Agnipurāṇa

agnipurāṇaṃ ।

athāgnipurāṇānukramaṇikā ।

adhyāye viṣayaḥ pṛṣṭhe purāṇapraśnaḥ matsyāvatāravarṇanam kūrmāvatāravarṇanam varāha-nṛsiṃha-vāmana-paraśurāmāvatāravarṇanam rāmāvatāravarṇanam harivaṃśakathanam bhāratākhyānam buddhakalkyavatāravarṇanam navasargapradarśanaṃ āgamoktaviṣṇvādidevatāsāmānyapūjā snānavidhiḥ vāsudevādipūjāvidhiḥ kuṇḍanirmāṇādyagnikāryakathanam vāsudevādimantranirūpaṇam mudrālakṣaṇakathanam sarvadīkṣākathanam ācāryābhiṣekaḥ sarvatobhadramaṇḍalādilakṣaṇam maṇḍalavidhiḥ kuśāpāmarjanakathanam dīkṣitasaṃskāraḥ viṣṇupavitrārohaṇādividhānam sarvadevapavitrārohaṇavidhiḥ devālayanirmāṇaphalam bhūmiparigrahaḥ arghyadānavidhiḥ śilāvinyāsaḥ prāsādalakṣaṇakathanam prāsādadevatāsthāpanādikathanam vāsudevādipratimālakṣaṇakathanam piṇḍikālakṣaṇam śālagrāmādimūrtilakṣaṇam śālagrāmādipūjā viṣṇucaturviṃśatimūrtistotraṃ matsyādipratimālakṣaṇam devīpratimālakṣaṇam sūryādipratimālakṣaṇam yoginīpratimālakṣaṇam liṅgalakṣaṇam vyaktāvyaktaliṅgalakṣaṇam liṅgapiṇḍikālakṣaṇam dikpālayāgakathanam kalaśādhivāsaḥ devasnapanavidhiḥ devādhivāsanavidhiḥ vāsudevapratiṣṭhā dvārapratiṣṭhādhvajārohaṇādikathanaṃ lakṣmīpratiṣṭhā sudarśanacakrādipratiṣṭhā kūpādipratiṣṭhā sabhāgṛhasthāpanam sādhāraṇapratiṣṭhā jīrṇamūrtyuddhāraḥ devayātrotsavaḥ yajñāvabhṛthasnānaṃ vṛkṣārāmādipratiṣṭhā vināyakapūjā viśeṣasnānādikathanam sūryārcanaṃ śivapūjā agnisthāpanādikathanam caṇḍapūjā kapilādipūjanam pavitrādhivāsanavidhiḥ pavitrārohaṇam damanakārohaṇavidhiḥ samayadīkṣā saṃskāradīkṣā nirvāṇadīkṣādhivāsanaṃ nirvāṇadīkṣā ekatattvadīkṣā nirvāṇadīkṣāṅgībhūtābhiṣekakathanaṃ nānāmantrakathanam pātālaśilānyāsaḥ vāstupūjā prāsādaśilānyāsaḥ śivaliṅgapratiṣṭhāsāmagrī śivaliṅgādhivāsanavidhiḥ śivaliṅgapratiṣṭhāvidhiḥ gaurīpratiṣṭhāvidhiḥ sūryapratiṣṭhāvidhiḥ dvārapratiṣṭhā prāsādakṛtyapratiṣṭhā dhvajārohaṇam jīrṇaśivaliṅgoddhāraḥ prāsādasāmānyalakṣaṇam gṛhādivāstukathanam nagarādivāstukathanam svāyambhuvasargakathanam bhuvanakoṣavarṇanam tīrthamāhātmyam gaṅgāmāhatmyam prayāgamāhatmyam vārāṇasīmāhātmyakathanam narmadādimāhātmyakathanam gayāmāhātmyakathanam gayāyātrā śrāddhakalpaḥ bhāratavarṣavarṇanaṃ mahādvīpādivarṇanaṃ bhuvanakoṣavarṇanaṃ jyotiḥśāstraṃ kālagaṇanaṃ yuddhajayārṇavīyanānāyogāḥ yuddhajayārṇavīyajyotiḥśāstrasāraḥ yuddhajayārṇavīyanānācakrāṇi yuddhajayārṇavīyanakṣatranirṇayaḥ yuddhajayārṇavīyanānābalāni yuddhajayārṇavīyakoṭacakraṃ yuddhajayārṇavīyārghyakāṇḍaṃ yuddhajayārṇavīyamaṇḍalaṃ yuddhajayārṇavīyacakrādiḥ yuddhajayārṇavīyasevācakraṃ yuddhajayārṇavīyanānābalāni yuddhajayārṇavīyatrailokyavijayavidyā yuddhajayārṇavīyasaṅgrāmavijayavidyā yuddhajayārṇavīyanakṣatracakraṃ yuddhajayārṇavīyamahāmārīvidyā yuddhajayārṇavīyaṣaṭkarmāṇi yuddhajayārṇavīyaṣaṣṭisaṃvatsarāṇi yuddhajayārṇavīyaṣoḍaśapadakā yuddhajayārṇavīyaṣaṭviṃśatpadakajñānaṃ yuddhajayārṇavīyamantrauṣadhādayaḥ yuddhajayārṇavīyakubjikākramapūjā yuddhajayārṇavīyakubjikāpūjā mālinīmantrādinyāsaḥ aṣṭāṣṭakadevī tvaritāpūjādiḥ saṅgrāmavijayapūjā ayutalakṣakoṭihomāḥ manvantarāṇi varṇetaradharmāḥ gṛhasthavṛttayaḥ brahmacaryāśramaḥ vivāhaḥ ācārādhyāyaḥ dravyaśuddhiḥ śāvāśaucādiḥ srāvādyaśaucaṃ asaṃskṛtādiśaucaṃ vānaprasthāśramaḥ yatidharmaḥ dharmaśāstraṃ śrāddhakalpaḥ navagrahahomaḥ nānādharmāḥ varṇadharmāḥ ayutalakṣakoṭihomāḥ mahāpātakādayaḥ prāyaścittāni vrataparibhāṣā pratipadvratāni dvitīyāvratāni tṛtīyāvratāni caturthīvratāni pañcamīvratāni ṣaṣṭhīvratāni saptamīvratāni aṣṭamīvratāni navamīvratāni daśamīvratāni ekādaśīvratāni dvādaśīvratāni śravaṇadvādaśīvrataṃ akhaṇḍadvādaśīvrataṃ trayodaśīvratāni caturdaśīvratāni śivarātrivrataṃ aśokapūrṇimādivrataṃ vāravratāni nakṣatravratāni divasavratāni māsavratāni nānāvratāni dīpadānavrataṃ navavyūhārcanaṃ puṣpādhyāyaḥ narakasvarūpavarṇanaṃ māsopavāsavrataṃ bhīṣmapañcakavrataṃ agastyārghyadānavrataṃ kaumudavrataṃ vratadānādisamuccayaḥ dānaparibhāṣā mahādānāni nānādānāni bherudānāni pṛthvīdānāni mantramāhātmyaṃ sandhyāvidhiḥ gāyatrīnirvāṇaṃ rājābhiṣekaḥ abhiṣekamantrāḥ śatruvijayasahāyasampattiḥ anujīvivṛttañca durgasampattiḥ rājadharmāḥ yuddhayātrā svapnādhyāyaḥ śakunaphalaṃ yātrāmaṇḍalacintādiḥ ṣāḍguṇyaṃ prātyahikarājakarma raṇadīkṣā śrīstotraṃ rāmoktanītiḥ rājyāṅgāni dvādaśarājamaṇḍalāni sandhivigrahādayaś ca sāmādyupāyāḥ rājanītiḥ puruṣalakṣaṇaṃ strīlakṣaṇaṃ āyudhalakṣaṇaṃ ratnaparīkṣā vāstulakṣaṇaṃ puṣpādipūjāphalaṃ dhanurvedāḥ vyavahārāḥ divyapramāṇāni dāyavibhāgaḥ sīmāvivādādinirṇayaḥ vākpāruṣyādiprakaraṇaṃ ṛgvidhānaṃ yajurvidhānaṃ sāmavidhānaṃ atharvavidhānaṃ utpātaśāntiḥ devapūjāvaiśvadevādibaliḥ dikpālādisnānaṃ vināyakasnānaṃ māheśvarasnānalakṣakoṭihomādayaḥ nārījanāvidhiḥ chatrādimantrādayaḥ viṣṇupañjaraṃ vedaśākhādayaḥ dānādimāhātmyaṃ sūryavaṃśaḥ somavaṃśaḥ yuduvaṃśaḥ dvādaśasaṃgrāmāḥ rājavaṃśaḥ puruvaṃśaḥ siddhauṣadhāni sarvarogaharāṇyauṣadhāni rasādilakṣaṇaṃ vṛkṣāyurvedaḥ nānārogaharāṇyauṣadhāni mantrarūpauṣadhāni mṛtasañjīvanīkarasiddhayogaḥ kalpasāgaraḥ gajacikitsā aśvavāhanasāraḥ aśvacikitsā aśvaśāntiḥ gajaśāntiḥ śāntyāyurvedaḥ mantraparibhāṣā nāgalakṣaṇāni daṣṭacikitsā pañcāṅgarudravidhānaṃ viṣahṛnmantrauṣadhaṃ gonasādicikitsā bālagrahaharabālatantraṃ grahahṛnmantrādikaṃ mūryārcanaṃ nānāmantrāḥ aṅgākṣarārcanaṃ pañcākṣarādipūjāmantrāḥ pañcapañcāśadviṣṇunāmāni nārasiṃhādimantrāḥ trailokyamohanamantrāḥ trailokyamohanīlakṣmyādipūjā tvaritāpūjā tvaritāmantrādiḥ tvaritāmūlamantrādiḥ tvaritāvidyā nānāmantrāḥ tvaritājñānaṃ stambhanādimantrāḥ nānāmantrāḥ sakalādimantroddhāraḥ gaṇapūjā vāgīśvarīpūjā maṇḍalāni aghorāstrādiśāntikalpaḥ pāśupataśāntiḥ ṣaḍaṅgānyadhorāstrāṇi rudraśāntiḥ aṃśakādiḥ gauryādipūjā devālayamāhātmyaṃ chandaḥsāraḥ chandojātinirūpanaṃ viṣamakathanaṃ ardhasamanirūpaṇaṃ samavṛttanirūpaṇaṃ prastāranirūpaṇaṃ śikṣānirūpaṇaṃ kāvyādilakṣaṇaṃ nāṭakanirūpaṇaṃ śṛṅgārādirasanirūpaṇaṃ rītinirūpaṇaṃ nṛtyādāvaṅgakarmanirūpaṇaṃ abhinayādinirūpaṇaṃ śabdālaṅkārāḥ arthālaṅkārāḥ śabdārthālaṅkārāḥ kāvyaguṇavivekaḥ kāvyadoṣavivekaḥ ekākṣarābhidhānaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ sandhisiddharūpaṃ puṃliṅgaśabdasiddharūpaṃ strīliṅgaśabdasiddharūpaṃ napuṃsakaśabdasiddharūpaṃ kārakaṃ samāsaḥ taddhitaṃ unādisiddharūpaṃ tiṅvibhaktisiddharūpaṃ kṛtsiddharūpaṃ svargapātālādivargāḥ avyayavargāḥ nānārthavargāḥ bhūmivanauṣadhyādivargāḥ nṛvargāḥ brahmavargāḥ kṣatrabiṭhśūdravargāḥ sāmānyanāmaliṅgāni nityanaimittikaprākṛtapralayāḥ ātyantikalayagarbhotpattyādayaḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ narakanirūpanaṃ yamaniyamāḥ āsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhārāḥ dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā samādhiḥ brahmajñānaṃ samādhiḥ brahmajñānaṃ advaitabrahmajñānaṃ gītāsāraḥ yamagītā āgneyapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ 

oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya ।

agnipurāṇam ।

chapter 

ś atha prathamo adhyāyaḥ

granthaprastāvanā śriyaṃ sarasvatīṃ gaurīṃ gaṇeśaṃ skandamīśvaram । brahmāṇaṃ vahnimindrādīn vāsudevaṃ namāmyaham ।। naimiṣe harimījānā ṛṣayaḥ śaunakādayaḥ । tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena svāgataṃ sūtamabruvan ।।

ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
sūta tvaṃ pūjito asmābhiḥ sārātsāraṃ vadasva naḥ ।yena vijñānamātreṇa sarvajñatvaṃ prajāyate ।।
sūta uvāca
sārātsāro hi bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sargādikṛdvibhuḥ ।brahmāhamasmi taṃ jñātvā sarvajñatvaṃ prajāyate ।।dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat ।dve vidye veditavye hi iti cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ ।।ahaṃ śukaś ca pailādyā gatvā vadarikāśramam ।vyāsaṃ natvā pṛṣṭavantaḥ so asmān sāramathābravīt ।।
vyāsa uvāca
śukādyaiḥ śṛṇu sūta tvaṃ vaśiṣṭho māṃ yathābravīt ।brahmasāraṃ hi pṛcchantaṃ munibhiś ca parātparam ।।

lakṣmīmiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vijñātamātreṇa iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

aparañca parañca yaditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yadabravīditi kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

vasiṣṭha uvāca
dvaividhyaṃ brahma vakṣyāmi śṛṇu vyāsākhilānugam ।yathāgnirmāṃ purā prāha munibhirdaivataiḥ saha ।।purāṇaṃ paramāgneyaṃ brahmavidyākṣaraṃ param ।ṛgvedādyaparaṃ brahma sarvadevasukhāvaham ।।agninoktaṃ purāṇam yad āgneyaṃ brahmasammitam ।bhuktimuktipradaṃ divyaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṛṇām ।।kālāgnirūpiṇam viṣṇuṃ jyotirbrahma parātparam ।munibhiḥ pṛṣṭavān devaṃ pūjitaṃ jñānakarmabhiḥ ।।
vasiṣṭha uvāca
saṃsārasāgarottāra- nāvaṃ brahmeśvaraṃ vada ।vidyāsāraṃ yadviditvā sarvajño jāyate naraḥ ।।
agnir uvāca
viṣṇuḥ kālāgnirudro ahaṃ vidyāsāraṃ vadāmi te ।vidyāsāraṃ purāṇaṃ yat sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇaṃ ।।sargasya pratisargasya vaṃśamanvantarasya ca ।vaṃśānucaritādeś ca, matsyakūrmādirūpadhṛk ।।dve vidye bhagavān viṣṇuḥ parā caivāparā ca ha ।ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvākhyā vedāṅgāni ca ṣaḍ dvija ।।

dve vidye brahma iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

akhilātmagamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sarvavedamukham paramiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vedasammitamiti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

puṇyamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yad gaditvā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

jñānasandīpanādeva iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

brahmāgneyaṃ purāṇamiti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

yad dvija iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ jyotiṣāṅgatiḥ ।chando abhidhānaṃ mīmāṃsā dharmaśāstraṃ purāṇakam ।।nyāyavaidyakagāndharvaṃ dhanurvedo arthaśāstrakam ।apareyaṃ parā vidyā yayā brahmābhigamyate ।।yattadadṛśyamagrāhyam agotracaraṇam dhruvam ।viṣṇunoktaṃ yathā mahyaṃ devebhyo brahmaṇā purā ।tathā te kathayiṣyāmi hetuṃ matsyādirūpiṇam ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye praśno nāma prathamodhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvitīyo adhyāyaḥ

matsyāvatāravarṇanaṃ

vaśiṣṭha uvāca
matsyādirūpiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ brūhi sargādikāraṇam ।purāṇaṃ brahma cāgneyaṃ yathā viṣṇoḥ purā śrutam ।।
agnir uvāca
matsyāvatāraṃ vakṣye ahaṃ vasiṣṭha śṛṇu vai hareḥ ।avatārakriyā duṣṭa- naṣṭyai satpālanāya hi ।।āsīdatītakalpānte brāhmo naimittiko layaḥ ।samudropaplutāstatra lokā bhūrādikā mune ।।manurvaivasvatastepe tapo vai bhuktimuktaye ।ekadā kṛtamālāyāṃ kurvato jalatarpaṇaṃ ।।tasyāñjalyudake matsyaḥ svalpa eko abhyapadyata ।kṣeptukāmaṃ jale prāha na māṃ kṣipa narottama ।।

brahmāvagamyate iti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

agotracaraṇaṃ paramiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

na māṃ kṣipa nṛpottama iti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
p>grāhādibhyo bhayaṃ me adya tac chrutvā kalaśe akṣipat ।sa tu vṛddhaḥ punarmatsyaḥ prāha taṃ dehi me vṛhat ।।sthānametadvacaḥ śrutvā rājāthodañcane akṣipat ।tatra vṛddho abravīdbhūpaṃ pṛthu dehi padaṃ mano ।।sarovare punaḥ kṣipto vavṛdhe tatpramāṇavān ।ūce dehi vṛhat sthānaṃ prākṣipaccāmbudhau tataḥ ।।lakṣayojanavistīrṇaḥ kṣaṇamātreṇa so abhavat ।matsyaṃ tamadbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ prābravīn manuḥ ।।ko bhavān nanu vai viṣṇur nārāyaṇa namostute ।māyayā mohayasi māṃ kimarthaṃ tvaṃ janārdana ।।manunokto abravīnmatsyo manuṃ vai pālane ratam ।avatīrṇo bhavāyāsya jagato duṣṭanaṣṭaye ।।saptame divase tvabdhiḥ plāvayiṣyati vai jagat ।upasthitāyāṃ nāvi tvaṃ vījādīni vidhāya ca ।।saptarṣibhiḥ parivṛto niśāṃ brāhmīṃ cariṣyasi ।upasthitasya me śṛṅge nibadhnīhi mahāhinā ।।ityuktvāntardadhe matsyo manuḥ kālapratīkṣakaḥ ।sthitaḥ samudra udvele nāvamāruruhe tadā ।।ekaśṛṅgadharo matsyo haimo niyutayojanaḥ ।

me atra iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

punaḥ sthānamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ambudhau manuriti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

nanu viṣṇustvamiti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

ity uktāntarhito matsya iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ity uktvā devamatsyātmā bṛhatkāraṇasaṅgata iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
nāvambabandha tacchṛṅge matsyākhyaṃ ca purāṇakam ।।śuśrāva matsyātpāpaghnaṃ saṃstuvan stutibhiś ca taṃ ।brahmavedaprahartāraṃ hayagrīvañca dānavaṃ ।।avadhīt, vedamatsyādyān pālayāmāsa keśavaḥ ।prāpte kalpe atha vārāhe kūrmarūpo abhavaddhariḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye matsyāvatāro nāma dvitīyo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha tṛtīyo adhyāyaḥ

kūrmāvatāravarṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
vakṣye kūrmāvatārañca śrutvā pāpapraṇāśanam ।purā devāsure yuddhe daityair devāḥ parājitāḥ ।।durvāsasaś ca śāpena niśrīkāścābhavaṃstadā ।stutvā kṣīrābdhigaṃ viṣṇum ūcuḥ pālaya cāsurāt ।।brahmādikān hariḥ prāha sandhiṃ kurvantu cāsuraiḥ ।kṣīrābdhimathanārthaṃ hi amṛtārthaṃ śriye asurāḥ ।।arayo api hi sandheyāḥ sati kāryārthagaurave ।yuṣmānamṛtabhājo hi kārayāmi na dānavān ।।

nāvaṃ badhvā tasya śṛṅge iti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

stutibhirmanuriti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

saṃśrutaṃ pāpanāśanamiti kha, ga, gha cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

surā kṣīrābdhigamiti ga, gha, cihnitapustkadvayapāṭhaḥ

sandhiṃ kuruta cāsurariti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhājo hi kariṣyāmi iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā tu vāsukim ।kṣīrābdhiṃ matsahāyena nirmathadhvamatandritāḥ ।।viṣṇūktāṃ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā daityaiḥ kṣīrābdhimāgatāḥ ।tato mathitumārabdhāḥ yataḥ pucchantataḥ surāḥ ।।phaṇiniḥśvāsasantaptā hariṇāpyāyitāḥ surāḥ ।mathyamāne arṇave so adrir anādhāro hy apo aviśat ।।kūrmarūpaṃ samāsthāya dadhre viṣṇuś ca mandaram ।kṣīrābdhermathyamānācca viṣaṃ hālāhalaṃ hy abhūt ।।hareṇa dhāritaṃ kaṇṭhe nīlakaṇṭhastato abhavat ।tato abhūdvāruṇī devī pārijātastu kaustubhaḥ ।।gāvaścāpsaraso divyā lakṣmīrdevī hariṅgatā ।paśyantaḥ sarvadevāstāṃ stuvantaḥ saśriyo abhavan ।।tato dhanvantarirviṣṇur āyurvedapravartakaḥ ।bibhrat kamaṇḍalumpūrṇam amṛtena samutthitaḥ ।।amṛtaṃ tatkarāddaityā surebhyo ardhaṃ pradāya ca ।gṛhītvā jagmurjanmādyā viṣṇuḥ strīrūpadhṛk tataḥ ।।tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpasampannāṃ daityāḥ procurvimohitāḥ ।bhava bhāryāmṛtaṃ gṛhya pāyayāsmān varānane ।।tathetyuktvā haristebhyo gṛhītvāpāyayatsurān ।candrarūpadharo rāhuḥ pibaṃścārkendunārpitaḥ ।।

rajjaṃ kṛtvā tu iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

niḥśvāsasaṃglānā iti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

tato hara iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

pradarśaka iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

akandusūcita iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
hariṇāpyariṇā cchinnaṃ sa rāhustacchiraḥ pṛthak ।kṛpayāmaratānnītaṃ varadaṃ harimabravīt ।।rāhurmattastu candrārkau prāpsyete grahaṇaṃ grahaḥ ।tasmin kale ca yaddānaṃ dāsyante syāt tadakṣayaṃ ।।tathetyāhātha taṃ viṣṇus tataḥ sarvaiḥ sahāmaraiḥ ।strīrūpaṃ samparityajya hareṇoktaḥ pradarśaya ।।darśayāmāsa rudrāya strīrūpaṃ bhagavān hariḥ ।māyayā mohitaḥ śambhuḥ gaurīṃ tyaktvā striyaṃ gataḥ ।।nagna unmattarūpo abhūt striyaḥ keśānadhārayat ।agādvimucya keśān strī anvadhāvacca tāṅgatām ।।skhalitaṃ tasya vīryaṃ kau yatra yatra harasya hi ।tatra tatrābhavat kṣetraṃ liṅgānāṃ kanakasya ca ।।māyeyamiti tāṃ jñātvā svarūpastho abhavaddharaḥ ।śivamāha harī rudra jitā māyā tvayā hi me ।।na jetumenāṃ śakto me tvadṛte anyaḥ pumān bhuvi ।aprāpyāthāmṛtaṃ daityā devair yuddhe nipātitāḥ ।tridivasthāḥ surāścāsan yaḥ paṭhet tridivaṃ vrajet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye kūrmāvatāro nāma tṛtīyo adhyāyaḥ ।।

hariṇā cāsinā cchinnamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhaveyaṃ ye tadā dānaṃ dāsyante syāttadakṣayamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

māyayā mohito rudrastarasā tāṃ jagāma ha । mohinīṃ prāpya matimān striyaḥ keśāmadhārayaditi ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tatra tatra mahātīrthaṃ kṣetrāṇāmuttamottamamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha caturtho adhyāyaḥ

varāhādyavatāravarṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
avatāraṃ varāhasya vakṣye ahaṃ pāpanāśanam ।hiraṇyākṣo asureśo abhūt devān jitvā divi sthitaḥ ।।devair gatvā stuto viṣṇur yajñarūpo varāhakaḥ ।abhūt, taṃ dānavaṃ hatvā daityaiḥ sākañca kaṇṭakam ।।dharmadevādirakṣākṛt tataḥ so antardadhe hariḥ ।hiraṇyākṣasya vai bhrātā hiraṇyakaśipus tathā ।।jitadevayajñabhāgaḥ sarvadevādhikārakṛt ।nārasiṃhavapuḥ kṛtvā taṃ jaghāna suraiḥ saha ।।svapadasthān surāṃś cakre nārasiṃhaḥ suraiḥ stutaḥ ।devāsure purā yuddhe baliprabhṛtibhiḥ surāḥ ।।jitāḥ svargātparibhraṣṭā hariṃ vai śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ।surāṇāmabhayaṃ datvā adityā kaśyapena ca ।।stuto asau vāmano bhūtvā hy adityāṃ sa kratuṃ yayau ।baleḥ śrīyajamānasya, rājadvāre agṛṇāt śrutiṃ ।।devān paṭhantaṃ taṃ śrutvā vāmanaṃ varado abravīt ।nivārito api śukreṇa balir brūhi yad icchasi ।।tatte ahaṃ sampradāsyāmi, vāmano balimabravīt ।

surendrobhūditi gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

surān jitveti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sārdhantu kaṇṭakamiti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

hiraṇyakaśipustadeti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

harinte iti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
padatrayaṃ hi gurvarthaṃ dehi dāsye tamabravīt ।।toye tu patite haste vāmano abhūdavāmanaḥ ।bhūrlokaṃ sa bhuvarlokaṃ svarlokañca padatrayaṃ ।।cakre baliñca sūtalaṃ tacchakrāya dadau hariḥ ।śakro devair hariṃ stutvā bhuvaneśaḥ sukhī tvabhūt ।।vakṣye paraśurāmasya cāvatāraṃ śṛṇu dvija ।uddhatān kṣatriyān matvā bhūbhāraharaṇāya saḥ ।।avatīrṇo hariḥ śāntyai devaviprādipālakaḥ ।jamadagne reṇukāyāṃ bhārgavaḥ śastrapāragaḥ ।।dattātreyaprasādena kārttavīryo nṛpastvabhṛt ।sahasrabāhuḥ sarvorvī- patiḥ sa mṛgayāṃ gataḥ ।।śrānto nimantrito araṇye muninā jamadagninā ।kāmadhenuprabhāveṇa bhojitaḥ sabalo nṛpaḥ ।।aprārthayat kāmadhenuṃ yadā sa na dadau tadā ।hṛtavānatha rāmeṇa śiraśchitvā nipātitaḥ ।।yuddhe paraśunā rājā dhenuḥ svāśramamāyayau ।kārttavīryasya putraistu jamadagnirnipātitaḥ ।।rāme vanaṃ gate vairād atha rāmaḥ samāgataḥ ।pitaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā pitṛnāśābhimarṣitaḥ ।।triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ niḥkṣatrāmakarodvibhuḥ ।kurukṣetre pañca kuṇḍān kṛtvā santarpya vai pitṝn ।।

me gurvarthamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhrānta iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

aprārthayaddhomadhenumiti kha, ga, cihinitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

sadhenuścāśramaṃ yayau iti kha, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
kāśyapāya mahīṃ datvā mahendre parvate sthitaḥ ।kūrmasya ca varāhasya nṛsiṃhasya ca vāmanaṃ ।avatāraṃ ca rāmasya śrutvā yāti divaṃ naraḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye varāhanṛsiṃhādyavatāro nāma caturtho adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcamo adhyāyaḥ

śrīrāmāvatāravarṇanam

agnir uvāca
rāmāyaṇamahaṃ vakṣye nāradenoditaṃ purā ।vālmīkaye yathā tadvat paṭhitaṃ bhuktimuktidam ।।
nārada uvāca
viṣṇunābhyabjajo brahmā marīcirbrahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ ।marīceḥ kaśyapastasmāt sūryo vaivasvato manuḥ ।।tatastasmāttathekṣvākus tasya vaṃśe kakutsthakaḥ ।kakutsthasya raghustasmād ajo daśarathastataḥ ।।rāvaṇāderbadhārthāya caturdhābhūt svayaṃ hariḥ ।rājño daśarathādrāmaḥ kauśalyāyāṃ babhūva ha ।।kaikeyyāṃ bharataḥ putraḥ sumitrāyāñca lakṣmaṇaḥ ।śatrughna ṛṣyaśṛṅgeṇa tāsu sandattapāyasāt ।।prāśitādyajñasaṃsiddhād rāmādyāś ca samāḥ pituḥ ।yajñavighnavināśāya viśvāmitrārthito nṛpaḥ ।।rāmaṃ sampreṣayāmāsa lakṣmaṇaṃ muninā saha ।

rāmo gato astraśastrāṇi śikṣitastāḍakāntakṛt ।।mārīcaṃ mānavāstreṇa mohitaṃ dūrato anayat ।subāhuṃ yajñahantāraṃ sabalañcāvadhīt balī ।।siddhāśramanivāsī ca viśvāmitrādibhiḥ saha ।gataḥ kratuṃ maithilasya draṣṭuñcāpaṃ sahānujaḥ ।।śatānandanimittena viśvāmitraprabhāvitaḥ ।rāmāya kathito rājñā samuniḥ pūjitaḥ kratau ।।dhanurāpūrayāmāsa līlayā sa babhañja tat ।vīryaśuklāñca janakaḥ sītāṃ kanyāntvayonijām ।।dadau rāmāya rāmo api pitrādau hi samāgate ।upayeme jānakīntām urmilāṃ lakṣmaṇas tathā ।।śrutakīrtiṃ māṇḍavīñca kuśadhvajasute tathā ।janakasyānujasyaite śatrughnabharatāvubhau ।।kanye dve upayemāte janakena supūjitaḥ ।rāmo agātsavaśiṣṭhādyair jāmadagnyaṃ vijitya ca ।ayodhyāṃ bharatobhyāgāt saśatrughno yudhājitaḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye rāmāyaṇe bālakāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcamo adhyāyaḥ

tāḍakāpahṛditi kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

babhañja taddṛḍhaṃ dhanuriti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tadā iti kha, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

bharatothāgāt iti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṣṭho adhyāyaḥ

śrīrāmāvatāravarṇanaṃ

nārada uvāca
bharate atha gate rāmaḥ pitrādīnabhyapūjayat ।rājā daśaratho rāmam uvāca śṛṇu rāghava ।।guṇānurāgādrājye tvaṃ prajābhirabhiṣecitaḥ ।manasāhaṃ prabhāte te yauvarājyaṃ dadāmi ha ।।rātrau tvaṃ sītayā sārdhaṃ saṃyataḥ suvrato bhava ।rājñaś ca mantriṇaścāṣṭau savasiṣṭhās tathābruvan ।।sṛṣṭirjayanto vijayaḥ siddhārtho rāṣṭravardhanaḥ ।aśoko dharmapālaś ca sumantraḥ savasiṣṭhakaḥ ।।pitrādivacanaṃ śrutvā tathetyuktvā sa rāghavaḥ ।sthito devārcanaṃ kṛtvā kauśalyāyai nivedya tat ।।rājovāca vasiṣṭhādīn rāmarājyābhiṣecane ।sambhārān sambhavantu sma ity uktvā kaikeyīṅgataḥ ।।ayodhyālaṅkṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā jñātvā rāmābhiṣecanaṃ ।bhaviṣyatītyācacakṣe kaikeyīṃ mantharā sakhī ।।pādau gṛhītvā rāmeṇa karṣitā sāparādhataḥ ।tena vaireṇa sā rāma- vanavāsañca kāṅkṣati ।।kaikeyi tvaṃ samuttiṣṭha rāmarājyābhiṣecanaṃ ।maraṇaṃ tava putrasya mama te nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।

rājyavardhana iti kha, ga, gha cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

sumantraś ca vaśiṣṭhaka iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakacatuṣṭayapāṭhaḥ

mantharāsatī iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ mantharā satīmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kabjayoktañca tac chrutvā ekamābharaṇaṃ dadau ।uvāca me yathā rāmas tathā me bharataḥ sutaḥ ।।upāyantu na paśyāmi bharato yena rājyabhāk ।kaikeyīmabravīt kruddhā hāraṃ tyaktvātha mantharā ।।bāliśe rakṣa bharatam ātmānaṃ māñca rāghavāt ।bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya tataḥ sutaḥ ।।rājavaṃśastu kaikeyi bharatāt parihāsyate ।devāsure purā yuddhe śambareṇa hatāḥ surāḥ ।।rātrau bhartā gatastatra rakṣito vidyayā tvayā ।varadvayantadā prādād yācedānīṃ nṛpañca tat ।।rāmasya ca vanevāsaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca ।yauvarājyañca bharate tadidānīṃ pradāsyati ।।protsāhitā kubjayā sā anarthe cārthadarśinī ।uvāca sadupāyaṃ me kaccittaṃ kārayiṣyati ।।krodhāgāraṃ praviṣṭātha patitā bhuvi mūrchitā ।dvijādīnarcayitvātha rājā daśarathastadā ।।dadarśa kekayīṃ ruṣṭām uvāca kathamīdṛśī ।rogārtā kiṃ bhayodvignā kimicchasi karomi tat ।।yena rāmeṇa hi vinā na jīvāmi muhūrtakam ।śapāmi tena kuryāṃ vai vāñchitaṃ tava sundari ।।satyaṃ brūhīti sovāca nṛpaṃ mahyaṃ dadāsi cet ।varadvayaṃ pūrvadattaṃ satyāt tvaṃ dehi me nṛpa ।।caturdaśasamā rāmo vane vasatu saṃyataḥ ।

kathitamiti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
sambhārair ebhiradyaiva bharatotrābhiṣecyatām ।।viṣaṃ pītvā mariṣyāmi dāsyasi tvaṃ na cennṛpa ।tac chrutvā mūrchito bhūmau vajrāhata ivāpatat ।।muhūrtāccetanāṃ prāpya kaikeyīmidamabravīt ।kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa mayā vā pāpaniś caye ।।yanmāmevaṃ bravīṣi tvaṃ sarvalokāpriyaṅkari ।kevalaṃ tvatpriyaṃ kṛtvā bhaviṣyāmi suninditaḥ ।।yā tvaṃ bhāryā kālarātrī bharato nedṛśaḥ sutaḥ ।praśādhi vidhavā rājyaṃ mṛte mayi gate sute ।।satyapāśanibaddhastu rāmamāhūya cābravīt ।kaikeyyā vañcito rāma rājyaṃ kuru nigṛhya mām ।।tvayā vane tu vastavyaṃ kaikeyībharato nṛpaḥ ।pitarañcaiva kaikeyīṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।kṛtvā natvā ca kauśalyāṃ samāśvasya salakṣmaṇaḥ ।sītayā bhāryayā sārdhaṃ sarathaḥ sasumantrakaḥ ।।datvā dānāni viprebhyo dīnānāthebhya eva saḥ ।mātṛbhiś caiva viprādyaiḥ śokārtair nirgataḥ purāt ।।uṣitvā tamasātīre rātrau paurān vihāya ca ।prabhāte tamapaśyanto ayodhyāṃ te punarāgatāḥ ।।rudan rājāpi kauśalyā- gṛhamāgāt suduḥkhitaḥ ।paurā janā striyaḥ sarvā rurudū rājayoṣitaḥ ।।rāmo rathasthaścīrāḍhyaḥ śṛṅgaverapuraṃ yayau ।guhena pūjitastatra iṅgudīmūlamāśritaḥ ।।

na tvaṃ bhāryā iti ga, gha, cha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

saṃśrita iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
lakṣmaṇaḥ sa guho rātrau cakraturjāgaraṃ hi tau ।sumantraṃ sarathaṃ tyaktvā prātar nāvātha jāhnavīṃ ।।rāmalakṣmaṇasītāś ca tīrṇā āpuḥ prayāgakam ।bharadvājaṃ namaskṛtya citrakūṭaṃ giriṃ yayuḥ ।।vāstupūjāntataḥ kṛtvā sthitā mandākinītaṭe ।sītāyai darśayāmāsa citrakūṭañca rāghavaḥ ।।nakhair vidārayantantāṃ kākantaccakṣurākṣipat ।aiṣikāstreṇa śaraṇaṃ prāpto devān vihāyasaḥ ।।rāme vanaṃ gate rājā ṣaṣṭhe ahni niśi cābravīt ।kauśalyāṃ sa kathāṃ paurvāṃ yadajñānaddhataḥ purā ।।kaumāre śarayūtīre yajñadattakumārakaḥ ।śabdabhedācca kumbhena śabdaṃ kurvaṃś ca tatpitā ।।śaśāpa vilapanmātrā śokaṃ kṛtvā rudanmuhuḥ ।putraṃ vinā mariṣyāvas tvaṃ ca śokānmariṣyasi ।।putraṃ vinā smaran śokāt kauśalye maraṇaṃ mama ।kathāmuktvātha hā rāmam uktvā rājā divaṅgataḥ ।।suptaṃ mattvātha kauśalyā suptā śokārtameva sā ।suprabhāte gāyanāś ca sūtamāgadhavandinaḥ ।।prabodhakā bodhayanti na ca budhyatyasau mṛtaḥ ।kauśalyā taṃ mṛtaṃ jñātvā hā hatāsmīti cābravīt ।।narā nāryo atha rurudur ānīto bharatastadā ।vaśiṣṭhādyaiḥ saśatrughnaḥ śīghraṃ rājagṛhātpurīm ।।

pūrvāmiti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

nṛpa iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

cāpataditi ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dṛṣṭvā saśokāṃ kaikeyīṃ nindayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ ।akīrtiḥ pātitā mūrdhni kauśalyāṃ sa praśasya ca ।।pitarantailadroṇisthaṃ saṃskṛtya sarayūtaṭe ।vaśiṣṭhādyair janair ukto rājyaṃ kurviti so abravīt ।।vrajāmi rāmamānetuṃ rāmo rājā mato balī ।śṛṅgaveraṃ prayāgañca bharadvājena bhojitaḥ ।।namaskṛtya bharadvājaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇamāgataḥ ।pitā svargaṃ gato rāma ayodhyāyāṃ nṛpo bhava ।।ahaṃ vanaṃ prayāsyāmi tvadādeśapratīkṣakaḥ ।rāmaḥ śrutvā jalaṃ datvā gṛhītvā pāduke vraja ।।rājyāyāhannayāsyāmi satyāccīrajaṭādharaḥ ।rāmokto bharataścāyān nandigrāme sthito balī ।।tyaktvāyodhyāṃ pāduke te pūjya rājyamapālayat ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye rāmāyaṇe ayodhyākāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptamo adhyāyaḥ

rāmāyaṇavarṇanaṃ

nārada uvāca
rāmo vaśiṣṭhaṃ mātṝñca natvātiñca praṇamya saḥ ।anasūyāñca tatpatnīṃ śarabhaṅgaṃ sutīkṣṇakam ।।

yato balī iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ gato balī iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

nāhaṃ rājyaṃ prayāsyāmi iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ rājyaṃ nāhaṃ prayāsyāmi iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
agastyabhrātaraṃ natvā agastyantatprasādataḥ ।dhanuḥkhaḍgañca samprāpya daṇḍakāraṇyamāgataḥ ।।janasthāne pañcavaṭyāṃ sthito godāvarītaṭe ।tatra sūrpaṇakhāyātā bhakṣituṃ tān bhayaṅkarī ।।rāmaṃ surūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā kāminī vākyamabravīt ।kastvaṃ kasmātsamāyāto bhartā me bhava cārthitaḥ ।।etau ca bhakṣayiṣyāmi ity uktvā taṃ samudyatā ।tasyā nāsāñca karṇau ca rāmokto lakṣmaṇo acchinat ।।raktaṃ kṣarantī prayayau kharaṃ bhrātaramabravīt ।mariṣyāmi vināsāhaṃ khara jīvāmi vai tadā ।।rāmasya bhāryā sītāsau tasyāsīllakṣmaṇo anujaḥ ।teṣām yadrudhiraṃ soṣṇaṃ pāyayiṣyasi māṃ yadi ।।kharastatheti tāmuktvā caturdaśasahasrakaiḥ ।rakṣasāṃ dūṣaṇenāgād yoddhuṃ triśirasā saha ।।rāmaṃ rāmo api yuyudhe śarair vivyādha rākṣasān ।hastyaśvarathapādātaṃ balaṃ ninye yamakṣayaṃ ।।triśīrṣāṇaṃ kharaṃ raudraṃ yudhyantañcaiva dūṣaṇam ।yayau sūrpaṇakhā laṅkāṃ rāvaṇāgre apatad bhuvi ।।abravīdrāvaṇaṃ kruddhā na tvaṃ rājā na rakṣakaḥ ।kharādihantū rāmasya sītāṃ bhāryāṃ harasva ca ।।rāmalakṣmaṇaraktasya pānājjīvāmi nānyathā ।tathetyāha ca tac chrutvā mārīcaṃ prāha vai vraja ।।svarṇacitramṛgo bhūtvā rāmalakṣmaṇakarṣakaḥ ।

hṛdrudhiramiti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

rakṣasāṃ sahasā prāyādyoddhumiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sītāgre tāṃ hariṣyāmi anyathā maraṇaṃ tava ।।mārīco rāvaṇaṃ prāha rāmo mṛtyurdhanurdharaḥ ।rāvaṇādapi martavyaṃ martavyaṃ rāghavādapi ।।avaśyaṃ yadi martavyaṃ varaṃ rāmo na rāvaṇaḥ ।iti matvā mṛgo bhūtvā sītāgre vyacaranmuhuḥ ।।sītayā prerito rāmaḥ śareṇāthāvadhīcca taṃ ।mriyamāṇo mṛgaḥ prāha hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca ।।saumitriḥ sītayokto atha viruddhaṃ rāmamāgataḥ ।rāvaṇopyaharat sītāṃ hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣaṃ ।।jaṭāyuṣā sa bhinnāṅgo aṅkenādāya jānakīm ।gato laṅkāmaśokākhye dhārayāmāsa cābravīt ।।bhava bhāryā mamāgryā tvaṃ rākṣasyo rakṣyatāmiyam ।rāmo hatvā tu mārīcaṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇamabravīt ।।māyāmṛgo asau saumitre yathā tvamiha cāgataḥ ।tathā sītā hṛtā nūnaṃ nāpaśyat sa gato atha tām ।।śuśoca vilalāpārto māntyaktvā kva gatāsi vai ।lakṣmaṇāśvāsito rāmo mārgayāmāsa jānakīm ।।dṛṣṭvā jaṭāyustaṃ prāha rāvaṇo hṛtavāṃś ca tāṃ ।mṛto atha saṃskṛtastena kabandhañcāvadhīttataḥ ।।śāpamukto abravīdrāmaṃ sa tvaṃ sugrīvamāvraja ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye rāmāyaṇe āraṇyakakāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma saptamo adhyāyaḥ

mṛtyurna tadvaramiti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

preṣita iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

viratha iti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

āhvayāmāsa iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha aṣṭamo adhyāyaḥ

śrīrāmāvatārakathanaṃ

nārada uvāca
rāmaḥ pampāsaro gatvā śocan sa śarvarīṃ tataḥ ।hanūmatā sa sugrīvaṃ nīto mitrañcakāra ha ।।sapta tālān vinirbhidya śareṇaikena paśyataḥ ।pādena dundubheḥ kāyañ cikṣepa daśayojanaṃ ।।tadripuṃ bālinaṃ hatvā bhrātaraṃ vairakāriṇam ।kiṣkindhāṃ kapirājyañca rumāntārāṃ samarpayat ।।ṛṣyamūke harīśāya kiṣkindheśo abravītsa ca ।sītāṃ tvaṃ prāśyase yadvat tathā rāma karomi te ।।tac chrutvā mālyavatpṛṣṭhe cāturmāsyaṃ cakāra saḥ ।kiṣkindhāyāñca sugrīvo yadā nāyāti darśanaṃ ।।tadābravīttaṃ rāmoktaṃ lakṣmaṇo vraja rāghavam ।na sa saṅkucitaḥ panthā yena bālī hato gataḥ ।।samaye tiṣṭha sugrīva mā bālipathamanvagāḥ ।sugrīva āha saṃsakto gataṃ kālaṃ na buddhavān ।।ityuktvā sa gato rāmaṃ natvovāca harīśvaraḥ ।ānītā vānarāḥ sarve sītāyāś ca gaveṣaṇe ।।

gauravācchavarīnataḥ iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । śavarīṃ tata iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hanūmatā vānarendramiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

abravīttat iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

prāpsyasi yathā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sugrīvamāha saṅkruddha iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ । sugrīva ṛddhisaṃsakta iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tvanmatāt preṣayiṣyāmi vicinvantu ca jānakīm ।pūrvādau māsamāyāntu māsādūrdhvaṃ nihanmi tān ।।ityuktā vānarāḥ pūrva- paścimottaramārgagāḥ ।jagmū rāmaṃ sasugrīvam apaśyantas tu jānakīm ।।rāmāṅgulīyaṃ saṅgṛhya hanūmān vānaraiḥ saha ।dakṣiṇe mārgayāmāsa suprabhāyā guhāntike ।।māsādūrdhvañca vinyastā apaśyantastu jānakīm ।ūcurvṛthā mariṣyāmo jaṭāyurdhanya evasaḥ ।।sītārthe yo atyajat prāṇān rāvaṇena hato raṇe ।tac chrutvā prāha sampātir vihāya kapibhakṣaṇaṃ ।।bhrātāsau me jaṭāyurvai mayoḍḍīno arkamaṇḍalam ।arkatāpādrakṣito agāt dagdhapakṣo ahamabbhragaḥ ।।rāmavārtāśravāt pakṣau jātau bhūyo atha jānakīm ।paśyāmyaśokavanikā- gatāṃ laṅkāgatāṃ kila ।।śatayojanavistīrṇe lavaṇābdhau trikūṭake ।jñātvā rāmaṃ sasugrīvaṃ vānarāḥ kathayantu vai ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye rāmāyāṇe kiṣkindhākāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma aṣṭamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha navamo adhyāyaḥ

śrīrāmāvatārakathanaṃ

nārada uvāca
sampātivacanaṃ śrutvā hanumānaṅgadādayaḥ ।abdhiṃ dṛṣṭvābruvaṃste abdhiṃ laṅghayet ko nu jīvayet ।।

kapīnāṃ jīvanārthāya rāmakāryaprasiddhaye ।śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ pupluve abdhiṃ sa mārutiḥ ।।dṛṣṭvotthitañca mainākaṃ siṃhikāṃ vinipātya ca ।laṅkāṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānāṃ gṛhāṇi vanitāgṛhe ।।daśagrīvasya kumbhasya kumbhakarṇasya rakṣasaḥ ।vibhīṣaṇasyendrajito gṛhe anyeṣāṃ ca rakṣaso ।।nāpaśyat pānabhūmyādau sītāṃ cintāparāyaṇaḥ ।aśokavanikāṃ gatvā dṛṣṭavāñchiṃśapātale ।।rākṣasīrakṣitāṃ sītāṃ bhava bhāryeti vādinaṃ ।rāvaṇaṃ śiṃśapāstho atha neti sītāntu vādinīṃ ।।bhava bhāryā rāvaṇasya rākṣasīrvādinīḥ kapiḥ ।gate tu rāvaṇe prāha rājā daśaratho abhavat ।।rāmo asya lakṣmaṇaḥ putrau vanavāsaṅgatau varau ।rāmapatnī jānakī tvaṃ rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt ।।rāmaḥ sugrīvamitras tvāṃ mārgayan preṣayacca mām ।sābhijñānañcāgulīyaṃ rāmadattaṃ gṛhāṇa vai ।।sītāṅgulīyaṃ jagrāha sāpaśyanmārūtintarau ।bhūyo agre copaviṣṭaṃ tam uvāca yadi jīvati ।।rāmaḥ kathaṃ na nayati śṛṅkitāmabravīt kapiḥ ।rāmaḥ sīte na jānīte jñātvā tvāṃ sa nayiṣyati ।।rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasaṃ hatvā sabalaṃ devi mā śuca ।sābhijñānaṃ dehi me tvaṃ maṇiṃ sītādadatkapau ।।uvāca māṃ yathā rāmo nayecchīghraṃ tathā kuru ।

rāmaś ca iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tvāṃ mārgayet preṣayecca māmiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kākākṣipātanakathām pratiyāhi hi śokaha ।।maṇiṃ kathāṃ gṛhītvāha hanūmānneṣyate patiḥ ।athavā te tvarā kācit pṛṣṭhamāruha me śubhe ।।adya tvāṃ darśayiṣyāmi sasugrīvañca rāghavam ।sītābravīddhanūmantaṃ nayatāṃ māṃ hi rāghavaḥ ।।hanūmān sa daśagrīva darśanopāyamākarot ।vanaṃ babhañja tatpālān hatvā dantanakhādibhiḥ ।।hatvātu kiṅkarān sarvān sapta mantrisutānapi ।putramakṣaṃ kumārañca śakrajicca babandha tam ।।nāgapāśena piṅgākṣaṃ darśayāmāsa rāvaṇam ।uvāca rāvaṇaḥ kastvaṃ mārutiḥ prāha rāvaṇam ।।rāmadūto rāghavāya sītāṃ dehi mariṣyasi ।rāmabāṇair hataḥ sārdhaṃ laṅkāsthai rākṣasair dhruvam ।।rāvaṇo hantumudyukto vibhīṣaṇanivāritaḥ ।dīpayāmāsa lāṅgalaṃ dīptapucchaḥ sa mārutiḥ ।।dagdhvā laṅkāṃ rākṣasāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ praṇamya tām ।samudrapāramāgamya dṛṣṭā sīteti cābravīt ।।aṅgadādīnaṅgadādyaiḥ pītvā madhuvane madhu ।jitvā dadhimukhādīṃś ca dṛṣṭvā rāmañca te abruvan ।।dṛṣṭā sīteti rāmo api hṛṣṭaḥ papraccha mārutim ।kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvayā sītā kimuvāca ca māmprati ।।sītākathāmṛtenaiva siñca māṃ kāmavahnigam ।hanūmānabravīdrāmaṃ laṅghayitvābdhimāgataḥ ।।sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā purīṃ dagdhvā sītāmaṇiṃ gṛhāṇa vai ।hatvā tvaṃ rāvaṇaṃ sītāṃ prāpsyase rāma mā śuca ।।gṛhītvā taṃ maṇiṃ rāmo ruroda virahāturaḥ ।

maṇiṃ dṛṣṭvā jānakī me dṛṣṭā sītā nayasva mām ।।tayā vinā na jīvāmi sugrīvādyaiḥ prabodhitaḥ ।samudratīraṃ gatavān tatra rāmaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ ।।gatastiraskṛto bhrātrā rāvaṇena durātmanā ।rāmāya dehi sītāṃ tva mityuktenāsahāyavān ।।rāmo vibhīṣaṇaṃ mitraṃ laṅkaiśvarye abhyaṣecayat ।samudraṃ prārthayanmārgaṃ yadā nāyāttadā śaraiḥ ।।bhedayāmāsa rāmañca uvācābdhiḥ samāgataḥ ।nalena setuṃ badhvābdhau laṅkāṃ vraja gabhīrakaḥ ।।ahaṃ tvayā kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ rāmo api nalasetunā ।kṛtena taruśailādyair gataḥ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ ।।vānaraiḥ sa suvelasthaḥ saha laṅkāṃ dadarśa vai ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye rāmāyaṇe sundarakāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma navamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha daśamo adhyāyaḥ

śrīrāmāvatāravarṇanaṃ

nārāda uvāca
rāmoktaścāṅgado gatvā rāvaṇaṃ prāha jānakī ।dīyatāṃ rāghavāyāśu anyathā tvaṃ mariṣyasi ।।rāvaṇo hantumudyuktaḥ saṅgrāmoddhatarākṣasaḥ ।rāmāyāha daśagrīvo yuddhamekaṃ tu manyate ।।rāmo yuddhāya tac chrutvā laṅkāṃ sakapirāyayau ।vānaro hanūmān maindo dvivido jāmbavānnalaḥ ।।nīlastāroṅgado dhūmraḥ suṣeṇaḥ keśarī gayaḥ ।

panaso vinato rambhaḥ śarabhaḥ krathano balī ।।gavākṣo dadhivaktraś ca gavayo gandhamādanaḥ ।ete cānye ca sugrīva etair yukto hy asaṅkhyakaiḥ ।।rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāñca yuddhaṃ saṅkulamābabhau ।rākṣasā vānarān jaghnuḥ śaraśaktigadādibhiḥ ।।vānarā rākṣasāñ jaghnur nakhadantaśilādibhiḥ ।hastyaśvarathapādātaṃ rākṣasānāṃ balaṃ hataṃ ।।hanūmān giriśṛṅgeṇa dhūmrākṣamabadhīdripum ।akampanaṃ prahastañca yudhyantaṃ nīla ābadhīt ।।indrajicccharabandhācca vimuktau rāmalakṣmaṇau ।tārkṣasandarśanādvāṇair jaghnatū rākṣasaṃ balam ।।rāmaḥ śarair jarjaritaṃ rāvaṇañcākarodraṇe ।rāvanaḥ kumbhakarṇañca bodhayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ ।।kumbhakarṇaḥ prabuddho atha pītvā ghaṭasahasrakam ।madyasya mahiṣādīnāṃ bhakṣayitvāha rāvaṇam ।।sītāyā haraṇaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtantvaṃ hi gururyataḥ ।ato gacchāmi yuddhāya rāmaṃ hanmi savānaram ।।ityuktvā vānarān sarvān kumbhakarṇo mamarda ha ।gṛhītastena sugrīvaḥ karṇanāsaṃ cakarta saḥ ।।karṇanāsāvihīno asau bhakṣayāmāsa vānarān ।rāmo atha kumbhakarṇasya bāhū ciccheda śāyakaiḥ ।।tataḥ pādau tataśchitvā śiro bhūmau vyapātayat ।atha kumbho nikumbhaś ca makarākṣaś ca rākṣasaḥ ।।mahodaro mahāpārśvo matta unmattarākṣasaḥ ।praghaso bhāsakarṇaś ca virūpākṣaś ca saṃyuge ।।devāntako narāntaś ca triśirāścātikāyakaḥ ।

rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇenaite vānaraiḥ savibhīṣaṇaiḥ ।।yudhyamānāstayā hy anye rākṣasā bhuvi pātitāḥ ।indrajinmāyayā yudhyan rāmādīn sambabandha ha ।।varadattair nāgabāṇaiḥ oṣadhyā tau viśalyakau ।viśalyayābraṇau kṛtvā mārutyānītaparvate ।।hanūmān dhārayāmāsa tatrāgaṃ yatra saṃsthitaḥ ।nikumbhilāyāṃ homādi kurvantaṃ taṃ hi lakṣmaṇaḥ ।।śarair indrajitaṃ vīraṃ yuddhe taṃ tu vyaśātayat ।rāvaṇaḥ śokasantaptaḥ sītāṃ hantuṃ samudyataḥ ।।avindhyavārito rājā rathasthaḥ sabalo yayau ।indrokto mātalī rāmaṃ rathasthaṃ pracakāra tam ।।rāmarāvaṇayoryuddhaṃ rāmarāvaṇayoriva ।rāvaṇo vānarān hanti mārutyādyāś ca rāvaṇam ।।rāmaḥ śastraistamastraiś ca vavardha jalado yathā ।tasya dhvajaṃ sa ciccheda rathamaśvāṃś ca sārathim ।।dhanurbāhūñchirāṃsyeva uttiṣṭhanti śirāṃsi hi ।paitāmahena hṛdayaṃ bhitvā rāmeṇa rāvaṇaḥ ।।bhūtale pātitaḥ sarvai rākṣasai ruruduḥ striyaḥ ।āśvāsya tañca saṃskṛtya rāmājñapto vibhīṣaṇaḥ ।।hanūmatānayadrāmaḥ sītāṃ śuddhāṃ gṛhītavān ।rāmo vahnau praviṣṭāntāṃ śuddhāmindrādibhiḥ stutaḥ ।।brahmaṇā daśarathena tvaṃ viṣṇū rākṣasamardanaḥ ।indrorcito amṛtavṛṣṭyā jīvayāmāsa vānarān ।।

nāgapaśair iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

suhṛnnivārita iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
rāmeṇa pūjitā jagmur yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā divañca te ।rāmo vibhīṣaṇāyādāl laṅkāmabhyarcya vānarān ।।sasītaḥ puṣpake sthitvā gatamārgeṇa vai gataḥ ।darśayan vanadurgāṇi sītāyai hṛṣṭamānasaḥ ।।bharadvājaṃ namaskṛtya nandigrāmaṃ samāgataḥ ।bharatena nataścāgād ayodhyāntatra saṃsthitaḥ ।।vasiṣṭhādīnnamaskṛtya kauśalyāñcaiva kekayīm ।sumitrāṃ prāptarājyo atha dvijādīn so abhyapūjayat ।।vāsudevaṃ svamātmānam aśvamedhair athāyajat ।sarvadānāni sa dadau pālayāmāsa saḥ prajāḥ ।।putravaddharmakāmādīn duṣṭanigrahaṇe rataḥ ।sarvadharmaparo lokaḥ sarvaśasyā ca medinī ।nākālamaraṇañcāsīd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye rāmāyaṇe yuddhakāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma daśamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ekādaśo adhyāyaḥ

śrīrāmāvatāravarṇanaṃ

nārada uvāca
rājyasthaṃ rāghavaṃ jagmur agastyādyāḥ supūjitāḥ ।dhanyastvaṃ vijayī yasmād indrajidvinipātitaḥ ।।brahmātmajaḥ pulastyobhūt viśravāstasya naikaṣī ।puṣpotkaṭābhūt prathamā tatputrobhūddhaneśvaraḥ ।।naikaṣyāṃ rāvaṇo jajñe viṃśadbāhurdaśānanaḥ ।

svargamārgeṇa vai gata iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tapasā brahmadattena vareṇa jitadaivataḥ ।।kumbhakarṇaḥ sanidro abhūd dharmiṣṭho abhūdvibhīṣaṇaḥ ।svasā śūrpaṇakhā teṣāṃ rāvaṇānmeghanādakaḥ ।।indraṃ jitvendrajiccābhūd rāvaṇādadhiko balī ।hatastvayā lakṣmaṇena devādeḥ kṣemamicchatā ।।ityuktvā te gatā viprā agastyādyā namaskṛtāḥ ।devaprārthitarāmoktaḥ śatrughno lavaṇārdanaḥ ।।abhūt pūrmathurā kācit rāmokto bharato avadhīt ।koṭitrayañca śailūṣa- putrāṇāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ ।।śailūṣaṃ duṣṭagandharvaṃ sindhutīranivāsinam ।takṣañca puṣkaraṃ putraṃ sthāpayitvātha deśayoḥ ।।bharatogātsaśatrughno rāghavaṃ pūjayan sthitaḥ ।rāmo duṣṭānnihatyājau śiṣṭān sampālya mānavaḥ ।।putrau kuśalavau jātau vālmīkerāśrame varau ।lokāpavādāttyaktāyāṃ jñātau sucaritaśravāt ।।rājyebhiṣicya brahmāham asmīti dhyānatatparaḥ ।daśavarṣasahasrāṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca ।।rājyaṃ kṛtvā kratūn kṛtvā svargaṃ devārcito yayau ।sapauraḥ sānujaḥ sītā- putro janapadānvitaḥ ।।
agnir uvāca
vālmīkir nāradācchrutvā rāmāyaṇamakārayat ।savistaraṃ yadetacca śṛṇuyātsa divaṃ vrajet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye rāmāyaṇe uttarakāṇḍavarṇanaṃ nāma ekādaśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvādaśo adhyāyaḥ

śrīharivaṃśavarṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
harivaṃśampravakṣyāmi viṣṇunābhyambujādajaḥ ।brahmaṇotristataḥ somaḥ somājjātaḥ purūravāḥ ।।tasmādāyurabhūttasmān nahuṣo ato yayātikaḥ ।yaduñca turvasuntasmād devayānī vyajāyata ।।druhyaṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī ।yadoḥ kule yādavāś ca vasudevastaduttamaḥ ।।bhuvo bhārāvatārārthaṃ devakyāṃ vasudevataḥ ।hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāḥ ṣaḍgarbhā yoganidrayā ।।viṣṇuprayuktayā nītā devakījaṭharaṃ purā ।abhūcca saptamo garbho devakyā jaṭharād balaḥ ।।saṅkrāmito abhūdrohiṇyāṃ rauhiṇeyastato hariḥ ।kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāñca nabhasi ardharātre caturbhujaḥ ।।devakyā vasudevena stuto bālo dvibāhukaḥ ।vasudevaḥ kaṃsabhayād yaśodāśayane anayat ।।yaśodābālikāṃ gṛhya devakīśayane anayat ।kaṃso bāladhvaniṃ śrutvā tāñcikṣepa śilātale ।।vāritopi sa devakyā mṛtyurgarbhoṣṭamo mama ।śrutvāśarīriṇīṃ vācaṃ matto garbhāstu māritāḥ ।।samarpitāstu devakyā vivāhasamayeritāḥ ।sā kṣiptā bālikā kaṃsam ākāśasthābravīdidam ।।kiṃ mayā kṣiptayā kaṃsa jāto yastvāṃ badhiṣyati ।

viṣṇunābhyabjādaja iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sarvasvabhūto devānāṃ bhūbhāraharaṇāya saḥ ।।ityuktvā sā ca śumbhādīn hatvendreṇa ca saṃstutā ।āryā durgā vedagarbhā ambikā bhadrakālyapi ।।bhadrā kṣemyā kṣemakarī naikabāhur namāmi tām ।trisandhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhennāma sarvān kāmānavāpnuyāt ।।kaṃso api pūtanādīṃś ca preṣayadbālanāśane ।yaśodāpatinandāya vasudevena cārpitau ।।rakṣaṇāya ca kaṃsāder bhītenaiva hi gokule ।rāmakṛṣṇau ceratustau gobhirgopālakaiḥ saha ।।sarvasya jagataḥ pālau gopālau tau babhūvatuḥ ।kṛṣṇaścolūkhale baddho dāmnā vyagrayaśodayā ।।yamalārjunamadhye agād bhagnau ca yamalārjunau ।parivṛttaś ca śakaṭaḥ pādakṣepāt stanārthinā ।।pūtanā stanapānena sā hatā hantumudyatā ।vṛndāvanagataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kāliyaṃ yamunāhradāt ।।jitvā niḥsārya cābdhisthañ cakāra balasaṃstutaḥ ।kṣemaṃ tālavanaṃ cakre hatvā dhenukagardabhaṃ ।।ariṣṭavṛṣabhaṃ hatvā keśinaṃ hayarūpiṇam ।śakrotsavaṃ parityajya kārito gotrayajñakaḥ ।।parvataṃ dhārayitvā ca śakrādvṛṣṭir nivāritā ।namaskṛto mahendreṇa govindo athārjunorpitaḥ ।।indrotsavastu tuṣṭena bhūyaḥ kṛṣṇena kāritaḥ ।rathastho mathurāñcāgāt kaṃsoktākrūrasaṃstutaḥ ।।gopībhiranuraktābhiḥ krīḍitābhir nirīkṣitaḥ ।

rajakaṃ cāprayacchantaṃ hatvā vastrāṇi cāgrahīt ।।saha rāmeṇa mālābhṛn mālākāre varandadau ।dattānulepanāṃ kubjām ṛjuṃ cakre ahanad gajaṃ ।।mattaṃ kuvalayāpīḍaṃ dvāri raṅgaṃ praviśya ca ।kaṃsādīnāṃ paśyatāṃ ca mañcasthānāṃ niyuddhakaṃ ।।cakre cāṇūramallena muṣṭikena balo akarot ।cāṇūramuṣṭikau tābhyāṃ hatau mallau tathāpare ।।mathurādhipatiṃ kaṃsaṃ hatvā tatpitaraṃ hariḥ ।cakre yādavarājānam astiprāptī ca kaṃsage ।।jarāsandhasya te putryau jarāsandhastadīritaḥ ।cakre sa mathurārodhaṃ yādavair yuyudhe śaraiḥ ।।rāmakṛṣṇau ca mathurāṃ tyaktvā gomantamāgatau ।jarāsandhaṃ vijityājau pauṇḍrakaṃ vāsudevakaṃ ।।purīṃ ca dvārakāṃ kṛtvā nyavasad yādavair vṛtaḥ ।bhaumaṃ tu narakaṃ hatvā tenānītāś ca kanyakāḥ ।।devagandharvayakṣāṇāṃ tā uvāca janārdanaḥ ।ṣodaśastrīsahasrāṇi rukmiṇyādyās tathāṣṭa ca ।।satyabhāmāsamāyukto garuḍe narakārdanaḥ ।maṇiśailaṃ saratrañca indraṃ jitvā harirdivi ।।pārijātaṃ samānīya satyabhāmāgṛhe akarot ।sāndīpaneś ca śastrāstraṃ jñātvā tadbālakaṃ dadau ।।jitvā pañcajanaṃ daityaṃ yamena ca supūjitaḥ ।

rajakañca prajalpantamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
abadhīt kālayavanaṃ mucukundena pūjitaḥ ।।vasudevaṃ devakīñca bhaktaviprāṃś ca sorcyat ।revatyāṃ balabhadrācca yajñāte niśaṭhonmukau ।।kṛṣṇāt śāmbo jāmbavatyāmanyāsvanye abhavan sutāḥ ।taṃ matsyaṃ śambarāyādānmāyāvatyai ca śambaraḥ ।।māyāvatī matsyamadhye dṛṣṭvā svaṃ patimādarāt ।papoṣa sā taṃ covāca ratiste ahaṃ patirmama ।।kāmastvaṃ śambhunānaṅgaḥ kṛtohaṃ śambareṇa ca ।hṛtā na tasya patnī tvaṃ māyājñaḥ śambaraṃ jahi ।।tac chrutvā śambaraṃ hatvā pradyumnaḥ saha bhāryayā ।māyāvatyā yayau kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇo hṛṣṭo atha rukmiṇī ।।pradyumnādaniruddhobhūduṣāpatirudāradhīḥ ।bāṇo balisutastasya sutoṣā śoṇitaṃ puraṃ ।।tapasā śivaputro abhūt māyūradhvajapātitaḥ ।yuddhaṃ prāpsyasi vāṇa tvaṃ vāṇaṃ tuṣṭaḥ śivobhyadhāt ।।śivena krīḍatīṃ gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvoṣā saspṛhā patau ।tāmāha gaurī bhartā te niśi supteti darśanāt ।।vaiśākhamāsadvādaśyāṃ puṃso bhartā bhaviṣyati ।gauryuktā harṣitā coṣā gṛhe suptā dadarśa taṃ ।।ātmanā saṅgataṃ jñātvā tatsakhyā citralekhayā ।likhitādvai citrapaṭādaniruddhaṃ samānayat ।।

tac chrutvā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kṛṣṇapautraṃ dvārakāto duhitā vāṇamantriṇaḥ ।kumbhāṇḍasyāniruddhogādrarāma hy uṣayā saha ।।vāṇadhvajasya sampātai rakṣibhiḥ sa niveditaḥ ।aniruddhasya vāṇena yuddhamāsītsadāruṇam ।।śrutvā tu nāradāt kṛṣṇaḥ pradyumnabalabhadravān ।garuḍasthotha jitvāgnīn jvaraṃ māheśvarantathā ।।hariśaṅkarayoryuddhaṃ babhūvātha śarāśari ।nandivināyakaskandamukhāstārkṣādibhirjitāḥ ।।jṛmbhate śaṅkare naṣṭe jṛmbhaṇāstreṇa viṣṇunā ।chinnaṃ sahasraṃ bāhūnāṃ rudreṇābhayamarthitam ।।viṣṇunā jīvito vāṇo dvibāhuḥ prābravīcchivam ।tvayā yadabhayaṃ dattaṃ vāṇasyāsya mayā ca tat ।।āvayor nāsti bhedo vai bhedī narakamāpnuyāt ।śivādyaiḥ pūjito viṣṇuḥ soniruddha uṣādiyuk ।।dvārakāntu gato reme ugrasenādiyādavaiḥ ।aniruddhātmajo vajro mārkaṇḍeyāttu sarvavit ।।balabhadraḥ pralambaghno yamunākarṣaṇo abhavat ।dvividasya kaperbhettā kauravonmādanāśanaḥ ।।harī remenekamūrto rukmiṇyādibhirīśvaraḥ ।putrānutpādayāmāsa tvasaṃkhyātān sa yādavān ।harivaṃśaṃ paṭhet yaḥ sa prāptakāmo hariṃ vrajet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye harivaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo adhyāyaḥ

karṣaka iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha trayodaśo adhyāyaḥ

kurupāṇḍavotpattyādikathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
bhārataṃ sampravakṣyāmi kṛṣṇamāhātmyalakṣaṇam ।bhūbhāramaharadviṣṇur nimittīkṛtya pāṇḍavān ।।viṣṇunābhyabjajo brahmā brahmaputro atriratritaḥ ।somaḥ somādbudhastasmādaila āsīt purūravāḥ ।।tasmādāyustato rājā nahuṣo ato yayātikaḥ ।tataḥ purustasya vaṃśe bharato atha nṛpaḥ kuruḥ ।।tadvaṃśe śāntanustasmādbhīṣmo gaṅgāsuto anujau ।citrāṅgado vicitraś ca satyavayāñca śāntanoḥ ।।svargaṃ gate śāntanau ca bhīṣmo bhāryāvivarjitaḥ ।apālayat bhrātṛrājyaṃ bālaścitrāṅgado hataḥ ।।citrāṅgadena dve kanye kāśirājasya cāmbikā ।ambālikā ca bhīṣmeṇa ānīte vijitāriṇā ।।bhārye vicitravīryasya yakṣmaṇā sa divaṅgataḥ ।satyavatyā hy anumatādambikāyāṃ nṛpobhavat ।।dhṛtarāṣṭro ambālikāyāṃ pāṇḍuś ca vyāsataḥ sutaḥ ।gāndhāryāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrācca duryodhanamukhaṃ śatam ।।śataśṛṅgāśramapade bhāryāyogād yato mṛtiḥ ।ṛṣiśāpāttato dharmāt kuntyāṃ pāṇḍoryudhiṣṭhiraḥ ।।vātādbhīmo arjunaḥ śakrānmādryāmaśvikumārataḥ ।nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca pāṇḍurmādrīyuto mṛtaḥ ।।karṇaḥ kuntyāṃ hi kanyāyāṃ jāto duryodhāśritaḥ ।kurupāṇḍavayorvairandaivayogādbabhūva ha ।।

duryodhano jatugṛhe pāṇḍavānadahat kudhīḥ ।dagdhāgārādviniṣkrāntā mātṛpṛṣṭāstu pāṇḍavāḥ ।।tatastu ekacakrāyāṃ brāhmaṇasya niveśane ।muniveṣāḥ sthitāḥ sarve nihatya vakarākṣasam ।।yayauḥ pāñcālaviṣayaṃ draupadyāste svayamvare ।samprāptā bāhuvedhena draupadī pañcapāṇḍavaiḥ ।।ardharājyaṃ tataḥ prāptā jñātā duryodhanādibhiḥ ।gāṇḍīvañca dhanurdivyaṃ pāvakādrathamuttamam ।।sārathiñcārjunaḥ saṅkhye kṛṣṇamakṣayyaśāyakān ।brahmāstrādīṃs tathā droṇātsarve śastraviśāradāḥ ।।kṛṣṇena so arjuno vahniṃ khāṇḍave samatarpayat ।indravṛṣṭiṃ vārayaṃś ca śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ ।।jitā diśaḥ pāṇḍavaiś ca rājyañcakre yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ।bahusvarṇaṃ rājasūyaṃ na sehe taṃ suyodhanaḥ ।।bhrātrā duḥśāsanenoktaḥ karṇena prāptabhūtinā ।dyūtakārye śakuninā dyūtena sa yudhiṣṭhiram ।।ajayattasya rājyañca sabhāstho māyayāhasat ।jito yudhiṣṭhiro bhrātṛyuktaścāraṇyakaṃ yayau ।।vane dvādaśavarṣāṇi pratijñātāni so anayat ।aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi bhojayan pūrvavat dvijān ।।sadhaumyo draupadīṣaṣṭhastataḥ prāyādvirāṭakam ।kaṅko dvijo hy avijñāto rājā bhīmotha sūpakṛt ।।

bāhubhedena iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

draupadīṃ pañca pāṇḍavā iti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

vasupūrṇamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ratnapūrṇamiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kaṅko dvijo hy abhūcchreṣṭha iti kha,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bṛhannalārjuno bhāryā sairindhrī yamajau tathā ।anyanāmnā bhīmasenaḥ kīcakañcābadhīnniśi ।।draupadīṃ hartukāmaṃ taṃ arjunaścājayat kurūn ।kurvato gograhādīṃś ca tair jñātāḥ pāṇḍavā atha ।।subhadrā kṛṣṇabhaginī arjunātsamajījanat ।abhimanyundadau tasmai virāṭaścottarāṃ sutām ।।saptākṣauhiṇīśa āsīddharmarājo raṇāya saḥ ।kṛṣṇo dūtobravīd gatvā duryodhanamamarṣaṇam ।।ekādaśākṣauhiṇīśaṃ nṛpaṃ duryodhanaṃ tadā ।yudhiṣṭhirāyārdharājyaṃ dehi grāmāṃś ca pañca vā ।।yudhyasva vā vacaḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇamāha suyodhanaḥ ।bhūsūcyagraṃ na dāsyāmi yotsye saṅgrahaṇodyataḥ ।।viśvarūpandarśayitvā adhṛṣyaṃ vidurārcitaḥ ।prāgādyudhiṣṭhiraṃ prāha yodhayainaṃ suyodhanam ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye ādiparvādivarṇanaṃ nāma trayodaśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha caturdaśo adhyāyaḥ

kurupāṇḍavasaṅgrāmavarṇanam

agnir uvāca
yaudhiṣṭhirī dauryodhanī kurukṣetraṃ yayau camūḥ ।bhīṣmadroṇādikān dṛṣṭvā nāyudhyata gurūniti ।।pārthaṃ hy uvāca bhagavānnaśocyā bhīṣmamukhyakāḥ ।śarīrāṇi vināśīni na śarīrī vinaśyati ।।

vidurānvita iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ayamātmā paraṃ brahma ahaṃ brahmasmi viddhi tam ।siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo yogī rājadharmaṃ prapālaya ।।kṛṣṇoktothārjuno ayudhyadrathastho vādyaśabdavān ।bhīṣmaḥ senāpatirabhūdādau dauryodhane bale ।।pāṇḍavānāṃ śikhaṇḍī ca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha ।dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ pāṇḍavāṃś ca jaghnuryuddhe sabhīṣmakāḥ ।।dhārtarāṣṭrān śikhaṇḍyādyāḥ pāṇḍavā jaghnurāhave ।devāsurasaṃ yuddhaṃ kurupāṇdavasenayoḥ ।।babhūva svasthadevānāṃ paśyatāṃ prītivardhanaṃ ।bhīṣmostraiḥ pāṇḍavaṃ sainyaṃ daśāhobhirnyapātayat ।।daśame hy arjuno vāṇair bhīṣmaṃ vīraṃ vavarṣa ha ।śikhaṇḍī drupadokto astrair vavarṣa jalado yathā ।।hastyaśvarathapādātamanyonyāstranipātitam ।bhīṣmaḥ svacchandamṛtyuś ca yuddhamārgaṃ pradarśya ca ।।vasūkto vasulokāya śaraśayyāgataḥ sthitaḥ ।uttarāyaṇamīkṣaṃś ca dhyāyan viṣṇuṃ stavan sthitaḥ ।।duryodhane tu śokārte droṇaḥ senāpatistvabhut ।pāṇdave harṣite sainye ḍhṛṣṭadyumnaś camūpatiḥ ।।tayoryuddhaṃ babhūvograṃ yamarāṣṭravivardhanam ।virāṭadrupadādyāś ca nimagnā droṇasāgare ।।dauryodhanī mahāsenā hastyaśvarathapattinī ।dhṛṣṭadyumnādhipatitā droṇaḥ kāla ivābabhau ।।hatośvatthāmā cetyukte droṇaḥ śastrāṇi cātyajat ।dhṛṣṭadyumnaśarākrāntaḥ patitaḥ sa mahītale ।।

anyonyāstranipīḍitamiti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
pañcamehani durdharṣaḥ sarvakṣatraṃ pramathya ca ।duryodhane tu śokārte karṇaḥ senāpatistvabhūt ।।arjunaḥ pāṇḍavānāñca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha ।śastrāśastri mahāraudraṃ devāsuraraṇopamam ।।karṇārjunākhye saṅgrāme karṇorīnabadhīccharaiḥ ।dvitīyāhani karṇastu arjunena nipātitaḥ ।।śalyo dinārdhaṃ yuyudhe hy abadhīttaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ।yuyudhe bhīmasenena hatasainyaḥ suyodhanaḥ ।।bahūn hatvā narādīṃś ca bhīmasenamathābravīt ।gadayā praharantaṃ tu bhīmastantu vyapātayat ।।gadayānyānujāṃstasya tasminnaṣṭādeśehani ।rātrau suṣuptañca balaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ nyapātayat ।।akṣauhiṇīpramāṇantu aśvatthāmā mahābalaḥ ।draupadeyān sapāñcālān dhṛṣṭadyumnañca so abadhīt ।।putrahīnāṃ draupadīṃ tāṃ rudantīmarjunastataḥ ।śiromaṇiṃ tu jagrāha aiṣikāstreṇa tasya ca ।।aśvatthāmāstranirdagdhaṃ jīvayāmāsa vai hariḥ ।uttarāyāstato garbhaṃ sa parīkṣidabhūnnṛpaḥ ।।kṛtavarmā kṛpo drauṇistrayo muktāstato raṇāt ।pāṇḍavāḥ sātyakiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sapta muktā na cāpare ।।striyaścārtāḥ samāśvāsya bhīmādyaiḥ sa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ।saṃskṛtya prahatān vīrān dattodakadhanādikaḥ ।।bhīṣmācchāntanavācchrutvā dharmān sarvāṃś ca śāntidām ।rājadharmānmokṣadharmāndānadharmān nṛpo abhavat ।।aśvamedhe dadau dānaṃ brāhmaṇebhyorimardanaḥ ।

śrutvārjunānmauṣaleyaṃ yādavānāñca saṅkṣayam ।rājye parīkṣitaṃ sthāpya sānujaḥ svargamāptavān ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye mahābhāratavarṇanaṃ nāma caturdaśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcadaśo adhyāyaḥ

pāṇḍavacaritavarṇanam

agnir uvāca
yudhiṣṭhire tu rājyasthe āśramādāśramāntaram ।dhṛtarāṣṭro vanamagād gāndhārī ca pṛthā dvija ।।vidurastvagninā dagdho vanajena divaṅgataḥ ।evaṃ viṣṇurbhuvo bhāramaharaddānavādikam ।।dharmāyādharmanāśāya nimittīkṛtya pāṇḍavān ।sa vipraśāpavyājena muṣalenāharat kulam ।।yādavānāṃ bhārakaraṃ vajraṃ rājyebhyaṣecayat ।devadeśāt prabhāse sa dehaṃ tyaktvā svayaṃ hariḥ ।।indraloke brahmaloke pūjyate svargavāsibhiḥ ।balabhadronantamūrtiḥ pātālasvargamīyivān ।।avināśī harirdevo dhyānibhirdhyeya eva saḥ ।vinā taṃ dvārakāsthānaṃ plāvayāmāsa sāgaraḥ ।।saṃskṛtya yādavān pārtho dattodakadhanādikaḥ ।striyoṣṭāvakraśāpena bhāryā viṣṇoś ca yāḥ sthitāḥ ।।punastacchāpato nītā gopālair laguḍāyudhaiḥ ।arjunaṃ hi tiraskṛtya pārthaḥ śokañcakāra ha ।।vyāsenāśvāsito mene balaṃ me kṛṣṇasannidhau ।

mauṣaleneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

svargamāpnuyāditi kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
hastināpuramāgatya pārthaḥ sarvaṃ nyavedayat ।।yudhiṣṭhirāya sa bhrātre pālakāya nṛṇāntadā ।taddhanustāni cāstrāṇi sa rathaste ca vājinaḥ ।।vinā kṛṣṇena tannaṣṭaṃ dānañcāśrotriye yathā ।tac chrutvā dharmarājastu rājye sthāpya parīkṣitam ।।prasthānaṃ prasthito dhīmān draupadyā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha ।saṃsārānityatāṃ jñātvā japannaṣṭaśataṃ hareḥ ।।mahāpathe tu patitā draupadī sahadevakaḥ ।nakulaḥ phālguno bhīmo rājā śokaparāyaṇaḥ ।।indrānītarathārūḍhaḥ sānujaḥ svargamāptavān ।dṛṣṭvā duryodhanādīṃś ca vāsudevaṃ ca harṣitaḥ ।।etatte bhārataṃ proktaṃ yaḥ paṭhetsa divaṃ vrajet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye mahābhāratavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcadaśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣoḍaśo adhyāyaḥ

buddhādyavatārakathanam

agnir uvāca
vakṣye buddhāvatārañca paṭhataḥ śṛṇvatorthadam ।purā devāsure yuddhe daityair devāḥ parājitāḥ ।।rakṣa rakṣeti śaraṇaṃ vadanto jagmurīśvaram ।māyamohasvaruposau śuddhodanasuto abhavat ।।mohayāmāsa daityāṃstāṃstyājitā vedadharmakam ।te ca bauddhā babhūvurhi tebhyonye vedavarjitāḥ ।।ārhataḥ so abhavat paścādārhatānakarot parān ।evaṃ pāṣaṇḍino jātā vedadharmādivarjitāḥ ।।

narakārhaṃ karma cakrurgrahīṣyantyadhamādapi ।sarve kaliyugānte tu bhaviṣyanti ca saṅkarāḥ ।।dasyavaḥ śīlahīnāś ca vedo vājasaneyakaḥ ।daśa pañca ca śākhā vai pramāṇena bhaviṣyati ।।dharmakañcukasaṃvītā adharmarucayas tathā ।mānuṣān bhakṣayiṣyanti mlecchāḥ pārthivarūpiṇaḥ ।।kalkī viṣṇuyaśaḥputro yājñavalkyapurohitaḥ ।utsādayiṣyati mlecchān gṛhītāstraḥ kṛtāyudhaḥ ।।sthāpayiṣyati maryādāṃ cāturvarṇye yathocitām ।āśrameṣu ca sarveṣu prajāḥ saddharmavartmani ।।kalkirūpaṃ parityajya hariḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati ।tataḥ kṛtayugānnāma purāvat sambhaviṣyati ।।varnāśramāś ca dharmeṣu sveṣu sthāsyanti sattama ।evaṃ sarveṣu kalpeṣu sarvamanvantareṣu ca ।।avatārā asaṅkhyātā atītānāgatādayaḥ ।viṣṇordaśāvatārākhyān yaḥ paṭhet śṛṇuyānnaraḥ ।।sovāptakāmo vimalaḥ sakulaḥ svargamāpnuyāt ।dharmādharmavyavasthānamevaṃ vai kurute hariḥ ।avatīrṇañca sa gataḥ sargādeḥ kāraṇaṃ hariḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye buddhakalkyavatāravarṇanaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptadaśo adhyāyaḥ

sṛṣṭiviṣayakavarnanam

agnir uvāca
jagatsargādikān krīḍān viṣṇorvakṣyedhunā śṛṇu ।svargādikṛt sa sargādiḥ sṛṣṭyādiḥ saguṇoguṇaḥ ।।

brahmāvyaktaṃ sadāgre abhūt na khaṃ rātridinādikaṃ ।prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ viṣṇuḥ praviśyākṣobhayattataḥ ।।svargakāle mahattattvamahaṅkārastato abhavat ।vaikārikastaijasaś ca bhūtādiś caiva tāmasaḥ ।।ahaṅkārācchabdamātramākāśamabhavattataḥ ।sparśamātro anilastasmādrūpamātro analastataḥ ।।rasamātrā āpa ito gandhamātrā mahī smṛtā ।ahaṅkārāttāmasāttu taijasānīndriyāṇi ca ।।vaikārikā daśa devā mana ekādaśendriyam ।tataḥ svayaṃbhūrbhagavān sisṛkṣurvividhāḥ prajāḥ ।।apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryamavāsṛjat ।āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ ।।ayanantasya tāḥ pūrvantena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।hiraṇyavarṇamabhavat tadaṇḍamudakeśayam ।।tasmin jajñe svayaṃ brahmā svayambhūriti naḥ śrutam ।hiraṇyagarbho bhagavānuṣitvā parivatsaram ।।tadaṇḍamakarot dvaidhandivaṃ bhuvamathāpi ca ।tayoḥ śakalayormadhye ākāśamasṛjat prabhuḥ ।।apsu pāriplavāṃ pṛthivīṃ diśaś ca daśadhā dadhe ।tatra kālaṃ mano vācaṃ kāmaṃ krodhamatho ratim ।।

viṣṇumiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gandhamātrā dharitryabhūditi kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

tataḥ svayambhūrbhagavānityārabhya sraṣṭumicchan prajāpatirityantapāṭhastu mahābhāratīyaharivaṃśaparvaṇa uddhṛta iti adhyavasīyate ubhayatra krameṇa pāṭhasāmyāt

tāsu bījamathāsṛjaditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hiraṇyagarbhamabhavaditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hiraṇyavarṇa iti ga, cihnitgapustakapāṭhaḥ
sasarja sṛṣṭintadrūpāṃ sraṣṭumicchan prajāpatiḥ ।vidyutośanimeghāṃś ca rohitendradhanūṃṣi ca ।।vayāṃsi ca sasarjādau parjanyañcātha vaktrataḥ ।ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni nirmame yajñasiddhaye ।।sādhyāstair ayajandevān bhūtamuccāvacaṃ bhujāt ।sanatkumāraṃ rudrañca sasarja krodhasambhavam ।।marīcimatryaṅgirasaṃ pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum ।vasiṣṭhaṃ mānasāḥ sapta brahmāṇa iti niścitāḥ ।।saptaite janayanti sma prajā rudrāś ca sattama ।dvidhā kṛtvātmano dehamardhena puruṣo abhavat ।।ardhena nārī tasyāṃ sa brahmā vai cāsṛjat prajāḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye jagatsargavarṇanaṃ nāma saptadaśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha aṣṭādaśo adhyāyaḥ

svāyambhuvavaṃśavarṇanam

agnir uvāca
priyavratottānapādau manoḥ svāyambhuvāt sutau ।ajījanatsa tāṃ kanyāṃ śatarūpāṃ taponvitām ।।

bhūtamuccāvacaṃ hy ajāditi kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ sāndhyāṃstair ayajan devān bhūtamuccāvacaṃ prajā iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

niścitamiti kha,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ajījanat sutāṃ kanyāṃ sadrūpāñca taponvitāmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । ajījanat sutāṃ kanyāṃ śatarūpāṃ taponvitāmiti ṅa,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kāmyāṃ kardamabhāryātaḥ samrāṭ kukṣirvirāṭ prabhuḥ ।surucyāmuttamo jajñe putra uttānapādataḥ ।।sunītyāntu dhruvaḥ putrastapastepe sa kīrtaye ।dhruvo varṣasahasrāṇi trīṇi divyāni he mune ।।tasmai prīto hariḥ prādānmunyagre sthānakaṃ sthiram ।ślokaṃ papāṭha hy uśanā vṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā sa tasya ca ।।aho asya tapaso vīryamaho śrutamahodbhutam ।yamadya purataḥ kṛtvā dhruvaṃ saptarṣayaḥ sthitāḥ ।।tasmāt śiṣṭiñca bhavyañca dhruvācchambhurvyajāyata ।śiṣṭerādhatta suchāyā pañca putrānakalmaṣān ।।ripuṃ ripuñjayaṃ ripraṃ vṛkalaṃ vṛkatejasam ।riporādhatta bṛhatī cākṣuṣaṃ sarvatejasam ।।ajījanat puṣkariṇyāṃ vīriṇyāṃ cākṣuṣo manum ।manorajāyanta daśa naḍvalāyāṃ sutottamāḥ ।।ūruḥ puruḥ śatadyumnastapasvī satyavākkaviḥ ।agniṣṭuratirātraś ca sudyumnaścābhimanyukaḥ ।।ūrorajanayat putrān ṣaḍagneyī mahāprabhān ।aṅgaṃ sumanasaṃ svātiṃ kratumaṅgirasaṅgayam ।।aṅgāt sunīthāpatyaṃ vai veṇamekaṃ vyajāyata ।

kāmyā iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

sthānamuttamamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yadatra iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tasmāt śliṣṭiñca iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

śliṣṭeārādhatta iti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

urūriti kha,ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
arakṣakaḥ pāparataḥ sa hato munibhiḥ kuśaiḥ ।।prajārthamṛṣayothāsya mamanthurdakṣiṇaṃ karaṃ ।veṇasya mathito pāṇau sambabhūva pṛthur nṛpaḥ ।।taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ prāhureṣa vai muditāḥ prajāḥ ।kariṣyati mahātejā yaśaś ca prāpsyate mahat ।।sa dhanvī kavacī jātastejasā nirdahanniva ।pṛthurvaiṇyaḥ prajāḥ sarvā rarakṣa kṣetrapūrvajaḥ ।।rājasūyābhiṣiktānāmādyaḥ sa pṛthivīpatiḥ ।tasmāccaiva samutpannau nipuṇau sūtamāgadhau ।।tatstotrañcakraturvīrau rājābhūjjanarañjanāt ।dugdhā gaustena śasyārthaṃ prajānāṃ jīvanāya ca ।।saha devair munigaṇair gandharvaiḥ sāpsarogaṇaiḥ ।pitṛbhirdānavaiḥ sarpair vīrudbhiḥ parvatair janaiḥ ।।teṣu teṣu ca pātreṣu duhyamānā vasundharā ।prādādyathepsitaṃ kṣīrantena prāṇānadhārayat ।।pṛthoḥ putrau tu dharmajñau jajñāte antardvipālinau ।śikhaṇḍī havirdhānamantardhānāt vyajāyata ।।havirdhānāt ṣaḍāgneyī dhīṣaṇājanayat sutān ।prācīnavarhiṣaṃ śukraṃ gayaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vrajājinau ।।prācīnāgrāḥ kuśāstasya pṛthivyāṃ yajato yataḥ ।prācīnavarhirbhagavān mahānāsītprajāpatiḥ ।।savarṇādhatta sāmudrī daśa prācīnavarhiṣaḥ ।

rājasūyābhivyaktānāmādya iti kha,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śubhramiti ga,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

suvarṇādhatta iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sarve pracetaso nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ ।।apṛthagdharmacaraṇās te tapyanta mahattapaḥ ।daśavarṣasahasrāṇi samudrasalileśayāḥ ।।prajāpatitvaṃ samprāpya tuṣṭā viṣṇoś ca nirgatāḥ ।bhūḥ khaṃ vyāptaṃ hi tarubhistāṃstarūnadahaṃś ca te ।।mukhajāgnimarudbhyāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cātha drumakṣayam ।upagamyābravīdetān rājā somaḥ prajāpatīn ।।kopaṃ yacchata dāsyanti kanyāṃ vo māriṣāṃ varām ।tapasvino muneḥ kaṇḍoḥ pramlocāyāṃ mamaiva ca ।।bhaviṣyaṃ jānatā sṛṣṭā bhāryā vo astu kulaṅkarī ।asyāmutpatsyate dakṣaḥ prajāḥ saṃvardhayiṣyati ।।pracetasastāṃ jagṛhurdakṣosyāñca tato abhavat ।acarāṃś ca carāṃś caiva dvipadotha catuṣpadaḥ ।।sa sṛṣṭvā manasā dakṣaḥ paścādasṛjata striyaḥ ।dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa ।।saptāviṃśati somāya catastro ariṣṭanemine ।dve caiva bahuputrāya dve caivāṅgirase adāt ।।tāsu devāś ca nāgādyā maithunānmanasā purā ।dharmasargampravakṣyāmi daśapatnīṣu dharmataḥ ।।viśvedevāstu viśvāyāḥ sādhyān sādhyā vyajāyata ।maruttvayā maruttvanto vasostu vasavo abhavan ।।bhānostu bhānavaḥ putrā muhūrtāstu muhūrtajāḥ ।

kaṇṭhoriti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ karṇoriti ṅa,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sa dṛṣṭvā manasā iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dve caiva bhāṇḍave tata iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sambāyā dharmato ghoṣo nāgavīthī ca yāmijā ।।pṛthivīviṣayaṃ sarvamarundhatyāṃ vyajāyata ।saṅkalpāyāstu saṅkalpā indor nakṣatrataḥ sutāḥ ।।āpo dhruvañca somañca dharaś caivānilonalaḥ ।pratyūṣaś ca prabhāvaś ca vasavoṣṭau ca nāmataḥ ।।āpasya putro vaitaṇḍyaḥ śramaḥ śānto munis tathā ।dhruvasya kālo lokānto varcāḥ somasya vai sutaḥ ।।dharasya putro draviṇo hutahavyavahas tathā ।manoharāyāḥ śiśiraḥ prāṇotha ramaṇas tathā ।।purojavonilasyāsīdavijñāto analasya ca ।agniputraḥ kumāraś ca śarastambe vyajāyata ।।tasya śākho viśākhaś ca naigameyaś ca pṛṣṭajaḥ ।kṛttikātaḥ kārttikeyo yatiḥ sanatkumārakaḥ ।।pratyūṣāddevalo jajñe viśvakarmā prabhāvataḥ ।kartā śilpasahasrāṇāṃ tridaśānāñca vardhakiḥ ।।manuṣyāścopjīvanti śilpaṃ vai bhūṣaṇādikaṃ ।surabhī kaśyapādrudrānekādaśa vijajñuṣī ।।mahādevaprasādena tapasā bhāvitā satī ।

lambāyā iti ga,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nagavīthī iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dharmaś caivānilonala iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dhariṣa iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

maraṇastatheti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

jātaḥ sanatkumārata iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yuvatī iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ajaikapādahirbraghnastvaṣṭā rudrāś ca sattama ।।tvaṣṭuś caivātmajaḥ śrīmānviśvarūpo mahāyaśāḥ ।haraś ca bahurūpaś ca tryambakaścāparājitaḥ ।।vṛṣākapiś ca śambhuś ca kapardī raivatas tathā ।mṛgavyādhasya sarpaś ca kapālī daśa caikakaḥ ।rudrāṇāṃ ca śataṃ lakṣaṃ yair vyāptaṃ sacarācaraṃ ।।
e ity ādimāhāpurāṇe āgneye jagatsargavarṇanaṃ nāma aṣṭādaśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athonaviṃśatitamo adhyāyaḥ

kaśyapavaṃśavarṇanam

agnir uvāca
kaśyapasya vede sargamadityādiṣu he mune ।cākṣuṣe tuṣitā devāste adityāṃ kaśyapātpunaḥ ।।āsan viṣṇuś ca śakraś ca tvaṣṭā dhātā tathāryamā ।pūṣā vivasvān savitā mitrotha varuṇo bhagaḥ ।।aṃśuś ca dvādaśādityā āsan vaivasvatentare ।ariṣṭanemipatrīnāmapatyānīha ṣoḍaśa ।।bahuputrastha viduṣaś catasro vidyutaḥ sutāḥ ।pratyaṅgirajāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ kṛśāśvasya surāyudhāḥ ।।udayāstamane sūrye tadvadete yuge yuge ।hiraṇyakaśipurdityāṃ hiraṇyākṣaś ca kaśyapāt ।।

saptama iti kha ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

smṛtā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
siṃhikā cābhavat kanyā vipracitteḥ parigrahaḥ ।rāhuprabhṛtayastasyāṃ saiṃhikeyā iti śrutāḥ ।।hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putrāś catvāraḥ prathitaujasaḥ ।anuhrādaś ca hrādaś ca prahrādaścātivaiṣṇavaḥ ।।saṃhrādaś ca caturthobhūt hrādaputro hradas tathā ।hradasya putra āyuṣmān śibirvāskala eva ca ।।virovanastu prāhrādirbalirjajñe virocanāt ।baleḥ putraśataṃ tvāsīdvāṇaśreṣṭhaṃ mahāmune ।।purākalpe hi bāṇena prasādyomāpatiṃ varaḥ ।pārśvato vihariṣyāmītyevam prāptaś ca īśvarāt ।।hiraṇyākṣasutāḥ pañca śambaraḥ śakunistviti ।dvimūrdhā śaṅkurāryaś ca śatamāsan danoḥ sutāḥ ।।svarbhānostu prabhā kanyā pulomnastu śacī smṛtā ।upadānavī hayaśirā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī ।।pulomā kālakā caiva vaiśvānarasute ubhe ।kaśyapasya tu bhārye dve tayoḥ putrāś ca koṭayaḥ ।।prahrādasya catuṣkoṭyo nivātakavacāḥ kule ।tāmrāyāḥ ṣaṭ sutāḥ syuś ca kākī śvenī ca bhāsyapi ।।gṛdhrikā śuci sugrīvā tābhyaḥ kākādayo abhavan ।

saṃhrādaputra āyuṣmāniti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

vāṇajyeṣṭhamiti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

prabhumiti kha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

ity evaṃ prāptamīśvarāditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

jharjharaḥ śakunistvatīti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । śaknistvatheti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dvimūrdhā śambarādyāś ca iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gṛdhrikā ca śucigrīvo iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ gṛdhrikāśucisugrīvo iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
aśvāścoṣṭrāś ca tāmrāyā aruṇo garuḍas tathā ।।vinatāyāḥ sahasrantu sarpāś ca surasābhavāḥ ।kādraveyāḥ sahasrantu śeṣavāsukitakṣakāḥ ।।daṃṣṭriṇaḥ krodhavaśajā dharotthāḥ pakṣiṇo jale ।surabhyāṃ gomahiṣyādi irotpannāstṛṇādayaḥ ।।svasāyāṃ yakṣarakṣāṃsi muneraśvarasobhavan ।ariṣṭāyāntu gandharvāḥ kaśyapāddhi sthirañcaraṃ ।।eṣāṃ putrādayo asaṅkhyā devair vai dānavā jitāḥ ।ditirvinaṣṭaputrā vai toṣayāmāsa kaśyapaṃ ।।putramindraprahartāramicchatī prāpa kaśyapāt ।pādāprakṣālanāt suptā tasyā garbhaṃ jaghāna ha ।।chidramanviṣya cendrastu te devā maruto abhavan ।śakrasyaikonapañcāśatsahāyā dīptatejasaḥ ।।etatsarvaṃ harirbrahmā abhiṣicya pṛthuṃ nṛpaṃ ।dadau krameṇa rājyāni anyeṣāmadhipo hariḥ ।।dvijauṣadhīnāṃ candraś ca apāntu varuṇo nṛpaḥ ।rājñāṃ vaiśravaṇo rājā sūryāṇāṃ viṣṇorīśvaraḥ ।।vasūnāṃ pāvako rājā marutāṃ vāsavaḥ prabhuḥ ।prajāpatīnāṃ dakṣo atha prahlādo dānavādhipaḥ ।।pitṝṇāṃ ca yamo rājā bhūtādīnāṃ haraḥ prabhuḥ ।himavāṃś caiva śailānāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaraḥ prabhuḥ ।।

dharaṇyā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kaśyapādi parasparamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

devair dāityāḥ parājitā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhūtānāñca hara iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
gāndharvāṇāṃ citraratho nāgānāmatha vāsukiḥ ।sarpāṇāṃ takṣako rājā garuḍaḥ pakṣiṇāmatha ।।airāvato gajendrāṇāṃ govṛṣotha gavāmapi ।mṛgaṇāmatha śārdūlaḥ plakṣo vanaspatīśvaraḥ ।।uccaiḥśravās tathāśvānāṃ sudhanvā pūrvapālakaḥ ।dakṣiṇasyāṃ śaṅkhapadaḥ ketumān pālako jale ।hiraṇyaromakaḥ saumye pratisargoyamīritaḥ ।।
e ity ādimāhāpurāṇe āgneye pratisargavarṇanaṃ nāma ūnaviṃśatitamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha viṃśatitamo adhyāyaḥ

sargaviṣayakavarṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
prathamo mahataḥ sargo vijñeyo brahmaṇastu saḥ ।tanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargo hi sa smṛtaḥ ।।vaikārikastṛtīyastu sarga aindriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ ।।mukhyaḥ sargaś caturthastu mukhyā vai sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ ।tiryaksrotāstu yaḥ proktaḥ stairyagyonyastataḥ smṛtaḥ ।।tathordhvasrotasāṃ ṣaṣṭho devasargastu sa smṛtaḥ ।tatorvāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mānuṣaḥ ।।aṣṭamonugrahaḥ sargaiḥ sātvikastāmasaś ca yaḥ ।pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāś ca trayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।।prākṛto vaikṛtaś caiva kaumāro navamas tathā ।

brahmato nava sargāstu jagato mūlahetavaḥ ।।khyātyādyā dakṣakanyāstu bhṛgvādyā upayemire ।nityo naimittakaḥ sargastridhā prakathito janaiḥ ।।prākṛtā dainandinī syādantarapralayādanu ।jāyate yatrānudinaṃ mityasargo hi sammataḥ ।।devau dhātāvidhātārau bhṛgoḥ khyātirasūyata ।śriyañca patnī viṣṇoryā stutā śakreṇa vṛddhaye ।।dhāturvidhārturdvau putrau kramāt prāṇo mṛkaṇḍukaḥ ।mārkaṇḍeyo mṛkaṇḍoś ca jajñe vedaśirāstataḥ ।।paurṇamāsaś ca sambhūtyāṃ marīcerabhavat sutaḥ ।smṛtyāmaṅgirasaḥ putrāḥ sinīvālī kuhūs tathā ।।rākāścānumatiścātreranasūyāpyajījanat ।somaṃ durvāsasaṃ putraṃ dattātreyañca yoginam ।।prītyāṃ pulastyabhāryāyāṃ dattolistatsutobhavat ।kṣamāyāṃ pulahājjātāḥ sahiṣṇuḥ karmapādikāḥ ।।sannatyāñca kratorāsan bālikhilyā mahaujasaḥ ।aṅguṣṭhaparvamātrāste ye hi ṣaṣṭisahasviṇaḥ ।।urjāyāñca vaśiṣṭhācca rājā gātrordhvabāhukaḥ ।savanaścālaghuḥ śukraḥ sutapāḥ sapta carṣayaḥ ।।pāvakaḥ pavamānobhūcchuciḥ svāhāgnijobhavat ।

kumāryāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

rajogotrordhvāhuka iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ rājā śātrordhvabālaka iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ, rajogotrordhvavāhaka iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sabalaścānaghaḥ śukra iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
agnisvāttā varhiṣado anagnayaḥ sāgnayo hy ajāt ।।pitṛbhyaś ca svadhāyāñca menā vaidhāriṇī sute ।hiṃsābhāryā tvadharmasya tayorjajñe tathānṛtam ।।kanyā ca nikṛtistābhyāṃ bhayannarakemeva ca ।māyā ca vedanā caiva mithunantvidametayoḥ ।।tayorjajñetha vai māyāṃ mṛtyuṃ bhūtāpahāriṇam ।vedanā ca sutaṃ cāpi duḥkhaṃ jajñetha rauravāt ।।mṛtyorvyādhijarāśokatṛṣṇākrodhāś ca jajñire ।brahmaṇaś ca rudan jāto rodanādrudranāmakaḥ ।।bhavaṃ śarvamatheśānaṃ tathā paśupatiṃ dvija ।bhīmamugraṃ mahādevamuvāca sa pitāmahaḥ ।।dakṣakopācca tadbhāryā dehantatyāja sā satī ।himavadduhitā bhūtvā patnī śambhorabhūt punaḥ ।।ṛṣibhyo nāradādyuktāḥ pūjāḥ snānādipūrvikāḥ ।svāyambhuvādyāstāḥ kṛtvā viṣṇvāderbhuktimuktidāḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye jagatsargavarṇanaṃ nāma viṃśatitamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ekaviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

sāmānyapūjākathanaṃ

nārada uvāca
sāmānyapūjāṃ viṣṇvādervakṣye mantrāṃś ca sarvadān ।samastaparivārāya acyutāya namo yajet ।।

sāgnayo hy agāditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ, agnipālā varhiṣado hy ājyapāḥ sāgnayo hy ajāditi gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vaisāraṇī sute iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dhātre vidhātre gaṅgāyai yamunāyai nidhī tathā ।dvāraśriyaṃ vastunavaṃ śaktiṃ kūrmamanantakam ।।pṛthivīṃ dharmakaṃ jñānaṃ vairāgyaiśvaryameva ca ।adharmādīn kandanālapadmakeśarakarṇikāḥ ।।ṛgvedādyaṃ kṛtādyañca satvādyarkādimaṇḍalam ।vimalotkarṣiṇī jñānā kriyā yogā ca tā yajet ।।prahvīṃ satyāṃ tatheśānānugrahāsanamūrtikām ।durgāṃ giraṅgaṇaṃ kṣetraṃ vāsudevādikaṃ yajet ।।hṛdayañca śiraḥ śūlaṃ varmanetramathāstrakam ।śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ yajet ।।vanamālāṃ śriyaṃ puṣṭiṃ garuḍaṃ gurumarcayet ।indramagniṃ yamaṃ rakṣo jalaṃ vāyuṃ dhaneśvaram ।।īśānantamajaṃ cāstraṃ vāhanaṃ kumudādikam ।viṣvaksenaṃ maṇḍalādau siddhiḥ pūjādinā bhavet ।।śivapūjātha sāmānyā pūrvaṃ nandinamarcayet ।mahākālaṃ yajedgaṅgāṃ yamunāñca gaṇādikam ।।giraṃ śriyaṃ guruṃ vāstuṃ śakyādīn dharmakādikam ।vāmā jyeṣṭhā tathā raudrī kālī kalavikāriṇī ।।balavikariṇī cāpi balapramathinī kramāt ।

prahvī sandhyā tatheśānānugrahāsanamūrtikā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

durgāṃ giriṃ gaṇamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ durgāṃ śivaṃ gaṇamiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yajet durgāṃ iti kha, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

giriṃ śriyamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ śivaṃ śriyatamiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gaurīṃ śriyaṃ guruṃ cāstraṃ śaktyādiṃ dharmakādikamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sarvabhūtadamanī ca madanonmādinī śivāsanaṃ ।।hāṃ huṃ hāṃ śivamūrtaye sāṅgavaktraṃ śivaṃ yajet ।hauṃ śivāya hāmityādi hāmīśānādivaktrakaṃ ।।hrīṃ gaurīṃ gaṃ gaṇaḥ śakramukhāś caṇḍīhṛtādikāḥ ।kramātsūryārcane mantrā daṇḍī pūjyaś ca piṅgalaḥ ।।uccaiḥśravāścāruṇaś ca prabhūtaṃ vimalaṃ yajet ।sārādhyoparamasukhaṃ skandādyaṃ madhyato yajet ।।dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā tathā ।amoghā vidyutā caiva pūjyātha sarvatomukhī ।।arkāsanaṃ hi haṃ khaṃ kha solkāyeti ca mūrtikām ।hrāṃ hrīṃ sa sūryāya nama āṃ namo hṛdāya ca ।।arkāya śirase tadvadagnīśāsuravāyugān ।bhūrbhuvaḥ svare jvālini śikhā huṃ kavacaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।bhāṃ netraṃ vas tathārkāstraṃ rājñī śaktiś ca niṣkubhā ।somo aṅgārakotha budho jīvaḥ śukraḥ śaniḥ kramāt ।।rāhuḥ ketustejaś caṇḍaḥ saṅkṣepādatha pūjanaṃ ।āsanaṃ mūrtaye mūlaṃ hṛdādyaṃ paricārakaḥ ।।viṣṇvāsanaṃ viṣṇurmūrteroṃ śrīṃ śrīṃ śrīdharohariḥ ।hrīṃ sarvamūrtimantroyamiti trailokyamohanaḥ ।।hrīṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ klīṃ viṣṇuḥ svarair dīrghairhṛdādikaṃ ।samastaiḥ pañcamī pūjā saṅgrāmādau jayādidā ।।

sāvārādhyoparaṃ duḥkhamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

agnisāśrayavāyugāniti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । arkāya śirase tadvadagnijāyāyutañca taditi ṅa,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śaktiś ca nirgatā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
cakraṃ gadāṃ kramācchaṅkhaṃ muṣalaṃ khaḍgaśārṅgakam ।pāśāṅkuśau ca śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ vanamālayā ।।śrīṃ śrīrmahālakṣmītārkṣyo gururindrādayo arcanam ।sarasvatyāsanaṃ mūrtirauṃ hrīṃ dadhī sarasvatī ।।hṛdādyā lakṣmīrmedhā ca kalātuṣṭiś ca puṣṭikā ।gaurī prabhāmatī durgā gaṇo guruś ca kṣetrapaḥ ।।tathā gaṃ gaṇapataye ca hrīṃ gauryai ca śrīṃ śriyai ।hrīṃ tvaritāyai hrīṃ sau tripurā caturthyantanamontakāḥ ।।praṇavādyāś ca nāmādyamakṣaraṃ vindusaṃyutaṃ ।oṃ yutaṃ vā sarvamantrapūjanājjapataḥ smṛtāḥ ।।homāttilaghṛtādyaiś ca dharmakāmārthamokṣadāḥ ।pūjāmantrān paṭhedyastu bhuktabhogo divaṃ vrajet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye vāsudevādipūjākathanaṃ nāma ekaviṃśatitamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvāviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

snānavidhikathanaṃ

nārada uvāca
vakṣye snānaṃ kriyādyarthaṃ nṛsiṃhena tu mṛttikāṃ ।gṛhītvā tāṃ dvidhā kṛtvā manaḥsnānamathaikayā ।।nimajyācamya vinyasya siṃhena kṛtarakṣakaḥ ।

hrīṃ tvaritāyai, hrīṃ aiṃ klīṃ sau tripurā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kṛtarakṣaṇa iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vidhisnānaṃ tataḥ kuryāt prāṇāyāmapuraḥsaraṃ ।।hṛdi dhyāyan harijñānaṃ mantreṇāṣṭākṣareṇa hi ।tridhā pāṇitale mṛtsnāṃ digbandhaṃ siṃhajaptataḥ ।।vāsadevaprajaptena tīrthaṃ saṅkalpya cālabhet ।gātraṃ vedādinā mantraiḥ sammārjyārādhya mūrtinā ।।kṛtvāghamarṣaṇaṃ vastraṃ paridhāya samācaret ।vinyasya mantrair dvirmārjya pāṇisthaṃ jalameva ca ।।nārāyaṇena saṃyamya vāyumāghrāya cotsṛjet ।jalaṃ dhyāyan hariṃ paścāddatvārghyaṃ dvādaśākṣaraṃ ।।japtvānyāñchataśastasya yogapīṭhāditaḥ kramāt ।mantrān dikpālaparyantānṛṣīn pitṛgaṇānapi ।।manuṣyān sarvabhūtāni sthāvarāntānyathāvaset ।nyasya cāṅgāni saṃhṛtya mantrānyāgagṛhaṃ vrajet ।।evamanyāsu pūjāsu mūlādyaiḥ snānamācaret ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye snānavidhikathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśodhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha trayoviṃśodhyāyaḥ

pūjāvidhikathanaṃ

nārada uvāca
vakṣye pūjāvidhiṃ viprā yat kṛtvā sarvamāpnuyāt ।prakṣālitāṅghrirācamya vāgyataḥ kṛtarakṣakaḥ ।।

dhyāyaṃ hariṃ devamiti ghacihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
prāṅmukhaḥ svastikaṃ baddhvā padmādyaparameva ca ।yaṃ vījaṃ nābhimadhyasthaṃ dhūmraṃ caṇḍānilātmakaṃ ।।viśeṣayedaśeṣantu dhyāyet kāyāttu kalmaṣaṃ ।kṣauṃ hṛtpaṅkajamadhyasthaṃ vījaṃ tejonidhiṃ smaran ।।adhordhvatiryaggābhistu jvālābhiḥ kalmaṣaṃ dahet ।śaśāṅkākṛtivaddhyāyedambarasthaṃ sudhāmbubhiḥ ।।hṛtpadmavyāpibhirdehaṃ svakamāplāvayetsudhīḥ ।susumnāyonimārgeṇa sarvanāḍīvisarpibhiḥ ।।śodhayitvā nyasettattvaṃ karaśuddhirathāstrakaṃ ।vyāpakaṃ hastayorādau dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhatoṅgakaṃ ।।mūlaṃ dehe dvādaśāṅgaṃ nyasenmantrair dviṣaṭkakaiḥ ।hṛdayaṃ ca śiraś caiva śikhā varmāstralocane ।।udaraṃ ca tathā pṛṣṭhaṃ bāhurujānupādakaṃ ।mudrāṃ dattvā smaret viṣṇuṃ japtvāṣṭaśatamarcayet ।।vāme tu vardhanīṃ nyasya pūjādravyaṃ tu dakṣiṇe ।prakṣālyāstreṇa cārghyeṇa gandhapuṣpānvite nyaset ।।caitanyaṃ sarvagaṃ jyotiraṣṭajaptena vāriṇā ।phaḍantena tu saṃsicya haste dhyātvā hariṃ pare ।।dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ vahnidiṅmukhāḥ ।adharmādīni gātrāṇi pūrvādau yogapīṭhake ।।kūrmaṃ pīṭhe hy anantañca yamaṃ sūryādimaṇḍalaṃ ।

viśoṣayedaśeṣantu iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

svakāmān dāhayet sudhīḥ iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ svakamāhlādayet sudhīriti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sthalaṃ tena tu saṃsicya haste dhyātvā hariṃ paṭhediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

padmamiti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
vimalādyāḥ keśarasthānugrahā karṇikā sthitā ।।pūrvaṃ svahṛdaye dhyātvā āvāhyārcaiś ca maṇḍale ।arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tathācāmaṃ madhuparkaṃ punaś ca tat ।।snānaṃ vastropavītañca bhūṣaṇaṃ gandhapuṣpakaṃ ।dhūpadīpanair vedyāni puṇḍarīkākṣavidyayā ।।yajedaṅgāni pūrvādau dvāri pūrve pareṇḍajaṃ ।dakṣe cakraṃ gadāṃ saumye koṇe śaṅkhaṃ dhanurnyaset ।।devasya vāmato dakṣe ceṣudhī khaḍgameva ca ।vāme carma śriyaṃ dakṣe puṣṭiṃ vāmegrato nyaset ।।vanamālāñca śrīvatsakaustubhau dikpatīnvahiḥ ।svamantraiḥ pūjayet sarvān viṣṇurarghovasānataḥ ।।vyastena ca samastena aṅgair vījena vai yajet ।japtvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya stuttvārdhyañca samarpya ca ।।hṛdaye vinyaseddhyātvā ahaṃ brahma haristviti ।āgacchāvāhane yojyaṃ kṣamasveti visarjane ।।evamaṣṭākṣarādyaiś ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā vimuktibhāk ।ekamūrtyarcanaṃ proktaṃ navavyūhārcanaṃ śṛṇu ।।aṅguṣṭhakadvaye nyasya vāsudevaṃ balādikān ।tarjanyādau śarīretha śirolalāṭavaktrake ।।hṛnnābhiguhyajānvaṅghrau madhye pūrvādikaṃ yajet ।ekapīṭhaṃ navavyūhaṃ navapīṭhañca pūrvavat ।।

vāme varma śriyamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

asmallabdhapustakeṣu viṣṇurarghovasānata iti viṣṇāvarghau ca mānataḥ iti ca pāṭho vartate । ayansvasamīcīna iva pratibhāti viṣṇumarghyāsanādibhiriti tu yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ

madhyagulphāditaḥ pisphaca iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
navābje navamūrtyā ca navavyūhañca pūrvavat ।iṣṭaṃ madhye tataḥ sthāne vāsudevañca pūjayet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye ādimūrtyādipūjāvidhirnāma trayoviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha caturviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

kuṇḍanirmāṇādividhiḥ

nārada uvāca
agnikāryaṃ pravakṣyāmi yena syātsarvakāmabhāk ।caturabhyadhikaṃ viṃśamaṅgulaṃ caturasrakaṃ ।।sūtreṇa sūtrayitvā tu kṣetraṃ tāvat khanetsamaṃ ।khātasya mekhalā kāryā tyaktvā caivāṅguladvayaṃ ।।sattvādisañjñā pūrvāśā dvādaśāṅgulamucchritā ।aṣṭāṅgulā dvyaṅulātha caturaṅgulavistṛtā ।।yonirdaśāṅgulā ramyā ṣaṭcaturdvyaṅgulāgragā ।kramānnimnā tu kartavyā paścimāśāvyavasthitā ।।aśvatthapatrasadṛśī kiñcit kuṇḍe niveśitā ।turyāṅgulāyatā nālaṃ pañcadaśāṅgulāyataṃ ।।mūlantu tryaṅgulaṃ yonyā agraṃ tasyāḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ ।lakṣaṇañcaikahastasya dviguṇaṃ dvikarādiṣu ।।ekatrimekhalaṃ kuṇḍaṃ vartulādi vadāmyahaṃ ।

sadmādisañjñā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

malantu dvyaṅgulamiti ga,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kuṇḍārdhe tu sthitaṃ sūtraṃ koṇe yadatiricyate ।।tadardhaṃ diśi saṃsthāpya bhrāmitaṃ vartulaṃ bhavet ।kuṇḍārdhaṃ koṇabhāgārdhaṃ diśiścottarato vahiḥ ।।pūrvapaścimato yatnāllāñchayitvā tu madhyataḥ ।saṃsthāpya bhrāmitaṃ kuṇḍamardhacandraṃ bhavet śubhaṃ ।।padmākāre dalāni syurmekhalānāntu vartule ।bāhudaṇḍapramāṇantu homārthaṃ kārayet srucaṃ ।।saptapañcāṅgulaṃ vāpi caturasrantu kārayet ।tribhāgena bhavedgartaṃ madhye vṛttaṃ suśobhanam ।।tiryagūrdhvaṃ samaṃ khātādvahirardhantu śodhayet ।aṅgulasya caturthāṃśaṃ śeṣārdhārdhaṃ tathāntataḥ ।।khātasya mekhalāṃ ramyāṃ śeṣārdhena tu kārayet ।kaṇṭhaṃ tribhāgavistāraṃ aṅguṣṭhakasamāyataṃ ।।sārdhamaṅguṣṭhakaṃ vā syāttadagre tu mukhaṃ bhavet ।caturaṅgulavistāraṃ pañcāṅgulamathāpi vā ।।trikaṃ dvyaṅgulakaṃ tat syānmadhyantasya suśobhanam ।āyāmastatsamastasya madhyanimnaḥ suśobhanaḥ ।।śuṣiraṃ kaṇṭhadeśe syādviśed yāvat kanīyasī ।śeṣakuṇḍantu kartavyaṃ yathāruci vicitritaṃ ।।sruvantu hastamātraṃ syāddaṇḍakena samanvitaṃ ।vaṭukaṃ dvyaṅgulaṃ vṛttaṃ kartavyantu suśobhanaṃ ।।
kuṇḍakena samanvitamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kaṇṭhakaṃ dvyaṅgulamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ candrābhaṃ dvyaṅgulamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
gopadantu yathā magnamalpapaṅke tathā bhavet ।upalipya likhedrekhāmaṅgulāṃ vajranāsikāṃ ।।saumyāgrā prathamā tasyāṃ rekhe pūrvamukhe tayoḥ ।madhye tisras tathā kuryāddakṣiṇādikrameṇa tu ।।evamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit ।viṣṭaraṃ kalpayettena tasmin śaktintu vaiṣṇavīṃ ।।alaṃ kṛtvā mūrtimatīṃ kṣipedagniṃ hariṃ smaran ।prādeśamātrāḥ samidho datvā parisamuhya taṃ ।।darbhaistridhā paristīrya pūrvādau tatra pātrakaṃ ।āsādayedidhmavahnī bhūmau ca śrukśruvadvayaṃ ।।ājyasthālī carusthālī kuśājyañca praṇītayā ।prokṣayitvā prokṣaṇīñca gṛhītvāpūrya vāriṇā ।।pavitrāntarhite haste pariśrāvya ca tajjalaṃ ।prāṅnītvā prokṣaṇīpātraṇ jyotiragre nidhāya ca ।।tadadbhistriś ca samprokṣya iddhmaṃ vinyasya cāgrataḥ ।praṇītāyāṃ supuṣpāyāṃ viṣṇuṃ dhyātvottareṇa ca ।।ājyasthālīmathājyena sampūryāgre nidhāya ca ।samplavotpavanābhyāntu kuryādājyasya saṃskṛtiṃ ।।akhaṇḍitāgrau nirgarbhau kuśau prādeśamātrakau ।tābhyāmuttānapāṇibhyāmaṅguṣṭhānāmikena tu ।।ājyaṃ tayostu saṅgṛhya dvirnītvā triravāṅkṣipet ।sruksruvau cāpi saṅgṛhya tābhyāṃ prakṣipya vāriṇa ।।

rudranāsikāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ vaktranāsikāmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ādyaṃ tayostu sampūjya trīn vārānūrdhvamutkṣipediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pratapya darbhaiḥ sammṛjya punaḥ prakṣyālya caiva hi ।niṣṭapya sthāpayitvā tu praṇavenaiva sādhakaḥ ।।praṇavādinamontena paścāddhomaṃ samācaret ।garbhādhānādikarmāṇi yāvadaṃśavyavasthayā ।।nāmāntaṃ vratabandhāntaṃ samāvartāvasānakam ।adhikārāvasānaṃ vā karyādaṅgānusārataḥ ।।praṇavenopacārantu kuryātsarvatra sādhakaḥ ।aṅgair homastu kartavyo yathāvittānusārataḥ ।।garbhādānantu prathamaṃ tataḥ puṃsavanaṃ smṛtam ।sīmantonnayanaṃ jātakarma nāmānnaprāśanam ।।cūḍakṛtiṃ vratabandhaṃ vedavratānyaśeṣataḥ ।samāvartanaṃ patnyā ca yogaścāthādhikārakaḥ ।।hṛdādikramato dhyātvā ekaikaṃ karma pūjya ca ।aṣṭāvaṣṭau tu juhuyāt pratikarmāhutīḥ punaḥ ।।pūrṇāhutiṃ tato dadyāt śrucā mūlena sādhakaḥ ।vauṣaḍantena mantreṇa plutaṃ susvaramuccaran ।।viṣṇorvahnintu saṃskṛtya śrapayedvaiṣṇavañcarum ।ārādhya sthiṇḍile viṣṇuṃ mantrān saṃsmṛtya saṃśrapet ।।āsanādikrameṇaiva sāṅgāvaraṇamuttamam ।gandhapuṣpaiḥ samabhyarcya dhyātā devaṃ surottamam ।।ādhāyedhmamathāghārāvājyāvagnīśasaṃsthitau ।

niyujya sthāpayitveti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

devavratānyaśeṣata iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yogaścāthādhikārata iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mantrān santarpya saṃtrapet iti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
vāyavyanairṛtāśādipravṛttau tu yathākramam ।।ājyabhāgau tato hutvā cakṣuṣī dakṣiṇottare ।madhyetha juhuyātsarvamantrānarcākrameṇa tu ।।ājyena tarpayenmūrterdaśāṃśenāṅgahomakam ।śataṃ sahasraṃ vājyādyaiḥ samidbhirvā tilaiḥ saha ।।samāpyārcāntu homāntāṃ śucīn śiṣyānupoṣitān ।āhūyāgre niveśyātha hy astreṇa prokṣayet paśūn ।।śiṣyānātmani saṃyojya avidyākarmabandhanaiḥ ।liṅgānuvṛttaś caitanyaṃ saha liṅgena pāśitam ।।dhyānamārgena samprokṣya vāyuvījena śodhayet ।tato dahanavījena sṛṣṭiṃ brahmāṇḍasañjñikām ।।nirdagdhāṃ sakalāṃ dhyāyedbhasmakūṭanibhasthitām ।plāvayedvāriṇā bhasma saṃsāraṃ vārmayaṃsmaret ap।tatra śaktiṃ nyaset paścāt pārthivīṃ bījasañjñikām ।tanmātrābhiḥ samastābhiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ pārthivaṃ śubham ।।aṇḍantadudbhavandhyāyettadādhārantadātmakam ।tanmadhye cintayenmūrtiṃ pauruṣīṃ praṇavātmikām ।।liṅgaṃ saṅkrāmayet paścādātmasthaṃ pūrvasaṃskṛtam ।vibhaktendriyasaṃsthānaṃ kramād vṛddhaṃ vicintayet ।।tatoṇḍamabdamekaṃ tu sthitvā dviśakalīkṛtam ।

samidbhirvā tilais tathā iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

saha liṅgena darśitamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

saṃsārañcākṣayaṃ smarediti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sthaṇḍile pūrvasaṃskṛtamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dyāvāpṛthivyau śakale tayormadhye prajāpatim ।।jātaṃ dhyātvā punaḥ prokṣya praṇavena tu saṃśritam ।mantrātmakatanuṃ kṛtvā yathānyāsaṃ puroditam ।।viṣṇurhastaṃ tato mūrdhni datvā dhyātvā tu vaiṣṇavam ।evamekaṃ bahūn vāpi janitvā dhyānayogataḥ ।।karau saṅgṛhya mūlena netre baddhvā tu vāsasā ।netramantreṇa mantrī tān sadanenāhatena tu ।।kṛtapūjo guruḥ samyak devadevasya tattvavān ।śiṣyān puṣpāñjalibhṛtaḥ prāṅmukhānupaveśayet ।।arcayeyuś ca tepyevamprasūtā guruṇā harim ।kṣiptvā puṣpāñjaliṃ tatra puṣpādibhiranantaram ।।amantramarcanaṃ kṛtvā guroḥ pādārcanantataḥ ।vidhāya dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt sarvasvaṃ cārdhameva vā ।।guruḥ saṃśikṣayecchiṣyān taiḥ pūjyo nāmabhirhariḥ ।viśvaksenaṃ yajedīśaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।।tajjapantañca tarjanyā maṇḍalasthaṃ visarjayet ।।viṣṇunirmālyamakhilaṃ viṣvaksenāya cārpayet ।praṇītābhis tathātmānamabhiṣicya ca kuṇḍagaṃ ।।vahnimātmani saṃyojya viṣvaksenaṃ visarjayet ।bubhukṣuḥ sarvamāpnoti mumukṣur līyate harau ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye agnikāryādikathanaṃ nāma caturviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

vāsudevārcanaṃ kṛtvā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcaviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

vāsudevādimantranirūpaṇaṃ

nārada uvāca
vāsudevādimantrāṇāṃ pūjānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vade ।vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaścāniruddhakaḥ ।।namo bhagavate cādau a ā aṃ aḥ svavījakāḥ ।oṅkārādyā namontāś ca namo nārāyaṇastataḥ ।।oṃ tat sat brahmaṇe caiva oṃ namo viṣṇave namaḥ ।oṃ kṣauṃ oṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya vai namaḥ ।।oṃ bhūrnamo bhagavate varāhāya narādhipāḥ ।javāruṇaharidrābhā nīlaśyāmalalohitāḥ ।।meghāgnimadhupiṅgābhā vallabhā nava nāyakāḥ ।aṅgāni svaravījānāṃ svanāmāntair yathākramam ।।hṛdayādīni kalpeta vibhaktaistantravedibhiḥ ।vyañjanādīni vījāni teṣāṃ lakṣaṇamanyathā ।।dīrghasvaraistu bhinnāni namontāntasthitāni tu ।aṅgāni hrasvayuktāni upāṅgānīti varṇyate ।।vibhaktanāmavarṇāntasthitāni vījamuttamaṃ ।dīrghair hrasvaiś ca saṃyuktaṃ sāṅgopāṅgaṃsvaraiḥ kramāt ।।vyañjanānāṃ kramo hy eṣa hṛdayādiprakḷptaye ।svavījena svanāmāntair vibhaktānyaṅganāmabhiḥ ।।
