dvādaśākṣaravījakā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sthitavījārthamuttamamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dīrghasvaraiś ca saṃyuktamaṅgopāṅgaṃ svaraiḥ kramāditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

svaravījeṣu nāmāntair vibhaktānyaṅganāmabhiriti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
yuktāni hṛdayādīni dvādaśāntāni pañcataḥ ।ārabhya kalpayitvā tu japet siddhyanurūpataḥ ।।hṛdayañca śiraścūḍā kavacaṃ netramastrakaṃ ।ṣaḍaṅgāni tu vījānāṃ mūlasya dvādaśāṅgakaṃ ।।hṛcchiraś ca śikhā varma cāstranetrāntayodaraṃ ।praṣṭabāhūrujānūṃś ca jaṅghā pādau kramānnyaset ।।kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ vainateyaḥ khaṃ ṭhaṃ phaṃ ghaṃgadāmanuḥ ।gaṃ ḍaṃ baṃ saṃ puṣṭhimanto ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyainamaḥ ।।vaṃ śaṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ chaṃ taṃ paṃ kaustubhāya ca ।jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya śrīvatsāya saṃ vaṃ daṃ caṃlaṃ ।।oṃ dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai mahānantāya vai namaḥ ।nirvījapadamantrāṇāṃ padair aṅgāni kalpayet ।।jātyantair nāmasaṃyukterhṛdayādīni pañcadhā ।praṇavaṃ hṛdayādīni tataḥ proktāni pañcadhā ।।praṇavaṃ hṛdayaṃ pūrvaṃ parāyeti śiraḥ śikhā ।nāmnātmanā tu kavacaṃ astraṃ nāmāntakaṃ bhavet ।।

dvādaśārṇāni yatnata iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mahāgadā iti ṅa,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ṭhaṃ ṇaṃ maṃ kṣaṃ iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

daṃ bhaṃ pamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śrīvatsāya ca pañcamamiti ṅa, cihnitapustkapāṭhaḥ śrīvatso vaṃ caṃ daṃ ṭhaṃ laṃ iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

namonantāya vai nama iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nāmnāmunā tu iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustkadvayapāṭhaḥ
oṃ parāstrādisvanāmātmā caturthyanto namontakaḥ ।ekavyūhādiṣaḍviṃśavyūhāttasyātmano manuḥ ।।kaniṣṭādikarāgreṣu prakṛtiṃ dehakercayet ।parāya puruṣātmā syāt prakṛtyātmā dvirūpakaḥ ।।oṃ parayāmnyātmane caiva vāyvarkau ca dvirūpakaḥ ।agniṃ trimūrtau vinyasya vyāpakaṃ karadehayoḥ ।।vāyvarkau karaśākhāsu savyetarakaradvaye ।hṛdi mūrto tanāveṣa trivyūhe turyarūpake ।।ṛgvedaṃ vyāpakaṃ haste aṅgulīṣu yajurnyaset ।taladvayetharvarūpaṃ śirohṛccaraṇāntakaḥ ।।ākāśaṃ vyāpakaṃ nyasya kare dehe tu pūrvavat ।aṅgulīṣu ca vāyvādi śirohṛdguhyapādake ।।vāyurjyotirjalaṃ pṛthvī pañcavyūhaḥ samīritaḥ ।manaḥ śrotrantvagdṛgjihvā ghrāṇaṃ ṣaḍvyūha īritaḥ ।।vyāpakaṃ mānasaṃ nyasya tatoṅguṣṭāditaḥ kramāt ।mūrdhāsyahṛdguhyapatsu kathitaḥ karuṇātmakaḥ ।।ādimūrtistu sarvatra vyāpako jīvasañjñitaḥ ।bhūrbhuvaḥ svarmaharjanastapaḥ styañca saptadhā ।।kare dehe nyasedādyamaṅguṣṭādikrameṇa tu ।talasaṃsthaḥ saptamaś ca lokeśo dehake kramāt ।।

oṃ parāstrādityanāmātmā iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

evaṃ vyūhādiṣaḍviṃśaṃ vyūhāttasyātmano manuriti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

agniṃ dvimūrtau iti kha, cihnitapustkapāṭhaḥ

talasthaḥ saptamaś caiva iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dehe śirolalāṭāsyahṛdguhyāṅgriṣu saṃsthitaḥ ।agniṣṭhomastathokthastu ṣoḍaśī vājapeyakaḥ ।।atirātrāptoryāmañca yajñātmā saptarūpakaḥ ।dhīrahaṃ manaḥ śabdaś ca sparśarūparasāstataḥ ।।gandho buddhirvyāpakaṃ tu kare dehe nyaset kramāt ।nyasedantyai ca talayoḥ ke lalāṭe mukhe hṛdi ।।nābhau guhye ca pāde ca aṣṭavyūhaḥ pumān smṛtaḥ ।vījo buddhirahaṅkāro manaḥ śabdo guṇonilaḥ ।।rūpaṃ raso navātmāyaṃ jīva aṅguṣṭhakadvaye ।tarjanyādikramāccheṣaṃ yāvadvāmapradeśinīṃ ।।dehe śirolalāṭāsyahṛnnābhiguhyajānuṣu ।pādayoś ca daśātmāyaṃ indro vyāpī samāsthitaḥ ।।aṅguṣṭhakadvaye vahnistarjanyādau pareṣu ca ।śirolalāṭavaktreṣu hṛnnābhiguhyajānuṣu ।।pādayorekadaśātmā manaḥ śrotraṃ tvageva ca ।cakṣurjihvā tathā ghrāṇaṃ vākpāṇyaṅghriś ca pāyukaḥ ।।upasthaṃ mānaso vyāpī śrotramaṅguṣṭhakadvaye ।tarjanyādikramādaṣṭau atiriktaṃ taladvaye ।।uttamāṅgulalalāṭāsyahṛnnābhāvatha guhyake ।uruyugme tathā jaṅghe gulphapādeṣu ca kramāt ।।

atirātrāptayāmaś ca iti kha, cihnitapustkapāṭhaḥ

rasās tathā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nyasedante ca iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । nyasedaṣṭau ca iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kramāt smṛta iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭḥaḥ
viṣṇurmadhuharaś caiva trivikramakavāmanau ।śrīdharotha hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmanābhastathaiva ca ।।dāmodaraḥ keśavaś ca nārāyaṇastataḥ paraḥ ।mādhavaścātha govindo viṣṇuṃ vai vyāpakaṃ nyaset ।।aṅguṣṭhādau tale dvau ca pāde jānuni vai kaṭau ।śiraḥśikharakaṭyāñca jānupādādiṣu nyaset ।।dvādaśātmā pañcaviṃśaḥ ṣaḍviṃśavyūhakas tathā ।puruṣo dhīrahaṅkāro manaścittañca śabdakaḥ ।।tathā sparśo raso rūpaṃ gandhaḥ śrotraṃ tvacas tathā ।cakṣurjihvā nāsikā ca vākpāṇyaṅghriś ca pāyavaḥ ।।upastho bhūrjalantejo vāyurākāśameva ca ।puruṣaṃ vyāpakaṃ nyasya aṅguṣṭhādau daśa nyaset ।।śeṣān hastatale nyasya śirasyatha lalāṭake ।mukhahṛnnābhiguhyorujānvaṅghrau karaṇodgatau ।।pāde jānvorupasthe ca hṛdaye mūrdhni ca kramāt ।paraś ca puruṣātmādau ṣaḍviṃśe pūrvavatparaṃ ।।sañcintya maṇḍalaike tu prakṛtiṃ pūjayedbudhaḥ ।pūrvayāmyāpyasaumyeṣu hṛdayādīni pūjayet ।।astramagnyādikoṇeṣu vainateyādi pūrvavat ।dikpālāṃś ca vidhistvanyaḥ trivyūhegniś ca madhyataḥ ।।pūrvādidigbalāvasorājyādibhiralaṅkṛtaḥ ।karṇikāyāṃ nābhasaś ca mānasaḥ karṇikāsthitaḥ ।।

astramagnyādipatreṣu iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

dikpālāṃś ca vidhistasya iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ dikpālādau vidhistulya iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
viśvarūpaṃ sarvasthityai yajedrājyajayāya ca ।sarvavyūhaiḥ samāyuktamaṅgair api ca pañcabhiḥ ।।garuḍādyaistathendrādyaiḥ sarvān kāmānavāpnuyāt ।viśvaksenaṃ yajennāmnā vai vījaṃ vyomasaṃsthitaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye mantrapradarśanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

mudrālakṣaṇakathanaṃ

nārada uvāca
mudrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye sānnidhyādiprakārakaṃ ।añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā vandanī hṛdayānugā ।।ūrdhvāṅguṣṭhovāmamuṣṭirdakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhabandhanaṃ ।savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yasya cordhve prakīrtitaḥ ।।tisraḥ sādharaṇā vyūhe athāsādharaṇā imāḥ ।kaniṣṭhādivimokena aṣṭo mudrā yathākramaṃ ।।aṣṭānāṃ pūrvavījānāṃ kramaśastvavadhārayet ।aṅguṣṭhena kaniṣṭāntaṃ namayitvāṅgulitrayaṃ ।।ūrdhvaṃ kṛtvā sammukhañca vījāya navamāya vai ।vāmahastamathottānaṃ kṛtvārdhaṃ nāmayecchanaiḥ ।।

sarvasiddhyai iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

vairājaṃ nāgasaṃyutamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭḥaḥ । yau vījaṃ cāṅgasaṃyutamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yaḥ savyerdhe prakīrtita iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
varāhasya smṛtā mudrā aṅganāñca kramādimāḥ ।ekaikāṃ mocayedbaddhvā vāmamuṣṭo tathāgulīṃ ।।ākuñcayet pūrvamudrāṃ dakṣiṇepyevameva ca ।ūrdhvāṅguṣṭho vāmamuṣṭhirmudrāsiddhistato bhavet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye mudrāpradarśanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptaviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

dīkṣāvidhikathanaṃ

nārada uvāca
vakṣye dīkṣāṃ sarvadāñca maṇḍalebje hariṃ yajet ।daśamyāmupasaṃhṛtya yāgadravyaṃ samastakaṃ ।।vinyasya nārasiṃhena sammantrya śatavārakaṃ ।sarṣapāṃstu phaḍantena rakṣoghnān sarvataḥ kṣipet ।।śaktiṃ sarvātmakāṃ tatra nyaset prāsādarūpiṇīṃ ।sarvauṣadhiṃ samāhṛtya vikirānabhimantrayet ।।śatavāraṃ śubhe pātre vāsudevena sādhakaḥ ।saṃsādhya paṇjagavyantu pañcabhirmūlamūrtibhiḥ ।।nārāyaṇāntaiḥ samprokṣya kuśāgraistena tāṃbhuvaṃ ।vikirānvāsudevena kṣipeduttānapāṇinā ।।tridhā pūrvamukhastiṣṭhan dhyāyet viṣṇuṃ tathā hṛdi ।vardhanyā sahite kumbhe sāṅgaṃ viṣṇuṃ prapūjayet ।।

sarṣapāṃstadvadastreṇa iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kuśāgreṇaiva tāṃ bhuvamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭḥaḥ
śatavāraṃ mantrayitvā tvastreṇaiva ca vardhanīṃ ।acchinnadhārayā siñcan īśānāntaṃ nayecca taṃ ।।kalasaṃ pṛṣṭhato nītvā sthāpayedvikiropari ।saṃhṛtya vikirān darbhaiḥ kumbheśaṃ karkarīṃ yajet ।।savastraṃ pañcaratnāḍhyaṃ khaṇḍile pūjayeddhariṃ ।agnāvapi samabhyarcya mantrān sañjapya pūrvavat ।।prakṣālya puṇḍarīkena vilipyāntaḥ sugandhinā ।ukhāmājyena saṃpūrya gokṣīreṇa tu sādhakaḥ ।।ālokya vāsudevena tataḥ saṅkarṣaṇena ca ।taṇḍulānājyasaṃsṛṣṭān kṣipet kṣīre susaṃskṛte ।।pradyumnena smāloḍya darvyā saṅghaṭṭayecchanaiḥ ।pakvamuttārayet paścādaniruddhena deśikaḥ ।।prakṣālyālipya tat kuryādūrdhvapuṇḍraṃ tu bhasmanā ।nārāyaṇena pārśveṣu carumevaṃ susaṃskṛtaṃ ।।bhāgamekaṃ tu devāya kalaśāya dvitīyakaṃ ।tṛtīyena tu bhāgena pradadyādāhutitrayaṃ ।।śiṣyaiḥ saha caturthaṃ tu gururadyādviśuddhaye ।nārāyaṇena sammantrya saptadhā kṣīravṛkṣajam ।।dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayitvā tyaktvā jñātvāsvapātakaṃ ।aindrāgnyuttarakeśānīmukhaṃ patitamuttamaṃ ।।śubhaṃ siṃhaśataṃ hutvā ācamyātha praviśya ca ।

utthāyājyeneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

āloḍya vāsudevena iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vivṛddhaye iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śubhaṃ siddhamiti jñātvā ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pūjāgāraṃ nyasenmantrī prācyāṃ viṣṇuṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।saṃsārārṇavamagnānāṃ paśūnāṃ pāśamuktaye ।tvameva śaraṇaṃ deva sadā tvaṃ bhaktavatsala ।।devadevānujānīhi prākṛtaiḥ pāśabandhanaiḥ ।pāśitānmocayiṣyāmi tvatprasādāt paśūnimān ।।iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ sampraviśya paśūṃstataḥ ।dhāraṇābhistu saṃśodhya pūrvajjvalanādinā ।।saṃskṛtya mūrtyā saṃyojya netre baddhvā pradarśayet ।puṣpapūrṇāñjalīṃstatra kṣipettannāma yojayet ।।amantramarcanaṃ tatra pūrvavat kārayet kramāt ।yasyāṃ mūrtau patet puṣpaṃ tasya tannāma nirdiśet ।।śikhāntasammitaṃ sūtraṃ pādāṅguṣṭhādi ṣaḍguṇaṃ ।kanyāsu kartitaṃ raktaṃ punastattriguṇīkṛtam ।।yasyāṃ saṃlīyate viśvaṃ yato viśvaṃ prasūyate ।prakṛtiṃ prakriyābhedaiḥ saṃsthitāṃ tatra cintayet ।।tena prākṛtikān pāśān grathitvā tattvasaṅkhyayā ।kṛtvā śarāve tat sūtraṃ kuṇḍapārśve nidhāya tu ।।tatastattvāni sarvāṇi dhyātvā śiṣyatanau nyaset ।sṛṣṭikramāt prakṛtyādipṛthivyantāni deśikaḥ ।।tatraikadhā paṇcadhā syāddaśadvādaśadhāpi vā ।

mūrtyā samprokṣya iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sūtramiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tatra saṅkhyayā iti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

nidhīyate iti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

tatrārcā pañcadhā yā syādaṅgair dvādaśadhāpi veti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । tatrātmā pañcadhā vā syāt daśadvadaśadhāpiveti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
jñātavyaḥ sarvabhedena grathitastattvacintakaiḥ ।।aṅgaiḥ pañcabhiradhvānaṃ nikhilaṃ vikṛtikramāt ।tanmātrātmani saṃhṛtya māyāsūtre paśostanau ।।prakṛtirliṅgaśaktiś ca kartā buddhis tathā manaḥ ।pañcatanmātrabuddhyākhyaṃ karmākhyaṃ bhūtapañcakaṃ ।।dhyāyecca dvādaśātmānaṃ sūtre dehe tathecchayā ।hutvā sampātavidhinā sṛṣṭeḥ sṛṣṭikrameṇa tu ।।ekaikaṃ śatahomena dattvā pūrṇāhutiṃ tataḥ ।śarāve sampuṭīkṛtya kumbheśāya nivedayet ।।adhivāsya yathā nyāyaṃ bhaktaṃ śiṣyaṃ tu dīkṣayet ।karaṇīṃ kartarīṃ vāpi rajāṃsi khaṭikāmapi ।।anyadapyupayogi syāt sarvaṃ tadvāyugocare ।saṃsthāpya mūlamantreṇa parāmṛśyādhivādhivāsayet ।।namo bhūtebhyaś ca baliḥ kuśe śete smaran hariṃ ।maṇḍapaṃ bhūṣayitvātha vitānaghaṭalaḍḍukaiḥ ।।maṇḍaletha yajedviṣṇuṃ tataḥ santarpya pāvakaṃ ।āhūya dīkṣayecchiṣyān baddhapadmāsanasthitān ।।sammokṣya viṣṇuṃ hastena mūrdhānaṃ spṛśya vai kramāt ।prakṛtyādivikṛtyantāṃ sādhibhūtādhidaivatāṃ ।।sṛṣṭimādhyātmikīṃ kṛtvā hṛdi tāṃ saṃharet kramāt ।tanmātrabhūtāṃ sakalāṃ jīvena samatāṃ gatāṃ ।।tataḥ samprārthya kambheśaṃ sūtraṃ saṃhṛtya deśikaḥ ।

māyāsūtre suśobhane iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

karālaṃ kartarīñcāpi iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

vitānabhavagandhakair iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । vitānapaṭakendriyair iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
agneḥ samīpamāgatya pārśve taṃ sanniveśya tu ।।mūlamantreṇa sṛṣṭīśamāhutīnāṃ śatena taṃ ।udāsīnamathāsādya pūrṇāhutyā ca deśikaḥ ।।śuklaṃ rajaḥ samādāya mūlena śatamantritaṃ ।santāḍya hṛdayantena huṃphaṭkārāntasaṃyutaiḥ ।।viyogapadasaṃyuktair vījaiḥ padādibhiḥ kramāt ।pṛthivyādīni tattvāni viśliṣya juhuyāttataḥ ।।vahnāvakhilatattvānāmālaye vyāhṛte harau ।nīyamānaṃ kramātsarvaṃ tatrādhvānaṃ smaredbudhaḥ ।।tāḍanena viyojyaivaṃ ādāyāpādya śāmyatāṃ ।prakṛtyāhṛtya juhuyādyathokte jātavedasi ।।garbhādhānaṃ jātakarma bhogañcaiva layantathā ।śuddhaṃ tattvaṃ samuddhṛtya pūrṇāhutyā tu deśikaḥ ।sannayeddvipare tattve yāvadavyāhṛtaṃ kramāt ।।tat paraṃ jñānayogena vilāpya paramātmani ।vimuktabandhanaṃ jīvaṃ parasminnavyaye pade ।।nivṛttaṃ paramānande śuddhe buddhe smaredbudhaḥ ।dadyāt pūrṇāhutiṃ paścādevaṃ dīkṣā samāpyate ।।prayogamantrān vakṣyāmi yair dīkṣā homasaṃlayaḥ ।
oṃ yaṃ bhūtāni viśuddhaṃ huṃ phaṭ
anena tāḍanaṃ kuryādviyojanamiha dvayaṃ ।।
oṃ yaṃ bhūtānyāpātayehaṃ ādānaṃ kṛtvā cānena prakṛtyā yojanaṃ śṛṇu ।

tāḍanena vimokṣyaivamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ yaṃ bhūtāni puṃścāho homamantraṃ pravakṣyāmi tataḥ pūrṇāhutermanuṃ ।।

oṃ bhūtāni saṃhara svāhā । oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya vauṣaṭ
pūrṇāhutyanantare tu tadvai śiṣyantu sādhayet ।evaṃ tattvāni sarvāṇi kramātsaṃśodhayed budhaḥ ।।namontena svavījena tāḍanādipuraḥsaram ।
oṃ vāṃ varmendriyāṇi । oṃ deṃ buddhīndriyāṇi
yaṃ vījena samānantu tāḍanādiprayogakam ।।
oṃ suṃgandhatanmātre viyuṅkṣva huṃ phaṭ ।। oṃ khaṃ khaṃ kṣa prakṛtyā । oṃ suṃ huṃ gandhatanmātre saṃhara svāhā tataḥ pūrṇāhutiś caivamuttareṣu prayujyate ।

oṃ rāṃ rasatanmātre । oṃ bheṃ rūpatanmātre । oṃ raṃ sparśatanmātre । oṃ eṃ śabdatanmātre । oṃ bhaṃ namaḥ । oṃ naṃ buddhe । oṃ oṃ prakṛte
ekamūrtāvayaṃ prokto dīkṣāyogaḥ samāsataḥ ।evameva prayogastu navavyūhādike smṛtaḥ ।।dagdhāparasmin sandadhyānnirvāṇe prakṛtinnaraḥ ।avikāre samādadhyādīśvare prakṛtinnaraḥ ।।śodhayitvātha bhutāni karmāṅgāni viśodhayet ।buddhyākhyānyatha tanmātramanojñānamahaṅkṛtiṃ ।।liṅgātmānaṃ viśodhyānte prakṛtiṃ śodhāyet punaḥ ।

tadvai śiṣyantusannayediti kha, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

oṃ suṃ āyāhi hāmiti kha,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ oṃ saṃ pāhi svāhā iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

aṃ duṃ stva prakṛtyā iti oṃ khaṃ khaṃ stva prakṛtyā iti ca kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

karmākhyāni ca śodhayediti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
puruṣaṃ prākṛtaṃ śuddhamīśvare dhāmni saṃsthitaṃ ।।svagocarīkṛtāśeṣabhogamuktau kṛtāspadaṃ ।dhyāyan pūrṇāhutiṃ dadyāddīkṣeyaṃ tvadhikāriṇī ।।aṅgair ārādhya mantrasya nītvā tattvagaṇaṃ samaṃ ।kramādevaṃ viśodhyānte sarvasiddhisamanvitaṃ ।।dhyāyan pūrṇāhitiṃ dadyātdīkṣeyaṃ sādhake smṛtā ।dravyasya vā na sampattiraśaktirvātmano yadi ।।iṣṭvā devaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ sarvopakaraṇānvitaṃ ।sadyodhivāsya dvādaśyāṃ dīkṣayeddeśikottamaḥ ।।bhakto vinītaḥ śārīrair guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ ।śiṣyo nātidhanī yastu sthaṇḍilebhyarcya dīkṣayet ।।adhvānaṃ nikhilaṃ daivaṃ bhautaṃ vādhyātmikī kṛtaṃ ।sṛṣṭikrameṇa śiṣyasya dehe dhyātvā tu deśikaḥ ।।aṣṭāṣṭāhutibhiḥ pūrvaṃ kramāt santarpya sṛṣṭimān ।svamantrair vāsudevādīn jananādīn visarjayet ।।homena śodhayet paścātsaṃhārakramayogataḥ ।yonisūtrāṇi baddhāni muktvā karmāṇi deśikaḥ ।।śiṣyadehātsamāhṛtya kramāttattvāni śodhayet ।agnau prākṛtike viṣṇau layaṃ nītvādhidaivake ।।śuddhaṃ tattvamaśuddhena pūrṇāhutyā tu sādhayet ।śiṣye prakṛtimāpanne dagdhvā prākṛtikān guṇān ।।

likhitaṃ daivamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pūjāṃ kṛtvā visarjayediti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ vimalādīn visarjayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pūrṇāhutyā tu sannayediti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
maucayedadhikāre vā niyuñjyāddeśikaḥ śiśūn ।athānyān śaktidīkṣāṃ vā kuryāt bhāve sthito guruḥ ।।bhaktyā samprātipannānāṃ yatīnāṃ nirdhanasya ca ।sampūjya sthaṇḍile viṣṇuṃ pārśvasthaṃ sthāpya putrakaṃ ।।devatābhimukhaḥ śiṣyastiryagāsyaḥ svayaṃ sthitaḥ ।adhvānaṃ nikhilaṃ dhyātvā parvabhiḥ svair vikalpitaṃ ।।śiṣyadehe tathā devamādhidaivikayācanaṃ ।dhyānayogena sañcintya pūrvavattāḍanādinā ।।kramāttattvāni sarvāṇi śodhayet sthaṇḍile harau ।tāḍanena viyojyātha gṛhītvātmani tatparaḥ ।।deve saṃyojya saṃśodhya gṛhītvā tat svabhāvataḥ ।ānīya śuddhabhāvena sandhayitvā krameṇa tu ।।śodhayeddhyānayogena sarvato jñānamudrayā ।śuddheṣu sarvatattveṣu pradhāne ceśvare sthite ।।dagdhvā nirvāpayecchiṣyān pade caiśe niyojayet ।ninayet siddhimārge vā sādhakaṃ deśikottamaḥ ।।evamevādhikārastho gṛhī karmaṇyatandritaḥ ।ātmānaṃ śodhayaṃstiṣṭhed yāvadrāgakṣayo bhavet ।।kṣīṇarāgamathātmānaṃ jñātvā saṃśuddhikilviṣaḥ ।āropya putre śiṣye vā hy adhikārantu saṃyamī ।।dagdhvā māyāmayaṃ pāśaṃ pravrajya svātmani sthitaḥ ।śarīrapātamākāṅkṣannāsītāvyaktaliṅgavān ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye sarvadīkṣākathanaṃ nāma saptaviṃśodhyāyaḥ

paśūniti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tat punariti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakacatuṣṭayapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha aṣṭāviṃśodhyāyaḥ

abhiṣekavidhānaṃ

nārada uvāca
abhiṣekaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathācāryastu putrakaḥ ।siddhibhāk sādhako yena rogī rogādvimucyate ।।rājyaṃ rājā sutaṃ strīñca prāpnuyānmalanāśanaṃ ।mūrtikumbhān suratnāḍhyānmadhyapūrvādito nyaset ।।sahasrāvartitān kuryādathavā śatavartitān ।maṇḍape maṇḍale viṣṇuṃ prācyaiśānyāñca pīṭhike ।।niveśya śakalīkṛtya putrakaṃ sādhakādikaṃ ।abhiṣekaṃ samabhyarcya kuryādgītādipūrvakaṃ ।।dadyācca yogapīṭhādīṃstvanugrāhyāstvayā narāḥ ।guruś ca samayān brūyādguptaḥ śiṣyotha sarvabhāk ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye ācāryābhiṣeko nāma aṣṭāviṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ūnatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

sarvatobhadramaṇḍalakathanaṃ

nārada uvāca
sādhakaḥ sādhayenmantraṃ devatāyatanādike ।śuddhabhūmau gṛhe prārcya maṇḍale harimīśvaraṃ ।।caturastrīkṛte kṣetre maṇḍalādīni vai likhet ।rasavāṇākṣikoṣṭheṣu sarvatobhadramālikhet ।।ṣaṭtriṃśatkoṣṭhakaiḥ padmaṃ pīṭhaṃ paṅktyāvahirbhavet ।dvābhyāntu vīthikā tasmād dvābhyāṃ dvārāṇi dikṣu ca ।।

vartulaṃ bhrāmayitvā tu padmakṣetraṃ puroditam ।padmārdhe bhāmayitvā tu bhāgaṃ dvādaśamaṃ vahiḥ ।।vibhajya bhrāmayeccheṣaṃ catuḥkṣetrantu vartulaṃ ।prathamaṃ karṇikākṣetraṃ keśarāṇāṃ dvitīyakam ।।tṛtīyaṃ dalasandhīnāṃ dalāgrāṇāṃ caturthakam ।prasārya koṇasūtrāṇi koṇadiṅmadhyamantataḥ ।।nidhāya keśarāgre tu dalasandhīṃstu lāñchayet ।pātayitvātha sūtrāṇi tatra patrāṣṭakaṃ likhet ।।dalasandhyantarālantu mānaṃ madhye nidhāya tu ।dalāgraṃ bhrāmayettena tadagraṃ tadanantaraṃ ।।tadantarālaṃ tatpārśve kṛtvā vāhyakrameṇa ca ।keśare tu likheddvau dvau dalamadhye tataḥ punaḥ ।।padmalakṣmaitat sāmānyaṃ dviṣaṭkadalamucyate ।karṇikārdhena mānena prāksaṃsthaṃ bhrāmayet kramāt ।।tatpārśve bhramayogena kuṇḍalyaḥ ṣaḍ bhavanti hi ।evaṃ dvādaśa matsyāḥ syurdviṣaṭkadalakañca taiḥ ।।pañcapatrābhisiddhyarthaṃ matsyaṃ kṛtvaivamabjakam ।vyomarekhāvahiḥ pīṭhantatra koṣṭāni mārjayet ।।trīṇi koṇeṣu pādārthaṃ dvidvikānyaparāṇi tu ।caturdikṣu viliptāni gātrakāṇi bhavantyuta ।।tataḥ paṅktidvayaṃ dikṣu vīṭhyarthantu vilopayet ।dvārāṇyāśāsu kurvīta catvāri catasṛṣvapi ।।dvārāṇāṃ pārśvataḥ śobhā aṣṭau kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ ।

paṅktidvayaṃ dvayaṃ dikṣu vīthyarthaṃ viniyojayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tatpārśva upaśobhāstu tāvatyaḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।।samīpa upaśobhānāṃ koṇāstu parikīrtitāḥ ।caturdikṣu tato dve dve cintayenmadhyakoṣṭhakaiḥ ।।catvāri vāhyato mṛjyādekaikaṃ pārśvayorapi ।śobhārthaṃ pārśvayostrīṇi trīṇi lumpaddalasya tu ।।tadvadviparyaye kuryādupaśobhāṃ tataḥ param ।koṇasyāntarvahistrīṇi cintayeddvirvibhedataḥ ।।evaṃ ṣoḍaśakoṣṭhaṃ syādevamanyattu maṇḍalam ।dviṣaṭkabhāge ṣaṭtriṃśatpadaṃ padmantu vīthikā ।।ekā paṅktiḥ prābhyāṃ tu dvāraśobhādi pūrvavat ।dvādaśāṅgulibhiḥ padmamekahaste tu maṇḍale ।।dvihaste hastamātraṃ syādvṛddhyā dvāreṇa vācaret ।apīṭhañcaturasraṃ syādvikarañcakrapaṅkajam ।।padmārdhaṃ navabhiḥ proktaṃ nābhistu tisṛbhiḥ smṛtā ।aṣṭābhirdvārakān kuryānnemintu caturaṅgulaiḥ ।।tridhā vibhajya ca kṣetramantardvābhyāmathāṅkayet ।pañcāntasvarasiddhyarthaṃ teṣvasphālya likhedarān ।।indīvaradalākārānathavā mātulāṅgavat ।padmapatrāyatānvāpi likhedicchānurūpataḥ ।।bhrāmayitvā vahir nemāvarasandhyantare sthitaḥ ।bhrāmayedaramūlantu sandhimadhye vyavasthitaḥ ।।

parimārjitā iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dvidhā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pañcāntarastvasiddhyarthamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ pañcottarastu siddhyarthamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
aramadhye sthito madhamaraṇiṃ bhrāmayet samam ।evaṃ siddhyantarāḥ samyak mātulāṅganibhāḥ samāḥ ।।vibhajya saptadhā kṣetraṃ caturdaśakaraṃ samam ।dvidhā kṛte śataṃ hy atra ṣaṇnavatyadhikāni tu ।।koṣṭakāni caturbhistair madhye bhadraṃ samālikhet ।parito visṛjedvīthyai tathā dikṣu samālikhet ।।kamalāni punarvīthyai paritaḥ parimṛjya tu ।dve dve madhyamakoṣṭhe tu grīvārthaṃ dikṣu lopayet ।।catvāri vāhyataḥ paścāttrīṇi trīṇi tu lopayet ।grīvāpārśve vahistvekā śobhā sā parikīrtitā ।।vimṛjya vāhyakoṇeṣu saptāntastrīṇi mārjayet ।maṇḍalaṃ navabhāgaṃ syānnavavyūhaṃ hariṃ yajet ।।pañcaviṃśatikavyūhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ viśvarūpagaṃ ।dvātriṃśaddhastakaṃ kṣetraṃ bhaktaṃ dvātriṃśatā samaṃ ।।evaṃ kṛte caturviṃśatyadhikantu sahasrakaṃ ।koṣṭhakānāṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ madhye śoḍaśakoṣṭhakaiḥ ।।bhadrakaṃ parilikhyātha pārśve paṅktiṃ vimṛjya tu ।tataḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ koṣṭair dikṣu bhadrāṣṭakaṃ likhet ।।tatopi paṅktiṃ sammṛjya tadvat ṣoḍaśabhadrakaṃ ।likhitvā paritaḥ paṅktiṃ vimṛjyātha prakalpayet ।।dvāradvādaśakaṃ dikṣu trīṇi trīṇi yathākramaṃ ।ṣaḍbhiḥ parilupyāntarmadhye catvāri pārśvayoḥ ।।catvāryantarvahirdve tu śobhārthaṃ parimṛjya tu ।upadvārasiddhyarthaṃ trīṇyantaḥ pañca vāhyataḥ ।।

dikṣu tatrāṣṭakaṃ likhediti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
parimṛjya tathā śobhāṃ pūrvavat parikalpayet ।vahiḥ koṇeṣu saptāntastrīṇi koṣṭhāni mārjayet ।।pañcaviṃśatikavyūhe paraṃ brahma yajet kaje ।madhye pūrvāditaḥ padme vāsudevādayaḥ kramāt ।।varāhaṃ pūjayitvā ca pūrvapadme tataḥ kramāt ।vyūhān sampūjayettāvat yāvat ṣaḍviṃśamo bhavet ।।yathoktaṃ vyūhamakhilamekasmin paṅkaje kramāt ।yaṣṭavyamiti yatnena pracetā manyate adhvaraṃ ।।satpantu mūrtibhedena vibhaktaṃ manyate acyutaṃ ।catvāriṃśat karaṃ kṣetraṃ hy uttaraṃ vibhajet kramāt ।।ekaikaṃ saptadhā bhūyastathaivaikaṃ dvidhā punaḥ ।catuḥṣaṣṭyuttaraṃ saptaśatānyekaṃ sahasrakaṃ ।।koṣṭhakānāṃ bhadrakañca madhye ṣoḍaśakoṣṭhakaiḥ ।pārśve vīthīṃ tataścāṣṭabhadrāṇyatha ca vīthikā ।।ṣoḍaśābjānyatho vīthī caturviṃśatipaṅkajaṃ ।vīthīpadmāni dvātriṃśat paṅktivīthikajānyatha ।।catvāriṃśattato vīthī śeṣapaṅktitrayeṇa ca ।dvāraśobhopaśobhāḥ syurdikṣu madhye vilopya ca ।।dvicatuḥṣaḍdvārasiddhyai caturdikṣu vilopayet ।pañca trīṇyekakaṃ vāhye śobhopadvārasiddhaye ।।

śubhe iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yaṣṭavyamiti yajñena iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ yaṣṭavyamiti mantreṇa iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pracetā manyate dhruvamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hyuttamamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dvārāṇāṃ pārśvayorantaḥ ṣaḍ vā catvāri madhyataḥ ।dve dve lumpedevameva ṣaḍ bhavantyupaśobhikāḥ ।।ekasyāṃ diśi saṅkhyāḥ syuḥ catasraḥ prisaṅkhyayā ।।ekaikasyāṃ diśi trīṇi dvārāṇyapi bhavantyuta ।pañca pañca tu koṇeṣu paṅktau paṅktau kramāt mṛjet ।koṣṭakāni bhavedevaṃ martyeṣṭyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śubhaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye maṇḍalādilakṣaṇaṃ nāma ūnatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha triṃśo adhyāyaḥ

maṇḍalavidhiḥ

nārada uvāca
madhye padme yajedbrahma sāṅgaṃ pūrvebjanābhakaṃ ।āgneyebje ca prakṛtiṃ yāmyebje puruṣaṃ yajet ।।puruṣāddakṣiṇe ca vahniṃ nairṛte vāruṇenilaṃ ।ādityamaindave padme ṛgyajuś caiśapadmake ।।indrādīṃś ca dvitīyāyāṃ padme ṣoḍaśake tathā ।sāmātharvāṇamākāśaṃ vāyuṃ tejas tathā jalaṃ ।।pṛṭhivīñca manaś caiva śrotraṃ tvak cakṣurarcayet ।rasanāñca tathā ghrāṇaṃ bhūrbhuvaś caiva ṣoḍaśaṃ ।।maharjanastapaḥ satyaṃ tathāgniṣṭomameva ca ।atyagniṣṭomakaṃ cokthaṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vājapeyakaṃ ।।atirātrañca sampūjya tathāptoryāmamarcayet ।mano buddhimahaṅkāraṃ śabdaṃ sparśañca rūpakaṃ ।।rasaṃ gandhañca padmeṣu caturviṃśatiṣu kramāt ।

pratyagniṣṭomakamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ jyotiṣṭomakamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
jīvaṃ manodhipañcāhaṃ prakṛtiṃ śabdamātrakaṃ ।।vāsudevādimūrtīñca tathā caiva daśatmakaṃ ।manaḥ śrotraṃ tvacaṃ prārcya cakṣuś ca rasanaṃ tathā ।।ghrāṇaṃ vākpāṇipādañca dvātriṃśadvārijeṣvimān ।caturthāvaraṇe pūjyāḥ sāṅgāḥ saparivārakāḥ ।।pāyūpasthau ca sampūjya māsānāṃ dvādaśādhipān ।puruṣottamādiṣaḍviṃśān vāhyāvaraṇake yajet ।।cakrābje teṣu sampūjyā māsānāṃ patayaḥ kramāt ।aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ ṣaḍvā pañcātha caturo apare ।।rajaḥ pātaṃ tataḥ kuryāllikhite maṇḍale śṛṇu ।karṇikā pītavarṇā syādrekhāḥ sarvāḥ sitāḥ samāḥ ।।dvihaste aṅguṣṭamātrāḥ syurhaste cārdhasamāḥ sitāḥ ।padmaṃ śuklena sandhīṃstu kṛṣṇena śyāmatothavā ।।keśarā raktapītāḥ syuḥ koṇān raktena pūrayet ।bhūṣayedyogapīṭhantu yatheṣṭaṃ sārvavarṇikaiḥ ।।latāvitānapatrādyair vīthikāmupaśobhayet ।pīṭhadvāre tu śuklena śobhāraktena pītataḥ ।।upaśobhāñca nīlena koṇaśaṅkhyāṃś ca vai sitān ।bhadrake pūraṇaṃ proktamevamanyeṣu pūraṇaṃ ।।trikoṇaṃ sitaraktena kṛṣṇena ca vibhūṣayet ।dvikoṇaṃ raktapītābhyāṃ nābhiṃ kṛṣṇena cakrake ।।arakān pītaraktābhiḥ śyāmān nemintu raktataḥ ।sitaśyāmāruṇāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pītā rekhāstu vāhyataḥ ।।śālipiṣṭādi śuklaṃ syādraktaṃ kausumbhakādikam ।haridrayā ca hāridraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ syāddagdhadhānyataḥ ।।

śamīpatrādikaiḥ śyāmaṃ vījānāṃ lakṣajāpyataḥ ।caturlakṣaistu mantrāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ lakṣasādhanam ।।ayutaṃ buddhividyānāṃ stotrāṇāñca sahasrakam ।pūrvamevātha lakṣeṇa mantraśuddhis tathātmanaḥ ।।tathāpareṇa lakṣeṇa mantraḥ kṣetrīkṛto bhavet ।pūrvamevāsamo homo vījānāṃ samprakīrtitaḥ ।।pūrvasevā daśāṃśena mantrādīnāṃ prakīrtitā ।paraś carye tu mantre tu māsikaṃ vratamācaret ।।bhuvi nyasedvāmapādaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt pratigraham ।evaṃ dvitriguṇenaiva madhyamottamasiddhayaḥ ।।mantradhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi yena syānmantrajaṃ phalam ।sthūlaṃ śabdamayaṃ rūpaṃ vigrahaṃ vāhyamiṣyate ।।sukṣmāṃ jyotirmayaṃ rūpaṃ hārdaṃ cintāmayaṃ bhavet ।cintayā rahitaṃ yattu tat paraṃ prakīrtitam ।।varāhasiṃhaśaktīnāṃ sthūlarūpaṃ pradhānataḥ ।cintayā rahitaṃ rūpaṃ vāsudevasya kīrtitam ।।itareṣāṃ smṛtaṃ rūpaṃ hārdaṃ cintāmayaṃ sadā ।sthūlaṃ vairājamākhyātaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vai liṅgitaṃ bhavet ।।cintayā rahitaṃ rūpamaiśvaraṃ parikīrtitam ।hṛtpuṇḍarīkanilayañcaitanyaṃ jyotiravyayam ।।vījaṃ vījātmakaṃ dhyāyet kadambakusumākṛtiṃ ।kumbhāntaragato dīpo niruddhaprasavo yathā ।।saṃhataḥ kevalastiṣṭhedevaṃ mantreśvaro hṛdi ।anekaśuṣire kumbhe tāvanmātrā gabhastayaḥ ।।prasaranti vahistadvannāḍībhirvījaraśmayaḥ ।

athāvabhāsato daivīmātmīkṛtya tanuṃ sthitāḥ ।।hṛdayāt prasthitā nāḍyo darśanendriyagocarāḥ ।agnīṣomātmake tāsāṃ nāḍyau nāsāgrasaṃsthite ।।samyagguhyena yogena jitvā dehasamīraṇam ।japadhyānarato mantrī mantralakṣaṇamaśnute ।।saṃśuddhabhūtatanmātraḥ sakāmo yogamabhyasan ।aṇimādimavāpnoti viraktaḥ pravilaṅghya ca ।devātmake bhūtamātrānmucyate cendriyagrahāt ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye maṇḍalādivarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ekatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

mārjanavidhānaṃ

agnir uvāca
rakṣāṃ svasya pareṣāñca vakṣye tāṃ mārjanāhvayāṃ ।yayā vimucyate duḥkhaiḥ sukhañca prāpnuyānnaraḥ ।।oṃ namaḥ paramārthāya puruṣāya mahātmane ।arūpabahurūpāya vyāpine paramātmane ।।niṣkalmaṣāya śuddhāya dhyānayogaratāya ca ।namaskṛtya pravakṣyāmi yat tatsidhyatu me vacaḥ ।।varāhāya nṛsiṃhāya vāmanāya mahāmune ।namaskṛtya pravakṣyāmi yattatsidhyatu me vacaḥ ।।

mantrajaṃ phalamaśnute iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sukhaṃ brahmāpnuyānnaraḥ iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
trivikramāya rāmāya vaikuṇṭhāya narāya ca ।namaskṛtya pravakṣyāmi yattat sidhyatu me vacaḥ ।।varāha narasiṃheśa vāmaneśa trivikrama ।haragrīveśa sarveśa hṛṣīkeśa harāśubham ।।aparājitacakrādyaiś caturbhiḥ paramāyudhaiḥ ।akhaṇḍitānubhāvaistvaṃ sarvaduṣṭaharo bhava ।।harāmukasya duritaṃ sarvañca kuśalaṃ kuru ।mṛtyubandhārtabhayadaṃ duritasya ca yat phalam ।।parābhidhyānasahitaiḥ prayuktañcābhicārakam ।gadasparśamahārogaprayogaṃ jarayā jara ।।oṃ namo vāsudevāya namaḥ kṛṣṇāya khaḍgine ।namaḥ puṣkaranetrāya keśavāyādicakriṇe ।।namaḥ kamalakiñjalkapītanirmalavāsase ।mahāhararipuskandhasṛṣṭacakrāya cakriṇe ।।dṃṣṭroddhṛtakṣitibhṛte trayīmūrtimate namaḥ ।mahāyajñavarāhāya śeṣabhogāṅkaśāyine ।।taptahāṭakakeśāgrajvalatpāvakalocana ।vajrādhikanakhasparśaṃ divyasiṃha namostu te ।।kāśyapāyātihrasvāya ṛgyajuḥsāmabhūṣita ।tubhyaṃ vāmanarūpāyākramate gāṃ namo namaḥ ।।varāhāśeṣaduṣṭāni sarvapāpaphalāni vai ।marda marda mahādaṃṣṭra marda marda ca tatphalam ।।

akhaṇḍitātmabhāvaistvamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

daṃṣṭroddhṛtabhūmibhartre iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sṛjate gāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
narasiṃha karālākhya dantaprāntānalojjvala ।bhañja bhañja ninādena duṣṭānyasyārtināśana ।।ṛgyajuḥsāmagarbhābhirvāgbhirvāmanarūpadhṛk ।praśamaṃ sarvaduḥkhāni nayattvasya janārdanaḥ ।।aikāhikaṃ dvyāhikañca tathā tridivasaṃ jvaram ।cāturthakantathātyugrantathaiva satatajvaram ।।doṣotthaṃ sannipātotthaṃ tathaivāgantukaṃ jvaram ।śamaṃ nayāśu govinda cchindhi cchindhyasya vedanām ।।netraduḥkhaṃ śiroduḥkhaṃ duḥkhañcodarasambhavam ।antaḥśvāsamatiśvāsaṃ paritāpaṃ savepathum ।।gudaghrāṇāṅghrirogāṃś ca kuṣṭharogāṃs tathā kṣayaṃ ।kāmalādīṃs tathā rogān pramehāṃścātidāruṇān ।।bhagandarātisārāṃś ca mukharogāṃś ca valgulīm ।aśmarīṃ mūtrakṛcchrāṃś ca rogānanyāṃś ca dāruṇān ।।ye vātaprabhavā rogā ye ca pittasamudbhavāḥ ।kaphodbhavāś ca ye kecit ye cānye sānnipātikāḥ ।।āgantukāś ca ye rogā lūtā visphoṭakādayaḥ ।te sarve praśamaṃ yāntu vāsudevāpamārjitāḥ ।।vilayaṃ yāntu te sarve viṣṇoruccāraṇena ca ।kṣayaṃ gachhantu cāśeṣāste cakrābhihatā hareḥ ।।

chinda chindāsya vedanāmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

aniśvāsamatiśvāsamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tathaiva ca iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ye rogāḥ pittasambhavā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vāsudevaparājitā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
acyutānantagovindanāmoccāraṇabhīṣitāḥ ।naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmyaham ।।sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vāpi kṛtrimaṃ cāpi yadviṣam ।dantodbhavaṃ nakhabhavamākāśaprabhavaṃ viṣam ।।lūtādiprabhavaṃ yacca viṣamanyattu duḥkhadaṃ ।śamaṃ nayatu tat sarvaṃ kīrtitosya janārdanaḥ ।।grahān pretagrahāṃścāpi tathā vai ḍākinīgrahān ।vetālāṃś ca piśācāṃś ca gandharvān yakṣarākṣasān ।।śakunīpūtanādyāṃś ca tathā vaināyakān grahān ।mukhamaṇḍīṃ tathā krūrāṃ revatīṃ vṛddharevatīm ।।vṛddhakākhyān grahāṃścogrāṃs tathā mātṛgrahānapi ।bālasya viṣṇoś caritaṃ hantu bālagrahānimān ।।vṛddhāś ca ye grahāḥ kecidye ca bālagrahāḥ kvacit ।narasiṃhasya te dṛṣṭyā dagdhā ye cāpi yauvane ।।sadā karālavadano narasiṃho mahābalaḥ ।grahānaśeṣānniḥśeṣān karotu jagato hitaḥ ।।narasiṃha mahāsiṃha jvālāmālojjvalānana ।grahānaśeṣān sarveśa khāda khādāgnilocana ।।ye rogā ye mahotpātā yadviṣaṃ ye mahāgrahāḥ ।yāni ca krūrabhṛtāni grahapīḍāś ca dāruṇāḥ ।।śastrakṣateṣu ye doṣā jvālāgardabhakādayaḥ ।tāni sarvāṇi sarvātmā paramātmā janārdanaḥ ।।

tathā vetālikān grahāniti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gandharvān rāksasānapi iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śaṭā iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
kiñcidrūpaṃ samāsyāya vāsudevāsya nāśaya ।।kṣiptvā sudarśanañ cakraṃ jvālāmālātibhīṣaṇam ।sarvaduṣṭopaśamanaṃ kuru devavarācyuta ।।sudarśana mahājvāla cchindhi cchindhi mahārava ।sarvaduṣṭāni rakṣāṃsi kṣayaṃ yāntu vibhīṣaṇa ।।prācyāṃ pratīcyāṃ ca diśi dakṣiṇottaratas tathā ।rakṣāṅkarotu sarvātmā narasiṃhaḥ sugarjitaḥ ।।divi bhuvyantarīkṣe ca pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvatogrataḥ ।rakṣāṅkarotu bhagavān bahurūpī janārdanaḥ ।।yathā viṣṇurjagatsarvaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣaṃ ।tena satyena duṣṭāni śamamasya vrajantu vai ।।yathā viṣṇau smṛte sadyaḥ saṅkṣayaṃ yānti pātakāḥ ।satyena tena sakalaṃ duṣṭamasya praśāmyatu ।।paramātmā yathā viṣṇurvedānteṣu ca gīyate ।tena satyena sakalaṃ duṣṭamasya praśāmyatu ।।yathā yajñeśvaro viṣṇurdeveṣvapi hi gīyate ।satyena tena sakalaṃ yanmayoktaṃ tathāstu tat ।।śāntirastu śivañcāstu duṣṭamasya praśāmyatu ।vāsudevaśarīrotthaiḥ kuśair nirmathitaṃ mayā ।।apamārjatu govindo naro nārāyaṇas tathā ।tathāstu sarvaduḥkhānāṃ praśamo japanāddhareḥ ।।

mahābala iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

svargarjitair iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

prayāntu vai iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kuśair nirṇāśitamiti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
apamārjanakaṃ śastraṃ sarvarogādivāraṇam ।ayaṃ hariḥ kuśo viṣṇurhatā rogā mayā tava ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye kuśāpamārjanaṃ nāma ekatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvātiṃśo adhyāyaḥ

saṃskārakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
nirvāṇādiṣu dīkṣāsu cattvāriṃśattathāṣṭa ca ।saṃskārān kārayeddhīmān śṛṇutānyaiḥ suro bhavet ।।garbhādhānantu yonyāṃ vai tataḥ puṃsavanañcaret ।sīmantonnayanañcaiva jātakarma ca nāma ca ।।annāśanaṃ tataścūḍā brahmacaryavratāni ca ।catvāri vaiṣṇavī pārthī bhautikī śrotrikī tathā ।।godānaṃ sūtakatvañca pākayajñāś ca sapta te ।aṣṭakā pārvaṇaśrāddhaṃ śrāvaṇyagrāyaṇīti ca ।।caitrī cāśvayujī sapta haviryajñāṃś ca tān śṛṇu ।ādhānañcāgnihotrañca darśo vai paurṇamāsakaḥ ।।cāturmāsyaṃ paśubandhaḥ sautrāmaṇirathāparaḥ ।somasaṃsthāḥ sapta śṛṇu agniṣṭomaḥ kratūttamaḥ ।।atyagniṣṭoma ukthaś ca ṣoḍaśo vājapeyakaḥ ।atirātrāptoryāmaś ca sahasreśāḥ savā ime ।।hiraṇyāṅghrirhiraṇyākṣo hiraṇyamitra ity ataḥ ।

sapta ca iti ga, kha, cihnitapustkadvayapāṭhaḥ
hiraṇyapāṇirhemākṣo hemāṅgo hemasūtrakaḥ ।।hiraṇyāsyo hiraṇyāṅgo hemajihvo hiraṇyavān ।aśvamedho hi sarveśo guṇāścāṣṭātha tān śṛṇu ।।dayā ca sarvabhūteṣu kṣāntiś caiva tathārjavam ।śaucaṃ caivamanāyāso maṅgalaṃ cāparo guṇaḥ ।।akārpaṇyañcāspṛhā ca mūlena juhuyācchatam ।sauraśākteyaviṣṇvīśadīkṣāstvete samāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।saṃskāraiḥ saṃskṛtaś caitair bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।sarvarogādvinirmukto devavadvartate naraḥ ।japyāddhomātpūjanācca dhyānāddevasya ceṣṭabhāk ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye aṣṭacatvāriṃśatsaṃskārakathanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha trayastriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

pavitrārohaṇavidhānaṃ

agnir uvāca
pavitrārohaṇaṃ vakṣye varṣapūjākalaṃ hareḥ ।āṣāḍhādau kārtikānte pratipadvanadā tithiḥ ।।śriyā gauryā gaṇeśasya sarasvatyā guhasya ca ।mārtaṇḍamātṛdurgāṇāṃ nāgarṣiharimanmathaiḥ ।।śivasya brahmaṇastadvaddvitīyādititheḥ kramāt ।yasya devasya yo bhaktaḥ pavitrā tasya sā tithiḥ ।।ārohaṇe tulyavidhiḥ pṛthak mantrādikaṃ yadi ।

vardhate tithiriti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sauvarṇe rājataṃ tāmraṃ netrakārpāsikādikaṃ ।।brāhmaṇyā kartitaṃ sūtraṃ tadalābhe tu saṃskṛtaṃ ।triguṇaṃ triguṇīkṛtya tena kuryāt pavitrakaṃ ।।aṣtottaraśatādūrdhvaṃ tadardhaṃ cottamādikaṃ ।kriyālopāvighātārthaṃ yattvayābhihitaṃ prabho ।।mayā tat kriyate deva yathā yatra pāvitrakaṃ ।avighnaṃ tu bhavedatra kuru nātha jayāvyaya ।।prārthya tanmaṇḍalāyādau gāyatryā bandhayennaraḥ ।oṃ nārāyaṇāya vidmahe vāsudevāya dhīmahi ।।tanno viṣṇuḥ pracodayāt devadevānurūpataḥ ।jānūrunābhināmāntaṃ pratimāsu pavitrakaṃ ।।pādāntā vanamālā syādaṣṭottrasahasrataḥ ।mālā tu kalpasādhyaṃ vā dviguṇaṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāt ।।karṇikā keśaraṃ patraṃ mantrādyaṃ maṇḍalāntakaṃ ।maṇḍalāṅgulamātraikacakrābjādyau pavitrakaṃ ।।sthaṇḍile aṅgulamānena ātmanaḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ ।ācāryāṇāṃ ca sūtrāṇi pitṛmātrādipustake ।।nābhyantaṃ dvādaśagranthiṃ tathā gandhapavitrake ।dvyaṅgulāt kalpanādau dvirmālā cāṣṭottaraṃ śataṃ ।।athavārkacaturviṃśaṣaḍtriṃśanmālikā dvijaḥ ।anāmāmadhyamāṅguṣṭhair mandādyaiḥ mālikārthibhiḥ ।।

pādāntareṇa mālā syādaṣṭottarasahasraśaḥ iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gadādyamiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

cakrāṅgadau pavitrake iti gha, cihnitaputakapāṭhaḥ

mandādau iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ mandrādyair iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kaniṣṭādau dvādaśa vā granthayaḥ syuḥ pavitrake ।raveḥ kumbhahutāśādeḥ sambhave viṣṇuvanmatam ।।pīṭhasya pīṭhamānaṃ syānmekhalānte ca kuṇḍakaṃ ।yathāśakti sūtragranthiparicāretha vaiṣṇave ।।sūtrāṇi vā saptadaśa sūtreṇa trivibhaktake ।rocanāgurukarpūraharidrākuṅkumādibhiḥ ।।rañjayeccandanādyair vā snānasandhyādikṛnnaraḥ ।ekādaśyāṃ yāgagṛhe bhagavantaṃ hariṃ jayet ।।samastaparivārāya baliṃ pīṭhe samarcayet ।kṣyauṃ kṣetrapālāya dvārānte dvāropari tathā śriyaṃ ।।dhātre dakṣe vidhātre ca gaṅgāñca yamunāṃ tathā ।śaṅkhapadmanidhī pūjya madhye vāstvapasāraṇaṃ ।।sāraṅgāyeti bhūtānāṃ bhūtaśuddhiṃ sthitaś caret ।।
oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ gandhatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ ।।

oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ rasatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi 
namaḥ
oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ rūpatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi
namaḥ ।।

oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ sparśatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ

trisūtrāṇi ca bhadrake iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hūṃ haḥ phaṭ hūmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ oṃ hrāṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hrīṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūniti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hrāṃ haḥ hrūṃ iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ oṃ hrāṃ haḥ phaṭ hrīmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hrāṃ haḥ phaṭ iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ śabdatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ ।।
pañcodghātair gandhatanmātrarūpaṃ bhūmimaṇḍalaṃ ।caturasrañca pītañca kaṭhinaṃ vajralāñchitam ।।indrādhidaivataṃ pādayugmamadhyagataṃ smaret ।śuddhañca rasatanmātraṃ pravilipyātha saṃharet ।।rasamātrarūpamātre krameṇānena pūjakaḥ ।।
oṃ hrīṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ rasatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ

oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ rūpatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ

oṃ hrīṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ sparśatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ

oṃ hrīṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ śabdatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ
jānunābhimadhyagataṃ śvetaṃ vai padmalāñchitaṃ ।śuklavarṇaṃ cārdhacandraṃ dhyāyedvaruṇadaivataṃ ।।caturbhiś ca tadudghātaiḥ śuddhaṃ tadrasamātrakaṃ ।saṃharedrūpatanmātrai rūpamātre ca saṃharet ।।
oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ rūpatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ

oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ sparśatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ

oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ śabdatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ
iti tribhistadudghātaistrikoṇaṃ vahnimaṇḍalam ।nābhikaṇṭhamadhyagataṃ raktaṃ svastikalāñchitaṃ ।।dhyātvānalādhidaivantacchuddhaṃ sparśe layaṃ nayat ।

oṃ hrāṃ haḥ phaṭ hamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhḥ

oṃ hrīṃ phaṭ hamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ oṃ hrūṃ haḥ phaṭ hūmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hrīṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hraṃ haḥ phaṭ hūmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

padmāsanamadhyagatamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hrauṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ sparśatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi 
namaḥ
oṃ hrauṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ śabdatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi
namaḥ ।।

kaṇṭhanāsāmadhyagataṃ vṛttaṃ vai vāyumaṇḍalam ।।dvirudghātair dhūmravarṇaṃ dhyāyecchuddhendulāñchitam ।sparśamātraṃ śabdamātraiḥ saṃhareddhyānayogataḥ ।।
oṃ hrauṃ haḥ phaṭ hrūṃ śabdatanmātraṃ saṃharāmi namaḥ
ekodghātena cākāśaṃ śuddhasphaṭikasannibham ।nāsāpuṭaśikhāntasthamākāśamupasaṃharet ।।śoṣaṇādyair dehaśuddhiṃ kuryādevam kramāttataḥ ।śuṣkaṃ kalevaraṃ dhyāyet pādādyañca śikhāntakam ।।yaṃ vījena vaṃ vījena jvālāmālāsamāyutam ।dehaṃ ramityanenaiva brahmarandhrādvinirgatam ।।vindundhyātvā cāmṛtasya tena bhasmakalevaram ।samplāvayellamityasmāt dehaṃ sampādya divyakam ।।nyāsaṃ kṛtvā kare dehe mānasaṃ yāgamācaret ।viṣṇuṃ sāṅgaṃ hṛdi padme mānasaiḥ kusumādibhiḥ ।।mūlamantreṇa deveśamprārcayedbhuktimuktidam ।svāgataṃ devadeveśa sannidhau bhava keśava ।।gṛhāṇa mānasīṃ pūjāṃ yathārthaṃ paribhāvitām ।ādhāraśaktiḥ kūrmātha pūjyonanto mahī tataḥ ।।madhyegnyādau ca dharmādyā adharmādīndramukhyagam ।

oṃ kṣauṃ haḥ phaṭ krūmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ kṣauṃ haḥ phaṭ krūmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

jvālāmālāsamaprabhamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yathāsvamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dharmādīnindrādau viparītakāniti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sattvādi madhye padmañca māyāvidyākhyatattvake ।।kālatattvañca sūryādimaṇḍalaṃ pakṣirājakaḥ ।madhye tataś ca vāyavyādīśāntā gurupaṅktikāḥ ।।gaṇaḥ sarasvatī pūjyā nārado nalakūvaraḥ ।gururgurupādukā ca paro guruś ca pādukā ।।pūrvasiddhāḥ parasiddhāḥ keśareṣu ca śaktayaḥ ।lakṣmīḥ sarasvatī prītiḥ kīrtiḥ śāntiś ca kāntikā ।।puṣṭistuṣṭirmahendrādyā madhye vācāhito hariḥ ।dhṛtiḥ śrīratikāntyādyā mūlena sthāpito acyutaḥ ।।oṃ abhimukho bhaveti prārthya sannihito bhava ।vinyasyārghyādikaṃ datvā gandhādyair mūlato yajet ।।oṃ bhīṣaya bhīṣaya hṛt śirastrāsaya vai punaḥ ।mardaya mardaya śikhā agnyādau śastratostrakaṃ ।।rakṣa rakṣa pradhvaṃsaya pradhvaṃsaya kavacāya namastataḥ ।oṃ hrūṃ phaṭ astrāya namo mūlavījena cāṅgakaṃ ।।pūrvadakṣāpyasaumyeṣu mūrtyāvaraṇamarcayet ।vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaścāniruddhakaḥ ।।agnyādau śrīdhṛtiratikāntayo mūrtayo hareḥ ।śaṅkhacakragadāpadmamagnyādau pūrvakādikaṃ ।।śārṅgañca muṣalaṃ khaḍgaṃ vanamālāñca tadvahiḥ ।indrādyāś ca tayānanto nairṛtyāṃ varuṇastataḥ ।।brahmendreśānayormadhye astrāvaraṇakaṃ vahiḥ ।airāvatastataśchāgo mahiṣo vānaro jhaṣaḥ ।।

gaṇaś ca tāsu pūjyo atha iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

rakṣa rakṣa pradhvaṃsaya kavacāyeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hrīmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
mṛgaḥ śaśo atha vṛṣabhaḥ kūrmo haṃsastato vahiḥ ।pṛśnigarbhaḥ kumudādyā dvārapālā dvayaṃ dvayaṃ ।।pūrvādyuttaradvārāntaṃ hariṃ natvā baliṃ vahiḥ ।viṣṇupārṣadebhyo namo balipīṭhe baliṃ dadet ।।viśvāya viśvaksenātmane īśānake yajet ।devasya dakṣiṇe haste rakṣāsūtrañca bandhayet ।।saṃvatsarakṛtācāryāḥ sampūrṇaphaladāyine ।pavitrārohaṇāyedaṃ kautukaṃ dhāraya oṃ namaḥ ।।upavāsādiniyamaṃ kuryādvai devasannidhau ।upavāsādiniyato devaṃ santoṣayāmyaham ।।kāmakrodhādayaḥ sarve mā me tiṣṭhantu sarvathā ।adyaprabhṛti deveśa yāvadvaiśeṣikaṃ dinam ।।yajamāno hy aśaktaścet kuryānnaktādikaṃ vratī ।hutvā visarjayet stutvā śrīkarannityapūjanam ।।oṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ śrīdharāya trailokyamohanāya namaḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pavitrārohaṇe śrīdharanityapūjākathanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśodhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha catustriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

homādividhiḥ

agnir uvāca
viśedanena mantreṇa yāgasthānañca bhūṣayet ।namo brahmaṇyadevāya śrīdharāyāvyayātmane ।।

oṃ krīmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ṛgyajuḥsāmarūpāya śabdadehāya ।vilikhya maṇḍalaṃ sāyaṃ yāgadravyādi cāharet ।।prakṣālitakarāṅghriḥ san vinyasyārghyakaro naraḥ ।arghyādibhistu śiraḥ prokṣya dvāradeśādikaṃ yathā ।।ārabhed dvārayāgañca toraṇeśān prapūjayet ।aśvatthodumbaravaṭaprakṣāḥ pūrvādigā nagāḥ ।।ṛgindraśobhanaṃ prāsyāṃ yujuryamasubhadrakam ।sāmāpaś ca sudhanvākhyaṃ somātharvasuhotrakam ।।toraṇāntaḥ patākāś ca kumudādyā ghaṭadvayam ।dvāri dvāri svanāmnārcyāḥ pūrve pūrṇaś ca puṣkaraḥ ।।ānandanandanau dakṣe vīrasenaḥ suṣeṇakaḥ ।sambhavaprabhavau saumye dvārapāṃś caiva pūjayet ।।astrajaptapuṣpakṣepādvighnānutsārya saṃviśet ।bhūtaśuddhiṃ vidhāyātha vinyasya kṛtamudravaḥ ।।phaṭkārāntāṃ śikhāṃ japtvā sarṣapān dikṣu nikṣipet ।vāsudevena gomūtraṃ saṅkarṣaṇena gomayam ।।pradyumnena payastajjāt dadhi nārāyaṇād ghṛtam ।ekadvitryādivārāṇi ghṛtādvai bhāgatodhikam ।।ghṛtapātre tadekatra pañcagavyamudāhṛtam ।maṇḍapaprokṣaṇāyaikañcāparamprāśanāya ca ।।ānīya daśakumbheṣu indrādyān lokapān yajet ।pūjyājñāṃ śrāvayettāṃś ca sthātavyaṃ cājñayā hareḥ ।।yāgadravyādi saṃrakṣya vikirān vikirettataḥ ।mūlāṣṭaśatasañjaptān kuśakūrcān hareś ca tān ।।aiśānyāṃ diśi tatrasthaṃ sthāpyaṃ kumbhañca vardhanīṃ ।

kumbhe sāṅgaṃ hariṃ prārcya vardhanyāmastramarcayet ।।pradakṣiṇaṃ yāgagṛhaṃ vardhanyācchinnadhārayā ।siñcannayettataḥ kumbhaṃ pūjayecca sthirāsane ।।sapañcaratnavastrāḍhyakumbhe gandhādibhirharim ।vardhanyāṃ hemagarbhāyāṃ yajedastrañca vāmataḥ ।।tatsamīpe vāstulakṣmīṃ bhūvināyakamarcayet ।srapanaṃ kalpayedviṣṇoḥ saṅkrāntyādau tathaiva ca ।।pūrṇakumbhān nava sthāpya navakoṇeṣu nirbraṇān ।।pūrvādikalasegnyādau pañcāmṛtajalādikam ।dadhi kṣīraṃ madhūṣṇīdaṃ pādyaṃ syāccaturaṅgakam ।।padmaśyāmākadūrvāś ca viṣṇupatnī ca pādyakam ।tathāṣṭāṅgārghyamākhyātaṃ yavagandhaphalākṣatam ।।kuśāḥ siddhārthapuṣpāni tilā dravyāṇi cārhaṇam ।lavaṅgakakkolayute dadyādācamanīyakam ।।snāpayenmūlamantreṇa devaṃ pañcāmṛtair api ।śuddhodaṃ madhyakumbhena devamūrdhni viniḥkṣipet ।।kalaśānniḥsṛtaṃ toyaṃ kūrcāgraṃ saṃspṛśennaraḥ ।śuddhodakena pādyañca arghyamācamanandadet ।।parimṛjya paṭenāṅgaṃ savastraṃ maṇḍalaṃ nayet ।tatrābhyarcyācareddhomaṃ kuṇḍādau prāṇasaṃyamī ।।prakṣālya hastau rekhāś ca tisraḥ pūrvāgragāminīḥ ।

cārhaṇā iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

dūrvāgramiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dakṣiṇāduttarāś ca tisraś caivaottarāgragāḥ ।।arghyodakena samprokṣya yonimudrāmpradarśayet ।dhyātvāgnirūpañcāgnintu yonyāṃ kuṇḍe kṣipennaraḥ ।।pātrāṇyāsādayet paścāddarbhaśrukśruvakādibhiḥ ।bāhumātrāḥ paridhaya idhmavraś canameva ca ।।praṇītā prokṣaṇīpātramājyasthālī ghṛtādikam ।prasthadvayaṃ taṇḍulānāṃ yugmaṃ yugmamadhomukham ।।praṇītāprokṣaṇīpātre nyaset prāgagragaṃ kuśam ।adbhiḥ pūryapraṇītāntu dhyātvā devaṃ prapūjya ca ।।praṇītāṃ sthāpayedagre dravyāṇāñcaiva madhyataḥ ।prokṣaṇīmadbhiḥ sampūrya prārcya dakṣe tu vinyaset ।।caruñca śrapayedagnau brahmāṇaṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset ।kuśānāstīrya pūrvādau paridhīn sthāpayettataḥ ।।vaiṣṇavīkaraṇaṃ kuryād garbhādhānādinā naraḥ ।garbhādhānaṃ puṃsavanaṃ sīmantonnayanañjaniḥ ।।nāmādisamāvartanāntaṃ juhuyādaṣṭa cāhutīḥ ।pūrṇāhutīḥ pratikarma śrucā sruvasuyuktayā ।।kuṇḍamadhye ṛtumatīṃ lakṣmīṃ sañcintya homayet ।kuṇḍalakṣmīḥ samākhyātā prakṛtistriguṇātmakā ।।sā yoniḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vidyāmantragaṇasya ca ।vimukteḥ kāraṇaṃ vahniḥ paramātmā ca muktidaḥ ।।prācyāṃ śiraḥ samākhyātaṃ bāhū koṇe vyavasthitau ।īśānāgneyakoṇe tu jaṅghe vāyavyanairṛte ।।udaraṃ kuṇḍamityuktaṃ yoniryonirvidhīyate ।guṇatrayaṃ mekhalāḥ syurdhyātvaivaṃ samidho daśa ।।

pañcādhikāṃstu juhuyāt praṇavānmuṣṭimudrayā ।punarāghārau juhuyādvāyvagnyantaṃ tataḥ śrapet ।।īśāntaṃ mūlamantreṇa ājyabhāgau tu homayet ।uttare dvādaśāntena dakṣiṇe tena madhyataḥ ।।vyāhṛtyā padmamadhyasthaṃ dhyāyedvahnintu saṃskṛtam ।vaiṣṇavaṃ saptajihvaṃ ca sūryakoṭisamaprabham ।।candravaktrañca sūryākṣaṃ juhuyācchatamaṣṭa ca ।tadardhañcāṣṭa mūlena aṅgānāñca daśāṃśataḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye agnikāryakathanaṃ nāma caturtriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

pavitrādhivāsanādividhiḥ

agnir uvāca
sampātāhutināsicya pavitrāṇyadhivāsayet ।nṛsiṃhamantrajaptāni guptānyastreṇa tāni tu ।।vastrasaṃveṣṭitānyeva pātrasthānyabhimantrayet ।vilvādyadbhiḥ prokṣitāni mantreṇa caikadhā dvidhā ।।kumbhapārśve tu saṃsthāpya rakṣāṃ vijñāpya deśikaḥ ।dantakāṣṭhañcāmarakaṃ pūrve saṅkarṣaṇena tu ।।pradyumnena bhasmatilān dakṣe gomayamṛttikāṃ ।

svastimudrayeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pañcavaktraṃśceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

saṅghātāhutināsicyeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mantrāṇāṃ caikadhā dvidheti kha, cihinitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vāruṇena cāniruddhena saumye nārāyaṇena ca ।।darbhodakañcātha hṛdā agnau kuṅkumarocanaṃ ।aiśānyāṃ śirasā dhūpaṃ śikhayā nairṛtepyatha ।।mūlapuṣpāṇi divyāni kavacenātha vāyave ।candanāmbvakṣatadadhidūrvāś ca puṭikāsthitāḥ ।।gṛhaṃ trisūtreṇāveṣṭya punaḥ siddhārthakān kṣipet ।dadyātpūjākrameṇātha svaiḥ svair gandhapavitrakaṃ ।।mantrair vai dvārapādibhyo viṣṇukumbhe tvanena ca ।viṣṇutejobhavaṃ ramyaṃ sarvapātakanāśanaṃ ।।sarvakāmapradaṃ devaṃ tavāṅge dhārayāmyahaṃ ।sampūjya dhūpadīpādyair vrajeddvārasamīpataḥ ।।gandhapuṣpākṣatopetaṃ pavitrañcākhilerpayet ।pavitraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo mahāpātakanāśanaṃ ।।dharmakāmārthasiddhyarthaṃ svakeṅge dhārayāmyahaṃ ।āsane parivārādau gurau dadyāt pavitrakaṃ ।।gandhādibhiḥ samabhyarcya gandhapuṣpākṣatādimat ।viṣṇutejobhavetyādimūlena harayerpayet ।।vahnisthāya tato datvā devaṃ samprārthayettataḥ ।kṣīrodadhimahānāgaśayyāvasthitavigrahaḥ ।।prātastvāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi sannidhau bhava keśava ।indrādibhastato datvā viṣṇupārṣadake baliṃ ।।tato devāgrataḥ kumbhaṃ vāsoyugasamanvitaṃ ।rocanācandrakāśmīragandhādyudakasaṃyutaṃ ।।gandhapuṣpādinābhūṣya mūlamantreṇa pūjayet ।

pavitraṃ pārśvato nayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
maṇḍapādvahirāgatya vilipte maṇḍalatraye ।।pañcagavyañcarundantakāṣṭhañcaiva kramādbhavet ।purāṇaśravaṇaṃ stotraṃ paṭhan jāgaraṇaṃ niśi ।।parapreṣakabālānāṃ strīṇāṃ bhogabhujāṃ tathā ।sadyodhivāsanaṃ kuryādvinā gandhapavitrakaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pavitrādhivāsanaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭtriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

pavitrāropaṇavidhānaṃ

agnir uvāca
prātaḥ snānaṃ kṛtvā dvārapālān prapūjya ca ।praviśya gupte deśe ca samākṛṣyātha dhārayet ।।pūrvādhivāsitaṃ dravyaṃ vastrābharaṇagandhakaṃ ।nirasya sarvanirmālyaṃ devaṃ saṃsthāpya pūjayet ।।pañcāmṛtaiḥ kaṣāyaiś ca śuddhagandhodakaistataḥ ।pūrvādhivāsitaṃ dadyādvastraṃ gandhaṃ ca puṣpakaṃ ।।agnau hutvā nityavacca devaṃ samprārthayennamet ।samarpya karma devāya pūjāṃ naimittikīṃ caret ।।dvārapālaviṣṇukumbhavardhanīḥ prārthayeddhariṃ ।ato deveti mantreṇa mūlamantreṇa kumbhake ।।kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa namastubhyaṃ gṛhṇīṣvedaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।

lokapālāniti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

prārthayennyasediti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pavitrīkaraṇārthāya varṣapūjāphalapradaṃ ।।pavitrakaṃ kurudhvādya yanmayā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ।śuddho bhavāmyahaṃ deva tvatprasādāt sureśvara ।।pavitrañca hṛdādyaistu ātmānamabhiṣicya ca ।viṣṇukumbhañca samprokṣya vrajeddevasamīpataḥ ।।pavitramātmane dadyādrakṣābandhaṃ visṛjya ca ।gṛhāṇa brahmasūtrañca yanmayā kalpitaṃ prabho ।।karmaṇāṃ pūraṇārthāya yathā doṣo na me bhavet ।dvārapālāsanagurumukhyānāñca pavitrakam ।।kaniṣṭādi ca devāya vanamālāñca mūlataḥ ।hṛdādiviśvaksenānte pavitrāṇi samarpayet ।।vahnau hutvāgnivartibhyo viṣṇvādibhyaḥ pavitrakam ।prārcya pūrṇāhutiṃ dadyāt prāyaścittāya mūlataḥ ।।aṣṭottaraśataṃ vāpi pañcopaniṣadaistataḥ ।maṇividrumamālābhirmandārakusumādibhiḥ ।।iyaṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā tavāstu garuḍadhvaja ।vanamālā yathā deva kaustubhaṃ satataṃ hṛdi ।।tadvat pavitratantūṃś ca pūjāṃ ca hṛdaye vaha ।kāmato akāmato vāpi yatkṛtaṃ niyamārcane ।।vidhinā vighnalopena paripūrṇaṃ tadastu me ।prārthya natvā kṣamāpyātha pavitraṃ mastake arpayet ।।datvā baliṃ dakṣiṇābhirvaiṣṇavantoṣayedguruṃ ।

rakṣābandhaṃ vimucya ceti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । pavitraṃ mūlato dadyādrakṣārthaṃ tadvisṛjya ceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pavitrakaṃ tvañca pūjāyāṃ hṛdaye vaheti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
viprān bhojanavastrādyair divasaṃ pakṣameva vā ।।pavitraṃ snānakāle ca avatārya samarpayet ।anivāritamannādyaṃ dadyādbhuṅktetha ca svayaṃ ।।visarjane ahni sampūjya pavitrāṇi visarjayet ।sāṃvatsarīmimāṃ pūjāṃ sampādya vidhivanmama ।।vraja pavitrakedānīṃ viṣṇulokaṃ visarjitaḥ ।madhye someśayoḥ prārcya viṣvaksenaṃ hi tasya ca ।।pavitrāṇi samabhyarcya brāhmaṇāya samarpayet ।yāvantastantavastasmin pavitre parikalpitāḥ ।।tāvadyugasahasrāṇi viṣṇuloke mahīyate ।kulānāṃ śatamuddhṛtya daśa pūrvān daśāparān ।viṣṇulokaṃ tu saṃsthāpya svayaṃ muktimavāpnuyāt ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye viṣṇupavitrārohaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

sarvadevapavitrārohaṇavidhiḥ

agnir uvāca
saṅkṣepāt sarvadevānāṃ pavitrārohaṇaṃ śṛṇu ।pavitra sarvalakṣma syāt svarasānalagaṃ tvapi ।।jagadyone samāgaccha parivāragaṇaiḥ saha ।nimantrayāmyahaṃ prātardadyāntubhyaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।।jagatsṛje namastubhyaṃ gṛhṇīṣvedaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।

pavitrāropaṇamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

jagatsūte iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pavitrīkaraṇārthāya varṣapūjāphalapradaṃ ।।śivadeva namastubhyaṃ gṛhṇīṣvedaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।maṇividrumamālābhirmandārakusumādibhiḥ ।।iyaṃ sāṃvatsarī pūjā tavāstu vedavitpate ।sāṃvatsarīmimāṃ pūjāṃ sampādya vidhimanmama ।।vraja pavitrakedānīṃ svargalokaṃ visarjitaḥ ।sūryadeva namastubhyaṃ gṛhṇīṣvedaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।।pavitrīkaraṇārthāya varṣapūjāphalapradaṃ ।śivadeva namastubhyaṃ gṛhṇīṣvedaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।।pavitrīkaraṇārthāya varṣapūjāphalapradaṃ ।vāṇeśvara namastubhyaṃ gṛhṇīṣvedaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।।pavitrīkaraṇārthāya varṣapūjāphalapradaṃ ।śaktideva namastubhyaṃ gṛhṇīṣvedaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।।pavitrīkaraṇārthāya varṣapūjāphalapradaṃ ।nārāyaṇamayaṃ sūtramaniruddhamayaṃ varaṃ ।।dhanadhānyāyurārogyapradaṃ sampradadāmi te ।kāmadevamayaṃ sūtraṃ saṅkarṣaṇamayaṃ varaṃ ।।vidyāsantatisaubhāgyapradaṃ sampradadāmi te ।vāsudevamayaṃ sūtraṃ dharmakāmārthamokṣadaṃ ।।saṃsārasāgarottārakāraṇaṃ pradadāmi te ।viśvarūpamayaṃ sūtraṃ sarvadaṃ pāpanāśanaṃ ।।

gaṇeśvara iti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

paramiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
atītānāgatakulasamuddhāraṃ dadāmi te ।kaniṣṭhādīni catvāri manubhistu kramāddade ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye saṅkṣepapavitrārohaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha aṣṭatriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

devālayanirmāṇaphalaṃ

agnir uvāca
vāsudevādyālayasya kṛtau vakṣye phalādikaṃ ।cikīrṣordevadhāmādi sahasrajanipāpanut ।।manasā sadmakartṝṇāṃ śatajanmāghanāśanaṃ ।yenumodanti kṛṣṇasya kriyamāṇaṃ narā gṛhaṃ ।।tepi pāpair vinirmuktāḥ prayāntyacyutalokatāṃ ।samatītaṃ bhaviṣyañca kulānāmayutaṃ naraḥ ।।viṣṇulokaṃ nayatyāśu kārayitvā harergṛhaṃ ।vasanti pitaro dṛṣṭvā viṣṇuloke hy alaṅkṛtāḥ ।।vimuktā nārakair duḥkhaiḥ kartuḥ kṛṣṇasya mandiraṃ ।brahmahatyādipāpaughaghātakaṃ devatālayaṃ ।।phalaṃ yannāpyate yajñair dhāma kṛtvā tadāpyate ।devāgāre kṛte sarvatīrthasnānaphalaṃ labhet ।।devādyarthe hatānāñca raṇe yattatphalādikaṃ ।śāṭhyena pāṃśunā vāpi kṛtaṃ dhāma ca nākadaṃ ।।

gṛhādikaṃ ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

nandanti iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ । valganti iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hṛṣṭā iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
ekāyatanakṛt svargī tryagārī brahmalokabhāk ।pañcāgārī śambhulokamaṣṭāgārāddharau sthitiḥ ।।ṣoḍaśālayakārī tu bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।kaniṣṭhaṃ madhyamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kārayitvā harergṛhaṃ ।।svargaṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ mokṣamāpnoti ca kramāt ।śreṣṭhamāyatanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kṛtvā yaddhanavān labhet ।।kaniṣṭhenaiva tat puṇyaṃ prāpnotyadhanavānnaraḥ ।samutpādya dhanaṃ kṛtyā svalpenāpi surālayaṃ ।।kārayitvā hareḥ puṇyaṃ samprāpnotyadhikaṃ varaṃ ।lakṣaṇātha sahasreṇa śatenārdhena vā hareḥ ।।kārayan bhavanaṃ yāti yatrāste garuḍadhvajaḥ ।bālye tu krīḍamāṇā ye pāṃśubhirbhavanaṃ hareḥ ।।vāsudevasya kurvanti tepi tallokagāminaḥ ।tīrthe cāyatane puṇye saddhakṣetre tathāṣṭame ।।karturāyatanaṃ viṣṇoryathoktāttriguṇaṃ phalaṃ ।bandhūkapuṣpavinyāsaiḥ sudhāpaṅkena vaiṣṇavaṃ ।।ye vilimpanti bhavanaṃ te yānti bhagavatpuraṃ ।patitaṃ patamānantu tathārdhapatitaṃ naraḥ ।।samuddhṛtya harerdhāma prāpnoti dviguṇaṃ phalaṃ ।patitasya tu yaḥ kartā patitasya ca rakṣitā ।।viṣṇorāyatanasyeha naro viṣṇulokabhāk ।iṣṭakānicayastiṣṭhed yāvadāyatane hareḥ ।।sakulastasya vai kartā viṣṇuloke mahīyate ।

ṣoḍaśāgārakārī tu iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

svalpenaiveti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sa eva puṇyavān pūjya iha loke paratra ca ।।kṛṣṇasya vāsudevasya yaḥ kārayati ketanaṃ ।jātaḥ sa eva sukṛtī kulantenaiva pāvitaṃ ।।viṣṇurudrārkadevyādergṛhakartā sa kīrtibhāk ।kiṃ tasya vittanicayair mūḍhasya parirakṣitaḥ ।।duḥkhārjitair yaḥ kṛṣṇasya na kārayati ketanaṃ ।nopabhogyaṃ dhanaṃ yasya pitṛvipradivaukasāṃ ।।nopabhogāya bandhūnāṃ vyarthastasya dhanāgamaḥ ।yathā dhruvo nṛṇāṃ mṛtyurvittanāśas tathā dhruvaḥ ।।mūḍhastatrānubadhnāti jīvitetha cale ghane ।yadā vittaṃ na dānāya nopabhogāya dehināṃ ।।nāpi kīrtyai na dharmāthaṃ tasya svāmyetha ko guṇaḥ ।tasmādvittaṃ samāsādya daivādvā pauruṣādatha ।।dadyāt samyag dvijāgryebhyaḥ kīrtanāni ca kārayet ।dānebhyaścādhikaṃ yasmāt kīrtanebhyo varaṃ yataḥ ।।atastatkārayeddhīmān viṣṇvādermandirādikaṃ ।viniveśya harerdhāma bhaktimadbhir narottamaiḥ ।।niveśitaṃ bhavet kṛtsnaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaraṃ ।bhūtaṃ bhavayam bhaviṣyañca sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tathetarat ।।ābrāhmastambaparyantaṃ sarvaṃ viṣṇoḥ samudbhavaṃ ।tasya devādidevasya sarvagasya mahātmanaḥ ।।niveśya bhavanaṃ viṣṇor na bhūyo bhuvi jāyate ।yathā viṣṇordhāmakṛtau phalaṃ tadvaddivaukasāṃ ।।

tathaiva ca iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sarveśasya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śivabrahmārkavighneśacaṇḍīlakṣmyādikātmanāṃ ।devālayakṛteḥ puṇyaṃ pratimākaraṇedhikaṃ ।।pratimāsthāpane yāge phalasyānto na vidyate ।mṛṇmayāddāruje puṇyaṃ dārujādiṣṭkābhave ।।iṣṭakotthācchailaje syāddhemāderadhikaṃ phalaṃ ।saptajanmakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ prārambhādeva naśyati ।।devālayasya svargī syānnarakaṃ na sa gacchati ।kulānāṃ śatamuddhṛtya viṣṇulokaṃ nayennaraḥ ।।yamo yamabhaṭānāha devamandirakāriṇaḥ ।
yama uvāca
pratimāpūjādikṛto nāneyā narakaṃ narāḥ ।।devālayādyakartāra āneyāste tu gocare ।visāradhvaṃ yathānyāyanniyogo mama pālyatāṃ ।।nājñābhaṅgaṃ kariṣyanti bhavatāṃ jantavaḥ kvacit ।kevalaṃ te jagattātamanantaṃ samupāśritāḥ ।।bhavadbhiḥ parihartavyāsteṣāṃ nātrāsti saṃsthitiḥ ।ye ca bhagavatā loke taccittāstatparāyaṇāḥ ।।pūjayanti sadā viṣṇuṃ te vastyājyāḥ sudūrataḥ ।yastiṣṭhan prasvapan gacchannuttiṣṭhan skhalite sthite ।।saṅkīrtayanti govindaṃ te vastyājyāḥ sudūrataḥ ।nityanaimittikair devaṃ ye yajanti janārdanam ।।nāvalokyā bhavadbhiste tadgatā yānti tadgatim ।

āneyāstvaviśeṣata iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

niyamo me anupālyatāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

jantavaḥ kvaciditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ye puṣpadhūpavāsobhirbhūṣaṇaiścātivallabhaiḥ ।।arcayanti na te grāhyā narāḥ kṛṣṇālaye gatāḥ ।upalepanakartāraḥ sammārjanaparāś ca ye ।।kṛṣṇālaye parityajyāsteṣāṃ putrās tathā kulam ।yena cāyatanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kāritaṃ tatkulodbhavam ।।puṃsāṃ śataṃ nāvalokyaṃ bhavadbhirduṣṭacetasā ।yastu devālayaṃ viṣṇordāruśailamayaṃ tathā ।।kārayen mṛṇmayaṃ vāpi sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।ahanyahani yajñena yajato yan mahāphalam ।।prāpnoti tat phalaṃ viṣṇoryaḥ kārayati ketanaṃ ।kulānāṃ śatamāgāmi samatītaṃ tathā śataṃ ।।kārayan bhagavaddhāma nayatyacyutalokatāṃ ।saptalokamayo viṣṇustasya yaḥ kurute gṛhaṃ ।।tārayatyakṣayāṃllokānakṣayān pratipadyate ।iṣṭakācayavinyāso yāvantyabdāni tiṣṭhati ।।tāvadvarṣasahasrāṇi tatkarturdivi saṃsthitiḥ ।pratimākṛdviṣṇulokaṃ sthāpako līyate harau ।devasadmapratikṛtipratiṣṭhākṛttu gocare ।।
agnir uvāca
yamoktā nānayaṃstetha pratiṣṭhādikṛtaṃ hareḥ ।hayaśīrṣaḥ pratiṣṭhārthaṃ devānāṃ brahmaṇe abravīt ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye devālayādimāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma aṣṭatriṃśodhyāyaḥ ।।

kṛṣṇāśraye gatā iti kha, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

pratiṣṭhādyamiti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś athonacatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

bhūparigrahavidhānaṃ

hayagrīva uvāca
viṣṇvādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhādi vakṣye brahman śṛṇuṣva me ।proktāni pañcarātarāṇi saptarātrāṇi vai mayā ।।vyastāni munibhirloke pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyayā ।hayaśīrṣaṃ tantramādyaṃ tantraṃ trailokyamohanaṃ ।।vaibhavaṃ pauṣkaraṃ tantraṃ prahrādaṅgārgyagālavaṃ ।nāradīyañca sampraśnaṃ śāṇḍilyaṃ vaiśvakaṃ tathā ।।satyoktaṃ śaunakaṃ tantraṃ vāsiṣṭhaṃ jñānasāgaraṃ ।svāyambhuvaṃ kapilañca tārkṣaṃ nārāyaṇīyakaṃ ।।ātreyaṃ nārasiṃhākhyamānandākhyaṃ tathāruṇaṃ ।baudhāyanaṃ tathārṣaṃ tu viśvoktaṃ tasya sārataḥ ।।pratiṣṭhāṃ hi dvijaḥ kuryānmadhyadeśādisambhavaḥ ।nakacchadeśasambhūtaḥ kāverīkoṅkaṇodgataḥ ।।kāmarūpakaliṅgoptyaḥ kāñcīkāśmīrakośalaḥ ।ākāśavāyutejombu bhūretāḥ pañca rātrayaḥ ।।acaitanyāstamodriktāḥ pañcarātravivarjitaṃ ।brahmāhaṃ viṣṇuramala iti vidyātsa deśikaḥ ।।sarvalakṣaṇahīṇopi sa gurustantrapāragaḥ ।

caiśvaraṃ tatheti ga, ṅa, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

tathāṣṭāṅgamiti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

kāśmīrake sthita iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
nagarābhimukhāḥ sthāpyā devā na ca parāṅmukhāḥ ।।kurukṣetre gayādau ca nadīnāntu samīpataḥ ।brahmā madhye tu nagare pūrve śakrasya śobhanaṃ ।।agnāvagneś ca mātṝṇāṃ bhūtānāñca yamasya ca ।dakṣiṇe caṇḍikāyāś ca pitṛdaityādikasya ca ।।vairṛte mandiraṃ kuryāt varuṇādadeś ca vāruṇe ।vāyor nāgasya vāyavye saumye yakṣaguhasya ca ।।caṇḍīśasya maheśasya aiśe viṣṇoś ca sarvaśaḥ ।pūrvadevakulaṃ pīḍya prāsādaṃ svalpakaṃ tvatha ।।samaṃ vāpyadhikaṃ vāpi na kartavyaṃ vijānatā ।ubhayordviguṇāṃ sīmāṃ tyaktvā cocchrayasammitāṃ ।।prāsādaṃ kārayedanyaṃ nobhayaṃ pīḍayedbudhaḥ ।bhūmau tu śodhitāyāṃ tu kuryādbhumiparigrahaṃ ।।prākārasīmāparyantaṃ tato bhutabaliṃ haret ।māṣaṃ haridrācūrṇantu salājaṃ dadhisaktubhiḥ ।।aṣṭākṣareṇa saktūṃś ca pātāyitvāṣṭadikṣu ca ।rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca yesmiṃstiṣṭhanti bhūtale ।।sarve te vyapagacchantu sthānaṃ kuryāmahaṃ hareḥ ।halena vāhayitvā gāṃ gobhiś caivāvadārayet ।।pramāṇvaṣṭakenaiva trasareṇuḥ prakīrtyate ।।tair aṣṭabhistu bālāgraṃ likhyā tair aṣṭabhirmatā ।tābhiryūkāṣṭabhiḥ khyātā tāścāṣṭau yavamadhyamaḥ ।।

nadyadriṣu iti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
yavāṣṭakair aṅgulaṃ syāccaturviṃśāṅgulaḥ karaḥ ।caturaṅgulasaṃyuktaḥ sa hastaḥ padmahastakaḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pratiṣṭhāyāṃ bhūparigraho nāmonacatvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

arghyadānavidhānaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
pūrvamāsit mahadbhūtaṃ sarvabhūtabhayaṅkaraṃ ।taddevair nihitaṃ bhumau sa vāstupuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।catuḥṣaṣṭipade kṣetre īśaṃ koṇārdhasaṃsthitaṃ ।ghṛtākṣataistarpayettaṃ parjanyaṃ padagataṃ tataḥ ।।utpalādibhirjayantañca dvipadasthaṃ patākayā ।mahendrañcaikakoṣṭhasthaṃ sarvaraktaiḥ pade raviṃ ।।vitānenārdhapadagaṃ satyaṃ pade bhṛśaṃ ghṛtaiḥ ।vyoma śākunamāṃsena koṇārdhapadasaṃsthitaṃ ।।srucā cārdhapade vahniṃ pūṣāṇaṃ lājayaikataḥ ।svarṇena vitathaṃ dviṣṭhaṃ mathanena gṛhākṣataṃ ।।māṃsaudanena dharmeśamekaikasmin sthitaṃ dvayaṃ ।gandharvaṃ dvipadaṃ gandhair bhṛśaṃ śākunajihvayā ।।ekasthamūrdhvasaṃsthañca mṛgaṃ nīlapaṭais tathā ।pitṝn kṛśarayārdhasthaṃ dantakāṣṭhaiḥ padasthitaṃ ।।

nṛhasta iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vyoma śākulamāṃseneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dauvārikaṃ dvisaṃsthañca sugrīvaṃ yāvakena tu ।puṣpadantaṃ kuśastambaiḥ padmair varuṇamekataḥ ।।asuraṃ surayā dviṣṭhaṃ pade śeṣaṃ ghṛtāmbhasā ।yavaiḥ pāpaṃ padārdhasthaṃ rogamardhe ca maṇḍakaiḥ ।।nāgapuṣpaiḥ pade nāgaṃ mukhyaṃ bhakṣyair dvisaṃsthitaṃ ।mudgaudanena bhallāṭaṃ pade somaṃ pade tathā ।।madhunā pāyasenātha śālūkena ṛṣiṃ dvaye ।pade ditiṃ lopikābhirardhe ditimathāparaṃ ।।pūrikābhistataścāpamīśādhaḥ payasā pade ।tatodhaścāpavatsantu dadhnā caikapade sthitaṃ ।।laḍḍukaiś ca marīcintu pūrvakoṣṭhacatuṣṭaye ।savitre raktapuṣpāṇi brahmādhaḥkoṇakoṣṭhake ।।tadadhaḥkoṣṭhake dadyāt sāvitryai ca kuśodakaṃ ।vivaste aruṇaṃ dadyāccandanañcaturaṅghriṣu ।।rakṣodhaḥkoṇakoṣṭhe tu indrāyānnaṃ niśānvitaṃ ।indrajayāya tasyādho ghṛtānnaṃ koṇakoṣṭhake ।।catuṣpadeṣu dātavyamindrāya guḍapāyasaṃ ।vāyvadhaḥkoṇadeśe tu rudrāya pakvamāṃsakaṃ ।।tadadhaḥkoṇakoṣṭhe tu yakṣāyārdraṃ phalantathā ।mahīdharāya māṃsānnaṃ māghañca caturaṅghriṣu ।।madhye catuṣpade sthāpyā brahmaṇe tilataṇḍulāḥ ।carakīṃ māṣasarpibhyāṃ skandaṃ kṛśarayāsṛjā ।।raktapadmair vidārīñca kandarpañca palodanaiḥ ।pūtanāṃ palapittābhyāṃ māṃsāsṛgbhyāñca jambhakaṃ ।।

madhyacatuṣṭaye iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pittāsṛgasthibhiḥ pāpāṃ pilipiñjaṃ srajāsṛjā ।īśādyān raktamāṃsena abhāvādakṣatair yajet ।।rakṣomātṛgaṇebhyaś ca piśācādibhya eva ca ।pitṛbhyaḥ kṣetrapālebhyo balīn dadyāt prakāmataḥ ।।āhutvaitānasantarpya prāsādādīnna kārayet ।brahamasthāne hariṃ lakṣmīṃ gaṇaṃ paścāt samarcayet ।।mahīśvaraṃ vāstumayaṃ vardhanyā sahitaṃ ghaṭaṃ ।brahmāṇaṃ madhyataḥ kumbhe brahmādīṃś ca digīśvarān ।।dadyāt pūrṇāhutiṃ paścāt svasti vācya praṇamya ca ।pragṛhya karkarīṃ samyak maṇḍalantu pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।sūtramārdeṇa he brahmaṃstoyadhārāñca bhrāmayet ।pūrvavattena mārgeṇa sapta vījāni vāpayet ।।prārambhaṃ tena mārgeṇa tasya khātasya kārayet ।tato gartaṃ khanenmadhye hastamātraṃ pramāṇataḥ ।।caturaṅgulakaṃ cādhaścopalipyārcayettataḥ ।dhyātvā caturbhujaṃ viṣṇumarghyaṃ dadyāttu kumbhataḥ ।।karkaryā pūrayet śvabhraṃ śuklapuṣpāṇi ca nyaset ।dakṣiṇāvartakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bījair mṛddbhiś ca pūrayet ।।arghyādānaṃ viniṣpādya govastrādīndadedgurau ।kālajñāya sthapataye vaiṣṇavādibhya arcayet ।।tatastu khānayedyatnajjalāntaṃ yāvadeva tu ।puruṣādhaḥsthitaṃ śalyaṃ na gṛhe doṣadaṃ bhavet ।।

pilipicchamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mahīdharaṃ vāstumayamiti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

puruṣādhiṣṭhitaṃ śalyamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
asthiśalye vidyate vai bhittirvai gṛhiṇo asukhaṃ ।
yannāmaśabdaṃ śṛṇuyāttatra śalyaṃ tadudbhavaṃ ।।

e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye arghyadānakathanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikacatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

śilāvinyāsavidhānaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
pādapratiṣṭhāṃ vakṣāmi śilāvinyāsalakṣaṇaṃ ।agrato maṇḍapaḥ kāryaḥ kuṇḍalānāntu catuṣṭayaṃ ।।kumbhanyāseṣṭakānyāso dvārastambhocchrayaṃ śubhaṃ ।pādonaṃ pūrayet khātaṃ tatra vāstuṃ yajet same ।।iṣṭakāś ca supakvāḥ syurdvādaśāṅgulasammitāḥ ।savistāratribhāgena vaipulyena samanvitāḥ ।।karapramāṇā śreṣṭhā syācchilāpyatha śilāmaye ।nava kumbhāṃstāmramayān sthāpayediṣṭakāghaṭān ।।adbhiḥ pañcakaṣāyeṇa sarvauṣadhijalena ca ।gandhatoyena ca tathā kumbhaistoyasupūritaiḥ ।।hiraṇyavrīhisaṃyuktair gandhacandanacarcitaiḥ ।āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhiḥ śanno devīti cāpyatha ।।tarat samandīriti ca pāvamānībhireva ca ।uduttamaṃ varuṇamiti kathānaś ca tathaiva ca ।।

suvistāraṃ vibhāgena naipuṇyaneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śilā syānna śilāmaye iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhavatatsamandīritīti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
varuṇasyeti mantreṇa haṃsaḥ śuciṣadityapi ।śrīsūktena tathā śilāḥ saṃsthāpya saṃghaṭāḥ ।।śayyāyāṃ maṇḍape prācyāṃ maṇḍale harimarcayet ।juhuyājjanayitvāgniṃ samidho dvādaśīstataḥ ।।āghārāvājyabhāgau tu praṇavenaiva kārayet ।aṣṭāhutīs tathāṣṭāntair ājyaṃ vyāhṛtibhiḥ kramāt ।।lokeśānāmagnaye vai somāyāvagraheṣu ca ।puruṣottamāyeti ca vyāhṛtīrjuhuyāttataḥ ।।prāyaścittaṃ tataḥ pūrṇāṃ mūrtimāṃsaghṛtāṃstilān ।vedādyair dvādaśāntena kumbheṣu ca pṛthak pṛthak ।।prāṅmukhastu guruḥ kuryādaṣṭadikṣu vilipya ca ।madhye caikāṃ śilāṃ kumbhaṃ nyasedetān surān kramāt ।।padmaṃ caiva mahāpadmaṃ makaraṃ kacchapaṃ tathā ।kumudañca tathā nandaṃ padmaṃ śaṅkhañca padminīṃ ।।kumbhānna cālayetteṣu iṣṭakānāntu devatāḥ ।īśānāntāś ca pūrvādāviṣṭakāṃ prathamaṃ nyaset ।।śaktayo vimalādyāstu iṣṭakānāntu devatāḥ ।nyasanīyā yathā yogaṃ madhye nyasyā tvanugrahā ।।avyaṅge cākṣata pūrṇaṃ muneraṅgirasaḥ sute ।iṣṭake tvaṃ prayaccheṣṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayāmyahaṃ ।।mantreṇānena vinyasya iṣṭakā deśakramottamaḥ ।
samyutā iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।

aṣṭāhutīplathā pūrṇair ājyamiti ga, gha, ṅa, iti pustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

somāya ca grahāya ceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dvādaśārṇena iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
garbhādhānaṃ tataḥ kuryānmadhyasthāne samāhitaḥ ।।kumbhopariṣṭhādeveśaṃ padminīṃ nyasya devatāṃ ।mṛttikāś caiva puṣpāṇi dhātavo ratnameva ca ।।lauhāni dikpaterastraṃ yajedvai garbhabhājane ।dvādaśāṅgulavistāre caturaṅgulakocchraye ।।padmākāre tāmramaye bhājane pṛthivīṃ yajet ।ekānte sarvabhūteśe parvatāsanamaṇḍite ।।samudraparivāre tvaṃ devi garbhaṃ samāśraya ।nande nandaya vāsiṣṭhe vasubhiḥ prajayā saha ।।jaye bhārgavadāyāde prajānāṃ vijayāvahe ।pūrṇeṅgirasadāyāde pūrṇakāmaṃ kuruṣva māṃ ।।bhadre kāśyapadāyāde kuru bhadrāṃ matiṃ mama ।sarvavījasamāyukte sarvaratnauṣadhīvṛte ।।jaye surucire nande vāsiṣṭhe ramyatāmiha ।prajāpatisute devi caturasre mahīyasi ।।subhage suprabhe bhadre gṛhe kāśyapi ramyatāṃ ।pūjite paramāś carye gandhamālyair alaṅkṛte ।।bhavabhūtikarī devi gṛhe bhārgavi ramyatāṃ ।deśasvāmipurasvāmigṛhasvāmiparigrahe ।।manuṣyādikatuṣṭyarthaṃ paśuvṛddhikarī bhava ।evamuktvā tataḥ khātaṃ gomūtreṇa tu secayet ।।kṛtvā nidhāpayedgarbhaṃ garbhādhānaṃ bhavenniśi ।govastrādi pradadyācca guravenyeṣu bhojanaṃ ।।

rasameva ceti ga gha ṅa cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

priyayeti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
garbhaṃ nyasyeṣṭakā nyasya tato garbhaṃ prapūrayet ।pīṭhabandhamataḥ kuryānmitaprāsādamānataḥ ।।pīṭhottamañcocchrayeṇa prāsādasyārdhavistarāt ।padahīnaṃ madhyamaṃ syāt kaniṣṭhaṃ cottamārdhataḥ ।।pīṭhabandhopariṣṭhāttu vāstuyāgaṃ punaryajet ।pādapratiṣṭhākārī tu niṣpāpo divi modate ।।devāgāraṃ karomīti manasā yastu cintayet ।tasya kāyagataṃ pāpaṃ tadahnā hi praṇaśyati ।।kṛte tu kiṃ punastasya prāsāde vidhinaiva tu ।aṣṭeṣṭakasamāyuktaṃ yaḥ kuryāddevatālayaṃ ।।na tasya phalasampattirvaktuṃ śakyeta kenacit ।anenaivānumeyaṃ hi phalaṃ prāsādavistarāt ।।grāmamadhye ca pūrve ca pratyagdvāraṃ prakalpayet ।vidiśāsu ca sarvāsu grāme pratyaṅmukho bhavet ।dakṣiṇe cottare caiva paścime prāṅmukho bhavet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pātālayogakathanaṃ nāma ekacatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvācatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

prāsādalakṣaṇakathanaṃ

hayagrīva uvāca
prāsādaṃ sampravakṣyāmi sarvasādhāraṇaṃ śṛṇu ।caturasrīkṛtaṃ kṣetraṃ bhajet ṣoḍaśadhā budhaḥ ।।madhye tasya caturbhistu kuryādāyasamanvitaṃ ।

samaprāsādamānata iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dvadaśaiva tu bhāgāni bhittyarthaṃ parikalpayet ।।jaṅghocchrāyantu kartavyaṃ caturbhāgeṇa cāyataṃ ।jaṅghāyāṃ dviguṇocchrāyaṃ mañjaryāḥ kalpayed budhaḥ ।।turyabhāgena mañjaryāḥ kāryaḥ samyak pradakṣiṇaḥ ।tanmānanirgamaṃ kāryamubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ samaṃ ।।śikhareṇa samaṃ kāryamagre jagati vistaraṃ ।dviguṇenāpi kartavyaṃ yathāśobhānurūpataḥ ।।vistārānmaṇḍapasyāgre garbhasūtradvayena tu ।dairghyātpādādhikaṃ kuryānmadhyastambhair vibhūṣitaṃ ।।prāsādagarbhamānaṃ vā kurvīta mukhamaṇḍapaṃ ।ekāśītipadair vyāstuṃ paścāt maṇḍapamārabhet ।।śukān prāgdvāravinyāse pādāntaḥsthān yajet surān ।tathā prākāravinyāse yajed dvātriṃśadantagān ।।sarvasādhāraṇaṃ caitat prāsādasya ca lakṣaṇaṃ ।mānena pratimāyā vā prāsādamaparaṃ śṛṇu ।।pratimāyāḥ pramāṇana kartavyā piṇḍikā śubhā ।garbhastu piṇḍikārdhena garbhamānāstu bhittayaḥ ।।bhitterāyāmamānena utsedhantu prakalpayet ।bhittyucchrāyāttu dviguṇaṃ śikharaṃ kalpayed budhaḥ ।।śikharasya tu turyeṇa bhramaṇaṃ parikalpayet ।śikharasya caturthena vyagrato mukhamaṇḍapaṃ ।।

catyurbhāgeṇa vā yutamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । caturbhāgeṇa saṃyutamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

samyak kuryāt pradakṣiṇamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dvātriṃśadantare iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
aṣṭamāṃsena garbhasya rathakānāntu nirgamaḥ ।paridherguṇabhāgena rathakāṃstatra kalpayet ।।tattṛtīyeṇa vā kuryādrathakānāntu nirgamaṃ ।vāmatrayaṃ sthāpanīyaṃ rathakatritaye sadā ।।śikharārthaṃ hi sūtrāṇi catvāri vinipātayet ।śukanāśordhvataḥ sūtraṃ tiryagbhūtaṃ nipātayet ।।śikharasyārdhabhāgasthaṃ siṃhaṃ tatra tu kārayet ।śukanāsāṃ sthirīkṛtya madhyasandhau nidhāpayet ।।apare ca tathā pārśvaṃ tadvat sūtraṃ nidhāpayet ।tadūrdhvantu bhavedvedī sakaṇṭā manasārakaṃ ।।skandhabhagnaṃ na kartavyaṃ vikarālaṃ tathaiva ca ।ūrdhvaṃ ca vedikāmānāt kalaśaṃ parikalpayet ।।vistārāddviguṇaṃ dvāraṃ kartavyaṃ tu suśobhanaṃ ।udumbarau tadūrdhvañca nyasecchākhāṃ sumaṅgalaiḥ ।।dvārasya tu caturthāṃśe kāryau caṇḍapracaṇdakau ।viśvaksenavatsadaṇḍau śikhordhvoḍumbare śriyaṃ ।।diggajaiḥ snāpyamānāntāṃ ghaṭeḥ sābjāṃ surūpikāṃ ।prāsādasya caturthāṃśaiḥ prākārasyocchrayo bhavet ।।prāsādāt pādahīnastu gopurasyocchrayo bhavet ।pañcahastasya devasya ekahastā tu pīṭhikā ।।gāruḍaṃ maṇḍapañcāgre ekaṃ bhaumādidhāma ca ।kuryāddhi pratimāyāntu dikṣu cāṣṭamāsu copari ।।pūrve varāhaṃ dakṣe ca nṛsiṃhaṃ śrīdharaṃ jale ।uttare tu hayagrīvanāgneyyāṃ jāmadagnyakaṃ ।।

tatturīyeṇeti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
nairṛtyāṃ rāmakaṃ vāyau vāmanaṃ vāsudevakaṃ ।īśe prāsādaracanā deyā vasvarkakādibhiḥ ।dvārasya cāṣṭamādyaṃśaṃ tyatkā bedho na doṣabhāk ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye prāsādalakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvācattvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha tricatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

prāsādadevatāsthāpanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
prāsāde devatāḥ sthāpyā vakṣye brahman śṛṇuṣva me ।pañcāyatamadhye tu vāsudevaṃ niveśayet ।।vāmanaṃ nṛhariñcāśvaśīrṣaṃ tadvañca śūkaraṃ ।āgneye nairṛte caiva vāyavye ceśagocare ।।atha nārāyaṇaṃ madhye āgneyyāmambikāṃ nyaset ।nairṛtyāṃ bhāskaraṃ vāyau brahmāṇaṃ liṅgamīśake ।।athavā rudrarūpantu athavā navadhāmasu ।vāsudevaṃ nyasenmadhye pūrvādau vāmavāmakān ।।indrādīn lokapālāṃś ca athavā navadhāmasu ।pañcāyatanakaṃ kuryāt madhye tu puruṣottamaṃ ।।lakṣmīvaiśravaṇau pūrvaṃ dakṣe mātṛgaṇaṃ nyaset ।skandaṃ gaṇeśamīśānaṃ sūryādīn paścime grahān ।।uttare daśa matsyādīnāgneyyāṃ caṇḍikāṃ tathā ।nairṛtyāmambikāṃ sthāpya vāyavye tu sarasvatīṃ ।।padmāmaiśe vāsudevaṃ madhye nārāyaṇañca vā ।trayodaśālaye madhye viśvarūpaṃ nyaseddhariṃ ।।

pūrvādau keśavādīn vā anyadhāmasvayaṃ hariṃ ।mṛṇmayī dārughaṭitā lohajā ratnajā tathā ।।śailajā gandhajā caiva kausumī saptadhā smṛtā ।kausumī gandhajā caiva mṛṇmayī pratimā tathā ।।tatkālapūjitāś caitāḥ sarvakāmaphalapradāḥ ।atha śailamayīṃ vakṣye śilā yatra ca gṛhyate ।।parvatānāmabhāve ca gṛhṇīyādbhūgatāṃ śilāṃ ।pāṇḍarā hy aruṇā pītā kṛṣṇā śastā tu vairṇināṃ ।।na yadā labhyate samyag varṇināṃ varṇataḥ śilā ।varṇādyāpādānaṃ tatra juhyāt siṃhavidyayā ।।śilāyāṃ śuklarekhāgryā kṛṣṇāgryā siṃhahomataḥ ।kāṃsyaghaṇṭāninādā syāt puṃliṅgā visphuliṅgikā ।।tanmandalakṣaṇā strī syādrūpābhāvānnapuṃsakā ।dṛśyate maṇḍalaṃ yasyāṃ sagarbhāṃ tāṃ vivarjayet ।।pratimārthaṃ vanaṃ gatvā vrajayāgaṃ samācaret ।tatra khātvopalipyātha maṇḍape tu hariṃ yajet ।।baliṃ datvā karmaśastraṃ ṭaṅkādikamathārcayet ।hutvātha śālitoyena astreṇa prokṣayecchilāṃ ।।rakṣāṃ kṛtvā nṛsiṃhena mūlamantreṇa pūjayet ।hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ dadyāttato bhūtabaliṃ guruḥ ।।

anyadhāmasu yajñaviditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।yugmadhāmasvayaṃ harimiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kaumudī iti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

unmattalakṣaṇā iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mantrayediti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
atra ye saṃsthitāḥ sattvā yātudhānāś ca guhyakāḥ ।siddhādayo vā ye cānye tān sampūjya kṣamāpayet ।।viṣṇubimbārthamasmākaṃ yātraiṣā keśavājñayā ।viṣṇvarthaṃ yadbhavet kāryaṃ yuṣmākamapi tadbhavet ।।anena balidānena prītā bhavata sarvathā ।kṣameṇa gacchatānyatra muktvā sthānamidaṃ tvarāt ।evaṃ prabodhitāḥ sattvā yānti tṛptā yathāsukhaṃ ।śilpibhiś ca caruṃ prāśya svapnamantraṃ japenniśi ।।oṃ namaḥ sakalalokāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave ।viśvāya viśvarūpāya svapnādhipataye namaḥ ।।ācakṣva devadeveśa prasuptosmi tavāntikaṃ ।svapne sarvāṇi kāryāṇi hṛdisthāni tu yāni me ।।
oṃ oṃ hrūṃ phaṭ viṣṇave svāhā 
śubhe svapne śubhaṃ sarvaṃ hy aśubhe siṃhahomataḥ ।prātararghyaṃ śilāyāṃ tu datvāstreṇāstrakaṃ yajet ।।kuddālaṭaṅkaśastrādyaṃ madhvānyāktamukhañcaret ।ātmānaṃ cintayedviṣṇuṃ śilpinaṃ viśvakarmakaṃ ।।śastraṃ viṣṇvātmakaṃ dadyāt mukhapṛṣṭhādi darśayet ।jitendriyaḥ ṭaṅkahastaḥ śilpī tu caturasrakāṃ ।।

lokasiddhyarthamasmākamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

viśvādhipataye iti kha, cihnitapuatakapāṭhaḥ

prapanno asmi iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ oṃ hrīṃ phaḍiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

viśvakarmaṇimiti kha, ga, cihnitapuatakapāṭhaḥ

viśvātmakamiti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
śilāṃ kṛtvā piṇḍikārthaṃ kiñcinnyūnāntu kalpayet ।rathe sthāpya samānīya savastrāṃ kāruveśmani ।pūjayitvātha ghaṭayet pratimāṃ sa tu karmakṛt ।।
e ity ādi mahāpurāṇe āgneye śāntyādivarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuś catvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

vāsudevādipratimālakṣaṇavidhiḥ

bhagavānuvāca
vāsudevādipratimālakṣaṇaṃ pravadāmi te ।prāsādasyottare pūrvamukhīṃ vā cottarānanāṃ ।।saṃsthāpya pūjya ca baliṃ datvātho madhyasūcakaṃ ।śilāṃ śilpī tu navadhā vibhajya navame aṃśake ।।sūrpabhaktaiḥ śilāyāṃ tu bhāgaṃ svāṅgulamucyate ।dvyaṅgulaṃ golakaṃ nāmnā kālanetraṃ taducyate ।।bhāgamekaṃ tridhā bhaktvā pārṣṇibhāgaṃ prakalpayet ।bhāgamekaṃ tathā jānau grīvāyāṃ bhāgameva ca ।।mukuṭaṃ tālamātraṃ syāttālamātraṃ tayā mukhaṃ ।tālenaikena kaṇṭhantu tālena hṛdayaṃ tathā ।।nābhimeḍhrāntarantālaṃ dvitālāvūrukau tathā ।tāladvayena jaṅghā syāt sūtrāṇi śṛṇu sāmprataṃ ।।kāryaṃ sūtradvayaṃ pāde jaṅghāmadhye tathāparaṃ ।jānau sūtradvayaṃ kāryamūrūmadhye tathāparaṃ ।।meḍhre tathāparaṃ kāryaṃ kaṭyāṃ sūtrantathāparaṃ ।mekhalābandhasiddhyarthaṃ nābhyāṃ caivāparantathā ।।

hṛdaye ca tathā kāryaṃ kaṇṭhe sūtradvayaṃ tathā ।lalāte cāparaṃ kāryaṃ mastake ca tathāparaṃ ।।mukuṭopari kartavyaṃ sūtramekaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ ।sūtrāṇyūrdhvaṃ pradeyāni saptaiva kamalodbhava ।।kakṣātrikāntareṇaiva ghaṭ sūtrāṇi pradāpayet ।madhyasūtraṃ tu santyajya sūtrāṇyeva nivedayet ।।lalāṭaṃ nāsikāvaktraṃ kartavyañcaturaṅgulaṃ ।grīvākarṇau tu kartavyau āyāmāccaturaṅgulau ।।dvyaṅgule hanuke kārye vistārāccibukantathā ।aṣṭāṅgulaṃ lalāṭantu vistāreṇa prakīrtitam ।।pareṇa dvyaṅgulau śaṅkhau kartavyāvalakānvitau ।caturaṅgulamākhyātamantaraṃ karṇanetrayoḥ ।।dvyaṅgulau pṛthukau karṇau karṇāpāṅgārdhapañcame ।bhrūsamena tu sūtreṇa karṇaśrotraṃ prakīrtitam ।।viddhaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ karṇamaviddhañcaturaṅgulam ।civukena samaṃ viddhamaviddhaṃ vā ṣaḍaṅgulam ।।gandhapātraṃ tathāvartaṃ śaṣkulīṃ kalpayettathā ।dvyaṅgulenādharaḥ kāryastasyārdhenottarādharaḥ ।।ardhāṅgulaṃ tathā netraṃ vaktrantu caturaṅgulam ।āyāmena tu vaipulyāt sārdhamaṅgulamucyate ।।avyāttamevaṃ syādvaktraṃ vyāttaṃ tryaṅgulamiṣyate ।nāsāvaṃśasamucchrāyaṃ mūle tvekāṅgulaṃ matam ।।ucchrāyā dvyaṅgulaṃ cāgre karavīropamāḥ smṛtāḥ ।

mukuṭopari iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tathā gojī iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
antaraṃ cakṣuṣoḥ kāryaṃ caturaṅgulamānataḥ ।।dvyaṅgulaṃ cākṣikoṇaṃ ca dvyaṅgulaṃ cāntaraṃ tayoḥ ।tārā netratribhāgeṇa dṛktārā pañcamāṃśikā ।।tryaṅgulaṃ netravistāraṃ droṇī cārdhāṅgulā matā ।tatsamāṇā bhruvorlekhā bhruvau caiva same mate ।।bhrūmadhyaṃ dvyaṅgulaṃ kāryaṃ bhrūdairghyaṃ caturāṅgulam ।ṣaṭtriṃśadaṅgulāyāmammastakasya tu veṣṭanam ।।mūrtīnāṃ keśavādīnāṃ dvātriṃśadveṣṭanaṃ bhavet ।pañcanetrā tvadhogrīvā vistārādveṣṭanaṃ punaḥ ।।triguṇantu bhavedūrdhvaṃ vistṛtāṣṭāṅgulaṃ punaḥ ।grīvātriguṇamāyāmaṃ grīvāvakṣontaraṃ bhavet ।।skandhāvaṣṭāṅgulau kāryau trikalāvaṃśakau śubhau ।saptanetrau smṛtau bāhū prabāhū ṣoḍaśāṅgulau ।।trikalau vistṛtau bāhū prabāhū cāpi tatsamau ।bāhudaṇḍordhvato jñeyaḥ pariṇāhaḥ kalā nava ।।saptadaśāṅgulo madhye kūrpārordhe ca ṣoḍaśa ।kūrpārasya bhavennāhaḥ triguṇaḥ kamalodbhava ।।nāhaḥ prabāhumadhye tu ṣoḍaśāṅgula ucyate ।agrahaste parīṇāho dvādaśāṅgula ucyate ।।vistareṇa karatalaṃ kīrtitaṃ tu ṣaḍaṅgulam ।dairghyaṃ saptāṅgulaṃ kāryaṃ madhyā pajcāṅgulā matā ।।tarjanyanāmikā caiva tasmādardhāṅgulaṃ vinā ।kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhakau kāryau caturaṅgulasammitau ।।

bhrūdairghyāccaturaṅgulā iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dviparvoṅguṣṭhakaḥ kāryaḥ śeṣāgulyastriparvikāḥ ।sarvāsāṃ parvaṇordhena nakhamānaṃ vidhīyate ।।vakṣaso yat pramāṇantu jaṭharaṃ tatpramāṇataḥ ।aṅgulaikaṃ bhavennābhī vedhena ca pramāṇataḥ ।।tato meḍhrāntaraṃ kāryaṃ tālamātraṃ pramāṇataḥ ।nābhimadhye prīṇāho dvicatvāriṃśadaṅgulaiḥ ।।antaraṃ stanayoḥ kāryaṃ tālamātraṃ pramāṇataḥ ।civukau yavamānau tu maṇḍalaṃ dvipadaṃ bhavet ।।catuḥṣaṣṭyaṅgulaṃ kāryaṃ veṣṭanaṃ vakṣasaḥsphuṭam ।caturmukhañca tadadhoveṣṭanaṃ parikīrtitam ।।pariṇāhas tathā kaṭyā catuḥpañcāśadaṅgulaiḥ ।vistāraścorumūle tu procyate dvādaśaṅgulaḥ ।।tasmādabhyadhikaṃ madhye tato nimnataraṃ kramāt ।vistṛtāṣṭāṅgulaṃ jānutriguṇā pariṇāhataḥ ।।jaṅghāmadhye tu vistāraḥ saptāṅgula udāhṛtaḥ ।triguṇā paridhiścāsya jaṅghāgraṃ pañcavistarāt ।।triguṇā paridhiścāsya pādau tālapramāṇakau ।āyāmādutthitau pādau caturaṅgulameva ca ।।gulphāt pūrvaṃ tu kartavyaṃ pramāṇāccaturaṅgulam ।trikalaṃ vistṛtau pādau tryaṅgulo guhyakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।pañcāṅgulastu nāhosya dīrghā tadvat pradeśinī ।aṣṭamāṣṭāṃśatonyūnaḥ śeṣāṅgulyaḥ krameṇa tu ।।sapādāṅgulamutsedhamaṅguṣṭasya prakīrtitaṃ ।yavonamaṅgulaṃ kāryamaṅguṣṭhasya nakhaṃ tathā ।।

cūcukau iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ardhāṅgulaṃ tathānyāsāṃ kramān nyūnaṃ tu kārayet ।aṅgulau vṛṣaṇau kāryau meḍhraṃ tu caturaṅgulam ।।pariṇāhotra koṣāgraṃ kartavyañcaturaṅgulam ।ṣaḍaṅgulaparīṇāhau vṛṣaṇau parikīrtitau ।।pratimā bhūṣaṇāḍhyā syādetaduddeśalakṣaṇam ।anayaiva diśā kāryaṃ loke dṛṣṭvā tu lakṣaṇam ।।dakṣiṇe tu kare cakramadhastāt padmameva ca ।vāme śaṅkhaṃ gadādhastādvāsudevasya lakṣaṇāt ।।śrīpuṣṭau vāpi kartavye padmavīṇākarānvite ।ūrumātrocchitāyāme mālāvidyādharau tathā ।।prabhāmaṇḍalasaṃsthau tau prabhā hastyādibhūṣaṇā ।padmābhaṃ pādapīṭhantu pratimāsvevamācaret ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pratimālakṣaṇaṃ nāma catuś catvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcacatvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ

piṇḍikālakṣaṇakathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
piṇḍikālakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye dairghyeṇa pratimāsamā ।ucchrāyaṃ pratimārdhantu catuḥṣaṣṭipuṭāṃ ca tām ।।tyaktvā paṅktidvayaṃ cādhastadūrdhvaṃ yattu koṣṭhakam ।

sārdhāṅgulaṃ tathāyāmamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

maṇividyādharāviti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

catuḥṣaṣṭipadāmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
samantādubhayoḥ pārśve antasthaṃ parimārjayet ।।ūrdhvaṃ paṅgktidvayaṃ tyaktvā adhastād yattu koṣṭhakam ।antaḥ sammārjayet yatnāt pārśvayorubhayoḥ samam ।।tayormadhyagatau tatra catuṣkau mārjayettataḥ ।caturdhā bhājayitvā tu ūrdhvapaṅktidvayaṃ budhaḥ ।।mekhalā bhāgamātrā syāt khātaṃ tasyārdhamānataḥ ।bhāgaṃ bhāgaṃ parityajya pārśvayorubhayoḥ samaṃ ।।datvā caikaṃ padaṃ vāhye pramāṇaṃ kārayed budhaḥ ।tribhāgeṇa ca bhāgasyāgre syāttoyavinirgamaḥ ।।nānāprakārabhedena bhadreyaṃ piṇḍikā śubhā ।aṣṭatālā tu kartavyā devī lakṣmīstayā striyaḥ ।।bhruvau yavādhike kārye yavahīnā tu nāsikā ।golakenādhikaṃ vaktramūrdhvaṃ tiryagvivarjitaṃ ।।āyate nayane kārye tribhāgonair yavaistribhiḥ ।tadardhena tu vaipulyaṃ netrayoḥ parikalpayet ।।karṇapāśo dhikaḥ kāryaḥ sṛkkaṇīsamasūtrataḥ ।namraṃ kalāvihīnantu kuryādaṃśadvayaṃ tathā ।।grīvā sārdhakalā kāryā tadvistāropaśobhitā ।netraṃ vinā tu vistārau ūrū jānū ca piṇḍikā ।।aṅghripṛṣṭhau sphicau kaṭyāṃ yathābhāgaṃ prakalpayet ।saptāṃśonās tathāṅgulyo dīrghaṃ viṣkambhanāhataṃ ।।netraikavarjitāyāmā jaṅghorū ca tathā kaṭiḥ ।madhyapārśvaṃ ca tadvṛttaṃ ghanaṃ pīnaṃ kucadvayaṃ ।।

tatreyamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tālamātrau stanau karyau kaṭiḥ sārdhakalādhikā ।lakṣma śeṣaṃ purāvatsyāt dakṣiṇe cāmubujaṃ kare ।।vāme vittvaṃ striyau pārśve śubhe cāmarahastake ।dīrghaghoṇastu garuḍaś cakrāṅgādyānatho vade ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye piṇḍikālakṣmādilakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

śālagrāmādimūrtilakṣaṇakathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
śālagrāmādimūrteś ca vakṣyehaṃ bhuktimuktidāḥ ।vāsudevo asito dvāre śālagrāmadvicakrakaḥ ।।jñeyaḥ saṅkarṣaṇo lagnadvicakro rakta uttamaḥ ।sūkṣmacakro bahucchidraḥ pradyumno nīladīghavaḥ ।।pīto niruddhaḥ padmāṅgo vartulo dvitrirekhavān ।kṛṣṇo nārāyaṇo nābhyunnataḥ śuṣiradīrghavān ।।parameṣṭho sābjacakraḥ pṛṣṭhacchidrakaś ca vindumān ।sthūlacakro asito viṣṇurmadhye rekhā gadākṛtiḥ ।।nṛsiṃhaḥ kapikaḥ sthūlavakraḥ syāt pañcavindukaḥ ।varāhaḥ śaktiliṅgaḥ syāt taccakrau viṣamau sṛtau ।।indranīlanibhaḥ sthūlastrirekhālāñchitaḥ śubhaḥ ।kūrmastathonnataḥ pṛṣṭhe vartulāvartako asitaḥ ।।hayagrīvoṅkuśāvārarekho nīlaḥ savindukaḥ ।

pṛthuśccchidraśceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vaikuṇṭhaḥ ekacakro abjī maṇibhiḥ puccharekhakaḥ ।।matsyo dīrghastrivinduḥ syāt kācavarṇastu pūritaḥ ।śrīdharo vanamālāṅkaḥ pañjarekhastu vartulaḥ ।।vāmano vartulaścātihrasvo nīlaḥ savindukaḥ ।śyāmastrivikramo dakṣarekho vāmena vindukaḥ ।।ananto nāgabhogāṅgo naikābho naikamūrtimān ।sthūlo dāmodaro madhyacakro dvāḥsūkṣmavindukaḥ ।।sudarśanastvekacakro lakṣmīnārāyaṇo dvayāt ।tricakraścācyuto devastricakrako vā trivikramaḥ ।।janārdanaś catuś cakro vāsudevaś ca pañcabhiḥ ।ṣaṭvakraś caiva pradyumnaḥ saṅkarṣaṇañca saptabhiḥ ।।puruṣottamoṣṭacakro navavyūho navāṅkitaḥ ।daśāvatāro daśabhirdaśaikenāniruddhakaḥ ।dvādaśātmā dvādaśabhirata ūrdhvamanantakaḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye śālagrāmādimūrtilakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptacatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

śālagrāmādipūjākathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
śālagrāmādicakrāṅkapūjāḥ siddhyai vadāmi te ।trividhā syāddhareḥ pūjā kāmyākāmyobhayātmikā ।।mīnādīnāntu pañcānāṃ kāmyātho vobhayātmikā ।

madhyacakrādhaḥ sūkṣmavinduka iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kāmyārthevobhayātmaketi gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
