varāhasya nṛsiṃhasya vāmanasya ca muktaye ।।cakrādīnāṃ trayāṇāntu śālagrāmārcanaṃ śṛṇu ।uttamā niṣphalā pūjā kaniṣṭhā saphalārcanā ।।madhyamā mūrtipūjā syāccakrābje caturasrake ।praṇavaṃ hṛdi vinyasya ṣaḍaṅgaṅkaradehayoḥ ।।kṛtamudrātrayaś cakrād vahiḥ pūve guruṃ yajet ।āpye gaṇaṃ vāyave ca dhātāraṃ nairṛte yajet ।।vidhātārañca kartāraṃ hartāraṃ dakṣasaumyayoḥ ।viśvaksenaṃ yajedīśe āgneye kṣetrapālakam ।।ṛgādivedān prāgādau ādhārānantakaṃ bhuvaṃ ।pīṭhaṃ padmaṃ cārkacandravahnyākhyaṃ maṇḍalatrayaṃ ।।āsanaṃ dvādaśārṇena tatra sthāpya śilāṃ yajet ।astena ca samastena svavījena yajet kramāt ।।pūrvādāvatha vedādyair gāyatrībhyāṃ jitādinā ।praṇavenārcayet pañcānmudrāstisraḥ pradarśayet ।।viśvaksenasya cakrasya kṣetrapālasya darśayet ।śālagrāmasya prathamā pūjārtho niṣphalocyate ।।pūrvavat ṣoḍaśārañca sapadmaṃ maṇḍalaṃ likhet ।śaṅkhacakragadākhaḍgair gurvādyaṃ pūrvavadyajet ।।pūrve saumye dhanurvāṇān vedādyair āsanaṃ dadet ।śilāṃ nyased dvādaśārṇaistṛtīyaṃ pūjanaṃ śṛṇu ।।aṣṭāramabjaṃ vilikhet gurvādyaṃ pūrvavadyajayet ।

caturbhiḥ pūrvavadyajediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gandhādyair iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
aṣṭārṇenāsanaṃ datvā tenaiva ca śilāṃ nyaset ।
pūjayeddaśadhā tena gāyatrībhyāṃ jitaṃ tathā ।।

e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye śālagrāmādipūjākathanaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭācatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ

caturviṃśatimūrtistotrakathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
oṃrūpaḥ keśavaḥ padmaśaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।nārāyaṇaḥ śaṅkhapadmagadācakrī pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।tato gado mādhavoriśaṅkhapadmī namāmi taṃ ।cakrakaumodakīpadmaśaṅkhī govinda ūrjitaḥ ।।bhokṣadaḥ śrīgadī padmī śaṅkhī viṣṇuś ca cakradhṛk ।śaṅkhacakrābjagadinaṃ madhusūdanamāname ।।bhaktyā trivikramaḥ padmagadī cakrī ca śaṅkhyapi ।śaṅkhacakragadāpadmī vāmanaḥ pātu māṃ sadā ।।gaditaḥ śrīdharaḥ padmī cakraśārṅgī ca śaṅkhyapi ।hṛṣīkeśo gadācakrī padmī cakraśaṅkhī ca pātu naḥ ।।varadaḥ padmanābhastu śaṅkhābjārigadādharaḥ ।dāmodaraḥ padmaśaṅkhagadācakrī namāmi taṃ ।।tene gadī śaṅkhacakrī vāsudevobjabhṛjjagat ।saṅkarṣaṇo gadī śaṅkhī padmī cakrī ca pātu vaḥ ।।

jitaṃ tata iti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

cakrī gadyatha śaṅkhyapi iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
gadī cakrī śaṅkhagadī pradyumnaḥ padmabhṛt prabhuḥ ।aniruddhaś cakragadī śaṅkhī padmī ca pātu naḥ ।।sureśoryabjaśaṅkhāḍhyaḥ śrīgadī puruṣottamaḥ ।adhokṣajaḥ padmagadī śaṅkhī cakrī ca pātu vaḥ ।।devo nṛsiṃhaś cakrābjagadāśaṅkhī namāmi tam ।acyutaḥ śrīgadī padmī cakrī śaṅkhī ca pātu vaḥ ।।bālarūpī śaṅkhagadī upendraś cakrapadmyapi ।janārdanaḥ padmacakrī śaṅkhadhārī gadādharaḥ ।।śaṅkhī padmī ca cakrī ca hariḥ kaumodakīdharaḥ ।kṛṣṇaḥ śaṅkhī gadī padmī cakrī me bhuktimuktidaḥ ।।ādimūttirvāsudevastasmāt saṅkarṣaṇobhavat ।saṅkarṣaṇācca pradyumnaḥ pradyumnādaniruddhakaḥ ।।keśavādiprabhedena aikaikasya tridhā kramāt ।dvādaśākṣarakaṃ stotraṃ caturviṃśatimūrtimat ।yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi nirmalaḥ sarvamāpnuyāt ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye caturviṃśatimūrtistotraṃ nāma aṣṭācatvāriṃśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonapañcāśo adhyāyaḥ

matsyādilakṣaṇavarṇanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
daśāvatāraṃ matsyādilakṣaṇaṃ pravadāmi te ।matsyākārastu matsyaḥ syāt kūrmaḥ kārmākṛlirbhavet ।।

śaṅkhapadmī iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
narāṅgo vātha kartavyo bhūvarāho gadādibhṛt ।dakṣiṇe vāmake śaṅkhaṃ lakṣmīrvā padmameva vā ।।śrīvāmakūrparasthā tu kṣmānantau caraṇānugau ।varāhasthāpanādrājyaṃ bhavābdhitaraṇaṃ bhavet ।।narasiṃho vivṛttāsyo vāmorukṣatadānavaḥ ।tadvakṣo dārayanmālī sphuraccakragadādharaḥ ।।chatrī daṇḍī vāmanaḥ syādathavā syāccaturbhujaḥ ।rāmaścāpeṣuhastaḥ syāt kaḍgī paraśunānvitaḥ ।।rāmaścāpī śarī khaḍgī śaṅkhī vā dvibhujaḥ smṛtaḥ ।gadālāṅgaladhārī ca rāmo vātha caturbhujaḥ ।।vāmordhve lāṅgalaṃ dadyādadhaḥ śaṅkhaṃ suśobhanaṃ ।muṣalaṃ dakṣiṇordhve tu cakrañcādhaḥ suśobhanaṃ ।।śāntātmā lambakarṇaś ca gaurāṅgaścāmbarāvṛtaḥ ।ūrdhvapadmasthito buddho varadābhayadāyakaḥ ।।dhanustūṇānvitaḥ kalkī mlecchotsādakaro dvijaḥ ।athavāśvasthitaḥ khaḍgī śaṅkhacakraśarānvitaḥ ।।lakṣaṇaṃ vāsudevādinavakasya vadāmi te ।dakṣiṇordhve gadā vāme vāmordhve cakramuttamaṃ ।।brahmeśau pārśvagau nityaṃ vāsudevosti pūrvavat ।śaṅkhī sa varado vātha dvibhujo vā caturbhujaḥ ।।lāṅgalī muṣalī rāmo gadāpadmadharaḥ smṛtaḥ ।

vāmoruhṛtadānava iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gaurāṅgaścāyudhāvṛta iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

dhanurvāṇānvita iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pradyumno dakṣiṇe vajraṃ śaṅkhaṃ vāme dhanuḥ kare ।।gadānābhyāvṛtaḥ pītyā pradyumno vā dhanuḥśarī ।caturbhujo niruddhaḥ syāttathā nārāyaṇo vibhuḥ ।।caturmukhaś caturbāhurvṛhajjaṭharamaṇḍalaḥ ।lambakūrco jaṭāyukto vrahmā haṃsāgravāhanaḥ ।।dakṣiṇe cākṣasūtrañca sruvo vāme tu kuṇḍikā ।ājyasthālī sarasvatī sāvitrī vāmadakṣiṇe ।।viṣṇuraṣṭabhujastārkṣe kare khaḍgastu dakṣiṇe ।gadāśaraś ca varado vāme kārmukakheṭake ।।cakraśaṅkhau caturbāhur narasiṃhaś caturbhujaḥ ।śaṅkhacakradharo vāpi vidāritamahāsuraḥ ।।acaturbāhurvarāhastu śeṣaḥ pāṇitale dhṛtaḥ ।dhārayan bāhunā pṛthvīṃ vāmnena kamalādharaḥ ।।pādalagnā dharā kāryā padā lakṣmīrvyavasthitā ।trailokyamohanastārkṣye aṣṭabāhustu dakṣiṇe ।।cakraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca muṣalaṃ aṅkuśaṃ vāmake kare ।śaṅkhaśārṅgagadāpāśān padmavīṇāsamanvite ।।lakṣmīḥ sarasvatī kārye viśvarūpo atha dakṣiṇe ।mudgaraṃ ca tathā pāśaṃ śaktiśūlaṃ śaraṃ kare ।।vāme śaṅkhañca śārṅgañca gadāṃ pāśaṃ ca tomaraṃ ।

dakṣiṇe cakramiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gadī ratyāvṛta iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

lambabhruva iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭaḥ

dhārayannākulāṃ pṛthvīṃ vāmena kamalāmadha iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
lāṅgalaṃ paraśuṃ daṇḍaṃ churikāṃ carmakṣepakaṃ ।।viṃśadbāhuś caturvaktro dakṣiṇasthotha vāmake ।trinetre vāmapārśve na śayito jalaśāyyapi ।।śriyā dhṛtaikacaraṇo vimalādyābhirīḍitaḥ ।nābhipadmacaturvaktro hariśaṅkarako hariḥ ।।śūlarṣṭidhārī dakṣe ca gadācakradharo pade ।rudrakeśavalakṣmāṅgo gaurīlakṣmīsamanvitaḥ ।।śaṅkhacakragadāvedapāṇiścāśvaśirā hariḥ ।vāmapādo dhṛtaḥ śeṣe dakṣiṇaḥ kūrmapṛṣṭhagaḥ ।।dattātreyo dvibāhuḥ syādvāmotsaṅge śriyā saha ।viśvaksenaś cakragadī halī śaṅkhī harergaṇaḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pratimālakṣaṇaṃ nāma ūnapañcāśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcāśodhyāyaḥ

devīpratimālakṣaṇakathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
caṇḍī viṃśatibāhuḥ syādbibhratī dakṣiṇaiḥ karaḥ ।śūlāsiśakticakrāṇi pāśaṃ kheṭāyudhābhayaṃ ।।ḍamaruṃ śaktikāṃ vāmair nāgapāśañca kheṭakaṃ ।kuṭhāṅkuśacāpāṃś ca ghaṇṭādhvajagadāṃs tathā ।।ādarśamudgarān hastaiś caṇḍī vā daśabāhukā ।tadadho mahiṣaśchinnamūrdhā patitamastakaḥ ।।

carma cottamamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śastrodyatakaraḥ kruddhastadgrīvāsambhavaḥ pumān ।śūlahasto vamadrakto raktasraṅmūrdhajekṣaṇaḥ ।।siṃhenāsvādyamānastu pāśabaddho gale bhṛśaṃ ।yāmyāṅghyrākrāntasiṃhā ca savyāṅghrirnīcagāsure ।।caṇḍikeyaṃ trinetrā ca saśastrā ripumardanī ।navapadmātmake sthāne pūjyā durgā svamūrtitaḥ ।।ādau madhye tathendrādau navātattvātmabhiḥ kramāt ।aṣṭādaśabhujaikā tu dakṣe muṇḍaṃ ca kheṭakaṃ ।।ādarśatarjanīcāpaṃ dhvajaṃ ḍamarukaṃ tathā ।pāśaṃ vāme bibhratī ca śaktimudgaraśūlakaṃ ।।vajrakhaḍgāṅkuśaśarān cakrandevī śalākayā ।etair evāyudhair yuktā śeṣāḥ ṣoḍaśabahukāḥ ।।ḍamaruṃ tarjanīṃ tyaktvā rudracaṇḍādayo nava ।rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍā ca caṇḍogrā caṇḍanāyikā ।।caṇḍā caṇdavatī caiva caṇḍarūpāticaṇḍikā ।ugracaṇḍā ca madhyasthā rocanābhāruṇāsitā ।।nīlā śuklā dhūmrikā ca pītā śvetā ca siṃhagāḥ ।mahiṣotha pumān śastrī tatkacagrahamuṣṭikāḥ ।।ālīḍhā nava durgāḥ syuḥ sthāpyāḥ putrādivṛddhaye ।tathā gaurī ca caṇḍikādyā kuṇḍyakṣararadāgnidhṛk ।।saiva rambhā vane siddhāgnihīnā lalitā tathā ।skandhamūrdhakarā vāme dvitīye dhṛtadarpaṇā ।।

navatatvādibhirirti ṅa,cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śālāsu nava iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
yāmye phalāñjalihastā saubhāgyā tatra cordhvikā ।lakṣmīryāmyakarāmbhojā vāme śrīphalasaṃyutā ।।pustākṣamālikāhastā vīṇāhastā sarasvatī ।kumbhābjahastā śvetābhā makaropari jāhnavī ।।kūrmagā yamunā kumbhakarā śyāmā ca pūjyate ।savīṇastumburuḥ śuklaḥ śūlī mātragrato vṛṣe ।।gaurī caturmukhī brāhmī akṣamālāsurānvitā ।kuṇḍakṣapātriṇī vāme haṃsagā śāṅkarī sitā ।।śaracāpau dakṣiṇe asyā vāme cakraṃ dhanurvṛṣe ।kaumārī śikhigā raktā śaktihastā dvibāhukā ।।cakraśaṅkhadharā savye vāme lakṣmīrgadābjadhṛk ।daṇḍaśaṅkhāsi gadayā vārāho mahiṣasthitā ।।aindrī vāme vajrahastā sahasrākṣī tu siddhaye ।cāmuṇḍā koṭarāghnī syānnirmāṃsā tu trilocanā ।।nirmāṃsā asthisārā vā ūrdhvakeśī kṛśodarī ।dvīpacarmadharā vāme kapālaṃ paṭṭiśaṅkare ।।śūlaṃ kartrī dakṣaṇe asyāḥ śavārūḍhāsthitabhūṣaṇā ।vināyako narākāro vṛhatkukṣirgajānanaḥ ।।vṛhacchuṇḍo hy upavīto mukhaṃ saptakalaṃ bhavet ।vistārāddairghyatacaiva śuṇḍaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśadaṅgulaṃ ।।kalā dvādaśa nāḍī tu grīvā sārdhakalocchritā ।ṣaṭtriṃśadaṅgulaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ guhyamadhyardhamaṅgulaṃ ।।

makareddhari jāhnavīti kha, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustatrayakapāṭhaḥ

vāme vajramiti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

śaṅkhāri iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
nābhirūrū dvādaśañca jaṅghe pāde tu dakṣiṇe ।svadantaṃ paraśuṃ vāme laḍḍukañcotpalaṃ śaye ।।sumukhī ca viḍālākṣī pārśve skando mayūragaḥ ।svāmī śākho viśākhaś ca dvibhujo bālarūpadhṛk ।।dakṣe śaktiḥ kukkuṭotha ekavaktrotha ṣaṇmukhaḥ ।ṣaḍbhujo vā dvādaśabhirgrāmeraṇye dvibāhukaḥ ।।śaktīṣupāśanistriṃśatotradostarjanīyutaḥ ।śaktyā dākṣiṇahasteṣu ṣaṭsu vāme kare tathā ।।śikhipicchandhanuḥ kheṭaṃ patākābhayakukkuṭe ।kapālakartarīśūlapāśabhṛdyāmyasaumyayoḥ ।।gajacarmabhṛdūrdhvāsyapādā syāt rudracarcikā ।saiva cāṣṭabhujā devī śiroḍamarukānvitā ।।tena sā rudracāmuṇḍā nāṭeśvaryatha nṛtyatī ।iyameva mahālakṣmīrupaviṣṭā caturmukhī ।।nṛvājimahiṣebhāṃś ca khādantī ca kare sthitān ।daśabāhustrinetrā ca śastrāsiḍamarutrikaṃ ।।bibhratī dakṣiṇe haste vāme ghaṇṭāṃ ca kheṭakaṃ ।khaṭvāṅgaṃ ca triśūlañca siddhacāmuṇḍakāhvayā ।।siddhayogeśvarī devī sarvasiddhapradāyikā ।etadrūpā bhavedanyā pāśāṅkuśayutāruṇā ।।bhairavī rūpavidyā tu bhujair dvādaśabhiryutā ।etāḥ śmaśānajā raudrā ambāṣṭakamidaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।

ādyāṣṭakamidamiti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
kṣamā śivāvṛtā vṛddhā dvibhujā vivṛtānanā ।danturā kṣemakarī syādbhūmau jānukarā sthitā ।।yakṣiṇyastabdhadīrghākṣāḥ śākinyo vakradṛṣṭayaḥ ।piṅgākṣāḥ syurmahāramyā rūpiṇyopsarasaḥ sadā ।।sākṣamālī triśūlī ca nandīśo dvārapālakaḥ ।mahākālosimuṇḍī syācchūlakhaṭakavāṃs tathā ।।kṛśo bhaṅgī ca nṛtyan vai kuṣmāṇḍasthūlakharvavān ।gajagokarṇavaktrādyā vīrabhadrādayo gaṇāḥ ।।ghaṇṭākarṇoṣṭadaśadoḥ pāparogaṃ vidārayan ।vajrāsidaṇḍacakreṣumuṣalāṅkuśamudgarān ।।dakṣiṇe tarjanīṃ kheṭaṃ śaktiṃ muṇḍañca pāśakaṃ ।cāpaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ kuṭhārañca dvābhyāñcaiva triśūlakaṃ ।ghaṇṭāmālākulo devo visphoṭakavimardanaḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye devīpratimālakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ekapañcāśo adhyāyaḥ

sūryādipratimālakṣaṇaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
sasaptāśve saikacakre rathe sūryo dvipadmadhṛk ।masībhājanalekhanyau bibhratkuṇḍī tu dakṣiṇe ।।vāme tu piṅgalo dvāri daṇḍabhṛt sa ravergaṇaḥ ।

śivācyuteti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vajradṛṣṭaya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mahārathyo rūpiṇyo apsarasa iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

visphoṭakaruṇardana iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bālavyajanadhāriṇyau pārśve rājñī ca niṣprabhā ।।athavāśvārūḍhaḥ kārya ekastu bhāskaraḥ ।varadā dvyabjanaḥ sarve dikpālāstrakarāḥ kramāt ।।mudgaraśūlacakrābjabhṛtognyādividiksthitāḥ ।sūryāryamādirakṣontāś caturhastā dviṣaḍdale ।।varuṇaḥ sūryanāmā ca sahasrāṃśus tathāparaḥ ।dhātā tapanasañjñaś ca savitātha gabhastikaḥ ।।raviś caivātha parjanyastvaṣṭā mitrotha viṣṇukaḥ ।meṣādirāśisaṃsthāś ca mārgādikārttikāntakāḥ ।।kṛṣṇo rakto manāgraktaḥ pītaḥ pāṇḍarakaḥ sitaḥ ।kapilaḥ pītavarṇaś ca śukābho dhavalas tathā ।।dhūmro nīlaḥ kramādvarṇāḥ śaktayaḥ keśarāgragāḥ ।iḍā suṣumnā viśvārcirindusañjñā pramardinī ।।praharṣiṇī mahākālī kapilā ca prabodhanī ।nīlāmbarā ghanāntasthā amṛtākhyā ca śaktayaḥ ।।varuṇādeś ca tadvarṇāḥ keśarāgreṣu vinyaset ।tejaś caṇḍo mahāvakro dvibhujaḥ padmakhadgabhṛt ।।kuṇḍikājapyāmālīnduḥ kujaḥ śaktyakṣamālikaḥ ।budhaścāpākṣapāṇiḥ syājjīvaḥ kuṇḍyakṣamālikaḥ ।।

viśvācī vindusañjñāpravardhanī iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mahārakta iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । mārtaṇḍaś ca mahārakta iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
padmakhaḍgadhṛgiti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
khaḍgacarmabhṛditi ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śukraḥ kuṇḍyakṣamālī syāt kiṇkiṇīsūtravāñchaniḥ ।ardhacandradharo rāhuḥ ketuḥ khaḍgī ca dīpabhṛt ।।anantastakṣakaḥ karkaḥ padmo mahābjaḥ śaṅkhakaḥ ।kulikaḥ sūtriṇaḥ sarve phaṇavaktrā mahāprabhāḥ ।।indro vajrī gajārūḍhaśchāgagogniś ca śaktimān ।yamo daṇḍī ca mahiṣe nairṛtaḥ khaḍgavān kare ।।makare varuṇaḥ pāśī vāyurdhvajadharo mṛge ।gadī kuvero meṣastha īśānaś ca jaṭī vṛṣe ।।dvibāhavo lokapālā viśvakarmākṣasūtrabhṛt ।hanūmān vajrahastaḥ syāt padbhyāṃ sampīḍitāśrayaḥ ।।vīṇāhastāḥ kinnarāḥ syurmālāvidyādharāś ca khe ।durbalāṅgāḥ piśācāḥ syurvetālā vikṛtānanāḥ ।kṣetrapālāḥ śūlavantaḥ pretā mahodarāḥ kṛśāḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pratimālakṣaṇaṃ nāma ekapañcāśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvipañcośo adhyāyaḥ

devīpratimālakṣaṇaṃ

bhagavānuvāca

yoginyaṣṭāṣṭakaṃ vakṣye aindrādīśāntataḥ kramāt ।

śikhinīsūtravān śaniriti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

khaḍgo iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

maṇividyādharāś ca khe iti kha, cihitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vistṛtānanā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śūlayutā iti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
akṣobhyā rūkṣakarṇo ca rākṣasī kṛpaṇākṣayā ।।piṅgākṣī ca kṣayā kṣemā ilā līlālayā tathā ।lolā laktā balākeśī lālasā vimalā punaḥ ।।hutāśā ca viśālākṣī huṅkārā vaḍavāmukhī ।mahākrūrā krodhanā tu bhayaṅkarī mahānanā ।।sarvajñā taralā tārā ṛgvedā tu hayānanā ।sārākhyā rudraśaṅgrāhī sambarā tālajaṅghikā ।।raktākṣī suprasiddhā tu vidyujjihvā karaṅkiṇī ।meghanādā pracaṇḍogrā kālakarṇī varapradā ।।candrā candrāvalī caiva prapañcā pralayāntikā ।śiśuvaktrā piśācī ca piśitāśā ca lolupā ।।dhamanī tāpanī caiva rāgiṇī vikṛtānanā ।vāyuvegā vṛhatkukṣirvikṛtā viśvarūpikā ।।yamajihvā jayantī ca durjayā ca jayāntikā ।viḍālī revatī caiva pūtanā vijayāntikā ।।aṣṭahastāś caturhastā icchāstrāḥ sarvasiddhidāḥ ।

kṣapaṇā kṣamā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । kṣapaṇā kṣapā iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayakapāṭhaḥ

lolā raktā ca lokeśo iti ga, gha, ṅa, cihniapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

vimalā tata iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

rasasaṅgrāhī iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । vasusaṅgrāhī iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kālavarṇī iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

caṇḍā caṇdavatīti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vāmanī iti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bhairavaścārkahastaḥ syāt kūrparāsyo jaṭendubhṛt ।।khaḍgāṅkuśakuṭhāreṣuviśvabhayabhṛdekataḥ ।cāpatriśūlakhaṭvāṅgapāśakārdhavarodyataḥ ।।gajacarmadharo dvābhyāṃ kṛttivāsohibhūṣataḥ ।pretāśano mātṛmadhye pūjyaḥ pañcānanothavā ।।avilomāgniparyantaṃ dīrghāṣṭakaikabheditaṃ ।tatṣaḍaṅgāni jātyantair anvitaṃ ca kramād yajet ।।mandirāgnidalārūḍhaṃ suvarṇarasakānvitaṃ ।nādavindvandusaṃyuktaṃ mātṛnāthāṅgadīpitaṃ ।।vīrabhadro vṛṣārūḍho mātragre sa caturmukhaḥ ।gaurīṃ tu dvibhujā tryakṣā śūlinī darpaṇānvitā ।।śūlaṃ galantikā kuṇḍī varadā ca caturbhujā ।abjasthā lalitā skandagaṇādarśaśalākayā ।।caṇḍikā saśahastā syāt khaḍgaśūlāriśaktidhṛk ।dakṣe vāme nāgapāśaṃ carmāgkuśakuṭhārakaṃ ।dhanuḥ siṃhe ca mahiṣaḥ śūlena prahatogrataḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pratimālakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

danturāsya iti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

maṇḍalāgnidalārūḍhamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śūlaṃ galantī kuṇḍī ceti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

skandagaṇā daśa vināyakā iti kha, cihinitapustakapāṭhaḥ

atra caṇḍikādaśahasteṣu khaḍgaśūlāriśaktidhṛgiti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ

asmallabdhapustakapañcakeṣu nāyaṃ pāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha tripañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ

liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
liṅgādilakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye kamalodbhava tacchṛṇu ।dairghyārdhaṃ vasubhirbhaktvā tyaktvā bhāgatrayaṃ tataḥ ।।viṣkambhaṃ bhūtabhāgaistu caturasrantu kārayet ।āyāmaṃ mūrtibhirbhaktvā ekadvitrikramān nyaset ।।brahmaviṣṇuśivāṃśeṣu vardhamānoyamucyate ।caturasresya varṇārdhaṃ guhyakoṇeṣu lāñchayet ।।aṣṭāgraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ bhāgaṃ sidhyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ ।ṣoḍaśāsraṃ tataḥ kuryāddvātriṃśāsraṃ tataḥ punaḥ ।।catuḥṣaṣṭyasrakaṃ kṛtvā vartulaṃ sādhayettataḥ ।kartayedatha liṅgasya śiro vai deśikottamaḥ ।।vistāramatha liṅgasya aṣṭadhā saṃvibhājayet ।bhāgārdhārdhantu santyajya cchatrākāraṃ śiro bhavet ।।triṣu bhāgeṣu sadṛśamāyāmaṃ yasya cistaraḥ ।tadvibhāgasamaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradaṃ ।।dairghyasya tu caturthena viṣkambhaṃ devapūjite ।sarveṣāmeva liṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu sāmprataṃ ।।madhyasūtraṃ samāsādya brahmarudrāntikaṃ budhaḥ ।ṣoḍaśāṅgulaliṅgasya ṣaḍbhāgair bhājito yathā ।।tadvaiyamanasūtrābhyāṃ mānamantaramucyate ।yavāṣṭamuttare kāryaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ yavahānitaḥ ।।adhobhāgaṃ tridhā kṛtvā tvardhamekaṃ parityajet ।

vrajedātyantikamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
aṣṭadhā taddvayaṃ kṛtvā ūrdhvabhāgatryaṃ tyajet ।।ūrdhvañca pañcamādbhāgād bhrāmya rekhāṃ pralambayet ।bhāgamekaṃ parityajya saṅgaṃ kārayettayoḥ ।।etat sādhāraṇaṃ proktaṃ liṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ mayā ।sarvasādhāraṇaṃ vakṣye piṇḍikāntānnibodha me ।।brahmabhāgapraveśañca jñātvā liṅgasya cocchrayaṃ ।nyased brahmaśilāṃ vidvān samyakkarmaśilopari ।।tathā sumucchrayaṃ jñātvā piṇḍikāṃ pravibhājayet ।dvibhāgamucchritaṃ pīṭhaṃ vistāraṃ liṅgasammitam ।।tribhāgaṃ madhyataḥ khātaṃ kṛtvā pīṭhaṃ vibhājayet ।svamānārdhatribhāgeṇa bāhulyaṃ parikalpayet ।।bāhulyasya tribhāgeṇa mekhalāmatha kalpayet ।khātaṃ syānmekhalātulyaṃ kramānnimnantu kārayet ।।mekhalāṣoḍaśāṃśena khātaṃ vā tatpramāṇajñaḥ ।ucchrāyaṃ tasya pīṭhasya vikārāṅgaṃ tu kārayet ।।bhūmau praviṣṭamekaṃ tu bhāgaikena piṇḍikā ।kaṇṭhaṃ bhāgaistribhiḥ kāryaṃ bhāgenaikena paṭṭikā ।।dyaṃgena cordhvapaṭṭantu ekāṃśāḥ śeṣapaṭṭikā ।bhāgaṃ bhāgaṃ praviṣṭantu yāvat kaṇṭhaṃ tataḥ punaḥ ।।nirgamaṃ bhāgamekaṃ tu yāvadvai śeṣapaṭṭikā ।praṇālasya tribhāgena nirgamastu tribhāgataḥ ।।

madhyataḥ kṛtvā tataḥ pīṭhamiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vikārāṃśāṃśceti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhāgenaikeneti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

cārdhapaṭṭantu iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
mūleṅgulyagravistāramagre tryaṃśena cārdhataḥ ।īṣannimnantu kurvīta khātaṃ taccottareṇa vai ।
piṇḍikāsahitaṃ liṅgametat sādhāraṇaṃ smṛtam ।।

e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuḥpañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ

liṅgamānādikathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
vakṣyāmyanyaprakāreṇa liṅgamānādikaṃ śṛṇu ।vakṣye lavaṇajaṃ liṅgaṃ ghṛtajaṃ buddhivardhanam ।।bhūtaye vastraliṅgantu liṅgantātkālikaṃ viduḥ ।pakvāpakvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ syādapakvāt pakvajaṃ varaṃ ।।tato dārumayaṃ puṇyaṃ dārujāt śailajaṃ varaṃ ।śailādvaraṃ tu muktājaṃ tato lauhaṃ suvarṇajaṃ ।।rājataṃ kīrtitaṃ tāmraṃ paittalaṃ bhuktimuktidaṃ ।raṅgajaṃ rasaliṅgañca bhuktimuktipradaṃ varaṃ ।।rasajaṃ rasalohādiratnagarbhantu vardhayet ।mānādi neṣṭaṃ siddhādi sthāpitetha svayambhuvi ।।vāme ca svecchayā teṣāṃ pīṭhaprāsādakalpanā ।pūjayet sūryavimbasthaṃ darpaṇe prativimbitaṃ ।।pūjye harastu sarvatra liṅge pūrṇārcanaṃ bhavet ।hastottaravidhaṃ śailaṃ dārujaṃ tadvadeva hi ।।

pravakṣye ahaṃ prakāreṇeti ga cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ratnajamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

haste tu vividhaṃ śailamiti ga cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
calamaṅgulamānena dvāragarbhakaraiḥ sthitam ।aṅgulād gṛhaliṅgaṃ syādyāvat pañcaśāṅgulaṃ ।।dvāramānāt trisaṅkhyākaṃ navadhā garbhamānataḥ ।navadhā garbhamānena liṅgandhāmni ca pūjayet ।।evaṃ liṅgāni ṣaṭtriṃśat jñeyāni jyeṣṭhamānataḥ ।madhyamānena ṣaṭtriṃśat ṣaṭtriṃśadadhamena ca ।।itthamaikyena liṅgānāṃ śatamaṣṭottaraṃ bhavet ।ekāṅgulādipañcāntaṃ kanyasañcalamucyate ।।ṣadvādidaśaparyantañcalaṃ liṅgañca madhyamaṃ ।ekādaśāṅgulādi syāt jyeṣṭhaṃ pañcadaśāntakam ।।ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ mahāratnai ratnair anyair navāṅgulam ।ravibhirhemabhārotthaṃ liṅgaṃ śeṣaistripañcabhiḥ ।।ṣoḍaśāṃśe ca vedāṃśe yugaṃ luptvordhvadeśataḥ ।dvātriṃśatṣoḍaśāṃśāṃś ca koṇayostu vilopayet ।।caturniveśanāt kaṇṭho viṃśatistriyugais tathā ।pārśvābhyāṃ tu viluptābhyāṃ calaliṅgaṃ bhavedvaraṃ ।।dhāmno yugartunāgāṃśair dvāraṃ hīnāditaḥ kramāt ।liṅgadvārocchrayādarvāg bhavet pādonataḥ kramāt ।।garbhārdhenādhamaṃ liṅgaṃ bhūtāṃśaiḥ syāt tribhirvaraṃ ।tayormadhye ca sūtrāṇi sapta sampātayet samaṃ ।।

vanamaṅgulamānena dvāragarbhakare sthitamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dvātriṃśatṣoḍaśārdhañceti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

viṃśatistriguṇaistatheti gha, cihnitapusutakapāṭhaḥ

vanaliṅgaṃ bhavedvaramiti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । calaliṅgaṃ bhaved dhruvamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
evaṃ syurnava sūtrāṇi bhūtasūtraiś ca madhyamaṃ ।dvyantaro vāmavāmañca liṅgānāṃ dīrghatā nava ।।hastādvivardhate hasto yāvatsyur nava pāṇayaḥ ।hīnamadhyottamaṃ liṅgaṃ trividhaṃ trividhātmakam ।।ekaikaliṅgamadhyeṣu trīṇi trīṇi ca pādaśaḥ ।liṅgāni ghaṭayeddhīmān ṣaṭsu cāṣṭottareṣu ca ।।sthiradīrghaprameyāttu dvāragarbhakarātmikā ।bhāgeśañcāpyamīśañca devejyantulyasaṃjñitaṃ ।।catvāri liṅgarūpāṇi viṣkambheṇa tu lakṣayet ।dīrghamāyānvitaṃ kṛtvā liṅgaṃ kuryāt trirūpakaṃ ।।caturaṣṭāṣṭavṛttañca tattvatrayaguṇātmakaṃ ।liṅgānāmīpsitaṃ dairghyaṃ tena kṛtvāṅgulāni vai ।।dhvajādyāyaiḥ surair bhūtaiḥ śikhibhirvā haret kṛtiṃ ।tānyaṅgulāni yaccheṣaṃ lakṣayecca śubhāśubhaṃ ।।dhvajādyā dhvajasiṃhebhavṛṣāḥ jyeṣṭhāḥ pare śubhāḥ ।svareṣu ṣaḍjagāndhārapañcamāḥ śubhadāyakāḥ ।।bhūteṣu ca śubhā bhūḥ syādagniṣvāhavanīyakaḥ ।uktāyāmasya cārdhāṃśe nāgāṃśair bhājite kramāt ।।rasabhūtāṃśaṣaṣṭhāṃśatryaṃśādhikaśarair bhavet ।āḍhyānāḍhyasurejyārkatulyānāñcaturasratā ।।pañcamaṃ vardhamānākhyaṃ vyāsānnāhapravṛddhitaḥ ।dvidhā bhedā bahūnyatra vakṣyante viśvakarmataḥ ।।āḍhyādīnāṃ tridhā sthaulyādyavadhūtaṃ tadaṣṭadhā ।

antare vāmavāme ceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sthaulyād yavavṛddhyā tadaṣṭadhā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tridhā hastājjinākhyañca yuktaṃ sarvasamena ca ।।pañcaviṃśatiliṅgāni nādye devārcite tathā ।pañcasaptabhirekatvājjinair bhaktair bhavanti hi ।।caturdaśasahasrāṇi caturdaśaśatāni ca ।evamaṣṭāṅgulavistāro navaikakaragarbhataḥ ।।teṣāṃ koṇārdhakoṇasthaiścintyāt koṇāni sūtrakaiḥ ।vistāraṃ madhyamaḥ kṛtvā sthāpyaṃ vā madhyatastrayaṃ ।।vibhāgādūrdhvamaṣṭāsro dvyaṣṭāsraḥsyācchivāṃśakaḥ ।pādājjānvantako brahmā nābhyanto viṣṇurityataḥ ।।mūrdhvānto bhūtabhāgeśo vyakte avyakte ca tadvati ।pañcaliṅgavyavasthāyāṃ śiro vartulamucyate ।।chatrābhaṃ kukkuṭābhaṃ vā bālendupratimākṛtiḥ ।ekaikasya caturbhedaiḥ kāmyabhedāt phalaṃ vade ।।liṅgamastakavistāraṃ vasubhaktantu kārayet ।ādyabhāgaṃ caturdhā tu vistārocchrāyato bhajet ।।catvāri tatra sūtrāṇi bhāgabhāgānupātanāt ।

pūjayet sarvameva ceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nāḍhye devārcita iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

evamaṣṭāṅgualavinyāsa iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chindyāt koṇānīti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । chindyāt koṣāṇi iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dvibhāgādūrdhavamaṣṭāsra iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bālendutrapuṣākṛtiriti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

caturbhāgair iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

antyabhāgamiti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

catvāri tatra chatrāṇi iti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakacatuṣṭyapāṭhaḥ
puṇḍarīkantu bhāgena viśālākhyaṃ vilopanāt ।।triśātanāttu śrīvatsaṃ śatrukṛdvedalopanāt ।śiraḥ sarvasame śreṣṭhaṃ kukkuṭābhaṃ surāhvaye ।।caturbhāgātmake liṅgetrapuṣaṃ dvayalopanāt ।anādyasya śiraḥ proktamardhacandraṃ śiraḥ śṛṇu ।।aṃśāt prānte yugāṃśaiś ca tvekāhānyāmṛtākṣakaṃ ।pūrṇabālendukumudaṃ dvitrivedakṣayāt kramāt ।।catustrirekavadanaṃ mukhaliṅgamataḥ śṛṇu ।pūjābhāgaṃ prakartavyaṃ mūrtyagnipadakalpitaṃ ।।arkāṃśaṃ pūrvavat tyaktvā ṣaṭ sthānāni vivartayat ।śironnatiḥ prakartavyā lalāṭaṃ nāsikā tataḥ ।।vadanaṃ civukaṃ grīvā yugabhāgair bhujākṣibhiḥ ।karābhyāṃ mukulīkṛtya pratimāyāḥ pramāṇataḥ ।।mukhaṃ prati samaḥ kāryo vistārādaṣṭamāṃśataḥ ।caturmukhaṃ mayā proktaṃ trimukhañcocyate śṛṇu ।।karṇapādādhikāstasya lalāṭādīni nirdiśet ।bhujau caturbhirbhāgaistu kartavyau paścimorjitaṃ ।।vistarādaṣṭamāṃśena mukhānāṃ pratinirgamaḥ ।ekavaktraṃ tathā kāryaṃ pūrvasyāṃ saumyalocanaṃ ।।lalāṭanāsikāvaktragrīvāyāñca vivartayet ।

kukkuṭāṇḍaṃ sudhādvaye iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dvaikahānyā sutāhvayamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ṛtvagnipadakalpitamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ, mukhabhāgaṃ prakartavyaṃ mūlāgnipadakalpitamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

karṇābhyāṃ kuṇḍalīkṛtveti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bhujācca pañcamāṃśena bhujahīnaṃ vivartayet ।।vistārasya ṣaḍaṃśena mukhair nirgamanaṃ hitaṃ ।sarveṣāṃ mukhaliṅgānāṃ trapuṣaṃ vātha kukkuṭaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye vyaktāvyaktalakṣaṇaṃ nāma catuḥpañcāśattamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcapañcāśattamo adhyāyaḥ

piṇḍikālakṣaṇakathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
ataḥ paraṃpravakṣyāmi pratimānāntu piṇḍikām ।dairghyeṇa pratimātulyā tadardhena tu vistṛtā ।।ucchritāyāmatordhena suvistārārdhabhāgataḥ ।tṛtīyena tu vā tulyaṃ tattribhāgeṇa mekhalā ।।khātaṃ ca tatpramāṇaṃ tu kiñciduttarato natam ।vistārasya caturthena praṇālasya vinirgamaḥ ।।samūlasya vistāramagre kuryāttadardhataḥ ।vistārasya tṛtīyena toyamārgantu kārayet ।।piṇḍikārdhena vā tulyaṃ dairghyamīśasya kīrtitam ।īśaṃ vā tulyadīrghañca jñātvā sūtraṃ prakalpayet ।।

bhujārdhapañcamāṃśeneti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tribhāgena tu bāhulyamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

piṇḍikārdhena bāhulyamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dairghyaṃ kuśasyeti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kuśambāhulyadīrghañceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ucchrāyaṃ pūrvavat kuryādbhāgaṣoḍaśasaṅkhyayā ।adhaḥ ṣaṭkaṃ dvibhāgantu kaṇṭhaṃ kuryāttribhāgakam ।।śeṣāstvekaikaśaḥ kāryāḥ pratiṣṭhānirgamās tathā ।paṭṭikā piṇḍikā ceyaṃ sāmānyapratimāsu ca ।।prāsādadvāramānena pratimādvāramucyate ।gajavyālakasaṃyuktā prabhā syāt pratimāsu ca ।।piṇḍikāpi yathāśobhaṃ kartavyā satataṃ hareḥ ।sarveṣāmeva devānāṃ śiṣṇūktaṃ mānamucyate ।devīnāmapi sarvāsāṃ lakṣmyuktaṃ mānamucyate ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye piṇḍikālakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭpañcāśattamo adhyāyaḥ

dikpālayāgakathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
pratiṣṭhāpañcakaṃ vakṣye pratimātmā tu pūruṣaḥ ।prakṛtiḥ piṇḍikā lakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhā yogakastayoḥ ।।icchāphalārthibhistasmātpratiṣṭhā kriyate naraiḥ ।garbhasūtraṃ tu niḥsārya prāsādasyāgrato guruḥ ।।aṣṭaṣoḍaśaviṃśāntaṃ maṇḍapañcādhamādikam ।snānaṃ kalaśārthañca yāgadravyārthamardhataḥ ।।tribhāgeṇārdhabhāgena vediṃ kuryāttu śobhanām ।

pratimādravyamucyate iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

garbhasūtrantu nirmāyeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kalaśair ghaṭikābhiś ca vitānādyaiś ca bhūṣayet ।।pañcagavyena samprokṣya sarvadravyāṇi dhārayet ।alaṅkṛto gururviṣṇuṃ dhyātvātmānaṃ prapūjayet ।।aṅgulīyaprabhṛtibhirmūrtipān valayādibhiḥ ।kuṇḍe kuṇḍe sthāpayecca mūrtipāṃstatra pāragān ।।catuṣkoṇe cārdhakoṇe vartule padmasannibhe ।pūrvādau toraṇārthantu pippaloḍumbarau vaṭaṃ ।।plakṣaṃ suśobhanaṃ pūrvaṃ subhadrandakṣatoraṇaṃ ।sukarma ca suhotrañca āpye saumye samucchrayam ।।pañcahastaṃ tu saṃsthāpya syonāpṛthvīti pūjayet ।toraṇastambhamūle tu kalaśānmaṅgalāṅkurān ।।pradadyādupariṣṭācca kuryāccakraṃ sudarśanaṃ ।pañcahastapramāṇantu dhvajaṃ kuryāddvicakṣaṇaḥ ।।vaipulyaṃ cāsya kurvīta ṣoḍaśāṅgulasanmitaṃ ।saptahastocchritaṃ vāsya kuryāt kuṇḍaṃ surottama ।।aruṇogninibhaś caiva kṛṣṇaḥ śuklotha pītakaḥ ।raktavarṇas tathā śvetaḥ śvetavarṇādikakramāt ।।kumudaḥ kumudākṣaś ca puṇḍarīkotha vāmanaḥ ।śaṅkukarṇaḥ sarvanetraḥ sumukhaḥ supratiṣṭhitaḥ ।।pūjyā koṭiguṇair yuktāḥ pūrvādyā dhvajadevatāḥ ।jalāḍhakasupūrāstu pakvavimbopamā ghaṭāḥ ।।

samāhita iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śvetavarnakramāt dhvajā iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
kṛṣṇavarṇaḥ kramāddhvajā iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
aṣṭāviṃśādhikaśataṃ kālamaṇḍanavarjitāḥ ।sahiraṇyā vastrakaṇṭhāḥ sodakāstoraṇādvahiḥ ।।ghaṭāḥ sthāpyāś ca pūrvādau vedikāyāś ca koṇagān ।caturaḥ sthāpayet kumbhānājighreti ca mantrataḥ ।।kumbheṣvāvāhya śakrādīn pūrvādau pūjayet kramāt ।indrāgaccha devarāja vajrahasta gajasthita ।।pūrvadvārañca me rakṣa devaiḥ saha namostu te ।trātāramindramantreṇa arcayitvā yajed budhaḥ ।।āgacchāgre śaktiyuta cchāgastha balasaṃyuta ।rakṣāgneyīṃ diśaṃ devaiḥ pūjāṃ gṛha namostu te ।।agnimūrdhetimantreṇa yajedvā āgneya namaḥ ।mahiṣastha yamāgaccha daṇḍahasta mahābala ।।rakṣa tvaṃ dakṣiṇadvāraṃ vaivasvata namostu te ।vaivasvataṃ saṅgamanamityanena yajedyamaṃ ।।nairṛtāgaccha khaḍgāḍhya balavāhanasaṃyuta ।idamarghyamidaṃ pādyaṃ rakṣa tvaṃ nairṛtīṃ diśaṃ ।।eṣa te nairṛte mantreṇa yajedarghyādibhir naraḥ ।makarārūḍha varuṇa pāśahasta mahābala ।।āgaccha paścimaṃ dvāraṃ rakṣa rakṣa namostu te ।uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaṃ yajedarghyādibhirguruḥ ।।āgaccha vāyo sabala dhvajahasta savāhana ।vāyavyaṃ rakṣa devaistvaṃ samarudbhir namostu te ।।

śaktihasta iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

agnimūrdhveti arghyādyair iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

naravāhanasaṃyuta iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vāta ity ādibhiścārvedonnamo vāyavepi vā ।āgaccha soma sabalā gadāhasta savāhana ।।rakṣa tvamuttaradvāraṃ sakuvera namostu te ।somaṃ rājānamiti vā yajetsomāya vai namaḥ ।।āgaccheśāna sabala śūlahasta vṛṣasthita ।yajñamaṇḍapasyaiśānīṃ diśaṃ rakṣa namostu te ।।īśānamasyeti yajedīśānāya namopi vā ।brahmannāgaccha haṃsastha sruksruvavyagrahastaka ।।salokordhvāṃ diśaṃ rakṣa yajñasyāja namostu te ।hiraṇyagarbheti yajennamaste brahmaṇepi vā ।।anantāgaccha cakrāḍhya kūrmasthāhigaṇeśvara ।adhodiśaṃ rakṣa rakṣa ananteśa namostu te ।namostu sarpeti yajedanantāya namopi vā ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye dikpatiyāgo nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptapañcāśodhyāyaḥ

kumbhādhivāsavidhiḥ

bhagavānuvāca
bhūmeḥ parigrahaṃ kuryāt kṣipedbrīhīṃś ca sarṣapān ।nārasiṃhena rakṣoghnān prokṣoghnān prokṣayet pañcagavyataḥ ।।bhūmiṃ ghaṭe tu sampūjya saratne sāṅgakaṃ hariṃ ।astramantreṇa karakaṃ tatra cāṣṭaśataṃ yajet ।।acchinnadhārayā siñcan brīhīn saṃskṛtya dhārayet ।

astramantreṇa kavacamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pradakṣiṇaṃ paribhrāmya kalaśaṃ vikiropari ।।savastre kalaśe bhūyaḥ pūjayedacyutaṃ śriyaṃ ।yoge yogeti mantreṇa nyasecchayyāntu maṇḍale ।।kuśopari tūlikāñca śayyāyāṃ digvidikṣu ca ।vidyādhipān yajedviṣṇuṃ madhughātaṃ trivikramaṃ ।।vāmanaṃ dikṣu vāyvādau śrīdharañca hṛṣīkapaṃ ।padmanābhaṃ dāmodaramaiśānyāṃ snānamaṇḍape ।।abhyarcya paścādaiśānyāṃ catuṣkumbhe savedike ।snānamaṇḍaṣake sarvadravyāṇyānīya nikṣipet ।।snānakumbheṣu kumbhāṃstāṃś caturdikṣvadhivāsayet ।kalaśāḥ sthāpanīyāstu abhiṣekārthamādarāt ।।vaṭodumbarakāśvatthāṃś campakāśokaśrīdrumān ।palāśārjunaplakṣāṃstu kadambavakulāmrakān ।।pallavāṃstu samānīya pūrvakumbhe vinikṣipet ।padmakaṃ rocanāṃ dūrvāṃ darbhapiñjalameva ca ।।jātīpuṣpaṃ kundapuṣpacandanaṃ raktacandanaṃ ।siddhārthaṃ tagarañcaiva taṇḍulaṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset ।।savarṇaṃ rajatañcaiva kūladvayamṛdantathā ।nadyāḥ samudragāminyā viśeṣāt jāhnavīmṛdaṃ ।।gomayañca yavān śālīṃstilāṃś caivāpare nyaset ।viṣṇuparṇīṃ śyāmalatāṃ bhṛṅgarājaṃ śatāvarīṃ ।।

dikṣu vahnyādāviti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

catustambhe iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

padmakāśokaśrīdrumāniti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

parṇakumbha iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sahadevāṃ mahādevīṃ balāṃ vyaghrīṃ salakṣmaṇāṃ ।aiśānyāmapare kumbhe maṅgalyānviniveśayet ।।valmīkamṛttikāṃ saptasthānotthāmapare nyaset ।jāhnavīvālukātoyaṃ vinyasedapare ghaṭe ।।varāhavṛṣanāgendraviṣāṇoddhṛtamṛttikāṃ ।mṛttikāṃ padmamūlasya kuśasya tvapare nyaset ।।tīrthaparvatamṛdbhiś ca yuktamapyapare nyaset ।nāgakeśarapuṣpañca kāśmīramapare nyaset ।।candanāgurukarpūraiḥ puṣpaṃ caivāpare nyaset ।vaidūryaṃ vidrumaṃ muktāṃ sphaṭikaṃ vajrameva ca ।।etānyekatra nikṣipya sthāpayeddevasattama ।nadīnadataḍāgānāṃ salilair aparaṃ nyaset ।।ekāśītipade cānyānmaṇḍape kalaśān nyaset ।gandhodakādyaiḥ sampūrṇān śrīsūktenābhimantrayet ।।yavaṃ siddhārthakaṃ gandhaṃ kuśāgraṃ cākṣataṃ tathā ।tilān phalaṃ tathā puṣpamarghyārthaṃ pūrvato nyaset ।।padmaṃ śyāmalatāṃ dūrvāṃ viṣṇuparṇīṃ kuśāṃstathā ।pādyārthaṃ dakṣiṇe bhāge madhuparkaṃ tu dakṣiṇe ।।kakkolakaṃ lavaṅgañca tathā jātīphalaṃ śubhaṃ ।uttare hy ācamanāya agnau dūrvākṣatānvitaṃ ।।pātraṃ nīrājanārthaṃ ca tathodvartanamānile ।gandhapuṣpānvitaṃ pātramaiśānyāṃ pātrake nyaset ।।

sahadevāṃ siṃhapucchīmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । sahadevāṃ javāṃ siṃhīmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

madhuparkantu paścime iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
murāmāṃsī cāmalakaṃ sahadevāṃ niśādikaṃ ।ṣaṣṭidīpānnyasedaṣṭau nyasennīrājanāya ca ।।śaṅkhaṃ cakrañca śrīvatsaṃ kuliśaṃ paṅkajādikaṃ ।hemādipātre kṛtvā tu nānāvarṇādipuṣpakaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye kalaśādhivāso nāma saptapañcāśattamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha aṣṭapañcāśattamo adhyāyaḥ

snānādividhiḥ

bhagavānuvāca
aiśānyāṃ janayet kuṇḍaṃ gururvahniñca vaiṣṇavaṃ ।gāyatryaṣṭaśataṃ hutvā sampātavidhinā ghaṭān ।।prokṣayet kāruśālāyāṃ śilpibhirmūrtipair vrajet ।tūryaśabdaiḥ kautukañca bandhayeddakṣiṇe kare ।।viṣṇave śipiviṣṭeti ūrṇāsūtreṇa sarṣapaiḥ ।paṭṭavastreṇa kartavyaṃ deśikasyāpi kautukaṃ ।।maṇḍape pratimāṃ sthāpya savastrāṃ pūjitān stuvan ।namastercye sureśāni praṇīte viśvakarmaṇā ।।prabhāvitāśeṣajagaddhātri tubhyaṃ namo namaḥ ।tvayi sampūjayāmīśe nārāyaṇamanāmayaṃ ।।rahitā śilpidoṣaistvamṛddhiyuktā sadā bhava ।evaṃ vijñāpya pratimāṃ nayettāṃ snānamaṇḍapaṃ ।।śilpinantoṣayeddravyair gurave gāṃ pradāpayet ।citraṃ deveti mantreṇa netre conmīlayettataḥ ।।

maṇḍale iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
agnirjyotīti dṛṣṭiñca dadyādvai bhadrapīṭhake ।tataḥ śuklāni puṣpāṇi ghṛtaṃ siddhārthakaṃ tathā ।।dūrvāṃ kuśāgraṃ devasya dadyācchirasi deśikaḥ ।madhuvāteti mantreṇa netre cābhyañjayedguruḥ ।।hiraṇyagarbhamantreṇa imaṃ meti ca kīrtayet ।ghṛtenābhyañjayet paścāt paṭhan ghṛtavatīṃ punaḥ ।।masūrapiṣṭe nodvartya ato deveti kīrtayan ।kṣālayeduṣṇatoyena sapta te agreti deśikaḥ ।।drupadādivetyanulimpedāpo hi ṣṭheti secayet ।nadījaistīrthajaiḥ snānaṃ pāvamānīti ratnajaiḥ ।।samudraṃ gaccha candanaistīrthamṛtkalaśena ca ।śanno devīḥ snāpayecca gāyatryāpyuṣṇavāriṇā ।।pañcamṛddhirhiraṇyeti snāpayetparameśvaraṃ ।sikatādbhirirmaṃ meti valmīkodaghaṭena ca ।।tadviṣṇoriti oṣadhyadbhiryā oṣadhīti mantrataḥ ।yajñāyajñeti kāṣāyaiḥ pañcabhirgavyakaistataḥ ।।payaḥ pṛthivyāṃ mantreṇa yāḥ phalinī phalāmbubhiḥ ।viśvataś cakṣuḥ saumyena pūrveṇa kalasena ca ।।somaṃ rājānamityevaṃ viṣṇo rarāṭaṃ dakṣataḥ ।haṃsaḥ śuciḥ paścimena kuryādudvartanaṃ hareḥ ।।mūrdhānandivamantreṇa dhātrīṃ māṃsīṃ ca ke dadet ।mānastoketi mantreṇa gandhadvāreti gandhakaiḥ ।।

mayūrapicchenodvartya iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gāyatryā gandhavāriṇā iti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

dhātrīmāṃsyudakena ceti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
idamāpeti ca ghaṭair etāśītipadasthitaiḥ ।ehyehi bhagavan viṣṇo lokānugrāhakāraka ।।yajñabhāgaṃ gṛhāṇemaṃ vāsudeva namostu te ।anenāvāhya deveśaṃ kuryāt kautukamocanaṃ ।।muñcāmi tveti sūktena deśikasyāpi mocayet ।hiraṇmayena pādyaṃ dadyādato deveti cārghyakaṃ ।।madhuvātā madhuparkaṃ mayi gṛhṇāmi cācamet ।akṣannamīmadanteti kireddarvākṣataṃ budhaḥ ।।kāṇḍānnirmañchanaṃ kuryādgandhaṃ gandhavatīti ca ।unnayāmīti mālyañca idaṃ viṣṇuḥ pavitrakaṃ ।।vṛhaspate vastrayugmaṃ vedāhamityuttarīyakaṃ ।mahāvratena sakalīpuṣpaṃ cauṣadhayaḥ kṣipet ।।dhūpaṃ dadyāddhūrasīti vibhrāṭsūktena cāñjanaṃ ।yuñjantīti ca tilakaṃ dīrghāyuṣṭveti mālyakaṃ ।।indracchatreti chatrantu ādarśantu virājataḥ ।cāmarantu vikarṇena bhūṣāṃ rathantareṇa ca ।।vyajanaṃ vāyudaivatyair muñcāmi tveti puṣpakaṃ ।vedādyaiḥ saṃstutiṃ kuryāddhareḥ puruṣasūktataḥ ।।sarvametatsamaṃ kuryāt piṇḍikādau harādike ।devasyotthānasamaye sauparṇaṃ sūktamuccaret ।।uttiṣṭheti samutthāpya śayyāyā maṇḍape nayet ।śākunenaiva sūktena devaṃ brahmarathādinā ।।ato deveti sūktena prātimāṃ piṇḍikāṃ tathā ।śrīsūktena ca śayyāyāṃ viṣṇostu śakalīkṛtiḥ ।।

tattvāyāmīti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
mṛgarājaṃ vṛṣaṃ nāgaṃ vyajanaṃ kalaśaṃ tathā ।vaijayantīṃ tathā bherīṃ dīpamityaṣṭamaṅgalaṃ ।।darśayedaśvasūktena pādadeśe tripāditi ।ukhāṃ pidhānakaṃ pātramambikāṃ darvikāṃ dadet ।।muṣalolūkhalaṃ dadyācchilāṃ sammārjanīṃ tathā ।tathā bhojanabhāṇḍāni gṛhopakāraṇāni ca ।।śirodeśe ca nidrākhyaṃ vastraratnayutaṃ ghaṭaṃ ।khaṇḍakhādyaiḥ pūrayitvā snapanasya vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye snapanādividhānaṃ nāma aṣṭapañcāśo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

adhivāsanakathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
hareḥ sānnidhyakaraṇamadhivāsanamucyate ।sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ dhyātvā ātmānaṃ puruṣottamaṃ ।।oṃkāreṇa samāyojya cicchaktimabhimāninīṃ ।niḥsāryātmaikatāṃ kṛtvā svasmin sarvagate vibhau ।।yojayenmarutāṃ pṛthvīṃ vahnivījena dīpayet ।saṃharedvāyunā cāgniṃ vāyumākāśato nayet ।।

matiśālinīmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kṛtvā puṃsīti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
adhibhūtādidevaistu sādhyākhyair vibhavaiḥ saha ।tanmātrapātrakān kṛtvā saṃharettat kramād budhaḥ ।।ākāśaṃ manasāhatya manohaṅkaraṇe kuru ।ahaṅkārañca mahati tañcāpyavyākṛte nayet ।।avyākṛtaṃ jñānarūpe vāsudevaḥ sa īritaḥ ।sa tāmavyākṛtiṃ māyāmabhyaṣṭa sisṛkṣayā ।।saṅkarṣaṇaṃ saṃ śabdātmā sparśākhyamasṛjat prabhuḥ ।kṣobhya māyāṃ sa pradyumnaṃ tejorūpaṃ sa cāsṛjat ।।aniruddhaṃ rasamātraṃ brahmāṇaṃ gandharūpakaṃ ।aniruddhaḥ sa ca brahmā apa ādau sasarja ha ।।tasmin hiraṇmayañcāṇḍaṃ so asṛjat pañcabhūtavat ।tasmin saṅkrāmite jīve śaktirātmopasaṃhṛtā ।।prāṇo jīvena saṃyukto vṛttimāniti śabdyate ।jīvovyāhṛtisañjñastu prāṇeṣvādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।prāṇair yuktā tato buddhiḥ sañjātā cāṣṭamūrtikī ।ahaṅkārastato jajñe manastasmādajāyata ।।arthāḥ prajajñire pañca saṅkalpādiyutāstataḥ ।śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpañca raso gandha iti smṛtā ।।jñānaśaktiyutānyetair ārabdhānīndriyāṇi tu ।

sādhyārthair vibhavair iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sādhyādyair vibhavair iti ṅa, cihinitapustakapāṭhaḥ

manasāhṛtya mano ahaṅkaraṇe kṣare iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vāsudeve samāhita iti ṅa, iti cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

saṅkramate jīva iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

cāṣṭavṛttikīti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tvakśrotraghrāṇacakṣūṃṣi jihvābuddhīndriyāṇi tu ।।pādau pāyuḥs tathā pāṇī vāgupasthaś ca pañcamaḥ ।karmendriyāṇi caitāni pañcabhūtānyataḥ śṛṇu ।।ākāśavāyutejāṃsi salilaṃ pṛthivī tathā ।sthūlamebhiḥ śarīrantu sarvādhāraṃ prajāyate ।।eteṣāṃ vācakā mantrā nyāsāyocyanta uttamāḥ ।jīvabhūtaṃ makārantu devasya vyāpakaṃ nyaset ।।prāṇatattvaṃ bhakārantu jīvopādhigataṃ nyaset ।hṛdayasthaṃ bakārantu buddhitattvaṃ nyased budhaḥ ।।phakāramapi tatraiva ahaṅkāramayaṃ nyaset ।manastattvaṃ pakārantu nyasetsaṅkalpasambhavaṃ ।।śabdatanmātratattvantu nakāraṃ mastake nyaset ।sparśātmakaṃ dhakārantu vaktradeśe tu vinyaset ।।dakāraṃ rūpatattvantu hṛddeśe viniveśayet ।thakāraṃ vastideśe tu rasatanmātrakaṃ nyaset ।।takāraṃ gandhatanmātraṃ jaṅghayorviniveśayet ।ṇakāraṃ śrotrayor nyasya ḍhakāraṃ vinyasettvaci ।।ḍakāraṃ netrayugme tu rasanāyāṃ ṭhakārakaṃ ।ṭakāraṃ nāsikāyāntu ñakāraṃ vāci vinyaset ।।jhakāraṃ karayor nyasya pāṇitattvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ ।jakāraṃ padayor nyasya chaṃ pāyau camupasthake ।।vinyaset pṛthivītattvaṃ ṅakāraṃ pādayugmake ।vastau ghakāraṃ gaṃ tattvaṃ taijasaṃ hṛdi vinyaset ।।

makārantaddehasyeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

viniyojayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
khakāraṃ vāyutattvañca nāsikāyāṃ niveśayet ।kakāraṃ vinyasennityaṃ khatattvaṃ mastake budhaḥ ।।hṛtpuṇḍarīke vinyasya yakāraṃ sūryadaivataṃ ।dvāsaptatisahasrāṇi hṛdayādabhiniḥsṛtāḥ ।।kalāṣoḍaśasaṃyuktaṃ makāraṃ tatra vinyaset ।tanmadhye cintayenmantrī vinduṃ vahnestu maṇḍalaṃ ।।hakāraṃ vinyasettatra praṇavena surottamaḥ ।oṃ āṃ parameṣṭhyātmane āṃ namaḥ puruṣātmane ।।oṃ vāṃ manonivṛttyātmane nāñca viśvātmane namaḥ ।oṃ vaṃ namaḥ sarvātmane ity uktāḥ pañca śaktayaḥ ।।sthāne tu prathamā yojyā dvitīyā āsane matā ।tṛtīyā śayane tadvaccaturthī pānakarmaṇi ।।pratyarcāyāṃ pañcamī syātpañcopaniṣadaḥ smṛtāḥ ।hūṅkāraṃ vinyasenmadhye dhyātvā mantramayaṃ hariṃ ।।yāṃ mūrtiṃ sthāpayettasmāt mūlamantraṃ nyasettataḥ ।oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya mūlakaṃ ।।śiroghrāṇalalāṭeṣu mukhakaṇṭhahṛdi kramāt ।bhujayorjaṅghayoraṅghyroḥ keśavaṃ śirasi nyaset ।।nārāyaṇaṃ nyasedvaktre grīvāyāṃ mādhavaṃ nyaset ।

krūṃkāramiti ṅa, cihnitaopustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ ṣaṃ parameṣṭyātmane yannamaḥ puruṣātmane । laṃ namo viśvātmane namaḥ ।। naṃ namaḥ sarvātmane ity uktāḥ pañcaśaktayaḥ iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dānakarmaṇi iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

abhyarcāyāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kṣakāramiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yā mūrtiḥ sthāpyate tasyāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
govindaṃ bhujayornyasya viṣṇuṃ ca hṛdaye nyaset ।।madhusūdanakaṃ pṛṣṭhe vāmanaṃ jaṭhare nyaset ।kakṣyāntrivikramaṃ nyasya jaṅghāyāṃ śrīdharaṃ nyaset ।।hṛṣīkeśaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ padmanābhaṃ tu gulphake ।dāmodaraṃ pādayoś ca hṛdayādiṣaḍaṅgakaṃ ।।etat sādhāraṇaṃ proktamādirmūrtestu sattama ।athavā yasya devasya prārabdhaṃ sthāpanaṃ bhavet ।।tasyaiva mūlamantreṇa sajīvakaraṇaṃ bhavet ।yasyā mūrtestu yannāma tasyādyaṃ cākṣaraṃ ca yat ।।tat svairair dvādaśair bhedya hy aṅgāni parikalpayet ।hṛdayādīni deveśa mūlañca daśamākṣaraṃ ।।yathā deve tathā dehe tattvāni viniyojayet ।cakrābjamaṇdale viṣṇuṃ yajedgandhādinā tathā ।।pūrvavaccāsanaṃ dhyāyetsagātraṃ saparicchadaṃ ।śubhañcakraṃ dvādaśāraṃ hy upariṣṭādvicintayet ।।trinābhicakraṃ dvinemi svaraistacca samanvitaṃ ।pṛṣṭhadeśe tataḥ prājñaḥ prakṛtyādīnniveśayet ।।pūjayedārakāgreṣu sūryaṃ dvādaśadhā punaḥ ।

yathā tattve tathā dehe iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yajed gandhādinā tata iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । yajedāhutibhis tathā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dhyāyet tanmātramiti ga, cihhnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । dhyāyet samātramiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pūjayed dvādaśāgreṣu iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । pūjayed dvādaśāreṣu iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kalāṣoḍaśasaṃyuktaṃ somantatra vicintayet ।।sabalaṃ tritayaṃ nābhau cintayeddeśikottamaḥ ।padmañca dvādaśadalaṃ padmamadhye vicintayet ।।tanmadhye pauruṣīṃ śaktiṃ dhyātvābhyarcya ca diśikaḥ ।pratimāyāṃ hariṃ nyasya tatra taṃ pūjayet surān ।।gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ samyak sāṅgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ kramāt ।dvādaśākṣaravījaistu keśavādīn samarcayet ।।dvādaśāre maṇḍale tu laukapālādikaṃ kramāt ।pratimāmarcayet paścādgandhapuṣpādibhirdvijaḥ ।।pauruṣeṇa tu sūktena śriyāḥ sūktena piṇḍikāṃ ।jananādikramāt paścājjanayedvaiṣṇavānalaṃ ।।hutvāgniṃ hutamiti kuṇḍegniṃ praṇayedbudhaḥ ।agnipraṇayane mantrastvamagne hy agnirucyate ।।dakṣiṇegniṃ hutamiti kuṇḍegniṃ praṇayedbudhaḥ ।agnimagnīti pūrve tu kuṇḍegniṃ praṇayedbudhaḥ ।।uttare praṇayedagnimagnimagnī havāmahe ।agnipraṇayane mantrastvamagne hy agnirucyate ।।palāśasamidhānāntu aṣṭottarasahasrakaṃ ।kuṇḍe kuṇḍe homayecca vrīhīn vedādikais tathā ।।sājyāṃstilān vyāhṛtibhirmūlamantreṇa vai ghṛtaṃ ।kuryāttataḥ śāntihomaṃ madhuratritayena ca ।।dvādaśārṇaiḥ spṛśet pādau nābhiṃ hṛn mastakaṃ tataḥ ।ghṛtaṃ dadhi payo hutvā spṛśenmūrdhanyatho tataḥ ।।

dhyātvā paścāttu deśika iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tatra tān pūjayet surāmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
spṛṣṭvā śironābhipādāṃś catasraḥ sthāpayennadīḥ ।gaṅgā ca yamunā godā kramānnāmnā sarasvatī ।।dahettu viṣṇugāyatryā gāyatryā śrapayeccaruṃ ।homayecca baliṃ dadyāduttare bhojayeddvijān ।।sāmādhipānāṃ tuṣṭyarthaṃ hemagāṃ gurave dadet ।dikpatibhyo baliṃ dattvā rātrau kuryācca jāgaraṃ ।brahmagītādiśabdena sarvabhāgadhivāsanāt ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye adhivāsanaṃ nāma ūnaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṣṭitamodhyāyaḥ

vāsudevapratiṣṭhādividhiḥ

bhagavānuvāca
piṇḍikāsthāpanārthantu garbhāgāraṃ tu saptadhā ।vibhajed brahmabhāge tu pratimāṃ sthāpayed budhaḥ ।।devamanuṣapaiśācabhāgeṣu na kadācana ।brahmabhāgaṃ parityajya kiñcidāśritya cāṇḍaja ।।devamānuṣabhāgābhyāṃ sthāpyā yatnāttu piṇḍikā ।napuṃsakakaśilāyāntu ratnanyāsaṃ samācaret ।।nārasiṃhena hutvā ratnanyāsaṃ ca tena vai ।

catasraḥ sthāpayecca gā iti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapaṭhaḥ

ghoṣayecca tato makhe iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sthāpayedāśu piṇḍikāmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

varṇanyāsamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vrīhīn ratnāṃstridhātūṃś ca lohādīṃś candanādikān ।।pūrvādinavagarteṣu nyasen madhye yathāruci ।atha cendrādimantraiś ca garto guggulunāvṛtaḥ ।।ratnanyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā pratimāmālabhedguruḥ ।saśalākair darbhapuñjaiś ca sahadevaiḥ samanvitaiḥ ।।savāhyantaiś ca saṃskṛtya pañcagavyena śodhayet ।prokṣayeddarbhatoyena nadītīrthodakena ca ।।homārthe khaṇḍilaṃ kuryāt sikatābhiḥ samantataḥ ।sārdhahastapramāṇaṃ tu caturasraṃ suśobhanaṃ ।।aṣṭadikṣu yathānyāsaṃ kalaśānapi vinyaset ।pūrvādyānaṣṭavarṇena agnimānīya saṃskṛtaṃ ।।tvamagnedyubhiriti gāyatryā samidho hunet ।aṣṭārṇenāṣṭaśatakaṃ ājyaṃ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet ।।śāntyudakaṃ āmrapatraiḥ mūlena śatamantritaṃ ।siñceddevasya tanmūrdhni śrīś ca te hy anayā ṛcā ।।brahmayānena coddhṛtya uttiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate ।tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa prāsādābhimukhaṃ nayet ।।śivikāyāṃ hariṃ sthāpya bhrāmayīta purādikaṃ ।gītavedādiśabdaiś ca prāsādadvāri dhārayet ।।

prokṣayed gandhatoyeneti kha, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

aṣṭāntenāṣṭaśatakamiti kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

śāntyudakamājyapātrair iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

brahmapātreṇeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gītavādyādiśabdaiś ca iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
strībhirviprair maṅgalāṣṭaghaṭaiḥ saṃsnāpayeddhariṃ ।tato gandhādinābhyarcya mūlamantreṇa deśikaḥ ।।ato deveti vastrādyamaṣṭāṅgārghyaṃ nivedya ca ।sthire lagne piṇḍikāyāṃ devasya tveti dhārayet ।।oṃ trailokyavikrāntāya namastestu trivikrama ।saṃsthyāpya piṇḍikāyāntu sthiraṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ ।।dhruvā dyauriti mantreṇa viśvataś cakṣurityapi ।pañcagavyena saṃsnāpya kṣālya gandhadakena ca ।।pūjayet sakalīkṛtya sāṅgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ hariṃ ।dhyāyet svaṃ tasya mūrtintu pṛthivī tasya pīṭhikā ।।kalpayedvigrahaṃ tasya taijasaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ।jīvamāvāhayiṣyāmi pañcaviṃśatitattvagaṃ ।।caitanyaṃ paramānandaṃ jāgratsvapnavivarjitaṃ ।dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitaṃ ।।brahmādistambaparyantaṃ hṛdayeṣu vyavasthitaṃ ।hṛdayāt pratimāvimbe sthiro bhava pareśvara ।।sajīvaṃ kuru bimbaṃ tvaṃ savāhyābhyantarasthitaḥ ।aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo dehopādhiṣu saṃsthitaḥ ।।jyotirjñānaṃ paraṃ brahma ekamevādvitīyakaṃ ।sajīvīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇavena nibodhayet ।।sānnidhyakaraṇannāma hṛdayaṃ spṛśya vai japet ।sūktantu pauruṣaṃ dhyāyan idaṃ guhyamanuṃ japet ।।namastestu sureśāya santoṣavibhavātmane ।

maṅgalāṣṭaghaṭe iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
jñānavijñānarūpāya brahmatejonuyāyine ।।guṇātikrāntaveśāya puruṣāya mahātmane ।akṣayāya purāṇāya viṣṇo sannihito bhava ।।yacca te paramaṃ tattvaṃ yacca jñānamayaṃ vapuḥ ।tat sarvamekato līnamasmindehe vibudhyatāṃ ।।ātmānaṃ sannidhīkṛtya brahmādiparivārakān ।svanāmnā sthāpayedanyānāyudhān svamudrayā ।।yātrāvarṣādikaṃ dṛṣṭvā jñeyaḥ sannihito hariḥ ।natvā stutvā stavādyaiś ca japtvā cāṣṭākṣarādikaṃ ।।caṇḍapracaṇḍau dvārasthau nirgatyābhyarcayedguruḥ ।agnimaṇḍapamāsādya garuḍaṃ sthāpya pūjayet ।।digīśān diśi devāṃś ca sthāpya sampūjya deśikaḥ ।viśvaksenaṃ tu saṃsthāpya śaṅkhacakrādi pūjayet ।।sarvapārṣadakebhyaś ca baliṃ bhūtebhya arcayet ।paramavastrasuvarṇādi gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadet ।।yāgopayogidravyādyamācāryāya narorpayet ।ācāryadakṣiṇārdhantu ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadet ।।anyebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadyādbhojayed brāhmaṇāṃstataḥ ।avāritān phalān dadyādyajamānāya vai guruḥ ।।viṣṇuṃ nayet pratiṣṭhātā cātmanā sakalaṃ kulaṃ ।

guṇātikrāntarūpāya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yacca te paramaṃ guhyamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yātrāvarṣādikaṃ kṛtveti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

avāritaphalamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pratiṣṭhākṛditi kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakacatuṣṭayapāṭhaḥ
sarveṣāmeva devānāmeṣa sādhāraṇo vidhiḥ ।
mūlamantrāḥ pṛthakteṣāṃ śeṣaṃ kāryaṃ samānakaṃ ।।

e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye vāsudevapratiṣṭhādikathanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ekaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

dvārapratiṣṭhādhvajārohāṇādividhiḥ

bhagavānuvāca
vakṣe cāvabhṛtasnānaṃ viṣṇor natveti homayet ।ekāśītipade kumbhān sthāpya saṃsthāpayeddhariṃ ।।pūjayed gandhapuṣpādyair baliṃ datvā guruṃ yajet ।dvārapratiṣṭhāṃ vakṣyāmi dvārādho hema vai dadet ।।aṣṭabhiḥ kalaśaiḥ sthāpya śākhodumbarakau guruḥ ।gandhādibhiḥ samabhyarcya mantrair vedādibhirguruḥ ।।kuṇḍeṣu homayedvahniṃ samillājatilādibhiḥ ।datvā śayyādikañcādho dadyādādhāraśaktikāṃ ।।śākhayorvinyasenmūle devau caṇḍapracaṇdakau ।ūrdhvodumbarake devīṃ lakṣmīṃ suragaṇārcitāṃ ।।nyasyābhyarcya yathānyāyaṃ śrīsūktena caturmukhaṃ ।datvā tu śrīphalādīni ācāryādestu dakṣiṇāṃ ।।pratiṣṭhāsiddhadvārasya tvācāryaḥ sthāpayeddhariṃ ।

viṣṇurnuketi gha, ṅa, cihnitapurstakadvayapāṭhaḥ

samidājyatilādibhiriti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

athābhyarcyeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
prāsādādasya pratiṣṭhantu hṛtpratiṣṭheti tāṃ śṛṇu ।।samāptau śukanāśāyā vedyāḥ prāgdarbhamastake ।sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ kumbhamathavā śuklanirmitaṃ ।।aṣṭaratnauṣadhīdhātuvījalauhānvitaṃ śubhaṃ ।savastraṃ pūritaṃ cādbhirmaṇḍale cādhivāsayet ।।sapallavaṃ nṛsiṃhena hutvā sampātasañcitaṃ ।nārāyaṇākhyatattvena prāṇabhūtaṃ nyasettataḥ ।।vairājabhūtāntaṃ dhyāyet prāsādasya sureśvara ।tataḥ puruṣavatsarvaṃ prāsādaṃ cintayed budhaḥ ।।adho datvā suvarṇaṃ tu tadvavad bhūtaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset ।gurvādau dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād brāhmaṇādeś ca bhojanaṃ ।।tataḥ paścādvedibandhaṃ tadūrdhvaṃ kaṇṭhabandhanaṃ ।kaṇṭhopariṣṭāt kartavyaṃ vimalāmalasārakaṃ ।।tadūrdhvaṃ vṛkalaṃ kuryāccakrañcādyaṃ sudarśanaṃ ।mūttiṃ śrīvāsudevasya grahaguptāṃ nivedayet ।।kalaśaṃ vātha kurvīta tadūrdhvaṃ cakramuttamaṃ ।vedyāś ca paritaḥ sthāpyā aṣṭau vighneśvarāstvaja ।।

vanamālāyāmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śuktinirmalamiti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ । śulvanirmitamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vairājarūpaṃ tamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tattvabhūtamiti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tadūrdhvaṃ cūrṇakaṃ kuryāditi ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
tadūrdhvaṃ culvakaṃ kuryāditi kha, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

aṣṭau vedyeśvarāstvaja iti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
catvāro vā caturdikṣu sthāpanīyā garutmataḥ ।dhvajārohaṃ ca vakṣyāmi yena bhūtādi naśyati ।।prāsādavimbadravyāṇāṃ yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ ।tāvadvarṣasahasrāṇi tatkartā viṣṇulokabhāk ।।kumbhāṇḍavedivimbānāṃ bhramaṇādvāyunānagha ।kaṇṭhasyāveṣṭanāj jñeyaṃ phalaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ dhvajāt ।।patākānāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi daṇḍaṃ puruṣarūpiṇaṃ ।prāsādaṃ vāsudevasya mūrtibhedaṃ nibodha me ।।dhāraṇāddharaṇīṃ viddhi ākāśaṃ śuṣirātmakaṃ ।tejastat pāvakaṃ viddhi vāyuṃ sparśagataṃ tathā ।।pāṣāṇādiṣveva jalaṃ pārthivaṃ pṛthivīguṇaṃ ।pratiśabdodbhavaṃ śabdaṃ sparśaṃ syāt karkaśādikaṃ ।।śuklādikaṃ bhavedrūpaṃ rasamannādidarśanaṃ ।dhūpādigandhaṃ gandhantu vāg bheryādiṣu saṃsthitā ।।śukanāśāśritā nāsā bāhū tadrathakau smṛtau ।śirastvaṇḍaṃ nigaditaṃ kalaśaṃ mūrdhajaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।kaṇṭhaṃ kaṇṭhamiti jñeyaṃ skandhaṃ vedī nigadyete ।pāyūpasthe praṇāle tu tvak sudhā parikīrtitā ।।mukhaṃ dvāraṃ bhavedasya pratimā jīva ucyate ।tacchaktiṃ piṇḍikāṃ viddhi prakṛtiṃ ca tadākṛtiṃ ।।

mūrtibhūtamiti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dharaṇādvāruṇīṃ viddhi iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।dharaṇādvāruṇīṃ devīmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।dhāraṇīṃ dharaṇīṃ viddhi iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pārthivaṃ pṛthivītalamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । pārthivaṃ pṛthivījalamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

rasamāsthāya darśanaṃ rasamāhvādi darśanamiti kha, cihnitapsuatakapāṭhaḥ
niś calatvañca garbhosyā adhiṣṭhātā tu keśavaḥ ।evameva hariḥ sākṣātprāsādatvena saṃsthitaḥ ।।jaṅghā tvasya śivo jñeyaḥ skandhe dhātā vyavasthitaḥ ।ūrdhvabhāge sthito viṣṇurevaṃ tasya sthitasya hi ।।prāsādasya pratiṣṭhāntu dhvajarūpeṇa me śṛṇu ।dhvajaṃ kṛtvā surair daityā jitāḥ śastrādicihnitaṃ ।।aṇḍordhvaṃ kalaśaṃ nyasya tadūrdhvaṃ vinyaseddhvajaṃ ।vimbārdhamānaṃ daṇḍasya tribhāgenātha kārayet ।।aṣṭāraṃ dvādaśāraṃ vā madhye mūrtimatānvitaṃ ।nārasiṃhena tārkṣyeṇa dhvajadaṇḍastu nirbraṇaḥ ।।prāsādasya tu vistāro mānaṃ daṇḍasya kīrtitaṃ ।śikharārdhena vā kuryāt tṛtīyārdhena vā punaḥ ।।dvārasya dairghyād dviguṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ vā parikalpayet ।dhvajayaṣṭirdevagṛhe aiśānyāṃ vāyavethavā ।।kṣaumādyaiś ca dhvajaṃ kuryādvicitraṃ vaikavarṇakaṃ ।ghaṇṭācāmarakiṅkiṇyā bhūṣitaṃ pāpanāśanaṃ ।।daṇḍāgrāddharaṇīṃ yāvaddhastaikaṃ vistareṇa tu ।mahādhvajaḥ sarvadaḥ syātturyāṃśāddhīnatorcitaḥ ।।dhvaje cārdhena vijñeyā patākā mānavarjitā ।vistareṇa dhvajaḥ kāryo viṃśadaṅgulasannibhaḥ ।।adhivāsavidhānena cakraṃ daṇḍaṃ dhvajaṃ tathā ।

jitāḥ śaktyādicihnitamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । jitāḥ śakrādicihnitamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vimbārdhamānaṃ cakrantu iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vicitrañcaiva varṇakamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
devavat sakalaṃ kṛtvā maṇḍapasnapanādikaṃ ।।netronmīlanakaṃ tyaktā pūrvoktaṃ sarvamācaret ।adhivāsayecca vidhinā śayyāyāṃ sthāpya deśikaḥ ।।tataḥ sahasraśīrṣeti sūktaṃ cakre nyased budhaḥ ।tathā sudarśanaṃ mantraṃ manastattvaṃ niveśayet ।।manorūpeṇa tasyaiva sajīvakaraṇaṃ smṛtaṃ ।areṣu mūrtayo nyasyāḥ keśavādyāḥ surottama ।।nābhyabjapratinemīṣu nyasettattvāni deśikaḥ ।nṛsiṃhaṃ viśvarūpaṃ vā abjamadhye niveśayet ।।sakalaṃ vinyaseddaṇḍe sūtrātmānaṃ sajīvakaṃ ।niṣkalaṃ paramātmānaṃ dhvaje dhyāyan nyaseddhariṃ ।।tacchaktiṃ vyāpinīṃ dhyāyed dhvajarūpāṃ balābalāṃ ।maṇḍape sthāpya cābhyarcya homaṃ kuṇḍeṣu kārayet ।।kalaśe svarṇakalaśaṃ nyasya ratnāni pañca ca ।sthāpayeccakramantreṇa svarṇacakramadhastataḥ ।।pāradena tu samplāvya netrapaṭṭena cchādayet ।tato niveśayeccakraṃ tanmadhye nṛhariṃ smaret ।।oṃ kṣoṃ nṛsiṃhāya namaḥ pūjayet sthāpayeddhariṃ ।tato dhvajaṃ gṛhītvā tu yajamānaḥ sabāndhavaḥ ।।

calācalāmiti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ, sulocanamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

maṇḍale iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

svarṇacakrantu madhyata iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

netraṃ yatnena cchādayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ kṣauṃ nṛsiṃhāya nama iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dadhibhaktayute pātre dhvajasyāgraṃ niveśayet ।dhruvādyena phaḍantena dhvajaṃ mantreṇa pūjayet ।।śirasyādhāya tat pātraṃ nārāyanamanusmaran ।pradakṣiṇaṃ tu kurvīta turyamaṅgalaniḥsvanaiḥ ।।tato niveśayet daṇḍaṃ mantreṇāṣṭākṣareṇa tu ।muñcāmi tveti sūktena dhvajaṃ muñcedvicakṣaṇaḥ ।।pātraṃ dhvajaṃ kuñjarādi dadyādācāryake dvijaḥ ।eṣa sādhāraṇaḥ prokto dhvajasyārohaṇe vidhiḥ ।।yasya devasya yaccihnaṃ tanmantreṇa sthiraṃ caret ।svargatvā dhvajadānāttu rājā balī bhavet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye dhvajārohaṇaṃ nāma ekaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dviṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

lakṣmīpratiṣṭhāvidhiḥ

bhagavānuvāca
samudāyena devādeḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ pravadāmi te ।lakṣmyāḥ pratiṣṭhā prathamaṃ tathā devīgaṇasya ca ।।pūrvavat sakalaṃ kuryānmaṇḍapasnapanādikaṃ ।bhadrapīṭhe śriyaṃ nyasya sthāpayedaṣṭa vai ghaṭān ।।ghṛtenābhyajya mūlena snapayet pañcagavyakaiḥ ।hiraṇyavarṇā hariṇī netre conmīlayecchriyāḥ ।।

maṇḍalasnapanādikamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sthāpayedvaruṇe ghaṭāniti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tanma āvaha ity evaṃ pradadyānmadhuratrayam ।aśvapūrveti pūrveṇa tāṃ kumbhenābhiṣecayet ।।kāmosmiteti yāmyena paścimenābhiṣecayet ।candraṃ prabhāsāmuccāryādityavarṇeti cottarāt ।।upaitu meti cāgneyāt kṣutpipāseti nairṛtāt ।gandhadvāreti vāyavyāṃ manasaḥ kāmamākṛtim ।।īśānakalaśenaiva śiraḥ sauvarṇakardamāt ।ekāśītighaṭaiḥ snānaṃ mantreṇāpaḥ sṛjan kṣitim ।।ārdrāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ gandhair ārdrāmityādipuṣpakaiḥ ।tanmayāvaha mantreṇa ya ānanda ṛcākhilaṃ ।।śāyantīyena śayyāyāṃ śrīsūktena ca sannidhim ।lakṣmīvījena cicchaktiṃ vinyasyābhyarcayet punaḥ ।।śrīsūktena maṇḍapetha kuṇḍeṣvabjāni homayet ।karavīrāṇi vā hutvā sahasraṃ śatameva vā ।।gṛhopakaraṇāntādi śrīsūktenaiva cārpayet ।tataḥ prāsādasaṃskāraṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā tu pūrvavat ।।mantreṇa piṇḍikāṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhānaṃ tataḥ śriyaḥ ।śrīsūktena ca sānnidhyaṃ pūrvavat pratyṛcaṃ japet ।।cicchaktiṃ bodhayitvā tu mālāt sānnidhyakaṃ caret ।

asminnāvaha iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

aśvamūrdheti mantreṇa tāṃ kumbhebhiniveśayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mantreṇa cāsṛjat kṣitimiti kha, cihnatapustakapāṭhaḥ

ya ānandeti vāsasamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mantreṇa piṇḍikāṃ kṛtvā pratimāṃ sthāpayan śriya iti ṅa, cihntapustakapāṭhaḥ

pratyṛcaṃ yajediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bhūsvarṇavastragonnādi gurave brahmaṇerpayet ।evaṃ devyo akhilāḥ sthāpyāvāhya svargādi bhāvayet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye lakṣmīsthāpanaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha triṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

sudarśanacakrādipratiṣṭhākathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
evaṃ tārkṣyasya cakrasya brahmaṇo nṛhares tathā ।pratiṣṭhā viṣṇuvat kāryā svasvamantreṇa tāṃ śṛṇu ।।sudarśana mahācakra śānta duṣṭabhayaṅkara ।
cchinda chinda bhinda bhinda vidāraya vidāraya paramantrān grasa grasa
bhakṣaya bhakṣaya bhūtān trāyasa trāyasa hūṃ phaṭ sudarśanāya
namaḥ ।।
abhyarcya cakraṃ cānena raṇe dārayete ripūn ।।
oṃ kṣauṃ narasiṃha ugrarūpa jvala jvala prajvala prajvala svāhā ।।
narasiṃhasya mantroyaṃ pātālākhyasya vacmi te ।
oṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya pradīptasūryakoṭisahasrasamatejase vajranakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhāyaṃ sphuṭavikaṭavikīrṇakesarasaṭāprakṣubhitamahārṇavāmbhodadundubhinirghoṣāya sarvamantrottāraṇāya ehyehi bhagavannarasiṃha puruṣaparāparabrahmasatyena sphura sphura vijṛmbha vijṛmbha ākrama garja garja muñca muñca siṃhanādān vidāraya vidāraya vidrāvaya vidrāvaya āviśa

bhūsvarṇagavānnādi iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pātālākhyasya vakṣyate iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

āviśa sarvamantrarūpāṇi sarvamantrajātayaś ca hana hana chinda saṅkṣipa saṅkṣipa sara sara dāraya dāraya sphuṭa sphuṭa sphoṭaya sphoṭaya jvālāmālāsaṅghātamaya sarvato anantajvālāvajrāśanicakreṇa sarvapātālān utsādaya utsādaya sarvato anatajvālāvajraśarapañjareṇa sarvapātālān parivāraya parivāraya sarvapātālāsuravāsināṃ hṛdayānyākarṣaya ākarṣaya śīghraṃ daha daha paca paca matha matha śoṣaya śoṣaya nikṛntaya nikṛntaya tāvadyāvanme vaśamāgatāḥ pātālebhyaḥ phaṭ 
asurebhyaḥ phaṭ mantrarūpebhyaḥ phaṭ mantrajātibhyaḥ phaṭ
saṃśayānmāṃ bhagavannarasiṃharūpa viṣṇo sarvāpadbhyaḥ
sarvamantrarūpebhyo rakṣa rakṣa hrūṃ phaṭ namo astu te ।।

narasiṃhasya vidyeyaṃ harirūpārthasiddhidā ।।trilokyamohanair mantraiḥ sthāpyastrailokyamohanaḥ ।gado dakṣe śāntikaro dvibhujo vā caturbhujaḥ ।।vāmordhve kārayeccakraṃ pāñcajanyamatho hy adhaḥ ।śrīpuṣṭisaṃyuktaṃ kuryād balena saha bhadrayā ।।prāsāde sthāpayedviṣṇuṃ gṛhe vā maṇḍape api vā ।vāmanaṃ caiva vaikuṇṭhaṃ hayāsyamaniruddhakaṃ ।।sthāpayejjalaśayyāsthaṃ matsyādīṃścāvatārakān ।saṅkarṣaṇaṃ viśvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vai rudramūrtikaṃ ।।ardhanārīśvaraṃ tadvaddhariśaṅkaramātṛkāḥ ।bhairavaṃ ca tathā sūryaṃ grahāṃstadvināyakam ।।

dara dara iti kha, ga, ṅa, iti cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

rakṣa rakṣa oṃ phaṭ iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । rakṣa rakṣa hrīṃ phaḍiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

harirūpā sumidvidā iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
gaurīmindrādikāṃ lepyāṃ citrajāṃ ca balābalāṃ ।pustakānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ ca vakṣye likhanatadvidhiṃ ।।svastike maṇḍale abhyarcya śarapatrāsane sthitaṃ ।lekhyañca likhitaṃ pustaṃ gururvidyāṃ hariṃ yajet ।।yajamāno guruṃ vidyāṃ hariṃ lipikṛtaṃ naraṃ ।prāṅmukhaḥ padminīṃ dhyāyet likhitvā ślokapañcakaṃ ।।raupyasthamasyā haimyā ca lekhanyā nāgarākṣaraṃ ।brāhmaṇān bhojayecchakyā śaktyā dadyācca dakṣiṇāṃ ।।guruṃ vidyāṃ hariṃ prārcya purāṇādi likhennaraḥ ।pūrvavanmaṇḍalādye ca aiśānyāṃ bhadrapīṭhake ।।darpaṇe pustakaṃ dṛṣṭvā secayet pūrvavad ghaṭaiḥ ।netronmīlanakaṃ kṛtvā śayyāyāṃ tu nyasennaraḥ ।।nyasettu pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ devādyaṃ tatra pustake ।kṛtvā sajīvīkaraṇaṃ prārcya hutvā caruṃ tataḥ ।।samprāśya dakṣiṇābhistu gurvādīn bhojayeddvijān ।rathena hastinā vāpi bhrāmyet pustakaṃ naraiḥ ।।gṛhe devālayādau tu pustakaṃ sthāpya pūjayet ।vastrādiveṣṭitaṃ pāṭhādādāvante samarcayet ।।

indrādikāṃ japyamiti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śarayantrāsane sthitamiti kha, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

raupyamayyātha haimyā vā lekhanyatha varākṣaramiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
prāṅmukhaḥ padminīṃ dhyāyet likhitvā ca pradāpayet ।
brāhmaṇān bhojayecchaktyā śaktyādadyācca dakṣiṇāmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pūrvamaṇḍapapārśve iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pustakaṃ nara iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ante sadārcayediti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
jagacchāntiñcāvadhārya pustakaṃ vācayennaraḥ ।adhyāyamekaṃ kumbhādbhiryajamānādi secayet ।।dvijāya pustakaṃ datvā phalasyānto na vidyate ।trīṇyāhuratidānāni gāvaḥ pṛthvīṃ sarasvatī ।।vidyādānaphalaṃ datvā masyantaṃ patrasañcayaṃ ।yāvattu patrasaṅkhyānamakṣarāṇāṃ tathānagha ।।tāvadvarṣasahasrāṇi viṣṇuloke mahīyate ।pañcarātraṃ purāṇāni bhāratāni dadannaraḥ ।kulaikaviṃśamuddhṛtya pare tattve tu līyate ।।
e ity ādimahāputrāṇe āgneye devādipratiṣṭhāpustakapratiṣṭhākathanaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamodhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha catuḥṣaṣṭitamodhyāyaḥ

kūpādipratiṣṭhākathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
kūpavāpītaḍāgānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vacmi tāṃ śṛṇu ।jalarūpeṇa hi hariḥ somo varuṇa uttama ।।agnīṣomamayaṃ viśvaṃ viṣṇurāpastu kāraṇaṃ ।haimaṃ raupyaṃ ratnajaṃ vā varuṇaṃ kārayennaraḥ ।।dvibhujaṃ haṃsapṛṣṭhasthaṃ dakṣiṇenābhayapradaṃ ।vāmena nāgapāśaṃ taṃ nadīnāgādisaṃyutaṃ ।।yāgamaṇḍapamadhye syādvedikā kuṇḍamaṇḍitā ।toraṇaṃ vāruṇaṃ kumbhaṃ nyasecca karakānvitaṃ ।।bhadrake cārdhacandre vā svastike dvāri kumbhakān ।agnyādhānaṃ cāpyakuṇḍe kṛtvā pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet ।।

varuṇaṃ snānapīṭhe tu ye te śateti saṃspṛśet ।ghṛtenābhyañjayet paścānmūlamantreṇa deśikaḥ ।।śanno devīti prakṣālya śuddhavatyā śivodakaiḥ ।adhivāsayedaṣṭakumbhān sāmudraṃ pūrvakumbhake ।।gāṅgamagnau varṣatoyaṃ dakṣe rakṣastu nairjharaṃ ।nadītoyaṃ paścime tu vāyavye tu nadodakaṃ ।।audbhijjaṃ cottare sthāpya aiśānyāṃ tīrthasambhavaṃ ।alābhe tu nadītoyaṃ yāsāṃ rājeti mantrayet ।।devaṃ nirmārjya nirmañchya durmitriyeti vicakṣaṇaḥ ।netre conmīlayeccitraṃ taccakṣurmadhuratrayaiḥ ।।jyotiḥ sampūrayeddhaimyāṃ gurave gāmathārpayet ।samudrajyeṣṭhetyabhiṣiñcayedvaruṇaṃ pūrvakumbhataḥ ।।samudraṃ gaccha gāṅgeyāt somo dhenviti varṣakāt ।devīrāpo nirjharādbhir nadādbhiḥ pañcanadyataḥ ।।udbhidadbhyaścodbhidena pāvamānyātha tīrthakaiḥ ।āpo hi ṣṭhā pañcagavyāddhiraṇyavarṇeti svarṇajāt ।।āpo asmeti varṣoptyair vyāhṛtyā kūpasambhavaiḥ ।varuṇañca taḍāgoptyair varuṇādbhistu vaśyataḥ ।।āpo devīti girijair ekāśīvighaṭaistataḥ ।snāpayedvaruṇasyeti tvanno varuṇā cārghyakaṃ ।।vyāhṛtyā madhuparkantu vṛhaspateti vastrakaṃ ।varuṇeti pavitrantu praṇavenottarīyakaṃ ।।

nadīkṣodamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

āsāṃ rudreti kīrtayediti ṅa, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

indriyeti vicakṣaṇa iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
yadvāraṇyena puṣpādi pradadyādvaruṇāya tu ।cāmaraṃ darpaṇaṃ chatraṃ vyajanaṃ vaijayantikāṃ ।।mūlenottiṣṭhetyutthāpya tāṃ rātrimadhivāsayet ।varuṇañceti sānnidhyaṃ yadvāraṇyena pūjayet ।।sajīvīkaraṇaṃ mūlāt punargandhādinā yajet ।maṇḍape pūrvavat prārcya kuṇḍeṣu samidādikaṃ ।।vedādimantrair gandhādyāś catasro dhenavo duhet ।dikṣvatho vai yavacaruṃ tataḥ saṃsthāpya homayet ।।vyāhṛtyā vātha gāyatryā mūlenāmantrayettathā ।sūryāya prajāpataye dyauḥ svāhā cāntarikṣakaḥ ।।tasyai pṛthivyai dehadhṛtyai iha svadhṛtaye tataḥ ।iha ratyai ceha ramatyā ugro bhīmaś ca raudrakaḥ ।।viṣṇuś ca varuṇo dhātā rāyaspoṣo mahendrakaḥ ।agniryamo nairṛto atha varuṇo vāyureva ca ।।kuvera īśo ananto atha brahmā rājā jaleśvaraḥ ।tasmai svāhedaṃ viṣṇuś ca tadviprāseti homayet ।।somo dhenviti ṣaḍ hutvā imaṃ meti ca homayet ।āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhirimā rudreti homayet ।।daśādikṣu baliṃ dadyāt gandhapuṣpādinārcayet ।pratimāṃ tu samutthāpya maṇḍale vinyased budhaḥ ।।pūjayedgandhapuṣpādyair hemapuṣpādibhiḥ kramāt ।

maṇḍale iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

mūle tvagnau ca homayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vāyuḥ somo mahendraka iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
jalāśayāṃstu digbhāge vitastidvayasammitān ।।kṛtvāṣṭau sthaṇḍilān ramyān saikatān deśikottamaḥ ।varuṇasyeti mantreṇa sājyamaṣṭaśataṃ tataḥ ।।caruṃ yavamayaṃ hutvā śāntitoyaṃ samācaret ।secayenmūrdhni devaṃ tu sajīvakaraṇaṃ caret ।।dhyāyettu varuṇaṃ yuktaṃ gauryā nadanadīgaṇaiḥ ।oṃ varuṇāya namo abhyarcya tataḥ sānnidhyamācaret ।।utthāpya nāgapṛṣṭhādyair bhrāmayettaiḥ samaṅgalaiḥ ।āpo hi ṣṭheti ca kṣipettrimadhvākte ghaṭe jale ।।jalāśaye madhyagataṃ suguptaṃ viniveśayet ।snātvā dhyāyecca varuṇaṃ sṛṣṭiṃ brahmāṇḍasañjñikāṃ ।।agnivījena sandagddhya tadbhasma plāvayeddharāṃ ।sarvamapomayaṃ lokaṃ dhyāyet tatra jaleśvaraṃ ।।toyamadhyasthitaṃ devaṃ tato yūpaṃ niveśayet ।caturasramathāṣṭāsraṃ vartulaṃ vā pravartitaṃ ।।ārādhya devatāliṅgaṃ daśahastaṃ tu kūpake ।yūpaṃ yajñīyavṛkṣotthaṃ mūle haimaṃ phalaṃ nyaset ।।vāpyāṃ pañcadaśakaraṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ tu viṃśatikaṃ ।taḍāge pañcaviṃśākhyaṃ jalamadhye niveśayet ।।yāgamaṇḍapāṅgeṇa vā yūpabrasketi mantrataḥ ।sthāpya tadveṣṭayedvastrair yūpopari patākikāṃ ।।

caruṃ sacamasaṃ hutveti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

utthāya iti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

suvartitamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

yūpasthāneti mantrata iti ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tadabhyarcya ca gandhādyair jagacchāntiṃ samācaret ।dakṣiṇāṃ gurave dadyādbhūgohemāmbupātrakaṃ ।।dvijebhyo dakṣiṇā deyā āgatān bhojayettathā ।ābrahmastambaparyantā ye kecitsalilārthinaḥ ।।te tṛptimupagacchantu taḍāgasthena vāriṇā ।toyamutsarjayedevaṃ pañcagavyaṃ vinikṣipet ।।āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhiḥ śāntitoyaṃ dvijaiḥ kṛtaṃ ।tīrthatoyaṃ kṣipet puṇyaṃ gokulañcārpayedvijān ।।anivāritamannādyaṃ sarvajanyañca kārayet ।aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ yaḥ samācaret ।।ekāhaṃ sthāpayettoyaṃ tatpuṇyamayutāyutaṃ ।vimāne modate svarge narakaṃ na sa gacchati ।।gavādi pivate yasmāttasmāt kartur na pātakaṃ ।toyadānātsarvadānaphalaṃ prāpya divaṃ yajet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye
kūpavāpītaḍāgādipratiṣṭhākathanaṃ nāma
catuḥṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

sabhāsthāpanakathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
sabhādisthānaṃ vakṣye tathaiva teṣāṃ pravartanaṃ ।bhūmau parīkṣitāyāñca vāstuyāgaṃ samācaret ।।svecchayā tu sabhāṃ kṛtvā svecchayā sthāpayet surān ।

toyaṃ samutsṛjedevamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gokulaṃ pāyayed dvijāniti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
catuṣpathe grāmādau ca na śūnye kārayet sabhāṃ ।।nirmalaḥ kulamuddhṛtya kartā svarge vimodate ।anena vidhinā kuryāt saptabhaumaṃ harergṛhaṃ ।।yathā rājñāṃ tathānyeṣāṃ pūrvādyāś ca dhvajādayaḥ ।koṇabhujān varjayitvā catuḥśālaṃ tu vartayet ।।triśālaṃ vā dviśālaṃ vā ekaśālamathāpi vā ।vyayādhikaṃ na kurvīta vyayadoṣakaraṃ hi tat ।।āyādhike bhavet pīḍā tasmāt kuryāt samaṃ dvayaṃ ।kararāśiṃ samastantu kuryādvasuguṇaṃ guruḥ ।।saptārciṣā hṛte bhāge gargavidyāvicakṣaṇaḥ ।aṣṭadhā bhājite tasmin yaccheṣaṃ sa vyayo gataḥ ।।athavā kararāśiṃ tu hanyāt saptārciṣā budhaḥ ।vasubhiḥ saṃhṛte bhāge pṛthvyādi parikalpayet ।।dhvajo dhūmras tathā siṃhaḥ śvā vṛṣastu kharo gajaḥ ।tathā dhvāṅkṣastu pūrvādāvudbhavanti vikalpayet ।।triśālakatrayaṃ śastaṃ udakpūrvavivarjitaṃ ।yāmyāṃ paragṛhopetaṃ dviśālaṃ labhyate sadā ।।yāmye śālaikaśālaṃ tu pratyakśālamathāpi vā ।ekaśāladvayaṃ śastaṃ śeṣāstvanye bhayāvahāḥ ।।catuḥśālaṃ sadā śastaṃ sarvadoṣavivarjitaṃ ।ekabhaumādi kurvīta bhavanaṃ saptabhaumakaṃ ।।dvāravedyādirahitaṃ pūraṇena vivarjitaṃ ।devagṛhaṃ devatāyāḥ pratiṣṭhāvidhinā sadā ।।

pūś catuṣpathagrāmādāviti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dhvajādi iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
saṃsthāpya manujānāñca samudāyoktakarmaṇā ।prātaḥ sarvauṣadhīsnānaṃ kṛtvā śuciratandritaḥ ।।madhuraistu dvijān bhojya pūrṇakumbhādiśobhitaṃ ।satoraṇaṃ svasti vācya dvijān goṣṭhahastakaḥ ।।gṛhī gṛhaṃ praviśecca daivajñān prārcya saṃviśet ।gṛhe puṣṭikaraṃ mantraṃ paṭheccemaṃ samāhitaḥ ।।oṃ nande nandaya vāśiṣṭhe vasubhiḥ prajayā saha ।jaye bhārgavadāyade prajānāṃ vijayāvahe ।।pūrṇe aṅgirasadāyāde pūrṇakāmaṃ kurudhva māṃ ।bhadre kāśyapadāyāde kuru bhadrāṃ matiṃ mama ।।sarvavījauṣadhīyukte sarvaratnauṣadhīvṛte ।rucire nandane nande vāsiṣṭhe ramyatāmiha ।।prajāpatisute devi caturasre mahīyasi ।subhage suvrate devi gṛhe kāśyapi ramyatāṃ ।।pūjite paramācāryair gandhamālyair alaṅkṛte ।bhavabhūtikare devi gṛhe bhārgavi ramyatāṃ ।।avyakte vyākṛte pūrṇe muneraṅgirasaḥ sute ।iṣṭake tvaṃ prayaccheṣṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayāmyahaṃ ।।deśasvāmipurasvāmigṛhasvāmiparigrahe ।manuṣyadhanahastyaśvapaśuvṛddhikarī bhava ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye sabhāgṛhasthāpanaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

gopucchahastaka iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

devājñāṃ prāpya iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

sādhāraṇapratiṣṭhāvidhānaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
samudāyapratiṣṭhāñca vakṣye sā vāsudevavat ।ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve aśvinau tathā ।।ṛṣayaś ca tathā sarve vakṣye teṣāṃ viśeṣakaṃ ।yasya devasya yannāma tasyādyaṃ gṛhya cākṣaraṃ ।।mātrābhirbhedayitvā tu dīrghāṇyaṅgāni bhedayet ।prathamaṃ kalpayedvījaṃ savinduṃ praṇavaṃ natiṃ ।।sarveṣāṃ mūlamantreṇa pūjanaṃ sthāpanaṃ tathā ।niyamavratakṛcchrāṇāṃ maṭhasaṅkramaveśmanāṃ ।।māsopavāsaṃ dvādaśyāṃ ity ādisthāpanaṃ vade ।śilāṃ pūrṇaghaṭaṃ kāṃsyaṃ sambhāraṃ sthāpayettataḥ ।।brahmakūrcaṃ samāhṛtya śraped yavamayaṃ caruṃ ।kṣīreṇa kapilāyāstu tadviṣṇoriti sādhakaḥ ।।praṇavenābhighāryaiva darvyā saṅghaṭṭayettataḥ ।sādhayitvāvatāryātha viṣṇumabhyarcya homayet ।।vyāhṛtā caiva gāyatryā tadviprāseti homayet ।viśvataś cakṣurvedyair bhūragnaye tathaiva ca ।।sūryāya prajāpataye antarikṣāya homayet ।dyauḥ svāhā brahmaṇe svāhā pṛthivī mahārājakaḥ ।।tasmai somañca rājānaṃ indrādyair homamācaret ।

aṅgāni kalpayediti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

praṇavaṃ gatimiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
evaṃ hutvā carorbhāgān dadyāddigbalimādarāt ।।samidho aṣṭaśataṃ hutvā pālāśāṃścājyahomakaṃ ।kuryāt puruṣasūktena irāvatī tilāṣṭakaṃ ।।hutvā tu brahmaviṣṇvīśadevānāmanuyāyināṃ ।grahāṇāmāhutīrhutvā lokeśānāmatho punaḥ ।।parvatānāṃ nadīnāñca samudrāṇāṃ tathāahutīḥ ।hutvā ca vyāhṛtīrdaddyāt sruvapūrṇāhutitrayaṃ ।।vauṣaḍantena mantreṇa vaiṣṇavena pitāmaha ।pañcagavyaṃ caruṃ prāśya datvācāryāya dakṣiṇāṃ ।।tilapātraṃ hemayuktaṃ savastraṃ gāmalaṅkṛtāṃ ।prīyatāṃ bhagavān viṣṇurityutsṛjedvrataṃ budhaḥ ।।māsopavāsāderanyāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vacmi pūrṇataḥ ।yajñenātoṣya deveśaṃ śrapayedvaiṣṇavaṃ caruṃ ।।tilataṇḍulanīvāraiḥ śyāmākair athavā yavaiḥ ।ājyenādhārya cottārya homayenmūrtimantrakaiḥ ।।viṣṇvādīnāṃ māsapānāṃ tadante homayet punaḥ ।
oṃ viṣṇave svāhā । oṃ viṣṇave nibhūyapāya svāhā । oṃ viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya svāhā । oṃ narasiṃhāya svāhā । oṃ puruṣottamāya svāhā
dvādaśāśvatthasamidho homayedghṛtasamplutāḥ ।।viṣṇo rarāṭamantreṇa tato dvādaśa cāhutīḥ ।

evaṃ datvā iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । etān datvā iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ viṣṇave pravṛṣāya svāhā iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
idaṃ viṣṇurirāvatī carordvādaśa āhutīḥ ।।hutvā cājyāhutīstadvattadviprāseti homayet ।śeṣahomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā dadyāt pūrṇāhutitrayaṃ ।।yuñjatetyanuvākantu japtvā prāśīta vai caruṃ ।praṇavena svaśabdānte kṛtvā pātre tu paippale ।।tato māsādhipānāntu viprān dvādaśa bhojayet ।trayodaśa gurustatra tebhyo dadyāttrayodaśa ।।kumbhān svādvambusaṃyuktān sacchatropānahānvitān ।gāvaḥ prītiṃ samāyāntu pracarantu praharṣitāḥ ।iti gopathamutsṛjya yūpaṃ tatra niveśayet ।।daśahastaṃ prapāarāmamaṭhasaṅkramaṇādiṣu ।gṛhe ca homamevantu kṛtvā sarvaṃ yathāvidhi ।।pūrvoktena vidhānena praviśecca gṛhaṃ gṛhī ।anivāritamannādyaṃ sarveṣveteṣu kārayet ।।dvijebhyo dakṣiṇā deyā yathāśaktyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ ।ārāmaṃ kārayedyastu nandane sa ciraṃ vaset ।।maṭhapradānāt svarloke śakraloke vasettataḥ ।prapādānādvāruṇena saṅkrameṇa vaseddivi ।।iṣṭakāsetukārī ca goloke mārgakṛdgavāṃ ।niyamavratakṛdviṣṇuḥ kṛcchrakṛtsarvapāpahā ।।gṛhaṃ datvā vasetsvarge yāvadābhūtasamplavaṃ ।

añjatetyanuvākastu iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

svādvannasaṃyuktāniti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakacatuṣṭayapāṭhaḥ

samudāyapratiṣṭheṣṭā śivādīnāṃ gṛhātmanāṃ ।।

e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye samudāyapratiṣṭhākathanaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

jīrṇoddhāravidhānaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
jīrṇāddhāravidhiṃ vakṣye bhūṣitāṃ snapayedguruḥ ।acalāṃ vinyasedgehe atijīrṇāṃ parityajet ।।vyaṅgāṃ bhagnāṃ ca śailāḍhyāṃ nyasedanyāṃ ca pūrvavat ।saṃhāravidhinā tatra tattvān saṃhṛtya deśikaḥ ।।sahasraṃ nārasiṃhena hutvā tāmuddhared guruḥ ।dāravīṃ dārayedvahnau śailajāṃ prakṣipejjale ।।dhātujāṃ ratnajāṃ vāpi agādhe vā jale ambudhau ।yānamāropya jīrṇāṅgaṃ chādya vastrādinā nayet ।।vāditraiḥ prakṣipettoye gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadet ।yatpramāṇā ca yaddravyā tanmānāṃ sthāpayeddine ।kūpavāpītaḍāgāderjīrṇoddhāre mahāphalaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye jīrṇoddhārakathanaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

bhūṣitāñca yajed gururiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter ś atha aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ

yātrotsavavidhikathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
vakṣye vidhiṃ cotsavasya sthāpite tu sure caret ।tasminnabde caikarātraṃ trirātrañcāṣṭarātrakaṃ ।।utsavena vinā yasmāt sthāpanaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet ।ayane viṣuve cāpi śayanopavane gṛhe ।।kārakasyānukūle vā yātrāndevasya kārayet ।maṅgalāṅkuraropaistu gītanṛtyādivādyakaiḥ ।।śarāvaghaṭikāpālīstvaṅkurārohaṇe hitāḥ ।yavāñchālīṃstilān mudgān godhūmān sitasarṣapān ।।kulatthamāṣaniṣpāvān kṣālayitvā tu vāpayet ।pūrvādau ca baliṃ dadyāt bhraman dīpaiḥ puraṃ niśi ।।indrādeḥ kumudādeś ca sarvabhūtebhya eva ca ।anugacchanti te tatra pratirūpadharāḥ punaḥ ।।pade pade aśvamedhasya phalaṃ teṣāṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।āgatya devatāgāraṃ devaṃ vijñāpayed guruḥ ।।tīrthayātrā tu yā deva śvaḥ kartavyā surottama ।tasyārambhamanujñātumarhase deva sarvathā ।।devamevantu vijñāpya tataḥ karma samārabhet ।prarohaghaṭikābhyāntu vedikāṃ bhūṣitāṃ vrajet ।।

śayanotthāpane gṛhe iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । śayanotthāpane hareriti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

samācarediti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
catuḥstambhāntu tanmadhye svastike pratimāṃ nyaset ।kāmyārthāṃ lekhyacitreṣu sthāpya tatrādhivāsayet ।।vaiṣṇavaiḥ saha kurvīta ghṛtābhyaṅgantu mūlataḥ ।ghṛtadhārābhiṣekaṃ vā sakalāṃ śarvarīṃ budhaḥ ।।darpaṇaṃ darśya nīrājaṃ gītavādyaiś ca maṅgalaṃ ।vyajanaṃ pūjanaṃ dīpaṃ gandhapuṣpādibhiryajet ।।haridrāmudgakāśmīraśuklacūrṇādi mūrdhni ।pratimāyāś ca bhaktānāṃ sarvatīrthaphalaṃ dhṛte ।।snāpayitvā samabhyarcya yātrāvimbaṃ rathe sthitaṃ ।nayedgurur nadīrnādaiśchatrādyai rāṣṭrapālikāḥ ।।nimnagāyojanādarvāk tatra vedīntu kārayet ।vāhanādavatāryainaṃ tasyāṃ vedyānniveśayet ।।caruṃ vai śrapayet tatra pāyasaṃ homayettataḥ ।abliṅgaiḥ vaidikair mantraistīrthānāvāhayettataḥ ।।āpo hiṣṭhopaniṣadaiḥ pūjayedarghyamukhyakaiḥ ।punardevaṃ samādāya toye kṛtvāghamarṣaṇaṃ ।।snāyānmahājanair viprair vedyāmuttārya taṃ nyaset ।pūjayitvā tadahnā ca prāsādaṃ tu nayettataḥ ।pūjayet pāvakasthantu guruḥ syādbhuktimuktikṛt ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye devayātrotsavakathanaṃ nāma aṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

arcikair iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś athonasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

snānavidhānaṃ

agnir uvāca
brahman śṛṇu pravakṣāmi snapanotsavavistaraṃ ।prāsādasyāgrataḥ kumbhānmaṇḍape maṇḍale nyaset ।।kuryād dhyānārcanaṃ homaṃ harerādau ca karmasu ।sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi homayet pūrṇayā saha ।।snānadravyāṇyathāhṛtya kalaśāṃścāpi vinyaset ।adhivāsya sūtrakaṇṭhān dhārayenmaṇḍale ghaṭān ।।caturasraṃ puraṃ kṛtvā rudraistaṃ pravibhājyet ।madhyena tu caruṃ sthāpya pārśve paṅktiṃ pramārjayet ।।śālicūrṇādināpūrya pūrvādinavakeṣu ca ।kumbhamudrāṃ tato badhvā ghaṭaṃ tatrānayed budhaḥ ।।puṇḍarīkākṣamantreṇa darbhāṃstāṃstu visarjayet ।adbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ sarvaratnayutaṃ madhye nyased ghaṭaṃ ।।yavavrīhitilāṃś caiva nīvarān śyāmakān kramāt ।kulatthamudgasiddhārthāṃstacchuktānaṣṭadikṣu ca ।।aindre tu navake madhye ghṛtapūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset ।palāśāśvatthanyagrodhavilvodumbaraśīrṣāṃ ।।jambūśamīkapitthānāṃ tvakkaṣāyair ghaṭāṣṭakaṃ ।āgneyanavake madhye madhupūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset ।।gośṛṅganaśvagaṅgāgajendradaśaneṣu ca ।tīrthakṣetrakhaleṣvaṣṭau mṛttikāḥ syurghaṭāṣṭake ।।

pravibhāvayediti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ
yāmye tu navake madhye tilatailaghaṭaṃ nyaset ।nāraṅgamatha jambīraṃ kharjūraṃ mṛdvikāṃ kramāt ।।nārikelaṃ nyaset pūgaṃ dāḍimaṃ panasaṃ phalaṃ ।nairṛte navake madhye kṣīrapūrṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ nyaset ।।kuṅkumaṃ nāgapuṣpañca campakaṃ mālatīṃ kramāt ।mallikāmatha punnāgaṃ karavīraṃ mahotpalaṃ ।।puṣpāṇi cāpye navake madhye vai nārikelakam ।nādayematha sāmudraṃ sārasaṃ kaupameva ca ।।varṣajaṃ himatoyañca nairjharaṅgāṅgameva ca ।udakānyatha vāyavye navake kadalīphalaṃ ।।sahadevīṃ kumārīṃ ca siṃhīṃ vyāghrīṃ tathāmṛtāṃ ।viṣṇuparṇīṃ śataśivāṃ vacāṃ divyauṣadhīrnyaset ।।pūrvādau saumyanavake madhye dadhighaṭaṃ nyaset ।patramelāṃ tvacaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ bālakaṃ candanadvayaṃ ।।latāṃ kastūrikāṃ caiva kṛṣṇāgurumanukramāt ।siddhadravyāṇi pūrvādau śāntitoyamathaikataḥ ।।candratāraṃ kramācchuklaṃ girisāraṃ trapu nyaset ।ghanasāraṃ tathā śīrṣaṃ pūrvādau ratnameva ca ।।ghṛtenābhyarjya codvartya snapayenmūlamantrataḥ ।gandhādyaiḥ pūjayedvahnau hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret ।।baliñca sarvabhūtebhyo bhojayeddattadakṣiṇaḥ ।devaiś ca munibhirbhūpair devaṃ saṃsthāpya ceśvarāḥ ।।

ghoṣasāramiti kha, ga, gha, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

devaiś ca munibhiḥ sārdhamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । divyaiś ca balibhirdhūpair devamiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
babhūvuḥ sthāpitvetthaṃ snapanotsavakaṃ caret ।aṣṭottarasahasreṇa ghaṭānāṃ sarvabhāg bhavet ।।yajñāvabhṛthasnānena pūrṇasaṃsnāpanaṃ kṛtam ।gaurīlakṣmīvivāhādi cotsavaṃ snānapūrvakam ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye yajñāvabhṛtasnānaṃ nāma ūnasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

vṛkṣādipratiṣṭhākathanaṃ

bhagavānuvāca
pratiṣṭhāṃ pādapānāñca vakṣye ahaṃ bhuktimuktidāṃ ।sarvauṣadhyudakair liptān piṣṭātakavibhūṣitān ।।vṛkṣānmālyair alaṅkṛtya vāsobhirabhiveṣṭayet ।sūcyā sauvarṇayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ karṇavedhanam ।।hemaśalākayāñjanañca vedyāntu phalasaptakam ।adhivāsayecca pratyekaṃ ghaṭān balinivedanaṃ ।।indrāderadhivāso atha homaḥ kāryo vanaspateḥ ।vṛkṣamadhyādutsṛjedgāṃ tato abhiṣekamantrataḥ ।।ṛgyajuḥsāmamantraiś ca vāruṇair maṅgalai ravaiḥ ।vṛkṣavedikakumbhakaiś ca snapanaṃ dvijapuṅgavāḥ ।।tarūṇāṃ yajamānasya kuryuś ca yajamānakaḥ ।bhūṣito dakṣiṇāṃ dadyādgobhūbhūṣaṇavastrakaṃ ।।

vāruṇamanumirvarariti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vṛkṣavedīśakumbhaistu iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kṣīreṇa bhojanaṃ dadyādyāvaddinacatuṣṭayaṃ ।homastilādyaiḥ kāryastu palāśasamidhais tathā ।।ācārye dviguṇaṃ dadyāt pūrvavan maṇḍapādikam ।pāpanāśaḥ parā siddhirvṛkṣārāmapratiṣṭhayā ।।skandāyeśo yathā prāha pratiṣṭhādyaṃ tathā śṛṇu ।sūryeśagaṇaśaktyādeḥ parivārasya vai hareḥ ।।
e ity ādimāhāpurāṇe āgneye pādapārāmapratiṣṭhākathanaṃ nāma saptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ekasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

gaṇeśapūjāvidhiḥ

aiśvara uvāca
gaṇapūjāṃ pravakṣyāmi nirvighnāmakhilārthadāṃ ।gaṇāya svāhā hṛdayamekadaṃṣṭrāya vai śiraḥ ।।gajakarṇine ca śikhā gajavaktrāya varma ca ।mahodarāya svadantahastāyākṣi tathāstrakam ।।gaṇo guruḥ pādukā ca śaktyanantau ca dharmakaḥ ।mukhyāsthimaṇḍalaṃ cādhaścordhvacchadanamarcayet ।।padmakarṇikavījāṃś ca jvālinīṃ nandayārcayet ।sūryeśā kāmarūpā ca udayā kāmavartinī ।।

nirvighnāṃ pāpanāśinīmiti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

balakarṇine ceti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mahodarāye daṇḍahastāyākṣi iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mukhyāstimaṇḍalamiti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
satyāṃ ca vighnanāśā ca āsanaṃ gandhamṛttikā ।yaṃ śoṣā raṃ ca dahanaṃ plavo laṃ vaṃ tathāmṛtam ।।lambodarāya vidmahe mahodarāya dhīmahi tanno dantī pracodayāt ।gaṇapatirgaṇādhipo gaṇeśo gaṇanāyakaḥ ।gaṇakrīḍo vakratuṇḍa ekadaṃṣṭro mahodaraḥ ।।gajavaktro lambuka kṣirvikaṭo vighnanāśanaḥ ।dhūmravarṇā mahendrādyāḥ pūjyā gaṇapateḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye vināyakapūjākathanaṃ nāma ekasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvisaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

snānaviśeṣādikathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣyāmi skanda nityādyaṃ snānaṃ pūjāṃ pratiṣṭhayā ।khātvāsinā samuddhṛtya mṛdamaṣṭāṅgulāṃ tataḥ ।।sarvātmanā samuddhṛtya punastenaiva pūrayet ।śirasā payasastīre nidhāyāstreṇa śodhayet ।।tṛṇāni śikhayoddhṛtya varmaṇā vibhajettridhā ।ekayā nābhipādāntaṃ prakṣālya punaranyayā ।।astrābhilabdhayālabhya dīptayā sarvavigrahaṃ ।niruddhākṣāṇi pāṇibhyāṃ prāṇān saṃyamya vāriṇi ।।nimajyāsīta hṛdyastraṃ smaran kālānalaprabhaṃ ।

vighnarājaka iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nijāstreṇa viśodhayediti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
malasnānaṃ viśodhayetthaṃ samutthāya jalāntarāt ।।astrasandhyāmupāsyātha vidhisnānaṃ samācaret ।sārasvatāditīrthānāṃ ekamaṅkuśamudrayā ।।hṛdākṛṣya tathā snāpya punaḥ saṃhāramudrayā ।śeṣaṃ mṛdbhāgamādāya praviśya nābhivāriṇi ।।vāmapāṇitale kuryādbhāgatrayamudaṅmukhaḥ ।aṅgair dakṣiṇamekādyaṃ pūrvamastreṇa saptadhā ।।śivena daśadhā saumyaṃ japedbhāgatrayaṃ kramāt ।sarvadikṣu kṣipet pūrvaṃ hūṃ phaḍantaśarātmanā ।।kuryācchivena saumyena śivatīrthaṃ bhujakramāt ।sarvāṅgamaṅgajaptena mūrdhādicaraṇāvadhi ।।dakṣiṇena samālabhya paṭhannaṅgacatuṣṭayam ।pidhāya khāni sarvāṇi sammukhīkaraṇena ca ।।śivaṃ smarannimajjeta hariṃ gaṅgeti vā smaran ।vauṣaḍantaṣaḍaṅgena ke kuryādabhiṣecanaṃ ।।kumbhamātreṇa rakṣārthaṃ pūrvādau nikṣipejjalaṃ ।snātvā rajopacāreṇa sugandhāmalakādibhiḥ ।।snātvā cottīrya tattīrthaṃ saṃhāriṇyopasaṃharet ।athāto vidhiśuddhena saṃhitāmantritena ca ।।nivṛtyādiviśuddhena bhasmanā snānamācaret ।śirastaḥ pādaparyantaṃ hrūṃ phaḍantaśarātmanā ।।tena kṛtvā malasnānaṃ vidhisnānaṃ samācaret ।

krūṃ phaḍantaśarātmanā iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

krūṃ phaḍantaśarātmanā iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
īśatatpuruṣāghoraguhyakājātasañcaraiḥ ।।krameṇoddhūnayenmūrdhni vaktrahṛdguhyavigrahāt ।sandhyātraye niśīthe ca varṣāpūrvāvasānayoḥ ।।suptvā bhuktvā payaḥ pītvā kṛtvā cāvaśyakādikam ।strīpunnapuṃsakaṃ śūdraṃ viḍālaśaśamūṣikam ।।snānamāgneyakaṃ spṛṣṭvā śucā vuddhūlakaṃ caret ।sūryāṃśuvarṣasamparkaiḥ prāṅmukhenordhvabāhunā ।।māhendraṃ snānamaiśena kāryaṃ saptapadāvadhi ।gosaṅghamadhyagaḥ kuryāt khurotkhātakareṇubhiḥ ।।pāvanaṃ navamantreṇa snānantadvarmaṇāthavā ।sadyojātādibhirmantrair ambhobhirabhiṣecanam ।।mantrasnānaṃ bhavedevaṃ vāruṇāgneyayorapi ।manasā mūlamantreṇa prāṇāyāmapuraḥsaram ।।kurvīta mānasaṃ snānaṃ sarvatra vihitaṃ ca yat ।vaiṣṇavādau ca tanmantrair evaṃ snānādi kārayet ।।sandhyāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi mantrair bhinnaiḥ samaṃ guha ।saṃvīkṣya triḥ pivedambu brahmatīrthena śaṅkaraiḥ ।।svadhāntair ātmatattvādyaistataḥ khāni spṛśeddhṛdā ।śakalīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prāṇāyāmena saṃsthitaḥ ।।triḥ samāvartayen mantrī manasā śivasaṃhitāṃ ।ācamya nyasya sandhyāñca brāhmīṃ prātaḥ smarennaraḥ ।।haṃsapadmāsanāṃ raktāṃ caturvaktrāṃ caturbhujāṃ ।
