guhyakājātasaṃravair iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tatkharotkhātareṇubhiriti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

smarettata iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
praskandamālinīṃ dakṣe vāme daṇḍakamaṇḍaluṃ ।।tārkṣyapadmāsanāṃ dhyāyenmadhyāhne vaiṣṇavīṃ sitāṃ ।śaṅkhacakradharāṃ vāme dakṣiṇe sagadābhayaṃ ।।raudrīṃ dhyāyed vṛṣābjasthāṃ trinetrāṃ śaśibhūṣitāṃ ।triśūlākṣadharāṃ dakṣe vāme sābhayaśaktikāṃ ।।sākṣiṇīṃ karmaṇāṃ sandhyāṃ ātmānaṃtatprabhānugaṃ ।caturthī jñāninaḥ sandhyā niśīthādau vibhāvyate ।।hṛdbindubrahmarandhreṣu arūpā tu pare sthitā ।śivabodhaparā yā tu sā sandhyā maramocyate ।।paitryaṃ mūle pradeśinyāḥ kaniṣṭhāyāḥ prajāpateḥ ।brāhmyamaṅguṣṭhamūlasthaṃ tīrthaṃ daivaṃ karāgrataḥ ।।savyapāṇitale vahnestīrthaṃ somasya vāmataḥ ।ṛṣīṇāṃ tu samagreṣu aṅgulīparvasandhiṣu ।।tataḥ śivātmakair mantraiḥ kṛtvā tīrthaṃ śivātmakaṃ ।mārjanaṃ saṃhitāmantraistattoyena samācaret ।।vāmapāṇipatattoyayojanaṃ savyapāṇinā ।uttamāṅge kramānmantrair mārjanaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ ।।nītvā tadupanāsāgraṃ dakṣapāṇipuṭasthitaṃ ।bodharūpaṃ sitaṃ toyaṃ vāmamākṛṣya stambhayet ।।tatpāpaṃ kajjalābhāsampiṅgayāricya muṣṭinā ।kṣipedvajraśilāyāntu tadbhavedaghamarṣaṇaṃ ।।svāhāntaśivamantreṇa kuśapuṣpākṣatānvitaṃ ।śivāyārghyāñjalindatvā gāyatrīṃ śaktito japet ।।

dākṣiṇyaḥ karmaṇāṃ sandhyā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kumbhayediti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tarpaṇaṃ sampravakṣyāmi devatīrthena mantrakāt ।tarpayeddhauṃ śivāyeti svāhānyān svāhayā yutān ।।hrāṃ hṛdyāya hrīṃ śirase hrūṃ śikhāyai hraiṃ kavacāya ।astrāyāṣṭau devagaṇān hṛdādityebhya eva ca ।।hāṃ vasubhyo atha rudrebhyo viśvebhyaś caiva marudbhyaḥ ।bhṛgubhyo hāmaṅgirobhya ṛṣīn kaṇṭhopavītyatha ।।atreye atha vasiṣṭhāya namaścātha pulastaye ।kṛtave bhāradvajāya viśvāmitrāya vai namaḥ ।।pracetase manuṣyāṃś ca sanakāya vaṣaṭ tathā ।hāṃ sanandāya vaṣaṭ sanātanāya vai vaṣaṭ ।।sanatkumārāya vaṣaṭ kapilāya tathā vaṣaṭ ।pañcaśikhāya dyubhave saṃlagnakaramūlataḥ ।।sarvebhyo bhūtebhyo vauṣaṭ bhūtān devapitṝnatha ।dakṣaskandhopavītī ca kuśamūlāgratastilaiḥ ।।kavyabālānalāyātha somāya ca yamāya ca ।aryamṇe cāgnisomāya varhiṣadbhyaḥ svadhāyutān ।।ājyapāya ca somāya viśeṣasuravat pitṝn ।oṃ hāṃ īśānāya pitre svadhā dadyāt pitāmahe ।।śāntaprapitāmahāya tathāpretapitṝṃs tathā ।pitṛbhyaḥ pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhātha prapitāmahe ।।vṛddhaprapitāmahebhyo mātṛbhyaś ca svadhā tathā ।hāṃ mātāmahebhyaḥ svadhā hāṃ pramātāmahebhyaś ca ।।vṛddhapramātāmahebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pitṛbhyas tathā ।

marīcaye pulastyāyeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hāṃ īśānāya pitre ca sadājyāya pitāmahāyeti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sarbhebhyaḥ svadhā jñātibhyaḥ sarvācāryebhya eva ca ।diśāṃ dikpatisiddhānāṃ mātṝṇāṃ graharakṣasāṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye snānādividhirnāma dvisaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trisaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

sūryapūjāvidhiḥ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣye sūryārcanaṃ skanda karāṅganyāsapūrvakaṃ ।ahaṃ tejomayaḥ sūrya iti dhyātvārghyamarcayet ।।pūrayedraktavarṇena lalāṭākṛṣṭavindunā ।taṃ saṃpūjya raveraṅgaiḥ kṛtvā rakṣāvaguṇṭhanaṃ ।।samprokṣya tajjalair dravyaṃ pūrvāsyo bhānumarcayet ।oṃ aṃ hṛdvījādi sarvatra pūjanaṃ daṇḍipiṅgalau ।।dvāri dakṣe vāmapārśve īśāne aṃ gaṇāya ca ।agnau guruṃ pīṭhamadhye prabhūtaṃ cāsanaṃ yajet ।।agnyādau vimalaṃ sāramārādhyaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ ।sitaraktapītanīlavarṇān siṃhanibhān yajet ।।padmamadhye rāṃ ca dīptāṃ rīṃ sūkṣmāṃ raṃ jayāṃkramāt ।rūṃ bhadrāṃ reṃ vibhūtīś ca vimalāṃ raimamoghayā ।।roṃ rauṃ vidyutā śaktiṃ pūrvādyāḥ sarvatomukhāḥ ।

oṃ hāṃ hṛdvījādīti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ruṃ jayāṃ kramāditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
raṃ madhye arkāsanaṃ syāt sūryamūrtiṃ ṣaḍakṣaraṃ ।।oṃ haṃ khaṃ kholkayeti yajedāvāhya bhāskaraṃ ।lalāṭākṛṣṭamañjalyāṃ dhyātvā raktaṃ nyasedraviṃ ।।hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namo mudrayāvāhanādikaṃ ।vidhāya prītaye vimbamudrāṃ gandhādikaṃ dadet ।।padmamudrāṃ bilvamudrāṃ pradarśyāgnau hṛdīritaṃ ।oṃ āṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ arkāya śirase tathā ।।bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ sureśāya śikhāyai nairṛte yajet ।huṃ kavacāya vāyavye hāṃ netrāyeti madhyataḥ ।।vaḥ astrāyeti pūrvādau tato mudrāḥ pradarśayet ।dhenumudrā hṛdādīnāṃ goviṣāṇā ca netrayoḥ ।।astrasya trāsanī yojyā grahaṇāṃ ca namaskriyā ।soṃ somaṃ buṃ budhaṃ vṛñca jīvaṃ bhaṃ bhārgavaṃ yajet ।।dale pūrvādike agnyādau aṃ bhaumaṃ śaṃ śanaiś caraṃ ।raṃ rāhuṃ keṃ ketave ca gandhādyaiś ca khakholkayā ।।mūlaṃ japtvārghyapātrāmbu datvā sūryāya saṃstutiḥ ।natvā parāṅmukhañcārkaṃ kṣamasveti tato vadet ।।śarāṇunā phaḍantena samāhatyāṇusaṃhṛtiṃ ।

hrīṃ hraṃ hraiṃ sa iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sureśāya jvāliniśikhāyai iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

krūṃ kavacāya iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

hrīṃ netrāyetīti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । bhāṃ netrāyeti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

parāṅmukhañcārghyamiti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śavānunā phaḍantena samāhṛtyānusaṃhatimiti kha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ । śavāṇunā phaḍantena samahatyārthaṃ saṃhatimiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
hṛtpadme śivasūryetisaṃhāriṇyopasaṃskṛtiṃ ।।yojayettejaś caṇḍāya ravinirmālyamarpayet ।abhyarcyaiśe japāddhyānāddhomātsarvaṃ raverbhavet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye sūryapūjā nāma trisaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuḥsaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

śivapūjākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
śivapūjāṃ pravakṣyāmi ācamya praṇavārghyavān ।dvāramastrāmbunā prokṣya homādidvārapānyajet ।।gaṇaṃ sarasvatīṃ lakṣmīmūrdhvodumbarake yajet ।nandigaṅge dakṣiṇe atha sthite vāmagate yajet ।।mahākālaṃ ca yamunāṃ divyadṛṣṭinipātitaḥ ।utsārya divyān vighnāṃś ca puṣpākṣepāntarikṣagān ।।dakṣapārṣṇitribhirghātaibhūmiṣṭhānyāgamandiraṃ ।dehalīṃ laṅghayedvāmaśākhāmāśritya vai viśet ।।praviśya dakṣapādena vinyasyāstramudumbare ।oṃ hāṃ vāstvadhipataye brahmaṇe madhyato yajet ।।

saṃhāriṇyopasaṃhatamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
saṃhāriṣṇopasaṃhṛtamiti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

abhyarcya ceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dakṣaśākhāsthite iti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
nirīkṣaṇādibhiḥ śastraiḥ śuddhānādāya gaḍḍukān ।labdhānujñaḥ śivānmaunī gaṅgādikamanuvrajet ।।pavitrāṅgaḥ prajaptena vastrapūtena vāriṇā ।pūrayedambudhau tāṃstān gayatryā hṛdayena vā ।।gandhakākṣata puṣpādisarvadravyasamuccayaṃ ।sannidhīkṛtya pūjārthaṃ bhūtaśuddhādi kārayet ।।devadakṣe tato nyasya saumyāsyaś ca śarīrataḥ ।saṃhāramudrayādāya mūrdhni mantreṇa dhārayet ।।bhogyakarmopabhogārthaṃ pāṇikacchapikākhyayā ।hṛdambuje nijātmānaṃ dvādaśāntapade athavā ।।śodhayet pañcabhūtāni sañcintya śuṣirantanau ।caraṇāṅguṣṭhayoryugmān śuṣirāntarvahiḥ smaret ।।śaktiṃ hṛdvyāpinīṃ paścāddhūṅkāre pāvakaprabhe ।randhramadhyasthite kṛtvā prāṇarodhaṃ hi cintakaḥ ।।niveśayedrecakānte phaḍantenātha tena ca ।hṛtkaṇṭhatālubhrūmadhyabrahmarandhre vibhidya ca ।।

gandhakān iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । luḍḍukāniti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
guḍḍukākṣateti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।gaṇḍūkākṣateti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
saumyāsyaḥ svaśarīrata iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

mūrtimantreṇeti ga, gha, ṅa, cihinitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

svaśirastanau iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

paścādoṅkāre iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

candramadhyasthite iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ cakramadhyasthite iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nivodhayedrecakānte iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
granthīnnirbhidya hūṅkāraṃ mūrdhni vinyasya jīvanaṃ ।sampuṭaṃ hṛdayenātha pūrakāhitacetanaṃ ।।hūṃ śikhopari vinyasya śuddhaṃ vindvātmakaṃ smaret ।kṛtvātha kumbhakaṃ śambhau ekodghātena yojayet ।।recakena vījavṛttyā śive līno atha śodhayet ।pratilomaṃ svadehe tu vindvantaṃ tatra vindukaṃ ।।layannītvā mahīvātau jalavahnī parasparaṃ ।dvau dvau sādhyau tathākāśamavirodhena tacchṛṇu ।।pārthivaṃ maṇḍalaṃ pītaṃ kaṭhinaṃ vajralāñchitaṃ ।haumityātmīyavījena tannivṛttikalāmayaṃ ।।padādārabhya mūrdhānaṃ vicintya caturasrakaṃ ।udghātapañcakenaiva vāyubhūtaṃ vicintayet ।।ardhacandraṃ dravaṃ saumyaṃ śubhrasambhojalāñchitaṃ ।hrīmityanena vījena pratiṣṭhārūpatāṃ gataṃ ।।saṃyuktaṃ rāmamantreṇa puruṣāntamakāraṇaṃ ।arghyañcaturbhirudghātair vahnibhūtaṃ viśodhayet ।।āgneyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tryastraṃ raktaṃ svastikalāñchitaṃ ।hūmityanena vījena vidyārūpaṃ vibhāvayet ।।ghorāṇutribhirudghātair jalabhūtaṃ viśodhayet ।

viṣṇvātmakamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

svahetau tu iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
haumityunnīya vījeneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।haumityāgneyavījeneti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ardhacandraṃ tataḥ saumye śivaṃ pūrveṇa yojayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vāmaṃ mantreṇeti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । vā samantreṇeti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ṣaḍasraṃ maṇḍalaṃ vāyorvindubhiḥ ṣaḍbhiraṅkitaṃ ।।kṛṣṇaṃ hremiti vījena jātaṃ śāntikalāmayaṃ ।sañcityodghātayugmena pṛthvībhūtaṃ viśodhayet ।।nabhovindumayaṃ vṛttaṃ vinduśaktivibhūṣitaṃ ।vyomākāraṃ suvṛttañca śuddhasphaṭikanirmalaṃ ।।hauṅkāreṇa phaḍantena śāntyatītakalāmayaṃ ।dhyātvaikodghātayogena suviśuddhaṃ vibhāvayet ।।āpyāyayettataḥ sarvaṃ mūlenāmṛtavarṣiṇā ।ādhārākhyāmanantañca dharmajñānādipaṅkajaṃ ।।hṛdāsanamidaṃ dhyātvā mūrtimāvāhayettataḥ ।sṛṣṭyā śivamayaṃ tasyāmātmānaṃ dvādaśāntataḥ ।।atha tāṃ śaktimantreṇa vauṣaḍantena sarvataḥ ।divyāmṛtena samplāvya kurvīta sakalīkṛtaṃ ।।hṛdayādikarānteṣu kaniṣṭhādyaṅgulīṣu ca ।hṛdādimantravinyāsaḥ sakalīkaraṇaṃ mataṃ ।।astreṇa rakṣya prākāraṃ tanmantreṇātha tadvahiḥ ।śaktijālamadhaścordhvaṃ mahāmudrāṃ pradarśayet ।।āpadamastakaṃ yāvad bhāvapuṣpaiḥ śivaṃ hṛdi ।padme yajet pūrakeṇa ākṛṣṭāmṛtasadghṛtaiḥ ।।śivamantrair nābhikuṇḍe tarpayeta śivānalaṃ ।

mūlenāmṛtasecanāditi ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hṛdyāsanamidamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hṛdayādiṣaḍaṅgena iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tāvat puṣpair iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
lalāṭe vindurūpañca cintayecchubhavigrahaṃ ।।ekaṃ svarṇādipātrāṇāṃ pātramastrāmbuśodhitaṃ ।vinduprasūtapīyūṣarūpatoyākṣatādinā ।।hṛdāpūrya ṣaḍaṅgena pūjayitvābhimantrayet ।saṃrakṣya heti mantreṇa kavacena viguṇṭhayet ।।racayitvārghyamaṣṭāṅgaṃ secayeddhenumudrayā ।abhiṣiñcedathātmānaṃ mūrdhni tattoyavindunā ।।tatrasthaṃ yāgasambhāraṃ prokṣayedastravāriṇā ।abhimantrya hṛdā piṇḍaistanutrāṇena veṣṭayet ।।darśayitvāmṛtāṃ mudrāṃ puṣpaṃ datvā nijāsane ।vidhāya tilakaṃ mūrdhni puṣpaṃ mūlena yojayet ।।snāne devārcane home bhojane yāgayogayoḥ ।āvaśyake jape dhīraḥ sadā vācaṃyamo bhavet ।।nādāntoccāraṇānmantraṃ śodhayitvā susaṃskṛtaṃ ।pūjane abhyarcya gāyatryā sāmānyārghyamupāharet ।।brahmapañcakamāvartya mālyamādāya liṅgataḥ ।aiśānyāndiśi caṇḍāya hṛdayena nivedayet ।।prakṣālya piṇdikāliṅge astratoye tato hṛdā ।arghyapātrāmbunā siñcediti liṅgaviśodhanaṃ ।।ātamadravyamantraliṅgaśuddhau sarvān surānyajet ।vāyavye gaṇapataye hāṃ gurubhyo arcayecchive ।।

cintayet saparigrahamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

rocayeddhenumudrayeti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
ādhāraśaktimaṅkuranibhāṃ kūrmaśilāsthitāṃ ।yajed brahmaśilārūḍhaṃ śivasyānantamāsanaṃ ।।vicitrakeśaprakhyānamanyonyaṃ pṛṣṭadarśinaḥ ।kṛtatretādirūpeṇa śivasyāsanapādukāṃ ।।dharmaṃ jñānañca vairāgyamaiśvaryañcāgnidiṅmukhān ।kūrpārakuṅkumasvarṇakajjalābhān yajet kramāt ।।padmañca karṇikāmadhye pūrvādau madhyato nava ।varadābhayahastāś ca śaktayo dhṛtacāmarāḥ ।।vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrī ca kālī kalavikāriṇī ।balavikaraṇī pūjyā balapramathanī kramāt ।।hāṃ sarvabhūtadamanī keśarāgre manonmanī ।kṣittyādi śuddhavidyāntu tattvavyāpakamāsanaṃ ।।nyaset siṃhāsane devaṃ śuklaṃ pañcamukhaṃ vibhuṃ ।daśabāhuṃ ca khaṇḍenduṃ dadhānandakṣiṇaiḥ karaiḥ ।।śaktyṛṣṭiśūlakhaṭvāṅgavaradaṃ vāmakaiḥ karaiḥ ।ḍamaruṃ vījapurañca nīlābjaṃ sūtrakotpalaṃ ।।dvātriṃśallakṣaṇopetāṃ śaivīṃ mūrtintu madhyataḥ ।hāṃ haṃ hāṃ śivamūrtaye svaprakāśaṃ śivaṃ smaran ।।brahmādikāraṇatyāgānmantraṃ nītvā śivāspadaṃ ।tato lalātamadhyasthaṃ sphurattārāpatiprabhaṃ ।।ṣaḍaṅgena samākīrṇaṃ vindurūpaṃ paraṃ śivaṃ ।puṣpāñjaligataṃ dhyātvā lakṣmīmūrtau niveśayet ।।oṃ hāṃ hauṃ śivāya nama āvāhanyā hṛddā tataḥ ।āvāhya sthāpya sthāpanyā sannidhāyāntikaṃ śivaṃ ।।nirodhayenniṣṭhurayā kālakāntyā phaḍantataḥ ।

vighnānutsārya viṣṭhyātha liṅgamudrāṃ namaskṛtiṃ ।।hṛdāvaguṇṭhayet paścādāvāhaḥ sammukhī tataḥ ।niveśanaṃ sthāpanaṃ syātsannidhānaṃ tavāsmi bhoḥ ।।ākarmakāṇḍaparyantaṃ sannedheyoparikṣayaḥ ।svabhakteś ca prakāśoyastadbhavedavaguṇṭhanaṃ ।।sakalīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā mantraiḥ ṣaḍbhirathaikatāṃ ।aṅgānāmaṅginā sārdhaṃ vidadhyādamṛtīkṛtaṃ ।।cicchaktihṛdayaṃ śambhoḥ śiva aiśvaryamaṣṭadhā ।śikhāvaśitvaṃ cābhedyaṃ tejaḥ kavacamaiśvaraṃ ।।pratāpo duḥsahaścāstramantarāyāpahārakaṃ ।namaḥ svadhā ca svāhā ca vauṣaṭ ceti yathākramaṃ ।।hṛtpuraḥsaramuccārya pādyādīni nivedayet ।pādyaṃ pādāmbujadvandve vaktreṣvācamanīyakaṃ ।।arghyaṃ śirasi devasya dūrvāpuṣpākṣatāni ca ।evaṃ saṃskṛtya saṃskārair daśabhiḥ parameśvaraṃ ।।yajet pañcopacāreṇa vidhinā kusumādibhiḥ ।abhyukṣyoddhartya nirmbhañjya rājikālavaṇādibhiḥ ।।arghyodavindupuṣpādyair gaḍḍūkaiḥ snāpayecchanaiḥ ।payodadhighṛtakṣaudraśarkarādyair anukramāt ।।īśādimantritardravyair arcya teṣāṃ viparyayaḥ ।

choṭyātha iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

abhuktejyā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śivamaiśvaryamaṣṭadhā iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

gandhakair iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ity ādimantritair bhakṣyaiś caiṣāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
toyadhūpāntaraiḥ sarvair mūlena snapayecchivaṃ ।।virūkṣya yavacūrṇena yatheṣṭaṃ śītalair jalaiḥ ।svaśaktyā gandhatoyena saṃsnāpya śucivāsasā ।।nirmārjyārghyaṃ pradadyācca nopari bhrāmayet karaṃ ।na śūnyamastakaṃ liṅgaṃ puṣpaiḥ kuryāttato dadet ।।candanādyaiḥ samālabhya puṣpaiḥ prārcya śivāṇunā ।dhūpabhājanamastreṇa prokṣyābhyarcya śivāṇunā ।।astreṇa pūjitāṃ ghaṇṭāṃ cādāya guggulaṃ dadet ।dadyādācamanaṃ paścāt svadhāntaṃ hṛdayāṇunā ।।ārātrikaṃ samuttārya tathaivācāmayet punaḥ ।praṇamyādāya devājñāṃ bhogāṅgāni prapūjayet ।।hṛdagnau candrabhaṃ caiśe śivaṃ cāmīkaraprabhaṃ ।śikhāṃ raktāñca nairṛtye kṛṣṇaṃ varma ca vāyave ।।caturvaktraṃ caturbāhuṃ dalasthān pūjayedimān ।daṃṣṭrākarālamapyastraṃ pūrvādau vajrasannibhaṃ ।।mūle hauṃ śivāya namaḥ oṃ hāṃ hūṃ hīṃ hoṃ śiraś ca ।hṛṃ śikhāyai haiṃ varma haścāstraṃ parivārayutāya ca ।।śivāya dadyāt pādyañca ācāmañcārghyameva ca ।gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpadīpaṃ naivedyācamanīyakaṃ ।।karodvartanatāmbūlaṃ mukhavāsañca darpaṇaṃ ।

śivātmaneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śivātmaneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hṛdayātmaneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

caturvaktrāṃś caturbāhūn iti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

dalāgre iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śirasyāropya devasya dūrvākṣatapavitrakaṃ ।।mūlamaṣṭaśataṃ japtvā hṛdayenābhimantritaṃ ।carmaṇāveṣṭitaṃ khaḍgaṃ rakṣitaṃ kuśapuṣpakaiḥ ।।akṣatair mudrāyā yuktaṃ śivamudbhavasañjñayā ।guhyātiguhyaguptyarthaṃ gṛhāṇāsmatkṛtaṃ japaṃ ।।siddhirbhavatu me yena tvatprasādāttvayi sthite ।bhogī ślokaṃ paṭhitvādyaṃ dakṣahastena śambhave ।।mūlāṇunārghyatoyena varahaste nivedayet ।yatkiñcit kurmahe deva sadā sukṛtaduskṛtaṃ ।।tanme śivapadasthasya hūṃ kṣaḥ kṣepaya śaṅkara ।śivo dātā śivo bhoktā śivaḥ sarvamidaṃ jagat ।।śivo jayati sarvatra yaḥ śivaḥ sohameva ca ।ślokadvayamadhītyaivaṃ japaṃ devāya cārpayet ।।śivāṅgānāṃ daśāṃśañca datvārghyaṃ stutimācaret ।pradakṣiṇīkṛtya nameccāṣṭāṅgañcāṣṭamūrtaye ।natvā dhyānādibhiś caiva yajeccitre analādiṣu ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye śivapūjā nāma catuḥsaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

namedaṣtāṅgamūrtaye iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

agnisthāpanādividhiḥ

īśvara uvāca
arghapātrakaro yāyādagnyāgāraṃ susaṃvṛtaḥ ।yāgopakaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ divyadṛṣṭyā ca kalpayet ।।udaṅmukhaḥ kuṇḍamīkṣet praokṣaṇaṃ tāḍanaṃkuśaiḥ ।vidadhyādastramantreṇa varmaṇābhyukṣaṇaṃ mataṃ ।।khaḍgena khātamuddhāraṃ pūraṇaṃ samatāmapi ।kurvīta varmaṇā sekaṃ kuṭṭanantu śarātmanā ।।sammārjanaṃ samālepaṃ kalārūpaprakalpanaṃ ।trisūtrīparidhānaṃ ca varmaṇābhyarcanaṃ sadā ।।rekhātrayamudak kuryādekāṃ pūrvānanāmadhaḥ ।kuśena ca śivāstreṇa yadvā tāsāṃ viparyayaḥ ।।vajrīkaraṇamantreṇa hṛdā darbhaiś catuṣpathaṃ ।akṣapātrantatanutreṇa vinyasedviṣṭaraṃ hṛdā ।।hṛdā vāgīśvarīṃ tatra īśāmāvāhya pūjayet ।vahniṃ sadāśrayānītaṃ śuddhapātroparisthitaṃ ।।kravyādāṃśaṃ parityajya vīkṣaṇādiviśodhitaṃ ।audaryaṃ caindavaṃ bhautaṃ ekīkṛtyānalatrayaṃ ।।oṃ hūṃ vahnicaitanyāya vahnivījena vinyaset ।saṃhitāmantritaṃ vahniṃ dhenumudrāmṛtīkṛtaṃ ।।rakṣitaṃ hetimantreṇa kavacenāvaguṇṭhitaṃ ।pūjitantriḥ paribhrāmya kuṇḍasyordhvaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।

divyadṛṣṭyā vilpkayediti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

śarāṇuneti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śivavījamiti dhyātvā vāgīśāgarbhagocare ।vāgīśvareṇa devena kṣipyamānaṃ vibhāvayet ।।bhūmiṣṭhajānukko mantrī hṛdātmasammukhaṃ kṣipet ।tato antasthitavījasya nābhideśe samūhanaṃ ।।sambhṛtiṃ paridhānasya śaucamācamanaṃ hṛdā ।garbhāgneḥ pūjanaṃ kṛtvā tadrakṣārthaṃ śarāṇunā ।।badhnīyādgarbhajaṃ devyāḥ kakaṅkaṇaṃ pāṇipallave ।garbhādhānāya sampūjya sadyojātena pāvakaṃ ।।tato hṛdayamantreṇa juhuyādāhutitrayaṃ ।puṃsavanāya vāmena tṛtīye yāsi pūjayet ।।āhutitritayaṃ dadyācchirasāmbukaṇānvitaṃ ।sīmantonnayanaṃ ṣaṣṭhe māsi sampūjya rūpiṇā ।।juhuyādāhutīstisraḥ śikhayā śikhayaiva tu ।vaktrāṅgakalpanāṃ kuryādvaktrodghāṭananiṣkṛtī ।।jātakarmanṛkarmabhyāṃ daśame māsi pūrvavat ।vahniṃ sandhukṣya darbhādyaiḥ snānaṃ garbhamalāpahaṃ ।।suvarṇabandhanaṃ devyā kṛtaṃ dhyātvā hṛdārcayet ।sadyaḥsūtakanāśāya prokṣayedastravāriṇā ।।kumbhantu vahirastreṇa tāḍayedvarmaṇokṣayet ।astreṇottarapūrvāgrānmekhalāsu vahiḥ kuśān ।।

tatontasthitadevasya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śarātmanā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gandhādyair iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kuṇḍantu iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
āsthāpya sthāpayetteṣu hṛdā paridhivistaraṃ ।vaktāṇāmastramantreṇa tato nālāpannuttaye ।।samidhiḥ pañca hotavyāḥ prānte mūle ghṛtaplutāḥ ।brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ viṣṇumanantañca hṛdārcayet ।।dūrvākṣataiś ca paryantaṃ paridhisthānanukramāt ।indrādīśānaparyantāntānviṣṭarasthānanukramāt ।।agnerabhimukhībhūtān nijadikṣu hṛdārcayet ।nivārya vighnasaṅghātaṃ vālakaṃ pālayiṣyatha ।।śaivīmājñābhimānteṣāṃ śrāvayettadanantaraṃ ।gṛhītvā sruksruvāvūrdhvavadanādhomukhaiḥ kramāt ।।pratāpyāgnau tridhā darbhamūlamadhyāgrakaiḥ spṛśet ।kuśaspṛṣṭapradeśe tu ātmavidyāśivātmakaṃ ।।kramāttattvatrayaṃ nyasya hāṃ hīṃ hūṃ saṃ ravaiḥ kramāt ।sruvi śaktiṃ sruve śambhuṃ vinyasya hṛdayāṇunā ।।trisūtrīveṣṭitagrīvo pūjitau kusumādibhiḥ ।kuśānāmupariṣṭāttau sthāpayitvā svadakṣiṇe ।।gavyamājyaṃ samādāya vīkṣaṇādiviśodhitaṃ ।svakāṃ brahmamayīṃ mūrtiṃ sañcintyādāya tadghṛtaṃ ।।kuṇḍasyordhvaṃ hṛdāvartya bhrāmayitvāgnigocare ।punarviṣṇumayīṃ dhyātvā ghṛtamīśānagocare ।।dhṛtvādāya kuśāgreṇa svāhāntaṃ śirasāṇunā ।

āstīryeti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustadvayapāṭhaḥ

hāṃ hrīṃ hraṃ samiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । hūṃ hāṃ krūṃ samiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śirasātmanā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
juhuyādviṣṇave vinduṃ rudrarūpamanantaraṃ ।।bhāvayannijamātmānaṃ nābhau dhṛtvāplavettataḥ ।prādeśamātradarbhābhyāmaṅguṣṭānāmikāgrakaiḥ ।।dhṛtābhyāṃ sammukhaṃ vahnerastreṇāplavamācaret ।hṛdātmasammukhaṃ tadvat kuryāt samplavanantataḥ ।।hṛdālabdhadagdhadarbhaṃ śastrakṣepāt pavitayet ।dīptenāparadarbheṇa nivāhyānena dīpayet ।।astramantreṇa nirdagdhaṃ vahnau darbhaṃ punaḥ kṣipet ।kṣiptvā ghṛte kṛtagranthikuśaṃ prādeśasammitaṃ ।।pakṣadvayamiḍādīnāṃ trayaṃ cājye vibhāvayet ।krāmādbhāgatrayādājyaṃ sruveṇādāya homayet ।।svetyagnau hā ghṛte bhāgaṃ śeṣamājyaṃ kṣipet kramāt ।
oṃ hāṃ agnaye svāhā । oṃ hāṃ somāya svāhā । oṃ hāṃ agnīṣomābhyāṃ svāhā
udghāṭanāya netrāṇāṃ agnernetratraye mukhe ।।sruveṇa ghṛtapūrṇena caturthīmāhutiṃ yajet ।
oṃ hāṃ agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāhā abhimantrya ṣaḍaṅgena bodhayeddhenumudrayā ।। avaguṇṭhya tanutreṇa rakṣedājyaṃ śarāṇunā । hṛdājyavinduvikṣepāt kuryādabhyukṣya śodhanaṃ ।। vaktrābhighārasandhānāṃ vaktraikīkaraṇaṃ tathā । oṃ hāṃ sadyojātāya svāhā । oṃ hāṃ vāmadevāya svāhā । oṃ hāṃ

svāhetyagnau ghṛte iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śarātmaneti ṇa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

aghorāya svāhā । oṃ tatpuruṣāya svāhā । oṃ hāṃ īśānāya svāhā
ityekaikaghṛtāhutyā kuryādvaktrābhighārakaṃ ।।
auṃ hāṃ sadyojātavāmadevābhyāṃ svāhā । oṃ hāṃ vāmadevāghorābhyāṃ svāhā । oṃ hāṃ aghoratatpuruṣābhyāṃ svāhā । oṃ hāṃ tatpuruṣeśānābhyāṃ svāhā
itivaktrānusandhānaṃ mantrair ebhiḥ kramāccaret ।agrito gatayā vāyuṃ nirṛtādiśivāntayā ।।vaktrāṇāmekatāṃ kuryāt sruveṇa ghṛtaghārayā ।oṃ hāṃ sadyojātavāmadevāghoratatpuruṣeśānebhyaḥ svāhā ।।itīṣṭavaktre vaktrāṇāmantarbhāvastadākṛtiḥ ।।īśena vahnimabhyarcya datvāstreṇāhutitrayaṃ ।kuryāt sarvātmanā nāma śivāgnistvaṃ hutāśana ।।hṛdārcitau visṛṣṭāgnau pitarau vidhipūraṇīṃ ।mūlena vauṣaḍantena dadyāt pūrṇāṃ yathāvidhi ।।tato hṛdambuje sāṅgaṃ sasenaṃ bhāsuraṃ paraṃ ।yajet pūrvavadāvāhya prārthyājñāntarpayecchivaṃ ।।yāgāgniśivayoḥ kṛtvā nāḍīsandhānamātmanā ।śaktyā mūlāṇunā homaṃ kuryādaṅgair daśāṃśataḥ ।।ghṛtasya kārṣiko homaḥ kṣīrasya madhunas tathā ।śaktimātrāhutirdadhnaḥ prasṛtiḥ pāyasyatu ।।yathāvat sarvabhakṣāṇāṃ lājānāṃ muṣṭisammitaṃ ।khaṇḍatrayantu mūlānāṃ kalānāṃ svapramāṇataḥ ।।

sasenaṃ bhāskaraṃ paramiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । śāsanaṃ bhāskaraṃ paramiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । śāśanaṃ bhāsraṃ paramiti ṅa cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । śāsanaṃ tryakṣaraṃ paramiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
grāsārdhamātramannānāṃ sūkṣmāṇi pañca homayet ।ikṣorāparvikaṃ mānaṃ latānāmaṅguladvayaṃ ।।puṣpaṃ patraṃ svamānena samidhāṃ tu daśāṅgulaṃ ।candracandanakāśmīrakastūrīyakṣakardamān ।।kalāyasammitānenān guggulaṃ vadarāsthivat ।kandānāmaṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ juhuyādvidhivat paraṃ ।।homaṃ nirvartayedevaṃ brahmavījapadaistataḥ ।ghṛtena sruci pūrṇāyāṃ nidhāyādhomukhaṃ sruvaṃ ।।srugagre puṣpamāropya paścādvāmena pāṇinā ।punaḥ savyena tau dhṛtvā śaṅkhasannibhamudrayā ।।samudgato ardhakāyaś ca samapādaḥ samitthitaḥ ।nābhau tanmūlamādhāya srugagravyagralocanaḥ ।।brahmādikāraṇātyāgādviniḥsṛtya suṣumṇayā ।vāmastanāntamānīya tayormūlamatandritaḥ ।।mūlamantramavispaṣṭaṃ vauṣaḍantaṃ samuccaret ।tadagnau juhuyādājyaṃ yavasammitadhārayā ।।ācāmaṃ candanaṃ datvā tāmbūlaprabhṛtīnapi ।bhaktyā tadbhūtimāvandya vidadhyātpraṇatiṃ parāṃ ।।tato vahniṃ samabhyarcya paḍantāstreṇa saṃvarān ।saṃhāramudrayāhṛtya kṣamasvetyabhidhāya ca ।।bhāsurān paridhīstāṃś ca pūrakeṇa hṛdāṇunā ।

viniḥsṛtya svapṛṣṭayā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।viniḥsṛtya svapuṣṭayā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bhāsvarāniti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hṛdātmaneti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śraddhayā parayātmīye sthāpayeta hṛdambuje ।।sarvapākāgramādāya kṛtvā maṇḍalakadvayaṃ ।antarvahirbaliṃ dadyādāgneyyāṃ kuṇḍasannidhau ।।oṃ hāṃ rudrebhyaḥ svāhā pūrve mātṛbhyo dakṣiṇe tathā ।vāruṇe hāṃ gaṇebhyaś ca svāhā tebhyastvayaṃ baliḥ ।।uttare hāñca yakṣebhya īśāne hāṃ grahebhya u ।agnau hāmasurebhyaś ca rakṣobhyo nairṛte baliḥ ।।vāyavye hāñca nāgebhyo nakṣatrebhyaś ca madhyataḥ ।hāṃ rāśibhyaḥ svāhā vahnau viśvebhyo nairṛte yathā ।।vāruṇyāṃ kṣetrapālāya antarbalirudāhṛtaḥ ।dvitīye maṇḍale vāhye indyāyāgniyamāya ca ।।nairṛtāya jaleśāya vāyave dhanarakṣiṇe ।īśānāya ca pūrvādau hīśāne brahmaṇe namaḥ ।।nairṛte viṣṇave svāhā vāyasādervahirbaliḥ ।balidvayagatānmantrān saṃhāramudrayāatmani ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye agnikāryaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

kṛtvā ca maṇḍaladvayamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gaṇebhya u iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hāṃ ṛpibhya iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vāyavyāmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । nairṛta iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭsaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

caṇdapūjākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
tataḥ śivāntikaṅgatvā pūjāhomādikaṃ mama ।gṛhāṇa bhagavan puṇyaphalamityabhidhāya ca ।।arghyodakena devāya mudrayodbhavasañjñayā ।hṛdvījapūrvamūlena sthiracitto nivedayet ।।tataḥ pūrvavadabhyarcya stutvā stotraiḥ praṇamya ca ।arghyaṃ parāṅmukhaṃ datvā kṣamasvetyabhidhāya ca ।।nārācamudrayāstreṇa phaḍantenātmasañcayaṃ ।saṃhṛtya divyayā liṅgaṃ mūrtimantreṇa yojayet ।।sthaṇḍile tvarcite deve mantrasaṅghātamātmani ।niyojya vidhinoktena vidadhyāccaṇḍapūjanaṃ ।।oṃ caṇḍeśānāya namo madhyataś caṇḍamūrtaye ।oṃ dhūlicaṇḍeśvarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā tamāhṇayet ।।caṇḍahṛdayāya hūṃ phaṭ oṃ caṇḍaśirase tathā ।oṃ caṇḍaśikhāyai hūṃ phaṭ caṇḍāyuḥ kavacāya ca ।।caṇḍastrāya tathā hūṃ phaṭ caṇḍaṃ rudrāgnijaṃ smaret ।śūlaṭaṅkadharaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sākṣasūtrakaṇḍaluṃ ।।ṭaṅkākare ardhacandre vā caturvaktraṃ prapūjayet ।

oṃ balicaṇḍeśvarāya iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

krūṃ phaḍiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hūṃ caṇḍaśirase svāheti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hūṃ phaṭ caṇdata iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

ṭaṅkāreṇārdhacandre iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
yathāśakti japaṃ kuryādaṅgānāntu daśāṃśataḥ ।।gobhūhiraṇyavastrādimaṇihemādibhūṣaṇaṃ ।vihāya śesanirmālyaṃ caṇḍeśāya nivedayet ।।lehyacoṣyādyanuvaraṃ tāmbūlaṃ sragvilepanaṃ ।nirmālyaṃ bhojanaṃ tubhyaṃ pradattantu śivājñayā ।।sarvametat kriyākāṇḍaṃ mayā caṇḍa tavājñayā ।nyūnādhikaṃ kṛtaṃ mohāt paripūrṇaṃ sadāstu me ।।iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ datvārghyaṃ tasya saṃsmaran ।saṃhāramūrtimantreṇa śanaiḥ saṃhāramudrayā ।।pūrakānvitamūlena mantrānātmani yojayet ।nirmālyāpanayasthānaṃ limpedgomayavāriṇā ।prokṣyārghyādi visṛjyātha ācānto anyatsamācaret ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye caṇḍapūjākathanaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

kapilādipūjāvidhanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
kapilāpūjanaṃ vakṣye ebhirmantrair yajecca gāṃ ।oṃ kapile nande namaḥ oṃ kapile bhadrike namaḥ ।।oṃ kapile suśīle namaḥ kapile surabhiprabhe ।oṃ kapile sumanase namaḥ oṃ bhuktimuktiprade namaḥ ।।saurabheyi jaganmātardevānāmamṛtaprade ।gṛhāṇa varade grāsamīpsitārthañca dehi me ।।

vanditāsi vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā ।kapile hara me pāpaṃ yanmayā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ ।।gāvo mamāgrato nityaṃ gāvaḥ pṛṣṭhata eva ca ।gāvo me hṛdaye cāpi gavāṃ madhye vasāmyahaṃ ।।dattaṃ gṛhṇantu me grāsaṃ japtvā syāṃ nirmalaḥ śivaḥ ।prārcya vidyāpustakāni gurupādau namennaraḥ ।।yajet snātvā tu madhyāhne aṣṭapuṣpikayā śivaṃ ।pīṭhamūrtiśivāṅgānāṃ pūjā syādaṣṭapuṣpikā ।।madhyāhne bhojanāgāre sulipte pākamānayet ।tato mṛtyuñjayenaiva vauṣaḍantena saptadhā ।।japtaiḥ sadarbhaśaṅkhasthaiḥ siñcettaṃ vārivindubhiḥ ।sarvapākāgramuddhṛtya śivāya vinivedayet ।।athārdhaṃ cullikāhome vidhānāyopakalpayet ।viśodhya vidhinā cullīṃ tadvahniṃ pūrakāhutiṃ ।।hutvā nābhyagninā caikaṃ tato recakavāyunā ।vahnivījaṃ samādāya kādisthānagatikramāt ।।śivāgnistvamiti dhyātvā cullikāgnau niveśayet ।oṃ hāṃ agnaye namo vai hāṃ somāya vai namaḥ ।।sūryāya vṛhaspataye prajānāṃ pataye namaḥ ।sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyaḥ sarvaviśvebhya eva ca ।।

dattaṃ gṛhāṇeti ga, gha, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

anyārdhamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । antyārdhamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nidhānāyopakalpayediti ca, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
hṛdi sthānamatikramediti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
kādisthānamatikramāditi kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
hāmagnaye khiṣṭikṛte pūrvādāvarcayedimān ।svāhāntāmāhutiṃ datvā kṣamayitvā visarjayet ।।cullyā dakṣiṇabāhau ca yajeddharmāya vai namaḥ ।vāmabāhāvadharmāya kāñjikādikabhāṇḍake ।।rasaparivartamānāya varuṇāya jalāgnaye ।vighnarājo gṛhadvāre peṣaṇyāṃ subhage namaḥ ।।oṃ raudrike namo girike namaś caolūkhale yajet ।balapriyāyāyudhāya namaste muṣale yajet ।।sammārjanyāṃ devatokte kāmāya śayanīyake ।madhyastambhe ca skandāya datvā vāstubaliṃ tataḥ ।।bhuñjīta pātre sauvarṇe padminyādidalādike ।ācāryaḥ sādhakaḥputra samayī maunamāsthitaḥ ।।vaṭāśvatthārkavātāvisarjabhallātakāṃstyajet ।apośānaṃ purādāya prāṇādyaiḥ praṇavānvitaiḥ ।।svāhāntenāhutīḥ pañca datvādīpyodarānalaṃ ।nāgaḥ kūrmo atha kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ ।।etebhya upavāyubhyaḥ svāhāpoṣānavāriṇā ।bhaktādikaṃ nivedyāya piveccheṣodakaṃ naraḥ ।।amṛtopastaraṇamasi prāṇāhutīstato dadet ।prāṇāya svāhāpānāya samānāya tatas tathā ।।udānāya ca vyānāya bhuktvā cullakamācaret ।

jalāśaye iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ raudrakoṭigirike iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakacatuṣṭayapāṭhaḥ

amṛtāpiścānamasīti śarīre annādivāyavaḥ ।।

e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye vāstupūjākathanaṃ nāma saptasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athoṣṭasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ

pavitrārohaṇakathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
pavitrārohaṇaṃ vakṣye kriyārcādiṣu pūraṇaṃ ।nityaṃ tannityamuddiṣṭaṃ naimittikamathāparaṃ ।।āṣāḍhādicaturdaśyāmatha śrāvaṇabhādrayoḥ ।sitāsitāsu kartavyaṃ caturdaśyaṣṭamīṣu tat ।।kuryādvā kārttikīṃ yāvattithau pratipādike ।vahnibrahmāmbikebhāsyanāgaskandārkaśūlināṃ ।।durgāyamendragovindasmaraśambhusudhābhujāṃ ।sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmraṃ kṛtādiṣu yathākramaṃ ।।kalau kārpāsajaṃ cāpi paṭṭapadmādisūtrakaṃ ।praṇavaś candramā vahnirbrahmā nāgo guho hariḥ ।।sarveśaḥ sarvadevāḥ syuḥ krameṇa navatantuṣu ।aṣṭottaraśatānyardhaṃ tadardhaṃ cottamādikaṃ ।।ekāśītyāthavā sūtraistriṃśatāppaṣṭayuktayā ।

śarīronmādavāyava iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

svadhābhujāmiti kha, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

guho raviriti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakacatuṣṭayapāṭhaḥ

sadeśa iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pañcāśatā vā kartavyaṃ tulyagranthyantarālakaṃ ।।dvādaśāṅgulamānāni vyāsādaṣṭāṅgulāni ca ।liṅgavistāramānāni caturaṅgulakāni vā ।।tathaiva piṇḍikāsparśaṃ caturthaṃ sarvadaivataṃ ।gaṅgāvatārakaṃ kāryaṃ sujātena sudhautakaṃ ।।granthiṃ kuryācca vāmena aghoraṇātha śodhayet ।rañjayet puruṣeṇaiva raktacandanakuṅkumaiḥ ।।kastūrīrocanācandrair haridrāgair ikādibhiḥ ।granthayo daśa kartavyā athavā tantusaṅkhyayā ।।antaraṃ vā yathāśobhamekadvicaturaṅgulaṃ ।prakṛtiḥ pauruṣī vīrā caturthī tvaparājitā ।।jayānyā vijayā ṣaṣṭhī ajitā ca sadāśivā ।manonmanī sarvamukhī granthayo abhyadhikāḥ śubhāḥ ।।kāryā vā candravahnyarkapavitraṃ śivavaddhṛdi ।ekaikaṃ nijamūrtau vā puptake guruke gaṇe ।।syādekaikaṃ tathā dvāradikpālakalaśādiṣu ।hastādinavahastāntaṃ liṅgānāṃ syātpavitrakaṃ ।।aṣṭāviṃśatito yuddhaṃ daśabhirdaśabhiḥ kramāt ।dvyaṅgulābhyantarāstatra kramādekāṅgulāntarāḥ ।।granthayo mānamapyeṣāṃ liṅgavistārasasmitaṃ ।saptamyāṃ vā trayodaśyāṃ kṛtanityakriyaḥ śuciḥ ।।bhūṣayet puṣpavastrādyaiḥ sāyāhne yāgamandiraṃ ।

caṇḍavahnyarkapavitramiti kha, ga, ṅa cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

pustake gurave gaṇo iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kṛtvā naimittikīṃ sandhyāṃ viśeṣeṇa ca tarpaṇaṃ ।।parigṛhīte bhūbhāge pavitre sūryamarcayet ।ācamya sakalīkṛtya praṇavārghyakaro guruḥ ।।dvārāṇyastreṇa samprokṣya pūrvādikramato arcayet ।hāṃ śāntikalādvārāya tathā vidyākalātmane ।।nivṛttikalādvārāya pratiṣṭhākhyakalātmane ।tacchākhayoḥ pratidvāraṃ dvau dvau dvārādhipau yajet ।।nandine mahākālāya bhṛṅgiṇe atha gaṇāya ca ।vṛṣabhāya ca skandāya devyai caṇḍāya ca kramāt ।।nityaṃ ca dvārapālādīn praviśya dvārapaścime ।iṣṭvā vāstuṃ bhūtaśuddhiṃ viśeṣārghyakaraḥ śivaḥ ।।prokṣaṇādyaṃ vidhāyātha yajñasambhārakṛnnaraḥ ।mantrayeddarbhadūrvādyaiḥ puṣpādyaiś ca hṛdādibhiḥ ।।śivahastaṃ vidhāyetthaṃ svaśirasyadhiropayet ।śivo ahamādiḥ sarvajño mama yajñapradhānatā ।।atyarthaṃ bhāvayeddevaṃ jñānakhadgakaro guruḥ ।nairṛtīṃ diśamāsādya prakṣipedudagānanaḥ ।।arghyāmbu pañcagavyañca samastān makhamaṇḍape ।catuṣpathāntasaṃskārair vīkṣaṇādyaiḥ susaṃskṛtaiḥ ।।vikṣipya vikirāṃstatra kuśakūrcopasaṃharet ।

sūtrite sūryamarcayediti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakacatuṣṭayapāṭhaḥ

prokṣaṇacceti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vidhāyaikamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

brāhmaṇādyair iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

daśakūrñcopasaṃharediti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
tānīśadiśi vardhanyāmāsanāyopakalpayet ।।nairṛte vāstugīrvāṇā dvāre lakṣmīṃ prapūjayet ।paścimābhimukhaṃ kumbhaṃ sarvadhānyopari sthitaṃ ।।praṇavena vṛṣārūḍhaṃ siṃhasthāṃ vardhanīntataḥ ।kumbhe sāṅgaṃ śivandevaṃ vardhanyāmarcayet ।।dikṣu śakrādidikpālān viṣṇubrahmaśivādikān ।vardhanīṃ samyagādāya ghaṭapṛṣṭānugāminīṃ ।।śivājñāṃ śrāvayenmantrī pūrvādīśānagocaraṃ ।avicchinnapayodhārāṃ mūlamantramudīrayet ।।samantād bhrāmayedenāṃ rakṣārthaṃ śastrarūpiṇīṃ ।pūrvaṃ kalaśamāropya śastrārthantasya vāmataḥ ।।samagrāsanake kumbhe yajeddevaṃ sthirāsane ।vardhanyāṃ praṇavasthāyāmāyudhantadanu dvayoḥ ।।bhagaliṅgasamāyogaṃ vidadhyālliṅgamudrayā ।kumbhe nivedya bodhāsiṃ mūlamantrajapantathā ।।taddaśāṃśena vardhanyāṃ rakṣāṃ vijñāpayedapi ।gaṇeśaṃ vāyave abhyarcya haraṃ pañcāmṛtādibhiḥ ।।snāpayet pūrvavat prārcya kuṇḍe ca śivapāvakaṃ ।

anīśadiśi iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

vardhanyāṃ śastramarcayediti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

viṣṇubrahmāvasānakāniti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

śastrālambhasyeti ka, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

rakṣāṃ ca kārayet sadeti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pūrvavat snāpayet prārcediti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । sthāpayet pūrvavaccāgnimiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kumbhe vā śivamarcayediti ga, cihnitaspustakapāṭhaḥ
vidhivacca caruṃ kṛtvā sampātāhutiśodhitaṃ ।।devāgryātmavibhedena darṣyā taṃ vibhajet tridhā ।datvā bhāgau śivāgnibhyāṃ saṃrakṣedbhāgamātmani ।।śareṇa carmaṇā deyaṃ pūrvato dantadhāvanaṃ ।tasmādghoraśikhābhyāṃ vā dakṣiṇe paścime mṛdaṃ ।।sādyojātena ca hṛdā cottare vāmanīkṛtaṃ ।jalaṃ vāmena śirasā īśe gandhānvitaṃ jalaṃ ।।pañcagavyaṃ palāśādipuṭakaṃ vai samantataḥ ।aiśānyāṃ kusumaṃ dadyādāgneyyāṃ diśi rocanāṃ ।।aguruṃ nirṛtāśāyāṃ vāyavyāṃ ca catuḥsamaṃ ।homadravyāṇi sarvāṇi sadyojātaiḥ kuśaiḥ saha ।।daṇḍākṣasūtrakaupīnabhikṣāpātrāṇi rūpiṇe ।kajjalaṃ kuṅkumantailaṃ śalākāṃ keśaśodhanīṃ ।।tāmbūlaṃ darpaṇaṃ dadyāduttare rocanāmapi ।āsanaṃ pāduke pātraṃ yogapaṭṭātapatrakaṃ ।।aiśānyāmīśamantreṇa dadyādīśānatuṣṭaye ।pūrvasyāñcarukaṃ sājyaṃ dadyādgandhādikaṃ nave ।।pūrvitrāṇi samādāya prokṣitānyarghyavāriṇā ।saṃhitāmantrapūtāni nītvā pāvakasannidhiṃ ।।kṛṣṇājinādināacchādya smaran saṃvatsarātmakaṃ ।sākṣiṇaṃ sarvakṛtyānāṃ goptāraṃ śivamavyayaṃ ।।

sadyojātena ca hṛdā cottare vāmanīyakamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । sadyojātena ca hṛdā cottare dhāma niṣphalamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

phalamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

daṇḍākṣasūtrakaupānatīrthapātrāṇi iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sveti heti prayogeṇa mantrasaṃhitayā punaḥ ।śodhayecca pavitrāṇi vārāṇāmekaviṃśatiṃ ।।gṛhādi veṣṭayetsūtrair gandhādyaṃ ravaye dadet ।pūjitāya samācamya kṛtanyāsaḥ kṛtārghyakaḥ ।।nandyādibhyo atha gandhākhyaṃ vāstoścātha praviśya ca ।śastrebhyo lokapālebhyaḥ svanāmnā śivakumbhake ।।vardhanyai vighnarājāya gurave hy ātmane yajet ।atha sarvauṣadhīliptaṃ dhūpitaṃ puṣpadūrvayā ।।āmantrya ca pavitraṃ tat vidhāyāñjalimadhyagaṃ ।oṃ samastavidhicchidrapūraṇe ca vidhiṃ prati ।।prabhavamantrayāmi tvāṃ tvadicchāvāptikārikāṃ ।tatsiddhimanujānīhi yajataścidacitpate ।।sarvathā sarvadā śambho namaste astu prasīda me ।āmantrito asi deveśa saha devyā gaṇeśvaraiḥ ।।mantreśair lokapālaiś ca sahitaḥ paricārakaiḥ ।nimantrayāmyahantubhyaṃ prabhāte tu pavitrakaṃ ।।niyamañca kariṣyāmi parameśa tavājñayā ।ityevandevamāmantrya recakenāmṛtīkṛtaṃ ।।śivāntaṃ mūlamuccārya tacchivāya nivedayet ।

gandhākhyamiti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapaṭhaḥ

pūjanārthaṃ samācamya iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ravyādibhyo atheti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gandhādyamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

āmantraṇapavitramiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

parivārakaiviti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
japaṃ stotraṃ pramāṇañca kṛtvā śambhuṃ kṣamāpayet ।।hutvā carostṛtīyāṃśaṃ taddaddīta śivāgnaye ।digvāsibhyo digīśebhyo bhūtamātṛgaṇebhya u ।।rudrebhyo kṣetrapādibhyo namaḥ svāhā balistvayaṃ ।diṅnāgādyaiś ca pūrvādau kṣetrāya cāgnaye baliḥ ।।samācamya vidhicchidrapūrakaṃ homamācaret ।pūrṇāṃ vyāhṛtihomañca kṛtvā rundhīta pāvakaṃ ।।tata omagnaye svāhā svāhā somāya caiva hi ।omagnīṣomābhyāṃ svāhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte tathā ।।ityāhuticatuṣkantu datvā kuryāttu yojanāṃ ।vahnikuṇḍārcitaṃ devaṃ maṇḍalābhyarcite śive ।।nāḍīsandhānarūpeṇa vidhinā yojayettataḥ ।vaṃśādipātre vinyasya astrañca hṛdayantataḥ ।।adhiropya pavitrāṇi kalābhirvātha mantrayet ।ṣaḍaṅgaṃ brahmamūlair vā hṛddharmāstrañca yojayet ।।vidhāya sūtraiḥ saṃveṣṭya pūjayitvāṅgasambhavaiḥ ।rakṣārthaṃ jagadīśāya bhaktinamraḥ samarpayet ।।pūjite puṣpadhūpādyair datvā siddhāntapustake ।guroḥ pādāntikaṃ gatvā bhaktyā dadyāt pavitrakaṃ ।।nirgatya vahirācamya gomaye maṇḍalatraye ।

śivājñayā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhūtamātṛgaṇeṣu phaḍiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

rudrebhyaḥ kṣetrapālebhya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pūjayitvā tataḥ śivamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । pūjayitvātha sañcarair iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pañcagavyañcarundantadhāvanañca kramād yajet ।।ācānto mantrasambaddhaḥ kṛtasaṅgītajāgaraḥ ।svapedantaḥ smarannīśaṃ bubhukṣurdarbhasaṃstare ।।anenaiva prakāreṇa mumukṣurapi saṃviśet ।kevalambhasmaśayyāyāṃ sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pavitrādhivāsanavidhirnāma aṣṭasaptatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikonāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

pavitrārohaṇavidhiḥ

īśvara uvāca
atha prātaḥ samutthāya kṛtasnānaḥ samāhitaḥ ।kṛtasandhyārcano mantrī praviśya makhamaṇḍapaṃ ।।samādāya pavitrāṇi avisarjitadaivataḥ ।aiśānyāṃ bhājane śuddhe sthāpayet kṛtamaṇḍale ।।tato visarjya deveśaṃ nirmālyamapanīya ca ।pūrvavad bhūtale śuddhekṛtvāhnikamatha dvayaṃ ।।ādityadvāradikpālakumbheśānau śive anale ।naimittikīṃ savistarāṃ kuryāt pūjāṃ viśeṣataḥ ।।mantrāṇāṃ tarpaṇaṃ prāyaścittahomaṃ śarātmanā ।aṣṭottaraśataṃ kṛtvā dadyāt pūrṇāhutiṃ śanaiḥ ।।

ādityadvāradikpālān skandeśānau śive anale iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śarāṇuneti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ
pavitraṃ bhānave datvā samācamya dadīta ca ।dvāramālādidikpālakumbhavardhanikādiṣu ।।sannidhāne tataḥ śambhorupaviśya nijāsane ।pavitramātmane dadyādgaṇāya guruvahnaye ।।oṃ kālātmanā tvayā deva yaddiṣṭaṃ māmake vidhau ।kṛtaṃ kliṣṭaṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ guptañca yatkṛtaṃ ।।tadastu kliṣṭamakliṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ kliṣṭamasaṃskṛtaṃ ।sarvātmanāmunā śambho pavitreṇa tvadicchayā ।।oṃ pūrayamakhavrataṃ niyameśvarāya svāhā ।ātmatattve prakṛtyante pālite padmayoninā ।।mūlaṃ layāntamuccārya pavitreṇārcayecchivaṃ ।vidyātattve ca vidyānte viṣṇukāraṇapālite ।।īśvarāntaṃ samuccārya pavitramadhiropayet ।śivānte śivatattve ca rudrakāraṇapālite ।।śivāntaṃ mantramuccārya tasmai deyaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।sarvakāraṇapāleṣu śivamuccārya suvrataḥ ।।mūlaṃ layāntamuccārya dadyādgaṅgāvatārakaṃ ।ātmavidyāśivaiḥ proktaṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ pavitrakaṃ ।।vinirdiṣṭaṃ bubhukṣūṇāṃ śivatattvātmabhiḥ kramāt ।svāhāntaṃ vā namo antaṃ vā mantrameṣāmudīrayet ।।
oṃ hāṃ ātmatattvādhipataye śivāya svāhā

prabhustvaṃ māmakevidhau iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

hutaṃ yatra vaṣaṭkṛtamiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sarvatattveṣu suvrata iti kha, ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

dadyādaṅgāvatārakamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ vidyātattvādhipataye śivāya svāhā

oṃ hauṃ śivatattvādhipataye śivāya svāhā

oṃ hauṃ sarvatattvādhipataye śivāya svāhā
natvā gaṅgāvatārantu prārthayettaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ ।tvaṅgatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃsthitistvañcarācare ।।antaścāreṇa bhūtānāṃ draṣṭā tvaṃ parameśvara ।karmaṇā manasā vācā tvatto nānyā gatirmama ।।mantrahīnaṃ kriyāhīnaṃ dravyahīnañca yat kṛtaṃ ।japahomārcanair hīnaṃ kṛtaṃ nityaṃ mayā tava ।।akṛtaṃ vākyahīnaṃ ca tat pūraya maheśvaraṃ ।supūtastvaṃ pareśāna pavitraṃ pāpanāśanaṃ ।।tvayā pavitritaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamaṃ ।khaṇḍitaṃ yanmayā deva vrataṃ vaikalpayogataḥ ।।ekībhavatu tat sarvaṃ tavājñāsūtragumphitaṃ ।japaṃ nivedya devasya bhaktyā stotraṃ vidhāya ca ।।natvā tu guruṇādiṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīyānniyamannaraḥ ।caturmāsaṃ trimāsaṃ vā tryahamekāhameva ca ।।praṇamya kṣamayitveśaṃ gatvā kuṇḍāntikaṃ vratī ।pāvakasthe śive apyevaṃ pavitrāṇāṃ catuṣṭayaṃ ।।samāropya samabhyarcya puṣpadhūpākṣatādibhiḥ ।antarbaliṃ pavitrañca rudrādibhyo nivedayet ।।praviśyāntaḥ śivaṃ stutvā sapraṇāmaṃ kṣamāpayet ।

antaś cara tvaṃ bhūtānāmiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

paripūrṇaṃ karo tu me iti ga, cihitapustakapāṭhaḥ

amṛtastvaṃ pareśāna iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
prāyaścittakṛtaṃ homaṃ kṛtvā hutvā ca pāyasaṃ ।।śanaiḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ datvā vahnisthaṃ visṛjecchivaṃ ।homaṃ vyāhṛtibhiḥ kṛtvā rundhyānniṣṭhurayānalaṃ ।।agnyādibhyastato dadyādāhutīnāṃ catuṣṭayaṃ ।dikpatibhyastato dadyāt sapavitraṃ vahirbaliṃ ।।siddhāntapustake dadyāt sapramāṇaṃ pavitrakaṃ ।
oṃ hāṃ bhūḥ svāhā । oṃ hāṃ bhuvaḥ svāhā । oṃ hāṃ svaḥ svāhā । oṃ hāṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ svāhā homaṃ vyāhṛtibhiḥ kṛtvā datvāahuticatuṣṭayaṃ ।।

oṃ hāṃ agnaye svāhā । oṃ hāṃ somāya svāhā । oṃ hāṃ agnīṣomābhyāṃ svāhā । oṃ hāṃ agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāhā
guruṃ śivamivābhyarcya vastrabhūṣādivistaraiḥ ।samagraṃ saphalaṃ tasya kriyākāṇḍādi vārṣikaṃ ।।yasya tuṣṭo guruḥ samyagityāha parameśvaraḥ ।itthaṃ guroḥ samāropya hṛdālambipavitrakaṃ ।।dvijātīn bhojayitvā tu bhaktyā vastrādikaṃ dadet ।dānenānena deveśa prīyatāṃ me sadā śivaḥ ।।bhaktyā snānādikaṃ prātaḥ kṛtvā śambhoḥ samāharet ।pavitrāṇyaṣṭapuṣpaistaṃ pūjayitvā visarjayet ।।nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kṛtvā vistareṇa yathā purā ।pavitrāṇi samāropya praṇamyāgnau śivaṃ yajet ।।prāyaścittaṃ tato astreṇa hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ yajet ।

dikpālebhyastato datveti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tato astreṇa kṛtveti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bhuktikāmaḥ śivāyātha kuryāt karmasamarpaṇaṃ ।।tvatprasādena karmedaṃ māstu phalasādhakaṃ ।muktikāmastu karmedaṃ māstu me nātha bandhakaṃ ।।vahnisthaṃ nāḍīyogena śivaṃ saṃyojayechive ।hṛdi nyasyāgnisaṅghātaṃ pāvakaṃ ca visarjayet ।।samācamya praviśyāntaḥ kumbhānugatasaṃvarān ।śive saṃyojya sākṣepaṃ kṣamasveti visarjayet ।।visṛjya lokapālādīnādāyeśāt pavitrakaṃ ।sati caṇḍeśvare pūjāṃ kṛtvā datvā pavitrakaṃ ।।tannirmālyādikaṃ tasmai sapavitraṃ samarpayet ।athavā sthaṇḍile caṇḍaṃ vidhinā pūrvavadyajet ।।yat kiñcidvārṣikaṃ karma kṛtaṃ nyūnādhikaṃ mayā ।tadastu paripūrṇaṃ me caṇḍa nātha tavājñayā ।।iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ natvā stutvā visarjayet ।tyaktanirmālyakaḥ śuddhaḥ snāpayitvā śivaṃ yajet ।pañcayojanasaṃstho api pavitraṃ gurusannidhau ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye pavitrārohaṇaṃ nāma ekonāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha aśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

damanakārohaṇavidhiḥ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣye damanakārohavidhiṃ pūrvavadācaret ।harakopāt purā jāto bhairavo damitāḥ surāḥ ।।

tenātha śapto viṭapo bhaveti tripurāriṇā ।prasanneneritaṃ cedaṃ pūjayiṣyanti ye narāḥ ।।paripūrṇaphalaṃ teṣāṃ nānyathā te bhaviṣyati ।saptamyāṃ vā trayodaśyāṃ damanaṃ saṃhitātmabhiḥ ।।sampūjya bodhayedvṛkṣaṃ bhavavākyena mantravit ।haraprasādasaṃbhūta tvamatra sannidhībhava ।।śivakāryaṃ samuddiśya netavyo asi śivājñayā ।gṛhe apyāmantraṇaṃ kuryāt sāyāhne cādhivāsanaṃ ।।yathāvidhi samabhyarcya sūryaśaṅkarapāvakān ।devasya paścime mūlaṃ dadyāttasya mṛdā yutaṃ ।।vāmena śirasā vātha nālaṃ dhātrīṃ tathottare ।dakṣiṇe bhagnapatrañca prācyāṃ puṣpañca dhāraṇaṃ ।।puṭikāsthaṃ phalaṃ mūlamathaiśānyāṃ yajecchivaṃ ।pañcāṅgamañjalau kṛtvā āmantrya śirasi nyaset ।।āmantrito asi deveśa prātaḥkāle mayā prabho ।kartavyastapaso lābhaḥ pūrṇaṃ sarvaṃ tavājñayā ।।mūlena śeṣaṃ pātrasthaṃ pidhāyātha pavitrakaṃ ।prātaḥ snātvā jagannāthaṃ gandhapuṣpādibhiryajet ।।nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kṛtvā damanaiḥ pūjayettataḥ ।śeṣamañjalimādāya ātmavidyāśivātmabhiḥ ।।mūlādyair īśvarāntaiś ca caturthāñjalinā tataḥ ।oṃ hauṃ makheśvarāya makhaṃ pūraya śūlapāṇaye namaḥ ।।

deveśa pūjākāle iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

gandhapuṣpādinārcayediti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śivaṃ vahniṃ ca sampūjya guruṃ prārcyātha bodhayet ।।bhagavannatiriktaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā yanmayā kṛtaṃ ।sarvaṃ tadastu sampūrṇaṃ yacca dāmanakaṃ mama ।sakalaṃ caitramāsotthaṃ phalaṃ prāpya divaṃ vrajet ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye damanakārohaṇavidhirnāma aśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

samayadīkṣāvidhānaṃ

īśvara uvāca
vākṣyāmi bhogamokṣārthaṃ dīkṣāṃ pāpakṣayaṅkarīṃ ।malamāyādipāśānāṃ viśleṣaḥ kriyate yayā ।।jñānañca janyate śiṣye sā dīkṣā bhuktimuktidā ।vijñātakalanāmaiko dvitīyaḥ pralayākalaḥ ।।tṛtīyaḥ sakalaḥ śāstre anugrāhyastrividho mataḥ ।tatrādyo malamātreṇa mukto anyo malakarmabhiḥ ।।kalādibhūmiparyantaṃ stavaistu sakalo yataḥ ।nirādhārātha sādhārā dīkṣāpi dvividhā matā ।।nirādhārā dvayosteṣāṃ sādhārā sakalasya tu ।ādhāranirapekṣeṇa kriyate śambhucaryayā ।।tīvraśaktinipātena nirādhāreti sā smṛtā ।ācāryamūrtimāsthāya māyātīvrādibhedayā ।।śaktyā yāṃ kurute śambhuḥ sā sādhikaraṇocyate ।

pralayānala iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । pralayātmaka iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
iyaṃ caturvidhā proktā savījā vījavarjitā ।।sādhikārānadhikārā yathā tadabhidhīyate ।samayācārasaṃyuktā savījā jāyate nṛṇāṃ ।।nirvījā tvasamarthānāṃ samayācāravarjitā ।nitye naimittike kāmye yataḥ syādadhikāritā ।।sādhikārā bhaveddīkṣā sādhakācāryayorataḥ ।nirvījā dīkṣitānāntu yadāsa mama putrayoḥ ।।nityamātrādhikāratvaddīkṣā niradhikārikā ।dvividheyaṃ dvirūpā hi pratyekamupajāyate ।।ekā kriyāvatī tatra kuṇḍamaṇḍalapūrvikā ।manovyāpāramātreṇa yā sā jñānavatī matā ।।itthaṃ labdhādhikāreṇa dīkṣāacāryeṇa sādhyate ।skandadīkṣāṃ guruḥ kuryāt kṛtvā nityakriyāṃ tataḥ ।।praṇavārgyakarāmbhojakṛtadvārādhipārcaṇaḥ ।vighnānutsārya dehalyāṃ nyasyāstraṃ svāsane sthitaḥ ।।kurvīta bhūtasaṃśuddhiṃ mantrayogaṃ yathoditaṃ ।tilataṇḍulasiddhārthakuśadūrvākṣatodakaṃ ।।sayavakṣīranīrañca viśeṣārghyamidantataḥ ।tadambunā dravyaśuddhiṃ tilakaṃ svāsanātmanoḥ ।।pūjanaṃ mantraśiddhiñca pañcagavyañca pūrvavat ।lājacandanasiddhārthabhasmadūrvākṣataṃ kuśān ।।vikirān śuddhalājāṃstān sadhūpānastramantritān ।

kṛtanityakriyādvaya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhasmadūrvākṣatāniti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śastrāmbu prokṣitānetān kavacenāvaguṇṭhitān ।।nānāgrahaṇākārān vighnaughavinivārakān ।darbhāṇāntālamānena kṛtvā ṣaṭtriṃśatā dalaiḥ ।।saptajaptaṃ śivāstreṇa veṇīṃ bodhāsimuttamaṃ ।śivamātmani vinyasya sṛṣṭyādhāramabhīpsitaṃ ।।niṣkalaṃ ca śivaṃ nyasya śivo ahamiti bhāvayet ।uṣṇīṣaṃ śirasi nyasya alaṃ kuryātsvadehakaṃ ।।gandhamaṇḍanakaṃ svīye vidadhyāddakṣiṇe kare ।vidhinātrārcayedīśamitthaṃ syācchivamastakaṃ ।।vinyasya śivamantreṇa bhāsvaraṃ nijamastake ।śivādabhinnamātmānaṃ kartāraṃ bhāvayedyathā ।।maṇḍale karmaṇāṃ sākṣī kalaśe yajñarakṣakaḥ ।homādhikaraṇaṃ vahnau śiṣye pāśavimocakaḥ ।।svātmanyanugṛhīteti ṣaḍādhāro ya īśvaraḥ ।so ahameveti kurvīta bhāvaṃ sthirataraṃ punaḥ ।।jñānakhaḍgakaraḥ sthitvā nairṛtyābhimukho naraḥ ।sārghyāmbupañcagavyābhyāṃ prokṣayedyāgamaṇḍapaṃ ।।catuṣpathāntasaṃskāraiḥ saṃskuryādīkṣaṇādibhiḥ ।vikṣipya vikarāṃstatra kuśakūrcopasaṃharet ।।tānīśadiśi vardhanyāmāsanāyopakalpayet ।nairṛte vāstugīrvāṇān dvāre lakṣmīṃ prapūjayet ।।āpye ratnaiḥ pūrayantīṃ hṛdā maṇḍaparūpiṇīṃ ।

astrāmbu iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ śiṣye pāpavimocaka iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sāmbuvastre saratne ca dhānyasthe paścimānane ।।aiśe kumbhe yajecchambhuṃ śaktiṃ kumbhasya dakṣiṇe ।paścimasyāntu siṃhasthāṃ vardhanīṃ khaḍgarūpiṇīṃ ।।dikṣu śakrādidikpālānviṣṇvantān praṇavāsanān ।vāhanāyudhasaṃyuktān hṛdābhyarcya svanāmabhiḥ ।।prathamantāṃ samādāya kumbhasyāgrābhigāminīṃ ।avicchinnapayodharāṃ bhrāmayitvā pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।śivājñāṃ lokapālānāṃ śrāvayenmūlamuccaran ।saṃrakṣata yathāyogaṃ kumbhaṃ dhṛtvātha tāṃ dhāret ।।tataḥ sthirāsane kumbhe sāṅgaṃ sampūjya śaṅkaraṃ ।vinyasya śodhyamadhvānaṃ vardhanyāmastramarcayet ।।oṃ haḥ astrāsanāya hūṃ phaṭ । oṃ oṃ astramūrtaye namaḥ ।
oṃ hūṃ phaṭ pāśupatāstrāya namaḥ । oṃ oṃ hṛdayāya hūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ śrīṃ śirase hūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ yaṃ śikhāyai hūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ gūṃ kavacāya hūṃ
phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ phaṭ astrāya hūṃ phaṭ namaḥ caturvaktraṃ sadaṃṣṭrañca smaredastraṃ saśaktikaṃ ।samudgaratriśūlāsiṃ sūryakoṭisamaprabhaṃ ।।bhagaliṅgasamāyogaṃ vidadhyālliṅgamudrayā ।

oṃ aṃ haḥ astrāsanāya hraṃ phaṭ । oṃ aṃ astramūrtaye namaḥ । oṃ paśūṃ huṃ phaṭ pāśupatāstrāya namaḥ । oṃ hṛdayāya hraṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ śrīṃ śirase hrūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ maṃ śikhāyai phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ astrāya phaṭ hūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । iti ga, cihnkitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ haḥ astrāsanāya krūṃ phaṭ । oṃ oṃ astramūrtaye namaḥ । oṃ svāṃ svaṃ krūṃ phaṭ pāśupatāstrāya svāhā । oṃ oṃ hṛdayāya krūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ paṃ śikhāyai krūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ khaṃ kavacāya krūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ haṃ phaṭ astrāya phaṭ namaḥ । iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
agguṣṭhena spṛśet kumbhaṃ hṛdā muṣṭyāstravardhanīṃ ।।bhuktaye muktaye tvādau muṣṭinā vardhanīṃ spṛśet ।kumbhasya mukharakṣārthaṃ jñānakhaḍgaṃ samarpayet ।।śastrañca mūlamantrasya śataṃ kumbhe niveśayet ।taddaśāṃśena vardhanyāṃ rakṣāṃ vijñāpayettataḥ ।।yathedaṃ kṛtayatnena bhagavanmakhamandiraṃ ।rakṣaṇīyaṃ jagannātha sarvādhvaradhara tvayā ।।praṇavasthaṃ caturbāhuṃ vāyavye gaṇamarcayet ।sthaṇḍile śivamabhyarcya sārghyakuṇḍaṃ vrajennaraḥ ।।niviṣṭo mantratṛptyarthamarghyagandhaghṛtādikaṃ ।vāme asavye tu vinyasya samiddarbhatilādikaṃ ।।kuṇḍavahnisrugājyādi prāgvat saṃskṛtya bhāvayet ।mukhyatāmūrdhvavaktrasya hṛdi vahnau śivaṃ yajet ।।svamūrtau śivakumbhe ca sthaṇḍile tvagniśiṣyayoḥ ।sṛṣṭinyāsena vinyasya śodhyādhvānaṃ yathāvidhi ।।kuṇḍamānaṃ mukhaṃ dhyātvā hṛdāhutibhirīpsitaṃ ।vījāni saptajihvānāmagnerhomāya bhaṇyate ।।virephāvantimauvarṇau rephaṣaṣṭhasvarānvitau ।induvinduśikhāyuktau jihvāvījānupakramāt ।।hiraṇyā vanakā raktā kṛṣṇā tadanu suprabhā ।atiriktā bahurūpā rudrendrāgnyāpyadiṅmukhā ।।kṣīrādimadhurair homaṃ kuryācchāntikapauṣṭike ।abhicāre tu piṇyākasaktukañcukakāñcikaiḥ ।।lavaṇair ājikātakrakaṭutailaiś ca kaṇṭakaiḥ ।

vāyavye kālamarcayediti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
samidbhirapi vakrābhiḥ kruddho bhāṣyāṇunā yajet ।।kadambakalikāhomādyakṣiṇī siddhyati dhruvaṃ ।bandhūkakiṃśukādīni vaśyākarṣāya homayet ।।bilvaṃ rājyāya lakṣmārthaṃ pāṭalāṃś campakānapi ।padmāni cakravartitve bhakṣyabhojyāni sampade ।।dūrvā vyādhivināśāya sarvasattvavaśīkṛte ।priyaṅgupāṭalīpuṣpaṃ cūtapatraṃ jvarāntakaṃ ।।mṛtyuñjayo mṛtyujit syād vṛddhiḥ syāttilahomataḥ ।rudraśāntiḥ sarvaśāntyai atha prastutamucyate ।।āhutyaṣṭaśatair mūlamaṅgāni tu daśāṃśataḥ ।santarpayeta mūlena dadyāt pūrṇāṃ yathā purā ।।tathā śiṣyapraveśāya pratiśiṣyaṃ śataṃ japet ।dur nimittāpasārāya sunimittakṛte tathā ।।śatadvayañca hotavyaṃ mūlamantreṇa pūrvavat ।mūlādyaṣṭāstramantrāṇāṃ svāhāntaistarpaṇaṃ sakṛt ।।śikhāsampuṭitair vījair hrūṃ phaḍantaiś ca dīpanaṃ ।oṃ hauṃ śivāya svāhetyādimantraiś ca tarpaṇaṃ ।।oṃ hrūṃ hrauṃ hrīṃ śivāya hrūṃ phaḍityādidīpanaṃ ।tataḥ śivāmbhasā sthālīṃ kṣālitāṃ varmaguṇṭhitāṃ ।।candanādisamālabdhāṃ badhnīyāt kaṭakaṃ gale ।varmāstrajaptasaddarbhapatrābhyāṃ carusiddhaye ।।

huṃ phaḍantaiś ca kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
oṃ hūṃ hauṃ hūṃ śivāya hūmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
oṃ kraṃ hauṃ kraṃ śivāya krūṃ iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dharmaguṇṭhitāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
varmādyair āsane datte sārdhendukṛtamaṇḍale ।nyastāyāṃ mūrtibhūtāyāṃ bhāvapuṣpaiḥ śivaṃ yajet ।।vastrabaddhamukhāyāṃ vā sthālyāṃ puṣpair vahirbhavaiḥ ।cullyāṃ paścimavaktrāyāṃ nyastāyāṃ mānuṣātmanā ।।nyastāhaṅkāravījāyāṃ śuddhāyāṃ vīkṣaṇādibhiḥ ।dharmādharmaśarīrāyāṃ japtāyāṃ mānuṣātmanā ।।sthālīmāropayedastrajaptāṃ gavyāmbumārjitāṃ ।gavyaṃ payo astrasaṃśuddhaṃ prāsādaśatamantritaṃ ।।tuṇḍalān śyāmakādīnāṃ nikṣipettatra tadyathā ।ekaśiṣyavidhānāya teṣāṃ prasṛtipañcakaṃ ।।prasṛtiṃ prasṛtiṃ paścādvardhayed dvyādiṣu kramāt ।kuryāccānalamantreṇa pidhānaṃ kavacāṇunā ।।śivāgnau mūlamantreṇa pūrvāsyaś carukaṃ pacet ।sukhinne tatra taccullyāṃ śruvamāpūrya sarpiṣā ।।svāhāntaiḥ saṃhitāmantrair datvā taptābhighāraṇaṃ ।saṃsthāpya maṇḍale sthālīṃ saddarbhe astrāṇunā kṛte ।।praṇavena pidhāyāsyāṃ taddehalepanaṃ hṛdā ।suśītalo bhavatyevam prāpya śītābhighāraṇaṃ ।।vidadhyātsaṃhitāmantraiḥ śiṣyaṃ prati sakṛt sakṛt ।dharmādyāsanake hutvā kuṇḍamaṇḍalapaścime ।।sampātañca srucā hutvā śuddhiṃ saṃhitayā caret ।carukaṃ sakṛdālabhya tayaiva vaṣaḍantayā ।।

dharmādyair āsane iti ka, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sārdāmbukṛtamaṇḍale iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dharmādyāsanake dhṛtveti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dhenumudrāmṛtībhūtaṃ sthaṇḍileśāntikaṃ nayet ।sājyabhāgaṃ svaśiṣyāṇāṃ bhāgo devāya vahnaye ।।kuryāttu stokapālādeḥ samadhvājyamitidaṃ trayaṃ ।namo antena hṛdā dadyāttenaivācamanīyakaṃ ।।sājyaṃ mantraśataṃ hutvā dadyāt pūrṇāṃ yathāvidhi ।maṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍataḥ pūrve madhye vā śambhukumbhayoḥ ।।rudramātṛgaṇādīnāṃ nirvartyāntarbaliṃ hṛdā ।śivamadhye apyalabdhājño vidhāyaikatvabhāvanaṃ ।।sarvajñatādiyukto ahaṃ samantāccopari sthitaḥ ।mamāṃśo yojanāsthānamadhiṣṭhāhamadhvare ।।śivo ahamityahaṅkārī niṣkramed yāgamaṇḍapāt ।nyastapūrvāgrasandharbhe śastrāṇukṛtamaṇḍale ।।praṇavāsanake śiṣyaṃ śuklavastrottarīyakaṃ ।snātañcodaṅmukhaṃ muktyai pūrvavaktrantu bhuktaye ।।ūrdhvaṃ kāyaṃ samāropya pūrvāsyaṃ pravilokayet ।caraṇādiśikhāṃ yāvanmuktau bhuktau vilomataḥ ।।cakṣuṣā saprasādena śaivaṃ dhāma vivṛṇvatā ।astrodakena sammokṣya mantrāmbusnānasiddaye ।।bhasmasnānāya vighnānāṃ śāntaye pāpabhittaye ।sṛṣṭisaṃhārayogena tāḍayedastrabhasmanā ।।punarastrāmbunā prokṣya sakalīkaraṇāya taṃ ।

sthaṇḍilopāntikaṃ nayediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tenaivācamanīyamiti ka, kha, ga, cihnitapustakatrayapāṭhaḥ

pāśabhittaye iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
nābherūrdhvaṃ kuśāgreṇa mārjanīyāstramuccaran ।।tridhāalabheta tanmūlair aghamarṣāya nābhyadhaḥ ।dvaividhyāya ca pāśānāṃ ālabheta śarāṇunā ।।taccharīre śivaṃ sāṅgaṃ sāsanaṃ vinyasettataḥ ।puṣpādipūjitasyāsya netre netreṇa vā hṛdā ।।badhvāmantritavastreṇa sitena sadaśena ca ।pradakṣiṇakramādenaṃ praveśya śivadakṣiṇaṃ ।।savastramāsanaṃ dadyāt yathāvarṇaṃ nivedayet ।saṃhāramudrayātmānaṃ mūrtyā tasya hṛdambuje ।।nirudhya śodhite kāye nyāsaṃ kṛtvā tamarcayet ।pūrvānanasya śiṣyasya mūlamantreṇa mastake ।।śivahastaṃ pradātavyaṃ rudreśapadadāyakaṃ ।śivasevāgrahopāyaṃ dattahastaṃ śivāṇunā ।।śive prakṣepayet puṣpamapanīyārcakantāraṃ ।tatpātrasthānamantrāḍhyaṃ śivadevagaṇānugaṃ ।।viprādīnāṃ kramānnāma kuryādvā svecchayā guruḥ ।praṇatiṃ kumbhavardhanyoḥ kārayitvānalāntikaṃ ।।sadakṣiṇāsane tadvat saumyāsyamupaveśayet ।śiṣyadehaviniṣkrāntāṃ suṣumṇāmiva cintayet ।।nijagrahalīnāñca darbhamūlena mantritaṃ ।

suvarṇañceti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śivātmaneti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

apanīyādhikāmbaraṃ iti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sadakṣiṇāsana tatreti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
darbhāgraṃ dakṣiṇe tasya vidhāya karapallave ।।tammūlamātmajaṅghāyāmagrañceti śikhidhvaje ।śiṣyasya hṛdayaṃ gatvā recakena śivāṇunā ।।purakeṇa samāgatya svakīyaṃ hṛdyāntaraṃ ।śivāgninā punaḥ kṛtvā nāḍīsandhānamīdṛśaṃ ।।hṛdā tatsannidhānārthañjuhuyādāhutitrayaṃ ।śivahastasthiratvārthaṃ śataṃ mūlena homayet ।itthaṃ samayadīkṣāyāṃ bhavedyogyo bhavārcane ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye samayadīkṣākathanaṃ nāma ekāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvyaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

saṃskāradīkṣākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣye saṃskāradīkṣāyāṃ vidhānaṃ śṛṇu ṣaṇmukha ।āvāhayenmaheśasya vahnisthasya śiro hṛdi ।।saṃśliṣṭau tau samabhyarcya santarpya hṛdayātmanā ।tayoḥ sannidhaye dadyāttenaivāhutipañcakaṃ ।।kusumenāstraliptena tāḍayettaṃ hṛdā śiśuṃ ।prasphurattārakākāraṃ caitanyaṃ tatra bhāvayet ।।

śivātmaneti kha, ga, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

śivahaste ca sthityarthamiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kusumenāṣṭajapteneti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
praviśya tatra huṅkāramuktaṃ recakayogataḥ ।saṃhāriṇyā tadākṛṣya pūrakeṇa hṛdi nyaset ।।tato vāgīśvarīyaunau mudrayodbhavasañjñayā ।
hṛtsampuṭitamantreṇa recakena vinikṣipet ।।

oṃ hāṃ hāṃ hāṃ ātmane namaḥ 
jājvalyamāne nirdhūme juhuyādiṣṭasiddhaye ।apravṛddhe sadhūme tu homo vahnau na siddhyati ।।snigdhaḥ pradakṣiṇāvartaḥ sugandhiḥ śasyate analaḥ ।viparītasphuliṅgī ca bhūmisparśaḥ praśasyate ।।ityevamādibhiścihnair hutvā śiṣyasya kalmaṣaṃ ।pāpabhakṣaṇahomena dahedvā taṃ bhavātmanā ।।dvijatvāpādanārthāya tathā rudrāṃśabhāvane ।āhāravījasaṃśuddhau garbhādhānāya saṃsthitau ।।sīmante janmato nāmakaraṇāya ca homayet ।śatāni pañca mūlena vauṣaḍādidaśāṃśataḥ ।।śithilībhūtabandhasya śaktāvutkarṣaṇaṃ ca yat ।ātmano rudraputtratve garbhādhānaṃ taducyate ।।svāntatryātmaguṇavyaktiriha puṃsavanaṃ mataṃ ।māyātmanorvivekena jñānaṃ sīmantavardhanaṃ ।।śivāditattvaśuddhestu svīkāro jananaṃ mataṃ ।

hṛtsampuṭātmamantreṇeti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ hāṃ ātmane nama iti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ hāṃ ātmane nama iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pāpakṣayeṇa homaneti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vījasaṃsiddhau iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bodhanaṃ yacchivatvena śivatvārhasya no mataṃ ।।saṃhāramudrayātmānaṃ sphuradvahnikaṇopamaṃ ।vidadhīta samādāya nije hṛdayapaṅkaje ।।tataḥ kumbhayogena mūlamantramudīrayet ।kuryāt samavaśībhāvaṃ tadā ca śivayorhṛdi ।।brahmādikāraṇātyāgakramādrecakayogataḥ ।nītvā śivāntamātmānamādāyodbhavamudrayā ।।hṛtsampuṭitamantreṇa recakena vidhānavit ।śiṣyasya hṛdayāmbhojakarṇikāyāṃ vinikṣipet ।।pūjāṃ śivasya vahneś ca guruḥ kuryāttadocitāṃ ।praṇatiñcātmane śiṣyaṃ samayān śrāvayettathā ।।devaṃ na nindecchāstrāṇi nirmālyādi na laṅghayet ।śivāgnigurupūjā ca kartavyā jīvitāvadhi ।।bālabāliśavṛddhastrībhogabhugvyādhitātmanāṃ ।yathāśakti dadītārthaṃ samarthasya samagrakān ।।bhūtāṅgāni jaṭābhasmadaṇḍakaupīnasaṃyamān ।īśānādyair hṛdādyair vā parijapya yathākramāt ।।svāhāntasaṃhitamantraiḥ pātreṣvāropya pūrvavat ।sampāditadrutaṃ hutvā sthaṇḍileśāya darśayet ।।rakṣaṇāya ghaṭādhastādāropya kṣaṇamātrakaṃ ।śivādājñāṃ samādāya dadīta yatine guruḥ ।।evaṃ samayadīkṣāyāṃ viśiṣṭāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ ।

vardhanamiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dadītānnamiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vahnihomāgamajñānayogyaḥ sañjāyate śiśruḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye samayadīkṣākathanaṃ nāma dvyaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha tryaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

nirvāṇadīkṣākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
atha nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ kuryānmūlādidīpanaṃ ।pāśabandhanaśaktyarthaṃ tāḍanādikṛtena vā ।।ekaikayā tadāhutyā pratyekaṃ tattrayeṇa vā ।vījagarbhaśikhārdhantu hūṃ phaḍantadhruvādinā ।।oṃ hrūṃ hrauṃ hauṃ hrūṃ phaḍiti mūlamantrasya dīpanaṃ ।oṃ hrūṃ hauṃ hauṃ hrūṃ phaḍiti hṛdaya evaṃ śiromukhe ।।pratyekaṃ dīpanaṃ kuryāt sarvasmin krūrakarmaṇi ।śāntike pauṣṭike cāsya vaṣaḍantādināṇunā ।।vaṣaḍvauṣaṭsamopetaiḥ sarvakāmyopari sthitaiḥ ।havanaṃ saṃvaraiḥ kuryāt sarvatrāpyāyanādiṣu ।।tataḥ svasavyabhāgasthaṃ maṇḍale śuddhavigrahaṃ ।

hrīṃ phaḍantadhruvādinā iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
oṃ hūṃ hauṃ hauṃ hūṃ phaḍiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।oṃ hūṃ hoṃ hūṃ phaḍiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ oṃ hūṃ hāṃ hāṃ hūṃ phaḍiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।oṃ hraṃ hrīṃ hraṃ hraṃ phaḍiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vaṣaḍantādinātmaneti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śiṣyaṃ sampūjya tat sūtraṃ suṣumṇeti vibhāvitaṃ ।।mūlena tacchikhābandhaṃ pādāṅguṣṭhāntamānayet ।saṃhāreṇa mumukṣostu badhnīyācchiṣyakāyake ।।puṃsastu dakṣiṇe bhāge vāme nāryā niyojayet ।śaktiṃ ca śaktimantreṇa pūjitāntasya mastake ।।saṃhāramudrayāadāya sūtraṃ tenaiva yojayet ।nāḍīntvādāya mūlena sūtre nyasya hṛdārcayet ।।avaguṇṭhya tu rudreṇa hṛdayenāhutitrayaṃ ।pradadyātsannidhānārthaṃ śaktāvapyevameva hi ।।oṃ hāṃ varṇādhvane namo hāṃ bhavanādhvane namaḥ ।oṃ hāṃ kālādhvane namaḥ śodhyādhvānaṃ hi sūtrake ।।nyasyāstravāriṇā śiṣyaṃ prokṣyāstramantritena ca ।puṣpeṇa hṛdi santāḍya śiṣyadehe praviśya ca ।।guruś ca tatra hūṅkārayuktaṃ recakayogataḥ ।caitanyaṃ haṃsavījasthaṃ viśliṣyedāyudhātmanā ।।
oṃ hauṃ hūṃ phaṭ 
āchidya śaktisūtreṇa hāṃ haṃ svāheti cāṇunā ।saṃhāramudrayā sūtre nāḍībhūte niyojayet ।।
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hāṃ ātmane namaḥ vyāpakaṃ bhāvayedenaṃ tanutrāṇāvaguṇṭhayet ।

oṃ dvām padādhvane namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ varṇādhvane namaḥ ।
oṃ hāṃ bhavanādhvane namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ kalādhvane namaḥ । iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ hāṃ padātmane namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ varṇātmane namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ mantrātmane namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ kālātmane nama iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ hauṃ hūṃ phaṭ iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tanmātreṇāvaguṇṭhayediti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
āhutitritayaṃ dadyāt hṛdā sannidhihetave ।।vidyādehañca vinyasya śāntyatītāvalokanaṃ ।tasyāmitaratattvādyaṃ mantrabhūtaṃ vicintayet ।।
oṃ hāṃ hauṃ śāntyatītakalāpāśāya nama ity anenāvalokayet
he tattve mantramapyekaṃ padaṃ varṇāś ca ṣoḍaśa ।tathāṣṭau bhuvanānyasyāṃ vījanāḍīkathadvayaṃ ।।viṣayañca guṇañcaikaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca sadā śivaṃ ।sitāyāṃ śāntyatītāyāmantarbhāvya prapīḍayet ।।
oṃ hauṃ śāntyatītakalāpāśāya hūṃ phaṭ
saṃhāramudrayāadāya vidadhyāt sūtramastake ।pūjayedāhutīṃstisro dadyāt sannidhihetave ।।tattve dve akṣare dve ca vījanāḍīkathadvayaṃ ।guṇau mantrau tathābjasthamekaṃ kāraṇamīśvaraṃ ।।padāni bhānusaṅkhyāni bhuvanāni daśa sapta ca ।ekañca viṣayaṃ śāntau kṛṣṇāyāmacyutaṃ smaret ।।tāḍayitvā samādāya mukhasūtre niyojayet ।juhuyānnijavījena sānnidhyāyāhutitrayaṃ ।।vidyāyāṃ sapta tattvāni pādānāmekaviṃśatiṃ ।ṣaḍ varṇān sañcaraṃ caikaṃ lokānāṃ pañcaviṃśatiṃ ।।guṇānāntrayamekañca viṣayaṃ rudrakāraṇaṃ ।antarbhāvyātiriktāyāṃ jīvanāḍīkathadvayaṃ ।।astramādāya dadhyācca padaṃ dvyadhikaviṃśatiṃ ।lokānāñca kalānāñca ṣaṣṭiṃ guṇacatuṣṭayaṃ ।।

oṃ hāṃ hauṃ hoṃ śāntyatītakalāpāśāyeti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
mantrāṇāṃ trayamekañca viṣayaṃ kāraṇaṃ hariṃ ।antarbhāvya pratiṣṭhāyāṃ śuklayāntāḍanādikaṃ ।।vidhāya nābhisūtrasthāṃ sannidhāyāhutīryajet ।hrīṃ bhuvanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃpadānāmaṣṭaviṃśatiṃ ।vījanāḍīsamīrāṇāṃ dvayorindriyayorapi ।varṇantattvañca viṣayamekaikaṃ guṇapañcakaṃ ।।hetuṃ brahmāṇḍamantrasthaṃ śambarāṇāṃ catuṣṭayaṃ ।nivṛttau pītavarṇāyāmantarbhāvya pratāḍayet ।।ādau yattattvabhāgānte sūtre vinyasyapūjayet ।juhuyādāhutīstisraḥ sannidhāya pāvake ।।ityādāya kalāsūtre yojayecchiṣyavigrahāt ।savījāyāntu dīkṣāyāṃ samayācārayāgataḥ ।।dehārambhakarakṣārthaṃ mantrasiddhiphalādapi ।iṣṭāpūrtādidharmārthaṃ vyatiriktaṃ prabandhakaṃ ।।caitanyabodhakaṃ sūkṣmaṃ kalānāmantare smaret ।amunaiva krameṇātha kuryāttarpaṇadīpane ।।āhutibhiḥ svamantreṇa tisṛbhistisṛbhis tathā ।
oṃ hauṃ śāntyatītakalāpāśāya svāhetyāditarpaṇaṃ

oṃ hāṃ haṃ hāṃ śāntyatītakalāpāśāya hūmphaḍityādidīpanaṃ
tat sūtraṃ vyāptibodhāya kalāsthāneṣu pañcasu ।।

hrīṃ tribhuvanādhipānāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

padānāmūnaviṃśatimiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

ādau satattvabhāveneti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ hauṃ hauṃ iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
saṅgṛhya kuṅkumājyena tatra sāṅgaṃ śivaṃ yajet ।hūmphaḍantaiḥ kalāmantrair bhittvā pāśānanukramāt ।।namo antaiś ca praviśyāntaḥ kuryād grahaṇabandhane ।
oṃ hūṃ hāṃ hauṃ hāṃ hūṃ phaṭ śāntyatītakalāṃ gṛhṇāmi badhnāmi cetyādimantraiḥ kalānāṃ grahaṇabandhanādiprayogaḥ
pāśādīnāñca svīkāro grahaṇaṃ bandhanaṃ punaḥ ।।puruṣaṃ prati niḥśeṣavyāpārapratipattaye ।upaveśyātha tat sūtraṃ śiṣyaskandhe niveśayet ।।vistṛtāghapramoṣāya śataṃ mūlena homayet ।śarāvasampuṭe puṃsaḥ striyāś ca praṇitodare ।।hṛdastrasampuṭaṃ sūtraṃ vidhāyābhyarcayeddhṛdā ।sūtraṃ śivena sāṅgena kṛtvā sampātaśodhitaṃ ।।nidadhyāt kalaśasyādho rakṣāṃ vijñāpayediti ।śiṣyaṃ puṣpaṃ kare datvā sampūjya kalaśādikaṃ ।।praṇamayya vahiryāyād yāgamandiramadhyataḥ ।maṇḍalatritayaṃ kṛtvā mumukṣvanuttarānanān ।।bhuktaye pūrvavaktrāṃś ca śiṣyāṃstatra niveśayet ।prathame pañcagavyasya prāśayeccullakatrayaṃ ।।pāṇinā kuśayuktena arcitānantarāntaraṃ ।caruntatastṛtīye tu grāsatritayasammitaṃ ।।aṣṭagrāsapramāṇaṃ vā daśanasparśavarjitaṃ ।pālāśapuṭake muktau bhuktau pippalapatrake ।।

kumbhamājyeneti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nidadhyān pūrvavaddhṛdā iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
hṛdā sambhojanaṃ datvā pūtair ācāmayejjalaiḥ ।dantakāṣṭhaṃ hṛdā kṛtvā prakṣipecchobhane śubhaṃ ।।nyūnādidoṣamoṣāya mūlenāṣṭottaraṃ śataṃ ।vidhāya sthiṇḍileśāya sarvakarmasamarpaṇaṃ ।।pūjāvisarjanañcāsya caṇḍeśasya ca pūjanaṃ ।nirmālyamapanīyātha śeṣamagnau yajeccaroḥ ।।kalaśaṃ lokapalāṃś ca pūjayitvā visṛjya ca ।visṛjedgaṇamagniñca rakṣitaṃ yadi vāhyataḥ ।।vāhyato lokapālānāṃ datvā saṅkṣepato baliṃ ।bhasmanā śuddhatoyair vā snātvā yā gālayaṃ viśet ।।gṛhasthān darbhaśayyāyāṃ pūrvaśīrṣān surakṣitān ।hṛdā sadbhasmaśayyāyāṃ yatīn dakṣiṇamastakān ।।śikhābaddhasikhānastrasaptamāṇavakānvitān ।vijñāya snāpayecchiṣyāṃstato yāyāt punarvahiḥ ।।
oṃ hili hili triśūlapāṇaye svāhā
pañcagavyañcaruṃ prāśya gṛhītvā dantadhāvanaṃ ।samācamya śivaṃ dhyātvā śayyāmāsthāya pāvanīṃ ।।dīkṣāgataṅkriyākāṇḍaṃ saṃsmaran saṃviśedguruḥ ।iti saṅkṣepataḥ prokto vidhirdīkṣādhivāsane ।।
e ity ādimāhāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāmadhivāsanaṃ nāma tryaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

yāgālayaṃ vrajediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vidyāmāsthāya pāvanīmiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś caturaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

nirvāṇadīkṣāvidhānaṃ

īśvara uvāca
atha prātaḥ samutthāya kṛtasnanādiko guruḥ ।dadhyārdramāṃsamadyādeḥ praśastābhyavahāritā ।।gajāśvarohaṇaṃ svapne śubhaṃ śuklāṃśukādikaṃ ।tailābhyaṅgādikaṃ hīnaṃ homo ghoreṇa śāntaye ।।nityakarmadvayaṃ kṛtvā praviśya makhamaṇḍapaṃ ।svācānto nityavat karma kuryānnaimittike vidhau ।।tataḥ saṃśodhya cātmānaṃ śivahastaṃ tathātmani ।vinyasya kumbhagaṃ prārcya indrādīnāmanukramāt ।।maṇḍale sthaṇḍile vāpi prakurvīta śivarcanaṃ ।tarpaṇaṃ pūjanaṃ vahneḥ pūrṇāntaṃ mantratarpaṇaṃ ।।duḥkhapradoṣamoṣāya śastreṇāṣṭādhikaṃ śataṃ ।hutvā hūṃ sampuṭenaiva vidadhyāt mantradīpanaṃ ।।antarbalividhānañca madhye sthaṇḍilakumbhayoḥ ।kṛtvā śiṣyapraveśāya labdhānujño vahirvrajet ।।kuryātsamayavattatra maṇḍalāropaṇādikaṃ ।sampātahomaṃ tannāḍīrūpadarbhakarānugaṃ ।।tatsannidhānāya tistro hutvā mūlāṇunāahutīḥ ।kumbhasthaṃ śivamabhyarcya pāśasūtramupāharet ।।

śuklāmbarādikamiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

asmallabdhapañcapustakeṣu dadhyārdramāṃsamadyāderityārabhya homo ghoreṇa śāntaye ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ pūrveṇānanvita iva pratibhāti

pāśasūtraṃ samāharediti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
svadakṣiṇordhvakāyasya śiṣyasyābhyarcitasya ca ।tacchikhāyāṃ nibadhnīyāt pādāṅguṣṭhāvalambitaṃ ।।taṃ niveśya nivṛttestu vyāptimālokya cetasā ।jñeyāni bhuvanānyasyāṃ śatamaṣṭādhikaṃ tataḥ ।।kapālo ajaś ca buddhaś ca vajradehaḥ pramardanaḥ ।vibhūtiravyayaḥ śāstā pinākī tridaśādhipaḥ ।।agnī rudro hutāśo ca piṅgalaḥ khādako haraḥ ।jvalano dahano babhrurbhasmāntakakṣapāntakau ।।yāmyamṛtyuharo dhātā vidhātā kāryarañjakaḥ ।kālo dharmo apyadharmaś ca saṃyoktā ca viyogakaḥ ।।nairṛto māraṇo hantā krūradṛṣṭirbhayānakaḥ ।ūrdhvāṃśako virūpākṣo dhūmralohitadaṃṣṭravān ।।balaścātibalaś caiva pāśahasto mahābalaḥ ।śvetaś ca jayabhadraś ca dīrghabāhurjalāntakaḥ ।।vaḍavāsyaś ca bhīmaś ca daśaite vāruṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ।śīghro laghurvāyuvegaḥ sūkṣmastīkṣṇaḥ kṣapāntakaḥ ।।pañcāntakaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ kapardī meghavāhanaḥ ।jaṭāmukuṭadhārī ca nānāratnadharas tathā ।।nidhīśo rūpavān dhanyo saumyadehaḥ prasādakṛt ।prakāśo apyatha lakṣmīvān kāmarūpo daśottare ।।vidyādharo jñānadharaḥ sarvajño vedapāragaḥ ।mātṛvṛttaś ca piṅgākṣo bhūtapālo balipriyaḥ ।।

pravardhana iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

varuṇa iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

janāntaka iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
sarvavidyāvidhatā ca sukhaduḥkhaharā daśa ।anantaḥ pālako dhīraḥ pātālādhipatis tathā ।।vṛṣo vṛṣadharo vīryo grasanaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ ।lohitaś caiva vijñeyā daśa rudrāḥ phaṇisthitāḥ ।।śambhurvibhurgaṇādhyakṣastryakṣastridaśavanditaḥ ।saṃhāraś ca vihāraś ca lābho lipsurvicakṣaṇaḥ ।।attā kuhakakālāgnirudro hāṭaka eva ca ।kuṣmāṇḍaś caiva satyaś ca brahmā viṣṇuś ca saptamaḥ ।।rudraścāṣṭāvime rudrāḥ kaṭāhābhyantare sthitāḥ ।eteṣāmeva nāmāni bhuvanānāmapi smaret ।।bhavodbhavaḥ sarvabhūtaḥ sarvabhūtasukhapradaḥ ।sarvasānnidhyakṛd brahmaviṣṇurudraśarārcitaḥ ।।
saṃstuta pūrvasthita oṃ sākṣin oṃ rudrāntaka oṃ pataṅga oṃ śabda oṃ sūkṣma oṃ śiva sarvasarvada sarvasānnidhyakara brahmaviṣṇurudrakara oṃ namaḥ śivāya oṃ namo namaḥ 
aṣṭāviṃśati pādāni vyomavyāpi mano guha ।sadyohṛdastranetrāṇi mantravarṇāṣṭako mataḥ ।।

ghora iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vīryāprasanna iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

atha śuklakakālāgnirudra iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

anarcita saṃstuta pūrvasthita sākṣin tuṅga pataṅga jñāna śabda sūkṣma śiva sarvada sarvādhyakṣakara brahmaviṣṇurudra oṃ namaḥ śivāya oṃ namo namaḥ oṃ namaḥ śivāya oṃ namo namaḥ iti । anarcita saṃstuta pūrvavinda oṃ sākṣiṇa oṃ rudrāntaka oṃ pataṅga oṃ jñāna oṃ śabda oṃ sūkṣma oṃ śiva oṃ sarva oṃ sarvada oṃ sarvasānnidhyakara brahmaviṣṇu rudrakara oṃ namaḥ śivāya oṃ namo nama iti ca, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vījākāro makāraś ca nāḍyāviḍāpiṅgalāhvaye ।prāṇāpānāvubhau vāyū ghrāṇopasthau tathendriye ।।gandhastu viṣayaḥ prokto gandhādiguṇapañcake ।pārthivaṃ maṇḍalaṃ pītaṃ vajrāṅgaṃ caturasrakaṃ ।।vistāro yojanānāntu koṭirasya śatāhatā ।atraivāntargatā jñeyā yonayo api caturdaśa ।।prathamā sarvadevānāṃ manvādyā devayonayaḥ ।mṛgapakṣī ca paśavaś caturdhā tu sarīsṛpāḥ ।।sthāvaraṃ pañcamaṃ sarvaṃ yoniḥ ṣaṣṭhī amānuṣī ।paiśācaṃ rākṣasaṃ yākṣaṃ gāndharvaṃ caindrameva ca ।।saumyaṃ prāṇeśvaraṃ brāhmamaṣṭamaṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।aṣṭānāṃ pārthivantattvamadhikārāspadaṃ mataṃ ।।layastu prakṛtau buddhau bhogo brahmā ca kāraṇaṃ ।tato jāgradavasthānaiḥ samastair bhuvanādibhiḥ ।।nivṛttiṃ garbhitāṃ dhyātvā svamantreṇa niyojya ca ।
oṃ hāṃ hrūṃ hāṃ nivṛttikalāpāśāya hūṃ phaṭ tata oṃ hāṃ hāṃ nivṛttikalāpāśāya svāhetyanenāṅkuśamudrayā pūrakeṇākṛṣya oṃ hrūṃ hrāṃ hrūṃ nivṛttikalāpāśāya hūṃ phaḍityanena saṃhāramudrayā kumbhakenādhaḥ-[!!!]

vījoṅkāro makaraśceti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
yoniḥ ṣaṣṭhī sumānuṣī iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ ।
yoniḥ ṣaṣṭīṣu mānuṣī iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

prajeśvaramiti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ hūṃ hāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

tata oṃ hāṃ hāṃ hāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hūṃ hrūṃ hūmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sthānādādāya oṃ oṃ hrāṃ hāṃ nivṛttikalāpāśāya nama ity anenodbhavamudrayā recakena kumbhe saṃsthāpya oṃ hāṃ nivṛttikalāpāśāya nama ity anenārghyaṃ datvā sampūjya vimukhenaiva svāhāntenai sannidhānāyāhutitrayaṃ santarpaṇāhutitrayaṃ ca datvā oṃ hāṃ brahmaṇe nama iti brahmāṇamāvāhya sampūjya ca svāhāntena santarpya
brahman tavādhikāre asmin mumukṣuṃ dokṣyayāmyahaṃ ।।bhāvyaṃ tvayānukūlena vidhiṃ vijñāpayediti ।āvāhayettato devīṃ rakṣāṃ vāgīśvarīṃ hṛdā ।।icchājñānakriyārūpāṃ ṣaḍvidhāṃ hy ekakāraṇaṃ ।pūjayettarpayeddevīṃ prakāreṇāmunā tataḥ ।।vāgīśvarīṃ viniḥśeṣayonivikṣobhakāraṇaṃ ।hṛtsampuṭārthavījādihūṃ phaḍantaśarāṇunā ।।tāḍayeddhṛdaye tasya praviśetsa vidhānavit ।tataḥ śiṣyasya caitanyaṃ hṛdi vahnikaṇopamaṃ ।।nivṛttisthaṃ yutaṃ pāśair jyeṣṭhayā vibhajedyathā ।oṃ hāṃ hūṃ haḥ hūṃ phaṭoṃ hāṃ svāhetyanenātha pūrakeṇāṅkuśamudrayā ।।tadākṛṣya svamantreṇa gṛhītvāatmani yojayet ।
oṃ hāṃ hrūṃ hāṃ ātmane namaḥ
pitrorvibhāvya saṃyogaṃ caitanyaṃ recakena tat ।।brahmādikāraṇatyāgakramānnītvā śivāspadaṃ ।

oṃ hūṃ hrīṃ hāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

praviśyecceti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ hāṃ kṣaṃ hāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
garbhādhānārthamādāya yugapat sarvayoniṣu ।।kṣipedvāgīśvarīyonau vāmayodbhavamudrayā ।
oṃ hāṃ hāṃ hāṃ ātmane namaḥ 
pūjayedapyanenaiva tarpayedapi pañcadhā ।।anyayoniṣu sarvāsu dehaśuddhiṃ hṛdā caret ।nātra puṃsavanaṃ stryādiśarīrasyāpi sambhavāt ।।sīmantonnayanaṃ vāpi daivānyaṅgāni dehavat ।śirasā janma kurvīta jugupsan sarvadehināṃ ।।tathaiva bhāvayedeṣāmadhikāraṃ śivāṇunā ।bhogaṃ kavacamantreṇa śastreṇa viṣayātmanā ।।moharūpamabhedaś ca layasajñaṃ vibhāvayet ।śivena śrotasāṃ śuddhiṃ hṛdā tattvaviśodhanaṃ ।।pañca pañcāhutīḥ kuryāt garbhādhānādiṣu kramāt ।māyayā malakarmādipāśabandhanivṛttaye ।।niṣkṛtyaiva hṛdā paścād yajeta śatamāhutīḥ ।malaśaktinirodhena pāśānāñca viyojanaṃ ।।svāhāntāyudhamantreṇa pañcapañcāhutīryajet ।māyādyantasya pāśasya saptavārāstrajaptayā ।।kartaryā chedanaṃ kuryāt kalpaśastreṇa tadyathā ।
oṃ hūṃ nivṛttikalāpāśāya hūṃ phaṭ

oṃ haṃ haṃ hāṃ ātmane nama iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śikhātmane kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

pañcapañcāhutīrdadyāditi ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
bandhakatvañca nirvartya hastābhyāñca śarāṇunā ।।visṛjya vartulīkṛtya ghṛtapūrṇe sruve dharet ।dahedanukalāstreṇa kevalāstreṇa bhasmasāt ।।kuryāt pañcāhutīrdatvā pāśāṅkuśanivṛttaye ।
oṃ haḥ astrāya hūṃ phaṭ
prāyaścittaṃ tataḥ kuryādastrāhutibhiraṣṭabhiḥ ।।athāvāhya vidhātāraṃ pūjayettarpayettathā ।
tata oṃ hāṃ śabdasparśaśuddhabrahman gṛhāṇa svāhetyāhutitrayeṇādhikāramasya samarpayet
dagdhaniḥśeṣapāpasya brahmannasya paśostvayā ।।bandhāya na punaḥ stheyaṃ śivājñāṃ śrāvayediti ।tato visṛjya dhātāraṃ nāḍyā dakṣiṇayā śanaiḥ ।।saṃhāramudrayātmānaṃ kumbhakena nijātmanā ।rāhuyuktaikadeśena candravimbena sannibhaṃ ।।ādāya yojayet sūtre recakenodbhavākhyayā ।pūjayitvārghyapātrasthatoyavindusudhopamaṃ ।।visṛjya pitarau dadyādvauṣaḍantaśivāṇunā ।pūraṇāya vidhiḥ pūrṇā nivṛttiriti śodhitā ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ nivṛttikalāśodhanaṃ nāma caturaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

śivātmaneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dagdhaniḥśeṣapāśasya iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

pratiṣṭhākalāśodhanoktiḥ

īśvara uvāca
tattvayoratha sandhānaṃ kuryācchuddhaviśuddhayoḥ ।hrasvadīrghaprayogeṇa nādanādāntasaṅginā ।।oṃ hāṃ hrūṃ hāṃ aptejo vāyurākāśaṃ tanmātrendriyabuddhayaḥ ।guṇatrayamahaṅkāraś caturviṃśaḥ pumāniti ।।pratiṣṭhāyāṃ niviṣṭhāni tattvānyetāni bhāvayet ।pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyāni khādiyāntākṣarāṇi ca ।।pañcāśadadhikā ṣaṣṭirbhuvanaistulyasañjñitāḥ ।tāvanta eva rudrāś ca vijñeyāstatra tadyathā ।।amareśaḥ prabhāvaś ca nemiṣaḥ puṣkaro api ca ।tathā pādiś ca daṇḍiś ca bhāvabhūtirathāṣṭamaḥ ।।nakulīśo hariś candraḥ śrīśailo daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ ।anvīśo asrātikeśaś ca mahākālo atha madhyamaḥ ।।kedāro bhairavaś caiva dvitīyāṣṭakamīritaṃ ।tato gayākurukṣetrakhalānādikanādike ।।vimalaścāṭṭahāsaś ca mahendro bhāma eva ca ।vasvāpadaṃ rudrakoṭiraviyukto mahāvantaḥ ।।gokarṇo bhadrakarṇaś ca svarṇākṣaḥ sthāṇureva ca ।ajeśaś caiva sarvajño bhāsvaraḥ sūdanāntaraḥ ।।subāhurmattarūpī ca viśālo jaṭilas tathā ।

oṃ hāṃ hūṃ hūṃ hāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

alpīśo bhrāntikeśaśceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vimalaś caṇḍahāsaśceti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
raudro atha piṅgalākṣaś ca kāladaṃṣṭrī bhavettataḥ ।।viduraś caiva ghoraś ca prājāpatyo hutāśanaḥ ।kāmarūpī tathā kālaḥ karṇo apyatha bhayānakaḥ ।।mataṅgaḥ piṅgalaś caiva haro vai dhātṛsajñakaḥ ।śaṅkukarṇo vidhānaś ca śrīkaṇṭhaś candraśekharaḥ ।।sahaitena ca paryantāḥ kathyante atha padānyapi ।
vyāpin oṃ arūpa oṃ pramatha oṃ tejaḥ oṃ jyotiḥ oṃ puruṣa oṃ agne oṃ adhūma oṃ abhasma oṃ anādi oṃ nānā oṃ dhūdhū oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ anidhana nidhanodbhava śiva śarva paramātman maheśvara mahādeva sadbhāveśvara mahātejaḥ yogādhipataye muñca prathama sarva sarvesarveti dvātriṃśat padāni vījabhāve trayo mantrā vāmadevaḥ śivaḥ śikhā ।। gāndhārī ca suṣumṇā ca nāḍyau dvau mārutau tathā । samānodānanāmānau rasanāpāyurindriye ।। rasastu viṣayo rūpaśabdasparśarasā guṇāḥ । maṇḍalaṃ vartulaṃ tacca puṇḍarīkāṅkitaṃ sitaṃ ।। svapnāvasthāpratiṣṭhāyāṃ kāraṇaṃ garuḍadhvajaṃ । pratiṣṭhāntakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sañcintya bhuvanādikaṃ ।। sūtraṃ dehe svamantreṇa praviśyaināṃ viyojayet । oṃ hāṃ khīṃ hāṃ pratiṣṭhākalāpāśāya oṃ phaṭ svāhāntenānainaiva pūrakeṇāṅkuśamudrayā samākarṣet tataḥ oṃ hāṃ hrūṃ hrāṃ hrūṃ pratiṣṭhā kalāpāśāya hrūṃ phaḍityanena saṃhāramudrayā kumbhakena hṛdayādadho nāḍī-[!!!]

oṃ hrīṃ hraṃ hāṃ hūṃ iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sūtrādādāya oṃ hāṃ hrūṃ hrāṃ hāṃ pratiṣṭhākalāpāśāya nama ity anenodbhavamudrayā recakena kumbhe samāropayet oṃ hāṃ hrīṃ pratiṣṭhākalāpāśāya nama ity anenārcayitvā sampūjya svāhāntenāhutīnāṃ trayeṇa sannidhāya tataḥ oṃ hāṃ viṣṇave nama iti viṣṇumāvāhya sampūjya santarpya
viṣṇo tavādhikāre asmin mumukṣuṃ dīkṣayāmyahaṃ ।।bhāvyaṃ tvayānukūlena viṣṇuṃ vijñāpayediti ।tato vāgīśvarīṃ devīṃ vāgīśamapi pūrvavat ।।āvāhyābhyarcya santarpya śiṣyaṃ vakṣasi tāḍayet ।oṃ hāṃ hāṃ haṃ phaṭ praviśedapyanenaiva caitanyaṃ vibhajettataḥ ।।śastreṇa pāśasaṃyuktaṃ jyeṣṭayāṅkuśamudrayā ।
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hoṃ hrūṃ phaṭ 
svāhāntena hṛdākṛṣya tenaiva puṭitātmanā ।।gṛhītvā taṃ namontena nijātmani niyojayet ।
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hoṃ ātmane namaḥ
pūrvavat pitṛsaṃyogaṃ bhāvayitvodbhavākhyayā ।।vāmayā tadanenaiva devīgarbhe vinikṣipet ।
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hāṃ ātmane namaḥ
dehotpattau hṛdā hy evaṃ śirasā janmanā tathā ।।

oṃ hūṃ hrāṃ hāṃ iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ haṃ hāṃ haḥ phaṭ iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakadvayapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ haṃ hāṃ hūṃ phaṭ iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

nivedayediti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ haṃ hāṃ iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhāvayitvā tu dakṣayeti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śikhayā vādhikārāya bhogāya kavacāṇunā ।tattvaśuddhau hṛdā hy evaṃ garbhādhānāya pūrvavat ।।śirasā pāśaśaithilye niṣkṛtyaivaṃ śataṃ japet ।evaṃ pāśaviyoge api tataḥ śāstrajaptayā ।।chindyādastreṇa kartaryā kalāvījavatā yathā ।
oṃ hrīṃ pratiṣṭhākalāpāśāya haḥ phaṭ
visṛjya vartulīkṛtya pāśamantreṇa pūrvavat ।।ghṛtapūrṇe śrave datvā kalāstreṇaiva homayet ।astreṇa juhuyāt pañca pāśāṅkuranivṛttaye ।।prāyaścittaniṣedhārthaṃ dadyādaṣṭāhutīstataḥ ।oṃ haḥ astrāya hrūṃ phaṭhṛdāvāhya hṛṣīkeśaṃ kṛtvā pūjatarpaṇe ।।pūrvoktavidhinā kuryādadhikārasamarpaṇaṃ ।
oṃ hāṃ rasaśulkaṃ gṛhāṇa svāhā
niḥśeṣadagdhapāśasya paśorasya hare tvayā ।।na stheyaṃ bandhakatvena śivājñāṃ śrāvayediti ।tato visṛjya govindaṃ vidyātmānaṃ niyojya ca ।।bāhumuktārdhadṛśyena candravimbena sannibhaṃ ।saṃhāramudrayā svasthaṃ vidhāyodbhavamudrayā ।।sūtre saṃyojya vinyasya toyavinduṃ yathā purā ।visṛjya pitarau vahneḥ pūjitau kusumādibhiḥ ।

vardhanīkṛtyeti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

saṃhāramadrayātmasthaṃ iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dadyāt pūrṇāṃ vidhānena pratiṣṭhāpi viśodhitā ।।

e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ pratiṣṭhākalāśodhanaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

vidyāviśodhanavidhānaṃ

īśvara uvāca
sandhānamatha vidyāyāḥ prācīnakalayā saha ।kurvīta pūrvavat kṛtvā tattvaṃ varṇaya tadyathā ।।
oṃ hoṃ kṣīmiti sandhānaṃ
rāgś ca śuddhavidyā ca niyatiḥ kalayā saha ।kālo mayā tathāvidyā tattvānāmiti saptakaṃ ।।ralavāḥ śaṣasāḥ varṇāḥ ṣaḍ vidyāyāṃ prakīrtitāḥ ।padāni praṇavādīni ekaviṃśatisaṅkhyayā ।।
oṃ namaḥ śivāya sarvaprabhave haṃ śivāya īśānamūrdhāya tatpuruṣavaktrāya aghorahṛdayāya vāmadevaguhyāya sadyojātamūrtaye oṃ namo namo guhyātiguhyāya goptre anidhāya sarvādhipāya jyotirūpāya prameśvārāya bhavena oṃ vyoma

pūrvavat dhṛtveti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

iṃ śivāya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vacoguhyāya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

sadyojātāya mūrtaye iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

atha nidhāya sarvādhipataya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
oṃ rudrāṇāṃ bhuvanānāñca svarūpamatha kaśyape ।prathamo vāmadevaḥ syāttataḥ sarvabhavodbhavaḥ ।।vajradehaḥ prabhurdhātā kravikramasuprabhāḥ ।vaṭuḥ praśāntanāmā ca paramākṣarasañjñakaḥ ।।śivaś ca saśivo babhrurakṣayaḥ śambhureva ca ।adṛṣṭarūpanāmānau tathānyo rūpavardhanaḥ ।।manonmano mahāvīryaścitrāṅgastadanantaraṃ ।kalyāṇa iti vijñeyāḥ pañcaviṃśatisaṅkhyayā ।।mantro ghorāmarau vīje nāḍyau dve tatra te yathā ।pūṣā ca hastijihvā ca vyānanāgau prabhañjanau ।।viṣayo rūpamevaikamindriye pādacakṣuṣī ।śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpañca traya ete guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।avasthātra ṣuptiś ca rudro devastu kāraṇaṃ ।vidyāmadhyagataṃ sarvaṃ bhāvayedbhavanādikaṃ ।।tāḍanaṃ chedanaṃ tatra praveśañcāpi yojanaṃ ।ākṛṣya grahaṇaṃ kuryādvidyayā hṛtpradeśataḥ ।।ātmanyāropya saṅgṛhya kalāṃ kuṇḍe niveśayet ।rudraṃ kāraṇamāvāhya vijñāpya ca śiśuṃ prati ।।pitrorāvahanaṃ kṛtvā hṛdaye tāḍayecchiśuṃ ।praviśya pūrvamantreṇa tadātmani niyojayet ।।ākṛṣyādāya pūrvoktavidhināatmani yojayet ।vāmayā yojayet yonau gṛhītvā dvādaśāntataḥ ।।

buddha iti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

āvāhanaṃ kuryāditi ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kurvīta dehasampattiṃ janmādhikārameva ca ।bhogaṃ layantathā śrotaḥśuddhitattvaviśodhanaṃ ।।niḥśeṣamalakarmādipāśabandhanivṛttaye ।niṣkṛtyaiva vidhānena yajeta śatamāhutīḥ ।।astreṇa pāśaśaithilyaṃ malaśaktiṃ tirohitāṃ ।chedanaṃ mardanaṃ teṣāṃ vartulīkaraṇaṃ tathā ।।dāhaṃ tadakṣarābhāvaṃ prāyaścittamathoditaṃ ।rudrāṇyāvāhanaṃ pūjā rūpagandhasamarpaṇaṃ ।।
oṃ hrīṃ rūpagandhau śulkaṃ rudra gṛhāṇa svāhā
saṃśrāvya śāmbhavīmājñāṃ rudraṃ visṛjya kāraṇaṃ ।vidhāyātmani caitanyaṃ pāśasūtre niveśayet ।।vinduṃ śirasi vinyasya visṛjet pitarau tataḥ ।dadyāt pūrṇāṃ vidhānena samastavidhipūraṇīṃ ।।pūrvoktavidhinā kāryaṃ vidyāyāṃ tāḍanādikaṃ ।svavījantu viśeṣaḥ syāditi vidyā viśodhitā ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ vidyāviśodhanaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

śāntiśodhanakathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
sandadhyādadhunā vidyāṃ śāntyā sārdhaṃ yathāvidhi ।śāntau tattvadvayaṃ līnaṃ bhāveśvarasadāśivau ।।

chedanaṃ bhedanaṃ teṣāṃ bahulīkaraṇantathā iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
hakāraś ca kṣakāraś ca dvau varṇau parikīrtitau ।rudrāḥ samānanāmāno bhuvanaiḥ saha tadyathā ।।prabhavaḥ samayaḥ kṣudro vimalaḥ śiva ity api ।ghanau nirañjanākārau svaśivau dīptikāraṇau ।।tridaśeśvaranāmā ca tridaśaḥ kālasajjñakaḥ ।
sūkṣmāmbujeśvaraśceti rudrāḥ śāntau pratiṣṭhitāḥ ।।

vyomavyāpine vyomavyāpyarūpāya sarvavyāpine śivāya anantāya anāthāya anāśritāya dhruvāya śāśvatāya yogapīṭhasaṃsthitāya nityayogine dhyānāhārāyeti dvādaśapādāni
puruṣaḥ kavacau mantrau vīje vindūpakārakau ।alambuṣāyasānāḍyau vāyū kṛkarakarmakau ।।indriye tvakkarāvasyā sparśastu viṣayo mataḥ ।guṇau sparśaninādau dvāvekaḥ kāraṇamīśvaraḥ ।।turmyāvastheti śāntisthaṃ sambhāvya bhuvanādikaṃ ।vidadhyāttāḍanaṃ bhedaṃ praveśañca viyojanaṃ ।।ākṛṣya grahaṇaṃ kuryācchāntervadanasūtrataḥ ।ātmanyāropya saṅgṛhya kalāṃ kuṇḍe niveśayet ।।īśaṃ tavādhikāre asmin mumukṣuṃ dīkṣayāmyahaṃ ।bhavyaṃ tvayānukūlena kuryāt vijñāpanāmiti ।।āvāhanādikaṃ pitroḥ śiṣyasya tāḍanādikaṃ ।

sūkṣmāsūkṣmeśvaraś caiva iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

vyomavyāpakarūpāya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । vyomarūpāyeti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

dhyāyaparāyeti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । vyānāhārāyeti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhāvyaṃ tvayā ca śuddhena iti ga, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
vidhāyādāya caitanyaṃ vidhināatmani yojayet ।।pūrvavat pitṛsaṃyogaṃ bhāvayitvodbhavākhyayā ।hṛtsampuṭātmavījena devīgarbhe niyojayet ।।dehotpattau hṛdā pañca śirasā janmahetave ।śikhayā vādhikārāya bhogāya kavacāṇunā ।।layāya śastramantreṇa śrotaḥśuddhau śivena ca ।tattvaśuddhau hṛdā hy evaṃ garbhādhānādi pūrvavat ।।varmaṇā pāśaśaithilyaṃ niṣkṛtyaivaṃ śataṃ japet ।malaśaktitirodhane śastreṇāhutipañcakaṃ ।।evaṃ pāśaviyoge api tataḥ saptāstrajaptayā ।chindyādastreṇa kartaryā pāśānvījavatā yathā ।।
oṃ hauṃ śāntikalāpāśāya haḥ hūṃ phaṭ
visṛjya vartulīkṛtya pāśamantreṇa pūrvavat ।ghṛtapūrṇe śruve datvā kalāstreṇaiva homayet ।।astreṇa juhuyāt pañca pāśāṅkuśanivṛttaye ।prāyaścittaniṣedhāya dadyādaṣṭāhutīratha ।।
oṃ haḥ astrāya hūṃ phaṭ
hṛdeśvaraṃ samāvāhya kṛtvā pūjanatarpaṇe ।vidadhīta vidhānena tasmai śulkasamarpaṇaṃ ।।
oṃ hāṃ īśvara buddhyahaṅkārau śulkaṃ gṛhāṇa svāhā
niḥśeṣadagdhapāśasya paśorasyeśvara tvayā ।na stheyaṃ bandhakatvena śivājñāṃ śrāvayediti ।।
