ekaṃ pāśaviyogārthamiti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hy aimiti ka, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ omiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ yaimiti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
visṛjedīśvarandevaṃ raudrātmānaṃ niyojayet ।īṣaccandramivātmānaṃ vidhināatmani yojayet ।।sūtre saṃyojayedenaṃ śuddhayodbhavamudrayā ।dadyāt mūlena śiṣyasya śirasyamṛtavindukaṃ ।।visṛjya pitarau vahneḥ pūjitau kusumādibhiḥ ।dadyāt pūrṇāṃ vidhānajño niḥśeṣavidhipūraṇīṃ ।।asyāmapi vidhātavyaṃ pūrvavattāḍanādiakaṃ ।svavījantu viśeṣaḥ syācchuddhiḥ śānterapīḍitā ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ śāntiśodhanaṃ nāma saptaśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ

nirvāṇadīkṣākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
sandhānaṃ śāntyatītāyāḥ śāntyā sārdhaṃ viśuddhayā ।kurvīta pūrvavattatra tattvavarṇādi tad yathā ।।
oṃ hīṃ kṣauṃ hauṃ hāṃ iti sandhānāni
ubhau śaktiśivau tattve bhuvanāṣṭakasiddhikaṃ ।dīpakaṃ rocikañcaiva mocakaṃ cordhvagāmi ca ।।vyomarūpamanāthañca syādanāśritanaṣṭamaṃ ।oṅkārapadamīśāne mantro varṇāś ca ṣoḍaśa ।।akārādivisargāntā vījena dehakārakau ।kuhūś ca śaṅkhinī nāḍyau devadattadhanañjayau ।।marutau sparśanaṃ śrotraṃ indriye viṣayo nabhaḥ ।

śabdo guṇo asyāvasthā tu turyātītā tu pañcamī ।।hetuḥ sadāśivo deva iti tattvādisañcayaṃ ।sañcintya śāntyatītākhyaṃ vidadhyāttāḍanādikaṃ ।।kalāpāśaṃ samātāḍya phaḍantena vibhidya ca ।praviśyāntar namo antena phaḍantena viyojayet ।।śikhāhṛtsampuṭībhūtaṃ svāhāntaṃ sṛṇimudrayā ।pūrakeṇa samākṛṣya pāśaṃ mastakasūtrataḥ ।।kumbhakena samādāya recakenodbhavākhyayā ।hṛtsampuṭanamo antena vahniṃ kuṇḍe niveśayet ।।asyāḥ pūjādikaṃ sarvaṃ nivṛtteriva sādhayet ।sadāśivaṃ samāvāhya pūjayitvā pratarpya ca ।।sadā khyāte adhikāre asmin mumukṣuṃ dīkṣayāmyahaṃ ।bhāvyaṃ tvayānukūlena bhaktyā vijñāpayediti ।।pitrorāvāhanaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tarpaṇasannidhī ।hṛtsampuṭātmavījena śiṣyaṃ vakṣasi tāḍayet ।।
oṃ hāṃ hūṃ haṃ phaṭ
praviśya cāpyanenaiva caitanyaṃ vibhajettataḥ ।śastreṇa pāśasaṃyuktaṃ jyeṣṭhayāṅkuśamudrayā ।।
oṃ hāṃ hūṃ haṃ phaṭ 
svāhāntena tadākṛṣya tenaiva puṭitātmanā ।gṛhītvā tannamo antena nijātmani niyojayet ।।
oṃ hāṃ haṃ hīṃ ātmane namaḥ 

oṃ hāṃ huṃ haḥ phaṭ iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hāṃ haṃ hrīmātmane nama iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
pūrvavat pitṛsaṃyogaṃ bhāvayitvodbhavākhyayā ।vāmayā tadanenaiva devyā garbhe niyojayet ।।garbhādhānādikaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā caret ।mūlena pāśaśaithilye niṣkṛtyaiva śataṃ japet ।।malaśaktitirodhāne pāśānāñca viyojane ।pañcapañcāhutīrdadyādāyudhena yathā purā ।।pāśānāyudhamantreṇa sapravārābhijaptayā ।chindyādastreṇa kartaryā kalāvījayujā yathā ।।
oṃ hāṃ śāntyatītakalāpāśāya haḥ hūṃ phaṭ
visṛjya vartulīkṛtya pāśānastreṇa pūrvavat ।ghṛtapūrṇe śruve datvā kalāstreṇaiva homayet ।।astreṇa juhuyāt pajca pāśāṅkuśanivṛttaye ।prāyaścittaniṣedhārthaṃ dadyādaṣṭāhutīstataḥ ।।sadāśivaṃ hṛdāvāhya kṛtvā pūjanatarpaṇe ।pūrvoktavidhinā kuryādadhikārasamarpaṇaṃ ।।
oṃ hāṃ sadāśiva manovindu śulkaṃ gṛhāṇa svāhā
niḥśeṣadagdhapāśasya paśorasya sadāśiva ।bandhāya na tvayā stheyaṃ śivājñāṃ śrāvayediti ।।mūlena juhuyāt pūrṇāṃ visṛjettu sadāśivaṃ ।tato viśuddhamātmānaṃ śaraccandramivoditaṃ ।।saṃhāramudrayā raudryā saṃyojya gururātmani ।kurvīta śiṣyadehasthamuddhṛtyodbhavamudrayā ।।dadyādāpyāyanāyāsya mastake arghyāmbuvindukaṃ ।kṣamayitvā mahābhaktyā pitarau visṛjettathā ।।

vāmayā hṛdayenaiveti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
kheditau śiṣyadīkṣāyai yanmayā pitarau yuvāṃ ।kāruṇyanānmokṣayitvā tadvraja tvaṃ sthānamātmanaḥ ।।śikhāmantritakartaryā bodhaśaktisvarūpiṇīṃ ।śikhāṃ chidyācchivāstreṇa śiṣyasya caturaṅgulāṃ ।।
oṃ klīṃ śikhāyai hūṃ phaṭ oṃ haḥ astrāya hūṃ phaṭ
sruci tāṃ ghṛtapūrṇāyāṃ goviḍgolakamadhyagāṃ ।saṃvidhāyāstramantreṇa hūṃ phaḍantena homayet ।।
oṃ hauṃ haḥ astrāya hūṃ phaṭ
prakṣālya sruksruvau śiṣyaṃ saṃsnāpyācamya ca svayaṃ ।yojanikāsthānamātmānaṃ śastramantreṇa tāḍayet ।।viyojyākṛṣya sampūjya pūrvavad dvādaśāntataḥ ।ātmīyahṛdayāmbhojakarṇikāyāṃ niveśayet ।।pūritaṃ śruvamājyena vihitādhomukhaśrucā ।nityoktavidhināadāya śaṅkhasannibhamudrayā ।।prasāritaśirogrīvo nādoccārānusārataḥ ।samadṛṣṭiśivaścāntaḥ parabhāvasamanvitaḥ ।।kumbhamaṇḍalavahnibhyaḥ śiṣyādapi nijātmanaḥ ।gṛhītvā ṣaḍvidhavidhānaṃ śrugagre prāṇanāḍikaṃ ।।sañcintya vinduvad dhyātvā kramaśaḥ saptadhā yathā ।prathamaṃ prāṇasaṃyogasvarūpamaparantataḥ ।।

oṃ hūṃ śikhāyai hūṃ phaṭ iti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ hrīṃ śikhāyai hraṃ phaḍiti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

govindalokamadhyagāmiti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

viyojyākṛṣya saṅgṛhyeti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

kuṇḍamaṇḍalavahnibhya iti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
hṛdayādikramoccāravisṛṣṭaṃ mantrasañjñakaṃ ।pūrakaṃ kumbhakaṃ kṛtvā vyādāya vadanaṃ manāk ।।suṣumṇānugataṃ nādasvarūpantu tṛtīyakaṃ ।saptame kāraṇe tyāgātpraśāntavikharaṃ layaḥ ।।śaktinādordhvasañcārastacchaktivikharaṃ mataṃ ।prāṇasya nikhilasyāpi śaktiprameyavarjitaṃ ।।tatkālavikharaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ śaktyatītañca saptamaṃ ।tadetad yojanāsthānaṃ vikharantattvasañjñakaṃ ।।pūrakaṃ kumbhakaṃ kṛtvā vyādāya vadanaṃ manāk ।śanair udīrayan mūlaṃ kṛtvā śiṣyātmano layaṃ ।।hakāre taḍidākāre ṣaḍadhvajaprāṇarūpiṇi ।ukāraṃ parato nābhervitastiṃ vyāpya saṃsthitaṃ ।।tataḥ paraṃ makārantu hṛdayāccaturaṅgulaṃ ।oṅkāraṃ vācakaṃ viṣṇostato aṣṭāṅgulakaṇṭhakaṃ ।।caturaṅgulatālusthaṃ makāraṃ rudravācakaṃ ।tadvallalāṭamadhyasthaṃ vindumīśvaravācakaṃ ।।nādaṃ sadāśivaṃ devaṃ brahmarandhrāvasānakaṃ ।śaktiṃ ca brahmarandhrasthāṃ tyajannityamanukramāt ।।divyaṃ pipīlikāsparśaṃ tasminnevānubhūya ca ।dvādaśānte pare tattve paramānandalakṣaṇe ।।bhāvaśūnye mano atīte śive nityaguṇodaye ।vilīya mānase tasmin śiṣyātmānaṃ vibhāvayet ।।vimuñcan sarpiṣo dhārāṃ jvālānte api pare śive ।yojanikāsthiratvāya vauṣaḍantaśivāṇunā ।।

vauṣaḍantaśivātmaneti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
datvā pūrṇāṃ vidhānena guṇāpadānamacaret ।
oṃ hāṃ ātmane sarvajño bhava svāhā । oṃ hāṃ ātmane 
paritṛpto bhava svāhā । oṃ hrūṃ ātmane anādibodho bhava svāhā। oṃ hauṃ ātmane svatantro bhava svāhā । oṃ hauṃ ātman aluptaśaktirbhava svāhā । oṃ haḥ ātmane anantaśaktirbhavasvāhāitthaṃ ṣaḍguṇamātmānaṃ gṛhītvā paramākṣarāt ।।vidhinā bhāvanopetaḥ śiṣyadehe niyojayet ।tīvrāṇuśaktisampātajanitaśramaśāntaye ।।śiṣyamūrdhani vinyasyedarghyādamṛtavindukaṃ ।praṇamayyeśakumbhādīn śivāddakṣiṇamaṇḍale ।।saumyavaktraṃ vyavasthāpya śiṣyaṃ dakṣiṇamātmanaḥ ।tvayaivānugṛhīto ayaṃ mūrtimāsthāya māmakīṃ ।।deve vahnau gurau tasmādbhaktiṃ cāpyasya vardhaya ।iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ praṇamya ca guruḥ svayaṃ ।।

oṃ hrīṃ ātmanniti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ hauṃ ātmanniti gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hrīṃ ātmane iti kha, ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ hīṃ ātmanniti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hraiṃ ātmanniti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ ātmanniti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ hraiṃ ātmanniti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ huṃ ātmanniti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ । oṃ hauṃ ātmanniti gha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

oṃ haiṃ ātmanniti kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

śivadakṣiṇamaṇḍale iti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ

bhaktiṃ nāthāsya vardhayeti kha, ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
śreyastavāstviti brūyādāśiṣaṃ śiṣyamādarāt ।tataḥ paramayā bhaktyā datvā deve aṣṭapuṣpikāṃ ।putrakaṃ śivakumbhena saṃsnāpya visṛjenmakhaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nirvāṇadīkṣāsamāpanaṃ nāma aṣṭāśītitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

ekatattvadīkṣākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
athaikatāttvikī dīkṣā laghutvādupadiśyate ।sūtrabandhādi kurvīta yathāyogaṃ nijātmanā ।।kālāgnyādiśivāntāni tattvāni parabhāvayet ।samatattve samagrāṇi sūtre maṇigaṇāniva ।।āvāhya śivatattvādi garbhādhānādi pūrvavat ।mūlena kintu kurvīta sarvaśulkasamarpaṇaṃ ।।pradadīta tataḥ pūrṇāṃ tattvavātopagarbhitāṃ ।ekayaiva yayā śiṣyo nirvāṇamadhigacchati ।।yojanāyai śive cānyāṃ sthiratvāpādanāya ca ।datvā pūrṇāṃ prakurvīta śivakumbhābhiṣecanaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahapurāṇe āgneye ekatattvadīkṣākathanaṃ nāma ūnanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha navatitamo adhyāyaḥ

abhiṣekādikathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
śivamabhyarcyābhiṣekaṃ kuryācchiṣyādike śriye ।kumbhānīśādikāṣṭhāsu kramaśo nava vinyaset ।।teṣu kṣārodaṃ kṣīrodaṃ dadhyudaṃ ghṛtasāgaraṃ ।ikṣukādambarīsvādumastūdānaṣṭasāgarān ।।niveśayed yathāsaṅkhyamaṣṭau vidyeśvarānatha ।ekaṃ śikhaṇḍinaṃ rudraṃ śrīkaṇṭhantu dvitīyakaṃ ।।trimūrtamekarudrākṣamekanetraṃ śivottamaṃ ।saptamaṃ sūkṣmanāmānamanantaṃ rudramaṣṭamaṃ ।।madhye śivaṃ samudrañca śivamantraṃ ca vinyaset ।yāgālayān digīśasya racite snānamaṇḍape ।।kuryāt karadvayāyāmāṃ vedīmaṣṭāṅgulocchritāṃ ।śrīparṇādyāsane tatra vinyasyānantamānasaṃ ।।śiṣyaṃ niveśya pūrvāsyaṃ sakalīkṛtya pūjayet ।kāñjikaudanamṛdbhasmadūrvāgomayagolakaiḥ ।।siddhārthadadhitoyaiś ca kuryānnirmañchanaṃ tataḥ ।kṣārodānukrameṇātha hṛdā vidyeśaśambaraiḥ ।।kalasaiḥ snāpayecchiṣyaṃ svadhādhāraṇayānvitaṃ ।paridhāpya site vastre niveśya śivadakṣiṇe ।।pūrvoditāsane śiṣyaṃ punaḥ pūrvavadarcayet ।uṣṇīṣaṃ yogapaṭṭañca mukuṭaṃ kartarīṃ ghaṭīṃ ।।akṣamālāṃ pustakādi śivakādyadhikārakaṃ ।

svādugargodānaṣṭasāgarāniti ka, kha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
dīkṣāvyākhyāpratiṣṭhādyaṃ jñātvādyaprabhṛti tvayā ।।suparīkṣya vidhātavyamājñāṃ saṃśrāvayediti ।abhivādya tataḥ śiṣyaṃ praṇipatya maheśvaraṃ ।।vighnajvālāpanodārthaṃ kuryādvijñāpanāṃ yathā ।abhiṣekārthamādiṣṭastvayāhaṃ gurumūrtinā ।।saṃhitāpāragaḥ so ayamabhiṣikto mayā śiva ।tṛptaye mantracakrasya pañcapañcāhutīryajet ।।dadyāt pūrṇāṃ tataḥ śiṣyaṃ sthāpayennijadakṣiṇe ।śiṣyadakṣiṇapāṇisthā aṅguṣṭhādyaṅgulīḥ kramāt ।।lāñchayedupabaddhāya dagdhadarbhāgraśambaraiḥ ।kusumāni kare datvā praṇāmaṃ kārayedamuṃ ।।kumbhe anale śive svasmisaṃstataskṛtyamāviśet ।anugrāhyāstvayā śiṣyāḥ śāstreṇa suparīkṣitāḥ ।।bhūpavanmānavādīnāmabhiṣekādabhīpsitaṃ ।āṃ śrāṃ śrauṃ paśuṃ hūṃ phaḍiti astrarājābhiṣekataḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye abhiṣekādikathanaṃ nāma navatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

vividhamantrādikathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
abhiṣiktaḥ śivaṃ viṣṇuṃ pūjayedbhāskarādikān ।śaṅkhabheryādinirghoṣaiḥ snāpayet pañcagavyakaiḥ ।।

svayaṃ vīkṣyeti ga, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
yo devāndevalokaṃ sa yāti svakulamuddharan ।varṣakoṭisahasreṣu yat pāpaṃ smupārjitaṃ ।।ghṛtābhyaṅgena devānāṃ bhasmībhavati pāvake ।āḍhakena ghṛtādyaiś ca devān snāpya suro bhavet ।।candanenānulipyātha gandhādyaiḥ pūjayettathā ।alpāyāsanaṃ stutibhistutā devāstu sarvadā ।।atītānāgatajñānamantradhībhuktimuktidāḥ ।gṛhītvā praśnasūkṣmārṇe hṛte dvābhyāṃ śubhāśubhaṃ ।।tribhirjīvo mūladhātuś caturbhirbrāhmaṇādidhīḥ ।yañcādau bhūtatattvādi śeṣe caivaṃ japādikaṃ ।।ekatrikātitrikānte pade dvipamakāntake ।aśubhaṃ madhyamaṃ madhyeṣvindrastriṣu nṛpaḥ śubhaḥ ।।saṅkhyāvṛnde jīvitābdaṃ yamo abdadaśahā dhruvaṃ ।sūryebhāsyeśadurgāśrīviṣṇumantrair likhet kaje ।।kaṭhinyā japtayā spṛṣṭe gomūtrākṛtirekhayā ।ārabhyaikaṃ trikaṃ yāvattricatuṣkāvasānakaṃ ।।marud vyoma marudvījaiś catuḥṣaṣṭipade tathā ।akṣāṇāṃ patanāt sparśādviṣamādau śubhādikaṃ ।।ekatrikādimārabhya ante cāṣṭatrikaṃ tathā ।dhvajādyāyāḥ samā hīnā viṣamāḥ śobhanādidāḥ ।।āipallavitaiḥ kādyaiḥ ṣoḍaśasvarapūrvagaiḥ ।ādyaistaiḥ sasvaraiḥ kādyaistripurānāmamantrakāḥ ।।hrīṃ vījāḥ praṇavādyāḥspur namo antā yatra pūjane ।mantrā viṃśatisāhasrāḥ śataṃ ṣaṣṭhyadhikaṃ tataḥ ।।

śobhanādikāḥ iti ṅa, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
āṃ hrīṃ mantrāḥ sarasvatyāś caṇḍikāyāstathaiva ca ।tathā gauryāś ca durgāyā āṃ śrīṃ mantrāḥ śriyas tathā ।।tathākṣauṃ krauṃ mantrāḥ sūryasya āṃ hauṃ mantrāḥśivasya ca ।āṃ gaṃ mantrā gaṇeśasya āṃ mantrāś ca tathā hareḥ ।।śatārdhaikādhikaiḥ kādyais tathā ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kharaiḥ ।kādyaistaiḥ sasvaraisādyaiḥ kāntair mantrās tathākhilāḥ ।।ravīśadevīviṣṇūnāṃ svābdhidevendravartanāt ।śatatrayaṃ ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ pratyekaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kramāt ।abhiṣikto japed dhyāyecchiṣyādīn dīkṣayedguruḥ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye nānāmantrādikathanaṃ nāma ekanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvinavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

pratiṣṭhāvidhikathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
pratiṣṭhāṃ sampravakṣyāmi kramāt saṅkṣepato guha ।pīṭhaṃ śaktiṃ śivo liṅgaṃ tadyogaḥ sā śivāṇubhiḥ ।।pratiṣṭhāyāḥ pañca bhedāsteṣāṃ rūpaṃ vadāmi te ।yatra brahmaśilāyogaḥ sā pratiṣṭhā viśeṣataḥ ।।sthāpanantu yathāyogaṃ pīṭha eva niveśanaṃ ।pratiṣṭhābhinnapīṭhasya sthitasthāpanamucyate ।।utthāpanañca sā proktā liṅgoddhārapuraḥsarā ।yasyāṃ tu liṅgamāropya saṃskāraḥ kriyate budhaiḥ ।।

tathā kṣau hrau mantrāḥ sūryasyeti ga, gha, cihnitapustakapāṭhaḥ
āthāpanaṃ taduddiṣṭaṃ dvidhā viṣṇvādikasya ca ।āsu sarvāsu caitanyaṃ niyuñjīta paraṃ śivam ।।yadādhārādibhedena prāsādeṣvapi pañcadhā ।parīkṣamatha medinyāḥ kuryātprāsādakāmyayā ।।śuklājyagandhā raktā ca raktagandhā sugandhinī ।pītā kṛṣṇā surāgandhā viprādīnāṃ mahī kramāt ।।pūrveśottarasarvatra pūrvā caiṣāṃ viśiṣyate ।ākhāte hāstike yasyāḥ pūrṇe mṛdadhikā bhavet ।।uttamāntāṃ mahīṃ vidyāttoyādyair vā samukṣitāṃ ।asthyaṅgārādibhirduṣṭāmatyantaṃ śodhayed guruḥ ।।nagaragrāmadurgārthaṃ gṛhaprāsādakāraṇaṃ ।khananair gokulāvāsaiḥ karṣaṇair vā muhurmuhuḥ ।।maṇḍape dvārapūjādi mantratṛptyavasānakaṃ ।karma nirvartyāghorāstraṃ sahasraṃ vidhinā yajet ।।samīkṛtyopaliptāyāṃ bhūmau saṃśodhayeddiśaḥ ।svarṇadadhyakṣatai rekhāḥ prakurvīta pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।madhyādīśānakoṣṭasthe pūrṇakumbhe śivaṃ yajet ।vāstumabhyarcya tattoyaiḥ siñcet kuddālakādikaṃ ।।

utthāpanaścetyādi, viṣṇvādikasya cetyetyantaḥ sārdhaikaślokātmakapāṭho ga pustake nāsti

yathādhārābhibhedeneti ga

raktagandhānugandhīti kha

praśasyate iti gha

śodhayetdhruvamiti gha

nagaragrāmetyardhaśloko gha pustake nāsti

mantradīptyavasānakamiti ga । mantrabhūmyavasānakamiti gha

nirvartya ghorāstraṃ mahāstramiti ga

rekhāṃ prakurvīteti kha ,ga ca

svarṇakuṇḍe iti ga । svarṇakumbhe iti gha, ṅa, ca
bāhye rakṣogaṇāniṣṭvā vidhinā digbalaṃ kṣipet ।bhūmiṃ saṃsicya saṃsnāpya kuddālādyaṃ prapūjayet ।।anyaṃ vastrayugacchajñaṃ kumbhaṃ skandhe dvijanmanaḥ ।nidhāya gītavādyādibrahmagoṣasamākulaṃ ।।pūjāṃ kumbhe samāhṛtya prāpte lagne agnikoṣṭhake ।kuddālenābhiṣiktena madhvaktena tu khānayet ।।nairṛtyāṃ kṣepayenmṛtsnāṃ khāte kumbhajalaṃ kṣipet ।purasya pūrvasīmantaṃ nayed yāvadabhīpsitaṃ ।।atha tatra kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā bhrāmayet paritaḥ puraṃ ।siñcan sīmantacihnāni yāvadīśānagocaraṃ ।।arghyadānamidaṃ proktaṃ tatra kumbhaparibramāt ।itthaṃ parigrahaṃ bhūmeḥ kurvīta tadanantaraṃ ।।karkarāntaṃ jalāntaṃ vā śalyadoṣajighāṃsayā ।khānayed bhūḥ kumārīṃ ced vidhinā śalyamuddharet ।।akacaṭatapayaśahān mānavaścet praśnākṣarāṇi tu ।agnerdhvajādipātitāḥ svasthāne śalyamākhyānti ।।kartuścāṅgavikāreṇa jānīyāttatpramāṇataḥ ।paśvādīnāṃ praveśena kīrtanair virutair diśaḥ ।।mātṛkāmaṣṭavargāḍhyāṃ phalake bhuvi vā likhet ।śalyajñānaṃ vargavaśāt pūrvādīśāntataḥ kramāt ।।avarge caiva lohantu kavarge aṅgāramagnitaḥ ।

bhūmiṃ saṃsicya saṃsthāpyeti ga, gha, ṅa ca

kuddālākhyamiti ga

pūrvamīśāntamiti kha

srāvayet iti kha

nava cet praśnākṣarāṇi bhāṣante iti ga, gha ca

pūrvādīnāṃ tata iti kha
cavarge bhasma dakṣe syāṭ ṭavarge asthi ca nairṛte ।।tavarge ceṣṭakā cāpye kapālañca pavargake ।yavarge śavakītādi śavarge lohamādiśet ।।havarge rajataṃ tadvadavargāccānarthakarānapi ।prīkṣyātmabhiḥ karāpūrair aṣṭāṅgulamṛdantaraiḥ ।।pādonaṃ khātamāpūrya sajalair mudgarāhataiḥ ।liptāṃ samaplavāṃ tatra kārayitvā bhuvaṃ guruḥ ।।sāmānyārghyakaro yāyānmaṇḍapaṃ vakṣyāmāṇakaṃ ।toraṇadvāḥpatīniṣṭvā pratyagdvāreṇa saṃviśet ।।kuryāttatrātmaśuddhyādi kuṇḍamaṇḍapasaṃskṛtiṃ ।kalasaṃ vardhanīsaktaṃ lokapālaśivārcanaṃ ।।agnerjananapūjādi sarvaṃ pūrvavadācaret ।yajamānānvito yāyācchilānāṃ snānamaṇḍapaṃ ।।śilāḥ prāsādaliṅgasya pādadharmādisañjñakāḥ ।aṣṭāṅgulocchritāḥ śastāś caturasrāḥ karāyatāḥ ।।pāṣāṇānāṃ śilāḥ kāryā iṣṭakānāṃ tadardhataḥ ।prāsāde aśmaśilāḥ śaile iṣṭakā iṣṭakāmaye ।।aṅkitā navavaktrādyaiḥ paṅkajāḥ paṅkajāṅkitāḥ ।nandā bhadrā jayā riktā pūrṇākhyā pañcamī matā ।।āsāṃ padmo mahāpadmaḥ śaṅkho atha makaras tathā ।samudraśceti pañcāmī nidhikumbhāḥ kramādhaḥ ।।nandā bhadrā jayā pūrṇā ajitā cāparājitā ।

muśalair mudgarāhatair iti ṅa

vardhanīyuktamiti ga, ṅa ca

yajamānārcita iti gha

navarudrādyair iti gha

pāṣāṇānāmityādiḥ, pañcamīrmatā ity antaḥ ślokadvayātmakapāṭho ga pustake nāsti
vijayā maṅgalākhyā ca dharaṇī navamī śilā ।।subhadraś ca vibhadraś ca sunandaḥ puṣpanandakaḥ ।jayo atha vijayaś caiva kumbhaḥ pūrṇastathottaraḥ ।।navānāntu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nidhikumbhaḥ pūrṇastathottaraḥ ।āsanaṃ prathamaṃ dattvā tāḍyollikhyaśarāṇunā ।।sarvāsāmaviśeṣeṇa tanutreṇāvaguṇṭhanaṃ ।mṛdbhirgomayayogāmūtrakaṣāyair gandhavāriṇā ।।astreṇa hūṃ phaḍantena malasnānaṃ samācaret ।vidhinā pañcagavyena snānaṃ pañcāmṛtena ca ।।gandhatoyāntaraṃ kuryānnijanāmāṅkitāṇunā ।phalaratnasuvarṇānāṃ gośṛṅgasalilaistataḥ ।।candanena samālabhya vastrair ācchādayecchilāṃ ।svarṇotthamāsanaṃ datvā nītvā yāgaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।śayyāyāṃ kuśatalpe vā hṛdayena niveśayet ।sampūjya nyasya buddhyādidharāntaṃ tattvasañcayaṃ ।।trikhaṇḍavyāpakaṃ tattvatrayañcānukramān nyaset ।buddhyādau cittaparyante cintātanmātrakāvadhau ।।

puṣpadantaka it kha, ga, gha, ṅa ca

pūrvastathottara iti gha

praṇavaṃ datvā iti kha

śarātmaneti kha, ga, ca

tanmātreṇāvaguṇṭhanamiti kha

huṃ phaḍanteneti ga

kuryād dvijanāmāṅkitātmaneti kha । kuryān nijanāmāṅkitātmaneti ga

samālipyeti ga

kuśatalpe vā hṝdayena viśeṣayet iti kha । kuśatalpe ca hṛdayena niveśayet iti ga

buddhyādau cittaparyante cittatanmātrakāvadhau iti gha । sampacya ity ādiḥ tanmātrakāvadhāvityantaḥ sārdhaikaślokapāṭho ga pustake nāsti
tanmātrādau dharānte ca śivavidyātmanāṃ sthitiḥ ।tattvāni nijamantreṇa tattveśāṃś ca hṛdārcayet ।।sthāneṣu puṣpamālādicihniteṣu yathākramaṃ ।
oṃ hūṃ śivatattvāya namaḥ । oṃ hūṃ śivatattvādhipataye rudrāya namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ vidyātattvāya namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ vidyātattvādhipāya viṣṇave namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ ātmatattvāya
namaḥ । oṃ hāṃ ātmatattvādhipataye brahmaṇe namaḥ kṣamāgniyajamānārkān jalavātendukhāni ca ।।pratitattvaṃ nyasedaṣṭau mūrtīḥ pratiśilāṃ śilāṃ ।sarvaṃ paśupatiṃ cograṃ rudraṃ bhavamatheśvaraṃ ।।mahādevaṃ ca bhīmaṃ ca mūrtīśāṃś ca yathākramāt ।oṃ dharāmūrtaye namaḥ, oṃ dharādhipataye namaḥ,ityādimantrān lokapālān yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nijāṇubhiḥ ।।vinyasya pūjayet kumbhāṃstanmantrair vā nijāṇubhiḥ ।indrādīnāṃ tu vījāni vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa tu ।।
lūṃ rūṃ śūṃ pūṃ vūṃ yūṃ mūṃ hūṃ kṣūmiti 
ukto navaśilāpakṣaḥ śilā pañcapadā tathā ।

oṃ hraṃ iti ga, gha ca

oṃ hīṃ iti gha

vidyātattvādhipataye iti kha

oṃ hūṃ śivatattvādhipataye ity ādiḥ, oṃ hāṃ ātmatattvādhipataye brahmaṇe nama ity antaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti

paśupatiṃ bhīmamiti gha

bhavamakheśvaram iti gha

nijātmabhiriti kha, ga । vinyasyetyardhaśloko ga pustake nāsti

oṃ hūṃ ghūṃ būṃ yūṃ mūṃ haṃ kṣamitīti ga । oṃ kaṃ sūṃ pūṃ śūṃ hrūṃ kṣamitīti gha । lūṃ rūṃ śūṃ pūṃ vūṃ cūṃ mūṃ hūṃ kṣūmitīti kha
pratitattvaṃ nyasenmūrtīḥ sṛṣṭyā pañca dharādikāḥ ।।brahmā viṣṇus tathā rudra īśvaraś ca sadāśivaḥ ।ete ca pañca mūrtīśā yaṣṭavyāstāsu pūrvavat ।।
oṃ pṛthvīmūrtaye namaḥ । oṃ pṛthvīmūrtyadhipataye brahmaṇe namaḥ । ity ādi mantrāḥ
sampūjya kalaśān pañca krameṇa nijanāmabhiḥ ।nirundhīta vidhānena nyāso madhyaśilākramāt ।।kuryāt prākāramantreṇa bhūtidarbhaistataḥ ।kuṇḍeṣu dhārikāṃ śaktiṃ vinyasyābhyarcya tarpayet ।।tattvatattvādhipān mūrtīrmūrtīśāṃś ca ghṛtādibhiḥ ।tato brahmāṃśaśuddhyarthaṃ mūlāṅgaṃ brahmabhiḥ kramāt ।।kṛtvā śatādipūrṇāntaṃ prokṣyāḥ śāntijalaiḥśilāḥ ।pūjayecca kuśaiḥ spṛṣṭvā pratitattvamanukramāt ।।sāṃnidhyamatha sandhānaṃ kṛtvā śuddhaṃ punarnyaset ।evaṃ bhāgatraye karma gatvā gatvā samācaret ।।oṃ āṃ īṃ ātmatattvavidyātattvābhyāṃ namaḥ iti ।

nyastavystāsu iti kha

nibadhnītīti kha, ga, ṅa ca
tatra tatrādhipān mūrtīrmūrtīśāṃśceti ṅa ।tantratattvādhipān mūrtīrmūrtīśāṃsveti kha
prokṣya śāntijalaiḥ śilāmiti kha । prokṣya śāntijalaiḥ śilā iti ga, gha ca

kṛtvā mantramiti ga

sānnidhyamityarthaśloko ṅa pustake nāsti । sānnidhyamatha sandhānaṃ ity ataḥ paraṃ hrasvadīrghaprayogataḥ ity ataḥ prāṅmadhvagapāṭho gha pustake nāsti

oṃ āṃ hāṃ ātmatattvavidyātattvāya nama iti ga । oṃ āṃ iṃ uṃ vidyātattvaśivatattvābhyāṃ nama iti ḍa । oṃ āṃ iṃ ātmavidyātattvāya nama iti kha
saṃspṛśed darbhamūlādyair brahmāṅgāditrayaṃ kramāt ।kuryāttattvānusandhānaṃ hrasvadīrghaprayogataḥ ।।oṃ hāṃ uṃ vidyātattvaśivatattvābhyāṃ namaḥ ।ghṛtena madhunā pūrṇāṃstāmrakumbhān saratnakān ।pañcagavyārghyarsasiktān lokapālādhidaivatān ।।pūjayitvā nijair mantraiḥ sannidhau homamācaret ।śilānāmatha sarvāsāṃ saṃsmaredadhidaivatāḥ ।।vidyārūpāḥ kṛtasnānā hemavārṇāḥ śilāmbarāḥ ।nyūnādidoṣamoṣārthaṃ vāstubhūmeś ca śuddhaye ।yajedastreṇa mūrdhāntamāhutīnāṃ śataṃ śataṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye śilānyāsakathanaṃ nāma dvinavatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trinavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

vāstupūjādividhānam

īśvara uvāca
tataḥ prāsādamāsūtrya vartayedvāstumaṇḍapaṃ ।kuryāt koṣṭhacatuḥṣaṣṭiṃ kṣetre vedāsrake same ।।koṇeṣu vinyased vaṃśau rajjavo aṣṭau vikoṇagāḥ ।
oṃ iṃ uṃ iti gha, ṅ ca

pañcagavyena saṃsiktān iti ga

nyūnādidoṣanāśārthamiti gha

yajedasreṇa śuddhyarthamāhutīnāmiti gha

vāstumaṇḍalamiti ga ṅa । tata iti ślokārdhaṃ gha pustake nāsti

vinyasedvaṃśamiti kha
dvipadāḥ ṣaṭpadāstāstu vāstuntatrārcayed yathā ।।ākuñcitakacaṃ vāstumuttānamasurākṛtiṃ ।smaret pūjāsu kuḍyādiniveśe uttarānanaṃ ।।jānunī kūrparau śakthi diśi vātahutāśayoḥ ।paitryāṃ pādapuṭe raudryāṃ śiro asya hṛdaye añjaliḥ ।।asya dehe samārūḍhā devatāḥ pūjitāḥ śubhāḥ ।aṣṭau koṇādhipāstatra koṇārdheṣvaṣṭasu sthitāḥ ।।ṣaṭpadāstu marīcyādyā dikṣu pūrvādiṣu kramāt ।madhye catuṣpado brahmā śeṣāstu padikāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।samastanāḍīsaṃyoge mahāmarmānujaṃ phalaṃ ।triśūlaṃ svastikaṃ vajraṃ mahāsvastikasampuṭau ।।trikuṭuṃ maṇibandhaṃ ca suviśuddhaṃ padaṃ tathā ।iti dvādaśa marmāṇi vāstorbhittyādiṣu tyajet ।।sājyamakṣatamīśāya parjanyāyāmbujodakaṃ ।dadītātha jayantāya patākāṃ kuṅkumojjvalāṃ ।।ratnavāri mahendrāya ravau dhūmraṃ vitānakaṃ ।satyāya ghṛtagodhūmamājyabhaktaṃ bhṛśāya ca ।।vimāṃsamantarīkṣāya śuktuntebhyastu pūrvataḥ ।madhukṣīrājyasampūrṇāṃ pradadyādvahnaye śrucaṃ ।।lājān pūrṇaṃ suvarṇāmbu vitathāya nivedayet ।

ākuñcitakaramiti gha

kuryādityādiḥ muttānamasurākṛtimityantaḥ ślokadvayātmakapāṭho ga pustakake nāsti

koṇārdheṣu vyavasthitā iti gha

pādikā iti kha

muṣṭikaṃ vaktramiti kha

trikoṣṭhamiti ga

dadīteti ardhaśloko ga pustake nāsti
dadyād gṛhakṣate kṣaudraṃ yamarāje palaudanaṃ ।।gandhaṃ gandharvanāthāya jihvāṃ bhṛṅgāya pakṣiṇaḥ ।mṛgāya padmaparṇāni yāmyāmityaṣṭadevatāḥ ।।pitre tilodakaṃ kṣīraṃ vṛkṣajaṃ dantadhāvanaṃ ।dauvārikāya devāya pradadyād dhenumudrayā ।।sugrīvāya diśet pūpān puṣpadantāya darbhakaṃ ।raktaṃ pracetase padmamasurāya surāsavaṃ ।।ghṛtaṃ guḍaudanaṃ śeṣe rogāya ghṛtamaṇḍakān ।lājān vā paścimāśāyāṃ devāṣṭakamitīritaṃ ।।mārutāya dhvajaṃ pītaṃ nāgāya nāgakeśaraṃ ।mukhye bhakṣyāṇi bhallāṭe mudgasūpaṃ susaṃskṛtaṃ ।।somāya pāyasaṃ sājyaṃ śālūkamūṣaye diśet ।lopīmaditaye dityai purīmityuttarāṣṭakaṃ ।।modakān brahmaṇaḥ prācyāṃ ṣaṭpādāya marīcaye ।savitre raktapuṣpāṇi vahnyadhaḥkoṇakoṣṭhake ।।tadadhaḥkoṣṭhake dadyāt sāvitryai ca kuśodakaṃ ।dakṣiṇe candanaṃ raktaṃ ṣaṭpadāya vivasvate ।।haridraudanamindrāya rakṣodhaḥkrīṇakoṣṭhake ।

bhūtakṣaye raudramiti kha, cha ca । gṛhakṛte kṣaudramiti gha

phalaudanamiti kha gha ca

yavaparṇānīti gha । padmavarṇānīti kha cha ca

yāmyāmityaṣṭadevatā iti kha

pradadyādaghamudrayeti kha । pradadyādvanamudrayeti gha, cha ca

padmaṃ sambarāyeti gha

śālūkaṃ śṛṇayeti kha, cha ca

purīmityavarāṣṭakamiti ga

savitre ca kuśodakamiti ga

sāvitryai candanamiti ga
indrajayāya miśrānnamindrādhastānnivedayet ।।varuṇyāṃ ṣaṭpadāsīne mitre saṅuḍamodanaṃ ।rudrāya ghṛtasiddhānnaṃ vāyukoṇādhare pade ।।tadadho rudradāsāya māsaṃ mārgamathottare ।dadīta māṣanaivedyaṃ ṣaṭpadasthe dharādhare ।।āpāya śivakoṇādhaḥ tadvatsāya ca tatsthale ।kramāddadyāddadhikṣīraṃ pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ ।।catuṣpade niviṣṭāya brahmaṇe madhmadeśataḥ ।pañcagavyākṣatopetañcaruṃ sājyaṃ nivedayet ।।īśādivāyuparyantakoṇeṣvatha yathākramaṃ ।vāstuvāhye carakyādyāś catasraḥ pūjayed yathā ।।carakyai saghṛtaṃ māṃsaṃ vidāryai dadhipaṅkaje ।pūtanāyai palaṃ pittaṃ rudhiraṃ ca nivedayet ।।asthīni pāparākṣasyai raktapittapalāni ca ।tato māṣaudanaṃ prācyāṃ skandāya vinivedayet ।।aryamṇe dakṣiṇāśāyāṃ pūpān kṛsarayā yutān ।jambhakāya ca vāruṇyāmāmiṣaṃ rudhirānvitaṃ ।।udīcyāṃ pilipiñjāya raktānnaṃ kusumāni ca ।yajedvā sakalaṃ vāstuṃ kuśadadhyakṣaterjalaiḥ ।।

māṃsanaivedyamiti kha, cha, ca

varādhare iti gha

āpavatsacatuṣṭaye iti kha । tadvatsāyai ca tattale iti gha, ja ca

vārāhyai iti ṅa, cha ca

vipace iti kha, cha ca

tato māṃsaudanamiti kha gha cha ca

kumbhakāyeti cha

pilipicchāyeti ṅa । lipipiñjāyeti cha
gṛhe ca nagarādau ca ekāśītipadair yajet ।tripadā rajjavaḥ kāryāḥ ṣaṭpadāś ca vikoṇake ।।īśādyāḥ pādikāstasminnāgadyāś ca dvikoṣṭhagāḥ ।ṣaṭpadasthā marīcyādyā brahmā navapadaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।nagaragrāmakheṭādau vāstuḥ śatapado api vā ।vaṃśadvayaṃ koṇagataṃ durjayaṃ durdharaṃ sadā ।।yathā devālaye nyasas tathā śatapade hitaḥ ।grahāḥ skandādayastatra vijñeyāś caiva ṣaṭpadāḥ ।।carakyādyā bhūtapadā rajjuvaṃśādi pūrvavat ।deśasaṃsthāpane vāstu catustriṃśacchataṃ bhavet ।।catuḥṣaṣṭipado brahmā marīcyādyāś ca devatāḥ ।catuḥpañcāśatpadikā āpādyaṣṭau rasāgnibhiḥ ।।īśānādyā navapadāḥ skandādyāḥ śaktikāḥ smṛtāḥ ।carakyādyāstadvadeva rajjuvaṃśādi pūrvavat ।।jñeyo vaṃśasahasraistu vāstumaṇḍalagaḥ padaiḥ ।nyāso navaguṇastatra kartavyo deśavāstuvit ।।pañcaciṃśatpado vāsturvaitālākhyaścitau smṛtaḥ ।anyo navapado vāstuḥ ṣoḍaśāṅghris tathāparaḥ ।।ṣaḍasratryasravṛttādermadhye syāccaturasrakaṃ ।

nāgādyāścārdhakoṣṭagā iti kha, cha ca

śatapade apīti ga

daśamaṃ sthāpane iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha ca

caturviṃśacchatamiti ga

catuḥṣaṣṭipade iti gha

īśānādyāḥ śivapadā skandādyāḥ padikā iti gha

samañca sthāpane vāstuś catustriṃśacchataṃ bhavediti gha pustake adhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ । catuḥṣaṣṭipado brahmā ity ādiḥ, rajjuvaṃśādi pūrvavat ity antaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti
khāte vāstoḥ samaṃ pṛṣṭhe nyāse brahmaśilātmake ।।śāṣākasya niveśe ca mūrtisaṃsthāpane tathā ।pāyasena tu naivedyaṃ sarveṣāṃ vā pradāpayet ।।uktānukte tu vai vāstuḥ pañcahastapramāṇataḥ ।gṛhaprāsādamānena vāstuḥ śreṣṭhastu sarvadā ।।
e ity ādimahapurāṇe āgneye vāstupūjākathanaṃ nāma trinavatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha caturṇavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

śilāvinyāsavidhānaṃ

īśvara uvāca
īśādiṣu carakyādyāḥ pūrvavat pūjayedvahiḥ ।āhutitritayaṃ dadyāt pratidevamanukramāt ।।datvā bhūtabaliṃ lagne śilānyāsamanukramāt ।madhyasūtre nyasecchaktiṃ kumbhañcānantamuttamaṃ ।।nakārārūḍhamūlena kumbhe asmin dhārayecchilāṃ ।kumbhānaṣṭau sabhadrādīn dikṣu pūrvādiṣu kramāt ।।lokapālāṇubhirnyasya śvabhreṣu nyastaśaktiṣu ।

khātārambhe samaṃ pṛṣṭhe iti ṅa । khāto bāloḥ samaḥ pṛṣṭhe iti cha

niveśeneti kha, cha ca

paraṃ hastapramānata iti cha

sarvada iti kha, gha, cha ca । sarvaśa iti ga, ca

īśādyādiṣu brahmādyā iti ga

madhye śvabhra iti gha

kumbhañcānantamantikamiti gha, cha ca । kumbhañcānantamantimamiti ṅa

lokapālātmabhirnyasyediti kha, cha ca । lokapālāṇubhirnyasyediti ṅa

sūtreṣviti ka । kumbheṣviti ga
śilāsteṣvatha nandādyāḥ krameṇa viniyojayet ।।śambarair mūrtināthānāṃ yathā syurbhittimadhyataḥ ।tāsu dharmādikānaṣṭau koṇāt koṇaṃ vibhāgaśaḥ ।।subhadrādiṣu nandādyāś catasro agnyādikoṇagāḥ ।ajitādyāś ca pūrvādijayādiṣvatha vinyaset ।।brahmāṇaṃ copari masya vyāpakaṃ ca maheśvaraṃ ।cintayedeṣu cādhānaṃ vyomaprasādamadhyagaṃ ।।balindattvā japedastraṃ vighnadoṣanivāraṇaṃ ।śilāpañcakapakṣe api manāguddiśyate yathā ।।madhye pūrṇaśilānyāsaḥ subhadrakalaśe ardhataḥ ।padmādiṣu ca nandādyāḥ koṇeṣvagnyādiṣu kramāt ।।madhyabhāve catasro api mātṛvadbhāvasammatāḥ ।oṃ pūrṇe tvaṃ mahāviśve sarvasandohalakṣaṇe ।।sarvasampūrṇamevātra kuruṣvāṅgirasaḥ sute ।oṃ nande tvaṃ nandinī puṃsāṃ tvāmatra sthāpayāmyahaṃ ।।prāsāde tiṣṭha santṛptā yāvaccandrārkatārakaṃ ।āyuḥ kāmaṃ śriyannande dehi vāsiṣṭha dehināṃ ।।

śilādyāstatheti ka

kramaśa iti gha

śambarair mūrtinādhānāmiti kha cha ca । śambarair mūrtimādhānamiti ṅa

tān sudharmādikānaṣṭau iti kha

vibhāgata iti gha

pūrvādijayādiṣu ceti ga

brahmāṇaṃ copavinyasyeti kha, gha, ṅa, cha, ca

vighnadoṣanivārakamiti ga

pūrvaśilānyāsa iti gha

madhyābhāve iti kha, ga ca

mahābhāge iti ga

dehi māmiti kha, cha ca । dehi na iti gha
asmin rakṣā sadā kāryā prāsāde yatnatastvayā ।oṃ bhadre tvaṃ sarvadā bhadraṃ lokānāṃ kuru kāśyapi ।।āyurdā kāmadā devi śrīpradā ca sadā bhava ।oṃ jaye atra sarvadā devi śrīdāayurdā ca sadā bhava ।।oṃ jaye atra sarvadā devi tiṣṭha tvaṃ sthāpitā maya ।nityañjayāya bhūtyai ca svāminī bhava bhārgavi ।।oṃ rikte atiriktadoṣaghne siddhimuktiprade śubhaṃ ।sarvadā sarvadeśasthe tiṣṭhāsmin viśvarūpiṇi ।।gaganāyatanandhyātvā tatra tattvatrayaṃ nyaset ।prāyaścittantato hutvā vidhinā visṛjenmakhaṃ ।।
e ity ādimahāpurāṇe āgneye śilānyāsakathanaṃ nāma caturṇavatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

pratiṣṭhā sāmagrīvidhānaṃ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣye liṅgapratiṣṭhāṃ ca prāsāde bhuktimuktidāṃ ।tāś caret sarvadā muktau bhuktau devadine sati ।।vinā caitreṇa māghādau pratiṣṭhā māsapañcake ।

mudā iti kha cha ca

kāmade devīti gha

jayetretyardhaślokaḥ cha pustake nāsti

oṃ jaya enaṃ sadeti kha cha ca

mama iti ṅa

raktātiraktadoṣaghna iti cha । raktātriraktadoṣaghne iti kha

santiṣṭhāsminnīśarūpiṇīti gha । śarparūpiṇīti ja

tattve tattvatrayamiti gha

sarvadā muktau devādeve grahe satīti gha । sarvadā muktyai bhuktyai daivadine satīti ṅa
guruśukrodaye kāryā prathame karaṇetraye ।।śuklapakṣe viśeṣeṇa kṛṣṇe vā pañcamandinaṃ ।caturthīṃ navamīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ varjayitvā caturdaśīṃ ।।śobhanāstithayaḥ śaṣāḥ krūravāravivarjitāḥ ।śatabhiṣā dhaniṣṭhārdrā anurodhottaratrayaṃ ।।rohiṇī śravaṇaśceti sthirārambhe mahodayāḥ ।lagnañca kumbhasiṃhālitulāstrīvṛṣadhanvināṃ ।।śasto jīvo navarkṣeṣu saptasthāneṣu sarvadā ।budhaḥ ṣaḍaṣṭadiksaptaturyeṣu vinartuṃ śitaḥ ।।saptartutridaśādisthaḥ śaśāṅkobaladaḥ sadā ।ravirdaśatriṣaṭsaṃstho rāhustridaśaṣaḍgataḥ ।।ṣaṭtristhānagatāḥ śastā mandāṅgārārkaketavaḥ ।śubhrāḥ krūraś ca pāpāś ca sarva ekādaśasthitāḥ ।।eṣāṃ dṛṣṭirmunau pūrṇā tvārdhikī grahabhūtayoḥ ।pādikī rāmadiksthāne caturaṣṭau pādavarjitā ।।pādānyūnacaturnāḍī bhogaḥ syānmīnameṣayoḥ ।vṛṣakumbhau ca bhuñjāte catasraḥ pādavarjitāḥ ।।makaro mithunaṃ pañca cāpāliharikarkaṭāḥ ।pādīnāḥ ṣaṭ tulākanye ghaṭikāḥ sārdhapañca ca ।।

kṛṣṇepyāpañcamaṃ dinamiti kha, cha ca ।kṛṣṇepyāpañcamāddināditi gha
anurādhottarātrayamiti ca

śravaṇaś caite iti ca

keśarī vṛṣabhaḥ kumbhaḥ sthirāḥ syuḥ siddhidāyakāḥ ।carā dhanustulāmeṣā dviḥsvabhāvāstṛtīyakāḥ ।।śubhaḥ śubhagrahair dṛṣṭaḥ śasto lagnaḥśubhāśritaḥ ।guruśukrabudhe yukto lagno dadyādbalāyudhī ।।rājyaṃ śauryaṃ balaṃ putrān yaśodharmādikaṃ bahu ।prathamaḥ saptamasturyo daśamaḥ kendra ucyate ।।guruśukrabudhāstatra sarvasiddhiprasādakāḥ ।tryekādaśacaturthasthā lagnāt pāpagrahāḥ śubhāḥ ।।atopyanīcakarmāthaṃ yojyāstithyādayo budhaiḥ ।dhāmnaḥ pañcaguṇāṃ bhūmiṃ tyaktvā vā dhānasammitāṃ ।।hastād dvādaśasopānāt kuryānmaṇḍamagrataḥ ।caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ snānārthantu tadardhataḥ ।।ekāsyaṃ caturāsyaṃ vā raudryāṃ prācyuttarethavā ।hāstiko daśahasto vai maṇḍaporkakaro athavā ।।dvihastottarayā vṛddhyā śeṣaṃ syānmaṇḍapāṣṭakaṃ ।

kriyā medheti ṅa

tathaivaiccheti ṅa
tamā mohā kṣamā niṣṭhā mṛtyurmāya bhayā jvareti kha ।
umā mohā kṣamā nityā mṛtyurmāyābhayājvarā iti ja
tisrothavā kriyājñānā tathā bādhādhināyikā ।ātmāditriṣu tattveṣu tīvramūrtiṣu vinyaset ।।atrāpi piṇḍikā brahmaśilādiṣu yathāvidhi ।gauryādisaṃvarair eva pūrvavat sarvamācaret ।।evaṃ vidhāya vinyāsaṃ gatvā kuṇḍāntikaṃ tataḥ ।kuṇḍamadhye maheśānaṃ mekhalāsu maheśvaraṃ ।।kriyāśaktiṃ tathānyāsu nādamoṣṭhe ca vinyaset ।ghaṭaṃ sthaṇḍilavahnīśaiḥ nāḍīsandhānakantataḥ ।।padmatantusamāṃ śaktimudvātena samudyatāṃ ।viśantī sūryamārgeṇa niḥsarantīṃ samudgatāṃ ।।punaś ca śūnyamārgeṇa viśatīṃ svasya cintayet ।evaṃ sarvatra sandheyaṃ mūrtipaiś ca parasparaṃ ।।sampūjya dhārikāṃ śaktiṃ kuṇḍe santarpya ca kramāt ।tattvatattveśvarā murtīrmūrtīrśāṃś ca ghṛtādibhiḥ ।।sampūjya tarpayitvā tu sannidhau saṃhitāṇubhiḥ ।

kriyājñānīti ga, gha ca

ājñāditriṣu iti gha

gauryādisañcarair eveti gha, ja ca
pūrvavat sarvamarcayediti kha, cha ca । pūrvavacca samācarediti ja ।nyāsaṃ pūrvavadācare sadidi ḍa
nādamadhye ceti ja

ghaṭaṃ sthaṇḍilavargīśair iti kha, cha ca

nāḍīsambhārakaṃ tata iti ja
tattvatattveśvarā mūrtiḥ svargyā tena samucyatāmiti kha, cha ca ।pañcatattvasamāṃ śaktiṃ svadhā tena samudyatāmiti ṅa
samudgamāniti ja

sūryamārgeṇeti cha

mūrti mūrtīśāṃśceti ja

ghaṭasthaṇḍiletyādiḥ, ghṛtādibhiratyantaḥ pāṭho gha pustake nāsti

saṃhitātmabhiriti kha । sahitātmabhiriti cha । saṃghaṭāṇubhiriti ja
śataṃ sahasramardhaṃ vā pūrṇayā saha homayet ।।tattvatattveśvarā mūrtirmūrtīśāṃś ca kareṇukān ।tathā santarpya sānnidhye juhuyurmūrtipā api ।।tato brahmabhiraṅgaiś ca dravyakālānurodhataḥ ।santarpya śaktiṃ kumbhāmbhaḥprokṣite kuśamūlataḥ ।।liṅgamūlaṃ ca saṃspṛśya japeyurhomasaṅkhyayā ।sannidhānaṃ hṛdā kuryurvarmaṇā cāvaguṇṭhanaṃ ।।evaṃ saṃśodhya brahmādi viṣṇvantādi viśuddhaye ।vidhāya pūrvavatsarvaṃ homasaṅkhyājapādikam ।।kuśamadhyāgrayogena liṅgamadhyāgrakaṃ spṛśet ।yathā yathā ca sandhānaṃ tadidānīmihocyate ।।
oṃ hāṃ haṃ oṃ oṃ oṃ eṃ oṃ bhūṃ bhūṃ vāhyamūrtaye namaḥ 

evaṃ vidhāyetyādiḥ, pūrṇayā saha homayedityantaḥ saptaślokātmakaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti

mūrtipāṃś ca kareṇukān iti gha, ṅa ca

brahmabhiraṃśaiśceti kha, gha ca । brahmabhirajñaiśceti cha, ja ca
santarpya śaktikumbhāmbhaḥprokṣite iti ka ।
santarpyaśāntikumbhasthaiḥ prokṣite iti ja । santarpya śāntikumbhāmbhaḥ prokṣite iti gha

sampūjyeti kha, cha ca

brahmādīniti kha, ga, gha, cha ca

oṃ hāṃ hāṃ oṃ oṃ oṃ bīṃ oṃ bhūṃ bhūṃ vāstumūrtaye nama iti kha, cha ca । oṃ hāṃ oṃ hāṃ oṃ oṃ vāṃ oṃ bhūṃ hāṃ vāṃ kṣmāmūrtaye nama iti ja । gha pustake bhūṃ bhūṃ vāṃ iti viśeṣaḥ । oṃ hāṃ hāṃ oṃ oṃ vāṃ oṃ oṃ hūṃ hūṃ vāhyamūrtaye nama iti ṅa

o hāṃ vāṃ āṃ oṃ āṃ ṣāṃ oṃ bhūṃ bhūṃ vā vahnimūrtaye namaḥ
evañca yajamānādimūrtibhirabhisandheyaṃ ।pañcamūrtyātmakepyevaṃ sandhānaṃ hṛdayādibhiḥ ।।mūlena svīyavījair vā jñeyantattvatrayātmake ।śilāpiṇḍo vṛṣeṣvevaṃ pūrṇāchinnaṃ susaṃvaraiḥ ।।bhāgābhāgaviśuddhyarthaṃ homaṃ kuryācchatādikaṃ ।nyūnādidoṣamoṣāya śivenāṣṭādhikaṃ śataṃ ।।hutvātha yat kṛtaṃ karma śivaśrotre nivedayet ।etatsamanvitaṃ karma tvacchaktau ca mayā prabho ।।oṃ namaḥ bhagavate rudrāya rudra namostu te ।vidhipūrṇamapūrṇaṃ vā svaśaktyāpūrya gṛhyatāṃ ।।oṃ hrīṃ śāṅkari pūraya svāhā iti piṇḍikāyāṃ ।atha liṅge nyasej jñānī kriyākhyaṃ pīṭhavigrahe ।।ādhārarūpiṇīṃ śaktiṃ nyased brahmaśilopari ।nibadhya saptarātraṃ vā pañcarātraṃ trirātrakaṃ ।।

oṃ hāṃ hāṃ vāṃ oṃ oṃ vāṃ oṃ bhūṃ bhūṃ vāṃ iti kha, ga, cha ca । oṃ hāṃ hāṃ vāṃ oṃ oṃ vāṃ oṃ oṃ oṃ vāṃ hūṃ hūṃ vāṃ iti ja । oṃ oṃ hāṃ vāṃ oṃ oṃ oṃ vāṃ oṃ hūṃ hūṃ iti ṅa

mūrtibhirapi sandheyamiti gha, ja ca

jñeyaṃ tattu trayātmakamiti kha, cha ca । deyaṃ tatra trayātmake iti ṅa

pūrṇācchinnātmakasaṃvarair iti kha, cha ca । pūrṇācchinnaṃ svayaṃvarair iti ṅa

śatādhikamiti ga, gha ca

stutvātheti ṅa

śivāgre taditi ṅa

samarpitamiti kha, gha, ja ca

rudrāya rudro rudra namostu te iti ṅa, ja ca

svaśaktyāpūjyeti kha, cha ca

oṃ hrūṃ iti gha

pūjayeti kha, cha, ṅa ca

nirudhyeti kha, ja, ṅa ca
ekarātramatho vāpi yadvā sadyodhivāsanaṃ ।vinādhivāsanaṃ yāgaḥ kṛto api phalapradaḥ ।।svamantraiḥ pratyahaṃ deyamāhutīnāṃ śataṃ śataṃ ।śivakumbhādipūjāñca digbilañca nivedayet ।।gurvādisahito vāso rātrau niyamapūrvakam ।adhivāsaḥ sa vasatevadherbhāvaḥ samīritaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe adhivāsanavidhirnāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

śivapratiṣṭhākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
prātar nitpavidhiṃ kṛtvā dvārapālaprapūjanaṃ ।praviśya pragvidhānena dehaśuddhyādimācaret ।।dikpatīṃś ca samabhyarcya śivakumbhañca vardhanīṃ ।

satyādhivāsanamiti ja

dīkṣāntañca samabhyarcyeti ja

vāsudeva dayāśīla līlayā māṃ samuddhara । gharoddhāre samarthosi mamoddhāre kiyañchramaḥ ।। iti śloko kha, cha pustakedhikotrāsti
aṣṭamuṣṭikayā liṅgaṃ vahniṃ sanparpya ca kramāt ।।śivājñātastato gacchet prāsādaṃ śastramuccaran ।tadgatān prakṣipedvighnān humphaḍantaśarāṇunā ।।na madhye sthāpayelliṅgaṃ bedhadoṣaviśaṅkayā ।tasmān madhyaṃ parityajya yavārdhena yavena vā ।।kiñcidīśānamāśritya śilāṃ madhye niveśayet ।mūlena tāmanantākhyāṃ sarvādhārasvarūpiṇīṃ ।।sarvagāṃ sṛṣṭiyogena vinyasedacalāṃ śilāṃ ।athavānena mantreṇa śivasyāsanarūpiṇīṃ ।।oṃ namo vyāpini bhagavati sthire acale dhruve ।
hraṃ laṃ hrīṃ svāhā 
tvayā śivājñayā śakte sthātavyamiha santataṃ ।।ityuktvā ca samabhyarcya nirudhyādraudramudrayā ।vajrādīni ca ratnāni tathośīrādikauṣadhīḥ ।।lohān hemādikāṃsyantān haritālādikāṃs tathā ।dhānyaprabhṛtiśastrāṃś ca pūrvamuktānanukramāt ।।prabhārāgatvadehatvavīryaśaktimayānimān ।bhāvayennekacittastu lokapāleśasaṃvaraiḥ ।।pūrvādiṣu ca garteṣu nyasedekaikaśaḥ kramāt ।

aṣṭaputriyeti kha, gha, cha ca । aṣṭapuṣpikayeti ga, ṅa, ca ।aṣṭapuṣṭikayā iti ja
prāsādamastramuccaran iti kha, ṅa ca । prasādaṃ śāstramuccaranniti ga, ja ca

huṃ phaḍantaśivātmaneti kha, ga, cha ca । huṃ phaḍantaśivāṇuneti ja

sarvādhānasvarūpiṇīmiti ja

hraṃ laṃ hraṃ svāheti kha, cha, ca । oṃ hrāṃ laṃ hāṃ svāheti ja
ity uktvā taṃ samabhyarcyeti kha, cha ca । ity unmūlaṃ samabhyarceti ga ।ity uccārya samabhyarcyeti ṅa
virundhyādrodhamudrayeti kha, ga, ṅa ca

vīryāśaktimanukramāditi gha

lokapāleśasañcarair iti gha

pūrvādivatsvagarteṣu iti ṅa

prabhārāgetyādiḥ nyasedekaikaśaḥ kramāditi pāṭhaḥ, chapustake nāsti
hemajaṃ tārajaṃ kūrmaṃ vṛṣaṃ vā dvārasammukhaṃ ।।sarittaṭamṛdā yuktaṃ parvatāgramṛdāthavā ।prakṣipenmadhyagartādau yadvā meruṃ suvarṇajaṃ ।।madhūkākṣatasaṃyuktamañjanena samanvitaṃ ।pṛthivīṃ rājatīṃ yadvā yadvā hemasamudbhavāṃ ।।sarvavījasuvarṇābhyāṃ samāyuktāṃ vinikṣipet ।svarṇajaṃ rājataṃ vāpi sarvalohasamudbhavaṃ ।।suvarṇaṃ kṛśarāyuktaṃ padmanālaṃ tato nyaset ।devadevasya śaktyādimūrtiparyantamāsanaṃ ।।prakalpya pāyasenātha liptvā guggulunāthavā ।śvabhramācchādya vastreṇa tanutreṇāstrarakṣitaṃ ।।dikpatibhyo baliṃ datvā samācānto atha deśikaḥ ।śevena vā śilāśvabhrasaṅgadoṣanivṛttaye ।।śastreṇa vā śataṃ samyag juhuyāt pūrṇayā saha ।
dvārasampuṭamiti ga

mṛdā puna iti ga

madhyagartāyāmiti kha, gha, ṅa ca

madhūkākṣatettyādiḥ, vinikṣipedityantaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti

sarvalohasamanvitamiti ga

pañcadhānyamiti kha, gha ca

lipteti gha, ṅa ca
śvabhramācchādya vastreṇa tanmātreṇa svarakṣitamiti kha, ṅa ca ।yantramācchādya śastreṇa tanutreṇa svarakṣitamiti ja ।śvabhrettyādipāṭho cha pustake nāsti
dikpālādibhyo balimiti ḍa
śilāstatra saṅgadoṣanivṛttaye iti gha, ja ca ।
śilāśvabhramaṅgadoṣavṛttaye iti kha, cha ca
ekaikāhutidānena santarpya vāstudevatāḥ ।।samutthāpya hṛdādevamāsanaṃ maṅgalādibhiḥ ।gururdevāgrato gacchenmūrtipaiś ca diśi sthitaiḥ ।।caturbhiḥ saha kartavyā devayajñasya pṛṣṭhataḥ ।prāsādādi paribhramya bhadrākhyadvārasammukhaṃ ।।liṅgaṃ saṃsthāpya datvārghyaṃ prāsādaṃ sanniveśayet ।dvāreṇa dvārabandhena dvāradeśena tacchilā ।।dvārabandhe śikhāśūnye tadardhenātha tadṛte ।varjayan dvārasaṃsparśaṃ dvāreṇaiva maheśvaraṃ ।।devagṛhasamārambhe koṇenāpi praveśayet ।ayameva vidhirjñeyo vyaktaliṅge api sarvataḥ ।।gṛhe praveśanaṃ dvāre lokair api samīritaṃ ।apadvārapraveśena vidurgotrakṣayaṃ gṛhaṃ ।।atha pīṭhe ca saṃsthāpya liṅgaṃ dvārasya sammukhaṃ ।tūryamaṅgalanirgheṣair dūrvākṣatasamanvitaṃ ।।samuttiṣṭhaṃ hṛdetyuktvā mahāpāśupataṃ paṭhet ।

mūrtipaiḥ svadiśi sthitair iti ja

bandhubhiḥ saha kartavyā devayānasyeti kha । bandhubhiḥ sahakāre ca devālayasya iti ga, ja ca

prāsādārdhamiti ja

sampraveśayediti gha

tadardhenātha ghātayet iti jha । tadardhenātha tatsute iti ga । tadardhenātha tadyatimiti gha । tadardhe vātha tatsutamiti ja । tadardhe nātha tadyute iti ṅa

bandhane iti kha । rakṣayan iti jha । varjayediti cha

vittagotrakṣayaṃ guhamiti ga

atha caivaṃ iti ja, jha, gha ca
apanīya ghaṭaṃ śvabhrād deśiko mūrtipaiḥ saha ।।mantraṃ sandhārayitvā tu viliptaṃ kuṅkumādibhiḥ ।śaktiśaktimatoraikyaṃ dhyātvā caiva tu rakṣitaṃ ।।layāntaṃ mūlamuccārya spṛṣṭvā śvabhre niveśayet ।aṃśena brahmabhāgasya yadvā aṃśadvayena ca ।।ardhena vāṣṭamāṃśena sarvasyātha praveśanaṃ ।vidhāya sīsakaṃ nābhidīrghābhiḥ susamāhitaḥ ।।śvabhraṃ vālukayāpurya brūyāt sthirībhaveti ca ।tato liṅge sthirībhūte dhyātvā sakalarūpiṇaṃ ।।mūlamuccārya śaktyantaṃ sṛṣṭyā ca niṣkalaṃ nyaset ।sthāpyamānaṃ yadā liṅgaṃ yāmyāṃ diśamathāśrayet ।।tattaddigīśamantreṇa pūrṇāntaṃ dakṣiṇānvitaṃ ।

ghaṭaṃ tatra iti jha

mantraṃ sandhārayitvātha iti kha । patrasthaṃ dhārayitvā tu, iti gha

suliptamiti ga

lakṣitamiti gha, ja, jha, ca

namontamiti ḍa

śaktimudre niveśayediti ja

ardhena cāṣṭamāṃśena sarvasyādhaḥ praveśanam iti ja

sīsakaṃ vāgbhirdīrghābhiriti cha । sīsakaṃ cāpi dīrghāriti ja

atheti ka, ṅa, cha ca

layāmantamityādiḥ, sthirībhaveti ca ity antaḥ sārdhaślokadvayātmakaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

dhyāyediti gha

sṛṣṭyādivikalamiti jha । sṛṣṭyādiniṣphalamiti kha, gha, ca । sṛṣṭyādi niṣphalamiti ga, ḍa ca

tato liṅge ity ādiḥ, diśamathāśrayedityantaḥ pāṭho ja pustake nāsti
savye sthāne ca vakre ca calite sphuṭitepi vā ।।juhuyān mūlamantreṇa bahurūpeṇa vā śataṃ ।kuñcānyeṣvapi doṣeṣu śivaśāntiṃ samāśrayet ।।yuktaṃ nyāsādibhirliṅgaṃ kurvannevaṃ na doṣabhāk ।pīṭhabandhamataḥ kṛtvā lakṣaṇasyāṃśalakṣaṇaṃ ।।gaurīmantraṃ layaṃ nītvā sṛṣṭyā piṇḍīñca vinyaset ।sampūrya pārśvasaṃsiddhiṃ vālukāvajralepanaṃ ।।tato mūrtidharaiḥ sārdhaṃ guruḥ śāntiṃ ghaṭordhvataḥ ।saṃsthāpya kalaśair anyaistadvat pañcāmṛtādibhiḥ ।।vilipya candanādyaiś ca sampūjya jagadīśvaraṃ ।umāmaheśamantrābhyāṃ tau spṛśelliṅgamudrayā ।।tatastritattvavinyāsaṃ ṣaḍarcādipuraḥsaraṃ ।kṛtvā mūrtiṃ tadīśānāmaṅgānāṃ brahmaṇāmatha ।।jñānī liṅge kriyāpīṭhe vināsya snāpayettataḥ ।gandhair vilipya sandhūpya vyāpitve śive nyaset ।।sragdhūpadīpanaivedyair hṛdayena phalāni ca ।

vakreṇeti kha

catūrūpeṇa iti jha

sthāpyamānamityādiḥ, śāntaṃ samāśrayat ity antaḥ pāṭhī ga, ṅa, pustake nāsti

uktanyāsavidhiṃ liṅge iti kha । uktanyāsavidhau liṅge iti ga

pīṭha bandhamadhaḥ kṛtvā kurvanneva na doṣabhāk iti kha, ga ca । pīṭha bandhamataḥ kṛtvā lakṣaṇasyāṅgalakṣaṇamiti gha

pārśvasiddhiṃ ca vālukāvrajalepanamiti ja

saptāranyakalaśair anyaiḥ stutvā iti jha

caturājyaiś ca iti jha

ṣaḍarghādipuraḥsaramiti jha । ṣaḍagrādipuraḥsaramiti kha

jñānaliṅge iti jha
vinivedya yathāśakti samācamya maheśvaraṃ ।।datvārghaṃ ca japaṃ kṛtvā nivedya varade kare ।candrārkatārakaṃ yāvan mantreṇa śaivamūrtipaiḥ ।।svecchayaiva tvayā nātha sthātavyamiha mandire ।praṇamyeva vahirgatvā hṛdā vā praṇavena vā ।।saṃsthāpya vṛṣabhaṃ paścāt pūrvavadvalimācaret ।nyūnādidoṣamoṣāya tato mṛtyujitā śataṃ ।।śivena saśivo hutvā śāntyarthaṃ pāyasena ca ।jñānājñānakṛtaṃ yacca tat pūraya mahāvibho ।।hiraṇyapaśubhūmyādi gītavādyādihetave ।ambikeśāya tad bhaktyā śaktyā sarvaṃ nivedayet ।।dānaṃ mahotsavaṃ paścāt kuryāddinacatuṣṭayaṃ ।trisandhyaṃ tridinaṃ mantrī homayen mūrtipaiḥ saha ।।caturthehani pūrṇāñca carukaṃ bahurūpiṇā ।nivedya sarvakuṇḍeṣu sampātāhutisodhitam ।।dinacatuṣṭayaṃ yāvattannirmālyantadūrdhataḥ ।nirmālyāpanayaṃ kṛtvā snāpayitvā tu pūjayet ।।pūjā sāmānyaliṅgeṣu kāryā sādhāraṇāṇubhiḥ ।

jalaṃ hutvā iti ga

nivedya varadevake iti ja

mantreśair mūrtipaiḥ saha iti jha । mantreśair mūrtijaiḥ saha iti gha

vahiṣkṛtvā iti jha । vahirhatvā iti gha

nyūnādidoṣamokṣāyeti ja । nyānādidoṣanāśāyeti ṅa

mahāprabho iti jha

hiraṇyavastradhūpādi iti jha

pāyasāhutisodhitamiti jha । sampātāhutiśodhanamiti ga

snāpayitvā ca iti ga

sādhāraṇāṃśubhiriti kha । sādhāraṇādikamiti ga
vihāya liṅgacaitanyaṃ kuryāt sthāṇuvisarjanaṃ ।।asādhāraṇaliṅgeṣu kṣamasveti visarjanaṃ ।āvāhanamabhivyaktirvisargaḥ śaktirūpatā ।।pratiṣṭhānte kvacit proktaṃ sthirādyāhutisaptakaṃ ।sthiras tathāprameyaścānādibodhastathaiva ca ।।nityotha sarvagaś caivāvināśī dṛṣṭa eva ca ।ete guṇā maheśasya sannidhānāya kīrtitāḥ ।।oṃ namaḥ śivāya sthiro bhavetyāhutīnāṃ kramaḥ ।evametañca sampādya vidhāya śivakumbhavat ।।kumbhadvayañca tanmadhyādekakumbhāmbhasā bhavaṃ ।saṃsnāpya tad dvitīyantu kartṛsnānāya dhārayet ।।datvā baliṃ samācamya vahirgacchet śivājñayā ।jagatīvāhyataś caṇḍamaiśānyāndiśi mandire ।।dhāmagarbhapramāṇe ca supīṭhe kalpitāsane ।pūrvavan nyāsahomādi vidhāya dhyānapūrvakaṃ ।।saṃsthāpya vidhivattatra brahmāṅgaiḥ pūjayettataḥ ।aṅgāni pūrvayuktāni brahmāṇī tvarcanā yathā ।।

vilāsī tṛpta eva ca iti kha, ṅa, cha, ja ca । avināśī tṛpta eva ca iti ṅa

sannidhāya prakīrtitā iti kha, cha ca
oṃ nama ity ādi, śivakumbhavat ity antaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti ।śivāya śivakumbhavat iti ga
vahiḥ kumbhe śivājñayā iti jha

vāmagarbhapramāṇena iti jha

svapīṭhe iti ga

brahmādyair iti ga, jha ca

pūrvamuktāni iti kha, ga, ṅa, cha ca । pūrvabhuktānīti ja

tvadhunā yathā iti kha

evaṃ sadyojātāya oṃ hrūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ viṃ vāmadevāya hrūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ buṃ aghorāya hrūṃ phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ tatpuruṣāya vaumīśānāya ca hrūṃ phaṭ ।।
japaṃ vivedya santarpya vijñāpya natipūrvakaṃ ।devaḥ sannihito yāvattāvattvaṃ sannidho bhava ।।nyūnādhikañca yatkiñcit kṛtamajñānato mayā ।tavatprasādena caṇḍeśa tat sarvaṃ paripūraya ।।vāṇaliṅge vāṇarohe siddhaliṅge svayambhuvi ।pratimāsu ca sarvāsu na caṇḍo adhikṛto bhavet ।।advaitabhāvanāyukte sthaṇḍileśavidhāvapi ।abhyarcya caṇḍaṃ sasutaṃ yajamānaṃ hi bhāryayā ।।pūrvasthāpitakumbhe na snāpayet snāpakaḥ svayaṃ ।sthāpakaṃ yajamānopi sampūjya ca maheśavat ।।vittaśāṭhyaṃ vinā dadyād bhūhiraṇyādi dakṣiṇāṃ ।

oṃ sadyojātāya hūṃ phaṭ iti jha । evaṃ sadyojātāya oṃ hrūṃ phaṭ nama iti kha, cha ca । oṃ evaṃ sadyo jātāya hūṃ phaṭ nama iti ga, ja ca

oṃ vaṃ iti jha

oṃ evaṃ ceti cha । oṃ vai iti ja

dhūpaṃ nivedya iti gha

kṛtamajñānatopi vā iti ga

bāṇaliṅge cale lohe iti ja

sthaṇḍile sannidhāvapi iti ja, jha ca

sthāpaka iti ja

prapūjya ca iti ja

maheśvaramiti kha, cha ca

gohiraṇyādi iti ja, jha ca
mūrtimān vidhivat paścāt jāpakān brāhmaṇāṃs tathā ।।devajñaṃ śilpinaṃ prārcya dīnānāthādi bhojayet ।yadatra sammukhībhāve svedito bhagavanmayā ।।kṣamasva nātha tat sarvaṃ kāruṇyāmbunidhaṃ mama ।iti vijñaptiyuktāya yajamānāya sadguruḥ ।।pratiṣṭhāpuṇyasadbhāvaṃ sphurattārakasaprabhaṃ ।kuśapuṣpākṣatopetaṃ svakareṇa samarpayet ।।tataḥ pāśapatopetaṃ praṇamya parameśvaraṃ ।tato api balibhirbhūtān sannidhāya nibodhayet ।।sthātavyaṃ bhavatā tāvad yāvat sannihito haraḥ ।gururvastrādisaṃyuktaṃ gṛhṇīyādyāgamaṇḍapaṃ ।।sarvopakaraṇaṃ śilpī tathā snāpanamaṇḍapaṃ ।anye devādayaḥ sthāpyā mantrair āgamasambhavaiḥ ।।ādivarṇasya bhedādvā sutattvavyāptibhāvitāḥ ।sādhya pramukhadevāś ca saridoṣadhayas tathā ।।kṣetrapāḥ kinnarādyāś ca pṛthivītattvamāśritāḥ ।

dīnānāthāṃśceti ja

deva tvaṃ nātha tat sarvaṃ kāruṇyān manave nama iti jha

pratiṣṭhāyajñasambhāramiti ga

sphurattārakasannibhamiti

tataḥ paśupatiṃ japtvā iti kha, ga ca

bhava iti kha, gha ca

gururvastrāṇītyādiḥ, snānamaṇḍapamityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

ādivarṇasya śeṣādvā iti jha
svātantryā vyāptirīritā iti ga । svatattvavyāptibhāvitā iti cha ।svatantravyāptibhedata iti ja
jāpya iti jha
snānaṃ sarasvatīlakṣmīnadīnāmambhasi kvacit ।।bhuvanādhipatīnāñca sthānaṃ yatra vyavasthitiḥ ।aṇḍavṛddhipradhānāntaṃ tritattvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padaṃ ।।tanmātrādipradhānāntaṃ padametat trikaṃ hareḥ ।nāṭyeśagaṇamātṝṇāṃ yakṣeśaśarajanmanāṃ ।।aṇḍajāḥ śuddhavidyāntaṃ padaṃ gaṇapates tathā ।māyāṃśadeśaśaktyanataṃ śivā śivoptarociṣāṃ ।।padamīśvaraparyantaṃ vyaktārcāsu ca kīrtitaṃ ।kūrmādyaṃ kīrtitaṃ yacca yacca ratnādipañcakaṃ ।।pratikṣipet pīṭhagarte ca pañcabrahmaśilāṃ vinā ।ṣaḍbhirvibhājite garte tyaktvā bhāvañca pṛṣṭhataḥ ।।sthāpanaṃ pañcamāṃśe ca yadi vā vasubhājite ।sthāpanaṃ saptame bhāge pratimāsu sukhāvahaṃ ।।dhāraṇābhirviśuddhiḥ syāt sthāpane lepacitrayoḥ ।snānādi mānasantatra śilāratnādiveśanaṃ ।।netrodghāṭanamantreṣṭamāsanādiprakalpanaṃ ।pūjā nirambubhiḥ puṣpair yathā citraṃ na duṣyati ।।vidhistu calaliṅgeṣu sampratyeva nigadyate ।

tanmātrādiprayāṇāntamiti kha

tattvamekaṃ citraṃ hareriti gha

snānaṃ sarasvatītyādiḥ, rociṣāmityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

yadratnādikapañcakamiti ja

ṣaḍabhirbhājite garbhe iti ṅa

śilāvāhādiveśanaṃ iti jha । śilāratnaniveśanamiti kha
pañcabhirvā tribhirvāpi pṛthak kuryād vibhājite ।।bhagatrayeṇa bhāgāṃśo bhavedbhāgadvayena vā ।svapīṭheṣvapi tadvat syālliṅgeṣu tattvabhedataḥ ।।sṛṣṭimantreṇa saṃskāro vidhivat sphāṭikādiṣu ।kiñca brahmaśilāratnaprabhūteścānivedanaṃ ।।yojanaṃ piṇḍikāyāś ca manasā parikalpayet ।svayambhūvāṇaliṅgādau saṃskṛtau niyamo na hi ।।snāpanaṃ saṃhitāmantrair nyāsaṃ homañca kārayet ।nadīsamudrarohāṇāṃ sthāpanaṃ pūrvavan mataṃ ।।aihikam mṛṇmayaṃ liṅgaṃ piṣṭakādi ca takṣaṇāt ।kṛtvā sampūjayecchuddhaṃ sīkṣaṇādividhānataḥ ।।samādāya tato mantrānātmānaṃ sannidhāya ca ।tajjale prakṣipelliṅgaṃ vatsarāt kāmadaṃ bhavet ।।viṣṇvādisthāpanaṃ caiva pṛyaṅmantraiḥ samācaret ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śivapratiṣṭhā nāma saptanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

pṛthak pīṭhe iti kha, ga, gha ca

sthāpanamityādiḥ, kuryād vibhājite ity antaḥ pāṭho ṅapustake nāsti

svapīṭhe snapite iti kha

prabhūtepyadhiveśanamiti gha

vāṇaliṅgānāmiti ja

piṣṭakādi ca tatkramāditi cha, ja ca

mṛṣṭimantreṇetyādiḥ dīkṣaṇādividhānata ity antaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti

śivapūjā iti ka

ś athāṣṭanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

gaurīpratiṣṭhākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣye gaurīpratiṣṭhāñca pūjayā sahitāṃ śṛṇu ।maṇḍapādyaṃ puro yacca saṃsthāpya cādhiropayet ।।śayyāyāntāṃś ca vinyasya mantrānmūrtyādikān guha ।ātmavidyāśivāntañca kuryādīśaniveśanaṃ ।।śaktiṃ parāṃ tato nyasya hutvā japtvā ca pūrvavat ।sandhāya ca tathā piṇḍīṃ kriyāśaktisvarūpiṇīṃ ।।sadeśavyāpikāṃ dhyātvā nyastaratnādikāṃ tathā ।evaṃ saṃsthāpya tāṃ paścāddevīntasyānniyojayet ।।paraśaktisvarūpāntāṃ svāṇunā śaktiyogataḥ ।tato nyaset kriyāśaktiṃ pīṭhe jñānañca vigrahe ।।tatopi vyāpinīṃ śaktiṃ samāvāhya niyojayet ।ambikāṃ śivanāmnīñca samālabhya prapūjayet ।।
oṃ ādhāraśaktaye namaḥ । oṃ skandāya ca tathā namaḥ । oṃ hrīṃ nārāyaṇāya namaḥ । oṃ aiśvaryāya namaḥ

maṇḍapādyaṃ praviśecca iti ga

śivāstraṃ ceti gha

tathā śaktiṃ parāmiti kha

stutveti ja

caṇḍīmiti kha

ātmaneti cha

tryambakeśīti nāmnīñca samārabhyeti ja

oṃ aṃ adhaśchadanāya namaḥ । oṃ padmāsanāya namaḥ । oṃ ūrdhvacchadanāya namaḥ । oṃ padmāsanāya namaḥ । atha sampūjyāḥ keśavās tathā । oṃ hrīṃ karṇikāya namaḥ । oṃ kṣaṃ puṣkarākṣebhya ihārcayet । oṃ hāṃ puṣṭyai hrīṃ ca jñānāyai hrūṃ kriyāyai tato namaḥ । oṃ nālāya namaḥ । ruṃ dharmāya namaḥ । ruṃ jñānāya vai namaḥ । oṃ vairāgyāya vai namaḥ । oṃ vai adharmāya namaḥ । oṃ ruṃ ajñānāya vai
namaḥ । oṃ avairāgyāya vai namaḥ । aṃ anaiśvaryāya namaḥ ।
huṃ vāce huṃ ca rāgiṇyai kraiṃ jvālinyai tato namaḥ । oṃ hrauṃ śamāyai ca namaḥ । hruṃ jyeṣṭhāyai tato namaḥ । oṃ hrauṃ rauṃ krauṃ navaśaktyai gauṃ ca gauryāsanāya ca । gauṃ gaurīmūrtaye namaḥ । gauryā mūlamathocyate । oṃ hrīṃ saḥ mahāgauri rudradayite svāhā । gāṃ hrūṃ hrīṃ śivo gūṃ syāt śivāyai kavacāya ca । goṃ netrāya ca goṃ astrāya oṃ gauṃ vijñānaśaktaye, oṃ gūṃ kriyāśaktaye namaḥ । pūrvādau śākrādikān । oṃ suṃ subhāgāyai namaḥ । hrīṃ vījalalitā tataḥ । oṃ hrīṃ kāminyai ca namaḥ । oṃ hrūṃ syāt kāmaśālinīmantrair gaurīṃ pratiṣṭhāpya prārcya japtvātha sarvabhāk ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gaurīpratiṣṭhā nāmāṣṭanavatitamo adhyāyaḥ

oṃ khaṃ puṣkarebhya iti kha

dhaṃ dharmāya nama iti kha

vaṃ jñānāya nama iti kha

ruṃ adharmāya nama iti ṅa

vāmāyai iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa ca

oṃ hūṃ sa iti gha

hrīṃ kriyāśaktaye nama iti jha । oṃ kriyāśaktaye nama iti gha

japtvānurūpataḥ iti ga, cha, ca

ś athonaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sūryapratiṣṭhākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣye sūryapratiṣṭhāñca pūrvavanmaṇḍapādikaṃ ।snānādikañca samyādya pūrvoktavidhinā tataḥ ।।vidyāmāsanaśayyāyāṃ sāṅgaṃ vinyasya bhāskaraṃ ।tritattvaṃ vinyasettatra sasvaraṃ khādipañcakaṃ ।।śuddhyādi pūrvavat kṛtvā piṇḍīṃ saṃśodhya pūrvavat ।sadeśapadaparyantaṃ vinyasya tattvapañcakaṃ ।।śaktyā ca sarvatomukhyā saṃsthāpya vidhivatataḥ ।svāṇunā vidhivat sūryaṃ śaktyantaṃ sthāpayedguruḥ ।।svāmyantamathavādityaṃ pādāntannāma dhārayet ।sūryamantrāstu pūrvoktā draṣṭavyāḥ sthāpanepi ca ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sūryapratiṣṭhā nāmaikonaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

snānādikaṃ ca sampūjya iti kha, cha, ca

vinyasya padapañcakamiti cha । vinyasya ratnapañcakamiti ja

ātmaneti cha

śaktyarthamiti ṅa

sūryamantrāśceti cha

sthāpanepi veti ja

ś atha śatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dvārapratiṣṭhākathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca
dvārāśritapratiṣṭhāyā vakṣyāmi vidhimapyatha ।dvārāṅgāni kaṣāyādyaiḥ saṃskṛtya śayane nyaset ।।mūlamadhyāgrabhāgeṣu trayamātmādiseśvaraṃ ।vinyasya sanniveśyātha hutvā japtvātra rūpataḥ ।।dvārādatho yajedvāstuntatraivānantamantritaḥ ।ratnādipañcakaṃ nyasya śāntihomaṃ vidhāya ca ।।yavasiddhārthakākrāntā ṛddhivṛddhimahātilāḥ ।gomṛtsarṣaparāgendramohanīlakṣaṇāmṛtāḥ ।।rocanā rug vaco dūrvā prāsādadhaś ca poṭalīṃ ।prakṛtyodumbare baddhvā rakṣārthaṃ praṇavena tu ।।dvāramuttarataḥ kiñcidāśritaṃ sanniveśayet ।ātmatattvamadho nyasya vidyātattvañca śākhayoḥ ।।śivamakāśadeśe ca vyāpakaṃ sarvamaṅgale ।tato maheśanāthaṃ ca vinyasenmūlamantrataḥ ।।

vinyasya ca niveśayātha iti kha । vinyasya sannibodhyātheti ja

ajaptvānurūpata iti ga

sarvapuṣkalamiti kha, gha ca
dvārāśritāṃś ca talpādīn kṛtayuktaiḥ svanāmabhiḥ ।juhuyācchatamardhaṃ vā dviguṇaṃ śaktitothavā ।।nyūnādidoṣamoṣārthaṃ hetito juhuyāccchataṃ ।digbalimpūrvavaddhutvā pradadyāddakṣiṇādikaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dvārapratiṣṭhā nāma śatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

prāsādapratiṣṭhā

īavara uvāca
prāsādasthāpanaṃ vakṣye taccaitanyaṃ svayogataḥ ।śukanāśāsamāptau tu pūrvavedyāś ca madhyataḥ ।।ādhāraśaktitaḥ padme vinyaste praṇavena ca ।svarṇādye katamoddbhataṃ pañcagavyena saṃyutaṃ ।।madhukṣīrayutaṃ kumbhaṃ nyastaratrādipañcakaṃ ।sragvastraṃ gandhaliptañca gandhavatpuṣpabhūṣitaṃ ।।cūtādipallavānāñca kṛtī kṛtyañca vinyaset ।

nandyādīna iti kha

kṛtyayuktair iti ja

śaktito yathā iti ga

bhāgatrayeṇetyādiḥ, juhuyācchatamityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti । atra katipayaślokādhiko adhyāyatrayātmakaḥ pāṭhaḥ patitosti

pūrvavad datvā iti ga, gha ca

taccaitanyañca yogata iti ga । taccaitanyasvayogata iti cha

vinyaste praṇavena tu iti kha, cha, ja, jha ca । vinyaset praṇavena tu iti ga

madhukṣīrayutaṃ nyastaratnādipañcakaṃ tata iti ga

gandhavatpuṣpadhūpitamiti ga, ṅa, cha ca
vahnikṛta padmaṃ vinyasediti kha । vahnikūpaṃ yavaṃ nyasediti ga ।
vahnikūpeṣu ca nyasediti ja
pūrakeṇa samādāya sakalīkṛtavigrahaḥ ।।sarvātmabhinnātmānaṃ svāṇunā svāntamārutaḥ ।ājñayā bodhayecchambhau recakena tato guruḥ ।।dvādaśāntāt samādāya sphuradvahnikaṇopamaṃ ।nikṣipet kumbhagarbhe ca nyastatantrātivāhikaṃ ।।vigrahantadguṇānāñca bodhakañca kalādikaṃ ।kṣāntaṃ vāgīśvaraṃ tattu brātaṃ tatra niveśayet ।।daśa nāḍīrdaśa prāṇānindriyāṇi trayodaśa ।tadadhipāṃś ca saṃyojya praṇavādyaiḥ svanāmabhiḥ ।।svakāryakāraṇatvena māyākāśaniyāmikāḥ ।vidyeśān prerakān śambhuṃ vyāpinañca susamvaraiḥ ।।aṅgāni ca vinikṣipya nirundhyādrodhamudrā ।suvarṇādyudbhavaṃ yadvā puruṣaṃ puruṣānugaṃ ।।pañcagavyakaṣāyādyaiḥ pūrvavat saṃskṛtantataḥ ।śayyāyāṃ kumbhamāropya dhyātvā rudramumāpatiṃ ।।

sarvātmabhinnātmānaṃ svātmanā iti kha । sarvātmābhinnamātmā ca sthāṇuneti ja

bodhayecchaktau iti kha, gha ca

dvādaśāntamiti ga, ja ca

nyasya tatra yathākramamiti ga । nyasya tatrābhivāhikamiti cha । nyasya tatrābhivādakamiti ja

vāmeśvaramiti kha । bāṇeśvaramiti ṅa

akāryakāraṇatve neti kha, cha ca

prayāmikā iti kha, cha ca

vyāpinañca svaśaktita iti jha । vyāpinañcāsya saṃsravair iti ṅa

ajñāne ceti gha, jha ca । aṅkādi ceti ṅa

nirmañchya droṇamudrayā iti ga । nirundhyād dravamudrayā iti jha
tasmiṃś ca śivamantreṇa vyāpakatvena viyaset ।sannidhānāya homañca praokṣaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ japaṃ ।।sānnidhyābodhanaṃ sarvambhāgatrayavibhāgataḥ ।vidhāyaivaṃ prakṛtyante kumbhe taṃ viniveśayet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe prāsādakṛtyapratiṣṭhā nāmaikādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ś atha dvyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dhvajāropaṇaṃ

īśvara uvāca
cūlake dhvajadaṇḍe ca dhvaje devakule tathā ।pratiṣṭhā ca yathoddiṣṭā tathā skanda vadāmi te ।।taḍāgārdhapraveśādvā yadvā savārdhaveśanāt ।aiṣṭake dārujaḥ śūlaḥ śailaje dhāmni śailajaḥ ।।vaiṣṇavādau ca cakrāḍhyaḥ kumbhaḥ syānmūrtimānataḥ ।sa ca triśūlayuktastu agracūlābhidho mataḥ ।।

sannidhyābodhanamiti kha, cha, ja ca

vidhāyaiveti ja

prakṛtyā tu iti kha

cūḍake dhvajadaṇḍe vā iti ja

yathādiṣṭā iti jha

tathā hy ahaṃ vadāmi te iti ṅa

aiṣṭe dārubhava iti gha, ja ca

taḍāgārdhetyādiḥ, śailaja ity antaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti
agraṃ cūḍābhidho mata iti gha । asracūlādidoṣata iti cha ।
gṛhacūḍābhidho mata iti ṅa । agraṃ cūḍādidoṣata iti kha
īśaśūlaḥ samākhyāto mūrdhni liṅgasamanvitaḥ ।vījapūrakayukto vā śivaśāstreṣu tadvidhaḥ ।।citro dhvajaś ca jaṅghāto yathā jaṅgārdhato bhavet ।bhavedvā daṇḍamānastu yadi vā tadyadṛcchayā ।।mahādhvajaḥ samākhyāto yastu pīṭhasya veṣṭakaḥ ।śakrair grahai rasaivāpi hastair daṇḍastu sambhitaḥ ।।uttamādikrameṇaiva vijñeyaḥ śūribhistataḥ ।vaṃśajaḥ śālajātirvā sa daṇḍaḥ sarvakāmadaḥ ।।ayamāropyamāṇastu bhaṅgamāyāti vai yadi ।rājñoniṣṭaṃ vijānīyādyajamānasya vā tathā ।।mantreṇa bahurūpeṇa pūrvavacchāntimācaret ।dvārapālādipūjāñca mantrāṇāntarpyaṇantathā ।।vidhāya cūlakaṃ daṇḍaṃ snāpayedastramantrataḥ ।anenaiva tu mantreṇa dhvajaṃ samprokṣya deśikaḥ ।।mṛdu kaṣāyādibhiḥ snānaṃ prāsādaṅkārayettataḥ ।vilipya rasamācchādya śayyāyāṃ nyasya pūrvavat ।।cūḍake liṅgavaṇanyāso na ca jñānaṃ na ca kriyā ।

īśaścūḍa iti iti ga । īṣaścūla iti cha ।śaśaḥ śūla iti ja
jaṅghāto yadvā jaṅghārdhato bhavediti kha । saṅghāto yathā jaṅghārdhato yajediti gha

yadi vā tadvidicchayā iti kha

yastu syāt pīṭhaveṣṭaka iti ṅa

rājñoriṣṭamiti ja

vai tathā iti ja

cūḍakamiti ja

bhṛtkāṣāyādibhiriti kha, cha ca

vilipya rasamādāyeti ja

cūlake iti gha, ṅa ca
viśeṣārthā caturthī ca na kuṇḍasya kalpanā ।।daṇḍe tayārthatattvañca vidyātattvaṃ dvitīyakaṃ ।sadyojātāni vakrāṇi śivatattvaṃ punardhvaje ।।niṣkalañca śivantatra nyasyāṅgāni prapūjayet ।cūḍake ca tato mantro sānnidhye sahitāṇubhiḥ ।।homayet pratibhāgañca dhvaje taistu phaḍantikaiḥ ।anyathāpi kṛtaṃ yacca dhvajasaṃskāraṇaṃ kvacit ।।astrayāgavidhāvevaṃ tatsarvamupadarśitaṃ ।prāsāde kārite sthāne sragvastrādivibhūṣite ।।jaṅghā vedī tadūrdhve tu tritattvādi niveśya ca ।homādikaṃ vidhāyātha śivaṃ sampūjya pūrvavat ।।sarvatattvamayaṃ dhyātvā śivañca vyāpakaṃ nyaset ।anantaṃ kālarudrañca vibhāvya ca padāmbuje ।।kuṣmāṇḍahāṭakau pīṭhe pātālanarakaiḥ saha ।bhuvanair lokapālaiś ca śatarudrādibhirvṛtaṃ ।।brahmāṇdakamidaṃ dhyātvā jaṅghātāñca vibhāvayet ।vāritejonilavyomapañcāṣṭakasamanvitaṃ ।।

viśeṣādyā iti gha

navadaṇḍasyeti jha

tathātmatattvañceti ga, gha ca

sadyojātādi vakrāṇīti jha

cūlake ca iti kha, ja ca

saṃhitātmabhiriti kha, ga ca

cūlake iti śloko jhapustake nāsti

tacca dhvaje saṃharaṇamiti kha, cha, ca । yacca dhvajasaṃskaraṇamiti gha

astrayāge vidhāne ceti ja

prāsādakāritasthāne iti kha, jha ca । prāsāde kāritasthāne iti ja

pātālanavakair iti ṅa, ja ca

pañcāggakasamanvitamiti ga
sarvāvaraṇasañjñañca vṛddhayonyavṛkānvitaṃ ।yogāṣṭakasamāyuktaṃ nāśāvidhi guṇatrayaṃ ।।paṭasthaṃ puruṣaṃ siṃhaṃ vāmañca paribhāvayet ।mañjarīvedikāyāñca vidyādikacatuṣṭayaṃ ।।kaṇṭhe māyāṃ sarudrāñca vidyāścāmalasārake ।kalase ceśvaraṃ vinduṃ vidyeśvarasamanvitaṃ ।।jaṭājūṭañca taṃ vidyācchūlaṃ candrārdharūpakaṃ ।śaktitrayaṃ ca tatraiva daṇḍe nādaṃ vibhāvya ca ।।dhvaje ca kuṇḍalīṃ śaktimiti dhāmni vibhāvayet ।jagatyā vātha sandhāya liṅgaṃ piṇḍikayāthavā ।।samutthāpya sumantraiś ca vinyaste śaktipaṅkaje ।nyastaratnādike tatra svādhāre viniveśayet ।।yajamāno dhvaje lagne bandhumitrādibhiḥ saha ।dhāma pradakṣiṇīkṛtya labhate phalamīhitaṃ ।।guruḥ pāśupataṃ dhyāyan sthiramantrādhipair yutaṃ ।adhipān śastrayuktāṃś ca rakṣaṇāya nibodhayet ।।

vuddhayonyantakānvitamiti ga

yāgaṣṭakasamāyuktamiti jha

rāgaśceti kha, ja ca

kaṇṭhe māyāṅgavaktrañceti jha

vidyāścāmanasārake iti kha, ga ca । vidyādyā manasārake iti ja
viśveśvarasamanvitamiti kha, gha, cha ca । vidyottarasamanvitamiti ga ।
sarvāvaraṇasañjñañcetyādiḥ, viśveśvarasamanvitamityantaḥ pāṭho ṅapustake nāsti

liṅgapiṇḍikayāthaveti gha, ṅa, ja ca svamantraiśceti ga, ṅa, ca

labhate phalamīpsitamiti ṅa

pāśupataṃ dhyāyediti kha, gha ca

śivamantrādhipair yutamiti gha, ṅa ca

rakṣaṇāya nivedayediti kha, cha ca
nyūnādidoṣaśāntyarthaṃ hutvā datvā ca digbaliṃ ।gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād yajamāno divaṃ vrajet ।।pratimāliṅgavedīnāṃ yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ ।tāvadyugasahasrāṇi karturbhogabhujaḥ phalaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dhvajārohaṇādividhirnāma dvyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha tryadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

jīrṇoddhāraḥ

īśvara uvāca
jīrṇādīnāñca liṅgānāmuddhāraṃ vidhinā vade ।lakṣmojjhitañca bhagnañca sthūlaṃ vajrahataṃ tathā ।।saṃpuṭaṃ sphuṭitaṃ vyaṅgaṃ liṅgamityevamādikaṃ ।ityādiduṣṭaliṅgānāṃ yojyā piṇḍī tathā vṛṣaḥ ।।cālitañcalitaṃ liṅgamatyarthaṃ viṣamasthitaṃ ।diḍmūḍhaṃ pātitaṃ liṅgaṃ madhyasthaṃ patitaṃ tathā ।।evaṃvidhañca saṃsthāpya nirbraṇañca bhavedyadi ।nadyādikapravāhena tadapākriyate yadi ।।tato anyatrāpi saṃsthāpya vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā ।

nyūnādidoṣanāśārthaṃ kṛtveti jha । nyūnādidoṣanāśāya hutveti gha, ja ca

kartarbhogavata iti kha, cha ca

tyājyā piṇḍīti gha

nimnamityarthamiti ja

santyājyamiti jha
susthitaṃ dusthitaṃ vāpi śivaliṅgaṃ na cālayet ।।śatena sthāpanaṃ kuryāt sahasreṇa tu cālanaṃ ।pūjādibhiś ca saṃyuktaṃ jīrṇādyamapi susthitaṃ ।।yāmye maṇḍapamīśe vā pratyagdvāraikatoraṇaṃ ।vidhāya dvārapūjādi sthaṇḍile mantrapūjanaṃ ।।mantrān santarpya sampūjya vāstudevātuṃ pūrvavat ।digbaliṃ ca vahirdatvā samācamya svayaṃ guruḥ ।।brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu śambhuṃ vijñāpayettataḥ ।duṣṭaliṅgamidaṃ śaṃbhoḥ śāntiruddhāraṇasya cet ।।rusistavādividhinā adhitiṣṭhasva māṃ śiva ।evaṃ vijñāpya deveśaṃ śāntihomaṃ samācaret ।।madhvājyakṣīradūrvābhirmūlenāṣṭādhikaṃ śataṃ ।tato liṅgaṃ ca saṃsthāpya pūjayet sthiṇḍile tathā ।।oṃ vyāpakeśvarāyeti nāṭyantaṃ śivavādinā ।

dusthitaṃ cāpīti ga

sahasreṇa ca cālayediti ga

jīrṇādyamapi saṃsthitamiti kha, cha ca । pūjayā rahitaṃ yattadanniṣṭhamapi duḥsthitamiti kha, gha, pustake adhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ

sthaṇḍileśaprapūjanamiti kha, ga, ṅa, cha, jha ca । sthaṇḍile samprapūjanamiti gha, ja ca

sarvamiti ka

śāntiruddharaṇe nyasediti kha, ga, gha, cha ca

rucistavāsti vidhineti kha, ṅa, cha, ja ca

sthaṇḍilamiti kha, gha, cha, ja ca

oṃ vyāpakeśvarāyeti tattvenābhyantarādine iti kha । oṃ vyāpakeśvarāyeti nātyantaśivavācineti gha । oṃ vyāpakeśvarāyeti tattvenātyantavādine iti cha

oṃ vyāpakaṃ hṛdayeśvarāya namaḥ । oṃ vyāpakeśvarāya śirase namaḥ । ity ādyaṅgamantrāḥ 
tatastatrāśritaṃ tattvaṃ śrāvayedastramastataḥ ।।sattvaḥ kopīha yaḥ kopiliṅgamāśritya tiṣṭhati ।liṅgantyaktvā śivājñābhiryatreṣṭaṃ tatra gacchatu ।।vidyāvidyeśvarair yuktaḥ sa bhavotra bhaviṣyati ।sahasraṃ pratibhāge ca tataḥ pāśupatāṇunā ।।hutvā śāntyambunā prokṣya spṛṣṭvā kuśair japettataḥ ।datvārghaṃ ca vilomena tattvatattvādhipāṃs tathā ।।aṣṭamūrtīśvarān liṅga piṇḍikāsaṃsthitān guruḥ ।visṛjya svarṇapāśena vṛṣaskandhasthayā tathā ।।rajvā vadhvā tayā nītvā śivamantaṃ gṛṇan janaiḥ ।tajjale nikṣipen mantrī puṣṭhyarthaṃ juhuyācchataṃ ।।tṛptaye dikpatīnāñca vāstuśuddhau śataṃ śataṃ ।rakṣāṃ vidhāya taddhāmni mahāpāśupatā tataḥ ।।liṅgamanyattatastatra vidhivat sthāpayed guruḥ ।asurair munibhirgotrastantravidbhiḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ ।।

oṃ vyāpakeśvarāya hṛdayāya nama iti kha, ga ca । oṃ vyāpakeśvara hṛdayā nama iti jha, gha ca

śirase svāheti ja

ity aṅgamantrā iti kha, ṅa, ca । ity ādimantrā iti cha

snāpayedastramantrata iti cha । dhārayedastramantrata iti ja

siddhvaḥ kopīheti gha

śambhuratreti gha, ja ca । prabhuratreti kha, cha ca

pāśupatātmaneti kha, ga, cha ca

darbhair japettata iti ṅa

mūrtimūrtīśvarān liṅge iti kha, gha, ṅa, cha ca

vāstumadhye gha

tattvavidbhiriti kha, gha, cha, ja ca
jīrṇaṃ vāpyathavā bhagnaṃ vidhināpi nacālayet ।eṣa eva vidhiḥ kāryojīrṇadhāmasamuddhṛtau ।।khaḍge mantragaṇaṃ nyasya kārayet mandirāntaraṃ ।saṅkoce maraṇaṃ proktaṃ vistāro tu dhanakṣayaḥ ।।
taddravyaṃ śreṣṭhadravyaṃ vā tat sakāryaṃ tatpramāṇakaṃ

e ity āgneye mahapurāṇe jīrṇoddhāro nāma tryadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha caturadhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ

prāsādalakṣaṇaṃ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣye prāsādasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ te śikhadhvaja ।caturbhāgīkṛte kṣetre bhitterbhāgena vistarāt ।।adribhāgena garbhaḥ syāt piṇḍikā pādavistarāt ।pañcabhāgīkṛte kṣetrentarbhāge tu piṇḍikā ।।suṣiraṃ bhāgavistīrṇaṃ bhittayo bhāgavistarāt ।bhāgau dvau madhyame garbhe jyeṣṭhabhāgadvayena tu ।।

jīrṇe prāpya yathā magnamiti kha

tatpramāṇata iti gha

ardhabhāgeneti kha, gha, cha, ja ca

pañcabhāgīkṛte vāpi madhyabhāge iti gha, cha, ja ca

bhāgau dvau madhyamo garbho jyeṣṭho bhāgadvayena tu iti ṅa, cha, ja ca
tribhistu kanyasāgarbhaḥ śeṣo bhittiriti kvacit ।ṣoḍhābhakyethavā kṣetre bhittirbhāgaikavistarāt ।।garbho bhāgena vistīrṇo bhāgadvayena piṇḍikā ।vistārād dviguṇo vāpi sapādadviguṇo api vā ।।ardhārdhadviguṇo vāpi triguṇaḥ kvacittriducchrayaḥ ।jagatī vistarārdhena tribhāgena kvacidbhavet ।।nemiḥ pādonaviestīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ ।paridhistrayaṃ śako madhye rathakāṃstatra kārayet ।।cāmuṇḍaṃ bhairavaṃ teṣu nāṭyeśaṃ ca niveśayet ।prāsādārdhena devānāmaṣṭau vā caturo api vā ।।pradakṣiṇāṃ vahiḥ kuryāt prāsādādiṣu vā navā ।ādityāḥ pūrvataḥ sthāpyāḥ skandognirvāyugocare ।।evaṃ yamādayo nyasyāḥ svasyāḥ svasyāṃ diśi sthitāḥ ।caturdhā śikharaṃ kṛtvā śukanāsā dvibhāgikā ।।tṛtīye vedikā tvagneḥ sakaṇṭho malasārakaḥ ।vairājaḥ puṣpakaścānyaḥ kailāso maṇikas tathā ।।triviṣṭhapañca pañcaiva merumūrdhani saṃsthitāḥ ।caturasrastu tatrādyo dvitīyopi tadāyataḥ ।।

tribhistu kalaso garbha iti kha, cha ca

adhyardhadviguṇo vāpīti gha, ja ca

pādena vistīrṇā iti gha, ja ca

prāsādāddikṣu iti kha, gha, cha, ja ca । prāsāde dikṣu iti ṅa

skandognirvāmagocare iti ka

sakaṇṭhomavasāraka iti ṅa । sakaṇṭhomavasādhaka iti cha

kailāsya iti ṅa, cha ca

caturdhetyādiḥ, merumūrdhni saṃsthitā ity antaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti
vṛtto vṛttāyataścānyo hy aṣṭāsraścāpi pañcamaḥ ।ekaiko navadhābhedaiś catvāriṃśacca pañca ca ।।prāsādaḥ prathamo merurdvitiyo mandaras tathā ।vimānañca tathā bhadraḥ sarvatobhadra eva ca ।।caruko nandiko nandirvardhamānas tathāparaḥ ।śrīvatsaśceti vairājyānvavāye ca samutthitāḥ ।।balabhī gṛharājaś ca śālāgṛhañca mandiraṃ ।viśālaś ca samo brahma mandiraṃ bhuvanantathā ।।prabhavaḥ śivikā veśma navaite puṣpakodbhavāḥ ।balayo dundubhiḥ padmo mahāpadmaka evaca ।।vardhanī vānya uṣṇīṣaḥ śaṅkhaś ca kalasas tathā ।svavṛkṣaś ca tathāpyete vṛttāḥ kailāsasambhavāḥ ।।gajotha vṛṣabho haṃso garutmānnṛkṣanāyakaḥ ।bhūṣaṇo bhūdharaścānnye śrījayaḥ pṛthavīdharaḥ ।।vṛttāyatāt samudbhūtā navaite maṇikāhvayāt ।vajraṃ cakrantathā cānyat svastikaṃ vajrasvastikaṃ ।।

caturvṛttāyataścānya iti gha

rucakā iti ka

viśālaś ca mano brahmeti kha, gha ca । viśālaś ca tathā brahmeti ga

paṇava iti ja

mahāpadmaś ca iti ka

śakunī cāsya uṣṇīṣa iti ja

vardhanītyādiḥ, kailāsasambhavā ity antaḥ pāṭho cha pustake nāsti

vṛṣaṇa iti ṅa

khavṛkṣaścetyādiḥ, pṛthivīdhara ity antaḥ pāṭho ja pustake nāsti

maṇikākṣayāt iti ja

vajrahastikamiti kha, ga, cha ca । vajramuṣṭikamiti ja
citraṃ svastikakhaḍgañca gadā śrīkaṇṭha eva ca ।vijayo nāmataś caite triviṣṭapasamudbhavāḥ ।।nagarāṇāmimāḥ sañjñā lāṭādīnāmimās tathā ।grīvārdhenonnatañcūlampṛthulañca vibhāgataḥ ।।daśadhā vedikāṅkṛtvā pañcabhiḥ skandhavistaraḥ ।tribhiḥ kaṇṭhaṃ tu kartavyaṃ caturbhistu pracaṇḍakaṃ ।।dikṣu dvārāṇi kāryāṇi na vidikṣu kadācana ।piṇḍikā koṇavistīrṇā madhyamāntā hy udāhṛtā ।।kvacit pañcamabhāgena mahatāṅgarbhapādataḥ ।ucchrāyā dviguṇāsteṣāmanyathā vā nigadyate ।।ṣaṣṭyādhikāt samārabhya aṅgulānāṃ śatādiha ।uttamānyapi catvāri dvārāṇi daśahānitaḥ ।।trīṇyeva madhyamāni syustrīṇyeva kanyasānyataḥ ।ucchrāyārdhena vistāro hy ucchrāyo abhyadhikastridhā ।।caturbhiraṣṭabhirvāpi daśabhiraṅgulaistataḥ ।ucchrāyāt pādavistīrṇā viśākhāstaduduṃvare ।।vistarārdhena bāhulyaṃ sarveṣāmeva kīrtitam ।

vijayo nāyakaś caite iti ga

naṭādīnāmimāstatheti kha, ṅa ca । nāṭyādīnāmimāstatheti ga, gha, cha ca । nādādīnāmimāstatheti ja

pṛthulaṃ svatribhāgata iti kha, gha, cha ca । pṛthusamudrabhāgata iti ṅa

caturbhistu tadaṇḍakamiti kha, ga ca । caturbhiḥ kṛtadaṇḍakamiti ja

ṣaṣṭyādhikāṃśamārabhya aṅgulānāṃ śatādhikamiti ja

uttamānyapi catvāri catvāri daśahānita iti ja

daśabhirvā guṇaiḥ śubha iti cha

viśākhāsthe tvaḍumbare iti cha ca
viśuddhena tu vāhulyamiti kha । vistarārdhena vā hanyāditi jha ।
vistarārdhena bahulyamiti ja
dvipañcasaptanavabhiḥ śākhābhirdvāramiṣṭadaṃ ।।adhaḥśākhācaturthāṃśe pratīhārau niveśayet ।mithunaiḥ pādavarṇābhiḥ śākhāśeṣaṃ vibhūṣayet ।।stambhabiddhe bhṛtyatā syāt vṛkṣabiddhe tvabhūtitā ।kūpabiddhe bhayaṃ dvāre kṣetrabiddhe dhanakṣayaḥ ।।prāsādagṛhaśilādimārgaviddheṣu bandhanaṃ ।sabhābiddhe na dāridryaṃ varṇabiddhe nirākṛtiḥ ।।ulūkhalena dāridryaṃ śilābiddhena śatrutā ।chāyābiddhena dāridryaṃ bedhadoṣo na jāyate ।।chedādutpāṭanādvāpi tathā prākāralakṣaṇāt ।sīmāyā dviguṇatyāgād bedhadoṣo na jāyate ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sāmānyaprāsādalakṣaṇaṃ nāma caturadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nagarādivāstukathanaṃ

īśvara uvāca

nagaragrāmadurgādyā gṛhaprāsādavṛddhaye ।

mithunair atha vallībhiriti kha, cha ca

dvāre śvabhrabiddhe iti kha, gha, ṅa ca

mārgavedhaiś ca iti cha

cullībiddhe iti kha, ṅa ca

śilābiddhena mūḍhatāṃ iti ga, ja ca

nagaragrāmadurgādau iti kha, cha, ja ca । nagaragrāmadurgākhyamiti gha
ekāśītipadair vastuṃ pūjayet siddhaye dhruvaṃ ।।prāgāsyā daśadhā nāḍyāstāsāṃ nāmāni ca bruve ।śāntā yaśovatī kāntā viśālā prāṇavāhinī ।।satī vasumatī nandā subhadrātha manoramā ।uttarā dvādaśānyāś ca ekāśītyaṅghrikārikā ।।hariṇī suprabhā lakṣmīrvibhūtirvimalā priyā ।jayā jvālā viśokā ca smṛtāstatrapādataḥ ।।īśādyaṣṭāṣṭakaṃ dikṣu yajedīśaṃ dhanañjayaṃ ।śakramarkaṃ tathā satyaṃ bhṛśaṃ vyoma ca pūrvataḥ ।।havyavāhañca pūrvāṇi vitathaṃ bhaumameva ca ।kṛtāntamatha gandharvaṃ bhṛgaṃ mṛgañca dakṣiṇe ।।pitaraṃ dvārapālañca sugrīvaṃ puṣpadantakaṃ ।varuṇaṃ daityaśeṣau ca yakṣmāṇaṃ paścime sadā ।।rogāhimukhyo bhallāṭaḥ saubhāgyamaditirditiḥ ।navāntaḥ padago brahmā pūjyordhe ca ṣaḍaṅghigāḥ ।।brahmeśāntarakoṣṭhastha māyākhyāntu paddvaye ।tadadhaścāpavatsākhyaṃ kendrantareṣu ṣaṭpade ।।

subhadrā ceti ja

manojavā iti ja

uttarāsyā daśānyāśceti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ja ca

sūtrapādata iti ga । sūtrapātata iti cha

śakramekaṃ tathāpatyamiti jha

rogāhimokṣeti kha, cha ca

somarūpyaditau ditimiti kha

ṣaḍaṅgakā iti ga

goṣṭhastha iti cha
marīcikāgnimadhye tu savitā dvipadasthitaḥ ।sāvitrī tadadho dvyaṃśe vivasvān ṣaṭpade tvadhaḥ ।।pitṛbrahmāntare viṣṇumindumindraṃ tvadho jayaṃ ।varuṇabrahmaṇormadhye mitrākhyaṃ ṣaṭpade yajet ।।rogabrahmāntare nityaṃ dvipañca rudradāsakam ।tadadho dvyaṅghrigaṃ yakṣma ṣaṭsaumyeṣu dharādharaṃ ।।carakīṃ skandavikaṭaṃ vidārīṃ pūtanāṃ kramāt ।jammaṃ pāpaṃ pilipicchaṃ yajedīśādivāhyataḥ ।।ekāśīpadaṃ veśma maṇḍapaś ca śatāṅghrikaḥ ।pūrvavaddevatāḥ pūjyā brahmā tu ṣoḍaśāṃśake ।।marīciś ca vivasvāṃś ca mitraṃ pṛthvīdharas tathā ।daśakoṣṭhasthitā dikṣu tvanye beśādikoṇagāḥ ।।daityamātā tatheśāgnī mṛgākhyau pitarau tathā ।pāpayakṣmānilau devāḥ sarve sārdhāṃśake sthitāḥ ।।yatpādyokaḥ pravakṣyāmi saṅkṣepeṇa kramād guha ।

dvisthañceti kha, ga, ja ca

ṣaṭsaumyeṣu carācaramiti jha, gha ca

kumbhapālamiti cha

pillipiñjamiti kha । piñjipiñchamiti cha

carakīmityādiḥ, vāhyata ity antaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

śatārdhakamiti jha

brahmāntaiḥ ṣoḍaśāṃtakair iti kha, cha ca । brahmāntāḥ ṣoḍaśāṃśake iti ga, ja ca

pṛthvīdharantatheti kha

tvanyeveśādike gaṇā iti kha, cha ca

daityamātā bhaveśāgnī iti kha । daityamātā hareśāgnī iti gha, ja ca

yajñādyoka iti ṅa
sadigviṃśatkarair dairghyādaṣṭāviṃśati vistarāt ।।śiśirāśrayaḥ śivākhyaś ca rudrahīnaḥ sadobhayoḥ ।rudradviguṇitā nāhāḥ pṛthuṣṇobhirvinā tribhiḥ ।।syādgrahadviguṇaṃ dairghyāttithibhiś caiva vistarāt ।sāvitraḥ sālayaḥ kuḍyā anyeṣāṃ pṛthakstriṃśāṃśataḥ ।।kuḍyapṛthupajaṅghoccāt kuḍyantu triguṇocchayaṃ ।kuḍyasūtrasamā pṛthvī vīthī bhedādanekadhā ।।bhadre tulyañca vīthībhirdvāravīthī vināgrataḥ ।śrījayaṃ pṛṣṭhato hīnaṃ bhadroyaṃ pārś cayorvinā ।।garbhapṛthusamā vīthī tadardhārdhena vā kvacit ।vīthyardhenopavīthyādyamekadvitripurānvitam ।।sāmānyānātha gṛhaṃ vakṣye sarveṣāṃ sarvakāmadaṃ ।ekadvitricatuḥśālamaṣṭaśālaṃ yathākramāt ।।ekaṃ yāmye ca saumāsyaṃ dve cet paścāt puromukham ।catuḥśālantu sāmmukhyāttayorindrendramuktayoḥ ।।śivāsyamambupāsyaiṣa indrāsye yamasūryakaṃ ।

sāṣṭāviṃśati iti kha, ṅa ca
śivāśramaḥ śivākhyasyeti kha, gha, jha ca ।śivāgrakaśivākhyasyeti ga । śivāgragaḥ śivākhyasyeti ṅa, ja ca ।śivāśrayaḥ śivākhyasyeti cha
dairghyādṛṣibhibhiś caiveti gha

dairghyāt sāṣṭāviṃśativistarāditi cha

sāvitryālayaḥ kulā iti kha । sāvitra ity ādiḥ, triguṇocchrayamityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

garbhapīṭhasamā iti kha, gha, jha ca

saumyāsyaṃ dve dve paścātpuromukhamiti kha । saumyākhyaṃ dve ca paścādadhomukhamiti jha sāvitraḥ sālayaḥ koṭīnāṃ tapasā
prāksaumyasthe ca daṇdākhyaṃ prāgyāmye vātasañjñakaṃ ।।āpyendau gṛhavalyākhyaṃ triśūlaṃ tadvinardhikṛt ।pūrvaśalāvihīnaṃ syāt sukṣetraṃ vṛddhidāyakaṃ ।।yāmye hīne bhavecchūlī triśālaṃ vṛddhikṛt paraṃ ।yakṣaghnaṃ jalahīnaukaḥ sutaghnaṃ bahuśatrukṛt ।।

satyalokataḥ । apunarmārakā yatra brahmaloko hi smṛtaḥ । pādādyadhasturbhūloko bhuvaḥ sūryādvavaḥ smṛtaḥ । svarloko bhuvāntaś ca niyutāni caturdaśa । ekadaṇḍaṃ kaṭāhena vṛto brahmāṇḍavistaraḥ । vārivahnyānalāśaistato bhūtādināvadhi । vṛtaṃ daśaguṇair aṇḍaṃ bhūtādirmahatā tathā । daśottarāṇyaśeṣāṇi śukra kasmānmāmune । mahāntañca samāvṛtya pradhānaṃ samavasthitaṃ । anantasya na tasyāntaḥ saṃsthānaṃ na ca vidyate । hetubhūtamaśeṣasya prakṛtiḥ sā purā mune । asaṅkhyātāni cāṇḍāni tatra jātāni ca dṛśāṃ । daruṇyagniryathā tailaṃ tena tadvat pumāniti । pradhānevasthito vyāpī cetanātmātmavedanaḥ । pradhānaś ca pumāṃś caiva sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmabhūs tathā । viṣṇuśaktyā mahatprājñavṛttau saṃśrayadharmiṇau । tayoḥ saiva pṛthagbhāve karaṇaṃ saṃśayasya ca । mahākhyaṃ svatalaścākhyaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi sattama । kṛṣṇapītāruṇāḥ śukraśarkarāśailakāñcanāḥ । bhūmayasteṣu cānyeṣu santi daityādayaḥ sukhaṃ । pātālānāmadhaścānte śeṣo viṣṇoś ca tāmasaḥ । guṇānanyān sa cānantaḥ śirasā dhārayanmahīṃ । bhuvodho narakā lokaṃ nayate kṣatravaiṣṇavaḥ । vāriṇā bhāvitā pṛthvī yāvattāvannabho mataṃ । siddhāntamastuyābhyaiva, indrāsthe yamasūryakaṃ । mallabdheṣu ka, kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, jha cihnitapustakeṣu sāvitraḥ sālayaḥ ity ataḥ paraṃ naiṣa pāṭho vartate । teṣu tu mudritapāṭha eva vartate punaḥ ja cihnitapustake sāvitraḥ sālaya ity ataḥ paraṃ indrāsyeyamasūryakamityantaḥ pāṭho nāsti । ja cihnitapustake ya uktapāṭho dṛśyate tatra pūrvāparasaṅgatirnāsti । prakaraṇāntarīyapāthoyamatra lekhakabhramāt samāgata iti bhāti

gṛhaśalyākhyamiti kha

pūrvaśākhāvihīnamiti ṅa

yāmye hīne bhaveccullī triśāstraṃ dititatparamiti jha । yāmye hīne bhavecchatrī triśālaṃ vittahṛtparamiti ga
indrādikramato vacmi dhvajādyaṣṭau gṛhāṇyahaṃ ।prakṣālānusragāvāsamagnau tasya mahānasaṃ ।।yāmye rasakriyā śayyā dhanuḥśastrāṇi rakṣasi ।dhanamuktyamvupeśākhye samyagandhau ca mārute ।।saumye dhanapaśū kuryādīśe dīkṣāvarālayaṃ ।svāmihastamitaṃ veśma vistārāyāmapiṇḍikaṃ ।।triguṇaṃ hastasaṃyuktaṃ kṛtvāṣṭāṃśaihṛtaṃ tathā ।taccheṣoyaṃ sthitastena vāyasāntaṃ dhvajādikaṃ ।।trayaḥ pakṣāgnivedeṣu rasarṣivasuto bhavet ।sarvanāśakaraṃ veśma madhye cānte ca saṃsthitaṃ ।।tasmācca navame bhāge śubhakṛnnilayo mataḥ ।tanmadhe maṇḍapaḥ śastaḥ samo vā dviguṇāyataḥ ।।pratyagāpye cenduyame haṭṭa eva gṛhāvalī ।ekaikabhavanākhyāni dikṣvaṣṭāṣṭakasaṅkhyayā ।।īśādyaditikāntāni phalānyeṣāṃ yathākramaṃ ।bhayaṃ nārī calatvaṃ ca jayo vṛddhiḥ pratāpakaḥ ।।

indrādikramato vahnīti kha, cha ca
prakṣālanātmabhāgāraḥ samagnau iti cha ।prakṣālānugrahāvāsamagrau iti ja
dhanabhktāmbupaśākhye iti kha, cha ca

śasyamañcau ceti jha

yāmye iti jha

dīkṣāsurālayamiti kha, ja, jha ca

kṛtvāṣṭāṃśair hataṃ tatheti ga । kṛtvāṣṭāṅgair hataṃ tatheti gha, ja ca । kṛtvāṣṭāṃśahatastatheti jha

tasmāttu iti jha

prāgīśe cenduyāmye veti kha । prāgāpye cenduyāmye iti cha, jha ca

sarvanāśakaramityādiḥ, yathākramamityantaḥ pāṭho ja pustake nāsti
dharmaḥ kaliś ca naisvyañca prāgdvāreṣvaṣṭasu dhruvaṃ ।dāho asukhaṃ suhṛnnāśo dhananāśo mṛtirdhanaṃ ।।śilpitvaṃ tanayaḥ syācca yāmyadvāraphalāṣṭakam ।āyuḥprāvrājyaśasyāni dhanaśāntyarthasaṅkṣayāḥ ।।śoṣaṃ bhogaṃ cāpatyañca jaladvāraphalāni ca ।rogo madārtimukhyatvaṃ cārthāyuḥ kṛśatā matiḥ ।।mānaś ca dvārataḥ pūrva ūtarasyāndiśi kramāt ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gṛhādivāsturnāma pañcādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nagarādivāstuḥ

īśvara uvāca
nagarādikavāstuś ca vakṣye rājyādivṛddhaye ।yojanaṃ yojanārdhaṃ vā tadarthaṃ sthānamāśrayet ।।

vanavāsī mṛtirdhanamiti gha । dharmaḥ kaliścetyādiḥ, mṛtirdhanamityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

āyuḥ prāvāhyaśasyānīti kha, cha ca

bhogaṃ ca patyaṃ ceti kha, cha ca

dvārataḥ prokta iti gha bhojanārdhantadardhaṃ ca iti gha, ṅa ca
abhyarcya vāstu nagaraṃ prākārādyantu kārayet ।īśāditriṃśatpadake pūrvadvāraṃ ca sūryake ।।gandharvābhyāṃ dakṣiṇe syādvāruṇye paścime tathā ।saumyadvāraṃ saumyapade kāryā haṭṭāstu vistarāḥ ।।yenebhādi sukhaṃ gacchet kuryād dvāraṃ tu ṣaṭkaraṃ ।chinnakarṇaṃ vibhinnañca candrārdhābhaṃ puraṃ na hi ।।vajrasūcīmukhaṃ neṣṭaṃ sakṛd dvitrisamāgamaṃ ।cāpābhaṃ vajranāgābhaṃ purārambhe hi śāntikṛt ।।prārcya viṣṇu harārkādīnnatvā dadyād baliṃ balī ।āgneye svarṇakarmārān purasya viniveśayet ।।dakṣiṇe nṛtyavṛttīnāṃ veśyāstrīṇāṃ gṛhāṇi ca ।naṭānāñcakrikādīnāṃ kaivartādeś ca nairṛte ।।rathānāmāyudhānāñca kṛpāṇāñca vāruṇe ।śauṇḍikāḥ karmādhikṛtā vāyavye parikarmaṇaḥ ।।brāhmaṇā yatayaḥ siddhāḥ puṇyavantaś ca cottare ।phalādyādivikrayiṇa īśāne ca vaṇigjanāḥ ।।pūrvataś ca balādhyakṣā āgneye vividhaṃ balaṃ ।strīṇāmādeśino dakṣe kāṇḍārānnairṛte nyaset ।।paścime ca mahāmātyān koṣapālāṃś ca kārukān ।

gandharvādyā iti ga, ja ca

sūcīmukhaṃ naṣṭamiti jha, cha ca

vyāyataṃ vajranāsābhamiti gha । cāpābhaṃ cakranābhābhamiti ṅa

stutvā natvā baliṃ balī iti ṅa

āgneye tu karmakārāniti kha

dakṣiṇe bhṛtyadhūrtānāmiti cha

naṭānāṃ vāhlikādīnāmiti kha, ja ca

parikarmaṇa iti cha, ja ca
uttare daṇḍanāthāṃś ca nāyakadvijasaṅkulān ।।pūrvataḥ kṣatriyān dakṣe vaiśyāñchūndrāṃś ca paścime ।dikṣu vaidyān vājinaś ca balāni ca caturdiśaṃ ।।pūrveṇa caraliṅgyādīñchmaśānādīni dakṣiṇe ।paścime godhanādyañca kṛṣikartṝṃstathottare ।।nyasenmlecchāṃś ca koṇeṣu grāmādiṣu tathā smṛtiṃ ।śriyaṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ dvāri pūrve tau paśyatāṃ śriyaṃ ।।devādīnāṃ paścimataḥ pūrvāsyāni gṛhāṇi hi ।pūrvataḥ paścimāsyāni dakṣiṇe cottarānanān ।।nākeśaviṣṇvādidhāmāni rakṣārthaṃ nagarasya ca ।nirdaivatantu nagaragrāmadurgagṛhādikaṃ ।।bhujyate tat piśācādyai rogādyaiḥ paribhūyate ।nagarādi sadaivaṃ hi jayadaṃ bhuktimuktidaṃ ।।pūrvāyāṃ śrīgṛhaṃ proktamāgneyyāṃ vai mahānasaṃ ।śanayaṃ dakṣiṇasyāntu nairṛtyāmāyudhāśrayaṃ ।।bhojanaṃ paścimāyāntu vāyavyāṃ dhānyasaṅgrahaḥ ।uttare dravyasaṃsthānamaiśānyāṃ devatāgṛhaṃ ।।catuḥśālaṃ triśālaṃ vā dviśālaṃ caikaśālakaṃ ।catuḥśālagṛhāṇāntu śālālindakabhedataḥ ।।

tathā sthitamiti kha, gha, ṅa, cha ca । yathāsthitamiti ja

vaiśravaṇaṃ vāpi iti ga

pūrvata iti kha

dakṣiṇe cottareṇa ceti kha, ga, gha ca

nagarasya hīti kha, cha ca

rogādyair abhibhūyate iti ja

dakṣiṇāyāṃ tviti ga, gha, jha ca

devatālayamiti jha

śālālindaprabhedata iti ka
śatadvayantu jāyante pañcāśat pañca teṣvapi ।triśālāni tu catvāri dviśālāni tu pañcadhā ।।ekaśālāni catvāri ekālindāni vacmi ca ।aṣṭāviṃśadalindāni gṛhāṇi nagarāṇi ca ।।caturbhiḥ saprabhiś caiva pañcapañcāśadeva tu ।ṣaḍalindāni viṃśaiva aṣṭābhirviṃśa eva hi ।।aṣṭālindaṃ bhavedevaṃ nagarādau gṛhāṇi hi ।
e ity āgeneye mahāpurāṇe nagarādivāsturnāma ṣaḍadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

svāyambhuvasargaḥ

agnir uvāca 
vakṣye bhuvanakoṣañca pṛthvīdvīpādilakṣaṇaṃ ।agnidhraścāgnibāhuś ca vapuṣmāndyutimāṃs tathā ।।medhā medhātithirbhavyaḥ savanaḥ putra eva ca ।

gṛhāṇi nagarādiṣu iti jha । gṛhāṇi nagarāṇi tu iti kha

viṃśa eva ceti kha, cha ca

aṣṭābhirvibhajedevamiti cha

īśvara uvāceti kha, cha ca

savanaḥ kṣaya eva ca iti ka
jyotiṣmān daśamasteṣāṃ satyanāmā suto abhavat ।।priyabratasutāḥ khyātāḥ saptadvīpāndadau pitā ।jambudvīpamathāgnīdhre plakṣaṃ medhātitherdadau ।।vapuṣmate śālmalañca jyotiṣmate kuśāhvayaṃ ।krauñcadvīpaṃ dyutimate śākaṃ bhavyāya dattavān ।।puṣkaraṃ savanāyādādagnīdhre adāt sute śataṃ ।jambūdvīpaṃ pitā lakṣaṃ nābherdattaṃ himāhvayaṃ ।।hemakūṭaṃ kimpuruṣe harivarṣāya naiṣadhaṃ ।ilāvṛte merumadhye ramye nīlācalaśritaṃ ।।hiraṇvate śvetavarṣaṃ kurūṃstu kurave dadau ।bhadrāśvāya ca bhadrāśvaṃ ketumālāya paścimaṃ ।।meroḥ priyavrataḥ putrānabhiṣicya yayau vanaṃ ।śālagrāme tapastaptvā yayau viṣṇorlayaṃ nṛpaḥ ।।yāni kumpuruṣādyāni hy aṣṭavarṣāṇi sattama ।teṣāṃ svābhāvikī siddhiḥ sukhaprāyā hy ayatnataḥ ।।jarāmṛtyubhayaṃ nāsti dharmādharmau yugādikaṃ ।nādhamaṃ madhyamantulyā himāddeśāttu nābhitaḥ ।।ṛṣabho merudevyāñca ṛṣabhād bharato abhavat ।ṛṣabho dattaśrīḥ putre śālagrāme hariṅgataḥ ।।bharatād bhārataṃ varṣaṃ bharatāt sumatistvabhūt ।bharato dattalakṣmīkaḥ śālagrāme hariṃ gataḥ ।।

sutebhya u iti kha, cha ca

ramyenīlācalāśriyamiti kha, ṅa, jha ca । ramyaṃ nīlācale sthitamiti gha

himāddeśāntanābhita iti cha

sumatistata iti ga
