sa yogī yogaprastāve vakṣye taccaritaṃ punaḥ ।sumatestejasastasmādindradyumno vyajāyata ।।parameṣṭhī tatastasmāt pratīhārastadanvayaḥ ।pratīhārāt pratīhartā pratiharturbhuvastataḥ ।।udgītotha ca prastāro vibhuḥ prastārataḥ sutaḥ ।pṛthuś caiva tato nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ sutaḥ ।।naro gayasya tanayaḥ tatputro abhūdvirāṭ tataḥ ।tasya putro mahāvīryo dhīmāṃstasmādajāyata ।।mahāntastatsutaścābhūnmanasyastasya cātmajaḥ ।tvaṣṭā tvaṣṭuś ca virajā rajastasyāpyabhūt sutaḥ ।।satyajidrajasastasya jajñe putraśataṃ mune ।viśvajyotiḥpradhānāste bhāratantair vivardhitaṃ ।।kṛtatretādisargeṇa sargaḥ svāyambhuvaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe svāyambhuvaḥ sargo nāma saptādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

bhuvanakoṣaḥ

agnir uvāca
jambūplakṣāhvayau dvīpau śālmaliścāparo mahān ।kuśaḥ krauñcas tathā śākaḥ puṣkaraśceti saptamaḥ ।।

yogaprastāre iti ga, ja, jha ca

indradyumnobhyajāyateti kha, cha ca

pratīhārādityādiḥ, prastārataḥ suta ity antaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

duṣṭāduṣṭaś ca virajā iti kha
ete dvīpāḥ samudraistu sapta saptabhirāvṛtāḥ ।lavaṇekṣusurāsarpirdadhidugdhajalaiḥ samaṃ ।।jambūdvīpo dvīpamadhye tanmadhye merurucchritaḥ ।caturaśītisāhasro bhūyiṣṭhaḥ ṣoḍaśādvirāṭ ।।dvātriṃśanmūrdhni vistarāt ṣoḍaśādhaḥ sahasravān ।bhūyastasyāsya śailo asau karṇikākārasaṃsthitaḥ ।।himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhaścāsya dakṣiṇe ।nīlaḥ śvetaś ca śṛṅgo ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ ।।lakṣapramāṇau dvau madhye daśahīnās tathāpare ।sahasradvitayochrāyāstāvadvistāriṇaś ca te ।।bhārataṃ prathamaṃ varṣantataḥ kimpuruṣaṃ smṛtaṃ ।harivarsantathaivānyanmerordakṣiṇato dvija ।।ramyakaṃ cottare varṣaṃ tathaivānyaddhiraṇmayaṃ ।uttarāḥ kuravaś caiva yathā vai bhārataṃ tathā ।।navasāhasramekaikameteṣāṃ munisattama ।ilāvṛtañca tanmadhye sauvarṇā meruruchritaḥ ।।meroś caturdiśantatra navasāhasravistṛtaṃ ।

dadhidugdhajalāntakā iti kha, cha ca

jambūdvīpastasya madhye iti ja

merurutthita iti jha

bhūmiṣṭha iti gha, ja ca । bhuvistha iti ṅa

ṣoḍaśāṃśa iti jha

bhūpādmasyāsya iti kha, ga, cha ca

tathaivātra hiraṇmayamiti ga । tathaivātha hiraṇmayamiti ja

ilāvṛtaścetyādiḥ, navasāhasravistṛtamityantaḥ pāṭho cha pustake nāsti
ilāvṛtaṃ mahābhāga catvāraścātra parvatāḥ ।।viṣkambhā racitā meroryojanāyutavistṛtāḥ ।pūrveṇa mandaro nāma dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ ।।vipulaḥ paścime pārśve supārśvaścottare smṛtaḥ ।kadambasteṣu jambuś ca pippalo baṭa eva ca ।।ekādaśaśatāyāmāḥ pādapā giriketavaḥ ।jambūdvīpeti sañjñā syāt phalaṃ jambā gajopamaṃ ।।jambūnadīrasenāsyāstvidaṃ jāmbūnadaṃ paraṃ ।supārśvaḥ pūrvato meroḥ ketumālastu paścime ।।vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ pūrve dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ ।vaibhrājaṃ paścime saumye nandanañca sarāṃsyatha ।।aruṇodaṃ mahābhadraṃ saṃśitodaṃ samānasaṃ ।śitābhaś cakramuñjādyāḥ pūrvataḥ keśarācalāḥ ।।dakṣiṇendrestrikūṭādyāḥ śiśivāsamukhā jale ।śaṅkhakūṭādayaḥ saumye merau ca brahmaṇaḥ purī ।।caturdaśasahasrāṇi yojanānāñca dikṣu ca ।indrādilokapālānāṃ samantāt brahmaṇaḥ puraḥ ।।viṣṇupādāt plāvayitvā candraṃ svargāt patantyapi ।pūrveṇa śītā bhadrāśvācchailācchailādgatārṇavaṃ ।।tathaivālakanandāpi dakṣiṇenaiva bhārataṃ ।

yojanāyutamucchritā iti gha

supārśvaścottare sthita iti gha

rasanāsmāddhemajāmbunadamiti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha ca

asitodamiti ja

pūrvataḥ śiśirācalā iti kha, ga, gha, ja ca

śaśivāmamukhā jale iti kha, gha, ṅa, cha ca

dakṣiṇena ca bhāratamiti kha । dakṣiṇenaiti bhāratamiti ga
prayāti sāgaraṃ kṛtvā saptabhedātha paścimaṃ ।।abdhiñca cakṣuḥsaumyābdhiṃ bhadrottarakurūnapi ।ānīlaniṣadhāyāmau mālyavadgandhamādanau ।।tayormadhyagato meruḥ karṇikākārasaṃsthitaḥ ।bhāratāḥ ketumālāś ca bhadrāśvāḥ kuravas tathā ।।patrāṇi lokapadmasya maryādāśailavāhyataḥ ।jaṭharo devakūṭaś ca maryādāparvatāvubhau ।।tau dakṣiṇottarāyāmāvānīlaniṣadhāyatau ।gandhamādanakailāsau pūrvavacāyatāvubhau ।।aśītiyojanāyāmāvarṇavāntarvyavasthitau ।niṣadhaḥ pāripātraś ca maryādāparvatāvubhau ।।meroḥ paścimadigbhāge yathā pūrve tathā sthitau ।triśṛṅgo rudhiraś caiva uttarau varṣaparvatau ।।pūrvapañcāyatāvetāvarṇavāntarvyavasthitau ।jāṭharādyāś ca maryādāśailā meroś caturdiśaṃ ।।keśarādiṣu yā droṇyastāsu santi purāṇi hi ।lakṣmīviṣṇvagnisūryādidevānāṃ munisattama ।।bhaumānāṃ svargadharmāṇāṃ na pāpāstatra yānti ca ।

bhadrodbhavakurūnapi iti kha

alīnaniṣadhāyāmā iti kha, cha ca

ramyakamityādiḥ, maryādāparvatāvubhāvityanntaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

pūrvapaścāyatāvubhau iti gha, ṅa, ja ca
bhumāḥ svargā dharmiṇānte na pāpāstatra yānti ca iti cha, ṅa ca ।maumānāṃ svargadharmāṇāṃ tanayā hy atra yānti ceti ga, gha ca ।
bhogināṃ svargadharmāṇāṃ tanayāstatra yānti ceti ja
bhadrāśve asti hayagrīvo varāhaḥ ketumālake ।।bhārate kūrmarūpī ca matsyarūpaḥ kuruṣvapi ।viśvarūpeṇa sarvatra pūjyate bhagavān hariḥ ।।kimpuruṣādyaṣṭasu kṣudbhītiśokādikaṃ na ca ।catturviṃśatisāhasraṃ prajā jīvantyanāmayāḥ ।।kṛtādikalpanā nāsti bhaumānyambhāṃsi nāmbudāḥ ।sarveṣveteṣu varṣeṣu sapta sapta kulācalāḥ ।।nadyaś ca śataśastebhyastīrthabhūtāḥ prajajñire ।bhārate yāni nīrthāni tāni tīrthāni vacmi te ।।
chapter 

ś atha navādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tīrthamāhātmyaṃ

agnir uvāca
māhātmyaṃ sarvatīrthānāṃ vakṣye yadbhaktimuktidaṃ ।yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaś caiva susaṃyataṃ ।।vidyā tapaś ca kīrtiś ca sa tīrthaphalamaśnute ।

svasaṃyatamiti gha
pratigrāhādupāvṛtto laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ ।।niṣpapastīrthayātrī tu sarvayajñaphalaṃ labhet ।anupoṣya trirātrīṇi tīrthānyanabhigamya ca ।।adatvā kāñcanaṃ gāś ca daridro nāma jāyate ।tīrthābhiogamane tat syādyadyajñenāpyate phalaṃ ।।puṣkaraṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ sānnidhyaṃ hi trisandhyakaṃ ।daśakoṭisahasrāṇi tīrthānāṃ vipra puṣkare ।।brahmā saha surair āste munayaḥ sarvamicchavaḥ ।devāḥ prāptāḥ siddhimatra snātāḥ pitṛsurārcakāḥ ।।aśvamedhaphalaṃ prāpya brahmalokaṃ prayānti te ।kārttikyāmannadānācca nirmalo brahmalokabhāk ।।puṣkare duṣkaraṃ gantuṃ puṣkare duṣkaraṃ tapaḥ ।duṣkaraṃ puṣkare dānaṃ vastuṃ caiva suduṣkaraṃ ।।tatra vāsājjapacchrāddhāt kulānāṃ śatamuddharet ।jambumārgaṃ ca tatraiva tīrthantaṇḍulikāśramaṃ ।।karṇāśramaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ narmadā cārvudaṃ paraṃ ।tīrthañcarmaṇvatī sindhuḥ somanāthaḥ prabhāsakaṃ ।।sarasvatyabdhisaṅgaś ca sāgarantīrthamuttamaṃ ।

tīrthādigamane iti gha

pitṛsurārcitā iti kha

aśvamedhaphalaścāsyeti kha, ga, cha ca । aśvamedhaphalaṃ cāpyeti gha

brahmalokakamiti kha, ga, ṅa, cha ca

duṣkaraṃ gantumiti kha

vastuṃ tatra suduṣkaramiti ja

kaṇvāśramamiti gha

sarasvatyabdhisañjñayeti ga, gha, ja ca
piṇḍārakaṃ dvārakā ca gomatī sarvasiddhidā ।।bhūmitīrthaṃ brahmatuṅgaṃ tīrthaṃ pañcanadaṃ paraṃ ।bhīmatīrthaṃ girīndrañca devikā pāpanāśinī ।।tīrthaṃ vinaśanaṃ puṇyaṃ nāgodbhedamaghārdanaṃ ।tīrthaṃ kumārakoṭiś ca sarvadānīritāni ca ।।kurukṣetraṃ gamiṣyāmi kurukṣetre vasāmyahaṃ ।ya evaṃ satataṃ brūyātso amalaḥ prāpnuyāddivaṃ ।।tatra viṣṇvādayo devāstatra vāsāddhariṃ vrajet ।sarasvatyāṃ sannihityāṃ snānakṛdbrahmalokabhāk ।।pāṃśavopi kurukṣetre nayanti paramāṃ gatiṃ ।dharmatīrthaṃ suvarṇākhyaṃ gaṅgādvāramanuttamaṃ ।।tīrthaṃ kaṇakhalaṃ puṇyaṃ bhadrakarṇahradantathā ।gaṅgāsasvatīsaṅgaṃ brahmāvartamaghārdanaṃ ।।bhṛgutuṅgañca kubjāmraṃ gaṅgodbhedamaghāntakaṃ ।vārāṇasī varantīrthamavimuktamanuttamaṃ ।।kapālamocanaṃ tīrthantīrtharājaṃ prayāgakaṃ ।gomatīgaṅgayoḥ saṅgaṃ gaṅgā sarvatra nākadā ।।tīrthaṃ rājagṛhaṃ puṇyaṃ śālagrāmamaghāntakaṃ ।

ṛṣitīrthaṃ brahmatuṅgamiti gha । bhūmitīrthaṃ brahmasañjñamiti cha

bhīmātīrthamiti gha

vāmāddivaṃ brajediti ja

brahmalokaga iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca

tatra karṇahradaṃ tatheti kha । bhadrakaṃ tu hradaṃ tatheti ga, ṅa ca

gaṅgodbhedamavantikamiti ja
vaṭeśaṃ vāmanntīrthaṃ kālikāsaṅgamuttamaṃ ।।lauhityaṃ karatoyākhyaṃ śoṇañcātharṣabhaṃ paraṃ ।śrīparvataṃ kolvagiriṃ sahyādrirmalayo giriḥ ।।godāvarī tuṅgabhadrā kāvero varadā nadī ।tāpī payoṣṇī revā ca daṇḍakāraṇyamuttamaṃ ।।kālañjaraṃ muñjavaṭantīrthaṃ sūrpārakaṃ paraṃ ।mandākinī citrakūṭaṃ śṛṅgaverapuraṃ paraṃ ।।avantī paramaṃ tīrthamayodhyā pāpanāśanī ।naimiṣaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe tīrthayātrā māhātmyaṃ nāma navādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha daśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gaṅāmāhātmyaṃ

agnir uvāca
gaṅāmāhātmyamākhyāsye sevyā sā bhuktimuktidā ।yeṣāṃ madhye yāti gaṅgā te deśā pāvanā varāḥ ।।

tīrthaṃ kaṇakhalamityādiḥ, kālikāsaṅgamuttamamityantaḥ pāṭho cha pustake nāsti

śrīparvataṃ kondragiririti cha । śrīparvataṃ kolagirimiti ja

śṛṅgaverapuaraṃ varamiti gha

agnir uvāca । māhātmyaṃ sarvatīrthānāmityādiḥ, naimiṣaṃ paramantīrthaṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakaṃ । ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe tīrthayātrāmāhātmyamityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

gatirgaṅgā tu bhūtānāṃ gatimanveṣatāṃ ap।

sadā
gaṅgā tārayate cobhau vaṃśau nityaṃ hi sevitā ।।cāndrāyaṇasahasrācca gaṅgāmbhaḥpānamuttamaṃ ।gaṅāṃ māsantu saṃsevya sarvayajñaphalaṃ labhet ।।sakalāghaharī devī svargalokapradāyinī ।yāvadasthi ca gaṅgāyāṃ tāvat svarge sa tiṣṭhati ।।andhādayastu tāṃ sevya devair gacchanti tulyatāṃ ।gaṅgātīrthasamudbhūtamṛddhārī so aghahārkavat ।।darśanāt sparśanāt pānāttathā gaṅgetikīrtanāt ।punāti puṇyapuruṣān śataśītha sahasraśaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gaṅgāmāhātmyaṃ nāma daśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ekādaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

prayāgamāhātmyaṃ

agnir uvāca
vakṣye prayāgamāhātmyaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ paraṃ ।prayāge brahmaviṣṇvādyā deva munivarāḥ sthitāḥ ।।

gatirgaṅgā hīti ga, ja ca

gatirgatimatāmiti jha

gaṅgā pāvayate iti jha

patitādayastu iti jha

gacchanti sāmyatāmiti gha, jha ca
gaṅgātīrasamudbhūtamṛddhāro so aghahārkavaditi kha, ga, jha ca ।
gaṅgātīrasamudbhūtamṛdaṃ mūrdhā vibharti yaḥ । vibharti rūpaṃ sorkasya tamonāśāya kevalamiti ṅa

bhaktimuktiphalapradamiti ga । bhuktimuktipradāyakamiti jha
saritaḥ sāgarāḥ siddhā gandharvasarāpsas tathā ।tatra trīṇyagnikuṇḍāni teṣāṃ madhye tu jāhnavī ।।vegena samatikrāntā sarvatīrthatiraskṛtā ।tapanasya sutā tatra triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā ।।gaṅgāyamunayormadhyaṃ pṛthivyā jaghanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।prayāgaṃ jaghanasyāntarupasthamṛṣayo viduḥ ।।prayāgaṃ sapratiṣṭhānam kambalāśvatarāvubhau ।tīrthaṃ bhogavatī caiva vedī proktā prajāpateḥ ।।tatra vedāś ca yajñāś ca mūrtimantaḥ prayāgake ।stavanādasya tīrthasya nāmasaṅkirtanādapi ।।mṛttikālambhanādvāpi sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।prayāge saṅgate dānaṃ śrāddhaṃ japyādi cākṣayaṃ ।।na devavacanādvipra na lokavacanādapi ।matirutkramaṇīyānte prayāge maraṇaṃ prati ।।daśatīrthasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭikoṭyas tathāparāḥ ।teṣāṃ sānnidhyamatraiva prayāgaṃ paramantataḥ ।।vāsukerbhogavatyatra haṃsaprapatanaṃ paraṃ ।gavāṃ koṭipradānādyat tryahaṃ snānasya tatphalaṃ ।।prayāge māghamāse tu evamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ ।

gaṅāyamunayormadhye iti kha

saritaḥ sāgarā ity ādiḥ, upasthamṛṣayo vidurityantaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti

śravaṇādasyeti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ja ca

śrāddhadravyādi cākṣayamiti gha

tryahaṃ snātasyeti gha
sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgā triṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā ।।gaṅādvāre prayāge ca gaṅgāsāgarasaṅgame ।atra dānāddivaṃ yāti rājendro jāyate atra ca ।।vaṭamūle saṅgamādau mṛto viṣṇupurīṃ vrajet ।urvaśīpulinaṃ ramyaṃ tīrthaṃ sandhyāvatas tathā ।।koṭītīrthañcāśvamedhaṃ gaṅgāyamunamuttamaṃ ।mānasaṃ rajasā hīnaṃ tīrthaṃ vāsarakaṃ paraṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe prayāgamāhātmyaṃ nāma ekādaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvādaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vārāṇasīmāhātmyam

agnir uvāca
vārāṇasī paraṃ tīrthaṃ gauryai prāha maheśvaraḥ ।bhuktimuktipradaṃ puṇyaṃ vasatāṃ gṛṇatāṃ hariṃ ।।
rudra uvāca
gaurīkṣetraṃ na muktaṃ vai avimuktaṃ tataḥ smṛtaṃ ।
annadānāddivamiti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca

tīrthaṃ vānarakaṃ paramiti kha, ga, gha, ṅa ca

vārāṇasīmiti kha, gha ca

vasatāṃ śṛṇutāṃ harimiti ga, gha, ṅa ca
japtaṃ taptaṃ dattamamavimukte vilākṣayaṃ ।।aśmanā caraṇau hatvā vasetkāśīnna hi tyajet ।hariś candraṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ guhyamāmnātakeśvaraṃ ।।japyeśvaraṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ guhyaṃ śrīparvataṃ tathā ।mahālayaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ bhṛguś caṇḍeśvaraṃ tathā ।।kedāraṃ paramaṃ guhyamaṣṭau santyavimuktake ।guhyānāṃ paramaṃ guhyamavimuktaṃ paraṃ mama ।।dviyojanantu pūrvaṃ syād yojanārdhaṃ tadanyathā ।varaṇā ca nadī cāsīt tayormadhye vārāṇasī ।।atra snānaṃ japo homo maraṇaṃ devapūjanaṃ ।śrāddhaṃ dānaṃ nivāsaś ca yadyat syādbhuktimuktidaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vārāṇasīmāhātmyaṃ nāma dvādaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

kāśīṃ tu na hi santyajediti ja

paraṃ guhyamavimuktaṃ paraṃ mameti ja

jayeśvaraṃ paraṃ guhyamiti kha

mahābalamiti ka

bhūmicaṇḍeśvaramiti ga

tathānyatheti jha

dvayormadhye iti kha

yadvat syādbhuktimuktidamiti ṅa

chapter 

ś atha trayodaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

narmadādimāhātmyam

agnir uvāca
narmadādikamāhātmyaṃ vakṣyehaṃ narmadāṃ parāṃ ।sadyaḥ punāti gāṅgeyaṃ darśanādvāri nārmadaṃ ।।vistarādyojanaśataṃ yojanadvayamāyatā ।ṣaṣṭistīrthasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭikoṭyas tathāparāḥ ।।parvatasya samantāttu tiṣṭhantyamarakaṇṭake ।kāverīsaṅgamaṃ puṇyaṃ śrīparvatamataḥ śṛṇu ।।gaurī śrīrūpiṇī tepe tapastāmabravīddhariḥ ।avāpsyasi tvamadhyātmyaṃ nāmnā śrīparvatastava ।।samantādyojanaśataṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati ।atra dānantapo japyaṃ śrāddhaṃ sarvamathākṣayaṃ ।।

narmadāparamiti jha

niryāntyamarakaṇṭake iti jha

tapastāmabravīddhara iti ga

atra dānaṃ tathā japyamiti jha

sarvamathākṣaramiti kha, cha ca
maraṇaṃ śivalokāya sarvadaṃ tīrthamuttamaṃ ।haro atra krīḍate devyā hiraṇyakaśipus tathā ।।
tapastaptvā balī cābhūnmunayaḥ siddhimāpnuvan ।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe narmadāśrīparvatādimāhātmyaṃ nāma trayodaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha caturdaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gayāmāhātmyam

agnir uvāca
gayāmāhātmyamākhyāsye gayātīrthottamottamaṃ ।gayāsurastapastepe tattapastāpibhiḥ suraiḥ ।।uktaḥ kṣīrābdhigo viṣṇuḥ pālayāsmān gayāsurāt ।tathetyuktvā harirdaityaṃ varaṃ brūhīti cābravīt ।।daityo abravītpavitro ahaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvatīrthataḥ ।tathetyuktvā gato viṣṇurdaityaṃ dṛṣṭvā na vā hariṃ ।।gatāḥ śūnyā mahī svarge devā brahmādayaḥ surāḥ ।

siddhimāpnuyuriti jha

tattapastāpitair iti ga, gha, jha ca

brahmādayaḥ punaḥ iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja jha ca
gatā ūcurhariṃ devāḥ śūnyā bhūstridivaṃ hare ।।daityasya darśanādeva brahmaṇañcābravīddhariḥ ।yāgārthaṃ daityadehaṃ tvaṃ prārthaya tridaśaiḥ saha ।।tac chrutvā sasuro brahmā gayāsuramathābravīt ।atithiḥ prārthayāmi tvāndehaṃ yāgāya pāvanaṃ ।।gayāsurastathetyuktvāpatattasya śirasyatha ।yāgaṃ cakāra calite dehi pūrṇāhutiṃ vibhuḥ ।।punarbrahmābravīdviṣṇuṃ pūrṇakāle asuro acalat ।śiṣṇurdharmamathāhūya prāha devamayīṃ śilām ।।dhārayadhvaṃ surāḥ sarve yasyāmupari santu te ।gadādharo madīyātha mūrtiḥ sthāsyati sāmaraiḥ ।।dharmaḥ śilāṃ devamayīṃ tac chrutvādhārayat parāṃ ।yā dharmāddharmavatyāñca jātā dharmavratā sutā ।।marīcirbrahmaṇaḥ putrastāmuvāha taponvitāṃ ।yathā hariḥ śriyā reme gauryā śambhus tathā tayā ।।kuśapuṣpādyaraṇyācca ānīyātiśramānvitaḥ ।bhuktvā dharmavratāṃ prāha pādasaṃvāhanaṃ kuru ।।viśrāntasya muneḥ pādau tathetyuktvā priyākarot ।etasminnantare brahmā munau supte tathāgataḥ ।।dharmavratācintayañca kiṃ brahmāṇaṃ samarcaye ।pādasaṃvāhanaṃ kurve brahmā pūjyo gurorguruḥ ।।

tac chrutvā satvaro brahmeti ṅa

śirastatheti jha

dehe pūrṇāhutimiti kha, cha, ja ca

dehamayīmiti ga, cha, ja ca

tapaścitāmiti jha

samānīya śramānvita iti ja

supte samāgata iti gha, ṅa, ja, jha ca

dharmavratetyādiḥ, gurorgururityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti
vicintya pūjayāmāsa brahmāṇaṃ cārhaṇādibhiḥ ।marīcistāmapaśyat sa śaśāpoktivyatikramāt ।।śilā bhaviṣyasi krodhāddharmavratābravīcca taṃ ।pādābhyaṅgaṃ parityajya tvadguruḥ pūjito mayā ।।adoṣāhaṃ yatastvaṃ hi śāpaṃ prāpsyasi śaṅkarāt ।dharmavratā pṛthak śāpaṃ dhārayitvāgrimadhyagāt ।।tapaś cacāra varṣāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyayutāni ca ।tato viṣṇvādayo devā varaṃ brūhīti cābruvan ।।dharmavratābravīddevān śāpannirvartayantu me ।
devā ūcuḥ
datto marīcinā śāpo bhaviṣyati na cānyathā ।।śilā pavitrā devāṅghrilakṣitā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi ।devavratā devaśilā sarvadevādirūpiṇī ।।sarvadevamayī puṇyā niś calāyārasusya hi ।
devavratovāca
yadi tuṣṭāstha me sarve mayi tiṣṭhantu sarvadā ।।brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudrādyā gaurīlakṣmīmukhāḥ surāḥ ।
agnir uvāca
devavratāvacaḥ śrutvā tathetyuktvā divaṅgatāḥ ।।sā dharmaṇāsurasyāsya dhṛtā devamayī śilā ।saśilaś calito daityaḥ sthitā rudrādayastataḥ ।।sadevaś calito daityastato devaiḥ prasāditaḥ ।kṣīrābdhigo hariḥ prādāt svamūrtiṃ śrīgadādharaṃ ।।gacchantu bhoḥ svayaṃ yāsyaṃ mūrtyā vai devagamyayā ।

marīcistāmapaśyadvai iti gha

dharmavratābravīdvaca iti ja

pavitrā devānāṃ vanditā tvamiti gha

sarvatīrthamayī iti gha, jha ca

tadā devair iti ja

gacchetyuktvā svayaṃ gacchediti jha । gacchantūktvā svayaṃ yāsye iti kha, cha ca

mūrtyā devaikagamyayā iti gha, ṅa ca
sthito gadādharo devo vyaktāvyaktobhayātmakaḥ ।।niś calārthaṃ svayaṃ devaḥ sthita ādigadādharaḥ ।gado nāmāsuro daityaḥ sa hato viṣṇunā purā ।।tadasthinirmitā cādyā gadā yā viśvakarmaṇā ।ādyayā gadayā hetipramukhā rākṣasā hatāḥ ।।gadādhareṇa vidhivat tasmādādigadhādharaḥ ।devamayyāṃ śilāyāṃ ca sthite cādigadādhare ।।gayāsure niś caleya brahmā pūrṇāhutiṃ dadau ।gayāsuro abravīddevān kimarthaṃ vañcito hy ahaṃ ।।viṣṇorvacanamātreṇa kinnasyānniś calohyahaṃ ।ākrānto yadyahaṃ devā dātumarhata me varaṃ ।।
devā ūcuḥ
tīrthasya karaṇe yat tvamasmābhir niś calīkṛtaḥ ।viṣṇoḥ śambhorbrahmaṇaś ca kṣetraṃ tava bhaviṣyati ।।prasiddhaṃ sarvatīrthebhyaḥ pitrāderbrahmalokadaṃ ।ityuktvā te sthitā devā devyastīrthādayaḥ sthitāḥ ।।yāgaṃ kṛtvā dadau brahmā ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇāṃ tadā ।pañcakrośaṃ gayākṣetraṃ pañcāśat pañca cārpayet ।।grāmān svarṇagirīn kṛtvā nadīrdugdhamadhuśravāḥ ।sarovarāṇi dadhyājyair bahūnannādiparvatān ।।

nāmāsuro raudra iti gha, jha ca

tadaṅgānnirmitā iti jha । tadarthā nirmitā iti cha

gadāvareṇa deveneti jha

gado nāmāsura ity ādiḥ, tasmādādigadādhara ity antaḥ pāṭho ja pustake nāsti

śilāyāntu iti ja

vāñchito hy ahamiti kha, cha ca

dātumarhatheti ṅa

tīrthasya kāraṇāyeti gha, jha ca

grāmān puṇyagirīniti ṅa

dadhyādyair bahūnannādiparvatāniti ja
kāmadhenuṃ kalpataruṃ svarṇarūpyagṛhāṇi ca ।na yācayantu viprendrā alpānuktvā dadau prabhuḥ ।।dharmayāge pralobhāttu pratigṛhya dhanādikaṃ ।sthitā yadā gayāyānte śaptāte brahmaṇā tadā ।।vidyāvivarjitā yūyaṃ tṛṣṇāyuktā bhaviṣyatha ।dugdhādivarjitā nadyaḥ śailāḥ pāṣāṇarūpiṇaḥ ।।brahmāṇaṃ brāhmaṇaścocur naṣṭaṃ śāpena śākhilaṃ ।jīvanāya prasādannaḥ kuru viprāṃś ca so abravīt ।।tīrthopajīvikā yūyaṃ sacandrārkaṃ bhaviṣyatha ।ye yuṣmān pūjayiṣyanti gayāyāmāgatā narāḥ ।।havyakavyair dhanaiḥ śraddhaisteṣāṃ kulaśataṃ vrajet ।narakāt svargalokāya svargalokāt parāṅgatiṃ ।।gayopi cākarodyāgaṃ bahvannaṃ bahudakṣiṇaṃ ।gayā purī tena nāmnā pāṇḍavā ījire hariṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma caturdaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

anyānatheti jha । kṣapānuktvā iti cha gandhādivarjitā iti gha

tīrthopajīvakā yūyamācandrārkamiti kha, ga, gha, ṅa ca

kulaśataṃ mahaditi ja

svargalokaṃ ceti gha, ja, jha ca vahnathemiti kha, cha ca । bahulamiti jha

agnipurāṇam

maharṣiśrīmadvedavyāsena praṇītam

śrīlaśrī vaṅgadeśīyāsiyātik-samājānujñayā

śrīrājendralālamitreṇa pariśodhitam

kalikātārājadhānyāṃ gaṇeśayantre mudritañca saṃvat 

athāgnipurāṇasya dvitīyakhaṇḍasyānukramaṇikā

agnipurāṇaṃ

chapter 

ś atha pañcadaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gayāyātrāvidhiḥ

agnir uvāca
udyataścedgayāṃ yātuṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ ।vidhāya kārpaṭīveśaṃ grāmasyāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।kṛtvā pratidinaṅgacchet saṃyataścāpratigrahī ।gṛhāccalitamātrasya gayayā gamanaṃ prati ।।svargārohaṇasopānaṃ pitṝṇāntu pade pade ।brahmajñānena kiṃ kāryaṃ gogṛhe maraṇena kiṃ ।।kiṃ kurukṣetravāsena yadā putro gayāṃ vrajet ।gayāprāptaṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṇāmutsavo bhavet ।।padbhyāmapi jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā asmabhyaṃ kinna dāsyati ।brahmajñānaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ gogṛhe maraṇaṃ tathā ।।vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktireṣā caturvidhā ।kāṅkṣanti pitaraḥ putraṃ narakādbhayabhīravaḥ ।।gayāṃ yāsyati yaḥ putraḥ sa nastrātā bhaviṣyati ।muṇḍanañcopavāsaś ca sarvatīrtheṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ ।।na kālādirgayātīrthe dadyāt piṇḍāṃś ca nityaśaḥ ।pakṣatrayanivāsī ca punātyāsaptatamaṃ kulaṃ ।।

gantumiti kha, ga, gha, cha, ja ca

yadi iti gha, ga, jha ca
aṣṭakāsu ca vṛddhauca gayāyāṃ mṛtavāsare ।atra mātuḥ pṛthak śrāddhamanyatra patinā saha ।।pitrādinavadaityaṃ tathā dvādaśadaivataṃ ।prathame divase snāyāttīrthe hy uttaramānase ।।uttare mānase puṇye āyurārogyavṛddhaye ।sarvāghaughavidhānāya snānaṃ kuryād vimuktaye ।।santarpya devapitrādīn śrāddhakṛt piṇḍado bhavet ।divyāntarīkṣabhaumasthān devān santarpayāmyahaṃ ।।divyāntarīkṣabhaumādi pitṛmātrādi tarpayet ।pitā pitāmahaś caiva tathaiva prapitāmahaḥ ।।mātā pitāmahī caiva tathaiva prapitāmahī ।mātāmahaḥ pramātāmaho vṛddhapramātāmahaḥ ।।tebhyonyebhya imān piṇḍānuddhārāya dadāmyahaṃ ।oṃ namaḥ sūryadevāya somabhaumajñarūpiṇe ।।jīvaśukraśanaiścārirāhuketusvarūpiṇe ।uttare mānase snātā uddharetsakalaṃ kulaṃ ।।sūryaṃ natvā vrajenmaunī naro dakṣiṇamānasaṃ ।

anvaṣṭakāsu vṛddhau ceti gha, ṅa ca

sarvāghaughavināśāyeti kha, gha, cha ca

snānaṃ sarvavimuktaye iti cha

divyāntarīkṣagān bhaumāniti ga

mātā mātāmahī caiveti ka, kha, ga, cha, ja ca

vṛddhapramātṛkāmaha iti ka, ga, cha, ja ca

tebhyastebhya iti gha, ja ca

somabhaumasvarūpiṇe iti gha

snātveti ka

sūryaṃ dṛṣṭvā iti ṅa

tato dakṣiṇamānasamiti ga, gha, ja, jha ca
dakṣiṇe mānase snānaṃ karomi pitṛtṛptaye ।।gayāyāmāgataḥ svargaṃ yāntu me pitaro akhilāḥ ।śrāddhaṃ piṇḍantataḥ kṛtvā sūryaṃ natvā vadedidaṃ ।।oṃ namo bhānave bhartre bhavāya bhava me vibho ।bhuktimuktipradaḥ sarvapitṝṇāṃ bhavabhāvitaḥ ।।kavyavālānalaḥ somo yamaś caivāryamā tathā ।agniṣvāttā varhiṣada ājyapāḥ pitṛdevatāḥ ।।āgacchantu mahābhāgā yuṣmābhī rakṣitāstviha ।madīyāḥ pitaro ye ca mātṛmātāmahādayaḥ ।।teṣāṃ piṇḍapradātāhamāgato asmi gayāmimāṃ ।udīcyāṃ muṇḍapṛṣṭhasya devarṣigaṇapūjitaṃ ।।nāmnā kanakhalaṃ tīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaṃ ।siddhānāṃ prītijananaiḥ pāpānāñca bhayaṅkaraiḥ ।।lelihānair mahānāgai rakṣyate caiva nityaśaḥ ।tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti krīḍante bhuvi mānavāḥ ।।phalgutīrthaṃ tato gacchenmahānadyāṃ sthitaṃ paraṃ ।nāgājjanārdanāt kūpādvaṭāccottaramānasāt ।।etad gayāśiraḥ proktaṃ phalgutīrthaṃ taducyate ।muṇḍapṛṣṭhanāgādyāś ca sārāt sāramathāntaraṃ ।।

karomi pitṛdaivate iti ja

bhānave tasmai iti ṅa

devarṣigaṇasevitamiti gha, ja ca । devatāgaṇasevitamiti jha

tatra snātā divamiti ja

phalguṃ gayāśira iti kha, ṅa, cha ca
yasmin phalati śrīrgaurvā kāmadhenurjalaṃ mahī ।dṛṣṭiramyādikaṃ yasmāt phalgutīrthaṃ na phalguvat ।।phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharaṃ ।etena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ nṛṇāṃ sukṛṭakāriṇāṃ ।।pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni āsamudrātsarāṃsi ca ।phalgutīrthaṃ gamiṣyanti vāramekaṃ dine dine ।।phalgutīrthe tīrtharāje karoti snānamādṛtaḥ ।pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokāptyai ātmano bhuktimuktaye ।।snātvā śrāddhī piṇḍado atha nameddevaṃ pitāmahaṃ ।kalau māheśvarā lokā atra devī gadādharaḥ ।।pitāmaho liṅgarūpī tannamāmi maheśvaraṃ ।gadādharaṃ balaṃ kāmamaniruddhaṃ narāyaṇaṃ ।।brahmaviṣṇunṛsiṃhākhyaṃ varāhādiṃ namāmyahaṃ ।tato gadādharaṃ dṛṣṭvā kulānāṃ śatamuddharet ।।dharmāraṇyaṃ dvitīye ahni mataṅgasyāśrame vare ।mataṅgavāpyāṃ saṃsnāya śrāddhakṛt piṇḍado bhavet ।।mataṅgeśaṃ suddheśaṃ natvā cedamudīrayet ।pramāṇaṃ devatāḥ santu lokapālāś ca sākṣiṇaḥ ।।mayāgatya mataṅge asmin pitṝṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā ।snānatarpaṇaśrāddhādirbrahmatīrthe atha kūpake ।।

ato deva iti kha, ga, gha, cha ca

nārāyaṇamiti kha, ga, ṅa ca

śrāddhadaḥ piṇḍada iti kha

mataṅgeśañca siddheśamiti ja

brahmatīrthetreti kha
tatkūrpayūpayormadhye śrāddhaṃ kulaśatoddhṛtau ।mahābodhaturuṃ natvā dharmavān svargalokabhāk ।।tṛtīye brahmasarasi snānaṃ kuryādyatavrataḥ ।snānaṃ brahmasarastīrthe karomi brahmabhūtaye ।।pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokāya brahmarṣigaṇasevite ।tarpaṇaṃ śrāddhakṛt piṇḍaṃ pradadyāttu prasecanaṃ ।kuryācca vājapeyārthī brahmayūpapradakṣiṇaṃ ।।eko muniḥ kumbhakuśāgrahasta āmrasya mūle salilandadāti ।āmnāya siktāḥ pitaraś ca tṛptā ekā kriyā dvyarthakarī prasiddhā ।।brahmāṇañca namaskṛtya kulānāṃ śatamuddharet ।phalgutīrthe caturthe ahni snātvā devāditarpaṇaṃ ।।kṛtvā śrāddhaṃ sapiṇḍañca gayāśirasi kārayet ।pañcakrośaṃ gayākṣetraṃ krośamekaṃ gayāśiraḥ ।।tatra piṇḍapradānena kulānāṃ śatamudharet ।muṇḍapṛṣṭhe padaṃ nnyāstaṃ mahādevena dhīmatā ।।muṇḍapṛṣṭhe śiraḥ sākṣād gayāśira udāhṛtaṃ ।

brahmasadasi iti kha, gha, ṅa, ja ca

mayāgatyetyādiḥ, snānaṃ kuryādyatavrata ity antaḥ pāṭhaścha pustake nāsti

brahmasadastīrthe iti gha । brahmaśirastīrthe iti kha
tarpaṇaśrāddhakṛt piṇḍapradaścāpi prasecanamiti kha, cha ca ।
tarpaṇaśrāddhakṛt piṇḍapradaścāmraprasecanamiti ga, gha, ṅa, ja ca
sākṣād gayāśirastatra phalgutīrthāśramaṃ kṛtaṃ ।।amṛtaṃ tatra vahati pitṝṇāndattamakṣayaṃ ।snātvā daśāśvamedhe tu dṛṣṭvā devaṃ pitāmahaṃ ।।rudrapādaṃ naraḥ spṛṣṭvā neha bhūyo abhijāyate ।śamīpatrapramāṇena piṇḍaṃ datvā gayāśire ।।narakasthā divaṃ yānti svargasthā mokṣamāpnuyuḥ ।pāyasenātha piṣṭena śaktunā caruṇā tathā ।।piṇḍadānaṃ taṇḍulaiś ca godhūmaistilamiśritaiḥ ।piṇḍaṃ datvā rudrapade kulānāṃ śatamuddharet ।।tathā viṣṇupade śrāddhapiṇḍado hy ṛṇamuktikṛt ।pitrādīnāṃ śatakulaṃ svātmānaṃ tārayennaraḥ ।।tathā brahmapade śrāddhī brahmalokaṃ nayetpitṝn ।dakṣiṇāgnipade tadvadgārhapatyapade tathā ।।pade vāhavanīyasya śrāddhī yajñaphalaṃ labhet ।āvasathyasya candrasya sūryasya ca gaṇasya ca ।।agastyakārttikeyasya śrāddhī tārayate kulaṃ ।ādityasya rathaṃ natvā karṇādityaṃ namīnnaraḥ ।।

phalgutīrthāśrayamiti ga, gha, ja, jha ca

piṇḍaṃ dadyādgayāśire iti ja

piṇḍadaḥ kulamuktikṛditi ga, ja ca । piṇḍado hy atimuktikṛditi gha

svātmaneti ja

brahmapade śrāddhamiti jha

varuṇasyātha cendrasyeti ṅa । āvasathyasya cendrasyeti cha । āvasathyasya sendrasyeti ja

rathaṃ dṛṣṭveti kha, cha ca
kanakeśapadaṃ natvā gayākedārakaṃ namet ।sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ pitṝn brahmapuraṃ nayet ।।viśālo api gayāśīrṣe piṇḍado abhūcca putravān ।viśālāyāṃ viśālo abhūdrājaputro abravīd dvijān ।।kathaṃ putrādayaḥ syurme dvijā ūcurviśālakaṃ ।gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati ।।viśālo api gayāśīrṣe pitṛpiṇḍāndadau tataḥ ।dṛṣṭvākāśe sitaṃ raktaṃ puruṣāṃstāṃś capṛṣṭavān ।।ke yuyanteṣu caivaikaḥ sitaḥ proce viśālakaṃ ।ahaṃ sitaste janaka indralokaṃ gataḥ śubhān ।।mama raktaḥ pitā putra kṛṣṇaś caiva pitāmahaḥ ।abravīt narakaṃ prāptā tvayā muktīkṛtā vayaṃ ।।piṇḍadānād brahmalokaṃ brajāma iti te gatāḥ ।viśālaḥ prāptaputādī rājyaṃ kṛtvā hariṃ yayau ।।pretarājaḥ svamuktyai ca vaṇijañcedamabravīt ।pretaiḥ sarvaiḥ sahārtaḥ san sukṛtaṃ bhujyate phalaṃ ।।śravaṇadvādaśīyoge kumbhaḥ sānnaś ca sodakaḥ ।dattaḥ purā sa madhyāhne jīvanāyopatiṣṭhate ।।dhanaṃ gṛhītvā me gaccha gayāyāṃ piṇḍado bhava ।vaṇigdhanaṃ gṛhītvā tu gayāyāṃ piṇḍado abhavat ।।

dadau gata iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca

sārthaś ca sodaka iti cha
pretarājaḥ saha pretair mukto nīto hareḥ puraṃ ।gayāśīrṣe piṇḍadānādātmānaṃ svapitṝṃs tathā ।।pitṛvaṃśe sutā ye ca mātṛvaṃśe tathaiva ca ।guruśvaśurabandhūnāṃ ye cānye bāndhavā mṛtāḥ ।।ye me kule luptapiṇḍāḥ putradāravivarjitāḥ ।kriyālopagatā ye ca jātyandhāḥ puṅgavas tathā ।।virūpā āmagarbhā ye jñātājñātāḥ kule mama ।teṣāṃ piṇḍo mayā datto hy akṣayyamupatiṣṭhatāṃ ।।ye kecit pretarūpeṇa tiṣṭhanti pitaro mama ।te sarve tṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā ।।piṇḍo deyastu sarvebhyaḥ sarvair vai kulatārakaiḥ ।ātmanastu tathā deyo hy akṣayaṃ lokamicchatā ।।pañcame ahni gadālole snāyānmantreṇa buddhimān ।gadāprakṣālane tīrthe gadālole atipāvane ।।snānaṃ karāmi saṃsāragadaśāntyai janārdana ।namo akṣayavaṭāyaiva akṣayasvargadāyine ।।pitrādīnāmakṣayāya sarvapāpakṣayāya ca ।śrāddhaṃ vaṭatale kuryād brāhmaṇānāñca bhojanaṃ ।।ekasmin bhojite vipre koṭirbhavati bhojitā ।kimpunarbahubhirbhuktaiḥ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayaṃ ।।

pretarājetyādiḥ, svapitṝṃstathetyantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

śubhakarmavivarjitā iti jha

piṇḍenāneneti ṅa

vaṭataṭe iti ja
gayāyāmannadātā yaḥ pitarastena putriṇaḥ ।vaṭaṃ vaṭeśvaraṃ natvā pūjayet prapitāmahaṃ ।।akṣayāṃllabhate lokān kulānāṃ śatamuddharet ।kramato akramato vāpi gayāyatrā mahāphalā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gayāmāhātmye gayayātrā nāma pañcadaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣoḍaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gayāyātrāvidhiḥ

agnir uvāca
gāyatryaiva mahānadyāṃ snātaḥ sandhyāṃ samācaret ।gāyatryā agrataḥ prātaḥ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍamathākṣayaṃ ।।madhyāhne codyati snātvā gītavādyair hyupāsya ca ।sāvitrīpurataḥ sandhyāṃ piṇḍadānañca tatpade ।।agastyasya pade kuryādyonidvāraṃ praviśya ca ।nirgato na punaryoniṃ praviśenmucyate bhavāt ।।

prāta iti ka

madhyāhne sarasīti ga

mucyate bhayāditi cha, jha ca
baliṃ kākaśilāyāñca kumārañca namettataḥ ।svargadvāryāṃ somakuṇḍe vāyutīrthe atha piṇḍadaḥ ।।bhavedākaśagaṅgāyāṃ kapilāyāñca piṇḍadaḥ ।kapileśaṃ śivaṃ natvā rukmikuṇḍe ca piṇḍadaḥ ।।koṭītīrthe ca koṭīśaṃ natvāmoghapade naraḥ ।gadālole vānarake gopracāre ca piṇḍadaḥ ।।natvā gāvaṃ vaitaraṇyāmekaviṃśakuloddhṛtiḥ ।śrāddhapiṇḍapradātā syāt krauñcapade ca piṇḍadaḥ ।।tṛtīyāyāṃ viśālāyāṃ niścirāyāñca piṇḍadaḥ ।ṛṇamokṣe pāpamokṣe bhasmakuṇḍe atha bhasmanā ।।snānakṛn mucyate pāpānnameddevaṃ janārdanam ।eṣa piṇḍo mayā dattastava haste janārdana ।।paralokagate mahyamakṣyayyamupatiṣṭhatāṃ ।gayāyāṃ pitṛrūpeṇa svayameva janārdanaḥ ।।taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ mucyate vai ṛṇatrayāt ।mārkaṇḍeyeśvaraṃ natvā namedgṛdhreśvaraṃ naraḥ ।।mūlakṣetre maheśasya dhārāyāṃ piṇḍado bhavet ।

namennara iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha ca

māsapade annada iti kha, gha ca

kapileśamityādiḥ, gopracāre ca piṇḍada ity antaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti

śrāddhe piṇḍapradateti kha

bhavedākāśagaṅgāyāmaityādiḥ, krauñcapāde ca piṇḍada ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti

namedbhūteśvaraṃ nara iti gha
gṛdhrakūṭe gṛdhravaṭe dhautapāde ca piṇḍadaḥ ।।puṣkariṇyāṃ kardamāle rāmatīrthe ca piṇḍadaḥ ।prabhāseśannamet pretaśilāyāṃ piṇḍado bhavet ।।divyāntarīkṣabhūmiṣṭhāḥ pitaro bāndhavādayaḥ ।pretādirūpā muktāḥ syuḥ piṇḍair dattair mayākhilāḥ ।।sthānatraye pretaśilā gayāśirasi pāvanī ।prabhāse pretakuṇḍe ca piṇḍadastārayet kulam ।।vasiṣṭheśannamaskṛtya tadagre piṇḍado bhavet ।gayānābhau suṣumṇāyāṃ mahākoṣṭyāñca piṇḍadaḥ ।।gadādharāgrato muṇḍapṛṣṭhe devyāś ca sannidhau ।muṇdapṛṣṭhaṃ namedādau kṣetrapālādisaṃyutam ।।pūjayitvā bhayaṃ na syādviṣarogādināśanam ।brahmāṇañca namaskṛtya brahmalokaṃ nayet kulam ।।subhadrāṃ balabhadrañca prapūjya puruṣottamam ।sarvakāmasamāyuktaḥ kulamuddhṛtya nākabhāk ।।hṛṣīkeśaṃ namaskṛtya tadagre piṇḍado bhavet ।mādhavaṃ pūjayitvā ca devo vaimāniko bhavet ।।mahālakṣmīṃ prārcya gaurīṃ maṅgalāñca sarasvatīm ।pitṝnuddhṛtya svargastho bhuktabhogo atra śāstradhīḥ ।।

sarvakāmasamāyuktaḥ kulamuddhṛtya lokabhāgiti pāṭhotra jha pustake adhiko asti

pretādirūpamuktā iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ja ca

kulamuddhṛtya lokabhāgiti ga, ja ca । vaśiṣṭheśamityādiḥ, kulamuddhṛtya nākabhāgityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

devair vaimānika iti cha
dvādaśādityamabhyarya vahniṃ revantamindrakam ।rogādimuktaḥ svargī syācchrīkapardivināyakam ।।prapūjya kārttikeyañca nirvighnaḥ siddhimāpnuyāt ।somanāthañca kāleśaṅkedāraṃ prapitāmaham ।।siddheśvarañca rudreśaṃ rāmeśaṃ brahmakeśvaram ।aṣṭaliṅgāni guhyāni pūjayitvā tu sarvabhāk ।।nārāyaṇaṃ varāhañca nārasiṃhaṃ namecchriye ।brahmaviṣṇumaheśākhyaṃ tripuraghnamaśeṣadam ।।sītāṃ rāmañca garuḍaṃ vāmanaṃ samprapūjya ca ।sarvakāmānavāpnoti brahmalokaṃ nayet pitṝn ।।devaiḥ sārdhaṃ samprapūjya devamādigadādharam ।ṛṇatrayavinirmuktastārayet sakalaṃ kulam ।।devarūpā śilā puṇyā tasmāddevamayī śilā ।gayāyāṃ nahi tat sthānaṃ yatra tīrthaṃ na vidyate ।।yannāmnā pātayet piṇḍaṃ tannayedbrahma śāśvatam ।phalgvīśaṃ phalgucaṇḍīṃ ca praṇamyāṅgārakeśvaram ।।mataṅgasya pade śrāddhī bharatāśramake bhavet ।haṃsatīrthe koṭitīrthe yatra pāṇḍuśilānnadaḥ ।।tatra syādagnidhārāyāṃ madhusravasi piṇḍadaḥ ।rudreśaṃ kilikileśaṃ namedvṛddhivināyakam ।।piṇḍado dhenukāraṇye pade dhenor namecca gām ।

pūjayitvātheti ka, gha, ṅa, ja ca

namedbuddhivināyakamiti kha, ga, cha ca । namedvṛddhavināyakamiti gha
sarvān pitṝṃstārayecca sarasvatyāñca piṇḍadaḥ ।।sandhyāmupāsya sāyāhne nameddevīṃ sarasvatīm ।trisandhyākṛdbhavedvipro vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ।।gayāṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya gayāviprān prapūjya ca ।annadānādikaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtantatrākṣayaṃ bhavet ।।stutvā samprārthayedevamādidevaṃ gadādharam ।gadādharaṃ gayāvāsaṃ pitrādīnāṃ gatipradam ।।dharmārthakāmamokṣārthaṃ yogadaṃ praṇamāmyaham ।dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitam ।।nityaśuddhaṃ buddhiyuktaṃ satyaṃ brahma namāmyaham ।ānandamadvayaṃ devaṃ devadānavavanditam ।।devadevīvṛndayuktaṃ sarvadā praṇamāmyaham ।kalikalmaṣakālārtidamanaṃ vanamālinam ।।pālitākhilalokeśaṃ kuloddharaṇamānasam ।vyaktāvyaktavibhaktātmāvibhaktātmānamātmani ।।sthitaṃ sthirataraṃ sāraṃ vande ghorāghamardanam ।āgato asmi gayāṃ deva pitṛkārye gadādharaḥ ।।tvaṃ me sākṣī bhavādyeha anṛṇo ahamṛṇatrayāt ।

nityaśuddhabuddhiyuktamiti gha, cha ca

kālārtināśanamiti gha । kālārtidalanamiti ga, ṅa, gha, ja ca

pālitākhiladeveśamiti gha

sthitataramiti ga, gha, ṅa ca

vandehamarimardanamiti ṅa । vande saṃsāramardanamiti ja
sākṣiṇaḥ santu me devā brahmeśānādayas tathā ।।mayā gayāṃ samāsādya pitṝṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā ।gayāmāhātmyapaṭhanācchrāddhādau brahmalokabhāk ।।pitṝṇāmakṣayaṃ śrāddhamakṣayaṃ brahmalokadam ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gayāmāhātmye gayāyātrā nāma ṣoḍaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptadaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śrāddhakalpaḥ

agnir uvāca
kātyāyanī munīnāha yathā śrāddhaṃ tathā vade ।gayādau śrāddhaṃ kurvīta saṅkrāntyādau viśeṣataḥ ।।kāle vāparapakṣe ca caturthyā ūrdhvameva va ।samyādya ca padarkṣe ca pūrvedyuś ca nimantrayet ।।yatīn gṛhasthasādhūn vā snātakāñchrotriyān dvijān ।anavadyān karmaniṣṭhān śiṣṭānācārasaṃyutān ।।

sampādya paramarkṣe ceti cha

ācārasaṃskṛtāniti ga, ja ca
varjayecchitrikuṣṭhyādīnna gṛhṇīyānnimantritān ।snātāñchucīṃs tathā dāntān prāṅmukhān devakarmaṇi ।।upaveśayettrīn pitryādīnekaikamubhayatra vā ।evaṃ mātāmahādeś ca śākair api ca kārayet ।।tadahni brahmacārī syādakopo atvarito mṛduḥ ।satyo apramatto anadhvanyo asvādhyāyaś ca vāgyataḥ ।।sarvāṃś ca paṅktimūrdhanyān pṛcchet praśne tathāsane ।darbhānāstīrya dviguṇān pitre devādikañcaret ।।viśvāndevānāvāhayiṣye pṛcchedāvāhayeti ca ।viśvedevāsa āvāhya vikīryātha yavān japet ।।viśve devāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ pitṝnāvāhayiṣye ca ।pṛcchedāvāhayetyukte uśantastvā samāhvayet ।।tilān vikīryātha japedāyāntvityādi pitrake ।sapitritre niṣiñcedvā śanno devīrabhi tṛcā ।।yavo asīti yavān datvā pitre sarvatra vai tilān ।tilo asi somadevatyo gosavo devanirmitaḥ ।
pratnamadbhiḥ pṛktaḥ svadhayā pitṝn lokān prīṇāhi naḥ svadhā । iti
śrīś ca teti dadetpuṣpaṃ pātre haime atha rājate ।।audumvare vā khaḍge vā parṇapātre pradakṣiṇam ।devānāmapasavyaṃ tu pitṝṇāṃ savyamācaret ।।

atvarito atyṛjuriti ṅa

satye prapanno anadhvanyo hy asvādhyāyaśceti kha, gha ca
ekaikasya ekaikena sapavitrakareṣu ca ।
yā divyā āpaḥ payasā sambabhūvuryā antarikṣā 
utapārthivīryāḥ
hiraṇyavarṇā yajñiyāstā na āpaḥ śivāḥ saṃśyonāḥ
suhavā bhavantu ।।

viśve devā eṣa vo arghaḥ svāhā ca pitareṣa te ।।avadhaivaṃ pitāmahadeḥ saṃsravāt prathame caret ।pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasīti nyubjaṃ pātraṃ karotyadhaḥ ।।atra gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpācchādanadānakaṃ ।ghṛtāktamannamuddhṛtya pṛcchatyagnau kariṣye ca ।।kuruṣvetyabhyanujñāto juhuyātsāgniko anale ।anagnikaḥ pitṛhaste sapavitre tu mantrataḥ ।।agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāheti prathamāhutiḥ ।somāya pitṛmate atha yamāyāṅgirase pare ।।hutaśeṣaṃ cānnapātre datvā pātraṃ samālabhet ।
pṛthivī te pātrandyauḥ pidhānaṃ brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtaṃ juhomi svāheti
japtvedaṃ viṣṇurityanne dvijāṅguṣṭhanniveśayet ।।apahateti ca tilān vikīryānnaṃ pradāyayet ।juṣadhvamiti coktvātha gāyatryādi tato japet ।।

ekaikasyetyādiḥ, prathame caredityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

anagniko jale caiveti ṅa svadheti ka
devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca mahāyogibhya eva ca ।namaḥ svadhāyai svāhayai nityameva namo namaḥ ।।tṛptān jñātvānnaṃ vikiredapo dadyāt sakṛt sakṛt ।gāyatrīṃ pūrvavajjaptvā madhu madhviti vai japet ।।tṛptāḥ stha iti sampṛcchettṛptāḥ sma iti vai vadet ।śeṣamannamanujñāpya sarvamannamathaikataḥ ।।uddhṛtyocchiṣṭapārśve tu kṛtvā caivāvanejanaṃ ।dadyātkuśeṣu trīn piṇḍānācānteṣu pare jaguḥ ।।ācānteṣūdakaṃ puṣpāṇyakṣatāni pradāpayet ।akṣayyodakamevātha āśiṣaḥ prārthayennaraḥ ।।aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotranno vardhatāṃ sadā ।dātāro no abhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca ।।śraddhā ca no māvyagamadbahudeyaṃ ca no astviti ।annañca no bahu bhavedatithīṃś ca labhemahi ।।yācitāraś ca naḥ santu mā ca yācisma kañcana ।svadhāvācanīyān kuśānāstīrya sapavitrakān ।।svadhāṃ vācayiṣye pṛcchedanujñātaś ca vācyatāṃ ।pitṛbhyaḥ pitāmahebhyaḥ prapitāmahamukhyake ।।svadhocyatāmastu svadhā ucyamānastathaiva ca ।apo niṣiñceduttānaṃ pātraṃ kṛtvātha dakṣiṇāṃ ।।

svāhāyai nityameva bhavantviti iti kha, cha ca

prārthayettata iti gha, ja, jha ca

aghorāḥ pitara ity ādiḥ, āstīrya sapavitrakānityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ kha, cha pustakadvaye nāsti
yathāśakti pradadyācca daive paitre atha vācayet ।viśve devāḥ prīyantāñca vāje visarjayet ।।āmāvājasyetyanuvrajya kṛtvā viprān pradakṣiṇaṃ ।gṛhe viśedamāvāsyāṃ māsi māsi carettathā ।।ekoddiṣṭaṃ pravakṣyāmi śrāddhaṃ pūrvavadācaret ।ekaṃ pavitramekārdhaṃ ekaṃ piṇḍampradāpayet ।।nāvāhanāgnaukaraṇaṃ viśve devā na cātra hi ।tṛptipraśne svaditamiti vadetsukhaditaṃ dvijaḥ ।।upatiṣṭhatāmityakṣayye visarge cābhiramyatāṃ ।abhiratāḥ sma ity apare śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret ।।sapiṇṭhīkaraṇaṃ vakṣye abdānte madhyato api vā ।pitṝṇāṃ trīṇi pātrāṇi ekampretasya pātrakaṃ ।।sapavitrāṇi catvāri tilapuṣpayutāni ca ।gandhodakena yuktāni pūrayitvābhiṣiñcati ।।pretapātraṃ pitṛpātre ye samanā iti dvayāt ।pūrvavat piṇḍadānādi pretānāṃ pitṛtā bhavet ।।athābhyudayikaṃ śrāddhaṃ vakṣye sarvaṃ tu pūrvavat ।japet pitṛmantravarjaṃ pūrvāhṇe tat pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।upacārā ṛjukuśāstilārthaiś ca yavair iha ।tṛptipraśnastu sampannaṃ susampannaṃ vadeddvijaḥ ।।

gandhodakena siktāni iti ja

athābhyudayikamityādiḥ, yavair iha ity antaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti
dadhyakṣatavadarādyāḥ piṇḍā nāndīmukhān pitṝn ।āvāhayiṣye pṛcchecca prīyantāmiti cākṣaye ।।nāndīmukhāś ca pitaro vācayiṣye atha pṛcchati ।nāndīmukhān pitṛgaṇān prīyantāmityatho vadet ।।nāndīmukhāś ca pitarastatpitā prapitāmahaḥ ।mātāmahaḥ pramātāmaho vṛddhapramātṛkāmahaḥ ।।svadhākāranna yuñjīta yugmān viprāṃś ca bhojayet ।tṛptiṃ vakṣye pitṝṇāṃ ca grāmyair oṣadhibhis tathā ।।māsantṛptis tathāraṇyaiḥ kandamūlaphalādibhiḥ ।matsyair māsadvayaṃ mārgaistrayaṃ vai śākunena ca ।।caturo rauraveṇātha pañca ṣaṭ chāgalena tu ।kūrmeṇa sapta cāṣṭau ca vārāheṇa navaiva tu ।।meṣamāṃsena daśa ca māhiṣaiḥ pārṣataiḥ śivaiḥ ।saṃvatsarantu gavyena payasā pāyasena vā ।।vārdhīnasasya māṃsena tṛptirdvādaśavārṣikī ।khaḍgamāṃsaṃ kālaśākaṃ lohitacchāgalo madhu ।।mahāśalkāś ca varṣāsu maghāśrāddhamathākṣayaṃ ।mantrādhyāyyagnihotrī ca śākhādhyāyī ṣaḍaṅgavit ।।tṛṇāciketaḥ trimadhurdharmadroṇasya pāṭhakaḥ ।triṣuparṇajyeṣṭhasāmajñānī syuḥ paṅktipāvanāḥ ।।

dadhyakṣatavadaryādyā iti ga, cha ca

tathā vanyair iti kha, ṅa ca

vatsaraṃ rauraveṇātheti gha

pañcakaṃ chāgastena tu iti ṅa

lohitacchāgaka iti ga, gha, ṅa ca

maghāśrāddhamihākṣayamiti jha

jaladroṇasyeti jha
kamyānāṃ kalpamākhyāsye pratipatsu dhanaṃ bahu ।striyaḥ parā dvitīyāyāñcaturthyāṃ dharmakāmadaḥ ।।pañcamyāṃ putrakāmastu ṣaṣṭhyāñca śraiṣṭhyabhāgapi ।kṛṣibhāgī ca saptamyāmaṣṭamyāmarthalābhakaḥ ।।navamyāñca ekaśaphā daśamyāṅgogaṇo bhavet ।ekadaśyāṃ parīvāro dvādaśyāndhanadhānyakaṃ ।।jñātiśreṣṭhyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyāñca śastrataḥ ।mṛtānāṃ śrāddhaṃ sarvāptamamāvāsyāṃ samīritaṃ ।।sapta vyādhā daśāraṇye mṛgāḥ kālañjare girau ।cakravākāḥ śaradvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānse ।।te api jātāḥ kurukṣetre brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ ।prasthitā dūramadhvānaṃ yūyantebhyo avasīdata ।।śrāddhādau paṭhite śrāddhaṃ pūrṇaṃ syādbrahmalokadaṃ ।śrāddhaṃ kuryācca putrādiḥ piturjīvati tatpituḥ ।।tatpitustatpituḥ kuryājjīvati prapitāmahe ।pituḥ pitāmashasyātha parasya prapitāmāt ।।

kālamākhyāsye iti jha ca

śreṣṭhabhāgyapi iti kha, ga, ṅa, cha ca । jyeṣṭhabhāgapi iti gha

navamyāṃ vai śaphapatiriti ja

caturdaśyāñca śāstrata iti kha, gha ca

mṛtānāṃ śrāddhaṃ sarvāptiramāvāsyā samīritā iti ka

daśārṇeṣu iti kha, ga, ṅa, cha ca

te abhijātā iti kha, gha ca

kuryāt suputro api iti cha

tatpiturityādiḥ, prapitāmahādityantaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti
evaṃ mātrādikasyāpi tathā mātāmahādike ।śrāddhakalpaṃ paṭhedyastu sa labhet śrāddhakṛtphalaṃ ।।tīrthe yugādau manvādau śrāddhaṃ dattamathākṣayaṃ ।aśvayucchuklanavamī dvādaśī kartike tathā ।।tṛtīyā caiva māghasya tathā bhādrapadasya ca ।phālgunasyāpyamāvāsyā pauṣayaikādaśī tathā ।।āṣāḍhasyāpi daśamī māghamāsasya saptamī ।śrāvaṇe cāṣṭamī kṛṣṇā tathāṣāḍhe ca pūrṇimā ।।kartikī phālgunī tadvaj jyaiṣṭhe pañcadaśī sitā ।svāyambhuvādyā manavasteṣāmādyāḥ kilākṣayāḥ ।।gayā prayāgo gaṅgā ca kurukṣetraṃ ca narmadā ।śrīparvataḥ prabhāsaś ca śālagrāmo varāṇasī ।।godāvarī teṣu śrāddhaṃ strīpuruṣottamādiṣu ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śrāddhakalpo nāma saptadaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭādaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

bhāratavarṣaṃ

agnir uvāca
uttaraṃ yat samudrasya himādreś caiva dakṣiṇaṃ ।varṣaṃ tad bhārataṃ nāma navasāhasravistṛtaṃ ।।karmabhūmiriyaṃ svargamapavargaṃ ca gacchatāṃ ।

yastu labhecchrāddhakṛtaṃ phalamiti kha, cha, ja ca

vārāṇasī iti kha, ṅa, cha, ja ca
mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimān hemaparvataḥ ।।vindhyaś ca pāripātraś ca saptātra kulaparvatāḥ ।indradvīpaḥ kaseruś ca tāmravarṇo gabhastimān ।।nāgadvīpas tathā saumyo gāndharvastvatha vāruṇaḥ ।ayaṃ tu navamasteṣu dvīpaḥ sāgarasaṃvṛtaḥ ।।yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi dvīpoyaṃ dakṣiṇottarāt ।nava bhedā bhāratasya madhyabhede atha pūrvataḥ ।।kirātā yavanāścāpi brāhmaṇādyāś ca madhyataḥ ।vedasmṛtimukhā nadyaḥ pāripātrodbhavās tathā ।।vindhyācca narmadādyāḥ syuḥ sahyāttāpī payoṣṇikā ।godāvarībhīmarathīkṛṣṇaveṇādikās tathā ।।malayāt kṛtamālādyāstrisāmādyā mahendrajāḥ ।kumārādyāḥ śuktimato himādreś candrabhāgakā ।।paścime kurupāñcālamadhyadeśādayaḥsthitāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe bhāratavarṣaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikonaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mahādvīpādi

agnir uvāca
lakṣayojanavistāraṃ jambūdvīpaṃ samāvṛtam ।

śaktimānṛkṣaparvata iti gha, cha ca । śuktimānṛkṣaparvata iti ja

nava bhedā bhavantyasyeti jha

śaktimata iti kha, ga, gha, jha ca
lakṣyayojanamanena kṣīrodena samantataḥ ।।saṃveṣṭya kṣāramudadhiṃ plakṣadvīpas tathā sthitaḥ ।sapta medhātitheḥ putrāḥ plakṣadvīpeśvarās tathā ।।syācchāntabhayaḥ śiśiraḥ sukhodaya itaḥ paraḥ ।ānandaś ca śivaḥ kṣemo dhruvastannāmavarṣakaṃ ।।maryādāśailo gomedhaś candro nāradadundbhī ।somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo vaibhrājāstajjanāḥ śubhāḥ ।।nadyaḥ pradhānāḥ saptātra plakṣācchākāntikeṣu ca ।jīvanaṃ pañcasāsraṃ dharmo varṇāśramātmakaḥ ।।āryakāḥ kuravaś caiva viviṃśā bhāvinaś ca te ।viprādyāstaiś ca somo arcyo dvilakṣaścābdhilakṣakaḥ ।।mānenekṣurasodena vṛto dviguṇaśālmalaḥ ।vapuṣmataḥ sapta putrāḥ śālmaleśās tathābhavan ।।śveto atha haritaś caiva jīmūto lohitaḥ kramāt ।vaidyuto mānasaś caiva suprabho nāma varṣakaḥ ।।dviguṇo dviguṇenaiva surodena samāvṛtaḥ ।kumudaścānalaś caiva tṛtīyastu valāhakaḥ ।।droṇaḥ kaṃko atha mahiṣaḥ kakudmān sapta nimnagāḥ ।kapilāścāruṇāḥ pītāḥ kṛṣṇāḥsyurbrāhmaṇādayaḥ ।।vāyurūpaṃ yajanti sma surodenāyamāvṛtaḥ ।

dvīpas tathā smṛta iti jha

varṇāśramātmaja iti kha, gha, ja ca

kumudaśconnataś caiveti kha, ga, gha, ṅa ca

karko atheti ka

surodena samāvṛta iti gha
jyotiṣmataḥ kuśeśāḥ syurudgijo dhenumān sutaḥ ।।dvairatho laṃvano dhairyaḥ kapilaś ca prabhākaraḥ ।viprādyā dadhimukhyāstu brahmarūpaṃ yajanti te ।।vidrumo hemaśailaś ca dyutimān puṣpavāṃs tathā ।kuśeśayo hariḥ śailo varṣārthaṃ mandarācalaḥ ।।veṣṭito ayaṃ ghṛtodena krauñcadvīpena so apyatha ।krauñceśvarāḥ dyutimataḥ putrāstannāmavarṣakāḥ ।।kuśalo manonugaścoṣṇaḥ pradhāno athāndhakārakaḥ ।muniś ca dundubhiḥ sapta sapta śailāś ca nimnagāḥ ।।krauñcaś ca vāmnaś caiva tṛtīyaścāndhakārakaḥ ।devavṛt puṇḍarīkaś ca dundubhirdviguṇo mithaḥ ।।dvīpā dvīpeṣu ye śailā yathā dvīpāni te tathā ।puṣkarāḥ puṣkalā dhanyāstīrthā viprādayo harim ।।yajanti krauñcadvīpastu dadhimaṇḍodakāvṛtaḥ ।saṃvṛtaḥ śākadvīpena havyācchākeśvarāḥ sutāḥ ।।jaladaś ca kumāraś ca sukumāro maṇīvakaḥ ।kuśottaratho modākī drumastannāmavarṣakāḥ ।।udayākhyo jaladharo raivataḥ śyāmakodrakau ।āmvikeyas tathā ramyaḥ keśarī sapta nimnagāḥ ।।

rudrābha iti ka । vikrama iti kha, cha ca

kuśala ity ādiḥ, nimnagā ity antaḥ pāṭho jha pustake nāsti

tṛtīyaścānukāraka iti gha, jha ca

puṣkalāvatyāṃ tīrthā iti gha
magā magadhamanasyā mandagāś ca dvijātayaḥ ।yajanti sūryarūpaṃ tu śākaḥ kṣīrābdhinā vṛtaḥ ।।puṣkareṇāvṛtaḥ so api dvau putrau savanasya ca ।masāvīto dhātakiś ca varṣe dve nāmacihnite ।।eko adrirmānasākhyo atra madhyato valayākṛtiḥ ।yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi vistārocchrāyataḥ samaḥ ।।jīvanaṃ daśasāhasraṃ surair brahmātra pūjyate ।svādūdakenodadhinā veṣṭito dvīpamānataḥ ।।ūnātiriktatā cāpāṃ samudreṣu na jāyate ।udayāstamaneṣvindoḥ pakṣayoḥ śuklakṛṣṇayoḥ ।।daśottarāṇi pañcaiva aṅgulānāṃ śatāni vai ।apāṃ vṛddhikṣayau dṛṣṭau sāmudrīṇāṃ mahāmune ।।svādūdakā bahuguṇā bhūrhaimī jantuvarjitā ।lokālokastataḥ śailo yojanāyutavistṛtaḥ ।।lokālokastu tamasāvṛto athāṇḍakaṭāhataḥ ।bhūmiḥ sāṇḍakaṭāhena pañcāśatkoṭivistarā ।।
e ity āgneye mahapurāṇe dvīpādivarṇanaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

āgāmyagadhamālasyā iti kha, cha ca

dvijādaya iti ka, kha, ga, cha ca

sūryarūpante iti gha, ja ca

varṣe dve bhāgacihnite iti jha

pañcātreti ga, ṅa ca

samudrāṇāmiti ga, ṅa, jha ca

svādūdakā dvitriguṇeti kha, cha ca । svādūdakā tu dviguṇeti gha, ja ca । svādūdakā tu dviguṇeti ga, ṅa ca

pañcāśatkoṭivistṛteti cha

chapter 

ś atha viṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

bhuvanakoṣaḥ

agnir uvāca
vistārastu smṛto bhūmeḥ sahasrāṇi ca saptatiḥ ।ucchrāyo daśasāhasraṃ pātālañcaikamekakaṃ ।।atalaṃ vitalañcaiva nitalañca gabhastimat ।mahākhyaṃ sutalañcāgryaṃ pātālañcāpi saptamaṃ ।।kṛṣṇapītāruṇāḥ śuklaśarkarāśailakāñcanāḥ ।bhūmayasteṣu ramyeṣu santi daityādayaḥ sukhaṃ ।।pātālānāmadhaścāste śeṣo viṣṇuś ca tāmasaḥ ।guṇānantyātsa cānantataḥ śirasā dhārayanmahīṃ ।।bhuvo adho narakā naike na patettatra vaiṣṇavaḥ ।raviṇā bhāsitā pṛthvī yāvattāyannabho mataṃ ।।bhūmeryojanalakṣantu viśiṣṭharavimaṇḍalaṃ ।raver lakṣeṇa candraś ca lakṣānnākṣatramindutaḥ ।।dvilakṣādbhādbudhaścāste budhācchukro dvilakṣataḥ ।dvilakṣeṇa kujaḥ śukrādbhaumād dvilakṣato guruḥ ।।gurordvilakṣataḥ sauritllakṣātsaptarṣayaḥ śaneḥ ।lakṣād dhruvo hy ṛṣibhyastu trailokyañcocchrayeṇa ca ।।dhruvāt koṭyā maharloko yatra te kalpavāsinaḥ ।

jano dvikoṭitastasmādyatrāsan sanakādayaḥ ।।janāttapaścāṣtakoṭyā vairājā yatra devatāḥ ।ṣaṇavatyā tu koṭīnāntapasaḥ satyalokakaḥ ।।apunarmārakā yatra brahmaloko hi sa smṛtaḥ ।pādagamyastu bhūlloko bhuvaḥ sūryāntaraḥ smṛtaḥ ।।svargaloko dhruvāntastu niyutāni caturdaśa ।etadaṇḍakaṭāhena vṛto brahmāṇḍavistaraḥ ।।vārivahnyanilākāśaistato bhūtādinā vahiḥ ।vṛtaṃ daśaguṇair aṇḍaṃ bhūtādirmahatā tathā ।।daśottarāṇi śeṣāṇi ekaikasmānmāmune ।mahāntañca samāvṛtya pradhānaṃ samavasthitaṃ ।।anantasya na tasyāntaḥ saṅkhyānaṃ nāpi vidyate ।hetubhūtamaśeṣasya prakṛtiḥ sā parā mune ।।asaṅkhyātāni śāṇḍāni tatra jātāni cedṛśāṃ ।dāruṇyagniryathā tailaṃ tile tadvat pumāniti ।।pradhāne ca sthito vyāpī cetanātmātmavedanaḥ ।pradhānañca pumāṃś caiva sarvabhūtātmabhṛtayā ।।viṣṇuśaktyā mahāprājña vṛtau saṃśrayadharmiṇau ।tayoḥ saiva pṛthagbhāve kāraṇaṃ saṃśrayasya ca ।।

yatra vai iti ṅa

ayutāni iti ja

saṅkhyānaṃ naiva vidyate iti gha, jha ca । saṅkhyānaṃ na ca vidyate iti ga

pumānapi iti gha, jha ca

pradhāne avasthitaṃ iti kha, ga, ṅa ca

sarvabhūtānubhūtayā iti ṅa

dvayoriti jha
kṣobhakāraṇabhūtaś ca sargakāle mahāmune ।yathā śaityaṃ jale vāto vibharti kaṇikāgataṃ ।।jagacchaktis tathā viṣṇoḥ pradhānapratipādikāṃ ।viṣṇuśaktiṃ samāsādya devādyāḥ sambhavanti hi ।।sa ca viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ brahma yataḥ sarvamidaṃ jagat ।yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya ratho nava ।।īśādaṇḍastathaivāsya dviguṇo munisattama ।sārdhakoṭis tathā saptaniyutānyadhikāni vai ।ojanānāntu tasyākṣastatra cakraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ ।trinābhimatipañcāraṃ ṣaṇṇemi dvyayanātmakaṃ ।।saṃvatsaramayaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kālacakraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ ।catvāriṃśatsahasrāṇi dvitīyakṣo vivasvataḥ ।।pañcānyāni tu sārdhāni syandanasya mahāmate ।akṣapramāṇamubhayoḥ pramāṇantadadyugārdhayoḥ ।।hrasvo akṣastadyugārdhañca dhruvādhāraṃ rathasya vai ।hayāś ca sapta chandāṃsi gāyatryādīni suvrata ।।udayāstamanaṃ jñeyaṃ darśanādarśanaṃ raveḥ ।yāvanmātrapradeśe tu vaśiṣṭho avasthito dhruvaḥ ।।svayamāyāti tāvattu bhūmerābhūtasamplave ।ūrdhottaramṛṣibhyastu dhruvo yatra vyavasthitaḥ ।।etadviṣṇupadaṃ divyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vyomni bhāsvaraṃ ।nirdhūtadoṣapaṅkānāṃ yatīnāṃ sthānamuttamaṃ ।।

bhūmerāhūtasamplave iti gha, ja ca
tato gaṅgā prabhavati smaraṇāt pāśanāśanī ।divi rūpaṃ harerjñeyaṃ śiśumārākṛti prabho ।।sthitaḥ pucche dhruvastatra bhraman bhrāmayati grahān ।sa ratho adhiṣṭhitā devair ādityair ṛṣibhirvaraiḥ ।।gandharvair apsarobhiś ca grāmaṇīsarparākṣasaiḥ ।himoṣṇavārivarṣāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān raviḥ ।।ṛgvedādimayo viṣṇuḥ sa śubhāśubhakāraṇaṃ ।rathastricakraḥ somasya kundābhāstasya vājinaḥ ।।vāmadakṣiṇato yuktā daśa tena caratyasau ।trayastriṃśatsahasrāṇi trayastriṃśacchatāni ca ।।trayastriṃśattathā devāḥ pivanti kṣaṇadākaraṃ ।ekāṃ kalāñca pitara ekāmāraśmisaṃsthitāḥ ।।vāyvagnidravyasambhūto rathaś candrasutasya ca ।aṣṭābhisturagair yukto budhastena caratyapi ।।śukrasyāpi ratho aṣṭāśvo bhaumasyāpi rathas tathā ।vṛhaspate ratho aṣṭāśvaḥ śaneraṣṭāśvako rathaḥ ।।svarbhānoś ca ratho aṣṭāśvaḥ ketoścāṣṭāśvako rathaḥ ।yadadya vaiṣṇavaḥ kāyastato vipra vasundharā ।।

sarvapāpapraṇāśinīti ja

ṛṣabho raveriti ga, gha, ṅa, ja ca

saratha ity ādiḥ, rākṣasair ityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti

kundābhāstatra vājina iti ka, gha, ṅa ca

kṣaṇadācaramiti jha
padmākarā samudbhūtā parvatādyādisaṃyutā ।jyotirbhuvananadyadrisamudravanakaṃ hariḥ ।।yadasti nāsti tadviṣṇurviṣṇujñānavijṛmbhitaṃ ।na vijñānamṛte kiñcij jñānaṃ viṣṇuḥ parampadaṃ ।।tat kuryād yena viṣṇuḥ syāt satyaṃ jñānamanantakaṃ ।paṭhed bhuvanakoṣaṃ hi yaḥ so avāptasukhātmabhāk ।।jyotiḥśāstrādividhyāś ca śubhāśubhādhipo hariḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe bhuvanakoṣo nāma viṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikaviṃśādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

jyotiḥśāstraṃ

agnir uvāca
jyotiḥśāstraṃ pravakṣyāmi śubhāśubhavivekadaṃ ।cāturlakṣasya sāraṃ yat taj jñātvā sarvavidbhavet ।।ṣaḍaṣṭake vivāho na na ca dvidvādaśe striyāḥ ।na trikoṇe hy atha prītiḥ śeṣe ca samasaptake ।।

jñānavijñānajṛmbhitamiti ja

śubhāśubhāśayo haririti kha, cha ca

ṣaṭkāṣṭake iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ja ca

na trikoṇeṣu prītiḥ syāditi ja
dvidvādaśe trikoṇe ca maitrīkṣetrapayoryadi ।bhavedekādhipatyañca tārāprītirathāpi vā ।।tathāpi kāryaḥ saṃyogo na tu ṣaṭkāṣṭake punaḥ ।jīve bhṛgau cāstamite mriyate ca pumān striyā ।।gurukṣetragate sūrye sūryakṣetragate gurau ।vivāhaṃ na praśaṃsanti kanyāvaidhavyakṛdbhavet ।।aticāre tripakṣaṃ syādvakre māsacatuṣṭayaṃ ।vratodvāhau na kurvīta gurorvakrāticārayoḥ ।।caitre pauṣe na riktāsu harau supte kuje ravau ।candrakṣaye cāśubhaṃ syāt sandhyākālaḥ śubhāvahaḥ ।।rohiṇī cottarā mūlaṃ svātī hasto atha revatī ।tule na mithune śasto vivāhaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ।।vivāhe karṇabedhe ca vrate puṃsavane tathā ।prāśane cādyacūḍāyāṃ biddharkṣañca vivarjayet ।।śravaṇe mūlapuṣye ca sūryamaṅgalajīvake ।kumbhe siṃhe ca mithune karma puṃsavanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।haste mūle mṛge pauṣṇe budhe śukre ca niṣkṛtiḥ ।arkendujīvabhṛguje mūle tāmbūlabhakṣaṇaṃ ।।annasya prāśanaṃ śukre jīve mṛge ca maunake ।hastādipañcake puṣpe kṛttikāditraye tathā ।।

viddhamṛkṣaṃ vivarjayet iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca

jīve makaramīnake iti jha
aśvinyāmatha revatyāṃ navānnaphalabhakṣaṇaṃ ।puṣpā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā rohiṇī śravaṇāśvinau ।।svātisaumye ca bhaiṣajyaṃ kuryādanyatra varjayet ।pūrvātrayaṃ maghā yāmyaṃ pāvanaṃ śravaṇatrayaṃ ।।bhaumādityaśanervāre snātavyaṃ rogamuktitaḥ ।pārthive cāṣṭahrīṃkāraṃ madhye nāma ca dikṣu ca ।।hrīṃ puṭaṃ pārthive dikṣu hrīṃ vidikṣu likhedvasūn ।gorocanākuṅkumena bhūrje vastre gale dhṛtaṃ ।।śatravo vaśamāyānti mantreṇānena niścitaṃ ।śrīṃ hrīṃ sampuṭaṃ nāma śrīṃ hrīṃ patrāṣṭakekramāt ।।gorocanākuṅkumena bhurje atha subhagāvṛte ।gomadhyavāgamaḥ patre haridrāyā rasena ca ।।śilāpaṭṭe arīn stambhayati bhūmāvadhomukhīkṛṭaṃ ।oṃ hūṃ saḥ sampuṭannāma oṃ hūṃ saḥ patrāṣṭakekramāt ।।gorocanākuṅkumena bhūrje mṛtyunivāraṇaṃ ।ekapañcanavaprītyai dviṣatdvādaśayogakāḥ ।।trisaptaikādaśe lābho vedāṣṭadvādaśe ripuḥ ।tanurdhanañca sahajaḥ suhṛt suto ripus tathā ।।jāyā nidhanadharmau ca karmāyavyayakaṃ kramāt ।

pūrvātrikamiti ja

pāvakamiti ṅa

oṃ hraṃ sa iti cha

oṃ jūṃ sa iti kha । oṃ hraṃ sa iti cha

ekapañcanavaśāntyai iti ja
sphuṭaṃ mesādilagneṣu navatārābalaṃ vadet ।।janma sampadvipat kṣemaṃ pratyariḥ sādhakaḥ kramāt ।nidhanaṃ mitrapramamitraṃ tārābalaṃ viduḥ ।।dhāre jñaguruśukrāṇāṃ sūryācandramasos tathā ।māghādimasāṣaṭke tu kṣīramādyaṃ praśasyate ।।karṇabedho budhe jīve puṣye śravaṇacitrayoḥ ।pañcame abde cādhyayanaṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ pratipadantyajet ।।riktāṃ pañcadaśīṃ bhaumaṃ prārcya vāṇīṃ hariṃ śriyaṃ ।māghādimāsaṣatke tu makhalābandhanaṃ śubhaṃ ।।cūḍākaraṇakādyañca śravaṇādau na śasyate ।astaṃ yāte guro śukre kṣīṇe ca śaśalāñchane ।।upanītasya viprasya mṛtyuṃ jāḍyaṃ vinirdiśet ।kṣaurarkṣe śubhavāre ca samāvartanamiṣyate ।।śubhakṣetre vilagneṣu śubhayuktekṣiteṣu ca ।aśvinīmaghācitrāsu svātīyāmyottarāsu ca ।।punarvasau tathā puṣye dhanurvedaḥ praśasyate ।bharaṇyārdrā maghāśleṣā vahnibhagarkṣayos tathā ।।jijīviṣur na kurvīta vastraprāvaraṇaṃ naraḥ ।gurau śukre budhe vastraṃ vivāhādau na bhādikaṃ ।।revatyaśvidhaniṣṭhāsu hastādiṣu ca pañcasu ।śaṅkhavidrumaratnānāṃ paridhānaṃ praśasyate ।।

māghādimāsaṣaṭkeṣu iti jha 
yāmyasarpadhaniṣṭhāsu triṣu pūrveṣu vāruṇe ।krītaṃ hānikaraṃ dravyaṃ vikrītaṃ lābhakṛdbhavet ।।aśvinīsvāticitrāsu revatyāṃ vāruṇe harau ।krītaṃ lābhakaraṃ dravayaṃ vikrītaṃ hānikṛdbhavet ।।bharaṇī trīṇi pūrvāṇi ārdrāśleṣā maghānilāḥ ।vahnijyeṣṭāviśākhāsu svāmino nopatiṣṭhate ।।dravyaṃ dattaṃ prayuktaṃ vā yatra nikṣipyate dhanaṃ ।uttare śravaṇe śākre kuryādrājābhiṣecanaṃ ।।caitraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tathā bhādramāśvinaṃ pauṣameva ca ।māghaṃ caiva parityajya śeṣamāse gṛhaṃ śubhaṃ ।।aśvinī rohiṇī mūlamuttarātrayamaindavaṃ ।svātī hastānurādhā ca gṛhārambhe praśasyate ।।ādityabhaumavarjantu vāpīprāsādake tathā ।siṃharāśigate jīve gurvāditye malimluce ।।bāle vṛddhe astage śukre gṛhakarma vivarjayet ।agnidāho bhayaṃ rogo rājapīḍā dhanakṣatiḥ ।।saṅgrahe tṛṇakāṣṭhānāṃ kṛte śravaṇapañcake ।gṛhapraveśanaṃ kuryāddhaniṣṭhottaravāruṇe ।।naukāyā ghaṭane dvitripañcasaptatrayodaśī ।nṛpadarśī dhaniṣṭhāsu hastāpauṣṇāśvinīṣu ca ।।pūrvātrayandhaniṣṭhārdrā vahniḥ saumyaviśākhayoḥ ।

yāmyasarpaviśākhāsu iti gha, ja ca

pūrveṣu cānale iti ga, gha, ṅa ca
aśleṣā cāśvinī caiva yātrāsiddhistu sampadā ।।triṣūttareṣu rohiṇyāṃ sinībālī caturdaśī ।śravaṇā caiva hastā ca citrā ca vaiṣṇavī tathā ।।goṣṭhayātrāṃ na kurvīta praveśaṃ naiva kārayet ।anilottararohiṇyāṃ mṛgamūlapunarvasau ।।puṣyaśravaṇahasteṣu kṛṣikarma samācaret ।punarvasūttarāsvātībhagamūlendravāruṇe ।।guroḥ śukrasya vāre vā vāre ca somabhāsvatoḥ ।vṛṣalagne ca kartavyaṅkanyāyāṃ mithune tathā ।।dvipañca daśamī sapta tṛtīyā ca trayodaśī ।revatīrohiṇīndrāgnihastamaitrottareṣu ca ।।mandāravarjaṃ vījāni vāpayet sampadarthyapi ।revatīhastamūleṣu śravaṇe bhagamaitrayoḥ ।।pitṛdaive tathā saumye dhānyacchedaṃ mṛgodaye ।hastacitrāditisvātau revatyāṃ śravaṇatraye ।।sthire lagne gurorvāre atha bhārgavasaumyayoḥ ।yāmyāditimaghājyeṣṭhāsūtareṣu praveśayet ।।

yātrāsiddhiṣu sampada iti ga, ja ca

samārabhediti gha, ṅa ca

bhagamūle ca vāruṇe iti kha, cha ca

vāre vā iti ja

tripañceti ja

hastamaitrottarāsu iti ja

vāpayet saṃyato api ceti kha, cha, ja ca

care lagne iti jha

gurorvārethavā iti gha, ja ca

oṃ dhanadāya sarvadhaneśāya dehi me dhanaṃ svāhā । oṃ nave varṣe ilādevi lokasaṃvardhani kāmarūpiṇi dehi me dhanaṃ svāhā ।।
patrasthaṃ likhitaṃ dhānyarāśisthaṃ dhānyavardhanaṃ ।tripūrvāsu viśākhāyāṃ dhaniṣṭhāvāruṇe api ca ।।eteṣu ṣaṭsu vijñeyaṃ dhānyaniṣkramaṇaṃ budhaiḥ ।devatārāmavāpyādipratiṣṭhodaṅmukhe ravau ।।mithunasthe ravau darśādyādi syād dvādaśī tithiḥ ।sadā tatraiva kartavyaṃ śayanaṃ cakrapāṇinaḥ ।।siṃhatauliṅgate cārke darśādyadvādaśīdvayaṃ ।ādāvindrasamuptyānaṃ prabodhaś ca hareḥ kramāt ।।tathā kanyāgate bhānau durgoptyāne tathāṣṭamī ।tripādeṣu ca ṛkṣeṣu yadā bhadrā tithirbhavet ।।bhaumādityaśanaiścāri vijñeyaṃ tat tripuṣkaraṃ ।sarvakarmaṇyupādeyā viśuddhiś candratarayoḥ ।।janmāśritastriṣaṣṭhaś ca saptamo daśamas tathā ।ekādaśaḥ śaśī yeṣānteṣāmeva śubhaṃ vadet ।।śuklapakṣe dvītīyaś ca pañcamo navamaḥ śubhaḥ ।mitrātimitrasādhakasapatkṣemāditārakāḥ ।।

oṃ śrīṃ dhanadāyeti ja

``nave varṣe gurorvāre atha bhārgavasaumyayoḥ'' eṣa pāṭhotra cha pustakedhiko asti

siṃhatauligate iti kha

kanyārāśigate bhānau iti gha

viśuddhiś candrasūryayoriti ja
janmanā mṛtyumāpnoti vipadā dhanasaṅkṣayaṃ ।pratyarau maraṇaṃ vidyānnidhane yāti pañcatāṃ ।।
kṛṣṇāṣṭamīdinādūrdhvaṃ
yāvacchuklāṣṭamīdinaṃ ।tāvat kālaṃ śaśī kṣīṇaḥ pūrṇastatropari smṛtaḥ ।।vṛṣe ca mithune bhānau jīve candrendradaivate ।paurṇamāsī gurorvāre mahājyauṣṭhī prakīrtitā ।।aindre guruḥ śaśī caiva prājāpatye ravis tathā ।pūrṇimā jyeṣṭhamāsasya mahājyauṣṭhī prakīrtitā ।।svātyantare yantraniṣṭhe śakrasyotthāpayed dhvajaṃ ।haryṛkṣapāde cāśvinyāṃ saptāhānte visarjayet ।।sarvaṃ hemasamandānaṃ sarve brahmasamā dvijāḥ ।sarvaṃ gaṅgāsamantoyaṃ rāhugraste divākare ।।dhvāṅkṣī mahodarī ghorā mandā mandākinī dvijāḥ ।rākṣasī ca krameṇārkātsaṅkrāntirnāmabhiḥ smṛtā ।।bālave kaulave nāge taitile karaṇe yadi ।uttiṣṭhan saṅkramatyarkrastadā lokaḥ sukhī bhavet ।।gare vave vaṇigviṣṭau kintughne śakunau vrajet ।rājño doṣeṇa loko ayampīḍyate sampadā samaṃ ।।catuṣpādviṣṭivāṇijye śayitaḥ saṅkramedraviḥ ।

kṛṣṇāṣṭamīdalādūrdhvaṃ yāvacchuklāṣṭamīdalamiti ḍa

jīve candrendradaivatamiti ja

indrādyapāda iti kha, ga ca । haryādyapāde iti ḍa

mandākinī tatheti kha, gha, cha ca । mandākinīti ceti jha

tathā loka iti kha
durbhikṣaṃ rājasaṅgrāmo dampatyoḥ saṃśayo bhavet ।।ādhāne janmanakṣatre vyādhau kleśādikaṃ bhavet ।kṛttikāyānnavadinantrirātraṃ rohiṇīṣu ca ।।mṛgaśiraḥpañcarātraṃ ārdrāsu prāṇanāśanaṃ ।punarvasau ca puṣye ca saptarātraṃ vidhīyate ।।navarātraṃ tathāśleṣā śmaśānāntaṃ maghāsu ca ।dvau māsau pūrvaphālgunyāmuttarāsu tripañcakam ।।haste tu dṛśyate citrā ardhamāsantu pīḍanam ।māsadvayantathā svātirviśākhā viṃśatirdinaṃ ।।maitre caiva daśāhāni jyeṣṭhāsvevārdhamāsakam ।mūle na jāyate mokṣaḥ pūrvāṣāḍhā tripañcakam ।।uttarā dinaviṃśatyā dvau māsau śravaṇena ca ।dhaniṣṭhā cārdhamāsañca vāruṇe ca daśāhakam ।।na ca bhādrapade mokṣa uttarāsu tripañcakam ।revatī daśarātrañca ahorātrantathāśvinī ।।bharaṇyāṃ prāṇahāniḥ syād gāyatrīhomataḥ śubhaṃ ।pañcadhānyatilājyādyair dhenudānandvije śamaṃ ।।daśā sūryasya ṣaṣṭhābdā indoḥ pañcadaśaiva tu ।aṣṭau varṣāṇi bhaumasya daśasaptadaśā budhe ।।

ārdrāyāmiti ga, ja ca

uttarāsu trirātrakamiti jha

pūrvāṣāḍhādinapañcakamiti ka । hastetu dṛśyante ity ādiḥ, pūrvāṣāḍhātripañcakamityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ḍa, cha, pustakadvaye nāsti
daśābdāni daśā paṅgorūnaviṃśadgurordṛśā ।rāhordvādaśavarṣāṇi bhārgavasyaikaviṃśatiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe jyotiḥśastrasāro nāma ekaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvāviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kālagaṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
kālaḥ samāgaṇo vakṣye gaṇitaṃ kālabuddhaye ।kālaḥ samāgaṇo arkaghno māsaiś caitrādibhiryutaḥ ।।dvighno dvisṭḥaḥ savedaḥ syāt pañcāṅgaṣṭayutoguṇaḥ ।triṣṭho madhyo vasuguṇaḥ punarvedaguṇaś ca saḥ ।।aṣṭarandhrāgnihīnaḥ syādadhaḥ saikarasāṣṭakaiḥ ।madhyo hīnaḥ ṣaṣṭihato labdhayuktastathopari ।।nyūnaḥ saptakṛto vārastadadhastithināḍayaḥ ।saguṇo dviguṇaścoroddhvaṃ tribhirūno guṇaḥ punaḥ ।।adhaḥ svarāmasaṃyukto rasārkāṣṭaphalair yutaḥ ।aṣṭāviṃśaccheṣapiṇḍastithināḍyā adhaḥ sthitaḥ ।।

samāgaṇorkābda iti kha, cha ca

pañcadaśayuto gaṇa iti ja

aṣṭacandrāgnihīna iti ja

ṣaṣṭihata iti ṅa
guṇastisṛbhirūnordhaṃ dvābhyāṃ ca guṇayet punaḥ ।madhye rudraguṇaḥ kāryo hy adhaḥ saiko navāgnibhiḥ ।।labdhahīno bhavenmadhyo dvāviṃśativivarjitaḥ ।ṣaṣṭiśeṣe ṛṇaṃ jñeyaṃ labdhamūrdhvaṃ vinikṣipet ।।saptaviṃśatiśeṣastu dhruvo nakṣatrayogayoḥ ।māsi māsi kṣiped vārandvātriṃśadghaṭikāstithau ।।dve piṇḍe dve ca nakṣatre nāḍya ekādaśa hy ṛṇe ।vārasthāne tithindadyāt saptabhirbhārgavamāharet ।।śeṣavārāś ca sūryādyā ghaṭikāsu ca pātayet ।piṇḍikeṣu tithindadyāddhareccaiva caturdaśa ।।ṛṇaṃ dhanaṃ dhanamṛṇaṃ kramāj jñeyaṃ caturdaśe ।prathame trayodaśe pañca dvitīyadvādaśe daśa ।।pañcadaśastṛtīye ca tathācaikādaśe smṛtāṃ ।caturthe daśame caiva bhavedekonaviṃśatiḥ ।।pañcame navame caiva dvāviṃśatirudāhṛtāḥ ।ṣaṣṭhāṣṭame tvakhaṇḍāḥ syuś caturviṃśatireva ca ।।saptame pañcaviṃśaḥ syāt khaṇḍaśaḥ piṇḍikād bhavet ।karkaṭādau haredrāśimṛtuvedatrayaiḥ kramāt ।।tulādau prātilomyena trayo vedarasāḥ kramāt ।

saikena saptakair iti kha, ga ca

ṛtuhīna iti ṅa

khaṇḍakaḥ piṇḍakādbhavediti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca
makarādau dīyate ca rasavedatrayaḥ kramāt ।meṣādau prātilomyena trayo vedarasāḥ kramāt ।kheṣavaḥ khayugā maitraṃ meṣādau vikalā dhanam ।।karkaṭe prātilomyaṃ syādṛṇametat tulādike ।caturguṇā tithirjñeyā vikalāśceha sarvadā ।।hanyālliptāgatāgāmipiṇḍasaṅkhyāphalantaraiḥ ।ṣaṣṭyāptaṃ prathamoccārye hānau deyandhane dhanam ।।dvitīyoccarite varge vaiparītyamiti sthitiḥ ।tithirdviguṇitā kāryā ṣaḍbhāgaparivarjitā ।।ravikarmaviparītā tithināḍīsamāyutā ।ṛṇe śuddhe tu nāḍyaḥ syurṛṇaṃ śudhyeta no yadā ।।saṣaṣṭikaṃ pradeyantat ṣaṣṭyādhikye ca tattyajet ।nakṣatraṃ tithimiśraṃ syāccaturbhirguṇitā tithiḥ ।।tithistribhāgasaṃyuktā ṛṇena ca tathānvitā ।tithiratra citā kāryā tadvedādyogaśodhanaṃ ।।ravicandrau samau kṛtvā yogo bhavati niś calaḥ ।ekonā tithirdviguṇā saptabhinnā kṛtirdvidhā ।।tithiś ca dviguṇaikonā kṛtāṅgaiḥ karaṇanniśi ।

makarādau ity ādiḥ, vedarasāḥ kramādityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti

santyajediti gha

saptabhinnā gatirdvidheti kha । saptacchinnā kṛtirdvidheti gha, ja ca
kṛṣṇacaturdaśyante śakuniḥ parvaṇīha catuṣpadaṃ ।।prathame tithyardhato hi kintughnaṃ pratipanmukhe ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe kālagaṇanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trayoviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yuddhajayārṇavīyanānāyogāḥ
vakṣye jayaśubhādyarthaṃ sāraṃ yuddhajayārṇave ।a i u e o svarāḥ syuḥ kramānnandādikā tithiḥ ।।kādihāntā bhaumaravī jñasomau gurubhārgavau ।śanirdakṣiṇanāḍyāntu bhaumārkaśanayaḥ pare ।।khārṇavaḥ khasasair guṇyo rudrair bhāgaṃ samāharet ।rasāhatantu tat kṛtvā pūrvabhāgena bhājayet ।।vahnibhiścāhataṃ kṛtvā rūpantatraiva nikṣipet ।spandanaṃ nāḍyāḥ phalāni saprāṇaspandanaṃ punaḥ ।।anenaiva tu mānena udayanti dine dine ।sphuraṇaisribhirucchvāsa ucchvāsaistu palaṃ smṛtam ।।

vahnibhiś ca hṛtaṃ kṛtvā iti gha
ṣaṣṭibhiś ca palair liptā liptāṣaṣṭistvaharniśaṃ ।pañcamārdhodaye bālakumārayuvavṛddhakāḥ ।।mṛtyuryenodayastena cāstamekādaśāṃśakaiḥ ।kulāgame bhavedbhaṅgaḥ samṛtyuḥ pañcamo apivā ।।
svarodayañcakraṃ
śanicakre cārdhamāsaṅgrahāṇāmudayaḥ kramāt ।vibhāgaiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ śanibhāgastu mṛtyudaḥ ।।
śanicakraṃ
daśakotisahasrāṇi arvudānyarvudaṃ haret ।trayodaśe ca lakṣāṇi pramāṇaṃ kūrmarūpiṇaḥ ।।maghādau kṛttikādyantastaddeśāntaḥ śanisthitau ।
kūrmacakraṃ
rāhucakre ca saptordhamadhaḥ sapta ca saṃlikhet ।।vāyvagnyoś caiva nairṛtye pūrṇimāgneyabhāgataḥ ।abhāvāsyāṃ vāyave ca rāhurvai tithirūpakaḥ ।।rakāraṃ dakṣabhāge tu hakāraṃ vāyave likhet ।pratipadādau kakārādīn sakāraṃ nairṛte punaḥ ।।rāhoemukhe tu bhaṅgaḥ syāditi rāhurudāhṛtaḥ ।viṣṭiragnau paurṇamāsyāṃ karāṇīndre tṛtīyakaṃ ।।ghorā yāmyāntu saptamyāṃ daśamyāṃ raudrasaumyagā ।caturdaśyāntu vāyavye caturthyāṃ varuṇāśraye ।।

arvudānyarvudaṃ kramāditi jha

saptarasāṃllikhediti jha

viṣtirvahnau iti ga
śuklāṣṭabhyāṃ dakṣiṇe ca ekādaśyāṃ bhṛśantyajet ।raudraś caiva tathā śveto maitraḥ sārabhaṭas tathā ।।sāvitrī virocanaś ca jayadevo abhijittathā ।rāvaṇo vijayaś caiva nandī varuṇa eva ca ।।yamasaumyau bhavaścānte daśapañcamuhūrtakāḥ ।raudre raudrāṇi kurvīta śvete snānādikaṃ caret ।।maitre kanyāvivāhādi śubhaṃ sārabhaṭe caret ।sāvitre sthāpanādyaṃ vā virocane nṛpakriyā ।।jayadeve jayaṃ kuryād rāvaṇe raṇakarma ca ।vijaye kṛṣivāṇijyaṃ paṭabandhaṃ ca nandini ।।varuṇe ca taḍāgādi nāśakarma yame caret ।saumye saumyādi kurvīta bhavellagnamahardivā ।।yogā nāmnā viruddhāḥ syuryogā nāmnaiva śobhanāḥ ।rāhurindrātsamīrañca vāyordakṣaṃ yamācchivam ।।śivādāpyañjalādagniragneḥ saumyantatastrayam ।tataś ca saṅkramaṃ hanti catasro ghaṭikābhraman ।।
rāhucakraṃ
caṇḍīndrāṇī vārāhī ca muśalī girikarṇikā ।balā cātibalā kṣīrī mallikājātiyūthikāḥ ।।yathālābhaṃ dhārayettāḥ śvetārkaś ca śatāvarī ।guḍūcī vāgurī divyā oṣadhyo dhāritā jaye ।।

spandanamityādiḥ, jayadevobhijittathetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ gha pustake nāsti

jīvakarma ceti kha

vāyoryāmyaṃ tataḥ śivamiti gha

oṃ namo bhairavāya khaḍgaparaśuhastāya oṃ hrūṃ vighnavināśāya oṃ hrūṃ phaṭ
anenaiva tu mantreṇa śikhābandhādikṛjjaye ।tilakañcāñjanañcaiva dhūpalepanameva ca ।।snānapānāni tailāni yogadhūlimataḥ śṛṇu ।śubhagā manaḥśilā tālaṃ lākṣārasasamanvitaṃ ।।taruṇīkṣīrasaṃyukto lalāṭe tilako vaśe ।viṣṇukrāntā ca sarpākṣī sahadevañca rocanā ।।ajādugdhena saṃpiṣṭaṃ tilakovaśyakārakaḥ ।priyaṅgukuṅkumaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ mohanī tagaraṃ ghṛtaṃ ।।tilako vaśyakṛttacca rocanā raktacandanaṃ ।niśā manaḥśilā tālaṃ priyaṅgusarṣapās tathā ।।mohanī haritā krāntā sahadevī śikhā tathā ।mātulaṅgarasaiḥ piṣṭaṃ lalāṭe tilako vaśe ।।sendrāḥ surā vaśaṃ yānti kiṃ punaḥ kṣudramānuṣāḥ ।mañjiṣṭhā candanaṃ raktaṃ kaṭkandā vilāsinī ।।punarnavāsamāyukto lepo ayaṃ bhāskaro vaśe ।candanaṃ nāgapuṣpañca mañjiṣṭhā tagaraṃ vacā ।।lodhnapriyaṅgurajanīmāṃsītailaṃ vaśaṅkaraṃ ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānāyogā nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

oṃ namo bhagavate bhairavāyeti kha, gha ca

oṃ hūmiti kha, ja ca

sahadevā ceti ṅa

mañjiṣṭhā tagarantatheti ka । mañjiṣṭhā bhallakaṃ vaceti cha

chapter 

ś atha caturviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yuddhajayārṇavīyajyotiḥśāstrasāraḥ agnir uvāca
jyotiḥśāstrādisārañca vakṣye yuddhajayārṇave ।vinā mantroṣadhādyañca yathyomāmīśvaro abravīt ।।
devyuvāca
devair jitā dānavāś ca yenopāyena tadvada ।śubhāśubhavivekādyaṃ jñānaṃ yuddhajayārṇavaṃ ।।
īśvara uvāca
mūladeveccayā jātā śaktiḥ pañcādaśākṣarā ।carācaraṃ tato jātaṃ yāmārādhyākhilārthavit ।।mantrapīṭhaṃ pravakṣyāmi pañcamantrasamudbhavaṃ ।te mantrāḥ sarvamantrāṇāṃ jīvite maraṇe sthitāḥ ।।ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvākhyadevamantrāḥ krameṇa te ।sadyojātādayo mantrā brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudrakaḥ ।।īśaḥ saptaśikhā devāḥ śakrādyāḥ pañca ca svarāḥ ।a i u e o kalāś ca mūlaṃ brahmeti kīrtitaṃ ।।kāṣṭhamadhye tathā vahnirapravṛddho na dṛśyate ।vidyamānā tathā dehe śivaśaktirna dṛśyate ।।ādau śaktiḥ samutpannā oṅkārasvarabhūṣitā ।tato vindurmahādevi ekāreṇa vyavasthitaḥ ।।

īśvaro avadat iti gha

dānavādyā iti ja

yāmārādhyākhilātmaviditi kha, ga ca
jāto nāda ukārastu nadate hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ ।ardhacandra ikārastu mokṣamārgasya bodhakaḥ ।।akāro vyakta utpanno bhogamokṣapradaḥ paraḥ ।akāra aiśvare bhūmirnivṛttiś ca kalā smṛtā ।।gandhonavījaḥ prāṇākhya iḍāśaktiḥ sthirā smṛtā ।ikāraś ca pratiṣṭhākhyo raso pālaś ca piṅgalā ।।krūrā śaktirīvījaḥ syāddharavījo agnirūpavān ।vidyā samānā gāndhārī śaktiś ca dahanī smṛtā ।।praśāntirvāryupaspṛśo yaścodānaś calā kriyā ।oṅkāraḥ śāntyatītākhyaḥ khaśabdayūthapāṇinaḥ ।।pañca vargāḥ svarā jātāḥ kujajñagurubhārgavāḥ ।śaniḥ kramādakārādyāḥ kakārādyāstvadhaḥ sthitāḥ ।।etanmūlamataḥ sarvaṃ jñāyate sacarācaraṃ ।vidyāpīṭhaṃ pravakṣyāmi praṇavaḥ śiva īritaḥ ।।umā somaḥ svayaṃ śaktirvāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrāpi ।brahmā viṣṇuḥ kramādrudro guṇāḥ sargādayastrayaḥ ।।ratnanāḍītrayañcaiva sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ paro aparaḥ ।cintayecchvetavarṇantaṃ muñcamānaṃ parāmṛtaṃ ।।plavyamānaṃ yathātmānaṃ cintayettaṃ divāniśaṃ ।ajaratvaṃ bhaveddevi śivatvamupagacchati ।।

bhogamokṣapradaḥ śubha iti ja

bahunāḍītrayañcaiveti ka, ṅa ca

śivatvamadhigacchatīti ja
aṅguṣṭhādau nyasedaṅgānnetraṃ madhye atha dehake ।mṛtyuñayaṃ tataḥ prārcya raṇādau vijayī bhavet ।।śūnyo nirālayaḥ śabdaḥ sparśaṃ tiryaṅnataṃ spṛśet ।rūpasyordhvagatiḥ proktā jalasyādhaḥ samāśritā ।।sarvasthānavinirmukto gandho madhye ca mūlakaṃ ।nābhimūle sthitaṃ kandaṃ śivarūpantu maṇḍitaṃ ।।śaktivyūhena somo arko haristatra vyavasthitaḥ ।daśavāyusamopetaṃ pañcatanmātramaṇḍitaṃ ।।kālānalasamākāraṃ prasphurantaṃ śivātmakaṃ ।tajjīvaṃ jīvalokasya sthāvarasya carasya ca ।।tasminnaṣṭe mṛtaṃ manye mantrapīṭhe anilātmakaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave jyotiḥśāstrasāro nāma caturviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yuddhajayārṇavīyanānācakrāṇi

īśvara uvāca

oṃ hrīṃ karṇamoṭāni bahurūpe bahudaṃṣṭre hrūṃ

nāḍīmūle iti kha

tatra vījaṃ jīvanāyeti kha, cha ca । tatra jīvaṃ jīvaloka iti ṅa

tasminnaste iti gha

phaṭ oṃ haḥ oṃ grasa grasa kṛnta kṛnta chaka chaka chaka hrūṃ phaṭ namaḥ
paṭhyamāno hy ayaṃ mantraḥ kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ ।māraṇe pātane vāpi mohanoccāṭane bhavet ।।karṇamoṭī mahāvidyā sarvavarṇeṣu rakṣikā ।
nānāvidyā
pañcodayaṃ pravakṣyāmi svarodayasamaśritaṃ ।।nābhihṛdyantaraṃ yāvattāvaccarati mārutaḥ ।uccāṭayedraṇādau tu karṇākṣīṇi prabhedayet ।।karoti sādhakaḥ kruddho japahomaparāyaṇaḥ ।hṛdayātpāyukaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ jvaradāhārimāraṇe ।।kaṇṭhodbhavo raso vāyuḥ śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ rasaṃ ।divyaṃ stambhaṃ samākarṣaṃ gandho nāsāntiko bhruvaḥ ।।gandhalīnaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā stambhayennātra saṃśayaḥ ।stambhanaṃ kīlanādyañca karotyeva hi sādhakaḥ ।।caṇḍaghaṇṭā karālī ca sumukhī durmukhī tathā ।revatī prathamā ghorā vāyucakreṣu tā yajet ।।uccāṭakārikā devyaḥ sthitāstejasi saṃsthitāḥ ।saumyā ca bhīṣaṇī devī jayā ca vijayā tathā ।।ajitā cāparājitā mahākoṭī ca raudrayā ।śuṣkakāyā prāṇaharā rasacakre sthitā amūḥ ।।

oṃ huṃ phaḍiti kha

jvaradāhanivāraṇe iti gha
virūpākṣī parā divyās tathā cākāśamātaraḥ ।saṃhārī jātahārī ca daṃṣṭrālā śuṣkarevatī ।।pipīlikā puṣṭiharā mahāpuṣṭipravardhanā ।bhadrakālī subhadrā ca hadrabhīmā subhadrikā ।।sthirā ca niṣṭhurā divyā niṣkampā gadinī tathā ।dvātriṃśanmātaraś cakre aṣṭāṣṭakramaśaḥ sthitāḥ ।।eka eva raviś candra ekaś caikaikaśaktikā ।bhūtabhedena tīrthāni yathā toyaṃ mahītale ।।prāṇa eko maṇḍalaiś ca bhidyate bhūtapañjare ।vāmadakṣiṇayogena daśadhā sampravartate ।।vindumuṇḍavicitrañca tattvavastreṇa veṣṭitaṃ ।brahmāṇḍena kapālena piveta paramāmṛtaṃ ।।pañcavargabalādyuddhe jayo bhavati tacchṛṇu ।a ākacaṭatapayāḥ śa āsyo varga īritaḥ ।।i īkhachaṭhathapharāḥ ṣo vargaś ca dvitīyakaḥ ।u ūgajaḍadabalāḥ so vargaś ca tṛtīyakaḥ ।।e aighajhaḍhadhabhavāḥ so vargaś ca caturthakaḥ ।o au aṃ aḥ ṅañaṇanā mo vargaḥ pañcamo bhavet ।।varṇāścābhyudaye nṝṇāṃ catvāriṃśacca pañca ca ।bālaḥ kumāro yuvā syādvṛddho mṛtyuś ca nāmataḥ ।।

bhūtabhedena bhinnāni iti ṅa। tāni bhedena bhinnāni iti gha

brahmadaṇḍe iti ṅa
ātmapīdā śoṣakaḥ syādudāsīnaś ca kālakaḥ ।kṛttikā pratipadbhauma ātmano lābhadaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।ṣaṣṭhī bhaumo maghā pīḍā ārdrā caikādaśī kujaḥ ।mṛtyurmaghā dvitīyā jño lābhaścārdrā ca saptamī ।।budhe hānirbharaṇī jñaḥ śravaṇaṃ kāla īdṛśaḥ ।jīvo lābhāya ca bhavettṛtīyā pūrvaphalgunī ।।jīvo aṣṭamī dhaniṣṭhārdrā jīvo aśleṣā trayodaśī ।mṛtyau śukraś caturthī syāt pūrvabhādrapadā śriye ।।pūrvāṣāḍhā ca navamī śukraḥ pīḍākaro bhavet ।bharaṇī bhūtajā śukro yamadaṇḍo hi hānikṛt ।।kṛttikāṃ pañcamī mando lābhāya tithirīritā ।aśleṣā daśamī mando yogaḥ pīḍākaro bhavet ।।maghā śaniḥ pūrṇimā ca yogo bhṛtyukaraḥ smṛtaḥ ।
tithiyogaḥ
pūrvottarāgninairṛtyadakṣiṇānilacandramāḥ ।।brahmādyāḥ syurdṛṣṭayaḥ syuḥ pratipannavamīmukhāḥ ।rāśibhiḥ sahitā dṛṣṭā grahādyāḥ siddhaye smṛtāḥ ।।meṣādyāś caturaḥ kumbhā jayaḥ pūrṇe anyathā mṛtiḥ ।sūryādiriktā pūrṇā ca kramādevampradāpayet ।।

jīve aṣṭamīti kha

bharaṇītyādiḥ, pīḍākaro bhavetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti

dakṣāgnyanilacandramā iti gha

brahmādyāḥ syustridṛṣṭāḥ syuriti kha
raṇe sūrye phalaṃ nāsti some bhaṅgaḥ praśāmyati ।kujena kalahaṃ vidyādbudhaḥ kāmāya vai guruḥ ।।jayāya manase śukro mande bhaṅgo raṇe bhavet ।deyāni piṅgalācakre sūryagāni ca bhāni hi ।।mukhe netre lalāṭe atha śirohastorupādake ।pāde mṛtistriṛkṣe syāntrīṇi pakṣe arthanāśanam ।।mukhasthe ca bhavetyauḍā śirasthe kāryanāśanam ।kukṣisthite phalaṃ syācca rāhucakraṃ vadāmyaham ।।indrācca nairṛtaṅgacchetrairṛtātsomameva ca ।somāddhutāśanaṃ vahnerāpyamāpyācchivālayaṃ ।।rudrādyamaṃ yamādvāyuṃ vāyoś candraṃ vrajet punaḥ ।bhuṅkte catasro nāḍyastu rāhupṛṣṭe jayo raṇe ।।agrato mṛtyumāpnoti tithirāhuṃ vadāmi te ।āgneyādiśivāntaṃ ca pūrṇimāmāditaḥ priye ।।pūrve kṛṣṇāṣṭamīṃ yāvat rāhudṛṣṭau bhayo bhavet ।aiśānyāgneyanairṛtyavāyavye phaṇirāhukaḥ ।।meṣādyā diśi pūrvādau yatrādityo agrato mṛtiḥ ।tṛtīyā kṛṣṇapakṣe tu saptamī daśamī tathā ।।caturdaśī tathā śukre caturthyekādaśī tithiḥ ।pañcadaśī viṣṭayasyuḥ pūrṇimāgneyavāyave ।।akacaṭatapayaśā vargāḥ sūryādayo grahāḥ ।

maṇaye iti kha, ṅa ca
gṛdhrolukaśyenakāś ca piṅgalaḥ kauśikaḥ kramāt ।।sāsasaś ca mayūraś ca goraṅkuḥ pakṣiṇaḥ smṛtāḥ ।ādau sādhyo huto mantra uccāṭe pallavaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।vaśye jvare tathākarṣe prayogaḥ siddhikārakaḥ ।śānto prīto namaskāro vauṣaṭ puṣṭo vaśādiṣu ।।huṃ mṛtyau prītisannāśe vidveṣoccāṭane ca phaṭ ।vaṣaṭ sute ca dīptyādau mantrāṇāṃ jātayaś ca ṣaṭ ।।oṣadhīḥ sampravakṣyāmi mahārakṣāvidhāyinīḥ ।mahākālī tathā caṇḍī vārāhī ceśvarī tathā ।।sudarśanā tathendrāṇī gātrasthā rakṣayanti tam ।balā cātibalā bhīrurmusalī sahadevyapi ।।jātī ca mallikā yūthau gāruḍī bhṛṅgarājakaḥ ।cakrarūpā mahoṣadhyo dhāritā vijayādidāḥ ।।grahaṇe ca mahādevi uddhṛtāḥ śubhadāyikāḥ ।mṛdā tu kuñjaraṅkṛtvā sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitam ।।tasya pādatale kṛtvā stambhayecchatrumātmanaḥ ।nagāgre caikavṛkṣe ca vajrāhatapradeśake ।।valmīkamṛdāmāhṛtya mātarau yojayettataḥ ।
oṃ namo mahābhairavāya vikṛtadaṃṣṭrograrūpāya piṅgalākṣāya triśūlakhaḍgadharāya vauṣaṭ

ādau hutāśano mantra iti kha

huṃ mṛtau iti kha

vaṣaṭ lābhe ca dīptyādāviti gha, cha ca

triśūlakhaṭvāṅgadharāyeti kha, ga, gha, cha ca । triśūline khaḍgakhaṭvāṅgadharāyeti ja
pūjayet kardamaṃ devi stambhayecchastrajālakam ।।agnikāryaṃ pravakṣyāmi raṇādau jayavardhanam ।śmaśāne niśi kāṣṭhāgnau nagnī muktaśikho naraḥ ।।dakṣiṇāsyastu juhuyānnṛmāṃsaṃ rundhiraṃ viṣaṃ ।tuṣāsthikhaṇḍamiśrantu śatrunāmnā śatāṣṭakam ।।
oṃ namo bhagavati kaumāri lala lala lālaya lālaya ghaṇṭādevi amukaṃ māraya sahasā namo astu te bhagavati vidye svāhā anayā vidyayā homādbandhatvañjāyate ripoḥ ।

oṃ vajrakāya vajratuṇḍa kapilapiṅgala karālavadana ūrdhvakeśa mahābala raktamukha taḍijjihva mahāraudra daṃṣṭrotkaṭa kaha karālina mahādṛḍhaprahāra laṅgeśvarasetubandha śailapravāha gaganacara ehyehi bhavaganmahābalaparākrama bhairavo jñāpayati ehyehi mahāraudra dīrghalāṅgūlena amukaṃ veṣṭaya veṣṭaya jambhaya jambhaya khana khana vaite hrūṃ phaṭ aṣṭatriṃśacchatandevi hanumān sarvakumbhakṛt ।। paṭe hanūmatsandarśanādbhaṅgamāyānti śatravaḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave nānācakrāṇi nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

dagdhatvaṃ jāyate kṣaṇāt iti gha, ja ca

vajramukha iti gha

huṃphaḍiti kha

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nakṣatranirṇayaḥ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣyāmyṛkṣātmakaṃ piṇḍaṃ śubhāśubhavibuddhaye ।yasminnṛkṣe bhavet sūryastadādau trīṇi mūrdhani ।।ekammukhe dvayannetre hastapāde catuṣṭayaṃ ।hṛdi pañca sute jānau āyurbuddhiṃ vicintayet ।।śirasthe tu bhavedrājyaṃ piṇḍato vaktrayogataḥ ।netrayoḥ kāntasaubhāgyaṃ hṛdaye dravyasaṅgrahaḥ ।।haste dhṛtaṃ taskaratvaṅgatāsuradhvagaḥ pade ।kumbhāṣtake bhāni likhya sūryakumbhastu riktakaḥ ।।aśubhaḥ sūryakumbhaḥ syācchubhaḥ pūrvādisaṃsthitaḥ ।phaṇirāhuṃ pravakṣyāmi jayājayavivekadaṃ ।।aṣṭāviṃśāṃllikhedvindūn punarbhājyastribhstribhiḥ ।atha ṛkṣāṇi catvāri rekhāstatraiva dāpayet ।।yasminnṛkṣe sthito rāhustadṛkṣaṃ phaṇimūrdhani ।tadādi vinyased bhāni saptaviṃśakrameṇa tu ।।vaktre saptagate ṛkṣe mriyate sarva āhave ।

trīṇi mastake iti ja

gatāyuradhvagaḥ pade iti kha

bhāni likhediti gha, ja ca

kālarāhumiti ṅa

kālamūrdhanīti ṅa, ja, ca
skandhe bhaṅgaṃ vijānīyātsaptameṣu ca madhyataḥ ।।udarasthena pūjā ca jayaś caivātmanas tathā ।kaṭideśe sthite yodhe āhave harate parān ।।pucchasthitena kīrtiḥ syādrāhudṛṣṭe ca bhe mṛtiḥ ।punaranyaṃ pravakṣyāmi ravirāhubalantava ।।raviḥ śukro budhaś caiva somaḥ saurirgurus tathā ।lohitaḥ saṃhikaś caiva ete yāmārdhabhāginaḥ ।।sauriṃ raviñca rāhuñca kṛtvā yatnena pṛṣṭhataḥ ।sa jayet sainyasaṅghātaṃ dyūtamadhvānamāhavaṃ ।।rohiṇī cottarāstisro mṛgaḥ pañca sthirāṇi hi ।aśvinī revatī svātī dhaniṣṭhā śatatārakā ।।kṣiprāṇi pañcabhānyeva yātrārthī caiva yojayet ।anurādhāhastamūlaṃ mṛgaḥ puṣyaṃ punarvasuḥ ।।sarvakāryeṣu caitāni jyeṣṭhā citrā viśākhayā ।purvāstisro agnirbharaṇī maghārdrāśleṣādāruṇāḥ ।।sthāvareṣu sthiraṃ hy ṛkṣaṃ yātrāyāṃ kṣipramuttamaṃ ।saubhāgyārthe mṛdūnyeva ugreṣūgrantu kārayet ।।dāruṇe dāruṇaṃ kuryādvakṣye cādhomukhādikaṃ ।kṛtrikā bharaṇyaśleṣā viśākhā pitṛnairṛtam ।।

udarasthe ceti kha

kaṭideśa ity ādiḥ, saurirgurustathetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ gha pustake nāsti

yātrādhvani ceti kha, gha ca
pūrvātrayamadhovaktraṃ karma cādhomukhañcaret ।eṣu kūpataḍāgādi vidyākarma bhiṣakkriyā ।।sthāpanannaukābhūpādividhānaṃ khananantathā ।revatī cāśvinī citrā hastā svātī punarvasuḥ ।।anurādhā mṛgo jyeṣṭhā nava vai pārśvatomukhāḥ ।eṣu rājyābhiṣekañca paṭṭabandhaṅgajāśvayoḥ ।।ārāmagṛhaprāsādaṃ prākāraṃ kṣetratoraṇaṃ ।dhvajacihnapatākāś ca sarvānetāṃś ca kārayet ।।dvādaśī sūryadagdhā tu candreṇaikadaśī tathā ।bhaumena daśamī dagdhā tṛtīyā vai budhena ca ।।ṣaṣṭī ca guruṇā dagdhā dvitīyā bhṛguṇā tathā ।saptamī sūryaputreṇa tripuṣkaramatho vade ।।dvitīyā dvādaśī caiva saptamī vai tṛtīyayā ।ravirbhaumas tathā śauriḥ ṣaḍetāstu tripuṣkarāḥ ।।viśākhā kṛttikā caiva uttare dve punarvasuḥ ।pūrvabhādrapadā caiva ṣaḍete tu tripuṣkarāḥ ।।lābho hānirjayo vṛddhiḥ putrajanma tathaiva ca ।naṣṭaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vā tatsarvantriguṇaṃ bhavet ।।

cādhomukhaṃ bhavediti kha

naukādyūtādividhānamiti ga, gha, ṅa ca

vajracihnapatākāśceti jha

tṛtīyaketi ṅa, ja ca

gururbhaumastatheti ka, ga, gha, ṅa ca

ṣaḍetāstriṣu puṣkarā iti ka, kha, ṅa, cha ca

tatsarvaṃ dviguṇamiti kha, cha ca
aśvinī bharaṇī caiva aśleṣā puṣyameva ca ।khātiś caiva viśākhā ca śravaṇaṃ saptamaṃ punaḥ ।।etāni dṛḍhacakṣūṃṣi paśyanati ca diśo daśa ।yātrāsu dūragasyāpi āgamaḥ puṇyagocare ।।āṣāḍhe revatī citrā kekarāṇi punarvasuḥ ।eṣu pañcasu ṛkṣeṣu nirgatasyāgamo bhavet ।।kṛttikā rohiṇī saumyaṃ phalgunī ca maghā tathā ।mūlaṃ jyeṣṭhānurādhā ca dhaniṣṭhā śatatārakāḥ ।।pūrvabhādrapadā caiva cipiṭāni ca tāni hi ।adhvānaṃ vrajamānasya punarevāgamo bhavet ।।hasta uttarabhādraś ca ārdrāṣāḍhā tathaiva ca ।naṣṭārthāś caiva dṛśyante saṅgrāmo naiva vidyate ।।punarvakṣyāmi gaṇḍāntamṛkṣamadhye yathā sthitam ।revatyante caturnāḍī aśvinyādicatuṣṭayam ।।ubhayoryāmamātrantu varjayettat prayatnataḥ ।aśleṣānte maghādau tu ghaṭikānāṃ catuṣṭayam ।।dvitīyaṃ gaṇḍamākhyātaṃ tṛtīyaṃ bhairavi śṛṇu ।jyeṣṭhābhamūlayormadhye ugrarūpantu yāmakam ।।

kekareṣu ca ṛkṣeṣu iti cha

cipiṭāni ca bhāni hi iti ka, cha ca

revatyante catuṣkantu iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca
na kuryācchubhakarmāṇi yadīcchedātmajīvitaṃ ।
dārake jātakāle ca mriyete pitṛmātaro ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nakṣatranirṇayo nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānābalāni

īśvara uvāca 
viṣkumbhe ghaṭikāstisraḥ śūle pañca vivarjayet ।ṣaṭ ṣaṭ gaṇḍe anigaṇḍe ca nava vyādyātavajrayoḥ ।।parighe ca vyatīpāte ubhayorapi taddinam ।vaidhṛte taddinañcaiva yātrāyuddhādikantyajet ।।grahaiḥ śubhāśubhaṃ vakṣye devi meṣādirāśitaḥ ।candraśukrau ca janmasthyau varjitau śubhadāyakau ।।

jātake cāpīti kha

agniruvāceti cha

pañca ca varjayediti kha, ga, gha, ṅa ca

ṣaṭ ca gaṇḍe atigaṇḍe ceti kha, gha, cha ca । sapta gaṇḍetigaṇḍe ceti ga, ṅa ca

meṣādirāśibhiriti ja
dvitīyo maṅgalo athārkaḥ sauriś caiva tu saiṃhikaḥ ।dravyanāśamalābhañca āhave bhaṅgamādiśet ।।somo budho bhṛgurjīmo dvitīyasthāḥ śubhāvahāḥ ।tṛtīyastho yadā bhānuḥ śanirbhaumo bhṛgus tathā ।।budhaś caivendū rāhuś ca sarve te phaladā grahāḥ ।budhaśukrau caturthau tu śeṣāś caiva bhayāvahāḥ ।।pañcamastho yadā jīvaḥ śukraḥ saumyaś ca candramāḥ ।dadeta cepsitaṃ lābhaṃ ṣaṣṭhe sthāne śubho raviḥ ।।candraḥ saurirmaṅgalaś ca grahā devi svarāśitaḥ ।budhaś ca śubhadaḥ ṣaṣṭhe tyajet ṣaṣṭhaṃ guruṃbhṛguṃ ।।saptamo arkaḥ śanirbhaumo rāhurhānyai sukhāya ca ।jīvo bhṛguś ca saumyaś ca jñaśukro cāṣṭamau śubhau ।।śeṣā grahās tathā hānyai jñabhṛgū navamau śubhau ।śeṣā hānyai ca lābhāya daśamau bhṛgubhāskarau ।।śanirbhaumaś ca rāhuś ca candraḥ saumyaḥ śubhāvahaḥ ।śubhāś caikādaśe sarve varjayeddaśame gurum ।।budhaśukrau dvādaśasthau śeṣān dvādaśagāṃstyajet ।ahorātre dvādaśa syū rāśayastān vadāmyaham ।।mīno meṣo atha mithunañcatasro nāḍayo vṛṣaḥ ।ṣaṭ karkasiṃhakanyāś ca tulā pañca ca vṛścikaḥ ।।dhanurnakro ghaṭaś caiva sūryago rāśirādyakaḥ ।

dadātīti kha

varjayeddaśamiti kha, ga, gha, ṅa ca
carasthiradviḥsvabhāvā meṣādyāḥ syuryathākramam ।।kulīro makaraś caiva tulāmeṣādayaś carāḥ ।carakāryaṃ jayaṃ kāmamācarecca śubhaśubham ।।sthiro vṛṣo hariḥ kumbho vṛścikaḥ sthirakāryake ।śīghraḥ samāgamo nāsti rogārto nauva mucyate ।।mithunaṃ kanyakā maunī dhanuś ca dviḥsvabhāvakaḥ ।dviḥsvabhāvāḥ śubhāś caite sarvakāryeṣu nityaśaḥ ।।yātrāvāṇijyasaṅgrāme vivāhe rājadarśane ।vṛddhiṃ jayantathā lābhaṃ yuddhe jayamavāpnuyāt ।।aśvinī viṃśatārāś ca turagasyākṛtiryathā ।yadyatra kurute vṛṣṭimekarātraṃ pravarṣati ।।yamabhe tu yadā vṛṣṭiḥ pakṣamekantu varṣati ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave nānābalāni nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha aṣṭāviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

koṭacakram

īavara uvāca
koṭacakraṃ pravakṣyāmi caturasraṃ puraṃ likhet ।caturasraṃ punarmadhye tanmadhye caturasrakam ।।
