nāḍītritayacihnāḍhyaṃ meṣādyāḥ pūrvadiṅmukhāḥ ।kṛttikā pūrvabhāge tu aśleṣāgneyagocare ।।bharaṇī dakṣiṇe deyā viśākhāṃ nairṛte nyaset ।anurādhāṃ paścime ca śravaṇaṃ vāyugocare ।।dhanbiṣṭhāñcottare nyasya aiśānyāṃ revatīṃ tathā ।vāhyanāḍyāṃ sthitānyeva aṣṭau hy ṛkṣāṇi yatnataḥ ।।rohiṇīpuṣyaphalguṇyaḥ svātī jyeṣṭhā krameṇa tu ।abhijicchatatārā tu aśvinī madhyanāḍikā ।।koṭamadhye tu yā nāḍī kathayāmi prayatnataḥ ।mṛgaścābhyantare pūrvaṃ tasyāgneye punarvasuḥ ।।uttarāphalgunī yāmye citrā nairṛtasaṃsthitā ।mūlantu paścime nyasyottarāṣāḍhāntu vāyave ।।pūrvabhādrapadā saumye revatī īśagocare ।koṭasyābhyantare nāḍī hy ṛkṣāṣṭakasamanvitā ।।ārdrā hastā tathāṣāḍhā catuṣkañcottarātrikam ।madhye stambhacatuṣkantu dadyāt koṭasya koṭare ।।evaṃ durgasya vinyāsaṃ vāhye sthānaṃ diśādhipāt ।āgantuko yadā yoddhā ṛkṣavān syātphalānvitaḥ ।।koṭamadhye grahāḥ saumyā yadā ṛkṣānvitāḥ punaḥ ।jayaṃ madhyasthitānāntu bhaṅgamāgāmino viduḥ ।।praveśabhe praveṣṭavyaṃ nirgamabhe ca nirgamet ।bhṛguḥ saumyas tathā bhauma ṛkṣāntaṃ sakalaṃ yadā ।।tadā bhaṅgaṃ vijānīyājjayamāgantukasya ca ।

praveśarkṣacatuṣke tu saṅgrāmañcārabhed yadā ।।
tadā siddhyati taddurgaṃ na kuryāttatra vismayam ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave koṭacakraṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

arghakāṇḍam

īśvara uvāca
arghamānaṃ pravakṣyāmi ulkāpāto atha bhūś calā ।nirghāto grahaṇaṃ veśo diśāṃ dāho bhavedyadā ।।lakṣayenmāsi māsyevaṃ yadyete syuś ca caitrake ।alaṅkārādi saṅgṛhya ṣaḍbhirmāsaiś caturguṇam ।।vaiśākhe cāṣṭame māsi ṣaḍguṇaṃ sarvasaṅgrahaṃ ।jyaiṣṭhe māsi tathāṣāḍhe yavagodhūmadhānyakaiḥ ।।śrāvaṇe ghṛtatailādyair āśvine vastradhānyakaiḥ ।kārttike dhānyakaiḥ krītair māse syānmārgaśīrṣake ।।puṣye kuṅkumagandhādyair lābho dhānyaiś ca māghake ।gandhādyaiḥ phālgune krītair arghakāṇḍamudāhṛtam ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe arghakāṇḍaṃ nāma ūnatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha triṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ghātacakraṃ

īśvara uvāca
maṇḍalāni pravakṣyāmi caturdhā vijayāya hi ।kṛttikā ca maghā puṣpaṃ pūrvā caiva tu phalgunī ।।viśākhā bharaṇī caiva pūrvabhādrapadā tathā ।āgneyamaṇḍalaṃ bhadre tasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ ।।yadyatra calate vāyurveṣṭanaṃ śaśisūryayoḥ ।bhūmikampo atha nirghāto grahaṇaṃ candrasūryayoḥ ।।dhūmajvālā diśāṃ dāhaḥ ketoś caiva pradarśanaṃ ।raktavṛṣṭiścopatāpaḥ pāṣāṇapatanantathā ।।netrarogo atisāraś ca agniś ca prabalo bhavet ।svalpakṣīrās tathā gāvaḥ svalpapuṣpaphalā drumāḥ ।।vināśaś caiva śasyānāṃ svalpavṛṣṭiṃ vinirdiśet ।cāturvarṇāḥ prapīḍyante kṣudhārtā akhilā narāḥ ।।saindhavā yāmunāś caiva gurjakā bhojavāhṇikāḥ ।jālandharaṃ ca kāśmīraṃ saptamañcottarāpatham ।।deśāś caite vinaśyanti tasminnutpātadarśane ।hastā citrā maghā svātī mṛgo vātha punarvasuḥ ।।uttarāphalgunī caiva aśvinī ca tathaiva ca ।

yadātra bhavate kiñcidvāyavyantaṃ vinirdiśet ।।naṣṭadharmāḥ prajāḥ sarvā hāhābhūtā vicetasaḥ ।ḍāhalaḥ kāmarūpañca kaliṅgaḥ kośalas tathā ।।ayodhyā ca avantī ca naśyante koṅkaṇāndhrakāḥ ।aśleṣā caiva mūlantu pūrvāṣāḍhā tathaiva ca ।।revatī vāruṇaṃ hy ṛkṣantathā bhādrapadottarā ।yadātra calate kiñcidvāruṇaṃ taṃ vinirdiśet ।।bahukṣīraghṛtā gāvo bahupuṣpaphalā drumāḥ ।ārogyaṃ tatra jāyeta bahuśasyā ca medinī ।।dhānyāni ca samarghāni sukhikṣaṃ pārthiva bhavet ।pparasparaṃ narendrāṇāṃ saṅgrāmo dāruṇo bhavet ।।jyeṣṭhā ca rohiṇī caiva anurādhā ca vaiṣṇavam ।dhaniṣṭhā cottarāṣāḍhā abhijit saptamantathā ।।yadātra śalate kiñcin māhendraṃ taṃ vinirdiśet ।prajāḥ samuditāstasmin sarvarogavivarjitāḥ ।।sandhiṃ kurvanti rājānaḥ subhikṣaṃ pārthivaṃ śubham ।grāmastu dvividho jñeyo mukhapucchakaro mahān ।।candro rāhus tathāditya ekarāśau yadi sthitaḥ ।mukhagrāmastu vijñeyo yāmitre puccha ucyate ।।

yadyatra bhvate iti ja

yadātra labhate iti cha

yathā sthita iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ja ca । yadā sthita iti ja, jha ca
bhānoḥ pañcadaśe hy ṛkṣe yadā carati candramāḥ ।tithicchede tu samprāpte somagrāmaṃ vinirdiśet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave maṇḍalaṃ nāma triṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ghātacakrādiḥ

īśvara uvāca
pradakṣiṇamakārādīn svarān pūrvādito likhet ।caitrādyaṃ bhramaṇāccakraṃ pratipat pūrṇimā tithiḥ ।।trayodaśī caturdaśī aṣṭamyekā ca saptamī ।pratipattrayodaśyantāstithayo dvādaśa smṛtāḥ ।।caitracakre tu saṃsparśājjayalābhādikaṃ viduḥ ।ciṣame tu śubhaṃ jñeyaṃ same cāśubhamīritam ।।yuddhakāle samutpatre yasya nama hy udāhṛtam ।mātrārūḍhantu yannāma ādityo gurureva ca ।।

tithibhede iti jha
jayastasya sadākālaṃ saṅgrāme caiva bhīṣaṇe ।hrasvanāma yadā yodho mriyate hy anivāritaḥ ।।prathamo dīrgha ādistho dvitīyo madhye antakaḥ ।dvau madhyena prathamāntau jāyete nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।punaścānte yadā cādau svarārūḍhantu dṛśyate ।hrasvasya maraṇaṃ vidyād dīrghasyaiva jayo bhavet ।।naracakraṃ pravakṣyāmi hy ṛkṣapiṇḍātmakaṃ yathā ।pratimāmālikhet pūrvaṃ padyādṛkṣāṇi vinyaset ।।śīrṣe trīṇi mukhe caikaṃ dve ṛkṣe netrayornyaset ।vedasaṅkhyāni hastābhyāṃ karṇe ṛkṣadvayaṃ punaḥ ।।hṛdaye bhūtasaṅkhyāni ṣaḍṛkṣāṇi tu pādayoḥ ।nāma hy ṛkṣaṃ sphuṭaṃ kṛṭvā cakramadhye tu vinyaset ।।netre śirodakṣakarṇe yāmyahaste ca pādayoḥ ।hṛdgrīvāvāmahaste tu punarguhye tu pādayoḥ ।।yasminnṛkṣe sthitaḥ sūryaḥ saurirbhaumastu saiṃhikaḥ ।tasmin sthāne sthite vidyād ghātameva na saṃśayaḥ ।।jayacakraṃ pravakṣyāmi ādihāntāṃś ca vai likhet ।rekhāstrayodaśālikhya ṣaḍrekhāstiryagālikhet ।।dig grahā munayaḥ sūryā ṛtvigrudrastithiḥ kramāt ।mūrchanāsmṛtivedarkṣajinā akaḍamā hy adhaḥ ।।

mriyate hy avicārita iti kha । mriyate hy avicārata iti ga, gha, ṅa ca

yathā cādau iti ka, ga, gha, ṅa ca

mūrchanāsmṛtivedāṅgajinā iti ña
ādityādyāḥ saptahṛte nāmānte balino grahāḥ ।ādityasauribhaumākhyā jaye saumyāś ca sandhaye ।।rekhā dvādaśa coddhṛtya ṣaṭ ca yāsyāstathottarāḥ ।manuś caiva tu ṛkṣāṇi netre ca ravimaṇḍalaṃ ।।tithayaś ca rasā vedā agniḥ saptadaśāthavā ।vasurandhrāḥ samākhyātā akaṭapānadho nyaset ।।ekaikamakṣarannyastvā śeṣāṇyevaṅkramān nyaset ।nāmākṣarakṛtaṃ piṇḍaṃ vasubhirbhājayettataḥ ।।vāyasānmaṇḍalo atyagro maṇḍalādrāsabho varaḥ ।rāsabhādvṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭhā vṛṣabhāt kuñjaro varaḥ ।।kuñjarāccaiva punaḥ siṃhaḥ siṃhāś caiva kharurvaraḥ ।kharoś caiva balī dhūmraḥ evamādi balābalaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ghātacakrādirnāmaikatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvātriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sevācakraṃ

īśvara uvāca
sevācakraṃ pravakṣyāmi lābhālābhānusūcakaṃ ।pitā mātā tathā bhrātā dampatī ca viśeṣataḥ ।।

mantraś caiva tu iti kha, gha, ja, ña ca

lābhālābhārthasūcakamiti jha, ña ca
tasmiṃś cakre tu vijñeyaṃ yo yasmāllabhate phalaṃ ।ṣaḍūrdhvāḥ sthāpayedrekhā bhinnāścāṣtau tu tiryagāḥ ।।koṣṭhakāḥ pañcatriṃśacca teṣu varṇān samālikhet ।svarān pañca samuddhṛtya sparśān paścāt samālikhet ।।kakārādihakārāntān hīnāṅgāṃstrīnvivarjayet ।siddhaḥ sādhyaḥ susiddhaś ca arirmṛtyuś ca nāmataḥ ।।arirmṛtyuaś ca dvāvetau varjayet sarvakarmasu ।eṣāṃ madhye yadā nāma lakṣayettu prayatnataḥ ।।ātmapakṣe sthitāḥ sattvāḥ sarve te śubhadāyakāḥ ।dvitīyaḥ poṣakāś caiva tṛtīyaścārthadāyakaḥ ।।ātmanāśaś caturthastu pañcamo mṛtyudāyakaḥ ।sthānamevārthalābhāya mitrabhṛtyādivāndhavāḥ ।।siddhaḥ sādhyaḥ susiddhaś ca sarve te phaladāyakāḥ ।arirbhṛtyaś ca dvāvetau varjayet sarvakarmasu ।।akārāntaṃ yathā proktaṃ a i u e o vidus tathā ।punaś caivāṃśakān vakṣye vargāṣṭakasusaṃskṛtān ।।devā akāravarge daityāḥ kavargamāśritāḥ ।nāgāś caiva cavargāḥ syurgandhavāś ca ṭavargajāḥ ।।

svārthapakṣe iti kha, gha, ja, ña ca । svātmapakṣe iti jha

svārthanāśaś caturthastu iti kha, gha, ṅa, ja, ña ca

arirmṛtyurityādiḥ, sarvakarmasu ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti
tavarge ṛṣayaḥ proktāḥ pavarge rākṣasāḥ smṛtāḥ ।piśācāś ca yavarge ca śavarge mānuṣāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।devebhyo balino daityā daityebhyaḥ pannagās tathā ।pannagebhyaś ca gandharvā gandharvādṛṣayo varāḥ ।।ṛṣibhyo rākṣasāḥ śūrā rākṣasebhyaḥ piśācakāḥ ।piśācebhyo mānuṣāḥ syurdurbalaṃ varjayedbalī ।।punarmitravibhāgantu tārācakraṃ kramācchṛṇu ।nāmādyakṣaramṛkṣantu sphuṭaṃ kṛtvā tu parvataḥ ।।ṛkṣe tu saṃsthitāstārā navatrikā yathākramāt ।janma sampadvipat kṣemaṃ nāmarkṣāttārakā imāḥ ।।pratyarā dhanadā ṣaṣṭhī naidhanāmaitrake pare ।paramaitrāntimā tārā janmatārā tvaśobhanā ।।sampattārā mahāśreṣṭhā vipattārā tu niṣphalā ।kṣematārā sarvakārye pratparā arthanāśinī ।।dhanadā rājyalābhādi naidhanā kāryanāśinī ।maitratārā ca mitrāya paramitrā hitāvahā ।।tārācakraṃ ।mātrā vai svarasañjñā syānnāmamadhye kṣipet priye ।viṃśatyā ca haredbhāgaṃ yaccheṣaṃ tat phalaṃ bhavet ।।ubhayortrāsamadhye tu lakṣayecca dhanaṃ hy ṛṇaṃ ।hīnamātrā hy ṛṇaṃ jñeyandhanaṃ mātrādhikaṃ punaḥ ।।

pannagāstatra iti ka, ga, gha, ṅa, ña ca । pannagāḥ smṛtā iti jha

pratyarā cātmanāśinī iti cha

hitāya ceti ṅa
dhanena mitratā nṝṇāṃ ṛṇenaiva hy udāsatā ।sevācakramidaṃ proktaṃ lābhālābhādidarśakaṃ ।।meṣamithunayoḥ prītirmaitrī mithunasiṃhayoḥ ।tulāsiṃhau mahāmaitrī evaṃ dhanurghaṭe punaḥ ।।mitrasevāṃ na kurvīta mitrau mīnavṛṣau matau ।vṛṣakarkaṭayormaitrī kulīraghaṭayos tathā ।।kanyāvṛścikayorevantathā makarakīṭayoḥ ।mīnamakarayormaitrī tṛtīyaikādaśe sthitā ।।tulāmeṣau mahāmaitrī vidviṣṭo vṛṣavṛścikau ।mithunadhanuṣoḥ prītiḥ karkaṭamakarayos tathā ।।mṛgakumbhakayoḥ prītiḥ kanāmīnau tathaiva ca ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave sevācakraṃ nāma dvātriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trayastriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānābalāni

īśvara uvāca
garbhajātasya vakṣyāmi kṣetrādhipasvarūpakaṃ ।nātidīrghaḥ kṛśaḥ sthūlaḥ samāṅgo gaurapaitikaḥ ।।

raktākṣo guṇavān śūro gṛhe sūryasya jāyate ।saubhāgyo mṛdusāraś ca jātaś candragṛhodaye ।।vātādhiko atilubdhādirjāto bhūmibhuvo gṛhe ।buddhimān subhago mānī jātaḥ saumyagṛhodaye ।।vṛhatkrodhaś ca śubhago jāto gurugṛhe naraḥ ।tyāgo bhogo ca subhago jāto bhṛgugṛhodaye ।।buddhimāñchubhago mānī jātaścārkigṛhe naraḥ ।saumyalagne tu saumyaḥ syāt krūraḥ syāt krūralagnake ।।daśāphalaṅgauri vakṣye nāmarāśau tu saṃsthitaṃ ।gajāśvadhanadhānyāni rājyaśrīrvipulā bhavet ।।punardhanāgamaścāpi daśāyāṃ bhāskarasya tu ।divyastrīdā candradaśā bhūmilābhaḥ sukhaṃ kuje ।।bhūmirdhānyaṃ dhanaṃ baudhe gajāśvādidhanaṃ gurau ।khādyapānadhanaṃ dśukre śanau vyādhyādisaṃyutaḥ ।।snānasevādinādhvānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ rāhurdarśane ।vāmanāḍīpravāhe syānnāma cedviṣamākṣaraṃ ।।tadā jayati saṅgrāme śanibhaumasasaiṃhikāḥ ।dakṣanāḍīpravāherke vāṇijye caiva niṣphalā ।।saṅgrāme jayamāpnoti samanāmā naro dhruvaṃ ।adhaścāre jayaṃ vidyādūrdhvacāre raṇe mṛtiṃ ।।
oṃ hūṃ oṃ hrūṃ oṃ spheṃ astraṃ moṭaya oṃ cūrṇaya oṃ sarvaśatruṃ mardaya oṃ hrūṃ oṃ hraḥ phaṭ

mocayeti kha, cha ca
saptavārannyasenmantraṃ dhyātvātmānantu bhair avaṃ ।caturbhujandaśabhujaṃ viṃśadbāhvātmakaṃ śubhaṃ ।।śūlakhaṭvāṅgahastantu khaḍgakaṭṭārikodyataṃ ।bhakṣaṇaṃ parasainyānāmātmasainyaparāṅmukhaṃ ।।sammukhaṃ śatrasainyasya śatamaṣṭottaraṃ japet ।japāḍḍamarukācchabdācchastraṃ tyaktvā palāyate ।।parasainyaṃ śṛṇu bhaṅgaṃ prayogena punarvade ।śmaśānāṅgāramādāya viṣṭāñcolūkakākayoḥ ।।karpaṭe pratimāṃ likhya sādhyastaivākṣaraṃ yathā ।nāmātha navadhā likhya ripoś caiva yathākramaṃ ।।mūrdhni vaktre lalāṭe ca hṛdaye guhyapādayoḥ ।pṛṣṭhe tu bāhumadhye tu nāma vai navadhā likhet ।।moṭayedyuddhakāle tu uccaritvā tu vidyaya ।tārkṣyacakraṃ pravakṣyāmi jayārthaṃ trimukhākṣaraṃ ।।kṣipa oṃ svāhā tārkṣātmā śatrurogaviṣādinut ।duṣṭabhūtagrahārtasya vyādhitasyāturasya ca ।।karoti yādṛśaṅkarma tādṛśaṃ siddhyate khagāt ।sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamañcaiva lūtāś ca kṛtrimaṃ viṣaṃ ।।tatsarvaṃ nāśamāyāti sādhakasyāvalokanāt ।

bāhumūle tu iti ga

mocayedyuddhakāle tu iti ja, jha ca

jayārthaṃ bhūmukhākṣaramiti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca

nāśamāpnotīti ja
punardhyāyenmahātārkṣyaṃ dvipakṣaṃ mānuṣākṛtiṃ ।।dvibhujaṃ vakracañcuṃ ca gajakūrmadharaṃ prabhuṃ ।asaṅkhyoragapādasthamāgacchantaṃ khamadhyataḥ ।।grasantañcaiva khādantaṃ tudantaṃ cāhave ripūn ।cañcvāhatāś ca draṣṭavyāḥ kecitpādaiś ca cūrṇitāḥ ।।pakṣapātaiścūrṇitāś ca kecinnaṣṭā diśo daśa ।tārkṣyadhyānānvito yaś ca trilokye hy ajayo bhavet ।।picchikāntu pravakṣyāmi mantrasādhanajāṃ kriyāṃ ।
oṃ hrūṃ pakṣin kṣipa oṃ hūṃ saḥ mahābalaparākrama sarvasainyaṃ bhakṣaya oṃ mardaya oṃ cūrṇaya oṃ vidrāvaya oṃ hūṃ khaḥ oṃ bhairavo jñāpayati svāhā
amuñcandragrahaṇe tu japaṅkṛtvā tu picchikāṃ ।।mantrayed bhrāmayetsainyaṃ sammukhaṃ gajasiṃhayoḥ ।dhyānādravān mardayecca siṃhārūḍho mṛgāvikān ।।śabdādbhaṅgaṃ pravakṣyāmi dūraṃ mantreṇa bodhayet ।mātṝṇāṃ carukaṃ dadyāt kālarātryā viśeṣataḥ ।।śmaśānabhasmasaṃyuktaṃ mālatī cāmarī tathā ।kārpāsamūlamātrantu tena dūrantu bodhayet ।।
oṃ ahe he mahendri ahe mahendri bhañja hi oṃ jahi masānaṃhi khāhi khāhi kili kili kili oṃ huṃ phaṭ

vajracañcuṃ ceti ga, gha, ṅa, ña ca

abhayo bhavediti ga, gha, ṅa ca

haramantreṇeti ka । mūlamantreṇeti kha, gha, ja, ña ca

mālatī vānarī tatheti cha, ña ca
arer nāśaṃ dūraśabdājjaptayā bhaṅgavidyayā ।aparājitā ca dhustūrastābhyāntu tilakena hi ।।
oṃ kili kili vikili icchākili bhūtahani śaṅkhini ubhe daṇdahaste raudri māheśvari ulkāmukhi jvālāmukhi śaṅkukarṇe śuṣkajaṅghe alambuṣe hara oṃ sarvaduṣṭān khana oṃ yanmannirīkṣayeddevi tāṃstān mohaya oṃ rudrasya hṛdaye sthitā raudri saumyena bhāvena ātmarakṣāntataḥ kuru svāhā
vāhyato mātṝḥ saṃlikhya sakalākṛtiveṣṭitāḥ ।nāgapatre likhedvidyāṃ sarvakāmārthasādhanīṃ ।।hastādyair dhāritā pūrvaṃ brahmarudrendraviṣṇubhiḥ ।gurusaṅgrāmakāle tu vidyayā rakṣitāḥ surāḥ ।।rakṣayā nārasiṃhyā ca bhairavyā śaktirūpayā ।sarve trailokyamohinyā gauryā devāsure raṇe ।।vījasampuṭitaṃ nāma karṇikāyāṃ daleṣu ca ।pūjākrameṇa cāṅgāni rakṣāyantraṃ smṛtaṃ śubhe ।।mṛtyuñjayaṃ pravakṣyāmi nāmasaṃskāramadhyaga ।kalābhiveṣṭitaṃ paścāt sakāreṇa nibodhitaṃ ।।jakāraṃ vindusaṃyuktaṃ oṅkāreṇa samanvitaṃ ।dhakārodaramadhyasthaṃ vakāreṇa nibodhitaṃ ।।

nāgayantre iti gha, ña ca

rakṣāmantramiti kha, ga, ṅa, ja ca

kakārodaramadhyasthaṃ cakāreṇeti kha । cakārodaramadhyasthaṃ cakāreṇeti ga, jha ca । vakārodaramadhyasthaṃ ṭhakāreṇeti ṅa, cha ca
candrasampuṭamadhyasthaṃ sarvaduṣṭavimardakam ।athavā karṇikāyāñca likhennāma ca kāraṇam ।।pūrve dale tathoṅkāraṃ svadakṣe cottare likhet ।āgneyyādau ca hūṅkārandale ṣoḍaśake svarān ।।catustriṃśaddale kādyān vāhye mantrañca mṛtyujit ।likhedvaibhūrjapatre tu rocanākuṅgkumena ca ।।karpūracandanābhyāñca śvetasūteṇa veṣṭayet ।sikthakena paricchādya kalaśopari pūjayet ।।yantrasya dhāraṇādrāgāḥ śāmyanti ripavo mṛtiḥ ।vidyāntu bhelakhīṃ vakṣye viprayogamṛterharīṃ ।।
oṃ vātale vitale viḍālamukhi indraputri udbhavo vāyudevena khīli ājī hājā mayi vāha ihādi duḥkhanityakaṇṭhoccair muhūrtānvayā aha māṃ yasmahaṃ upāḍi oṃ bhelakhi oṃ svāhā
navadurgāsaptajaptānmukhastambho mukhasthitāt ।
oṃ caṇḍi oṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā
gṛhītvā saptajaptaṃ tu khadgayuddhe aparājitaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave nānābalāni nāma trayastriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

mantrasyeti ka, kha, ga, cha ca

ripurogamṛterharīmiti ga, gha, ṅa, ja, jha ña ca

chapter 

ś atha catustriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

trailokyavijayavidyā

īśvara uvāca

trailokyavijayāṃ vakṣye sarvayantravimardanīṃ ।

oṃ hūṃ kṣūṃ hrūṃ oṃ namo bhagavati daṃṣṭriṇi bhīmavaktre mahograrūpe hili hili raktanetre kili kili mahānisvane kulu oṃ vidyujjihve kulu oṃ nirmāṃse kaṭa kaṭa gonasābharaṇe cili cili śavamālādhāriṇi drāvaya oṃ mahāraudri sārdracarmakṛtācchade vijṛmbha oṃ nṛtya asilatādhāriṇi bhṛkuṭīkṛtāpāṅge viṣamanetrakṛtānane vasāmedoviliptagātre kaha oṃ hasa kruddha oṃ nīlajīmūtavarṇe oṃ hrām hrīṃ hrūṃ raudrarūpe hūṃ hrīṃ klīṃ oṃ hrīṃ hūṃ oṃ ākarṣa oṃ dhūna oṃ he haḥ khaḥ vajriṇi hūṃ kṣūṃ kṣāṃ krodharūpiṇi prajvala oṃ bhīmabhīṣaṇe bhinda oṃ mahākāye cchinda oṃ karālini kiṭi mahābhūtamātaḥ sarvaduṣṭanivāriṇi jaye oṃ vijaye oṃ trailokyavijaye hūṃ phaṭ svāhā

sarvamantravimardanīmiti kha

sārdracarmakṛtāmbare iti jha
nīlavarṇāṃ pretasaṃsthāṃ viṃśahastāṃ yajejjaye ।।nyāsaṃ kṛtvā tu pañcāṅgaṃ raktapuṣpāṇi homayet ।saṅgrāme sainyabhaṅgaḥ syāt trailokyatrijayāpāṭhāt ।।
oṃ bahurūpāya stambhaya stambhaya oṃ mohaya oṃ sarvaśatrūn drāvaya oṃ brahmāṇamākarṣaya viṣṇumākarṣaya oṃ māheśvaramākarṣaya oṃ indraṃ ṭālaya oṃ parvatān cālaya oṃ saptasāgarān śoṣaya oṃ chinda chinda bahurūpāya namaḥ bhujaṅgannāmamṛnmūrtisaṃsthaṃ vidyādarintataḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave trailokyavijayavidyā nāma caturtriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

saṅgrāmavijayavidyā

īśvara uvāca
saṅgrāmavijayāṃ vidyāṃ padamālāṃ vadāmyahaṃ ।
oṃ hrīṃ cāmuṇḍe śmaśānavāsini khaṭvāṅgakapālahaste 

khaḍgakapālahaste iti jha

mahapretasamārūḍhe mahāvimānasamākule kālarātri mahāgaṇaparivṛte mahāmukhe bahubhuje ghaṇṭāḍamarukiṅkaṇīaṭṭāṭṭahāse kili kili oṃ hūṃ phaṭ daṃṣṭrāghorāndhakāriṇi nādaśabdabahule gajacarmaprāvṛtaśarīre māṃsadigdhe lelihānograjihve mahārākṣasi raudradaṃṣṭrākarāle bhaumāṭṭāṭṭahāse sphuradvidyutprabhe cala cala oṃ cakoranetre cili cili oṃ lalajjihve oṃ bhīṃ bhrukuṭīmukhi huṅkārabhayatrāsanikapālamālāveṣṭitajaṭāmukuṭaśaśāṅkadhāriṇi aṭṭāṭṭahāse kili kili oṃ hrūṃ daṃṣṭrāghorāndhakāriṇi sarvavighnavināśini idaṃ karma sādhaya oṃ śīghraṃ kuru oṃ phaṭ oṃ aṅkuśena śamaya praveśaya oṃ raṅga raṅga kampaya oṃ cālaya oṃ rudhiramāṃsamadyapriye hana oṃ kuṭṭa oṃ chinda oṃ māraya oṃ anukramaya oṃ vajraśarīrampātaya oṃ trailokyagatanduṣṭamaduṣṭaṃ vā gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ vā āveśaya oṃ nṛtya oṃ vanda oṃ koṭarākṣi ūrdhvakeśi ulūkavadane karaṅkiṇi oṃ karaṅkamālādhāriṇi daha oṃ paca oṃ gṛhṇa oṃ maṇḍalamadhye praveśaya oṃ kiṃ vilambasi brahmasatyena viṣṇusatyena rudrasatyena ṛṣisatyena āveśaya oṃ kili kili oṃ khili khili vili vili oṃ vikṛtarūpadhāriṇi kṛṣṇabhujaṅgaveṣṭitaśarīre sarvagrahāveśani pralambauṣṭhini bhrūbhaṅgalagnanāsike vikaṭamukhi kapilajaṭe brāhmibhañja oṃ jvalāmukhi 

rudraśarīraṃ pānayeti kha । rudraśarīraṃ ghātayeti gha, ña ca

kapilajaṭādhāriṇi bhañja bhañjeti jha

jvalajjvālamukhi iti ga, gha, ṅa, ña ca

khana oṃ pātaya oṃ raktākṣi ghūrṇaya bhūmiṃ pātaya oṃ śiro gṛhṇa cakṣurmīlaya oṃ hastapādau gṛhṇa mudrāṃ sphoṭaya oṃ phaṭ oṃ vidāraya oṃ triśūlena cchedaya oṃ vajreṇa hana oṃ daṇḍena tāḍaya oṃ cakreṇa cchedaya oṃ śaktyā bhedaya daṃṣṭryā kīlaya oṃ karṇikayā pāṭaya oṃ aṅkuśena gṛhṇa oṃ śirokṣijvaramaikāhikaṃ dvyāhikaṃ tryāhikañcāturthikaṃ ḍākinīskandagrahān muñca muñca oṃ paca oṃ utsādaya oṃ bhūmiṃ pātaya oṃ gṛhṇa oṃ brahmāṇi ehi oṃ māheśvari ehi oṃ kaumāri ehi oṃ vaiṣṇavi ehi oṃ vārāhi ehi oṃ aindri ehi oṃ cāmuṇḍe ehi oṃ revati ehi oṃ ākāśarevati ehi oṃ himavaccāriṇi ehi oṃ rurumardini asurakṣayaṅkakari ākāśagāmini pāśena bandha bandha aṅkuśena kaṭa samayaṃ tiṣṭha oṃ maṇḍalaṃ praveśaya oṃ gṛhṇa mukhambandha oṃ cakṣurbandha hastapādau ca bandha duṣṭagrahān sarvān bandha oṃ diśo bandha oṃ vidiśo bandha adhastādbandha oṃsarvaṃ bandha oṃ bhasmanā pānīyena vā mṛttikayā sarṣapair vā sarvānāveśaya oṃ pātaya oṃ cāmuṇḍe kili kili oṃ vicce huṃ phaṭ svāhā
padamālā jayākhyeyaṃ sarvakarmaprasādhikā ।।sarvadā homajapyādyaiḥ pāṭhādyaiś ca raṇe jayaḥ ।aṣṭāviṃśabhujā dhyeyā asikheṭakavatkarau ।।gadādaṇdayutau cānyau śaracāpadharau parau ।

asikheṭalasatkarāviti kha । asikheṭakadhṛkkarau iti ña

gadāmuṇḍayutau iti ja
muṣṭimudgarayuktau ca śaṅkakhaḍgayutau parau ।।dhvajavajradharau cānyau sacakraparaśū parau ।ḍamarudarpaṇāḍhyau ca śaktikuntadharau parau ।।halena muṣalenāḍhyau pāśatomarasaṃyutau ।ḍhakkāpaṇasaṃyuktau abhayamuṣṭikānvitau ।।tarjayantī ca mahiṣaṃ ghātanī homato arijit ।trimadhvāktatilair homo na deyā yasya kasya cit ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhārṇave saṅgrāmavijayavidyā nāma pañcatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭtriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nakṣatracakraṃ

īśvara uvāca
atha cakraṃ pravakṣyāmi yātrādau ca phalapradam ।aśvinyādau likheccakraṃ trināḍīparibhūṣitaṃ ।।aśvinyārdrādibhiḥ pūrvā tataścottaraphalgunī ।hastā jyeṣṭhā tathā mūlaṃ vāruṇaṃ cāpyajaikapāt ।।

muṣṭimudgarasaṃyuktau iti ja । ṛṣṭimudgarayuktau ceti ña
abhayasvastikānvitau iti kha, ga, ṅa, cha, jha ca ।
abhayastambhikāśvitau iti ja
nāḍīyaṃ prathamā cānyā yāmyaṃ mṛgaśiras tathā ।puṣyaṃ bhāgyantathā citrā maitrañcāpyaṃ ca vāsavaṃ ।।ahirvradhraṃ tṛtīyātha kṛttikā rohiṇī hy ahiḥ ।citrā svātī viśākhā ca śravaṇā revatī ca bhaṃ ।।nāḍītritayasaṃjuṣṭagrahāj jñeyaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ ।cakramphaṇīśvarantattu trināḍīparibhūṣitaṃ ।।ravibhaumārkarāhusthamaśubhaṃ syācchubhaṃ paraṃ ।deśagrāmayutā bhrātṛbhāryādyā ekaśaḥ śubhāḥ ।।
a, bha, kṛ, ro, mṛ, ā, pu, pu, a, ma, pū, u, ha, ci, svā, vi, a, jye, mū, pū, u, a, dha, śa, pū, u, re । atra saptaviṃśatinakṣatrāṇi jñeyāni

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave nakṣatracakraṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mahāmārīvidyā

īśvara uvāca
mahāmārīṃ pravakṣyāmi vidyāṃ śatruvimardinīṃ ।

cakramphaṇīśvarantadvat iti ga, gha, ṅa, jha, ña ca

oṃ hrīṃ mahāmāri raktākṣi kṛṣṇavarṇe yamasyājñākariṇi sarvabhūtasaṃhārakāriṇi amukaṃ hana oṃ daha paca oṃ chinda oṃ māraya oṃ utsādaya oṃ sarvasattvavaśaṅkari sarvakāmike huṃ phaṭ svāheti

oṃ māri hṛdayāya namaḥ । oṃ mahāmāri śirase svāhā । oṃ kālarātri śikhāyai vauṣaṭ । oṃ kṛṣṇavarṇe khaḥ kavacāya

huṃ । oṃ tārakākṣi vidyujjihve sarvasattvabhayaṅkari rakṣa sarvakāryeṣu hraṃ trinetrāya caṣaṭ । oṃ mahāmāri sarvabhūtadamāni mahākāli astrāya huṃ phaṭ
eṣa nyāsī mahādevi kartavyaḥ sādhakena tu ।।śavādivastramādāya caturasrantrihastakaṃ ।kṛṣṇavarṇāṃ trivaktrāñca caturbāhuṃ samālikhet ।।paṭe vicitravarṇaiś ca dhanuḥ śūlañca kartṛkāṃ ।khaṭvāṅgandhārayantīṃ ca kṛṣṇābhaṃ pūrvamānanaṃ ।।tasya dṛṣṭinipātena bhakṣayedagrato naraṃ ।dvitīyaṃ yāmyabhāge tu raktajihvaṃ bhayānakaṃ ।।lelihānaṃ karālaṃ ca daṃṣṭrotkaṭabhayānakaṃ ।tasya dṛṣṭinipātena bhakṣyamāṇaṃ hayādikaṃ ।।tṛtīyaṃ ca sukhaṃ devyāḥ śvetavarṇaṃ gajādinut ।gandhapuṣpādimadhvājyaiḥ paścimābhimukhaṃ yajet ।।

sadhanuḥśūlakartṛkāmiti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ja, ña ca
mantrasmṛterakṣirogaśirorogādi naśyati ।vaśyāḥ syuryakṣarakṣāś ca nāśamāyānti śatravaḥ ।।samidho nimbavṛkṣasya hy ajāraktavimiśritāḥ ।mārayet krodhasaṃyukto homādeva na saṃśayaḥ ।।parasainyamukho bhūtvā saptāhaṃ juhuyādyadi ।vyādhibhirgṛhyate sainyambhaṅgo bhavati vairiṇaḥ ।।samidho aṣṭasahasrantu yasya nāmnā tu homayet ।acirān mriyate sopi brahmaṇā yadi rakṣitaḥ ।।unmattasamidho raktaviṣayuktasahasrakaṃ ।dinatrayaṃ sasainyaś ca nāśamāyāti vai ripuḥ ।।rājikālavarṇair homādbhaṅgo areḥ syād dinatrayāt ।khararaktasamāyuktahomāduccāṭayedripuṃ ।।kākaraktasamāyogāddhomādutsādanaṃ hy areḥ ।badhāya kurute sarvaṃ yat kiñcinmanasepsitaṃ ।।atha saṅgrāmasamaye gajārūḍhastu sādhakaḥ ।kumārīdvayasaṃyukto mantrasannaddhavigrahaḥ ।।dūraśaṅkhādivādyani vidyayā hy ābhimantrayet ।mahāmāyāpaṭaṃ gṛhya ucchettavyaṃ raṇājire ।।parasainyamukho bhūtvā darśayettaṃ mahāpaṭaṃ ।kumārīrbhojayettatra paścātpiṇḍīñca bhrāmayet ।।sādhakaścintayetsainyampāṣāṇamiva niś calaṃ ।nirutsāhaṃ vibhagnañca muhyamānañca bhāvayet ।।eṣa stambho mayā prokto na deyo yasya kasya cit ।

trailokyavijayā māyā durgaivaṃ bhairavī tathā ।।
kubjikā bhairavo rudro nārasiṃhapaṭādinā ।।

e ity āgneye mahāopurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave mahāmārī nāma saptatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ṣaṭkarmāṇi

īśvara uvāca
ṣaṭkarmāṇi pravakṣyāmi sarvamantreṣu tacchṛṇu ।ādau sādhyaṃ likhet pūrvaṃ cānte mantrasamanvitaṃ ।।pallavaḥ sa tu vijñeyo mahoccāṭakaraḥ paraḥ ।ādau mantraḥ tataḥ sādhyo madhye sādhyaḥ punarmanuḥ ।।yogākhyaḥ sampradāyo ayaṅkulotsādeṣu yojayet ।ādau mantrapadandadyānmadhye sādhyaṃ niyojayet ।।punaścānte likhenmantraṃ sādhyaṃ mantrapadaṃ punaḥ ।

rodhakaḥ sampradāyastu stambhanādiṣu yojayet ।।adhordhvaṃ yāmyavāme tu madhye sādhyantu yojayet ।sampuṭaḥ satu vijñeyo vaśyākarṣeṣu yojayet ।।mantrākṣaraṃ yadā sādhyaṃ prathitañcākṣarākṣaraṃ ।prathamaḥ sampradāyaḥ syādākṛṣṭivaśakārakaḥ ।।mantrākṣaradvayaṃ likhya ekaṃ sādhyakṣaraṃ punaḥ ।vidarbhaḥ satu vijñeyo vaśyākākarṣeṣu yojayet ।।ākarṣaṇād yat karma vasante caiva kārayet ।tāpajvare tathā vaśye svāhā cākarṣaṇe śubhaṃ ।।namaskārapadañcaiva śāntivṛddhau prayojayet ।pauṣṭikeṣu vaṣaṭkāramākarṣe vaśakarmaṇi ।।vidveṣoccāṭane mṛtyau phaṭ syāt khaṇḍīkṛtau śubhe ।lābhādau mantradīkṣādau vaṣaṭkārastu siddhidaḥ ।।yamo asi yamārājo asi kālarūpo asi dharmarāṭ ।mayādattamimaṃ śatrumacireṇa nipātaya ।।nipātayāmi yatnena nivṛtto bhava sādhaka ।saṃhṛṣṭamanasā brūyāddeśiko ariprasūdanaḥ ।।padme śukle yamaṃ prārcya homādetat prasiddhyati ।ātmānambhairavaṃ dhyātvā tato madhye kuleśvarīṃ ।।rātrau vārtāṃ vijānāti ātmanaś ca parasya ca ।

adha ūrdhvaṃ yāmyavāme iti kha

saṃrambhamanseti cha
durge durge rakṣaṇīti durgāṃ prārcyārihā bhavet ।।japtvā hasakṣamalavarayumbhairavīṃ ghātayedariṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave ṣaṭkarmāṇi nāmāṣṭatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ṣaṣṭisaṃvatsarāḥ

īśvara uvāca
ṣaṣṭyabdānāṃ pravakṣyāmi śubhāśubhamataḥ śṛṇu ।prabhave yajñakarmāṇi vibhave sukhino janāḥ ।।śukle ca sarvaśasyāni pramodena pramoditāḥ ।prajāpatau pravṛddhiḥ syādaṅgirā bhogavardhanaḥ ।।śrīmukhe vardhate loko bhāve bhāvaḥ pravardhate ।pūraṇo pūrate śakro dhātā sarvauṣadhīkaraḥ ।।īśvaraḥ kṣema ārogyabahudhānyasubhikṣadaḥ ।pramāthī madhyavarṣastu vikrame śasyasampadaḥ ।।vṛṣo vṛṣyati sarvāṃś ca citrabhānuś ca citratāṃ ।

svarbhānuḥ kṣemamārogyaṃ tāraṇe jaladāḥ śubhāḥ ।।pārthive śasyasampattirativṛṣṭis tathā jayaḥ ।sarvajityuttamā vṛṣṭiḥ sarvadhārī subhikṣadaḥ ।।virodhī jaladān hanti vikṛtaś ca bhayaṅkaraḥ ।khare bhavet pumān vīro nandane nandate prajā ।।viṣayaḥ śatruhantā ca śatrurogādi mardayet ।jvarārto manmathe loko duṣkare duṣkarā prajāḥ ।।durmukhe durmukho loko hemalambe na sampadaḥ ।saṃvatsaro mahādevi vilambastu subhikṣadaḥ ।।vikārī śatrukopāya vijaye sarvadā kvacit ।plave plavanti toyāni śobhane śubhakṛtprajā ।।rākṣase niṣṭhuro loko vividhandhānyamānane ।suvṛṣṭiḥ piṅgale kvāpi kāle hy ukto dhanakṣayaḥ ।।siddhārthe siddhyate sarvaṃ raudre raudraṃ pravartate ।durmatau madhyamā vṛṣṭirdundubhiḥ kṣemadhānyakṛt ।।sravante rudhirodgārī raktākṣaḥ krodhane jayaḥ ।kṣaye kṣīṇadhano lokaḥ ṣaṣṭisaṃvatsarāṇi tu ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave ṣaṣṭisaṃvatsarāṇi nāma ūnacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

durmukhe mukhro loka iti kha, gha, ṅa, ña ca

kṣīṇadhavo loka iti ka । kṣīṇajano loka iti ja

chapter 

ś atha catvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vaśyādiyogāḥ

īśvara uvāca
vaśyādiyogān vakṣyāmi likhed dvyaṣṭapade tvimān ।bhṛṅgarājaḥ sahadevī mayūrasya śikhā tathā ।।putrañjīvakṛtañjalī hy adhaḥpuṣpā rudantikā ।kumārī rudrajaṭā syādviṣṇukrāntā śito arkakaḥ ।।lajjālukā mohalatā kṛṣṇadhustūrasañjñitā ।gorakṣaḥ karkaṭo caiva meṣaśṛṅgī snuhī tathā ।।ṛtvijo vahnaye nāgāḥ pakṣau muni manū śivaḥ ।vasavo dik rasā vedā graha rtuavi candramāḥ ।।tithayaś ca kramādbhāgā oṣadhīnāṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ ।prathamena catuṣkeṇa dhūpaścodvartanaṃ paraṃ ।।tṛtīyenāñjanaṃ kuryāt snānaṃ kuryāccatuṣkataḥ ।bhṛṅgarājānulomācca caturdhā lepanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।munayo dakṣaṇe pārśve yugādyāścottarāḥ smṛtāḥ ।bhujagāḥ pādasaṃsthāś ca īśvarā mūrdhni saṃsthitāḥ ।।madhyena sārkaśaśibhirdhūpaḥ syāt sarvakāryake ।etair viliptadehastu tridaśair api pūjyate ।।

sahadevā iti kha, gha, ṅa, cha ca

kumārī vajrajaṭā iti cha

kṛṣṇadhustūrasañjiketi kha

tridaśair api gṛhyate iti gha, ṅa ca
dhūpastu ṣoḍaśādyastu gṛhādyudvartane smṛtaḥ ।yugādyāścāñjane proktā vāṇādyāḥ snānakarmaṇi ।।rudrādyā bhakṣaṇe proktāḥ pakṣādyāḥ pānake smṛtāḥ ।ṛtvigvedartunayanaistilakaṃ lokamohanaṃ ।।sūryatridaśapakṣaiś ca śailaiḥ strī lepato vaśā ।candrendraphaṇirudraiś ca yonilepādvaśāḥ striyaḥ ।।tithidigyugavāṇaiś ca guṭikā tu vaśaṅkarī ।bhakṣye bhojye tathā pāne dātavyā guṭikā vaśe ।।ṛtviggrahākṣiśailaiś ca śastrastambhe mukhe dhṛtā ।śailendravedarandhraiś ca aṅgalepājjale vaset ।।vāṇākṣimanurudraiś ca guṭikā kṣuttṛṣādinut ।triṣoḍaśadiśāvāṇair lepāt strī durbhagā śubhā ।।tridaśākṣidiśānetrair lepāt krīḍecca patragaiḥ ।tridaśākṣeśabhujagair lepāt strī sūyate sukhaṃ ।।saptadiṅmunirandhraiś ca dyūtajihvastralepataḥ ।tridaśākṣyabdhimunibhirdhvajalepāt ratau sutaḥ ।।grahābdhisarpyatridaśair guṭikā syād vaśaṅkarī ।ṛtvikpadasthitauṣadhyāḥ prabhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave ṣoḍaśapadakā nāma catvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

tridaśākṣyandhimanubhirdhvajalepāditi ga, gha, ṅa, cha ca

chapter 

ś athaikacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ṣaṭtriṃśatpadakajñānaṃ

īśvara uvāca
ṣaṭtriṃśatpadasaṃsthānāmoṣadhīnāṃ vade phalaṃ ।amarīkaraṇaṃ nṛṇāṃ brahmarudrendrasevitaṃ ।।harītakyakṣyadhātrāś ca marīcampippalīśiphā ।vahniḥ śuṇṭhī pippalī ca guḍūcīvacanimbakāḥ ।।vāsakaḥ śatamūlī ca saindhavaṃ sindhuvārakaṃ ।kaṇṭakārī gokṣurakā vilvampaunarnavaṃ balā ।।eraṇḍamuṇḍī rucako bhṛṅgaḥ kṣāro atha parpaṭaḥ ।dhanyāko jīrakaś caiva śatapuṣyī javānikā ।।viḍaṅgaḥ khadiraś caiva kṛtamālo haridrayā ।vacā siddhārtha etāni ṣaṭtriṃśatpadagāni hi ।।kramādekādisañjñāni hy aupadhāni mahānti hi ।sarvarogaharāṇi syuramarīkaraṇāni ca ।।balīpalitabhettṝṇi sarvakoṣṭhagatāni tu ।eṣāṃ cūrṇañca vaṭikā rasena paribhāvitā ।।avalehaḥ kaṣāyo vā modako guḍakhaṇḍakaḥ ।

cavyanimbakā iti ja, jha ca

balīpalitabhedīnīti cha
madhuto dhṛtato vāpi ghṛtantailamathāpi vā ।।sarvātmanopayuktaṃ hi mṛtasañjīvanambhavet ।karṣārdhaṃ karṣamekaṃ vā palārdhaṃ palamekakaṃ ।।yatheṣṭācāranirato jīvedvarṣaśatatrayaṃ ।mṛtasañjīvanīkalpe yogo nāsmāt paro asti hi ।।prathamānnavakādyogāt sarvarogaiḥ pramucyate ।dvitīyācca tṛtīyācca caturthānmucyate rujaḥ ।।evaṃ ṣaṭkācca prathamād dvitīyācca tṛtīyataḥ ।caturthātpañcamāt ṣaṣṭhāttathā navacatuṣkataḥ ।।ekaditricatuḥpañcaṣaṭsaptāṣṭamato anilāt ।agnibhāskaraṣaḍviṃśasaptaviṃśaiś ca pittataḥ ।।vāṇartuśailavasubhistithibhirmucyate kaphāt ।vedāgnibhirbāṇaguṇaiḥ ṣadguṇaiḥ syādvaśe dhṛte ।।grahādigrahaṇāntaiś ca sarvair eva vimucyate ।ekadvitrirasaiḥ śailair vasugrahaśivaiḥ kramāt ।।dvātriṃśattithisūryaiś ca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।ṣaṭtriṃśatpadakajñānaṃ na deyaṃ yasya kasya cit ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave
ṣaṭtriṃśatpadakajñānaṃ nāma ekacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo
adhyāyaḥ ।।

yathecchācāranirata iti ja

ś atha dvicatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mantroṣadhādiḥ

īśvara uvāca
mantrauṣadhāni cakrāṇi vakṣye sarvapradāni ca ।cauranāmno varṇaguṇo dvighno mātrāś caturguṇāḥ ।।nāmnā hṛte bhaveccheṣadyauro atha jātakaṃ vade ।praśne ye viṣamā varṇāste garbhe putrajanmadāḥ ।।nāmavarṇaiḥ samaiḥ kāṇo vāme akṣṇi viṣamaiḥ punaḥ ।dakṣiṇākṣi bhavet kāṇaṃ strīpunnāmākṣarasya ca ।।mātrāvarṇāś caturnighanā varṇapiṇḍe guṇe kṛte ।same strī viṣame nā syādviśeṣe ca mṛtiḥ striyāḥ ।।prathamaṃ rūpaśūnye atha prathamaṃ mriyate pumān ।praśnaṃ sūkṣmākṣarair gṛhya dravyair bhāge akhile matam ।।śanicakraṃ pravakṣyāmi tasya dṛṣṭiṃ parityajet ।rāśisthaḥ saptame dṛṣṭiś caturdaśaśaterdhikā ।।ekadvyaṣṭadvādaśamaḥ pādadṛṣṭiś ca taṃ tyajet ।dinādhipaḥ praharabhāk śeṣā yāmārdhabhāginaḥ ।।

mantrauṣadhādicakrāṇīti gha, ña ca

viśeṣeṇeti kha

yāmārdhabhogina iti ka, ga, ṅa, ja ca
śanibhāgantyajedyuddhe dinarāhuṃ vadāmi te ।ravau pūrve anile mande gurau yāmye anale bhṛgau ।।agnau kuje bhavet somye sthite rāhurbudhe sadā ।phaṇirāhustu praharamaiśe vahnau ca rākṣase ।।vāyau saṃveṣṭayitvā ca śatruṃ hantīśasanmukhaṃ ।tithirāhuṃ pravakṣyāmi pūrṇimāgneyagocare ।।amāvāsyā vāyave ca rāhuḥ sammukhaśatruhā ।kādyā jāntāḥ sammukhe syuḥ sādyā dāntāś ca dakṣiṇe ।।akle tyajet kujagaṇān dhādyā māntāś ca pūrvataḥ ।yādyā hāntā uttare syustithidṛṣṭiṃ vivarjayet ।।pūrvāś ca dakṣiṇāstisro rekhā vai mūlabhedake ।sūryarāśyādi saṃlikhya dṛṣṭau hānirjayo anyathā ।।viṣṭirāhuṃ pravakṣyāmi aṣṭau rekhāstu pātayet ।śivādyamaṃ yamādvāyuṃ vāyorindraṃ tato ambupaṃ ।।nairṛtācca nayeccandraṃ candrādagniṃ tato jale ।jalādīśe caredrāhurviṣṭyā saha mahābalaḥ ।।aiśānyāṃ ca tṛtīyādau saptamyādau ca yāmyake ।evaṃ kṛṣṇe site pakṣe vāyau rāhuś ca hantyarīn ।।indrādīn bhairavādīṃś ca brahmāṇyādīn grahādikān ।aṣṭāṣṭakañca pūrvādau yāmyādau vātayoginīṃ ।।yāndiśaṃ vahate vāyustatrastho ghātayedarīn ।dṛḍhīkaraṇamākhyāsye kaṇṭhe bāhvādidhāritā ।।puṣyoddhṛtā kāṇḍalakṣyaṃ vārayet śarapuṅkhikā ।

tathā parājitā pāṭhā dvābhyāṃ khaḍgaṃ nivārayet ।।

oṃ namo bhagavati vajraśṛṅkhale hana oṃ bhakṣa oṃ khāda oṃ are raktaṃ piba kapālena raktākṣi raktapaṭe bhasmāṅgi bhasmaliptaśarīre vajrāyudhe vajrākāranicite pūrvāṃ diśaṃ bandha oṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśambandha oṃ paścimāṃ diśambandha uttarāṃ diśambandha nāgān bandha nāgapatnīrbandha oṃ asurān bandha oṃ yakṣarākṣasapiśācān bandha oṃ pretabhūtagandharvādayo ye kecidupadravāstebhyo rakṣa oṃ ūrdhavaṃ rakṣa adhā rakṣa oṃ kṣurika bandha oṃ jvala mahābale ghaṭi oṃ moṭi saṭāvalivajjāgnivajraprākāre huṃ phaṭ hrīṃ hrūṃ śrīṃ phaṭ hrīṃ haḥ phūṃ pheṃ phaḥ sarvagrahebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭopadravebhyo hrīṃ aśeṣebhyo rakṣa grahajvarādibhūteṣu sarvakarmasu yojayet ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave mantrauṣadhādirnāma hi catvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha tricatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kubjikāpūjā

īśvara uvāca
kubjikākramapūjāñca vakṣye sarvārthasādhanīṃ ।yayā jitāḥ surā devaiḥ śastrādyair ājyasaṃyutaiḥ ।।

kubjikācakrapūjācceti kha, cha ca
māyābījaṃ ca guhyāṅge ṣaṭkamastraṃ kare nyaset ।kālī kālīti hṛdayaṃ duṣṭacāṇḍālikā śiraḥ ।।hrauṃ spheṃ ha sa kha ka cha ḍa oṃ kāro bhairavaḥ śikhā ।bhelakhī kavacaṃ dūtī netrākhyā raktacaṇḍikā ।।tato guhyakruñjikāstraṃ maṇḍale sthānake yajet ।agnau kūrcaśiro rudre nairṛtye atha śikhānile ।।kavacammadhyato netraṃ astrandikṣu ca maṇḍale ।dvātriṃśatā karṇikāyāṃ sroṃhasakṣamalanavavaṣaḍasacātmamantravījakaṃ ।।brahmāṇī caiva māheśo kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā ।vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā caṇḍikendrakāt ।।yajedravalakasahān śivendāgniyame adnipe ।jale tu kusumamālāmadrikāṇāṃ ca pañcakaṃ ।।jālandharaṃ pūrṇagiriṃ kāmarūpaṃ kramādyajet ।marudeśāgninairṛtye madhye vai vajrakubjikāṃ ।।anādivimalaḥ pūjyaḥ sarvajñavimalastutaḥ ।prasiddhavimalaścātha saṃyogavimalastutaḥ ।।samayākhyo atha vimala etadvimalapañcakaṃ ।marudīśānanairṛtye vahnau cottaraśṛṅgake ।।kubjārthaṃ khiṃkhinī ṣaṣṭhā sopannā susthirā tathā ।ratnasundarī caiśāne śṛṅge cāṣṭādināthakāḥ ।।mitra oḍīśaṣaṣṭhyākhyau varṣā agnyambupe anile ।bhavedgaganaratnaṃ syāccāpye kavacaratnakaṃ ।।

bruṃ martyaḥ pañcanāmākhyo marudīśānavahnigaḥ ।yāmyāgneye pañcaratnaṃ jyeṣṭhā raudrī tathāntikā ।।tisro hy āsāṃ mahāvṛddhāḥ pañcapraṇavato akhilāḥ ।saptaviṃśatyaṣṭaviṃśabhedāt sampūjanaṃ dvidhā ।।oṃ aiṃ gūṃ kramagaṇapatiṃ praṇavaṃ vaṭukaṃ yajet ।caturasre maṇḍale ca dakṣiṇe gaṇapaṃ yajet ।।vāme ca vaṭukaṃ koṇe gurūn soḍaśanāthakān ।vāyavyādau cāṣṭa daśa pratiṣaṭkoṇake tataḥ ।।brahmādyāścāṣṭa paritastanmadhye ca navātmakaḥ ।kubjikā kulaṭā caiva kramapūjā tu sarvadā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave kubjikākramapūjā nāma tricatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuś catvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ kubjikāpūjā

īśvara uvāca
śrīmatīṃ kubjikāṃ vakṣye dharmārthādijayapradāṃ ।pūjayenmūlamantreṇa parivārayutena vā ।।
oṃ aiṃ hrauṃ śrīṃ khaiṃ hreṃ hasakṣamalacavayambhagavati ambike hrāṃ hrīṃ kṣrīṃ kṣauṃ kṣrūṃ krīṃ kubjike hrāṃ oṃ ṅañanaṇame aghoramukhi vrāṃ chrāṃ

khaṃ mṛtyau vuñcanāmākhya iti ja

chīṃ kili kṣauṃ vicce khyoṃ śrīṃ kroṃ oṃ hroṃ aiṃ vajrakubjini strīṃ trailokyakarṣiṇi hrīṃ kāmāṅgadrāviṇi hrīṃ strīṃ mahākṣobhakāriṇi aiṃ hrīṃ kṣrīṃ aiṃ hroṃ śrīṃ pheṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavati kṣrauṃ kubjike hroṃ hroṃ kraiṃ ṅañaṇaname aghoramukhi chrāṃchāṃ vicce oṃ kili 
kṛtvā karāṅganyāsañca sandhyāvandanamācaret ।vāmā jyeṣṭhā tathā raudrīṃ sandhyātrayamanukramāt ।।
kulavāgīśi vidmahe mahākālīti dhīmahi । tannaḥ kaulī pracodayāt
mantrāḥ pañca praṇavādyāḥ pādukāṃ pūjayāmi ca ।madhye nāma caturthyantaṃ dvinavātmakavījakāḥ ।।namontā vātha ṣaṣṭyā tu sarve jñeyā vadāmi tān ।kaulīśanāthaḥ sukalā janmataḥ kubjikā tataḥ ।।śrīkaṇṭhanāthaḥ kauleśo gaganānandanāthakaḥ ।caṭulā devī maitrīśī karālī tūrṇanāthakaḥ ।।ataladevī śrīcandrā devītyantāstatastvime ।bhagātmapuṅgaṇadevamohanīṃ pādukāṃ yajet ।।atītabhuvanānandaratnāḍhyāṃ pādukāṃ yajet ।brahmajñānātha kamalā paramā vidyayā saha ।।vidyādevīguruśuddhistriśuddhiṃ pravadāmi te ।gaganaś caṭulī cātmā padmānando maṇiḥ kalā ।।

vahnikubjini iti kha, cha ca
kamalo māṇikyakaṇṭho gaganaḥ kumudastataḥ ।śrīpadmo bhairavānando devaḥ kamala ity ataḥ ।।śivo bhavo atha kṛṣṇaś ca navasiddhāś ca ṣoḍaśa ।candrapūro atha gulmaś ca śubhaḥ kāmo atimuktakaḥ ।।kaṇṭho vīraḥ prayogo atha kuśalo devabhogakaḥ ।viśvadevaḥ khaḍgadevo rudro dhātāsireva ca ।।mudrāsphīṭī vaṃśapūro bhojaḥ ṣoḍaśa siddhakāḥ ।samayānyastu dehastu ṣoḍhānyāsena yantritaḥ ।।prakṣipya maṇḍale puṣpaṃ maṇḍalānyatha pūjayet ।anantañca mahāntañca sarvadā śivapādukāṃ ।।mahāvyāptiś ca śūnyañca pañcatattvātmamaṇḍalaṃ ।śrīkaṇṭhanāthapādukāṃ śaṅkarānantakau yajet ।।sadāśivaḥ piṅgalaś ca bhṛgvānandaś ca nāthakaḥ ।lāṅgūlānandasaṃvartau maṇḍalasthānake yajet ।।nairṛtye śrīmahakālaḥ pinākī ca mahendrakaḥ ।khaḍgo bhujaṅgo vāṇaś ca aghāsiḥ śabdako vaśaḥ ।।ājñārūpo nandarūpo balindatvā kramaṃ yajet ।
hrīṃ khaṃ khaṃ hūṃ sauṃ vaṭukāya aru arghaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpaṃgandhaṃ baliṃ pūjāṃ gṛhṇa namastubhyaṃ । oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ kṣeṃ kṣetrapālāya avatara mahākapilajaṭābhāra bhāsvaratrinetrajvālāmukha ehyehi ganhdapuṣpabalipūjāṃ gṛhṇa khaḥ khaḥ oṃ kaḥ oṃ laḥ oṃ mahāḍāmarādhipataye svāhā

kāmo atha muktaka iti ja, cha, ña ca

vaṭo vīra iti ja, cha ca

pramathādhipataye iti ṅa । mahāmāyādhipataye iti ja
baliśeṣe atha yajet hrīṃ hrūṃ hāṃ śrīṃ vai trikūṭakaṃ ।।vāme ca dakṣiṇe hy agre yāmye niśānāthapādukāḥ ।dakṣe tamorināthasya hagre kālānalasya ca ।।uḍḍiyāṇaṃ jālandharaṃ pūrṇaṃ vai kāmarupakaṃ ।gaganānandadevañca svargānandaṃ savargakaṃ ।।paramānandadevañca satyānandasya pādukāṃ ।nāgānandañca vargākhyamuktānte ratnapañcakaṃ ।।saumye śive yajet ṣaṭkaṃ suranāthasya pādukāṃ ।śrīmatsamayakoṭīśaṃ vidyākoṭīśvaraṃ yajet ।।koṭīśaṃ vindukoṭīśaṃ siddhakoṭīśvarantathā ।siddhacatuṣkamāgneyyāṃ amarīśeśvaraṃ yajet ।।cakrīśanāthaṃ kuruṅgeśaṃ vṛtreśañcandranāthakaṃ ।yajedgandhādibhiś caitān yāmye vimalapañcakaṃ ।।yajedanādivimalaṃ sarvajñavimalaṃ tataḥ ।yajedyogīśavimalaṃ siddhākhyaṃ samayākhyakaṃ ।।naiṛtye caturo devān jayet kandarpanāthakaṃ ।pūrvāḥ śaktīś ca sarvāś ca kubjikāpādukāṃ yajet ।।

svargānandañca devakamiti gha, ña ca

pannagānandadevañceti ña । pavanānandadevañceti ja

martyānandasya pādukāmiti kha, ga, ṅa, jha, ja ca

bhūtośaṃ mantranāyakamiti ja । bhūtīśaṃ mantranāyakamiti ña

caturo vedāniti kha, cha, ja ca

pūrvān saśaktīn sarvāṃśceti ja, ña ca
navātamkena mantreṇa pañcapraṇavakena vā ।sahasrākṣamanavadyaṃ viṣṇuṃ śivaṃ sadā yajet ।।pūrvācchivāntaṃ brahmādi brahmāṇī ca maheśvarī ।kaumārī vaiṣṇavī caiva vārāhī śakraśaktikā ।।cāmuṇḍā ca mahālakṣmīḥ pūrvādīśāntamarcayet ।ḍākinī rākinī pūjyā lākinī kākinī tathā ।।śākinī yākinī pūjyā vāyavyādugraṣaṭṣu ca ।yajed dhyātvā tato devīṃ dvātriṃśadvarṇakātmakāṃ ।।pañcapraṇavakenāpi hrīṃ kāreṇāthavā yajet ।nīlotpaladalaśyāmā ṣaḍvaktrā ṣaṭprakārikā ।।cicchaktiktiraṣṭādaśākhyā bāhudvādaśasaṃyutā ।siṃhāsanasukhāsīnā pretapadmoparisthitā ।।kulakoṭisahasrāḍhyā karkoṭo mekhalāsthitaḥ ।takṣakeṇopariṣṭācca gale hāraś ca vāsukiḥ ।।kulikaḥ karṇayoryasyāḥ kūrmaḥ kuṇḍalamaṇḍalahḥ ।bhruvoḥ padmo makāpadmo vāme nāgaḥ kapālakaḥ ।।akṣasūtrañca khaṭvāṅgaṃ śaṅkaṃ pustañca dakṣiṇe ।triśūlantadarpaṇaṃ khaḍgaṃ ratnamālāṅkuśandhanuḥ ।।śvetamūrdhvamukhandevyā ūrdhvaśvetantathāparaṃ ।pūrvāsyaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ krodhi dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇakaṃ ।।

sadāśivaṃ svayaṃ yajediti ṅa, cha, ja ca

ṣaḍvarṇeti ja

vanamālaṅkuśaṃ dhanuriti gha, ṅa ca
himakundendabhaṃ saumyaṃ brahmā pādatale sthitaḥ ।viṣṇustu jaghane rudro hṛdi kaṇṭhe tatheśvaraḥ ।।sadāśivo lalāṭe syācchivastasyordhvataḥ sthitaḥ ।āghūrṇitā kubjikaivandhyeyā pūjādikarmasu ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave kubjikāpūjā nāma catuś catvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mālinīnānāmantrāḥ

īśvara uvāca
nānāmantrān pravakṣyāmi ṣoḍhānyāsapuraḥsaram ।nyāsastridhā tu ṣoḍhā syuḥ śāktaśāmbhavayāmalāḥ ।।śāmbhave śabdarāśiḥ ṣaṭṣoḍaśagranthirūpavān ।trividyā tadgraho nyāsastritattvātmābhidhānakaḥ ।।caturtho vanamālāyāḥ ślokadvādaśarūpavān ।pañcamo ratnapañcātmā navātmā ṣaṣṭha īritaḥ ।।śākte pakṣe ca mālinyāstrividyātmā dvitīyakaḥ ।

ṣoḍaśapratirūpavāniti jha
adhoryaṣṭakarūpo anyo dvādaśāṅgaś caturthakaḥ ।pañcamastu ṣaḍaṅgaḥ syācchaktiścānyāstracaṇḍikā ।krīṃ hrauṃ klīṃ śrīṃ krūṃ phaṭ trayaṃ syātturyākhyaṃsarvasādhakaṃ ।।mālinyā nādikāntaṃ syāt nādinī ca śikhā smṛtā ।agrasenī śirasi syāt śiromālānivṛttiḥ śaḥ ।।ṭa śāntiś ca śiro bhūyāc cāmuṇḍā ca trinetragā ।ḍha priyadṛṣṭirdvinetre ca nāsāgā guhyaśaktinī ।।na nārāyaṇī dvikarṇe ca dakṣakarṇe ta mohanau ।ja prajñā vāmakarnasthā vaktre ca vajriṇī smṛtā ।।ka karālī dakṣadaṃṣṭrā vāmāṃsā kha kapālinī ।ga śivā ūrdhvadaṃṣṭrā syād gha ghorā vāmadaṃṣṭrikā ।।u śikhā dantavinyāsā ī māyā jihvayā smṛtā ।a syānnāgeśvarī vāci va kaṇṭhe śikhivāhinī ।।bha bhīṣaṇī dakṣaskandhe vāyuvegā ma vāmake ।ḍanāmā dakṣabāhau tu ḍha vāme ca vināyakā ।।pa pūrṇimā dvihaste tu okārādyaṅgulīyake ।aṃ darśanī vāmāṅgulya aḥ syātsañjīvanī kare ।।ṭa kapālinī kapālaṃ śūladaṇḍe ta dīpanī ।triśūle ja jayantī syādvṛddhiryaḥ sādhanī smṛtā ।।

śaktiḥ syādyā vivarṇikā iti ja । śaktiścānyā trikhaṇḍiketi ña

phaṭatrayaṃ syāt taryuddhe sarvasāddhakamiti kha, cha ca

khaśvasanīti kha, cha ca

pāvanīti ja, ña ca
jīve śa paramākhyā syād ha prāṇe cāmbikā smṛtā ।dakṣastane cha śarīrā na vāme pūtanā stane ।।a stanakṣīrā ā moṭo lambodaryudare ca tha ।nābhau saṃhārikā kṣa syān mahākālī nitambama ।।guhye sa kusumamālā ṣa śukre śukradevikā ।urudvaye ta tārāsyāha jñānā dakṣajānuni ।।vāme syādau kriyāśaktiro gāyatrī ca jaṅghagā ।o sāvitrī vāmajaṅghā dakṣe do dohanī pade ।।pha phetkārī vāmapāde navātmā mālinī manuḥ ।a śrīkaṇṭhaḥ śikhāyāṃ syādāvaktre syādanantakaḥ ।।i sūkṣmo dakṣanetre syādī trimūrtistu vāmake ।u dakṣakarṇe amarauśa ū karṇerghāṃśako apare ।।ṛ bhāṣabhūtirnāsāgre vāmanāsā tithīśa ṛ ।ḷ sthāṇurdakṣagaṇḍe syādvāmagaṇḍe haraś ca ḹ ।।kaṭīśo dantapaṅktāve bhūtīśaścordhvadanta ai ।sadyojāta o adhare ūrdhvauṣṭhe anugrahīśa au ।।aṃ krūro ghāṭakāyāṃ syādaḥ mahāsenajihvayā ।ka krodhīśo dakṣaskandhe khaś caṇḍīśaś ca bāhuṣu ।।pañcāntakaḥ kūrpare go gha śikhī dakṣakaṅgaṇe ।ṅa ekapādaścāṅgulyo tāmaskandhe ca kūrmakaḥ ।।cha ekanetro bāhau syāccaturvaktro ja kūrpare ।jha rājasaḥ kaṅkaṇagaḥ ñaḥ sarvakāmado aṅgulī ।।ṭa spmeśo nitambe syāddakṣa ūrurṭha lāṅgalī ।

ḍa dāruko dakṣajānau jaṅghā ḍho ardhajaleśvaraḥ ।।ṇa umākāntako aṅgulyasta āṣāḍho nitambake ।tha daṇḍī vāma ūrau syādda bhido vāmajānuni ।।dha mīno vāmajaṅghāyānna meṣaś caraṇāṅgulī ।pa lohito dakṣakukṣau pha śikhī vāmakukṣigaḥ ।।ba galaṇḍaḥ pṛṣṭhavaṃśe bho nābhau ca dviraṇḍakaḥ ।ma mahākālo hṛdaye ya vāṇīśastvavismṛtaḥ ।।ra rakte syādbhujaṅge śo la pinākī ca māṃsake ।va khaḍgīśaḥ svātmani syādvakaścāthini śaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।ṣa śvetaś caiva majjāyāṃ sa bhṛguḥ śukradhātuke ।prāṇe ho nakulīśaḥ syāt kṣa saṃvartaś ca koṣagaḥ ।।rudraśaktīḥ prapūjya hrīṃvījenākhilamāpnuyāt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe mālinīmantrādinyāso nāma pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭcatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aṣṭāṣṭakadevyaḥ

īśvara uvāca
trikhaṇḍīṃ sampravakṣāmi brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarīṃ ।

ya vāṇīśastu vistṛta iti ña

oṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya namaḥ । namaścāmuṇḍe namaścākāśamātṝṇāṃ sarvakāmārthasādhanīnāmajarāmarīṇāṃ sarvatrāpratihatagatīnāṃ svarūparūpaparivartinīnāṃ sarvasattvavaśīkaraṇotsādanīnmūlanasamastakarmapravṛttānāṃ sarvamātṛguhyaṃ hṛdayaṃ paramasiddhaṃ parakarmacchedanaṃ paramasiddhikarammātṝṇāṃ vacanaṃ śubhaṃ brahmakhaṇḍapade rudrair ekaviṃśādhikaṃ śataṃ ।।

tadyathā, oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe brahmāṇi aghore amoghe varade vicce svāhā । oṃ namaḥcāmuṇḍe māheśvari aghore amoghe varade vicce svāhā । oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe kaumāri aghore amoghe varade vicce svāhā ।oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe vaiṣṇavi aghore amoghe varade vicce svāhā । oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe vārāhi aghore amoghe varade vicce svāhā । oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe indrāṇi aghore amoghe varade vicce svāhā । oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe caṇḍi agore amoghe varade vicce svāhā । oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe īśāni aghore amoghe varade vicce svāhā yathākṣarapadānāṃ hi viṣṇukhaṇḍandvitīyakaṃ । oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe ūrdhvakeśi jvalitaśikhare vidyujjihve tārakākṣi piṇgalabhruve vikṛtadaṃṣṭre kruddhe oṃ māṃsaśoṇitasurāsavapriye hasa oṃ nṛtya oṃ vijṛmbhaya oṃ māyatrailokyarūpasahasraparivartinīnāṃ oṃ bandha oṃ kuṭṭa ciri hiri bhiri trāsani bhrāmaṇi oṃ drāviṇi kṣobhaṇi 

oṃ namaścāmuṇḍe māheśvarītyādiḥ, vicce svāhetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti

jvalitaśikha iti kha, ṅa, gha, ña ca

māriṇi saṃjīvani heri geri gheri oṃ muri oṃ namo mātṛgaṇāya namo namo vicce
ekatriṃśatpadaṃ śambhoḥ śatamantraikasaptatiḥ ।।he ghauṃ pañcapraṇavādyantāṃ trikhaṇḍīñca japed yajet ।he ghauṃ śrīkubjikāhṛdayaṃ padasandhau tu yojayet ।।akuntāditrimadhyasthaṃ kulādeś ca trimadhyagaṃ ।madhyamādi trimadhyasthaṃ piṇḍaṃ pāde trimadhyagaṃ ।।trayārdhamātrāsaṃyuktaṃ praṇavādyaṃ śikhāśivāṃ ।
oṃ kṣrauṃ śikhābhairavāya namaḥ । skhīṃ skhauṃ skheṃ savījatryakṣaraḥ
hrāṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ nirvījantryarṇaṃ dvātriṃśadvarṇakamparaṃ ।।kṣādayaś ca kakārāntā akulā ca kulakramāt ।śaśinī bhānunī caiva pāvanī śiva ity ataḥ ।।gāndharī ṇaś ca piṇḍākṣī capalā gajajihvikā ।ma mṛṣā bhayasārā syānmadhyamā pho ajarāya ca ।।kumāro kālarātrī na saṅkaṭā da dha kālikā ।pha śivā bhavaghorā ṇa ṭa vībhatsā ta vidyutā ।।ṭha viśvambharā śaṃśinyā ḍha jvālāmālayā tathā ।karālī durjayā raṅgī vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudryapi ।।kha kālī ka kulālamvī anulomā da piṇḍinī ।ā vedinī i rūpī vai śāntirmūrtiḥ kalākulā ।।ṛ khaḍginī u balitā ḷ kulā ḹ tathā yadi ।subhagā vedanādinyā karālī aṃ ca madhyamā ।।

aḥ apetarayā pīṭhe pūjyāś ca kaktayaḥ kramāt ।skhāṃ skhīṃ skhauṃ mahābhairavāya namaḥ ।akṣodyā hy ṛkṣakarṇī ca rākṣasī kṣapaṇakṣayā ।।piṅgākṣī cākṣayā kṣemā brahmāṇyaṣṭakasaṃsthitāḥ ।ilā līlāvatī nīlā laṅgā laṅkeśvarī tathā ।।lālasā vimalā mālā māheśvaryaaṣṭake sthitāḥ ।hutāśanā viśālākṣī hrūṅkārī vaḍavāmukhī ।।hāhāravā tathā krūrā krodhā bālā kharānanā ।kaumāryā dehasambhūtāḥ pūjitāḥ sarvasiddhidāḥ ।।ssarvajñā taralā tārā ṛgvedā ca hayānanā ।sārāsārasvayaṅgrāhā śāśvatī vaiṣṇavīkule ।।tālujihvā ca raktākṣī vidyujjihvā karaṅkiṇī ।meghanādā pracaṇḍogrā kālakarṇī kalipriyā ।।vārāhīkulasambhūtāḥ pūjanīyā jayārthinā ।campā campāvatī caiva pracampā jvalitānanā ।।piśācī picuvaktrā ca lolupā aindrīsambhavāḥ ।pāvanī yācanī caiva vāmanī damanī tathā ।।vinduvelā vṛhatkukṣī vidyutā viśvarūpiṇī ।cāmuṇḍākulasambhūtā maṇḍale pūjitā jaye ।।yamajihvā jayantī ca durjayā ca yamāntikā ।

lolā iti ja

sāttvikī iti ja

jayantiketi kha
viḍālī revatī caiva jayā ca vijayā tathā ।।
mahālakṣmīkule jātā aṣṭāṣṭakamudāhṛtaṃ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe aṣṭāṣṭakādirnāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tvaritāpūjādiḥ

īśvara uvāca । oṃ guhyakubjike huṃ phaṭ mama sarvopadravān yantramantratantracūrṇaprayogādikaṃ yena kṛtaṃ kāritaṃ kurute kariṣyati kārayiṣyati tān sarvān hana daṃṣṭrākarālini hraiṃ
hrīṃ huṃ guhyakubjikāyai dvāhā । hrauṃ oṃ khe voṃguhyakubjikāyai namaḥhrīṃ sarvajanakṣobhaṇī janānukarṣiṇī tataḥ ।oṃ kheṃ khyāṃ, sarvajanavaśaṅkarī tathā syājjanamohinī ।।oṃ khyauṃ sarvajanastambhanī aiṃ khaṃ khrāṃ kṣobhaṇītathā ।

krīṃ kha kha ye khrauṃ iti cha

oṃ kha khyāṃ iti cha । oṃ sphūṃ iti ga

oṃ kha khrauṃ iti cha । oṃ sphaiṃ iti jha

aiṃ tritattvaṃ vījaṃ śreṣṭhaṅkulaṃ pañcākṣarī tathā ।।

phaṃ śrīṃ kṣīṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ kṣeṃ vacche kṣe kṣe hrūṃ phaṭ hrīṃ namaḥ । oṃ hrāṃ kṣe vacche kṣe kṣo hrīṃ phaṭ naveyaṃ tvaritā punarjñeyārcitā jaye
hrīṃ siṃhāyetyāsanaṃ syāt hrīṃ kṣe hṛdayamīritaṃ ।vacche atha śirase svāhā tvaritāyāḥ śivaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।kṣeṃ hrīṃ śikhāyai vauṣaṭ syād bhavet kṣeṃ kavacāya huṃ ।hrūṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ hrīmantañca phaḍantakaṃ ।।hrīṃ kārī khecarī caṇḍā chedanī kṣobhaṇī kriyā ।kṣemakārī ca hrīṃ kārī phaṭkārī navaśaktayaḥ ।।atha dūrīḥ pravakṣyāmi pūjyā indrādigāś ca tāḥ ।
hrīṃ nale bahutuṇḍe ca khage hrīṃ khecare jvalāni jvala kha khe cha che śavavibhīṣaṇe ca che caṇḍe chedani karāli kha khe che kṣe kharahāṅgī hrīṃ । kṣe vakṣe kapile ha kṣe hrūṃ krūntejovati raudri mātaḥ hrīṃ phe ve phe phe vakre varī phe । puṭi puṭi ghore hrūṃ phaṭ brahmavetāli madhye
guhyāṅgāni ca tattvāni tvaritāyāḥ punarvade ।।hrauṃ hrūṃ haḥ hṛdaye proktaṃ hoṃ haś ca śiraḥsmṛtaṃ ।phāṃ jvala jvaleti ca śikhā varma ile hraṃ huṃ huṃ ।।

krīṃ kāro iti cha

hrīṃ nale vajratuṇḍe iti ja

khage krīmiti cha

śaravibhīṣaṇe iti ja

krūṃ phaṭ iti cha

krīṃ hrūṃ ha iti cha

kroṃ kṣūṃ śrīṃ netramityuktaṃ kṣauṃ astraṃ vai tataś ca phaṭ huṃ khe vacche kṣeḥ hrīṃ kṣeṃ huṃ phaṭ vā huṃ śiraś caiva madhye syāt pūrvādau khe sadāśive । va īśaḥ che manonmānī makṣe tārkṣo hrīṃ ca mādhavaḥ ।। kṣeṃ brahmā huṃ tathādityo dāruṇaṃ phaṭ smṛtāḥ sadā ।। e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave tvaritāpūjādirnāma saptacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha aṣṭacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

saṅgramavijayapūjā

īśvara uvāca । oṃ ḍe kha khyāṃ sūryāya saṅgrāmavijayāya namaḥ । hrāṃ hroṃ hrūṃ hreṃ hrauṃ hraḥ
ṣaḍaṅgāni tu sūryasya saṅgrāme jayadasya hi ।
oṃ haṃ khaṃ khaśoklāya svāhā । spūṃ hrūṃ huṃ krūṃ oṃ hroṃ kreṃ
prabhūtaṃ vimalaṃ sārasārādhyaṃ paramaṃ mukhaṃ ।।dharmajñānañca vairāgyamaiśvaryādyaṣṭakaṃ yajet ।anantāsanaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ padmāsanamataḥ paraṃ ।।

karṇikākeśaraṇyeva sūryasomāgnimaṇḍalaṃ ।dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā tathā ।।amoghā vidyutā pūjyā navamī sarvatomukhī ।sattvaṃ rajastamaś caiva prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ tathā ।।ātmānañcāntarātmānaṃ paramātmānamarcayet ।sarve vindusamāyuktā māyānilasamanvitāḥ ।।uṣā prabhā ca sandhyā ca sāyā māyā balānvitā ।vinduviṣṇusamāyuktā dvārapālās tathāṣṭakaṃ ।।sūryaṃ caṇḍaṃ pracaṇḍañca pūjayedgandhakādibhiḥ ।pūjayā japahomādyair yuddhādau vijayo bhavet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave saṅgrāmavijayapūjā nāma aṣṭacatvāriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

lakṣakoṭihomaḥ

īśvara uvāca
homādraṇādau vijayo rājyāptirvighnanāśanaṃ ।kṛcchreṇa śuddhimutpādya prāṇāyāmaśatena ca ।।

dīptā dhūmeti jha

vindu vindu samāyuktā iti cha
antarjale ca gāyatrīṃ japtvā ṣoḍaśadhācaret ।prāṇāyāmāṃś ca pūrvāhṇe juhuyāt pāvake haviḥ ।।bhaikṣyayāvakabhakṣī ca phalamūlāśano api vā ।kṣīraśaktughṛtāhāra ekamāhāramāśrayet ।।yāvatsamāptirbhavati lakṣahomasya pārvati ।dakṣiṇā lakṣahomānte gāvo vastrāṇi kāñcanaṃ ।।sarvotpātasamutpattau pañcabhirdaśabhirdvijaiḥ ।nāsti loke sa utpāto yo hy anena na śāmyati ।।maṅgalyaṃ paramaṃ nāsti yadasmādatiricyate ।koṭihomantu yo rājā kārayet pūrvavaddvijaiḥ ।।na tasya śatravaḥ saṅkhye jātu tiṣṭhanti karhicit ।na tasya mārako deśe vyādhirvā jāyate kvacit ।।ativṛṣṭiranāvṛṣṭirmūṣakāḥ śalabhāḥ śukāḥ ।rākṣasādyāś ca śāmyanti sarve ca ripavo raṇe ।।koṭihome tu varayedbrāhmaṇānviṃśatiṃ tathā ।śatañcātha sahasraṃ vā yatheṣṭāmbhūtimāpnuyāt ।।koṭihomantu yaḥ kuryād dvijo bhūpo athavā ca viṭ ।yadicchet prāpnuyāttattat saśarīro divaṃ vrajet ।।gāyatryā grahamantrair vā kuṣmāṇḍījātavedasaiḥ ।aindravāruṇavāyavyayāmyāgneyaiś ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ ।।śākteyaiś ca śāmbhavaiḥ saurair mantrair homārcanāttataḥ ।ayutenālpasiddhiḥ syāllakṣahomo akhilārtinut ।।sarvapīḍādinaśāya koṭihomo akhilārthadaḥ ।

yavavrīhitilakṣīraghṛtakuśapramātikāḥ ।।paṅkajośīravilvāmradalā home prakīrtitāḥ ।aṣṭahastapramāṇena koṭihomeṣu khātakaṃ ।।tasmādardhapramāṇena lakṣahome vidhīyate ।
homo ayutena lakṣeṇa kodyājyādyaiḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yuddhajayārṇave ayutalakṣakoṭihomo nāmonapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

manvantarāṇi

agnir uvāca
manvantarāṇi vakṣyāmi ādyāḥ svāyambhuvo manuḥ ।agnīdhrādyāstasya sutā yamo nāma tadā surāḥ ।।aurvādyāś ca saptarṣaya indraś caiva śatakratuḥ ।pārāvatāḥ satuṣitā devāḥ svārociṣe antare ।।vipaścittatra devendra ūrjastambhādayo dvijāḥ ।caitrakimpuruṣāḥ putrāstṛtīyaścottotamo manuḥ ।।suśāntirindro devāś ca sudhāmādyā vaśiṣṭhajāḥ ।saptarṣayo ajādyāḥ putrāś caturthastāmasī manuḥ ।।

svarūpādyāḥ suragaṇāḥ śikhirindraḥ sureśvaraḥ ।jyotirdhāmādayo viprā nava khyātimukhāḥ sutāḥ ।।raivate vitathaścendro amitābhās tathā surāḥ ।hiraṇyaromādyā munayo balabandhādayaḥ sutāḥ ।।manojavaścākṣuṣe atha indraḥ svātyādayaḥ surāḥ ।sumedhādyā maharṣayaḥ puruprabhṛtayaḥ sutāḥ ।।vivasvataḥ suto vipraḥ śrāddhadevo manustataḥ ।ādityavasurudrādyā devā indraḥ purandaraḥ ।।vaśiṣṭhaḥ kāśyapo athātrirjamadagniḥ sagotamaḥ ।viśvāmitrabharadvājau munayaḥ sapta sāmprataṃ ।।ikṣvākupramukhāḥ putrā aṃśena harirābhavat ।svāyambhuve mānaso abhūdajitastadanantare ।।satyo harirdevadaro vaikuṇṭho vāmanaḥ kramāt ।chāyājaḥ sūryaputrastu bhavitā cāṣṭamo manuḥ ।।pūrvasya ca savarṇo asau sāvarṇirbhavitāṣṭamaḥ ।sutapādyā devagaṇā dīptimaddrauṇikādayaḥ ।।munayo balirindraś ca virajapramukhāḥ sutāḥ ।navamo dakṣasāvarṇiḥ pārādyāś ca tadā surāḥ ।।indraś caivādbhutasteṣāṃ savanādyā dvijottamāḥ ।dhṛtaketvādayaḥ putrā brahmasāvarṇirityataḥ ।।sukhādayo devagaṇāsteṣāṃ śāntiḥ śatakratuḥ ।

hiraṇyaromādyā ṛṣaya iti ña

tathā surā iti cha
haviṣyādyāś ca munayaḥ sukṣetrādyāś ca tatsutāḥ ।।dharmasāvarṇikaścātha vihaṅgādyāstadā surāḥ ।gaṇeśaścendro naś carādyā munayaḥ putrakāmayoḥ ।।sarvatragādyā rudrākhyaḥ sāvarṇibhavitā manuḥ ।ṛtadhāmā surendraś ca haritādyāś ca devatāḥ ।।tapasyādyāḥ saptarṣayaḥ sutā vaidevavanmukhāḥ ।manustrayodaśo raucyaḥ sūtrāmāṇādayaḥ surāḥ ।।indro divaspatisteṣāṃ dānavādivimardanaḥ ।nirmohādyāḥ saptarṣayaścitrasenādayaḥ sutāḥ ।।manuś caturdaśo bhautyaḥ śucirindro bhaviṣyati ।cākṣuṣādyāḥ suragaṇā agnibāhṇādayo dvijāḥ ।।caturdaśasya bhautyasya putrā ūrumukhā manoḥ ।prayartayanti devāṃś ca bhuvi saptarṣayo divaḥ ।।devā yajñabhujaste tu bhūḥ putraiḥ paripālyate ।brahmaṇo divase brahmanmanavastu caturdaśa ।।manvādyāś ca harirvedaṃ dvāparānte vibheda saḥ ।ādyo vedaś catuṣpādaḥ śatasāhasrasammitaḥ ।।ekaścāsīd yajurvedastaṃ caturdhā vyakalpayat ।ādhvaryavaṃ yajurbhistu ṛgbhirhotraṃ tathā muniḥ ।।audgātraṃ sāmabhioś cakre brahmatvañcāpyatharvabhiḥ ।prathamaṃ vyāsaśiṣyastu pailo hy ṛgvedapāragaḥ ।।indraḥ pramataye prādādvāskalāya ca saṃhitāṃ ।baudhyādibhyo dadau sopi caturdhā nijasaṃhitāṃ ।।

yajurvedataroḥ śākhāḥ saptaviṃśanmahāmatiḥ ।vaiśampāyananāmāsau vyāsaśiṣyaś cakāra vai ।।kāṇvā vājasaneyādyā yājñavalkyādibhiḥ smṛtāḥ ।sāmavedataroḥ śākhā vyāsaśiṣyaḥ sajaiminiḥ ।।sumantuś ca sukarmā ca ekaikāṃ saṃhitāṃ tataḥ ।gṛhṇate ca sukarmākhyaḥ sahasraṃ saṃhitāṃ guruḥ ।।sumantuścātharvataruṃ vyāsaśiṣyo vibheda taṃ ।śiṣyānadhyāpayāmāsa paipyalādān sahasraśaḥ ।।purāṇasaṃhitāṃ cakre suto vyāsaprasādataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe manvantarāṇi nāma pañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikapañcāśadadhikaśatatano adhyāyaḥ

varṇetaradharmāḥ

agnir uvāca
manvādayo bhuktimuktidharmāṃścīrtvāpnuvanti yān ।proce paraśurāmāya varuṇoktantu puṣkaraḥ ।।
puṣkara uvāca
varṇāśrametarāṇānte dharmānvakṣyāmi sarvadān ।manvādibhir nigaditān vāsudevādituṣṭidān ।।

ahiṃsā satyavacanandayā bhūteṣvanugrahaḥ ।tīrthānusaraṇaṃ dānaṃ brahmacaryammatsaraḥ ।।devadvijātiśuśrūṣā gurūṇāñca bhṛgūttama ।śravaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ tathā ।।bhaktiś ca nṛpatau nityaṃ tathā sacchāstranetratā ।ānṛśaṃṣyantitikṣā ca tathā cāstikyameva ca ।।varṇāśramāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ dharmādharmaṃ samīritaṃ ।yajanaṃ yājanaṃ dānaṃ vedādyadhyāpanakriyā ।।pratigrahañcādhyayanaṃ viprakarmāṇi nirdiśet ।dānamadhyayanañcaiva yajanañca yathāvidhiḥ ।।kṣatriyasya savaiśyasya karmedaṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।kṣatriyasya viśeṣeṇa pālanaṃ duṣṭanigrahaḥ ।।kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyaṃ vaiśyasya parikīrtitaṃ ।śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā sarvaśilpāni vāpyatha ।।mauñjībandhanato janma viprādeś ca dvitīyakaṃ ।ānulomyena varṇānāṃ jātirmātṛsamā smṛtā ।।caṇḍālo brāhmaṇīputraḥ śūdrācca pratilomataḥ ।sūtastu kṣatriyājjāto vaiśyādvai devalas tathā ।।pukkasaḥ kṣatriyāputraḥ śūdrāt syāt pratilomajaḥ ।māgadhaḥ syāttathā vaiśyācchūdrādayogavo bhavet ।।vaiśyāyāṃ pratilomebhyaḥ pratilomāḥ sahasraśaḥ ।

dharmarūpamiti ga, gha, ṅa, ña ca
vivāhaḥ sadṛśaisteṣāṃ nottamair nādhamais tathā ।।caṇḍālakarma nirdiṣṭaṃ badhyānāṃ ghātanaṃ tathā ।strījīvantu tadrakṣāproktaṃ vaidehakasya ca ।।sūtānāmaśvasārathyaṃ pukkasānāñca vyādhatā ।stutikriyā māghdhānāṃ tathā cāyogaśasya ca ।।raṅgāvataraṇaṃ proktaṃ tathā śilpaiś ca jīvanaṃ ।vahirgrāmanivāsaś ca mṛtacelasya dhāraṇaṃ ।।na saṃsparśastathaivānyaiś caṇḍālasya vidhīyate ।brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā dehatyāgo atra yaḥ kṛtaḥ ।।strībālādyupapato vā vāhyāṇāṃ siddhikāraṇaṃ ।saṅkare jātayo jñeyāḥ piturmātuś ca karmataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe varṇāntaradharmā nāmaikapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvipañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gṛhasthavṛttiḥ

puṣkara uvāca
ājīvaṃstu yathoktena brāhmaṇaḥ svena karmaṇā ।kṣatraviṭśūdradharmeṇa jīvennaiva tu śūdrajāt ।।kṛṣibāṇijyagorakṣyaṃ kuśīdañca dvijaś caret ।gorasaṃ guḍalavaṇalākṣāmāṃsāni varjayet ।।

śrījīvanañca tatra syāt proktamiti ga, gha, ṅa, ña ca
bhūmiṃ bhitvauṣadhīśchitvā hutvā koṭapipīlikān ।punanti khalu yajñena karṣakā devapūjanāt ।।halamaṣṭagavaṃ dharmyaṃ ṣaḍgavaṃ jīvitārthināṃ ।carturgavaṃ nṛśaṃsānāṃ dvigavaṃ dharmaghātināṃ ।।ṛtāmṛtābhyāṃ jīveta mṛtena pramṛtena vā ।satyānṛtābhyāmapivā na svavṛttyā kadā ca na ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gṛhasthavṛttayo nāma vripañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha tripañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

brahmacaryāśramadharmaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
dharmamāśramiṇāṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu ।ṣoḍaśartuniśā strīṇāmādyastisrastu garhitāḥ ।।vrajedyugmāsu putrārthī karmādhānikamiṣyate ।garbhasya spaṣṭatājñāne savanaṃ spandanāt purā ।।ṣaṣṭhe aṣṭame vā sīmantaṃ putrīyaṃ nāmabhaṃ śubhaṃ ।acchinnanāḍyāṃ kartavyaṃ jātakarma vicakṣaṇaiḥ ।।aśauce tu vyatikrānte nāmakarma vidhīyate ।śarmāntaṃ brāhmasyoktaṃ varmāntaṃ kṣatriyasya tu ।।guptadāsātmakaṃ nāma praśastaṃ vaiśyaśūdrayoḥ ।

śarmāntaṃ brahmaṇasyoktaṃ varmāntaṃ kṣatriyasya ca ।।guptadāsātmakaṃ nāma praśastaṃ vaiśyaśūdrayoḥ ।bālaṃ nivedayedbhartre tava putro ayamityuta ।।yathākulantu cūḍākṛd brāhmaṇasyopanāyanaṃ ।garbhāṣṭame aṣṭame vābde garbhādekādaśe nṛpe ।।garbhāttu dvādaśe vaiśye ṣoḍaśābdādito na hi ।muñjānāṃ valkalānāntu kramānmaujjyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।।mārgavaiyādhravāstāni carmāṇi vratacāriṇāṃ ।parṇapippalavilvānāṃ kramāddaṇḍāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।।keśadeśalalāṭāsyatulyāḥ proktāḥ krameṇa tu ।avakrāḥ satvacaḥ sarve nāvipluṣṭāstu daṇḍakāḥ ।।vāsopavīte kārpāsakṣaumorṇānāṃ yathākramaṃ ।ādimadhyāvasāneṣu bhavacchabdopalakṣitaṃ ।।prathamaṃ tatra bhhikṣeta yatra bhikṣā dhruvaṃ bhavet ।strīṇāmamantratastāni vivāhastu samantrakaḥ ।।upanīya guruḥ śiṣyaṃ sikṣayecchaucamāditaḥ ।ācāramagnikāryaṃ ca sandhyopāsanameva ca ।।āyuṣyaṃ prāṅmukho bhuṅkte yaśasyaṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ ।śriyaṃ pratyaṅmukhī bhuṅkte ṛtaṃ bhuṅkte udaṅmukhaḥ ।।sāyaṃ prātaś ca juhuyān nāmedhyaṃ vyastahastakaṃ ।madhu māṃsa janaiḥ sārdhaṃ gītaṃ nṛtyañca vai tyajet ।।

nṛtyañca varjayediti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ña, ṭa ca । sāyaṃ prātaścetyādiḥ, nṛtyañca vai tyajedityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti
hiṃsāmparāpavādaṃ ca aślīlaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ ।daṇḍādi dhārayennaṣṭamapsu kṣiptvānyadhāraṇaṃ ।।vedasvīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā srāyādvai dattadakṣiṇaḥ । । naiṣṭhiko brahmacārī vā dehāntaṃ nivasedgurau ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe brahmacaryāśramo nāma tripañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuḥpañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vivāhaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
vipraś catasro vindeta bhāryāstisrastu bhūmipaḥ ।dve ca vaiśyo yathākāmaṃ bhāryaikāmapi cāntyajaḥ ।।dharmakāryāṇi sarvāṇi na kāryāṇyasavarṇayā ।pāṇirgrāhyaḥ savarṇāsu gṛhṇīyāt ksatriyā śaraṃ ।।vaiśyā pratīdamādadyāddaśāṃ vai cāntyajā tathā ।sakṛt kanyā pradātavyā haraṃstāṃ cauradaṇḍabhāk ।।apatyavikrayāsakte niṣkṛtir na vidhīyate ।kanyādānaṃ śacīyogo vivāho atha caturthikā ।।

satīyoga iti kha, cha ca
vivāhametat kathitaṃ nāmakarmacatuṣṭayaṃ ।naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klīve ca patite patau ।।pañcasvāpatsu nārīṇāṃ patiranyo vidhīyate ।mṛte tu devare deyāt tadabhāve yathecchayā ।।pūrvātritayamāgneyaṃ vāyavyaṃ cottarātrayaṃ ।rohiṇau ceti caraṇe bhagaṇaḥ śasyate sadā ।।naikagotrāntu varayennaikārṣeyāñca bhārgava ।pitṛtaḥ saptamādūrdhvaṃ mātṛtaḥ pañcamāttathā ।।āhūya dānaṃ brāhmaḥ syāt kulaśīlayutāya tu ।puruṣāṃstārayettajjo nityaṃ kanyapradānataḥ ।।tathā gomithunādānādvivāhastvārṣa ucyate ।prārthitā dīyate yasya prājāpatyaḥ sa dharmakṛt ।।śulkena cāsuro mando gāndharvo varaṇānmithaḥ ।rākṣaso yuddhaharaṇāt paiśācaḥ kanyakācchalāt ।।vaivāhike ahni kurvīta kumbhakāramṛdā śucīṃ ।jalāśaye tu tāṃ pūjya vādyādyaiḥ strīṃ gṛhatrayet ।।praśupte keśave naiva vivāhaḥ kārya eva hi ।poṣe caitre kujadine riktāviṣṭitatho na ca ।।na śukrajīve astamite na śaśāṅke grahārdite ।arkārkabhaumayukte bhe vyatīpātahate na hi ।।somyaṃ pitryañca vāyavyaṃ sāvitraṃ rohiṇī tathā ।

vaivāhikebde iti gha, ṅa, ña, ṭa ca

vādyaughair iti ga, gha, ña ca
uttarātritayaṃ mūlaṃ maitraṃ pauṣṇaṃ vivāhabhaṃ ।।mānuṣākhyas tathā lagno mānuṣākhyāṃśakaḥ śubhaḥ ।tṛtīye ca tathā ṣaṣṭhe daśamaikādaśe aṣṭame ।।arkārkicandatanayāḥ praśastā na kujo aṣṭamaḥ ।saptāntyāṣṭamavargeṣu śeṣāḥ śastā grahottamāḥ ।।teṣāmapi tathā madhyāt ṣaṣṭhaḥ śukro na śasyate ।vaivāhike bhe kartavyā tathaiva ca caturthikā ।।na dātavyā grahāstatra caturādyāstathaikagāḥ ।parvavarjaṃ striyaṃ gacchet satyā dattā sadā ratiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vivāho nāma satuḥpañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ācāraḥ

puṣkara uvāca
brāhme muhūrte cotthāya viṣṇvādīn daivatān smaret ।ubhe mūtrapurīṣe tu divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ ।।rātau ca dakṣiṇe kuryādubhe sandhye yathā divā ।na mārgādau jale vīpyāṃ satṛṇāyāṃ sadācaret ।।

śaucaṃ kṛtvā mṛdācamya bhakṣayeddantadhāvanaṃ ।nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ kriyāṅgaṃ malakarṣaṇaṃ ।।kriyāsnānaṃ tathā ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣoḍhāsnānaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।asnātasyāphalaṃ karma prātaḥsnānaṃ carettataḥ ।।bhūmiṣṭhamuddhṛtāt puṇyaṃ tataḥ prasravaṇodakaṃ ।tato api sārasaṃ puṇyaṃ tasmānnādeyamucyate ।।tīrthatoyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ gāṅgaṃ puṇyantu sarvataḥ ।saṃśodhitamalaḥ pūrvaṃ nimagnaś ca jalāśaye ।।upaspṛśya tataḥ kuryādambhasaḥ parimārjanaṃ ।hiraṇyavarṇāstisṛbhiḥ śanno devīti cāpyatha ।।āpohiṣṭheti tisṛbhiridamāpastathaiva ca ।tato jalāśaye magnaḥ kuryādantarjalaṃ japaṃ ।।tatrāghamarṣaṇaṃ sūktaṃ drupadāṃ vā tathā japet ।yuñjate mana ity evaṃ sūktaṃ sūktaṃ vāpyatha pauruṣaṃ ।।gāyatrīṃ tu viśeṣeṇa aghamarṣaṇasūktake ।devatā bhāvavṛttastu ṛṣiś caivāghamarṣaṇaḥ ।।chandaścānuṣṭubhaṃ tasya bhāvavṛtto hariḥ smṛtaḥ ।āpīḍamānaḥ śāṭīṃ tu devatāpitṛtarpaṇaṃ ।।pauruṣeṇa tu sūktena dadeccaivodakāñjaliṃ ।tato agnihavanaṃ kuryāddānaṃ datvā tu śaktitaḥ ।।

tatrāghamarṣaṇamityādiḥ devatāpitṛtarpaṇamityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti

tato agniharaṇamiti ṅa, cha ca

dīpaṃ datveti jha
tataḥ samabhigaccheta yogākṣemārthamīśvaraṃ ।āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ jāyāpatyaṅkamaṇḍaluḥ ।।ātmanaḥ śuciretāni pareṣāṃ na śucirbhavet ।bhārākrāntasya gurviṇyāḥ panthā deyo guruṣvapi ।।na paśyeccārkamudyantannāstaṃ yāntaṃ na cāmbhasi ।nekṣennagnāṃ striyaṃ kūpaṃ śūnāsthānamaghaughinaṃ ।।kārpāsāthi tayā bhasma nākrāmed yacca kutsitaṃ ।antaḥpuraṃ vittigṛhaṃ paradautyaṃ brajenna hi ।।nārohedviṣamānnāvanna vṛkṣaṃ na ca parvataṃ ।arthāyatanaśāstreṣu tathaiva syāt kutūhalī ।।loṣṭamardo tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī vinaśyati ।mukhādivādanaṃ nehed vinā dīpaṃ na rātrigaḥ ।।nādvāreṇa viśedveśma na ca vaktraṃ virāgayet ।kathābhaṅgaṃ na kurvīta na ca vāsoviparyayaṃ ।।bhadraṃ bhadramiti brūyānnāniṣṭaṃ kīrtayet kvacit ।pālāśamāsanaṃ varjyaṃ devādicchāyayā vrajet ।।na madhye pūjyayoryāyāt nocchiṣṭastārakādidṛk ।nadyānnānyāṃ nadīṃ brūyānna kaṇḍūyed dvihastakaṃ ।।asantarpya pitṝn devānnadīpārañca na vrajet ।malādiprakṣipennāpsu na nagnaḥ snānamācaret ।।

parabhṛto bhavenna hi iti jha

loṣṭamaddītyādiḥ, na rātriga ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ, gapustake nāsti

devādricchāyayeti kha, cha, ga ca

malādikṣepayennāpsu iti kha, ṭa ca
tataḥ samabhigaccheta yogakṣemārthamīśvaraṃ ।srajannātmanāppanayet kharādikarajastyajet ।।hīnānnāvahaset gacchennādeśe niyasecca taiḥ ।vaidyarājanadīhīne mlecchastrībahunāyake ।।rajasvalādipatitair na bhāṣeta keśavaṃ smaret ।nāsaṃvṛtamukhaḥ kuryāddhāsaṃ jṛmbhāṃ tathā kṣutaṃ ।।prabhorapyavamanaṃ khadgopayedvacanaṃ budhaḥ ।indriyāṇāṃ nānukūlī vedarodhaṃ na kārayet ।।nopekṣitavyo vyādhiḥ syādripuralpo api bhārgava ।rathyātigaḥ sadācāmet vibhṛyānnāgnivāriṇī ।।na huṅkuryācchivaṃ pūjyaṃ pādaṃ pādena nākramet ।pratyakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā kasya cinnāpriyaṃ vadet ।।vedaśāstranarendrarṣidevanindāṃ vivarjayet ।strīṇāmīrṣā na kartavyā triśvāsantāsu varjayet ।।dharmaśrutiṃ devaratiṃ kuryāddharmādi nityaśaḥ ।somasya pūjāṃ janmarkṣe vipradevādipūjanaṃ ।।

kuryāddhāsyamiti kha ,ṭa ca

ripurvatsopi iti ṅa

samācāmediti cha

strīṇāmiccheti ka

devanatimiti ga, gha, ṅa, ña, ṭa ca । vedanatimiti kha ,cha ca

bhadraṃ bhadramiti brūyādityādiḥ, kuryāddharmādi nityaśa ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti
ṣaṣṭhīcaturdaśyaṣṭamyāmabhyaṅgaṃ varjayettathā ।dūrādgṛhān mūtraviṣṭhe nottamaivairamācaret ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ācārādhyāyo nāma pañcapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dravyacuddhiḥ

puṣkara uvāca
dravyaśuddhiṃ pravakṣyāmi punaḥpākena mṛṇmayaṃ ।śuddhyen mūtrapurīṣādyaiḥ spṛṣṭāmraṃ suvarṇakaṃ ।।āvartitañcānyathā tu vāriṇāmllena tāmrakaṃ ।kṣāreṇa kāṃsyalohānāṃ muktādeḥ kṣālanena tu ।।abjānāṃ caiva bhāṇḍānāṃ sarvasyāśmamayasya ca ।śākarajjumūlaphalavaidalānāṃ tathaiva ca ।।mārjanādyajñapātrāṇāṃ pāṇinā yajñakarmaṇi ।uṣṇāmbunā sasnehānāṃ śuddhiḥ sammārjanādgṛhe ।।

duṣṭānāmiti ṭa
śodhanānmrakṣaṇādvastre mṛttikādbhirviśodhanaṃ ।bahuvastre prokṣaṇācca dāravāṇāñca takṣaṇāt ।।prokṣaṇāt saṃhatānāntu dravāṇāñca tathotplavāt ।śayanāsanayānānāṃ śūrpasya śakaṭasya ca ।।śuddhiḥ samprokṣaṇāj jñeyā palālendhanayos tathā ।śuddhārthakānāṅkalkena śṛṅgadantamayasya ca ।।gobālaiḥ palapātrāṇāmasthnāṃ syācchṛṅgavattathā ।niryāsānāṃ guḍānāñca lavaṇānāṃ ca śoṣaṇāt ।।kuśumbhakusumānāñca ūrṇākārpāsayos tathā ।śuddhannadīgataṃ toyaṃ puṇyantadvat prasāritaṃ ।।mukhavarjañca gauḥ śuddhā śuddhamaśvājayormukhaṃ ।nārīṇāñcaiva vatsānāṃ śakunīnāṃ śuno mukhaṃ ।।mukhaiḥ prasravaṇe vṛtte mṛgayāyāṃ sadā śuci ।bhuktvā kṣutvā tathā suptvā pītvā cāmbho vigāhya ca ।।rathyāmākramya cācāmedvāso viparidhāya ca ।mārjāraś caṅkramācchuddhaś caturythe ahni rajasvalā ।।snātā strī pañcame yogyā daive pitrye ca karmaṇi ।pañcāpāne daśaikasminnubhayoḥ sapta mṛttikāḥ ।।ekāṃ liṅge mṛdaṃ dadyāt karayostridvimṛttikāḥ ।brahmacārivanasthānāṃ yatīnāñca caturguṇaṃ ।।śrīphalair aṃśupaṭṭānāṃ kṣaumāṇāṅgaurasarṣapaiḥ ।

śodhanābhyukṣaṇādvastre iti gha, ṅa ca
śuddhiḥ paryukṣya toyena mṛgalomnāṃ prakīrtitā ।।puṣpāṇāñca phalānāñca prokṣaṇājjalato akhilaṃ ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dravyaśuddhirnāma ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śāvāśaucādiḥ

puṣkara uvāca
pretaśuddhiṃ pravakṣyāmi sūtikāśudhhimeva ca ।daśāhaṃ śāvamāśaucaṃ sapiṇdeṣu vidhīyate ।।janane ca tathā śuddhirbrāhmaṇānāṃ bhṛgūttama ।dvādaśāhena rājanyaḥ pakṣādvaiśyo atha māsataḥ ।।śūdro anulomato dāse svāmitulyantvaśaucakaṃ ।ṣaṭbhistribhirathaikena kṣatraviṭśūdrayoniṣu ।।brāhmaṇaḥ śuddhimāpnoti kṣatriyastu tathaiva ca ।viṭśūdrayoneḥ śuddhiḥ syāt kramāt paraśurāmaka ।।ṣaḍrātreṇa trirātreṇa ṣaḍbhiḥ śūdre tathā viśaḥ ।

ādantajananāt sadya ācūḍānnaiśikī śrutiḥ ।।trirātramāvratādeśāddaśarātramataḥ paraṃ ।ūnatraivārṣike śūdre pañcāhācchuddhiriṣyate ।।dvādaśāhene śuddhiḥ syādatīte vatsaratraye ।gataiḥ saṃvatsaraiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ śuddhirmāsena kīrtitā ।।strīṇāmakṛtacūḍānāṃ viśuddhir naiśikī smṛtā ।tathā ca kṛtacuḍānāṃ tryahācchuddhyanti bāndhavāḥ ।।vivāhitāsu nāśaucaṃ pitṛpakṣe vidhīyate ।piturgṛhe prasūtānāṃ viśuddhir naiśikī smṛtā ।।sūtikā daśarātreṇa śuddhimāpnoti nānyathā ।vivāhitā hi cet kanyā mriyate pitṛveśmani ।।tasyāstrirātrācchuddhyanti bāndhavā nātra saṃśayaḥ ।samānaṃ labdhaśaucantu prathamena samāpayet ।।asamānaṃ dvitīyena dharmarājavaco yathā ।deśāntarasthaḥ śrutvā tu kulyāṇāṃ maraṇodbhavau ।।yaccheṣaṃ daśarātrasya tāvadevaśucirbhavet ।atīte daśarātre tu trirātramaśucirbhavet ।।tathā saṃvatsare atīte snāta eva viśuddhyati ।mātāmahe tathātīte ācārye ca tathā mṛte ।।rātribhirmāsatulyābhirgarbhasrāve viśodhanaṃ ।sapiṇde brāhmaṇe varṇāḥ sarva evāviśeṣataḥ ।।

ācaḍānnaiśikī tatheti ṭa
daśarātreṇa śuddhyanti dvādaśāhena bhūmipaḥ ।vaiśyāḥ pañcadaśāhena śūdrā māsena bhārgava ।।ucchiṣṭasannidhāvekaṃ tathā piṇḍaṃ nivedayet ।kīrtayecca tathā tasya namagotre samāhitaḥ ।।bhuktavatsu dvijendreṣu pūjiteṣu dhanena ca ।visṛṣṭākṣatatoyeṣu gotranāmānukīrtanaiḥ ।।caturaṅgulavistāraṃ tatkhātantāvadantaraṃ ।vitastidīrghaṃ kartavyaṃ vikarṣūṇāṃ tathā trayaṃ ।।vikarṣūṇāṃ samīpe ca jvālayej jvalanatrayaṃ ।somāya vahnaye rāma yamāya ca samāsataḥ ।।juhuyādāhutīḥ samyak sarvatraiva catustrayaḥ ।piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kuryāt prāgvadeva pṛthak pṛthak ।।annena dadhnā madhunā tathā māṃsena pūrayet ।madhye cedadhimāsaḥ syāt kuryādabhyadhikantu tat ।।athavā dvādaśāhena sarvametat samāpayet ।saṃvatsarasya madhye ca yadi syādadhimāsakaḥ ।।tadā dvādaśake śrāddhe kāryaṃ tadadhikaṃ bhavet ।saṃvatsare samāpte tu śrāddhaṃ śrāddhavadācaret ।।pretāya tata ūrdhavaṃ ca tasyaiva puruṣatraye ।piṇḍān vinirvapettadvaccaturastu samāhitaḥ ।।sampūjya datvā pṛthivī samānā iti cāpyatha ।

dhaneṣu ceti ka, kha, gha, ṅa, cha, ja, ña ca
yojayet pretapiṇḍaṃ tu piṇḍeṣvanyeṣu bhārgava ।।pretapātraṃ ca pātreṣu tathaiva viniyojayet ।pṛthak pṛthak prakartavyaṃ karmaitat karmapātrake ।।mantravarjamidaṃ karma śūdrasya tu vidhīyate ।sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ strīṇāṃ kāryamevaṃ tadā bhavet ।।śrāddhaṃ kuryācca pratyabdaṃ prete kumbhānnamabdakaṃ ।gaṅgāyāḥ sikatā dhārā yathā varṣati vāsave ।।śakyā gaṇayituṃ loke natvatītāḥ pitāmahāḥ ।kāle satatage sthairyaṃ nāsti tasmāt kriyāṃ caret ।।devatve yātanāsthāne pretaḥ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ labhet ।nopakuryānnaraḥ śocan pretasyātmana eva vā ।।bhṛgvagnipāśakāmbhobhirmṛtānāmātmaghātināṃ ।patitānāṃ ca nāśaucaṃ vidyucchastrahatāś ca ye ।।yatibratibrahmacārinṛpakārukadīkṣitāḥ ।rājājñākāriṇo ye ca snāyādvai pretagāmyapi ।।maithune kaṭadhūme ca sadyaḥ snānaṃ vidhīyate ।dvijaṃ na nirharet pretaṃ śūdreṇa tu kathañcana ।।na ca śūdraṃ dvijenāpi tayordoṣo hi jāyate ।anāthaviprapretasya vahanāt svaragalokabhāk ।।

kāryameva tathā bhavediti cha, ṅa, ña ca । kāryametattathā bhavediti jha

rājājñākārakā iti ṭa

na nirdahediti kha

tayordoṣo abhijāyate iti ṅa
saṅgrāme jayamāpnoti prete anāthe ca kāṣṭhadaḥ ।saṅkalpya bāndhavaṃ pretamapasavyena tāṃ citiṃ ।।parikramya tataḥ snānaṃ kuryuḥ sarve savāsasaḥ ।pretāya ca tathā dadyustrīṃstrīṃś caivodakāñjalīn ।।dvāryaśmani padaṃ datvā praviśeyus tathā gṛhaṃ ।akṣatānnikṣipedvahnau nimbapatraṃ vidaśya ca ।।pṛthak śayīran bhūmau ca krītalabdhāśano bhavet ।ekaḥ piṇdo daśāhe tu śmaśrukarmakaraḥ śuciḥ ।।siddhārthakaistilair vidvān majjedvāsoparaṃ dadhat ।ajātadante tanaye śiśau garbhasrute tathā ।।kāryo naivāgnisaṃskāro naiva cāsyodakakriyā ।caturthe ca dinekāryas tathāsthnāṃ caiva sañcayaḥ ।।asthisañcayanādūrdhvamaṅgasparśo vidhīyate ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śāvāśaucaṃ nāma saptapañcāśadādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

srāvādyaśaucaṃ

puṣkara uvāca

srāvāśaucaṃ pravakṣyāmi manvādimunisammataṃ ।

siddhārthakaistilair viprān yajadvāso aparaṃ dadhaditi gha, ṅa, ña ca । siddhārthastilair vidvān snāyādvāso aparaṃ dadhaditi ga, ṭa ca
rātribhirmāsatulyābhirgarbhasrāve tryaheṇa yā ।।cāturmāsikapātānte daśāhaṃ pañcamāsataḥ ।rājanye ca catūrātraṃ vaiśye pañcāhameva ca ।।aṣṭāhena tu śūdrasya dvādaśāhādataḥ paraṃ ।strīṇāṃ viśuddhiruditā snānamātreṇa vai pituḥ ।।na snānaṃ hi sapiṇḍe syāttrirātraṃ saptamāṣṭayoḥ ।sadyaḥ śaucaṃ sapiṇḍānāmādantajananāttathā ।।ācūḍādekarātraṃ syādāvratācca trirātrakaṃ ।daśarātraṃ bhavedasmānmātāpitrostrirātrakaṃ ।।ajātadante tu mṛte kṛtacūḍe arbhake tathā ।prete nyūne tribhirvarṣair mṛte śuddhistu naiśilkī ।।dvyaheṇa kṣatriye śuddhistribhirvaiśye mṛte tathā ।śuddhiḥ śūdre pañcabhiḥ syāt prāgvivāhad dviṣaṭtvahaḥ ।।yatra trirātraṃ viprāṇāmaśaucaṃ sampradṛśyate ।tatra śūdre dvādaśāhaḥ ṣaṇṇava kṣatravaiśayyoḥ ।।dvyabde naivāgnisaṃskāro mṛte tannikhaned bhuvi ।na codakakriyā tasya nāmni cāpi kṛte sati ।।jātadantasya vā kāryā syādupanayanāddaśa ।ekāhācchuddhyate vipro yo agnivedasamanvitaḥ ।।hīne hīnatare caiva tryahaś caturahas tathā ।pañcāhenāgnihīnastu daśāhādbrāhmaṇavruvaḥ ।।

viśuddhiḥ kathiteti gha, ṅa, ña ca

dviṣaṭkakamiti ṭa
kṣatriyo navasaptāhacchuddhyedvipro guṇair yutaḥ ।daśāhāt saguṇo vaiśyo viṃśāhācchūdra eva ca ।।daśāhācchuddhyate vipro dvādaśāhena bhūmipaḥ ।vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhena śūdro māsena śuddhyati ।।guṇotkarṣe daśāhāptau tryahamekāhakaṃ tryahe ।ekāhāptau sadyaḥ śaucaṃ sarvatraivaṃ samūhayet ।।dāsāntevāsibhṛtakāḥ śiṣyāś caivātra vāsinaḥ ।svāmitulyamaśaucaṃ syānmṛte pṛthak pṛthagbhavet ।।maraṇādeva kartavyaṃ saṃyogo yasya nāgnibhiḥ ।dāhādūrdhvamaśaucaṃ syādyasya vaitāniko vidhiḥ ।।sarveṣāmeva varṇānāntribhāgāt sparśanambhavet ।tricatuḥpañcadaśabhiḥ spṛśyavarṇāḥ krameṇa tu ।।caturthe pañcame caiva saptame navame tathā ।asthisañcayanaṃ kāryaṃ varṇānāmanupūrvaśaḥ ।।ahastvadattakanyāsu pradattāsu tryahaṃ bhavet ।pakṣiṇī saṃskṛtāsveva svasrādiṣu vidhīyate ।।pitṛgotraṃ kumārīṇāṃ vyūḍhānāṃ bhartṛgotratā ।jalapradānaṃ pitre ca udvāhe cobhayatra tu ।।daśāhopari pitroś ca duhiturmaraṇe tryahaṃ ।sadyaḥ śaucaṃ sapiṇḍānāṃ pūrvaṃ cūḍākṛterdvija ।।ekāhato hy āvivihādūrdhvaṃ hastodakāt tryahaṃ ।pakṣiṇī bhrātṛputrasya sapiṇḍānāṃ ca sadyataḥ ।।daśāhācchuddhyate vipro janmahānau svayoniṣu ।

ṣadbhistribhirahaikena kṣatraviṭśūdrayoniṣu ।।etajjñeyaṃ sapiṇḍānāṃ vakṣye cānaurasādiṣu ।anauraseṣu putreṣu bhāryāsvanyagatāsu ca ।।parapūrvāsu ca strīṣu trirātrācchuddhiriṣyate ।vṛthāsaṅkarajātānāṃ pravrajyāsu ca tiṣṭhatāṃ ।।ātmanastyāgināñcaiva nivartetodakakriyā ।mātraikayā dvipitarau bhratarāvanyagāminau ।।ekāhaḥ sūtake tatra mṛtake tu dvyaho bhavet ।sapiṇḍānāmaśaucaṃ hi samānodakatāṃ vade ।।bāle deśāntarasthe ca pṛthakpiṇḍe ca saṃsthite ।savāsā jalamāplutya sadya eva viśuddhyati ।।daśāhena sapiṇḍāstu śuddhyanti pretasūtake ।trirātreṇa sukulyāstu snānāt śuddhyanti gotriṇaḥ ।।sapiṇḍatā tu puruṣe saptame vinivartate ।samānodakabhāvastu nivartetācaturdaśāt ।।janmanāmasmṛte vaitat tatparaṃ gotramucyate ।vigatantu videśasthaṃ śṛṇuyādyo hy anirdaśaṃ ।।yaccheṣaṃ daśarātrasya tāvadevāśucirbhavet ।atikrānte daśāhe tu trirātramaśucirbhavet ।।saṃvatsare vyatīte tu spṛṣṭvaivāpo viśuddhyati ।

mṛtake tu tryaho bhavediti gha, ṅa, ña ca । matake tu tathā bhavediti jha

snātā iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca
mātule pakṣiṇo rātriḥ śiṣyatvigbāndhaveṣu ca ।।mṛṭe jāmātari prete daihitre bhaginīsute ।śyālake tatsute caiva snānamātraṃ vidhīyate ।।mātāmahyāṃ tathācārye mṛte mātāmahe tryahaṃ ।durbhikṣe rāṣṭrasampāte āgatāyāṃ tathāpadi ।।upasargamṛtānāñca dāhe brahmavidāntathā ।satrivrati brahmattārisaṅgrāme deśaviplave ।।dāne yajñe vivāhe ca sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate ।vipragonṛpahantṝṇāmanuktaṃ cātmaghātināṃ ।।asādhyavyādhiyuktasya svādhyāye cākṣamasya ca ।prāyaścittamanujñātamagnitoyapraveśanaṃ ।।apamānāttathā krodhāt snehātparibhavādbhayāt ।udbadhya mriyate nārī puruṣo vā kathañcana ।।ātmaghātī caikalakṣaṃ vasetsa narake śucau ।vṛddhaḥ śrautasmṛterluptaḥ parityajati yastvasūn ।।trirātraṃ tatra śāśaucaṃ dvitīye cāsthisañcayaṃ ।tṛtīye tūdakaṃ kāryaṃ caturthe śrāddhamācaret ।।vidyudagnihatānāñca tryahaṃ śuddhiḥ sapiṇḍike ।pāṣaṇḍāśritā bhartṛghnyo nāśaucodakagāḥ striyaḥ ।।pitṛmātrādipāte tu ārdravāsā hy upoṣitaḥ ।

prete, bhaginīsuta ity api iti ṭa

yativratīti ja

apamānādatheti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca

vidyudādihatānāñca tryahācchuddhirvidhīyate iti ṭa
atītebde prakurvīta pretakāryaṃ yathāvidhi ।।yaḥ kaścittu haret pretamasapiṇḍaṃ kathañcana ।snātvā scelaḥ spṛṣṭvāgniṃ ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśuddhyati ।।yadyannamatti teṣāntu daśāhenaiva śuddhyati ।anadannannamahnyeva na vai tasmin gṛhe vaset ।।anāthaṃ vrāhmaṇaṃ pretaṃ ye vahanti dvijātayaḥ ।pade pade yajñaphalaṃ śuddhiḥ syāt snānamātrataḥ ।।pretībhūtaṃ dvijaḥ śūdramanugacchaṃstryahācchuciḥ ।mṛtasya bāndhavaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛtvā ca paridevanaṃ ।।varjayettadahorātraṃ dānaśrāddhādi kāmataḥ ।śūdrāyāḥ prasavo gehe śūdrasya maraṇaṃ tathā ।।bhāṇḍāni tu parityajya tryahādbhūlepataḥ śuciḥ ।na vipraṃ sveṣu tiṣṭhatsu mṛtaṃ śūdreṇa nāyayet ।।nayet pretaṃ snāpitañca pūjitaṃ kusumair dahet ।nagnadehaṃ dahen naiva kiñciddehaṃ parityajet ।।gotrajastu gṛhītvā tu citāṃ cāropayettadā ।āhitāgniryathānyāyaṃ dagdhavyastibhiragnibhiḥ ।।anāhitāgnirekena laukikenāparas tathā ।asmāt tvamabhijāto asi tvadayaṃ jāyatāṃ punaḥ ।।asau svargāya lokāya sukhāgniṃ pradadetsutaḥ ।sakṛtprasiñcantyudakaṃ nāmagotreṇa bāndhavāḥ ।।

dānaśrāddhādikarma ceti jha
evaṃ mātāmahācāryapretānāñcodakakriyā ।kāmyodakaṃ sakhipretasvasrīyaśvaśrurartvijāṃ ।।apo naḥ śośucidayaṃ daśāhañca suto arpayet ।brāhmaṇe daśapiṇḍāḥ syuḥ kṣatriye dvādaśa smṛtāḥ ।।vaiśye pañcadaśa proktāḥ śūdre triṃśat prakīrtitā ।putro vā putrikānyo vā piṇḍaṃ dadyācca putravat ।।vidiśya nimbapatrāṇi niyato dvāri veśmanaḥ ।ācamya cāgnimudakaṃ gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān ।।praviśeyuḥ samālabhya kṛtvāśmani padaṃ śanaiḥ ।akṣaralavaṇānnaḥ syur nirmāṃsā bhūmiśāyinaḥ ।।krītalabdhāśanāḥ snātā ādikartā daśāhakṛt ।abhāve brahmacārī tu kuryātpiṇḍodakādikaṃ ।।yathedaṃ śāvamāśaucaṃ sapiṇḍeṣu vidhīyate ।jananepyevaṃ syānnipuṇāṃ śuddhimicchatāṃ ।।sarveṣāṃ śāvamāśaucaṃ mātāpitroś ca sūtakaṃ ।sūtakaṃ mātureva syādupaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ ।।putrajanmadine śrāddhaṃ kartavyamiti niścitaṃ ।tadahastatpradānārthaṃ gohiraṇyādivāsasāṃ ।।maraṇaṃ maraṇenaiva sūtakaṃ sūtakena tu ।ubhayorapi yat pūrvaṃ tenāśaucena śuddhyati ।।sūtake mṛtakaṃ cetsyān mṛtake tvatha sūtakaṃ ।tatrādhikṛtya mṛtakaṃ śaucaṃ kuryānna sūtakaṃ ।।samānaṃ laghvaśaucantu prathamena samāpayet ।

asamānaṃ dvitīyena dharmarājavaco yathā ।।śāvāntaḥ śāva āyāte pūrvāśaucena śuddhyati ।guruṇā laghu bādhyeta laghunā naiva tadguru ।।mṛtake sūtake vāpi rātrimadhye anyadāpatet ।taccheṣeṇaiva suddhyeran rātriśeṣe dvyahādhikāt ।।prabhāte yadyaśaucaṃ syācchuddheraṃś ca tribhirdinaiḥ ।ubhayatra daśāhāni kulasyānnaṃ na bhujyate ।।dānādi ninivarteta kulasyānnaṃ na bhujyate ।ajñāte pātakaṃ nādye bhokturekamaho anyathā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe srāvādyaśaucaṃ nāma aṣṭapañcāśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikonaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

asaṃskṛtādiśaucaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
saṃskṛtasyāsaṃskṛtasya svargo mokṣo harimmṛteḥ ।asthnāṅgaṅgāmbhasi kṣepāt pretasyābhyudayo bhavet ।।

āpāta iti kha, cha ca

ananepyevamevaṃ syādityādiḥ, bhokturekamahonyathetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ gha, jha, ña pustakatrayeṣu nāsti
gaṅgātoye narasyāsthi yāvattāvaddivi sthatiḥ ।ātmanastyāgināṃ nāsti patitānāṃ tathā kriyā ।।teṣāmapi tathā gāṅge toye asthnāṃ patanaṃ hitaṃ ।teṣāṃ dattaṃ jalaṃ cānnaṃ gagane tat pralīyate ।।anugraheṇa mahatā pretasya patitasya ca ।nārāyaṇabaliḥ kāryastenānugrahamaśnute ।।akṣayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣastatra dattaṃ na naśyati ।patanātrāyate yasmāt tasmāt pātraṃ janārdanaḥ ।।patatāṃ bhuktimuktyādiprada eko harirdhruvaṃ ।dṛṣṭvā lokān mriyamāṇān sahāyaṃ dharmamācaret ।।mṛto api bāndhavaḥ śakto nānugantuṃ naraṃ mṛtaṃ ।jāyāvarjaṃ hi sarvasya yāmyaḥ panthā vibhidyate ।।dharma eko vrajatyenaṃ yatra kvacana gāminaṃ ।śvaḥ kāryamadya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikaṃ ।।na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtaḥ vāsya na vā kṛtaṃ ।kṣetrāpaṇagṛhāsaktamanyatragatamānasaṃ ।।vṛkīvīraṇamāsādya mṛtyurādāya gacchati ।na kālasya priyaḥ kaścid dveṣyaścāsya na vidyate ।।āyuṣye karmaṇi kṣīṇe prasahya harite janaṃ ।nāprāptakālo mriyate biddhaḥ śaraśatair api ।।kuśāgreṇāpi saṃspṛṣṭaḥ prāptakālo na jīvati ।

panthā vibhajyate iti ga

dharma eveti ja
auṣadhāni na mantrādyāstrāyante mṛtyunānvitaṃ ।।vatsavat prākṛtaṃ karma kartāraṃ vindati dhruvaṃ ।avyaktādi vyaktamadhyamavyaktanidhanaṃ jagat ।।kaumārādi yathā dehe tathā dehāntarāgamaḥ ।navamanyadyathā vastraṃ gṛhṇātyevaṃ śarīrikaṃ ।।dehī nityamabadhyo ayaṃ yataḥ śokaṃ tatastyajet ।।
e ity ādyāgneye mahāpurāṇe śaucaṃ nāmaikonaṣṭyadhikataśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vānaprasthāśramaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
vānaprasthayatīnāñca dharmaṃ vakṣye adhunā śṛṇu ।jaṭitvamagnihotritvaṃ bhūśayyājinadhāraṇaṃ ।।vane vāsaḥ payomūlanīvāraphalavṛttitā ।pratigrahanivṛttiś ca triḥsnānaṃ brahmacāritā ।।devātithīnāṃ pūjā ca dharmo ayaṃ vanavāsinaḥ ।

auṣadhādīti ka

yatīnāntu iti ṅa
gṛhī hy apatyāpatyañca dṛṣṭvāraṇyaṃ samāśrayet ।।tṛtīyamāyuṣo bhāgamekākī vā sabhāryakaḥ ।grīṣme pañcatapā nityaṃ varṣāsvabhrāvikāśikaḥ ।।ārdravāsāś ca hemante tapaścograñcaredbalī ।aparāvṛttimāsthāya vrajeddiśamajihmagaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vānaprasthāśramo nāma ṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yatidharmaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
yatirdharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi jñānamokṣādidarśakaṃ ।caturdhamāyuṣo bhāgaṃ prāpya saṅgāt parivarjayet ।।yadahni virajeddhīrastadahni ca parivrajet ।prajāpatyāṃ nirūpyeṣṭiṃ sarvadevasadakṣiṇāṃ ।।ātmanyagnīn samāropya pravrajedbrāhmaṇo gṛhāt ।

dṛṣṭvāvaśyamiti ṅa

tapaścograṃ vane carediti ṅa

bhajeddiśamajimhaga iti ṅa

saṅgān parityajediti ṅa

virajedvāpi tadahni iti ṅa
