eka eva carennityaṃ grāsamannāthamāśrayet ।।upekṣako asiñcayiko munirjñānasamanvitaḥ ।kapālaṃ vṛkṣamūlañca kucelamasahāyātā ।।samatā caiva sarvasminnetanmuktasya lakṣaṇaṃ ।nābhinandena maraṇaṃ nābhinandeta jīvanaṃ ।।kālameva pratīkṣeta nideśaṃ bhṛtako yathā ।dṛṣṭipūtaṃ nyasetpādaṃ vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ pivet ।।satyapūtāṃ vadedvācaṃ manaḥpūtaṃ samācaret ।alāvudārupatrāṇi mṛṇmayaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yateḥ ।।vidhūme nyastamuṣale vyaṅgāre bhuktavajjane ।vṛtte śarāvasampāte bhikṣāṃ nityaṃ yatiś caret ।।madhūkaramasaṅkliptaṃ prākpraṇītamayācitaṃ ।tātkālikañcopapannaṃ bhaikṣaṃ pañcavidhaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।pāṇipātrī bhavedvāpi pātre pātrāt samācaret ।avekṣeta gatiṃ nṝṇāṃ karmadoṣasamudbhavāṃ ।।śuddhabhāvaś caredbharmaṃ yatra tatrāśrame rataḥ ।samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu na liṅgaṃ dharmakāraṇaṃ ।।phalaṃ katakavṛkṣasya yadyapyambuprasādakaṃ ।na nāmagrahaṇādeva tasya vāri prasīdati ।।

vṛkṣamūlāni kha, gha, cha, jha ca । vṛkṣamūlādi iti ṭa

etacchuddhasyeti ṅa

jīvitamiti kha, gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca
ajihmaḥ paṇḍakaḥ paṅgurandho badhira eva ca ।sadbhiś ca mucyate madbhirajñānāt saṃsṛto dvijaḥ ।।ahni rātryāñca yān jantūn hinastyajñānato yatiḥ ।teṣāṃ snātvā viśuddhyarthaṃ prāṇāyāmān ṣaḍācaret ।।asthisthūṇaṃ snāyuyutaṃ māṃsaśoṇitalepanaṃ ।carmāvanaddhaṃ durgandhaṃ pūrṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥ ।।jarāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanamāturaṃ ।rajasvalamanityañca bhūtāvāsamimantyajet ।।dhṛtiḥ kṣamā damo asteyaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ ।hrīrvidyā satyamakrodho daśakaṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ ।।caturvidhaṃ bhaikṣavastu kuṭīrakavahūdake ।haṃsaḥ paramahaṃsaś ca yo yaḥ paścāt sa uttamaḥ ।।ekadaṇḍī tridaṇḍī vā yogī mucyate bandhanāt ।ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahau ।।yamāḥ pañcātha niyamāḥ śaucaṃ santoṣaṇantapaḥ ।svādhyāyeśvarapūjā ca padmakādyāsanaṃ yateḥ ।।prāṇāyāmastu dvividhaḥ sa garbho agarbha eva ca ।japadhyānayuto garbho viparītastvagarbhakaḥ ।।pratyekaṃ trividhaṃ sopi pūrakumbhakarecakaiḥ ।pūraṇāt pūrako vāyor niś calatvācca kumbhakaḥ ।।

samācarediti kha, cha ca

dayāsteyamiti ṅa

tridaṇḍī ceti ṅa

padmakādyāsanaṃ mahat iti ṭa
recanādrecakaḥ prokto mātrābhedena ca tridhā ।dvādaśāttu caturviṃśaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśanmātriko aparaḥ ।।tālo laghvakṣaro mātrā praṇavādi carecchanaiḥ ।pratyāhāro jāpakānāṃ dhyānamīśvaracintanaṃ ।।manodhṛtirdhāraṇā syāt samādhirbrahmaṇi sthitiḥ ।ayamātmā paraṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakaṃ ।।vijñānamānandaṃ brahma tattvamasyaahamasmi tat ।param brahma jyotirātmā vāsudevo vimukta oṃ ।।dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitaṃ ।jāgratsvapnasusuptyādimuktaṃ brahma turoyakaṃ ।।nityaśuddhabuddhayuktasatyamānandamadvayaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirakṣaraṃ sarvagaṃ hariḥ ।।so asāvādityapuruṣaḥ so asāvahamakhaṇḍa oṃ ।sarvārambhaparityāgī samaduḥkhasukhaṃ kṣamī ।।bhāvaśuddhaś ca brahmāṇḍaṃ bhittvā brahma bhavennaraḥ ।āṣaḍhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāñca cāturmāsyaṃ vratañcaret ।।tato jrajet navamyādau hy ṛtusandhiṣu vāpayet ।prāyaścittaṃ yatīnāñca dhyānaṃ vāyuyamas tathā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yatirdharmā nāmaikaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

āgratsvapnasusuptyāntamuktamiti ṅa, cha, ña ca

ity āgneye aśaucanirṇaya ity ādiḥ, satyamānandamadvayamityantaḥ pāṭho ga pustake nāsti

chapter 

ś atha dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dharmaśāstrakathanaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
manurviṣṇuryājñavalko hārīto atriryamo aṅigirāḥ ।vasiṣṭhadakṣasaṃvartaśātātapaparāśarāḥ ।।āpastambośanovyāsāḥ kātyayanabṛhaspatī ।gotamaḥ śaṅkhalikhitau dharmamete yathābruvan ।।tathā vakṣye samāsena bhuktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu ।pravṛttañca nivṛttañca dvividhaṅkarma vaidikaṃ ।।kāmyaṃ karma pravṛttaṃ syānnivṛttaṃ jñānapūrvakaṃ ।vedābhyāsastapo jñānamindiyāṇāñca saṃyamaḥ ।।ahiṃsā gurusevā ca niḥśreyasakaraṃ paraṃ ।sarveṣāmapi caiteṣāmatmajñānaṃ paraṃ smṛtaṃ ।।taccagryaṃ sarvavidyānāṃ prāpyate hy amṛtaṃ tataḥ ।sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani ।।samampaśyannātmayājī svārājyamadhigacchati ।ātmajñāne same ca syādvedābhyāse ca yatnavān ।।etaddvijanmasāmarthyaṃ brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ ।

etaddvijanmasāgryamiti kha, ṅa, jha, ña, ṭa ca । etaddvijanmasāmagrīti gha
vedaśāstrārthatattvajño yatra tatrāśrame vasan ।।ihaiva loke tiṣṭhan hi brahmabhūyāya kalpyate ।svādhyāyānāmupākarma śrāvaṇyāṃ śrāvaṇena tu ।।haste cauṣadhivāre ca pañcamyāṃ śrāvaṇasya vā ।pauṣamāsasya rohiṇyāmaṣṭakāyāmathāpi vā ।।jalānte chandasāṅkuryādutsargaṃ vidhivadvahiḥ ।tryahaṃ preteṣvanadhyāyaḥ śiṣyartviggurubandhuṣu ।।upākarmaṇi cotsargaṃ svaśākhāśrotriye tathā ।sandhyāgarjitanirghāte bhūkampolkānipātane ।।samāpya vedaṃ hy aniśamāraṇyakamadhītya ca ।pañcadaśyāṃ caturdaśyāmaṣṭamyāṃ rāhusūtake ।।ṛtusandhiṣu bhuktvā vā śrādvikaṃ pratigṛhya ca ।paśumaṇḍūkanakulaśvāhimārjāraśūkaraiḥ ।।kṛtentare tvahorātraṃ śakrapāte tathocchriye ।śvakroṣṭugardhabholūkamāsavāṇartunisvane ।।amedhyaśavaśūdrāntyaśmaśānapatitāntike ।aśubhāsu ca tārāsu vidyutstanitasamplave ।।bhutkvārdrapāṇirambhontarardharātre atimārute ।pāṃśuvarṣe diśāndāhe sandhyānīhārabhītiṣu ।।dhāvataḥ prāṇibādhe ca viśiṣṭe gṛhamāgate ।

brahmacaryāya kalpyate iti ṅa

svaśākhāśrotriye mṛte iti gha, jha, ña, ṭa ca

śaśamārjāraśūkarair iti ṅa
kharoṣṭrayānahastyaśvanaukāvṛkṣādirohaṇe ।।
saptatriṃśadanadhyāyānetāṃstātkālikānviduḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dharmaśāstraṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha triṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śrāddhakalpakathanaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
śrāddhakalpaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu ।nimantrya viprān pūrvedyuḥ svāgatenāparāhṇataḥ ।।prācyopaveśayet pīṭhe yugmāndaive atha pitrake ।ayugmān prāṅmukhāndaive trīn paitre caikameva vā ।।mātāmahānāmapyevantantraṃ vā vaiśyadevikaṃ ।prāṇiprakṣālanaṃ dattvā viṣṭarārthaṃ kuśānapi ।।āvāhayedanujñāto viśve devāsa ity ṛcā ।yavairanvavakīryātha bhājane sapavitrake ।।śannodevyā payaḥ kṣiptvā yavosīti yavāṃs tathā ।yādivyā itimantreṇa haste hy arghaṃ vinikṣipet ।।datvodakaṃ gandhamālyaṃ dhūpadānaṃ pradīpakaṃ ।apasavyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pitṝṇāmapradakṣiṇaṃ ।।

dviguṇāṃstu kuśān kṛtvā hy uśantastvetyṛcā pitṝn ।āvāhya tadanujñāto japedāyāntu nastataḥ ।।yavārthāstu tilaiḥ kāryāḥ kuryādarghyādi pūrvavat ।dattvārghyaṃ saṃśravān śeṣān pātre kṛtvā vidhānataḥ ।।pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasīti nyubjaṃ pātraṃ karotyadhaḥ ।agnau kariṣya ādāya pṛcchatyannaṃ ghṛtaplutaṃ ।।kuruṣveti hy anujñāto hutvāgnau pitṛyajñavat ।hutaśeṣaṃ pradadyāttu bhājaneṣu samāhitaḥ ।।yathālābhopapanneṣu raupyeṣu tu viśeṣataḥ ।datvānnaṃ pṛthivīpātramiti pātrābhimantraṇaṃ ।।kṛtvedaṃ viṣṇurityanne dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet ।savyāhṛtikāṃ gāyatrīṃ madhuvātā iti tyacaṃ ।।japtvā yathāsukhaṃ vācyaṃ bhuñjīraṃste api vāgyatāḥ ।annamiṣṭaṃ haviṣyañca dadyājjaptvā pavitrakaṃ ।।annamādāya tṛptāḥ stha śeṣaṃ caivānnamasya ca ।tadannaṃ vikired bhūmau dadyāccāpaḥ sakṛt sakṛt ।।sarvamannamupādāya satilaṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ ।ucchiṣṭasannidhau piṇḍān pradadyāt pitṛyajñavat ।।mātāmahānāmapyevaṃ dadyādācamanaṃ tataḥ ।svasti vācyaṃ tataḥ kuryādakṣayyodakameva ca ।।datvā tu dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā svadhākāramudāharet ।vācyatāmityanujñātaḥ svapitṛbhyaḥ svadhocyatāṃ ।।

mātāmahānāmityādiḥ, svapitṛbhyaḥ svadhocyatāmityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti
kuryurastu svadhetyukte bhūmau siñcettato jalaṃ ।prīyantāmiti vā daivaṃ viśve devā jalaṃ dadet ।।dātāro no abhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca ।śraddhā ca no māvyagamadbahudeyaṃ ca no stviti ।।ityuktvā tu priyā vācaḥ praṇipatya visarjayet ।vāje vāja iti prītapitṛpūrvaṃ visarjanaṃ ।।yasmiṃstu saṃśravāḥ pūrvamarghapātre nipātitāḥ ।pitṛpātraṃ taduttānaṃ kṛtvā viprān visarjayet ।।pradakṣiṇamanubrajya bhaktvā tu pitṛsevitaṃ ।brahmacārī bhavettāntu rajanīṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha ।।evaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vṛddhau nāndīmukhān pitṝn ।yajeta dadhikarkandhumiśrān piṇḍān yavaiḥ kriyā ।।ekoddiṣṭaṃ daivahīnamekārghaikapavitrakaṃ ।āvāhanāgnaukaraṇarahitaṃ hy apasavyavat ।।upatiṣṭhatāmityakṣayyasthāne pitṛvisarjane ।abhiramyatāmiti vaded brūyuste abhiratāḥ sma ha ।।gandhodakatilair yuktaṃ kuryāt pātracatuṣṭayaṃ ।arghārthapitṛpātreṣu pretapātraṃ prasecayet ।।ye samānā iti dvābhyāṃ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadācaret ।etat sapiṇḍīkaraṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ stiyā saha ।।arvāksapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ yasya saṃvatsarād bhavet ।

pitṛpūrvaṃ visarjayediti kha, cha, jha ca

stryā apīti kha, cha ca
tasyāpyannaṃ sodakumbhaṃ dadyāt saṃvatsaraṃ dvije ।।mṛtāhani ca kartavyaṃ pratimāsantu vatsaraṃ ।pratisaṃvatsaraṃ kāryaṃ śrāddhaṃ vai māsikānnavat ।।haviṣyānnena vai māsaṃ pāyasena tu vatsaraṃ ।mātsyahāriṇakaurabhraśākunacchāgapārṣataiḥ ।।aiṇarauravavārāhaśāśair māṃsair yathākramaṃ ।māsavṛddhyābhitṛpyanti dattair eva pitāmahāḥ ।।khaḍgāmiṣaṃ mahāśalkaṃ madhuyuktānnameva ca ।lohāmiṣaṃ kālaśākaṃ māṃsaṃ vārdhīnasasya ca ।।yaddadāti gayāsthañca sarvamānantyamucyate ।tathā varṣātrayodaśyāṃ maghāsu ca na saṃśayaḥ ।।kanyāṃ prajāṃ vandinaś ca paśūn mukhyān sutānapi ।ghṛtaṃ kṛṣiṃ ca vāṇijyaṃ dviśaphaikaśaphaṃ tathā ।।brahmavarcasvinaḥ putrān svarṇarūpye sakupyake ।jñātiśraiṣṭhyaṃ sarvakāmānāpnoti śrāddhadaḥ sadā ।।pratipatprabhṛtiṣvetānvarjayitvā caturdaśīṃ ।śastreṇa tu hatā ye vai teṣāṃ tatra pradīyate ।।svargaṃ hy apatyamojaś ca śauryaṃ kṣetraṃ balaṃ tathā ।putraśraiṣṭhyaṃ sasaubhāgyamapatyaṃ mukhyatāṃ sutān ।।

mātsyāvihāriṇaurabhraśākunacchāgapārṣatair iti cha

dattair iheti gha, ṅa, ña ca

madhumudgānnameva veti ṅa

sarvamānantyamaśnute iti gha, ṅa ca

svarṇamiti kha, cha ca
pravṛttacakratāṃ putrān vāṇijyaṃ prasutāṃ tathā ।arogitvaṃ yaśo vītaśokatāṃ paramāṅgatiṃ ।।ghanaṃ vidyāṃ bhiṣakasiddhiṃ rūpyaṃ gāścāpyajāvikaṃ ।aśvānāyuś ca vidhivat yaḥ śrāddhaṃ samprayacchati ।।kṛttikādibharaṇyante sa kāmānāpnuyādimān ।vasurudrāditisutāḥ pitaraḥ śrāddhadevatāḥ ।।prīṇayanti manuṣyāṇāṃ pitṝn śrāddhena tarpitāḥ ।āyuḥ prajāṃ dhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ sukhāni ca ।।prayacchanti tathā rājyaṃ prītā nṝṇāṃ pitāmahāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śrāddhakalpo nāma triṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuḥṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

navagrahahomaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
śrīkāmaḥ śāntikāmo vā grahayajñaṃ samārabhet ।vṛṣṭyāyuḥpuṣṭikāmo vā tathaivābhicaran punaḥ ।।

manuṣyādīniti kha, cha ca

āyuḥ prajñādhanamiti ja । āyuḥ prajāṃ balamiti gha

prītāḥ pitṛpitāmahā iti ṅa
sūryaḥ somo maṅgalaś ca budhaścātha bṛhaspatiḥ ।śukraḥ śanaiś caro rāhuḥ ketuśceti grahāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।tāmrakāt sphaṭikādraktacandanāt svarṇarkādubhau ।rajatādayasaḥ śīśāt grahāḥ kāryāḥ kramādime ।।suvarṇair vāyajellikhya gandhamaṇḍalakeṣu vā ।yathāvarṇaṃ pradeyāni vāsāṃsi kusumāni ca ।।gandhāś ca valayaś caiva dhūpo deyastu gugguluḥ ।kartavyā mantrayantaś ca caravaḥ pratidaivataṃ ।।ākṛṣṇena imaṃ devā agnirmūrdhā divaḥ kakut ।udbuddhyasveti ca ṛco yathāsaṅkhyaṃ prakīrtitāḥ ।।vṛhaspate atiyadaryastathaivālpāt pariśrutaḥ ।śanno devīs tathā kāṇḍāt ketuṃ kṛnvannimās tathā ।।arkaḥ pālāśaḥ khadiro hy apāmārgotha pippalaḥ ।udumbaraḥ śamī durvā kuśāś ca samidhaḥ kramāt ।।ekaikasyātrāṣṭaśatamaṣṭāviṃśatireva vā ।hotavyā madhusarpirbhyāṃ dadhnā caiva samanvitāḥ ।।guḍaudanaṃ pāyasaṃ ca haviṣyaṃ kṣīrayaṣṭikaṃ ।dadhyodanaṃ haviḥ pūpān māṃsaṃ citrānnameva ca ।।dadyādgrahakramadetaddvijebhyo bhojanaṃ budhaḥ ।śaktito vā yathālābhaṃ satkṛtya vidhipūrvakaṃ ।।dhenuḥ śaṅkhas tathānaḍvān hema vāso hayas tathā ।

khadirastvapāmārgo atheti ga, gha, ña ca
kṛṣṇā gaurāyasaśchāga etā vai dakṣiṇāḥ kramāt ।।yaś ca yasya yadā dūṣyaḥ sa taṃ yatnena pūjayet ।brahmaṇaiṣāṃ varo dattaḥ pūjitāḥ pūjitasya ca ।।grahādhīnā narendrāṇā muchrayāḥ patanāni ca ।bhāvabhāvo ca jagatastasmāt pūjyatamā grahāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe navagrahahomo nāma catuḥṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcaṣaṣtyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānādharmāḥ

agnir uvāca
dhyeya ātmā sthito yo asau hṛdaye dīpavat prabhuḥ ।ananyaviṣayaṃ kṛtvā mano buddhismṛtīndriyaṃ ।।śrāddhantu dhyāyine deyaṃ gavyaṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ।priyaṅgavo masūrāś ca vārtākuḥ kodravo na hi ।।saiṃhikayo yadā sūryaṃ grasate parvasandhiṣu ।hasticchāyā tu sā jñeyā śrāddhadānādike akṣyā ।।

sadā duḥstha iti kha, cha ca

manuṣyāṇāmiti ṅa

vyāpine deyamiti ṅa
pitre caiva yadā somo haṃse caiva kare sthite ।tithirvaivasvato nāma sā chāyā kuñjarasya tu ।।agnaukaraṇaśeṣantu na dadyādvaiśvadevike ।agnyabhāve tu viprasya haste dadyāttu dakṣiṇe ।।na strī duṣyati jāreṇa na vipro vedakarmaṇā ।balātkāropabhuktā cedvairihastagatāpi vā ।।santyajed dūṣitānnārīmṛtukāle na śuddhyati ।ya ātmatryatirekeṇa dvitīyaṃ nātra paśyati ।।brahmabhūtaḥ sa eveha yogī cātmarato amalaḥ ।viṣayendriyasaṃyogāt kecid yogaṃ vadanti vai ।।adharmo dharmabuddhyā tu gṛhītastair apaṇḍitaiḥ ।ātmano manasaś caiva saṃyogañca tathā pare ।।vṛttihīnaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā kṣetrajñaṃ paramātmani ।ekīkṛtya vimucyeta bandhādyogo ayamuttamaḥ ।।kuṭumbaiḥ pañcabhiryāmaḥ ṣaṣṭhastatra mahattaraḥ ।devāsuramanuṣyair vā sa jetuṃ naiva śakyate ।।vahirmukhāni sarvāṇi kṛtvā cābhimukhāni vai ।manasyevendriyagrāmaṃ manaścātmani yojayet ।।sarvabhāvavinirmuktaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ brahmaṇi nyaset ।etajjñānañca dhyānañca śeṣo anyo granthavistaraḥ ।।

caurahastagatāpi veti kha, gha, ña ca

dvitīyaṃ nānupaśyatīti gha, ṭa ca

sa jetuṃ na ca śakyata iti ga, ṅa ca

śeṣā ye granthavistarā iti ṅa
yannāsti sarvalokasya tadastīti virudhyate ।kathyamānaṃ tathānyasya hṛdaye nāvatiṣṭhate ।।asaṃvedyaṃ hi tad brahma kumārī strīmukhaṃ yathā ।ayogī naiva jānāti jātyandho hi ghaṭaṃ yathā ।।satryasantaṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānāccalati bhāskaraḥ ।eṣa me maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā paraṃ brahmādhigacchati ।।upavāsavratañcaiva snānantīrthaṃ phalantapaḥ ।dvijasampādanañcaiva sampannantasya tat phalaṃ ।।ekākṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma prāṇāyāmaḥ parantapaḥ ।sāvitryāstu paraṃ nāsti pāvanaṃ paramaṃ smṛtaḥ ।।pūrvaṃ striyaḥ surair bhuktāḥ somagandharvavahnibhiḥ ।bhuñjate mānuṣāḥ paścānnaitā duṣyanti kenacit ।।asavarṇena yo garbhaḥ strīṇāṃ yonau niṣicyate ।aśuddhā tu bhavennārī yāvatchalyaṃ na muñcati ।।niḥsṛte tu tataḥ śalye rajasā śuddhyate tataḥ ।dhyānena sadṛśannāsti śodhanaṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ ।।śvapākeṣvapi bhuñjāno dhyānena hi viśuddhyati ।ātmā dhyātā mano dhyānaṃ dhyeyo viṣṇuḥ phalaṃ hariḥ ।।akṣayāya yatiḥ śrāddhe paṅktipāvanapāvanaḥ ।ārūḍho naiṣṭhikandharmaṃ yastu pracyavate dvijaḥ ।।

svasaṃvedyaṃ hi tad brahma iti ga, ṅa ca । susaṃvedyaṃ hi tad brahma iti ja, ṭa ca । svayaṃ vedyaṃ hi tad brahma iti gha, ña ca
prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śuddhyetsa ātmahā ।ye ca pravrajitāḥ patnyāṃ yā caiṣāṃ vījasantatiḥ ।।vidurā nāma caṇḍālā jāyante nātra saṃśayaḥ ।śatiko mriyate gṛdhraḥ śvāsau dvādaśikas tathā ।।bhāso viṃśativarṣāṇi sūkaro daśabhis tathā ।apuṣpo viphalo vṛkṣo jāyate kaṇṭakāvṛtaḥ ।।tato dāvāgnidagdhastu sthāṇurbhavati sānugaḥ ।tato varṣaśatānyaṣṭau dve tiṣṭhatyacetanaḥ ।।pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ ।plavena labhate mokṣaṃ kulasyotsādanena vā ।।yogameva niṣeveteta nānyaṃ mantramaghāpahaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānādhamā nāma pañcaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

varṇadharmādikathanaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
vedasmārtaṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmaṃ vai pañcadhā smṛtaṃ ।varṇatvamekamāśritya yo adhikāraḥ pravartate ।।

dharmaṃ vai paramāmṛtamiti kha, cha ca
varṇadharṃaḥ sa vijñyeyo yathopanayanantriṣu ।yastvāśramaṃ samāśritya padārthaḥ saṃvidhīyate ।।ukta āśramadharmastu bhinnapiṇḍādiko yathā ।ubhayena nimittena yo vidhiḥ sampravartate ।।naimittikaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ prāyaścittavidhiryathā ।brahmacārī gṛhī cāpi vānaprastho yatir nṛpa ।।ukta āśramadharmastu dharmaḥ syāt pañcadhā paraḥ ।ṣāḍguṇyasyābhidhāne yo dṛṣṭārthaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ ।।sa tredhā mantrayāgādyadṛṣṭārtha iti mānavāḥ ।ubhayārtho vyavahārastu daṇḍadhāraṇameva ca ।।tulyārthānāṃ vikalpaḥ syād yāgamūlaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।vede tu vihito dharmaḥ smṛtau tādṛśa eva ca ।।anuvādaṃ smṛtiḥ sūte kāryārthamiti mānavāḥ ।guṇārthaḥ parisaṅkhyārtho vānuvādo viśeṣataḥ ।।viśeṣadṛṣṭa evāsau phalārtha iti mānavāḥ ।syādaṣṭacatvāriṃśadbhiḥ saṃskārair brahmalokagaḥ ।।garbhādhānaṃ puṃsavanaṃ sīmantonnayanaḥ tataḥ ।jātakarma nāmakṛtirannaprāśanacūḍakaṃ ।।saṃskāraścopanayanaṃ vedavratacatuṣṭayaṃ ।snānaṃ svadharmacāriṇyā yogaḥ syādyajñapañcakaṃ ।।

dharma eṣa sanātana iti ṅa

arthavādaṃ smṛtiḥ sūta iti kha, cha ca

vārthavādo viśeṣata iti kha, cha ca
devayajñaḥ pitṛyajño manuṣyabhūtayajñakau ।brahmayajñaḥ saptapākayajñasaṃsthāḥ puro aṣṭakāḥ ।।pārvaṇaśrāddhaṃ śrāvaṇyāgrahāyaṇī ca caitryapi ।āśvayujī saptahaviryajñasaṃsthāstataḥ smṛtāḥ ।।agnyādheyamagnihotraṃ darśaḥ syāt paśubandhakaḥ ।cāturmāsyāgrahāyeṣṭirnirūḍhaḥ paśubandhakaḥ ।।sautrāmaṇisaptasomasaṃsthāgniṣṭoma āditaḥ ।atyagniṣṭoma ukthaś ca ṣoḍaśī vājapeyakaḥ ।।atirātrās tathā stoma aṣṭau cātmaguṇāstataḥ ।dayā kṣamānasūyā ca anāyāso atha maṅgalaṃ ।।akārpaṇyāspṛhāśaucaṃ yasyaite sa paraṃ vrajet ।pracāre maithune caiva prasrāve dantadhāvane ।।snānabhojanakāle ca paṭsu maunaṃ samācaret ।punardānaṃ pṛthakpānamājyena yapasā niśi ।।dantacchedanamuṣṇaṃ ca sapta śaktuṣu varjayet ।snātvā puṣpaṃ na gṛhṇīyād devāyogyantadīritaṃ ।।anyagotropyasambaddhaḥ pretasyāgnindadāti yaḥ ।piṇḍañcodakadānañca sa daśāhaṃ samāpayet ।।udakañca tṛṇaṃ bhasma dvārampanthāstathaiva ca ।

agnyādhānamagnihotramiti kha, cha ca

anyagotro anyasambandha iti kha, gha, ña ca
ebhirantaritaṃ kṛtvā paṅktidoṣo na vidyate ।।
pañca prāṇāhutīrdadyādanāmāṅguṣṭhayogataḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe varṇadharmādirnāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

ayutalakṣakoṭihomāḥ

agnir uvāca
śrīśāntivijayādyarthaṃ grahayajñaṃ punarvade ।grahayajño ayutahomalakṣakoṭyātmakastridhā ।।vederaiśe hy agnikuṇḍād grahānāvāhya maṇḍale ।saumye gururbudhaś caiśe śukraḥ pūrvadale śaśī ।।āgneye dakṣiṇe bhaumo madhye syādbhāskaras tathā ।śanirāpye atha nairṛtye rāhuḥ ketuś ca vāyave ।।īśaścomā guho viṣṇurbrahmendrau yamakālakau ।citraguptaścādhidevā agnirāpaḥ kṣitirhariḥ ।।indra aindrī devatā ca prajeśo ahirvidhiḥ kramāt ।ete pratyadhidevāś ca gaṇeśo durgayānilaḥ ।।khamaśvinau ca sampūjya yajedvījaiś ca vedajaiḥ ।

arkaḥ palāśaḥ khadiro hy apāmārgaś ca pippalaḥ ।।udumbaraḥ śamī durvā kuśāś ca samidhaḥ kramāt ।madhvājyadadhisaṃmiśrā hotavyāścāṣṭadhā śatam ।।ekāṣṭaśaturaḥ kumbhān pūrya pūrṇāhutintathā ।vasordhārāntato dadyāddakṣiṇāñca tato dadet ।।yajamānaṃ caturbhistair abhiṣiñcet samantrakaiḥ ।surāstvāmabhiṣiñcantu brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ ।।vāsudevo jagannāthas tathā saṅkarṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ ।pradyumnaścāniruddhaś ca bhavantu vijayāya te ।।ākhaṇḍalo agnirbhagavān yamo vai nairṛtas tathā ।varuṇaḥ pavanaś caiva dhanādhyakṣas tathā śivaḥ ।।brahmaṇā sahitaḥ śeṣo dikpālāḥ pāntu vaḥ sadā ।kīrtirlakṣmīrdhṛtirmedhā puṣṭiḥ śraddhā kriyā matiḥ ।।buddhir lajjā vapuḥ śāntistuṣṭiḥ kāntiś ca mātaraḥ ।etāstvāmabhiṣiñcantu dharmapatnyāḥ samāgatāḥ ।।ādityaś candramā bhaumo budhajīvaśitārkajāḥ ।grahāstvāmabhiṣiñcantu rāhuḥ ketuś ca tarpitāḥ ।।devadānavagandharvā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ ।ṛṣayo manavo gāvo devamātara eva ca ।।devapatnyo drumā nāgā daityāścāpsarasāṅgaṇāḥ ।astrāṇi sarvaśāstrāṇi rājāno vāhanāni ca ।।auṣadhāni ca ratnāni kālasyāvayavāś ca ye ।saritaḥ sāgarāḥ śailāstīrthāni jaladā nadāḥ ।।

ete tvāmabhiṣiñcantu sarvakāmārthasiddhaye ।alaṅkṛtastato dadyāddhemagonnabhuvādikaṃ ।।kapile sarvadevānāṃ pūjanīyāsi rohiṇi ।tīrthadevamayī yasmādataḥśāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।puṇyastvaṃ śaṅkha puṇyānāṃ maṅgalānāñca maṅgalaṃ ।viṣṇunā vidhṛto nityamataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।dharma tvaṃ vṛṣarūpeṇa jagadānandakārakaḥ ।aṣṭamūrteradhiṣṭānamataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।hiraṇyagarbhagarbhasthaṃ hemavījaṃ vibhāvasoḥ ।anantapuṇyaphaladamataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।pītavastrayugaṃ yasmādvāsudevasya vallabhaṃ ।pradānāttasya vai viṣṇurataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।viṣṇustvaṃ matsyarūpeṇa yasmādamṛtasambhavaḥ ।candrārkavāhano nityamataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।yasmāttvaṃ pṛthivī sarvā dhenuḥ keśavasannibhā ।sarvapāpaharā nityamataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।yasmādāyasakarmāṇi tavādhīnāni sarvadā ।lāṅgalādyāyudhādīni ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।yasmāttvaṃ ssarvayajñānāmaṅgatvena vyavasthitaḥ ।yonirvibhāvasornityamataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।।gavāmaṅgeṣu tiṣṭhanti bhuvanāni caturdaśa ।yasmāttasmācchivaṃ me syādiha loke paratra ca ।।

dharmakāmārthasiddhaye iti kha
yasmādaśūnyaṃ śayanaṃ keśavasya śivasya ca ।śayyā mamāpyaśūnyāstu dattā janmani janmani ।।yathā ratneṣu sarveṣu sarve devāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ ।tathā śāntiṃ prayacchantu ratnadānena me surāḥ ।।yathā bhūmipradānasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīṃ ।dānānyanyāni me śāntirbhūmidānādbhavatviha ।।grahayajño ayutahomo dakṣiṇābhī raṇe jitiḥ ।vivāhotsavayajñeṣu pratiṣṭhādiṣu karmaṣu ।।sarvakāmāptaye lakṣakoṭihomadvayaṃ mataṃ ।gṛhadeśe maṇḍape atha ayute hastamātrakaṃ ।।mekhalāyonisaṃyuktaṃ kuṇḍañcatvāra ṛtvijaḥ ।svayameko api vā lakṣe sarvaṃ daśaguṇaṃ hi tat ।।caturhastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā tārkṣañcātrādhikaṃ yajet ।sāmadhvaniśīrastvaṃ vāhanaṃ pameṣṭhinaḥ ।।viṣayāpaharo nityamataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me ।pūrvavat kuṇḍamāmantrya lakṣahomaṃ samācaret ।।vasordhārāṃ tato dadyācchayyābhūṣādikaṃ dadet ।tatrāpi daśa cāṣṭau ca lakṣahome tathartvijaḥ ।।putrānnarājyavijayabhuktimuktyādi cāpnuyāt ।dakṣiṇābhiḥ phalenāsmācchatrughnaḥ koṭihomakaḥ ।।

tathā janmani janmanīti ṅa

gṛhādau maṇḍape vātheti kha । gṛhādau maṇḍape caivamiti ña

putrārtharājyavijayabhuktimuktyādīti kha, ṅa ca
caturhastaṃ cāṣṭahastaṃ kuṇḍandvādaśa ca dvijāḥ ।pañcaviṃśaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ vā paṭe dvāre catuṣṭayaṃ ।।koṭihomī sarvakāmī viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।homastu grahamantrair vā gāyatryā vaiṣṇavair api ।।jātavedomukhaiḥ śaivaiḥ vaidikaiḥ prathitair api ।tilair yavair ghṛtair aśvamedhaphalādibhāk ।।vidveṣaṇābhicāreṣu trikoṇaṃ kuṇḍamiṣyate ।samidho vāmahastena śyenāsthyanalasaṃyutāḥ ।।raktabhūṣair muktakeśair dhyāyadbhiraśivaṃ ripoḥ ।durmitriyāstasmai santu yo dveṣṭi huṃ phaḍiti ca ।।chindyāt kṣureṇa pratimāṃ piṣṭarūpaṃ ripuṃ hanet ।yajedekaṃ pīḍakaṃ vā yaḥ sa kṛtvā divaṃ vrajet ।।
e ity āgneye mahapurāṇe ayutalakṣakoṭihomā nāma saptaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mahāpātakādikathanam

puṣkara uvāca
daṇḍaṃ kuryānnṛpo nṝṇāṃ prāyaścittamakurvatāṃ ।kāmato akāmato vāpi prāyaścittaṃ kṛtaṃ caret ।।

jātavedomukhaiḥ saurair iti kha

ripuṃ harediti ṅa, ña ca
mattakruddhāturāṇāṃ ca na bhuñjīta kadācana ।mahāpātakināṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yacca spṛṣṭamudakyayā ।।gaṇānnaṃ gaṇikānnaṃ ca vārdhuṣergāyanasya ca ।abhiśaptasya ṣaṇḍasya yasyāścopapatirgṛhe ।।rajakasya nṛśaṃsasya vandinaḥ kitavasya ca ।mithyātapasvinaś caiva cauradaṇḍikayos tathā ।।kuṇḍagolastrījitānāṃ vedavikrayiṇas tathā ।śailūṣatantravāyānnaṃ kṛtaghnasyānnameva ca ।।karmārasya niṣādasya celanirṇejakasya ca ।mithyāpravrajitasyānnampuṃś calyāstailikasya ca ।।ārūḍhapatitasyānnaṃ vidviṣṭānnaṃ ca varjayet ।tathaiva brāhmaṇasyānnaṃ brāhmaṇenānimantritaḥ ।।brāhmaṇānnañca śūdreṇa nādyāccaiva nimantritaḥ ।eṣāmanyatamasyānnamamatyā vā tryahaṃ kṣapet ।।matyā bhuktvā caret kṛcchraṃ retoviṇmūtrameva ca ।caṇḍālaśvapacānnantu bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret ।।anirdiśaṃ ca pretānnaṃ gavāghrātaṃ tathaiva ca ।śūdrocchiṣṭaṃ śunocchiṣṭaṃ patitānnaṃ tathaiva ca ।।taptakṛcchraṃ prakurvīta aśauce kṛcchramācaret ।aśauce yasya yo bhuṅkte sopyaśuddhas tathā bhavet ।।mṛtapañcanakhāt kūpādamedhyena sakṛdyutāt ।

gaṇānāṃ gaṇikānāñceti ṅa, ña ca

cauradāmbhikayostatheti ña
apaḥ pītvā tryahaṃ tiṣṭhet sopavāso dvijottamaḥ ।।sarvatra śūdre pādaḥ syād dvitrayaṃ vaiśyabhūpayoḥ ।viḍvarāhakharoṣṭrāṇāṃ gomāyoḥ kapikākayoḥ ।।prāśya mūtrapurīṣāṇi dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret ।śuṣkāṇi jagdhvā māṃsāni pretānnaṃ karakāṇi ca ।।kravyādaśūkaroṣṭrāṇāṃ gomāyoḥ kapikākayoḥ ।gonarāśvakharoṣṭrāṇāṃ chatrākaṃ grāmakukkuṭaṃ ।।māṃsaṃ jagdhvā kuñjarasya taptakṛcchreṇa śuddhyati ।āmaśrāddhe tathā bhuktvā brahmacārī madhu tvadan ।।laśunaṃ guñjanaṃ cādyāt prājāpatyādinā śuciḥ ।bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ kuryān māṃsañcātmakṛtantathā ।।pelugavyañca peyūṣaṃ tathā śleṣmātakaṃ mṛdaṃ ।vṛthākṛśarasaṃyāvapāyasāpūpaśaṣkulīḥ ।।anupākṛṭamāṃsāni devānnāni havīṃṣi ca ।gavāñca mahiṣīṇāṃ ca varjayitvā tathāpyajāṃ ।।sarvakṣīrāṇi varjyāṇi tāsāñcaivāpyannirdaśaṃ ।śaśakaḥ śalyakī godhā khaḍgaḥ kūrmastathaiva ca ।।bhakṣyāḥ pañcanakhāḥ proktāḥ pariśeṣāś ca varjitāḥ ।pāṭhīnarohitānmatsyān siṃhatuṇḍāṃś ca bhakṣayet ।।yavagodhūmajaṃ sarvaṃ payasaś caiva vikriyāḥ ।vāgaṣāḍgavacakrādīn sasnehamuṣitaṃ tathā ।।

dvitīyaṃ vaiśyaśūdrayoreti ka, kha, ṅa, ña ca

śuṣkāṇi dagdhamaṃsāni iti ṅa

prājāpatyāddvijaḥ śuciriti kha
agnihotraparīddhāgnirbrāhmaṇaḥ kāmacārataḥ ।cāndrāyaṇaṃ carenmāsaṃ vīravadhvāsanaṃ hitaṃ ।।brahmahatyā surāpānaṃ steyaṃ gurvaṅganāgamaḥ ।mahānti pātakānyāhuḥ saṃyogaś caiva taiḥ saha ।।anṛte ca samutkarṣo rājagāmi ca paiśunaṃ ।guroścālīkanirbandhaḥ samānaṃ brahmahatyayā ।।brahmojjhyavedanindā ca kauṭasākṣyaṃ suhṛdbadhaḥ ।garhitānnājyayorjagdhiḥ surāpānasamāni ṣaṭ ।।nikṣepasyāpaharaṇaṃ narāśvarajatasya ca ।bhūmivajramaṇīnāñca rukmasteyasamaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।retaḥsekaḥ svayonyāṣu kumārīṣvantyajāsu ca ।sakhyuḥ putrasya ca strīṣu gurutalpasamaṃ viduḥ ।।gobadho ayājya saṃyājyaṃ pāradāryātmavikriyaḥ ।gurumātṛpitṛtyāgaḥ svādhyayāgnyoḥ sutasya ca ।।parivittitānujena parivedanameva ca ।tayordānañca kanyāyāstayoreva ca yājanaṃ ।।kanyāyā dūṣaṇañcaiva vārdhuṣyaṃ vratalopanaṃ ।taḍāgārāmadārāṇāmapatyasya ca vikriyaḥ ।।vrātyatā bāndhavatyāgo bhṛtādhyāpanameva ca ।bhṛtāccādhyayanādānamavikreyasya vikrayaḥ ।।

samāni brahmahatyayeti kha, ṅa, ña ca

garhitānāmannajagdhiriti ṅa

sakhyuḥ sutasya ceti ṅa
sarvākāreṣvadhīkāro mahāyantrapravartanaṃ ।hiṃsauṣadhīnāṃ stryājīvaḥ kriyālaṅganameva ca ।।indhanārthamaśuṣkāṇāṃ dumāṇāñcaiva pātanaṃ ।yoṣitāṃ grahaṇañcaiva strīnindakasamāgamaḥ ।।ātmārthañca kriyārambho ninditānnadanantathā ।anāhitāgnitāsteyamṛṇānāñcānapakriyā ।।asacchāstrādhigamanaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ vyasanakriyā ।dhānyakupyapaśusteyaṃ madyapastrīniṣevaṇaṃ ।।strīśūdraviṭkṣatrabadho nāstikyañcopapātakaṃ ।brāhmaṇasya rujaḥ kṛtyaṃ ghrātiraghreyamadyayoḥ ।।jaiṃbhaṃ puṃsi ca maithunyaṃ jātibhraṃśakaraṃ smṛtaṃ ।śvakharoṣṭramṛgendrāṇāmajāvyoś caiva māraṇaṃ ।।saṅkīrṇakaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ mīnāhinakulasya ca ।ninditebhyo dhanādānaṃ bāṇijyaṃ śūdrasevanaṃ ।।apātrīkaraṇaṃ jñeyamasatyasya ca bhāṣaṇaṃ ।kṛmikīṭavayohatyā madyānugatabhojanaṃ ।।phalaidhaḥkusumasteyamadhair yañca malāvahaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe mahāpātakādikathanaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

mārjārasyaiva māraṇamiti ṅa

chapter 

ś athaikonasaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

prāyaścittāni

puṣkara uvāca
etatprabhṛtipāpānāṃ prāyaścittaṃ vadāmi te ।brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṅkṛtvā vane vaset ।।bhikṣetātmaviśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvā śavaśirodhvajaṃ ।prāsyedātmānamagnau vā samiddhe triravākśirāḥ ।।yajeta vāśvamedhena svarjitā gosavena vā ।japanvānyatamaṃ vedaṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ brajet ।।sarvasvaṃ vā vedavide brāhmaṇāyopapādayet ।vratair etair vyapohanti mahāpātakino malaṃ ।।upapātakasaṃyukto goghno māsaṃ yavān pivet ।kṛtavāpo vasedgoṣṭhe carmaṇā tena saṃvṛtaḥ ।।caturthakālamaśrīyādakṣāralavaṇaṃ mitaṃ ।gomūtreṇa caret snānaṃ dvau māsau niyatendriyaḥ ।।divānugacchedgāś caiva tiṣṭhannūrdhvaṃ rajaḥ pivet ।vṛṣabhaikādaśā gāstu dadyādvicāritavrataḥ ।।avidyamāne sarvasvaṃ vedavidbhyo nivedayet ।pādamekañcaredrodhe dvau pādau bandhane caret ।।

dadyāt sucaritavrata iti ṅa
yojane pādahīnaṃ syāccaret sarvaṃ nipātane ।kāntāreṣvatha durgeṣu viṣameṣu bhayeṣu ca ।।yadi tatra vipattiḥ syādekapādo vidhīyate ।ghaṇṭābharaṇadoṣeṇa tathaivardhaṃ vinirdiśat ।।damane damane rodhe śakaṭasya niyojane ।stambhaśṛṅkhalapāśeṣu mṛte pādonamācaret ।।śṛṅgabhaṅge asthibhaṅge ca lāṅgūlacchedane tathā ।yāvakantu pivettāvadyāvat susthā tu gaurbhavet ।।gomatīñca japedvidyāṃ gostutiṃ gomatīṃ smaret ।ekā cedbahubhirdaivād yatra vyāpāditā bhavet ।।pādaṃ pādantu hatyāyāś careyuste pṛthak pṛthak ।upakāre kriyamāṇe vipattau nāsti pātakaṃ ।।etadeva vrataṃ kuryurupapātakinas tathā ।avakīrṇavarjaṃ śuddhyarthañcāndrāyaṇamathāpi vā ।।avakīrṇī tu kālena gardhabhena catuṣpathe ।pākayajñavidhānena yajeta nirṛtiṃ niśi ।।kṛtvāgniṃ vidhivaddhīmānantatastu samittṛcā ।candrendraguruvahnīnāṃ juhuyāt sarpiṣāhutiṃ ।।athavā gārdhabhañcarma vasitvābdañcarenmahīṃ ।hatvā garbhamavijñātaṃ brahmahatyāvrataṃ caret ।।

juhuyātsarpiṣāhutīriti kha, ṅa, ja ca
sarāṃ pītvā dvijo mohādagnivarṇāṃ surāṃ pivet ।gomūtramagnivarṇaṃ vā pivedudakameva vā ।।suvarṇasteyakṛdvipro rājānamabhigamya tu ।svakarma khyāpayan vrūyānmāṃ bhavānanuśāstviti ।।gṛhītvā muśalaṃ rājā sakṛddhanyāt svayaṅgataṃ ।badhena śuddhyate steyo brāhmaṇastapasaiva vā ।।gurutalpo nikṛtyaiva śiśnañca vṛṣaṇaṃ svayaṃ ।nidhāya cāñcalau gacchedānipātācca nairṛtiṃ ।।cāndrāyaṇān vā trīnmāsānabhyasenniyatendriyaḥ ।jātibhraṃśakaraṃ karma kṛtvānyatamamicchayā ।।carecchāntapanaṃ kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyamanicchayā ।saṅkarīpātrakṛtyāsu māsaṃ śodhanamaindavaṃ ।।malinīkaraṇīyeṣu taptaṃ syādyāvakaṃ tryahaṃ ।turīyo brahmahatyāyāḥ kṣatriyasya badhe smṛtaḥ ।।vaiśye aṣṭamāṃśe vṛttasthe śūdre jñeyastu ṣoḍaśaḥ ।mārjaranakulau hatvā cāsaṃ maṇḍūkameva ca ।।śvagodholūkakākāṃś ca śūdrahatyāvrataṃ caret ।caturṇāmapi varṇānāṃ nārīṃ hatvānavasthitāṃ ।।amatyaiva pramāpya strīṃ śūdrahatyāvrataṃ caret ।sarpādīnāṃ badhe naktamanasthnāṃ vāyusaṃyamaḥ ।।dravyāṇāmalpasārāṇāṃ steyaṃ kṛtvānyaveśmataḥ ।carecchāntapanaṃ kṛcchaṃ vrataṃ nirvāpya siddhyati ।।

bhakṣabhojyāpaharaṇe yānaśayyāsanasya ca ।puṣpamūlaphalānāñca pañcagavyaṃ viśodhanaṃ ।।tṛṇakāṣṭhadrumāṇāntu śuṣkānnasya guḍasya ca ।celacarmāmiṣāṇāntu trirātraṃ syādabhojanaṃ ।।maṇimuktāpravālānāṃ tāmrasya rajatasya ca ।ayaḥkāṃsyopalānāñca dvādaśāhaṃ kaṇānnabhuk ।।kārpāsakīṭajīrṇānāṃ dviśaphaikaśaphasya ca ।pakṣigandhauṣadhīnāntu rajvā caiva tryahampayaḥ ।।gurutalpavrataṃ kuryādretaḥ siktvā svayoniṣu ।sakhyuḥ putrasya ca strīṣu kumāroṣvantyajāsu ca ।।pitṛsvasreyīṃ bhaginīṃ svasrīyāṃ mātureva ca ।mātuś ca bhrāturāptasya gatvā cāndrāyaṇañcaret ।।amānuṣīṣu puruṣa udakyāyāmayoniṣu ।retaḥ siktvā jale caiva kṛcchraṃ śāntapanañcaret ।।maithunantu samāsevya puṃsi yoṣiti vā dvijaḥ ।goyāne apsu divā caiva savāsāḥ snānamācaret ।।caṇḍālāntyastriyo gatvā bhuktvā ca pratigṛhya ca ।patatyajñānato vipro jñānāt sāmyantu gacchati ।।vipraduṣṭāṃ striyaṃ bhartā nirundhyādekaveśmani ।yat puṃsaḥ paradāreṣu tadenāñcārayedvrataṃ ।।sācetpunaḥ praduṣyeta sadṛśenopamantritā ।kṛcchrañcādrāyaṇañcaiva tadasyāḥ pāvanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।

veṇucarmāmiṣāṇāñceti jha
yat karotyekarātreṇa vṛṣalīsevanaṃ dvijaḥ ।tadbhaikṣyabhuk japennityaṃ tribhirvaṣair vyapohati ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe prāyaścittāni nāma ekonasaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

prāyaścittāni

puṣkara uvāca
mahāpāpānuyuktānāṃ prāyaścittāni vacmite ।saṃvatsareṇa patati patitena sahācaran ।।yājanāddhyāpanādyaunānna tu yānāśanāsanāt ।yo yena patitenaiṣāṃ saṃsargaṃ yāti mānavaḥ ।।sa tasyaiva vrataṃ kuryāttatsaṃsargasya śuddhaye ।patitasyodakaṃ kāryaṃ sapiṇḍair bāndhavaiḥ saha ।।nindite ahani sāyāhṇe jñātyṛtvig gurusannidhau ।dāso ghaṭamapāṃ pūrṇaṃ paryasyet pretavatpadā ।।ahorātramupāsītannaśaucaṃ bāndhavaiḥ saha ।nivartayeraṃstasmāttu jyeṣṭhāṃśambhāṣaṇādike ।।jyeṣṭhāṃśamprāpnuyāccāsya yavīyān guṇato adhikaḥ ।

mahāpāpopapannānāmiti ṅa

prāyaścittaṃ vadāmi ta iti jha

pretavat sadeti kha, ga, gha, ṅa ca
prāyaścitte tu carite pūrṇaṃ kumbhamapāṃ navaṃ ।।tenaiva sārdhaṃ prāśyeyuḥ snātvā puṇyajalāśaye ।evameva vidhiṃ kuryuryoṣitsu papitāsvapi ।।vastrānnapānandeyantu vaseyuś ca gṛhāntike ।teṣāṃ dvijānāṃ sāvitrī nānūdyeta yathāvidhi ।।tāṃścārayitvā trīn kṛchrān yathāvidhyupanāyayet ।vikarmasthāḥ parityaktāsteṣāṃ mapyetadādiśet ।।japitvā trīṇi sāvitryāḥ sahastrāṇi samāhitaḥ ।māsaṅgoṣṭhe payaḥ pītvā mucyate asatpratigrahāt ।।brātyānāṃ yājanaṃ kṛtvā pareṣāmantyakarma ca ।abhicāramahīnānāntribhiḥ kṛcchair vyapohati ।।śaraṇāgataṃ parityajya vedaṃ viplāvya ca dvijaḥ ।saṃvatsaṃ yatāhārastatpāpamapasedhati ।।śvaśṛgālakharair daṣṭo grāmyaiḥ kravyādbhireva ca ।naroṣṭrāśvair varāhaiś ca prāṇāyāmena śuddhyati ।।snātakavratalope ca karmatyāge hy abhojanaṃ ।huṅkāraṃ brāhmaṇasyoktvā tvaṅkarañca garīyasaḥ ।।snātvānaśnannahaḥśeṣamabhivādya prasādayet ।avagūrya carekṣacchramatikṛcchrannipātane ।।kṛcchrātikṛcchraṃ kurvīta viprasyotpādya śoṇitaṃ ।

na yujyeteti kha

kṛcchrair viśuddhyati iti ga, gha, ṅa ca

naroṣṭaviḍvarāhaiśceti ṅa

krūṅkāramiti kha, gha, cha ca । oṅkāramiti ga, ṅa ca । haṅkārañceti kha
cāṇḍālādiravijñāto yasya tiṣṭheta veśmani ।।samyag jñātastu kālena tasya kurvīta śodhanaṃ ।cāndrāyaṇaṃ parākaṃ vā dvijānāntu viśodhanaṃ ।।prājāpatyantu śūdrāṇāṃ śeṣantadanusārataḥ ।guṃḍaṅkusumbhaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā dhānyāni yāni ca ।।kṛtvā gṛhe tato dvāri teṣāndadyāddhutāśanaṃ ।mṛṇamayānāntu bhāṇḍānāṃ tyāga eva vidhīyate ।।dravyāṇāṃ pariśeṣāṇāṃ dravyaśuddhirvidhīyate ।kūpaikapānasaktā ye sparśātsaṅkalpadūṣitāḥ ।।śuddhyeyurupavāsena pañcagavyena vāpyatha ।yastu saṃspṛśya caṇḍālamaśnīyācca svakāmataḥ ।।dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ kuryāttaptakṛcchramathāpi vā ।bhāṇḍasaṅkalasaṅkīrṇaścāṇḍālādijugupsitaiḥ ।।bhuktvāpītvā tathā teṣāṃ ṣaḍrātreṇa viśuddhyati ।antyānāṃ bhuktaśeṣantu bhakṣayitvā dvijātayaḥ ।।vrataṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ kuryustrirātraṃ śūdra eva tu ।caṇḍālakūpabhāṇḍeṣu ajñānātpivate jalaṃ ।।dvijaḥ śāntapanaṃ kuryācchūdraścopavaseddinaṃ ।caṇḍālena tu saṃspṛṣṭo yastvapaḥ pivate dvijaḥ ।।trirātrantena kartavyaṃ śūdraścopavaseddinaṃ ।ucchiṣṭena yadi spṛṣṭaḥ śunā śūdreṇa vā dvijaḥ ।।

sparśasaṅkalpabhūṣitā iti jha

saṃsṛṣṭa iti ka

yadeti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha ca
upoṣya rajanīmekāṃ pañcagavyena śuddhyati ।vaiśyena kṣatriyeṇaiva snānaṃ naktaṃ samācaret ।।adhvānaṃ prasthito vipraḥ kāntāre yadyanūdake ।pakvānnena gṛhītena mūtroccāraṅkaroti vai ।।anidhāyaiva taddravyaṃ aṅge kṛtvā tu saṃsthitaṃ ।śaucaṃ kṛtvānnamabhyukṣya arkasyāgneyaś ca darśayet ।।mlecchair gatānāṃ caurair vā kāntāre vā pravāsināṃ ।bhakṣyābhakṣyaviśuddhyarthaṃ teṣāṃ vakṣyāminiṣkṛtiṃ ।।punaḥ prāpya svadeśañca varṇānāmanupūrvaśaḥ ।kṛcchrasyānte brāhmaṇastu punaḥ saṃskāramarhati ।।pādonānte kṣatriyaś ca ardhānte vaiśya eva ca ।pādaṃ kṛtvā tathā śūdro dānaṃ datvā viśuddhyati ।।udakyā tu savarṇā yā spṛṣṭā cet syādudakyayā ।tasminnevāhani snātā śuddhimāpnotyasaṃśayaṃ ।।rajasvalā tu nāśnīyāt saṃspṛṣṭā hīnavarṇayā ।yāvanna śuddhimāpnoti śuddhasnānena śuddhyati ।।mūtraṃ kṛtvā vrajanvartma smṛtibhraṃśājjalaṃ pivet ।ahorātroṣito bhūtvā pañcagavyena śuddhyati ।।mūtroccāraṃ dvijaḥ kṛtvā akṛtvā śaucamātmanaḥ ।mohādbhuktvā trirātrantu yavān pītvā viśuddhyati ।।ye pratyavasitā viprāḥ pravrajyādibalāttathā ।

bhakṣyabhojyaviśuddhyarthamiti jha

lobhādbhuktveti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha ca
anāśakanivṛtāś ca teṣāṃ śuddhiḥ pracakṣyate ।।cārayettrīṇi kṛcchrāṇi cāndrāyaṇamathāpi vā ।jātakarmādisaṃskāraiḥ saṃskuryāttaṃ tathā punaḥ ।।upānahamamedhyaṃ ca yasya saṃspṛśate mukhaṃ ।mṛttikāgomayau tatra pañcagavyañca śodhanaṃ ।।vāpanaṃ vikrayañcaiva nīlavastrādidhāraṇaṃ ।tapanīyaṃ hi viprasya tribhiḥ kṛchrair viśuddhyati ।।antyajātiśvapākena saṃspṛṣṭā strī rajasvalā ।caturthe ahani śuddhā sā trirātraṃ tatra ācaret ।।cāṇḍālaśvapacau spṛṣṭvā tathā pūyañca sūtikāṃ ।śavaṃ tatsparśinaṃ spṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ snānena śuddhyati ।।nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ snātvā vipro viśuddhyati ।rathyārkaddamatoyena adhīnābhermṛdodakaiḥ ।।vānto viviktaḥ snātvā tu ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśuddhyati ।snānāt kṣurakarmakartā kṛcchrakṛdgrahaṇe annabhuk ।।apāṅkteyāśī gavyāśī śunā daṣṭas tathā śuciḥ ।kṛmidaṣṭaścātmaghātī kṛcchrājjapyācca homataḥ ।।homādyaiścānutāpena pūyante pāpino akhilāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe prāyaścittāni nāma saptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

antyajaiś ca svapākeneti ṅa

antyajātiśvapākenetyādiḥ, tatra ācaredityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti

śavantatatsparśinaṃ śvānamiti kha । śavantatspṛṣṭinaṃ śvānamiti gha, ja ca

mūtroccāraṃ dvijaḥ kṛtvetyādiḥ, pūyante pāpino akhilā ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja, jha pustake nāsti

chapter 

ś atha ekasaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

prāyaścittāni

puṣkara uvāca
prāyaścittaṃ rahasyādi vakṣye śuddhikaraṃ para ।pauruṣeṇa tu sūktena māsaṃ japyādināghahā ।।mucyate pātakaiḥ sarvair japtvā triraghamarṣaṇaṃ ।vedajapyādvāyuyamād gāyatryā vratato adyahā ।।muṇḍanaṃ sarvakṛcchreṣu snānaṃ homo hareryajiḥ ।utthitastu divā tiṣṭhedupaviṣṭas tathā niśi ।।etadvīrāsanaṃ proktaṃ kṛcchrakṛttena pāpahā ।aṣṭabhiḥ pratyahaṃ grāsair yaticāndrāyaṇaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।prātaś caturbhiḥ sāyañca śiśucāndrāyaṇaṃ smṛtaṃ ।yathākathañcit piṇḍānām catvāriṃśacchatadvayaṃ ।।māsena bhakṣayedetat suracāndrāyaṇaṃ caret ।tryahamuṣṇaṃ pivedāpastyahamuṣṇaṃ payaḥ pivet ।।tryāhamuṣṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ pītvā vāyubhakṣo bhavet tryahaṃ ।taptakṛcchramidaṃ proktaṃ śītaiḥ śītaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।।kṛcchrātikṛcchraṃ payasā divasānekaviṃśatiṃ ।gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakaṃ ।।

japato avadhaheti kha, gha, ja ca
ekarātropavāsaś cakṛcchraṃ śāntapanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।etacca pratyābhyastaṃ mahāśāntapanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।tryahābhyastamathaikaikamatiśāntapanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।kṛcchraṃ parākasañjñaṃ syāddvādaśāhamabhojanaṃ ।।ekabhaktaṃ tryahābhyastaṃ kramānnaktamayācitaṃ ।prājāpatyamupoṣyānte pādaḥ syāt kṛcchrapādakaḥ ।।phalair māsaṃ phalaṃ kṛcchraṃ bilvaiḥ śrīkcchra īritaḥ ।padmākṣaiḥ syādāmalakaiḥ puṣpakṛcchraṃ tu puṣpakaiḥ ।।patrakṛcchrantathā patraistoyakṛcchraṃ jalena tu ।mūlakṛcchrantathā mūlair dṛdhna kṣīreṇa takrataḥ ।।māsaṃ vāyavyakṛcchraṃ syātpāṇipūrānnabhojanāt ।tilair dvādaśarātreṇa kṛcchramāgneyamārtinut ।।pākṣaṃ prasṛtyā lājānāṃ brahmakūrcaṃ tathā bhavet ।upoṣitaś caturdṛśyāṃ pañcadaśyāmanantaraṃ ।।pañcagavyaṃ samaśnīyāddhaviṣyāśītyanantaraṃ ।māsena dvir naraḥ kṛtvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।śrīkāmaḥ puṣṭikāmaś ca svargakāmo aghanaṣṭaye ।devatārādhanaparaḥ kṛcchrakārī sa sarvabhāk ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpureṇe rahasyādiprāyaśvittaṃ nāma ekasaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvisaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sarvapāpaprāyaścittāni

puṣkara uvāca
paradāraparadravyajīvahiṃsādike yadā ।pravartate nṛṇāṃ cittaṃ prāyaścittaṃ stutistadā ।।viṣṇave viṣṇave nityaṃ viṣṇave viṣṇave namaḥ ।namāmi viṣṇuṃ cittasthamahaṅkāragatiṃ hariṃ ।।cittasthamīśamavyaktamanantamaparājitaṃ ।viṣṇumīḍyamaśeṣeṇa anādinidhanaṃ vibhuṃ ।।viṣṇuścittagato yanme viṣṇurbuddhigataś ca yat ।yaccāhaṅkārago viṣṇuryadviṣṇurmayi saṃsthitaḥ ।।karoti karmabhūto asau sthavarasya carasya ca ।tat pāpannāśamāyātu tasminneva hi cintite ।।dhyāto harati yat pāpaṃ svapne dṛṣṭastu bhāvanāt ।tamupendramahaṃ viṣṇuṃ praṇatārtiharaṃ hariṃ ।।jagatyasminnirādhāre majjamāne tamasyadhaḥ ।hastāvalambanaṃ viṣṇuṃ praṇamāmi parāt paraṃ ।।sarveśvareśvara vibho paramātmannadhokṣaja ।hṛṣīkeśa hṛṣīkeśa hṛṣīkeśa namo astu te ।।nṛsiṃhānanta govinda bhūtabhavana keśava ।

viṣṇave viṣṇave iti ja, ña ca
duruktaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ dhyātaṃ śamayāghannamo astu te ।।yanmayā cintitaṃ duṣṭaṃ svacittavaśavartinā ।akāryamahadatyugrantacchamannaya keśava ।।brahmaṇyadeva govinda paramārthaparāyaṇa ।jagannātha jagaddhātaḥ pāpaṃ praśamayācyuta ।।yathāparāhṇe sāyāhṇe madhyāhṇe ca tathā niśi ।kāyena manasā vācā kṛtaṃ pāpamajānatā ।।jānatā ca hṛṣīkeśa puṇḍarīkākṣa mādhava ।nāmatrayoccāraṇataḥ svapne yātu mama kṣayaṃ ।।śārīraṃ me hṛṣīkeśa puṇḍarīkākṣa mādhava ।pāpaṃ praśamayādya tvaṃ bākkṛtaṃ mama mādhava ।।yadbhuñjanyatsvapaṃstiṣṭhan gacchan jāgrad yadāsthitaḥ ।kṛtavān pāpamadyāhaṃ kāyena manasā girā ।।yat svalpamapi yat sthūlaṃ kuyoninarakābahaṃ ।tadyātu praśamaṃ sarvaṃ vāsudevānukīrtanāt ।।paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramañca yat ।tasmin prakīrtite viṣṇau yat pāpaṃ tat praṇaśyatu ।।yat prāpya na nivartante gandhasparśadivarjitaṃ ।sūrayastat padaṃ viṣṇostat sarvaṃ śamayatvaghaṃ ।।pāpapraṇāśanaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādapi ।

praśamātyarthamiti kha, gha, ja ca

asminniti gha

sarvaṃ gamayatvaghamiti jha

yaḥ paṭecchraddhayā nara iti ja, jha ca । yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyānnara iti ña
śārīrair mānasair vāgjaiḥ kṛtaiḥ papaiḥ pramucyate ।।sarvapāpagrahādibhyo yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padaṃ ।tasmāt pāpe kṛte japyaṃ stotraṃ sarvāghamardanaṃ ।।prāyaścittamaghaughānāṃ stotraṃ vratakṛte varaṃ ।prāyaścittaiḥ stotrajapair vratair naśyati pātakaṃ ।।tataḥ kāryāṇi saṃsiddhyai tāni vai bhuktimuktaye ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sarvapāpaprāyaścitte pāpanāśanastotraṃ nāma dvisaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trisaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

prāyaścittaṃ

agnir uvāca
prāyaścittaṃ brahṇoktaṃ vakṣye pāpopaśāntidaṃ ।syāt prāṇaviyogaphalo vyāpāro hananaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।rāgād dveṣāt pramādācca svataḥ parata eva vā ।brāhmaṇaṃ ghātayedyastu sa bhavedbrahmaghātakaḥ ।।bahūnāmekakāryāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śastradhāriṇāṃ ।yadyeko ghātakastatra sarve te ghātakāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।ākrośitastāḍito vā dhanaivvā paripīḍitaḥ ।

tataḥ karmāṇīti kha, ga, gha, cha ca
yamuddiśya tyajet prāṇāṃstamāhurbrahmaghātakaṃ ।।auṣadhādyupakāre tu na pāpaṃ syāt kṛte mṛte ।putraṃ śiṣyantathā bhāryāṃ śāsate na mṛte hy aghaṃ ।।deśaṃ kālañca yaḥ śaktiṃ pāpañcāvekṣya yatnataḥ ।prāyaścittaṃ prakalpyaṃ syādyatra coktā ba niṣkṛtiḥ ।।gavārthe brāhmaṇārthe vā sadyaḥ prāṇān parityajet ।prāsyedātmānamagnau vā mucyate brahmahatyayā ।।śiraḥkapālī dhvajavān bhaikṣāśī karma vedayan ।brahmahā dvādaśābdāni mitabhuk śuddhimāpnuyāt ।।ṣaḍbhirvarṣaiḥ śuddhacārī brahmahā pūyate naraḥ ।vihitaṃ yadakāmā māṃ kāmāttu dviguṇaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।prāyaścittaṃ pravṛttasya badhe syāttu trivārṣikaṃ ।brahmaghni kṣatre dviguṇaṃ viṭcchūdre dviguṇaṃ tridhā ।।anyatra vipre sakalaṃ pādonaṃ kṣatriye mataṃ ।vaiśye ardhapādaṃ kṣatre syādvṛddhastrībālarogiṣu ।।turīyo brahmahatyāyāḥ kṣatriyasya badhe smṛtaṃ ।vaiśye aṣṭamāṃśo vṛttasthe śūdre jñeyastu ṣoḍaśaḥ ।।apraduṣṭāṃ striyaṃ hatvā śūdrahatyāvrataṃ caret ।pañcagavyaṃ pivedgoghno māsamāsīta saṃyataḥ ।।goṣṭhe śayo go anugāmī gopradānena śuddhyati ।kṛcchrañcaivātikṛcchraṃ vā pādahrāso nṛpādiṣu ।।ativṛddhāmatikṛśāmatibālāñca rogiṇīṃ ।

na saṃskṛtiriti cha

badhe asya tu iti cha
hatvā pūrvavidhānena caredardhavrataṃ dvijaḥ ।।brāhmaṇān bhojayecchaktyā dadyāddhematiladikaṃ ।muṣṭicapeṭakīlena tathā śṛṅgādimoṭane ।।laguḍādiprahāreṇa gobadhaṃ tatra nirdiśet ।damena dāmane caiva śakaṭādau ca yojane ।।stambhaśṛṅkhalapāśair vā mṛte pādonamācaret ।kāṣṭhe śāntapanaṃ kuryāt prājāpatyantu loṣṭhake ।।taptakṛcchrantu pāṣāṇe śastre cāpyatikṛcchrakaṃ ।mārjāragodhānakulamaṇḍūkaśvapatatriṇaḥ ।।hatvā tryahaṃ pivet kṣīraṃ kṛcchraṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret ।vrataṃ rahasye rahasi prakāśe api prakāśakaṃ ।।prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kāryaṃ sarvapāpāpanuttaye ।pānakaṃ drākṣamadhukaṃ khārjarantālamaikṣavaṃ ।।madhvīkaṃ ṭaṅkamādhvīkaṃ maireyaṃ nārikelajaṃ ।na madyānyapi madyāni paiṣṭī mukhyā surā smṛtā ।।traivarṇasya niṣiddhāni pītvā taptvāpyapaḥ śuciḥ ।kaṇān vā bhakṣayedabdaṃ piṇyākaṃ vā sakṛnniśi ।।surāpāṇāpanutyarthaṃ bālavāmā jaṭī dhvajī ।ajñānāt prāśya viṇmūtraṃ surāsaṃspṛṣṭameva ca ।।punaḥ saṃskāramarhanti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ ।madyamāṇḍasthitā āpaḥ pītvā saptadinaṃ vratī ।।cāṇḍālasya tu pānīyaṃ pītvā syāt ṣaḍdinaṃ vratī ।caṇḍālakūpabhāṇḍeṣu pītvā śāntapanaṃ caret ।।

pañcagavyaṃ trirānte pītvā cāntyajalaṃ dvijaḥ ।matsyakaṇṭakaśambūkaśaṅkhaśuktikapardakān ।।pītvā navodakaṃ caiva pañcagavyena śuddhyati ।śavakūpodakaṃ pītvā trirātreṇa viśuddhyati ।।antyāvasāyināmannaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret ।āpatkāle śūdragṛhe manastāpena śuddhyati ।।śūdrabhājanabhuk vipraḥ pañcagavyādupoṣitaḥ ।kandupakvaṃ snehapakvaṃ snehaṃ ca dadhiśaktavaḥ ।।śūdrādanindyānyetāni guḍakṣīrarasādikaṃ ।asnātabhuk copavāsī dinānte tu japācchuciḥ ।।mūtroccāryaśucirbhuktvā trirātreṇa viśuddhyati ।keśakīṭāvapannaṃ ca pādaspṛṣṭañca kāmataḥ ।।bhrūṇaghnāvekṣittaṃ caiva saspṛṣṭaṃ vāpyudakyayā ।kākādyair avalīḍhaṃ ca śunāsaṃspṛṣṭameva ca ।।gavādyair annamāghrātaṃ bhuktvā tryahamupāvaset ।retoviṇmūtrabhakṣī tu prājāpatyaṃ samācaret ।।cāndrāyaṇa navaśrāddhe parāko māsike mataḥ ।pakṣatraye atikṛcchraṃ syāt ṣaṇmāse kṛcchrameva ca ।।ābdike pādakṛcchraṃ syādekāhaḥ punarāvdike ।pūrvedyurvārṣikaṃ śrāddhaṃ paredyuḥ punarāvdikaṃ ।।niṣiddhabhakṣaṇe bhukte prāyaścittamupoṣaṇaṃ ।bhūstṛṇaṃ laśunaṃ bhuktvā śiśukaṃ kṛcchramācaret ।।

laśunaṃ gṛñjanaṃ bhuktveti ṅa

śiśukṛcchraṃ samācarediti kha
abhojyānāntu bhuktvānnaṃ strīśūdrocchiṣṭameva ca ।jagdhvā māṃsamabhakṣyañca saptarātraṃ payaḥ pivet ।।madhu māṃsañca yo aśnīyācchāvaṃ sūtakameva vā ।prājāpatyaṃ caret kṛcchraṃ brahmacārī yatirvratī ।।anyayena parasvāpaharaṇaṃ steyamucyate ।musalena hato rājñā svarṇasteyī viśuddhyati ।।adhaḥśāyī jaṭādhārī parṇamūlaphalāśanaḥ ।ekakālaṃ samaśnāno dvādaśābde viśuddhyati ।।rukmasteyī surāpaś ca brahmahā gurutalpagaḥ ।steyaṃ kṛtvā surāṃ pītvā kṛcchrañcābdaṃ carennaraḥ ।।maṇimuktāpravālānāṃ tāmrasya rajatasya ca ।ayaskāṃsyopalānāñca dvādaśāhaṃ kaṇānnabhuk ।।manuṣyāṇāntu haraṇe strīṇāṃ kṣetragṛhasya ca ।vāpīkūpataḍāgānāṃ śuddhiścāndrāyaṇaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।bhakṣyabhojyāpaharaṇe yānaśayyāsanasya ca ।puṣpamūlaphalānāñca pañcagavyaṃ viśodhanaṃ ।।tṛṇakāṣṭhadrumāṇāñca śuṣkānnasya guḍasya ca ।celacarmāmiṣāṇāñca trirātraṃ syādabhojanaṃ ।।pituḥ patnīñca bhaginīmācāryatanayāntathā ।ācāryāṇīṃ sutāṃ svāñca gacchaṃś ca gurutalpagaḥ ।।gurutalpe abhibhāṣyainastapte pacyādayomaye ।śūmīṃ jvalantīñcāśliṣya mṛtunā sa viśuddhyati ।।cāndrāyaṇān vā trīnmāsānabhyasya gurutalpagaḥ ।

evameva vidhiṃ kuryād yoṣitsu patitāsvapi ।।yat puṃsaḥ paradāreṣu taccaināṃ kārayedvrataṃ ।retaḥ siktvā kumārīṣu cāṇḍālīṣu sutāsu ca ।।sapiṇḍāpatyadāreṣu prāṇatyāgo vidhīyate ।yat karotyekarātreṇa vṛṣalīsevanaṃ dvijaḥ ।।tadbhaikṣyabhug japannityaṃ tribhirvarṣair vyapohati ।pitṛvyadāragamane bhrātṛbhāryāgame tathā ।।cāṇḍālīṃ pukkasīṃ vāpi snuṣāñca bhaginīṃ sakhīṃ ।mātuḥ pituḥ svasārañca nikṣiptāṃ śaraṇāgatāṃ ।।mātulānīṃ svasārañca sagotrāmanyamicchatīṃ ।śiṣyabhāryāṃ gurorbhāryāṃ gatvā cāndrāyaṇañcaret ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe prāyaścittāni nāma trisaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

haviṣyabhugiti ga ,ṭa ca

mātṛjāyāgame iti ga, cha, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś atha catuḥsaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

prāyaścittāni

agnir uvāca
devāśramārcanādīnāṃ prāyaścittantu lopataḥ ।pūjālope cāṣṭaśataṃ japeddviguṇapūjanaṃ ।।pañcopaniṣadair mantrair hutvā brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ ।sūtikāntyajakodakyāspṛṣṭe deve śataṃ japet ।।pañcopaniṣadaiḥ pūjāṃ dviguṇaṃ snānameva ca ।viprabhojyaṃ homalope homasnānaṃ tathārcanaṃ ।।homadravye mūṣikādyair bhakṣite kīṭasaṃyute ।tāvanmātraṃ parityajya prokṣya devādi pūjayet ।।aṅkurārpaṇamātrantu chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ parityajet ।aspṛśyaiś caiva saṃspṛṣṭe anyapātre tadarpaṇaṃ ।।devamānuṣavighnaghnaṃ pūjākāle tathaiva ca ।mantradravyādivyatyāse mūlaṃ japtvā punarjapet ।।kumbhenāṣṭaśatajapo deve tu patite karāt ।bhinne naṣṭe copavāsaḥ śatahomācchubhaṃ bhavet ।।

śataṃ śahunediti kha, cha ca

śatahomācchucirbhavediti kha, gha, ña ca
kṛte pāpe anutāpo vai yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate ।prāyaścittantu tasyaikaṃ harisaṃsmaraṇaṃ paraṃ ।।cāndrāyaṇaṃ parāko vā prājāpatyamaghaughanut ।sūryeśaśaktiśrīśadimantrajapyamaghaughanut ।।gāyatrīpraṇavastotramantrajapyamaghāntakaṃ ।kādyair āvījasaṃyuktair ādyair ādyaistadantakaiḥ ।।sūryeśaśaktiśrīśādimantrāḥ koṭyadhikāḥ pṛthak ।oṃhrīmādyāś caturthyantā namontāḥ sarvakāmadāḥ ।।nṛsiṃhadvādaśāṣṭārṇamālāmantrādyaghaughanut ।āgneyasya purāṇasya paṭhanaṃ śravaṇādikaṃ ।।dvividyārūpako viṣṇuragnirūpastu gīyate ।paramātmā devamukhaṃ sarvavedeṣu gīyate ।।pravṛttau tu nivṛttau tu ijyate bhuktimuktidaḥ ।agnirūpasya viṣṇorhi havanaṃ dhyānamarcanaṃ ।।japyaṃ stutiś ca praṇatiḥ śārīrāśeṣāghaughanut ।daśasvarṇāni dānāni dhānyadvādaśameva ca ।।tulāpuruṣamukhyāni mahādānāni ṣoḍaśa ।annadānāni mukhyāni sarvāṇyaghaharāṇi hi ।।tithivārarkṣasaṅkrāntiyogamanvādikālake ।bratādi sūryeśaśaktiśrīśāderaghaghātanaṃ ।।gaṅgā gayā prayāgaś ca kāśyayodhyā hy avamtikā ।

pravṛttaistu nivṛttaistu ijyate bhuktimuktida iti gha, ṅa, jha, ña ca

aghanāśanamiti ga
kurukṣetraṃ puṣkarañca naimiṣaṃ puruṣottamaḥ ।।śālagrāmaprabhāsādyaṃ tīrthañcaghoghaghātakaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiriti dhyānamaghaughanut ।।purāṇaṃ brahma cāgneyaṃ brahmā viṣṇurmaheśvaraḥ ।avatārāḥ sarvapūjāḥ pratiṣṭhāpratimādikaṃ ।।jyotiḥśāstrapurāṇāni smṛtayastu tapovrataṃ ।arthaśāstrañca sargādyā āyurvedo dhanurmatiḥ ।।śikṣā chando vyākaraṇaṃ niruktañcābhidhānakaṃ ।kalpo nyāyaś ca mīmāṃsā hy anyat sarvaṃ hariḥ prabhuḥ ।।eke dvayoryato yasmin yaḥ sarvamiti veda yaḥ ।taṃ dṛṣṭvānyasya pāpāni vinaśyanti hariś ca saḥ ।।vidyāṣṭādaśarūpaś ca sūkṣmaḥ sthūlo aparo hariḥ ।jyotiḥ sadakṣaraṃ brahma paraṃ viṣṇuś ca nirmalaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe prāyaścittāni nāma catuḥsaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcasaptyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vrataparibhāṣā

agnir uvāca
tithivārarkṣadivasamāsartvabdārkasaṅkrame ।nṛstrīvratādi vakṣyāmi vasiṣṭha śṛṇu tat kramāt ।।

smṛtayaḥ śrutayo vratamiti ka, gha, ṅa, ña ca । ahaṃ brahmetyādiḥ, tapovratamityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ga pustake nāsti

puṃstrī vratādīti ṅa, ña ca
śāstrodito hi niyamo vrataṃ tacca tapo mataṃ ।niyamāstu viśeṣāstu vratasyaiva damādayaḥ ।।vrataṃ hi kartṛsantāpāttapa ity abhidhīyate ।indriyagrāmaniyamānniyamaścābhidhīyate ।।anagnayastu ye viprāsteṣāṃ śreyo abhidhīyate ।vratopavāsaniyamair nānādānais tathā dvijaḥ ।।te syurdevādayaḥ prītā bhuktimuktipradāyakāḥ ।upāvṛttasya pāpebhyo yastu vāso guṇaiḥ saha ।।upavāsaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sarvabhogavivarjitaḥ ।kāṃsyaṃ māṃsaṃ masūrañca caṇakaṃ koradūṣakaṃ ।।śākaṃ madhu parānnañca tyajedupavasan striyaṃ ।puṣpālaṅkāravastrāṇi dhūpagandhanulepanaṃ ।।upavāse na śasyanti dantadhāvanamañjanaṃ ।dantakāṣṭhaṃ pañcagavyaṃ kṛtvā prātarvratañcaret ।।asakṛjjalapānācca tāmbūlasya ca bhakṣaṇāt ।upavāsaḥ praduṣyeta divāsvapnācca maithunāt ।।kṣamā satyandayā dānaṃ śaucamindriyanigrahaḥ ।devapūjāgniharaṇaṃ santoṣo asteyameva ca ।।sarvavrateṣvayaṃ dharmaḥ sāmānyo daśadhā smṛtaḥ ।pavitrāṇi japeccaiva juhuyāccaiva śaktitaḥ ।।

taiḥ syurdevādaya iti ga, cha ca

sarvapāpavivarjita iti ja, jha ca । sarvataḥ parivarjita iti cha

śākaṃ dadhi parānnañceti kha, cha ca

devapūjāgnihavanamiti gha, ṭa ca
nityasnāyī mitāhāro gurudevadvijārcakaḥ ।kṣāraṃ kṣaudrañca lavaṇaṃ madhu māṃsāni varjayet ।।tilamudgādṛte śasyaṃ śasye godhūmakodravau ।cīnakaṃ devadhānyañca śamīdhānyaṃ tathaikṣavaṃ ।।śitadhānyaṃ tathā puṇyaṃ mūlaṃ kṣāragaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।vrīhiṣaṣṭikamudgāś ca kalāyāḥ satilā yavāḥ ।।śyāmākāś caiva nīvārā godhūmādyā vrate hitāḥ ।kuṣmāṇḍālāvuvārtākūn pālaṅkīmpūtikāntyajet ।।carubhaikṣyaṃ śaktukaṇāḥ śākandadhi ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ।śyāmākaśālinīvārā yavakaṃ mūlataṇḍulaṃ ।।haviṣyaṃ vratanaktādāvagnikāryādike hitaṃ ।madhu māṃsaṃ vihāyānyad vrate vā hitamīritaṃ ।।tryahaṃ prātastryahaṃ sāyaṃ tryahamadyādayācitaṃ ।tryahamparañca nāśnīyāt prājāpatyañcaran dvijaḥ ।।ekaikaṃ grāsamaśnīyāt tryahāṇi trīṇi pūrvavat ।tryahañcopavasedantyamatikṛcchraṃ caran dvijaḥ ।।gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakaṃ ।ekarātropavāsaś ca kṛcchraṃ śāntapanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।pṛthak śāntapanadravyaiḥ ṣaḍahaḥ sopavāsakaḥ ।saptāhena tu kṛcchro ayaṃ mahāśāntapano aghahā ।।dvādaśāhopavāsena parākaḥ sarvapāpahā ।

yatāhāra iti gha

śamīdhānyaṃ tathaiva ceti ga ,jha ca
mahāparākastriguṇastvayameva prakīrtitaḥ ।।paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśagrāsyamāvāsyabhojanaḥ ।ekāpāye tato vṛddhau cāndrāyaṇamato anyathā ।।kapilāgoḥ palaṃ mūtraṃ ardhāṅguṣṭhañca gomayaṃ ।kṣīraṃ saptapalandadyāt dadhnaś caiva paladvayaṃ ।।ghṛtamekapalandadyāt palamekaṃ kuśodakaṃ ।gayatryā gṛhya gomūtraṃ gandhadvāreti gomayaṃ ।।āpyāyasveti ca kṣīraṃ dadhikrāvṇeti vai dadhi ।tejo asīti tathā cājyaṃ devasyeti kuśodakaṃ ।।brahmakūrco bhavatyevaṃ āpo hiṣṭhetyṛcaṃ japet ।aghamarṣaṇasūktena saṃyojya praṇavena vā ।।pītvā sarvāghanirmukto viṣṇulokī hy upoṣitaḥ ।upavāsī sāyambhojī yatiḥ ṣaṣṭhātmakālavān ।।māṃsavarjī cāśvamedhī satyavādī divaṃ vrajet ।agnyādheyaṃ pratiṣṭhāñca yajñadānavratāni ca ।।devavratavṛṣotsargacūḍākaraṇamekhalāḥ ।māṅgalyamabhiṣekañca malamāse vivarjayet ।।darśāddarśastu cāndraḥ syāt triṃśāhaś caiva bhāvanaḥ ।māsaḥ saurastu saṅkrānternākṣatro bhavivartanāt ।।sauro māso vivāhādau yajñādau sāvanaḥ smṛtaḥ ।

dadhnaś caiva palatrayamiti gha, ña, ṭa ca

gāyatryā ity ādiḥ, kuśodakamityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti

sāvano mata iti cha
āvdhike pitṛkārye ca cāndro māsaḥ praśasyate ।।āṣāḍhīmavadhiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ syātpakṣastu pañcamaḥ ।kuryācchrāddhantatra raviḥ kanyāṃ gacchatu vā na vā ।।māsi saṃvatsare caiva tithidvaidhaṃ yadā bhavet ।tatrottarottamā jñeyā pūrvā tu syān malimlucā ।।upoṣitavyaṃ nakṣatraṃ yenāstaṃ yāti bhāskaraḥ ।divā puṇyāstu tithayo rātrau naktavrate śubhāḥ ।।yugmāgnikṛtabhūtāni ṣaṇmunyorvasurandhrayoḥ ।rudreṇa dvādaśo yuktā caturdaśyātha pūrṇimā ।।pratipadā tvamāvāsyā tithyoryugmaṃ mahāphalaṃ ।etadvyastaṃ mahāghoraṃ hanti puṇyaṃ purākṛtaṃ ।।narendramantrivratināṃ vivāhopadravādiṣu ।sadyaḥ śaucaṃ samākhyātaṃ kāntārāpadi saṃṣadi ।।ārabdhadīrghatapasāṃ na rājā vratahā striyāḥ ।garbhiṇī sūtikā naktaṃ kumārī ca rajasvalā ।।yadāśuddhā tadānyena kārayeta kriyāḥ sadā ।krodhāt pramādāllobhādvā vratabhaṅgo bhavedyadi ।।dinatrayaṃ na bhuññīta muṇḍanaṃ śiraso atha vā ।asāmarthye vratakṛtau patnīṃ vā kārayet sutaṃ ।।sūtake mṛtake kārtyaṃ prārabdhaṃ pūjanojjhitaṃ ।vratasthaṃ mūrchitaṃ dugdhapānādyair uddhared guruḥ ।।

yugmāgniyugabhūtānīti ja, jha ca

caturdaśyā ceti ga

narendrasatrivratināmiti kha, gha, ja, ña ca
aṣtau tānyavrataghnāni āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ payaḥ ।havirbrāhmaṇakāmyā ca gurorvacanamauṣadhaṃ ।।kīrtisantatividyādisaubhāgyārogyavṛddhaye ।nairmalyabhuktimuktyarthaṃ kurve vratapate vrataṃ ।।idaṃ vrataṃ mayā śreṣṭhaṃ gṛhītaṃ puratastava ।nirvighnāṃ siddhimāyātu tvatprasādāt jagatpate ।।gṛhīte asmin vratavare yadyapūrṇe mriye hy ahaṃ ।tatsarvaṃ pūrṇamevāstu prasanne tvayi satpatau ।।vratamūrtiṃ jagadbhūtiṃ maṇḍale sarvasiddhaye ।āvahaye namastubhyaṃ sannidhībhava keśava ।।manasā kalpitair bhaktyā pañcagavyair jalaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।pañcāmṛtaiḥ snāpayāmi tvaṃ me ca bhava pāpahā ।।gandhapuṣpodakair yuktamarghyamarghyapate śubhaṃ ।gṛhāṇa pādyamācāmamarghyārhaṅkuru māṃ sadā ।।vastraṃ vastrapate puṇyaṃ gṛhāṇa kuru māṃ sadā ।bhūṣaṇādyaiḥ suvastrādyaiśchāditaṃ vratasatpate ।।sugandhigandhaṃ vimalaṃ gandhamūrte gṛhāṇa vai ।pāpagandhavihīnaṃ māṃ kuru tvaṃ hi sugandhikaṃ ।।puṣpaṃ gṛhāṇa puṣpādipūrṇa māṃ kuru sarvadā ।puṣpagandhaṃ suvimalaṃ āyurārogyavṛddhaye ।।daśāṅgaṃ guggulughṛtayuktaṃ dhūpaṃ gṛhāṇa vai ।sadhūpa dhūpita māṃ tvaṃ kuru dhūpitasatpate ।।

vrate deva iti ga, gha, ja, jha, ña, ṭa ca
dīpamūrdhaśikhaṃ dīptaṃ gṛhāṇākhilabhāsakaṃ ।dīpamūrte prakāśāḍhyaṃ sarvadordhvagatiṃ kuru ।।annādikañca naivedyaṃ gṛhāṇānnādi satpate ।annādipūrṇaṃ kuru māmannadaṃ sarvadāyakaṃ ।।mantrahīnaṃ kriyāhīnaṃ bhaktihīnaṃ mayā prabho ।yat pūjitaṃ vratapate paripūrṇantadasu me ।।dharmaṃ dehi dhanaṃ dehi saubhāgyaṃ guṇasantatiṃ ।kīrtiṃ vidyāṃ dehi cāyuḥ svargaṃ mokṣañca dehi me ।।imāṃ pūjāṃ vratapate gṛhītvā vraja sāmprataṃ ।punarāgamanāyaiva varadānāya vai prabho ।।snātvā vratavatā sarvavrateṣu vratamūrtayaḥ ।pūjyāḥ suvarṇajāstā vai śaktyā vai bhūmiśāyinā ।।japo homaś ca sāmānyavratānte dānameva ca ।caturviṃśā dvādaśa vā pañca vā traya ekakaḥ ।।viprāḥ prapūjyā guravo bhojyāḥ śaktyā tu dakṣiṇā ।deyā gāvaḥ suvarṇādyāḥ pādukopānahau pṛthak ।।jalapātrañcānnapātramṛttikācchatramāsanaṃ ।śayyā vastrayugaṃ kumbhāḥ paribhāṣeyamīritā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vrataparibhāṣānāma pañcasaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

kīrtiṃ vṛddhimiti kha, cha ca viprāḥ pūjyāḥ sagarava iti gha, ja, ṭa ca

mudrikāchatramāsanamiti gha chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭsaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

pratipadvratāni

agnir uvāca
vakṣye pratipadādīni vratānyakhiladāni te ।kārttikāśvayuje caitre pratipadbrahmaṇastithiḥ ।।pañcadaśyānnirāhāraḥ pratipadyarcayedajaṃ ।oṃ tat sadbrahmaṇe namo gāyatryā vāvdamekakaṃ ।।akṣamālāśruvandakṣe vāme śrucakamaṇḍalu ।lambakūrcañca jaṭilaṃ haimaṃ brahmāṇamarcayet ।।śaktyā kṣīraṃ pradadyāttu brahmā me prīyatāmiti ।nirmalo bhogabhk svarge bhūmau vipro dhanī bhavet ।।dhanyaṃ vrataṃ pravakṣyāmi adhanyo dhanyatāṃ vrajet ।mārgaśīrṣe pratipadi naktaṃ hutvā pyupoṣitaḥ ।।agnaye nama ity agniṃ prārcyāvdaṃ sarvabhāg bhavet ।pratipadyekabhaktāśī samāpte kapilāpradaḥ ।।vaiśvānarapadaṃ yāti śikhivratamidaṃ smṛtaṃ ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe pratipadvratāni nāma ṣaṭsaptatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

dvitīyāvratāni

agnir uvāca
dvitīyāvratakaṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktidāyakaṃ ।puṣpāhārī dvitīyāyāmaśvinau pūjayet surau ।।abdaṃ svarūpasaubhāgyaṃ svargabhāg jāyate vratī ।kārttike śuktipakṣasya ditīyāyāṃ yamaṃ yajet ।।abdamupoṣitaḥ svargaṃ gacchenna narakaṃ vratī ।aśūnyaśayanaṃ vakṣye avaidhavyādidāyakaṃ ।।kṛṣṇapakṣe dvitīyāyāṃ śrāvaṇāsya caredidaṃ ।śrīvatsadhārin śrikānta śrīdhāman śrīpate avyaya ।।gārhasthyaṃ mā praṇāśaṃ me yātu dharmārthakāmadaṃ ।agnayī mā praṇaśyantu mā praṇaśyantu devatāḥ ।।pitaro mā praṇaśyantu matto dāmpatyabhedataḥ ।lakṣmyā viyujyate devo na kadāśidyathā bhavān ।।tathā kalatrasambandho deva mā me vibhidyatāṃ ।lakṣmyā na śūnyaṃ varada yathā te śayanaṃ vibho ।।śayyā mamāpyaśūnyāstu tathaiva madhusūdana ।lakṣmīṃ viṣṇuṃ yajedavdaṃ dadyācchayyāṃ phalāni ca ।।pratimāsaṃ ca somāya dadyādarghyaṃ samantrakaṃ ।

śuktapakṣe tu iti ga
gaganāṅgaṇasandīpa dugdhābdhimathanodbhava ।।bhābhāsitādigābhoga rāmānuja namo astu te ।oṃ śrīṃ śrīdharāya namaḥ somātmānaṃ hariṃ yajet ।।ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai namo daśarūpamahātmane ।ghṛtena homo naktañca śayyāṃ dadyāddvijātaye ।।dīpānnabhājanair yuktaṃ chatropānahamāsanaṃ ।sodakumbhañca pratimāṃ viprāyātha ca pātrakaṃ ।।patnyā ya evaṃ kurute bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।kāntivrataṃ pravakṣyāmi kārttikasya site caret ।।naktabhojī dvitīyāyāṃ pūjayed balakeśavau ।varṣaṃ prāpnoti vai kāntimāyurārogyakādikaṃ ।।atha śiṣṇuvrataṃ vakṣye manovāñchitadāyakaṃ ।pauṣaśukladvitīyādi kṛtvā dinacatuṣṭayaṃ ।।pūrvaṃ siddhārthakaiḥ snānaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇatilaiḥ smṛtaṃ ।vacayā ca tṛtīye ahni sarvauṣadhyā caturthake ।।murāmāṃṣī vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śaileyaṃ rajanīdvarya ।saṭī campakamustañca sarvauṣadhigaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।nāmnā kṛṣṇācyutānanta hṛṣīkeśeti pūjayet ।pāde nābhyāṃ cakṣuṣi ca kramācchirasi puṣpakaiḥ ।।śaśicandraśaśāṅkendusañjñābhiścārghyaṃ indave ।naktaṃ bhuñjīta ca naro yāvattiṣṭhati candramāḥ ।।

śayyāṃ dadyāddvitīyake iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja, ña, ṭa ca

agnir uvāca

śivaṃ rudrāya viśvāyeti kha, cha ca । śivaṃ bhadrāyeśvarāyeti ja, jha, ña, ṭa ca

sthāpayed ghṛtaniṣpāvakusumbhakṣīrajīvakaṃ ।।tarurājekṣulavaṇaṃ kustumburumathāṣṭamaṃ ।caitre śṛgodakaṃ prāśya devadevyagrataḥ svapet ।।prātaḥ snātvā samabhyarcya vipradāmpatyamarcayet ।tadaṣṭakaṃ dvije dadyāllalitā prīyatāṃ mama ।।śṛṅgodakaṃ gomayaṃ ca mandāraṃ bilvapatrakaṃ ।kuśodakaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ kārttike pṛṣadājyakam ।।gomūtrājyaṃ kṛṣṇatilaṃ pañcagavyaṃ kramāśanaṃ ।lalitā vijayā bhadrā bhavānī kumudā śivā ।।vāsudevī tathā gaurī maṅgalā kamalā satī ।caitrādau dānakāle ca prīyatāmiti vācayet ।।phalamekaṃ pavitrājyaṃ vratānte śayānaṃ dadet ।umāmaheśvaraṃ haimaṃ vṛṣabhañca gavā saha ।।guruñca mithunānyarcya vastrādyair bhuktimuktibhāk ।saubhāgyārogyarūpāyuḥ saubhāgyaśayanavratān ।।nabhasye vātha vaiśākhe kuryānmārgaśirasyatha ।

viṣṇumiti ṭa

yaśodāñceti ṅa, ja ca
dīpadīpta mahādīpaṃ dīpadīptada sarvadā ।।mayā dattaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ kuru cordhvagatiṃ ca māṃ ।viśvāya viśvapataye viśveśāya namo namaḥ ।।viśvādisambhavāyaiva govindāya niveditaṃ ।dharmāya dharmapataye darmeśāya namo namaḥ ।।dharmādisambhavāyaiva govindaśayanaṃ kuru ।sarvāya sarvapataye sarveśāya namao namaḥ ।।sarvādisambhavāyaiva govindāya ca pāvanaṃ ।kṣīrodārṇavasambhūta atrinetrasamudbhava ।।gṛhāṇārghyaṃ śaśāṅkedaṃ rohiṇyā sahito mama ।sthaṇḍile sthāpayeddevaṃ sacandrāṃ rohiṇīṃ yajet ।।devakīṃ vasudevaṃ ca yaśodāṃ nandakaṃ balaṃ ।ardharātre parodhārāḥ pātayed guḍasarpiṣā ।।vastrahemādikaṃ dadyādbrāhmaṇān bhojayedvratī ।janmāṣṭamīvratakaraḥ putravānviṣṇulokabhāk ।।varṣe varṣe tu yaḥ kuryāt putrārthī vetti no bhayaṃ ।putrān dehi dhanaṃ dehi āyurārogyasantatiṃ ।।dharmaṃ kāmaṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca dehi me ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe jayantyaṣṭamīvrataṃ nāma tryaśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

sarvadā iti gha, ṅa ca

viśveśāya namo astu te iti ja

pāragamiti ga । sarvāyetyādiḥ pāvanamityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti

kṛṣṇalokabhāgiti cha

putrārtho labhate sutamiti ja, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś atha caturaśityadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aṣṭamīvratāni

agnir uvāca
brahmādimātṛyajanājjapen mātṛgaṇāṣṭamīṃ ।kṛṣṇāṣṭābhyāṃ caitramāse pūjyābdaṃkṛṣṇamarthabhāk ।।kṛṣṇāṣṭamīvrataṃ vakṣye māse mārgaśire caret ।naktaṃ kṛtvā śucirbhūtvā gomūtraṃ prāśayenniśi ।।bhūmiśāyī niśāyāñca śaṅkaraṃ pujayed vratī ।pauṣe śambhuṃ ghṛtaṃ prāśya māghe kṣīraṃmaheśvaram ।।mahādevaṃ phālgune ca tilāśī samupoṣitaḥ ।caitre sthāṇuṃ yavāśī ca vaiśākhe atha śivaṃ yajet ।।kuśodaśī paśupatiṃ jyaiṣṭhe śṛṅgodakāśanaḥ ।āṣāḍhe gomayāśyugraṃ śrāvaṇe sarvamarkabhuk ।।tryambakaṃ ca bhādrapade bilvapatrāśano niśi ।taṇḍulāśī cāśvayuje īśaṃ rudantu kārttike ।।dadhyāśī homakārī syādvarṣānte maṇḍale yajet ।govastrahema gurave dadyādviprebhya īdṛśaṃ ।।prārthayitvā dvijān bhojya bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।

māghe kṣīrī maheśvaramiti gha, cha, ña ca

tilādīti ja

varṣe varṣe tu maṇḍale iti ña

dvijān toṣya iti ja
naktāśī tvaṣṭamīṣu syād vatsarānte ca dhenudaḥ ।।paurandaraṃ padaṃ yāti svargativratamucyate ।aṣṭamī budhavāreṇa pakṣayorubhayoryadā ।।tadā vrataṃ prakurvīta athavā saguḍāśitā ।tasyāṃ niyamakartāro na syuḥ khaṇḍitasampadaḥ ।।taṇḍulasyāṣṭamuṣṭīnāṃ varjayitvāṅgulīdvayaṃ ।bhaktaṃ kṛtvā cāmrapuṭe sakuśe sakulāmbikāṃ ।।sāttvikaṃ pūjayitvāṅgaṃ bhuñjīta ca kathāśravāt ।śaktito dakṣiṇāndadyāt karkaṭīntaṇḍulānvitāṃ ।।dhīro dvijo asya bhāryāsti rambhā putrastu kaiśikaḥ ।duhitā vijayā tasya dhīrasya dhanado vṛṣaḥ ।।kauśikastaṃ gṛhītvā tu gopālaiścārayan vṛṣaṃ ।gaṅgāyāṃ snānakṛtye atha nītaś caurair vṛṣastadā ।।snātvā vṛṣamapaśyan sa vṛṣaṃ mārgitumāgataḥ ।vijayābhaginīyukto dadarśa sa sarovare ।।divyastrīyoṣitāṃ vṛndamavravīddehi bhojanaṃ ।strīvṛndamūce vratakṛd bhuṅkṣva tvamatithiryataḥ ।।vrataṃ kṛtvā sa bubhuje prāptavān vanapālakaṃ ।

sugativratamucyate iti kha, gha, cha, ja, ña, ṭa ca ।suśāntivratamucyate iti ja
karkarīntaṇḍulānvitāmiti kha, gha, ṅa ca ।gargarīntaṇḍulānvitāmiti jha
vīro dvijo asyeti ga, gha, ṅa, ja, ña ca

vīrasya dhanapo vṛṣa iti kha, cha, ṭa ca । vīrasya dhanado vṛṣa iti gha, ṅa, ja, ña ca

snānakṛtyeṣu iti ṭa
gato dhīraḥ savṛṣabho vijayāsahitastadā ।।dhīreṇa vijayā dattā yamāyāntaritaḥ pitā ।vratabhāvāt kauśiko api hy ayodhyāyāṃ nṛpo abhavat ।।pitrostu narake dṛṣṭvā vijayārtiṃ yame gatā ।mṛgayāmāgataṃ proce mucyate narakāt kathaṃ ।।vratadvayādyamaḥ proce prāpya tat kaiśiko dadau ।budhāṣṭamīdvayaphalaṃ svargatau pitarau tataḥ ।।vijayā harṣitā cakre vrataṃ bhuktyādisiddhaye ।aśokakalikāścāṣtau ye pivanti punarvasau ।।caitre māsi sitāṣṭamyāṃ na te śokamavāpnuyuḥ ।tvāmaśokaharābhīṣṭa madhumāsasamuḍgava ।।pivāmi śokasantapto māmaśokaṃ sadā kuru ।caitrādau mātṛpūjākṛdaṣṭamyāṃ jayate ripūn ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe aṣṭamīvratāni nāma caturaśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcāśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

navamīvratāni ।।

agnir uvāca
navamīvratakaṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktyādisiddhidaṃ ।devī pūjyāśvine śukle gauryākhyānavamīvrataṃ ।।

gato vīra iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ja, ña ca

vīreṇeti ṭa

pitarau tadeti kha
piṣṭakākhyā tu navamī piṣṭāśī devapūjanāt ।aṣṭamyāmāśvine śukte kanyārkamūlabhe yadā ।।aghārdanā sarvadā vai mahatī navamī smṛtā ।durgā tu navagehasthā ekāgārasthitāthavā ।।pūjitāṣṭādaśabhujā śeṣāḥ ṣoḍaśamatkarāḥ ।śeṣāḥ ṣoḍaśahastāḥ syurañjanaṃ ḍamaruntathā ।।rudracaṇḍā pracaṇḍā ca caṇḍogrā saṇḍanāyikā ।caṇḍā caṇḍavatī pūjyā caṇḍarūpāticaṇḍikā ।।kramānmadhye cogracaṇḍā durgā mahiṣamardinī ।oṃ durge durge rakṣaṇi svāhā daśākṣāro mantraḥ ।।dīrghākārādimantrādir navanetro namo antikaḥ ।ṣaḍbhiḥ padair namaḥsvadhāvaṣaṭkārahṛdādikaṃ ।।aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntaṃ nyasyāṅgāni japecchivāṃ ।etañjapati yo guhyaṃ nāsau kenāpi bādhyate ।।kapālaṃ kheṭakaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ darpaṇantarjanīndhanuḥ ।dhvajaṇḍamarukaṃ pāśaṃ vāmahasteṣu vibhratīṃ ।।śaktimudgaraśūlāni vajraṃ khaḍgañca kuntakaṃ ।śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ śalākāṃ ca āyudhāni ca pūjayet ।।paśuñca kālī kālīti japtvā khaḍgena ghātayet ।kāli kāli vajreśvari lauhadaṇḍāyai namaḥ ।।

ṣoḍaśahastakā iti ṅa

kramāt madhye copacaṇḍāṃ kṭtvā mahiṣamardinīmiti ga

dīrghākārādītyādiḥ, japecchivāmityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ gha, ja, jha, ña pustake nāsti

evaṃ japatīti ja, jha ca
tadutthaṃ rudhiraṃ māṃsaṃ pūtanāyai ca nairṛte ।vāyavyāṃ pāparākṣasyai carakyai nama īśvare ।।vidārikāyai cāgneyyāṃ mahākauśikamagnaye ।tasyāgrato nṛpaḥ snāyācchatruṃ piṣṭamayaṃ haret ।।dadyāt skandaviśākhābhyāṃ brāhmādyā niśi tā yajet ।jayantī maṅgalā kālī bhadrakālī kapālinī ।।durgā śivā kṣamā dhātrī svāhā svadhā namo astu te ।devīṃ pañcāmṛtaiḥ snāpya pūjayeccārhaṇādinā ।।dhvajādirathayātrādibalidānaṃ varādikṛt ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe navamīvratāni nāma pañcāśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

daśamīvrataṃ

agnir uvāca
daśamīvratakaṃ vakṣye dharmakāmādidāyakaṃ ।daśamyāmekabhaktāśī samāpte daśadhenudaḥ ।।diśaś ca kāñcanīrdadyādbrāhmaṇādhipatirbhavet ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe daśamīvratāni nāma ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

mahākauśikaṃ maṇḍape iti gha, ña ca

piṣṭamayaṃ hunoditi kha, cha ca

chapter 

ś atha saptāśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ekādaśīvrataṃ

agnir uvāca
ekādaśīvrataṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradāyākaṃ ।daśamyānniyatāhāro māṃsamaithunavarjitaḥ ।।ekadaśyāṃ na bhuñjīta pakṣayorubhayorapi ।dvādaśyekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ ।।tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṇe ।ekādaśī kalā yatra parato dvādaśo gatā ।।tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyantrayodaśyāntu pāraṇe ।daśamyekādaśīmiśrā nopoṣyā narakapradā ।।ekādaśyānnirāhāro bhuktvā caivāpare ahani ।bhokṣye ahaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣa śaraṇaṃ me bhavācyuta ।।ekādaśyāṃ site pakṣe puṣyarkṣantu yadā bhavet ।sopoṣpākṣayyaphaladā proktā sā pāpanāśinī ।।ekādaśī dvādaśī yā śravaṇena ca saṃyutā ।vijayā sā tithiḥ proktā bhaktānāṃ vijayapradā ।।eṣaiva phālgune māsi puṣyarkṣeṇa ca saṃyutā ।

madhumāṃsair vivarjita iti ga

atreti kha, cha, ja ca

dvādaśī mateti gha, ña ca । dvādaśī bhavediti ṅa, jha ca
vijayā procyate sadbhiḥ koṭikoṭiguṇottarā ।।ekādaśyāṃ viṣṇupūjā kāryā sarvopakāriṇī ।dhanavān putravān loke viṣṇuloke mahīyate ।।
e ity āgnyeye mahāpurāṇe ekādaśīvrataṃ nāma saptāśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dvādaśīvratāni

agnir uvāca
dvādaśīvratakaṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradāyakaṃ ।ekabhaktena bhaktena tathaivāyācitena ca ।।upavāsena bhaikṣyeṇa caivaṃ dvādaśikavratī ।caitre māsi site pakṣe dvādaśyāṃ madanaṃ hariṃ ।।pūjayedbhuktimuktyarthī madanadvādaśaīvratī ।māghaśukle tu dvādaśyāṃ bhīmadvādaśikavratī ।।namo nārāyaṇāyeti yajedviṣṇuṃ sa sarvabhāk ।phālgune ca site pakṣe govindadvādaśīvratī ।।viśokadvādaśīkārī yajedāśvayuje hariṃ ।lavaṇaṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu kṛṣṇamabhyarcya yo naraḥ ।।dadāti śukladvādaśyāṃ sa sarvarasadāyakaḥ ।

kīṭikoṭiguṇottameti kha

ekādaśyāmṛṣiṃ pūjyeti kha, cha ca । ekadaśyāmṛṣipūjeti ṅa

kāryā sarvāghahāriṇīti jha, ña ca

bhuktimuktyarthamiti cha, ña ca
govatsaṃ pūjayed bhādre govatsadvādaśīvratī ।।mādhyāntu samatītāyāṃ śravaṇena tu saṃyutā ।dvādaśī yā bhavet kṛṣṇā proktā sā tiladvādaśī ।।tilaiḥ snānantilair homo naivedyantilamodakaṃ ।dīpaś ca tilatailena tathā deyaṃ tilodakaṃ ।।tilāś ca deyā viprebhyaḥ phalaṃ homopavāsataḥ ।oṃ namo bhagavate atho vāsudevāya vai yajet ।।sukalaḥ svargamāpnoti ṣaṭtiladvādaśīvratī ।manorathadvādaśīkṛt phālgune tu site arcayet ।।nāmadvādaśīvratakṛt keśavādyaiś ca nāmabhiḥ ।varṣaṃ yajeddhariṃ svargī na bhaven nārakī naraḥ ।।phālgunasya site abhyarcya sumatidvādaśīvratī ।māsi bhādrapade śukte anantadvādaśīvratī ।।aśleṣarkṣe tu mūle vā māghe kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ ।yajettilāṃś ca juhuyāttiladvādaśīkṛnnaraḥ ।।sugatidvādaśīkārī phālgune tu site yajet ।jaya kṛṣṇa namastubhyaṃ varṣaṃ syād bhuktimuktigaḥ ।।pauṣaśukle tu dvādaśyāṃ samprāptidvādaśīvratī ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānādvādaśīvratāni nāmāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

manorathadvādaśītyādiḥ, anantadvādaśīvratītyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ gha pustake nāsti

āṣāḍharkṣe tu mūle vā iti kha, ga, ja, ṭa ca

varṣe syād bhuktimuktida iti ga, gha ca

chapter 

ś athaikonanavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śravaṇadvādaśīvratam

agnir uvāca
śravaṇādaśīṃ vakṣye māsi bhādrapade site ।śravaṇena yutā śreṣṭhā mahatī sā hy upoṣitā ।।saṅgame saritāṃ snānācchravaṇadvādaśophalaṃ ।budhaśravaṇasaṃyuktā dānādau sumahāphalā ।।niṣiddhamapi kartavyantrayodaśyāntu pāraṇaṃ ।dvādṛśyāñca nirāhāro vāmanaṃ pūjayāmyahaṃ ।।udakumbhe svarṇamayantrayodaśyāntu pāraṇaṃ ।āvāhayāmyahaṃ viṣṇuṃ vāmanaṃ śaṅkhacakriṇaṃ ।।sitavastrayugacchanne ghaṭe sacchatrapāduke ।snāpayāmi jalaiḥ śuddhair viṣṇuṃ pañcāmṛtādibhiḥ ।।chatradaṇḍadharaṃ viṣṇuṃ vāmanāya namo namaḥ ।arghyaṃ dadāmi deveśa arghyārhādyaiḥ sadārcitaḥ ।।bhuktimuktiprajākīrtisarvaiśvaryayutaṃ kuru ।vāmanāya namo gandhaṃ homo anenāṣṭakaṃ śataṃ ।।

śravaṇena samāyukteti gha

dvādaśadvādaśīphalamiti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ña ca

śuddhair harimiti ga, ṭa ca

mudārcita iti ga
oṃ namo vāsudevāya śiraḥ sampūjayeddhareḥ ।śrīdharāya mukhaṃ tadvat kaṇṭhe kṛṣṇāya vai namaḥ ।।namaḥ śrīpataye vakṣo bhujo sarvāstradhāriṇe ।vyāpakāya namo nābhiṃ vāmanāya namaḥ kaṭiṃ ।।trailokyajayakāyeti meḍhraṃ jaṅghe yajeddhareḥ ।sarvādhipataye pādau viṣṇoḥ sarvātmane namaḥ ।।ghṛtapakvañca naivedyandadyād dadhyodanair ghaṭān ।rātrau ca jāgaraṃ kṛtvā prātaḥ snātvā ca saṅgame ।।gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ pūjya vadet puṣpāñjalistvidaṃ ।namo namaste govinda budhaśravaṇasañjñita ।।aghaughasaṅkṣayaṃ kṛtvā sarvasaukhyaprado bhava ।prīyatāndeva deveśa mama nityañjanārdana ।।vāmano buddhido dātā dravyastho vāmanaḥ svayaṃ ।vāmanaḥ pratigṛhṇāti vāmano me dadāti ca ।।dravyastho vāmano nityaṃ vāmanāya namo namaḥ ।pradattadakṣiṇo viprān sambhojyānnaṃ svayañcaret ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śravaṇadvādaśīvrataṃ nāmaikonanavatyadhikaśatatmo adhyāyaḥ ।।

trailokyajananāyeti jha, ña ca । trailokyajanakāyeti ṅa, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś atha navatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

akhaṇḍadvādaśīvrataṃ

agnir uvāca
akhaṇḍadvādaśīṃ vakṣye vratasampūrṇatākṛtaṃ ।mārgaśīrṣe site viṣṇuṃ dvādaśyāṃ samupoṣitaḥ ।।pañcagavyajale snāto yajettatprāśano vratī ।yavavrīhiyutampātrandvādaśyāṃ hi dvije arpayet ।।saptajanmani yat kiñcinmayā khaṇḍaṃ vrataṃ kṛtaṃ ।bhagavaṃstvatprasādena tadakhaṇḍamihāstu me ।।yathākhaṇḍaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tvameva puruṣottama ।tathākhilānyakhaṇḍāni vratāni mama santu vai ।।evamevānumāsañca cāturmāsyo vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ ।anyaccaitrādimāseṣu śaktupātrāṇi cārpayet ।।śrāvaṇādiṣu cārabhya kārttikānteṣu pāraṇaṃ ।saptajanmasu vaikalyaṃ vratānāṃ saphalaṃ kṛte ।।āyurārogyasaubhāgyarājyabhogādimāpnuyāt ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe akhaṇḍadvādaśīvrataṃ nāma navatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

svarṇapātrāṇi iti kha, gha, ña ca

agnir uvāca । akhaṇḍadvādaśīṃ vakṣye ity ādiḥ, rājyabhogādimāpnuyādityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti

chapter 

ś athaikanavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

trayodaśīvratāni

agnir uvāca
trayodaśīvratānīha sarvadāni vadāmi te ।anaṅgena kṛtāmādau vakṣye anaṅgatrayodaśīṃ ।।trayodaśyāṃ mārgaśīrṣe śukle anaṅgaṃ haraṃ yajet ।madha samprāśayedrātrau ghṛtahomastilākṣataiḥ ।।pauṣe yogeśvaraṃ prārcya candanāśī kṛtāhutiḥ ।maheśvaraṃ mauktikāśī māghe abhyarcya divaṃ vrajet ।।kākolaṃ prāśya nīraṃ tu phālgune pūjayedvratī ।karpūrāśī svarūpaṃ ca caitre saubhāgyavān bhavet ।।mahārūpantu vaiśākhe yajejjātīphalāśyapi ।lavaṅgāśī jyaiṣṭhadine pradyumnaṃ pūjayed vratī ।।tilodāśī tathāṣāḍhe umābhartāramarcayet ।śrāvaṇe gandhatoyāśī pūjayecchūlapāṇinaṃ ।।sadyojātaṃ bhādrapade prāśitā gurumarcayet ।suvarṇavāri saṃprāśya āśvine tridaśādhipam ।।

hariṃ yajediti cha, ja, ña ca

kākolaṃ prāśya cīnañceti gha, ja, jha, ña ca

jyaiṣṭhamāse īt ga, gha, ṅa, ja, jha, ña ca
viśveśvaraṃ kārttike tu madanāśī yajedvratī ।śivaṃ haimantu varṣānte sañcchādyāmradalena tu ।।vastreṇa pūjayitvā tu dadyādviprāya gāntathā ।śayanañchatrakalaśān pādukārasabhājanam ।।trayodaśyāṃ site caitre ratiprītiyutaṃ smaran ।aśokākhyaṃ nagaṃ likhya sindūrarajanīmukhaiḥ ।।avdhaṃ yajettu kāmārthī kāmatrayodaśīvratam ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe trayodaśī vratāni nāmaikanavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvinavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

caturdaśīvratāni

agnir uvāca
vrataṃ vakṣye caturdaśyāṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakaṃ ।kārttike tu caturdaśyāṃ nirāhāro yajecchivam ।।varṣabhogadhanāyuṣmān kurvan śivacaturdaśīm ।mārgaśīrṣe site aṣṭābhyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ munivrataḥ ।।

bhuktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu iti kha, gha, ja, jha, ña, ṭa ca ।bhuktimuktisukhapradamiti ṅa
bhogabalāyuṣmāniti ṅa
dvādaśyāṃ vā caturdaśyāṃ phalāhāro yajet suraṃ ।tyaktvā phalāni dadyāttu kurvan phalacaturdaśīṃ ।।caturdaśyāṃ mathāṣṭamyāṃ pakṣayoḥśuklakṛṣṇayoḥ ।anaśnan pūjayecchambhuṃ svargyubhayacaturdaśīṃ ।।kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāntu naktena tathā kṛṣṇacaturdaśīṃ ।iha bhogānavāpnoti paratra ca śubhāṅgatiṃ ।।kārtike ca caturdaśyāṃ kṛṣṇāyāṃ snānakṛt sukhī ।ārādhite mahendre tu dhvajākārāsu yaṣṭiṣu ।।tataḥ śuklacaturdaśyāmanantaṃ pūjayeddhariṃ ।kṛtvādarbhamayaṃ caiva vāridhānī samanvitaṃ ।।śāliprasthasya piṣṭasya pūpanāmnaḥ kṛtasya ca ।ardhaṃ viprāya dātavyamardhamātmani yojayet ।।kartavyaṃ saritāṃ cānte kathāṃ kṛtvā hareriti ।anantasaṃsāramahāsamudre magnān samabhyuddhara vāsudeva ।।anantarūpe viniyojayasva anantarūpāya namo namaste ।anena pūjayitvātha sūtraṃ baddhā tu mantritaṃ ।।svake kare vā kaṇṭhe vā tvanantavratakṛt sukhī ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānācaturdaśīvratāni nāma dvinavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

yajet svayamiti gha

varṣaṃ bhogadhanāyuṣmānityādiḥ dhvajākārāsu yaṣṭiṣu ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti

bhojanamiti gha, ṅa, ja, jha, ña, ṭa ca

kathāṃ śrutveti jha

chapter 

ś atha trinavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śivarātrivratam

agnir uvāca
śivarātrivrataṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu ।māghaphālgunayormadhye kṛṣṇā yā tu caturdaśī ।।kāmayuktā tu sopoṣyā kurvan jāgaraṇaṃ vratī ।śivarātrivrataṃ kurve caturdaśyāmabhojanaṃ ।।rātrijāgaraṇenaiva pūjayāmi śivaṃ vratī ।āvāhayāmyahaṃ śambhuṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakaṃ ।।narakārṇavakottāranāvaṃ śiva namo astu te ।namaḥ śivāya śāntāya prajārājyādidāyine ।।saubhāgyārogyavidyārthasvargamārgapradāyine ।dharmandehi dhanandehi kāmabhogādi dehi me ।।guṇakīrtisukhaṃ dehi svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca dehi me ।lubdhakaḥ prāptavān puṇyaṃ pāpī sundarasenakaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śivarātrivrataṃ nāma trinavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

bhuktimuktipradāyakamiti jha, ṭa ca

svargamokṣapradāyine iti ṅa

chapter 

ś atha caturnavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aśokapūeṇimādivrataṃ

agnir uvāca
aśokapūrṇimāṃ vakṣye bhūdharaṃ ca bhuvaṃ yajet ।phālgunyāṃ sitapakṣāyāṃ varṣaṃ syādbhuktimuktibhāk ।।kārttikyāntu vṛṣotsargaṃ kṛtvā naktaṃ samācaret ।śaivaṃ padamavāpnoti vṛṣavratamidaṃ paraṃ ।।pitryā yāmāvasī tasyāṃ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣyaṃ ।upoṣyābdaṃ pitṝniṣṭvā niṣpāpaḥ svargamāpnuyāt ।।pañcadaśyāṃ ca māghasya pūjyājaṃ sarvamāpnuyāt ।vakṣye sāvitryamāvāsyāmbhuktimuktikarīṃ śubhāṃ ।।pañcadaśyāṃ vratī jyaiṣṭhe vaṭamūle mahāsatīṃ ।trirātropoṣitā nārī saptadhānyaiḥ prapūjayet ।।prarūḍhaiḥ kaṇṭhasūtraiś ca rajanyāṃ kuṅkumādibhiḥ ।vaṭāvalambanaṃ kṛtvā nṛtyagītaiḥ prabhātake ।।namaḥ sāvitryai satyavate naivedyaṃ cārpayed dvije ।veśma gatvā dvijān bhojya svayaṃ bhuktvā visarjayet ।।sāvitrī prīyatāṃ devī saubhāgyādikamāpnuyāt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe tithivratāni nāma caturnavatyadhikataśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcanavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vāravratāni

agnir uvāca
vāravratāni vakṣyāmi bhuktimuktipradāni hi ।karaṃ punarvasuḥ sūrye snāne sarvauṣadhī śubhā ।।śrādhhau cādityavāre tu saptajanmasvarogabhāk ।saṅkrāntau sūryavāro yaḥ so arkasya hṛdayaḥ śubhaḥ ।।kṛtvā haste sūryavāraṃ naktenābdaṃ sa sarvabhāk ।citrābhasomavārāṇi sapta kṛtvā sukhī bhavet ।।svātyāṃ gṛhītvā cāṅgāraṃ saptanaktyārtivarjitaḥ ।viśākhāyāṃ budhaṃ gṛhya saptanaktī grahārtinut ।।anurādhe devaguruṃ saptanaktī grahārtinut ।śukraṃ jyeṣṭhāsu saṅgṛhya saptanaktī grahārtinut ।।mūle śanaiś caraṃ gṛhya saptanaktī grahārtinut ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vāravratāni nāma pañcavanatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

anurādhetyādiḥ grahārtinudityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nakṣatravratāni

agnir uvāca
nakṣatravratakaṃ vakṣye bhe hariḥ pūjito arthadaḥ ।nakṣatrapuruṣaṃ cādau caitramāse hariṃ yajet ।।mūle pādau yajejjaṅghe rohiṇīsvarcayeddhariṃ ।jānunī cāśvinīyoge āṣāḍhāsūrusañjñake ।।meḍhraṃ pūrvottarāsveva kaṭiṃ vai kṛttikāsu ca ।pārśve bhādrapadābhyāntu kukṣiṃ vai revatīṣu ca ।।stanau caivānurādhāsu dhaniṣṭhāsu ca pṛṣṭhakaṃ ।bhujau pūjyau viśākhāsu punarvasvaṅgulīryajet ।।aśleṣāsu nakhān pūjya kaṇṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhāsu pūjayet ।śrotre viṣṇoś ca śravaṇe mukhaṃ puṣye hareryajet ।।yajet svātiṣu dantāgramāsyaṃ vāruṇato arcayet ।maghāsu nasāṃ nayane mṛgaśīrṣe lalāṭakaṃ ।।citrāsu cārdrāsu kacānabdānte svarṇakaṃ hariṃ ।guḍapūrṇe ghaṭe abhyarcya śayyāgorthādi dakṣiṇā ।।nakṣatrapuruṣo viṣṇuḥ pūjanīyaḥ śivātmakaḥ ।

hariḥ sarvatra pūjita iti ga

śayyāgoścādi dakṣiṇā iti kha, ṭa ca । śayyāgonnādi dakṣiṇā iti gha, ña, ja ca । śayyādhenvādi sakṣikā iti ṅa
śāmbhavāyanīyavratakṛnmāsabhe pūjayeddhariṃ ।।kārttike kṛttikāyāṃ ca mṛgaśīrṣe mṛgāsyake ।nāmabhiḥ keśavādyaistu acyutāya namo api vā ।।kārttike kṛttikābhe ahni māsanakṣatragaṃ hariṃ ।śāmbhavāyanīyavratakaṃ kariṣye bhuktimuktidaṃ ।।keśavādi mahāmūrtimacyutaṃ sarvadāyakaṃ ।āvāhayāmyahandevamāyurārogyavṛddhidaṃ ।।kārttikādau sakāsāramannaṃ māsacatuṣṭayaṃ ।phālgunādau ca kuśaramāṣāḍhādau ca pāyasaṃ ।।devāya brāhmaṇebhyaś ca naktannaivedyamāśayet ।pañcagavyajalesnātastasyaiva prāśanācchuciḥ ।।arvāgvisarjanād dravyaṃ naivedyaṃ sarvamucyate ।visarjite jagannāthe nirmālyanbhavati kṣaṇāt ।।namo namaste acyuta me kṣayostu pāpasya vṛddhiṃ samupaitu puṇyaṃ ।aiśvaryavittādi sadākṣayaṃ me kṣayañca mā santatirabhyapaitu ।।yathācyutastvamparataḥ parastāt sa brahmabhūtaḥ parataḥ parātman ।

sarvapāpahamiti ṅa

sarvasāramannamiti kha, ga, gha ca

māsacatuṣṭakamiti kha

naktaṃ naivedyamarpayediti jha

aiśvaryavittādi mahodayaṃ me iti jha
tathācyutaṃ tvaṃ kuru vāñchitaṃ me mayā kṛtampāpaharāprameya ।।acyutānanda govinda prasīda yadabhīpsitaṃ ।akṣayaṃ māmameyātman kuruṣva puruṣottama ।।sapta varṣāṇi sampūjya bhuktimuktimavāpunuyāt ।anantavratamākhyāsye nakṣatravratakerthadaṃ ।।mārgaśīrṣe mṛgaśire gomūtrāśo yajeddhariṃ ।anantaṃ sarvakāmānāmananto bhagavān phalaṃ ।।dadātyanantañca punastadevānyatra janmani ।anantapunyopacayaṅkarotyetanmahāvrataṃ ।।yathābhilaṣitaprāptiṃ karotyakṣayameva ca ।pādādi pūjya nakte tu bhuñjīyāttailavarjitaṃ ।।ghṛtenānantamuddiśya homo māsacatuṣṭayaṃ ।caitrādau śālinā homaḥ payasā śrāvaṇādiṣu ।।māndhātābhūd yuvanāśvādanantavratakāt sutaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nakṣatravratakāni nāma ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

nakṣatravratakāmadamiti kha, ga, cha ca । nakṣatravratake annadamiti gha, ṅa, ña ca

chapter 

ś atha saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

divasavratāni

agnir uvāca
divasavratakaṃ vakṣye hy ādau dhenuvrataṃ vade ।yaścobhayamukhīndadyāt prabhūtakanakānvitāṃ ।।dinaṃ payovratastiṣṭhet sa yāti parasampadaṃ ।tryahaṃ payovrataṃ kṛtvā kāñcanaṃ kalpapādapaṃ ।।datvā brahmapadaṃ yāti kalpavṛkṣapradaṃ smṛtaṃ ।dadyādviṃśat palādūrdhvaṃ mahīṅkṛtvā tu kāñcanīṃ ।।dinaṃ payovratastiṣṭhedrudragaḥ syāddivāvratī ।pakṣe pakṣe trirātrantu bhaktenaikena yaḥ kṣapet ।।vipulaṃ dhanamāpnoti trirātravratakṛddinaṃ ।māse māse trirātrāśī ekabhaktī gaṇeśatāṃ ।।yastrirātravrataṃ kuryāt samuhiśya janārdanaṃ ।kulānāṃ śatamādāya sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ ।।navamyāñca site pakṣe naro mārgaśirasyatha ।prārabheta trirātrāṇāṃ vratantu vidhivad vratī ।।

dadyāt triṃśatpalādūrdhvamiti gha, ja, ña ca

kṣipediti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ña ca

yastrirātraśataṃ kuryāditi ga, gha, ña

mārgaśirasya ceti kha, gha, ja, ña ca
oṃ namo vāsudevāya sahasraṃ vā śataṃ japet ।aṣṭamyāmekabhaktāśī dinatrayamupāvaset ।।dvādaśyāṃ pūjayed viṣṇuṃ kārttike kārayed vrataṃ ।viprān sambhojya vastrāṇi śayanānyāsanāni ca ।।chatropavītapātrāṇi dadet samprārthayeddvijān ।vrato asmin duṣkare cāpi vikalaṃ yadabhūnmama ।।bhavadbhistadanujñātaṃ paripūrṇaṃ bhavatviti ।bhuktabhogo vrajed viṣṇuṃ trirātravratakatratī ।।kārttikavratakaṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradāyakaṃ ।daśamyāṃ pañcagavyāśo ekādaśyāmupoṣitaḥ ।।kārttikasya site abhyarcya viṣṇuṃ devavimānagaḥ ।caitre trirātraṃ naktāśī ajāpañcapradaḥ sukhī ।।trirātraṃ payasaḥ pānamupavāsaparastryahaṃ ।ṣaṣṭhyādi kārttike śukre kṛcchro māhendra ucyate ।।pañcarātraṃ payaḥ pītvā dadhyāhāro hy upoṣitaḥ ।ekādaśyāṃ kārttike tu kṛcchro ayaṃ bhāskarorthadaḥ ।।yavāgūṃ yāvakaṃ śākaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ jalaṃ ।pañcamyādi site pakṣe kṛcchraḥ śāntapanaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahapurāṇe divasavratāni nāma saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

trirātraśatakavrato iti kha, gha, ña ca । trirātraśatakakṛd vrato iti ṅa

kārttikasya site prārcya iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja, ña ca

bhāskaro annada iti kha, ga, gha, ja, ña ca

chapter 

ś athāṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

māsavratāni agnir uvāca
māsavratakamākhyāsye bhuktimuktipradāyakaṃ ।āṣāḍhādicaturmāsamabhyaṅgaṃ varjayet sudhīḥ ।।vaiśākhe puṣpalavaṇantyaktvā godo nṛpo bhavet ।godo māsopavāsī ca bhīmavratakaro hariḥ ।।āṣāḍhādicaturmāsaṃ prātaḥsnāyī ca viṣṇugaḥ ।māghe māsyatha caitre vā guḍadhenuprado bhavet ।।guḍavratastṛtīyāyāṃ gaurīśaḥ syānmahāvratī ।mārgaśīrṣādimāseṣu naktakṛdviṣṇulokabhāk ।।ekabhaktavratī tadvad dvādaśīvratakaṃ pṛṭhak ।phalavratī caturmāsaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā pradāpayet ।।śrāvaṇādicaturmāsaṃ vrataiḥ sarvaṃ labhedvratī ।āṣāḍhasya site pakṣe ekādaśyāmupoṣitaḥ ।।cāturmāsyavratānāntu kurvīta parikalpanaṃ ।āṣāḍhyāñcātha saṅkrāntau karkaṭasya hariṃ yajet ।।idaṃ vrataṃ mayā deva gṛhītaṃ puratastava ।

māse yavāśo ceti kha

bhīmavrataparo haririti ṅa

dvādaśīvratakaṃ paramiti ṅa

āṣāḍhagaṃ vṛṣasaṅkrāntyāṃ karkaṭe ceti jha
