nirvighnāṃ siddhimāyātu prasanne tvayi keśava ।।gṛhīte asmin vrate deva yadyapūrṇe mriye hy ahaṃ ।tanme bhavatu sampūrṇaṃ tvatprasādājjanārdana ।।māṃsādi tyaktvā vipraḥ syāttailatyāgī hariṃ yajet ।ekāntaropavāsī ca trirātraṃ viṣṇulokabhāk ।।cāndrāyaṇī viṣṇulokī maunī syān muktibhājanaṃ ।prājāpatyavratī svargī śaktuyāvakabhakṣakaḥ ।।gugdhādyāhāravān svargī pañcagavyāmbubhktathā ।śākamūlaphalāhārī naro viṣṇupurīṃ vrajet ।।māṃsavarjī yavāhāro rasavarjī hariṃ vrajet ।kaumudavratamākhyāsye āśvine samupoṣitaḥ ।।dvādaśyāṃ pūjayedviṣṇuṃ pralipyābjotpalādibhiḥ ।ghṛtena tilatailena dīpanaivedyamarpayet ।।oṃ namo vāsudevāya mālatyā mālayā yajet ।dharmakāmārthamokṣāṃś ca prāpnuyāt kaumudavratī ।।sarvaṃ labheddhariṃ prārcya māsopavāsakavratī ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe māsavratāni nāma aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

matsyādi tyaktveti kha, gha, cha ca । matsyatyāgī tu iti ṅa

viṣṇupuraṃ vrajediti kha, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś athaikonaśatādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānāvratāni

agnir uvāca
ṛtuvratāntyahaṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradāni te ।indhanāni tu yo dadyādvarṣādicaturo hy ṛtūn ।।ghṛtadhenupradaścānte brāhmaṇo agnivratī bhavet ।kṛtvā maunantu sandhyāyāṃ māsānte ghṛtakumbhadaḥ ।।tilaghaṇṭāvastradātā sukhī sārasvatavratī ।pañcāmṛtena snapanaṃ kṛtvābdaṃ dhenudo nṛpaḥ ।।ekādaśyāntu naktāśī caitre bhaktaṃ nivedayet ।haimaṃ viṣṇoḥ padaṃ yāti māsante viṣṇusadvratī ।।pāyasāśī goyugadaḥ śrībhāgdevīvratī bhavet ।nivedya pitṛdevebhyo yo bhuṅkte sa bhavennṛpaḥ ।।varṣavratāni coktāni saṅkrāntivratakaṃ vade ।saṅkrāntau svargalokī syādrātrijāgaraṇānnaraḥ ।।amāvāsyāṃ tu saṅkrāntau śivārkayajanāttathā ।uttare tvayane cājyaprasthasnānena keśave ।।

sudhīḥ sārasvatavratī iti kha, ga, gha, cha, ṭa ca

sarvavratāni coktānīti kha, cha, ja ca
dvātriṃśatpalamānena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।ghṛtakṣīrādinā snāpya prāpnoti viṣuvādiṣu ।।strīṇāmumāvrataṃ śrīdaṃ tṛtīyāsvaṣṭamīṣu ca ।gaurīṃ maheśvaraṃ cāpi yajet saubhāgyamāpnuyāt ।।umāmaheśvarau prārcya aviyogādi cāpnuyāt ।mūlavratakarī strī ca umeśavratakāriṇī ।।sūryabhaktā tu yā nārī dhruvaṃ sā puruṣo bhavet ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānāvratāni nāma ekonaśatādhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dīpadānavrataṃ

agnnir uvāca
dīpadānavrataṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradāyakaṃ ।devadvijātikagṛhe dīpado abdaṃ sa sarvabhāk ।।caturmāsaṃ viṣṇulokī kārttike svargalokyapi ।dīpadānāt paraṃ nāsti na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ।।dīpenāyuṣyacakṣuṣmāndīpāllakṣmīsutādikaṃ ।saubhāgyaṃ dīpadaḥ prāpya svargaloke nahīyate ।।vidarbharājaduhitā lalitā dīpadātmabhāk ।

cārudharmakṣmāpapatnī śatabhāryādhikābhavat ।।dadau dīpasahasraṃ sā viṣṇorāyatane satī ।
pṛṣṭā sā dīpamāhātmyaṃ sapatnībhya uvāca ha ।।

lalitovāca
sauvīrarājasya purā maitreyo abhūt purohitaḥ ।tena cāyatanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kāritaṃ devikātaṭe ।।kārttike dīpakastena dattaḥ samprerito mayā ।vaktraprāntena naśyantyā mārjārasya tadā bhayāt ।।nirvāṇavān pradīpto abhūdvartyā mūṣikayā tadā ।mṛtā rājātmajā jātā rājapatnī śatādhikā ।।asaṅkalpitamapyasya preraṇaṃ yat kṛtaṃ mayā ।viṣṇāyatanadīpasya tasyedaṃ bhujyate phalaṃ ।।jātismarā hy ato dīpān prayacchāmi tvahar niśaṃ ।ekadaśyāṃ dīpado vai vimāne divi modate ।।jāyate dīpahartā tu mūko vā jaḍa eva ca ।andhe tamasi duṣpāre narake patate kila ।।vikrośamānāṃś ca narān yamakiṅkarāhatān ।vilāpair alamatrāpi kiṃ vo vilapite phalaṃ ।।yadā pramādibhiḥ pūrvamatyantasamupekṣitaḥ ।janturjanmasahasrebhyo hy ekasmin mānuṣo yadi ।।tatrāpyativimūḍhātmā kiṃ bhogānabhidhāvati ।svahitaṃ viṣayāsvādaiḥ krandanaṃ tadihāgataṃ ।।

harṣitamiti kha, ga, gha ca । dūṣitamiti ṅa
bhujyate ca kṛtaṃ pūrvametat kiṃ vo na cintitaṃ ।parastrīṣu kucābhyaṅgaṃ prītaye duḥkhadaṃ hi vaḥ ।।muhūrtaviṣayāsvādo anekakoṭyavdaduḥkhadaḥ ।parastrīhāriyadgītaṃ hā mātaḥ kiṃ vilapyate ।।ko atibhāro harernāmni jihvayā parikīrtane ।vartitaile alpamūlye api yadagnirlabhyate sadā ।।dānāśaktair harerdīpo hṛtastadvo asti duḥkhadaṃ ।idānīṃ kiṃ vilāpena sahadhvaṃ yadupāgataṃ ।।
agnir uvāca
lalitoktañca tāḥ śrutvā dīpadānāddivaṃ yayuḥ ।tasmāddīpapradānena vratānāmadhikaṃ phalaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dīpadānavrataṃ nāma dviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

navavyūhārcanaṃ

agnir uvāca
navavyūhārcanaṃ vakṣye nāradāya harīritaṃ ।maṇḍale abje arcayenmadhye avījaṃ vāsudevakaṃ ।।āvījañca saṅkarṣaṇam pradyumnaṃ ca dakṣiṇe ।

aḥ anuruddhaṃ naiṛte oṃ nārāyaṇamapsu ca ।।tat sadbrahmāṇamanile huṃ viṣṇuṃ kṣauṃ nṛsiṃhakaṃ ।uttare bhūrvarāhañca īśe dvāri ca paścime ।।kaṃ ṭaṃ saṃ śaṃ garutmantaṃ pūrvavaktrañca dakṣiṇe ।khaṃ chaṃ vaṃ huṃ phaḍiti ca khaṃ ṭhaṃ phaṃ śaṃ gadāṃvidhau ।।baṃ ṇaṃ maṃ kṣaṃ koṇeśañca ghaṃ daṃ bhaṃ haṃśriyaṃ yajet ।dakṣiṇe cottare puṣṭiṃ gaṃ ḍaṃ baṃ śaṃ svavījakaṃ ।।pīṭhasya paścime dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāñca paścime ।śrīvatsaṃ caiva saṃ haṃ laṃ chaṃ taṃ yaṃ kaustubhaṃ jale ।।daśamāṅgakramādviṣṇornamo anantamadho arcayet ।daśāṅgādimahendrādīn pūrvādau caturo ghaṭān ।।toraṇāni vitānaṃ ca agnyanilenduvījakaiḥ ।maṇḍalāni kramāddhyātvā tanuṃ vandya tataḥ plavet ।।amvarasthaṃ tato dhyātvā sūkṣmarūpamathātmanaḥ ।sitāmṛte nimagnañca candravimvāt srutena ca ।।tadeva cātmano vījamamṛtaṃ plavasaṃskṛtaṃ ।utpādyamānaṃ puruṣamātmānamupakalpayet ।।utpanno asmi svayaṃ viṣṇurvījaṃ dvādaśakaṃ nyaset ।hṛcchirastu śikhā caiva kavacaṃ cāstrameva ca ।।vakṣomūrdhaśikhāpṛṣṭhalocaneṣu nyaseta punaḥ ।astraṃ karadvaye nyasya tato divyatanurbhavet ।।

krūṃ viṣṇuṃ kṣauṃ nṛsiṃhakamiti kha, cha, ja ca

pakṣirājañca dakṣiṇe iti ṅa

sitāsite nimagnañceti kha, ja ca
yathātmani tathā deve śiṣyadehe nyasettathā ।anirmālyā smṛtā pūjā yaddhareḥ pūjanaṃ hṛdi ।।sanirmālyā maṇḍalādau baddhanetrāś ca śiṣyakāḥ ।puṣpaṃ kṣipeyuryanmūrtau tasya tannāma kārayet ।।niveśya vāmataḥ śiṣyāṃstilavrīhighṛtaṃ hunet ।śatamaṣṭottaraṃ hutvā sahasraṃ kāyaśuddhaye ।।navavyūhasya mūrtīnāmaṅgānāṃ ca śatādhikaṃ ।pūṛṇāndattvā dīkṣayettān guruḥ pūjyaś ca tair dhanaiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe navavyūhārcanaṃ nāma ekādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

puṣpādhyāyakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
puṣpagandhadhūpadīpanaivedyaistuṣyate hariḥ ।puṣpāṇi devayogyāni hy ayogyāni vadāmi te ।।puṣpaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mālatī ca tamālo bhuktimuktimān ।mallikā sarvapāpaghnī yūthikā viṣṇulokadā ।।atimuktamayaṃ tadvat pāṭalā viṣṇulokadā ।

karavīrair viṣṇulokī javāpuṣpaiś ca puṇyavān ।।pāvantīkubjakādyaiś ca tagarair viṣṇulokabhāk ।karṇikārair viṣṇulokaḥ karuṇṭhaiḥ pāpanāśanaṃ ।।padmaiś ca ketakībhiś ca kundapuṣpaiḥ parā gatiḥ ।vāṇapuṣpair varvarābhiḥ kṛṣṇābhirharilokabhāk ।।aśokaistilakaistadvadaṭarūṣabhavais tathā ।muktibhāgī bilvapatraiḥ śamīpatraiḥ parā gatiḥ ।।viṣṇulokī bhṛṅgarājaistamālasya dalais tathā ।tulasī kṛṣṇagaurākhyā kalhārotpalakāni ca ।।padmaṃ kokanadaṃ puṇyaṃ śatābjamālayā hariḥ ।nīpārjunakadambaiś ca vakulaiś ca sugandhibhiḥ ।।kiṃśukair munipuṣpaistu gokarṇair nāgakarṇakaiḥ ।sandhyāpuṣpair bilvatakai rañjanīketakībhavaiḥ ।।kuṣmāṇḍatimirotthaiś ca kuśakāśaśarodbhavaiḥ ।dyūtādibhirmaruvakaiḥ patrairanyaiḥ sugandhikaiḥ ।।bhuktimuktiḥ pāpahānirbhaktyā sarvaistu tuṣyati ।svarṇalakṣādhikaṃ puṣpaṃ mālā koṭiguṇādhikā ।।svavane anyavane puṣpaistriguṇaṃ vanajaiḥ phalaṃ ।viśīrṇairnārcayedviṣṇunnādhikāṅgairna moṭitaiḥ ।।kāñcanāraistathonmattairgirikarṇikayā tathā ।

muktibhāgo kadambaiśceti ṅa

rajanīketakībhavairiti kha, ṅa, cha, ja ca

jalajaiḥ phalamiti ṅa
kuṭajaiḥ śālmalīyaiś ca śirīṣair narakādikaṃ ।।sugandhairbrahmapadmaiś ca puṣpairnīlotpalairhariḥ ।arkamandāradhustūrakusumairarcyate haraḥ ।।kuṭajaiḥ karkaṭīpuṣpaiḥ ketakīnna śive dadet ।kuṣmāṇḍanimbasambhūtaṃ paiśācaṃ gandhavarjitaṃ ।।ahiṃsā indriyajayaḥ kṣāntirjñānaṃ dayā śrutaṃ ।bhāvāṣtapuṣpaiḥ sampūjya devān syād bhuktimuktibhāk ।।ahiṃsā prathamaṃ puṣpaṃ puṣpamindriyanigrahaḥ ।sarvapuṣpaṃ dayā bhūte puṣpaṃ śāntirviśiṣyate ।।śamaḥ puṣpaṃ tapaḥ puṣpaṃ dhyānaṃ puṣpaṃ casaptamaṃ ।satyañcaivāṣṭamaṃ puṣpametaistuṣyati keśavaḥ ।।etairevāṣṭabhiḥ puṣpaistuṣyatyevārcito hariḥ ।puṣpāntarāṇi santyatra vāhyāni manujottama ।।bhaktyā dayānvitairviṣṇuḥ pūjitaḥ parituṣyati ।vāruṇaṃ salilaṃ puṣpaṃ saumyaṃ ghṛtapayodadhi ।।prājāpatyaṃ tathānnādi āgneyaṃ dhūpadīpakaṃ ।phalapuṣpādikañcaiva vānaspatyantu pañcamaṃ ।।pārthivaṃ kuśamūlādyaṃ vāyavyaṃ gandhacandanaṃ ।

śālmalijaiśceti kha, ga, ṅa ca

sugandhaiḥ patrapuṣpaiśceti ṅa

pūjyo nīlotpalairhaririti kha, ga, ṅa, ja ca

ahiṃsā indriyayayama iti ga

kṣāntirdānamiti kha

ahiṃsā prathamaṃ puṣpamityādiḥ, pūjitaḥ parituṣyati ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja, ña, ṭa pustakeṣu nāsti
śraddhākhyaṃ viṣṇupuṣpañca sarvadā cāṣṭapuṣpikāḥ ।।āsanaṃ mūrtipañcāṅgaṃ viṣṇurvā cāṣṭapuṣpikāḥ ।viṣṇostu vāsudevādyairīśānādyaiḥ śivasya vā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe puṣpādhyāyo nāma dvyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha tryadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

narakasvarūpam

agnir uvāca
puṣpādyaiḥ pūjanādviṣṇor na yāti narakāndave ।āyuṣo ante naraḥ prāṇairanicchannapi mucyate ।।jalamagnirviṣaṃ śastraṃ kṣudvyādhiḥ patanaṃ gireḥ ।nimittaṃ kiñcidāsādya dehī prāṇairvimucyate ।।anyaccharīramādatte yātanīyaṃ svakarmabhiḥ ।bhuṅkte atha pāpakṛt duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ dharmāya saṅgataḥ ।।nīyate yamadūtaistu yamaṃ prāṇibhayaṅkaraiḥ ।kupathe dakṣiṇadvāri dharmikaḥ paścimādibhiḥ ।।yamājñaptaiḥ kiṅkaraistu pātyate narakeṣu ca ।

āsanaṃ mūrtiṣoḍhāṅgamiti kha

pātyate narakeṣvapi iti kha । pātyate narake sadā iti ṅa ।pīḍyate narake adhuneti gha, cha ca
svarge tu nīyate dharmād vasiṣṭhādyuktisaṃśrayāt ।।goghātī tu mahāvīcyāṃ varṣalakṣantu pīḍyate ।āmakumbhe mahādīpte brahmahā bhūmihārakaḥ ।।mahāpralayakaṃ yāvadraurave pīḍyate śanaiḥ ।strībālavṛddhahantā tu yāvadindrāś caturdaśa ।।mahārauravake raudre gṛhakṣetrādidīpakaḥ ।dahyate kalpamekaṃ sa caurastāmisrake patet ।।naikakalpantu śūlādyairbhidyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ ।mahātāmisrake sarpajalaukādyaiś ca pīḍyate ।।yāvadbhūmirmātṛhādyā asipatravane asibhiḥ ।naikakalpantu narake karambhavālukāsu ca ।।yena dagdho janastatra dahyate vālukādibhiḥ ।kākole kṛmiviṣṭhāśī ekākī miṣṭabhojanaḥ ।।kuṭṭale mūtraraktāśī pañcayajñakriyojjhitaḥ ।sudurgandhe raktabhojī bhaveccābhakṣyabhakṣyakaḥ ।।tailapāke tu tilavat pīḍyate parapīḍakaḥ ।tailapāke tu pacyeta śaraṇāgataghātakaḥ ।।nirucchāse dānanāśī rasavikrayako adhvare ।nāmnā vajrakavāṭena mahāpāte tadānṛtī ।।mahājvāle pāpabuddhiḥ krakace agamyagāminaḥ ।saṅkarī guḍapāke ca pratudet paramarmanut ।।

asipatravane agnibhiriti ṅa

gurupāke ceti kha, ja ca
kṣārahrade prāṇihantā kṣuradhāre ca bhūmihṛt ।ambarīṣe gosvarṇahṛd drumacchidvajraśastrake ।।madhuhartā parītāpe kālasūtre parārthahṛt ।kaśmale atyantamāṃsāśī ugragandhe hy apiṇḍadaḥ ।।durdhare tu kācabhakṣī vandigrāharatāś ca ye ।mañjuṣe narake lohe apratiṣṭhe śrutinindakaḥ ।।pūtivaktre kūṭasākṣī pariluṇṭhe dhanāpahā ।bālastrīvṛddhaghātī ca karāle brāhmaṇārtikṛt ।।vilepe madyapo vipro mahātāmre tu medinaḥ ।।tathākramya pāradārān jvalantīmāyasīṃ śilāṃ ।śālmalākhye tamāliṅgen nārī bahunaraṅgamā ।।āsphoṭajihvoddharaṇaṃ strīkṣaṇān netrabhedanaṃ ।aṅgārarāśau kṣipyante mātṛputryādigāminaḥ ।।caurāḥ kṣuraiś ca bhidyante svamāṃsāśī ca māṃsabhuk ।māsopavāsakartā vai na yāti narakannaraḥ ।।ekādaśīvratakaro bhīṣmapañcakasad vratī ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe narakasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma tryadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

kṣārakūpe iti kha, cha ca

mahāprete tu bhedana iti kha, ga, gha, ḍa, cha, ja ca

chapter 

ś atha caturadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

māsopavāsavrataṃ

agnir uvāca
vrataṃ māsopavāsañca sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ vadāmi te ।kṛtvā tu vaiṣṇavaṃ yajñaṃ gurorājñāmavāpya ca ।।kṛcchrādyaiḥ svabalaṃ buddhvā kuryān māsopavāsakaṃ ।vānaprastho yatirvātha nārī vā vidhavā mune ।।āśvinasyāmale pakṣe ekādaśyāmupoṣitaḥ ।vratametattu gṛhṇīyādyāvattriṃśaddināni tu ।।adyaprabhṛtyahaṃ viṣṇo yāvadutthānakantava ।arcayetvāmanaśnan hi yāvat triṃśaddināni tu ।।kārttikāśvinayorviṣṇoryāvadutthānakantava ।mriye yadyantarāle ahaṃ vratabhaṅgo na me bhavet ।।trikālaṃ pūjayedviṣṇuṃ triḥsnāto gandhapuṣpakaiḥ ।viṣṇorgītādikaṃ japyandhyānaṃ kuryād vratī naraḥ ।।vṛthāvādampariharedarthākāṅkṣāṃ vivarjayet ।nāvratasthaṃ spṛśet kañcidvikarmasthānna cālayet ।।

vrataṃ māsopavāsākhyamiti gha, ja ca

annākāṅkṣāṃ vivarjayediti gha, ṅa ca
devatāyatane tiṣṭhedyāvat triṃśaddināni tu ।dvādaśyāṃ pūjayitvā tu bhojayitvā dvijānvratī ।।samāpya dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā pāraṇantu samācaret ।bhuktimuktimavāpnoti kalpāṃś caiva trayodaśa ।।kārayedvaiṣṇavaṃ yajñaṃ yajedviprāṃstrayodaśa ।tāvanti vastrayugmāni bhājanānyāsanāni ca ।।chatrāṇi sapavitrāṇi tathopānadyugāni ca ।yogapaṭṭopavītāni dadyādviprāya tairmataḥ ।।anyaviprāya śayyāyāṃ haimaṃ viṣṇuṃ prapūjya ca ।ātmanaś ca tathāmūrtiṃ vastrādyaiś ca prapūjayet ।।sarvapāpavinirmukto vipro viṣṇuprasādataḥ ।viṣṇulokaṃ gamiṣyāmi viṣṇureva bhavāmyahaṃ ।।vraja vraja devabuddhe viṣṇoḥ sthānamanāmayaṃ ।vimānenāmalastatra tiṣṭhed viṣṇusvarūpadhṛk ।।dvijānuktvātha tāṃ śayyāṃ gurave atha nivedayet ।kulānāṃ śatamuddhṛtya viṣṇulokannayed vratī ।।māsopavāsī yaddeśe sa deśo nirmalo bhavet ।kiṃ punastatkulaṃ sarvaṃ yatra māsopavāsakṛt ।।vratasthaṃ mūrchitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣīrājyañcaiva pāyayet ।naite vrataṃ vinighranti havirviprānumoditaṃ ।।

tataḥ pānayutāni ceti kha

vai nata iti gha

dvijān natvātheti ṅa
kṣīraṃ gurorhitauṣadhva āpo mūlaphalāni ca ।
viṣṇurmahauṣadhaṃ kartā vratamasmāt samuddharet ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe māsopavāsavrataṃ nāma caturadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

bhīṣmapañcakavrataṃ

agnir uvāca
bhīṣmapañcakamākhyāsye vratarājantu sarvadaṃ ।kārttikasyāmale pakṣe ekādaśyāṃ samacaret ।।dināni pañcatriḥsnātī pañcavrīhitilais tathā ।tarpayeddevapitrādīn maunī sampūjayeddhariṃ ।।pañcagavyena saṃsnāpya devaṃ pañcāmṛtena ca ।candanādyaiḥ samālipya gugguluṃ saghṛtandahet ।।dīpaṃ dadyāddivārātrau naivedyaṃ paramānnakaṃ ।oṃ namo vāsudevāya japedaṣṭottaraṃ śataṃ ।।

yavavrīhitilaistatheti gha, ṅa, cha, ja ca
juhuyācca ghṛtābhyaktāṃstilavrīhīṃstato vratī ।ṣaḍakṣareṇa mantreṇa svāhākārānvitena ca ।।kamalaiḥ pūjayet pādau dvitīye bilvapatrakaiḥ ।jānu sakthi tṛtīye atha nābhiṃ bhṛṅgarajena tu ।।vāṇabilvajavābhistu caturthe pañcame ahani ।mālatyā bhūmiśāyī syādekādaśyāntu gomayaṃ ।।gomūtraṃ dadhi dugdhaṃ ca pañcame pañcagavyakaṃ ।paurṇamāsyāñcarennaktaṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ labhedvratī ।।bhīṣmaḥ kṛtvā hariṃ prāptastenaiva bhīṣmapañcakaṃ ।brāhmaṇaḥ pūjanādyaiś ca upavāsādikaṃ vrataṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe bhīṣmapañcakaṃ nāma pañcādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

agastyārghyadānakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
agastyo bhagavānviṣṇustamabhyarcyāpnuyāddhariṃ ।aprāpte bhāskare kanyāṃ satribhāgaistribhirdinaiḥ ।।

hariṃ lebhe tenaitaditi ga । hariṃ prāpa tenaitaditi ṅa । hariṃ prāptastenaitaditi ja, ṭa ca pūjanātpañca upavāsādajavratamiti ga, gha, ṅa, ja, ña, ḍa ca
arghyaṃ dadyādagastyāya pūjayitvā hy upoṣitaḥ ।kāśapuṣpamayīṃ mūrtiṃ pradoṣe vinyased ghaṭe ।।muneryajettāṃ kumbhasthāṃ rātrau kuryāt prajāgaraṃ ।agastya miniśārdūla tejorāśe mahāmate ।।imāṃ mama kṛtāṃ pūjāṃ gṛhṇīṣva priyayā saha ।āvāhyārghye ca sammukhyaṃ prārcayeccandanādinā ।।jalāśayasamīpe tu prātarnītvārghyamarpayet ।kāśapuṣpapratīkāśa agnimārutasambhava ।।mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putra kumbhayone namo astu te ।ātāpirbhakṣito yena vātāpiś ca mahāsuraḥ ।।samudraḥ śoṣito yena so agastyaḥ sammukho astu me ।agastiṃ prārthayiṣyāmi karmaṇā manasā girā ।।arcayisyāmyahaṃ maitraṃ paralokābhikāṅkṣayā ।dvīpāntarasamutpannaṃ devānāṃ paramaṃ priyaṃ ।।rājānaṃ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ candanaṃ pratigṛhyatāṃ ।dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ bhājanī pāpanāśanī ।।saubhāgyārogyalakṣmīdā puṣpamālā pragṛhyatāṃ ।dhūpo ayaṃ gṛhyatāṃ deva bhaktiṃ me hy acalāṅkuru ।।īpsitaṃ me varaṃ dehi paratra ca śubhāṅgatiṃ ।surāsurairmuniśreṣṭha sarvakāmaphalaprada ।।

tejorāśe mahādyute iti ga, gha, cha, ja, jha, ña, ṭa ca ।tejorāśe jagatpate iti ṅa
vahnimārutasambhaveti jha

candanaṃ me pragṛhyanāmiti ja, ña ca
vastravrīhiphalairhemnā dattastvarghyo hy ayaṃ mayā ।agastyaṃ bodhayiṣyāmi yanmayā manasoddhṛtaṃ ।।phalairarghyaṃ pradāsyāmi gṛhāṇārghyaṃ mahāmune ।agastya evaṃ khanamānaḥ khanitraiḥ prajāmapatyaṃbalamīhamānaḥ ।ubhau karṇāvṛṣirugratejāḥ pupoṣa satyā deveṣvāśiṣojagāma ।।rājaputri namastubhyaṃ munipatnī mahāvrate ।arghyaṃ gṛhṇīṣva deveśi lopāmudre yaśasvini ।।pañcaratnasamāyuktaṃ hemarūpyasamanvitaṃ ।saptadhānyavṛtaṃ pātraṃ dadhicandanasaṃyutaṃ ।।arghyaṃ dadyādagastyāya strīśūdrāṇāmavaidikaṃ ।agastya muniśārdūla tejorāśe ca sarvada ।।imāṃ mama kṛtāṃ pūjāṃ gṛhītvā vraja śāntaye ।tyajedagastryamuddiśya dhānyamekaṃ phalaṃ rasaṃ ।।tato annaṃ bhojayedviprān ghṛtapāyasamodakān ।gāṃ vāsāṃsi suvarṇañca tebhyo dadyācca dakṣiṇāṃ ।।ghṛtapāyasayuktena pātreṇācchāditānanaṃ ।sahiraṇyañca taṃ kumbhaṃ brāhmaṇāyopakalpayet ।।

dattastvarghyo akṣaya iti ṅa

manasepsitamiti ga, gha, jha ca । manasehitamiti ṅa

saptadhānyayutamiti ja

pratimāñca suvarṇañceti ka

brāhmaṇāyopapādayediti gha, ṅa, ja, ña ca
saptavarṣāṇi datvārghyaṃ sarve sarvamavāpnuyuḥ ।nīrā putrāṃś ca saubhāgyaṃ patiṃ kanyā nṛpodbhavaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe agastyārghyadānavrataṃ nāma ṣaḍadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kaumudavrataṃ

agnir uvāca
kaumudākhyaṃ mayoktañca caredāśvayuje site ।hariṃ yajet māsamekamekādaśyāmupoṣitaḥ ।।āśvine śuklapakṣehamekāhārī hariṃ japan ।māsamekaṃ bhuktimuktyai kariṣye kaumudaṃ vrataṃ ।।upoṣya viṣṇuṃ dvādaśyāṃ yajeddevaṃ vilipya ca ।candanāgurukāśmīraiḥ kamalotpalapuṣpakaiḥ ।।kalhārairvātha mālatyā dīpaṃ tailena vāgyataḥ ।ahorātraṃ ca naivedyaṃ pāyasāpūpamodakaiḥ ।।oṃ namo vāsudevāya vijñāpyātha kṣamāpayet ।

bhojanādi dvije dadyādyāvad devaḥ prabuddhyate ।।tāvanmāsopavāsaḥ syādadhikaṃ phalamapyataḥ ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe kaumudavrataṃ nāma saptādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vratadānādisamuccayaḥ

agnir uvāca
vratadānāni sāmānyaṃ pravadāmi samāsataḥ ।tithau pratipadādau ca sūryādau kṛttikāsu ca ।।viṣkambhādau ca meṣādau kāle ca grahaṇādike ।yat kāle yad vrataṃ dānaṃ yad dravyaṃ niyamādi yat ।।tad dravyākhyañca kālākhyaṃ sarvaṃ vai viṣṇudaivataṃ ।ravīśabrahmalakṣmyādyāḥ sarve viṣṇorvibhūtayaḥ ।।tamuddiśya vrataṃ dānaṃ pūjādi syāttu sarvadaṃ ।jagatpate samāgaccha āsanaṃ pādyamarghyakaṃ ।।madhuparkaṃ tathācāmaṃ snānaṃ vastañca gandhakaṃ ।

bhojanāni iti ga, ja ca

ravīśabrahmalokeśā iti ja
puṣpaṃ dhūpaś ca dīpaś ca naivedyādi namo astu te ।।iti pūjāvrate dāne dānavākyaṃ samaṃ śṛṇu ।adyāmukasagotrāya viprāyāmukaśarmaṇe ।।etad dravyaṃ viṣṇudaivaṃ sarvapāpopaśāntaye।āyurārogyavṛddhyarthaṃ saubhāgyādivivṛddhaye ।।gotrasantativṛddhyarthaṃ vijayāya dhanāya ca ।dharmāyaiśvaryakāmāya tatpāpaśamanāya ca ।।saṃsāramuktaye dānantubhyaṃ sampradade hy ahaṃ ।etaddānapratiṣṭhārthaṃ tubhyametad dadāmyahaṃ ।।etena prīyatāṃ nityaṃ sarvalokapatiḥ prabhuḥ ।yajñadānavratapate vidyākīrtyādi dehi me ।।dharmakāmārthamokṣāṃś ca dehi me manasepsitaṃ ।yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyānnityaṃ vratadānasamuccayaṃ ।।sa prāptakāmo vimalo bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।tithivārarkṣasaṅkrāntiyogamanvādikaṃ vrataṃ ।।naikadhā vāsudevāderniyamāt pūjanādbhavet ।
e ity āgenye mahāpurāṇe vratadānasamuccayo nāma aṣṭādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

saubhāgyāya suṣṭadvaye iti ka, cha, ṭa, ca । saubhāgyāya subuddhaye iti gha, ja, ña ca

chapter 

ś atha navādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dānaparibhāṣākathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
dānadharmān pravakṣyāmi bhuktimuktidān śṛṇu ।dānamiṣṭaṃ tathā pūrtaṃ dharmaṃ kurvan hi sarvabhāk ।।vāpīkūpataḍāgāni devatāyatanāni ca ।annapradānamārāmāḥ pūrtaṃ dharmaṃ ca muktidaṃ ।।agnihotraṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ vedānāñcānupālanaṃ ।ātithyaṃ vaiśvadevañca prāhuriṣṭañca nākadaṃ ।।grahoparāge yaddānaṃ sūryasaṅkramaṇeṣu ca ।dvādaśyādau ca yaddānaṃ pūrtaṃ tadapi nākadaṃ ।।deśe kāle ca pātre ca dānaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet ।ayane viṣuve puṇye vyatīpāte dinakṣaye ।।yugādiṣu ca saṅkrāntau caturdaśyaṣṭamīṣu ca ।sitapañcadaśīsarvadvādaśīṣvaṣṭakāsu ca ।।yajñotsavavibāheṣu tathā manvantarādiṣu ।vaidhṛte dṛṣṭaduḥkhapne dravyabrāhmaṇalābhataḥ ।।śraddhā vā yaddine tatra sadā vā dānamiṣyate ।ayane dve vipuve dve catasraḥ ṣaḍaśītayaḥ ।।catasro viṣṇupadyaś ca saṅkrātyo dvādaśottamāḥ ।

kanyāyāṃ mithune mīne dhanuṣyapi ravergatiḥ ।।ṣaḍaśītimukhāḥ proktāḥ ṣaḍaśītiguṇāḥ phalaiḥ ।atītānāgate puṇye dve udagdakṣiṇāyane ।।triṃśat karkaṭake nāḍyo makare viṃśatiḥ smṛtāḥ ।vartamāne tulāmeṣe nāḍyāstubhayato daśa ।।ṣaḍaśītyāṃ vyatītāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiruktāstu nāḍikāḥ ।puṇyākhyā viṣṇupādyāñca prākpaścādapi ṣoḍaśa ।।śravaṇāśvidhaniṣṭhāsu nāgadaivatamastake ।yadā syādravivāreṇa vyatīpātaḥ sa ucyate ।।navamyāṃ śuklapakṣasya kārttike niragāt kṛtaṃ ।tretā sitatṛtīyāyāṃ vaiśākhe dvāparaṃ yugaṃ ।।darśe vai māghamāsasya trayodaśyāṃ nabhasyake ।kṛṣṇe kaliṃ vijānīyāj jñeyā manvantarādayaḥ ।।aśvayukacchuklanavamī dvādaśī kārttike tathā ।tṛtīyā caiva māghasya tathā bhādrapadasya ca ।।phālgunasyāpyamāvāsyā pauṣasyaikādaśī tathā ।āṣāḍhasyāpi daśamī māghamāsasya saptamī ।।āvāṇe cāṣṭamī kṛṣṇā tathāṣāḍhe ca pūrṇimā ।kārttike phālgune tadvaj jyaiṣṭhe pañcadaśī tathā ।।ūrdhve caivāgrahāyaṇyā aṣtakāstisra īritāḥ ।aṣṭakākhyā cāṣṭamī syādāsu dānāni cākṣyayaṃ ।।

syādatreti ga, gha, ja, ña ca
gayāgaṅgāprayāgādau tīrthe devālayādiṣu ।aprārthitāni dānāni vidyārthaṃ kanyakā na hi ।।dadyāt pūrvamukho dānaṃ gṛhṇīyāduttarāmukhaḥ ।āyurvivardhate dāturgrahītuḥ kṣīyate na tat ।।nāma gotraṃ samuccārya sampradānasya cātmanaḥ ।sampradeyaṃ prayacchanti kanyādāne punastrayaṃ ।।snātvābhyarcya vyāhṛtibhirdadyāddānantu sodakaṃ ।kanakāśvatilā nāgā dāsīrathamahīgṛhāḥ ।।kanyā ca kapilā dhenurmahādānāni vai daśa ।śrutaśauryatapaḥkanyāyājyaśiṣyādupagataṃ ।।śulkaṃ dhanaṃ hi sakalaṃ śulkaṃ śilpānuvṛttitaḥ ।kuśīdakṛṣivāṇijyaprāptaṃ yadupakārataḥ ।।pāśakadyūtacauryādipratirūpakasāhasaiḥ ।vyājenopāvarjitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ trividhaṃ trividhaṃ phalaṃ ।।adhyagnyadhyāvāhanikaṃ dattañca prītikarmaṇi ।bhrātṛmātṛpitṛprāptaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ strīdhanaṃsmṛtaṃ ।।brahmakṣatraviśāṃ dravyaṃ śūdrasyaiṣāmanugrahāt ।bahubhyo na pradeyāni gaurgṛhaṃ śayanaṃ stryiyaḥ ।।kulānāntu śataṃ hanyādaprayacchan pratiśrutaṃ ।devānāñca gurūṇāñca mātāpitrostathaiva ca ।।puṇyaṃ deyaṃ prayatnena yat puṇyañcārjitaṃ kvacit ।

kuśodetyādiḥ strīdhanaṃ smṛtamityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti
pratilābhecchayā dattaṃ yaddhanaṃ tadapārthakaṃ ।।śraddhayā sādhyate dharmo dattaṃ vāryapi cākṣayaṃ ।jñānaśīlaguṇopetaḥ parapīḍāvahiṣkṛtaḥ ।।ajñānāṃ pālanāttrāṇāttat pātraṃ paramaṃ smṛtaṃ ।mātuḥ śataguṇaṃ dānaṃ sahasraṃ piturucyate ।।anantaṃ duhiturdānaṃ sodarye dattamakṣayaṃ ।amanuṣye samaṃ dānaṃ pāpe jñeyaṃ mahāphalaṃ ।।varṇasaṅkare dviguṇaṃ śūdre dānaṃ caturguṇaṃ ।vaiśye cāṣṭaguṇaṃ kṣatre ṣoḍaśatvaṃ dvijavruve ।।vedādhyāye śataguṇamantaṃ vedabodhake ।purohite yājakādau dānamakṣayamucyate ।।śrīvihīneṣu yaddattaṃ tadanantaṃ ca yajavani ।atapasvyanadhīyānaḥ pratigraharucirdvijaḥ ।।ambhasyaśmaplavenaiva saha tenaiva majjati ।snātaḥ samyagupaspṛśya gṛhṇīyāt prayataḥ śuciḥ ।।pratigrahītā sāvitrīṃ sarvadaiva prakīrtayet ।tatastu kīrtayetsārdhaṃ dravyeṇa saha daivataṃ ।।pratigrāhī paṭheduccaiḥ pratigṛhya dvijottamāt ।mandaṃ paṭhet kṣatriyāttu upāṃśu ca tathā viśaḥ ।।

brahmabodhake iti gha, ṅa, ja, ña, ṭa ca

purohite yācakādāviti kha, cha, ṭa ca

sarvatraiva prakīrtayediti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ja, ña, ṭa ca
manasā ca tathā śūdrāt svastivācanakaṃ tathā ।abhayaṃ sarvadaivatyaṃ bhūmirvai viṣṇudevatā ।।kanyā dāsas tathā dāsī prājāpatyāḥ prakirtitāḥ ।prājāpatyo gajaḥ proktasturago yamadaivataḥ ।।tathā caikaśaphaṃ sarvaṃ yāmyaś ca mahiṣas tathā ।uṣṭraś ca nairṛto dhenū raudrī chāgo analas tathā ।।āpyo meṣo hariḥ krīḍa āraṇyāḥ paśavo anilāḥ ।jalāśayaṃ vāruṇaṃ syādvāridhānīghaṭādayaḥ ।।samudrajāni ratnāni hemalauhāni cānalaḥ ।prājāpatyāni śasyāni pakvānnamapi sattama ।।gāndharvaṃ gandhamityāhurvastraṃ vārhaspataṃ smṛtaṃ ।vāyavyāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ sarve vidyā brāhmī tathāṅgakaṃ ।।sārasvataṃ pustakādi viśvakarmā tu śilapke ।vanaspatirdrumādīnāṃ dravyadevā harestanuḥ ।।chatraṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ śayyā ratha āsanameva ca ।upānahau tathā yānamuttānāṅgira īritaṃ ।।raṇopakaraṇaṃ śastraṃ dhvajādyaṃ sarvadaivataṃ ।gṛhañca sarvadaivatyaṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣṇudevatā ।।śivo vā na tato dravyaṃ vyatiriktaṃ yato asti hi ।dravyasya nāma gṛhṇīyāddadānīti tathā vadet ।।toyaṃ dadyāttato haste dāne vidhirayaṃ smṛtaḥ ।

yātotra hīti ja
viṣṇurdātā viṣṇurdravyaṃ pratigṛhṇāmi vai vadet ।।svasti pratigrahaṃ dharmaṃ bhuktimuktī phaladvayaṃ ।gurūn bhṛtyānna jihīrṣurarciṣyan devatāḥ pitṝn ।।sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyānna tu tṛpyet svayantataḥ ।śūdrīyanna tu yajñārthaṃ dhanaṃ śūdrasya tatphalaṃ ।।guḍatakrarasādyāś ca śūdrādgrāhyā nivartinā ।sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyādavṛtyākarṣito dvijaḥ ।।nādhyāpanādyājanādvā garhitādvā pratigrahāt ।doṣo bhavati viprāṇāṃ jvalanārkasamā hi te ।।kṛte tu dīyate gatvā tretāsvānīya dīyate ।dvāpāre yācamānāya kalau tvanugamānvite ।।manasā pātramuddiśya jalaṃ bhūmau vinikṣipet ।vidyate sāgarasyānto nānto dānasya vidyate ।।adya somārkagrahaṇasaṅkrāntyādau ca kālake ।gaṅgāgayāprayāgādau tīrthadeśe mahāguṇe ।।tathā cāmukagotrāya tathā cāmukaśarmaṇe ।vedavedāṅgayuktāya pātrāya sumahātmane ।।yathānāma mahādravyaṃ viṣṇurudrādidaivataṃ ।putrapautragṛhaiśvaryapatnīdharmārthasadguṇā ।।kīttividyāmahākāmasaubhāgyārogyavṛddhaye ।sarvapāpopaśāntyarthaṃ svargārthaṃ bhuktimuktaye ।।

na taddānasya vidyate iti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja, ña, ṭha ca
etattubhyaṃ sampradade prīyatāṃ me hariḥ śivaḥ ।divyāntarīkṣabhaumādisamutpātaughaghātakṛt ।।dharmārthakāmamokṣāptyai brahmalokaprado astu me ।yathānāmasagotrāya viprāyāmukaśarmaṇe ।।etaddānapratiṣṭhārthaṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dade ।anena dānavākyena sarvadānāni vai dadet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dānaparibhāṣā nāma navādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha daśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mahādānāni

agnir uvāca
sarvadānāni vakṣyāmi mahādānāni ṣoḍaśa ।tulāpuruṣa ādyantu hiraṇyagarbhadānakaṃ ।।brahmāṇḍaṃ kalpavṛkṣaś ca gosahasrañca pañcamaṃ ।hiraṇyakāmadhenuś ca hiraṇyāśvaś ca saptamaṃ ।।hiraṇyāśvarathastadvaddhemahastirathas tathā ।pañcalāṅgalakantadvaddharādānaṃ tathaiva ca ।।

samutpātādyapāpahṛt iti ṅa । samutpātādipāpahṛditi gha
viśvacakraṃ kalpalatā saptasāgarakaṃ paraṃ ।ratnadhenurmahābhūtaghaṭaḥ śubhadine arpayet ।।maṇḍape maṇḍale dānaṃ devān prārcyārpayeddvije ।merudānāni puṇyāni meravo daśa tān śṛṇu ।।dhānyadroṇasahasreṇa uttamo ardhārdhataḥ parau ।uttamaḥ ṣoḍaśadroṇaḥ kartavyo lavaṇācalaḥ ।।daśabhārair guḍādriḥ syāduttamo ardhārdhataḥ parau ।uttamaḥ palasāhasraiḥ svarṇamerus tathā parau ।।daśadroṇaistilādriḥ syāt pañcabhiś ca tribhiḥ kramāt ।kārpāsaparvato viṃśabhāraiś ca daśapañcabhiḥ ।।viṃśatyā ghṛhakumbhānāmuttamaḥ syād ghṛtācalaḥ ।daśabhiḥ palasāhasrair uttamo rajatācalaḥ ।।aṣṭabhāraiḥ śarkarādrirmadhyomando ardhato ardhataḥ ।daśa dhenūḥ pravakṣyāmi yā dattvā bhuktimuktibhāk ।।prathamā guḍadhenuḥ syād ghṛtadhenus tathāparā ।tiladhenustṛtoyā ca caturthī jaladhenukā ।।kṣīradhenurmadhudhenuḥ śarkarādadhidhenuke ।rasadhenuḥ svarūpeṇa daśamī vidhirucyate ।।kumbhāḥ syurdravadhenūnāmitarāsāntu rāśayaḥ ।kṛṣṇājinañcaturhastaṃ prāggrīvaṃ vinyasedbhuvi ।।gomayenānuliptāyāṃ darbhānāstīrya sarvataḥ ।

atra ratnācalabodhakapāṭhaḥ patitaḥ daśavidhācalavibhāgasya pratijñātatvāt matsyapurāṇīyasaptasaptatyadhyāye ratnaśailas tathāṣṭama ity anena ratnācalasya daśavidhācalāntargatatvenollekhanācca
laghvaiṇakājinaṃ tadvadvatsasya parikalpayet ।।prāṅmukhīṃ kalpayeddhenumudakpādāṃ savatsakāṃ ।uttamā guḍadhenuḥ syāt sadā bhāracatuṣṭayāt ।।vatsaṃ bhāreṇa kurvīta bhārābhyāṃ madhyamā smṛtā ।ardhabhāreṇa vatsaḥ syāt kaniṣṭhā bhārakeṇa tu ।।caturthāṃśena vatsaḥ syād guḍavittānusārataḥ ।pañca kṛṣṇalakā māṣaste suvarnastu ṣoḍaśa ।।palaṃ suvarṇāś catvārastulā palaśataṃ smṛtaṃ ।syādbhāro viṃśatitulā droṇastu caturāḍhakaḥ ।।dhenuvatsau guḍasyobhau sitasūkṣmāmbarāvṛtau ।śuktikarṇāvikṣupādau śucimuktāphalekṣaṇau ।।sitasūtraśirālau ca sitakambalakamvalau ।tāmragaḍḍukapṛṣṭhau tau sitacāmararomakau ।।vidrumabhrūyugāvetau navanītastanānvitau ।kṣaumapucchau kāṃsyadohāvindranīlakatārakau ।।suvarṇaśṛṅgābharaṇau rajatakṣurasaṃyutau ।nānāphalamayā dantā gandhaghrāṇaprakalpitau ।।racayitvā yajeddhenumimair mantrair dvijottama ।yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deveṣvavasthitā ।।dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama śāntiṃ prayacchatu ।dehasthā yā ca rudrāṇī śaṅkarasya sadā priyā ।।dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu ।viṣṇuvakṣasi yā lakṣmīḥ svāhā yā ca vibhāvasoḥ ।।

candrārkaṛkṣaśaktiryā dhenurūpāstu sā śriye ।caturmukhasya yā lakṣmīryā lakṣmīrdhanadasya ca ।।lakṣmīryā lokapālānāṃ sa dhenurvaradāstu me ।svadhā tvaṃ pitṛmukhyānāṃ svāhā yajñabhujāṃ yataḥ ।।sarvapāpaharā dhenustasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me ।evamāmantritāṃ dhenuṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet ।।samānaṃ sarvadhenūnāṃ vidhānaṃ caitadeva hi ।sarvayajñaphalaṃ prāpya nirmalo bhuktimuktibhāk ।।svarṇaśṛṅgo śaphai raupyaiḥ suśīlā vastrasaṃyutā ।kāṃsyopadohā dātavyā kṣoriṇau gauḥ sadakṣiṇā ।।dātāsyāḥ svargamāpnoti vatsarān somasammitān ।kapilā cettārayati bhūyaścāsaptamaṃ kulaṃ ।।svarṇaśṛṅgīṃ raupyakhurāṃ kāṃsyadohanakānvitāṃ ।śaktito dakṣiṇāyuktāṃ dattvā syādbhuktimuktibhāk ।।savatsaromatulyāni yugānyubhayatomukhīṃ ।dattvā svargamavāpnoti pūrveṇa vidhinā dadet ।।āsannamṛtyunā deyā savatsā gaustu pūrvavat ।yamadvāre mahāvīre taptā vaitaraṇī nadī ।।tāntartuñca dadāmyenāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ vaitaraṇīñca gāṃ ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe mahādānāni nāma daśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

kṛṣṇā vaitaraṇī iti ja, jha, ṭa ca

tāntartuṃ vai dadāmyenāmiti cha

chapter 

ś athaikādaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānādānāni

agnir uvāca
ekāṅgāṃ daśagurdadyāddaśa dadyācca gośatī ।śataṃ sahasragurdadyāt sarve tulyaphalā hi te ।।prāsādā yatra sauvarṇā vasordhārā ca yatra sā ।gandharvāpsaraso yatra tatra yānti sahasradāḥ ।।gavāṃ śatapradānena mucyate narakārṇavāt ।dattvā vatsatarīṃ caiva svarhaloke mahīyate ।।godānādāyurārogyasaubhāgyasvargamāpnuyāt ।indrādilokapālānāṃ yā rājamahiṣī śubhā ।।mahiṣīdānamāhātmyādastu me sarvakāmadā ।dharmarājasya sāhāyye yasyāḥ putraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ ।।mahiṣāsurasya jananī yā sāstu varadā mama ।mahiṣīdānācca saubhāgyaṃ vṛṣadānāddivaṃ vrajet ।।saṃyuktahalapaṅktyākhyaṃ dānaṃ sarvaphalapradaṃ ।paṅktirdaśahalā proktā dārujā vṛṣasaṃyutā ।।sauvarṇapaṭṭasannaddhāndattvā svarge mahīyate ।

gavāṃ śatapradānenetyādiḥ, sarvakāmadā ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ jhapustake nāsti

dharmarājasya māhātmye iti ja
daśānāṃ kapilānāṃ tu dattānāṃ jyeṣṭhapuṣkare ।।tat phalañcākṣayaṃ proktaṃ vṛṣabhasya tu mokṣaṇe ।dharmo asitvañcatuṣpādaś catasraste priyā imāḥ ।।namo brahmaṇyadeveśa pitṛbhūtarṣipoṣaka ।tvayi mukte akṣayā lokā mama santu nirāmayāḥ ।।mā me ṛṇo astu daivatyo bhautaḥ paitro atha mānuṣaḥ ।dharmastvaṃ tvatprapannasya yā gatiḥ sāstu me dhruvā ।।aṅgayeccakraśūlābhyāṃ mantreṇānena cotsṛjet ।ekādaśāhe pretasya yasya cotsṛjyate vṛṣaḥ ।।mucyate pretalokāttu ṣaṇmāse cāvdikādiṣu ।daśahastena kuṇḍena triṃśatkuṇḍānnivartanaṃ ।।tānyeva daśavistārādgocarme tatprado aghabhit ।gobhūhiraṇyasaṃyuktaṃ kṛṣṇājinantu yo arpayet ।।sarvaduṣkṛtakarmāpi sāyujyaṃ brahmaṇo vrajet ।bhājanantilasampūrṇaṃ madhunā pūrṇameva ca ।।dadyāt kṛṣṇatilānāñca prasthamekañca māgadhaṃ ।śayyāṃ dattvā tu saguṇāṃ bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।।haimīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā dattvā svargas tathātmanaḥ ।vipulantu gṛhaṃ kṛtvā dattvā syādbhuktimuktibhāk ।।

tatphalaṃ cākṣayaṃ syādvai iti ṭa

vṛṣabhasya vimokṣaṇe iti kha । vṛṣabhasya ca mokṣaṇāditi ja

daivo atheti kha, cha ca

tatprado aghanuditi śa । tatprado aghajiditi gha, ṅa ca

yastu kṛṣṇājinaṃ dadediti ṭa

dattvottamaguṇāmiti gha
gṛhaṃ maṭhaṃ sabhāṃ svargī dattvā syācca pratiśriyaṃ ।dattvā kṛtvā gogṛhañca niṣpāpaḥ svargamāpnuyāt ।।yamamāhiṣadānāttu niṣpāpaḥ svargamāpnuyāt ।brahmā haro harirdevair madhye ca yamadūtakaḥ ।।pāśī tasya śiraśchittvā taṃ dadyāt svargabhāgbhavet ।trimukhākhyamidaṃ dānaṃ gṛhītvā tu dvijo aghabhāk ।।cakraṃ rūpyamayaṃ kṛtvā ke dhṛtvā tat pradāpayet ।hemayuktaṃ dvijāyaitat kālacakramidammahat ।।ātmatulyantu yo lauhaṃ dadenna narakaṃ vrajet ।pañcāśatpalasaṃyuktaṃ lauhadaṇḍaṃ tu yo arpayet ।।vastreṇācchādya viprāya yamadaṇḍo na vidyate ।mūlaṃ phalādi vā dravyaṃ saṃhataṃ vātha caikaśaḥ ।।mṛtyujjayaṃ samuddiśya dadyādāyurvivardhaye ।pumān kṛṣṇatilaiḥ kāryo raupyadantaḥ suvarṇadṛk ।।khaḍgodyatakaro dīrgho javākusumamaṇḍalaḥ ।raktāmvaradharaḥ sragvī śaṅkamālāvibhūṣitaḥ ।।upānadyugayuktāṅghriḥ kṛṣṇakambalapārśvakaḥ ।gṛhītamāṃsapiṇḍaś ca vāme vai kālapūruṣaḥ ।।sampūjya tañca gandhādyaiḥ brāhmaṇāyopapādayet ।maraṇavyādhihīnaḥ syādrājarājeśvaro bhavet ।।govṛṣau tu dvije dattvā bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।

pāpo iti kha, cha, ja ca

sampūjya vastragandhādyair iti ṅa
revantādhiṣṭhitañcāśvaṃ haimaṃ dattvā na mṛtybhāk ।।ghaṇṭādipūrṇamapyekaṃ dattvā syādbhuktimuktibhāk ।sarvān kāmānavāpnoti yaḥ prayacchati kāñcanaṃ ।।suvarṇe dīyamāne tu rajataṃ dakṣiṇeṣyate ।anyeṣāmapi dānānāṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇā smṛtā ।।suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ taṇḍulaṃ dhānyameva ca ।nityaśrāddhaṃ devapūjā sarvametadadakṣiṇaṃ ।।rajataṃ dakṣiṇā pitre dharmakāmārthasādhanaṃ ।suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ maṇimuktāvasūni ca ।।sarvametanmahāprājño dadāti vasudhāndadat ।pitṝṃś ca pitṛlokasthān devasthāne ca devatāḥ ।।santarpayati śāntātmā yo dadāti vasundharām ।kharvaṭaṃ kheṭakaṃ vāpi grāmaṃ vā śasyaśālinaṃ ।।nivartanaśataṃ vāpi tadardhaṃ vā gṛhādikaṃ ।api gocarmamātrāmbā dattvorvīṃ sarvabhāg bhavet ।।tailavinduryathā cāpsu prasarped bhūgataṃ tathā ।sarveṣāmevadānānamekajanmānugaṃ phalaṃ ।।hāṭakakṣitigaurīṇāṃ saptajanmānugaṃ phalaṃ ।trisaptakulamuddhṛtya kanyādo brahmalokabhāk ।।gajaṃ sadakṣiṇaṃ dattvā nirmalaḥ svargabhāg bhavet ।aśvaṃ dattvāyurārogyasaubhāgyasvargamāpnuyāt ।।

hiraṇyamiti ṭa
dāsīṃ dattvā dvijendrāya apsarolokamāpnuyāt ।dattvā tāmramayīṃ sthālīṃ palānāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ ।।ardhaistadardhair ardhair vā bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।śakaṭaṃ vṛṣasaṃyuktaṃ dattvā yānena nākabhāk ।।vastradānāllabhedāyurārogyaṃ svargamakṣayaṃ ।dhānyagodhūmakalamayavādīn svargabhāg dadat ।।āsanaṃ taijasaṃ pātraṃ lavaṇaṃ gandhacandanaṃ ।dhūpaṃ dīpañca tāmvūlaṃ lohaṃ rūpyañca ratnakaṃ ।।divyāni nānādravyāṇi dattvā syād bhuktimuktibhāk ।tilāṃś ca tilapātrañca dattvā svargamavāpnuyāt ।।annadānāt paraṃ nāsti na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ।hastyaśvarathadānāni dāsīdāsagṛhāṇi ca ।।annadānasya sarvāṇi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīṃ ।kṛtvāpi sumahatpāpaṃ yaḥ paścādannado bhavet ।।sarvapāpavinirmukto lokānāpnoti cākṣayān ।pānīyañca prapāndattvā bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।।agniṃ kāṣṭhañca mārgādau dattvā dīptyādimāpnuyāt ।devagandharvanārībhirvimāne sevyate divi ।।ghṛtaṃ taikañca lavaṇaṃ dattvā sarvamavāpnuyāt ।

tatordhvatastadardhārdhair yuktāṃ bhuktimavāpnuyāt iti cha

dhūpadīpañca naivedyaṃ tāmvūlaṃ loharatnakamiti kha

dīptāgnimāpnuyāditi ṅa
chatropānahakāṣṭhādi dattvā svarge sukhī vaset ।।pratipattithimukhyeṣu viṣkumbhādikayogake ।caitrādau vatsarādau ca aśvinyādau hariṃ haraṃ ।।brahmāṇaṃ lokapālādīn prārcya dānaṃ mahāphalaṃ ।vṛkṣārāmān bhojanādīn mārgasaṃvāhanādikān ।।pādābhyaṅgādikaṃ dattvā bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।trīṇi tulyaphalānīha gāvaḥ pṛthvī sarasvatī ।।vrāhmīṃ sarasvatīndattvā nirmalo brahmalokabhāk ।saptadvīpamahīdaḥ sa brahmajñānaṃ dadāti yaḥ ।।abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadyāt sarvabhāṅ naraḥ ।purāṇaṃ bhārataṃ vāpi rāmāyaṇamathāpi vā ।।likhitvā pustakaṃ dattvā bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।vedaśāstraṃ nṛtyagītaṃ yo adhyāpayati nākabhāk ।।vittaṃ dadyādupādhyāye chātrāṇāṃ bhojanādikaṃ ।kimadattaṃ bhavettena dharmakāmādidarśinā ।।vājapeyasahasrasya samyagdattasya yat phalaṃ ।tatphalaṃ sarvamāpnoti vidyādānanna saṃśayaḥ ।।śivālaye viṣṇugṛhe sūryasya bhavane tathā ।sarvadānapradaḥ sa syāt pustakaṃ vācayettu yaḥ ।।trailokye caturo varṇāś catvāraścāśramāḥ pṛthak ।brahmādyā devatāḥ sarvā vidyādāne pratiṣṭhatāḥ ।।

svarge mahīyate iti ga । svarge sukhī bhavedeti gha, ṅa ca
vidyā kāmadughā dhenurvidyā cakṣuranuttamaṃ ।upavedapradānena gandharvaiḥ saha modate ।।vedāṅgānāñca dānena svargalokamavāpnuyāt ।dharmaśāstrapradānena dharmeṇa saha modate ।।siddhāntānāṃ pradānena mokṣamāpnotyasaṃśayaṃ ।vidyādānamavāpnoti pradānāt pustakasya tu ।।śāstrāṇi ca purāṇāni dattvā sarvamavāpnuyāt ।śiṣyāṃś ca śikṣayedyastu puṇḍalīkaphalaṃ labhet ।।yena jīvati taddattvā phalasyānto na vidyate ।loke sreṣṭhatamaṃ sarvamātmanaścāpi yat priyaṃ ।।sarvaṃ pitṝṇāṃ dātavyaṃ teṣāmevākṣayārthinā ।viṣṇuṃ rudraṃ padmayoniṃ devīvighneśvarādikān ।।pūjayitvā pradadyādyaḥ pūjādravyaṃ sa sarvabhāk ।devālayaṃ ca pratimāṃ kārayat sarvamāpnuyāt ।।sammārjanaṃ copalepaṃ kurvan syānnirmalaḥ pumān ।nānāmaṇḍalakāryagre maṇḍalādhipatirbhavet ।।gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpadīpaṃ naivedyañca pradakṣiṇaṃ ।ghaṇṭādhvajavitānañca prekṣaṇaṃ vādyagautakaṃ ।।vastrādidattvādevāya bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।kastūrikāṃ śihlakañca śrīkhaṇḍamagurūntathā ।।karpūrañca tathāmustaṃ gugguluṃ vijayaṃ dadet ।

sammārjanamityādiḥ maṇḍalādhipatirbhavedityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti
ghṛtaprasthena saṃsthāpya saṅkrāntyādau sa sarvabhāk ।।snānaṃ palaśataṃ jñeyamabhyaṅgaṃ pañcaviṃśatiḥ ।palānāntu sahasreṇa mahāsnānaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।।daśāparādhāstoyena kṣīreṇa snāpanācchataṃ ।sahasraṃ payasā dadhnā ghṛtenāyutamiṣyate ।।dāsīdāsamalaṅkāraṃ gobhūmyaśvagajādikaṃ ।devāya dattvā saubhāgyaṃ dhanāyuṣmān vrajeddivaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānādānāni nāmaikādaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvādaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

merudānāni

agnir uvāca
kāmyadānāni vakṣyāmi sarvakāma pradāni te ।nityapūjāṃ māsi māsi kṛtvātho kāmyapūjanaṃ ।।vratārhaṇaṃ guroḥ pūjā vatsarānte mahārcanaṃ ।aśvaṃ vai mārgaśairṣe tu kamalaṃ piṣṭasambhavaṃ ।।śivāya pūjya yo dadyāt sūryaloke ciraṃ vaset ।

svargaloke ciraṃ vasediti ga, gha, ṅa, ṭa ca । śivaloke ciraṃ vasediti jha
gajaṃ pauṣe piṣṭamayaṃ trisaptakulamuddharet ।।māghe cāśvarathaṃ paiṣṭhaṃ dattvā narakaṃ vrajet ।phālgune tu vṛṣaṃ paiṣṭaṃ svargabhuk syānmahīpatiḥ ।।caitre cekṣumayīṃ gāvandāsadāsīsamanvitāṃ ।dattvā svarge ciraṃ sthitvā tadante syānmahīpatiḥ ।।saptavrīhīṃś ca vaiśākhe dattvā śivamayo bhavet ।balimaṇḍalakañcānnaiḥ kṛtvāṣāḍhe śivo bhavet ।।vimānaṃ śrāvaṇe pauṣpaṃ dattvā svargī tato nṛpaḥ ।śatadvayaṃ phalānāntu dattvoddhṛtya kulaṃ nṛpaḥ ।।guggulādi dahedbhādre svargī sa syāttato nṛpaḥ ।kṣīrasarpirbhṛtaṃ pātramāśvine svargadambhavet ।।kārttike guḍakhaṇḍājyaṃ dattvā svargī tato nṛpaḥ ।merudānaṃ dvādaśakaṃ vakṣye ahaṃ bhuktimuktidaṃ ।।meruvrate tu kārttikyāṃ ratnamerundaded dvije ।sarveṣāñcaiva merūṇāṃ pramāṇaṃ kramaśaḥ śṛṇu ।।vajrapadmamahānīlanīlasphaṭikasañjñitaḥ ।puṣpaṃ marakataṃ muktā prasthamātreṇa cottamaḥ ।।madhyo ardhaḥ syāttadardho adho vittaśāṭhyaṃ vivarjayet ।kārṇikāyāṃ nyasenmeruṃ brahmaviṣṇvīśadaivataṃ ।।mālyavān pūrvataḥ pūjyastatpūrve bhadarasañjñitaḥ ।aśvarakṣastataḥ prokto niṣadho merudakṣiṇe ।।hemakūṭo atha himavān trayaṃ saumye tathā trayaṃ ।nīlaḥ śvetaś ca śṛṅgī ca paścime gandhamādanaḥ ।।

vaikaṅkaḥ ketumālaḥ syānmerurdvādaśasaṃyutaḥ ।sopavāso arcayedviṣṇuṃ śivaṃ vā snānapūrvakaṃ ।।devāgre cārcya meruñca mantrair viprāya vai dadet ।viprāyāmukagotrāya merundravyamayamparaṃ ।।bhuktyai muktyai nirmalatve viṣṇudaivaṃ dadāmi te ।indraloke brahmaloke śivaloke hareḥ pure ।।kulamuddhṛtya krīḍeta vimāne devapūjitaḥ ।anyeṣvapi ca kāleṣu saṅkrāntyādau pradāpayet ।।palānāntu sahasreṇa hemamerumprakalpayet ।śṛṅgatrayasamāyuktaṃ brahmaviṣṇuharānvitaṃ ।।ekaikaṃ parvatantasya śataikaikena kārayet ।meruṇā saha śailāstu khyātāstatra trayodaśa ।।ayane grahaṇādau ca viṣṇvagre harimarcya ca ।svarṇameruṃ dvijāyārpya viṣṇuloke ciraṃ vaset ।।paramāṇavo yāvanta iha rājā bhavecciraṃ ।raupyameruṃ dvādaśādriyutaṃ saṅkalpato dadet ।।prāguktaṃ ca phalaṃ tasya viṣṇuṃ vipraṃprapūjya ca ।bhūmimeruñca viṣayaṃ maṇḍalaṃ grāmameva ca ।।parikalpyāṣṭamāṃśena śeṣāṃśāḥ pūrvavat phalaṃ ।dvādaśādrisamāyuktaṃ hastimerusvarūpiṇaṃ ।।

saṅkalpya taddadediti ga, gha, ṅa, ña ca

maṇḍalaṃ grāmameveti ga, jha, ṭa ca

śeṣāṅgā iti kha
dadettripuruṣair yuktaṃ dattvānantaṃ phalaṃ labhet ।tripañcāśvair aśvameruṃ hayayadvādaśasaṃyutaṃ ।।viṣṇvādīn pūjya taṃ dattvā bhuktabhogo nṛpo bhavet ।aśvasaṅkhyāpramāṇena gomeruṃ pūrvavaddadet ।।paṭṭavastrair bhāramātrair vastrameruś ca madhyataḥ ।śailair dvādaśavastraiś ca dattvā tañcākṣayaṃ phalaṃ ।।ghṛtapañcasahasraiś ca palānāmājyaparvataḥ ।śataiḥ pañcabhirekaikaḥ pārvate asmin hariṃ yajet ।।viṣṇvagre brāhmaṇāyārpya sarvaṃ prāpya hariṃ vrajet ।evaṃ ca khaṇḍameruñca kṛtvā dattvāpnuyāt phalaṃ ।।dhānyameruḥ pañcakhāro apara ekaikakhārakāḥ ।svarṇatriśṛṅgakāḥ sarve brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarān ।।sarveṣu pūjya viṣṇuṃ vā viśeṣādakṣayaṃ phalaṃ ।evaṃ daśāṃśamānena tilameruṃ prakalpayet ।।śṛṅgāṇi pūrvavattasya tathaivānyanageṣu ca ।tilameruṃ pradāyātha bandhubhirviṣṇulokabhāk ।।namo viṣṇusvarūpāya dharādharāya vai namaḥ ।brahmaviṣṇvīśaśṛṅgāya dharānābhisthitāya ca ।।nagadvādaśanāthāya sarvapāpāpahāriṇe ।viṣṇubhaktāya śāntāya trāṇaṃ me kuru sarvathā ।।niṣpāpaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ viṣṇuṃ gacchāmi oṃ namaḥ ।

bandhubhirbrahmalokabhāgiti jha
tvaṃ haristu hareragre ahaṃ viṣṇuś ca viṣṇave ।।nivedayāmi bhaktyā tu bhuktimuktyarthahetave ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe merudānāni nāma dvādaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trayodaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

pṛthvīdānāni

agnir uvāca
pṛthvīdānaṃ pravakṣyāmi pṛthivī trividhā matā ।śatakoṭiryojanānāṃ saptadvīpā sasāgarā ।।jambudvīpāvadhiḥ sā ca uttamā medinīritā ।uttamāṃ pañcabhirbhāraiḥ kāñcanaiś ca prakalpayet ।।tadardhāntarajaṃ kūrmaṃ tathā padmaṃ samādiśet ।uttamā kathitā pṛthvī dvyaṃśenaiva tu madhyamā ।।kanyasā ca tribhāgena trihānyā kūrmapaṅkaje ।palānāntu sahasreṇa kalpayet kalpapādapaṃ ।।mūladaṇḍaṃ sapatrañca phalapuṣpasamanvitaṃ ।

svalpā sā tu tribhāgeneti ṅa, ṭa ca
pañcaskandhantu saṅkalpya pañcānāndāpayet sudhīḥ ।।etaddātā brahmaloke pitṛbhirmodate ciraṃ ।viṣṇvagre kāmadhenuntu palānāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ ।।brahmaviṣṇumaheśādyā devā dhenau vyavasthitāḥ ।dhenudānaṃ sarvadānaṃ sarvada brahmalokadaṃ ।।viṣṇvagre kapilāṃ dattvā tārayet sakalaṃ kulaṃ ।alaṅkṛtya striyaṃ dadyādaśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet ।।bhūmiṃ dattvā sarvabhāk syāt sarvaśasyaprarohiṇīm ।grāmaṃ vātha puraṃ vāpi kheṭakañca dadt sukhī ।।kārttikyādau vṛṣotsargaṃ kurvaṃstārayate kulaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe pṛthvīdānāni nāma trayodaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha caturdaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mantramāhatmyakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
nāḍīcakraṃ pravakṣyāmi yajjñānāj jñāyate hariḥ ।nābheradhastādyat kandamaṅkurāstatra nirgatāḥ ।।

naramedhaphalaṃ labhediti ga, ṅa, ña ca

purīṃ vāpīti kha

kārttikādāviti kha, ṭa ca kurvan santārayet kulamiti ga, gha, ṅa, ṭa ca
dvāsaptatisahasrāṇi nābhimadhye vyavasthitāḥ ।tiryagūrdhvamadhaś caiva vyāptantābhiḥ samantataḥ ।।cakravatsaṃsthitā hy etāḥ pradhānā daśanāḍayaḥ ।iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva susumṇā ca tathaiva ca ।।gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pṛthā caiva yathā tathā ।alambuṣā huhuś caiva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā ।।daśa prāṇavahā hy etā nāḍayaḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।prāṇo apānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca ।।nāgaḥ kūrmo atha kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ ।prāṇastu prathamo vāyurdaśānāmapi sa prabhuḥ ।।prāṇaḥ prāṇayate prāṇaṃ visargāt pūraṇaṃ prati ।nityamāpūrayatyeṣa prāṇināmurasi sthitaḥ ।।niḥśvāsocchvāsakāsaistu prāṇo jīvasamāśritaḥ ।prayāṇaṃ kurute yasmāttasmāt prāṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।।adho nayatyapānastu āhārañca nṛṇāmadhaḥ ।mūtraśukravaho vāyurapānastena kīrtitaḥ ।।pītabhakṣitamāghrātaṃ raktapittakaphānilaṃ ।samannayati gātreṣu samāno nāma mārutaḥ ।।spandayatyadharaṃ vaktraṃ netrarāgaprakopanaṃ ।udvejayati marmāṇi udāno nāma mārutaḥ ।।vyāno vināmayatyaṅgaṃ vyāno vyādhiprakopanaḥ ।pratidānaṃ tathā kaṇṭhādvyāpānādvyāna ucyate ।।udgāre nāga ity uktaḥ kūrmaśconmīlane sthitaḥ ।

kṛkaro bhakṣaṇe caiva devadatto vijṛmbhite ।।dhanañjayaḥ sthito ghoṣe mṛtasyāpi na muñcati ।jīvaḥ prayāti daśadhā nāḍīcakraṃ hi tena tat ।।saṅkrāntirviṣuvañcaiva ahorātrāyanāni ca ।adhimāsa ṛṇañcaiva ūnarātra dhanantathā ।।ūnarātraṃ bhaveddhikkā adhimāso vijṛmbhikā ।ṛṇañcātra bhavet kāso niśvāso dhanamucyate ।।uttaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ jñeyaṃ vāmaṃ dakṣiṇasañjñitaṃ ।madhye tu viṣuvaṃ proktaṃ puṭadvayaviniḥsmṛtaṃ ।।saṅkrāntiḥ punarasyaiva svasthānāt sthānayogataḥ ।susumṇā madhyame hy aṅge iḍā vāme pratiṣṭhitā ।।piṅgalā dakṣiṇe vipra ūrdhvaṃ prāṇo hy ahaḥ smṛtaṃ ।apāno rātrirevaṃ syādeko vāyurdaśātmakaḥ ।।āyāmo dehamadhyasthaḥ somagrahaṇamiṣyate ।dehātitattvamāyāmaṃ ādityagrahaṇaṃ viduḥ ।।udaraṃ pūrayettāvadvāyunā yāvadīpsitaṃ ।prāṇāyāmī bhavedeṣa pūrakā dehapūrakaḥ ।।pidhāya sarvadvārāṇi niśvāsocchvāsavarjitaḥ ।sampūraṇakumbhavattiṣṭhet prāṇāyāmaḥ sa kumbhakaḥ ।।muñcedvāyuṃ tatastūrdhvaṃ śvāsenaikena mantravit ।ucchvāsayogayuktaś ca vāyumūrdvaṃ virecayet ।।

balantatheti ña

balamucyate iti ña, jha ca
uccarati svayaṃ yasmāt svadehāvasthitaḥ śivaḥ ।tasmāt tattvavidāñcaiva sa eva japa uccyate ।।ayute dve sahasraikaṃ ṣaṭśatāni tathaiva ca ।ahorātreṇa yogīndro japasaṅkhyāṃ karoti saḥ ।।ajapā nāma gāyatrī brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarī ।ajapāṃ japate yastāṃ punarjanma na vidyate ।।candrāgniravisaṃyuktā ādyā kuṇḍalinī matā ।hṛtpradeśe tu sā jñeyā aṅkurākārasaṃsthitā ।।sṛṣṭinyāso bhavettatra sa vai sargāvalambanāt ।sravantaṃ cintayettasminnamṛtaṃ sāttvikottamaḥ ।।dehasthaḥ sakalo jñeyo niṣphalo dehavarjitaḥ ।haṃsahaṃseti yo brūyāddhaṃso devaḥ sadāśivaḥ ।।tileṣu ca yathā tailaṃ puṣpe gandhaḥ samaśritaḥ ।puruṣasya tathā dehe sa vāhyābhyantarāṃ sthitaḥ ।।brahmaṇo hṛdaye sthānaṃ kaṇṭhe viṣṇuḥ samāśritaḥ ।tālumadhye sthito rudro lalāṭe tu maheśvaraḥ ।।prāṇāgrantu śivaṃ vidyāttasyānte tu parāparaṃ ।pañcadhā sakalaḥ prokto viparītastu niṣphalaḥ ।।prāsādaṃ nādamutthāpya śatatantu japedyadi ।ṣaṇmāsātsiddhimāpnoti yogayukto na saṃśayaḥ ।।gamāgamasya jñānena sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet ।

dehapūjita iti kha, gha, cha ca

tālumūle iti kha
aṇimādiguṇaiśvaryaṃ ṣaḍbhirmāsair avāpnuyāt ।।sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ paraśceti prāsādaḥ kathito mayā ।hrasvo dīrghaḥ plutaśceti prāsādaṃ lakṣayettridhā ।।hrasvo dahati pāpāni dīrgho mokṣaprado bhavet ।āpyāyane plutaśceti mūrdhni vinduvibhūṣitaḥ ।।ādāvante ca hrasvasya phaṭkāro māraṇe hitaḥ ।ādāvante ca hṛdayamākṛṣṭau samprakīrtitam ।।devasya dakṣiṇāṃ mūrtiṃ pañcalakṣaṃ sthito japet ।japānte ghṛtahomastu daśasāhasriko bhavet ।।evamāpyāyito mantro vaśyoccāṭādi kārayet ।ūrdhve śūnyamadhaḥ śūnyaṃ madhye śūnyaṃ nirāmayaṃ ।।triśūnyaṃ yo vijānāti mucyate asau dhruvaṃ dvijaḥ ।prāsādaṃ yo na jānāti pañcamantramahātanuṃ ।।aṣṭatriṃśatkalāyuktaṃ na sa ācārya ucyate ।tathoṅkārañca gāyatrīṃ rudrādīn vettyaasau guruḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe mantramāhātmyaṃ nāma caturdaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcadaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sandhyāvidhiḥ

agnir uvāca
oṅkāraṃ yo vijānāti sa yogī sa hariḥ pumān ।oṅkāramabhyasettasmānmṛnmantrasārantu sarvadaṃ ।।sarvamantraprayogeṣu praṇavaḥ prathamaḥ smṛtaḥ ।tena samparipūrṇaṃ yattat pūrṇaṃ karma netarat ।।oṅkārapūrvikāstisro mahāvyāhṛtayo avyayāḥ ।tripadā caiva sāvitrī vijñeyaṃ brahmaṇī mukhaṃ ।।yo adhīte ahanyahanyetāstrīṇi varṣāṇyatantritaḥ ।sa brahmaparamabhyeti vāyubhūtaḥ khamūrtimān ।।ekākṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma prāṇāyāmaparantapaḥ ।sāvitryāstu parannāsti maunāt satyaṃ viśiṣyate ।।saptāvartā pāpaharā daśabhiḥ prāpayeddivaṃ ।viṃśāvartā tu sā devī nayate hīśvarālayaṃ ।।aṣṭottaraśataṃ japtvā tīrṇaḥ saṃsārasāgarāt ।rudrakuṣmāṇḍajapyebhyo gāyatrī tu viśiṣyate ।।na gāyatryāḥ parañjapyaṃ na vyāhṛtisamaṃ hutaṃ ।gāyatryāḥ pādamapyardhamṛgardhamṛcameva vā ।।brahmahatyā surāpānaṃ suvarṇasteyameva ca ।gurudārāgamaś caiva japyenaiva punāti sā ।।

pāpe kṛte tilair homo gāyatrījapa īritaḥ ।japtvā sahasraṃ gāyatryā upavāsī sa pāpahā ।।goghnaḥ pitṛghno mātṛghno brahmahā gurutalpagaḥ ।brahmaghnaḥ svarṇahārī ca surāpo lakṣajapyataḥ ।।śudhyate vātha vā snātvā śatamantarjale japet ।apaḥ śatena pītvā tu gāyatryāḥ pāpahā bhavet ।।śataṃ japtā tu gāyatrī pāpopaśamanī smṛtā ।sahasraṃ śaptā sā devī upapātakanāśinī ।।abhīṣṭadā koṭijapyā devatvaṃ rājatāmiyāt ।oṅkāraṃ pūrvamuccārya bhūrbhuvaḥ svastathaiva ca ।।gāyatrī praṇavaścānte jape caivamudāhṛtaṃ ।viśvāmitra ṛṣicchando gāyatraṃ savitā tathā ।।devatopanaye japye viniyogo hute tathā ।agnirvāyū ravirvidyut yamo jalapatirguruḥ ।।parjanya indro gandharvaḥ pūṣā ca tadanantaraṃ ।mitro atha varuṇastvaṣṭā vasavo marutaḥ śaśī ।।aṅgirā viśvanāsatyau kas tathā sarvadevatāḥ ।rudro brahmā ca viṣṇuś ca kramaśo akṣaradevatāḥ ।।gayatryā japakāle tu kathitāḥ pāpanāśanāḥ ।pādāṅguṣṭhau ca gulphau ca nalakau jānunī tathā ।।jaṅghe śiśraś ca vṛṣaṇau kaṭir nābhistathodaraṃ ।

upapātakapāpaheti ga, gha, ṅa ca
stanau ca hṛdayaṃ grīvā mukhantālu ca nāsike ।।cakṣuṣī ca bhruvormadhyaṃ lalāṭaṃ pūrvamānanaṃ ।dakṣiṇottarapārśve dve śira āsyamanukramāt ।।pītaḥ śyāmaś ca kapilo marakato agnisannibhaḥ ।rukmavidyuddhūmrakṛṣṇaraktagaurendranīlabhāḥ ।।sphāṭikasvarṇapāṇḍvābhāḥ padmarāgo akhiladyutiḥ ।hemadhūmraraktanīlaraktakṛṣṇasuvarṇabhāḥ ।।śuklakṛṣṇapālāśābhā gāyatryā varṇakāḥ kramāt ।dhyānakāle pāpaharā hutaiṣā sarvakāmadā ।।gāyatryā tu tilair homaḥ sarvapāpapraṇāśanaḥ ।śāntikāmo yavaiḥ kuryādāyuṣkāmo ghṛtena ca ।।siddhārthakaiḥ karmasiddhyai payasā brahmavarcase ।putrakāmas tathā dadhnā dhānyakāmastu śālibhiḥ ।।kṣīravṛkṣasamiddhistu grahapīḍopaśāntaye ।dhanakāmas tathā bilvaiḥ śrīkāmaḥ kamalais tathā ।।ārogyakāmo dūrvābhirgurūtpāte sa eva hi ।saubhāgyecchurguggulunā vidyārthī pāyasena ca ।।ayutenoktasiddhiḥ syāllakṣeṇa manasepsitaṃ ।koṭyā brahmabadhān muktaḥ kuloddhārī harirbhavet ।।grahayajñamukho vāpi homo ayutamukho arthakṛt ।

padmarāgo amaladyutiriti kha, cha, ja, ṭa ca

śuklapadmapalāśābheti ṅa, ña ca
āvāhanañca gāyatryāstata oṅkāramabhyaset ।।smṛtvauṅkārantu gāyatryā nibadhnīyācchikhāntataḥ ।punarācamya hṛḍayaṃ nābhiṃ skandhau ca saṃspṛśet ।।praṇavasya ṛṣirbrahmā gāyatrīcchanda eva ca ।devo agniḥ paramātmā syādyogo vai sarvakarmasu ।।śuklā cāgnimukhī devyā kātyāyanasagotrajā ।trailokyavaraṇā divyā pṛthivyādhārasaṃyutā ।।akṣarasūtradharā devī padmāsanagatā śubhā ।
oṃ tejo asi maho asi balamasi bhrājo asi devānāndhāmanāmāsi । viśvamasi viśvāyuḥ sarvamasi sarvāyuḥ oṃ abhi bhūḥ
āgaccha varade devi japye me sannidhau bhava ।।vyāhṛtīnāntu sarvāsāmṛṣireva prajāpatiḥ ।vyastāś caiva samastāś ca brāhmamakṣaramomiti ।।viśvāmitro yamadagnirbharadvājo atha gotamaḥ ।ṛṣiratrirvaśiṣṭhaś ca kāśyapaś ca yathākramaṃ ।।agnirvāyū raviś caiva vākpatirvaruṇas tathā ।indro viṣṇurvyāhṛtīnāṃ daivatāni yathākramaṃ ।।gāyatryaṣṭiganuṣṭup ca vṛhatī paṅktireva ca ।triṣṭup ca jagatī ceti chandāṃsyāhuranuktāmāt ।।viniyoge vyāhṛtīnāṃ prāṇāyāme ca homake ।āpohiṣṭhetyṛcā cāpāndrupadādīti vā smṛtā ।।

drupadādīni vāpyṛcā iti ṅa, ja, ña ca
tathā hiraṇyavarṇābhiḥ pāvamānībhirantataḥ ।vipruṣo aṣṭau kṣipedūrdhvamājanmakṛtapāpajit ।।antarjale ṛtañceti upettriraghamarṣaṇaṃ ।āpohiṣṭhetyṛco asyāś ca sindhudvīpa ṛṣiḥ smṛtaḥ ।।brahmasnānāya chando asya gāyatrī devatā jalaṃ ।mārjane viniyogasya hayāvabhṛthake kratoḥ ।।aghamarṣaṇasūktasya ṛṣirevāghamarṣaṇaṃ ।anuṣṭup ca bhavecchando bhāvavṛttastu daivataṃ ।।āpījyorīrasa iti gāyatryāstu śiraḥ smṛtaṃ ।ṛṣiḥ prajāpatistasya chandohīnaṃ yajuryataḥ ।।brahmāgnivāyusūryāś ca devatāḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।prāṇarodhāttu vāyuḥ syādvāyoragniś ca jāyate ।।agnerāpastataḥ śuddhistataścācamanañcaret ।antaś carati bhūteṣu guhāyāṃ viśvamūrtiṣu ।।tapoyajñavaṣaṭkāra āpo jyotī raso amṛtaṃ ।udutyaṃ jātavedasamṛṣiḥ praṣkanna ucyate ।।gāyatrīcchanda ākhyātaṃ sūryaś caiva tu daivatam ।atirātre niyogaḥ syādagnīṣomo niyogakaḥ ।।citraṃ deveti ṛcake ṛṣiḥ kautsa udāhṛtaḥ ।triṣṭup chando daivatañca sūryo asyāḥ parikīrtitaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sandhyāvidhirnāma pañcadaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣoḍaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gāyatrīnirvāṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
evaṃ sandhyāvidhiṃ kṛtvā gāyatrīñca japet smaret ।gāyañcchiṣyān yatastrāyet bhāryāṃ prāṇāṃstathaiva ca ।।tataḥ smṛteyaṃ gāyatrī sāvitrīya tato yataḥ ।prakāśanātsā saviturvāgrūpatvāt sarasvatī ।।taj jyotiḥ paramaṃ brahma bhargastejo yataḥ smṛtaṃ ।bhā dīptāviti rūpaṃ hi bhrasjaḥ pāke atha tat smṛtaṃ ।।oṣadhyādikaṃ pacati bhrājṛ dīptau tathā bhavet ।bhargaḥ syād bhrājata iti bahulaṃ chanda īritaṃ ।।vareṇyaṃ sarvatejobhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ vai paramaṃ padaṃ ।svargāpavargakāmair vā varaṇīyaṃ sadaiva hi ।।vṛṇotervaraṇārthatvājjāgratsvapnādivarjitaṃ ।nityaśuddhabuddhamekaṃ satyantaddhīmahīśvaraṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirdhyayemahi vimuktaye ।taj jyotirbhagavān viṣṇurjagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ ।।śivaṃ kecit paṭhanti sma śaktirūpaṃ paṭhanti ca ।kecit sūryaṅkecidagniṃ vedagā agnihotriṇaḥ ।।

kāyān prāṇāṃstathaiva ceti ña
agnyādirūpo viṣṇurhi vedādau brahma gīyate ।tat padaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇordevasya savituḥ smṛtaṃ ।।mahadājyaṃ sūyate hi svayaṃ jyotirhariḥ prabhuḥ ।parjanyo vāyurādityaḥ śītoṣṇādyaiś ca pācayet ।।agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyagādityamupatiṣṭhate ।ādityājjāyate vṛṣṭirvṛṣṭerannantataḥ prajāḥ ।।dadhātervā dhīmahīti manasā dhārayemahi ।no asmākaṃ yaś ca bhargaś ca sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ dhiyaḥ ।।codayāt prerayed buddhīrbhoktṝṇāṃ sarvakarmasu ।dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavipākeṣu viṣṇusūryāgnirūpavān ।।īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśvabhrameva vā ।īśāvāsyamidaṃ sarvaṃ mahadādijagaddhariḥ ।।svargādyaiḥ krīḍate devo yo ahaṃ sa puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ ।ādityāntargataṃ yacca bhargākhyaṃ vai mumukṣubhiḥ ।।janmamṛtyuvināśāya duḥkhasya trividhasya ca ।dhyānena puruṣo ayañca draṣṭavyaḥ sūryamaṇḍale ।।tattvaṃ sadasi cidbrahma viṣṇoryat paramaṃ padaṃ ।devasya saviturbhargo vareṇyaṃ hi turīyakaṃ ।।dehādijāgradābrahma ahaṃ brahmeti dhīmahi ।yo asāvādityapuruṣaḥ so asāvahamananta oṃ ।।jñānāni śubhakarmādīn pravartayati yaḥ sadā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gāyatrīnirvāṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptadaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gāyatrīnirvāṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
liṅgamūrtiṃ śivaṃ stutvā gāyatryā yogamāptavān ।nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ brahma vasiṣṭho anyaś ca śaṅkarāt ।।namaḥ kanakaliṅgāya vedaliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।namaḥ paramaliṅgāya vyomaliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।।namaḥ sahasraliṅgāya vahniliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।namaḥ purāṇaliṅgāya śrutiliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।।namaḥ pātālaliṅgāya brahmaliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।namo rahasyaliṅgāya saptadvīpordhaliṅgine ।।namaḥ sarvātmaliṅgāya sarvalokāṅgaliṅgine ।namastvavyaktaliṅgāya buddhiliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।।namo ahaṅkārakiṅgāya bhūtaliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।nama indriyaliṅgāya namastanmātraliṅgine ।।namaḥ puruṣaliṅgāya bhāvaliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।

nirmalamiti kha

vaśiṣtopyeva śaṅkarāditi kha, gha ca

kamalaliṅgāyeti ṭa

namaḥ pavanaliṅgāyeti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, ṭa ca
namo rajordhaliṅgāya sattvaliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।।namstebhavaliṅgāya namastraiguṇyaliṅgine ।namo anāgataliṅgāya tejoliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।।namo vāyūrdhvaliṅgāya śrutiliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।namaste atharvaliṅgāya sāmaliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।।namo yajñāṅgaliṅgāya yajñaliṅgāya vai namaḥ ।namaste tattvaliṅgāya devānugataliṅgine ।।diśa naḥ paramaṃ yogamapatyaṃ matsamantathā ।brahma caivākṣayaṃ deva śamañcaiva paraṃ vibho ।।akṣayantvañca vaṃśasya dharme ca matimakṣayāṃ ।
agnir uvāca
vasiṣṭhena stutaḥ śambhustuṣṭaḥ śrīparvate purā ।।vasiṣṭhāya varaṃ dattvā tatraivāntaradhīyata ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gāyatrīnirvāṇaṃ nāma saptadaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

tattvaliṅgāyeti kha, cha ca

nama indriyaliṅgāyetyādiḥ sattvaliṅgāya vai nama ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti

namo vāgūrdhvaliṅgāyeti gha

namaste sarvaliṅgāya nāmaliṅgāyeti kha, cha ca

namo anāgataliṅgāyetyādiḥ devānugataliṅgine ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti

paramātmā paraṃvibho iti ja

chapter 

ś athāṣṭādaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājābhiṣekakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
puṣkareṇa ca rāmāya rājadharmaṃ hi pṛcchate ।yathādau kathitaṃ tadvadvaśiṣṭa kathayāmi te ।।
puṣkara uvāca
rājadharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvasmāt rājadharmataḥ ।rājā bhavet śatruhantā prajāpālaḥ sudaṇḍavān ।।pālayiṣyati vaḥ sarvān dharmasthān vratamācaret ।saṃvatsaraṃ sa vṛṇuyāt purohitamatha dvijaṃ ।।mantriṇaścākhilātmajñānmahiṣīṃ dharmalakṣaṇāṃ ।saṃvatsaraṃ nṛpaḥ kāle sasambhāro abhiṣecanaṃ ।।kuryānmṛte nṛpe nātra kālasya niyamaḥ smṛtaḥ ।tilaiḥ siddhārthakaiḥ snānaṃ sāṃvatsarapurohitau ।।ghoṣayitvā jayaṃ rājño rājā bhadrāsane sthitaḥ ।abhayaṃ ghoṣayed durgānmocayedrājyapālake ।।purodhasābhiṣekāt prāk kāryaindrī śāntireva ca ।upavāsyabhiṣekāhe vedyagnau juhuyānmanūn ।।

rājā hariti cha, kha, gha, ja, ña, ṭa ca

purohitamathartvijamiti kha, gha, cha, ja, ṭa ca

juhuyādamūniti ṅa
vaiṣṇavānaindramantrāṃstu sāvitrīn vaiśvadaivatān ।saumyān svastyayanaṃ śarmāyuṣyābhayadānmanūn ।।aparājitāñca kalasaṃ vahnerdakṣiṇapārśvagaṃ ।sampātavantaṃ haimañca pūjayedgandhapuṣpakaiḥ ।।pradakṣiṇāvartaśikhastaptajāmbūnadaprabhaḥ ।rathaughameghanirghoṣo vidhūmaś ca hutāśanaḥ ।।anulomaḥ sugandhaś ca svastikākārasannibhaḥ ।prasannārcirmahājvālaḥ sphuliṅgarahito hitaḥ ।।na vrajeyuś ca madhyena mārjāramṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ।parvatāgramṛdā tāvanmūrdhānaṃ śodhayennṛpaḥ ।।valmīkāgramṛdā karṇau vadanaṃ keśavālayāt ।indrālayamṛdā grīvāṃ hṛdayantu nṛpājirāt ।।karidantoddhṛtamṛdā dakṣiṇantu tathā bhujaṃ ।vṛṣaśṛṅgoddhṛtamṛdā vāmañcaiva tathā bhujaṃ ।।saromṛdā tathā pṛṣṭhamudaraṃ saṅgamān mṛdā ।nadītaṭadvayamṛdā pārśve saṃśodhayettathā ।।veśyādvāramṛdā rājñaḥ kaṭiśaucaṃ vidhīyate ।yajñasthānāttathaivorū gosthānājjānunī tathā ।।aśvasthānāttathā jaṅghe rathacakramṛdāṅghrike ।mūrdhānaṃ pañcagavyena bhadrāsanagataṃ nṛpaṃ ।।abhiṣiñcedamātyānāṃ catuṣṭayamatho ghaṭaiḥ ।

candrālayamṛdeti ja

saromṛdetyādiḥ saṃśodhayettathetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti
pūrvato hemakumbhena ghṛtapūrṇena brāhaṇaḥ ।।rūpyakumbhena yāmye ca kṣīrapūrṇena kṣatriyaḥ ।dadhnā ca tāmrakumbhena vaiśyaḥ paścimagena ca ।।mṛṇmayena jalenodak śūdrāmātyo abhiṣicayet ।tato abhiṣekaṃ nṛpaterbahvṛcapravaro dvijaḥ ।।kurvīta madhunā vipraśchandogaś ca kuśodakaiḥ ।sampātavantaṃ kalaśaṃ tathā gatvā purohitaḥ ।।vidhāya vahnirakṣāntu sadasyeṣu yathāvidhi ।rājaśriyābhiṣeke ca ye mantrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।।taistu dadyānmahābhāga brāhmaṇānāṃ svanais tathā ।tataḥ purohito gacchedvedimūlantadeva tu ।।śatacchidreṇa pātreṇa sauvarṇenābhiṣecayet ।yā oṣadhītyoṣadhībhīrathetyuktveti gandhakaiḥ ।।puṣpaiḥ puṣpavatītyeva brāhmaṇeti ca vījakaiḥ ।ratnair āśuḥ śiśānaś ca ye devāś ca kuśodakaiḥ ।।yajurvedyatharvavedī gandhadvāreti saṃspṛśet ।śiraḥ kaṇṭhaṃ rocanayā sarvatīrthodakair dvijāḥ ।।gītavādyādinirghoṣaiścāmaravyajanādibhiḥ ।sarvauṣadhimayaṃ kumbhaṃ dhārayeyurnṛpāgrataḥ ।।taṃ paśyeddarpaṇaṃ rājā ghṛtaṃ vai maṅgalādikaṃ ।abhyarcya viṣṇuṃ brahmāṇamindrādīṃś ca graheśvarān ।।

vedimūlantathaiva tu iri kha

dīpakair iti ṅa

yajurvedyatha ṛgvedī iti ṅa

grahādikāniti kha, ga, gha ca
vyāghracarmottarāṃ śayyāmupaviṣṭaḥ purohitaḥ ।madhuparkādikaṃ dattvā paṭṭabandhaṃ prakārayet ।।rājñomukuṭabandhañca pañcacarmottaraṃ dadet ।dhruvādyair iti ca viśed vṛṣajaṃ vṛṣadaṃśajaṃ ।।dvīpijaṃ siṃhajaṃ vyāghrajātañcarma tadāsane ।amātyasacivādīṃś ca pratīhāraḥ pradarśayet ।।gojāvigṛhadānādyaiḥ sāṃvatsarapurohitau ।pūjayitvā dvijān prārcya hy anyabhūgonnamukhyakaiḥ ।।vahniṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruṃ natvātha pṛṣṭhataḥ ।vṛṣamālabhya gāṃ vatsāṃ pūjayitvātha mantritaṃ ।।aśvamāruhya nāgañca pūjayettaṃ samāruhet ।paribhramedrājamārge balayuktaḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।puraṃ viśecca dānādyaiḥ prārcya sarvān visarjayet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rājābhiṣeko nāma aṣṭādaśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

abhiṣekamantrāḥ

puṣkara uvāca
rājadevādyabhiṣekamantrānvakṣye aghamardanān ।kumbhāt kuśodakaiḥ siñcettena sarvaṃ hi siddhyati ।।

surāstvāmabhiṣiñcantu brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ ।vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaścāniruddhakaḥ ।।bhavantu vijayāyaite indrādyā daśadiggatāḥ ।rudro dharmo manurdakṣo ruciḥ śraddhā ca sarvadā ।।bhṛguratrirvasiṣṭhaś ca sanakaś ca sanandanaḥ ।sanatkumāro aṅgirāś ca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ ।।marīciḥ kaśyapaḥ pāntu prajeśāḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ ।prabhāsurā vahirṣada agniṣvāttāś ca pāntu te ।।kravyādāścopahūtāś ca ājyapāś ca sukālinaḥ ।agnibhiścābhiṣiñcantu lakṣmyādyā dharmavallabhāḥ ।।ādityādyāḥ kaśyapasya bahuputrasya vallabhāḥ ।kṛśāśvasyāgniputrasya bhāryāścāriṣṭhaneminaḥ ।।aśvinyādyāś ca candrasya pulahasya tathā priyāḥ ।bhūtā ca kapiśā daṃṣṭrī surasā saramā danuḥ ।।śyenī bhāsī tathā krauñcī dhṛtarāṣṭrī śukī tathā ।patnyastvāmabhiṣiñcantu aruṇaścārkasārathiḥ ।।āyatir niyatīrātrir nidrā lokasthitau sthitāḥ ।umā menā śacī pāntu dhūmor nānirṛtirjaye ।।gaurī śivā ca ṛddhiś ca velā caiva naḍvalā ।aśiknī ca tathā jyotsnā devapatnyo vanaspatiḥ ।।mahākalpaś ca kalpaś ca manvantarayugāni ca ।

devaputrasyeti ja

pulastyasyeti ga, gha, ja ca

asitā ceti ṅa
saṃvatsarāṇi varṣāṇi pāntu tvāmayanadvayaṃ ।।ṛtavaś ca tathā māsā pakṣā rātryahanī tathā ।sandhyātithimuhūrtācca kālasyāvayavākṛtiḥ ।।sūryādyāś ca grahāḥ pāntu manuḥ svāyambhuvādikaḥ ।svāyambhuvaḥ svārociṣa auttamistāmaso manuḥ ।।raivataścākṣuṣaḥ ṣaṣṭho vaivasvata iheritaḥ ।sāvarṇo brahmaputraś ca dharmaputraś ca rudrajaḥ ।।dakṣajo raucyabhautyau ca manavastu caturdaśa ।viśvabhuk ca vipaścicca sucittiś ca śikhī vibhuḥ ।।manojavastathaujasvī baliradbhutaśāntayaḥ ।vṛṣaś ca ṛtadhāmā ca divaspṛk kavirindrakaḥ ।।revantaś ca kumāraś ca tathā vatsavināyakaḥ ।vīrabhadraś ca nandī ca viśvakarmā purojavaḥ ।te tvāmabhiṣiñcantu suramukhyāḥ samāgatāḥ ।nāsatyau devabhiṣajau dhruvādyā vasavo aṣṭa ca ।।daśa cāṅgiraso vedāstvābhiṣiñcantu siddhaye ।ātmā hy āyurmano dakṣo madaḥ prāṇastathaiva ca ।।haviṣmāṃś ca gariṣṭhaś ca ṛtaḥ satyaś ca pāntu vaḥ ।kraturdakṣo vasuḥ satyaḥ kālakāmo dhurirjaye ।।purūravā mādravāś ca viśvedevāś ca rocanaḥ ।aṅgārakādyāḥ sūryastvānnirṛtiś ca tathā yamaḥ ।।ajaikapādahirvradhro dhūmaketuś ca rudrajāḥ ।

rudrakā iti ga, gha, ṅa, ña ca
bharataś ca tathā mṛtyuḥ kāpāliratha kiṅkiṇiḥ ।।bhavano bhāvanaḥ pāntu svajanyaḥ svajanas tathā ।kratuśravāś ca mūrdhā ca yājano abhyuśanās tathā ।।prasavaścāvyayaś caiva dakṣaś ca bhṛgavaḥ surāḥ ।mano anumantā prāṇaś ca navopānaś ca vīryavān ।।vītihotro nayaḥ sādhyo haṃso nārāyaṇo avatu ।vibhuś caiva prabhuś caiva devaśreṣṭhā jagaddhitāḥ ।।dhātā mitro aryamā pūṣā śakro atha varuṇo bhagaḥ ।tvaṣṭā vivasvān savitā viṣṇurdvādaśa bhāskarāḥ ।।ekajyotiś ca dvijyotistriś caturjyotireva ca ।ekaśakro dviśakraś ca triśakraś ca mahābalaḥ ।।indraś ca metyādiśatu tataḥ pratimakṛttathā ।mitaś ca sammitaś caiva amitaś ca mahābalaḥ ।।ṛtajit satyajiccaiva suṣeṇaḥ senajittathā ।atimitro anumitraś ca purumitro aparājitaḥ ।।ṛtaś ca ṛtavāg dhātā vidhātā dhāraṇo dhruvaḥ ।vidhāraṇo mahātejā vāsavasya paraḥ sakhā ।।īdṛkṣaścāpyadṛkṣaś ca etādṛgamitāśanaḥ ।krīḍitaś ca sadṛkṣaś ca sarabhaś ca mahātapāḥ ।।

sujanastatheti kha, gha ca

viśvātmeti ṅa

īdṛkṣaścānyadṛkṣaśceti cha
dhartā dhuryo dhurirbhīma abhimuktaḥ kṣapātsaha ।dhṛtirvasuranādhṛṣyo rāmaḥ kāmo jayo virāṭ ।।devā ekonapañcāśanmarutastvāmavantu te ।citrāṅgadaścitrarathaḥ citrasenaś ca vai kaliḥ ।।urṇāyurugrasenaś ca dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca nandakaḥ ।hāhā hūhūrnāradaś ca viśvāvasuś ca tumburuḥ ।।ete tvāmabhiṣiñcantu gandharvā vijayāya te ।pāntu te kurupā mukhyā divyāścāpsarasāṅgaṇāḥ ।।anavadyā sukeśī ca menakāḥ saha janyayā ।kratusthalā ghṛtācī ca viśvācī puñjikasthalā ।।pramlocā corvaśī rambhā pañcacūḍā tilottamā ।citralekhā lakṣmaṇā ca puṇḍarīkā ca vāruṇī ।।prahlādo virocano atha balirvāṇo atha tatsutāḥ ।ete cānye abhiṣiñcantu dānavā rākṣasās tathā ।।hetiś caiva prahetiś ca vidyutsphurjathuragrakāḥ ।yakṣaḥ siddhārmakaḥ pātu māṇibhadraś ca nandanaḥ ।।piṅgākṣo dyutimāṃś caiva puṣpavanto jayāvahaḥ ।śaṅkhaḥ padmaś ca makaraḥ kacchapaś ca nidhirjaye ।।piśācā ūrdhvakeśādyā bhūtā bhūmyādivāsinaḥ ।mahākālaṃ puraskṛtya narasiṃhañca mātaraḥ ।।

abhimuktaḥ kṣamāsaheti ṅa

anādhṛṣta iti ga, gha ,ña ca

saha kanyayeti ja
guhaḥ skando viśākhastvānnaigameyo abhiṣiñcatu ।ḍākinyo yāś ca yoginyaḥ khecarā bhūcarāś ca yāḥ ।।garuḍaścāruṇaḥ pāntu sampātipramukhāḥ khagāḥ ।anantādyā mahānāgāḥ śeṣavāsukitakṣakāḥ ।।airāvato mahāpadmaḥ kambalāśvatarāvubhau ।śaṅkhaḥ karkoṭakaś caiva dhṛtarāṣṭro dhanañjayaḥ ।।kumudair āvaṇau padmaḥ puṣpadanto atha vāmanaḥ ।supratīko añjano nāgāḥ pāntu tvāṃ sarvataḥ sadā ।।paitāmahas tathā haṃso vṛṣabhaḥ śaṅkarasya ca ।durgāsiṃhaś ca pāntu tvāṃ yamasya mahiṣas tathā ।।uccaiḥśravāścāśvapatis tathā dhanvantariḥ sadā ।kaustubhaḥ śaṅkarājaś ca vajraṃ śūlañca cakrakaṃ ।।nandako astrāṇi rakṣantu dharmaś ca vyavasāyakaḥ ।citraguptaś ca daṇḍaś ca piṅgalo mṛtyukālakau ।।bālakhilyādimunayo vyāsavālmīkimukhyakāḥ ।pṛthurdilīpo bharato duṣyantaḥ śakrajidvalī ।।mallaḥ kakutsthaścānena yuvanāśvo jayadrathaḥ ।māndhātā mucukundaś ca pāntu tvāñca purūravāḥ ।।vāstudevāḥ pañcaviṃśattattvāni vijayāya te ।rukmabhaumaḥ śilābhaumaḥ patālo nīlamūrtikaḥ ।।

śatrujidvalo iti ka, kha ca

nīlamṛttika iti kha, gha, cha, ja, ña, ṭa ca । nīlamūrdhaja iti ṅa
pītaraktaḥ kṣitiś caiva śvetabhaumo rasātalaṃ ।bhūlloko atha bhuvarmukhyā jamvūdvīpādayaḥ śriye ।।uttarāḥ kuravaḥ pāntu ramyā hiraṇyakas tathā ।bhadrāśvaḥ ketumālaś ca varṣaś caiva valāhakaḥ ।।harivarṣaḥ kimpuruṣa indradvīpaḥ kaśerumān ।tāmravarṇo gabhastimān nāgadvīpaś ca saumyakaḥ ।।gandharvo varuṇo yaś ca navamaḥ pāntu rājyadāḥ ।himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadho nīla eva ca ।।śvetaś ca śṛṅavān merurmālyavān gandhamādanaḥ ।mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śaktimānṛkṣavān giriḥ ।।vindhyaś ca pāripātraś ca girayaḥ śāntidāstu te ।ṛgvedādyāḥ ṣaḍaṅgāni itihāsapurāṇakaṃ ।।āyurvedaś ca gandharvadhanurvedopavedakāḥ ।śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ jyotiṣāṅgatiḥ ।।chandogāni ca vedāś ca mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ ।dharmaśāstraṃ purāṇañca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa ।।sāṅkhyaṃ yogaḥ pāśupataṃ vedā vai pañcarātrakaṃ ।kṛtāntapañcakaṃ hy etad gāyatrī ca śivā tathā ।।durgā vidyā ca gāndhārī pāntu tvāṃ śāntidāś ca te ।lavaṇekṣusurāsarpidadhidugdhajalābdhayaḥ ।।catvāraḥ sāgarāḥ pāntu tīrthāni vividhāni ca ।

hairaṇyakastatheti gha, ṅa, ja ca । hiraṇmayaśtatheti cha
puṣkaraś ca prayāgaś ca prabhāso naimiṣaḥ paraḥ ।।gayāśīrṣo brahmaśirastīrthamuttramānasaṃ ।kālodako nandikuṇḍastīrthaṃ pañcanadas tathā ।।bhṛgutīrthaṃ prabhāsañca tathā cāmarakaṇṭakaṃ ।jambumārgaś ca vimalaḥ kapilasya tathāśramaḥ ।।gaṅgādvārakuśāvartau vindhyako nīlaparvataḥ ।varāhaparvataś caiva tīrthaṅkaṇakhalaṃ tathā ।।kālañjaraś ca kedāro rudrakoṭistathaiva ca ।vārāṇasī mahātīrthaṃ vadaryāśrama eva ca ।।dvārakā śrīgiristīrthaṃ tīrthañca puruṣottamaḥ ।śālagrāmotha vārāhaḥ sindhusāgarasaṅgamaḥ ।।phalgutīrthaṃ vindusaraḥ karavīrāśramas tathā ।nadyo gaṅgāsarasvatyaḥ śatadurgaṇḍakī tathā ।।acchodā ca vipāśā ca vitastā devikā nadī ।kāverī varuṇā caiva niś carā gomatī nadī ।।pārā carmaṇvatī rūpā mandākinī mahānadī ।tāpī payoṣṇī veṇā ca gaurī vaitaraṇī tathā ।।godāvarī bhīmarathī tuṅgabhadrā praṇī tathā ।candrabhāgā śivā gaurī abhiṣiñcantu pāntu vaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe abhiṣekamantrā nāmonaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

abhiṣiñcantu pānta ceti kha, ga, gha, ṅa, cha, ja, ña, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś atha viṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sahāyasampattiḥ

puṣkara uvāca
so abhiṣiktaḥ sahāmātyo jayecchatrūnnṛpottamaḥ ।rājñā senāpatiḥ kāryo brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo atha vā ।।kulīno nītiśāstrajñaḥ pratīhāraś ca nītivit ।dūtaś ca priyavādī syādakṣīṇo atibalānvitaḥ ।।tāmbūladhārī nā strī vā bhaktaḥ kleśasahapriyaḥ ।sāndhivigrahikaḥ kāryaḥ ṣāḍguṇyādiviśāradaḥ ।।khaḍgadhārī rakṣakaḥ syātdārathiḥ syādbalādivit ।sūdādhyakṣo hito vijño mahānasagato hi saḥ ।।sabhāsadastu dharmajñā lekhako akṣaraviddhitaḥ ।āhvānakālavijñāḥ syurhitā dauvārikā janāḥ ।।ratnādijño dhanādhyakṣaḥ anudvāre hito naraḥ ।syādāyurvedavidvaidyo gajadhyakṣo atha hayādivit ।।jitaśramo gajāroho hayādhyakṣo hayādivat ।durgādhyakṣo hito dhīmān sthapatirvāstuvedavit ।।yantramukte pāṇimukte amukte muktadhārite ।astrācāryo niyuddhe ca kuśalo nṛpaterhitaḥ ।।vṛddhaścāntaḥpurādhyakṣaḥ pañcāśadvārṣikāḥstriyaḥ ।

saptatyavdāstu puruṣāś careyuḥ sarvakarmasu ।।jāgratsyādāyudhāgāre jñātvā vṛttirvidhīyate ।uttamādhamamadhyāni buddhvā karmāṇi pārthivaḥ ।।uttamādhamamadhyāni puruṣāṇi niyojayet ।jyecchuḥ pṛthivīṃ rājā sahāyānanayoddhitān ।।dharmiṣṭhān dharmakāyeṣu śūrān saṅgrāmakarmasu ।nipuṇānarthakṛtyeṣu sarvatra ca tathā śucīn ।।strīṣu ṣaṇḍānniyuñjīta tīkṣṇān dāruṇakarmasu ।yo yatra vidito rājñā śucitvena tu tannaraṃ ।।dharme cārthe ca kāme ca niyuñjītādhame adhamān ।rājā yathārhaṃ kuryācca upādhābhiḥ parīkṣitān ।।samantro ca yathānyāyāt kuryāddhastivanecarān ।tatpadānveṣaṇe yattānadhyakṣāṃstatra kārayet ।।yasmin karmaṇi kauśalyaṃ yasya tasmin niyojayet ।pitṛpaitāmahān bhṛtyān sarvakarmasu yojayet ।।vinā dāyādakṛtyeṣu tatra te hi samāgatāḥ ।pararājagṛhāt prāptān janān saṃśrayakāmyayā ।।duṣṭānapyatha vāduṣṭān saṃśrayeta prayatnataḥ ।duṣṭaṃ jñātvā viśvasenna tadvṛttiṃ vartayedvaśe ।।deśāntarāgatān pārśve cāraijñātvā hi pūjayet ।śatravo agnivarṣaṃ sarpo nistriṃśamapi caikataḥ ।।

ripananarthakṛtyeṣviti kha

janānāśrayakāmyayeti kha
bhṛtyā vaśiṣṭaṃ vijñeyāḥ kubhṛṭyāś ca tathaikataḥ ।cāracakṣurbhavedrājā niyuñjīta sadācarān ।।janasyāvihitān saumyāṃs tathājñātān parasparaṃ ।vaṇijo mantrakuśalān sāṃvatsaracikitsakān ।।tathā pravrajitākārān balābalavivekinaḥ ।naikasya rājā śraddadhyācchraddadhyād bahuvākyataḥ ।।rāgāparāgau bhṛtyānāṃ janasya ca guṇāguṇān ।śubhānāmaśubhānāñca jñānaṅkuryādvaśāya ca ।।anurāgakaraṃ karma carejjahmādvirāgajaṃ ।janānurāgayā lakṣmyā rājā syājjanarañjanāt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sahāyasampattirnāma viṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter {ā}

ś atha ekaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
bhṛtyaḥ kuryāttu rājājñāṃ śiṣyavatsacchriyaḥ pateḥ ā।na kṣipedvacanaṃ rājño anukūlaṃ priyaṃ vadet ।ā।rahogatasya vaktavyamapriyaṃ yaddhitaṃ bhavet ā।na niyukto haredvittaṃ nopekṣettasya mānakaṃ ।rājñaś ca na tathākāryaṃ veśabhāṣāviceṣṭitaṃ ā।antaḥpuracarādhyakṣo vairabhūtair nirākṛtaiḥ ।ā।

saṃsargaṃ na vrajedbhṛtyo rājño guhyañca gopayet ā।pradarśya kauśalaṃ kiñcidrājānantu viśeṣayet ।ā।rājñā yacchrāvitaṃ guhyaṃ na talloke prakāśayet ā।ājñāpyamāne vānyasmin kiṅkaromīti vā vadet ।vastraṃ ratnamalaṅkāraṃ rājñā dattaṃ ca dhārayet ā।nānirdiṣṭo dvāri viśennāyogye bhuvi rājadṛk ।ā।jṛmbhānniṣṭhīvanaṅkāsaṃ kopaṃ paryantikāśrayaṃ ā।bhṛkuṭīṃ vātamudgāraṃ tatsamīpe visarjayet ।svaguṇākhyāpane yuktyā parāneva prayojayet ā।śāṭhyaṃ laulyaṃ sapaiśūnyaṃ nāstikyaṃ kṣudratā tathā ।ā।cāpalyañca parityājyaṃ nityaṃ rājānujīvinā ā।śrutena vidyāśilpaiś ca saṃyojyātmānamātmanā ।rājasevāntataḥ kuryādbhūtaye bhūtivardhanaḥ ā।namaskāryāḥ sadā cāsya putravallabhamantriṇaḥ ।ā।sacivair nāsya viśvāso rājacittapriyañcaret ā।tyajedviraktaṃ raktāttu vṛttimīheta rājavit ।apṛṣṭaścāsya na brūyāt kāmaṃ kuryāttathāpadi ā।prasanno vākyasaṅgrāhī rahasye na ca śaṅkate ।ā।

rājñādattaṃ na dhārayediti kha

nānirdiṣte iti kha, ga, gha, ña ca

vivarjayediti ga, gha, ja, ṭa ca

niyojayediti ga, gha, ña ca

bhūtivardhanīmiti ga, ṭa ca
kuśalādiparipraśnaṃ samprayacchati cāsanaṃ ā।tatkathāśravaṇāddhṛṣṭo apriyāṇyapi nandane ।ā।alpaṃ dattaṃ pragṛhṇāti smaret kathāntareṣvapi ā।iti raktasya kartavyaṃ sevāmanyasya varjayet ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe anujīvivṛttaṃ nāma viṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

durgasampattiḥ

puṣkara uvāca
durgasampattimākhyāsye durgadeśe vasennṛpaḥ ।vaiśyaśūdrajanaprāyo ahyanāhāryas tathāparaiḥ ।।kiñcidbrāhmaṇasaṃyukto bahukarmakaras tathā ।adevamātṛko bhaktajalo deśaḥ praśasyate ।।parair apīḍītaḥ puṣpaphaladhānyasanvitaḥ ।agamyaḥ paracakrāṇāṃ vyālataskaravarjitaḥ ।।ṣaṇṇāmekatamaṃ durgaṃ tatra kṛtvā vasedbalī ।dhanurdurgaṃ mahīdurgaṃ naradurgaṃ tathaiva ca ।।vārkṣañcaivāmbudurgañca giridurgañca bhārgava ।sarvottamaṃ śailadurgamabhedyaṃ cānyabhedanaṃ ।।

puṣpaphaladhānyadhanānvita iti ga, gha, ña, ṭa ca
purantatra ca haṭṭādyadevatāyatanādikaṃ ।anuyantrāyudhopetaṃ sodakaṃ durgamuttamaṃ ।।rājarakṣāṃ pravakṣyāmi rakṣyo bhūpo viṣāditaḥ ।pañcāṅgastu śirīṣaḥ syānmūtrapiṣṭo viṣārdanaḥ ।।śatāvarī chinnaruhā viṣaghnī taṇḍulīyakaṃ ।koṣātakī ca kalhārī brāhmī citrapaṭolikā ।।maṇḍūlaparṇī vārāhī dhātryānandakameva ca ।unmādinī somarājī viṣaghnaṃ ratnameva ca ।।vāstulakṣaṇasaṃyukte vasan durge surānyajet ।prajāś ca pālayedduṣṭāñjayeddānāni dāpayet ।।devadravyādiharaṇāt kalpantu narake vaset ।devālayāni kurvīta devapūjārato nṛpaḥ ।।surālayāḥ pālanīyāḥ sthāpanīyāś ca devatāḥ ।mṛṇmayāddārujaṃ puṇyaṃ dārujādiṣṭakāmayaṃ ।।aiṣṭakācchailajaṃ puṇyaṃ śailajāt svarṇaratnajaṃ ।krīḍan suragṛhaṃ kurvan bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।।citrakvad gītavādyādiprekṣaṇīyādidānakṛt ।tailājyamadhudugdhādyaiḥ snāpya devaṃ divaṃ vrajet ।।pūjayet pālayedviprān dvijasvanna harennṛpaḥ ।suvarṇamekaṃ gāmekāṃ bhūmerapyekamaṅgulaṃ ।।harannarakamāpnoti yāvadāhūtasamplavaṃ ।durācāranna dviṣecca sarvapāpeṣvapi sthitaṃ ।।naivāsti brāhmaṇabadhāt pāpaṃ gurutaraṃ kvacit ।

adaivaṃ daivataṃ kuryuḥ kuryurdaivamadaivataṃ ।।brāhmaṇā hi mahābhāgāstānnamasyetsadaiva tu ।brāhmaṇī rudatī hanti kulaṃ rājyaṃ prajās tathā ।।sādhvīstrīṇāṃ pālanañca rājā kuryācca dhārmikaḥ ।striyā prahṛṣṭayā bhāvyaṃ gṛhakāryaikadakṣayā ।।susaṃskṛtopaskarayā vyaye cāmuktahastayā ।yasmai dadyātpitā tvenāṃ śuśrūṣettaṃ patiṃ sadā ।।mṛte bhartari svaryāyāt brahmacarye sthitāṅganā ।paraveśmarucir nasyānna syāt kalahaśālinī ।।maṇḍanaṃ varjayennārī tathā proṣitabhartṛkā ।devatārādhanaparā tiṣṭhedbhartṛhite ratā ।।dhārayenmaṅgalārthāya kiñcidābharaṇantathā ।bhartrāgniṃ yā viśennārī sāpi svagamavāpnuyāt ।।śriyaḥ sampūjanaṅkāryaṃ gṛhasammārjanādikaṃ ।dvādaśyāṃ kārttike viṣṇuṃ gāṃ savatsāṃ dadettathā ।।sāvitryā rakṣito bhartā satyācāravratena ca ।saptamyāṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu site abhyarcya divākaraṃ ।।putrānāpnoti ca strīha nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rājadharmo nāma ekaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

tānna hiṃsyādyadaiva tu iti ja

satyavān suvratena ceti gha, ña ca

chapter 

ś atha dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājadharmāḥ

puṣkara uvāca
grāmasyādhipatiṃ kuryāddaśagrāmādhipaṃ nṛpaḥ ।śatagrāmādhipañcānyaṃ tathaiva viṣayeśvaraṃ ।।teṣāṃ bhogavibhāgaś ca bhavet karmānurūpataḥ ।nityameva tathā kāryaṃ teṣāñcāraiḥ parīkṣaṇaṃ ।।grāme doṣān samutpannān grāmeśaḥ prasamaṃ nayet ।aśakto daśapālasya sa tu gatvā nivedayet ।।śrutvāpi daśapālo api tatra yuktimupācaret ।vittādyāpnoti rājā vai viṣayāttu surakṣitāt ।।dhanavāndharmamāpnoti dhanavān kāmamaśnute ।ucchidyante vinā hy arthaiḥ kriyā grīṣme saridyathā ।।viśeṣo nāsti lokeṣe patitasyādhanasya ca ।patitānna tu gṛhṇanti daridro na prayacchati ।।dhanahīnasya bhāryāpi naikā syādupavartinī ।rāṣṭrapīḍākaro rājā narake vasate ciraṃ ।।nityaṃ rājñā tathā bhāvyaṃ garbhiṇī sahadharmiṇī ।yahā svaṃ sukhamutsṛjya garbhasya sukhamāvahet ।।

vinā hy arthamiti gha, ña ca

naiva syādvaśavartinīti kha, ṭa ca । naiva syādvaśavartinīti gha, ja, ña ca

sukhamāharediti ja, ṭa ca
kiṃ yajñaistapasā tasya prajā yasya na rakṣitāḥ ।surakṣitāḥ prajā yasya svargastasya gṛhopamaḥ ।।arakṣitāḥ prajā yasya narakaṃ tasya mandiraṃ ।rājā ṣaḍbhāgamādatte sukṛtādduṣkṛtādapi ।।dharmāgamo rakṣaṇācca pāpamāpnotyarakṣaṇāt ।subhagā viṭabhīteva rājavallabhataskaraiḥ ।।bhakṣyamāṇāḥ prajā rakṣyāḥ kāyasthaiś ca viśeṣataḥ ।rakṣitā tadbhayebhyastu rājño bhavati sā prajā ap।arakṣitā sā bhavati teṣāmeveha bhojanaṃ ।duṣṭasammardanaṃ kuryācchāstroktaṃ karamādadet ।।koṣe praveśayedardhaṃ nityañcārdhaṃ dvije dadet ।nidhiṃ dvijottamaḥ prāpya gṛhṇīyātsakalaṃ tathā ।।caturthamaṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ tathā ṣoḍaśamaṃ dvijaḥ ।varṇakrameṇa dadyācca nidhiṃ pātre tu dharmataḥ ।।anṛtantu vadan daṇḍyaḥ suvittasyāṃśamaṣṭamaṃ ।praṇaṣṭasvāmikamṛkthaṃ rājātryabdaṃ nidhāpayet ।।arvāk tryabdāddharet svāmī pareṇa nṛpatirharet ।mamedamiti yo brūyāt so arthayukto yathāvidhi ।।sampādya rūpasaṅkhyādīn svāmī tad dravyamarhati ।

satprajā iti gha, ña ca

subhagā viṭabhītevetyādiḥ, karamādadedityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti

dvije arpayediti ña, ṭa ca

amṛtaṃ vadato grāhyamiti ṭa
bāladāyādikamṛkthaṃ tāvadrājānupālayet ।।yāvatsyātsa samāvṛtto yāvadvātītaśaiśavaḥ ।bālaputrāsu caivaṃ syādrakṣaṇaṃ niṣkalāsu ca ।।pativratāsu ca strīṣu vidhabāsvāturāsu ca ।jīvantīnāntu tāsāṃ ye saṃhareyuḥ svavāndhavāḥ ।।tāñchiṣyāccauradaṇḍena dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ ।sāmānyato hṛtañcauraistadvai dadyāt svayaṃ nṛpaḥ ।।caurarakṣādhikāribhyo rājāpi hṛtamāpnuyāt ।ahṛte yo hṛtaṃ brūyānniḥsāryo daṇḍya eva saḥ ।।na tadrājñā pradātavyaṃ gṛhe yad gṛhagair hṛtaṃ ।svarāṣṭrapaṇyādādadyādrājā viṃśatimaṃ dvija ।।śulkāṃśaṃ paradeśācca kṣayavyayaprakāśakaṃ ।jñātvā saṅkalpayecchulkaṃ lābhaṃ vaṇigyathāpnuyāt ।।viṃśāṃśaṃ lābhamādadyāddaṇḍanīyastato anyathā ।strīṇāṃ pravrajitānāñca taraśulkaṃ vivarjayet ।।tareṣu dāsadoṣeṇa naṣṭaṃ dāsāṃstu dāpayet ।śūkadhānyeṣu ṣaḍbhāgaṃ śimbidhānye tathāṣṭamaṃ ।।rājā vanyārthamādadyāddeśakālānurūpakaṃ ।pañcaṣaḍbhāgamādadyād rājā paśuhiraṇyayoḥ ।।gandhauṣadhirasānāñca puṣpamūlaphalasya ca ।

bāladāyādikaṃ yuktamiti kha, ga, gha, ña ca

strīṇāñcaiva dvijātīnāmiti ṭa
patraśākatṛṇānāñca vaṃśavaiṇavacarmaṇāṃ ।।vaidalānāñca bhāṇḍānāṃ sarvasyāśmamayasya ca ।ṣaḍbhāgameva cādadyān madhumāṃsasya sarpiṣaḥ ।।mriyannapi na cādadyād brāhmaṇebhyas tathā karaṃ ।yasya rājñastu viṣaye śrotriyaḥ sīdati kṣudhā ।।tasya sīdati tadrāṣṭraṃ vyādhidurbhikṣataskaraiḥ ।śrutaṃ vṛttantu vijñāya vṛttiṃ tasya prakalpayet ।।rakṣecca sarvatastvenaṃ pitā putramivaurasaṃ ।saṃrakṣyamaṇo rājñā yaḥ kurute dharmamanvahaṃ ।।tenāyurvardhate rājño draviṇaṃ rāṣṭrameva ca ।karma kuryur narendrasya māsenaikañca śilpinaḥ ।।bhuktamātreṇa ye cānye svaśarīropajīyinaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rājadharmo nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājadharmāḥ

puṣkara uvāca
vakṣye antaḥpuracintāṃ ca dharmādyāḥ puruṣārthakāḥ ।anyonyarakṣayā teṣāṃ sevā kāryā striyā nṛpaiḥ ।।

māsenaikeneti cha, ja ca
dharmamūlo arthaviṭapas tathā karmaphalo mahān ।trivargapādapastatra rakṣayā phalabhāgaṃ bhavet ।।kāmādhīnāḥ striyo rāma tadarthaṃ ratnasaṅgrahaḥ ।sevyāstā nātisevyāś ca bhūbhujā viṣayaiṣiṇā ।।āhāro maithunannidrā sevyā nāti hi rug bhavet ।mañcādhikāre kartavyāḥ striyaḥ sevyāḥ svarāmikāḥ ।।duṣṭānyācarate yā tu nābinandati tatkathāṃ ।aikyaṃ dviṣadbhirvrajati garvaṃ vahati coddhatā ।।cumbitā mārṣṭi vadanaṃ dattanna bahu manyate ।svapityādau prasuptāpi tathā paścādvibudhyate ।।spṛṣṭā dhunoti gātrāṇi gātrañca viruṇaddhi yā ।īṣacchṛṇoti vākyāni priyāṇyapi parāṅmukhī ।।na paśyatyagradattantu jaghanañca nigūhati ।dṛṣṭe vivarṇavadanā mitreṣvatha parāṅmukhī ।।tatkāmitāsu ca strīsu madhyastheva ca lakṣyate ।jñātamaṇḍanakālāpi na karoti ca maṇḍanaṃ ।।yā sā viraktā tāntyaktvā sānurāgāṃ striyambhajet ।dṛṣṭvaiva hṛṣṭā bhavati vīkṣite ca parāṅmukhī ।।

kāmādharā iti gha, ña ca

lajjādhikāre iti kha, cha ca

suvāsikā iti ka

dviṣṭānyācakṣate iti ña

na paśyatyagradattantvityādiḥ, mitreṣvatha parāṅmukhītyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti

striyaṃ vrajediti gha, ña ca
dṛśyamanā tathānyatra dṛṣṭiṃ kṣipati cañcalāṃ ।tathāpyupāvartayituṃ naiva śaknotyaśeṣataḥ ।।vivṛṇīti tathāṅgāni svasyā guhyāni bhārgava ।garhitañca tathaivāṅgaṃ prayatnena nigūhati ।।taddarśane ca kurute bālāliṅganacumbanaṃ ।ābhāṣyamāṇā bhavati satyavākyā tathaiva ca ।।spṛṣṭā pulakitair aṅgaiḥ svedenaiva ca bhujyate ।karoti ca tathā rāma sulabhadravyayācanaṃ ।।tataḥ svalpamapi prāpya karoti paramāṃ mudaṃ ।nāmasaṅkīrtanādeva muditā bahu manyate ।।karajāṅkāṅkitānyasya phalāni preṣayatyapi ।tatpreṣitañca hṛdaye vinyasatyapi cādarāt ।।āliṅganaiś ca gātrāṇi limpatīvāmṛtena yā ।supte svapityathādau ca tathā tasya vibudhyate ।।urū spṛśati cātyarthaṃ suptañcainaṃ vibudhyate ।kapitthacūrṇayogena tathā daghnaḥ srajā tathā ।।ghṛtaṃ sugandhi bhavati dugdhaiḥ kṣiptais tathā yavaiḥ ।bhojyasya kalpanaivaṃ syādgandhamuktiḥ pradarśyate ।।śaucamācamanaṃ rāma tathaiva ca virecanaṃ ।bhāvanā caiva pākaś ca bodhanaṃ dhūpanantathā ।।vāsanañcaiva nirdiṣṭaṃ karmāṣṭakamidaṃ smṛtaṃ ।kapitthabilvajamvāmrakaravīrakapallavaiḥ ।।kṛtvodakantu yaddravyaṃ śaucitaṃ śaucanantu tat ।

teṣāmabhāve śaucantu mṛgadarpāmbhasā bhavet ।।nakhaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ ghanaṃ māṃsī spṛkkaśaileyajaṃ jalaṃ ।tathaiva kuṅkumaṃ lākṣā candanāgurunīradaṃ ।।saralaṃ devakāṣṭhañca karpūraṃ kāntayā saha ।bālaḥ kundurukaś caiva gugguluḥ śrīnivāsakaḥ ।।saha sarjarasenaivaṃ dhūpadravyaikaviṃśatiḥ ।dhūpadravyagaṇādasmādekaviṃśādyathecchayā ।।dve dve dravye samādāya sarjabhāgair niyojayet ।nakhapiṇyākamalayaiḥ saṃyojya madhunā tathā ।।dhūpayogā bhavantīha yathāvat svecchayā kṛtāḥ ।tvacannāḍīṃ phalantailaṃ kuṅkumaṃ granthi pravartakaṃ ।।śaileyantagaraṃ krāntāṃ colaṅkarpūrameva ca ।māṃsīṃ surāñca kuṣṭhañca snānadravyāṇi nirdiśet ।।etebhyastu samādāya dravyatrayamathecchayā ।mṛgadarpayutaṃ snānaṃ kāryaṃ kandarpavardhanaṃ ।।tvaṅmurānaladaistulyair vālakārdhasamāyutaiḥ ।snānamutpalagandhi syāt satailaṃ kuṅkumāyate ।।jātīpuṣasugandhi syāt tagarārdhena yojitaṃ ।saddhyāmakaṃ syādvakulaistulyagandhi manoharaṃ ।।

candanāguruśailajamiti kha, cha ca

devadāruśceti gha, ña ca

granthiparṇakamiti ga, gha, ña ca

saha sarjarasenetyādiḥ colaṃ karpūrameva cetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ṭa pustake nāsti
mañjiṣṭhātagaraṃ colaṃ tvacaṃ vyaghranakhaṃ nakkhaṃ ।gandhapatrañca vinyasya gandhatailaṃ bhavecchubhaṃ ।।tailaṃ nipīḍitaṃ rāma tilaiḥ puṣpādhivāsitaiḥ ।vāsanāt puṣpasadṛśaṃ gandhena tu bhaved dhruvaṃ ।।elālavaṅgakakkolajātīphalaniśākarāḥ ।jātīpatrikayā sārdhaṃ svatantrā mukhavāsakāḥ ।।karpūraṃ kuṅkumaṃ kāntā mṛgadarpaṃ hareṇukaṃ ।kakkolailālavaṅgañca jātau kośakameva ca ।।tvakpatraṃ truṭimustau ca latāṃ kastūrikaṃ tathā ।kaṇṭakāni lavaṅgasya phalapatre ca jātitaḥ ।।kaṭukañca phalaṃ rāma kārṣikāṇyupakalpayet ।taccūrṇe khadiraṃ sāraṃ dadyātturyaṃ tu vāsitaṃ ।।sahakārarasenāsmāt kartavyā guṭikāḥ śubhāḥ ।mukha nyastāḥ sugandhāstā mukharogavināśanāḥ ।।pūgaṃ prakṣālitaṃ samyak pañcapallavavāriṇā ।śaktyā tu guṭikādravyair vāsitaṃ mukhavāsakaṃ ।।kaṭukaṃ dantakāṣṭhañca gomūtre vāsitaṃ tryahaṃ ।kṛtañca pūgavadrāma mukhasaugandhikārakaṃ ।।tvakpathyayoḥ samāvaṃśau śaśibhāgārdhasaṃyutau ।nāgavallīsamo bhāti mukhavāso manoharaḥ ।।

kandukañceti kha, cha ca

dadyātturthaṃ tulonmitamiti ṭa, cha ca

kakkolailetyādiḥ guṭikāḥ śubhā ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ gha, ja pustakadvaye nāsti
