evaṃ kuryāt sadā strīṇāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ ।na cāsāṃ viśvasejjātu putramāturviśeṣataḥ ।।na svapet strīgṛhe rātrau viśvāsaḥ kṛtrimo bhavet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāopurāṇe strīrakṣādikāmaśāstraṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājadharmāḥ

puṣkara uvāca
rājaputrasya rakṣā ca kartavyā pṛthivīkṣitā ।dharmārthakāmaśāstrāṇi dhanurvedañca śikṣayet ।।śilpāni śikṣayeccaivamāptair mithyāpriyaṃvadaiḥ ।śarīrarakṣāvyājena rakṣiṇo asya niyojayet ।।na cāsya saṅgo dātavyaḥ kruddhalubdhavimānitaiḥ ।aśakyantu guṇādhānaṃ kartuṃ taṃ bandhayet mukhaiḥ ।।adhikāreṣu sarveṣu vinītaṃ viniyojayet ।mṛgayāṃ pānamakṣāṃś ca rājyanāśaṃstyajennṛpaḥ ।।divāsvapnaṃ vṛthāṭyāñca vākpāruṣyaṃ vivarjayet ।nindāñca daṇḍapāruṣyamarthadūṣaṇamutsṛjet ।।ākārāṇāṃ samuchedo durgādīnāmasatkriyā ।

arthānāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ viprakīrṇatvameva ca ।।adeśakāle yaddānamapātre dānameva ca ।artheṣu dūṣaṇaṃ proktamasatkarmapravartanaṃ ।।kāmaṃ krodhaṃ madaṃ mānaṃ lobhaṃ darpañca varjayet ।tato bhṛtyajayaṅkṛtvā paurajānapadaṃ jayet ।।jayedvāhyānarīn paścādvāhyāś ca trividhārayaḥ ।guravaste yathā pūrvaṃ kulyānantarakṛtrimāḥ ।।pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mitraṃ sāmantañca tathā ripoḥ ।kṛtrimañca mahābhāga mitrantrividhamucyate ।।svāmyamātyañjanapadā durgaṃ daṇdastathaiva ca ।koṣo mitrañca dharmajña saptāṅgaṃ rājyamucyate ।।mūlaṃ svāmī sa vai rakṣyastasmādrājyaṃ viśeṣataḥ ।rājyāṅgadrohiṇaṃ hanyātkāle tīkṣṇo mṛdurbhavet ।।evaṃ lokadvayaṃ rājño bhṛtyair hāsaṃ vivarjayet ।bhṛtyāḥ paribhavantīha nṛpaṃ harṣaṇasatkathaṃ ।।lokasaṅgrahaṇārthāya kṛtakavyasano bhavet ।smitapūrvābhibhāṣī syāt lokānāṃ rañjanaṃ caret ।।dīrghasūtrasya nṛpateḥ karmahānirdhruvaṃ bhavet ।rāge darpe ca māne ca drohe pāpe ca karmaṇi ।।apriye caiva vaktavye dīrghasūtraḥ praśasyate ।suptamantro bhavedrājā nāpado guptamantrataḥ ।।

tasmādrāṣṭramiti kha, ga, gha, cha, ja, ña, ṭa ca
jñāyate hi kṛtaṃ karma nārabdhaṃ tasya rājyakaṃ ।ākārair iṅgitair gatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitena ca ।।netravaktavikārābhyāṃ gṛhyate antargataṃ punaḥ ।naikastu mantrayen mantraṃ na rājā bahubhiḥ saha ।।bahubhirmantrayet kāmaṃ rājā mantrān pṛthak pṛthak ।mantriṇāmapi no kuryān mantrī mantraprakāśanaṃ ।।kvāpi kasyāpi viśvāso bhavatīha sadā nṛṇāṃ ।niś cayaś ca tathā mantre kārya ekena sūriṇā ।।naśyedavinayādrājā rājyañca vinayāllabhet ।traividyebhyastrayīṃ vidyāṃ daṇḍanītiñca śāśvatīṃ ।।ānvīkṣikīñcārthavidyāṃ vārtārambhāṃś ca lokataḥ ।jitendriyo hi śaknoti vaśe sthāpayituṃ prajāḥ ।।pūjyā devā dvijāḥ sarve dadyāddānāni teṣu ca ।dvije dānañcākṣayo ayaṃ nidhiḥ kaiścinna nāśyate ।।saṅgrāmeṣvanivartitvaṃ prajānāṃ paripālanaṃ ।dānāni brāhmaṇānāñca rājño niḥśreyasamparaṃ ।।kṛpaṇānāthavṛddhānāṃ vidhavānāñca yoṣitāṃ ।yogakṣemañca vṛttiñca tathaiva parikalpayet ।।varṇāśramavyavasthānaṃ kāryantāpasapūjanaṃ ।na viśvasecca sarvatra tāpaseṣu ca viśvaset ।।viśvāsayeccāpi parantattvabhūtena hetunā ।

tasya karmakamiti kha

kvacit kasyāpi iti kha, ga, gha, ja, ṭa ca
vakaviccintayedarthaṃ siṃhavacca parākramet ।।vṛkavaccāvalumpeta śaśavacca viniṣpatet ।dṛḍhapraharī ca bhavet tathā śūkaravannṛpaḥ ।।citrakāraś ca śikhivad dṛḍhabhaktis tathāśvavat ।bhavecca madhurābhāṣī tathā kokilavannṛpaḥ ।।kākaśaṅkī bhavennityamajñātāṃ vasatiṃ vaset ।nāparīkṣitapūrvañca bhojanaṃ śayanaṃ spṛśet ।।nāvijñātāṃ striyaṃ gacchennājñātāṃ nāvamārudvet ।rāṣṭrakarṣī bhrasyate ca rājyārthāccaiva jīvitāt ।।bhṛto vatso jātabalaḥ karmayogyo yathā bhavet ।tathā rāṣṭraṃ mahābhāga bhṛtaṃ karmasahaṃ bhavet ।।sarvaṃ karmedamāyattaṃ vidhāne daivapauruṣe ।tayordaivamacintyaṃ hi pauruṣe vidyate kriyā ।।janānurāgaprabhavā rājño rājyamahīśriyaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rājadharmo nāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājadharmāḥ

puṣkara uvāca
svayameva karma daivākhyaṃ viddhi dehāntarārjitaṃ ।tasmāt pauruṣameveha śreṣṭhamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ ।।

pratikūlaṃ tathā daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa vihanyate ।sāttvikāt karmaṇaḥ pūrvāt siddhiḥ syātpauruṣaṃ vinā ।।pauruṣaṃ daivasampattyā kāle phalati bhārgava ।daivaṃ puruṣakāraś ca dvayaṃ puṃsaḥ phalāvahaṃ ।।kṛṣervṛṣṭisamāyogāt kāle syuḥ phalasiddhayaḥ ।sadharmaṃ pauruṣaṃ kuryānnālaso na ca daivavān ।।sāmādibhirupāyaistu sarve siddhyantyupakramāḥ ।sāma copapradānañca bhedadaṇḍau tathāparau ।।māyopekṣendrajālañca upāyāḥ sapta tāñchṛṇu ।dvividhaṃ kathitaṃ sāma tathyañcātathyameva ca ।।tatrāpyatathyaṃ sādhūnāmākrośāyaiva jāyate ।mahākulīnā hy ṛjavo dharmanityā jitendriyāḥ ।।sāmasādhyā atathyaiś ca gṛhyante rākṣasā api ।tathā taduprakārāṇāṃ kṛtānāñcaiva varṇanaṃ ।।parasparantu ye dviṣṭāḥ kruddhabhītāvamānitāḥ ।teṣānbhedaṃ prayuñjīta paramaṃ darśayedbhayaṃ ।।ātmīyān darśayedāśāṃ yena doṣeṇa bibhyati ।parāstenaiva te bhedyā rakṣyo vai jñātibhedakaḥ ।।sāmantakoṣo vāhyastu mantrāmātyātmajādikaḥ ।antaḥkoṣañcopaśāmya kurvan śatroś ca taṃ jayet ।।upāyaśreṣṭhaṃ dānaṃ syāddānādubhayalokabhāk ।na so asti nāma dānena vaśago yo na jāyate ।।

parasmādarśayedbhayamiti ña

mantrāmātyānujādika iti ña
dānavāneva śaknoti saṃhatān bhedituṃ parān ।trayāsādhyaṃ sādhayettaṃ daṇḍena ca kṛtena ca ।।daṇḍe sarvaṃ sthitaṃ daṇḍo nāśayedduṣpraṇīkṛtaḥ ।adaṇḍyān daṇḍayannaśyeddaṇḍyānrājāpyadaṇḍayan ।।daivadaityoraganarāḥ siddhā bhūtāḥ patatriṇaḥ ।utkrameyuḥ svamaryādāṃ yadi daṇḍān na pālayet ।।yasmādadāntān damayatyadaṇḍyāndaṇḍayatyapi ।damanāddaṇḍanāccaiva tasmāddaṇḍa vidurbudhāḥ ।।tejasā dur nirīkṣyo hi rājā bhāskaravattataḥ ।lokaprasādaṃ gaccheta darśanāccandravattataḥ ।।jagadvyāpnoti vai cārair ato rājā samīraṇaḥ ।doṣanigrahakāritvādrājā vaivasvataḥ prabhuḥ ।।yadā dahati durbuddhiṃ tadā bhavati pāvakaḥ ।yadā dānaṃ dvijātibhyo dadyāt tasmāddhaneśvaraḥ ।।dhanadhārāpravarṣitvāddevādau varuṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।kṣamayā dhārayaṃllekān pārthivaḥ pārthivo bhavet ।।utsāhamantraśaktyādyai rakṣedyasmāddharistataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sāmādyupāyo nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājadharmāḥ

puṣkara uvāca
daṇḍapraṇayanaṃ vakṣye yena rājñaḥ parā gatiḥ ।triyavaṃ kṛṣṇalaṃ viddhi pāpastatpañcakaṃ bhavet ।।kṛṣṇalānāṃ tathā ṣaṣṭyā karṣārdhaṃ rāmakīrtitaṃ ।suvarṇaś ca vinirdiṣṭo rāma ṣoḍaśamāpakaḥ ।।niṣkaḥ suvarṇāś catvāro dharaṇaṃ daśabhistu taiḥ ।tāmrarūpyasuvarṇānāṃ manametat prakīrtitaṃ ।।tāmrakaiḥ kārṣiko rāma proktaḥ kārṣāpaṇo budhaiḥ ।paṇānāṃ dve śate sārdhaṃ prathamaḥ sāhasaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।madhyamaḥ pañca vijñeyaḥ sahasramapi cottamaḥ ।caurair amūṣito yastu mūṣito asmīti bhāṣate ।।tatpradātari bhāpāle sa daṇḍyastāvadeva tu ।yo yāvadviparītārthaṃ mithyā vā yo vadettu taṃ ।।tau nṛpeṇa hy adharmajñau dāpyau taddviguṇaṃ damaṃ ।kūṭasākṣyantu kurvāṇāṃstrīn varṇāṃś ca pradāpayet ।।vivāsayedbrāhmaṇantu bhojyo vidhir na hīrataḥ ।nikṣepasya samaṃ mūlyaṃ daṇḍyo nikṣepabhuk tathā ।।

tathācāṣṭau iti cha, ja ca tāmrikaiḥ kārṣika ity ādiḥ, sāhasaḥ smṛta ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti

yo yāvadityādiḥ, taddviguṇaṃ damamityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti
vastrādikasya dharmajña tathā dharmo na hīyate ।yo nikṣepaṃ ghātayati yaścānikṣipya yācate ।।tāvubhau cauravacchāsyau daṇḍyau vā dviguṇaṃ dama ।ajñānādyaḥ pumān kuryāt paradravyasya vikrayaṃ ।।nirdoṣo jñānapūrvakantu cauravaddaṇḍamarhati ।mūlyamādāya yaḥ śilpaṃ na dadyād daṇḍya eva saḥ ।।pratiśrutyāpradātāraṃ suvarṇaṃ daṇḍayennṛpaḥ ।bhṛtiṃ gṛhya na kuryādyaḥ karmāṣṭau kṛṣṇalā damaḥ ।।akāle tu tyajan bhṛtyaṃ daṇḍyaḥ syāttāvadeva tu ।krītvā vikrīya vā kiñcidyasyehānuśayo bhavet ।।so antardaśāhāttatsvāmī dadyāccaivādadīta ca ।pareṇa tu daśāhasya nādadyānnaiva dāpayet ।।ādadaddhi dadaccaiva rājñā daṇḍyaḥ śatāni ṣaṭ ।vare doṣānavikhyāpya yaḥ kanyāṃ varayediha ।।dattāpyadattā sā tasya rājñā daṇḍyaḥ śatadvayaṃ ।pradāya kanyāṃ yo anyasmai punastāṃ samprayacchati ।।daṇḍaḥ kāryo narendreṇa tasyāpyuttamasāhasaḥ ।satyaṅkāreṇa vācā ca yuktaṃ puṇyamasaṃśayaṃ ।।lubdho anyatra ca vikretā ṣaṭśataṃ daṇḍamarhati ।dadyāddhenuṃ na yaḥ pālo gṛhītvā bhaktavetanaṃ ।।sa tu daṇḍyaḥ śataṃ rājñā suvarṇaṃ vāpyarakṣitā ।

cauravadvadhamarhatoti gha, ña ca

varayedyadi iti gha, ña ca
dhanuḥśataṃ parīṇāho grāmasya tu samantataḥ ।।dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ vāpi nagarasya ca kalpayet ।vṛtiṃ tatra prakurvīta yāmuṣṭro nāvalokayet ।।tatrāparivṛte dhānye hiṃsite naiva daṇḍanaṃ ।gṛhantaḍāgamārāmaṃ kṣetraṃ vā bhīṣayā haran ।।śatāni pañca daṇḍyāḥ syādajñānād dviśato damaḥ ।maryādābhedakāḥ sarve daṇḍyāḥ prathamasāhasaṃ ।।śataṃ brāhmaṇamākruśya kṣatriyo daṇḍamarhati ।vaiśyaś ca dviśataṃ rāma śūdraś ca badhamarhati ।।pañcāśadbrāhmaṇo daṇḍyaḥ kṣatriyasyābhiśaṃsane ।vaiśye vāpyardhapañcāśacchūdre dvādaśako damaḥ ।।kṣatriyasyāpnuyādvaiśyaḥ sāhasaṃ pūrvameva tu ।śūdraḥ kṣatriyamākruśya jihvācchedanamāpnuyāt ।।dharmopadeśaṃ viprāṇāṃ śūdraḥ kurvaṃś ca daṇḍabhāk ।śrutadeśādivitathī dāpyo dviguṇasāhasaṃ ।।uttamaḥ sāhasastasya yaḥ pāpair uttamān kṣipet ।pramādādyair mayā proktaṃ prītyā daṇḍārdhamarhati ।।mātaraṃ pitaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ śvaśuraṃ guruṃ ।ākṣārayañcchataṃ daṇḍyaḥ panthānaṃ cādadadguroḥ ।।antyajātirdvijātintu yenāṅgenāparādhnuyāt ।tadeva cchedayettasya kṣipramevāvicārayan ।।avaniṣṭhīvato darpād dvāvoṣṭhau chedayennṛpaḥ ।apamūtrayato meḍhramapaśabdayato gudaṃ ।।

utkṛṣṭāsanasaṃsthasya nīcasyādhonikṛntanaṃ ।yo yadaṅgaṃ ca rujayettadaṅgantasya kartayet ।।ardhapādakarāḥ kāryā gogajāśvoṣṭraghātakāḥ ।vṛkṣantu viphalaṃ kṛttvā suvarṇaṃ daṇḍamarhati ।।dviguṇaṃ dāpayecchinne pathi sīmni jalāśaye ।dravyāṇi yo haredyasya jñānato ajñānato apivā ।।sa tasyotpādya tuṣṭintu rājñe dadyāttato damaṃ ।yastu rajjuṃ ghaṭaṃ kūpāddharecchindyācca tāṃ prapāṃ ।।sa daṇḍaṃ prāpnuyān māsaṃ daṇḍyaḥ syāt prāṇitārane ।dhānyaṃ daśabhyaḥ kumbhebhyo harato abhyadhikaṃ badhaḥ ।।śeṣe apyekādaśaguṇaṃ tasya daṇḍaṃ prakalpayet ।suvarṇarajatādīnāṃ nṛstrīṇāṃ haraṇe badhaḥ ।।yena yena yathāṅgena steno nṛṣu viceṣṭate ।tattadeva haredasy pratyādeśāya pārthivaḥ ।।brāhmaṇaḥ śākadhānyādi alpaṃ gṛhṇanna doṣabhāk ।godevārthaṃ haraṃścāpi hanyādduṣṭaṃ badhīdyataṃ ।।gṛhakṣetrāpahartāraṃ tathā patnyabhigāminaṃ ।agnidaṃ garadaṃ hanyāttathā cābhyudyatāyudhaṃ ।।rājā gavābhicārādyaṃ hanyāccaivātatāyinaḥ ।parastriyaṃ na bhāṣeta pratiṣiddho viśenna hi ।।adaṇḍyā strī bhavedrājñā varayanto patiṃ svayaṃ ।uttamāṃ sevamānaḥ strī jaghanyo badhamarhati ।।bhartāraṃ laṅghayedyā tāṃ śvabhiḥ saṅghātayet striyaṃ ।

savarṇadūṣitāṃ kuryāt piṇḍamātropajīvinīṃ ।।jyāyasā dūṣitā nārī muṇḍanaṃ samavāpnuyāt ।vaiśyāgame tu viprasya kṣatriyasyāntyajāgame ।।kṣatriyaḥ prathamaṃ vaiśyo daṇḍyaḥ śūdrāgame bhavet ।gṛhītvā vetanaṃ veśyā lobhādanyatra gacchati ।।vetanandviguṇaṃ dadyāddaṇdañca dviguṇaṃ tathā ।bhāryā putrāś ca dāsāś ca śiṣyo bhrātā ca sodaraḥ ।।kṛṭāparādhāstāḍyāḥ sūrajvā veṇudalena vā ।pṛṣṭhe na mastake hanyāccaurasyāpnoti kilviṣaṃ ।।rakṣāsvadhikṛtaiyastu prajātyarthaṃ vilupyate ।teṣāṃ sarvasvamādāya rājā kuryāt pravāsanaṃ ।।ye niyuktāḥ svakāryeṣu hanyuḥ kāryāṇi karmiṇāṃ ।nirghṛṇāḥ krūramanasastānniḥsvān kārayennṛpaḥ ।।amātyaḥ prāḍvivāko vā yaḥ kuryāt kāryamanyathā ।tasya sarvasvamādāya taṃ rājā vipravāsayet ।।gurutalpe bhayaḥ kāryaḥ surāpāṇe surādhvajaḥ ।steyeṣu śvapadaṃ vidyād brahmahatyāśiraḥ pumān ।।śūdrādīn ghātayedrājā pāpān viprān pravāsayet ।mahāpātakināṃ vittaṃ varuṇāyopapādayet ।।grāmeṣvapi ca ye keciccaurāṇāṃ bhaktadāyakāḥ ।bhāṇḍārakoṣadāś caiva sarvāṃstānapi ghātayet ।।rāṣṭreṣu rāṣṭrādhikṛtān sāmantān pāpino haret ।sandhiṃ kṛtvā tu ye cauryaṃ rātrau kurvanti taskarāḥ ।।

teṣāṃ cchitvā nṛpo hastau tīkṣṇe śūle niveśayet ।taḍāgadevatāgārabhedakān ghātayennṛpaḥ ।।samutsṛjedrājamārge yastvamedhyamanāpadi ।sa hi kārṣāpaṇandaṇḍyastamamedhyañca śodhayet ।।pratimāsaṅkramabhido dadyuḥ pañcaśatāni te ।samaiś ca viṣamaṃ yo vā carate mūlyato api vā ।।samāpnuyānnaraḥ pūrvaṃ damaṃ madhyamameva vā ।dravyamādāya vaṇijāmanargheṇāvarundhatāṃ ।।rājā pṛthak pṛthak kuryāddaṇḍamuttamasāhasaṃ ।dravyāṇāṃ dūṣako yaś ca praticchandakavikrayī ।।madhyamaṃ prāpnuyāddaṇḍaṃ kūṭakartā tathottamaṃ ।kalahāpakṛtaṃ deyaṃ daṇḍaś ca dviguṇastataḥ ।।abhakṣyabhakṣye vipre vā śūdre vā kṛṣṇalo damaḥ ।tulāśāsanakartā ca kūṭakṛnnāśakasya ca ।।ebhiś ca vyavahartā yaḥ sa dāpyo damamuttamaṃ ।viṣāgnidāṃ patiguruviprāpatyapramāpiṇīṃ ।।vikarṇakaranāsauṣṭhī kṛtvā gobhiḥ pravāsayet ।kṣetraveśmagrāmavanavidārakās tathā narāḥ ।।rājapatnyabhigāmī ca dagdhavyāstu kaṭāgninā ।ūnaṃ vāpyadhikaṃ vāpi likhedyo rājaśāsanaṃ ।।pārajāyikacaurau ca muñcato daṇḍa uttamaḥ ।rājayānāsanāroḍhurdaṇḍa uttamasāhasaḥ ।।yo manyetājito asmīti nyāyenāpi parājitaḥ ।

tamāyāntaṃ parājitya daṇḍayed dviguṇaṃ damaṃ ।।āhvānakārī badhyaḥ syādanāhūtamathāhvayan ।dāṇḍikasya ca yo hastādabhimuktaḥ palāyate ।।hīnaḥ puruṣakāreṇa tad dadyāddāṇḍiko dhanaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe daṇḍapraṇayanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yuddhayātrā

puṣkara uvāca
yadā manyeta nṛpatirākrandena balīyasā ।pārṣṇigrāho abhibhūto me tadā yātrāṃ prayojayet ।।puṣtā yodhā bhṛṭā bhṛtyāḥ prabhūtañca balaṃ mama ।mūlarakṣāsamartho asmi tair gatvā śivire vrajet ।।śatrorvā vyasane yāyāt daivādyaiḥ pīḍitaṃ paraṃ ।bhūkampo yāndiśaṃ yāti yāñca keturvyadūṣayat ।।vidviṣṭanāśakaṃ sainyaṃ sambhūtāntaḥprakopanaṃ ।śarīrasphuraṇe dhanye tathā susvapradarśane ।।nimitte śakune dhanye jāte śatrupuraṃ vrajet ।

punarjitveti ga, gha, ja ca

tair vṛtvā iti sādhuḥ

sambhūtāntaḥkopadamiti kha, cha ca
padātināgabahulāṃ senāṃ prāvṛṣi yojayet ।।hemante śiśire caiva rathavājisamākulāṃ ।caturaṅgabalopetāṃ vasante vā śaranmmukhe ।।senā padātibahulā śatrūn jayati sarvadā ।aṅgasakṣiṇabhāge tu śastaṃ prasphuraṇaṃ bhavet ।।na śastantu tathā vāme pṛṣṭhasya hṛdayasya ca ।lāñchanaṃ piṭakañcaiva vijñeyaṃ sphuraṇaṃ tathā ।।viparyayeṇābhihitaṃ savye strīṇāṃ śubhaṃ bhavet ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yātrā nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭāviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

svapnādhyāyaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
svapnaṃ śaubhāśubhaṃ vakṣye duḥkhapraharaṇantathā ।nābhiṃ vinānyatra gātre tṛṇavṛkṣasamudbhavaḥ ।।cūrṇaṃ mūrdhni kāṃsyānāṃ muṇḍanaṃ nagnatā tathā ।malināmbaradhāritvamabhyaṅgaḥ paṅkadigdhatā ।।uccāt prapatanañcaiva vivāho gītameva ca ।tantrīvādyavinodaś ca dolārohaṇameva ca ।।arjanaṃ padmalohānāṃ sarpāṇāmatha māraṇaṃ ।

śaradyaśceti ña, ṭa ca
raktapuṣpadrumāṇāñca caṇḍālasya tathaiva ca ।।varāhāśvakharoṣṭrāṇāṃ tathā cārohaṇakriyā ।bhakṣaṇaṃ pakṣimāṃsānāṃ tailasya kṛśarasya ca ।।mātuḥ praveśo jaṭhare citārohaṇameva ca ।śakradhvajābhipatanaṃ patanaṃ śaśisūryayoḥ ।।divyāntarīkṣabhaumānāmutpātānāñca darśanaṃ ।devadvijātibhūpānāṃ gurūṇāṅkopa eva ca ।।nartanaṃ hasanañcaiva vivāho gītameva ca ।tantrīvādyavihīnānāṃ vādyānāmapi vādanaṃ ।।srotovahādhogamanaṃ snānaṃ gomayavāriṇā ।paṅkodakena ca tathā maśītoyena vāpyatha ।।āliṅganaṃ kumārīṇāṃ puruṣāñca maithunaṃ ।hāniś caiva svagātrāṇāṃ vireko vamanakriyā ।।dakṣiṇāśāpragamanaṃ vyādhinābhibhavas tathā ।phalānāmupahāniś ca dhātūnāṃ bhedanaṃ tathā ।।gṛhāṇāñcaiva patanaṃ gṛhasammārjanantathā ।krīḍā piśācakravyādavānarāntyanarair api ।।parādabhibhavaś caiva tasmācca vyasanodbhavaḥ ।kāṣāyavastradhāritvaṃ tadvastraiḥ krīḍanaṃ tathā ।।

tantrīvādyavinodaścetyādiḥ, tailasya kṛśarasya cetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha, jha pustakadvaye nāsti

vivāhotsava eva ceti ja

tāsāmeva ca maithunamiti ja

hāniś caivetyādiḥ krīḍanaṃ tathetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti
snehapānāvagāhau ca raktamālyānulepanaṃ ।ityadhānyāni svapnāni teṣāmakathanaṃ śubhaṃ ।।bhūjaś ca svapanaṃ tadvat kāryāṃ snānaṃ dvijārcanaṃ ।tilair homo haribrahmaśivārkagaṇapūjanaṃ ।।tathā stutiprapaṭhanaṃ puṃsūktādijapas tathā ।svapnāstu prathame yāme saṃvatsaravipākinaḥ ।।ṣaḍbhirmāsair dvitīye tu tribhirmāsair triyāmikāḥ ।caturthe tvardhamāsena daśāhādaruṇodaye ।।ekasyāmatha cedrātrau śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubhaṃ ।paścādṛṣṭastu yastatra tasya pākaṃ vinirdiśet ।।tasmāttu śobhane svapne paścātsvāpo na śasyate ।śailaprāsādanāgāśvavṛṣabhārohaṇaṃ hitaṃ ।।drumāṇāṃ śvetapuṣpāṇāṃ gagane ca tathā dvija ।drumatṛṇodbhavo nābhau tathā ca bahubāhutā ।।tathā ca bahuśīrṣatvaṃ palitodbhava eva ca ।suśukramālyadhāritvaṃ suśuklāmbaradhāritā ।।candrārkatārāgrahaṇaṃ parimārjanameva ca ।śakradhvajāliṅganañca dhvajocchrāyakriyā tathā ।।bhūmyabudhārāgrahaṇaṃ śatrūṇāñcaiva vikriyā ।jayo vivāde dyūte ca saṅgrāme ca tathā dvija ।।bhakṣaṇañcārdramāṃsānāmpāyasasya ca bhakṣaṇaṃ ।darśanaṃ rudhirasyāpi snānaṃ vā rudhireṇa ca ।।
prathame bhāge iti kha

bhūmyambudhīnāṃ grahaṇamiti ka, cha, ña ca
sarārudhiramadyānāṃ pānaṃ kṣīrasya vāpyatha ।astrair viceṣṭanaṃ bhūmau nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ tathā ।।mukhena dohanaṃ śastaṃ mahiṣīṇāṃ tathā gavāṃ ।siṃhīnāṃ hastinīnāñca baḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca ।।prasādo devaviprebhyo gurubhyaś ca tathā dvija ।ambhasā cābhiṣekastu gavāṃ śṛṅgacyutena ca ।।candrād bhraṣṭena vā rāma jñeyaṃ rājyapradaṃ hi tat ।rājyābhiṣekaś ca tathā chedanaṃ śiraso apyatha ।।maraṇaṃ vahnilābhaś ca vahnidāho gṛhādiṣu ।labdheś ca rājaliṅgānāṃ tantrīvādyābhivādanaṃ ।।yastu paśyati svapnānte rājānaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ ।hiraṇyaṃ vṛṣabhaṅgāñca kuṭumbastasya vardhate ।।vṛṣebhagṛhaśailāgravṛkṣārohaṇarodanaṃ ।ghṛṭaviṣṭhānulepo vā agamyāgamanaṃ tathā ।।sitavastraṃ prasannāmbhaḥ phalī vṛkṣo nabho amalaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe svapnādhyāyī nāma aṣṭāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ekonatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śakunāni

puṣkara uvāca
auṣadhāni ca yuktāni dhānyaṃ kṛṣṇamaśobhanaṃ ।kārpāsaṃ tṛṇaśuṣkañca gomayaṃ vai dhanāni ca ।।

aṅgāraṃ guḍasarjau ca muṇḍābhyaktañca nagnakaṃ ।ayaḥ paṅkaṃ carmakeśau unmattañca napuṃsakaṃ ।।caṇḍālaśvapacādyāni narā bandhanapālakāḥ ।garbhiṇī strī ca vidhavāḥ piṇyakādīni vai mṛtaṃ ।।tuṣabhasmakapālāsthibhinnabhāṇḍamaśastakaṃ ।aśasto vādyaśabdaś ca bhinnabhairavajharjharaḥ ।।ehīti purataḥ śabdaḥ śasyate na tu pṛṣṭhataḥ ।gaccheti paścācchabdo agryaḥ purastāttu vigarhitaḥ ।।kva yāsi tiṣṭha mā gaccha kinte tatra gatasya ca ।aniṣṭaśabdā mṛtyarthaṃ kravyādaś ca dhvajādigaḥ ।।skhalanaṃ vāhanānāñca śastrabhaṅgastathaiva ca ।śiroghātaś ca dvārādyaiścchatravāsādipātanaṃ ।।harimabhyarcya saṃstutya syādamaṅgalyanāśanaṃ ।dvitīyantu tato dṛṣṭvā viruddhaṃ praviśedgṛhaṃ ।।śvetāḥ sumanasaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ pūrṇakumbho mahottamaḥ ।māṃsaṃ matsyā dūraśabdā vṛddha ekaḥ paśustvajaḥ ।।gāvastaraṅgamā nāgā devaś ca jvalito analaḥ ।dūrvārdragomayaṃ veśyā svarṇarūpyañca ratnakaṃ ।।vacāsiddhārthakauṣadhyo mudga āyudhakhaḍgakaṃ ।chatraṃ pīṭhaṃ rājaliṅgaṃ śavaṃ ruditavarjitaṃ ।।phalaṃ ghṛṭaṃ dadhi payo akṣatādarśamākṣikaṃ ।śaṅkhaṃ ikṣuḥ śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bhaktavāditagītakaṃ ।।

guḍasarpau ceti ga, gha, ña ca
gambhīrameghastanitaṃ taḍittuṣṭiś ca mānasī ।ekataḥ sarvaliṅgāni manasastuṣṭirekataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe māṅgalyādhyāyo nāma ekonatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha triṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śakunāni

puṣkara uvāca
tiṣṭhato gamane praśne puruṣasya śubhāśubhaṃ ।nivedayanti śakunā deśasya nagarasya ca ।।sarvaḥ pāpaphalo dīpto nirdiṣṭo daivacintikaiḥ ।śāntaḥ śubhaphalaś caiva daivajñaiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ ।।ṣaṭprakārā vinirdiṣṭā śakunānāñca dīptayaḥ ।velādigdeśakaraṇarutajātivibhedataḥ ।।pūrvā pūrvā ca vijñeyā sā teṣāṃ balavattarā ।divācaro rātricaras tathā rātrau divācaraḥ ।।krūreṣu dīptā vijñeyā ṛkṣalagnagrahādiṣu ।dhūmitā sā tu vijñeyā yāṅgamiṣyati bhāskaraḥ ।।yasyāṃ sthitaḥ sā jvalitā muktā cāṅgāriṇī matā ।etāstisraḥ smṛtā dīptāḥ pañca śāntās tathāparāḥ ।।

dīptāyāndiśi digdīptaṃ śakunaṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।grāmo araṇyā vane grāmyās tathā ninditapādapaḥ ।।deśe caivāśubhe jñeyo deśadīpto dvijottamaḥ ।kriyādīpto vinirdiṣṭaḥ svajātyanucitakriyaḥ ।।rutadīptaś ca kathito bhinnabhairavanisvanaḥ ।jātidīptas tathā jñeyaḥ kevalaṃ māṃsabhojanaḥ ।।dīptācchānto vinirdiṣṭaḥ sarvair bhedaiḥ prayatnataḥ ।miśrair miśro vinirdiṣṭastasya vācyaṃ phalāphalaṃ ।।gośvoṣṭragardabhaśvānaḥ sārikā gṛhagodhikā ।caṭakā bhāsakūrmādyāḥ kathitā grāmavāsinaḥ ।।ajāviśukanāgendrāḥ kolo mahiṣavāyasau ।grāmyāraṇyā vinirdiṣṭāḥ sarve anye vanagocarāḥ ।।mārjārakukkuṭau grāmyau tau caiva vanagocarau ।tayorbhavati vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vai rūpabhedataḥ ।।gokarṇaśikhicakrāhvakharahārītavāyasāḥ ।kulāhakukkubhaśyenapherukhañjanavānarāḥ ।।śataghnacaṭakaśyāmacāsaśyenakaliñjalāḥ ।tittiraḥ śatapatrañca kapotaś ca tathā trayaḥ ।।khañjarīṭakadātyūhaśukarājīvakukkuṭāḥ ।bhāradvājaś ca sāraṅga iti jñeyā divācarāḥ ।।vāguryulūkaśarabhakrauñcāḥ śaśakakacchapāḥ ।lomāsikāḥ piṅgalikāḥ kathitā rātrigocarāḥ ।।

sarve anye ca vanecarā iti jha
haṃṣāś ca mṛgamārjāranakularkṣabhujaṅgamāḥ ।vṛkārisiṃhavyāghroṣṭragrāmaśūkaramānuṣāḥ ।।śvāvidvṛṣabhagomāyuvṛkakokilasārasāḥ ।turaṅgakaupīnanarā godhā hy ubhayacāriṇaḥ ।।balaprasthānayoḥ sarve purastātsaṅghacāriṇaḥ ।jayāvahā vinirdiṣṭāḥ paścānnidhanakāriṇaḥ ।।gṛhādgamya yadā cāso vyāharet purutaḥ sthitaḥ ।nṛpāvamānaṃ vadati vāmaḥ kalahabhojane ।।yāne taddarśanaṃ śastaṃ savyamaṅgasya vāpyatha ।caurair moṣamathākhyāti mayūro bhinnanisvanaḥ ।।prayātasyāgrato rāma mṛgaḥ prāṇaharo bhavet ।ṛkṣākhujambukavyāghrasiṃhamārjāragardabhāḥ ।।pratilomās tathā rāma kharaś ca vikṛtrasvanaḥ ।vāmaḥ kapiñjalaḥ śreṣṭhas tathā dakṣiṇasaṃsthitaḥ ।।pṛṣṭhato ninditaphalastittiristu na śasyate ।eṇā varāhāḥ pṛṣatā vāmā bhūtvā tu dakṣiṇāḥ ।।bhavantyarthakarā nityaṃ viparītā vigarhitāḥ ।vṛṣāśvajambukavyāghrāḥ siṃhamārjāragardabhāḥ ।।vāñchitārthakarā jñeyā dakṣiṇādvāmato gatāḥ ।śivā śyāmānanācchūcchūḥ piṅgalā gṛhagodhikā ।।śūkarī parapuṣṭā ca punnāmānaś ca vāmataḥ ।

pratilomāstathetyādiḥ, siṃhamārjāragardabhā ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja bha pustakadvaye nāsti
strīsañjñā bhāsakārūṣakapiśrīkarṇaśchitkarāḥ ।।kapiśrīkarṇapipyīkā ruruśyenāś ca dakṣiṇāḥ ।jātīkṣāhiśaśakroḍagodhānāṃ kīrtanaṃ śubhaṃ ।।tataḥ sandarśanaṃ neṣṭaṃ pratīpaṃ vānararkṣayoḥ ।kāryakṛdbalī śakunaḥ prasthitasya hi yo anvahaṃ ।।bhavettasya phalaṃ vācyaṃ tadeva divasaṃ budhaiḥ ।matā bhakṣyārthino bālā vairasaktāstathaiva ca ।।sīmāntamabhyantaritā vijñeyā niṣphalā dvija ।ekadvitricaturbhistu śivā dhanyā rutair bhavet ।।pañcabhiś ca tathā ṣaḍbhiradhanyā parikīrtitā ।saptabhiś ca tathā dhanyā niṣphalā parato bhavet ।।nṛṇāṃ romāñcajananī vāhanānāṃ bhayapradā ।jvālānalā sūryamukhī vijñeyā bhayavardhanī ।।prathamaṃ sāraṅge dṛṣṭe śubhe deśe śubhaṃ vadet ।saṃvatsaraṃ manuṣyasya aśubhe ca śubhaṃ tathā ।।tathāvidhannaraḥ paśyetsāraṅgaṃ prathame ahani ।ātmanaś ca tathātvena jñātavyaṃ vatsaraṃ phalaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śakunāni nāma triṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

punnāmāstathetyādiḥ, pippīkā ity antaḥ pāṭho asmallabdheṣu navapustakeṣu prāyaḥ samāna eva । teṣāmekatamasyāpi sāhāyyena śodhituṃ na sa śakyate । abhidhānādiṣvapi tatratyaśabdo nopalabhyante । atastatra viratiḥ

chapter 

ś athaikatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śakunāni

puṣkara uvāca
viśanti yena mārgeṇa vāyasā bahavaḥ puraṃ ।tena mārgeṇa ruddhasya purasya grahaṇaṃ bhavet ।।senāyāṃ yadi vāsārthe niviṣṭo vāyaso ruvan ।vāmo bhayāturastrasto bhayaṃ vadati dustaraṃ ।।chāyāṅgavāhanopānacchatravastrādikuṭṭane ।mṛtyustatpūjane pūjā tadiṣṭakaraṇe śubhaṃ ।।proṣitāgamakṛtkākaḥ kurvan dvāri gatāgataṃ ।raktaṃ dagdhaṃ gṛhe dravyaṃ kṣipanvahnivedakaḥ ।।nyasedraktaṃ purastācca nivedayati bandhanaṃ ।pītaṃ dravyaṃ tathā rukma rūpyameva tu bhārgava ।।yaccaivopanayed dravyaṃ tasya labdhiṃ vinirdiśet ।dravyaṃ vāpanayedyattu tasya hāniṃ vinirdiśet ।।purato dhanalabdhiḥ syādāmamāṃsasya chardane ।bhūlabdhiḥ syān mṛdaḥ kṣepe rājyaṃ ratnārpaṇe mahat ।।yātuḥ kāko anukūlastu kṣemaḥ karmakṣamo bhavet ।na tvarthasādhako jñeyaḥ pratikūlo bhayāvahaḥ ।।sammukhe abhyeti viruvan yātrāghātakaro bhavet ।vāmaḥ kākaḥ smṛto dhanyo dakṣiṇo arthavināśakṛt ।।

duṣkaramiti kha, cha ca

dakṣiṇo annavināśakṛditi ga, gha, ña ca
vāmo anulomagaḥ śreṣṭho madhyamo dakṣiṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।pratilomagatirvāmo gamanapratiṣedhakṛt ।।nivedayati yātrārthamabhipretaṃ gṛhe gataḥ ।ekākṣaracaraṇastvarkaṃ vīkṣamāṇo bhayāvahaḥ ।।koṭare vāsamānaś ca mahānarthakaro bhavet ।na śubhastūṣare kākaḥ paṅkāṅkaḥ sa tu śasyate ।।amedhyapūrṇavadanaḥ kākaḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ ।jñeyāḥ patatriṇo anye api kākavad bhṛgunandana ।।skandhāvārāpasavyasthāḥ śvāno vipravināśakāḥ ।indrasthāne narendrasya pureśasya tu gopure ।।antargṛhe gṛheśasya maraṇāya bhavedbhaṣan ।yasya jighrati vāmāṅgaṃ tasya syādarthasiddhaye ।।bhayāya dakṣiṇaṃ cāṅgaṃ tathā bhujamadakṣiṇaṃ ।yātrāghātakaro yāturbhavet pratimukhāgataḥ ।।mārgāvarodhako mārge caurān vadati bhārgava ।alābho asthimukhaḥ pāpo rajjucīramukhas tathā ।।sopānatkamukho dhanyo māṃsapūrṇamukho api ca ।amaṅgalyamukhadravyaṃ keśañcaivāśubhaṃ tathā ।।avamūtryāgrato yāti yasya tasya bhayaṃ bhavet ।yasyāvamūtrya vrajati śubhaṃ deśantathā drumaṃ ।।

nanvarthasādhaka ity ādiḥ, gṛhe gata ity antaḥḥ pāṭhaḥ ṭa pustake nāsti

koṭare ity ādiḥ sarvārthasādhaka ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ ṭapustake nāsti
maṅgalañca tathā dravyaṃ tasya syādarthasiddhaye ।śvavacca rāma vijñeyās tathā vai jambukādayaḥ ।।bhayāya svāmini jñeyamanimittaṃ rutaṅgavāṃ ।niśi caurabhayāya syādvikṛtaṃ mṛtyave tathā ।।śivāya svāmino rātrau balīvardo nadan bhavet ।utsṛṣṭavṛṣabho rājño vijayaṃ samprayacchati ।।abhayaṃ bhakṣayantyaś ca gāvo dattās tathā svakāḥ ।tyaktasnehāḥ svavatseṣu garbhakṣayakarā matāḥ ।।bhūmiṃ pādair vinighnantyo dīnā bhītā bhayāvahāḥ ।ārdrāṅgyo hṛṣṭaromāś ca śṛgalagnamṛdaḥ śubhāḥ ।।mahiṣyādiṣu cāpyetat sarvaṃ vācyaṃ vijānatā ।ārohaṇaṃ tathānyena saparyāṇasya vājinaḥ ।।jalopaveśanaṃ neṣṭaṃ bhūmau ca parivartanaṃ ।vipatkaranturaṅgasya suptaṃ vāpyanimittataḥ ।।yavamodakayordveṣastvakasmācca na śasyate ।vadanādrudhirotpattirvepanaṃ na ca śasyate ।।krīḍan vaikaḥ kapotaiś ca sārikābhirmṛtiṃ vadet ।sāśrunetro jihvayā ca pādalehī vinaṣṭaye ।।vāmapādena ca tathā vilikhaṃś ca vasundharāṃ ।svapedvā vāmapārśvena divā vā na śubhapradaḥ ।।bhayāya syāt sakṛnmūtrī tathā nidrāvilānanaḥ ।

saparyārhasyeti sādhuḥ

vināśakṛditi ja, ṭa ca
ārohaṇaṃ na ceddadyāt pratīpaṃ vā gṛhaṃ vrajet ।।yātrāvighātamācaṣṭe vāmapārśvaṃ tathā spṛśan ।heṣamāṇaḥ śatruyodhaṃ pādasparśī jayāvahaḥ ।।grāme vrajati nāgaścen maithunaṃ deśahā bhavet ।prasūtā nāgavanitā mattā cāntāya bhūpateḥ ।।ārohaṇaṃ na ceddadyāt pratīpaṃ vā gṛhaṃ vrajet ।madaṃ vā vāraṇo jahyādrājaghātakaro bhavet ।।vāmaṃ dakṣiṇapādena pādamākramate śubhaḥ ।dakṣiṇañca tathā dantaṃ parimārṣṭi kareṇa ca ।।vṛṣo aśvaḥ kuñjaro vāpi ripusainyagato aśubhaḥ ।khaṇḍameghātivṛṣṭyā tu senā nāśamavāpnuyāt ।।pratikūlagraharkṣāttu tathā sammukhamārutāt ।yātrākāle raṇe vāpi chatrādipatanaṃ bhayaṃ ।।hṛṣṭā narāścānulomā grahā vai jayalakṣaṇaṃ ।kākair yodhābhibhavanaṃ kravyādbhirmaṇḍalakṣayaḥ ।।prācīpaścimakaiśānī śaumyā preṣṭhā śubhā ca dik ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śakunāni nāma ekatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

vāmaṃ dakṣiṇetyādiḥ, sammukhamārutādityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ jha pustake nāsti

chapter 

ś atha dvātriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yātrāmaṇḍalacintādiḥ

puṣkara uvāca
sarvayātrāṃ pravakṣyāmi rājadharmasamāśrayāt ।astaṅgate nīcagate vikale ripurāśige ।।pratilome ca vidhvaste śukre yātrāṃ visarjayet ।pratilome budhe yātrāṃ dikpatau ca tathā ca grahe ।।vaidhṛtau ca vyatīpāte nāge ca śakunau tathā ।catuṣpāde ca kintughne tathā yātrāṃ vivarjayet ।।vipattāre naidhane ca pratyarau cātha janmani ।gaṇḍe vivarjayedyātrāṃ riktāyāñca tithāvapi ।।udīcī ca tathā prācī tayoraikyaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।paścimā dakṣiṇā yā dik tayoraikyaṃ tathaiva ca ।।vāyvagnidiksamudbhūtaṃ parighanna tu laṅghayet ।ādityacandraśaurāstu divasāś ca na śobhanāḥ ।।kṛttikādyāni pūrveṇa maghādyāni ca yāmyataḥ ।maitrādyānyapare cātha vāsavādyāni vāpyudak ।।sarvadvārāṇi śastāni chāyāmānaṃ vadāmi te ।āditye viṃśatirjñeyāś candre ṣoḍaśa kīrtitāḥ ।।bhaume pañcadaśaivoktāś caturdaśa tathā budhe ।

vivarjayet iti kha, ga, gha, ña ca

dik pūrvā yā tathodīcīti ja
trayodaśa tathā jīye śukre dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ ।।ekādaśa tathā saure sarvakarmasu kīrtitāḥ ।janmalagne śakracāpe sammukhe na vrajennaraḥ ।।śakunādau śubhe yāyājjayāya harimāsmaran ।vakṣye maṇḍalacintānte kartavyaṃ rājarakṣaṇaṃ ।।svāmyamātyaṃ tathā durgaṃ koṣo daṇḍastathaiva ca ।mitrañjanapadaś caiva rājyaṃ saptāṅgamucyate ।।saptāṅgasya tu rājyasya vighnakartṝn vināśayet ।maṇḍaleṣu ca sarveṣu vṛddhiḥ kāryā mahīkṣitā ।।ātmamaṇḍalamevātra prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhavet ।sāmantāstasya vijñeyā ripavo maṇḍalasya tu ।।upetastu suhṛj jñeyaḥ śatrumitramataḥ paraṃ ।mitramitraṃ tato jñeyaṃ mitramitraripustataḥ ।।etatpurastāt kathitaṃ paścādapi nibodha me ।pārṣṇigrāhastataḥ paścāttatastvākranda ucyate ।।āsārastu tato anyaḥ syādākrandāsāra ucyate ।jigīṣoḥ śatruyuktasya vimuktasya tathā dvija ।।nātrāpi niś cayaḥ śakyo vaktuṃ manujapuṅgava ।nigrahānugrahe śakto madhyasthaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ।।nigrahānugrahe śaktaḥ sarveṣāmapi yo bhavet ।udāsīnaḥ sa kathito balavān pṛthivīpatiḥ ।।

maṇḍaleṣu ca sarveṣu sureśvarasamā hi te ity ardhaśloka āsārastvityasya pūrvaṃ ṭa pustake vartate, parantvasaṃlagnaḥ
na kasyacidripurmitraṅkāraṇācchatrumitrake ।maṇḍalaṃ tava samproktametad dvādaśarājakaṃ ।।trividhā ripavo jñeyāḥ kulyānantarakṛtrimāḥ ।pūrvapūrvo gurusteṣāṃ duścikitsyatamo mataḥ ।।anantaro api yaḥ śatruḥ so api me kṛtrimo mataḥ ।pārṣṇigrāho bhavecchatrormitrāṇi ripavas tathā ।।pārṣṇigrāhamupāyaiś ca śamayecca tathā svakaṃ ।mitreṇa śatrorucchedaṃ praśaṃsanti purātanāḥ ।।mitrañca śatrutāmeti sāmantatvādanantaraṃ ।śatruṃ jigoṣurucchindyāt svayaṃ śaknoti cedyadi ।।pratāpavṛddhau tenāpi nāmitrājjāyate bhayaṃ ।yathāsya nodvijelloko viśvāsaś ca yathā bhavet ।।jigīṣurdharmavijayī tathā lokaṃ vaśannayet ।
e ity āgneye mahāopurāṇe yātrāmaṇḍalacintādirnāma dvātriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trayastriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ṣāḍguṇyaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
sāmabhedau mayā proktau dānadaṇḍau tathaiva ca ।daṇḍaḥ svadeśe kathitaḥ paradeśe vravīmi te ।।

śatruṃ jihīrṣurucchindyāditi gha, ña ca
prakāśaścāprakāśaś ca dvividho daṇḍa ucyate ।luṇṭhanaṃ grāmaghātaś ca śasyaghāto agnidīpanaṃ ।।prakāśo atha viṣaṃ vahnirvividhaiḥ puruṣair badhaḥ ।dūṣaṇañcaiva sādhūnāmudakānāñca dūṣaṇaṃ ।।daṇḍapraṇayaṇaṃ proktamupekṣāṃ śṛṇu bhārgava ।yadā manyate nṛpatī raṇe na mama vigrahaḥ ।।anarthāyānubandhaḥ syāt sandhinā ca tathā bhavet ।sāmalabdhāspadañcātra dānañcārthakṣayaṅkaraṃ ।।bhedadaṇḍānubandhaḥ syāttadopekṣāṃ samāśrayet ।na cāyaṃ mama śaknoti kiñcit kartumupadravaṃ ।।na cāhamasya śaknomi tatropekṣāṃ samāśrayet ।avajñopahatastatra rājñā kāryo ripurbhavet ।।māyopāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi utpātair anṛtaiś carat ।śatrorudvejanaṃ śatroḥ śivirasthasya pakṣiṇaḥ ।।sthūlasya tasya pucchasthāṃ kṛtvolkāṃ vipulāṃ dvija ।visṛjecca tataś caivamulkāpātaṃ pradarśayet ।।evamanye darśanīyā utpātā bahavo api ca ।udvejanaṃ tathā kuryāt kuhakair vividhair dviṣāṃ ।।sāṃvatsarāstāpasāś ca nāśaṃ brūyuḥ prarasya ca ।jigīṣuḥ pṛthivīṃ rājā tena codvejayet parān ।।devatānāṃ prasādaś ca kīrtanīyaḥ parasya tu ।āgatanno amitrabalaṃ praharadhvamabhītavat ।।evaṃ brūyādraṇe prāpte bhagnāḥ sarve pare iti ।

kṣveḍāḥ kilakilāḥ kāryā vācyaḥ śatrurhatas tathā ।।devājñāvṛṃhito rājā sannaddhaḥ samaraṃ prati ।indrajālaṃ pravakṣyāmi indraṃ kālena darśayet ।।caturaṅgaṃ balaṃ rājā sahāyārthaṃ divaukasāṃ ।balantu darśayet prāptaṃ raktavṛṣṭiñcendrapau ।।chinnāni ripuśīrṣāṇi prāsādāgreṣu darśayet ।ṣāḍguṇyaṃ sampravakṣyāmi tadvarau sandhivigrahau ।।sandhiś ca vigrahaś caiva yānamāsanameva ca ।dvaidhībhāvaḥ saṃśayaś ca ṣaḍguṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।।paṇabandhaḥ smṛtaḥ sandhirapakārastu vigrahaḥ ।jigīṣoḥ śatruviṣaye yānaṃ yātrābhidhīyate ।।vigraheṇa svake deśe sthitirāsanamucyate ।balārdhena prayāṇantu dvaidhībhāvaḥ sa ucyate ।।udāsīno madhyago vā saṃśrayātsaṃśayaḥ smṛtaḥ ।samena sandhiranveṣyo ahīnena ca balīyasā ।।hīnena vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ svayaṃ rājñā balīyasā ।tatrāpi śuddhapārṣṇistu balīyāṃsaṃ samāśrayet ।।āsīnaḥ karmavicchedaṃ śaktaḥ kartuṃ riporyadā ।aśuddhapārṣṇiścāsīta vigṛhya vasudhādhipaḥ ।।aśuddhapārṣṇirbalavān dvaidhībhāvaṃ samāśrayet ।balinā vigṛhītastu yo asandehena pārthivaḥ ।।saṃśrayastena vaktavyo guṇānāmadhamo guṇaḥ ।

prāsādāgre pradarśayediti ṭa

vigṛhītastu iti kha
bahukṣayavyayāyāsaṃ teṣāṃ yānaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।।bahulābhakaraṃ paścāttadā rājā samāśrayet ।sarvaśaktivihīnastu tadā kuryāttu saṃśrayaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe upāyaṣaḍguṇādirnāma trayastriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catustriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

prātyahikarājakarma

puṣkara uvāca
ajasraṃ karma vakṣyāmi dinaṃ prati yadācaret ।dvimuhūrtāvaśeṣāyāṃ rātrau nidrāntyajennṛpaḥ ।।vādyavandisvanair gītaiḥ paśyed gūḍhāṃstato narān ।vijñāyate na ye lokāstadīyā iti kenacit ।।āyavyayasya śravaṇaṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ yathāvidhi ।vegotsargaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā rājā snānagṛhaṃ vrajet ।।snānaṃ kuryānnṛpaḥ paścāddantadhāvanapūrvakaṃ ।kṛtvā sandhyāntato japyaṃ vāsudevaṃ prapūjayet ।।vahnau pavitrān juhuyāt tarpayedudakaiḥ pitṝn ।

bahukṣayavyayāyāmiti kha, cha, ṭa ca

āsīnaḥ karmavicchedamityādiḥ, rājā samāśrayedityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti
dadyātsakāñcīṃ dhenuṃ dvijāśīrvādasaṃyutaḥ ।।anulipto alaṅkṛtaś ca mukhaṃ paśyecca darpaṇe ।sasuvarṇe dhṛte rājā śṛṇuyāddivasādikaṃ ।।auṣadhaṃ bhiṣajoktaṃ ca maṅgalālambhanañcaret ।paśced guruṃ tena dattāśīrvado atha vrajetsabhāṃ ।।tatrastho brāhmaṇān paśyedamātyānmantriṇas tathā ।prakṛtīś ca mahābhāga pratīhāraniveditāḥ ।।śrutvetihāsaṃ kāryāṇi kāryāṇāṃ kāryanirṇayam ।vyavahārantataḥ paśyenmantraṃ kuryāttu mantribhiḥ ।।naikena sahitaḥ kuryānna kuryādbahubhiḥ saha ।na ca mūrkhair nacānāptair guptaṃ na prakaṭaṃ caret ।।mantraṃ svadhiṣṭhitaṃ kuryādyena rāṣṭraṃ na bādhate ।ākāragrahaṇe rājño mantrarakṣā parā matā ।।ākārair iṅgitaiḥ prajñā mantraṃ gṛhṇanti paṇḍitāḥ ।sāṃvatsarāṇāṃ vaidyānāṃ mantriṇāṃ vacane rataḥ ।।rājā vibhūtimāpnoti dhārayanti nṛpaṃ hi te ।mantraṃ kṛtvātha vyāyāmañcakre yāne ca śastrake ।।niḥsattvādau nṛpaḥ snātaḥ paśyedviṣṇuṃ supūjitaṃ ।hutañca pāvakaṃ paśyedviprān paśyetsupūjitān ।।

guptaṃ cāprakaṭaṃ carediti ga, ja, ṭa ca

ākāra grahaṇe rājño mantrarakṣā parā matā ity asya sthāne ākāreṅgitatattvajñaḥ kāryākāryavicakṣaṇa iti ṭa pustakapāṭhaḥ

rājādhibhūtimāpnotīti ja
bhūṣito bhojanaṅkuryād dānādyaiḥ suparīkṣitaṃ ।bhuktvā gṛhītatāmbūlo vāmapārśvena saṃsthitaḥ ।।śāstrāṇi cintayed dṛṣṭvā yodhān koṣṭhāyudhaṃ gṛhaṃ ।anvāsya paścimāṃ sandhyāṃ kāryāṇi ca vicintya tu ।।carān sampreṣya bhuktānnamantaḥpuracaro bhavet ।vādyagītair akṣito anyair evannityañcarennṛpaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ājasrikaṃ nāma catustriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

raṇadīkṣā

puṣkara uvāca
yātrāvidhānapūrvantu vakṣye sāṅgrāmikaṃ vidhiṃ ।saptāhena yadā yātrā bhaviṣyati mahīpateḥ ।।pūjanīyo hariḥ śambhurmodakādyair vināyakaḥ ।dvitīye ahani dikpālān sampūjya śayanañcaret ।।śayyāyāṃ vā tadagre atha devān prārcya manuṃ smaret ।namaḥ śambhoḥ trinetrāya rudrāya varadāya ca ।।vāmanāya virūpāya svapnādhipataye namaḥ ।

saṃviśediti ja
bhagavandevadeveśa śūlabhṛdvṛṣavāhana ।।iṣṭāniṣṭe mamācakṣva svapne suptasya śāśvata ।yajjāgrato dūramiti purodhā mantramuccaret ।।tṛtīye ahani dikpālān rudrāṃstān dikpatīnyajet ।grahān yajeccaturthe ahni pañcame cāśvinau yajet ।।mārge yā devatāstāsānnadyādīnāñca pūjanaṃ ।divyāntarīkṣabhaumasthadevānāñca tathā baliḥ ।।rātrau bhūtagaṇānāñca vāsudevādipūjanaṃ ।bhadrakālyāḥ śriyaḥ kuryāt prārthayet sarvadevatāḥ ।।vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaścāniruddhakaḥ ।nārāyaṇo abjajo viṣṇur nārasiṃho varāhakaḥ ।।śiva īśastatpuruṣo hy aghoro rāma satyajaḥ ।sūryaḥ somaḥ kujaścāndrijīvaśukraśanaiś carāḥ ।।rāhuḥ keturgaṇapatiḥ senānī caṇḍikā hy umā ।lakṣmīḥ sarasvatī durgā brahmāṇīpramukhā gaṇāḥ ।।rudrā indrādayo vahnir nāgāstārkṣyo apare surāḥ ।divyāntarīkṣabhūmiṣṭhā vijayāya bhavantu me ।।mardayantu raṇe śatrūn sampragṛhyopahārakaṃ ।saputramātṛbhṛtyo ahaṃ devā vaḥ śaraṇaṅgataḥ ।।
tatpurata iti kha

rātrāvityādiḥ, satyaja ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ ga pustake nāsti

mardayantu ca me śatrūniti gha, ña ca

avantu māṃ svabhṛtyo ahamiti ja, ṭa ca
cāmūnāṃ pṛṣṭhato gatvā ripunāśā namo astu vaḥ ।vinivṛttaḥ pradāsyāmi dattādabhyadhikaṃ baliṃ ।।ṣaṣṭhe ahni vijayasnānaṃ kartavyaṃ cābhiṣekavat ।yātrādine saptame ca pūjayecca trivikramaṃ ।।nīrājanoktamantraiś ca āyudhaṃ vāhanaṃ yajet ।puṇyāhajayaśabdena mantrametanniśāmayet ।।divyāntarīkṣabhūmiṣṭhāḥ santvāyurdāḥ surāś ca te ।devasiddhiṃ prāpnuhi tvaṃ devayātrāstu sā tava ।।rakṣantu devatāḥ sarvā iti śrutvā nṛpo vrajet ।gṛhītvā saśarañcāpaṃ dhanurnāgeti mantrata ।।tadviṣṇoriti japtvātha dadyādripumukhe padaṃ ।dakṣiṇaṃ padaṃ dvātriṃśaddikṣu prācyādiṣu kramāt ।।nāgaṃ rathaṃ hayañcaiva dhuryāṃś caivāruhet kramāt ।āruhya vādyair gacchet pṛṣthato nāvalokayet ।।krośamātraṃ gatastiṣṭhet pūjayeddevatā dvijān ।paradeśaṃ vrajet paścādātmasainyaṃ hi pālayan ।।rājā prāpya deveśantu deśapālantu pālayet ।devānāṃ pūjanaṃ kuryānna chindyādāyamatra tu ।।nāvamānayettaddeśyānāgatya svapuraṃ punaḥ ।
camūnāṃ pṛṣṭhaś caiva ripunāśo bhavedyatheti ṭa

jitvā śatruṃ pradāsyāmīti ṭa

jaitrā yātrāstviti ṭa

prāptavideśastu iti ga, gha, ña ca

deśācārantu pālayediti kha । deśācāraṇeṇa pālayediti ga, gha, cha, ja, ña ca
jayaṃ prāpyārcayeddevān dadyāddānāni pārthivaḥ ।।dvitīye ahani saṅgrāmo bhaviṣyati yadā tadā ।snapayedgajamaśvādi yajeddevaṃ nṛpasiṃhakaṃ ।।chatrādirājaliṅgāni śastrāṇi niśi vai gaṇān ।prātarnṛsiṃhakaṃ pūjya vāhanādyamaśeṣataḥ ।।purodhasā hutaṃ paśyedvahniṃ hutvā dvijānyajet ।gṛhītvā saśarañcāpaṃ gajādyāruhya vai vrajet ।।deśe tvadṛśyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ kuryāt prakṛtikalpanāṃ ।saṃhatān yodhayedalpān kāmaṃ vistārayedbahūn ।।sūcīmukhamanīkaṃ syādalpānāṃ bahubhiḥ saha ।vyūhāḥ prāṇyaṅgarūpāś ca dravyarūpāś ca kīrtitāḥ ।।garuḍo makaravyūhaś cakraḥ śyenastathaiva ca ।ardhacandraś ca vajraś ca śakaṭavyūha eva ca ।।maṇḍalaḥ sarvatobhadraḥ sūcīvyūhaś ca te narāḥ ।vyūhānāmatha sarveṣāṃ pañcadhā sainyakalpanā ।।dvau pakṣāvanupakṣau dvāvaśyaṃ pañcamaṃ bhavet ।ekena yadi vā dvābhyāṃ bhāgābhyāṃ yuddhamācaret ।।bhāgatrayaṃ sthāpayettu teṣāṃ rakṣārthameva ca ।na vyūhakalpanā kāryā rājño bhavati karhicit ।।mūlacchede vināśaḥ syānna yudhyecca svayannṛpaḥ ।sainyasya paścāttiṣṭhettu krośamātre mahīpatiḥ ।।bhagnasandhāraṇaṃ tatra yodhānāṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।pradhānabhaṅge sainyasya nāśasthānaṃ vidhīyate ।।

na saṃhatānna viralānyodhān vyūhe prakalpayet ।āyudhānāntu sammardo yathā na syāt parasparaṃ ।।bhettukāmaḥ parānīkaṃ saṃhatair eva bhedayet ।bhedarakṣyāḥ pareṇāpi kartavyāḥ saṃhatās tathā ।।vyūhaṃ bhedāvahaṃ kuryāt paravyūheṣu cecchayā ।gajasya pādarakṣārthāś catvārastu tathā dvija ।।rathasya cāśvāś catvāraḥ samāstasya ca carmiṇaḥ ।dhanvinaś carmibhistulyāḥ purastāccarmiṇo raṇe ।।pṛṣṭhato dhanvinaḥ praścāddhanvinānturagā rathāḥ ।rathānāṃ kuñjarāḥ paścāddātavyāḥ pṛthivīkṣitā ।।padātikuñjarāśvānāṃ dharmakāryaṃ prayatnataḥ ।śūrāḥ pramukhato deyāḥ skandhamātrapradarśanaṃ ।।kartavyaṃ bhīrusaṅghena śatruvidrāvakārakaṃ ।dārayanti purastāttu na deyā bhīravaḥ puraḥ ।।protsāhantyeva raṇe bhīrūn śūrāḥ purasthitāḥ ।prāṃśavaḥ śakunāśāś ca ye cājihmekṣaṇā narāḥ ।।saṃhatabhrūyugāś caiva krodhanā kalahapriyāḥ ।nityahṛṣṭāḥ prahṛṣṭāś ca śūrā jñeyāś cakāminaḥ ।।saṃhatānāṃ hatānāṃ ca raṇāpanayanakriyā ।pratiyuddhaṃ gajānāñca toyadānādikañca yat ।।

śatrudrāvakāraṇamiti kha, ga, gha, ña ca

ye ca jihmekṣaṇā iti kha, ga, gha, ña ca

valāpanayanakriyeti ja
āyudhānayanaṃ caiva pattikarma vidhīyate ।ripūṇāṃ bhettukāmānāṃ svasainyasya tu rakṣaṇaṃ ।।bhedanaṃ saṃhatānāñca carmiṇāṃ karma kīrtitaṃ ।vimukhīkaraṇaṃ yuddhe dhanvināṃ ca tathocyate ।।dūrāpasaraṇaṃ yānaṃ suhatasya tathocyate ।trāsanaṃ ripusainyānāṃ rathakarma tathocyate ।।bhedanaṃ saṃhatānāñca bhedānāmapi saṃhatiḥ ।prākāratoraṇāṭṭāladrumabhaṅgaś ca saṅgate ।।pattibhūrviṣamā jñeyā rathāśvasya tathā samā ।sakardamā ca nāgānāṃ yuddhabhūmirudāhṛtā ।।evaṃ viracitavyūhaḥ kṛtapṛṣṭhadivākaraḥ ।tathānulomaśukrārkidikpālamṛdumārutāḥ ।।yodhānuttejayetsarvānnāmagotrāvadānataḥ ।bhogaprāptyā ca vijaye svargaprāptyā mṛtasya ca ।।jitvārīn bhogasamprāptiḥ mṛtasya ca parā gatiḥ ।niṣkṛtiḥ svāmipiṇḍasya nāsti yuddhasamā gatiḥ ।।śūrāṇāṃ raktamāyāti tena pāpantyajanti te ।dhātādiduḥkhasahanaṃ raṇe tat paramantapaḥ ।।varāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi yānti śūraṃ raṇe mṛtaṃ ।svāmī sukṛtamādatte bhagnānāṃ vinivartināṃ ।।brahmahatyāphalaṃ teṣāṃ tathā proktaṃ pade pade ।tyaktvā sahāyān yo gaccheddevāstasya vinaṣṭaye ।।aśvamedhaphalaṃ proktaṃ śūrāṇāmanirvartināṃ ।

dharmaniṣṭhe jayo rājñi yoddhavyāś ca samāḥ samaiḥ ।।gajādyaiś ca gajādyāś ca na hantavyāḥ palāyinaḥ ।na prekṣakāḥ praviṣṭāś ca aśastrāḥ pratitādayaḥ ।।śānte nidrābhibhūte ca ardhottīrṇe nadīvane ।durdine kūṭayuddhāni śatrunāśārthamācaret ।।bāhū pragṛhya vikrośedbhagnā bhagnāḥ pare iti ।prāptaṃ mitraṃ balaṃ bhūri nāyako atra nipātitaḥ ।।senānīrnihatāścāyaṃ bhūpatiścāpi viplutaḥ ।vidrutānāntu yodhānāṃ mukhaṃ ghāto vidhīyate ।।dhūpāś ca deyā dharmajña tathā ca paramohanāḥ ।patākāś caiva sambhāro vāditrāṇām bhayāvahaḥ ।।samprāpya vijayaṃ yuddhe devānviprāṃś ca saṃyajet ।ratnāni rājagāmīni amātyena kṛte raṇe ।।tasya striyo na kasyāpi rakṣyāstāś ca parasya ca ।śatruṃ prāpya raṇe muktaṃ putravat paripālayet ।।punastena na yoddhavyaṃ deśācārādi pālayet ।tataś ca svapuraṃ prāpya dhruve bhe praviśed gṛhaṃ ।।devādipūjanaṃ kuryādrakṣedyodhakuṭumbakaṃ ।saṃvibhāgaṃ prāvāptaiḥ kuryād bhṛtyajanasya ca ।।raṇādīkṣā mayoktā te jayāya nṛpaterdhruvā ।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe raṇadīkṣā nāma pañcatriṃaśadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

dharmaniṣṭho jayo nitya iti kha, cha ca

devān viprān gurūn yajediti gha, ja, ña ca

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭtriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śrīstotraṃ

puṣkara uvāca
rājyalakṣmīsthiratvāya yathendreṇa purā śriyaḥ ।stutiḥ kṛtā tathā rājā jayārthaṃ stutimācaret ।।
indra uvāca
namasye sarvalokānāṃ jananīmabdhisambhavāṃ ।śriyamunnindrapadmākṣīṃ viṣṇuvakṣaḥsthalasthitāṃ ।।tvaṃ siddhistvaṃ svadhā svāhā sudhā tvaṃ lokapāvani ।sandhayā rātriḥ prabhā bhūtirmedhā śraddhā sarasvatī ।।yajñavidyā mahāvidyā guhyavidyā ca śobhane ।ātmavidyā ca devi tvaṃ vimuktiphaladāyinī ।।ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītistvameva ca ।saumyā saumyair jagadrūpaistvayaitaddevi pūritaṃ ।।kā tvanyā tvāmṛte devi sarvayajñamayaṃ vapuḥ ।adhyāste deva devasya yogicintyaṃ gadābhṛtaḥ ।।tvayā devi parityaktaṃ sakalaṃ bhuvanatrayaṃ ।vinaṣṭaprāyamabhavat tvayedānīṃ samedhitaṃ ।।dārāḥ putrās tathāgāraṃ suhṛddhānyadhanādikaṃ ।bhavatyetanmahābhāge nityaṃ tvadvīkṣaṇān nṛṇāṃ ।।

sarvabhūtānāmiti gha, ja, ña ca

javanīmambusambhavāmiti ja
śarīrārogyamaiśvaryamaripakṣakṣayaḥ sukhaṃ ।devi tvaddṛṣṭidṛṣṭānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na durlabhaṃ ।।tvamambā sarvabhūtānāṃ devadevo hariḥ pitā ।tvayaitadvoiṣṇunā cāmba jagadvyāptaṃ carācaraṃ ।।mānaṃ koṣaṃ tathā koṣṭhaṃ mā gṛhaṃ mā paricchadaṃ ।mā śarīraṃ kalatrañca tyajethāḥ sarvapāvani ।।mā putrānmāsuhṛdvargānmā paśūnmā vibhūṣaṇaṃ ।tyajethā mama devasya viṣṇorvakṣaḥsthalālaye ।।sattvena satyaśaucābhyāṃ tathā śīlādibhirguṇaiḥ ।tyajante te narā sadyaḥ santyaktā ye tvayāmale ।।tvayāvalokitāḥ sadyaḥ śīlādyair akhilair guṇaiḥ ।kulaiśvaryaiś ca yujyante puruṣā nirguṇā api ।।sa ślāghyaḥ sa guṇī dhanyaḥ sa kulīnaḥ sa buddhimān ।sa śūraḥ sa ca vikrānto yastvayā devi vīkṣitaḥ ।।sadyo vaiguṇyamāyānti śīlādyāḥ sakalā guṇāḥ ।parāṅmukhī jagaddhātrī yasya tvaṃ viṣṇuvallabhe ।।na te varṇayituṃ śaktā guṇān jihvāpi vedhasaḥ ।prasīda devi padmākṣi nāsmāṃstyākṣīḥ kadācana ।।
puṣkara uvāca
evaṃ stutā dadau śrīś ca varamindrāya cepsitaṃ ।susthiratvaṃ ca rājyasya saṅgrāmavijayādikaṃ ।।

kṣayaḥ svayamiti kha, ga, gha, jha ca । kṣayaḥ śubhamiti cha

devadevasyeti ṭa

vakṣaḥsthalāśraye iti kha, ga, gha, ña ca
svastotrapāṭhaśravaṇakartṝṇāṃ bhuktimuktidaṃ ।śrīstotraṃ satataṃ tasmāt paṭhecca śṛṇuyānnaraḥ ।।
e ity agneye mahāpurāṇe śrīstotraṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rāmoktanītiḥ

agnir uvāca
nītiste puṣkaroktā tu rāmoktā lakṣmaṇāya yā ।jayāya tāṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu dharmādivardhanīṃ ।।
rāma uvāca
nyānenārjanamarthasya vardhanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ caret ।satpātrapratipattiś ca rājavṛttaṃ caturvidhaṃ ।।nayasya vinayo mūlaṃ vinayaḥ śāstraniś cayāt ।vinayo hīndriyajayastair yuktaḥ pālayenmahīṃ ।।śāstraṃ prajñā dhṛtirdākṣyaṃ prāgalbhyaṃ dhārayiṣṇutā ।utsāho vāgmitaudāryamāpatkālasahiṣṇutā ।।prabhāvaḥ śucitā maitrī tyāgaḥ satyaṃ kṛtajñatā ।kulaṃ śīlaṃ samaśceti guṇāḥ sampattihetavaḥ ।।prakīrṇaviṣayāraṇye dhāvantaṃ vipramāthinaṃ ।

vāgimatā dārḍhyamāpatkālasahiṣṇuteti kha, gha, ja, jha ca
jñānāṅkuśena kurvīta vaśyamindriyadantinaṃ ।।kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobho harṣo māno madas tathā ।ṣaḍvargamutsṛjedenamasmiṃstyakte sukhī nṛpaḥ ।।ānvīkṣikīṃ trayīṃ vārtāṃ daṇḍanītiṃ ca pārthivaḥ ।tadvaidyaistatkriyopaitaiścintatayedvinayānvitaḥ ।।ānvīkṣikyārthavijñānaṃ dharmādharmau trayīsthitau ।arthānarthau tu vārtāyāṃ daṇḍanītyāṃ nayānayau ।।ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣamā ।varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate ।।prajāḥ samanugṛhṇīyāt kuryādācārasaṃsthitiṃ ।vāk sūnṛtā dayā dānaṃ hīnopagatarakṣaṇaṃ ।।iti vṛttaṃ satāṃ sādhuhitaṃ satpuruṣavrataṃ ।ādhivyādhiparītāya adya śvo vā vināśine ।।ko hi rājā śarīrāya dharmāpetaṃ samācaret ।na hi svamukhamanvicchan pīḍayet kṛpaṇaṃ janaṃ ।।kṛpaṇaḥ pīḍyamāno hi manyunā hanti pārthivaṃ ।kriyate abhyarhaṇīyāya svajanāya yathāñjaliḥ ।।tataḥ sādhutaraḥ kāryo durjanāya śivarthinā ।priyamevābhidhātavyaṃ satsu nityaṃ dviṣatsu ca ।।devāste priyavaktāraḥ paśavaḥ krūravādinaḥ ।śucirāstikyapūtātmā pūjayeddevatāḥ sadā ।।

dīnopagatarakṣaṇamiti kha, gha, cha, ja, ña, ṭa ca

svamukhamanvicchuriti kha, cha ca
devatāvat gurujanamātmavacca suhṛjjanaṃ ।praṇipātena hi guruṃ sato amṛṣānuceṣṭitaiḥ ।।kurvītābhimukhān bhṛtyair devān sukṛtakarmaṇā ।sadbhāvena harenmitraṃ sambhrameṇa ca bāndhavān ।।strībhṛtyān premadānābhyāṃ dākṣiṇyetaraṃ janaṃ ।anindā parakṛtyeṣu svadharmaparipālanaṃ ।।kṛpaṇeṣu dayālutvaṃ sarvatra madhurā giraḥ ।prāṇair apyupakāritvaṃ mitrāyāvyabhicāriṇe ।।gṛhāgate pariṣvaṅgaḥ śaktyā dānaṃ sahiṣṇutā ।svasamṛddhiṣvanutsekaḥ paravṛddhiṣvamatsaraḥ ।।aparopatāpi vacanaṃ maunavratacariṣṇutā ।bandhabhirbaddhasaṃyogaḥ svajane caturaśratā ।।ucitānuvidhāyitvamiti vṛttaṃ mahātmanāṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rāmoktanītirnāma saptatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭatriṃśadadhikaśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājadharmāḥ

rāma uvāca
svāmyamātyañca rāṣṭrañca durgaṃ koṣo balaṃ suhṛt ।parasparopakārīdaṃ saptāṅgaṃ rājyamucyate ।।

svasamṛddhiṣvityādiḥ, mīnavratacariṣṇutetyantaḥ ja pustake nāsti
rājyāṅgānāṃ varaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sādhanaṃ pālayet sadā ।kulaṃ śīlaṃ vayaḥ sattvaṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ kṣiprakāritā ।।avisaṃvāditā satyaṃ vṛddhasevā kṛtajñatā ।daivasampannatā buddhirakṣudraparivāratā ।।śakyasāmantatā caiva tathā ca dṛḍhabhaktitā ।dīrghadarśitvamutsāhaḥ śucitā sthūlalakṣitā ।।vinītatvaṃ dhārmikatā sādhoś ca nṛpaterguṇāḥ ।prakhyātavaṃśamakrūraṃ lokasaṅgrāhiṇaṃ śuciṃ ।।kurvītātsahitāṅkṣī paricāraṃ mahīpatiḥ ।vāgmī pragalbhaḥ smṛtimānudagro balavān vaśī ।।netā daṇḍasya nipuṇaḥ kṛtaśilpaparigrahaḥ ।parābhiyogaprasahaḥ sarvaduṣṭapratikriyā ।।pravṛttānvavekṣī ca sandhivigrahatattvavit ।gūḍhamantrapracārajño deśakālavibhāgavit ।।ādātā samyagarthānāṃ viniyoktā ca pātravit ।krodhalobhabhayadrohadambhacāpalavarjitaḥ ।।paropatāpapaiśūnyamātsaryerṣānṛtātigaḥ ।vṛddhopadeśasampannaḥ śakto madhuradarśanaḥ ।।guṇānurāgasthitimānātmasampadguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ।kulīnāḥ śucayaḥ śūrāḥ śrutavanto anurāgiṇaḥ ।।

svāmyamātyetyādiḥ, pālayet sadetyantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ga pustake nāsti

tadvacca dṛḍhabhaktiteti ga

kṛtaśilpaḥ svavagraha iti gha, ña ca

sarvaduṣṭapratigraha iti kha, gha, cha ca

paracchidrānvavekṣī ceti gha, ña ca

guṇavanto anugāmina iti ga
daṇḍanīteḥ prayoktāraḥ sacivāḥ syurmahīpateḥ ।suvigraho jānapadaḥ kulaśīkakalānvitaḥ ।।vāgmī pragalbhaś cakṣuṣmānutsāhī pratipattimān ।stambhacāpalahīnaś ca maitraḥ kleśasahaḥ śuciḥ ।।satyasattvadhṛtisthairyaprabhāvārogyasaṃyutaḥ ।kṛtaśilpaś ca dakṣaś ca prajñāvān dhāraṇānvitaḥ ।।dṛḍhabhaktirakartā ca vairāṇāṃ sacivo bhavet ।smṛtistatparatārtheṣu cittajño jñānaniś cayaḥ ।।dṛḍhatā mantraguptiś ca mantrisampat prakīrtitā ।trayyāṃ ca daṇḍanītyāṃ ca kuśalaḥ syāt purohitaḥ ।।atharvadevavihitaṃ kuryācchāntikapauṣṭikaṃ ।sādhutaiṣāmamātyānāṃ tadvidyaiḥ saha buddhimān ।।cakṣuṣmattāṃ ca śilpañca parīkṣeta guṇadvayaṃ ।svajanebhyo vijānīyāt kulaṃ sthānamavagrahaṃ ।।parikarmasu dakṣañca vijñānaṃ dhārayiṣṇutāṃ ।guṇatrayaṃ parīkṣeta prāgalabhyaṃ prītitāṃ tathā ।।kathāyogeṣu buddhyeta vāgmitvaṃ satyavāditāṃ ।utasāhaṃ ca prabhāvaṃ ca tathā kleśasahiṣṇutāṃ ।।dhṛtiṃ caivānurāgaṃ ca sthairyañcāpadi lakṣayet ।bhaktiṃ maitrīṃ ca śaucaṃ ca jānīyādvyavahārataḥ ।।

kṛtaśīlaśceti ja

cintako jñānaniś caya iti ga

parīkṣeta guṇatrayamiti ja

pratibhāṃ tatheti ja

svajanebhya ity ādiḥ, kleśasahiṣṇutāmityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ cha pustake nāsti
saṃvāsibhyo balaṃ sattvamārogyaṃ śīlameva ca ।astabdhatāmacāpalyaṃ vairāṇāṃ cāpyakīrtanaṃ ।।pratyakṣato vijānīyād bhadratāṃ kṣudratāmapi ।phalānumeyāḥ sarvatra parokṣaguṇavṛttayaḥ ।।śasyākaravatī puṇyā khanidravyasamanvitā ।gohitā bhūrisalilā puṇyair janapadair yutā ।।ramyā sakuñjarabalā vāristhalapathānvitā ।adevamātṛkā ceti śasyate bhūribhūtaye ।।śūdrakāruvaṇikprāyo mahārambhaḥ kṛṣī balaḥ ।sānurāgo ripudveṣī pīḍāsahakaraḥ pṛthuḥ ।।nānādeśyaiḥ samākīrṇo dhārmikaḥ paśumān balī ।īdṛkjanapadaḥ śasto amūrkhavyasanināyakaḥ ।।pṛthusīmaṃ mahākhātamuccaprākāratoraṇaṃ ।puraṃ samāvasecchailasarinmaruvanāśrayaṃ ।।jalavaddhānyadhanavaddurgaṃ kālasahaṃ mahat ।audakaṃ pārvataṃ vārkṣamairiṇaṃ dhanvinaṃ ca ṣaṭ ।।īpsitadravyasampūrṇaḥ pitṛpaitāmahocitaḥ ।dharmārjito vyayasahaḥ koṣo dharmādivṛddhaye ।।pitṛpaitāmaho vaśyaḥ saṃhato dattavetanaḥ ।vikhyātapauruṣo janyaḥ kuśulaḥ śakunair vṛtaḥ ।।nānāprahaṇopeto nānāyuddhaviśāradaḥ ।

sattvamārogyaṃ kulameva ceti ja

makhyavyasananāyaka iti ga

uccaprakāragopuramiti gha, ña ca
nānāyodhasamākīrṇau nīrājitahayadvipaḥ ।।pravāsāyāsaduḥkheṣu yuddheṣu ca kṛtaśramaḥ ।advaidhakṣatriyaprāyo daṇḍo daṇḍavatāṃ mataḥ ।।yogavijñānasattvārūḍhyaṃ mahāpakṣaṃ priyamvadaṃ ।āyātikṣamamadvaidhaṃ mitraṃ kurvīta satkulaṃ ।।dūrādevābhigamanaṃ spaṣṭārthahṛdayānugā ।vāk satkṛtya pradānañca trividho mitrasaṅgrahaḥ ।।dharmakāmārthasaṃyogo mitrāttu trividhaṃ phalaṃ ।aurasaṃ tatra sannaddhaṃ tathā vaṃśakramāgataṃ ।।rakṣitaṃ vyasanebhyaś ca mitraṃ jñeyaṃ caturvidhaṃ ।mitre guṇāḥ satyatādyāḥ samānasukhadukhatā ।।vakṣye anujīvināṃ vṛtte sevī seveta bhūpatiṃ ।dakṣatā bhadratā dārḍhyaṃ kṣāntiḥ kleśasahiṣṇutā ।।santoṣaḥ śīlamutsāho maṇḍayatyanujīvinaṃ ।yathākālamupāsīta rājānaṃ sevako nayāt ।।parasthānagamaṃ krauryamauddhatyaṃ matsarantyajet ।vigṛhya kathanaṃ bhṛtyo na kuryāj jyāyasā saha ।।guhyaṃ marma ca mantrañca na ca bhartuḥ prakāśayet ।raktād vṛttiṃ samīheta viraktaṃ santyajennṛpaṃ ।।akārye pratiṣedhaś ca kārye cāpi pravartanaṃ ।saṅkṣepāditi sadvṛttaṃ bandhumitrānujīvināṃ ।।

mitraṃ kurvīta satkriyamiti ja

tatra sambaddhamiti ga
ājīvyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ rājā parjanyavadbhavet ।āyadvāreṣu cāptyarthaṃ dhanaṃ cādadatīti ca ।।kuryādudyogasampannānadhyakṣān sarvakarmasu ।kṛṣirvaṇikpatho durgaṃ setuḥ kuñjarabandhanaṃ ।।khanyākarabalādānaṃ śūnyānāṃ ca niveśanaṃ ।aṣṭavargamimaṃ rājā sādhuvṛtto anupālayet ।।āmuktikebhyaś caurebhyaḥ paurebhyo rājavallabhāt ।pṛthivīpatilobhācca prajānāṃ pañcadhā bhayaṃ ।।avekṣyaitadbhayaṃ kāle ādadīta karaṃ nṛpaḥ ।abhyantaraṃ śarīraṃ svaṃ vāhyaṃ rāṣṭrañca rakṣayet ।।daṇḍāṃsta daṇḍayedrājā svaṃ rakṣecca viṣāditaḥ ।striyaḥ putrāṃś ca śatrubhyo viśvasenna kadācana ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rājadharmo nāma aṣṭatriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ṣāḍguṇyaṃ

rāma uvāca
maṇḍalaṃ cintayet mukhyaṃ rājā dvādaśarājakaṃ ।arirmitramarermitraṃ mitramitramataḥ paraṃ ।।

rājyaṃ rāṣṭrañceti kha, cha, ña ca

lakṣayediti ña
tathārimitramitrañca vijigīṣoḥ puraḥ smṛtāḥ ।pārṣṇigrāhaḥ smṛtaḥ paścādākrandastadanantaraṃ ।।āsārāvanayoś caivaṃ vijagīṣāś ca maṇḍalaṃ ।areś ca vijigīṣoś ca madhyamo bhūmyanantaraḥ ।।anugrahe saṃhatayor nigrahe vyastayoḥ prabhuḥ ।maṇḍalādvahireteṣāmudāsīno balādhikaḥ ।।anugrahe saṃhatānāṃ vyastānāṃ ca budhe prabhuḥ ।sandhiñca vigrahaṃ yānamāsānadi vadāmi te ।।balavadvigrahītena sandhiṃ kuryācchivāya ca ।kapāla upahāraś ca santānaḥ saṅgatas tathā ।।upanyāsaḥ pratīkāraḥ saṃyogaḥ puruṣāntaraḥ ।adṛṣṭanara ādiṣṭa ātmāpi sa upagrahaḥ ।।parikramas tathā chinnas tathā ca paradūṣaṇaṃ ।skandhopayeyaḥ sandhiś ca sandhayaḥ ṣoḍaśeritāḥ ।।parasparopakāraś ca maitraḥ sambandhakas tathā ।upahārāś ca catvārasteṣu mukhyāś ca sandhayaḥ ।।bālo vṛddho dīrgharogas tathā bandhuvahiṣkṛtaḥ ।mauruko bhīrukajano lubdho lubdhajanas tathā ।।viraktaprakṛtiś caiva viṣayeṣvatiśaktimān ।anekacittamantraś ca devabrāhmaṇanindakaḥ ।।daivopahatakaś caiva daivanindaka eva ca ।durbhikṣavyasanopeto balavyasanasaṅkulaḥ ।।

puraḥsthitā iti kha, cha ca

maitraḥ sukhakarastatheti ga
svadeśastho bahuripurmuktaḥ kālena yaś ca ha ।satyadharmavyapetaś ca viṃśatiḥ puruṣā amī ।।ertaiḥ sandhiṃ na kurvīta vigṛhṇīyāttu kebalaṃ ।parasparāpakāreṇa puṃsāṃ bhavati vigrahaḥ ।।ātmano abhyudayākāṅkṣī pīḍyamānaḥ pareṇa vā ।deśakālabalopetaḥ prārabheteha vigrahaṃ ।।rājyastrīsthānadeśānāṃ jñānasya ca balasya ca ।apahārī mado mānaḥ pīḍā vaiṣayikī tathā ।।jñānātmaśaktidharmāṇāṃ vighāto daivameva ca ।mitrārthañcāpamānaś ca tathā bandhuvināśanaṃ ।।bhūtānugrahavicchedas tathā maṇḍaladūṣaṇaṃ ।ekārthābhiniveśatvamiti vigrahayonayaḥ ।।sāpatnyaṃ vāstujaṃ strījaṃ vāgjātamaparādhajaṃ ।vairaṃ pañcavidhaṃ proktaṃ sādhanaiḥ praśamannayet ।।kiñcitphalaṃ niṣphalaṃ vā sandigdhaphalameva ca ।tadātve doṣajananamāyatyāñcaiva niṣphalaṃ ।।āyatyāñca tadātve ca doṣasañjananaṃ tathā ।aparijñātavīryeṇa pareṇa stobhito api vā ।।parārthaṃ strīnimittañca dīrghakālaṃ dvijaiḥ saha ।akāladaivayuktena baloddhatasakhena ca ।।

ātmana ity adiḥ, vigrahamityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ gapustake nāsti

avahāra iti gha

jñānārthaśaktidharmāṇāmiti ña
tadātve phalasaṃyuktamāyatyāṃ phalavarjitaṃ ।āyatyāṃ phalasaṃyuktaṃ tadātve niṣphalaṃ tathā ।।itīmaṃ ṣoḍaśavidhannakuryādeva vigrahaṃ ।tadātvāyatisaṃśuddhaṃ karma rājā sadācaret ।।hṛṣṭaṃ puṣṭaṃ balaṃ matvā gṛhṇīyādviparītakaṃ ।mitramākranda āsāro yadā syurdṛḍhabhaktayaḥ ।।parasya viparītañca tadā vigrahamācaret ।vigṛhya sandhāya tathā sambhūyātha prasaṅgataḥ ।।upekṣayā ca nipuṇair yānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ smṛtaṃ ।parasparasya sāmarthyavighātādāsanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।areś ca vijagīṣoś ca yānavat pañcadhā smṛtam ।balinīrdviṣatormadhye vācātmānaṃ samarpayan ।।dvaidhībhāvena tiṣṭheta kākākṣivadalakṣitaḥ ।ubhayorapi sampāte seveta balavattaraṃ ।।yadā dvāvapi necchetāṃ saṃśleṣaṃ jātasaṃvidau ।tadopasarpettacchatrumadhikaṃ vā svayaṃ vrajet ।।ucchidyamāno balinā nirupāyapratikriyaḥ ।kuloddhataṃ satyamāryamāseveta balotkaṭaṃ ।।taddarśanopāstikatā nityantadbhāvabhāvitā ।tatkāritapraśriyatā vṛttaṃ saṃśrayiṇaḥ śrutaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ṣāḍguṇyaṃ nāma ekonacatvārtiṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

ubhayorityādiḥ, svayaṃ vrajedityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti

balotkaramiti ga, gha, ja, ña ca

chapter 

ś atha catvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

samādiḥ

rāma uvāca
prabhavotsāhaśaktibhyāṃ mantraśaktiḥ praśasyate ।prabhāvotsāhavān kāvyo jito devapurodhasā ।।mantrayeteha kāryāṇi nānāptair nāvipaścitā ।aśakyārambhavṛttīnāṃ kutaḥ kleśādṛte phalaṃ ।।avijñātasya vijñānaṃ vijñātasya ca niś cayaḥ ।arthadvaidhasya sandehacchedanaṃ śeṣadarśanaṃ ।।sahāyāḥ sādhanopāyā vibhāgo deśakālayoḥ ।vipatteś ca pratīkāraḥ pañcāṅgo mantra iṣyate ।।manaḥprasādaḥ śraddhā ca tathā karaṇapāṭavaṃ ।sahāyotthānasampacca karmaṇāṃ siddhilakṣaṇaṃ ।।madaḥ pramādaḥ kāmaś ca suptapralapitāni ca ।bhindanti mantraṃ pracchannāḥ kāminyo ramatāntathā ।।pragalbhaḥ smṛtimānvāgmīśastre śāstre ca niṣṭhitaḥ ।abhyastakarmā nṛpaterdūto bhaviturmarhati ।।nisṛṣṭārtho mitārthaś ca tathā śāsanahārakaḥ ।sāmarthyāt pādato hīno dūtastu trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।nāvijñātaṃ puraṃ śatroḥ praviśecca na śaṃsadaṃ ।

naya iṣyate iti kha, gha ca

śāsanaśāsaka iti kha, cha ca
kālamīkṣeta kāryārthamanujñātaś ca niṣpatet ।।chidrañca śatrorjānīyāt koṣamitrabalāni ca ।rāgāparāgau jānīyād dṛṣṭigātraviceṣṭitaiḥ ।।kuryāccaturvidhaṃ stortraṃ pakṣayorubhayorapi ।tapasvivyañjanopetaiḥ sucaraiḥ saha saṃvaset ।।caraḥ prakāśo dūtaḥ syādaprakāśaś caro dvidhā ।baṇik kṛṣībalo liṅgī bhikṣukādyātmakāś carāḥ ।।yāyādariṃ vyasaninaṃ niṣphale dūtaceṣṭite ।prakṛtavyasanaṃ yatsyāttat samīkṣya samutpatet ।।anayādvyasyati śreyastasmāttadvyasanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।hutāśano jalaṃ vyādhirdurbhikṣaṃ marakaṃ tathā ।।iti pañcavidhaṃ daivaṃ vyasanaṃ mānuṣaṃ paraṃ ।daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa śāntyā ca praśamannayet ।।utthāpitena nītyā ca mānuṣaṃ vyasanaṃ haret ।mantro mantraphalāvāptiḥ kāryānuṣṭhānamāyatiḥ ।।āyavyayau daṇḍanītiramitrapratiṣedhanaṃ ।vyasanasya pratīkāro rājyarājābhirakṣaṇaṃ ।।ityamātyasya karmedaṃ hanti savyasanānvitaḥ ।hiraṇyadhānyavastrāṇi vāhanaṃ prajayā bhavet ।।tathānye dravyanicayā danti savyasanā prajā ।prajānāmāpadisthānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ koṣadaṇḍayoḥ ।।

dṛṣṭivaktraviceṣṭitair iti ga, gha, cha, jha, ña ca

svacarair iti ja

viphale iti gha, jha, ña ca
paurādyāścopakurvanti saṃśrayādiha durdinaṃ ।tūṣṇīṃ yuddhaṃ janatrāṇaṃ mitrāmitraparigrahaḥ ।।sāmantādi kṛte doṣe naśyettadvyasanācca tat ।bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dānaṃ prajāmitraparigrahaḥ ।।dharmakāmādibhedaś ca durgasaṃskārabhūṣaṇaṃ ।koṣāttadvyasanāddhanti koṣamūlo hi bhūpatiḥ ।।mitrāmitrāvanīhemasādhanaṃ ripumardanaṃ ।dūrakāryāśukāritvaṃ daṇḍāttadvyasanāddharet ।।sastambhayati mitrāṇi amitraṃ nāśayatyapi ।dhanādyair upakāritvaṃ mitrāttadvyasanāddharet ।।rājā savyasanī hanyādrājakāryāṇi yāni ca ।vāgdaṇḍayoś ca pāruṣyamarthadūṣaṇameva ca ।।pānaṃ strī mṛgayā dyūtaṃ vyasanāni mahīpateḥ ।ālasyaṃ stabdhatā darpaḥ pramādo dvaidhakāritā ।।iti pūrvopadiṣṭañca sacivavyasanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।anāvṛṣṭiś ca pīḍādau rāṣṭravyasanamucyate ।।viśīrṇayantraprākāraparikhātvamaśastratā ।kṣīṇayā senayā naddhaṃ durgavyasanamucyate ।।vyayīkṛtaḥ parikṣipto aprajito asañcitas tathā ।daṣito darasaṃsthaś ca koṣavyasanamucyate ।।uparuddhaṃ parikṣiptamamānitavimānitaṃ ।

saṃstambhayatītyādiḥ, mitrāttadvyasanāddharedityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ chapuatake nāsti
abhūtaṃ vyādhitaṃ śrāntaṃ dūrāyātannavāgataṃ ।।parikṣīṇaṃ pratihataṃ prahatāgratarantathā ।āśānirvedabhūyiṣṭhamanṛtaprāptameva ca ।।kalatragarbhannikṣiptamantaḥśalpaṃ tathaiva ca ।vicchinnavīvadhāsāraṃ śūnyamūlaṃ tathaiva ca ।।asvāmyasaṃhataṃ vāpi bhinnakūṭaṃ tathaiva ca ।duṣpārṣṇigrāhamarthañca balavyasanamucyate ।।daivopapīḍitaṃ mitraṃ grastaṃ śatrubalena ca ।kāmakrodhādisaṃyuktamutsāhādaribhirbhavet ।।arthasya dūṣaṇaṃ krodhāt pāruṣyaṃ vākyadaṇḍayoḥ ।kāmajaṃ mṛgayā dyūtaṃ vyasanaṃ pānakaṃ striyaḥ ।।vākpāruṣyaṃ paraṃ loke udvejanamanarthakaṃ ।asiddhasādhanaṃ daṇḍastaṃ yuktyānayennṛpaḥ ।।udvejayati bhūtāni daṇḍapāruṣyavān nṛpaḥ ।bhūtānyudvejyamānāni dviṣatāṃ yānti saṃśrayaṃ ।।vivṛddhāḥ śatravaś caiva vināśāya bhavanti te ।dūṣyasya dūṣaṇārthañca parityāgo mahīyasaḥ ।।arthasya nītitattvajñair arthadūṣaṇamucyate ।pānāt kāryādino jñānaṃ mṛgayāto aritaḥ kṣayaḥ ।।jitaśramārthaṃ mṛgayāṃ vicaredrakṣite vane ।dharmārthaprāṇamāśādi dyūte syāt kalahādikaṃ ।।kālātipāto dharmārthapīrā strīvyasanādbhavet ।pānadoṣāt prāṇanāśaḥ kāryākāryāviniś cayaḥ ।।

skandhāvāraniveśajño nimittajño ripuṃ jayet ।skandhāvārasya madhye tu sakoṣaṃ nṛpatergṛhaṃ ।।maulībhūtaṃ śreṇisuhṛddviṣadāṭavikaṃ balaṃ ।rājaharmyaṃ samāvṛtya krameṇa viniveśayet ।।sainyaikadeśaḥ sannaddhaḥ senāpatipuraḥsaraḥ ।paribhrameccatvarāṃś ca maṇḍalena vahir niśi ।।vārtāḥ svakā vijānīyāddarasīmāntacāriṇaḥ ।nirgacchet praviśeccaiva sarva evopalakṣitaḥ ।।sāmadānaṃ ca bhedaś ca daṇḍopekṣendrajālakaṃ ।māyopāyāḥ sapta pare nikṣipetsādhanāya tān ।।caturvidhaṃ smṛtaṃ sāma upakārānukīrtanāt ।mithaḥsambanhdakathanaṃ mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣaṇaṃ ।।āyāte darśanaṃ vācā tavāhamiti cārpaṇaṃ ।yaḥ samprāptadhanotsarga uttamādhamamadhyamaḥ ।।pratidānaṃ tadā tasya gṛhītasyānumodanaṃ ।dravyadānamapūrvaṃ ca svayaṅgrāhapravartanaṃ ।।deyaś ca pratimokṣaś ca dānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ smṛtaṃ ।sneharāgāpanayanasaṃharṣotpādanaṃ tathā ।।mitho bhedaś ca bhedajñair bhedaś ca trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।badho arthaharaṇaṃ caiva parikleśastridhā damaḥ ।।prakāśaścāprakāśaś ca lokadviṣṭān prakāśataḥ ।udvijeta hatair lokasteṣu piṇḍaḥ praśasyate ।।

pariveśayediti kha

tathaiva supravartanamiti ja, ṭa ca
viśeṣeṇopaniṣidyogair hanyācchastrādinā dviṣaḥ ।jātimātraṃ dvijaṃ naiva hanyāt sāmottaraṃ vaśe ।।pralimpanniva cetāṃsi dṛṣṭvāsādhu pibanniva ।grasannivāmṛtaṃ sāma prayuñjīta priyaṃ vacaḥ ।।mithyābhiśastaḥ śrīkāma āhūyāpratimānitaḥ ।rājadveṣī cātikara ātmasambhāvitas tathā ।।vicchinnadharmakāmārthaḥ kruddho mānī vimānitaḥ ।akāraṇāt parityaktaḥ kṛtavairo api sāntvitaḥ ।।hṛtadravyakalatraś ca pūjārho apratipūjitaḥ ।etāṃstu bhedayecchatrau sthitānnityān suśaṅkitān ।।āgatān pūjayet kāmair nijāṃś ca praśamannayet ।sāmadṛṣṭānusandhānamatyugrabhayadarśanaṃ ।।pradhānadānamānaṃ ca bhedopāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।mitraṃ hataṃ kāṣṭhamiva ghuṇajagdhaṃ viśīryate ।।triśaktirdeśakālajño daṇḍenāstaṃ nayedarīn ।maitrīpradhānaṃ kalyāṇabuddhiṃ sāntvena sādhayet ।।lubdhaṃ kṣīṇañca dānena mitrānanyonyaśaṅkayā ।daṇḍasya darśanādduṣṭān putrabhrātādi sāmataḥ ।।dānabhedaiś camūmukhyān yodhān janapadadikān ।sāmāntāṭavikān bhedadaṇḍābhyāmaparāddhakān ।।devatāpratimānantu pūjayāntargatair naraiḥ ।pumān strīvastrasaṃvīto niśi cādbhutadarśanaḥ ।।

dānabhedaiś caiva mukhyān paurāniti ja
vetālolkāpiśācānāṃ śivānāṃ ca svarūpakī ।kāmato rūpadhāritvaṃ śastrāgnyaśmāmbuvarṣaṇaṃ ।।tamo anilo analo megha iti māyā hy amānuṣī ।jaghāna kīcakaṃ bhīma āsthitaḥ strīrūpatāṃ ।।anyāye vyasane yuddhe pravṛttasyānivāraṇaṃ ।upekṣeyaṃ smṛtā bhrātopekṣitaś ca hiḍimbayā ।।meghāndhakāravṛṣṭyagniparvatādbhutadarśanaṃ ।darasthānaṃ ca sainyānāṃ darśanaṃ dhvajaśālināṃ ।।chinnapāṭitabhinnānāṃ saṃsṛtānāṃ ca darśanaṃ ।itīndrajālaṃ dviṣatāmbhotyarthamupakalpayet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sāmādirnāma catvāriṃśadadhkadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ekacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājanītiḥ

rāma uvāca
ṣaḍvidhantu balaṃ vyūhya devān prārcya ripuṃ vrajet ।maulaṃ bhūtaṃ śroṇisuhṛddviṣadāṭavikaṃ balaṃ ।।pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ garīyastu balānāṃ vyasanaṃ tathā ।ṣaḍaṅgaṃ mantrakoṣābhyāṃ padātyaśvarathadvipaiḥ ।।nadyadravanadurgeṣu yatra yatra bhayaṃ bhavet ।

senāpatistatra tatra gacchedvyūhīkṛtair balaiḥ ।।nāyakaḥ purato yāyāt pravīrapuruṣāvṛtaḥ ।madhye kalatraṃ svāmī ca koṣaḥ phalgu ca yadbalaṃ ।।pārśvayorubhayoraśvā vājināṃ pārśvayo rathāḥ ।rathānāṃ pārśvayornāgā nāgānāṃ cāṭavībalaṃ ।।paścāt senāpatiḥ sarvaṃ puraskṛtya kṛtī svayaṃ ।yāyātsannaddhasainyaughaḥ khinnānāśvāsayañcchanaiḥ ।।yāyādvyūhena mahatā makareṇa purobhaye ।śyenenoddhṛtapakṣeṇa sūcyā vā vīravaktrayā ।।paścādbhaye tu śakaṭaṃ pārśvayorvajrasañjñitaṃ ।sarvataḥ sarvatobhadraṃ bhaye vyūhaṃ prakalpayet ।।kandare śailagahane nimnagāvanasaṅkaṭe ।dīrghādhvani pariśrāntaṃ kṣutpipāsāhitaklamaṃ ।।vyādhidurbhikṣamarakapīḍitaṃ dasyuvidrutaṃ ।paṅkāṃśujalaskandhaṃ vyastaṃ puñjīkṛtaṃ pathi ।।prasuptaṃ bhojanavyagramabhūmiṣṭhamasusthitaṃ ।caurāgnibhayavitrastaṃ vṛṣṭivātasamāhataṃ ।।ityādau svacamūṃ rakṣet prasainyaṃ ca ghatayet ।viśiṣṭo deśakālābhyāṃ bhinnaviprakṛtirbalī ।।kuryāt prakāśayuddhaṃ hi kūṭayuddhaṃ viparyaye ।teṣvavaskandakāleṣu paraṃ hanyātsamākulaṃ ।।

vajrasaṅkaṭamiti kha, cha ca
abhūmiṣṭhaṃ svabhūmiṣṭhaṃ svabhūmau copajāyataḥ ।prakṛtipragrahākṛṣṭaṃ pāśair vanacarādibhiḥ ।।hanyāt pravīrapuruṣair bhaṅgadānāpakarṣaṇaiḥ ।purastāddarśanaṃ datvā tallakṣakṛtaniś cayāt ।।hanyātpaścāt pravīreṇa balenopetya veginā ।paścādvā saṅkulīkṛtya hanyācchūreṇa pūrvataḥ ।।ābhyāṃ pārśvābhighātau tu vyākhyātau kūṭayodhane ।purastādviṣame deśe paścāddhanyāttu vegavān ।।puraḥ paścāttu viṣame evameva tu pārśvayoḥ ।prathamaṃ yodhayitvā tu dūṣyāmitrāṭavībalau ।।śrāntaṃ mandannirākrandaṃ hanyādaśrāntavāhanaṃ ।dūṣyāmitrabalair vāpi bhaṅgandatvā prayatnavān ।।jitamityeva viśvastaṃ hanyānmantravyapāśrayaḥ ।skandhāvārapuragrāmaśasyasvāmiprajādiṣu ।।viśrabhyantaṃ parānīkamapramatto vināśayet ।athavā gograhākṛṣṭaṃ tallakṣyaṃ mārgabandhanāt ।।avaskandabhayādrātripūjāgarakṛtaśramaḥ ।divāsuptaṃ samāhanyānnidrāvyākulasainikaṃ ।।niśi viśrabdhasaṃsuptaṃ nāgair vā khaḍgapāṇibhiḥ ।prayāne pūrvayāyitvaṃ vanadurgapraveśanaṃ ।।abhinnānāmanīkānāṃ bhedanaṃ bhinnasaṅgrahaḥ ।vibhīṣakādvāraghātaṃ koṣarakṣebhakarma ca ।।abhinnabhedanaṃ mitrasandhānaṃ rathakarma ca ।

vanadiṅmārgavicaye vīvadhāsāralakṣaṇaṃ ।।anuyānāpasaraṇe śīghrakāryopapādanaṃ ।dīnānusaraṇaṃ ghātaḥ koṭīnāṃ jaghanasya ca ।।aśvakarmātha patteś ca sarvadā śastradhāraṇaṃ ।śivirasya ca mārgādeḥ śodhanaṃ vastikarma ca ।।saṃsthūlasthāṇuvalmīkavṛkṣagulmāpakaṇṭakaṃ ।sāpasārā padātīnāṃ bhūrnātiviṣamā matā ।।svalpavṛkṣopalā kṣipralaṅghanīyanagā sthirā ।niḥśarkarā vipaṅkā ca sāpasārā ca vājibhūḥ ।।nisthāṇuvṛkṣakedārā rathabhūmirakardamā ।mardanīyatarucchedyavratatīpaṅkavarjitā ।।nirjharāgamyaśailā ca viṣamā gajamedinī ।urasyādīni bhinnāni pratigṛhṇan balāni hi ।।pratigraha iti khyāto rājakāryāntarakṣamaḥ ।tena śūnyastu yo vyūhaḥ sa bhinna iva lakṣyate ।।jayārthī na ca yuddhyeta matimānapratigrahaḥ ।yatra rājā tatra koṣaḥ koṣādhīnā hi rājatā ।।yodhebhyastu tato dadyāt kiñciddātuṃ na yujyate ।dravyalakṣaṃ rājaghāte tadardhaṃ tatsutārdane ।।senāpatibadhe tadvaddadyāddhastyādimardane ।athavā khalu yudhyeran pratyaśvarathadantinaḥ ।।

niḥśarkarā gamyaśaileti ja

kiṃ hi dātumiti gha, ña ca
yathā bhavedasaṃbādho vyāyāmavinivartane ।asaṅkareṇa yuddheran saṅkaraḥ saṅkulāvahaḥ ।।mahāsaṅkulayuddheṣu saṃśrayeranmataṅgajaṃ ।aśvasya pratiyoddhāro bhaveyuḥ puruṣāstrayaḥ ।।iti kalpyāstrayaścāśvā vidheyāḥ kuñjarasya tu ।pādagopā bhaveyuś ca puruṣā daśa pañca ca ।।vidhānamiti nāgasya vihitaṃ syandanasya ca ।anīkamiti vijñeyamiti kalpyā nava dvipāḥ ।।tathānīkasya randhrantu pañcadhā ca pracakṣate ।ityanīkavibhagena sthāpayed vyūhasampadaḥ ।।urasyakakṣapakṣāṃstu kalpyānetān pracakṣate ।uraḥkakṣau ca pakṣau ca madhyaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ pratigrahaḥ ।।koṭī ca vyūhaśāstrajñaiḥ saptāṅgo vyūha ucyate ।urasyakakṣapakṣāstu vyūho ayaṃ sapratigrahaḥ ।।guroreṣa ca śukrasya kakṣābhyāṃ parivarjitaḥ ।tiṣṭheyuḥ senāpatayaḥ pravīraiḥ puruṣair vṛtāḥ ।।abhedena ca yudhyeran rakṣeyuś ca parasparaṃ ।madhyavyūhe phalgu sainyaṃ yuddhavastu jaghanyataḥ ।।yuddhaṃ hi nāyakaprāṇaṃ hanyate tadanāyakaṃ ।urasi sthāpayennāgān pracaṇḍān kakṣayo rathān ।।hayāṃś ca pakṣayorvyūho madhyabhedī prakīrtitaḥ ।madhyadeśe hayānīkaṃ rathānīkañca kakṣayoḥ ।।pakṣayoś ca gajānīkaṃ vyūhontarbhedyayaṃ smṛtaḥ ।

rathasthāne hayān dadyāt padātīṃś ca hayaśrāye ।।rathābhāve tu dviradān vyūhe sarvatra dāpayet ।yadi syāddaṇḍabāhulyamābādhaḥ samprakīrtitaḥ ।।maṇḍalāṃsaṃhato bhogo daṇḍāste bahudhā śṛṇu ।tiryagvṛttistu daṇḍaḥ syād bhogo anyāvṛttireva ca ।।maṇḍalaḥ sarvatovṛttiḥ pṛthagvṛttirasaṃhataḥ ।pradaro dṛḍhako asahyaḥ cāpo vai kukṣireva ca ।।pratiṣṭhaḥ supratiṣṭhaś ca śyeno vijayasañjayau ।viśālo vijayaḥ śūcī sthūṇākarṇacamūmukhau ।।sarpāsyo valayaś caiva daṇḍa daṇḍabhedāś ca durjayāḥ ।atikrāntaḥ pratikrāntaḥ kakṣābhyāñcaikakṣapakṣataḥ ।।atikrāntastu pakṣābhyāṃ trayo anye tadviparyaye ।pakṣorasyair atikrāntaḥ pratiṣṭho anyo viparyayaḥ ।।sthūṇāpakṣo dhanuḥpakṣo dvisthūṇo daṇḍa ūrdhvagaḥ ।dviguṇontastvatikrāntapakṣo anyasya viparyayaḥ ।।dvicaturdaṇḍa ity ete jñeyā lakṣaṇataḥ kramāt ।gomūtrikāhisañcārīśakaṭo makaras tathā ।।bhogabhedāḥ samākhyātās tathā pariplavaṅgakaḥ ।daṇḍapakṣau yugārasyaḥ śakaṭastadviparyaye ।।makaro vyatikīrṇaś ca śeṣaḥ kuñjararājibhiḥ ।maṇḍalavyūhabhedau tu sarvatobhadradurjayau ।।aṣṭānīko dvitīyastu prathamaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ ।ardhacandraka ūrdhvāṅgo vajrabhedāstu saṃhateḥ ।।

tathā karkaṭaśṛṅgī ca kākapādau ca godhikā ।tricatuḥsainyānāṃ jñeyā ākārabhedataḥ ।।daṇḍasya syuḥ saptadaśa vyūhā dvau maṇḍalasya ca ।asaṅghātasya ṣaṭ pañca bhogasyaiva tu saṅgare ।।pakṣādīnāmathaikena hatvā śeṣaiḥ parikṣipet ।urasā vā samāhatya koṭibhyāṃ pariveṣṭayet ।।pare koṭī samākramya pakṣābhyāmapratigrahāt ।koṭibhyāñjaghanaṃ hanyādurasā ca prapīḍayet ।।yataḥ phalgu yato bhinnaṃ yataścānyair adhiṣṭhitaṃ ।tataścāribalaṃ hanyādātmanaścopavṛṃhayet ।।sāraṃ dviguṇasāreṇa phalgusāreṇa pīḍayet ।saṃhatañca gajānīkaiḥ pracaṇḍair dārayedbalaṃ ।।syāt kakṣapakṣorasyaś ca vartamānastu daṇḍakaḥ ।tatra prayogo ḍaṇḍasya sthānanturyeṇa darśayet ।।syāddaṇḍasamapakṣābhyāmatikrānto dṛḍhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।bhavetsa pakṣakakṣābhyāmatikrāntaḥ pradārakaḥ ।।kakṣābhyāñca pratikrāntavyūho asahyaḥ smṛto yathā ।kakṣapakṣāvadhaḥ sthapyorasyaiḥ kāntaś ca khātakaḥ ।।dvau daṇḍau balayaḥ prokto kāntaś ca khātakaḥ ।durjayaś caturvalayaḥ śatrorbalavimardanaḥ ।।kakṣapakṣaurasyair bhogo viṣayaṃ parivartayan ।

koṭibhyāṃ parikalpayediti gha, ña ca
sarpacārī gomūtrikā śarkaṭaḥ śakaṭākṛtiḥ ।।viparyayo amaraḥ proktaḥ sarvaśatruvimardakaḥ ।syāt kakṣapakṣorasyānāmekībhāvastu maṇḍalaḥ ।।cakrapadmādayo bhedā maṇḍalasya prabhedakāḥ ।evañca sarvatobhadro vajrākṣavarakākavat ।।ardhacandraś ca śṛṅgāṭo hy acalo nāmarūpataḥ ।vyūhā yathāsukhaṃ karyāḥ śatrūṇāṃ balavāraṇāḥ ।।agnir uvācarāmastu rāvaṇaṃ hatvā ayodhyāṃ prāptavān dvija ।rāmoktanītyendrajitaṃ hatavāṃllakṣmaṇaḥ purā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rāmoktarājanītirnāma ekacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

asmallabdhapustakanāṃ madhye ka ja cihnitapustrakadvaye daṇḍādikatipayavyūhānāṃ vinduvinyāsaistattannāmasamīpe ākṛtayaḥ pradarśitāḥ, parantu tā aśuddhā । tā
yathā,daṇḍavyūhasya ??? । dṛḍhavyūhasya ??? । khātakavyūhasya ??? । valayavyūhasya ??? ।durjayavyūhasya ??? । gomūtrikāvyūhasya ??? । amaravyūhasya ??? । sarvatobhadravyūhasya ???।।

chapter 

ś atha dvicatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

puruṣalakṣaṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
rāmoktoktā mayā nītiḥ strīṇāṃ rājan nṛṇāṃ vade ।lakṣaṇaṃ yadsamudreṇa gargāyoktaṃ yathā purā ।।
samudra uvāca
puṃsāñca lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye strīṇāñcaiva śubhāśubhaṃ ।ekādhiko dviśukraś ca triganbhīrastathaiva ca ।।tritrikastripralambaś ca tribhirvyāpnoti yas tathā ।tribalīmāṃstrivinatastrikālajñaś ca suvrata ।।puruṣaḥ syātsulakṣaṇyo vipulaś ca tathā triṣu ।caturlekhas tathā yaś ca tathaiva ca catuḥsamaḥ ।।catuṣkiṣkuś caturdaṃṣṭraḥ śuklakṛṣṇastathaiva ca ।caturgandhaś caturhrasvaḥ sūkṣmadīrghaś ca pañcasu ।।ṣaḍunnato aṣṭavaṃśaś ca saptasneho navāmalaḥ ।daśapadmo daśavyūho nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalaḥ ।।caturdaśasamadvandvaḥ ṣoḍaśākṣayaś ca śasyate ।dharmārthakāmasaṃyukto dharmo hy ekādhiko mataḥ ।।tārakābhyāṃ vinā netre śukradanto dviśuklakaḥ ।gambhīrastriśravo nābhiḥ sattvañcaikaṃ trikaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।anasūyā dayā kṣāntirmaṅgalācārayuktatā ।śaucaṃ spṛhā tvakārpaṇyamanāyāsaś ca śauryatā ।।

citrikastripralambaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe bhujayornaraḥ ।digdeśajātivargāṃś ca tejasā yaśasā śriyā ।।vyāpnoti yastrikavyāpī tribalīmānnarastvasau ।udare balayastisro narantrivinataṃ śṛṇu ।।devatānāṃ dvijānāñca gurūṇāṃ praṇatastu yaḥ ।dharmārthakāmakālajñastrikālajño abhidhīyate ।।uro lalāṭaṃ vaktrañca trivistīrṇo vilekhavān ।dvau pāṇī dvau tathā pādau dhvajacchatrādibhiryutau ।।aṅgulyo hṛdayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ kaṭiḥ śastaṃ catuḥsamaṃ ।ṣaṇṇavatyaṅgulotsedhaś catuṣkiṣkupramāṇataḥ ।।draṃṣṭrāś catasraś candrābhāś catuḥkṛṣṇaṃ vadāmi te ।netratārau bhruvau śmaśruḥ kṛṣṇāḥ keśāstathaiva ca ।।nāsāyāṃ vadane svede kakṣayorviḍagandhakaḥ ।hrasvaṃ liṅgaṃ tathā grīvā jaṅghe syādvedahrasvakaṃ ।।sūkṣmāṇyaṅguliparvāṇi nakhakeśadvijatvacaḥ ।hanū netre lalāṭe ca nāsā dīrghā stanāntaraṃ ।।vakṣaḥ kakṣau nakhā nāsonnataṃ vaktraṃ kṛkāṭikā ।snigdhāstvakkeśadantāś ca loma dṛṣṭirnakhāś ca vāk ।।jānvorurvoś ca pṛṣṭhastha vaṃśau dvau karanāsayoḥ ।netre nāsāpuṭau karṇau meḍhraṃ pāyumukhe amalaṃ ।।jihvoṣṭhe tālunetre tu hastapādau nakhās tathā ।śiśnāgravaktraṃ śasyante padmābhā daśa dehināṃ ।।pāṇipādaṃ mukhaṃ grīvā śravaṇe hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ ।

lalāṭamudaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ vṛhantaḥ pūjitā daśa ।।prasāritabhujasyeha madhyamāgradvayāntaraṃ ।ucchrāyeṇa samaṃ yasya nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalaḥ ।।pādau gulphau sphicau pārśvau vaṅkṣaṇau vṛṣaṇau kucau ।karṇauṣṭhe sakthinī jaṅghe hastau bāhū tathākṣiṇī ।।caturdaśasamadvandva etatsāmānyato naraḥ ।vidyāś caturdaśa dvyakṣaiḥ paśyedyaḥ ṣoḍaśākṣakaḥ ।।rūkṣaṃ śirātataṃ gātramaśubhaṃ māṃsavarjitaṃ ।durgandhiviparītaṃ yacchastandṛṣṭyā prasannayā ।।dhanyasya madhurā vāṇī gatirmattebhasannibhā ।ekakūpabhavaṃ roma bhaye rakṣā sakṛt sakṛt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe puruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha tricatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

strīlakṣaṇaṃ

samudra uvāca
śastā strī cārusarvāṅgī mattamātaṅgagāminī ।gurūrujaghanā yā ca mattapārāvatekṣaṇā ।।sunīlakeśī tanvaṅgī vilomāṅgī manoharā ।

śubhā strī iti ja
samabhūmispṛśau pādau saṃhatau ca tathā stanau ।।nābhiḥ pradakṣiṇāvartā guhyamaśvatthapatravat ।gulphau nigūḍhau madhyena nābhiraṅguṣṭhamānikā ।।jaṭharanna pralambañca romarūkṣā na śobhanā ।narkṣavṛkṣanadīnāmnī na sadā kalahapriyā ।।na lolupā na durbhāṣā śubhā devādipūjitā ।gaṇḍair madhūkapuṣpābhair na śirālā na lomaśā ।।na saṃhatabhrūkuṭilā patiprāṇā patipriyā ।alakṣaṇāpi lakṣaṇyā yatrākārāstato guṇāḥ ।।bhuvaṅkaniṣṭhikā yasyā na spṛśenmṛtyureva sā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe strīlakṣaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuś catvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

cāmarādilakṣaṇam

agnir uvāca
cāmaro rukmādaṇḍo agryaḥ chatraṃ rājñaḥ praśasyate ।haṃsapakṣair viracitaṃ mayūrasya śukasya ca ।।pakṣair vātha balākāyā na kāryaṃ miśrapakṣakaiḥ ।
na śatheti cha

jaṭharamityādiḥ, tato guṇā ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ gha, ña, pustakadvaye nāsti
caturasyaṃ brāhmaṇasya vṛttaṃ rājñaś ca śuklakaṃ ।।tricatuḥpañcaṣaṭsaptāṣṭaparvaś ca daṇḍakaḥ ।bhadrāsanaṃ kṣīravṛkṣaiḥ pañcāśadaṅgulocchrayaiḥ ।।vistāreṇa trihastaṃ syāt suvarṇādyaiś ca citritaṃ ।dhanurdravyatrayaṃ lohaṃ śṛṅgaṃ dāru dvijottama ।।jyādravyatritayañcaiva vaṃśabhaṅgatvacas tathā ।dārucāpapramāṇantu śreṣṭhaṃ hastacatuṣṭayaṃ ।।tadeva samahīnantu proktaṃ madhyakanīyasi ।muṣṭigrāhanimittāni madhye dravyāṇi kārayet ।।svalpakoṭistvacā śṛṅgaṃ śārṅgalohamaye dvija ।kāminībhrūlatākārā koṭiḥ kāryā susaṃyutā ।।pṛthagvā vipra miśraṃ vā lauhaṃ śārṅgantu kārayet ।śārṅgaṃ samucitaṃ kāryaṃ rukmavinduvibhūṣitaṃ ।।kuṭilaṃ sphuṭitañcāpaṃ sacchidrañca na śasyate ।suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ kṛṣṇāyo dhanuṣi smṛtaṃ ।।māhiṣaṃ śārabhaṃ śārṅgaṃ rauhiṣaṃ vā dhanuḥśubhaṃ ।candanaṃ vetasaṃ sālaṃ dhāvalaṅkakubhantaruḥ ।।sarvaśreṣṭhaṃ dhanurvaṃśair gṛhītaiḥ śaradi śritaiḥ ।pūjayettu dhanuḥ khaḍgamantraistrailokyamohanaiḥ ।।ayasaścātha vaṃśasya śarasyāpyaśarasya ca ।ṛtvijo hemavārṇābhāḥ snāyuśliṣṭāḥ supatrakāḥ ।।

caturasramityādiḥ, pañcāśadaṅgulocchrayair ityantaḥ pāṭhaḥ japustake nāsti

dvihastamiti ṭa

pūjayettaddhanuriti ga, gha, ña ca
rukmapuṅkhāḥ supaṅkāste tailadhautāḥ suvarṇakāḥ ।yātrāyāmabhiṣekādau yajedvāṇadhanurmukhān ।।sapatākāstrasaṅgrāhasāṃvatsarakarānnṛpaḥ ।brahmā vai meruśikhare svargagaṅgātaṭe ayajat ।।lauhadaityaṃ sa dadṛśe vidhnaṃ yajñe tu cintayan ।tasya cintayato vahneḥ puruṣo abhūdvalī mahān ।।vavande ajañca tandevā abhyanandanta harṣitāḥ ।tasmātsa nandakaḥ kaḍgo devokto hariragrahīt ।।taṃ jagrāha śanair devo vikoṣaḥ so abhyapadyata ।khaḍgo nīlo ratnamuṣṭistato abhūcchatabāhukaḥ ।।daityaḥ sa gadayā devān drāvayāmāsa vai raṇe ।viṣṇunā khaḍgacchinnāni daityagātrāṇi bhūtale ।।patitāni tu saṃsparśānnandakasya ca tāni hi ।lohabhūtāni sarvāṇi hatvā tasmai harirvaraṃ ।।dadau pavitramaṅgante āyudhāya bhavedbhuvi ।hariprasādād brahmāpi vinā vighnaṃ hariṃ prabhuṃ ।।pūjayāmāsa yajñena vakṣye atho khaḍgalakṣaṇaṃ ।khaṭīkhaṭṭarajātā ye daśanīyāstute smṛtāḥ ।।kāyacchidastvāṣikāḥ syurdṛḍhāḥ sūrpārakodbhavāḥ ।tīkṣṇāśchedasahā vaṅgāstīkṣṇāḥsyuścāṅgadeśajāḥ ।।śatārdhamaṅgulānāñca śreṣṭhaṃ khadgaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।

lohadaityamityādiḥ, harṣitā ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ ja pustake nāsti

tasmāttu nandaka iti gha, ña ca

mahādeva iti ja
tadardhaṃ madhyamaṃ jñeyaṃ tato hīnaṃ na dhārayet ।।dīrghaṃ sumadhuraṃ śabdaṃ yusya khaḍgasya sattama ।kiṅkiṇīsadṛśantasya dhāraṇaṃ śreṣṭhamucyate ।।khaḍgaḥ padmapalāśāgro maṇḍalāgraś ca śasyate ।karavīradalāgrābho ghṛtagandho viyatprabhaḥ ।।samāṅgulasthāḥ śasyante vraṇāḥ khadgeṣu liṅgavat ।kākolūkasavarṇābhā viṣamāste na śobhanāḥ ।।khaḍge na paśyedvadanamucchiṣṭo na spṛśedasiṃ ।mūlyaṃ jātiṃ na kathayenniśi kuryānna śīrṣake ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe āyudhalakṣaṇādirnāma catuś catvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ratnaparīkṣā

agnir uvāca
ratnānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye ratnaṃ dhāryamidaṃ nṛpaiḥ ।vajraṃ marakataṃ ratnaṃ padmarāgañca mauktikaṃ ।।indranīlaṃ mahānīlaṃ vaidūryaṃ gandhaśasyakaṃ ।candrakāntaṃ sūryakāntaṃ sphaṭikaṃ pulakaṃ tathā ।।

karketanaṃ puṣparāgaṃ tathā jyotīrasaṃ dvija ।spaṭikaṃ rājapaṭṭañca tathā rājamayaṃ śubhaṃ ।।saugandhikaṃ tathā gañjaṃ śaṅkhabrahmamayaṃ tathā ।gomedaṃ rudhirākṣañca tathā bhallātakaṃ dvija ।।dhūlīṃ marakatañcaiva tuthakaṃ sīsameva ca ।pīluṃ pravālakañcaiva girivajraṃ dvijottama ।।bhujaṅgamamaṇiñcaiva tathā vajramaṇiṃ śubhaṃ ।ṭiṭṭibhañca tathā piṇḍaṃ bhrāmarañca tathotpalaṃ ।।suvarṇapratibaddhāni ratnāni śrījayādike ।antaḥprabhatvaṃ vaimalyaṃ susaṃsthānatvameva ca ।।sudhāryā naiva dhāryāstu niṣprabhā malinās tathā ।khaṇḍāḥ saśarkarā ye ca praśastaṃ vajradharaṇam ।।ambhastarati yadvajramabhedyaṃ vimalaṃ ca yat ।ṣaṭkoṇaṃ śakracāpābhaṃ laghu cārkanibhaṃ śubham ।।śukapakṣanibhaḥ snigdhaḥ kāntimānvimalas tathā ।svarṇacūrṇanibhaiḥ sūkṣmair marakataś ca vindubhiḥ ।।sphaṭikajāḥ padmarāgāḥ syū rāgavanto atinirmalāḥ ।jātavaṅgā bhavantīha kuruvindasamudbhavāḥ ।।saugandhikotthā kāṣāyā muktāphalāstu śuktijāḥ ।vimalāstebhya utkṛṣṭā ye ca śaṅkhodbhavā mune ।।nāgadantabhavāścāgryāḥ kumbhaśūkaramatsyajāḥ ।veṇunāgabhavāḥ śreṣṭhā mauktikaṃ meghajaṃ varaṃ ।।vṛttatvaṃ śukratā svācchyaṃmahattvaṃ mauktike guṇāḥ ।

indranīlaṃ śubhaṃ kṣīre rājate bhrājate adhikaṃ ।।rañjayet svaprabhāveṇa tamamūlyaṃ vinirdiśet ।nīlaraktantu vaidūryaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ hārādikaṃ bhajet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ratnaparīkṣā nāma pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭcatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vāstulakṣaṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
vāstulakṣma pravakṣyāmi viprādīnāṃ ca bhūriha ।śvetā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam ।।ghṛtaraktānnamadyānāṃ gandhāḍhyā vasataś ca bhūḥ ।madhurā ca kaṣāyā ca amlādyuparasā kramāt ।।kuśaiḥ śarais tathākāśair dūrvābhiryā ca saṃśritā ।prārcya viprāṃś ca śiḥśalpāṃ khātapūrvantu kalpayet ।।catuḥṣaṣṭipadaṃ kṛtvā madhye brahmā catuṣpadaḥ ।prāk teṣāṃ vai gṛhasvāmī kathitastu tathāryamā ।।dakṣiṇena vivasvāṃś ca mitraḥ paścimatas tathā ।udaṅmahīdharaś caiva āpavatsau ca vahnige ।।sāvitraś caiva savitā jayendrau nairṛte ambudhau ।

bhrājate sthitamiti cha, ja ca

bhavediti ga, gha ca
rudravyādhī ca vāyavye pūrvādau koṇagādvahiḥ ।।mahendraś ca raviḥ satyo bhṛśaḥ pūrve atha dakṣiṇe ।gṛhakṣato aryamadhṛtī gandharvāścātha vāruṇe ।।puṣpadanto asurāś caiva varuṇo yakṣa eva ca ।saumye bhallāṭasomau ca aditirdhanadas tathā ।।nāgaḥ karagrahaś caiśe aṣṭau diśi diśi smṛtāḥ ।ādyantau tu tayordevau proktāvatra gṛheśvarau ।।parjanyaḥ prathamo devo dvitīyaś ca karagrahaḥ ।mahendraravisatyāś ca bhṛśo atha gaganantathā ।।pavanaḥ pūrvataś caiva antarīkṣadhaneśvarau ।āgneye cātha nairṛtye mṛgasugrīvakau surau ।।rogo mukhyaś ca vāyavye dakṣiṇe puṣpavittadau ।gṛhakṣato yamabhṛśau gandharvo nāgapaitṛkaḥ ।।āpye dauvārikasugrīvau puṣpadanto asuro jalaṃ ।yakṣmā rogaś ca śoṣaś ca uttare nāgarājakaḥ ।।mukhyo bhallāṭaśaśinau aditiś ca kuverakaḥ ।nāgo hutāśaḥ śreṣṭho vai śakrasūryau ca pūrvataḥ ।।dakṣe gṛhakṣataḥ puṣpa āpye sugrīva uttamaḥ ।puṣpadanto hy udagdvāri bhallāṭaḥ puṣpadantakaḥ ।।śileṣṭakādivinyāsaṃ mantraiḥ prārcya surāṃś caret ।nande nandaya vāsiṣṭhe vasubhiḥ prajayā saha ।।

bhṛguriti ja

nāgo hutāśanaḥ śreṣṭha iti kha, cha ca
jaye bhārgavavadāyāde prajānāñjayamāhave ।pūrṇe aṅgirasadāyāde pūrṇakāmaṃ kurudhva māṃ ।।bhadre kāśyapadāyāde kuru bhadrāṃ matiṃ mama ।sarvavījasamāyukte sarvaratnauṣadhair vṛte ।।rucire nandane nande vāsiṣṭhe ramyatāmiha ।prajāpatisute devi caturasre mahīmaye ।।subhage suvrate bhadre gṛhe kaśyapi ramyatāṃ ।pūjite paramācāryair gandhamālyair alaṅkṛte ।।bhavabhūtikare devi gṛhe bhārgavi ramyatāṃ ।avyaṅgye cākṣate pūrṇe muneraṅgirasaḥ sute ।।iṣṭake tvaṃ prayaccheṣṭaṃ pratiṣṭāṅkārayamyahaṃ ।deśasvāmipurasvāmigṛhasvāmiparigrahe ।।manuṣyadhanahastyaśvapaśuvṛddhikarī bhava ।gṛhapraveśe api tathā śilānyāsaṃ samācaret ।।uttareṇa śubhaḥ plakṣo vaṭaḥ prāk syād gṛhāditaḥ ।udumvaraś ca yāmyena paścime aśvattha uttamaḥ ।।vāmabhāge tathodyānaṃ kuryādvāsaṃ gṛhe śubhaṃ ।sāyaṃ prātastu gharmāptau śītakāle dināntare ।।varṣārātre bhuyaḥ śoṣe sektavyā ropitadrumāḥ ।viḍaṅgaghṛṭasaṃyuktān secayecchītavāriṇā ।।phalanāśe kulatthaiś ca māṣair mudgaistilair yavaiḥ ।

viprāṇāṃ jayamāvaheti kha

gandhamālyair alaṅkṛtair iti ga, cha ca
ghṛtaśītapayaḥsekaḥ phalapuṣpāya darvadā ।।matsyāmbhasā tu sekena vṛddhirbhavati śākhinaḥ ।āvikājasakṛccūrṇaṃ yavacūrṇaṃ tilāni ca ।।gomāṃsamudakañceti saptarātraṃ nidhāpayet ।utsekaṃ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ phalapuṣpādivṛddhidaṃ ।।matsyodakena śītena āmrāṇāṃ seka iṣyate ।praśastaṃ cāpyaśokānāṃ kāminīpādatāḍanaṃ ।।kharjūranārikelāderlavaṇādbhirvivardhanaṃ ।viḍaṅgamatsyamāṃsādbhiḥ sarveṣu dohadaṃ śubhaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vāstvādirnāma ṣaṭtacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

puṣpādipūjāphalaṃ

agnir uvāca
puṣpaistu pūjanādviṣṇuḥ sarvakāryeṣu siddhidaḥ ।mālatī mallikā yūthī pāṭalā karavīrakaṃ ।।pāvāntiratimuktaś ca karṇikāraḥ kurāṇṭakaḥ ।

sekaḥ ucyate iti kha

pāvantikātimuktaśceti ga
kubjakastagaro nīpo vāṇo varvaramallikā ।।aśokastilakaḥ kundaḥ pūjāyai syāttamālajaṃ ।bilvapatraṃ śamīpatraṃ patraṃ bhṛṅgarajasya tu ।।tulasīkālatulasīpatraṃ vāsakamarcane ।ketakīpatrapuṣpaṃ ca padmaṃ raktotpalādikaṃ ।।nārkannonmattakaṅkāñcī pūjane girimallikā ।kauṭajaṃ śālmalīpuṣpaṃ kaṇṭakārībhavannahi ।।ghṛtaprasthena viṣṇoś ca snānaṅgokoṭisatphalaṃ ।āḍhakena tu rājā syāt ghṛtakṣīrair divaṃ vrajet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe puṣpādipūjāphalaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter
