ś athāṣṭacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dhanurvedaḥ agnir uvāca
catuṣpādaṃ dhanurvedaṃ vede pañcavidhaṃ dvija ।rathanāgāśvapattīnāṃ yodhāṃścāśritya kīrtitaṃ ।।yanmuktaṃ pāṇimuktaṃ muktasandhāritaṃ tathā ।amuktaṃ bāhuyuddhañca pañcadhā tyat prakīrtitaṃ ।।tatra śastrāstrasampattyā dvividhaṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।

ṛjumāyāvibhedena bhūyo dvividhamucyate ।।kṣepiṇī cāpayantrādyair yantramuktaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।śilātomarayantrādyaṃ pāṇimuktaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।।muktasandhāritaṃ jñeyaṃ prāsādyamapi yadbhavet ।khaḍgādikamamuktañca niyuddhaṃ vigatāyudhaṃ ।।kuryādyogyāni prātrāṇi yoddhumicchurjitaśramaḥ ।dhanuḥśreṣṭhāni yuddhāni prāsamadhyāni tāni ca ।।tāni khaḍgajaghanyāni bāhupratyavarāṇi ca ।dhanurvede gururvipraḥ prokto varṇadvayasya ca ।।yuddhādhikāraḥ śūdrasya svayaṃ vyāpādi śikṣayā ।deśasthaiḥ śaṅkarai rājñaḥ kāryā yuddhe sahāyatā ।।aṅguṣṭhagulphapāṇyaṅghyaḥ śliṣṭāḥ syuḥ sahitā yadi ।dṛṣṭaṃ samapadaṃ sthānametallakṣaṇatas tathā ।।vāhyāṅgulisthitau pādau stabdhajānubalāvubhau rivitastyantarāsthānametadvaiśākhamucyate ।।haṃsapaṅktyākṛtisame dṛśyete yatra jānunī ।caturvitastivicchinne tadetanmaṇḍalaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।halākṛtimayaṃ yacca stabdhajānūrudakṣiṇaṃ ।vitastyaḥ pañca vistāre tadālīḍhaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।।etadeva viparyastaṃ pratyālīḍhamiti smṛtaṃ ।tiryagbhūto bhavedvāmo dakṣiṇo api bhavedṛjuḥ ।।gulphau pārṣṇigrahau caiva sthitau pañcāṅgulāntarau ।

pratyālīḍhaṃ prakīrtitamiti ja
sthānaṃ jātaṃ bhavedetad dvādaśāṅgulamāyataṃ ।।ṛjujānurbhavedvāmo dakṣiṇaḥ suprasāritaḥ ।athavā dakṣiṇañjānu kubjaṃ bhavati niś calaṃ ।।daṇḍāyato bhavedeṣa caraṇaḥ saha jānunā ।evaṃ vikaṭamuddiṣṭaṃ dvihastāntaramāyataṃ ।।jānunī dviguṇe syātāmuttānau caraṇāvubhau ।anena vidhiyogena sampuṭaṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।।kiñcidvivartitau pādau samadaṇḍāyatau sthirau ।dṛṣṭameva yathānyāyaṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulamāyataṃ ।।svastikenātra kurvīta praṇāmaṃ prathamaṃ dvija ।kāmukaṃ gṛhya vāmena vāṇaṃ dakṣiṇakena tu ।।vaiśākhe yadi vā jāte sthitau vāpyathavāyatau ।guṇāntantu tataḥ kṛtvā kārmuke priyakārmukaḥ ।।adhaḥkaṭintu dhanuṣaḥ phaladeśantu patriṇaḥ ।dharaṇyāṃ sthāpayitvā tu tolayitvā tathaiva ca ।।bhujābhyāmatra kuñjābhyāṃ prakoṣṭhābhyāṃ śubhavrata ।yasya vāṇaṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ puṅgadeśe ca patriṇaḥ ।।vinyāso dhanuś caiva dvādaśāṅgulamantaraṃ ।jyayā viśiṣṭaḥ kartavyo nātihīno na cādhikaḥ ।।niveśya kārmukaṃ nabhyāṃ nitambe śarasaṅkaraṃ ।utkṣipedutthitaṃ hastamantareṇākṣikarṇayoḥ ।।pūrveṇa muṣṭinā grāhyastanāgre dakṣiṇe śaraḥ ।haraṇantu tataḥ kṛtvā śīghraṃ pūrvaṃ prasārayet ।।

nābhyantarā naiva vāhyā nordhvakā nādharā tathā ।na ca kubjā na cottānā na calā nātiveṣṭitā ।।samā sthairyaguṇopetā pūrvadaṇḍamiva sthitā ।chādayitvā tato lakṣyaṃ pūrveṇānena muṣṭinā ।।urasā tūtthito yantā trikoṇavinatasthitaḥ ।srastāṃśe niś calagrīvo mayūrāñcitamastakaḥ ।।lalāṭanāsāvaktrāṃsāḥ kuryuraśvasamambhavet ।antaraṃ tryaṅgulaṃ jñeyaṃ civukasyāṃsakasya ca ।।prathamantryaṅgulaṃ jñeyaṃ dvitīye dvyaṅgulaṃ smṛtaṃ ।tṛtīye aṅgulamudiṣṭamāyatañcivukāṃsayoḥ ।।gṛhītvā sāyakaṃ puṅkhāttarjanyāṅguṣṭhakena tu ।anāmayā punargṛhya tathā madhyamayāpi ca ।।tāvadākarṣayedvegādyāvadvāṇaḥ supūritaḥ ।evaṃ vidhamupakramya moktavyaṃ vidhivat khagaṃ ।।dṛṣṭimuṣṭihataṃ lakṣyaṃ bhindyādvāṇena suvrataḥ ।muktvā tu paścimaṃ hastaṃ kṣipedvegena pṛṣṭhataḥ ।।etaducchedamicchanti jñātavyaṃ hi tvayā dvija ।kūrparantadadhaḥ kāryamākṛṣya tu dhanuṣmatā ।।ūrdhvaṃ vimuktake kārye lakṣaśliṣṭantu madhyamaṃ ।śreṣṭhaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vijñeyaṃdhanuḥśāstraviśāradaiḥ ।।jyeṣṭhastu sāyako jñeyo bhaveddvādaśamuṣṭayaḥ ।

tyaktvā iti ja
ekādaśa tathā kanīyāndaśamuṣṭayaḥ ।।caturhastaṃ dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ trayaḥ sārdhantu madhyamaṃ ।kanīyastu trayaḥ proktaṃ nityameva padātinaḥ ।।aśve rathe gaje śreṣṭhe tadeva parikīrtitaṃ ।।
e ity āgenye mahāpurāṇe dhanurvedo nāma aṣṭacatvāriṃśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dhanurvedakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
pūrṇāyataṃ dvijaḥ kṛtvā tato māṃsair gadāyudhān ।sunirdhautaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā yajñabhūmau vidhāpayet ।।tato vāṇaṃ samāgṛhya daṃśitaḥ susamāhitaḥ ।tūrṇamāsādya badhnīyādṛḍhāṃ kakṣāñca dakṣiṇām ।।vilakṣyamapi tadvāṇaṃ tatra caiva susaṃsthitaṃ ।tataḥ samuddharedvāṇaṃ tūṇāddakṣiṇapāṇinā ।।tenaiva sahitaṃ madhye śaraṃ saṅgṛhya dhārayet ।vāmahastena vai kakṣāṃ dhanustasmātsamuddharet ।।aviṣaṇṇamatirbhūtvā guṇe puṅkhaṃ niveśayet ।sampīḍya siṃhakarṇena puṅkhenāpi same dṛḍhaṃ ।।

vāmakarṇopaviṣtañca phalaṃ vāmasya dhārayet ।varṇān madhyamayā tatra vāmāṅgulyā ca dhārayet ।।mano lakṣyagataṃ kṛtvā muṣṭinā ca vidhānavit ।dakṣiṇe gātrabhāge tu kṛtvā varṇaṃ vimokṣayet ।।lalāṭapuṭasaṃsthānaṃ daṇḍaṃ lakṣye niveśayet ।ākṛṣya tāḍayettatra candrakaṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulam ।।muktvā vāṇaṃ tataḥ paścādulkāśikṣastadā tayā ।nigṛhṇīyān madhyamayā tato aṅgulyā punaḥ punaḥ ।।akṣilakṣyaṃ kṣipettūṇāccaturasrañca dakṣiṇam ।caturasragataṃ vedhyamabhyaseccāditaḥ sthitaḥ ।।tasmādanantaraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ parāvṛttaṃ gatañca yat ।nimnamunnatavedhañca abhyaset kṣiprakantataḥ ।।vedhyasthāneṣvathaiteṣu sattvasya puṭakāddhanuḥ ।hastāvāpaśataiścitraistarjayeddustarair api ।।tasmin vedhyagate vipra dve vedhye dṛḍhasañjñake ।dve vedhye duṣkare vedhye dve tathā citraduṣkare ।।na tu nimnañca tīkṣṇañca dṛḍhavedhye prakīrtite ।nimnaṃ duṣkaramuddiṣṭaṃ vedhyamūrdhvagatañca yat ।।mastakāyanamadhye tu citraduṣkarasañjñake ।evaṃ vedhyagaṇaṅkṛtvā dakṣiṇenetareṇa ca ।।ārohet prathamaṃ vīro jitalakṣastato naraḥ ।eṣa eva vidhiḥ proktastatra dṛṣṭaḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ ।।

asminniti kha, cha, ja ca

namrañceti gha, ña ca
adhikaṃ bhramaṇaṃ tasya tasmādvedhyāt prakīrtitam ।lakṣyaṃ sa yojayettatra patripatragataṃ dṛḍham ।।bhrāntaṃ pracalitañcaiva sthiraṃ yacca bhavediti ।samantāttāḍayed bhindyācchedayedvyathayedapi ।।karmayogavidhānajño jñātvaivaṃ vidhimācaret ।manasā cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭyā yogaśikṣuryamaṃ jayet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dhanurvede nāmonapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dhanurvedakathanam

agnir uvāca
jitahasto jitamatirjitadṛglakṣyasādhakaḥ ।niyatāṃ siddhimāsādya tato vāhanamāruhet ।।daśahasto bhavet pāśo vṛttaḥ karamukhas tathā ।guṇakārpāsamuñjānāṃ bhaṅgasnāyvarkavarmiṇām ।।anyeṣāṃ sudṛḍhānāñca sukṛtaṃ pariveṣṭitam ।tathā triṃśatsamaṃ pāśaṃ budhaḥ kuryāt suvartitam ।।kartavyaṃ śikṣakaistasya sthānaṃ kakṣāsu vai tadā ।vāmahastena saṅgṛhya dakṣiṇenoddharettataḥ ।।kuṇḍalasyākṛtiṃ kṛtvā bhrāmyakaṃ mastakopari ।

kṣipet tūrṇamaye tūrṇaṃ puruṣe carmaveṣṭite ।।valgite ca plute caiva tathā pravrajiteṣu ca ।samayogavidhiṃ kṛtvā prayuñjīta suśikṣitam ।।vijitvā tu yathānyāyaṃ tato bandhaṃ samācaret ।kaṭyāmbaddhvā tataḥ khaḍgaṃ vāmapārśvāvalambitam ।।dṛḍhaṃ vigṛhya vāmena niṣkarṣeddakṣiṇena tu ।ṣaḍaṅgulaparīṇāhaṃ saptahastasamucchritaṃ ।।ayomayyaḥ śalākāś ca varmāṇi vividhāni ca ।ardhahaste same caiva tiryagūrdhvagataṃ tathā ।।yojayedvidhinā yena tathātvaṅgadataḥ śṛṇu ।tūṇacarmāvanaddhāṅgaṃ sthāpayitvā navaṃ dṛḍhaṃ ।।kareṇādāya lagūḍaṃ dakṣiṇāṅgulakaṃ navaṃ ।udyamya ghātayedyasya nāśastena śiśordṛḍhaṃ ।।ubhābhyāmatha hastābhyāṃ kuryāttasya nipātanaṃ ।akleśena tataḥ kurvan badhe siddhiḥ prakīrtitā ।।vāhānāṃ śramakaraṇaṃ pracārārthaṃ purā tava ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dhanurvedo nāma pañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

varmaveṣṭite iti gha

jñātveti ṭa

chapter 

ś athaikapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dhanurvedakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
bhrāntamudbhrāntamāviddhamāplutaṃ viplutaṃ sṛtaṃ ।sampātaṃ samudīśañca śyenapātamathākulaṃ ।।uddhūtamavadhūtañca savyaṃ dakṣiṇameva ca ।anālakṣitavisphoṭau karālendramahāsakhau ।।vikarālanipātau ca vibhīṣaṇabhayānakau ।samagrārdhatṛtīyāṃśapādapādardhavārijāḥ ।।pratyālīḍhamathālīḍhaṃ varāhaṃ lulitantathā ।iti dvātriṃśato jñeyāḥ khaḍgacarmavidhau raṇe ।।parāvṛttamapāvṛttaṃ gṛhītaṃ laghusañjñitaṃ ।ūrdhvāt kṣiptamadhaḥ kṣiptaṃ sandhāritavidhāritaṃ ।।śyenapātaṃ gajapātaṃ grāhagrāhyantathaiva ca ।evamekādaśavidhā jñeyāḥ pāśavidhā narāḥ ।।ṛjvāyataṃ viśālañca tiryagbhrāmitameva ca ।pañcakarma vinirdiṣṭaṃ vyaste pāśe mahātmabhiḥ ।।chedanaṃ bhedanaṃ pāto bhramaṇaṃ śayanaṃ tathā ।vikartanaṃ kartanañca cakrakarmedameva ca ।।āsphoṭaḥ kṣeḍanaṃ bhedastrāsāndolitakau tathā ।

karālendramahāravāviti ka, ja, ṭa ca

śamanamiti gha, ja, ṭa ca
śūlakarmāṇi jānīhi ṣaṣṭhamāghātasañjñitaṃ ।।dṛṣṭighātaṃ bhujāghātaṃ pārśvaghātaṃ dvijottama ।ṛjupakṣeṣuṇā pātaṃ tomarasya prakīrtitaṃ ।।āhataṃ vipra gomūtraprabhūtaṅkamalāsanaṃ ।tatordhvagātraṃ namitaṃ vāmadakṣiṇameva ca ।।āvṛttañca parāvṛttaṃ pādoddhūtamaplutaṃ ।haṃsamardaṃ vimardañca gadākarma prakīrtitaṃ ।।karālamavaghātañca daśopaplutameva ca ।kṣiptahastaṃ sthitaṃ śūnyaṃ parāśostu vinirdiśet ।।tāḍanaṃ chedanaṃ vipra tathā cūrṇanameva ca ।mudgarasya tu karmāṇi tathā plavanaghātanaṃ ।।saṃśrāntamatha viśrāntaṃ govisargaṃ sudurdharaṃ ।bhindipālasya karmāṇi laguḍasya ca tānyapi ।।antyaṃ madhyaṃ parāvṛttaṃ nideśāntaṃ dvijottama ।vajrasyetāni karmāṇi paṭṭiśasya ca tānyapi ।।haraṇaṃ chedanaṃ ghāto baloddhāraṇamāyataṃ ।kṛpāṇakarma nirdiṣṭaṃ pātanaṃ sphoṭanaṃ tathā ।।trāsanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ ghāto baloddharaṇamāyatam ।kṣepaṇīkarma nirdiṣṭaṃ yantrakarmaitadeva tu ।।santyāgamavadaṃśaś ca varāhoddhūtakaṃ tathā ।hastāvahastamālīnamekahastastāvahastake ।।dvihastavāhupāśe ca kaṭirecitakodgate ।

haṃsamārgaṃ vimārgañceti gha, ña ca । samārgañca vimārgañceti ṭa
urolalāṭaghāte ca bhujāvidhamanantathā ।।karoddhūtaṃ vimānañca pādāhati vipādikaṃ ।gātrasaṃśleṣaṇaṃ śāntaṃ tathā gātraviparyayaḥ ।।ūrdhvaprahāraṃ ghātañca gomūtraṃ savyadakṣiṇe ।pārantārakaṃ daṇḍaṃ karavīrandhamākulaṃ ।।tiryagbandhamapāmārgaṃ bhīmavegaṃ sudarśanaṃ ।siṃhākrāntaṃ gajākrāntaṃ gardabhākrāntameva ca ।।gadākarmāṇi jānīyānniyuddhasyātha karma ca ।ākarṣaṇaṃ vikarṣaṇañca bāhūnāṃ mūlameva ca ।।grīvāviparivartañca pṛṣṭhabhaṅgaṃ sudāruṇaṃ ।paryāsanaviparyāsau paśumāramajāvikaṃ ।।pādaprahāramāsphoṭaṃ kaṭirecitakantathā ।gātrāśleṣaṃ skandhagataṃ mahīvyājanameva ca ।।urolalāṭaghātañca vispaṣṭakaraṇantathā ।uddhūtamavadhūtañca tiryaṅmārgagataṃ tathā ।।gajaskandhamavakṣepamaparāṅmukhameva ca ।devamārgamadhomārgamamārgagamanākulaṃ ।।yaṣṭighātamavakṣepo vasudhādāraṇantathā ।jānubandhaṃ bhujābandhaṃ sudāruṇaṃ ।।vipṛṣṭhaṃ sodakaṃ śubhraṃ bhujāveṣṭitameva ca ।sannaddhaiḥ saṃyuge bhāvyaṃ saśastraistair gajādibhiḥ ।।varāṅkuśadharau cobhau eko grīvāgato aparaḥ ।

pārakaṃ tārakaṃ gaṇḍamiti kha, gha ca

tiryagūrdhvamapāmārgamiti gha, ña ca
skandhau dvau ca dhānuṣkau dvau ca khaḍgadharau gaje ।।rathe raṇe gaje caiva turagāṇāṃ trayaṃ bhavet ।dhānuṣkāṇāntrayaṃ proktaṃ rakṣārthe turagasya ca ।।dhanvino rakṣaṇārthāya carmiṇantu niyojayet ।svamantraiḥ śastramabhyarcya śāstrantrailokyamohanaṃ ।।yo yuddhe yāti ca jayedarīn sampālayedbhuvaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dhanurvedo nāmaikapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvipañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vyavahārakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
vyavahāraṃ pravakṣyāmi nayānayavivekadaṃ ।catuṣpācca catuḥsthānaś catuḥsādhana ucyate ।।caturhitaś caturvyāpī catuṣkārī ca kīrtyate ।aṣṭāṅgo aṣṭādaśapadaḥ śataśākhastathaiva ca ।।triyonirdvyabhiyogaś ca dvidvāro dvigatis tathā ।dharmaś ca vyavahāraś ca caritraṃ rājaśāsanaṃ ।।catuṣpādvyavahārāṇāmuttaraḥ pūrvasādhakaḥ ।tatra satye sthito dharmo vyavahārastu sākṣiṣu ।।

varmiṇantviti gha, ña ca
caritraṃ saṅgrahe puṃsāṃ rājājñāyāntu śāsanaṃ ।sāmābhyupāyasādhyatvāccatuḥsādhana ucyate ।।caturṇāmāśramāṇāñca rakṣaṇātsa caturhitaḥ ।kartāraṃ sākṣiṇaś caiva satyānrājānameva ca ।।vyāpnoti pādago yasmāccaturvyāpī tataḥ smṛtaḥ ।dharmasyārthasya yaśaso lokapaṅktestathaiva ca ।।caturṇāṅkaraṇādeṣa catuṣkārī prakīrtitaḥ ।rājā sapuruṣaḥ sabhyāḥ śāstraṃ gaṇakalekhakau ।।hiraṇyamagnirudakamaṣṭāṅgaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ ।kāmāt krodhācca lobhācca tribhyo yasmāt pravartate ।।triyoniḥ kīrtyate tena trayametadvivādakṛt ।dvyabhiyogastu vijñeyaḥ śaṅkātattvābhiyogataḥ ।।śaṅkāṣaḍbhistu saṃsargāttattvaṣoḍhādidarśaṇāt ।pakṣadvayābhisambandhāddvidvāraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ ।।pūrvavādastayoḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣastvanantaraḥ ।bhūtacchalānusāritvāddvigatiḥ samudāhṛtā ।।ṛṇandeyamadeyañca yena yatra yathā ca yat ।dānagrahaṇadharmaś ca ṛṇādānamiti smṛtam ।।svadravyaṃ yatra viśrambhānnikṣipatyaviśaṅkitaḥ ।nikṣepannāma tat proktaṃ vyavahārapadambudhaiḥ ।।vaṇikprabhṛtayo yatra karma sambhūya kurvate ।tatsambhūyasamuptyānaṃ vyavahārapadaṃ viduḥ ।।dattvā dravyañca samyagyaḥ punarādātumicchati ।

dattvāpradānikaṃ nāma tadvivādapadaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।abhyupetya ca śuśrūṣāṃ yastāṃ na pratipadyate ।aśuśrūṣābhyupetyaitadvivādapadamucyate ।।bhṛtyānāṃ vetanasyoktādānādānavidhikriyā ।vetanasyānapākarma tadvivādapadaṃ smṛtam ।।nikṣiptaṃ vā paradravyaṃ naṣṭaṃ labdhvā prahṛtya vā ।kikrīyate parokṣaṃ yat sa jñeyo asvāmivikrayaḥ ।।vikrīya paṇyaṃ mūlyena kretre yacca na dīyate ।vikrīyāsampradānantadvivādapadamucyate ।।krītvā mūlyena yatpaṇyaṃ kretā na bahu manyate ।krītvā mūlyena yat paṇyaṃ duṣkrītaṃ manyate krayī ।।pāṣaṇḍanaigamādīnāṃ sthitiḥ samaya ucyate ।samayasyānapākarma tadvivādapadaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।setukedāramaryādāvikṛṣṭākṛṣṭaniś cayāḥ ।kṣetrādhikāre yatra syurvivādaḥ kṣetrajastu saḥ ।।vaivāhiko vidhiḥ strīnāṃ yatra puṃsāñca kīrtyate ।strīpuṃsayogasaṃjñantu tadvivādapadaṃ smṛtam ।।vibhāgorthasya paitrasya putrair yastu prakalpyate ।dāyamāgamiti proktaṃ tadvivādapadaṃ budhaiḥ ।।sahasā kriyate karma yat kiñcit baladarpitaiḥ ।tat sāhasamiti proktaṃ vivādapadamucyate ।।deśajātikulādīnāmākrośatyaṅgasaṃyutam ।yadvacaḥ pratikūlārthaṃ vākpāruṣyaṃ taducyate ।।

paragātreṣvabhidrehī hastapādāyudhādibhiḥ ।agnyādibhiś copaghātair daṇḍapāruṣyamucyate ।।akṣavajjaśalākādyair daivataṃ dyūtamucyate ।pañcakriḍāvayobhiś ca prāṇidyutasamāhvayaḥ ।।prakīrṇakaḥ punarjñeyo vyavahāro nirāśrayaḥ ।rājñāmājñāpratoghātastatkarmākaraṇantathā ।।vyavahāro aṣṭādaśapadasteṣāṃ bhedo atha vai śatam ।kriyābhedānmanuṣyānāṃ śataśākho nigadyate ।।vyavahārānnṛpaḥ paśyej jñāniviprair akopanaḥ ।śatrumitrasamāḥ sabhyā alobhāḥ śrutivedinaḥ ।।apaśyatā kāryavaśāt sabhyair vipraṃ niyojayet ।rāgāllobhādbhayādvāpi smṛtyapetādikāriṇaḥ ।।sabhyāḥ pṛthak pṛthag daṇḍyā vivādādvdiguṇo damaḥ ।smṛtyācāraeṣvyapetena mārgeṇa dharṣitaḥ paraiḥ ।।āvedayati yadrājñe vyavahārapadaṃ hi tat ।pratyarthino agrato lekhyaṃ yathā veditamarthinā ।।samāmāsatadardhāharnāmajātyādicihnitam ।śrutārthasyottaraṃ lekhyaṃ pūrvāvedakasannidhau ।।tapto arthī lekhayetsadyaḥ pratijñātārthasādhanam ।tatsiddhau siddhamāpnoti viparītamato anyathā ।।catuṣpādvyavahāroyaṃ vivādeṣūpadarśitaḥ ।

apaśyatā ity ayaṃ pāṭho na sādhuḥ
abhiyogamanistīrya nainaṃ pratyabhiyojayet ।।abhiyuktañca nānyena tyaktaṃ viprakṛtiṃ nayet ।kuryāt pratyabhiyogantu kalahe sāhaseṣu ca ।।ubhayoḥ pratibhūrgrāhyaḥ samarthaḥ kāmyanirṇaye ।nihnave bhāvito dadyāddhanaṃ rājñe tu tatsamam ।।mithyābhiyogād dviguṇamabhiyogāddhanaṃ haret ।sāhasasteyapāruṣyeṣvabhiśāpātyaye striyāḥ ।।vicārayetsadyaḥ eva kālo anyatrecchayā smṛtaḥ ।deśāddeśāntaraṃ yāti sṛkkaṇī parileḍhi ca ।।lalāṭaṃ svidyate cāsya mukhavaivarṇyameva ca ।svabhāvādvikṛtaṃ gacchenmanovākkāyakarmabhiḥ ।।abhiyoge atha vā sākṣye vāgduṣṭaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ।sandigdhārthaṃ svatantro yaḥ sādhayedyaś ca niṣpatet ।।na cāhūto vadet kiñciddhanī daṇḍyaś ca sa smṛtaḥ ।sākṣiṣūbhayataḥ satsu sākṣiṇaḥ pūrvavādinaḥ ।।pūrvapakṣe adharībhūte bhavantyuttaravādinaḥ ।sagaṇaścedvivādaḥ syāttatra hīnantu dāpayet ।।dattaṃ paṇaṃ vasañcaiva dhanino dhanameva ca ।chalannirasya dūtena vyavahārānnayennṛpaḥ ।।bhūtamapyarthamapyastaṃ hīyate vyavahārataḥ ।nihnute nikhilānekamekadeśavibhāvitam ।।dāpyaḥ sarvānnṛpeṇārthānna grāhyastvaniveditaḥ ।smṛtyorvirodhe nyāyastu vallavān vyavahārataḥ ।।

arthaśāstrāddhi balavaddharmaśāstramiti sthitiḥ ।pramāṇaṃ likhitaṃ bhuktiḥ sākṣiṇaśceti kirtitam ।।eṣāmanyatamābhāve divyānyatamamucyate ।sarveṣveva vivādeṣu balavatyuttarā kriyā ।।ādhau pratigrahe krīte pūrvā tu balavattarā ।paśyato bruvato bhūmerhānirviṃśativārṣikī ।।pareṇa bhujyamānā yā dhanasya daśavārṣikī ।ādhisaumopaniḥkṣepajaḍabāladhanair vinā ।।tathopanidhirājastrīśrotriyāṇāṃ dhanair api ।ādhyādīnāṃ vihartāraṃ dhanine dāpayeddhanaṃ ।।daṇḍyaṃ ca tatsamaṃ rājñe śaktyapekṣyamathāpi vā ।āgamopyadhiko bhuktiṃ vinā pūrvakramāgatāṃ ।।āgamopi balannaiva bhuktiḥ stokāpi yatra na ।āgamena viśuddhena bhogo yāti pramāṇatām ।।aviśuddhāgamo bhogaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ nādhigacchati ।āgamastu kṛto yena so abhiyuktastamuddharet ।।na tatsutastatsuto vā bhuktistatra garīyasī ।yobhiyuktaḥ paretaḥ syāt tasya ṛkthāttamuddharet ।।na tatra kāraṇaṃ bhuktirāgamena vinākṛtā ।balopādhivinirvṛttān vyavahārānnivartayet ।।strīnaktamantarāgāravahiḥśatrukṛtas tathā ।mattonmattārtavyasanibālabhītaprayojitaḥ ।।

smṛtiriti gha, ña ca
asambaddhakṛtaś caiva vyavahāro na siddhyati ।pranaṣṭādhiśataṃ deyaṃ nṛpeṇa dhanine dhanaṃ ।।vibhāvayennacelliṅgaistatsamaṃ dātumarhati ।deyañcaurahṛtaṃ dravyaṃ rājñā janapadāya tu ।।aśītibhāgo vṛddhiḥ syānmāsi māsi sabandhake ।varṇakramācchataṃ dvitricatuṣpañcakamanyathā ।।saptatistu paśustrīṇāṃ rasasyāṣṭaguṇā parā ।vastradhānyahiraṇyānāṃ catustridviguṇā tathā ।।grāmāntarāttu daśakaṃ sāmudrādapi viṃśatiṃ ।dadyurvā svakṛtāṃ vṛddhiṃ sarve sarvāsu jātiṣu ।।prapanna sādhayannarthaṃ na vācyā nṛpatirbhavet ।sādhyamāno nṛpaṃ gaccheddaṇḍyo dāpyaś ca taddhanaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyavahāro nāma dvipañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha tripañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vyavahārakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
gṛhītārthaḥ kramāddāpyo dhanināmadhamarṇikaḥ ।datvā tu brāhmaṇāyādau nṛpatestadanantaram ।।

rājñādhamarṇiko dāpyaḥ sādhitāddaśakaṃ smṛtam ।pañcakantu śataṃ dāpyaḥ prāptārtho hy uttamarṇakaḥ ।।hīnajātiṃ parikṣīṇamṛṇārthaṃ karma kārayet ।brāhmaṇastu parikṣīṇaḥ śanair dāpyo yathodayam ।।dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇāti prayuktaṃ yaḥ svakandhanam ।madhyasthasthāpitaṃ tatsyādvardhate na tataḥ paraṃ ।।ṛkthagrāha ṛṇaṃ dāpyo yoṣidgrāhastathaiva ca ।putro ananyāśritadravyaḥ putrahīnasya ṛkthinaḥ ।।avibhuktaiḥ kuṭumbārthaṃ yadṛṇantu kṛtambhavet ।dadyustadṛkthinaḥ prete proṣite vā kuṭumbini ।।na yoṣit patiputrābhyāṃ na putreṇa kṛtaṃ pitā ।dadyādṛte kuṭumbārthānna patiḥ strīkṛtaṃ tathā ।।gopaśauṇḍikaśainūṣarajakavyādhayoṣitāṃ ।ṛṇaṃ dadyātpatistvāsāṃ yasmādvṛttistadāśrayā ।।pratipannaṃ striyā deyaṃ patyā vā saha yat kṛtaṃ ।svayaṃ kṛtaṃ vā yadṛṇaṃ nānyastrī dātumarhati ।।pitari proṣite prete vyasābhiplute atha vā ।putrapautrair ṛṇandeyaṃ nihnave sākṣibhāvitam ।।surākāmadyūtakṛtandaṇḍaśulkāvaśiṣṭakam ।vṛthā dānaṃ tathaiveha putro dadyānna paitṛkam ।।bhrātṝṇāmatha dampatyoḥ pituḥ putrasya caiva hi ।

vyasanābhiplutepi veti kha, gha, ña ca
pratibhāvyamṛṇaṃ grāhyamavibhaktena ca smṛtam ।।darśane pratyaye dāne pratibhāvyaṃ vidhīyate ।ādhau tu vitathe dāpyā vitathasya sutā api ।।darśanapratibhūryatra mṛtaḥ prātyayiko api vā ।na tatputrā dhanaṃ dadyurdadyurdānāya ye sthitāḥ ।।bahavaḥ syuryadi svāṃśair dadyuḥ pratibhuvo dhanam ।ekacchāyāśriteṣveṣu dhanikasya yathā ruci ।।pratibhūrdāpito yatra prakāśaṃ dhanine dhanam ।dviguṇaṃ pratidātavyamṛṇikaistasya tadbhavet ।।svasantatistrīpaśavyaṃ dhānyaṃ dviguṇameva ca ।vastraṃ caturguṇaṃ proktaṃ rasaścāṣṭaguṇas tathā ।।ādhiḥ praṇaśyet dviguṇe dhane yadi na mokṣyate ।kāle kālakṛtaṃ naśyet phalabhogyo na naśyati ।।gopyādhibhogyo nāvṛddhiḥ sopakāre atha bhāvite ।naṣṭo deyo vinaṣṭaś ca daivarājakṛtādṛte ।।ādheḥ svīkaraṇātsiddhaurakṣamāṇopyasāratām ।yātaścedanya ādheyo dhanabhāg vā dhanī bhavet ।।caritraṃ bandhakakṛtaṃ savṛddhaṃ dāpayedvanaṃ ।satyaṅkārakṛtaṃ dravyaṃ dviguṇaṃ pratidāpayet ।।upasthitasya moktavya ādhirdaṇḍo anyathā bhavet ।prayojake sati dhanaṃ kulenyasyādhimāpnuyāt ।।tatkālakṛtamūlyo vā tatra tiṣṭhedavṛddhikaḥ ।

pratibhāvyamṛṇaṃ sākṣyamavibhaktena tat smṛtamiti kha, ga, gha, cha, ja, ṭa ca
vinā dhāraṇakādvāpi vikrīṇīte sasākṣikam ।।yadā tu dviguṇībhūtamṛṇamādhau tadā khalu ।mocyaścādhistadutpādya praviṣṭe dviguṇe dhane ।।vyasanasthamanākhyāya haste anyasya yadarpayet ।dravyaṃ tadaupanidhikaṃ pratideyaṃ tathaiva tat ।।na dāpyo apahṛtaṃ tattu rājadaivakataskaraiḥ ।preṣaścenmārgite datte dāpyo daṇḍaś ca tatsamam ।।ājīvan svecchayā daṇḍyo dāpyastaccāpi sodayaṃ ।yācitāvāhitanyāse nikṣepeṣvapyayaṃ vidhiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyavahāro nāma tripañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuḥpañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

divyapramāṇakathanaṃ

agnir uvāca
tapasvino dānaśīlāḥ kulīnāḥ satyavādinaḥ ।dharmapradhānā ṛjavaḥ putravanto dhanānvitāḥ ।।pañcayajñakriyāyuktāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ pañca vā trayaḥ ।yathājāti yathāvarṇa sarve sarveṣu vā smṛtāḥ ।।strīvṛddhabālakitavamattonmattābhiśastakāḥ ।

raṅgāvatāripāṣaṇḍikūṭakṛdvikalendriyāḥ ।।patitāptānnasambandhisahāyariputaskarāḥ ।amākṣiṇaḥ sarvasākṣī cauryapāruṣyasāhase ।।ubhayānumataḥ sākṣī bhavatyekopi dharmavit ।abruvan hi naraḥ sākṣyamṛṇaṃ sadaśabandhakam ।।rājñā sarvaṃ pradāpyaḥ syāt ṣaṭcatvāriṃśake ahnani ।na dadāti hi yaḥ sākṣyaṃ jānannapi narādhamaḥ ।।sa kūṭasākṣiṇāṃ pāpaistulyo daṇḍena caiva hi ।sākṣiṇaḥ śrāvayedvādiprativādisamīpagān ।।ye pātakakṛtāṃ lokā mahāpātakināṃ tathā ।agnidānāñca ye lokā ye ca strībālaghātināṃ ।।tān sarvān samavāpnoti yaḥ sākṣyamanṛtaṃ vadet ।sukṛtaṃ yattvayā kiñcijjanmāntaraśataiḥ kṛtam ।।tatsarvaṃ tasya jānīhi yaṃ parājayase mṛṣā ।dvaidhe bahūnāṃ vacanaṃ sameṣu guṇināntathā ।।guṇidvaidhe tu vacanaṃ grāhyaṃ ye guṇavattarāḥ ।yasyocuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ satyāṃ pratijñāṃ sa jayī bhavet ।।anyathā vādino yasya dhrūvastasya parājayaḥ ।ukte api sākṣibhiḥ sākṣye yadyanye guṇavattarāḥ ।।dviguṇā vānyathā brūyuḥ kūṭāḥ syuḥpūrvasākṣiṇaḥ ।pṛthak pṛthagdaṇḍanīyāḥ kūṭakṛtsākṣiṇas tathā ।।vivādāddviguṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ vivāsyo brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।yaḥ sākṣyaṃ śrāvito anyebhyo nihnute tattamovṛtaḥ ।।

sa dāpyo aṣṭaguṇam daṇḍaṃ brāhmaṇantu vivāsayet ।varṇināṃ hi badho yatra tatra sākṣyaanṛtaṃ vadet ।।yaḥ kaścidartho abhimataḥ svarucyā tu parasparaṃ ।lekhyaṃ tu sākṣimat kāryaṃ tasmin dhanikapūrvakam ।।samāmāsatadarhāhar nāmajātisvagotrajaiḥ ।sabrahmacārikātmīyapitṛnāmādicihnitam ।।samāpte arthe ṛṇī nāma svahastena niveśayet ।mataṃ me amukaputrasya yadatroparilekhitaṃ ।।sākṣiṇaś ca svahastena pitṛnāmakapūrvakam ।atrāhamamukaḥ sākṣī likheyuriti te samāḥ ।।alipijña ṛṇī yaḥ syālekayet svamatantu saḥ ।sākṣī vā sākṣiṇānyena sarvasākṣisamīpataḥ ।।ubhayābhyarthitenaitanmayā hy amukasūnunā ।likhitaṃ hy amukeneti lekhako athāntato likhet ।।vināpi sākṣibhir lekhyaṃ svahastalikhitañca yat ।tat pramāṇaṃ smṛtaṃ sarvaṃ balopadhikṛtādṛte ।।ṛṇaṃ lekhyakṛtaṃ deyaṃ puruṣaistribhireva tu ।ādhistu bhujyate tāvadyāvattanna pradīyate ।।deśāntarasthe durlekhye naṣṭonmṛṣṭe hṛte tathā ।bhinne cchinne tathā dagdhe lekhyamanyattu kārayet ।।sandigdhārthaviśuddhyarthaṃ svahastalikhitantu yat ।yuktiprāptikriyācihnasambandhāgamahetubhiḥ ।।lekhyasya pṛṣṭhe abhilikhet praviṣṭamadhamarṇinaḥ ।

dhanī copagataṃ dadyāt svahastaparicihnitam ।।datvarṇaṃ pāṭayellekhyaṃ śuddhyai cānyattu kārayet ।sākṣimacca bhavedyattu taddātavyaṃ sasākṣikaṃ ।।tulāgnyāpo viṣaṃ koṣo divyānīha viśuddhaye ।mahābhiyogeṣvetāni śīrṣakasthe abhiyoktari ।।rucyā vānyataraḥ kuryāditaro vartayecchiraḥ ।vināpi śīrṣakāt kuryānnṛpadrohe atha pātake ।।nāsahasrāddharet phālaṃ na tulānna viṣantathā ।nṛpārtheṣvabhiyogeṣu vaheyuḥ śucayaḥ sadā ।।sahasrārthe tulādīni koṣamalpe api dāpayet ।śatārdhaṃ dāpayecchuddhamaśuddho daṇḍabhāg bhavet ।।sacelasnātamāhūya sūryodaya upoṣitam ।kārayetdarvadivyāni nṛpabrāhmaṇasannidhau ।।tulā strībālavṛddhāndhapaṅgubrāhmaṇarogiṇāṃ ।agnirjvalaṃ vā śūdrasya yavāḥ sapta viṣasya vā ।।tulādhāraṇavidvadbhirabhiyuktastulāśritaḥ ।pratimānasamībhūto rekhāṃ kṛtvāvatāritaḥ ।।ādityacandrāvanilo analaś ca dyaurbhūmirāpohṛdayaṃ yamaś ca ।ahaś ca rātriś ca ubhe ca sandhye dharmaś ca jānāti narasya vṛttam ।।tvaṃ tule satyadhāmāsi purā devair vinirmitā ।satyaṃ vadasva kalyāṇi saṃśayānmāṃ vimocaya ।।

yadyasmi pāpakṛnmātastato māṃ tvamadho naya ।śuddhaścedgamayordhvammāṃ tulāmityabhimantrayet ।।karau vimṛditavrīherlakṣayitvā tato nyaset ।saptāśvaptyasya patrāṇi tāvat sūtreṇa veṣṭayet ।।tvameva sarvabhūtānāmantaś carasi pāvaka ।sākṣivat puṇyapāpebhyo brūhi satyaṅgare mama ।।tasyetyuktavato lauhaṃ pañcāśatpalikaṃ samam ।agnirvarṇaṃ nyaset piṇḍaṃ hastayorubhayorapi ।।sa tamādāya saptaiva maṇḍalāni śatair vrajet ।ṣoḍaśāṅgulakaṃ jñeyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tāvadantaram ।।muktvāgniṃ mṛditavrīhiradagdhaḥ śuddhimāpnuyāt ।antarā patite piṇḍe sandehe vā punarharet ।।pavitrāṇāṃ pavitra tvaṃ śodhyaṃ śodhaya pāvana ।satyena mābhirakṣasva varuṇetyabhiśastakam ।।nābhidaghnodakasthasya gṛhītvorū jalaṃ viśet ।samakālamiṣuṃ muktamānīyānyo javo naraḥ ।।yadi tasminnimagnāṅgaṃ paśyecca śuddhimāpnuyāt ।tvaṃ viṣa brahmaṇaḥ putra satyadharme vyavasthita ।।trāyasvāsmādabhīśāpāt satyena bhava me amṛtam ।evamuktvā viṣaṃ sārṅgaṃ bhakṣayeddhimaśailajaṃ ।।yasya vegair vinā jīrṇaṃ śuddhiṃ tasya vinirdiśet ।devānugrān samabhyarcya tatsnānodakamāharet ।।saṃśrāvya pāpayettasmājjalāttu prasṛtitrayam ।

ācaturdaśamādahno yasya no rājadaivikam ।।vyasanaṃ jāyate ghoraṃ sa śuddhaḥ syādasaṃśayam ।satyavāhanaśastrāṇi govījakanakāni ca ।।devatāgurupādāś ca iṣṭāpūrtakṛtāni ca ।ityete sukarāḥ proktāḥ śapathāḥ svalpasaṃśaye ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe divyāni pramāṇāni nāma catuḥpañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dāyavibhāgakathanam

agnir uvāca
vibhāgañcet pitā kuryādicchayā vibhajet sutān ।jyeṣṭhaṃ vā śreṣṭhabhāgena sarve vā syuḥ samāṃśinaḥ ।।yadi dadyāt samānaṃśān kāryāḥ patnyaḥ samāṃśikāḥ ।na dattaṃ strīdhanaṃ yāsāṃ bhartrā vā śvaśurena vā ।।śaktasthānīhamānasya kiñciddatvā pṛthak kriyā ।nyūnādhikavibhaktānāṃ dharmyaś ca pitṛnā kṛtaḥ ।।vibhajeyuḥ sutāḥ pitrorūrdhvamṛkthamṛṇaṃ samam ।māturduhitaraḥ śeṣamṛṇāttābhya ṛte annayaḥ ।।pitṛdravyāvināśena yadanyat svayamarjayet ।maitramaudvāhikañcaiva dāyādānānna tadbhavet ।।sāmānyārthasamutthāne vibhāgastu samaḥ smṛtaḥ ।

anekapitṛkāṇāntu pitṛto bhāgakalpanā ।।bhūryāpitā mahopāttā nibandho dravyameva vā ।tatra syāt sadṛśaṃ svāmyaṃ pituḥ putrasya cobhayoḥ ।।vibhakteṣu suto jātaḥ savarṇāyāṃ vibhāgabhāk ।dṛśyādvā tadvibhāgaḥ syādāyavyayaviśodhitāt ।।kramādabhyāgataṃ dravyaṃ hṛtamabhyuddharecca yaḥ ।dāyādebhyo na taddadyādvidyayā labdhameva ca ।।pitṛbhyāṃ yasya yaddattaṃ tattasyaiva dhanaṃ bhavet ।piturūrdhvaṃ vibhajatāṃ mātāpyaṃśaṃ samaṃ haret ।।asaṃskṛtāstu saṃskāryā bhrātṛbhiḥ pūrvasaṃskṛtaiḥ ।bhāginyaś ca nijādaṃśāddatvāṃśantu turīyakaṃ ।।catuḥstridvyekabhāgāḥ syurvarṇaśo brāhmaṇātmajāḥ ।kṣatrajāstridvyekabhāgā viḍjāstu dvyekabhāginaḥ ।।anyonyāpahṛtaṃ dravyaṃ vibhakte yattu dṛśyate ।tat punaste samair aṃśair vibhajeranniti sthitiḥ ।।aputreṇa parakṣetre niyogotpāditaḥ sutaḥ ।ubhayorapyasāvṛkthī piṇḍadātā ca dharmataḥ ।।auraso dharmapatnījastatsamaḥ putrikāsutaḥ ।kṣetrajaḥ kṣetrajātastu sagotreṇetareṇa vā ।।gṛhe pracchanna utpanno gūḍhajastu sutaḥ smṛtaḥ ।kānīnaḥ kanyakājāto mātāmahasuto mataḥ ।।kṣatāyāmakṣatāyāṃ vā jātaḥ paunarbhavaḥ sutaḥ ।dadyānmātā pitā vā yaṃ sa putrī dattako bhavet ।।

krītaś ca tābhyāṃ vikrītaḥ kṛtrimaḥ syāt svyaṃ kṛtaḥ ।dattātmā tu svayaṃ datto garbhe vittaḥ sahoḍhajaḥ ।।utsṛṣṭo gṛhyate yastu sopaviddho bhavet sutaḥ ।piṇḍado aṃśaharaś caiṣāṃ pūrvābhāve paraḥ paraḥ ।।sajātīyeṣvayaṃ proktastanayeṣu mayā vidhiḥ ।jāto api dāsyāṃ śūdrasya kāmato aṃśaharo bhavet ।।mṛte pitari kuryustaṃ bhrātarastvardhabhāgikaṃ ।abhrātṛko haret sarvaṃ duhitṝṇāṃ sutādṛte ।।patnī duhitaraś caiva pitaro bhrātaras tathā ।tatsuto gotrajo bandhuḥ śiṣyaḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ ।।eṣāmabhāve pūvasya dhanabhāguttarottaraḥ ।svaryātsya hy aputrasya sarvavarṇeṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ ।।vānaprasthayatibrahmacāriṇāmṛkthabhāginaḥ ।krameṇācāryasacchiṣyadharmabhrātrekatīrthinaḥ ।।saṃsṛṣṭinastu saṃsṛṣṭī sodarasya tu sodaraḥ ।dadyāccāpahereccāṃśaṃ jātasya ca mṛtasya ca ।।anyodaryastu saṃsṛṣṭī nānyodaryadhanaṃ haret ।asaṃsṛṣtyapi cādadyātsodaryo nānyamānṛjaḥ ।।patitastatsutaḥ klīvaḥ paṅgurunmattako jaḍaḥ ।andho acikitsyarogādyā bhartavyāstu niraṃśakāḥ ।।aurasāḥ kṣetrajāstveṣāṃ nirdoṣā bhāgahāriṇaḥ ।sutāś caiṣāṃ prabhartavyā yāvadvai bhartṛsātkṛtāḥ ।।aputrā yoṣitaś caiṣāṃ bhartavyāḥ sādhuvṛttayaḥ ।

nirvāsyā vyabhicāriṇyaḥ pratikūlāstathaiva ca ।।pitṛmātṛpatibhrātṛdattamadhyagnyupāgataṃ ।ādhivedanikuñcaiva strīdhanaṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।।bandhudattaṃ tathā śulkamanvādheyakameva ca ।aprajāyāmatītāyāṃ bāndhavāstadavāpnuyuḥ ।।aprajāstrīdhanaṃ bhratturbrāhmyādiṣu caturṣvapi ।duhitṛṇāṃ prasūtā cecchreṣe tu pitṛgāmi tat ।।datvā kanyāṃ haran daṇḍyo vyayaṃ dadyācca sodayam ।mṛtāyāṃ dattamādadyāt pariśodhyobhayavyayam ।।durbhikṣe dharmakārye ca vyādhau saṃpratirodhake ।gṛhītaṃ strīdhanaṃ bhartā na striye dātumarhati ।।adhivittastriyai dadyādadhivedanikaṃ samam ।na dattaṃ srīdhanaṃ yasyai datte tvardhaṃ prakīrtitam ।।vibhāganihnave jñātibandhusākṣyabhilekhitaiḥ ।vibhāgabhāvanā jñeyā gṛhakṣetraiś ca yautikaiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dāyavibhāgo nāma pañcapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sīmāvivādādinirṇayaḥ

agnir uvāca
sīmno vivāde kṣetrasya sāmantāḥ sthavirā gaṇāḥ ।gopāḥ sīmākṛṣāṇā ye sarve ca vanagocarāḥ ।।nayeyurete sīmānaṃ sthalāṅgāratuṣadrumaiḥ ।setuvalmīkanimnāsthicaityādyair upalakṣitām ।।sāmantā vā samaṃgrāmāś catvāro aṣṭau daśāpi vā ।raktasragvasanāḥ sīmānnayeyuḥ kṣitidhāriṇaḥ ।।anṛte tu pṛthagdaṇḍyā rājñā madhyamasāhasam ।abhāve jñātṛcihnānāṃ rājā sīmnaḥ pravattakaḥ ।।ārāmāyatanagrāmanipānodyānaveśmasu ।eṣa eva vidhirjñeyo varṣāmvupravaheṣu ca ।।maryādāyāḥ prabhedeṣu kṣetrasya haraṇe tathā ।maryādāyāś ca daṇḍyāḥ syuradhamottamamadhyamāḥ ।।na niṣedhyo alpabādhastu setuḥ kalyāṇakārakaḥ ।parabhūmiṃ haran kūpaḥ svalpakṣetro bahūdakaḥ ।।svāmine yo anivedyaiva kṣetre setuṃ prakalpayet ।utpanne svāmino bhogastadabhāve mahīpateḥ ।।phālāhatamapi kṣetraṃ yo na kuryānna kārayet ।

catvāro atha daśāpi veti kha, ga, ña ca
sa pradāpyo akṛṣṭaphalaṃ kṣetramanyena kārayet ।।māsānaṣṭau tu mahiṣī satyaghātasya kāriṇī ।daṇḍanīyā tadardhantu gaustadardhamajāvikaṃ ।।bhakṣayitvopaviṣṭānāṃ yathoktād dviguṇo damaḥ ।samameṣāṃ vivītepi svarāṣṭraṃ mahiṣīsamam ।।yāvat satyaṃ vinaṣṭantu tāvat kṣetrī phalaṃ labhet ।pālastāḍyo atha gosvāmī pūrvoktaṃ daṇḍamarhati ।।pathi grāmavivītānte kṣetre doṣo na vidyate ।akāmataḥ kāmacāre cauravaddaṇḍamarhati ।।mahotkṣotsṛṣṭapaśavaḥ sūtikāgantukā ca gauḥ ।pālo yeṣāntu mocyā daivarājapariplutāḥ ।।yathārpitān paśūn gopoḥ sāyaṃ pratyarpayettathā ।pramādamṛtanaṣṭāṃś ca pradāpyaḥ kṛtavetanaḥ ।।pāladoṣavināśe tu pāle daṇḍo vidhīyate ।ardhatrayodaśapaṇaḥ svāmino dravyameva ca ।।grāmecchayā gopracāro bhūmirājavaśena vā ।dvijastṛṇaidhaḥpuṣpāṇi sarvataḥ svavadāharet ।।dhanuḥśataṃ parīṇāho grāmakṣetrāntaraṃ bhavet ।dve śate kharvaṭasya syānnagarasya catuḥśatam ।।svaṃ labhetānyavikrītaṃ kreturdoṣo aprakāśite ।hīnādraho hīnamūlye velāhīne ca taskaraḥ ।।naṣṭāpahṛtamāsādya hartāraṃ grāhayennaram ।deśakālātipattau vā gṛhītvā svayamarpayet ।।

vikreturdarśanācchuddhiḥ svāmī dravyaṃ nṛpo damam ।kretā mūlyaṃ samāpnoti tasmādyastatra vikrayī ।।āgamenopabhogena naṣṭaṃ bhāvyamato anyathā ।pañcabandho damastasya rājñe tenāpyabhāvite ।।hṛtaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ yo dravyaṃ parahastādavāpnuyāt ।anivedya nṛpe daṇḍyaḥ sa tu ṣannayatiṃ paṇān ।।śaulkikaiḥ sthānapālair vā naṣṭāpahṛtamāhṛtaṃ ।arvāk saṃvatsarāt svāmī labhate parato nṛpaḥ ।।paṇānekaśaphe dadyāccaturaḥ pañca mānuṣe ।mahiṣoṣṭragavāṃ dvau dvau pādaṃ pādamajāvike ।।svakuṭumbāvirodhena deyaṃ dārasutādṛte ।nānvaye sati sarvasvaṃ deyaṃ yaccānyasaṃśrutam ।।pratigrahaḥ prakāśaḥ syāt sthāvarasya viśeṣataḥ ।deyaṃ pratiśrutañcaiva datvā nāpaharet punaḥ ।।daśaikapañcasaptāhamāsatryahārdhamāsikaṃ ।vījāyovāhyaratnastrīdohyapuṃsāṃ pratīkṣaṇam ।।agnau suvarṇamakṣīṇaṃ dvipalaṃ rajate śate ।aṣṭau trapuṇi sīse ca tāmre pañcadaśāyasi ।।śate daśapalāvṛddhiraurṇe kārpāsike tathā ।madhye pañcapalā jñeyā sūkṣme tu tripalā matā ।।kārmike romabaddhe ca triṃśadbhāgaḥ kṣayo mataḥ ।na kṣayo na ca vṛddhistu kauśeye valkaleṣu ca ।।deśaṃ kālañca bhogañca jñātvā naṣṭe balābalam ।

dravyāṇāṃ kuśalā brūyuryattaddāpyamasaṃśayam ।।balāddāsīkṛtaś caurair vikrītaścāpi mucyate ।svāmiprāṇaprado bhaktatyāgāttanniṣkrayādapi ।।pravrajyāvasito rājño dāsa āmaraṇāntikaḥ ।varṇānāmānulomyena dāsyaṃ na pratilomataḥ ।।kṛtaśilpopi nivaset kṛtakālaṃ gurorgṛhe ।antevāsī guruprāptabhojanastratphalaptadaḥ ।।rājā kṛtvā pure sthānaṃ brāhmaṇānnyasya tatra tu ।traividyaṃ vṛttimadbrūyāt svadharmaḥ pālyatāmiti ।।nijadharmāvirodhena yastu sāmayiko bhavet ।so api yatnena saṃrakṣyo dharmo rājakṛtaś ca yaḥ ।।gaṇadravyaṃ haredyastu saṃvidaṃ laṅghayecca yaḥ ।sarvasvaharaṇaṃ kṛtvā taṃ rāṣṭrādvipravāsayet ।।kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ sarvaiḥ samūhahitavādibhiḥ ।yastatra viparītaḥ syātsa dāpyaḥ prathamaṃ damam ।।samūhakāryaprahito yallabhettattadarpayet ।ekādaśaguṇaṃ dāpyo yadyasau nārpayet svayam ।।vedajñāḥ śucayo alubdhā bhaveyuḥ kāryacintakāḥ ।kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ teṣāṃ samūhahitavādināṃ ।।śreṇinaigamapākhaṇḍigaṇānāmapyayaṃ vidhiḥ ।bhedañcaiṣāṃ nṛpo rakṣet pūrvavṛttiñca pālayet ।।gṛhītavetanaḥ karma tyajan dviguṇamāvahet ।agṛhīte samaṃ dāpyo bhṛtyai rakṣya upaskaraḥ ।।

dāpyastu daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ bāṇijyapaśusasyataḥ ।aniścitya bhṛtiṃ yastu kārayetsa mahīkṣitā ।।deśaṃ kālañca yo atīyāt karma kuryācca yo anyathā ।tatra tu svāminaśchando adhikaṃ deyaṃ kṛte adhike ।।yo yāvat kurute karma tāvattasya tu vetanam ।ubhayorapyasādhyañcet sādhye kuryādyathāśrutam ।।arājadaivikannaṣṭaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ dāpyastu vāhakaḥ ।prasthānavighnakṛccaiva pradāpyo dviguṇāṃ bhṛtim ।।prakrānte saptamaṃ bhāgaṃ caturthaṃ pathi saṃtyajan ।bhṛtimardhapathe sarvāṃ pradāpyastyājakoapi ca ।।glahe śatikavṛddhestu sabhikaḥ pañcakaṃ gataṃ ।gṛhṇīyāddhūrtakitavāditarāddaśakaṃ śataṃ ।।sa samyakpālito dadyādrājñe bhāgaṃ yathākṛtaṃ ।jitamudgrāhayejjetre dadyātsatyaṃ vacaḥ kṣamī ।।prāpte nṛpatinā bhāge prasiddhe dhūrtamaṇḍale ।jitaṃ saśabhike sthāne dāpayedanyathā na tu ।।draṣṭāro vyavahārāṇāṃ sākṣiṇaś ca ta eva hi ।rājñā sacihnā nirvāsyāḥ kūṭākṣopadhidevinaḥ ।।dyūtamekamukhaṃ kāryaṃ taskarajñānakāraṇāt ।eṣa eva vidhirjñeyaḥ prāṇidyūte samāhvaye ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sīmāvivādādinirṇayo nāma ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vākpāruṣyādiprakaraṇam

agnir uvāca
satyāsatyānyathā stotrair nyūnāṅgendriyarogiṇāṃ ।kṣepaṃ karoti ceddaṇḍyaḥ paṇānardhatrayodaśa ।।abhigantāsmi bhaginīmmātaraṃ vā taveti ca ।śapantaṃ dāpayedrājā pañcaviṃśatikaṃ damaṃ ।।ardho adhameṣu dviguṇaḥ parastrīṣūttameṣu ca ।daṇḍapraṇayanaṃ kāryaṃ varṇajātyuttarādharaiḥ ।।prātilomyāpavādeṣu dviguṇatriguṇā damāḥ ।varṇānāmānulomyena tasmādevārdhahānitaḥ ।।vāhugrīvānetrasakthivināśe vācike damaḥ ।śatyastato ardhikaḥ pādanāsākarṇikarādiṣu ।।aśaktastu vadannevandaṇḍanīyaḥ paṇān daśa ।tathā śaktaḥ pratibhuvaṃ dadyāt kṣemāya tasya tu ।।patanīyakṛte kṣepe daṇḍī madhyamasāhasaḥ ।upapātakayukte tu dāpyaḥ prathamasāhasaṃ ।।traividyanṛpadevānāṃ kṣepa uttamasāhasaḥ ।

dadyādityatra dāpya iti pāṭho bhavituṃ yuktaḥ
madhyamo jñātipūgānāṃ prathamo grāmadeśayoḥ ।।asākṣikahate cihnair yuktibhinnāgamena ca ।draṣṭavyo vyavahārastu kūṭacihnakṛtādbhayāt ।।bhasmapaṅkarajaḥsparśe daṇḍo daśapaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।amedhyapārṣṇiniṣṭhyūtasparśane dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।sameṣvevaṃ parastrīṣu dviguṇastūttameṣu ca ।hīneṣvardhaṃ damo mohamadādibhiradaṇḍanam ।।viprapīḍākaraṃ cchedyamaṅgamabrāhmaṇasya tu ।udgūrṇe prathamo daṇḍaḥ saṃsparśe tu tadardhikaḥ ।।udgūrṇe hastapāde tu daśaviṃśatikau damau ।parasparantu sarveṣāṃ śāstre madhyamasāhasaḥ ।।pādakeśāṃśukakarolluñcaneṣu paṇān daśa ।pīḍākarṣāṃ śukāveṣṭapādādhyāse śatandamaḥ ।।śoṇitena vinā duḥsvaṅkurvan kāṣṭhādibhirnaraḥ ।dvātriṃśataṃ paṇān dāpyo dviguṇaṃ darśane asṛjaḥ ।।karapādadato bhaṅge cchedane karṇanāsayoḥ ।madhyo daṇḍo vraṇodbhede mṛtakalpahate tathā ।।ceṣṭābhojanavāgrodhe netrādipratibhedane ।kandharābāhusakthyāñca bhaṅge madhyamasāhasaḥ ।।ekaṃ ghnatāṃ bahūnāñca yathoktāddviguṇā damāḥ ।kalahāpahṛtaṃ deyaṃ daṇḍastu dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।duḥkhamutpādayedyastu sa samutthānajaṃ vyayam ।

dvāviṃśatipaṇāmiti kha
dāpyo daṇḍañca yo yasmin kalahe samudāhṛtaḥ ।।tarikaḥ sthalajaṃ śulkaṃ gṛhnan daṇḍyaḥ paṇāndaśa ।brāhmaṇaprātiveśyānāmetadevānimantraṇe ।।abhighāte tathā bhede cchede buddhyāvapātane ।paṇāndāpyaḥ pañcadaśaviṃśatiṃ tattrayantathā ।।duḥsvotpādigṛhe dravyaṃ kṣipan prāṇaharaṃ tathā ।ṣāḍaśādyaṃ paṇāt dāpyo dvitīyo madhyamandamam ।।duḥkhe ca śoṇitotpāde śākhāṅgacchedane tathā ।daṇḍaḥ kṣudrapaśūnāṃ syāddvipaṇaprabhṛtiḥ kramāt ।।liṅgasya cchedane mṛttau madhyamo mūlyameva ca ।mahāpaśūnāmeteṣu sthāneṣu dviguṇā damāḥ ।।prarohiśākhināṃ śākhāskandhasarvavidāraṇe ।upajīvyadrumāṇāntu viṃśaterdviguṇā damāḥ ।।yaḥ sāhasaṅkārayati sa dāpyo dviguṇandamam ।yastvevamuktvāhaṃ dātā kārayet sa caturguṇam ।।āryākrośātikramakṛdbhrātṛjāyāprahāradaḥ ।sandiṣṭasyāpradātā ca samudragṛhabhedakaḥ ।।sāmantakulikādīnāmapakārasya kārakaḥ ।pañcāśatpaṇiko daṇḍa eṣāmiti viniś cayaḥ ।।svacchandavidhavāgāmī vikruṣṭe nābhidhāvakaḥ ।akāraṇe ca vikroṣṭā caṇḍālaścottamān spṛśan ।।śūdraḥ pravrajitānāñca daive paitrye ca bhojakaḥ ।

prarohiśākhināmityādirviṃśaterdviguṇā damā ity antaḥ pāṭhaḥ kha pustake nāsti
ayuktaṃ śapathaṃ kurvannayogyo yogyakarmakṛt ।।vṛṣakṣudrapaśūnāñca pūṃstvasya pratighātakṛt ।sādhāraṇasyāpalopī dāsīgarbhavināśakṛt ।।pitāputrasvasṛbhrātṛdampatyācāryaśiṣyakāḥ ।eṣāmapatitānyonyatyāgī ca śatadaṇḍabhāk ।।vasānastrīn paṇān daṇḍyo nejakastu parāṃśukam ।vikrayāvakrayādhānayāciteṣu paṇān daśa ।।tulāśāsanamānānāṃ kūṭakṛnnāṇakasya ca ।ebhiś ca vyavahartā yaḥ sa dāpyo daṇḍamuttamam ।।akūṭaṃ kūṭakaṃ brūte kūṭaṃ yaścāpyakūṭakam ।sa nāṇakaparīkṣī tu dāpyaḥ prathamasāhasam ।।bhiṣaṅmithyācaran dāpyastiryakṣu prathamaṃ damam ।mānuṣe madhyamaṃ rājamānuṣeṣūttamantathā ।।abadhyaṃ yaś ca badhnāti badhyaṃ yaś ca pramuñcati ।aprāptavyavahārañca sa dāpyo damamuttamam ।।mānena tulayā vāpi yo aṃśamaṣṭamakaṃ haret ।dvāviṃśatipaṇān dāpyo vṛddhau hānau ca kalpitam ।।bheṣajasnehalavaṇagandhānyaguḍādiṣu ।paṇyeṣu prakṣipan hīnaṃ paṇāndāpyastu ṣoḍaśa ।।sambhūya kurvatāmarghaṃ sabādhaṃ kāruśilpināṃ ।arthasya hrāsaḥ vṛddhiṃ vā sahasro daṇḍa ucyate ।।rājāni sthāpyate yo arthaḥ pratyahaṃ tena vikrayaḥ ।krayo vā nisravastasmādbaṇijāṃ lābhakṛt smṛtaḥ ।।

svadeśapaṇye tu śataṃ baṇij gṛhṇīta pañcakaṃ ।daśakaṃ pāradeśye tu yaḥ sadyaḥ krayavikrayau ।।paṇyasyopari saṃsthāpya vyayaṃ paṇyasamudbhavaṃ ।artho anugrahakṛt kāryaḥ kreturvikretureva ca ।।gṛhītamūlyaṃ yaḥ paṇyaṃ kreturnaiva prayacchati ।sodayantasya dāpyo asau diglābhaṃ vā digāgate ।।vikrītamapi vikreyaṃ pūrve kretaryagṛhṇati ।hāniścet kretṛdoṣeṇa kretureva hi sā bhavet ।।rājadaivopaghātena paṇye doṣamupāgate ।hānirvikreturevāsau yācitasyāprayacchataḥ ।।anyahaste ca vikrītaṃ duṣṭaṃ vā duṣṭavadyadi ।vikrīnīte damastatra tanmūlyādadviguṇo bhavet ।।kṣayaṃ vṛddhiñca baṇijā paṇyānāmavijānatā ।krītvā nānuśayaḥ kāryaḥ kurvan ṣaḍ bhāgadaṇḍabhāk ।।samavāyena baṇijāṃ lābhārthaṃ karma kurvatāṃ ।labhālābhau yathā dravyaṃ yathā vā saṃvidā kṛtau ।।pratiṣiddhamanādiṣṭaṃ pramādādyacca nāśitaṃ ।sa taddayādvipravācca rakṣitāddaśamāṃśabhāk ।।arthaprekṣapaṇādviṃśaṃ bhāgaṃ śulkaṃ nṛpā haret ।vyāsiddhaṃ rājayogyañca vikrītaṃ rājagāmi tat ।।mithyā vadan parīmāṇaṃ śulkasthānādapakraman ।dāpyastvaṣṭaguṇaṃ yaś ca savyājakrayavikrayau ।।deśantaragate prete dravyaṃ dāyādabāndhavāḥ ।

jñātayo vā hareyustadāgatāstair vinā nṛpaḥ ।।jihmaṃ tyajeyurnirlobhamaśakto anyena kārayet ।anena vidhirākhyāta ṛtvikkarṣakarmiṇāṃ ।।grāhakair gṛhyate cauro loptreṇātha padena vā ।pūrvakarmāparādhī vā tathaivāśuddhavāsakaḥ ।।anye api śaṅkayā grāhyā jātināmādinihnavaiḥ ।dyūtastrīpānaśaktāś ca śuṣkabhinnamukhasvarāḥ ।।paradravyagṛhāṇāñca pṛcchakā gūḍhacāriṇaḥ ।nirāyā vyayavantaś ca vinaṣṭa dravyavikrayāḥ ।।gṛhītaḥ śaṅkayā cauryenātmānañcedviśodhayet ।dāpayitvā hṛtaṃ dravyaṃ cauradaṇḍena daṇḍayet ।।cauraṃ pradāpyāpahṛtaṃ ghātayedvividhair budhaiḥ ।sacihnaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ kṛtvā svarāṣṭrādvipravāsayet ।।ghātite apahṛte doṣo grāmabharturanirgate ।svasīmni dadyādgrāmastu padaṃ vā yatra gacchati ।।pañcagrāmī vahiḥ krośāddaśagrāmyaatha vā punaḥ ।vandigrāhāṃs tathā vājikuñjarāṇāñca hāriṇaḥ ।।prasahya ghātinaś caiva śūlamāropayennarān ।utkṣepakagranthibhedau karasandaṃśahīnakau ।।kāryau dvitīyāparādhe karapādaikahīnakau ।bhaktāvakāśāgnyudakamantrāpakaraṇavyayān ।।dattvā caurasya hanturvā jānato dama uttamaḥ ।śastrāvapāte garbhasya pātane cottamo damaḥ ।।

uttamo vādhamo vāpi puruṣastrīpramāpaṇe ।śilāṃ baddhvā kṣipedapsu naraghnīṃ viṣadāṃ striyaṃ ।।viṣāgnidāṃ nijagurunijāpatyapramāpaṇīṃ ।vikarṇakaranāsauṣṭhīṃ kṛtvā gobhiḥ pramāpayet ।।kṣetraveśmavanagrāmavivītakhaladāhakāḥ ।rājapatny abhigāmī ca dagdhavyāstu kaṭāgninā ।।pumān saṃgrahaṇe grāhyaḥ keśākeśiparastriyāḥ ।svajātāvuttamo daṇḍa ānulomye tu madhyamaḥ ।।prātilomye badhaḥ puṃsāṃ nāryāḥ karṇāvakartanam ।nīvīstanaprāvaraṇanābhikeśāvamardanam ।।adeśakālasambhāṣaṃ sahāvasthānameva ca ।strī niṣedhe śataṃ dadyād dviśatantu damaṃ pumān ।।pratiṣedhe tayordaṇḍo yathā saṃgrahaṇe tathā ।paśūn gacchaṃśchataṃ dāpyo hīnāṃ strīṃ gāś ca madhyamam ।।avaruddhāsu dāsīṣu bhujiṣyāsu tathaiva ca ।gamyāsvapi pumāndāpyaḥ pañcāśat paṇikandamam ।।prasahya dāsyabhigame daṇḍo daśapaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।kubandhenāṅkya gamayedantyāpravrajitāgame ।।nyūnaṃ vāpyadhikaṃ vāpi likhedyo rājaśāsanam ।pāradārikacauraṃ vā muñcato daṇḍa uttamaḥ ।।abhakṣair dūṣayan vipraṃ daṇḍa uttamasāhasam ।kūṭasvarṇavyavahārī vimāṃsasya ca vikrayī ।।aṅgahīnaś ca kartavyo dāpyaścottamasāhasaṃ ।

śakto hy amokṣayan svāmī daṃṣṭriṇaḥ śṛṅgiṇas tathā ।।prathamaṃ sāhasaṃ dadyādvikruṣṭe dviguṇaṃ tathā ।acaurañcaure abhivadan dāpyaḥ pañcaśataṃ damaṃ ।।rājño aniṣṭapravaktāraṃ tasyaivākrośakaṃ tathā ।mṛtāṅgalagnavikreturgurostāḍayitus tathā ।।tanmantrasya ca bhettāraṃ chittvā jihvāṃ pravāsayet ।rājayānāsanāroḍhurdaṇḍo madhyamasāhasaḥ ।।dvinetrabhedino rājadviṣṭādeśakṛtas tathā ।vipratvena ca śūdrasya jīvato aṣṭaśato damaḥ ।।yo manyetājito asmīti nyāyenābhiparājitaḥ ।tamāyāntaṃ punarjitvā daṇḍayeddviguṇaṃ damaṃ ।।rājñānyāyena yo daṇḍo gṛhīto varuṇāyataṃ ।vivedya dadyādviprebhyaḥ svayaṃ triṃśadguṇīkṛtaṃ ।।dharmaścārthaś ca kīrtiñca lokapaṅktirupagrahaḥ ।prajābhyo bahumānañca svargasthānañca śāśvatam ।।paśyato vyavahārāṃś ca guṇāḥ syuḥ sapta bhūpateḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vākpāruṣyādiprakaraṇaṃ nāma saptapañcāśadadhikadviśatatmo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ṛgvidhānaṃ

agnir uvāca
ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvavidhānaṃ puṣkaroditam ।bhuktimuktikaraṃ japyāddhomādrāmāya tadvade ।।
puṣkara uvāca
prativedantu karmāṇi kāryāṇi pravadāmi te ।prathamaṃ ṛgvidhānaṃ vai śṛṇu tvaṃ bhuktimuktidam ।।antarjale tathā home japatī manasepsitam ।kāmaṃ karoti gāyatrī prāṇāyāmādviśeṣataḥ ।।gāyatryā daśasāhasro japo naktāśano dvija ।bahusnātasya tatraiva sarvakalmaṣanāśanaḥ ।।daśāyutāni japtvātha haviṣyāśī sa muktibhāk ।praṇavo hi paraṃ brahma tajjapaḥ sarvapāpahā ।।oṃkāraśatajaptantu nābhimātrodake sthitaḥ ।jalaṃ pivet sa sarvaistu pāpair vai vipramucyate ।।mātrātrayaṃ trayo vedāstrayo devāstrayo agnayaḥ ।mahāvyāhṛtayaḥ sapta lokā homo akhilāghahā ।।gāyatrī paramā jāpyā mahāvyāhṛtayas tathā ।antarjale tathā rāma proktaś caivāghamarṣaṇaḥ ।।agnimīle purohitaṃ sūtko ayaṃ vahnidaivataḥ ।

pāpair hi vipramucyata iti ga, gha, ña ca
śirasā dhārayan vahniṃ yo japetparivatsaram ।।homaṃ triṣavaṇaṃ bhaikṣyamanagnijvalanañcaret ।ataḥ paramṛcaḥ sapta vāyvādyā yāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।।tā japan prayato nityamiṣṭān kāmān samaśnute ।medhākāmo japennityaṃ sadasanyamiti tyacam ।।anvayo yannimāḥ proktāḥ navarco mṛtyunāśanāḥ ।śunaḥśephamṛṣiṃ baddhaḥ sanniruddho atha vā japet ।।mucyate sarvapāpebhyo gadī vāpyagado bhavet ।ya icchecchāśvataṃ kāmaṃ mitraṃ prājñaṃ purandaraṃ ।।ṛgbhiḥ ṣoḍśabhiḥ kuryādindriyasyeti dine dine ।hiraṇyastūpamityetajjapan śatrūn prabādhate ।।kṣemī bhavati cādhvāno ye te panthā japan naraḥ ।raudrībhiḥṣaḍbhirīśānaṃ stūyādyo vai dine dine ।।caruṃ vā kalpayedraudraṃ tasya śāntiḥ parā bhavet ।udityudantamādityamupatiṣṭhan dine dine ।।kṣipejjalāñjalīn sapta manoduḥkhavināśanaṃ ।dviṣantamityathārdharcaṃ yadviprāntaṃ japan smaret ।।āgaskṛt saptarātreṇa vidveṣamadhigacchati ।ārogyakāmī rogī vā praskannasyottamaṃ japet ।।uttamastasya cārdharco japedvai vividhāsane ।udayatyāyurakṣyayyaṃ tejo madhyandine japet ।।

sannibaddho atheti ka, kha, ja ca
astaṃ pratigate sūrye dviṣantaṃ pratibādhate ।na vayaśceti sūktāni japan śatrūnniyacchati ।।ekādaśa suparṇasya sarvakāmānvinirdiśet ।ādhyātmikīḥ ka ity etā japanmokṣamavāpnuyāt ।।ā no bhadrā ity anena dīrghamāyuravāpnuyāt ।tvaṃ someti ca sūktena navaṃ paśyenniśākaraṃ ।।upatiṣṭhet samitpāṇirvāsāṃsyāpnotyasaṃśayaṃ ।āyurīpsannimamiti kautsa sūktaṃ sadā japet ।।āpanaḥ śośucaditi stutvā madhye divākaraṃ ।yathā muñcati ceṣokāṃ tathā pāpaṃ pramuñcati ।।jātavedasa ity etajjapet svastyayanaṃ pathi ।bhayair vimucyate sarvaiḥ svastimānāpnuyāt gṛhān ।।vyuṣṭāyāñca tathā rātryāmetadduḥsvapnanāśanaṃ ।pramandineti sūyantyā japedgarbhavimocanaṃ ।।japannindramiti snāto vaiśyadevantu saptakaṃ ।muñcatyājyaṃ tathā juhvat sakalaṃ kilviṣaṃ naraḥ ।।imāmiti japan śaśvat kāmānāpnotyabhīpsitān ।mānastoka iti dvābhyāṃ trirātropoṣitaḥ śuciḥ ।।auḍumbarīś ca juhuyātsamidhaścājyasaṃskṛtāḥ ।chittvā sarvānmṛtyupāśān jīvedrogavivarjitaḥ ।।ūrdhvabāhuranenaiva stutvā sambhuṃ tathaiva ca ।mānastoketi ca ṛcā śikhābandhe kṛte naraḥ ।।aghṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jāyate saṃśayaṃ vinā ।

citramityupatiṣṭheta trisandhyaṃ bhāskaraṃ tathā ।।samitpāṇirnaro nityamīpsitaṃ dhanamāpnuyāt ।atha svapneti ca japan prātarmadhyandine dine ।।duḥsvapnañcārhate kṛtsnaṃ bhojanañcāpnuyācchubham ।ubhe pumāniti tathā rakṣoghnaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ।।ubhe vāsā iti ṛco japan kāmānavāpnuyāt ।na sāganniti ca japan mucyate cātatāyinaḥ ।।kayā śubheti ca japan jātiśraiṣṭhamavāpnuyāt ।imannṛsomamityetat sarvān kāmānavāpnuyāt ।।pitarityupatiṣṭheta nityamarthamupasthitaṃ ।agne nayeti sūktena ghṛtahomaś ca mārgagaḥ ।।vīrānnayamavāpnoti suślokaṃ yo japet sadā ।kaṅkato neti sūktena viṣān sarvān vyapohati ।।yo jāta iti sūktena sarvān kāmānavāpnuyāt ।gaṇānāmiti sūktena śnigdhamāpnotyanuttamaṃ ।।yo me rājannitīmāntu duḥsvapnaśamanīmṛcaṃ ।adhvani prasthito yastu paśyecchatrūṃ samutthitaṃ ।।apraśastaṃ praśastaṃ vā kuvidaṅga imaṃ japet ।dvāviṃśakaṃ japan sūktamādhyātmikamanuttamaṃ ।।parvasu prayato nityamiṣṭān kāmān samaśnute ।kṛṇuṣveti japan sūktaṃ juhvadājyaṃ samāhitaḥ ।।

bhojanañcāpnuyācchatamiti kha, ga, gha, ja ca

nityamannamupasthitamiti ka, cha ca
ārātīnāṃ haret prāṇān rakṣāṃsyapi vināśayet ।upatiṣṭhet svayaṃ vahniṃ parityṛcā dine dine ।।taṃ rakṣati svayaṃ vahnirviśvato viśvatomukhaḥ ।haṃsaḥ śuciḥ sadityetacchucirīkṣeddivākaraṃ ।।kṛṣiṃ prapadyamānastu sthālīpākaṃ yathāvidhi ।juhuyāt kṣetramadhye tu svanīsvāhāstu pañcabhiḥ ।।indrāya ca marudbhyastu parjanyāya bhagāya ca ।yathāliṅgantu viharellāṅgalantu kṛṣībalaḥ ।।yukto dhānyāya sītāyai sunāsīramathottaraṃ ।gandhamālyair namaskārair yajedetāś ca devatāḥ ।।pravāpane pralavane khalasītāpahārayoḥ ।amoghaṅkarma bhavati vardhate sarvadā kṛṣiḥ ।।samudrāditi sūktena kāmānāpnoti pāvakāt ।viśvānara iti dvābhyāṃ ya ṛgbhyāṃ vahnimarhati ।।sa taratyāpadaḥ sarvā yaśaḥ prāpnoti cākṣayaṃ ।vipulāṃ śriyamāpnoti jayaṃ prāpnotyanuttamaṃ ।।agne tvamiti ca stutvā dhanamāpnoti vāñchitaṃ ।prajākāmo japennityaṃ varuṇadaivatatrayaṃ ।।svastyā trayaṃ japet prātaḥ sadā svastyayanaṃ mahat ।svasti panthā iti procya svastimān vrajate adhvani ।।vijigīṣurvanaspate śatrūṇāṃ vyādhitaṃ bhavet ।striyā garbhapramūḍhāyā garbhamokṣaṇamuttamaṃ ।।

vyādhikambhavaditi ṭa
acchāvadeti sūktañca vṛṣṭikāmaḥ prayiojayet ।nirāhāraḥ klinnavāsā na cireṇa pravarṣati ।।manasaḥ kāma ity etāṃ paśukāmo naro japet ।kardamena iti snāyātprajākāmaḥ śucivrataḥ ।।aśvapūrvā iti snāyādrājyakāmastu mānavaḥ ।rāhite carmaṇi snāyāt brāhmaṇastu yathāvidhi ।।rājā carmaṇi vaiyāghre chāge vaiśyastathaiva ca ।daśasāhasriko homaḥ pratyekaṃ parikīrtitaḥ ।।āgāra iti sūktena goṣṭhe gāṃ lokamātaraṃ ।upatiṣṭhedvrajeccaiva yadicchettāḥ sadākṣayāḥ ।।upetitisṛbhīrājño dundubhimabhimantrayet ।tejo bakañca prāpnoti śatruñcaiva niyacchati ।।tṛṇapāṇirjapetsūktuṃ rakṣoghnaṃ dasyunbhirvṛtaḥ ।ye ke ca umetyṛcaṃ japtvā dīrghamāyurāpnuyāt ।।jīmūtasūktena tathā senāṅgānyabhimantrayet ।yadhā liṅgaṃ tato rājā vinihanti raṇe ripūn ।।āgneyeti tribhiḥsūktair dhanamāpnoti cākṣayaṃ ।amīvaheti sūktena bhūtāni sthāpayenniśi ।।sabādhe viṣame durge bandhā vā nirgataḥ kvacit ।palāyan vā gṛhīto vā sūktametattathā japet ।।trirātraṃ niyatopoṣya śrāpayet pāyasañcaruṃ ।tenāhutiśataṃ pūrṇaṃ juhuyāt tryambaketyṛcā ।।

avāptavāniti ṭa
samuddiśya mahādevaṃ jīvedabdaśataṃ sukhaṃ ।taccakṣurityṛcā snāta upatiṣṭheddivākaraṃ ।।udyantaṃ madhyagañcaiva dīrghamāyurjijīviṣuḥ ।indrā someti sūktantu kathitaṃ śatrunāśanaṃ ।।yasya luptaṃ vrataṃ mohādvrātyair vā saṃsṛjetsaha ।upoṣyājyaṃ sa juhuyāttvamagne vratapā iti ।।ādityetyṛk ca samrājaṃ japtvā vāde jayī bhavet ।mahīti ca catuṣkeṇa mucyate mahato bhayāt ।।ṛcaṃ mahīti japtvā yadi hy etat sarvakāmānavāpnuyāt ।dvācatvāriṃśatiṃ caindraṃ japtvā nāśayate ripūn ।।vācaṃ mahīti japtvā ca prāpnotyārogyameva ca ।śanno bhaveti dvābhyāntu bhuktvānnaṃ prayataḥ śuciḥ ।।hṛdayaṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā vyādhibhir nābhibhūyate ।uttamedamiti snāto huttvā śatruṃ pramāpayet ।।śannogna iti sūktena hutenānnamavāpnuyāt ।kanyā vārarṣisūktena digdoṣādvipramucyate ।।yadatya kavyetyudite japte avaśyaṃ jagadbhavet ।yadvāgiti ca japtena vāṇī bhavati saṃskṛtā ।।vāco viditamiti tvetāṃ japan vācaṃ samaśnute ।pavitrāṇāṃ pavitrantu pāvamānyetyṛco matāḥ ।।vaikhānasā ṛcastriṃśatpavitrāḥ paramā matāḥ ।

ādityeti prasaṃmrājamiti ga, gha, ña

saṃsthiteti ka, cha, ca
ṛco dviṣaṣṭiḥ proktāś ca parasvetyṛṣisattama ।।sarvakalmaṣanāśāya pāvanāya śivāya ca ।svādiṣṭayetisūktānāṃ saptaṣaṣṭirudāhṛtā ।।daśottarāṇyṛcāñcaitāḥ pāvamānyaḥ śatāni ṣaṭ ।etajjapaṃś ca juhvacca ghoraṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ jayet ।।āpohiṣṭeti vāristho japetpāpabhayārdane ।pradevanneti niyato japecca marudhanvasu ।।prāṇāntike bhaye prāpte kṣipramāyustu vindati ।prāveyāmityṛcamekāṃ japecca manasā niśi ।।vyuṣṭāyāmudite sūrye dyūte jayamavāpnuyāt ।mā pragāmeti mūḍhaś ca panthānaṃ pathi vindati ।।kṣīṇāyuriti manyeta yaṅkañcit suhṛdaṃ priyaṃ ।yatteyamiti tu snātastasya mūrdhānamālabhet ।।sahasrakṛtvaḥ pañcāhaṃ tenāyurvindate mahat ।idaṃ medhyeti juhuyāt ghṛtaṃ prājñaḥ sahasraśaḥ ।।paśukāmo gavāṃ goṣṭhe arthakāmaś catuṣpathe ।vayaḥ suparṇa ity etāṃ japan vai vindate śriyaṃ ।।haviṣyantīyamabhyasya sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।tasya rogā vinaśyanti kāyāgnirvardhate tathā ।।yā oṣadhayaḥ svastyayanaṃ sarvavyādhivināśanaṃ ।vṛhaspate atītyetadvṛṣṭikāmaḥ prayojayet ।।sarvatreti parā śāntirjñeyā pratirathas tathā ।sūta sāṃkāśyapannityaṃ prajākāmasya kīrtitaṃ ।।

ahaṃ rudreti etadvāgmī bhavati mānavaḥ ।na yonau jāyate vidvān japanrātrīti rātriṣu ।।rātrisūktaṃ japannrātrī rātriṃ kṣemī jayennaraḥ ।kalpayantīti ca japannityaṃ kṛttvārināśanaṃ ।।āyuṣyañcaiva varcasyaṃ sūktaṃ dākṣāyaṇaṃ mahat ।uta devā iti japedāmayaghnaṃ dhṛtavrataḥ ।।ayamagne janityetajjapedagnibhaye sati ।araṇyānītyaraṇyeṣu japettadbhayanāśanaṃ ।।brāhmnīmāsādya sūkte dve ṛcaṃ brāhmīṃ śatāvarīṃ ।pṛthagadbhirghṛtair vātha medhāṃ lakṣmīñca vindati ।।māsa ity asapatnaghnaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ vijigīṣataḥ ।brahmaṇo agniḥ saṃvidānaṃ garbhamṛtyunivāraṇaṃ ।।apahīti japetsūktaṃ śucirdusvapnanāśanaṃ ।yenedamiti vaijaptvā samādhiṃ vindate paraṃ ।।mayo bhūrvāta ity etat gavāṃ svastyayanaṃ paraṃ ।śāmbarīmindrajālaṃ vā māyāmetena vārayet ।।mahītrīṇāmavarostviti pathi svastyayanaṃ japet ।agnaye vidviṣannevaṃ japecca ripunāśanaṃ ।।vāstoṣpatena mantreṇa yajeta gṛhadevatāḥ ।japasyaiṣa vidhiḥ prokto hute jñeyo viśeṣataḥ ।।homānte dakṣiṇā deyā pāpaśāntirhutena tu ।hutaṃ śāmyati cānnena annahemapradānataḥ ।।viprāśiṣastvamoghāḥ syurbahiḥsnānantu sarvataḥ ।

siddhārthakā yavā dhānyaṃ payo ghṛtaṃ tathā ।।kṣīravṛkṣāstathedhmantu homā vai sarvakāmadāḥ ।samidhaḥ kaṇṭhakinyaś ca rājikā rudhiraṃ viṣaṃ ।।abhicāre tathā śailaṃ aśanaṃ śaktavaḥ payaḥ ।dadhi bhaikṣyaṃ phalaṃ mūlamṛgvidhānamudāhṛtaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ṛgvidhānaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśadadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

ś athonaṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yajurvidhānaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
yajurvidhānaṃ vakṣyāmi bhuktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu ।oṃkārapūrvikā rāma mahāvyāhṛtayo matāḥ ।।sarvakalmaṣanāśinyaḥ sarvakāmapradās tathā ।ājyāhutisahasreṇa devānārādhayedbudhaḥ ।।manasaḥ kāṅkṣitaṃ rāma manasepsitakāmadaṃ ।śāntikāmo yavaiḥ kuryāttilaiḥ pāpāpanuttaye ।।dhānyaiḥ siddhārthakaiś caiva sarvakāma karais tathā ।audumbarībhiridhmābhiḥ pasukāmasya śasyate ।।dadhnā caivānnakāmasya payasā śāntimicchataḥ ।apāmārgasamiddhastu kāmayan kanakaṃ bahu ।।

kanyākāmo ghṛtāktāni yugmaśo grathitāni tu ।jātīpuṣpāṇi juhuyādgrāmārthī tilataṇḍulān ।।vaśyakarmaṇi śākhoḍhavāsāpāmārgameva ca ।viṣāsṛṅmiśrasamidho vyādhighātasya bhārgava ।।kruddhastu juhuyātsamyak śatrūṇāṃ badhakāmyayā ।sarvavrīhimayīṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ pratikṛtiṃ dvija ।।sahasraśastu juhuyādrājā vaśagato bhavet ।vastrakāmasya puṣpāṇi darvā vyādhivināśinī ।।brahmavarcasakāmasya vāsograñca vidhīyate ।pratyaṅgireṣu juhuyāttuṣakaṇṭakabhasmabhiḥ ।।vidveṣaṇe ca pakṣmāṇi kākakauśikayos tathā ।kāpilañca ghṛtaṃ hutvā tathā candragrahe dvija ।।vacācūrṇena sampātātsamānīya ca tāṃ vacāṃ ।sahasramantritāṃ bhuktvā medhāvī jāyate naraḥ ।।ekādaśāṅgulaṃ śaṅku lauhaṃ khādirameva ca ।dviṣato badhosīti japannikhanedripuveśmani ।।uccāṭanamidaṃ karma śatrūṇāṃ kathitaṃ tava ।cakṣuṣyā iti japtvā ca vinaṣṭañcakṣurāpnuyāt ।।upayuñjata ity edanuvākantathānnadaṃ ।tanūnapāgne saditi dūrvāṃ hutvārtivarjitaḥ ।।bheṣajamasīti dadhyājyair homaḥ paśūpasarganut ।

khādirameva veti ga, gha, ña ca

paśūpasargaheti ka, cha ca
tryamvakaṃ yajāmahe homaḥ saubhāgyavardhanaḥ ।।kanyānāma gṛhītvā tu kanyalābhakaraḥ paraḥ ।bhayeṣu tu japannityaṃ bhayebhyo vipramucyate ।।dhustūrapuṣpaṃ saghṛtaṃ hutvā syāt sarvakāmabhāk ।hutvā tu guggulaṃ rāma svapne paśyati śaṅkaraṃ ।।yuñjate mano anuvākaṃ japtvā dīrghāyurāpnuyāt ।viṣṇoravāṭamityetat sarvabādhāvināśanaṃ ।।rakṣoghnañca yaśasyañca tathaiva vijayapradaṃ ।ayatno agnirityetat saṃgrāme vijayapradaṃ ।।idamāpaḥ pravahata snāne pāpāpanodanaṃ ।viśvakarmannu haviṣā sūcīṃ lauhīndaśāṅgulām ।।kanyāyā nikhaneddvāri sānyasmai na pradīyate ।deva savitaretena juhuyādbalakāmo dvijottama ।।agnau svāheti juhuyādbalakāmo dvijottama ।tilair yavaiś ca dharmajña tathāpāmārgataṇḍulaiḥ ।।sahasramantritāṃ kṛtvā tathā gorocanāṃ dvija ।tilakañca tathā kṛtvā janasya priyatāmiyāt ।।rudrāṇāñca tathā japyaṃ sarvāghavinisūdanaṃ ।sarvakarmakaro homas tathā sarvatra śantidaḥ ।।ajāvikānāmaśvānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ tathā gavāṃ ।manuṣyāṇānnarendrāṇāṃ bālānāṃ yoṣitāmapi ।।grāmāṇāṃ nagarānāñca deśānāmapi bhārgava ।

viṣṇorvirāṭamityetaditi gha, ña ca । viṣṭorarāṭamityetaditi ka, ja, ṭa ca
upadrutānāṃ dharmajña vyādhitānāṃ tathaiva ca ।।marake samanuprāpte ripuje ca tathā bhaye ।rudrahomaḥ parā śāntiḥ pāyasena ghṛtena ca ।।kuṣmāṇḍaghṛtahomena sarvān pāpān vyapohati ।śaktuyāvakabhaikṣāśī naktaṃ manujasattama ।।bahiḥsnānarato māsānmucyate brahmahatyayā ।madhuvāteti mantreṇa homādito akhilaṃ labhet ।।dadhi krāvneti hutvā tu putrān prāpnotyasaṃśayaṃ ।tathā ghṛtavatītyetadāyuṣyaṃ syāt ghṛtena tu ।।svastina indra ity etatsarvabādhāvināśanaṃ ।iha gāvaḥ prajyāyadhvamiti puṣṭivivardhanam ।।ghṛtāhutisahasreṇa tathā lakṣmīvināśanaṃ ।śruveṇa devasya tveti hutvāpāmārgataṇḍulaṃ ।।mucyate vikṛtācchīghramabhicārānna saṃśayaḥ ।rudra pātu palaśasya samidbhiḥ kanakaṃ labhet ।।śivo bhavetyagnyutpāte vrīhibhirjuhuyānnaraḥ ।yāḥ senā iti caitacca taskarebhyo bhayāpaham ।।yo asmabhyamavātīyāddhutvā kṛṣṇatilānnaraḥ ।sahasraśo abhicārācca mucyate vikṛtāddvija ।।annenānnapatetyevaṃ hutvā cānnamavāpnuyāt ।haṃsaḥ śuciḥ sadityetajjaptantoye aghanāśanaṃ ।।catvāri bhaṅgetyetattu sarvapāpaharaṃ jale ।devā yajñeti japtvā tu brahmaloke mahīyate ।।

vasanteti ca hutvājyaṃ ādityādvaramāpnuyāt ।suparṇosīti cetyasya karmavyāhṛtivadbhavet ।।namaḥ svāheti trirjaptvā bandhanānmokṣamāpnuyāt ।antarjale trirāvartya drupadā sarvapāpamuk ।।iha gāvaḥ prajāyadhvaṃ mantroyaṃ buddhivardhanaḥ ।hutantu sarpiṣā dadhnā payasā pāyasena vā ।।śatam ya iti caitena hutvā parṇaphalāṇi ca ।ārogyaṃ śriyamāpnoti jīvitañca cirantathā ।।oṣadhīḥ pratimodagdhvaṃ vapane lavane arthakṛt ।aśvāvatī pāyasena homācchāntimavāpnuyāt ।।tasmā iti ca mantrena bandhanastho vimucyate ।yuvā suvāsā ity eva vāsāṃsyāpnoti cottamam ।।muñcantu mā śapathyāni sarvāntakavināśanam ।mā māhiṃsīstilājyena hutaṃ ripuvināśanaṃ ।।namo astu sarvasarpebhyo ghṛtena pāyasena tu ।kṛṇudhavaṃ rāja ity etadabhicāravināśanaṃ ।।dūrvākāṇḍāyutaṃ hutvā kāṇḍāt kāṇḍeti mānavaḥ ।grāme janapade vāpi marakantu śamannayet ।।rogārto mucyate rogāt tathā duḥkhāttu duḥkhitaḥ ।

śatañceti ṭa । śataṃ veti ka

auṣadhayaḥ pratimodadhyamiti ja

sarvakilviṣanāśanamiti gha, ña ca

vighnavināśanamiti ka, cha ca
auḍumbarīś ca samidho madhumānno vanaspatiḥ ।।hutvā sahasraśo rāma dhanamāpnoti mānavaḥ ।saubhāgyaṃ mahadāpnoti vyavahāre tathā trayam ।।apāṃ garbhamiti hutvā devaṃ varṣāpayeddhruvam ।apaḥ piveti ca tathā hutvā dadhi ghṛtaṃ madhu ।।pravartayati dharmajña mahāvṛṣṭimanantaraṃ ।namaste rudra ity etat sarvopadravanāśanaṃ ।।sarvaśāntikaraṃ proktaṃ mahāpātakanāśanaṃ ।adhyavocadityanena rakṣaṇaṃ vyādhitasya tu ।।rakṣoghnañca yaśasyañca cirāyuḥpuṣṭivardhanam ।siddhārthakānāṃ kṣepeṇa pathi caitajjapan sukhī ।।asau yastāmra ity etat paṭhannityaṃ divākaraṃ ।upatiṣṭheta dharmajña sāyaṃ prātaratandritaḥ ।।annamakṣayamāpnoti dīrghamāyuś ca vindati ।pramuñca dhanvannityetat ṣaḍbhirāyudhamantraṇaṃ ।।ripūṇāṃ bhayadaṃ yuddhenātrakāryā vicāraṇā ।māno mahānta ity evaṃ bālānāṃ śāntikārakaṃ ।।namo hiraṇyavāhave ity anuvākasaptakam ।rājikāṃ kaṭutailāktāṃ juhuyācchatrunāśanīṃ ।।namo vaḥ kirikebhyaś ca padmalakṣāhutair naraḥ ।rājyalakṣmīmavāpnoti tathā bilvaiḥ suvarṇakam ।।imā rudrāyeti tilair homācca dhanamāpyate ।

prayuñjeti ga, gha, ña ca
dūrvāhomena cānyena sarvavyādhivivarjitaḥ ।।āśuḥ śiśāna ity etadāyudhānāñca rakṣaṇe ।saṃgrāme kathitaṃ rāma sarvaśatrunivarhaṇaṃ ।।rājasāmeti juhuyāt sahasraṃ pañcabhirdvija ।ājyāhutīnāṃ dharmajña cakṣūrogādvimucyate ।।śanno vanaspate gehe homaḥ syādvāstudoṣanut ।agna āyūṃsi hutvājyaṃ dveṣaṃ nāpnoti kenacit ।।apāṃ pheneti lājābhirhutvā jayamavāpnuyāt ।bhadrā itīndriyair hīno japan syāt sakalendriyaḥ ।।agniś ca pṛthivī ceti vaśīkaraṇamuttamam ।adhvaneti japan mantraṃ vyavahāre jayī bhavet ।।brahma rājanyamiti ca karmārambhe tu siddhikṛt ।saṃvatsarosīti dhṛtair lakṣahomādarogavān ।।ketuṃ kṛṇvannitītyetat saṃgrāme jayavardhanam ।indrognirdharma ity etadraṇe dharmanibandhanam ।।dhanvā nāgeti mantraś ca dhanurgrāhanikaḥ paraḥ ।yajīteti tathā mantro vijñeyo hy abhimantraṇe ।।mantraścāhirathetyetaccharāṇāṃ mantraṇe bhavet ।vahnīnāṃ pitarityetattūrṇamantraḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।।yuñjantīti tathāśvānāṃ yojane mantra ucyate ।āśuḥ śiśāna ity etadyatrārambhaṇamucyate ।।

dharmavivardhanamiti ja

mantraś ca hi ratha hy etaccharāṇāmiti ka, cha ,ca
viṣṇoḥ krameti mantraś ca rathārohaṇikaḥ paraḥ ।ājaṅghetīti cāśvānāṃ tāḍanīyamudāhṛtaṃ ।।yāḥ senā abhitvarīti parasainyamukhe japet ।dundubhya iti cāpyetaddundubhītāḍnaṃ bhavet ।।etaiḥ pūrvahutair mantraiḥ kṛtvaivaṃ vijayī bhavet ।yamena dattamityasya koṭihomādvicakṣaṇaḥ ।।rathamutpādayecchīghraṃ saṃgrāme vijayapradam ।ā kṛṣṇeti tathaitasya karmavyāhṛtivadbhavet ।।śivasaṃkalpajāpena samādhiṃ manaso labhet ।pañcanadyaḥ pañcalakṣaṃ hutvā lakṣmīmavāpnuyāt ।।yadā badhūndakṣāyaṇāṃ mantreṇānena mantritam ।sahasrakṛtvaḥ kanakaṃ dhārayedripuvāraṇaṃ ।।imaṃ jīvebhya drati ca śilāṃ loṣṭrañcaturdiśaṃ ।kṣipedgṛhe tadā tasya na syāccaurabhayaṃ niśi ।।parimegāmaneneti vaśīkaraṇamuttamaṃ ।hantumabhyāgatastatra vaśībhavati mānavaḥ ।।bhakṣyatāmvūlapuṣpādyaṃ mantritantu prayacchati ।yasya dharmajña vaśagaḥ somya śīghraṃ bhaviṣyati ।।śanno mitra itītyetat sadā sarvatra śāntidaṃ ।gaṇānāṃ tvā gaṇapatiṃ kṛtvā homañcatuṣpathe ।।vaśīkuryājjagatsarvam sarvadhānyair asaṃśayam ।

śivasaṃkalpa ity etaditi gha, ja ca

parāṅne gāyanenetīti ka
hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayo mantroyamabhiṣecane ।।śanno devīrabhiṣṭaye tathā śāntikaraḥ paraḥ ।ekacakreti mantreṇa hutenājyena bhāgaśaḥ ।।grahebhyaḥ śāntimāpnoti prasādaṃ na ca saṃśayaḥ ।gāvo bhaga iti dvābhyāṃ hutvājyaṅgā avāpnuyāt ।।pravādāṃśaḥ sopaditi gṛhayajñe vidhīyate ।devebhyo vanaspata iti drumayajñe vidhīyate ।।gāyatrī vaiṣṇavī jñeyā tadviṣṇoḥ paramampadaṃ ।sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ sarvakāmakarantathā ।।
e ity āgeneye mahāpurāṇe yajurvidhānaṃ nāmonaṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṣṭhyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sāmavidhānaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
yujurvidhānaṅkathitaṃ vakṣye sāmnāṃ vidhānakaṃ ।saṃhitāṃ vaiṣṇavīñjaptvā hutvā syāt sarvakāmabhāk ।।saṃhitāñchāndasīṃ sādhu japtvā prīṇāti śaṅkaraṃ ।skandīṃ paitryāṃ saṃhitāñca japtvā syāttu prasādavān ।।

bhāgata iti ka, ga, cha, ña ca

pravādīśaṃ sopaditīti kha, cha ca

sarvaśāntikarantatheti gha, ña ca
yata indra bhajāmahe hiṃsādoṣavināśanaṃ ।avakīrṇī mucyate ca agnistigmeti vai japan ।।sarvapāpaharaṃ jñeyaṃ paritoyañca tāsu ca ।avikreyañca vikrīya japedghṛtavatīti ca ।।ayāno deva saviturjñeyanduḥsvapnanāśanaṃ ।abodhyagniritimantreṇa ghṛtaṃ rāma yathāvidhi ।।abhyukṣya ghṛtaśeṣeṇa mekhalābandha iṣyate ।strīṇāṃ yāsāntu garbhāṇi patanti bhṛgusattama ।।maṇiṃ jātasya bālasya vadhnīyāttadanantaraṃ ।somaṃ rājānametena vyādhibhirvipramucyate ।।sarpasāma prayuñjīno nāpnuyāt sarpajambhayaṃ ।mādya tvā vādyatetyetaddhutvā vipraḥ sahasraśaḥ ।।śatāvarimaṇibaddhvā nāpnuyācchastrato bhayaṃ ।dīrghatamasorka iti huttvānnaṃ prāpnuyādbahu ।।svamadhyāyantīti japanna mriyeta pipāsayā ।tvamimā oṣadhī hy etajjaptvā vyādhiṃ na vāpnuyāt ।।pathi devavratañjaptvā bhayebhyo vipramucyate ।yadindro munaye tveti hutaṃ saubhāgyavardhanaṃ ।।bhago na citra ity evaṃ netrayo rañjanaṃ hitaṃ ।saubhāgyavardhanaṃ rāma nātra kārya vicāraṇā ।।japendreti vargañca tathā saunbhāgyavardhanaṃ ।

paritoyaṃ yutāyutamiti ja, ṭa ca

pipāsita iti gha, ña ca
pari priyā hi vaḥ kāriḥ kāmyāṃ saṃśrāvayet striyaṃ ।।sā taṅkāmayate rāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।rathantaraṃ vāmadevyaṃ brahmavarcasavardhanaṃ ।।prāśayedbālakaṃ nityaṃ vacācūrṇaṃ ghṛtaplutaṃ ।indramidgāthinaṃ japtvā bhavecchrutidharastvasau ।।hutvā rathantarañjaptvā putramāpnotyasaṃśayaṃ ।mayi śrīriti mantroyaṃ japtavyaḥ śrīvivardhanaḥ ।।vairūpyasyāṣṭakaṃ nityaṃ prayuñjānaḥ śriyaṃ labhet ।saptāṣṭakaṃ prayuñjānaḥ sarvān kāmānavāpnuyāt ।।gavyeṣuṇeti yo nityaṃ sāyaṃ prātaratantritaḥ ।upasthānaṃ gavāṃ kuryāttasya syustāḥ sadā gṛhe ।।ghṛtāktantu yavadroṇaṃ vāta āvātu bheṣajaṃ ।anena vidhivat sarvāṃ māyāṃ vyapohati ।।pradevo dāsena tilān hutvā kārmaṇakṛntanaṃ ।abhi tvā pūrvapītaye vaṣaṭkārasamanvitaṃ ।।vāsakedhmasahasrantu hutaṃ yuddhe jayapradaṃ ।hastyaśvapuruṣān kuryādbudhaḥ piṣṭamayān śubhān ।।parakīyānathoddeśya pradhānapuruṣāṃs tathā ।susvinnān piṣṭakavarān kṣureṇot kṛtya bhāgaśaḥ ।।abhi tvā śūra ṇonumo mantreṇānena mantravit ।kṛtvā sarṣapatailāktān krodhena juhuyāttataḥ ।।

paripriyādeva kāririti kha, cha ca । paripriyādeva kaviriti gha, ña ca

mantreṇeti kha, cha, ja ca
etat kṛtvā budhaḥ karma saṃgrāme jayamāpnuyāt ।gāruḍaṃ vāmadevyañca rathantaravṛhadrathau ।।
sarvapāpapraśamanāḥ kathitāḥ saṃśayaṃ vinā ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sāmavidhānaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikaṣaṣṭhyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

atharvavidhānaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
sāmnāṃ vidhānaṃ kathitaṃ vakṣye cātharvaṇāmatha ।śāntātīyaṃ gaṇaṃ hutvā śāntimāpnoti mānavaḥ ।।bhaiṣajyañca gaṇaṃ hutvā sarvānrogān vyāpohati ।trisaptīyaṃ gaṇaṃ hutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।kvacinnāpnoti ca bhayaṃ hutvā caivābhayaṅgaṇaṃ ।na kvacijjāyate rāma gaṇaṃ hutvā parājitaṃ ।।āyuṣyañca gaṇaṃ hutvā apamṛtyuṃ vyapohati ।svastimāpnoti sarvatra hutvā svastyayanaṅgaṇaṃ ।।śreyasā yogamāpnoti śarmavarmagaṇantathā ।vāstoṣpatyagaṇaṃ hutvā vāstudoṣān vyapohati ।।tathā raudragaṇaṃ hutvā sarvān doṣān vyapohati ।etair daśaguṇair homī hy aṣṭādaśasu śāntiṣu ।।

vaiṣṇavī śāntiraindrī ca brāhmī raudrī tathaiva ca ।vāyavyā vāruṇī caiva kauverī bhārgavī tathā ।।prājāpatyā tathā tvāṣṭrī kaumārī vahnidevatā ।mārudgaṇā ca gāndhārī śāntair nairṛtakī tathā ।।śāntirāṅgirasī yāmyā pārthivī sarvakāmadā ।yastvāṃ mṛtyuriti hy etajjaptaṃ mṛtyuvināśanaṃ ।।suparṇastveti hutvā ca bhujagair naiva bādhyate ।indreṇa dattamityetat sarvakāmakarambhavet ।।indreṇa dattamityetat sarvabādhāvināśanaṃ ।imā devīti mantraś ca sarvaśāntikaraḥ paraḥ ।।devā maruta ity etat sarvakāmakarambhavet ।yamasya lokādityetat duḥsvapnaśamanamparaṃ ।।indraś ca pañcabaṇijeti hutaṃ strīṇāṃ saubhāgyavardhanaṃ ।kāmo me vājīti hutaṃ strīṇāṃ saubhāgyavardhanaṃ ।।tubhyameva javīmannityayutantu hutambhavet ।agne gobhinna ity etat medhāvṛddhikaramparaṃ ।।dhruvaṃ dhruveṇeti hutaṃ sthānalābhakaraṃ bhavet ।alaktajīveti śunā kṛṣilābhakaraṃ bhavet ।।ahante bhagna ity etat bhavetsaubhāgyavardhanaṃ ।ye me pāśas tathāpyetat bandhanāmnokṣakāraṇaṃ ।।śapantvahanniti ripūn nāśayeddhomajāpyataḥ ।

indra vanaṃ vanik cetīti gha, ja ca

agne saubhāgya ity etaditi ja
tvamuttamamitītyetadyaśobuddhivivardhanaṃ ।।yathā mṛgamatītyetat strīṇāṃ saubhāgyavardhanaṃ ।yena cehadidañcaiva garbhalābhakaraṃ bhavet ।।ayante yonirityetat putralābhakaraṃ bhavet ।śivaḥ śivābhirityetat bhavetsaubhāgyavardhanaṃ ।।vṛhaspatir naḥ paripātu pathi svastyayanaṃ bhavet ।muñcāmi tveti kathitamapamṛtyunivāraṇaṃ ।।atharvaśiraso adhyetā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।prādhānyena tu mantrāṇāṃ kiñcit karma taveritaṃ ।।vṛkṣāṇāṃ yajñiyānāntu samidhaḥ prathamaṃ haviḥ ।ājyañca vrīhayaś caiva tathā vai gaurasarṣapāḥ ।।akṣatāni tilāś caiva dadhikṣīre ca bhārgava ।darbhāstathaiva dūrvāś ca vilvāni kamalāni ca ।।śāntipuṣṭikarāṇyāhurdravyāṇyetāni sarvaśaḥ ।tailaṅkaṇāni dharmajña rājikā rudhiraṃ viṣaṃ ।।samidhaḥ kaṇṭakopetā abhicāreṣu yojayet ।ārṣaṃ vai daivataṃ chando viniyogajña ācaret ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe atharvavidhānaṃ nāmaikaṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kruddhaṃ bhūpaṃ prasādayediti gha, ja, jha ca

chapter 

ś atha dviṣaṣṭhyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

utpātaśāntiḥ

puṣkara uvāca
śrīsūktaṃ prativedañca jñeyaṃ lakṣmīvivardhanaṃ ।hiraṇyavarṇā hariṇīmṛcaḥ pañcadaśa śriyaḥ ।।ratheṣvakṣeṣu vājeti catasro yajuṣi śriyaḥ ।srāvantīyaṃ tathā sāma śrīsūktaṃ sāmavedake ।।śriyaṃ dhātarmayi dhehi prāktamātharvaṇe tathā ।śrīsūktaṃ yo japedbhaktyā hutvā śrīstasya vai bhavet ।।padmāni cātha vilvāni hutvājyaṃ vā tilān śriyaḥ ।ekantu pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ prativedantu sarvadaṃ ।।sūktena ddadyānniṣpāpo hy ekaikayā jalāñjaliṃ ।snāta ekaikayā puṣpaṃ viṣṇordatvāghahā bhavet ।।snāta ekaikayā datvā phalaṃ syāt sarvakāmabhāk ।mahāpāpopapānto bhavejjaptvā tu pauruṣaṃ ।।kṛcchrair viśuddho japtvā ca hutvā snātvātha sarvabhāk ।aṣṭādaśabhyaḥ śāntibhyastisro anyāḥ śāntayo varāḥ ।।amṛtā cābhayavā saumyā sarvotpātavimardanāḥ ।amṛtā sarvadavatyā abhayā brahmadaivatā ।।saumyā ca sarvadaivatyā ekā syātsarvakāmadā ।

hy ekaikaśa iti ka, gha, cha, ña ca
abhayāyā maṇiḥ kāryo varuṇasya bhṛgūttama ।।śatakāṇḍo amṛtāyāś ca saumyāyāḥ śaṅkajo maṇiḥ ।taddaivatyās tathā mantrāḥ siddhau syānmaṇibandhanaṃ ।।divyāntarīkṣabhaumādisamutpātārdanā imāḥ ।divyāntarīkṣabhaumantu adbhutaṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu ।।graharkṣavaikṛtaṃ divyamāntarīkṣannibodha me ।ulkāpātaś ca digdāhaḥ pariveśastathaiva ca ।।gandharvanagarañcaiva vṛṣṭiś ca vikṛtā ca yā ।carasthirabhavaṃ bhūmau bhūkampamapi bhūmijaṃ ।।saptāhābhyanatare vṛṣṭāvadbhutaṃ bhayakṛdbhavet ।śāntiṃ vinā tribhirvaṣair adbhutaṃ bhayakṛdbhavet ।।devatārcāḥ pranṛtyanti vepante prajvalanti ca ।āraṭhanti ca rodanti prasvidyante hasanti ca ।।arcāvikāropaśamo abhyarcya hutvā prajāpateḥ ।anagnirdīpyate yatra rāṣṭre ca bhṛśanisvanaṃ ।।na dīpyate cendhanavāṃstadrāṣṭraṃ pāḍyate nṛpaiḥ ।agnivaikṛtyaśamanamagnimantraiś ca bhārgava ।।akāle phalitā vṛkṣāḥ kṣīraṃ raktaṃ sravanti ca ।vṛkṣotpātapraśamanaṃ śivaṃ pūjya ca kārayet ।।ativṛṣṭiranāvṛṣṭirdurbhikṣāyobhayaṃ mataṃ ।
siddhyā iti gha, ña ca

devatāśceti kha, cha ca

āvaṭantīti kha, gha, cha, ña ca
anṛtau tridinārabdhavṛṣṭirjñeyā bhayāya hi ।।vṛṣṭivaikṛtyanāśaḥ syātparjaṇyendvarkapūjanāt ।nagarādapasarpante samīpamupayānti ca ।।nadyo hradapraśravaṇā virasāś ca bhavanti ca ।śalilāśayavaikṛtye japtavyo vāruṇo manuḥ ।।akālaprasavā nāryaḥ kālato vāprajās tathā ।vikṛtaprasavāś caiva yugmaprasavanādikaṃ ।।strīṇāṃ prasavavaikṛtye strīviprādiṃ prapūjayet ।vaḍavā hastinī gaurvā yadi yugmaṃ prasūyate ।।vijātyaṃ vikṛtaṃ vāpi ṣaḍbhirmāsair mriyeta vai ।vikṛtaṃ vā prasūyante paracakrabhayaṃ bhavet ।।homaḥ prasūtivaikṛtye japo viprādipūjanaṃ ।yāni yānānyayuktāni yuktāni na vahanti ca ।।ākāśe tūryanādāś ca mahadbhayamupasthitaṃ ।praviśanti yadā grāmamāraṇyā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ।।araṇyaṃ yānti vā grāmyāḥ jalaṃ yānti sthalodbhavāḥ ।sthalaṃ vā jalajā yānti rājadvārādike śivāḥ ।।pradoṣe kukkuṭo vāse śivā cārkodaye bhavet ।gṛhaṅkapotaḥ praviśet kravyāhā mūrdhni līyate ।।madhurāṃ makṣikāṃ kuryāt kāko maithunago dṛśi ।prāsādatoraṇodyānadvāraprākāraveśmanāṃ ।।animittantu patanaṃ dṛḍhānāṃ rājamṛtyave ।rajasā vātha dhūmena diśo yatra samākulāḥ ।।

ketūdayoparāgau ca chidratā śaśisūryayoḥ ।graharkṣavikṛtiryatra tatrāpi bhayamādiśet ।।agniryatra ma dīpyeta sravante codakambhakāḥ ।mṛtirbhayaṃ śūnyatādirutpātānāṃ phalambhavet ।।dvijadevādipūjābhyaḥ śāntirjapyaistu homataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe utpātaśāntirnāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha triṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

devapūjāvaiśvadevabaliḥ

puṣkara uvāca
devapūjādikaṃ karma vakṣye cotpātamardanam ।āpohiṣṭeti tisṛbhiḥ snāto arghyaṃ vioṣṇaverpayet ।।hiraṇyavarṇā iti ca pādyañca tisṛbhirdvija ।śanna āpo hy ācamanamidamāpo abhiṣecanaṃ ।।rathe akṣe ca tisṛbhirgandhaṃ yuveti vastrakaṃ ।puṣpaṃ puṣpavatītyevaṃ dhūpandhūposi cāpyatha ।।tejosi śukraṃ dīpaṃ syānmadhuparkaṃ dadhīti ca ।hiraṇyagarbha ity aṣṭāvṛcaḥ proktā nivedane ।।annasya manujaśreṣṭha pānasya ca sugandhinaḥ ।cāmaravyajanopānacchatraṃ yānāsane tathā ।।

gandhaṃ svadheti ka, ga ,gha, ja ca
yat kiñcidevamādi syātsāvitreṇa nivedayet ।pauruṣantu japet sūktaṃ tadeva juhuyāttathā ।।arcābhave tathā vedyāñjale pūrṇaghate tathā ।nadītīre atha kamale śāntiḥ syādviṣṇupūjanāt ।।tato homaḥ prakartavyo dīpyamāne vibhāvasau ।parisammṛjya paryukṣya paristīrya paristaraiḥ ।।sarvānnāgraṃ samuddhṛtya juhuyāt prayatastataḥ ।vāsudevāya devāya prabhave cāvyayāya ca ।।agnaye caiva somāya mitrāya varuṇāya ca ।indrāya ca mahābhāga indrāgnibhyāṃ tathaiva ca ।।viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyaḥ prajānāṃ pataye namaḥ ।anumatyai tathā rāma dhanvantaraya eva ca ।।vāstoṣpatyai tato devyai tataḥ sviṣṭikṛte agnaye ।sacaturthyantanāmnā tu hutvaitebhyo baliṃ haret ।।takṣopatakṣamabhitaḥ pūrveṇāgnimataḥ param ।aśvānāmapi dharmajña ūrṇānāmāni cāpyatha ।।nirundhī dhūmriṇīkā ca asvapantī tathaiva ca ।meghapatnī ca nāmāni sarveṣāmeva bhārgava ।।āgneyādyāḥ krameṇātha tataḥ śaktiṣu nikṣipet ।nandinyai ca subhāgyai ca sumaṅgalyai ca bhārgava ।।

sa caturthīkanāmneti pāṭhaḥ sādhuḥ

aśvaparṇīti ja

meghaparṇīti ja
bhadrakālyai tato datvā sthūṇāyāñca tathā śriye ।hiraṇyakeśyai ca tathā vanaspataya eva ca ।।dharmādharmamayau dvāre gṛhamadhye dhruvāya ca ।mṛtyave ca vahirdadyādvaruṇāyodakāśaye ।।bhūtebhyaś ca bahirdadyāccharaṇe dhanadāya ca ।indrāyendrapuruṣebhyo dadyāt pūrveṇa mānavaḥ ।।yamāya tatpuruṣebhyo dadyāddakṣiṇatas tathā ।varuṇāya tatpuruṣebhyo dadyātpaścimatas tathā ।।somāya somapuruṣebhya udagdadyādanantaraṃ ।brahmaṇe brahmapuruṣebhyo madhye dadyāttathaiva ca ।।ākāśe ca tathā cordhve sthaṇḍilāya kṣitau tathā ।divā divācarebhyaś ca rātrau rātricareṣu ca ।।baliṃ vahis tathā dadyātsāyaṃ prātastu pratyahaṃ ।piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ kuryāt prātaḥ sāyanna kārayet ।।pitre tu prathamaṃ dadyāttatpitre tadanantaram ।prapitāmahāya tanmātre pitṛmātre tato arpayet ।।tanmātre dakṣiṇāgreṣu kuśeṣvevaṃ yajet pitṝn ।indravāruṇavāyavyā yāmyā vā nairṛtāya ye ।।te kākāḥ pitṛgṛhantu imaṃ piṇḍaṃ mayodvṛtam ।kākapiṇḍantu mantreṇa śunaḥ piṇḍaṃ pradāpayet ।।vivasvataḥ kule jātau dvau śyāvaśabalau śunau ।teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ pradāsyāmi pathi rakṣantu me sadā ।।

śyāmaśabalāviti ja, ña, ṭa ca
saurabheyyaḥ sarvahitāḥ pavitrāḥ pāpanāśanāḥ ।pratigṛhṇantu me grāsaṃ gāvastrailokyamātaraḥ ।।grogrāsañca svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāṃ pradāpayet ।atithīndīnān pūjayitvā gṛhī bhuñjīta ca svayaṃ ।।
oṃ bhūḥ svāhā oṃ bhūvaḥ svāhā oṃ svaḥ svāhā oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ svāhā oṃ devakṛtasyainaso avayajanamasi svāhā oṃ pitṛkṛtasyainaso avayajanamasi svāhā oṃ ātmakṛtasyainaso avayajanamasi svāhā oṃ manuṣyakṛtasyainaso avayajanamasi svāhā oṃ enasa enaso avayajanamasi svāhā । yaccāhameno vidvāṃś cakāra yaccavidvāṃstasya sarvasyainaso avayajanamasi svāhā agnaye sviṣṭikṛte svāhā oṃ prajāpataye svāhā ।।

viṣṇupūjāvaiśvadevabaliste kīrtito mayā ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe devapūjāvaiśvadevabalirnāma triṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha catuḥṣaṣṭhyadhiakadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dikpālādisnānaṃ

agnir uvāca
sarvārthasādhanaṃ snānaṃ vakṣye śāntikaraṃ śṛṇu ।snāpayecca sarittīre grahān viṣṇuṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।

saurabheyā iti ka, gha, cha, ña ca

puṣparāśaya iti ja, ṭa ca
devālaye jvarārtyādau vināyakagrahārdite ।vidyārthino hrade gehe jayakāmasya tīrthake ।।padminyāṃ snāpayennārīṃ garbho yasyāḥ sravettathā ।aśokasannidhau snāyājjāto yasyā vinaśyati ।।puṣpārthināñca puṣpāḍhye putrārthināñca sāgare ।gṛhasaubhāgyakāmānāṃ sarveṣāṃ viṣṇusannidhau ।।vaiṣṇave revatīpuṣye sarveṣāṃ snānamuttamaṃ ।snānakāmasya saptāhampūrvamutsādanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।punar navāṃ rocanāñca śatāṅgaṃ guruṇī tvacaṃ ।madhūkaṃ rajanī dve ca tagarannāgakeśaram ।।ambarīñcaiva mañjiṣṭhāṃ māṃsīyāsakamardanaiḥ ।priyaṅgusarṣapaṃ kuṣṭhambalāmbrāhmīñca kuṅkumaṃ ।।pañcagavyaṃ śaktumiśraṃ udvartya snānamācaret ।maṇḍale karṇikāyāñca viṣṇuṃ brāhmaṇamarcayet ।।dakṣe vāme haraṃ pūrvaṃ patre pūrvādike kramāt ।likhedindrādikāndevān sāyudhān sahabāndhavān ।।snānamaṇḍalakān dikṣu kuryāccaiva vidikṣu ca ।viṣṇubrahmeśaśakrādīṃstadastrāṇyarcya homayet ।।ekaikasya tvaṣṭaśataṃ samidhastu tilān dhṛtaṃ ।bhadraḥ subhadraḥ siddhārthaḥ kalasāḥ puṣṭivardhanāḥ ।।amoghaścitrabhānuś ca parjanyo atha sudarśanaḥ ।sthāpayettu vaṭānenān sāśvirudramarudgaṇān ।।

sahavāhanāniti gha, ja ca
viśve devas tathā daityā vasavo munayas tathā ।āveśayantu suprītās tathānyā api devatāḥ ।।oṣadhīr nikṣipet kumbhe jayantīṃ vijayāṃ jayāṃ ।śatāvarīṃ śatapuṣpāṃ viṣṇukrāntāparājitām ।।jyotiṣmatīmatibalāñcandanośīrakeśaraṃ ।kastūrikāñca karpūraṃ bālakaṃ patrakaṃ tvacaṃ ।।jātīphalaṃ lavaṅgañca mṛttikāṃ pañcagavyakaṃ ।bhadrapīṭhe sthitaṃ sādhyaṃ snāpayeyurdvijā balāt ।।rājābhiṣekamantroktadevānāṃ homakāḥ pṛthak ।pūrṇāhutintato datvā gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dadet ।।indro abhiṣikto guruṇā purā daityān jaghāna ha ।dikpālasnānaṅkathitaṃ saṃgrāmādau jayādikaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dikpālādisnānaṃ nāma catuḥṣaṣṭhyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcaṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vināyakasnānaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
vināyakopasṛṣṭānāṃ snānaṃ sarvakaraṃ vade ।vināyakaḥ karmavighnasiddhyarthaṃ viniyojitaḥ ।।gaṇānāmādhipatye ca keśaveśapitāmahaiḥ ।svapnevagāhate atyarthaṃ jalaṃ muṇḍāṃś ca paśyati ।।

vināyakopasṛṣṭastu kravyādānadhirohati ।vrajamānas tathātmānaṃ manyate anugatamparaiḥ ।।vimanā viphalārambhaḥ saṃsīdatyanimittataḥ ।kanyā varaṃ na cāpnoti na cāpatyaṃ varāṅganā ।।ācāryatvaṃ śrotriyaś ca na śiṣyo adhyayanaṃ labhet ।dhanī na lābhamāpnoti na kṛṣiñca kṛṣībalaḥ ।।rājā rājyaṃ na cāpnoti snapanantasya kārayet ।hastapuṣyāśvayuksaumye vaiṣṇave bhadrapīṭhake ।।gaurasarṣapakalkena sājyenotsāditasya ca ।sarvauṣadhaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ praliptaśirasas tathā ।।caturbhiḥ kalasaiḥ snānanteṣu sarvauṣādhau kṣipet ।aśvasthānādgajasthānādvalmīkāt saṅgamāddhradāt ।।mṛttikāṃ rocanāṅgandhaṅguggulunteṣu nikṣipet ।sahasrākṣaṃ śatadhāramṛṣibhiḥ pāvanaṃ kṛtam ।।tena tvāmabhiṣiñcāmi pāvamānyaḥ punantu te ।bhagavante varuṇo rājā bhagaṃ sūryo vṛhaspatiḥ ।।bhagamindraś ca vāyuś ca bhagaṃ saptarṣayo daduḥ ।yatte keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yacca mūrdhani ।।lalāṭe karṇayorakṣṇorāpastadghnantu sarvadā ।darbhapiñjalimādāya vāmahaste tato guruḥ ।।

hastapuṣyāśvayuksaumyavaiṣṇaveṣu śubheṣu ceti gha, ña ca

sājyenāsāditasya ceti ka, cha ca

imā āpa iti cha, ña
snātasya sārṣapantailaṃ śruveṇauḍumbareṇa ca ।juhuyānmūrdhani kuśān savyena parigṛhya ca ।।mitaś ca sammitaś caiva tathā śālakakaṇṭakau ।kuṣmāṇḍo rājaputraś ca etaiḥ svāhāsamanvitaiḥ ।।nāmabhirbalimantraiś ca namaskārasamanvitaiḥ ।dadyāccatuṣpathe śūrpe kuśānāstīrya sarvataḥ ।।kṛtākṛtāṃstaṇḍulāṃś ca palalaudanameva ca ।matsyānpaṅkāṃstathaivāmān puṣpaṃ citraṃ surāṃ tridhā ।।mūlakaṃ pūrikāṃ pūpāṃstathaivaiṇḍavikāsrajaḥ ।dadhyannaṃ pāyasaṃ piṣṭaṃ modakaṃ guḍamarpayet ।।vināyakasya jananīmupatiṣṭhettato ambikāṃ ।dūrvāsarṣapapuṣpāṇāṃ datvārghyaṃ pūrṇamañjaliṃ ।।rūpaṃ dehi yaśo dehi saubhāgyaṃ subhage mama ।putraṃ dehi dhanaṃ dehi sarvān kāmāṃś ca dehi me ।।bhojayedbrāhmaṇāndadyādvastrayugmaṃ gurorapi ।vināyakaṃ grahānprārcya śriyaṃ karmaphalaṃ labhet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vināyakasnānaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

vaṣaṭkārasamanvitair iti gha, ja, ña, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭṣaṣṭhyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

māheśvarasnānalakṣakoṭihomādayaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
snānaṃ māheśvaraṃ vakṣye rājāderjayavardhanam ।dānavendrāya balaye yajjagādośanāḥ purā ।।bhāskare anudite pīṭhe prātaḥ saṃsnāpayed ghaṭaiḥ ।
oṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya ca balāya ca pāṇḍarocitabhasmānuliptagātrāya । tadyathā jaya jaya sarvān śatrūnmūkasya kalahavigrahavivādeṣu bhañjaya । oṃ matha matha sarvapathikānyosau yugāntakāle didhakṣati imāṃ pūjāṃ raudramūrtiḥ sahasrāṃśuḥ śukraḥ sa te rakṣatu jīvitaṃ । sambartakāgnitulyaś ca tripurāntakaraḥ śivaḥ । sarvadevamayaḥ sopi tava rakṣatu jīvitaṃ likhi likhi khili svāhā ।।
evaṃ snatastu mantreṇa juhuyāttilataṇḍulam ।।pañcāmṛtaistu saṃsnāpya pūjayecchūlapāṇinaṃ ।snānānyanyāni vakṣyāmi sarvadā vijayāya te ।।snānaṃ ghṛtena kathitamāyuṣyavardhanaṃ param ।gomayena ca lakṣmīḥ syādgomūtreṇāghamardanam ।।kṣīreṇa balabuddhiḥ syāddadhnā lakṣmīvivardhanaṃ ।kuśodakena pāpāntaḥ pañcagavyena sarvabhāk ।।śatamūlena sarvāptirgośṛṅgodakato aghajit ।

palāśabilvakamalakuśasnānantu sarvadaṃ ।।vacā haridre dve mustaṃ snānaṃ rakṣohaṇaṃ paraṃ ।āyuṣyañca yaśasyañca dharmamedhāvivardhanam ।।haimādbhiś caiva māṅgalyaṃ rūpyatāmrodakais tathā ।ratnodakaistu vijayaḥ saubhāgyaṃ sarvagandhakaiḥ ।।phalādbhiś ca tathārogyaṃ dhātryadbhiḥ paramāṃ śriyam ।tilasiddhārthakair lakṣmīḥ saubhāgyañca priyaṅguṇā ।।padmotpalakadambaiś ca śrīrbalaṃ balādrumodakaiḥ ।viṣṇupādodakasnānaṃ sarvasnānebhya uttamam ।।ekākī ekakāmāyetyekorkaṃ vidhivaccaret ।akrandayatisūktena prabadhnīyānmaṇiṃ kare ।।kuṣṭhapāṭhā vācā śuṇṭhī śaṅkhalohādiko maṇiḥ ।sarveṣāmevakāmānāmīśvaro bhagavān hariḥ ।।tasya saṃpūjanādeva sarvānkāmānsamaśnute ।snāpayitvā ghṛtakṣīraiḥ pūjayitvā ca pittahā ।।pañcamudgabalindatvā atisārāt pramucyate ।pañcagavyena saṃsnāpya vātavyādhiṃ vināśayet ।।dvisnehasnapanāt śleṣmarogahā cātipūjayā ।ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ tathā kṣaudraṃ snānantu trirasaṃ paraṃ ।।snānaṃ ghṛtāmbu dvisnehaṃ samalaṃ ghṛtatailakam ।kṣaudramikṣurasaṃ kṣīraṃ snānaṃ trimadhuraṃ smṛtam ।।ghṛtamiśurasaṃ tailaṃ kṣaudrañca trirasaṃ śriye ।
yavakāmāyetyekorkamiti ka, cha ca
anulepastriśukrastu karpūrośīracandanaiḥ ।।candanāgurukarpūramṛgadarpaiḥ sakuṅkumaiḥ ।pañcānulepanaṃ viṣṇoḥ sarvakāmaphalapradaṃ ।।trisugandhañca karpūraṃ tathā candanakuṅkumaiḥ ।mṛgadarpaṃ sakarpūraṃ malayaṃ sarvakāmadam ।।jātīphalaṃ sakarpūraṃ candanañca triśītakam ।pītāni śuklavarṇāni tathā śuklāni bhārgava ।।kṛṣṇāni caiva raktāni pañcavarṇāni nirdiśet ।utpalaṃ padmajātī ca triśītaṃ haripūjane ।।kuṅkumaṃ raktapadmāni triraktamutpalaṃ ।dhūpadīpādibhiḥ prārcya viṣṇuṃ śāntirbhavennṛṇāṃ ।।caturasrakare kuṇḍe brāhmaṇāścāṣṭa śoḍaśa ।lakṣahomaṅkoṭihomantilājyayavadhānyakaiḥ ।।grahānabhyarcya gāyatryā sarvaśāntiḥ kramādbhavet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe maheśvarasnānalakṣakoṭihomādayo nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptaṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nīrājanavidhiḥ

puṣkara uvāca
karma sāṃvatsaraṃ rājñāṃ janmarkṣe pūjayecca taṃ ।māsi māsi ca saṃkrāntau sūryasomādidevatāḥ ।।

agastyasyodaye agastyañcāturmāsyaṃ hariṃ yajet ।śayanotthāpane pañcadinaṃ kuryātsamutsavam ।।proṣṭhapāde site pakṣe pratipatprabhṛtikramāt ।śivirāt pūrvadigbhāge śakrārthaṃ bhavanañcaret ।।tatra śakradhvajaṃ sthāpya śacī śakrañca pūjayet ।aṣṭamyāṃ vādyaghoṣeṇa tāntu yaṣṭiṃ praveśayet ।।ekādaśyāṃ sopavāso dvādaśyāṃ ketumutthitam ।yajedvastrādisaṃvītaṃ ghaṭasthaṃ surapaṃ śacīṃ ।।vardhasvendra jitāmitra vṛtrahan pākaśāsana ।deva deva mahābhāga tvaṃ hi bhūmiṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ ।।tvaṃ prabhuḥ śāśvataś caiva sarvabhūtahite rataḥ ।anantatejā vai rājo yaśojayavivardhanaḥ ।।tejaste vardhayantvete devāḥ śakraḥ suvṛṣṭikṛt ।brahmaviṣṇumaheśāś ca kārttikeyo vināyakaḥ ।।ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyāś ca bhṛgavo diśaḥ ।marudguṇā lokapālā grahā yakṣādrinimnagāḥ ।।samudrā śrīrmahī gaurī caṇḍikā ca sarasvatī ।pravartayantu te tejo jaya śakra śacīpate ।।tava cāpi jayānnityaṃ mama sampaṭhyatāṃ śubhaṃ ।prasīda rājñāṃ viprāṇāṃ prajānāmapi sarvaśaḥ ।।bhavatprasādāt pṛthivī nityaṃ śasyavatī bhavet ।śivaṃ bhavatu nirvighnaṃ śāmyantāmītayo bhṛśaṃ ।।

paṭasthamiti ka, ga, cha, ja, ṭa ca
