mantreṇendraṃ samabhyarcya jitabhūḥ svargamāpnuyāt ।bhadrakālīṃ paṭe likhya pūjayedāśvine jaye ।।śuklapakṣe tathāṣṭamyāmāyudhaṃ kārmukaṃ dhvajam ।chatrañca rājaliṅgāni śastrādyaṃ kusumādibhiḥ ।।jāgranniśi balindadyāddvitīye ahni punaryajet ।bhadrakāli mahākāli durge durgārtihāriṇi ।।trailokyavijaye caṇḍi mama śāntau jaye bhava ।nīrājanavidhiṃ vakṣye aiśānyānmandiraṃ caret ।।toraṇatritayaṃ tatra gṛhe devānyajet sadā ।citrāntyaktvā yadā svātiṃ savitā pratipadyate ।।tataḥ prabhṛti kartavyaṃ yāvat svātau raviḥ sthitaḥ ।brahmā viṣṇuś ca śambhuś ca śakraś caivānalānilau ।।vināyakaḥ kumāraś ca varuṇo dhanado yamaḥ ।viśvedevā vaiśravaso gajāścāṣṭau ca tānyajet ।।kumudairāvaṇau padmaḥ puṣpadantaś ca vāmanaḥ ।supratīko añjano nīlaḥ pūjā kāryā gṛhādike ।।purodhā juhuyādājyaṃ samitsiddhārthakaṃ tilāḥ ।kumbhā aṣṭau pūjitāś ca taiḥ snāpyāśvagajottamāḥ ।।aśvāḥ snāpyā dadet piṇḍān tato hi prathamaṃ gajān ।niṣkrāmayettoraṇaistu gopurādi na laṅghayet ।।vikrameyustataḥ sarve rājaliṅgaṃ gṛhe yajet ।

śekharādīti ka
vāruṇe varuṇaṃ prārcya rātrau bhūtabaliṃ dadet ।।viśākhāyāṃ gate sūrye āśrame nivasennṛpaḥ ।alaṅkuryāddine tasmin vāhanantu viśeṣataḥ ।।pūjitā rājaliṅgāś ca kartavyā narahastagāḥ ।hastinanturagaṃ chatraṃ khaḍgaṃ cāpañca dundubhim ।।dhvajaṃ patākāṃ dharmajña kālajñastvabhimantrayet ।abhimantrya tataḥ sarvān kuryāt kuñjaradhūrgatān ।।kuñjaroparigau syātāṃ sāṃvatsarapurohitau ।mantritāṃś ca samāruhya toraṇena vinirgamet ।।niṣkramya nāgamāruhya toraṇenātha nirgamet ।baliṃ vibhajya vidhivadrājā kuñjaradhūrgataḥ ।।unmūkānāntu nicayamādīpitadigantaraṃ ।rājā pradakṣiṇaṃ kuryāttrīn vārān susamāhitaḥ ।।caturaṅgabalopetaḥ sarvasainyena nādayan ।evaṃ kṛtvā gṛhaṃ gacchedvisarjitajalāñjaliḥ ।।śāntir nīrājanākhyeyaṃ vṛddhaye ripumardanī ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nīrājanāvidhirnāma saptaṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

viśākhāntviti ka, cha ca

chapter 

ś athāṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chatrādimantrādayaḥ

puṣkara uvāca
chatrādimantrānvakṣyāmi yaistat pūjya jayādikam ।brahmaṇaḥ satyavākyena somasya varuṇasya ca ।।sūryasya ca prabhāvena vardhasva tvaṃ mahāmate ।pāṇḍarābhapratīkāśa himakundendusuprabha ।।yathāmbudaśchādayate śivāyaināṃ vasundharāṃ ।tathācchādaya rājānaṃ vijayārogyavṛddhaye ।।gandharvakulajātastvaṃ mābhūyāḥ kuladūṣakaḥ ।brahmaṇaḥ satyavākyena somasya varuṇasya ca ।।prabhāvācca hutāśasya vardhasva tvaṃ turaṅgama ।tejasā caiva sūryasya munīnāṃ tapasā tathā ।।rudrasya brahmacaryeṇa pavanasya balena ca ।smara tvaṃ rājaputro asi kaustubhantu maṇiṃ smara ।।yāṃ gatiṃ brahmahā gacchet pitṛhā mātṛhā tathā ।bhūmyarthe anṛtavādī ca kṣatriyaś ca parāṅmukhaḥ ।।vrajestvantāṃ gatiṃ kṣipraṃ mā tat pāpaṃ bhavettava ।vikṛtiṃ māpagacchestvaṃ yuddhe adhvani turaṅgama ।।ripūn vinighnansamare saha bhartrā sukhī bhava ।śakraketo mahāvīryaḥ suvarṇastvāmupāśritaḥ ।।patatrirāḍvainateyas tathā nārāyaṇadhvajaḥ ।

kāśyapeyo amṛtāhartā nāgārirviṣṇuvāhanaḥ ।।aprameyo durādharṣo raṇe devārisūdanaḥ ।mahābalo māvego mahākāyo amṛtāśanaḥ ।।garutmānmārutagatistvayi sannihitaḥ sthitaḥ ।viṣṇunā devadevena śakrārthaṃ sthāpito hy asi ।।jayāya bhava me nityaṃ vṛddhaye atha balasya ca ।sāśvavarmāyudhānyodhānrakṣāsmākaṃ ripūndaha ।।kumudairāvaṇau padmaḥ puṣpadanto atha vāmanaḥ ।supratīko añjano nīla ete aṣṭau devayonayaḥ ।।teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca balānyaṣṭau samāśritāḥ ।bhadro mando mṛgaś caiva gajaḥ saṃkīrṇa eva ca ।।vane vane prasūtāste smarayoniṃ mahāgajāḥ ।pāntu tvāṃ vasavo rudrā ādityāḥ samarudgaṇāḥ ।।bhartāraṃ rakṣa nāgendra samayaḥ paripālyatāṃ ।airāvatādhirūḍhastu vajrahastaḥ śatakratuḥ ।।pṛṣṭhato anugatastveṣa rakṣatu tvāṃ sa devarāṭ ।avāpnuhi jayaṃ yuddhe susthaś caiva sadā vraja ।।avāpnuhi balañcaiva airāvatasamaṃ yudhi ।śrīste somādbalaṃ viṣṇostejaḥ sūryājjavo anilāt ।।sthairyaṃ girerjayaṃ rudrādyaśo devāt purandarāt ।yuddhe rakṣantu nāgāstvāṃ diśaś ca saha daivataiḥ ।।aśvinau saha gandharvaiḥ pāntu tvāṃ sarvato diśaḥ ।manvo vasavo rudrā vāyuḥ somo maharṣayaḥ ।।

nāgakinnaragandharvayakṣabhūtagaṇā grahāḥ ।pramathāstu sahādityair bhūteśo mātṛbhiḥ saha ।।śakraḥ senāpatiḥ skando varuṇaścāśritastvayi ।pradahantu ripūn sarvān rājā vijayamṛcchatu ।।yāni prayuktānyaribhirbhūṣaṇāni samantataḥ ।patantu tava śatrūṇāṃ hatāni tava tejasā ।।kālanemibadhe yadvat yuddhe tripuraghātane ।hiraṇyakaśiporyuddhe badhe sarvāsureṣu ca ।।śobhitāsi tathaivādya śobhasva samayaṃ smara ।nīlasvetāmimāndṛṣṭvā naśyantvāśu nṛpārayaḥ ।।vyādhibhirvividhair ghoraiḥ śastraiś ca yudhi nirjitāḥ ।pūtanā revatī lekhā kālarātrīti paṭhyate ।।dahantvāśu ripūn sarvānpatāke tvāmupāśritāḥ ।sarvamedhe mahāyajñe devadevena śūlinā ।।śarveṇa jagataś caiva sāreṇa tvaṃ vinirmitaḥ ।nandakasyāparāṃ mūrtiṃ smara śatrunivarhaṇa ।।nīlotpaladalaśyāma kṛṣṇa duḥsvapnanāśana ।asirviśasanaḥ khaḍgastīkṣṇadhāro durāsadaḥ ।।augarbho vijayaś caiva dharmapālastathaiva ca ।ityaṣṭau tava nāmāni puroktāni svayambhuvā ।।nakṣatraṃ kṛttikā tubhyaṃ gururdevo maheśvaraḥ ।hiraṇyañca śarīrante daivatante janārdanaḥ ।।rājānaṃ rakṣa nistriṃśa sabalaṃ sapurantathā ।

pitā pitāmaho devaḥ sa tvaṃ pālaya sarvadā ।।śarmapradastvaṃ samare varman sainye yaśo adya me ।rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo ahantavānagha namo astu te ।।dundubhe tvaṃ sapatnānāṃ ghoṣāddhṛdayakampanaḥ ।bhava bhūmisainyānāṃ yathā vijayavardhanaḥ ।।yathā jīmūtaghoṣeṇa hṛṣyanti varavāraṇāḥ ।tathāstu tava śabdena harṣo asmākaṃ mudāvaha ।।yathā jīmūtaśabdena strīṇāṃ trāso abhijāyate ।tathā tu tava śabdena trasyantvasmaddviṣo raṇe ।।mantraiḥ sadārcanīyāste yojanīyā jayādiṣu ।ghṛtakambalaviṣṇādestvabhiṣekañca vatsare ।।rājño abhiṣekaḥ kartavyo daivajñena purodhasā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe chatrādimantrādayaḥ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭhyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

agnipurāṇam

maharṣiśrīmadvedavyāsena praṇītam

śrīlaśrī vaṅgadeśīyāsiyātik-samājānujñayā

śrīrājendralālamitreṇa pariśodhitam

kalikātārājadhānyāṃ gaṇeśayantre mudritañca saṃvat 

agnipurāṇam

chapter 

ś athonasaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

viṣṇupañjaraṃ

puṣkara uvaca
tripurañjaghnuṣaḥ pūrvaṃ brahmaṇā viṣṇupañjaraṃ ।śaṅkarasya dvijaśreṣtha rakṣaṇāya nirūpitaṃ ।।vāgīśena ca śakrasya balaṃ hantuṃ prayāsyataḥ ।tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi tattvaṃ śṛṇu jayādimat ।।viṣṇuḥ prācyāṃ sthitaś cakrī harirdakṣinaṇato gadī ।pratīcyāṃ śārṅgadhṛgviṣṇurjiṣṇuḥ khaḍgī mamottare ।।hṛṣīkeśo vikoṇeṣu tacchidreṣu janārdanaḥ ।kroḍarūpī harirbhūmau narasiṃho ambare mama ।।kṣurāntamamalañcakraṃ bhramatyetat sudarśanaṃ ।asyāṃśumālā duṣprekṣyā hantuṃ pretaniśācarān ।।gadā ceyaṃ sahasrārciḥpradīptapāvakojjvalā ।rakṣobhūtapiśācānāṃ ḍākinīnāñca nāśanī ।।śārṅgavisphūrjitañcaiva vāsudevasya madripūn ।tiryaṅmanuṣyakuṣmāṇḍapretādīn hantvaśeṣataḥ ।।

khaḍgadhārojjvalajjo atsnānirdhūtā ye samāhitāḥ ।te yāntu śāmyatāṃ sadyo garuḍeneva pannagāḥ ।।ye kuṣmāṇḍāsthā yakṣā ye daityā ye niśācarāḥ ।pretā vināyakāḥ krūrā manuṣyā jambhagāḥ khagāḥ ।।siṃhādayaś ca paśavo dandaśūkāś ca pannagāḥ ।sarve bhavantu te saumyāḥ kṛṣṇaśaṅkharavāhatāḥ ।।cittavṛttiharā ye me ye janāḥ smṛtihārakāḥ ।balaujasañca hartāraśchāyāvibhraṃśakāś ca ye ।।ye copabhogahartāro ye ca lakṣaṇanāśakāḥ ।kuṣmāṇḍāste praṇaśyantu viṣṇucakraravāhatāḥ ।।buddhisvāsthyaṃ manaḥsvāsthyaṃ svāsthyamaindriyakaṃ tathā ।mamāstu devadevasya vāsudevasya kīrtanāt ।।pṛṣṭhe purastānmama dakṣiṇottare vikoṇataścāstu janārdanohariḥ ।tamīḍyamīśānamanantamacyutaṃ janārdanaṃ praṇipatito na sīdati ।।yathā paraṃ brahma haris tathā paraḥ jagatsvarūpaś ca sa eva keśavaḥ ।satyena tenācyutanāmakīrtanāt praṇāśayettu trividhaṃmamāśubhaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe viṣṇupañjaraṃ nāmonasapratyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vedaśākhadikīrtanaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
sarvānugrāhakā mantrāś caturvargaprasādhakāḥ ।ṛgatharva tathā sāma yajuḥ saṃkhyā tu lakṣakaṃ ।।bhedaḥ sāṅkhyāyanaś caika āśvalāyano dvitīyakaḥ ।śatāni daśa mantrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇā dvisahasrakaṃ ।।ṛgvedo hi pramāṇena smṛto dvaipāyanādibhiḥ ।ekonidvisahasrantu mantrāṇāṃ yajuṣas tathā ।।śatāni daśa viprāṇāṃ ṣaḍaśītiś ca śākhikāḥ ।kāṇvamādhyandinī saṃjñā kaṭhī mādhyakaṭhī tathā ।।maitrāyaṇī ca saṃjñā ca taittirīyābhidhānikā ।vaiśampāyaniketyādyāḥ śākhā yajuṣi saṃsthitāḥ ।।sāmnaḥ kauthumasaṃjñaikā dvitīyātharvaṇāyanī ।gānānyapi ca catvāri veda āraṇyakantathā ।।ukthā ūhacaturthañca mantrā navasahasrakāḥ ।sacatuḥśatakāś caiva brahmasaṅghaṭakāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।pañcaviṃśatirevātra sāmamānaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।sumanturjājaliś caiva ślokāyaniratharvake ।।śaunakaḥ pippalādaś ca muñjakeśādayo apare ।mantrāṇāmayutaṃ ṣaṣṭiśatañcopaniṣacchataṃ ।।vyāsarūpī sa bhagavān śākhābhedadyakārayat ।

śākhābhedādayo viṣṇuritihāsaḥ purāṇakaṃ ।।prāpya vyāsāt purāṇādi sūto vai lomaharṣaṇaḥ ।sumatiścāgnivarcāś ca mitrayuḥśiṃśapāyanaḥ ।।kṛtavratotha sāvarṇiḥ ṣaṭśiṣyāstasya cābhavan ।śāṃśapāyanādayaś cakruḥ purāṇānāntu saṃhitāḥ ।।brāhmādīni purāṇāni harividyā daśāṣṭa ca ।mahāpurāṇe hy āgneye vidyārūpo hariḥ sthitaḥ ।।saprapañco niṣprapañco mūrtāmūrtasvarūpadhṛk ।taṃ jñātvābhyarcya saṃstūya bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।।viṣṇurjiṣṇurbhaviṣṇuś ca agnisūryādirūpavān ।agnirūpeṇa devādermukhaṃ viṣṇuḥ parā gatiḥ ।।vedeṣu sapurāṇeṣu yajñamūrtiś ca gīyate ।āgneyākhyaṃ purāṇantu rūpaṃ viṣṇormahattaraṃ ।।āgneyākhyapurāṇasya kartā śrotā janārdanaḥ ।tasmātpurāṇamāgneyaṃ sarvavedamayaṃ mahat ।।sarvavidyāmayaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvajñānamayaṃ varam ।sarvātma harirūpaṃ hi paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṛṇāṃ ।।vidyārthināñca vidyādamarthināṃ śrīdhanapradam ।rājyārthināṃ rājyadañca dharmadaṃ dharmakāminām ।।svargārthināṃ svargadañca putradaṃ putrakāmināṃ ।gavādikāmināṅgodaṃ grāmadaṃ grāmakāmināṃ ।।

śiṃśapāyanādayaś cakruriti kha 

paramiti ña 

śrībalapradamiti ña 
kāmārthināṃ kāmadañca sarvasaubhāgyasampradam ।guṇakīrtipradannṝṇāṃ jayadañjayakāminām ।।sarvepsūnāṃ sarvadantu muktidaṃ muktikāmināṃ ।
pāpaghnaṃ pāpakartṝṇāmāgneyaṃ hi purāṇakam ।।

ityāgneye mahāpurāṇe vedaśākhādikīrtinaṃ nāma saptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athaikasaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dānādimāhatmyaṃ

puṣkara uvāca
brahmaṇābhihitaṃ pūrvaṃ yāvanmātraṃ marīcaye ।lakṣārdhāddhantu tadbrāhmaṃ likhitvā sampradāpayet ।।vaiśākhyāmpaurṇamāsyāñca svargārthī jaladhenumat ।pādmaṃ dvādaśasāhasraṃ dyaiṣṭhe dadyācca dhenumat ।।varāhakalpavṛttāntamadhikṛtya parāśaraḥ ।trayoviṃśatisāhasraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ prāha cārpayet ।।jaladhenumadāṣāḍhyāṃ viṣṇoḥ padamavāpnuyāt ।caturdaśasahasrāṇi vāyavīyaṃ haripriyaṃ ।।śvetakalpaprasaṅgena dharmān vāyurihābravīt ।dadyāllikhitvā tadvipre śrāvaṇyāṃ guḍadhenumat ।।yatrādhikṛtya gāyatrīṃ kīrtyate dharmavistaraḥ ।

vṛtrāsurabadhopetaṃ tadbhāgavatamucyate ।।sārasvatasta kalpasya proṣṭhapadyāntu taddadet ।aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi hemasiṃhasamanvitaṃ ।।yatrāha nārado dharmān vṛhatkalpāśritānihaṃ ।pañcaviṃśasahasrāṇi nāradīyaṃ taducyate ।।sadhenuñcāśvine dadyātsiddhimātyantikīṃ labhet ।yatrādhikṛtya śatrūnāndharmādharmavicāraṇā ।।kārttikyāṃ navasāhasraṃ mārkaṇḍeyamathārpayet ।agninā yadvaśiṣṭhāya proktañcāgneyameva tat ।।likhitvā pustakaṃ dadyānmārgaśīrṣyāṃ sa sarvadaḥ ।dvādaśaiva sahasrāṇi sarvavidyāvabodhanaṃ ।।caturdaśasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyaṃ sūryasambhavaṃ ।bhavastu manave prāha dadyāt pauṣyāṃ guḍādimat ।।sāvarṇinā nāradāya brahmavaivartamīritaṃ ।rathāntarasya vṛttāntamaṣṭādaśasahasrakaṃ ।।māghyāndadyādvarāhasya caritaṃ brahmalokabhāk ।yatragniliṅgamadhyastho dharmānprāha maheśvaraḥ ।।āgneyakalpe talliṅgamekādaśasahasrakam ।taddatvā śivamāpnoti phālgunyāṃ tiladhenumat ।।caturdaśasahasrāṇi vārāhaṃ viṣṇuṇeritam ।bhūmau varāhacaritaṃ mānavasya pravṛttitaḥ ।।sahemagaruḍañcaitryāṃ padamāpnoti vaiṣṇavam ।

sarvavidyāvadhāraṇamiti ña 
caturaśītisāhasraṃ skāndaṃ skanderitaṃ mahat ।।adhikṛtya sadharmāṃś ca kalpe tatpuruṣe arpayet ।vāmanaṃ daśasāhasraṃ dhaumakalpe hareḥ kathāṃ ।।dadyāt śaradi viṣuve dharmārthādinibodhanam ।kūrmañcāṣṭasahasrañca kūrmoktañca rasātale ।।indradyumnaprasaṅgena dadyāttaddhemakūrmavat ।trayodaśasahasrāṇi mātsyaṃ kalpādito abravīt ।।matsyo hi manave dadyādviṣuve hemamatsyavat ।gāruḍañcāṣṭasāhasraṃ viṣṇūktantārkṣakalpake ।।viśvāṇḍādgaruḍotpattiṃ taddadyāddhemahaṃsavat ।brahmā brahmāṇḍamāhātmyamadhikṛtyābrabīttu yat ।।tacca dvādaśasāhasraṃ brahmāṇḍaṃ taddvije arpayet ।bhārate parvasamāptau vastragandhasragādibhiḥ ।।vācakaṃ pūjayedādau bhojayet pāyasair dvijān ।gobhūgrāmasuvarṇādi dadyātparvaṇi parvaṇi ।।samāpte bhārate vipraṃ saṃhitāpustakānyajet ।śubhe deśe niveśyātha kṣaumavastrādināvṛtān ।।naranārayaṇau pūjyau pustakāḥ kusumādibhiḥ ।go annabhūhema dadvātha bhojayitvā kṣamāpayet ।।mahādānāni deyāni ratnāni vividhāni ca ।māsakau dvau trayaś caiva māse māse pradāpayet ।।ayanādau śrābakasya dānamādau vidhīyate ।śrotṛbhiḥ sakalaiḥ kāryaṃ śrāvake pūjanaṃ dvija ।।

itihāsapurāṇānāṃ pustakāni prayacchati ।pūjayitvāyurārogyaṃ svargamokṣamavāpnuyāt ।।
ityagneye mahapuraṇe dānādimāhatmyaṃ nāmaika saptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvisaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sūryavaṃśakīrtanaṃ

agnir uvāca
sūryavaṃśaṃ somavaṃśaṃ rajñāṃ vaṃśaṃ vadami te ।harerbrahmā padmago abhūnmarīcirbrahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ ।।marīceḥ kaśyapastasmādvivasvāṃstasya patnyapi ।saṃjñā rājñī prabhā tisro rājñī raivataputrikā ।।revantaṃ suṣuve putraṃ prabhātañca prabhā raveḥ ।tvāṣṭrī saṃjñā manuṃ putraṃ yamalau yamunāṃ yamam ।।chāyā saṃjñā ca sāvarṇiṃ manuṃ vaivasvataṃ sutam ।śaniñca tapatīṃ viṣṭiṃ saṃjñāyāñcāśvinau punaḥ ।।manorvaivasvatasyāsan putrā vai na ca tatsamāḥ ।ikṣvākuś caiva nābhāgo dhṛṣṭaḥśaryātireva ca ।।nariṣyantas tathā prāṃśurnābhāgādiṣṭasattamāḥ ।karuṣaś ca pṛṣadhraś ca ayodhyāyāṃ mahābalāḥ ।।kanyelā ca manorāsīdbudhāttasyāṃ purūravāḥ ।purūravasamucpādya selā sudyumnatāṅgatā ।।

atra chāyetipāṭho yuktaḥ
sudyumnādutkalagayau vinatāśvastrayo nṛpāḥ ।utkalasyotkalaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinatāśvasya paścimā ।।dik sarvā rājavaryasya gayasya tu gayāpurī ।vaśiṣṭhavākyāt sudyumnaḥ pratiṣṭhānamavāpa ha ।।tat purūravase prādātsudyumno rājyamāpya tu ।nariṣyataḥ śakāḥ putrā nābhāgasya ca vaiṣṇavaḥ ।।ambarīṣaḥ prajāpālo dhārṣṭakaṃ dhṛṣṭataḥ kulam ।sukalpānartau śaryārtervairohyānartato nṛpaḥ ।।ānartaviṣayaścāsīt purī cāsīt kuśasthalī ।revasya raivataḥ putraḥ kakudmī nāma dhārmikaḥ ।।jyeṣṭhaḥ putraśatasyāsīdrājyaṃ prāpya kuśasthalīm ।sa kanyāsahitaḥ śrutvā gāndharvaṃ brahmaṇo antike ।।muhūrtabhūtaṃ devasya martye bahuyugaṃ gatam ।ājagāma javenātha svāṃ purīṃ yādavair vṛtām ।।kṛtāṃ dvāravatīṃ nāma bahudvārāṃ manoramām ।bhojavṛṣṇyandhakair guptāṃ vāsudevapurogamaiḥ ।।revatīṃ baladevāya dadau jñātvā hy aninditām ।tapaḥ sumeruśikhare taptvā viṣṇvālayaṃ gataḥ ।।nābhāgasya ca putrau dvau vaiśyau brāhmaṇatāṃ gatau ।karūṣasya tu kārūṣāḥ kṣatriyā yuddhadurmadāḥ ।।śūdratvañca pṛṣadhro agāddhiṃsayitvā guroś ca gām ।manuputrādathekṣākorvikukṣirdevarāḍabhūt ।।vikukṣestu kakutstho abhūttasya putraḥ suyodhanaḥ ।

tasya putraḥ pṛthur nāma viśvagaśvaḥ pṛthoḥ sutaḥ ।।āyustasya ca putro abhūdyuvanāśvas tathā sutaḥ ।yuvanāśvācca śrāvantaḥ pūrve śrāvantikā purī ।।śrāvantād vṛhadaśvo abhūt kubalāśvastato nṛpaḥ ।dhundhumāratvamagamaddhundhor nāmnā ca vai purā ।।dhundhumārāstrayo bhūpā dṛḍhāśvo daṇḍa eva ca ।kapilo atha dṛḍhāśvāttu haryaśvaś ca pramodakaḥ ।।haryaśvācca nikumbho abhūt saṃhatāśvo nikumbhataḥ ।akṛśāśvo raṇāśvaś ca saṃhatāśvasutāvubhau ।।yuvanāśvo raṇāśvasya māndhātā yuvanāśvataḥ ।māndhātuḥ purukutso abhūnmucukundo dvitīyakaḥ ।।purukutsādasasyuś ca sambhūto narmadābhavaḥ ।sambhūtasya sudhanvābhūttridhanvātha sudhanvanaḥ ।।tridhanvanastu taruṇastasya satyavrataḥ sutaḥ ।satyavratātsatyaratho hariś candraś ca tatsutaḥ ।।hariś candrādrohitāśvo rohitāśvādvṛko abhavat ।vṛkādvāhuś ca vāhoś ca sagarastasya ca priyā ।।prabhā ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇāṃ sutānāṃ jananī hy abhūt ।tuṣṭādaurvānnṛpādekaṃ bhānumatyasamañjasam ।।khanantaḥ pṛthivīṃ dagdhā viṣṇunā bahusāgarāḥ ।asamañjaso aṃśrumāṃś ca dilīpo aṃśumato abhavat ।।bhagīratho dilīpāttu yena gaṅgāvatāritā ।

munineti ja
bhagīrathāttu nābhāgo nābhāgādambarīṣakaḥ ।।sindhudvīpo ambarīṣāttu śrutāyustatsutaḥ smṛtaḥ ।śrutāyorṛtaparṇo abhūttasya kalmāṣapādakaḥ ।।kalmāṣāṅghreḥ sarvakarmā hy anaraṇyastato abhavat ।anaraṇyāttu nighno atha anamitrastato raghuḥ ।।raghorabhuddilīpastu dilīpāccāpyajo nṛpaḥ ।dīrghavāhurajāt kālastvajāpālastato abhavat ।।tatha daśaratho jātastasya putracatuṣṭayam ।nārāyaṇātmakāḥ sarve rāmastasyāgrajo abhavat ।।rāvaṇāntakaro rājā hy ayodhyāyāṃ raghūttamaḥ ।vālmīkiryasya caritaṃ cakre tannāradaśravāt ।।rāmaputrau kuśalavau sītāyāṃ kulavardhanau ।atithiś ca kuśājjajñe niṣadhastasya cātmajaḥ ।।niṣadhāttu nalo jajñe nabho ajāyata vai nalāt ।nabhasaḥ puṇḍarīko abhūt sudhanvā ca tato abhavat ।।sudhanvano devānīko hy ahīnāśvaś ca tatsutaḥ ।ahīnāśvāt sahasrāśvaś candrālokastato abhavat ।।candrāvalokatastārāpīḍo asmāccandraparvataḥ ।candragirerbhānurathaḥ śrutāyustasya cātmajaḥ ।ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavāḥ sūryavaṃśadharāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe suryavaṃśakīrtanaṃ nāma dvisaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sakarmābhūditi kha, cha, ca

chapter 

ś atha trisaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

somavaṃśavarṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
somavaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmi paṭhitaṃ pāpanāśanam ।viṣṇunābhyabjajo brahmā brahmaputro atriratritaḥ ।।somaś cakre rājasūyaṃ trailokyaṃ dakṣiṇāndadau ।samāpte avabhṛthe somaṃ tadrūpālokanecchavaḥ ।।kāmavāṇābhitaptāṅgyo naradevyaḥ siṣevire ।lakṣmīr narāyaṇaṃ tyaktvā sinīvālī ca kardamama ।।dyutiṃ vibhāvasuntyaktvā puṣṭirdhātāramavyayam ।prabhā prabhākarantyaktvā haviṣmantaṃ kuhūḥ svayam ।।kīrtirjayantambhartāraṃ vasurmārīcakaśyayam ।dhṛtistyaktvā patiṃ nandīṃ somamevābhajattadā ।।svakīyā iva somo api kāmayāmāsa tāstadā ।evaṃ kṛtāpacārasya tāsāṃ bhartṛgaṇastadā ।।na śaśākāpacārāya śāpaiḥ śastrādibhiḥ punaḥ ।saptalokaikanāthatvamavāptastapasā hy uta ।।vivabhrāma matistasya vinayādanayā hatā ।vṛhaspateḥ sa vai bhāryāṃ tārāṃ nāma yaśasvinīm ।।jahāra tarasā somo hy avamanyāṅgiraḥsutam ।tatastadyuddhamabhavat prakhyātaṃ tārakāmayam ।।

na śaśākāpakārāyeti ña
devānāṃ dānavānāñca lokakṣayakaraṃ mahat ।brahmā nivāryośanasantārāmaṅgirase dadau ।।tāmantaḥprasavāṃ dṛṣṭvā garbhaṃ tyajābravīdguruḥ ।garbhastyaktaḥ pradīpto atha prāhāhaṃ somasanbhavaḥ ।।evaṃ somādbudhaḥ puttraḥ puttrastasya purūravāḥ ।svargantyaktvorvaśī sā taṃ varayāmāsa cāpsarāḥ ।।tayā sahācaradrājā daśavarṣāṇi pañca ca ।pañca ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau ca daśa cāṣṭau mahāmune ।।eko agnirabhavat pūrvaṃ tena tretā pravartitā ।purūravā yogaśīlo gāndharvalokamīyivān ।।āyurdṛḍhāyuraśvāyurdhanāyurdhṛtimān vasuḥ ।divijātaḥ śatāyuś ca suṣuve corvaśī nṛpān ।।āyuṣo nahuṣaḥ putro vṛddhaśarmā rajis tathā ।darbho vipāpmā pañcāgnyaṃ rajeḥ putraśataṃ hy abhūt ।।rājeyā iti vikhyātā viṣṇudattavaro rajiḥ ।devāsure raṇe daityānabadhītsurayācitaḥ ।।gatāyendrāya putratvaṃ datvā rājyaṃ divaṅgataḥ ।rajeḥ putrair hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ śakrasyātha sudurmanāḥ ।।grahaśāntyādividhinā gururindrāya taddadau ।mohayitvā rajisutānāsaṃste nijadharmagāḥ ।।nahuṣasya sutāḥ sapta yatiryayātiruttamaḥ ।udbhavaḥ pañcakaś caiva śaryātimeghapālakau ।।

pañcāgnyā iti ja । pañcāgnyamiti ña
yatiḥ kumārabhāve api viṣṇuṃ dhyātvā hariṃ gataḥ ।devayānī śakrakanyā yayāteḥ patny abhūt tadā ।।vṛṣaparvajā śarmiṣṭhā yayāteḥ pañca tatsutāḥ ।yaduñca turvasuñcaiva devayānī vyajāyata ।।druhyañcānūñca pūruñca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī ।yaduḥ pūruścābhavatānteṣāṃ vaṃśavivardhanau ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe somavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nama trisaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

atha catuḥsaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yaduvaṃśavarṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
yadorāsanpañca putrā jyeṣṭhasteṣu sahasrajit ।nīlāñjako radhuḥ kroṣṭuḥ śatajicca sahasrajit ।।śatajiddhaihayo reṇuhayo haya iti trayaḥ ।dharmanetro haihayasya dharmanetrasya saṃhanaḥ ।।mahimā saṃhanasyāsīnmahimnao bhadrasenakaḥ ।bhadrasenād durgamo abhūddurgamātkanako abhavat ।।kanakāt kṛtavīryastu kṛtāgniḥ karavīrakaḥ ।kṛtaujāś ca caturtho abhūt kṛtavīryāttu so arjunaḥ ।।datto arjunāya tapate saptadvīpamahīśatām ।dadau bāhusahasrañca ajeyatvaṃ raṇe ariṇā ।।

adharme vartamānasya viṣṇuhastānmṛtirdhruvā ।daśa yajñasahasrāṇi so arjunaḥ kṛtavānnṛpāḥ ।।anaṣṭadravyatā rāṣṭre tasya saṃsmaraṇādabhūt ।na nūnaṃ kārttavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti vai nṛpaḥ ।।yajñair dānaistapobhiś ca vikrameṇa śrutena ca ।kartavīryasya ca śataṃ putrāṇāṃ pañca vai parāḥ ।।sūrasenaś ca sūraś ca dhṛṣṭoktaḥ kṛṣṇa eva ca ।jayadhvajaś ca nāmāsīdāvantyo nṛpatirmahān ।।jayadhvajāttālajaṅghastālajaṅghāttataḥ sutāḥ ।haihayānāṃ kulāḥ pañca bhojāścāvantayas tathā ।।vītihotrāḥ svayaṃ jātāḥ śauṇḍikeyāstathaiva ca ।vītihotrādananto abhudanantāddurjayo nṛpaḥ ।।kroṣṭorvaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmi yatra jāto hariḥ svayam ।kroṣṭostu vṛjinīvāṃś ca svāhābhūdvṛjinīvataḥ ।।svāhāputrao ruṣadguś ca tasya citrarathaḥ sutaḥ ।śaśavinduścitrarathāccakravartī harau rataḥ ।।śaśavindoś ca puttrāṇāṃ śatānāmabhavacchatam ।dhīmatāṃ cārurūpāṇāṃ bhūridraviṇatejasām ।।pṛthuśravāḥ pradhāno abhūttasya putraḥ suyajñakaḥ ।suyajñasyośanāḥ putrastitikṣuruśanaḥsutaḥ ।।titikṣostu marutto abhūttasmātkambalavarhiṣaḥ ।pañcāśadrukmakavacādrukmeṣuḥ pṛthurukmakaḥ ।।

viṣāṃśuśceti ja
havirjyāmaghaḥ pāpaghno jyāmaghaḥ strījito abhavat ।sevyāyāṃ jyāmaghādāsīdvidarbhastasya kauśikaḥ ।।lomapādaḥ krathaḥ śreṣṭhāt kṛtiḥ syāllomapadataḥ ।kauśikasya cidiḥ putrastasmāccaidyā nṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।krathādvidarbhaputrāś ca kuntiḥ kuntestu dhṛṣṭakaḥ ।dhṛṣṭasya nidhṛtistasya udarkākhyo vidūrathaḥ ।।daśārhaputro vyomastu vyomājjīmūta ucyate ।jīmūtaputro vikalastasya bhīmarathaḥ sutaḥ ।।bhīmarathānnavarathastato dṛḍharatho abhavat ।śakuntiś ca dṛḍharathāt śakunteś ca karambhakaḥ ।।karambhāddevalāto abhūt devakṣetraś ca tatsutaḥ ।devakṣetrānmadhurnāma madhordravaraso abhavat ।।dravarasāt puruhūto abhūjjanturāsīttu tatsutaḥ ।guṇī tu yādavo rājā jantuputrastu sāttvataḥ ।।sāttvatādbhajamānastu vṛṣṇirandhaka eva ca ।devāvṛdhaś ca catvārasteṣāṃ vaṃśāstu viśrutāḥ ।।bhajamānasya vāhyo abhūdvṛṣṭiḥ kṛmirnimis tathā ।devāvṛdhādvabhrurāsīttasya śloko atra gīyate ।।yathaiva śṛṇumo dūrāt guṇāṃstadvatsamantikāt ।vabhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devair devāvṛdhaḥsamaḥ ।।catvāraś ca sutā vabhrorvāsudevaparā nṛpāḥ ।

dhṛtiriti ña

devarāto abhuditi kha, ga, gha, ja, ña, ṭa, ca

vistṛtā iti ka, cha, ca
kuhuro bhajamānastu śiniḥ kambalavarhiṣaḥ ।।kuhurasya suto dhṛṣṇudhṛṣṇostu tanayo dhṛtiḥ ।dhṛteḥ kapotaromābhūttasya putrastu tittiriḥ ।।tittirestu naraḥ putrastasya candanadundubhiḥ ।punarvasustasya putra āhukaścāhukīsutaḥ ।।āhukāddevako jajñe ugrasenastato abhavat ।devavānupadevaś ca devakasya sutāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।teṣāṃ svasāraḥ saptāsan vasudevāya tā dadau ।devakī śrutadevī ca mitradevī yathodharā ।।śrīdevī satyadevī ca surāpī ceti saptamī ।navograsenasya sutāḥ kaṃsasteṣāñca pūrvajaḥ ।।nyagrodhaś ca sunāmā ca kaṅkaḥ śaṅkuś ca bhūmipaḥ ।sutanūrāṣṭrapālaś ca yuddhamuṣṭiḥ sumuṣṭikaḥ ।।bhajamānasya putro atha rathamukhyo vidūrathaḥ ।rājādhidevaḥ śūraś ca vidūrathasuto abhavat ।।rājādhidevaputrau dvau śoṇāś caḥ śvetavāhanaḥ ।śoṇāśvasya sutāḥ pañca śamī śatrujidādayaḥ ।।śamīputraḥ pratikṣetraḥ pratikṣetrasya bhojakaḥ ।bhojasya hṛdikaḥ putro hy adikasya daśātmajāḥ ।।kṛtavarmā śatadhanvā devārho bhīṣaṇādayaḥ ।

kukuro bhajamānastviti ka । sundaro bhajamānastviti ja

kukurasyeti ka

śakrajidādaya iti kha
devārhāt kambalavarhirasamaujāstato abhavat ।।sudaṃṣṭraś ca suvāsaś ca dhṛṣṭo abhūdasamaujasaḥ ।gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca dhṛṣṭabhārye babhūvatuḥ ।।sumitro abhūcca gāndhāryāṃ mādrī jajñe yudhājitam ।anamitraḥ śinirdhṛṣṭāttato vai devamīḍhuṣaḥ ।।anamitrasuto nighno nighnasyāpi prasenakaḥ ।satrājitaḥ praseno atha maṇiṃ sūryātsyamantakam ।।prāpyāraṇye carantantu siṃho hatvāgrahīnmaṇiṃ ।hato jāmbavatā siṃho jāmbavān hariṇā jitaḥ ।।tasmānmaṇiṃ jāmbavatīṃ prāpyāgāddārakāṃ purīm ।satrājitāya pradadau śatadhanvā jaghāna tam ।।hatvā śatadhanuṃ kṛṣṇo maṇimādāya kīrtibhāk ।balayādavamukhyāgre akrūrānmaṇimarpayet ।।mithyābhiśastiṃ kṛṣṇasya tyaktvā svargī ca sampaṭhan ।satrājito bhaṅgakāraḥ satyabhāmā hareḥ priyā ।।anamitrācchinirjajñe satyakastu śineḥ sutaḥ ।satyakātsātyakirjajñe yuyudhānāddhunirhyabhūt ।।dhuneryugandharaḥ putraḥ svāhyo abhut sa yudhājitaḥ ।ṛṣabhakṣetrakau tasya hy ṛṣabhācca svaphalkakaḥ ।।svaphalkaputro hy akrūro akūrācca sudhanvakaḥ ।śūrāttu vasudevādyāḥ pṛthā pāṇḍoḥ priyābhavat ।।

sudhājitamiti kha, cha ca

svāndhobhūditi kha, cha ca । sākṣo abhūditi ja
dharmādyudhiṣṭhiraḥ pāṇḍorvāyoḥ kuntyāṃ vṛkodaraḥ ।indrāddhanañjayo mādryāṃ nakulaḥ sahadevakaḥ ।।vasudevācca rohiṇyāṃ rāmaḥ sāraṇadurgamau ।vasudevācca devakyāmādau jātaḥ susenakaḥ ।।kīrtimān bhadrasenaś ca jārukhyo viṣṇudāsakaḥ ।bhadradehaḥ kaṃśa etān ṣaḍgarbhānnijaghāna ha ।।tato balastataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ subhadrā bhadrabhāṣiṇī ।cārudeṣṇaś ca śāmbādyāḥ kṛṣṇājjāmbavatīsutāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yaduvaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥsaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcasaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dvādaśasaṅgrāmāḥ

agnir uvāca
kaśyapo vasudevo abhūddevakī cāditirvarā ।devakyāṃ vasudevāttu kṛṣṇo abhūttapasānvitaḥ ।।dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārthāya hy adharmaharaṇāya ca ।surādeḥ pālanārthañca daityādermathanāya ca ।।rukmaṇī satyabhāmā ca satyā nagnajitī priyā ।satyabhāmā hareḥ sevyā gāndhārī lakṣmaṇā tathā ।।mitravindā ca kālindī devī jāmbavatī tathā ।suśīlā ca tathā mādrī kauśalyā vijayā jayā ।।

citravindeti kha, cha ca
evamādīni devīnāṃ sahasrāṇi tu ṣoḍaśa ।pradyumnādyāś ca rukmiṇyāṃ bhīmādyāḥ satyabhāmayā ।।jāmbavatyāñca śāmbādyāḥ kṛṣṇasyāsaṃs tathāpare ।śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ tasya dhīmataḥ ।।aśītiś ca sahasrāṇi yādavāḥ kṛṣṇarakṣitāḥ ।pradyumnasya tu vaidarbhyāmaniruddho raṇapriyaḥ ।।aniruddhasya vajrādyā yādavāḥ sumahābalāḥ ।tisraḥ koṭyo yādavānāṃ ṣaṣṭirlakṣāṇi dānavāḥ ।।manuṣye bādhakā ye tu tannāśāya babhūva saḥ ।kartuṃ karmavyavasthānaṃ manuṣyo jāyate hariḥ ।।devāsurāṇāṃ saṅgrāmā dāyārthaṃ dvādaśābhavan ।prathamo nārasiṃhastu dvitīyo vāmano raṇaḥ ।।saṅgrāmastvatha vārāhaś caturtho amṛtamanthanaḥ ।tārakāmayasaṅgrāmaḥ ṣaṣṭho hy ājīvako raṇaḥ ।।traipuraścāndhakabadho navamo vṛtraghātakaḥ ।jito hālāhalaścātha ghoraḥ kolāhalo raṇaḥ ।।hiraṇyakaśipoścoro vidārya ca nakhaiḥ purā ।nārasiṃho devapālaḥ prahnādaṃ kṛtavān nṛpam ।।devāsure vāmanaś ca chalitvā balimūrjitam ।mahendrāya dadau rājyaṃ kāśyapo aditisambhavaḥ ।।varāhastu hiraṇyākṣaṃ hatvā devānapālayat ।ujjahāra bhuvaṃ devadevair abhiṣṭutaḥ ।।manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā tu vāsukim ।

surāsuraiś ca mathitaṃ devebhyaścāmṛtaṃ dadau ।।tārakāmayasaṅgrāme tadā devāś ca pālitāḥ ।nivāryendraṃ gurūn devān dānavānsomavaṃśakṛtam ।।viśvāmitravaśiṣṭhātrikavayaś ca raṇe surān ।apālayante nirvārya rāgadveṣādidānavān ।।pṛthvīrathe brahmayanturīśasya śaraṇo hariḥ ।dadāha tripuraṃ devapālako daityamardanaḥ ।।gaurīṃ jihīrṣuṇā rudramandhakenārditaṃ hariḥ ।anuraktaś ca revatyāṃ cakrecāndhāsurārdanam ।।apāṃ phenamayo bhūtvā devāsuraraṇe haran ।vṛtraṃ devaharaṃ viṣṇurdevadharmānapālayat ।।śālvādīn dānavān jitvā hariḥ paraśurāmakaḥ ।apālayat surādīṃś ca duṣṭakṣatraṃ nihatya ca ।।hālāhalaṃ viṣaṃ daityaṃ nirākṛtya maheśvarāt ।bhayaṃ nirṇāśayāmāsa devānāṃ madhusūdanaḥ ।।devāsure raṇe yaś ca daityaḥ kolāhalo jitaḥ ।pālitāś ca surāḥ sarve viṣṇunā dharmapālanāt ।।rājāno rājaputrāś ca munayo devatā hariḥ ।yaduktaṃ yacca naivoktamavatārā harerime ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dvādaśasaṅgrāmā nāma pañcasaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

surāsurair amanthābdhimiti ka, cha ca

devāsuraharo abhavaditi ka, gha, ña, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭsaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rājavaṃśavarṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
turvasoś ca suto vargo gobhānustasya cātmajaḥ ।gobhānorāsīt traiśānistraiśānestu karandhamaḥ ।।karandhamānmaruttobhūd duṣmantastasya cātmajaḥ ।duṣmantasya varūtho abhūdgāṇḍīrastu varūthataḥ ।।gāṇḍīrāccaiva gāndhāraḥ pañca jānapadāstataḥ ।gāndhārāḥ keralāścolāḥ pāṇḍyāḥ kolā mahābalāḥ ।।druhyastu vabhrusetuś ca babhrusetoḥ purovasuḥ ।tato gāndhārā gāndhārair dharmo dharmād ghṛto abhavat ।।ghṛtāttu viduṣastasmāt pracetāstasya vai śatam ।ānadraś ca sabhānaraścākṣuṣaḥ parameṣukaḥ ।।sabhānarāt kālānalaḥ kālānalajasrṛñjayaḥ ।purañjayaḥ sṛñjayasya tatputro janamejayaḥ ।।tatputrastu mahāśālastatputro abhunmahāmanāḥ ।tasmāduśīnaro brahmannṛgāyāntu nṛgastataḥ ।।narāyāntu naraścāsīt kṛmistu kṛmitaḥ sutaḥ ।

śobhānustasya cātmaja iti kha 

śobhānorāsīditi kha 

karṇā iti ja, ṭa ca 
daśāyāṃ subrato jajñe dṛśadvatyāṃ śivis tathā ।।śive putrāstu catvāraḥ pṛthudarbhaś ca vīrakaḥ ।kaikeyo bhadrakasteṣāṃ nāmrā janapadāḥ śubhāḥ ।।titikṣuruśīnarajastitikṣoś ca ruṣadrathaḥ ।ruṣadrathādabhūtpailaḥ pailācca sutapāḥ sutaḥ ।।mahāyogi balistasmādaṅgo vaṅgaś ca mukhyakaḥ ।puṇḍraḥ kaliṅgo bāleyo baliryogī balānvitaḥ ।।aṅgāddadhivāhano abhūt tasmāddiviratho nṛpaḥ ।divirathāddharmarathastasya citrarathaḥ sutaḥ ।।citrarathātsatyaratho lomapadaś ca tatsutaḥ ।lomapādāccaturaṅgaḥ pṛthulākṣaś ca tatsutaḥ ।।pṛthulākṣācca campo abhūccampāddharyaṅgako abhavat ।haryaṅgācca bhadraratho bṛhatkarmā ca tatsutaḥ ।।tasmādabhūdvṝhadbhānurvṛhadbhānorbṛhātmavān ।tasmājjayadratho hy āsījjayadrathādvṛhadrathaḥ ।।vṛhadrathādviśvajicca karṇo viśvajito abhavat ।karṇasya vṛṣasenastu pṛthusenastadātmajaḥ ।eto aṅgavaṃśajā bhūpāḥ pūrorvaṃśaṃ vibodha me ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rājavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dadhivāmanobhūditi kha, cha, ña, ca

chapter 

ś atha saptasapratyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

puruvaṃśavarṇanaṃ

agnir uvāca
purorjanamejayo abhūtprācīnnantastu tatsutaḥ ।prācīnnantānmanastyustu tasmādvītamayo nṛpaḥ ।।śundhurvītamayāccābhūcchundhorbahuvidhaḥ sutaḥ ।bahuvidhācca saṃyātirahovādī ca tatsutaḥ ।।tasya putro atha bhadrāśoa bhadrāśvasya daśātmajāḥ ।ṛceyuś ca kṛṣeyuś ca sannateyus tathātmajaḥ ।।ghṛteyuś ca citeyuś ca sthaṇḍileyuś ca sattamaḥ ।dharmeyuḥ sannateyuś ca kṛceyurmatinārakaḥ ।।taṃsuroghaḥ pratirathaḥ purasto matinārajāḥ ।āsītpatirathātkaṇvaḥ kaṇvānmedhātithistvabhūt ।।taṃsuroghācca catvāro duṣmanto atha pravīrakaḥ ।sumantaścānayo vīro duṣmantādbharato abhavat ।।śakuntalāyāntu balī yasya nāmnā tu bhāratāḥ ।suteṣu mātṛkopena naṣṭeṣu bharatasya ca ।।tato marudbhirānīya putraḥ sa tu vṛhaspateḥ ।saṃkrāmito bharadvājaḥ kratubhirvitatho abhavat ।।sa cāpi vitathaḥ putrān janayāmāsa pañca vai ।

śagbhurvītamayāścābhūcchambhorbahuvidha iti kha, ja, ca
suhotrañca suhotāraṅgayaṅgarbhantathaiva ca ।।kapilaś ca mahātmānaṃ suketuñca sutadvayam ।kauśikañca gṛtsapatiṃ tathā gṛtsapateḥ sutāḥ ।।brahmāṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ kāśe dīrghatamāḥ sutāḥ ।tato dhanvantariścāsīttatsuto abhūcca ketumān ।।ketumato hemaratho divodāsa itiśrutaḥ ।pratardano divodāsādbhargavatsau pratardanāt ।।vatsādanarka āsīcca anarkāt kṣemako abhavat ।kṣemakadvarṣaketuś ca varṣaketorvibhuḥ smṛtaḥ ।।vibhorānartaḥ putro abhūdvibhoś ca sukumārakaḥ ।sukumārātsatyaketurvatsabhūmistu vatsakāt ।।suhotrasya vṛhatputro vṛhatastanayāstrayaḥ ।ajamīḍho dvimīḍhaś ca purumīḍhaś ca vīryavān ।।ajamīḍhasya keśinyāṃ jajñe jahnuḥ pratāpavān ।jahnorabhūdajakāśvo balākāśvastadātmajaḥ ।।valākāśvasya kuśikaḥ kuśikāt gādhirindrakaḥ ।gādheḥ satyavatī kanyā viśvāmitraḥ sūtottamaḥ ।।devarātaḥ katimukhā viśvāmitrasya te sutāḥ ।śunaḥśepho aṣṭakaścānyo hy ajamīḍhāt suto abhavat ।।nīlinyāṃ śāntiraparaḥ purujātiḥ suśāntitaḥ ।

kāśadīrghatamā iti ja

suta iti kha, cha, ja, ca

prabhāvavāniti kha
purujātestu vāhyāśvo vāhyāścvāt pañca pārthivāḥ ।।mukulaḥ sṛñjayaś caiva rājā vṛhadiṣus tathā ।yavīnaraś ca kṛmilaḥ pāñcālā iti viśrutāḥ ।।mukulasya tu maukulyāḥ kṣetropetā dvijātayaḥ ।cañcāśvo mukulājjajñe cañcāśvānmithunaṃ hy abhut ।।divodāso hy ahalyā ca ahalyāyāṃ śaradvatāt ।śatānandaḥ śatānandāt satyadhṛnmithunantataḥ ।।kṛpaḥ kṛpī kivodāsānmaitreyaḥ somapastataḥ ।sṛñjayāt pañcadhanuṣaḥ somadattaś ca tatsutaḥ ।।sahadevaḥ somadattāt sahadevāttu somakaḥ ।āsīcca somakājjanturjantoś ca pṛṣataḥ sutaḥ ।।pṛṣatāddrupadastasmāddhṛṣṭadyumno atha tatsutaḥ ।dhṛṣṭhaketuś ca dhūminyāmṛkṣo abhūdajamīḍhataḥ ।।ṛkṣātsamvaraṇo jajñe kuruḥ samvaraṇāttataḥ ।yaḥ prayāgādapākramya kurukṣetrañcakāra ha ।।kuroḥ sudhanvā sudhanuḥ parikṣiccārimejayaḥ ।sudhanvanaḥ suhotro abhūt suhotrāccyavano hy abhūt ।।vaśiṣṭhaparicārābhyāṃ saptāsan girikāsutāḥ ।vṛhadrathaḥ kuśo vīro yaduḥ pratyagraho balaḥ ।।matsyakālī kuśāgro ato hy āsīdrājño vṛhadrathāt ।kuśāgrādvṛṣabho jajñe tasya satyahitaḥ sutaḥ ।।sudhanvā tatsutaścorja ūrjādāsīcca sambhavaḥ ।

yavīnacaśceti kha, cha, ña, ca
sambhavācca jarāsandhaḥ sahadevaś ca tatsutaḥ ।।sahadevādudāpiś ca udāpeḥ śrutakarmakaḥ ।parikṣitasya dāyādo dhārmiko janamejayaḥ ।।janamejayāttrasadasyurjahnostu surathaḥ sutaḥ ।śrutasenograsenau ca bhīmasenaś ca nāmataḥ ।।janamejayasya putrau tu suratho mahimāṃs tathā ।surathādvidūratho abhūdṛkṣa āsīdvidūrathāt ।।ṛkṣasya tu dvitīyasya bhīmaseno abhavatsutaḥ ।pratīpo bhīmasenāttu pratīpasya tu śāntanuḥ ।।devāpirvāhlikaś caiva somadattastu śāntanoḥ ।vāhlikātsomadatto abhudbhūrirbhūrisravāḥ śalaḥ ।।gaṅgāyāṃ śāntanorbhīṣmaḥ kālyāyāṃ vicitravīryakaḥ ।kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaś caiva kṣetre vaicitravīryake ।।dhṛtaraṣṭrañca pāṇḍuñca vidurañcāpyajījanat ।pāṇḍoryudhiṣṭhiraḥ kuntyāṃ bhīmaś caivārjunastrayaḥ ।।nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca pāṇḍormādyrāñca daivataḥ ।arjunasya ca saubhadraḥ parikṣidabhimanyutaḥ ।।draupadī pāṇḍavānāñca priyā tasyāṃ yudhiṣṭhirāt ।prativindhyo bhīmasenācchrutakīrtirdhanañjayāt ।।sahadevācchrutakarmā śatānīkastu nākuliḥ ।bhīmasenāddhiḍimbāyāmanya āsīd ghaṭītkacaḥ ।।ete bhūtā bhaviṣyāś ca nṛpāḥ saṃkhyā na vidyate ।

atra pāṭhaḥ patitaḥ dhanañjayāt ka utpanna iti viśeṣāprāpteḥ
gatāḥ kālena kālo hi haristaṃ pūjayeddvija ।।homamagnausamuddiśya kuru sarvapradaṃ yataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe puruvaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma saptasaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭasaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

siddhauṣadhāni

agnir uvāca
āyurvedaṃ pravakṣyāmi suśrutāya yamabravīt ।devo dhanvantariḥ sāraṃ mṛtasañjīvanīkaraṃ ।।
suśruta uvāca
āyurvedaṃ mama brūhi narāśvebharugardanam ।siddhayogānsiddhamantrānmṛtasañjīvanīkarān ।।
dhanvantarir uvāca
rakṣan balaṃ hi jvaritaṃ laṅghitaṃ bhojayedbhiṣak ।saviśvaṃ lājamaṇḍantu tṛḍjvarāntaṃ śṛtaṃ jalam ।।mustaparpaṭakośīracandanodīcyanāgaraiḥ ।ṣaḍahe ca vyatikrānte tittakaṃ pāyayeddhruvaṃ ।।snehayettaktadoṣantu tatastañca virecayet ।jīrṇāḥ ṣaṣṭikanīvāraraktaśālipramodakāḥ ।।tadvidhāste jvareṣviṣṭā yavānāṃ vikṛtis tathā ।mudgā masūrāś ca ṇakāḥ kulatthāś ca sakuṣṭhakāḥ ।।

pakvadoṣantviti ña
āṭakyo nārakādyāś ca karkoṭakakatolvakam ।paṭolaṃ saphalaṃ nimbaṃ parpaṭaṃ dāḍimaṃ jvare ।।adhoge vamanaṃ śastamūrdhvage ca virecanam ।raktapitte tathā pānaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ śuṇṭhivarjitam ।।śaktugodhūmalājāś ca yavaśālimasūrakāḥ ।sakuṣṭhacaṇakā mudgā bhakṣyā godhūmakā hitāḥ ।।sādhitā ghṛtadugdhābhyāṃ kṣaudraṃ vṛṣaraso madhu ।atīsāre purāṇānāṃ śālīnāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ hitaṃ ।।anabhiṣyandi yaccānnaṃ lodhravalkalasaṃyutam ।mārutaṃ varjayed yatnaḥ kāryo gulmeṣu sarvathā ।।vāṭyaṃ kṣīreṇa cāśnīyādvāstūkaṃ ghṛtasādhitaṃ ।godhūmaśālayastiktā hitā jaṭhariṇāmatha ।।godhūmaśālayo mudgā brahmarkṣakhadiro abhayā ।pañcakolañjāṅgalāś ca nimbadhātryaḥ paṭolakāḥ ।।mātulaṅgarasājātiśuṣkamūlakasaindhavāḥ ।kuṣṭhināñca tathā śastaṃ pānārthe khadirodakaṃ ।।masūrasudgau peyārthe bhojyā jirṇāś ca śālayaḥ ।nimbaparpaṭakaiḥ śākair jāṅgalānāṃ tathā rasaḥ ।।viḍaṅgaṃ maricaṃ mustaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ lodhraṃ suvarcikā ।manaḥśilā ca vāleyaḥ kuṣṭhahā mūtrapeṣitaḥ ।।apūpakuṣṭhakulmāṣayavādyā mehināṃ hitāḥ ।yavānnavikṛtirmudgā kulatthā jīrṇaśālayaḥ ।।tiktarukṣāṇi śākāni tiktāni haritāni ca ।

tailāni tilaśigrukavibhītakeṅgudāni ca ।।mudgāḥ sayavagodhūmā dhānyaṃ varṣasthatañca yat ।jāṅgalasya rasaḥ śasto bhojane rājayakṣmiṇāṃ ।।kaulatthamaudgako rāsnāśuṣkamūlakajāṅgalaiḥ ।pūpair vā viskaraiḥ siddhair dadhidāḍimasādhitaiḥ ।।mātulaṅgarasakṣaudradrākṣāvyoṣādisaṃskṛtaiḥ ।yavagodhūmaśālyannair bhojayecchvāsakāsinaṃ ।।daṣamūlavalārāsnākulatthair upasādhitāḥ ।peyāḥ pūparasāḥ kvāthāḥ śvāsahikkānivāraṇāḥ ।।śuṣkamūlakakaulatthamūlajāṅgalajairasaiḥ ।yavagodhūmaśālyannaṃ jīrṇam sośīramācaret ।।sothavān saguḍāṃ pathyāṃ khādedvā guḍanāgaram ।takrañca citrakañcobhau grahaṇīroganāśanau ।।purāṇayavagodhūmaśālayo jaṅgalo rasaḥ ।mudgāmalakakharjūramṛdvīkāvadarāṇi ca ।।madhu sarpiḥ payaḥ śakraṃ nimbaparpaṭakau vṛṣam ।takrāriṣṭāś ca śasyante satataṃ vātarogiṇām ।।hṛdrogiṇo virecyāstu pippalyo hikkināṃ hitāḥ ।takrāvalālasindhūni muktāni śiśirāmbhasā ।।muktāḥ sauvarcalājādi madyaṃ śastaṃ madātyaye ।sakṣaudrapayasā lākṣāṃ pivecca kṣatavānnaraḥ ।।

bhadrāviṣṭāśceti kha

sadāmaye iti ña । damātyaye iti ṭa
kṣayaṃ māṃsarasāhāro vahnisaṃrakṣaṇājjayet ।śālayo bhojane raktā nīvārakalamādayaḥ ।।yavānnavikṛtirmāsaṃ śākaṃ sauvarcalaṃ śaṭī ।pathyā tathaivārśasāṃ yanmaṇḍaṃ takrañca vāriṇā ।।mustābhyāsas tathā lepaścitrakeṇa haridrayā ।yavānnavikṛtiḥ śālirvāstūkaṃ sasuvarcalam ।।trapuṣarvārugodhūmāḥ kṣīrekṣughṛtasaṃyutāḥ ।mūtrakṛcchre ca śastāḥ syuḥ pāne maṇḍasurādayaḥ ।।lājāḥ śaktus tathā kṣaudraṃ śūnyaṃ māṃsaṃ parūṣakam ।vārtākulāvaśikhinaśchardighnāḥ pānakāni ca ।।śālyannantoyapayasī kevaloṣṇe śṛte api vā ।tṛṣṇāghne mustaguḍayorguṭikā vā mukhe dhṛtā ।।yavānnavikṛtiḥ pūpaṃ śuṣkamūlakajantathā ।śākaṃ paṭolavetrāgramurustambhavināśanam ।।mudgāḍhakamasūrāṇāṃ satilair jāṅgalairasaiḥ ।sasaindhavaghṛtadrākṣāśuṇṭhyāmalakakolajaiḥ ।।yūṣaiḥ purāṇagodhūmayavaśālyannamabhyaset ।visarpī sasitākṣaudramṛdvīkādāḍimodakam ।।raktayaṣṭikagodhūmayavamudgādikaṃ laghu ।kākamārī ca vetrāgraṃ vāstukañca suvarcalā ।।vātaśoṇitanāśāya toyaṃ śastaṃ sitaṃ madhu ।

pathyā tathaiva kāśasya maṇḍaṃ takrañca vāruṇamiti kha, ña, ca

yūṣamiti kha, ja ca
nāśārogeśu ca hitaṃ ghṛtaṃ durvāprasādhitam ।।bhṛṅgarājarase siddhaṃ tailaṃ dhātrīrase api vā ।naśyaṃ sarvāmayeṣviṣṭaṃ mūrdhajantūdbhaveṣu ca ।।śītatoyānnapānañca tilānāṃ vipra bhakṣaṇam ।dvijadārḍhyakaraṃ proktaṃ tathā tuṣṭikaramparam ।।gaṇḍūṣaṃ tilatailena dvijadārḍhyakaraṃ paraṃ ।viḍaṅgacūrṇaṃ gomūtraṃ sarvatra kṛmināśane ।।dhātrīphalānyathājyañca śirolepanamuttamam ।śirorogavināśāya snigdhamuṣṇañca bhojanam ।।tailaṃ vā vastamūtrañca karṇapūraṇamuttamam ।karṇaśūlavināśāya sarvaśuktāni vā dvija ।।girimṛccandanaṃ lākṣā mālatī kalikā tathā ।saṃyojyā yā kṛtā vartiḥ kṣataśukraharī tu sā ।।vyoṣaṃ triphalayā yuktaṃ tucchakañca tathā jalam ।sarvākṣirogaśamanaṃ tathā caiva rasāñjanaṃ ।।ājyabhṛṣṭaṃ śilāpiṣṭaṃ lodhrakāñjikasaindhavaiḥ ।āścyotanāvināśāya sarvanetrāmaye hitam ।।girimṛccandanair lepo vahirnetrasya śasyate ।netrāmayavighātārthaṃ triphalāṃ śīlayet sadā ।।rātrau tu madhusarpirbhyāṃ dīrghamāyurjijīviṣuḥ ।śatāvarīrase siddhau vṛṣyau kṣīraghṛtau smṛtau ।।kalambikāni māṣāś ca vṛṣyau kṣīraghṛtau tathā ।

sarvaśuklānnīti kha
āyuṣyā triphalā jñeyā pūrvavanmadhukānvitā ।।madhukādirasopetā balīpalitanāśinī ।vacāsiddhaghṛtaṃ vipra bhūtadoṣavināśanam ।।kavyaṃ buddhipradañcaiva tathā sarvārthasādhanam ।valākalkakaṣāyeṇa siddhamabhyañjane hitam ।।rāsnāsahacarair vāpi tailaṃ vātavikāriṇām ।anabhiṣyandi yaccānnaṃ tadbraṇeṣu praśasyate ।।śaktupiṇḍī tathaivāmlā pācanāya praśasyate ।pakvasya ca tathā bhede nimbacūrṇañca ropaṇe ।।tathā śūcyupacāraś ca balikarma viśeṣataḥ ।sūtikā ca tathā rakṣā prāṇināntu sadā hitā ।।bhakṣaṇaṃ nimbapatrāṇāṃ sarpadaṣṭasya bheṣajam ।tālanimbadalaṅkeśyaṃ jīrṇantailaṃ yavāghṛtam ।।dhūpo vṛścikadaṣṭasya śikhipatraghṛtena vā ।arkakṣīreṇa saṃpiṣṭaṃ lopā vījaṃ palāśajaṃ ।।vṛścikārtasya kṛṣṇā vā śivā ca phalasaṃyutā ।arkakṣīraṃ tilaṃ tailaṃ palalañca guḍaṃ samam ।।pānājjayati durvāraṃ śvaviṣaṃ śīghrameva tu ।pītvā mūlaṃ trivṛttulyaṃ taṇḍulīyasya sarpiṣā ।।sarpakīṭaviṣāṇyāśu jayatyatibalānyapi ।candanaṃ padmakaṅkuṣṭhaṃ latāmbūśīrapāṭalāḥ ।।

kanṭhyaṃ vṛddhipradañcaiveti kha

pratyupacāraiśceti kha

kalasaṃyuteti ka
nirguṇḍī śārivā selurlūtāviṣaharo gadaḥ ।śirovirecanaṃ śastaṃ guḍanāgarakaṃ dvija ।।snehapāne tathā vastau tailaṃ dhṛtamanuttamam ।svedanīyaḥ paro vahniḥ śītāmbhaḥstambhanaṃ param ।।trivṛddhi recane śreṣṭhā vamane madanaṃ tathā ।vastirvireko vamanaṃ tailaṃ sarpis tathā madhu ।vātapittabalāśānāṃ krameṇa paramauṣadhaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe siddhauṣadhāni nāmāṣṭsaptatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athaikonāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sarvarogaharāṇyauṣadhāni

dhanvantarir uvāca
śārīramānamāgantusahajā vyādhayo matāḥ ।śārīrā jvarakuṣṭhādyā krodhādyā mānasā matāḥ ।।āgantavo vighātotthā sahajāḥ kṣujjarādayaḥ ।śārīrāgantunāśāya sūryavāre ghṛtaṃ guḍam ।।lavaṇaṃ sahiraṇyañca viprāyāpūpamarpayet ।candre cābhyaṅgado vipre sarvarogaiḥ pramucyate ।।tailaṃ śanaiś care dadyādāśvine gorasānnadaḥ ।ghṛtena payasā liṅgaṃ saṃsnāpya syādrugujjhitaḥ ।।

gāyatryā hāvayedvahnau dūrvāntrimadhurāplutām ।yasmin bhe vyādhimāpnoti tasmin snānaṃ baliḥ śubhe ।।mānasānāṃ rujādīnāṃ viṣṇoḥ stotraṃ haraṃ bhavet ।vātapittakaphā doṣā dhātavaś ca tathā śṛṇu ।।bhuktaṃ pakvāśayādannaṃ dvidhā yāti ca suśruta ।aṃśenaikena kiṭṭadvaṃ rasatāñcāpareṇa ca ।।kiṭṭabhāgo malastatra vinmūtrasvedadūṣikāḥ ।nāsāmalaṅkarṇamalaṃ tathā dehamalañca yat ।।rasabhāgādrasastatra samācchoṇitatāṃ vrajet ।māṃsaṃ raktattito medo medaso asthnaś ca sambhavaḥ ।।asthno majjā tataḥ śukraṃ śukādrāgastathaujasaḥ ।deśamārtiṃ balaṃ śaktiṃ kālaṃ prakṛtimeva ca ।।jñātvā cikitsataṃ kuryādbheṣajasya tathā balam ।tithiṃ riktāntyajed bhaumaṃ mandabhandāruṇograkam ।।harigodvijacandrārkasurādīn pratipūjya ca ।śṛṇu mantramimaṃ vidvan bheṣajārambhamācaret ।।brahmadakṣāśvirudrendrabhūcandrārkānilānalāḥ ।ṛṣayaś cauṣadhigrāmā bhūtasaṅghāś ca pāntu te ।।rasāyanamivarṣīṇāṃ devānāmamṛtaṃ yathā ।sudhevottamanāgānāṃ bhaiṣajyamidamastu te ।।vātaśleṣmātako deśo bahuvṛkṣo bahūdakaḥ ।anūpaḍtibikhyāto jāṅgalastadvivarjitaḥ ।।kiñcidvṛkṣodako deśas tathā sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।

jāṅgalaḥ pittabahulo madhyaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।rūkṣmaḥ śītaś calo vāyuḥ pittamuṣṇaṃ kaṭutrayam ।sthirāmlasnigdhamadhuraṃ balāśañca pracakṣate ।।vṛddhiḥ samānair eteṣāṃ viparītair viparyayaḥ ।rasāḥ svādvamlalavaṇāḥ śleṣmalā vāyunāśanāḥ ।।kaṭutiktakaṣāyāś ca vātalāḥ śleṣmanāśanāḥ ।kaṭvamlalavaṇā jñeyās tathā pittavivardhanāḥ ।।tiktasvādukaṣāyāś ca tathā pittavināśanāḥ ।rasasyaitadguṇaṃ nāsti vipākasyaitadiṣyate ।।vīryoṣṇāḥ kaphavātaghnāḥ śītāḥ pittavināśanāḥ ।prabhāvatas tathā karma te kurvanti ca suśruta ।।śiśire ca vasante ca nidāghe ca tathā kramāt ।cayaprakopapraśamāḥ kaphasya tu prakīrtitāḥ ।।nidāghavarṣārātrau ca tathā śaradi suśruta ।cayaprakopapraśamāḥ pavanasya prakīrtitāḥ ।।meghakāle ca śaradi hemante ca yathākramāt ।cayaprakopapraśamās tathā pittasya kīrtitāḥ ।।varṣādyo visargastu hemantādyās tathā trayaḥ ।śiśirādyās tathādānaṃ grīṣmāntā ṛtavastrayaḥ ।।saumyo visargastvādānamāgneyaṃ parikīrtitam ।varṣādīṃstrīnṛtūn somaś caran paryāyaśo rasān ।।janayatyamlalavaṇamadhurāṃstrīn yathākramam ।śiśirādīnṛtūnarkaś caran paryayaśo rasān ।।

vivardhayettathā tiktakaṣāyakaṭukān kramāt ।yathā rajanyo vardhante valamekaṃ hi vardhate ।।kramaśo atha manuṣyāṇāṃ hīyamānāsu hīyate ।rātribhuktadinānāñca vayasaś ca tathaiva ca ।।ādimadhyāvasāneṣu kaphapittasamīraṇāḥ ।prakopaṃ yānti kopādau kāle teṣāñcayaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।prakopottarake kāle śamasteṣāṃ prakīrtitaḥ ।adibhojanato vipra tathā cābhojanena ca ।।rogā hi sarve jāyante vegodīraṇadhāraṇaiḥ ।annena kukṣerdvāvaṃśāvekaṃ pānena pūrayet ।।āśrayaṃ pavanādīnāṃ tathaikamavaśeṣayet ।vyādher nidānasya tathā viparītamathauṣadham ।।kartavyametadevātra mayā sāraṃ prakīrtitam ।nābherūrdhvamadhaś caiva gudaśroṇyostathaiva ca ।।balāśapittavātānāṃ dehe sthānaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।tathāpi sarvagāś caite dehe vāyurviśeṣataḥ ।।dehasya madhye hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ tanmanasaḥ smṛtam ।kṛśo alpakeśaś capalo bahuvāgviṣamānalaḥ ।।vyomagaś ca tathā svapne vātaprakṛtirucyate ।akālapalitaḥ krodhī prasvedī madhurapriyaḥ ।।svapne ca dīptimatprekṣī pittaprakṛtirucyate ।dṛḍhāṅgaḥ sthiracittaś ca suprabhaḥ snigdhasūrdhajaḥ ।।śuddhāmbudarśī svapne ca kaphaprakṛtiko naraḥ ।

tāmasā rājasāś caiva sātvikāś ca tathā smṛtāḥ ।।manuṣyā munirśādūla vātapittakaphātmakāḥ ।raktapittaṃ vyavāyācca gurukarmapravartanaiḥ ।।kadannabhojanādvāyurdehe śokācca kupyati ।vidāhināṃ tatholkānāmuṣṇānnādhvanisevināṃ ।।pittaṃ prakopamāyāti bhayena ca tathā dvija ।atyambupānagurvannabhojināṃ bhuktaśāyinām ।।ślekeṣmāprakopamāyāti tathā ye cālasā janāḥ ।vātādyutthāni rogāṇi jñātvā śāmyāni lakṣaṇaiḥ ।।asthibhaṅgaḥ kaṣāyatvamāsye śuṣkāsyatā tathā ।jṛmbhaṇaṃ lomaharṣaś ca vātikavyādhilakṣaṇam ।।nakhanetraśirāṇāntu pītatvaṃ kaṭutā mukhe ।tṛṣṇā dāhoṣṇatā caiva pittavyādhinidarśanam ।।ālasyañca prasekaś ca gurutā madhurāsyatā ।uṣṇābhilāṣitā ceti ślaiṣmikavyādhilakṣaṇam ।।snigdhoṣṇamannamabhyaṅgastailapānādi vātanut ।ājyaṃ kṣīraṃ sitādyañca candraraśmyādi pittanut ।।sakṣaudraṃ triphalātailaṃ vyāyāmādi kaphāpaham ।sarvarogapraśāntyai syadviṣṇordhyānañca pūjanam ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sarvarogaharāṇyauṣadhāni nāmonāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tatholkānāmuṣmaṇāmadhvasevināmiti kha

chapter 

ś athāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

rasādilakṣaṇaṃ

dhanvantarir uvāca
rasādilakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye bheṣajānāṃ guṇaṃ śṛṇu ।rasavīryavipākajño nṛpādīnrakṣayennaraḥ ।।rasāḥ svādvamlalavaṇāḥ somajāḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।kaṭutiktakaṣāyāni tathāgneyā mahābhuja ।।tridhā vipāko dravyasya kaṭvamlalavaṇātmakaḥ ।dvidhā vīyya samuddiṣṭamuṣṇaṃ śītaṃ tathaiva ca ।।anirdeśyaprabhāvaś ca oṣadhīnāṃ dvijottama ।madhuraś ca kaṣāyaś ca tiktaś caiva tathā rasaḥ ।।śītavīryāḥ samuddiṣṭāḥ śeṣāstūṣṇāḥprakīrtitāḥ ।guḍucī tatra tiktapi bhavatyuṣṇātivīryataḥ ।।uṣṇā kaṣāyāpi tathā pathyā bhavati mānada ।madhuropi tathā māṃsa uṣṇa eva prakīrtitaḥ ।।lavaṇo madhraś caiva vipākamadhurau smṛtau ।amloṣṇaś ca tathā proktaḥ śeṣāḥ kaṭuvipākinaḥ ।।vīryapāke viparyaste prabhāvāttatra niś cayaḥ ।madhuro api kaṭuḥ pāke yacca kṣaudraṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।।kvāthayet ṣoḍaśaguṇaṃ viveddravyāccaturguṇam ।

yavakṣaudramiti kha
kalpanaiṣā kaṣāyasya yatra nokto vidhirbhavet ।।kaṣāyantu bhavettoyaṃ snehapāke caturguṇaṃ ।dravyatulyaṃ samuddhṛtya dravyaṃ snehaṃ kṣipedbudhaḥ ।।tāvatpramāṇaṃ dravyasya snehapādaṃ tataḥ kṣipet ।toyavarjantu yaddravyaṃ snehadravyaṃ tathā bhavet ।।saṃvartitauṣadhaḥ pākaḥ snehānāṃ parikīrtitaḥ ।tattulyatā tu lehyasya tathā bhavati suśruta ।।svacchamalpauṣadhaṃ kvāthaṃ kaṣāyañcoktavadbhavet ।akṣaṃ cūrṇasya nirdiṣṭaṃ kaṣāyasya catuṣpalaṃ ।।madhyamaiṣā smṛtā mātrā nāsti mātrāvikalpanā ।vayaḥ kālaṃ balaṃ vahniṃ deśaṃ dravyaṃ rujaṃ tathā ।।samavekṣya mahābhāga mātrāyāḥ kalpanā bhavet ।saumyāstatra rasāḥ prāyo vijñeyā dhātuvardhanāḥ ।।madhurāstu viśeṣeṇa vijñeyā dhātuvardhanāḥ ।doṣāṇāñcaiva dhātūnāṃ dravyaṃ samaguṇantu yat ।।tadeva vṛddhaye jñeyaṃ viparītaṃ kṣamāvaham ।upastambhatrayaṃ proktaṃ dehe asminmanujottama ।।āhāro maithunaṃ nidrā teṣu yatnaḥ sadā bhavet ।asevanāt sevanācca atyantaṃ nāśamāpnuyāt ।।kṣayasya bṛṃhaṇaṃ kāryaṃ sthuladehasya karṣaṇam ।rakṣaṇaṃ madhyakāyasya dehabhedāstrayo matāḥ ।।

snehapāke ca tadguṇamiti kha

tattulyatāpyasya tathā yathā bhavati suśruta iti kha
upakramadvayaṃ proktaṃ tarpaṇaṃ vāpyatarpaṇaṃ ।hitāśī ca mitāśī ca jīrṇāśī ca tathā bhavet ।।oṣadhīnāṃ pañcavidhā tathā bhavati kalpanā ।rasaḥ kalkaḥ śṛtaḥ śītaḥ phāṇḍaś ca manujottama ।।rasaś ca pīḍako jñeyaḥ kalka āloḍitād bhavet ।kvathitaś ca śṛto jñeyaḥ śītaḥ paryuṣito niśāṃ ।।sadyobhiśṛtapūtaṃ yat tat phāṇṭamabhidhīyate ।karaṇānāṃ śatañcaiva ṣaṣṭiś caivādhikā smṛtā ।।yo vetti sa hy ajeyaḥ sthātsambandhe vāhuśauṇḍikaḥ ।āhāraśuddhiragnyarthamagnimūlaṃ balaṃ nṛṇāṃ ।।sasindhutriphalāñcādyātsurājñi abhivarṇadāṃ ।jāṅgalañca rasaṃ sindhuyuktaṃ dadhi payaḥ kaṇāṃ ।।rasādhikaṃ samaṃ kuryānnaro vātādhiko api vā ।nidāghe mardanaṃ proktaṃ śiśire ca samaṃ bahu ।।vasante madhyamaṃ jñeyannidāghe mardanolvaṇaṃ ।tvacantu prathamaṃ mardyamaṅgañca tadanantaraṃ ।।snāyurudhiradeheṣu asthi bhātīva māṃsalaṃ ।skandhau bāhū tathaiveha tathā jaṅghe sajānunī ।।arivanmardayet prajño jatru vakṣaś ca pūrvavat ।aṅgasandhiṣu sarveṣu niṣpīḍya bahulaṃ tathā ।।prasārayedaṅgasandhīnna ca kṣepeṇa cākramāt ।nījīrṇe tu śramaṃ kuryānna bhuktvā pītavānnaraḥ ।।dinasya tu caturbhāga ūrdhvantu praharārdhake ।

vyāyāmaṃ naiva kartavyaṃ snāyācchītāmbunā sakṛt ।।vāryuṣṇañca śramaṃ jahyāddhṛdā śvāsanna dhārayet ।vyāyāmaś ca kaphaṃ hanyādvātaṃ hanyācca mardanaṃ ।।snānaṃ pittādhikaṃ hanyāttasyānte cātapāḥ priyāḥ ।ātapakleśakarmādau kṣemavyāyāmino narāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rasādilakṣaṇaṃ nāmāśītyadhikadvisatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vṛkṣāyurvedaḥ

dhanvantarir uvāca
vṛkṣāyurvedamākhyāsye plakṣaścottarataḥ śubhaḥ ।prāgvaṭo yāmyatastvāmra āpye aśvatthaḥ karmeṇa tu ।।dakṣiṇāṃ diśamutpannāḥ samīpe kaṇṭakadrumāḥ ।udyānaṃ gṛhavāse syāt tilān vāpyatha puṣpitān ।।gṛhṇīyādropayedvṛkṣān dvijañcandraṃ prapūjya ca ।dhruvāṇi pañca vāyavyaṃ hastaṃ prājeśavaiṣṇavaṃ ।।nakṣatrāṇi tathā mūlaṃ śasyante drumaropaṇe ।praveśayennadīvāhān puṣkariṇyāntu kārayet ।।

gṛhavāme iti ña

puṣkariṇyāntviti pāṭho na samyak pratibhāti
hastā maghā tathā maitramādyaṃ puṣyaṃ savāsavaṃ ।jalāśayasamārambhe vāruṇañcottarātrayam ।।saṃpūjya varuṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ parjanyaṃ tat samācaret ।ariṣṭāśokapunnāgaśirīṣāḥ sapriyaṅgavaḥ ।।aśokaḥ kadalī jambus tathā vakuladāḍimāḥ ।sāyaṃ prātastu gharmartau śītakāle dināntare ।।varṣāratrau bhuvaḥ śoṣe sektavyā ropitā drumāḥ ।uttamaṃ viṃśatirhastā madhyamaṃ ṣoḍaśāntaram ।।sthānāt sthānāntaraṃ kāryaṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ dvādaśāvaraṃ ।viphalāḥ syurghanā vṛkṣāḥ śastreṇādau hi śodhanam ।।viḍaṅgaghṛtapaṅkāktān secayecchītavāriṇā ।phalanāśe kulathaiś ca māsair mudgair yavaistilaiḥ ।।ghṛtaśītapayaḥsekaḥ phalapuṣpāya sarvadā ।āvikājaśakṛccūrṇam yavacūrṇaṃ tilāni ca ।।gomāṃsamudakañcaiva saptarātraṃ nidhāpayet ।utsekaḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ phalapuṣpādivṛddhidaḥ ।।matsyāmbhasā tu sekena vṛddhirbhavati śākhinaḥ ।viḍaṅgataṇḍulopetaṃ matsyaṃ māṃsaṃ hi dohadaṃ ।sarveṣāmaviśeṣeṇa vṛkṣāṇāṃ rogamardanam ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vṛkṣāyurvedo nāmaikāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvyaśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānārogaharāṇyauṣadhāni

dhanvantarir uvāca
siṃhī śaṭī niśāyugmaṃ vatsakaṃ kvāthasevanaṃ ।śiśoḥ sarvātisāreṣu stanyadoṣeṣu śasyate ।।śṛṅgīṃ sakṛṣṇātiviṣāṃ cūrṇitāṃ madhunā lihet ।ekā cātiviśā kāśacchardijvaraharī śiśoḥ ।।bālaiḥ sevyā vacā sājyā sadugdhā vātha tailayuk ।yaṣṭikāṃ śaṅkhapuṣpīṃ vā bālaḥ kṣīrānvitāṃ pivet ।।vāgrūpasampadyuktāyurmedhāśrīrvardhate śiśoḥ ।vacāhyagniśikhāvāsāśuṇṭhīkṛṣṇāniśāgadaṃ ।।sayaṣṭisaindhavaṃ bālaḥ prātarmedhākaraṃ pivet ।devadārumahāśigruphalatrayapayomucāṃ ।।kvāthaḥ sakṛṣṇā mṛdvīkā kalkaḥ sarvān kṛmīnharet ।triphalābhṛṅgaviśvānāṃ raseṣu madhusarpiṣoḥ ।।meṣīkṣīre ca gomūtre siktaṃ roge hitaṃ śiśoḥ ।nāsāraktaharo nasyāddurvārasa ihottamaḥ ।।laśunārdrakaśigrūṇāṃ rasaḥ karṇasya pūraṇam ।tailamārdrakajātyaṃ vā śūlahā cauṣṭharoganut ।।

siṃhī ṣaṣṭīti kha

śūlahā ity atra puṃstvanirdeśa ārṣaḥ

mūtrahā śoṣaroganuditi ña
jātīpatraṃ phalaṃ vyoṣaṃ kavalaṃ mūtrakaṃ niśā ।dugdhakvāthe abhayākalke siddhaṃ tailaṃ dvijārtinut ।।dhānyāmbu nārikelaṃ gomūtraṃ kramūkaviśvayuk ।kvāthitaṃ kabalaṃ kāryamadhijihvādhiśāntaye ।।sādhitaṃ lāṅgalīkalke tailaṃ nirguṇḍikārasaiḥ ।gaṇḍamālāgalagaṇḍau nāśayennasyakarmaṇā ।।pallavair arkapūtīkasnuhīrugghātajātikaiḥ ।udvartayet sagomūtraḥ sarvatvagdoṣanāśanaiḥ ।।vākucī satilā bhuktā vatsarāt kuṣṭhanāśanī ।pathyā bhallātakī tailaguḍapiṇḍī tu kuṣṭhajit ।।pūtīkavahnirajanī triphalāvyoṣacūrṇayuk ।takraṃ gudāṅkure peyaṃ bhakṣyā vā saguḍābhayā ।।phaladārvīviṣāṇāntu kvātho dhātrīraso athavā ।pātavyo rajanīkalkaḥ kṣaudrākṣaudrapramehiṇā ।।vāsāgarbho vyādhighātakvātha eraṇḍatailayuk ।vātaśoṇitahṛt pānāt pippalī syāt plīhāharī ।।sevyā jaṭhariṇā kṛṣṇā snukṣīravahubhāvitā ।payo vā racyadantyāgniviḍaṅgavyoṣakalkayuk ।।granthikogrābhayā kṛṣṇā viḍaṅgāktā ghṛte sthitā ।sāṃsantakraṃ grahaṇyarśaḥpāṇḍugulmakṛmīn haret ।।phalatrayāmṛtā vāsā tiktabhūnimbajas tathā ।kvāthaḥ samākṣiko hanyāt pāṇḍurogaṃ sakāmalaṃ ।।raktapittī pivedvāsāsurasaṃ sasitaṃ madhu ।

varīdrākṣābalāśuṇṭhīsādhitaṃ vā payaḥ pṛthak ।।varī vidārī pathyā balātrayaṃ savāsakaṃ ।śvadaṃṣṭrāmadhusarpirbhyāmālihet kṣayarogavān ।।pathyāśigrukarañjārkatvaksāraṃ madhusindhumat ।samūtraṃ vidradhiṃ hanti paripākāya tantrajit ।।trivṛtā jīvatī dantī mañjiṣṭhā śarvarīdvayaṃ ।tārkṣajaṃ nimbapatrañca lepaḥ śasto bhagandare ।।rugghātajanīlākṣācūrṇājakṣaudrasaṃyutā ।vāsovattirvraṇe yojyā śodhanī gatināśanī ।।śyāmāyaṣṭiniśālodhrapadmakotpalacandanaiḥ ।samarīcaiḥ śṛtaṃ tailaṃ kṣīre syādbraṇarohaṇaṃ ।।śrīkārpāsadalair bhasmaphalopalavaṇā niśā ।tatpiṇḍīsvedanaṃ tāmre satailaṃ syāt kṣatauṣadhaṃ ।।kumbhīsāraṃ payoyuktaṃ vahnidagdhaṃ vraṇe lipet ।tadeva nāśayetsekānnārikelarajoghṛtam ।।viṣvājamodasindhūtthaciñcātvagbhiḥ samābhayā ।takreṇoṣṇāmbunā vātha pītātīsāranāśanī ।।vatsakātiviṣāviśvavillamustaśṛtaṃ jalaṃ ।sāme purāṇe atīsāre sāmṛkśūle ca pāyayet ।।aṅgāradagdhaṃ sugataṃ sindhumuṣṇāmbunā pivet ।śūlavānatha vā taddhi sindhuhiṃgukaṇābhayā ।।kaṭurohotkaṇātaṅkalājacūrṇaṃ madhuplutaṃ ।

kaṭurohotpalātaṅkalājacūrṇamiti ṭa
vastracchidragataṃ vaktre nyastaṃ tṛṣṇāṃ vināśayet ।।pāṭhādārvījātidalaṃ drākṣāmūlaphalatrayaiḥ ।sādhitaṃ samadhu kvāthaṃ kavalaṃ mukhapāpahṛt ।।kṛṣṇātiviṣatiktendradārūpāṭhāpayomucāṃ ।kvātho mūtre śṛtaḥ kṣaudrī sarvakaṇṭhagadāpahaḥ ।।pathyāgokṣuradusparśarājavṛkṣaśilābhidāṃ ।kaṣāyaḥ samadhuḥ pīto mūtrakṛcchraṃ vyapohati ।।vaṃśatvagvaruṇakvāthaḥ śarkarāśmavighātanaḥ ।śākhoṭakvāthasakṣaudrakṣīrāśī ślīpadī bhavet ।।māsārkatvakpayastailaṃ madhusiktañca saindhavaṃ ।pādarogaṃ haretsarpirjālakukkuṭajaṃ tathā ।।śuṇṭhīsīvarcalāhiṅgucūrṇaṃ śūṇṭhīrasair ghṛtam ।rujaṃ haredatha kvātho viddhi baddhāgnisādhane ।।sauvarcalāgnihiṅgūnāṃ sadīpyānāṃ rasair yutaṃ ।viḍadīpyakayuktaṃ vā takraṃ gulmāturaḥ pivet ।।dhātrīpaṭolamudgānāṃ kvāthaḥ sājyo visarpahā ।śuṇṭhīdārunavākṣīrakvātho mūtrānvito aparaḥ ।।savyoṣāyorajaḥkṣāraḥ phalakvāthaś ca śothahṛt ।guḍaśigrutrivṛddhiś ca saindhavānāṃ rajoyutaḥ ।।trivṛtāphalakakvāthaḥ saguḍaḥ syādvirecanaḥ ।vacāphalakaṣāyotthaṃ payo vamanakṛbhavet ।।triphalāyāḥ palaśataṃ pṛthagbhṛṅgajabhāvitam ।

drākṣāmṛtaphalatrayair iti ña, ṭa ca
viḍaṅgaṃ lohacūrṇañca daśabhāgasamanvitam ।।śatāvarīguḍucyagnipalānāṃ śataviṃśatiḥ ।madhvājyatilajair lihyādbalīpalitavarjitaḥ ।।śatamabdaṃ hi jīveta sarvarogavivarjitaḥ ।triphalā sarvarogaghnī samadhuḥ śarkvarānvitā ।।sitāmadhughṛtair yuktā sakṛṣṇā triphalā tathā ।pathyācitrakaśuṇṭhāś ca guḍucīmuṣalīrajaḥ ।।saguḍaṃ bhakṣitaṃ rogaharaṃ triśatavarṣakṛt ।kiñciccūrṇaṃ javāpuṣpaṃ piṇḍitaṃ visṛjejjale ।।tailaṃ bhaved ghṛtākāraṃ kiñciccūrṇaṃ jalānvitaṃ ।dhūpārthaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ vṛṣadaṃśajarāyunā ।।punarmākṣikadhūpena dṛśyate tadyathā purā ।karpūrajalakābhekatailaṃ pāṭalimūlayuk ।।piṣṭvā lipya pade dve ca caredaṅgārake naraḥ ।tṛṇautthānādikaṃ vyūhya darśayanvai kutūhalaṃ ।।viṣagraharujadhvaṃsakṣudranarma ca kāmikaṃ ।tatte ṣaṭkarmakaṃ proktaṃ siddhidvayasamāśrayaṃ ।।mantradhyānauṣadhikathāmudrejyā yatra muṣṭayaḥ ।caturvargaphalaṃ proktaṃ yaḥ paṭhetsa divaṃ vrajet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānārogaharāṇyauṣadhāni nāma dvyaśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

pañcaviśatiriti ña, ṭa ca

karpūrajahukātailamiti kha । karpūrajānukātailamiti ja

chapter 

ś atha tryaśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mantrarūpauṣadhakathanaṃ

dhanvantarir uvāca
āyurārogyakartara oṃkāradyāś ca nākadāḥ ।oṃkāraḥ paramo mantrastaṃ japtvā cāmaro bhavet ।।gāyatrī paramo mantrastaṃ japtvā bhuktimuktibhāk ।oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya mantraḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ ।।oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya sarvadaḥ ।oṃ hūṃ namo viṣṇave mantroyañcauṣadhaṃ paraṃ ।।anena devā hy asurāḥ saśriyo nirujo abhavat ।bhūtānāmupakāraś ca tathā dharmo mahauṣadham ।।dharmaḥ saddharmakṛddharmī etair dharmaiś ca nirmalaḥ ।śrīdaḥ śrīṣaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ śrīdharaḥśrīniketanaḥ ।।śriyaḥ patiḥ śrīparama etaiḥ śriyamavāpnuyāt ।kāmī kāmapradaḥ kāmaḥ kāmapālas tathā hariḥ ।।ānando mādhavaś caiva nāma kāmāya vai hareḥ ।rāmaḥ paraśurāmaś ca nṛsiṃho viṣṇureva ca ।।trivikramaś ca nāmāni japtavyāni jigīṣubhiḥ ।vidyāmabhyasyatāṃ nityaṃ japtavyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।।dāmodaro bandhaharaḥ puṣkarākṣo akṣiroganut ।hṛṣīkeśo bhayaharo japedauṣadhakarmaṇi ।।

acyutañcāmṛtaṃ mantraṃ saṅgrāme cāparājitaḥ ।jalatāre nārasiṃhaṃ pūrvādau kṣemakāmavān ।।cakriṇaṅgadinañcaiva śārṅgiṇaṃ khaḍginaṃ smaret ।nārāyaṇaṃ sarvakāle nṛsiṃho akhilabhītinut ।।garuḍadhvajaś ca viṣahṛt vāsudevaṃ sadājapet ।dhānyādisthāpane svapne anantācyutamīrayet ।।nārāyaṇañca duḥsvapne dāhādau jalaśāyinaṃ ।hayagrīvañca vidyārthī jagatsūtiṃ sutāptaye ।balabhadraṃ śaurakārye ekaṃ nāmārthasādhakam ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe mantrarūpauṣadhakathanaṃ nāma tryaśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha caturaśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mṛtasañjīvanīkarasiddhayogaḥ

dhanvantarir uvāca
siddhayogān punarvakṣe mṛtasañjīvanīkarān।ātreyabhāṣitān divyān sarvavyādhivimardanān ।।
ātreya uvāca
vilvādipañcamūlasya kvāthaḥ syādvātike jvare ।pāvanaṃ pippalīmūlaṃ guḍūcī viṣvajo atha vā ।।

vīrakārye iti kha

ekanāmātha sarthakamiti kha, ña ca

sarvavyādhivināśakāniti kha
āmalakyabhayā kṛṣṇa vahniḥ sarvajvarāntakaḥ ।vilvāgnimanthaśyonākakāśmaryaḥ pārlā sthirā ।।trikaṇṭakaṃ pṛśnaparṇī vṛhatī kaṇṭakārikāḥ ।jvarāvipākapārśvārtikāśanut kuśamūlakam ।।guḍūcī parpaṭī mustaṃ kirātaṃ viśvabheṣajam ।vātapittajvare deyaṃ pañcabhadramidaṃ smṛtam ।।trivṛdviśālakaṭukātriphalāragbadhaiḥ kṛtaḥ ।sṃskāro bhedanakvāthaḥ peyaḥ sarvajvarāpahaḥ ।।devadārubalāvāsātriphalāvyopapadmakaiḥ ।saviḍaṅgaiḥ sitātulyaṃ taccurṇaṃ pañcakāśajit ।।daśamūlīśaṭīrāsnāpippalībilvapauṣkaraiḥ ।śṛṅgītāmalakībhārgīguḍūcīnāgavallibhiḥ ।।yavāgraṃ vidhinā siddhaṃ kaśāyaṃ vā pivennaraḥ ।kāśahṛdgrahaṇīpārśvahikvāśvāsapraśāntaye ।।madhukaṃ madhunā yuktaṃ vippalīṃ śarkarānvitāṃ ।nāgaraṃ guḍasaṃyuktaṃ hikvāghnaṃ lāvaṇatrayam ।।kāravyajājīmaricaṃ drākṣā vṛkṣāmladāḍimam ।sauvarcalaṃ guḍaṃ kṣaudraṃ sarvārocananāśanam ।।śṛṅgaverarasañcaiva madhunā saha pāyayet ।aruciśvāsakāśaghnaṃ pratiśyāyakaphāntakam ।।vaṭaṃ śṛṅgī śilālodhradāḍimaṃ madhukaṃ madhu ।pivet taṇḍulatoyena ccharditṛṣṇānivāraṇam ।।

devadārubalārāsnātriphalāvyoṣapadmakair iti kha
guḍucī vāsakaṃ lodhraṃ pippalīkṣaudrasaṃyutam ।kaphānvitañjayedraktaṃ tṛṣṇākāsajvarāpaham ।।vāsakasya rasastadvat samadhustāmrajo rasaḥ ।śirīṣapuṣpasurasabhāvitaṃ maricaṃ hitaṃ ।।sarvārtinunmasūro atha pittamuk taṇḍlīyakaṃ ।nirguṇḍī śārivā śelu raṅgolaś ca viṣāpahaḥ ।।mahauṣadhaṃ mṛtāṃ kṣudrāṃ puṣkaraṃ granthikodbhavaṃ ।pivet kaṇāyutaṃ kvāthaṃ mūrchāyāñca madeṣu ca ।।hiṅgusaurcalavyoṣairdviplāṃśairghṛtāḍhakaṃ ।caturguṇe gavāṃ mūtre siddhamunmādanāśanaṃ ।।śaṅkhapuṣpīvattākuṣṭhaiḥ siddhaṃ brāhmīrasair yutaṃ ।purāṇaṃ hantyapasmāraṃ sonmādaṃ medhyamuttamaṃ ।।pañcagavyaṃ ghṛtaṃ tadvat kuṣṭhanuccābhayāyutaṃ ।paṭolatriphalānimbaguḍucīdhāvaṇīvṛṣaiḥ ।।sakarañjair ghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ kuṣṭhanudvajrakaṃ smṛtaṃ ।nimbaṃ paṭolaṃ vyāghrī ca guḍūcī vāsakaṃ tathā ।।kuryāddaśapalān bhāgān ekaikasya sakuṭṭitān ।jaladroṇe vipaktavyaṃ yāvatpādāvaśeṣitaṃ ।।ghṛtaprasthampacettena triphalāgarbhasaṃyutaṃ ।pañcatiktamiti khyātaṃ sarpiḥ kuṣṭhavināśanaṃ ।।aśītiṃ vātajānrogān catvāriṃśacca paittikān ।

vaṅkolaśceti kha, ña, ca

puṣpakamiti ja

granthilodbhavamiti kha

triphalāśarkarāyutamiti kha, ña ca
viṃśatiṃ ślaiṣmikān kāsapīnasārśovraṇādikān ।।hantyanyān yogarajo ayaṃ yathārkastimiraṃ khalu ।triphalāyāḥ kaṣāyena bhṛṅnarājarasena ca ।।vraṇaprakṣālanaṅkuryādupadaṃśapraśāntaye ।paṭīladalacūrṇena dāḍimatvagrajo atha vā ।।guṇḍayecca gajenāpi triphalācūrṇakena ca ।triphalāyorajoyaṣṭhimārkavotpalamāricaiḥ ।।samaindhavaiḥ pacettailamabhyaṅgācchardikāpahaṃ ।sakṣīrān mārkavarasān dviprasthamadhukotpalaiḥ ।।pacettu tailakuḍavaṃ tannasyaṃ palitāpahaṃ ।nimbampaṭolaṃ triphalā guḍūcī svadiraṃ vṛṣaṃ ।।bhūnimbapāṭhātriphalāguḍūcīraktacandanaṃ ।yogadvayaṃ jvaraṃ hanti kuṣṭhavisphoṭakādikaṃ ।।paṭolāmṛtabhūnimbavāsāriṣṭakaparpaṭaiḥ ।khadirāntayutaiḥ kvātho visphoṭajvaraśāntikṛt ।।daśamūlī cchinnaruhā pathyā dāru punarnavā ।jvaravidradhiśotheṣu śigruviśvajitā hitāḥ ।।madhūkaṃ nimbapatrāṇi lepaḥ syadvraṇaśodhanaḥ ।triphalā khadiro dārvī nyagrodhātibalākuśāḥ ।।nimbamūlakapatrāṇāṃ kaṣāyāḥ śodhane hitāḥ ।karañjāriṣṭanirguṇḍīraso hanyādvraṇakramīn ।।

guṇḍayennagajenāpīti kha, ña ca
dhātakicandanabalāsamaṅgāmadhukotpalaiḥ ।dārvīmedonvitair lepaḥ samarpirvraṇaropaṇaḥ ।।guggulutriphalāvyoṣasamāṃrśair ghṛtayogataḥ ।nāḍī duṣṭavraṇaṃ śūlambhagandaramukhaṃ haret ।।haritakīṃ mūtrasiddhāṃ satailalavaṇānvitāṃ ।prātaḥ prātaś ca seveta kaphavātāmayāpahāṃ ।।trikaṭutriphalākvāthaṃ sakṣāralavaṇaṃ pivet ।kaphavātātmakeṣveva virekaḥ kaphavṛddhinut ।।pappalīpippalīmūlavacācitrakanāgaraiḥ ।kvāthitaṃ vā pivetpeyamāmavātavināśanaṃ ।।rāsnāṃ guḍucīmeraṇḍadevadārumahauṣadhaṃ ।pivet sarvāṅgike vāte sāme sandhyasthimajjage ।।daśamūlakaśāyaṃ vā piveddhā nāgarāmbhasā ।śuṇṭhīgokṣurakakvāthaḥ prātaḥ prātir niṣevitaḥ ।।sāmavātakaṭīśūlapācano rukpraṇāśanaḥ ।samūlapatraśākhāyāḥ prasāraṇyāś ca tailakaṃ ।।guḍucyāḥ surasaḥ kalkaḥ cūrṇaṃ vā kvāthameva ca ।prabhūtakālamāsevya mucyate vātaśoṇitāt ।।pippalī vardhamānaṃ vā sevyaṃ pathyā guḍena vā ।paṭolatriphalātīvrakaṭukāsṛtasādhitaṃ ।।pakvaṃ pītvā jayatyāśu sadāhaṃ vātaśoṇitaṃ ।

kaphavātavināśinīmiti ja

trikaṭutriphalākuṣṭhamiti ña

paṭolatriphalābhirukaṭukāmṛtasādhitamiti kha, cha, ña ca
guggulaṃ koṣṇaśīte tu guḍucī triphalāmbhasā ।।balāpunar navair aṇḍavṛhatīdvayagokṣuraiḥ ।sahiṅgu lavanaiḥ pītaṃ sadyo vātarujāpahaṃ ।।kārṣikaṃ pippalīmūlaṃ pañcaiva lavaṇāni ca ।pippalī citrakaṃ śuṇṭhī triphalā trivṛtā vacā ।।dvau kṣārau śādvalā dantī svarṇakṣīrī viṣāṇikā ।kolapramāṇāṃ guṭikāṃ pivet sauvīrakāyutāṃ ।।śothāvapāke trivṛtā pravṛddhe codarādike ।kṣīraṃ śothaharaṃ dāru varṣābhūrnāgaraiḥ śubham ।।sekas tathārkavarṣābhūnimbakvāthena śothajit ।vyoṣagarbhaṃ palāśasya triguṇe bhasmavāriṇi ।।sādhitaṃ pivataḥ sarpiḥ patatyarśo na saṃśayaḥ ।viśvaksenāvanirguṇḍīsādhitaṃ cāpi lāvaṇaṃ ।।viḍaṅgānalasindhūttharāsnāgrakṣāradārubhiḥ ।tailañcaturguṇaṃ siddhaṃ kaṭudravyaṃ jalena vā ।।gaṇḍamālāpahaṃ tailamabhyaṅgāt galagaṇḍanut ।śaṭīkunāgabalayakvāthaḥ kṣīrarase yutam ।।payasyāpippalīvāsākalkaṃ siddhaṃ kṣaye hitam ।vacāviḍabhayāśuṇṭhīhiṅgukuṣṭhāgnidīpyakān ।।dvitriṣaṭcaturekāṃśasaptapañcāśikāḥ kramāt ।cūrṇaṃ pītaṃ hanti gulmaṃ udaraṃ śūlakāsanut ।।pāṭhānikumbhatrikaṭutriphalāgniṣu sādhitam ।

ktoṣṭuśīte atheti kha
mūtreṇa cūrṇaguṭikā gulmaplīhādimardanī ।।vāsānimbapaṭīlāni triphalā vātapittanut ।lihyāt kṣaudreṇa viḍaṅgaṃ cūrṇaṃ kṛmivināśanam ।।viḍaṅgasaindhavakṣāramūtrenāpi harītakī ।śallakīvadarījambupiyālāmrārjunatvacaḥ ।।pītāḥ kṣīreṇa madhvaktāḥ pṛthakśīṇitavāraṇāḥ ।vilvāmraghātakīpāṭhāśuṇṭhīmocarasāḥ samāḥ ।।pītā rundhantyatīsāraṃ guḍatakreṇa durjayam ।cāṅgerīkoladadhyambunāgarakṣārasaṃyutam ।।ghṛtayukkvāthitaṃ peyaṃ gudaṃbhrase rujāpaham ।viḍaṅgātiviṣāmustaṃ dārupāthākaliṅgakam ।।marīcena samāyuktaṃ śothātīsāranāśanam ।śarkarāsindhuśuṇṭhībhiḥ kṛṣṇāmadhuguḍena vā ।।dve dve khādeddharītakyau jīvedvarṣaśataṃ sukhī ।triphalā pippalīyuktā samdhvājyā tathaiva sā ।।cūrnamāmalakaṃ tena surasena tu bhavitam ।madhvājyaśarkarāyuktaṃ liḍhvā strīśaḥ payaḥ pivet ।।māsapippaliśālīnāṃ yavagodhūmayos tathā ।cūrṇabhāgaiḥ samāṃśaiś ca pacet pippalīkāṃ śubhāṃ ।।tāṃ bhakṣayitvā ca pivet śarkarāmadhuraṃ payaḥ ।navaś caṭakavajjambhed daśavārān striyaṃ dhruvam ।।samaṅgādhātakīpuṣpalodhranīlotpalāni ca ।

tripalā cāmlapittanuditi kha, ña ca
etat kṣīrena dātavyaṃ strīṇāṃ pradaranaśanaṃ ।।vījaṅkauraṇṭakañcāpi madhukaṃ śvetacandanaṃ ।padmotpalasya mūlāni madhukaṃ śarkarātilān ।।dravamāṇeṣu garbheṣu garbhasyāpanamuttamaṃ ।devadāru nabhaḥ kuṣṭhaṃ naladaṃ viśvabheṣajaṃ ।।lepaḥ kāñcikamampaṣṭastailayuktaḥ śirortinut ।vastrapūtaṃ kṣipet koṣṇaṃ mindhūtyaṃ karṇaśūlanut ।।laśunārdrakaśigrūṇāṃ kadalyā vā rasaḥpṛthak ।balāśatāvarīrāsnāmṛtāḥ mairīyakeḥ pivet ।।triphalāsahitaṃ sarpistimiraghnamanuttamaṃ ।triphalāvyoṣasindhūptyair ghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ pivennaraḥ ।।cākṣuṣyambhedanaṃ hṛdyaṃ dīpanaṃ krapharoganut ।nīlotpalasya kiñjalkaṃ gośakṛdrasasaṃyutaṃ ।।guṭikāñjanametat syāt dinarātryandhayorhitaṃ ।yaṣṭīmadhuvacākṛṣṇāvījānāṃ kuṭajasya ca ।।kalkenāloḍya nimbasya kaṣāyo vamanāya saḥ ।snigdhasvinnayavantoyaṃ pradātavyaṃ virecanam ।।anyathā yojitaṃ kuryāt mandāgniṃ gauravāruciṃ ।pathyāsaindhavakṛṣṇānāṃ cūrṇamuṣṇāmbunā pivet ।।virekaḥ sarvarogaghnaḥ śreṣṭho nārācasaṃjñakaḥ ।

kṛṣṇamiti kha

kuṣṭhamiti ña

pathyāsaindhavakuṣṭhānāmiti kha
siddhayogā munibhyo ye ātreyeṇa pradarśitāḥ ।sarvarogaharāḥ sarvayogāgryāḥ suśrutena hi ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe mṛtasañjīvanīkarasiddhayogo nāma caturaśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kalpasāgaraḥ

dhanvantarir uvāca
kalpāmmṛtyuñcayānvakṣye hy āyurdānrogasardanān ।triśatī rogahā sevyā madhvājyatriphalāmṛtā ।।palaṃ palārdhaṃ karṣaṃ vā triphalāṃ sakalāṃ tathā ।bilvatailasya nasyañca māsaṃ pañcaśatī kaviḥ ।।rogāpamṛtyubalijit tilaṃ bhallātakaṃ tathā ।pañcāṅgaṃ vākūcīcūṇaṃ ṣaṇmāsaṃ khadirodakaiḥ ।।kvāthaiḥ kuṣṭhañjayet sevyaṃ cūrṇaṃ nīlakuruṇṭajam ।kṣireṇa madhunā vāpi śatāyuḥ khaṇḍadugdhabhuk ।।madhvājyaśuṇṭhīṃ saṃsevya palaṃ prātaḥ samṛdyujit ।balīpalitajijjīvenmāṇḍakīcūrṇadugdhapāḥ ।।uccaṭāmadhunā karṣaṃ payaḥpā mṛtyujinnaraḥ ।madhvājyaiḥ payasā vāpi nirguṇḍī rogamṛtyujit ।।

tailamiti ña
palāśatailaṃ karṣaikaṃ ṣaṇmāsaṃ madhunā pivet ।dugdhabhojī pañcaśatī sahasrāyurbhavennaraḥ ।।jyotiṣmatīpatrarasaṃ payasā triphalāṃ pivet ।madhunājyantatastadvat śatāvaryā rajaḥ palaṃ ।।kṣaudrājyaiḥ payasā vāpi nirguṇḍī rogamṛtyujit ।pañcāṅgaṃ nimbacūrṇasya khadirakvāthabhāvitaṃ ।।karṣaṃ bhṛṅgarasenāpi rogajiccāmaro bhavet ।rudantikājyamadhubhuk dugdhabhojī ca mṛtyujit ।।karṣacūrṇaṃ harītakyā bhāvitaṃ bhṛṅgarāḍrasaiḥ ।ghṛtena madhunā sevya triśatāyuś ca rogajit ।।vārāhikā bhṛṅgarasaṃ lohacūrṇaṃ śatāvarī ।sājyaṃ karṣaṃ pañcaśatī kartacūrṇaṃ śatāvarī ।।bhāvitaṃ bhṛṅgarājena madhvājyantriśatī bhavet ।tāmraṃ mṛtaṃ sṛtatulyaṃ gandhakañca kumārikā ।।rasair vimṛjya dve guñje sājyaṃ pañcaśatābdavān ।aśvagandhā palaṃ tailaṃ sājyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ śatābdavān ।।palampunar navācūrṇaṃ madhvājyapayasā pivam ।aśokacūrṇasya palaṃ madhvājyaṃ payasārtinut ।।tilasya tailaṃ samadhu nasyāt kṛṣṇakacaḥ śatī ।karṣamakṣaṃ samadhvājyaṃ śatāyuḥ payasā pivan ।।

roganuccāmaro bhavediti ña

sājyaṃ sarvamiti kha

tāmrāmṛtamiti kha

suratusyamiti ja, ña ca
abhayaṃ saguḍañcagdhvā ghṛtena madhurādibhiḥ ।dugdhānnabhuk kṛṣṇakeśo arogī pañcaśatābdavān ।।palaṅkuṣmāṇḍikācūrṇaṃ madhvājyapayasā pivan ।māsaṃ dugdhānnabhojī ca sahasrāyurvirogavān ।।śālūkacūrṇaṃ bhṛṅgājyaṃ samadhvājyaṃ śatābdakṛt ।kaṭutumbītailanasyaṃ karṣaṃ śatadvayābdavān ।।triphalā pippalī śuṇṭhī sevitā triśatābdakṛt ।śatāvaryāḥ pūrvayogaḥ sahasrāyurbalātikṛt ।।citrakena tathā purvas tathā śuṇṭhīviḍaṅgataḥ ।lohena bhṛṅgarājena balayā nimbapañcakaiḥ ।।khadireṇa ca nirguṇḍyā kaṇṭakāryātha vāsakāt ।varṣābhuvā tadrasair vā bhāvito vaṭikākṛtaḥ ।।cūrṇaṅghṛtair vā madhunā guḍādyair vāriṇā tathā ।oṃ hrūṃ sa itimantreṇa mantrato yogarājakaḥ ।।mṛtasañjīvanīkalpo rogamṛtyuñjayo bhavet ।surāsuraiś ca munibhiḥ sevitāḥ kalpasāgarāḥ ।।gajāyurvedaṃ provāca pālakāpye aṅgarājakaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe kalpasāgaro nāma pañcāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍaśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gajacikitsā

pālakāpya uvāca 
gajalakṣma cikitsāñca lomapāda yadāmi te ।dīrghahastā mahocchvāsāḥ prasastāste mahiṣṇavaḥ ।।viṃśatyaṣṭādaśanakhāḥ śītakālamadāś ca ye ।dakṣiṇañconnatandantaṃ vṛṃhitaṃ jaladopamaṃ ।।karṇaur ca vipūlau yeṣāṃ sūkṣmavindvanvitatvacau ।te dhāryā na tathā dhāryā vāmanā ye ca saṅkuśāḥ ।।hastinyaḥ pārśvagarbhiṇyo ca mūḍhā mataṅgajāḥ ।varṇaṃ satvaṃ balaṃ rūpaṃ kāntiḥ saṃhananañjavaḥ ।।saptasthito gajaścedṛk saṅgrāmerīñjayetsa ca ।kuñjarāḥ paramā śobhā śivirasya balasya ca ।।āyattaṃ kuñjaraiś caiva vijayaṃ pṛthivīkṣitāṃ ।pākaleṣu ca sarveṣu kartavyamanuvāsanaṃ ।।ghṛtatailaparīpākaṃ sthānaṃ vātavivarjitaṃ ।skandheṣu ca kriyā karyā tathā pālakavannṛpāḥ ।।gomūtraṃ pāṇḍurogeṣu rajanībhyāṃ ghṛtandvija ।ānāhe tailasiktasya niṣekastasya śasyate ।।lavaṇaiḥ pañcabhirmaśrā pratipānāya vāruṇī ।

dhanvantariruvāceti ña

mardanā iti ña
viḍaṅgatriphalāvyoṣasaindhavaiḥ kavalān kṛtān ।।mūrchāsu bhojayennāgaṃ kṣaudrantoyañca pāyayet ।agyaṅgaḥ śirasaḥ śūle nasyañcaiva praśasyate ।।nāgānāṃ snehapuṭakaḥ pādarogānupakramet ।paścāt kalkakaṣāyeṇa śodhanañca vidhīyate ।।śikhitittirilāvānāṃ pippalīmaricānvitaiḥ ।rasaiḥ sambhojayennagaṃ vepathuryasya jāyate ।।bālabilvaṃ tathā lodhraṃ dhātakī sitayā saha ।atīsāravināśāya piṇḍīṃ bhuñjīta kuñjaraḥ ।।nasyaṃ karagrahe deyaṃ ghṛtaṃ layaṇasaṃyutam ।māgadhīnāgarājājīyavāgūrmustasādhitā ।।utkarṇake tu dātavyā vārāhañca tathā rasam ।daśamūlakulatthāmlakākamācīvipācitam ।।tailamūṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ galagrahagadāpaham ।aṣṭabhirlavaṇaiḥ piṣṭhaiḥ prasannāḥ pāyayedghṛtam ।।mūtrabhaṅge atha vā vījaṃ kvathitaṃ trapūṣasya ca ।tvagdoṣeṣu pivennimbaṃ vṛṣaṃ vā kvathitaṃ dvipaḥ ।।gavāṃ mūtraṃ viḍaṅgāni kṛmikoṣṭheṣu śasyate ।śṛṅgaverakaṇādrākṣāśarkarābhiḥ śṛtaṃ payaḥ ।।kṣatakṣayakaraṃ pānaṃ tathā māṃsarasaḥ śubhaḥ ।mudgodanaṃ vyoṣayutamarucau tu praśasyate ।।trivṛdvyoṣāgnidantyarkaśyāmākṣīrebhapippalī ।etair gulmaharaḥ snehaḥ kṛtaś caiva tathāparaḥ ।।

bhedanadrāvaṇābhyaṅgasnehapānānuvāsanaiḥ ।sarvāneva samutpannan vidravān samupāharet ।।yaṣṭikaṃ mudgasūpena śāradena tathā pivet ।bālabilvais tathā lepaḥ phaṭurogeṣu śasyate ।।viḍaṅgendrayavau hiṅgu saralaṃ rajanīdvayam ।pūrvāhṇe pāyayet piṇḍān sarvaśūlopaśāntaye ।।pradhānabhojane teṣāṃ yaṣṭikavrīhiśālayaḥ ।madhyamau yavagodhūmau śeṣā dantini cādhamāḥ ।।yavaś caiva tathaivekṣurnāgānāṃ balavardhanaḥ ।nāgānāṃ yavasaṃ śuṣkaṃ tathā dhātuprakopaṇaṃ ।।madakṣiṇasya nāgasya payaḥpānaṃ praśasyate ।dīpanīyais tathā dravyaiḥ śṛto māṃsarasaḥ śubhaḥ ।।vāyasaḥ kukkuraścobhau kākolūkakulo hariḥ ।bhavet kṣaudreṇa saṃyuktaḥ piṇḍo yuddhe mahāpadi ।।kaṭumatsyaviḍaṅgāni kṣāraḥ koṣātakī payaḥ ।haridrā ceti dhūpoyaṃ kuñjarasya jayāvahaḥ ।।pippalītaṇḍulāstailaṃ mādhvīkaṃ mākṣikam tathā ।netrayoḥ pariṣekoyaṃ dīpanīyaḥ praśasyate ।।pūrīṣañcaṭakāyāś ca tathā pārāvatasya ca ।kṣīravṛkṣakarīṣāś ca prasannayeṣṭamañjanaṃ ।।

mudgyūṣeṇeti ja, ña ca

madāya hīti ña

kṣīravṛkṣakarīrāśceti ña
anenāñjitanetrastu karoti kadanaṃ raṇe ।utpalāni ca nīlāni sustantagarameva ca ।।taṇḍulodakapiṣṭāni netranirvāpanaṃ param ।nakhavṛddhau nakhacchedastailasekaś ca māsyapi ।।śayyāsthānaṃ bhaveccāsya karīṣaiḥ pāṃśubhis tathā ।śarannidāghayoḥ sekaḥ sarpiṣā ca tatheṣyate ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gajacikitsā nāma ṣaḍaśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aśvavāhanasāraḥ

dhanvantarir uvāca
aśvavāhanasārañca vakṣye cāśvacikitsanam ।vājināṃ saṃgrahaḥ kāryo dharmakamārthasiddhaye ।।aśvinī śraṇaṃ hastaṃ uttarātritayantathā ।nakṣatrāṇi praśastāni hayānāmādivāhane ।।hemantaḥ śiśiraś caiva vasantaścāśvavāhane ।grīṣmeśaradi varṣāsu niṣiddhaṃ vāhanaṃ haye ।।tīvrair na ca parair daṇḍair adeśe na ca tāḍayet ।kīlāsthisaṃkule caiva viṣame kaṇṭakānvite ।।

vālukāpaṅgasaṃcchanne gartāgartapradūṣite ।acittajño vinopāyair vāhanaṃ kurutetu haḥ ।।sa vāhyate hayenaiva pṛṣṭhasthaḥ kaṭikāṃ vinā ap।chandaṃ vijñāpayet kopi sakṛtī dhīmatāṃ varaḥ ।।abhyāsādabhiyogācca vināśāstraṃ svavāhakaḥ ।snātasya praṅmukhasyātha devān vapuṣi yojayet ।।praṇavādinamontena svavījena yathākramam ।brahmā citte vale viṣṇurvainateyaḥ parākrame ।।pārśve rudrā gururbuddhau viśvedevātha marmasu ।dṛgāvarte dṛśīndvarkau karṇayoraśvinau tathā ।।jaṭhare agniḥ svadhā svede vagjihvāyāṃ jave anilaḥ ।pṛṣṭhato nākapṛṣṭhastu khurāgre sarvaparvatāḥ ।।tārāś ca romakūpeṣu hṛdi cāndramasī kalā ।tejasyagnīratiḥ śroṇyāṃ lalāṭe ca jagatpatiḥ ।।grahāś ca heṣite caiva tathaivorasi vāsukiḥ ।upoṣito arcayet sādī hayaṃ dakṣaśrutau japet ।।haya gandharvarājastvaṃ śṛṇuṣva vacanaṃ gama ।gandharvakulajātastvaṃ mābhūstvaṃ kuladūṣakaḥ ।।dvijānāṃ satyavākyena somasya garuḍasya ca ।rudrasya varuṇasyaiva pavanasya balena ca ।।hutāśanasya dīptyā ca smara jātiṃ turaṅgama ।smara rājendraputrastvaṃ satyavākyamanusmara ।।

kaṇikāṃ vineti ka, ña ca
smara tvaṃ vāruṇīṃ kanyāṃ smara tvaṃ kaustubhaṃ maṇiṃ ।kṣirodasāgare caiva mathyamāne surāsuraiḥ ।।tatra devakule jātaḥ svavākyaṃ paripālaya ।kule jātastvamaśvānāṃ mitraṃ me bhava śāsvatam ।।śṛṇu mitra tvametacca siddho me bhava vāhana ।vijayaṃ rakṣa māñcaiva samare siddhimāvaha ।।tava pṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya hatā daityāḥ suraiḥ purā ।adhunā tvāṃ samāruhya jeṣyāmi ripuvāhinīṃ ।।karṇajāpantataḥ kṛtvā vimuhya ca tathā pyarīn ।paryānayeddhayaṃ sādī vahayedyuddhato jayaḥ ।।sañjātāḥ svaśarīreṇa doṣāḥ prāyeṇa vājināṃ ।hanyante atiprayatnena guṇāḥ sādivaraiḥ punaḥ ।।sahajā iva dṛśyante guṇāḥ sādivarodbhavāḥ ।nāśayanti guṇānanye sādinaḥ sahajānapi ।।guṇāneko vijānāti vetti doṣāṃs tathāparaḥ ।dhanyo dhīmān hayaṃ vetti mandadhīḥ ।।akarmajño anupāyajño vegāsakto atikopanaḥ ।ghanadaṇḍaraticchidre yaḥ mamopi na śasyate ।।upāyajño atha cittajño viśuddho doṣanāśanaḥ ।guṇārjanaparo nityaṃ sarvakarmaviśāradaḥ ।।pragraheṇa gṛhītvātha praviṣṭo vāhabhūtalam ।savyāpasavyabhedena vāhanīyaḥ svasādinā ।।

tathāsuraniti ja, ña, ṭa ca

saha jātāḥ śarīreṇeti ña
āruhya sahasā naiva tāḍnīyo hayottamaḥ ।tāḍanādubhayamāpnoti bhayānmohaś ca jāyate ।।prātaḥ sādī plutenaiva valgāmuddhṛtya cālayet ।mandaṃ mandaṃ vinā nālaṃ dhṛtavalgo dināntare ।।proktamāśvasanaṃ sāmabhedo aśvena niyojyate ।kaṣāditāḍnaṃ daṇḍo dānaṃ kālasahiṣṇutā ।।parvapūrvaviśuddhau tu vidadhyāduttarottaram ।jihvātale vināyogaṃ vidadhyādvāhane haye ।।guṇetaraśatāṃ valgāṃ sṛkkaṇyā saha gāhayet ।vismārya vāhanaṃ kuryācchithilānāṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।।hayaṃ jihvāṅgamāhīne jihvāgranthiṃ vimocayet ।gāṭatāṃ mocayettāvadyāvat stobhaṃ na suñcati ।।kuryācchatamurastrāṇamavilālañca muñcati ।ūrdhānanaḥ svabhādyastasyorastrāṇamaślatham ।।vidhāya vāhayeddṛṣṭyā līlayā sādisattamaḥ ।tasya savyena pūrveṇa saṃyuktaṃ savyavalgayā ।।yaḥ kuryātpaścimaṃ pādaṃ gṛhītastena dakṣiṇaḥ ।krameṇānena yo sevāṃ kurute vāmavalgayā ।।pādau tenāpi pādaḥ syādgṛhīto vāma eva hi ।agre ceccaraṇe tyakte jāyate sudṛḍhāsanaṃ ।।yau hṛtau duṣkare caiva moṭake nāṭakāyanaṃ ।savyahīnaṃ khalīkāro hanena guṇane tatha ।।svahāvaṃ hi turaṅgasya mukhavyāvartanaṃ puraḥ ।

na caivetthaṃ turaṅgāṇāṃ pādagrahaṇahetavaḥ ।।viśvastaṃ hayamālokya gāḍhamāpīḍya cāsanaṃ ।rokayitvā mukhe pādaṃ grāhyato lokanaṃ hitaṃ ।।gāḍhamāpīḍya rāgābhyāṃ valgāmākṛṣya gṛhyate ।tadvandhanād yugmapādaṃ tadvadvakvanamucyate ।।saṃyojya valgayā pādān valgāmāmocya vāñchitam ।vāhyapārṣṇiprayogāttu yatra tattāḍanaṃ matam ।।pralayāviplave jñātvā krameṇānena buddhimān ।moṭanena caturthena vidhireṣa bidhīyate ।।nādhatte adhaś ca pādaṃ yo aśvo laghuni maṇḍale ।moṭanodvakkanābhyāntu grāhayet pādamīśitaṃ ।।vaṭayitvāsane gāṭaṃ mandamādāya yo brajet ।grāhyate saṃgrahādyatra tatsaṃgrahaṇamucyate ।।hatvā parśve prahāreṇa sthānastho vyagramānasam ।valgāmākṛṣya pādena grāhyakaṇṭakapāyanam ।।utthito yo aṅghraṇānena pārṣṇnipādātturaṅgamaḥ ।gṛhyate yat khalīkṛtya khalīkāraḥ sa ceṣyate ।।gatitraye piyaḥ pādamādatte naiva vāñchitaḥ ।hatvā tu yatra daṇḍena grāhyate gahanaṃ hi tat ।।khalīkṛtya catuṣkeṇa turaṅgo valgayānyayā ।ucchāsya grāhyate anyatra tatsyāducchāsanaṃ punaḥ ।।

bhaṭhakālādyanutpādamiti ja

bāhyapārśve prayogāttviti kha

vaṇṭayitvāsane iti kha

grāhakaṇṭakapāyanamiti kha
svabhāvaṃ bahirasyantaṃ tasyāṃ diśi padāyanaṃ ।niyojya grāhayettattu mukhavyāpartanaṃ matam ।।grāhayitvā tataḥ pādaṃ trividhāsu yathākramam ।sādhayet pañcadhārāsu kramaśo maṇḍalādiṣu ।।ājanordhānanaṃ vāhaṃ śithilaṃ vāhayet sudhīḥ ।aṅgeṣu lāghavaṃ yāvattāvattaṃ vāhayeddhayaṃ ।।mṛduḥ skandhe laghurvaktre śithilaḥ sarvasandhiṣu ।yadā sasādino vaśyaḥ saṅgṛhṇīyāttadā hayaṃ ।।na tyajet paścimaṃ pādaṃ yadā sādhurbhavettadā ।tadākṛṣṭirvidhātavyā pāṇibhyāmiha balgayā ।।tatratriko yathā tiṣṭhedudgrīvośvaḥ samānanaḥ ।dharāyāṃ paścimau pādau antarīkṣe yadāśrayau ।।tadā sandharaṇaṃ kuryādgāṭhavāhañca muṣṭinā ।sahasaivaṃ samākṛṣṭo yasturaṅgo na tiṣṭhati ।।śarīraṃ vikṣipantañca sādhayenmaṇḍalabhramaiḥ ।kṣipet skandhañca yo vāhaṃ sa ca sthāpyo hi valgayā ।।gomayaṃ lavaṇaṃ mūtraṃ kvathitaṃ mṛtsamanvitam ।aṅgalepo makṣikādidaṃśaśramavināśanaḥ ।।madhye bhadrādijātīnāṃ maṇḍo deyo hi sādinā ।darśanaṃ bhotatīkṣasya nirutsāhaḥ kṣudhā hayaḥ ।।yathā vaśyas tathā śikṣā vinaśyantyativāhitāḥ ।avāhitā na midhyanti tuṅgavaktrāṃś ca vāhayet ।।sampīḍya jānuyugmena sthiramuṣṭisturaṅgamaṃ ।

gomūtrākuṭilā veṇī padmamaṇḍalamālikā ।।pañcolūkhalikā kāryā garvitāste atikīrtitāḥ ।saṃkṣiptañcaiva vikṣiptaṃ kuñcitañca yathācitam ।।valgitāvalgitau caiva ṣoṭā cetthamudāhṛtam ।vīthīdhanuḥśataṃ yāvadaśītir navatis tathā ।।bhadraḥ susādhyo vājī syānmando daṇḍaikamānasaḥ ।mṛgajaṅgho mṛgo vājī saṅkīrṇastatsamanviyāt ।।śarkarāmadhulājādaḥ sugandho aśvaḥ śucirdvijaḥ ।tejasvī kṣatriyaścāśbo vinīto buddhimāṃś ca yaḥ ।।śūdro aśuciś calo mando virūpo vimatiḥ khalaḥ ।valgayā dhāryamāṇo aśvo lālakaṃ yaś ca darśayet ।।dhārāsu yojanīyo asau pragrahagrahamokṣaṇaiḥ ।aśvādilakṣaṇam vakṣye śālihotro yathāvadat ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe aśvavāhanasāro nāma saptāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

gorjitāste atikīrtitā iti kha

yathāñcitamiti ña

mṛgañjaya iti kha, ña ca

chapter 

ś athāṣṭāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aśvacikitsā

śālihotra uvāca

aśvānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye
cikitsāñcaiva suśrutaap।hīnadanto vidantaś cakarālī kṛṣṇatālukaḥ ।।kṛṣṇajihvaś ca yamajojātamuṣkaś ca yas tathā ।dviśaphaś ca tathā śṛṅgī trivarṇo vyāghravarṇakaḥ ।।kharavarṇo bhasmavarṇo jātavarṇaś ca kākudī ।śvitrī ca kākasādī ca kharasārastathaiva ca ।।vānarākṣaḥ kṛṣṇaśaṭaḥ kṛṣṇaguhyastathaiva ca ।kṛṣṇaprothaś ca śūkaś ca yaś ca tittirisannibhaḥ ।।viṣamaḥ śvetapādaś ca dhruvāvartavivarjitaḥ ।aśubhāvartasaṃyukto varjanīyasturaṅgamaḥ ।।randhroparandhrayordvau dvau dvau dvau mastakavakṣasoḥ ।prayāṇe ca lalāṭe ca kaṇṭhāvartāḥ śubhā daśa ।।mṛkkaṇyāñca lalāṭe ca karṇamūle nigālake ।bāhumūle gale śreṣṭhā āvartāstvaśubhāḥ pare ।।śukendragopacandrābhā ye ca vāyasasannibhāḥ ।suvarṇavarṇāḥ snigdhāś ca praśasyāstu sadaiva hi ।।dīrghagrīvākṣikūṭāś ca hrasvakarṇāś ca śobhanāḥ ।

cikitsantaveti ña
rākṣānturaṅgamā yatra vijayaṃ varjayettataḥ ।।pālitastu hayo dantī śubhado duḥkhado anyathā ।śriyaḥ putrāstu gandharvā vājino ratnamuttamam ।।aśvamedhe tu turagaḥ pavitratvāttu hūyate ।vṛṣo nimbavṛhatyau ca guḍūcī ca samākṣikā ।।siṃhā gandhakārī piṇḍī svedaś ca śirasas tathā ।hiṅgu puṣkaramūlañca nāgaraṃ sāmlavetasaṃ ।।pippalīsaindhavayutaṃ śūlaghnaṃ cīṣṇavāriṇā ।nāgarātiviṣā mustā sānantā bilvamālikā ।।kvāthameṣāṃ pivedvājī sarvātīsāranāśanam ।priyaṅgusārivābhyāñca yuktamājaṃ śṛtaṃ payaḥ ।।paryāptaśarkaraṃ pītvā śramādvājī vimucyate ।droṇikāyāntu dātavyā tailavastisturaṅgame ।।koṣṭhajā ca śirā vedhyā tena tasya sukhaṃ bhavet ।dāṛimaṃ triphalā vyoṣaṃ guḍañca samabhāvikam ।।piṇḍametat pradātavyamaśvānāṃ kāśanāśanam ।priyaṅgulodhramadhubhiḥ pivedvṛṣarasaṃ hayaḥ ।।kṣīraṃ vā pañcakolādyaṃ kāśanāddhi pramucyate ।praskandheṣu ca sarveṣu śreya ādau viśodhaṇam ।।abhyaṅgodvartanaiḥ snehaṃ nasyavartikramaḥ smṛtaḥ ।jvaritānāṃ turaṅgāṇāṃ payasaiva kriyākramaḥ ।।lodhrakandharayormūlaṃ mātulāṅgāgnināgarāḥ ।

rājñīturaṅgamā yatreti kha

ghṛtamiti kha
kuṣṭhahiṅguvacārāsnālepoyaṃ śothanāśanaḥ ।।mañjiṣṭhā madhukaṃ drākṣāvṛhatyau raktacandanam ।trapuṣīvījamūlāni śṛṅgāṭakakaśerukam ।।ajāpayaḥśṛtamidaṃ suśītaṃ śarkarānvitaṃ ।pītvā nīraśano vājī raktamehāt pramucyate ।।manyāhanunigālasthaśirāśotho galagrahaḥ ।abhyaṅgaḥ kaṭutailena tatra teṣveva śasyate ।।galagrahagado śothaḥ prāyaśo galadeśake ।pratyakpuṣpī tathā bahniḥ saindhavaṃ sauraso rasaḥ ।।kṛṣṇāhiṅguyutair ebhiḥ kṛtvā nasyaṃ na sīdati ।niśe jyotiṣmatī pāṭhā kṛṣṇā kuṣṭhaṃ vacā madhu ।।jihvāstambhe ca lepo ayaṃ guḍamūtrayuto hitaḥ ।tilair yaṣṭyā rajanyā ca nimbapatraiś ca yojitā ।।kṣaudreṇa śodhanī piṇḍī sarpiṣā vraṇaropaṇī ।abhighātena khañjanti ye hy aścāstīvravedanāḥ ।।pariṣekakriyā teṣāṃ tailenāśu rujāpahā ।doṣakopābhighātābhyāṃ pakvabhinne vraṇakramaḥ ।।aśvatthoḍumbaraplakṣamadhūkavaṭakalkanaiḥ ।।prabhūtasalilaḥ kvāthaḥ sukhoṣṇaḥ vraṇaśodhanaḥ ।śatāhvā nāgaraṃ rāsnā mañjiṣṭhākuṣṭhasaindhavaiḥ ।।devadāruvacāyugmarajanīraktacandanaiḥ ।tailasiddhaṃ kaṣāyeṇa guḍūcyāḥ payasā saha ।।

tilataileneti kha
mrakṣeṇa vastinaśye ca yojyaṃ sarvatra liṅgine ।raktasrāvo jalaukābhir netrānte netrarogitaḥ ।।khāditoḍumbarāśvatthakaṣāyeṇa ca sādhanam ।dhātrīdurālabhātiktāpriyaṅgukuṅkumaiḥ samaiḥ ।।guḍūcyā ca kṛtaḥ kalko hito yuktāvalambine ।utpāte ca śile śrāvye śuṣkaśephe tathaiva ca ।।kṣiprakāriṇi doṣe ca sadyo vidalamiṣyate ।gośakṛnmañjikākuṣṭharajanītilamarṣapaiḥ ।।gavāṃ mūtreṇa piṣṭaiś ca mardanaṃ kaṇḍunāśanam ।śīto madhuyutaḥ kvātho nāśikāyāṃ saśarkaraḥ ।।raktapittaharaḥ pānādaśvakarṇaistathaiva ca ।saptame saptame deyamaśvānāṃ lavaṇaṃ dine ।।tathā bhuktavatāndeyā atipāne tu vāruṇī ।jīvanīyaiḥ samadhurair mṛdvīkāśarkarāyutaiḥ ।।sapippalīkaiḥ śaradi pratipānaṃ sapadmakaiḥ ।viḍaṅgāpippalīdhānyaśatāhvālodhrasaindhavaiḥ ।।macitrakaisturaṅgāṇāṃ pratipānaṃ himāgame ।lodhrapriyaṅgukāmustāpippalīviśvabheṣajaiḥ ।।sakṣaudraiḥ pratipānaṃ syādvasante kaphanāśanam ।priyaṅgupippalīlodhrayaṣṭyākṣaiḥ samahauṣadhaiḥ ।।nidāghe saguḍā deyā madirā pratipānake ।

vedhanamisyata iti ja, ña ca
