lodhrakāṣṭhaṃ salavaṇaṃ pippalyo viśvabheṣajam ।।bhavettailayutair ebhiḥ pratipānaṃ ghanāgame ।nidāghodvṛtapittārtāḥ śaratsu puṣṭaśoṇitāḥ ।।prāvṛḍbhinnapurīṣāś ca piveyurvājino ghṛtam ।piveyurvājinastailaṃ kaphavāyvadhikāstu ye ।।snehavyāpadbhavo yeṣāṃ kāryaṃ teṣāṃ virūkṣaṇam ।tryahaṃ yavāgūrūkṣā syād bhojanaṃ takrasaṃyutam ।।śarannidāghayoḥ sarpistailaṃ śītavasantayoḥ ।varṣāsu śiśire caiva vastau yamakamiṣyate ।।gurvabhiṣyandibhaktāni vyāyāmaṃ snājamātapam ।vāyuvarjañca vāhasya snehapītasya varjitam ।।snānaṃ pānaṃ śakṛtkrūṣṭhamaśvānāṃ salilāgame ।atyarthaṃ durdine kāle pānamekaṃ praśasyate ।।yuktaśītātape kāle dviḥpānaṃ snapanaṃ sakṛt ।grīṣme trisnānapānaṃ syacciraṃ tasyāyagāhanam ।।nistūṣāṇāṃ pradātavyā yavānāṃ caturāṭakī ।caṇakavrīhimaudgāni kalāyaṃ vāpi dāpayet ।।ahorātreṇa cārdhasya yavasasya tulā daśa ।aṣṭau śuṣkasya dātavyāś catasro atha vuṣasya vā ।।dūrvā pittaṃ yavaḥ kāsaṃ vuṣaś ca śloṣmasañcayam ।nāśayatyarjunaḥ śvāsaṃ tathā māno balakṣayam ।।vātikāḥ paittikāś caiva śleṣmajāḥ sānnipātikāḥ ।na rogāḥ pīḍayiṣyanti dūrvāhāranturaṅgamam ।।

dvau rajjubandhau duṣṭānāṃ pakṣayorubhayorapi ।paścāddhanuś ca kartarvyo dūrakīlavyapāśrayaḥ ।।vāseyustvāstṛte sthāne kṛtadhūpanabhūmayaḥ ।yatropanyastayavasāḥ sapradīpāḥ surakṣitāḥ ।
kṛkavākvajakapayo dhāryaścāśvagṛhe mṛgāḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe aśvāyurvedo nāmāṣṭāśītyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athonanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aśvaśāntiḥ

śālihotra uvāca
aśvaśāntiṃ pravakṣyāmi vajirogavimardanīṃ ।nityāṃ naimittakīṃ kamyāṃ trividhāṃ śṛṇu suśruta ।।śubhe dine śrīdharañca śriyamuccaiḥśravāś ca taṃ ।hayarājaṃ samabhyarcya sāvitrair jujuyādghṛtaṃ ।।dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāndadyādaśvavṛddhis tathā bhavet ।aśvayuk śuklapakṣasya pañcadaśyāñca śāntikaṃ ।।vahiḥ kuryādviśeṣeṇa nāsatyau varuṇaṃ yajet ।samullikhya tato devīṃ śākhābhiḥ parivārayet ।।ghatānsarvarasaiḥ pūrṇān dikṣu dadyātsavastrakān ।yavājyaṃ juhuyāt prārcya yajedaśvāṃś ca sāśvinān ।।

viprebhyo dakṣiṇāndadyānnaimittikamataḥ śṛṇu ।makarādau hayānāñca padmair viṣṇuṃ śriyaṃ yajet ।।brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ somamādityañca tathāśvinau ।revantamuccaiḥśravasandikpālāṃś ca daleṣvapi ।।pratyekaṃ pūrṇakumbhaiś ca vedyāntatsaumyataḥ sthale ।tilākṣatājyasiddhārthān devatānāṃ śataṃ śataṃ ।upoṣitena kartavyaṃ karma cāsvarujāpahaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe aśvaśāntirnāmonanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha navatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gajaśāntiḥ

śālihotra uvāca
gajaśāntiṃ pravakṣyāmi gajarogavimardanīm ।viṣṇuṃ śriyañca pañcamyāṃ nāgam airāvataṃ yajet ।।brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ viṣṇuṃ śakraṃ vaiśnavaṇaṃyamaṃ ।candrārkau varuṇaṃ vāyumagniṃ pṛthvīṃ tathā ca khaṃ ।।śeṣaṃ śailān kuñjarāṃś ca ye te aṣṭau devayonayaḥ ।virupākṣaṃ mahāpadmaṃ bhadraṃ sumanasantathā ।।kumudairāvaṇaḥ padmaḥ puṣpadanto atha vāmanaḥ ।supratīkoñjano nāgā aṣṭau homo atha dakṣiṇāṃ ।।

gajāḥ śāntyudakāsiktā vṛddhau naimittikaṃ sṛṇu ।gajānāmmakarādau ca aiśānyāṃ nagarādvahiḥ ।।sthaṇḍile kamale madhye viṣṇuṃ lakṣmīñca keśare ।brahmāṇaṃ bhāskaraṃ pṛthvīṃ yajet skandaṃ hy anantakaṃ ।।khaṃ śivaṃ somamindrādīṃstadastrāṇi dale kramāt ।vajraṃ śaktiñca daṇḍañca tomaraṃ pāśakaṃ gadāṃ ।।śūlaṃ padmambahirvṛnte cakre sūryantathāśvinau ।vasūnaṣṭhau tathā sādhyān yāmye atha nairṛte dale ।।devānāṅgirasaścāśvibhṛgavo maruto anile ।viśvedevāṃs tathā dakṣe rudrā śaidre atha maṇḍale ।।tato vṛttayā rekhayā tu devān vai vāhyato yajet ।sūtrakārānṛṣīn vāṇīṃ pūrvādau sarito girīn ।।mahābhūtāni koṇeṣu aiśānyādiṣu saṃyajet ।padmaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ śaṅkhaṃ caturaśrantu maṇḍalaṃ ।।caturdhāraṃ tataḥ kumbhāḥ agnyādau ca patākikāḥ ।catvārastoraṇā dvāri nāgān airavatādikān ।।pūrvādau cauṣadhībhiś ca devānāṃ bhājanaṃ pṛthak ।pṛthakśatāhutīścājyair gajānarcya pradakṣiṇaṃ ।।nāgaṃ vahniṃ devatādīn vāhyair jagmuḥ svakaṃ gṛham ।dvijebhyo dikṣiṇāṃ dadyāt hayavaidyādikas tathā ।।kariṇīntu samāruhya vadet karṇantu kālavit ।

maruto anala iti ja

catuḥkumbhā iti ña

patākina iti ja
nāgarāje amṛte śāntiṃ kṛtvāmusmin japenmanum ।।śrīgajastvaṃ kṛto rājñā bhavānasya gajāgraṇīḥ ।prabhūrmālyāgrabhaktaistvāṃ pūjayiṣpati pārthivaḥ ।।lokastadājñayā pūjāṃ kariṣyati tadā tava ।pālanīyastvayā rājā yuddhe adhvani tathā gṛhe ।।tiryagbhāvaṃ samutsṛjya divyaṃ bhāvamanusmara ।devāsure purā yuddhe śrīgajastridaśaiḥ kṛtaḥ ।।airāvaṇasutaḥ śrīmānariṣṭo nāma vāraṇaḥ ।śrīgajānāntu tat tejaḥ sarvamevopatiṣṭhate ।।tattejastava nāgendra divyabhāvasamanvitaṃ ।upatiṣṭhatu bhadrante rakṣa rājānamāhave ।।ityevamabhiṣiktainamāroheta śubhe nṛpaḥ ।tasyānugamanaṃ kuryuḥ saśastranavasadgajāḥ ।।śālāsvasau sthaṇḍile abje dikapālādīn yajedvahiḥ ।keśareṣu balaṃ nāgaṃ bhuvañcaica sarasvatīṃ ।।madhyeṣu ḍiṇḍimaṃ prārcya gandhamālyānulepanaiḥ ।hutvā deyastu kalaso rasapūrṇo dvijāya ca ।।gajādhyakṣaṃ hastipañca gaṇitajñañca pūjayet ।gajādhyakṣāya tandadyāt ḍiṇḍimaṃ sopi vādayet ।śubhagambhīraśabdaiḥ syājjaghanastho abhivādayet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gajaśāntirnāma navatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

kṛdvānyasminniti kha, ja, ña ca

chapter 

ś athaikanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śāntyāyurvedaḥ

dhanvantarir uvāca
goviprapālanaṃ karyaṃ rajñā gośāntimāvade ।gāvaḥ pavitrā māṅgalyā goṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ ।।śakṛnmūtraṃ paraṃ tāsāmalakṣmīnāśanaṃ paraṃ ।gavāṃ kaṇḍūyanaṃ vāri śṛṅgasyāghaughamardanam ।।gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpaś ca rocanā ।śaḍaṅgaṃ paramaṃ pāne duḥsvapnādyādivāraṇaṃ ।।rocanā viṣarakṣoghnī grāsadaḥ svargago gavāṃ ।yadgṛhe duḥkhitā gāvaḥ sa yāti narakannaraḥ ।।paragogrāsadaḥ svargī gohito brahmalokabhāk ।godānātkīrtanādrakṣāṃ kṛtvā coddharate kulam ।।gavāṃ śvāsāt pavitrā bhūḥ sparśanātkilviṣakṣayaḥ ।gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam ।।ekarātropavāsaś ca śvapākamapi śodhayet ।sarvāśubhavināśāya purācīratamīśvaraiḥ ।।pratyekañca tryahābhyamtaṃ mahāsāntapanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।sarvakāmapradañcaitat sarvāśubhavimardanam ।।kṛcchrātikṛcchraṃ payasā divasānekaviṃśatiṃ ।nirmalāḥ sarvakāmāptyā syurgagāḥ spur natottamāḥ ।।

tryahamuṣṇaṃ pivenmūtraṃ tryahamuṣṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ pivet ।tryahamuṣṇaṃ payaḥ pītvā vāyubhakṣaḥ paraṃ tryaham ।।taptakṛcchravrataṃ sarvapāpaghnaṃ brahmalokadaṃ ।śītaistu śītakṛcchraṃ syādbrahmoktaṃ brahmalokadaṃ ।।gomūtreṇācaretsnānaṃ vṛttiṃ kuryācca gorasaiḥ ।gobhirvrajecca bhuktāsu bhuñjītātha ca govratī ।।māsenaikena niṣpāpo golokī svargago bhavet ।vidyāñca gomatīṃ japtvā golokaṃ paramaṃ vrajet ।।gitair nṛtyair apsarobhirvimāne tatra modate ।gāvaḥ surabhayo nityaṃ gāvo guggulagandhikāḥ ।।gāvaḥ pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ gāvaḥ svastyayanaṃ paraṃ ।annameva paraṃ gāvo devānāṃ haviruttamam ।।pāvanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ kṣaranti ca vadanti ca ।haviṣā mantrapūtena tarpayantyamarāndivi ।।ṛṣīṇāmagnihotreṣu gāvo homeṣu yojitāḥ ।sarveṣāmeva bhūtānāṃ gāvaḥ śaraṇamuttamaṃ ।।gāvaḥ pavitraṃ paramaṃ gāvo māṅgalyamuttamaṃ ।gāvaḥ svargasya sopānaṃ gāvo dhanyāḥ sanātanāḥ ।।namo gobhyaḥ śrīmatībhyaḥ saurabheyībhya eva ca ।namo brahmasutābhyaś ca pavitrābhyo namo namaḥ ।।brāhmaṇāś caiva gāvaś ca kulamekaṃ dvidhā kṛtam ।ekatra mantrāstiṣṭhanti havirekatra tiṣṭhati ।।

devabrāhmaṇagosādhusādhvībhiḥ sakalaṃ jagat ।dhāryate vai sadā tasmāt sarve pūjyatamā matāḥ ।।pivanti yatra tattīrthaṃ gaṅgādyā gāva eva hi ।gavāṃ māhātmyamuktaṃ hi cikitsāñca tathā śṛṇu ।।śṛṅgāmayeṣu dhenūnāṃ tailaṃ dadyāt sasaindhavaṃ ।śṛṅgaverabalāmāṃsakalkasiddhaṃ samākṣikaṃ ।।karṇaśūleṣu sarveṣu mañjiṣṭhāhiṅgusaindhavaiḥ ।siddhaṃ tailaṃ pradātavyaṃ rasonenātha vā punaḥ ।।bilvamūlamapāmārgandhātakī casapāṭalā ।kuṭajandantamūleṣu lepāttacchūlanāśanaṃ ।।dantaśūlaharair dravyair ghṛtaṃ rāma vipācitaṃ ।mukharogaharaṃ jñeyaṃ jihvārogeṣu saindhavaṃ ।।śṛṅgaveraṃ haridre dve triphalā ca galagrahe ।hṛcchūle vastiśūle ca vātaroge kṣaye tathā ।।triphalā ghṛtamiśrā ca gavāṃ pāne praśasyate ।atīsāre haridre dve pāṭhāñcaiva pradāpayet ।।sarveṣu koṣṭharogeṣu tathāśākhāgadeṣu ca ।śṛṅgaverañca bhārgīñca kāse śvāse pradāpayet ।।dātavyā bhagnasandhāne priyaṅgurlabaṇānvitā ।tailaṃ vātaharaṃ pitte madhuyaṣṭīvipācitaṃ ।।kaphe vyoṣañca samadhu sapuṣṭakarajo asraje ।tailājyaṃ haritālañca bhagnakṣatiśṛtandadet ।।māsāstilāḥ sagodhūmāḥ paśukṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ tathā ।

eṣāṃ piṇḍī salavaṇā vatsānāṃ puṣṭidātviyaṃ ।।balapradā viṣāṇāṃ syadgrahanāśāya dhūpakaḥ ।devadāru vacā māṃsī guggulurhiṅgusarṣapāḥ ।।grahādigadanāśāya eṣa dhūpo gavāṃ hitaḥ ।ghaṇṭhā caiva gavāṃ kāryā dhūpenānena bhūpitā ।।aśvagandhātilaiḥ śuklaṃ tena gauḥ kṣīriṇī bhavet ।rasāyanañca pinyākaṃ matto yo dhāryate gṛhe ।।bhavāṃ purīṣe pañcabhyāṃ nityaṃ śāntyai śriyaṃ yajet ।vāsudevañca gandhādyair aparā śāntirucyate ।।aśvayukśuklapakṣasya pañcadaśyāṃ yajeddhariṃ ।harirudramajaṃ sūryaṃ śriyamagniṃ ghṛtena ca ।।dadhi samprāśya gāḥ pūjya kāryaṃ vāhnipradakṣiṇaṃ ।vṛṣāṇāṃ yojeyed yuddhaṃ gītavādyaravair vahiḥ ।।gavāntu lavaṇandeyaṃ brāhmaṇānāñca dakṣiṇā ।naimittike mākarādau yajedviṣṇuṃ saha śriyā ।।sthaṇḍilebje madhyagate dikṣu keśaragān surān ।subhadrājo raviḥ pūjyo bahurūpo balirvahiḥ ।।khaṃ viśvarūpā siddhiś ca ṛddhiḥ śāntiś ca rohiṇī ।digdhenavo hi pūrvādyāḥ kṛśaraiś candra īśvaraḥ ।।dikpālāḥ padmapatreṣu kumbheṣvagnau ca homayet ।kṣīravṛkṣasya samidhaḥ sarṣapākṣatataṇḍulān ।।śataṃ śataṃ suvarṇañca kāṃsyādikaṃ dvije dadet ।gāvaḥ pūjyā vimoktavyāḥ śāntyai kṣīrādisaṃyutāḥ ।।

agnir uvāca
śālihotraḥ suśrutāya hayāyurvedamuktavān ।pālakāpyo aṅgarājāya gajāyurvedamabravīt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śāntyāyurvedo nāmaikanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvinavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

mantraparibhāṣā

agnir uvāca
mantravidyāhariṃ vakṣye bhuktimuktipradaṃ śṛṇu ।viṃśatyarṇādhikā mantrā mālāmantrāḥ smṛtā dvija ।।daśākṣarādhikā mantrāstadarvāgvījasaṃjñitāḥ ।vardhakye siddhidā hy ete mālāmantrāstu yauvena ।।pañcākṣarādhikā mantrāḥ siddhidāḥ sarvadāpare ।strīpuṃnapuṃsakatvena tridhāḥ syurmantrajātayaḥ ।।strīmantrā vahnijāyantā namontāś ca napuṃsakāḥ ।śeṣāḥ pumāṃsaste śastā vakṣyoccāṭaviṣeṣu ca ।।kṣudrakriyāmayadhvaṃse striyo anyatra napuṃsakāḥ ।mantrāvāgneyasaumyākhyau tārādyantārdvayorjapet ।।tārāntyāgniviyatprāyo mantra āgneya iṣyate ।śiṣṭaḥ saumyaḥ praśastau tau karmaṇoḥ krūrasaumyayoḥ ।।

bandhoccāṭavaśeṣu ceti ja

striyo nātreti kha
āgneyamantraḥ saumyaḥ syātprāyaśo ante namo anvitaḥ ।saumyamantras tathāgneyaḥ phaṭkāreṇāntato yutaḥ ।।suptaḥ prabuddhamātro vā mantraḥ siddhiṃ na yacchati ।śvāpakālo mahāvāho jāgaro dakṣiṇāvahaḥ ।।āgneyasya manoḥ saumyamantrasyaitadviparyayāt ।prabodhakālaṃ jānīyādubhayorubhayorahaḥ ।।duṣṭarkṣarāśividveṣivarṇādīn varjayenmanūn ।rājyalābhopakārāya prārabhyāriḥ svaraḥ kurūn ।।gopālakakuṭīṃ prāyāt pūrṇāmityuditā lipiḥ ।nakṣetrekṣakramādyojyā svarāntyau revatīyujau ।।velā guruḥ svarāḥ śoṇaḥ karmaṇaivetibheditāḥ ।lipyarṇā vaśiṣu jñeyā ṣaṣṭheśādīṃś ca yojayet ।।lipau catuṣpathasthāyāmākhyavarṇapadāntarāḥ ।siddhāḥ sādhyā dvitīyasthāḥ susiddhā vairiṇaḥ pare ।।siddhādīn kalpayedevaṃ siddhātyantaguṇair api ।siddhe siddho japāt sādhyo japapūjāhutādinā ।।susiddho dhyānamātreṇa sādhakaṃ nāśayedariḥ ।duṣṭārṇapracuro yaḥ syānmantraḥ sarvavininditaḥ ।।praviśya vidhivaddīkṣāmabhiṣekāvasānikām ।śrutvā tantraṃ guror labdhaṃ sādhayedīpsitaṃ manum ।।dhīro dakṣaḥ śucirbhakto japadhyānāditatparaḥ ।

siddhadyantadalair apīti ja

japapūrṇāhutādineti kha
siddhastapasvī kuśalastantrajñaḥ satyabhāṣaṇaḥ ।।nigrahānugrahe śakto gururityabhidhīyate ।śānto dāntaḥ paṭuścīrṇabrahmacaryo haviṣyabhuk ।।kurvannācāryaśuśrūṣāṃ siddhotsāhī sa śiṣyakaḥ ।sa tūpadeśyaḥ putraś ca vinayī vasudas tathā ।।mantrandadyāt susiddhau tu sahasraṃ deśikaṃ japet ।yadṛcchayā śrutaṃ mantraṃ chalenātha balena vā ।।patre sthitañca gāthāñca janayedyadyanarthakam ।mantraṃ yaḥ sādhayedekaṃ japahomārcanādibhiḥ ।।kriyābhirbhūribhistasya sidhyante svalpasādhanāt ।samyaksiddhaikamantrasya nāsādhyamiha kiñcana ।।bahumantravataḥ puṃsaḥ kā kathā śiva eva saḥ ।daśalakṣajapādeka varṇo mantraḥ prasidhyati ।।varṇavṛddhyā japahrāsastenānyeṣāṃ samūhayet ।vījāddvitriguṇānmantrānmālāmantre japakriyā ।।saṅkhyānuktau śataṃ sāṣṭaṃ sahasraṃ vā japādiṣu ।japāddaśāṃśaṃ sarvatra sābhiśekaṃ hutaṃ viduḥ ।।dravyānuktau ghṛtaṃ home japo aśaktasya sarvataḥ ।mūlamantrāddaśāṃśaḥ syādaṅgādīnāṃ japādikam ।।japātsaśaktimantrasya kāmadā mantradevatāḥ ।sādhakasya bhavet tṛptā dhyānahomārcanādinā ।।uccairjapādviśiṣṭaḥ syādupāṃśurdaśabhirguṇaiḥ ।jihvājape śataguṇaḥ sahasro mānasaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।

prāṅmukho avāṅmukho vāpi mantrakarma samārabhet ।praṇavādyāḥ sarvamantrā vāgyato vihitāśanaḥ ।।āsīnastu japenmantrāndevatācāryatulyadṛk ।kuṭīviviktā deśāḥ syurdevālayanadīhradāḥ ।।siddhau yavāgūpūpair vā payo bhakṣyaṃ haviṣyakam ।mantrasya devatā tāvat tithivāreṣu vai japet ।।kṛṣṇāṣṭamīcaturdaśyorgrahaṇādau ca sādhakaḥ ।dasro yamo analo dhātā śaśī rudro gururditiḥ ।।sarpāḥ pitaro atha bhago aryamā śotetaradyutiḥ ।tvaṣṭā maruta indrāgnī mitrendrau nirṛtirjalam ।।viśvedevā hṛṣīkeśo vāyavaḥ salilādhipaḥ ।ajaikapādahirvradhnaḥ pūṣāśvinyādidevatāḥ ।।agnidasrāvumā nighno nāgaś candro divākaraḥ ।mātṛdurgā diśāmīśaḥ kṛṣṇo vaivasvataḥ śivaḥ ।।pañcadaśyāḥ śaśāṅkastu pitarastithidevatāḥ ।haro durgā gururviṣṇurbrahmā lakṣmīrdhaneśvaraḥ ।।ete suryādivāreśā lipinyāso atha kathyate ।keśānteṣu ca vṛtteṣu cakṣuṣoḥ śravaṇadvaye ।।nāsāgaṇḍauṣṭhadantānāṃ dve dve mūrdhasyayoḥ kramāt ।varṇān pañcasuvargānāṃ bāhucaraṇasandhiṣu ।।pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhato nābhau hṛdaye ca kramānnyaset ।

tareti kha

pañcasvaravargāṇāmiti kha
yādīṃś ca hṛdaye nyasyedeṣāṃ syuḥ saptadhātavaḥ ।।tvagasṛṅmāṃsakasnāyumedomajjāśukrāṇi dhātavaḥ ।vasāḥ payo vāsako likhyante caiva lipīśvarāḥ ।।śrīkaṇṭho anantasūkṣmau ca trimūrtiramareśvaraḥ ।agnīśo bhāvabhūtiś ca tithīśaḥ sthānuko haraḥ ।।daṇḍīśo bhautikaḥ sadyojātaścānugraheśvaraḥ ।akrūraś ca mahāsenaḥ śaraṇyā devatā amūḥ ।।tataḥ krodhīśattaṇḍau ca pañcāntakaśivottamau ।tathaiva rudrakūrmau ca trinetrau caturānanaḥ ।।ajeśaḥ śarmasoneśau tathā lāṅgalidārukau ।ardhanārīśvaraścomā kāntaścāṣāḍhidaṇḍinau ।।atrirmonaś ca meṣaś ca lohitaś ca śikhī tathā ।chagalaṇḍadviraṇḍau dvau samahākālavālinau ।।bhujaṅgaś ca pinākī ca khaḍgīśaś ca vakaḥ punaḥ ।śveto bhṛgurlaguḍīśākṣaś ca sambartakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।rudrātmaśaktān likhyādīn namontān vinyaset kramāt ।aṅgāni vinyasetsarve mantrāḥ sāṅgāstu siddhidāḥ ।।hṛllekhāvyomasapūrvāṇyetānyaṅgāni vinyaset ।hṛdādīnyaṅgamantrāntair yo japeddhṛdaye namaḥ ।।svāhā śirasyatha vaṣaṭśikhāyāṃ kavace c hūṃ ।vauṣat netre astrāya phaṭasyāt pañcāṅgaṃ netravarjitam ।।niraṅgasyātmanā cāṅgaṃ nyasyemānniyutaṃ japet ।kramābhyāṃ devīṃ vāgīśīṃ yathoktāṃstu tilān hunet ।।

lipidevī sākṣasūtrakumbhapustakapadmadhṛk ।kavitvādi prayaccheta karmādau siddhaye nyaset ।
niṣkavirnirmalaḥ sarve mantrāḥsidhyanti mātṛbhiḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe mantraparibhāṣā nāma dvinavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha trinavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nāgalakṣaṇāni

agnirucāca
nāgādayo atha bhāvādidaśasthānāni karma ca ।sūtakaṃ daṣṭaceṣṭeti saptalakṣaṇamucyate ।।śeṣavāsukitakṣākhyāḥ karkaṭo abjo mahāmbujaḥ ।śaṅkhapālaś ca kulika ity aṣṭaunāgavaryakāḥ ।।daśāṣṭapañcatriguṇaśatamūrdhānvitau kramāt ।viprau nṛpo viśau śūdrau dvau dvau nāgeṣu kīrtitau ।।tadanvayāḥ pañcaśataṃ tebhyo jātā asaṃkhyakāḥ ।phaṇimaṇḍalirājīlavātapittakaphātmakāḥ ।।vyantarā doṣamiśrāste sarpāṃ darvīkarāḥ smṛtāḥ ।rathāṅgalāṅgalacchatrasvastikāṅkuśadhāriṇaḥ ।।gonasā mandagā dīrghā maṇḍalair vidhaiścitāḥ ।

rathāṅgalāṅgalatramuṣṭikāṅkuśadhāriṇa iti kha

sthitā iti kha
rājilāścitritāḥ snigdhāstiryagūrdhvañca vājibhiḥ ।।vyantarā miśracihnāś ca bhūvarṣāgneyavāyavaḥ ।caturvidhāste ṣaḍviṃśabhedāḥ ṣoḍaśa gonasāḥ ।।trayodaśa ca rājīlā vyantarā ekaviṃśatiḥ ।ye anuktakāle jāyante sarpāste vyantarāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।āṣāḍhāditrimāsaiḥ syādgarbho māṣacatuṣṭaye ।aṇḍkānāṃ śate dve ca catvāriṃśat prasūyate ।।sarpā grasanti sūtaughān vinā strīpunnapuṃsakān ।unmīlate akṣi saptāhāt kṛṣṇo māsādbhavedvahiḥ ।।dvādaśāhāt subodhaḥ syāt dantāḥ syuḥ sūryadarśanāt ।dvātriṃśaddinaviṃśatyā catasrasteṣu daṃṣtrikāḥ ।।karālī makarī kālarātrī ca yamadūtikā ।etāstāḥ saviṣā daṃṣṭrā vāmadakṣiṇapārśvagāḥ ।।ṣanmāsānmucyate kṛttiṃ jovetsaṣṭisamādvayaṃ ।nāgāḥ sūryādivāreśāḥ sapta uktā divā niśi ।।sveṣāṃ ṣaṭ prativāreṣu kulikaḥ sarvasandhiṣu ।śaṅkhena vā mahābjena saha tasyodayo athavā ।।dvayīrvā nāḍikāmantramantrakaṃ kulikodayaḥ ।duṣṭaḥ sa kālaḥ sarvatra sarpadaṃśe viśeṣataḥ ।।kṛttikā bharaṇī svātī mūlaṃ pūrvatrayāśvanī ।viśākhārdrā maghāśleṣā citrā śravaṇarohiṇī ।।hastā mandakujau vārau pañcamī cāṣṭamī tithiḥ ।

nāḍikāmātrasantrakamiti ña

vinirdiśediti ka, kha, ja, ṭa ca
ṣaṣṭhī raiktā śivā nindyā pañcamī ca caturdaśī ।।sandhyācatuṣṭayaṃ duṣṭaṃ dagdhayogāś ca rāśayaḥ ।ekadvibahavo daṃśā daṣṭaviddhañca khaṇḍitam ।।adaṃśamavaguptaṃ syāddaṃśamevaṃ caturvidham ।trayo dvyekakṣatā daṃśā vedanā rudhirolvaṇā ।।naktantvekāṅghrikūrmābhā daṃśāś ca yamacoditāḥ ।dīhīpipīlikāsparśī kaṇṭhaśotharujānvitaḥ ।।satodo ranthito daṃśaḥ saviṣo nyastanirviṣaḥ ।devālaye śūnyagṛhe valmīkodyānakoṭare ।।rathyāsandhau śmaśāne ca nadyāñca sindhusaṅgame ।dvīpe catuṣpathe saudhe gṛhe abje parvatāgrataḥ ।।vilahadvāre jīrṇakūpe jīrṇaveśmani kuḍyake ।śigruśleṣmātakākṣeṣu jambū ḍumbareṇeṣu ca ।।vaṭe ca jīrṇaprākāre khāsyahṛtkakṣajatruṇi ।tālau śaṅkhe gale mūrdhni civuke nābhipādayoḥ ।।daṃśo aśubhaḥ śubho dūtaḥ puṣpahastaḥ suvāk sudhīḥ ।liṅgavarṇasamānaś ca śuklavastro amalaḥ śuciḥ ।।apadvāragataḥ śastrī pramādī bhūgatekṣaṇaḥ ।vivarṇavāsāḥ pāśādihasto gadgadavarṇabhāk ।।śuṣkakāṣṭhāśritaḥ khinnastilāktakakarāṃśukaḥ ।ārdravāsāḥ kṛṣṇaraktapuṣpayuktaśiroruhaḥ ।।kucamardī nakhacchedī gudaspṛk pādalekhakaḥ ।

sadaṃśamavaluptamiti ña

kaṇṭhaśoṣarujāntrita iti ña
keśamuñcī tṛṇacchedī duṣṭā dūtāstathaikaśaḥ ।।iḍānyā vā vaheddvedhā yadi dūtasya cātmanaḥ ।ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ puṣṭayāsmān vidyāstrīpunnapuṃsakān ।।dūtaḥ spṛśati yadgātraṃ tasmin daṃśamudāharet ।dūtāṅghricalanaṃ duṣṭhamutthitirniś calā śubhā ।।jīvapārśve śubho dūto duṣṭo anyatra sammāgataḥ ।jīvo gatāgatair duṣṭaḥ śubho dūtanivedane ।।dūtasya vāk praduṣṭā sā pūrvāmajārdhaninditā ।vibhaktaistasya vākyāntairviṣarnirviṣakālatā ।।ādyaiḥ svaraiś ca kādyaś ca vargair bhinnalipirdvidhā ।svarajo vasumānvargī itikṣepā ca mātṛkā ।।vātāgnīndrajalātmāno vargeṣu ca catuṣṭayam ।napuṃsakāḥ pañcamāḥ syuḥ svarāḥ śakrāmbuyonayaḥ ।।duṣṭau dūtasya vākpādau vātāgnī madhyamo hariḥ ।praśastā vāruṇā varṇā atiduṣṭā napuṃsakāḥ ।।prasthāne maṅgalaṃ vākyaṃ garjitaṃ meghahastinoḥ ।pradakṣiṇaṃ phale vṛkṣe vāmasya ca rutaṃ jitaṃ ।।śubhā gītādiśabdāḥ syurīdṛśaṃ syādasiddhaye ।anarthagīrathākrando dakṣiṇe virutaṃ kṣutam ।।veśyā kṣuto nṛpaḥ kanyā gaurdantī murajadhvajau ।kṣīrājyadadhiśaṅkhāmbu chatraṃ bherī phalaṃ surāḥ ।।taṇḍulā hema rupyañca siddhaye abhimukhā amī ।sakāṣṭhaḥ sānalaḥ kārurmalināmbarabhāvabhṛt ।।

galasthaṭaṅgo gomāyugṛdhrolūkakapardikāḥ ।tailaṃ kapālakārpāsā niṣedhe bhasma naṣṭaye ।।viṣarogāś ca sapta syurdhātordhātvantarāptitaḥ ।viṣadaṃśo lalāṭaṃ yātyatonetraṃ tatau sukham ।
āsyācca vacanīnāḍyau dhātūna prāpnoti hi kramāt ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nāgalakṣaṇadirnāma trinavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha caturnavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

daṣṭacikitsā

agnir uvāca
mantradhyānauṣadhair daṣṭacikitsāṃ pravadāmi te ।oṃ namo bhagavate nīlakaṇṭhāyeti ।japanādviṣahāniḥ syadauṣadhaṃ jīvarakṣaṇaṃ ।।sājyaṃ sakṛdrasaṃ peyaṃ dvividhaṃ viṣamucyate ।jaṅgamaṃ sarpabhūṣādi śṛṅgyādi sthāvaraṃ viṣaṃ ।।śāntasvarānvito brahmā lohitaṃ tārakaṃ śivaḥ ।viyaternāmamantro ayaṃ tārkṣaḥ śabdamayaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
oṃ jvala mahāmate hṛdayāya garuḍavirālaśirase garuḍaśikhāyai garuḍa viṣabhañjana prabhedana prabhedana vitrāsaya vitrāsaya vima-[!!!]

tārakaḥ iti kha

garuḍavilāsaśirase iti kha

rdaya vimardaya kavacāya apratihataśāmanaṃ vaṃ hūṃ phaṭ astrāya ugrarūpavāraka sarvabhayaṅkara bhīṣaya sarvaṃ daha daha bhasmīkuru kuru svāhā netrāya

saptavargāntayugmāṣṭadigdalasvara keśarādivarṇaruddhaṃ vahnirābhūtakarṇakaṃ mātṛkāmbujaṃ
kṛtvā hṛdisthaṃ tanmantrī vāmahastatale smaret ।aṅgaṣṭhādau nyasedvarṇānviyaterbheditāḥ kalāḥ ।।pītaṃ vajracatuṣkoṇaṃ pārthivaṃ śakradaivataṃ ।vṛttārdhamāpyapadmārdhaṃ śuklaṃ varūṇadaivataṃ ।।tryastraṃ svastikayuktañca taijasaṃ vahnidaivataṃ ।vṛttaṃ vinduvṛtaṃ vāyudaivataṃ kṛṣṇamālinam ।।aṅguṣṭhādyaṅgulīmadhye paryasteṣu svaveśmasu ।suvarṇanāgavāhena veṣṭhiteṣu nyaset kramāt ।।viyateś caturo varṇān sumaṇḍalasamatviṣaḥ ।arūpe ravatanmātre ākāśeśivadevate ।।kaniṣṭhāmadhyaparvasthe nyasettasyādyamakṣaram ।nāgānāmādivarṇāṃś ca svamaṇḍalagatānnyaset ।।bhūtādivarṇān vinyasedaṅguṣṭādyantaparvasu ।tanmātrādiguṇābhyarṇānaṅgulīṣu nyasedbudhaḥ ।।sparśanādevatārkṣeṇa haste hanyādviṣadvayaṃ ।maṇḍalādiṣu tān varṇān viyateḥ kavayo jitān ।।śreṣṭhadvyaṅgulibhirdehanābhisthāneṣu parvasu ।

bhedikāstatheti kha

varatanmatre iti kha
ājānutaḥ suvarṇābhamānābhestuhinaprabham ।।kuṅkumāruṇamākaṇṭhādākeśāntāt sitetaraṃ ।brahmāṇḍavyāpinaṃ tārkṣañcandrākhyaṃ nāgabhūṣaṇam ।।nīlogranāśamātmānaṃ mahāpakṣaṃ smaredbudhaḥ ।evantātkṣātmano vākyānmantraḥ syānmantriṇo viṣe ।।suṣṭistārkṣakarasyāntaḥsthitāṅguṣṭhaviṣāpahā ।tārkṣaṃ hastaṃ samudyamya tatpañcāṅgulicālanāt ।।kuryādviṣasya stambhādīṃstaduktamadavīṣayā ।ākāśādeṣa bhūvījaḥ pañcārṇādhipatirmanuḥ ।।saṃstambhayetiviṣato bhāṣayā stambhyedviṣam ।vyatyastabhūṣayā vījo mantro ayaṃ sādhusādhitaḥ ।।saṃplavaḥ plāvaya yamaḥ śabdādyaḥ saṃharedviṣaṃ ।daṇḍamutthāpayedeṣa sujaptāmbho abhiṣekataḥ ।।sujaptaśaṅkhabheryādinisvanaśravaṇena vā ।saṃdahatyeva saṃyukto bhūtejovyatyayāt sthitaḥ ।।bhūvāyuvyatyayānmantro viṣaṃ saṃkrāmayatyasau ।antastho nijaveśmastho vījāgnīndujalātmabhiḥ ।।etat karma nayenmantrī garuḍākṛtivigrahaḥ ।tārkṣavarṇagehasthastajjapānnāśayedviṣam ।।jāmudaṇḍīdamuditaṃ svadhāśrīvījalāñchitaṃ ।snānapānātsarvaviṣaṃ jvarātogāpamṛtyujit ।।pakṣi pakṣi mahāpakṣi mahāpakṣi vidhi svāhā ।

yaśa iti ña

pakṣi pakṣi mahāpakṣi mahāpakṣi kṣi kṣi svāhā ।।

dvāvetau pakṣirāḍmantrau viṣaghnāvabhimantraṇāt

pakṣirājāya vidhmahe pakṣidevāya dhīmahi tatro garuḍa
pracodayāt
vahnisthau pārśvatatpūrvau dantaśrīkau ca daṇḍinau ।।
sakālo lāṅgalī ceti nīlakaṇṭhādyamīritaṃ ।
vakṣaḥkaṇṭhaśikhāśvetaṃ nyasetstambhe susaṃskṛtau ।।

hara hara hṛdayāya namaḥ kapardine ca śirase nīlakaṇṭhāya vai śikhāṃ kālakūṭaviṣabhakṣaṇāya svāhā

atha varma ca kaṇṭhe netraṃ kṛttivāsāstrinetraṃ pūrvādyair ānanair yuktaṃ śvetapītāruṇāsitaiḥ
abhayaṃ varadaṃ cāpaṃ vāsukiñca dadhadbhujaiḥ ।yasyoparītapārśvasthagaurīrudro asya devatā ।।pādajānuguhānābhihṛtkaṇṭhānanamūrdhasu ।mantrārṇānnyasya karayoraṅguṣṭhādyaṅgulīṣu ca ।।tarjanyāditadantāsu sarvamaṅguṣṭhayor nyaset ।dhyātvaivaṃ saṃharet kṣipraṃ vaddhayā śūlamudrayā ।।kaniṣṭhā jyeṣṭhayā vaddhā tiśro anyāḥ prasṛterjavāḥ ।viṣanāśe vāmahastamanyasmin dakṣiṇaṃ karaṃ ।।
oṃ namo bhagavate nīlakaṇṭhāya ciḥ amalakaṇṭhāya ciḥ

sarvajñakaṇṭhāya ciḥ kṣipa oṃ svāhā

amalanīlakaṇṭhāya naikasarvaviṣāpahāya

namaste rudramanyava itisarmārjanādviṣaṃ vinaśyati na sandehaḥ karṇajāpyā upānahāvā
yajedrudravidhānena nīlagrīvaṃ maheśvaram ।
viṣavyādhivināśaḥ syāt kṛtvā rudravidhānakaṃ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe daṣṭacikitsā nāma caturṇavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

pañcāṅgarudravidhānaṃ

agnir uvāca
vakṣye rudravidhānantu pañcāṅgaṃ sarvadaṃ paraṃ ।hṛdayaṃ śivasaṅkalpaḥ śivaḥ sūktantu pauruṣam ।।śikhābhyaḥ sambhṛtaṃ sūktamāśuḥ kavacameva ca ।śatarudriyamastrañca rudrasyāṅgāni pañca hi ।।pañcāṅgānnyasya taṃ dhyātvā japedrudrāṃstaḥ kramāt ।yajjāgrata iti sūktaṃ yadṛcaṃ mānasaṃ viduḥ ।।ṛṣiḥ syācchivamaṅkalpaśchandastriṣṭuvudāhṛtaṃ ।śivaḥ sahasraśīrṣeti tasya nārāyaṇo apyṛṣiḥ ।।devatā puruṣo anuṣṭupchando jñeyañca traiṣṭubham ।abhyaśrasambhṛtaṃ sūktamṛṣiruttaragonaraḥ ।।ādyānāntimṛṇāṃ triṣṭupchando anuṣṭhuvdvayorapi ।

uttaragonasa iti ja, ṭa ca
chandastriṣṭubhamantyāyāḥ puruṣo asyāpi deṣatā ।।āśurintro dvādaśānāṃ chandastriṣṭuvudāhṛtaṃ ।ṛṣiḥ proktaḥ pratirathaḥ sūkte saptadaśārcake ।।pṛthak pṛthak devatāḥ syuḥ puruvidaṅgadevatā ।avaśiṣṭadaivateṣu chando anuṣṭuvudāhṛtaṃ ।।asau yamo bhavitrīndraḥ puruliṅgoktadevatāḥ ।paṅkticchando atha marmāṇi tvapaliṅgoktadevatāḥ ।।raudrādhyāye ca sarvasminnārṣaṃ syāt parameṣvapi ।prajāpatirvā devānāṃ kutsasya tisṛṇām punaḥ ।।manodvayorumaikā syādrudro rudrāś ca devatāḥ ।ādyonuvāko atha pūrva ekarudrākhyadaivataḥ ।।chando gāyatryamādyāyā anuṣṭup tisṛṇāmṛcām ।tisṛṇāñca tathā paṅktiranuṣṭuvatha saṃsmṛtam ।।dvayoś ca jagatīchando rudrāṇāmapyaśītayaḥ ।hiraṇyavāhavastisro namo vaḥ kirikāya ca ।।pañcarco rudradevāḥ syurmantre rudrānuvākakaḥ ।viṃśake rudradevāstāḥ prathamā vṛhatī smṛtā ।।ṛgdvitīyā trijagatī triṣṭuveva ca ।anuṣṭubho yajustisra āryādijñaḥ susiddhibhāk ।।trailokyamohanenāpi viṣavyādhyarimardanaṃ ।

bhavitrīti triṣṭub liṅgoktadevateti kha

rudrātmavācaka iti ja, ṭa ca

viṣavyādhivimardanamiti ja

iṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ hrauṃ hūṃ trailokyamohanāya viṣṇave
namaḥ ।aguṣṭubhaṃ nṛsiṃhena viṣavyādhivināśanaṃ ।।oṃ iṃ iṃ ugravīraṃ maṃhāviṣṇuṃ jvalantaṃsarvatomukhaṃ ।nṛsiṃhaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ mṛtyumṛtyumnamāmyahaṃ ।।ayameva tu pañcāṅgo mantraḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ ।dvādaśāṣṭākṣarau mantrau viṣavyādhivimardanau ।।kubjikā tripurā gaurī candrikā viṣahāriṇī ।prasādamantro viṣahṛdāyurārogyavardhanaḥ ।।sauro vināyakastadvadrudramantrāḥ sadākhilāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe pañcāṅgarudravidhānaṃnāma pañcanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣannavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

viṣahṛnmantrauṣadhaṃ
agnir uvāca । oṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya chinda viṣaṃ
jvalitaparaśupāṇaye ca । namo bhagavate pakṣirudrāya daṣṭakaṃ utthapaya daṣṭakaṃ kampaya jalpaya sarpadaṣṭamutthāpaya lala bandha gocaya vararudra gaccha badha truṭa bhīṣaya muṣṭinā saṃhara viṣaṃ ṭha ṭha

oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ hrūmiti ña

oṃ hauṃ haṃ iti ja

caṇḍikā iti ña

pakṣirarudreṇa ha viṣaṃ nāśamāyāti mantraṇāt

oṃ namo bhagavate rudra nāśaya viṣaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamaṃ kṛtrimākṛtrimaviṣamupaviṣaṃ nāśaya nānāviṣaṃ daṣṭakaviṣaṃ nāśaya dhama dama vama meghāndhakāradhārākarṣanirviṣayībhava saṃhara gaccha āveśaya viṣotthāpanarūpaṃ mantrāntādviṣadhāraṇaṃ oṃ kṣipa oṃ kṣipa svāhā

oṃ hrīṃ khīṃ saḥ ṭhandrauṃ hrīṃ ṭhaḥ
japādinā sādhitastu sarpān badhnāti nityaśaḥ ।।ekadvitricaturvījaḥ kṛṣṇacakrāṅgapañcakaḥ ।gopījanavallabhāya svāhā sarvārthasādhakaḥ ।।
oṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya pretādhipataye guttva garja bhrāmaya muñca muhya kaṭa āviśa suvarṇapataṅga rudro jñāpayati ṭha 
pātālakṣobhamantroyaṃ mantraṇādviṣanāśanaḥ ।daṃśakāhidaṃśe sadyo daṣṭaḥ kāṣṭhaśilādinā ।।viṣaśāntyai dehāddaṃśaṃ jvālakokanadādinā ।śirīṣavījapuṣpārkakṣīravījakaṭutrayaṃ ।।viṣaṃ vināśayet pānalepanenāñjanādinā ।śirīṣapuśpasya rasabhāvitaṃ maricaṃ sitaṃ ।।pānanasyāñjanādyaiś ca viṣaṃ hanyānna saṃśayaḥ ।koṣātakīvacāhiṅguśirīśārkapayoyutaṃ ।।

gulu iti ña

jvālako kaladālineti kha
kuṭutrayaṃ sameṣāmbho harennasyādinā viṣaṃ ।rāmaṭhekṣvākusarvāṅgacūrṇaṃ nasyādviṣāpahaṃ ।।indrabalāgnikandroṇaṃ tulasī devikā sahā ।tadrasāktaṃ trikaṭukaṃ cūrṇambhakṣyayiṣāpahaṃ ।pañcāṅgaṃ kṛṣṇapañcabhyāṃ śirīṣasya viṣāpahaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpuraṇe viṣahṛnmantrauṣadhaṃ nāma ṣannavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gonasādicikitsā

agnirucāca
gonasādicikitsāñca vaśiṣṭha śṛṇu vacmi te ।
hrīṃ hrīṃ amalapakṣi svāhā
tāmbūlakhādanānmantrī harenmaṇḍalino viṣaṃ ।।laśunaṃ rāmaṭhaphalaṃ kuṣṭhāgnivyoṣakaṃ viṣe ।snuhīkṣīraṃ gavyaghṛtaṃ pakṣaṃ pītvāhije viṣe ।।atha rājiladaṣṭe ca peyā kṛṣṇā samaindhavā ।ājyakṣaudraśakṛttoyaṃ purītatyā viṣāpahaṃ ।।sakṛṣṇākhaṇḍadugdhājyaṃ pātavyantena mākṣikaṃ ।vyoṣaṃ picchaṃ viḍālāsthi nakulāṅgaruhaiḥ samaiḥ ।।cūrṇitair meṣadugdhāktair dhūpaḥ sarvaviṣāpahaḥ ।

romanirguṇḍikākokavarṇair vā laśunaṃ samaṃ ।।munipatraiḥ kṛtasvedaṃ daṣṭaṃ kāñcikapācitaiḥ ।mūṣikāḥ ṣoḍaśa proktā rasaṅkārpāsajampivet ।।satailaṃ mūṣikārtighnaṃ phalinīkusumantathā ।sanāgaraguḍambhakṣyaṃ tadviṣārocakāpahaṃ ।।cikitsā viṃṣatirbhūtā lūtāviṣaharo gaṇaḥ ।padmakaṃ pāṭalī kuṣṭhaṃ natamūśīracandanaṃ ।।nirguṇḍī śārivā śelu lūtārtaṃ secayejjalaiḥ ।guñjānirguṇḍikaṅkolaparṇaṃ śuṇṭhī niśādvayaṃ ।।karañjāsthi ca tatpaṅkaiḥ vṛścikārtiharaṃ śṛṇu ।mañjiṣṭhā candanaṃ vyoṣapuṣpaṃ śirīṣakaumudaṃ ।।saṃyojyāś caturo yogā lepādau vṛścikāpahāḥ ।
oṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya civi chinda kiri bhinda khaḍge na chedaya śūlena bhedaya cakreṇa dāraya oṃ hrūṃ phaṭ
mantreṇa mantrito deyo gardhabhādīnnikṛntati ।।triphalośīramustāmbumāṃsīpadmakacandanaṃ ।ajākṣīreṇa pānādergardhabhāderviṣaṃ haret ।।haret śirīṣapañcāṅgaṃ vyoṣaṃ śatapadīviṣaṃ ।sakandharaṃ śirīṣāsthi haredundūrajaṃ viṣaṃ ।।vyoṣaṃ sasarpiḥ piṇḍītamūlamasya viṣaṃ haret ।

tatpakṣair iti ja, ña, ṭa ca

ciri iti ja
kṣāravyoṣavacāḍiṅguviḍaṅgaṃ saindhavannataṃ ।।ambaṣṭhātibalākuṣṭhaṃ sarvakīṭaviṣaṃ haret ।yaṣṭivyoṣaguḍakṣīrayogaḥ śūno viṣāpahaḥ ।।oṃ subhadrāyai namaḥ oṃ suprabhāyai namaḥ ।yānyauṣadhāni gṛhyante vidhānena vinā janaiḥ ।।teṣāṃ vījantvyā grāhyamiti brahmābravīcca tām ।tāmpraṇamyauṣadhīmpaścāt yavān prakṣipya muṣṭinā ।।daśa japtvā mantramidaṃ namaskuryāttadauṣadhaṃ ।tvāmuddharāmyūrdhvanetrāmanenaiva ca bhakṣayet ।।namaḥ puruṣasiṃhāya namo gopālakāya ca ।ātmanaivābhijānāti raṇe kṛṣṇaparājayaṃ ।।etena satyavākyena agado me astu sidhyatu ।
namo vaidūryamāte tanna rakṣa māṃ sarvaviṣebhyo gauri gāndhāri cāṇḍāli mātaṅgini svāhā harimāye
auṣadhādau prayoktavyo mantro ayaṃ sthāvare viṣe ।।bhuktamātre sthite jvāle padmaṃ śītāmbusevitaṃ ।pāyayetsaghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ viṣañcettadanantaraṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gonasādicikitsā nāma saptanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ṣaṣṭivyoṣaguḍakṣīrayoga iti ka, ja, ña, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś athāṣṭanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

balagrahaharabālatantram

agnir uvāca
bālatantraṃ pravakṣyāmi bālādigrahamardanaṃ ।atha jātadine vatsaṃ grahī gṛhṇāti pāpinī ।।gātrodvego nirāhāro nānāgrīvāvivartanaṃ ।tacceṣṭitamidaṃ tasyānmātṝṇāñca balaṃ haret ।।satsyamāṃsasurābhakṣyagandhasragdhūpadīpakaiḥ ।limpecca dhātakīlodhramañjiṣṭhātālacandanaiḥ ।।mahiṣākṣeṇa dhūpaś ca dvirātre bhauṣaṇī grahī ।tacceṣṭā kāsaniśvāsau gātrasaṅkocanaṃ muhuḥ ।।ājamūtrair lipet kṛṣṇāsevyāpāmārgacandanaiḥ ।gośṛṅgadantakeśaiś ca dhūpayet pūrvavadbaliḥ ।।grahī trirātre ghaṇṭhālī tacceṣṭā krandanaṃ muhuḥ ।jṛmbhaṇaṃ svanitantrāso gātrodvegamarocanaṃ ।।keśarāñjanagohastidantaṃ sājapayo lipet ।nakharājībilvadalair dhūpayecca baliṃ haret ।।grahī caturthī kākolī gātrodvegaprarocanaṃ ।phenodgāro diśo dṛṣṭiḥ kulmāṣaiḥ sāsavair baliḥ ।।gajadantāhinirmokavājimūtrapralepanaṃ ।sarājīnimbapatreṇa dhūtakeśena chūpayet ।।haṃsādhikā pañcamī syājjṛmbhāśvāsordhadhāriṇī ।

muṣṭibandhaś ca tacceṣṭā baliṃ matsyādinā haret ।।meṣaśṛṅgabalālodhraśilātālaiḥ śiśuṃ lipet ।phaṭkārī tu grahī ṣaṣṭhī bhayamohaprarodanaṃ ।।nirāhāro aṅgavikṣepo harenmatsyādinā baliṃ ।rājīguggulukuṣṭhebhadantādyair dhūpalepanaiḥ ।।saptame muktakeśyārtaḥ pūtigandho vijṛmbhaṇaṃ ।sādaḥ prarodanaṅkāso dhūpo vyāghranakhair lipet ।।vacāgomayagomūtraiḥ śrīdaṇḍī cāṣṭame grahī ।diśo nirīkṣaṇaṃ jihvācālanaṅkāsarodanaṃ ।।baliḥ pūrvaiva matsyādyair dhūpalepe ca hiṅgulā ।vacāsiddharthalaśunaiścordhvagrāhī mahāgrahī ।।udvejanordhvaniḥśvāsaḥ svamuṣṭidvayakhādanaṃ ।raktacandanakuṣṭhādyair dhūpayellepayecchiśuṃ ।।kapiromanakhair dhūpo daśamī rodanī grahī ।tacceṣṭā rodanaṃ śaśvat sugandho nīlavarṇatā ।।dhūpo nimbena bhūtograrājīsarjarasair lipet ।baliṃ vahirharellājakulmāṣakavakodanam ।।yāvattrayodaśāhaṃ syādevaṃ dhūpādikā kriyā ।gṛhnāti māsikaṃ vatsaṃ pūtanāsaṅkulī grahī ।।kākavadrodanaṃ śvāso mūtragandho akṣimīlanaṃ ।gomūtrasnapanaṃ tasya godantena ca dhūpanam ।।

dhūpadīpe ceti ṭa

karakodanamiti kha
pītavastraṃ dadedraktasraggandhau tailadīpakaḥ ।trividhaṃ pāyasammadyaṃ tilamāsañcaturvidham ।।karañjādho yamadiśi saptāhaṃ tair baliṃ haret ।dvimāsikañca mukuṭā vapuḥ śītañca śītalaṃ ।।chardhiḥ syānmukhaśoṣādipuṣpagandhāṃśukāni ca ।apūpamodanaṃ dīpaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nīrādi dhūpakam ।।tṛtīye gomukhī nidrā savinmūtraprarodanam ।yavāḥ priyaṅguḥ palanaṃ kulmāṣaṃ śākamodanam ।।kṣīraṃ pūrve dadenmadhye ahani dhūpaś ca sarpiṣā ।pañcabhaṅgena tat snānaṃ caturthe piṅgalārtihṛt ।।tanuḥ śītā pūtigandhaḥ śoṣaḥ sa mriyate dhruvam ।pañcamī lalanā gātrasādaḥ syānmukhaśoṣaṇaṃ ।।apānaḥ pītavarṇaś ca matsyādyair dakṣiṇe baliḥ ।ṣaṇmāse paṅkajā ceṣṭā rodanaṃ vikṛtaḥ svaraḥ ।।matsyamāṃsasurābhaktapuṣpagandhādibhirbaliḥ ।saprame tu nirāhārā pūtigandhādidantaruk ।।piṣṭamāṃsasurāmāṃsair baliḥ syādyamunāṣṭame ।visphoṭaśoṣaṇādyaṃ syāt taccikitsānna kārayet ।।navame kumbhakarṇyārto jvarī cchardati pālakam ।rodanaṃ māṃsakulmāṣamadyādyair vaiśvake baliḥ ।।daśame tāpasī ceṣṭā nirāhārokṣimīlanam ।ghaṇṭā patākā piṣṭoktā surāmāṃsabaliḥ same ।।rākṣasyekādaśī pīḍā netrādyaṃ na cikitsanam ।

cañcalā dvādaśe śvāsaḥ trāsādikaviceṣṭitam ।।baliḥ pūrve atha madhyāhne kulmāpādyaistilādibhiḥ ।yātanā tu dvitīye abde yātanaṃ rodanādikam ।।tilamāṃsamadyamāṃsair baliḥ snānādi pūrvavat ।tṛtīye rodanī kampo rodanaṃ raktamūtrakaṃ ।।guḍaudanaṃ tilāpūpaḥ pratimā tilapiṣṭajā ।tilasnānaṃ pañcapatrair dhūpo rājaphalatvacā ।।caturthe caṭakāśopho jvaraḥ sarvāṅgasādanam ।matsyamāṃsatilādyaiś ca baliḥ snānañca dhūpanam ।।cañcalā pañcame abde tu jvarastrāso aṅgasādanam ।māṃsaudanādyaiś ca balirmeṣaśṛṅgeṇa dhūpanam ।।palāśodumbarāśvatthavaṭabilvadalāmbudhṛk ।ṣaṣṭhe abde dhāvanīśoṣo vairasyaṃ gātrasādanam ।।saptāhobhirbaliḥ pūrvair dhupasnānañca bhaṅgakaiḥ ।saptame yamunācchardiravacohāsarodanam ।।māṃsapādyasamadyādyair baliḥ snānañca dhūpanam ।aṣṭame vā jātavedā nirāhāraṃ prarodanam ।।kṛśarāpūpadadhyādyair baliḥ snānañca dhūpanam ।kālābde navame vāhvorāsphoṭo garjanaṃ bhayam ।।baliḥ syāt kṛśarāpūpaśaktukulmāsapāyasaiḥ ।daśame abde kalahaṃsī dāho aṅgakṛśatā jvaraḥ ।।

vaivarṇyamiti ṭha

bhāgakair iti kha
paulikāpūpadadhyannaiḥ pañcarātraṃ baliṃ haret ।nimbadhūpakuṣṭhalepa ekādaśamake grahī ।।devadūtī niṣṭhuravāk balirlepādi pūrvavat ।balikā dvādaśe balirlepādi pūrvavat ।।trayodaśe vāyavī ca mukhavāhyāṅgasādanam ।raktānnagandhamālyādyair baliḥ pañcadalaiḥ snapet ।।rājīnisvadalair dhūpo yakṣiṇī ca caturdaśe ।ceṣṭā śūlaṃ jvaro dāho māṃsabhakṣādikair baliḥ ।।snānādi pūrvavacchāntyai muṇḍikārtistripañcake ।tacceṣṭāsṛkśravaḥ śaśvatkuryāmmātṛcikitsanam ।।vānarī ṣoḍaśī bhūmau patennidrā sadā jvaraḥ ।pāyasādyaistrirātrañca valiḥ snānādi pūrvavat ।।gandhavatī saptadaśe gātrodvegaḥ prarodanam ।kulmāṣādyair baliḥ snānadhūpalepādi pūrvavat ।।dineśāḥ pūtanā nāma varṣeśāḥ sukumārikāḥ ।
oṃ namaḥ sarvamātṛbhyo bālapīḍāsaṃyogaṃ bhuñja bhuñja cuṭa cuṭa sphoṭaya sphoṭaya sphura sphura gṛhṇa gṛhṇa ākaṭṭaya ākaṭṭaya evaṃ siddharūpo jñāpayati । hare hare nirdoṣaṃ kuru kuru bālikāṃ bālaṃ striyam puruṣaṃ vā sarvagrahāṇāmupakramāt

cāmuṇḍe namo devyai hrūṃ hrūṃ hrīṃ apasara apasara duṣṭagrahān hrūṃ tadyathā gacchantu gṛhyakāḥ anyatra panthānaṃ rudro jñāpayati
sarvabālagraheṣu syānmantro ayaṃ sarvakāmikaḥ ।।
oṃ namo bhagavati cāmuṇḍe muñca muñca baliṃ bālikāṃ vā
baliṃ gṛhṇa gṛhṇa jaya jaya vasa vasa ।sarvatra balidāne ayaṃ rakṣākṛt paṭhyate manuḥ ।rakṣantu ca jvarābhyāntaṃ muñcantu ca kumārakam ।brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ skando gauro gaurīlakṣmīrgaṇādayaḥ ।
e ity āgnaye mahāpurāṇe bālagrahaharaṃ bālatantraṃ nāma aṣṭanavatyadhikadviṣatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha navanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

grahahṛnmantrādikam

agnir uvāca
grahāpahāramantrādīn vakṣye grahavimardanān ।harṣecchābhayaśokādiviruddhāśucibhojanāt ।।gurudevādikopācca pañconmādā bhavanty atha ।tridoṣajāḥ sannipātā āganturiti te smṛtāḥ ।।devādayo grahā jātā rudrakrodhādanekadhā ।saritsarastaḍāgādau śailopavanasetuṣu ।।nadīsaṅge śūnyagṛhe viladvāryekavṛkṣake ।grahā gṛhṇanti puṃsaś ca śriyaḥ suptāñca garbhiṇīm ।।āsannapuṣpānnagnāñca ṛtusnānaṃ karoti yā ।avamānaṃ nṛṇāṃ vairaṃ vighnaṃ bhāgyaviparyayaḥ ।।devatāgurudharmādisadācārādilaṅghanam ।

striya iti ña, ṭa ca
patanaṃ śailavṛkṣādervidhunvanmūrdhajaṃ muhuḥ ।।rudannṛtyati raktākṣo hūṃrūpo anugrahī naraḥ ।udvignaḥ śūladāhārtaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇārtaḥ śirortimān ।।dehi dahīti yāceta balikāmagrahī naraḥ ।strīmālābhogasnānecchūratikāmagrahī naraḥ ।।mahāsudarśano vyomavyāpī viṭapanāsikaḥ ।pātālanārasiṃhādyā caṇḍīmantrā grahārdanāḥ ।।pṛśnīhiṅguvacācakraśirīṣadayitamparam ।pāśāṅkuśadharaṃ devamakṣamālākapālinam ।।khaṭṭāṅgābjādiśiktiñca dadhānaṃ caturānanam ।antarvāhyādikhaṭṭāṅgapadmasthaṃ ravimaṇḍale ।।ādityādiyutaṃ prārcya uditerke arghyakaṃ dadet ।śvāsaviṣāgniviprakuṇḍīhṛllekhāsakalo bhṛguḥ ।।arkāya bhūrbhuvaḥsvaś ca jvālinīṃ kulamudgaram ।padmāsano aruṇo raktavastrasadyutiviśvakaḥ ।।udāraḥ padmadhṛgdorbhyāṃ saumyaḥ sarvāṅgabhūṣitaḥ ।raktā hṛdādayaḥ saumyā varadāḥ padmadhāriṇaḥ ।।vidyutpuñjanibhaṃ vastraṃ śvetaḥ saumyo aruṇaḥ kujaḥ ।budhastadvadguruḥ pītaḥ śuklaḥ śukraḥ śanaiś caraḥ ।।kṛṣṇāṅgāranibho rāhurdhūmraḥ keturudāhṛtaḥ ।vāmoruvāmahastānte dakṣahastābhayapradā ।।svanāmādyantu vījāste hastau saṃśodhya cāstrataḥ ।

vipiṭanāsika iti ña
aṅguṣṭhādau tale netre hṛdādyaṃ vyāpakaṃ nyaset ।।mūlavījaistribhiḥ prāṇadhyāyakaṃ nyasya sāṅgakam ।prakṣālya pātramastreṇa mūlenāpūrya vāriṇā ।।gandhapuṣpākṣataṃ nyasya dūrvāmarghyañca mantrayet ।ātmānaṃ tena samprokṣya pūjādravyañca vai dhruvam ।।prabhūtaṃ vimalaṃ sāramārādhyaṃ paramaṃ sukham ।pīṭhādyān kalpayedetān hṛdā madhye vidikṣu ca ।।pīṭhopari hṛdā madhye dikṣu caiva vidikṣu ca ।pīṭhopari hṛdābjañca keśaveṣvaṣṭaśaktayaḥ ।।vāṃ dīptāṃ vīṃ tathā sukṣmāṃ vuñjayāṃ vūñcabhādrikāṃ ।veṃ vibhūtīṃ vaiṃ vimalāṃ vomasighātavidyutām ।।vauṃ sarvatomukhīṃ vaṃ pīṭhaṃ vaḥ prārcya raviṃ yajet ।āvāhya dadyāt pādyādi hṛtṣaḍaṅgena suvrata ।।khakārau daṇḍinau caṇḍau majjā daśanasaṃyutā ।māṃsadīrghā jaradvāyuhṛdaitat sarvadaṃ raveḥ ।।vahnīśarakṣo marutām kikṣu pūjyā hṛdādayaḥ ।svamantraiḥ karṇikāntasthā dikṣvastraṃ purataḥ sadṛk ।।pūrvādidikṣu sampūjyāś candrajñagurubhārgavāḥ ।nasyāñjanādi kurvīta sājamūtrair grahāpahaiḥ ।।pāṭhāpathyāvacāśigrusindhūvyoṣaiḥ pṛthak phalaiḥ ।ajākṣīrāḍhake pakvasarpiḥ sarvagrahān haret ।।vṛścikālīphalīkuṣṭhaṃ lavaṇāni ca śārṅgakam ।apasmāravināśāya tajjalaṃ tvabhibhojayet ।।

vidārīkuśakāśekṣukvāthajaṃ pāyayet payaḥ ।droṇe sayaṣṭikuṣmāṇḍarase sarpiś ca saṃskṛtau ।।pañcagavyaṃ ghṛtaṃ tadvadyogaṃ jvaraharaṃ śṛṇu ।
oṃ bhasmāstrāya vidmahe ekadaṃṣṭrāya dhīmahi tanno jvaraḥ pracodayāt
kṛṣṇoṣaṇaniśārāsnādrākṣātailaṃ guḍaṃ lihet ।।śvāsavānatha vā bhārgīṃ sayaṣṭimadhusarpiṣā ।pāṭhā tiktā kaṇā bhārgī athavā madhunā lihet ।।dhātrī viśvasitā kṛṣṇā mustā kharjūramāgadhī ।pivaraśceti hikkāghnaṃ tat trayaṃ madhunā lihet ।।kāmalī jīramāṇḍūkīniśādhātrīrasaṃ pivet ।vyoṣapadmakatriphalākiḍaṅgadevadāravaḥ ।rāsnācūrṇaṃ samaṃ khaṇḍair jagdhvā kāsaharaṃ dhruvam ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe grahahṛnmantrādikaṃ nāma navanavatyadhikadviśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha triśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sūryārcanam

agnir uvāca
śayyā tu daṇḍisājeśapāvakaś caturānanaḥ ।sarvārthasādhakamidaṃ vījaṃ piṇḍārthamucyate ।।svayaṃ dīrghasvarādyañca vījeṣvaṅgāni sarvaśaḥ ।khātaṃ sādhu viṣañcaiva savinduṃ sakalaṃ tathā ।।

gaṇasya pañca vījāni pṛthagdṛṣṭaphalaṃ mahat ।

gaṇaṃ jayāya namaḥ ekadaṃṣṭrāya acalakarṇine gajavaktrāya mahoharahastāya pañcāṅgaṃ sarvasāmānyaṃ siddhiḥ syāllakṣajāpyateḥ ।।

gaṇādhipataye gaṇeśvarāya gaṇanāyakāya gaṇakrīḍāya
digdale pūjayenmūrtīḥ purāvaccāṅgapañcakam ।
vakratuṇḍāya ekadaṃṣṭrāya mahodarāya gajavaktrāya

vikaṭāya vighnarājāya dhūmravarṇāya
digvidikṣu yajedetāllokāṃśāṃś caiva mudrayā ।।madhyamātarjanīmadhyagatāṅguṣṭhau samuṣṭikau ।caturbhujo modakāḍhyo daṇḍapāśāṅkuśānvitaḥ ।।dantabhakṣadharaṃ raktaṃ sābjaṃ pāśāḍkuśair vṛtam ।pūjayettaṃ caturthyāñca viśeṣenātha nityaśaḥ ।।śvetārkamūlena kṛtaṃ sarvāptiḥ syāttilair ghṛtaiḥ ।taṇḍulair dadhimadhvājyaiḥ saubhāgyaṃ vaśyatā bhavet ।।ghoṣāsṛkprāṇadhātvardī daṇḍī gārtaṇḍabhairavaḥ ।dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ kartā vimbapuṭāvṛtaḥ ।।hrasvāḥ syurmūrtaryaḥ pañca dīrghā aṅgāni tasya ca ।sindūrāruṇamīśāne vāmārdhadayitaṃ raviṃ ।।āgneyādiṣu koṇeṣu kujamandāhiketavaḥ ।snātvā vidhivadādityamārādhyārghyapuraḥsaraṃ ।।kṛtāntamaiśe nirmālyaṃ tejaś caṇḍāya dīpitaṃ ।rocanā kuṅkumaṃ vāri raktagandhākṣatāṅkurāḥ ।।

veṇuvījayavāḥśāliśyāmākatilarājikāḥ ।javāpuṣpānvitāṃ datvā pātraiḥ śirasi dhārya tat ।।jānubhyāmavanīṅgatvā sūryāyārghyaṃ nivedayet ।svavidyāmantritaiḥ kumbhair navabhiḥ prārcya vai grahān ।।grahādiśāntaye snānaṃ japtvārkaṃ sarvamāpnuyāt ।saṃgrāmavijayaṃ sāgniṃ vījadoṣaṃ savindukaṃ ।।nyasya mūrdhādipādāntaṃ mūlaṃ pūjya tu mudrayā ।svāṅgāni ca yathānyāsamātmānaṃ bhāvayedraviṃ ।।dhyānañca māraṇastambhe pītagāpyāyane sitam ।ripughātavidhau kṛṣṇaṃ mohayecchakracāpavat ।।yo abhiṣekajapadhyānapūjāhomaparaḥ sadā ।tejasvī hṛjayaḥ śrīmān samudrādau jayaṃ labhet ।।tāmbūlādāvidaṃ nyasya japtvā dadyāduśīrakaṃ ।nyastuvījena hastena sparśanaṃ tadvaśe smṛtaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sūryārcanaṃ nāma triśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānāmantrāḥ

agnir uvāca
vākkarmapārśvayukśukratokakṛte mato plavaḥ ।hutāntā deśavarṇeyaṃ vidyā mukhyā sarasvatī ।।

dhārya ceti kha

vidyutpātavidhāviti gha, ja, ña, ṭa ca
akṣārāśī varṇalakṣaṃ japet samatimān bhavet ।atriḥ savahnirvāmākṣivindurindrāya hṛtparaḥ ।।vajrapadmadharaṃ śakraṃ pītamāvāhya pūjayet ।niyutaṃ homayedājyatilāṃstenābhiṣecayet ।।nṛpādirbhraṣṭarajyādīnrājyaputrādimāpnuyāt ।hṛllekhā śaktidevākhyā doṣāgnirdaṇḍidaṇḍavān ।।śivamiṣṭvā japecchaktimaṣṭamyādicaturdaśīṃ ।cakrapāśāṅkuśadharāṃ sābhayāṃ varadāyikāṃ ।।homādinā ca saubhāgyaṃ kavitvaṃ puravān bhavet ।
oṃ hrīṃ oṃ namaḥ kāmāya sarvajanahitāya sarvajanamohanāya prajvalitāya sarvajanahṛdayaṃ mamātmagataṃ kuru oṃ
etajjapādinā mantrao vaśayet sakalaṃ jagat ।।
oṃ hrīṃ cāmuṇḍe amukandaha paca mama vaśamānaya ṭha 
vaśīkaraṇakṛnmantraścāmuṇḍāyāḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।phalatrayakaṣāyeṇa varāṅgaṃ kṣālayedvaśe ।।aśvagandhāyavaiḥ strī tu niśākarpūrakādinā ।pippalītaṇḍulānyaṣṭau maricāni ca viṃśatiḥ ।।vṛhatīrasalepaś ca vaśe syānmaraṇāntikaṃ ।kaṭīramūlatrikaṭukṣaudralepas tathā bhavet ।।himaṃ kapitthakarabhaṃ māgadhī madhukaṃ madhu ।teṣāṃ lepaḥ prayuktastu dampatyoḥ svastimāvahet ।।saśarkarayonilepāt kadambarasako madhu ।sahadevī mahālakṣmīḥ putrajīvī kṛtāñjaliḥ ।।

etaccūrṇaṃ śiraḥkṣiptaṃ likasya vaśamuttamam ।triphalācandanakvāthaprasthā dvikuḍavam pṛthak ।।bhṛṅgahemarasandoṣātāvatī cuñcukaṃ madhu ।ghṛtaiḥ pakvā niśā chāyā śuṣkā lipyā tu rañjanī ।।vidārīṃ soccaṭāmāṣacūrṇībhhtāṃ saśarkarāṃ ।gathitāṃ yaḥ vipet kṣīrair nityaṃ strīśatakaṃ vrajet ।।gulmamāṣatilavrīhicūrṇakṣīrasitānvitaṃ ।aśvatthavaṃśadarbhāṇāṃ mūlaṃ vai vaiṣṇavīśniyoḥ ।।mūlaṃ dūrvāśvagandhotthaṃ pivet kṣīraiḥ sutārthinī ।kauntīlakṣmyāḥ śiphā dhātrī vajraṃ loghnaṃ vaṭāṅkuram ।।ājyakṣīramṛtau peyaṃ putrārthaṃ tridivaṃ striyā ।putrārthinī pivet kṣīraṃ śrīmūlaṃ savaṭāṅkuram ।।śrīvaḍāṅkuradevīnāṃ rasaṃ nasye vipecca sā ।śrīpadmamūlamutkṣīramaśvatthottaramūlayuk ।।taralaṃ payasā yuktaṃ kārpāsaphalapallvaṃ ।apāmārgasya puṣpāgraṃ navaṃ samahiṣīpayaḥ ।।putrārthañcārdhaṣaṭśākair yogāś catvāra īritāḥ ।śarkarotpalapuṣpākṣalodhracandanasārivāḥ ।।sravamāṇe striyā garbhe dātavyāstaṇḍulāmbhasā ।lājā yaṣṭisitādrākṣākṣaudrasarpīṃṣi vā lihet ।।aṭaruṣakalāṅgulyaḥ kākamācyāḥ śiphā pṛthak ।nābheradhaḥ samālipya prasūte pramadā sukham ।।raktaṃ śuklaṃ jāvāpuṣpaṃ raktaśuklastrutau pivet ।

keśaraṃ vṛhatīmūlaṃ gopīyaṣṭitṛṇotpalam ।।sājakṣīraṃ satailaṃ tadbhakṣaṇaṃ romajanmakṛt ।śīryamāṇeṣu keśeṣu sthāpanañca bhavedidam ।।dhātrībhṛṅgarasaprasthatailañca kṣiramāḍhakam ।
oṃ namo bhagavate tryambakāya upaśamaya culu mili bhida gomānini cakriṇi hrūṃ phaṭ ।।
asmin grāme gokulasya rakṣāṃ kuru śāntiṃ kuru ।।ghaṇḍākarṇo mahāseno vīraḥ prokto mahābalaḥ ।।mārīnirnāśanakaraḥ sa māṃ pātu jagatpatiḥ ।ślokau caiva nyasedetau mantrau gorakṣakau pṛthak ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānāmantrā nāmaikādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aṅgākṣarārcanam

agnir uvāca
yadā janmarkṣagaś candro bhānuḥ saptasarāśigaḥ ।pauṣṇaḥ kālaḥ sa vijñeyastadā grāsaṃ parīkṣayet ।।kaṇṭoṣṭhau calataḥsthānādyasya vakrā ca nāsikā ।kṛṣṇā ca jihvā saptāhaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya vai bhavet ।।tāro meṣo viṣaṃ dantī naro dīrgho vaṇā rasaḥ ।krūddholkāya maholkāya vīrolkāya śikhā bhavet ।।

hyalkāya rāhasolkāya vaiṣṇavoṣṭākṣaro manuḥ ।kaniṣṭhāditadaṣṭānāmaṅgulīnāñca parvasu ।।jyeṣṭhāgreṇa kramāttāvan mūrdhanyaṣṭākṣaraṃ nyaset ।tarjanyāntāramaṅguṣṭhe lagne madhyamayā ca tat ।।taleṅguṣṭhe taduttāraṃ vījottāraṃ tato nyaset ।raktagauradhūmraharijjātarūpāḥ sitāstrayaḥ ।।evaṃ rūpānimān varṇān bhāvabuddhānnyaset kramāt ।hṛdāsyanetramūrdhāṅghritāluguhyakarādiṣu ।।aṅgāni ca nyasedvījānnyasyātha karadehayoḥ ।yathātmani tathā deve nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ karaṃ vinā ।।hṛdādisthānagān varṇān gandhapuṣpai samarcayet ।dharmādyagnyādyadharmādi gātre pīṭhe ambuje nyaset ।।yatra keśarakiñjalkavyāpisūryendudāhināṃ ।maṇḍalantritayantāvad bhedaistatra nyaset kramāt ।।guṇāś ca tantrasatvādyāḥ keśarasthāś ca śaktayaḥ ।vimalotkarṣaṇījñānakriyāyogāś ca vai kramāt ।।prahvī satyā tatheśānānugrahā madhyatastataḥ ।yogapīṭhaṃ samabhyarcya samāvahya hariṃ yajet ।।pādyārghyācamanīyañca pītavastravibhūṣaṇaṃ ।etat pañcopacārañca sarvaṃ mūlena dīyate ।।vāsudevādayaḥ pūjyāś catvāro dikṣu mūrtayaḥ ।vidikṣu śrīsarasvatyai ratiśāntyai ca pūjayet ।।

hṛdāsyanetramūrdhāṅghrijānuguhyakarādiṣviti kha
śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ muṣalaṃ khaḍgaśārṅgike ।vanamālānvitaṃ dikṣu vidikṣu ca yajet kramāt ।।abhyarcya ca vahistārkṣyaṃ devasya purato arcayet ।viśvaksenañca someśaṃ madhye āvaraṇādvahiḥ ।indrādiparicāreṇa pūjya sarvamavāpnuyāt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe aṅgākṣarārcanaṃ nāma dvyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha tryadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

pañcākṣarādipūjāmantrāḥ

agnir uvāca
meṣaḥ saṃjñā viṣaṃ sādyamasti dīrghodakaṃ rasaḥ ।etat pañcākṣaraṃ mantraṃ śivadañca śivātmakaṃ ।।tārakādi samabhyarcya devatvādi samāpnuyāt ।jñānātmakaṃ paraṃ brahma paraṃ buddhiḥ śivo hṛdi ।।tacchaktibhūtaḥ sarveśo bhinno brahmādimūrtibhiḥ ।mantrārṇāḥ pañca bhūtāni tanmantrā viṣayās tathā ।।prāṇādivāyavaḥ pañca jñānakarmendriyāṇi ca ।sarvaṃ pañcākṣaraṃ brahma tadvadaṣṭākṣarāntakaḥ ।।gavyena prakṣayeddīkṣāsthānaṃ mantreṇa coditaṃ ।tantrasambhūtasambhāvaḥ śivamiṣṭvā vidhānataḥ ।।

madhyeṣu toraṇadvahiriti kha, ja, ña ca
mūlamūrtyaṅgavidyābhistaṇḍulakṣepaṇādikam ।kṛtvā caruñca yat kṣīraṃ punastadvibhajet tridhā ।।nivedyaikaṃ paraṃ hutvā saśiṣyo anyadbhajedguruḥ ।ācamya sakalīkṛtya dadyāccchiṣyāya deśikaḥ ।।dantakāṣṭhaṃ hṛdā japtaṃ kṣīravṛkṣādisambhavam ।saṃśodhya dantān saṃkṣiptvā prajñālyaitat kṣipedbhuvi ।।pūrveṇa saumyavārīśagataṃ śubhamatau śubham ।punastaṃ śiṣyamāyāntaṃ śiśvābandhādirakṣitaṃ ।।kṛtvā vedyāṃ sahānena svapeddarbhāstare budhaḥ ।suṣuptaṃ vīkṣya taṃ śiṣyaḥ prabhāte śrāvayedguruṃ ।।śubhaiḥ siddhipadair bhaktistaiḥ punarmaṇḍalārcanam ।maṇḍalaṃ bhadrakādyuktaṃ pūjayetsarvasiddhidaṃ ।।snātvācamya mṛdā dehaṃ mantrair ālipya kalpyate ।śivatīrthe naraḥ snāyādaghamarṣaṇapūrvakam ।।hastābhiṣekaṃ kṛtvātha prāyāt pūjādikaṃ budhaḥ ।mūlenābjāsanaṃ kuryāttena pūrakakumbhakān ।।ātmānaṃ yojayitvordhvaṃ śikhānte dvādaśāṅgule ।saṃśoṣya dagdhvā svatanuṃ plāvayedamṛtena ca ।।dhmātvā divyaṃ vapustasminnātmānañca punarnayet ।kṛtvevaṃ cātmaśuddhiḥ syādvinyasyārcanamārabhet ।।kramāt kṛṣṇasitaśyāmaraktapītā nagādayaḥ ।mantrārṇā daṇḍināṅgāni teṣu sarvāstu mūrtayaḥ ।।

śiṣyamācāntamiti ña
aṅguṣṭhādikaniṣṭhāntaṃ vinyasyāṅgāni sarvataḥ ।nyasenmantrākṣaraṃ pādaguhyahṛdvaktramūrdhasu ।।vyāpakaṃ nyasya mūrdhādi mūlamaṅgāni vinyaset ।raktapītaśyāmasitān pīṭhapādān svakālajān ।।svāṅgānmantrair nyasedgātrāṇyadharmādīni dikṣu ca ।tatra padmañca suryādimaṇḍale tritayaṃ guṇān ।।pūrvādipatre kāmādyā navakaṃ karṇikopari ।vāmā jyeṣṭhā kramādraudro kālī kalavikāriṇī ।।balavikāriṇī cārtha balapramathanī tathā ।sarvabhūtadamanī ca navamī ca manonmanī ।।śvetā raktā sitā pītā śyāmā vahninibhāṣitā ।kṛṣṇāruṇāś ca tāḥ śaktīrjvālārūpāḥ smaret kramāt ।।anantayogapīṭhāya āvāhyātha hṛdabjataḥ ।sphaṭikābhaṃ caturvāhuṃ phalaśūladharaṃ śivam ।।sābhayaṃ varadaṃ pañcavadaṃnañca trilocanam ।patreṣu murtayaḥ pañca sthāpyāstatpuruṣādayaḥ ।।pūrve tatpuruṣaḥ śveto aghoro aṣṭabhujo asitāḥ ।caturvāhumukhaḥ pītāḥ sadyojātaś ca paścime ।।vāmadevaḥ strīvilāsī caturvaktrabhujo aruṇaḥ ।saumye pañcāsya īśāne īśānaḥ sarvadaḥ sitaḥ ।।iṣṭāṅgāni yathānyāyamanantaṃ sūkṣmamarcayet ।siddheśvaraṃ tvekanetraṃ pūrvādau diśa pūjayet ।।ekarudraṃ trinetrañca śrīkaṇṭhañca śikhaṇḍinam ।

aiśānyādividikṣvete vidyeśāḥ kamalāsanāḥ ।।śvetaḥ pītaḥ sito rakto dhūmro rakto aruṇaḥ śitaḥ ।śūlāśaniśareśvāsavāhavaś caturānanāḥ ।।umā vaṇḍeśanandīśau mahākālo gaṇeśvaraḥ ।vṛṣo bhṛṅgariṭiskandānuttarādau prapūjayet ।।kuliśaṃ śaktidaṇḍau ca khaḍgapāśadhvajau gadāṃ ।śūlaṃ cakraṃ yajet padmaṃ pūvvādau devamarcya ca ।।tato adhivāsitaṃ śiṣyaṃ pāyayedgavyapañcakam ।ācāntaṃ prokṣye netrāntair netre netreṇa bandhayet ।।dvāraṃ praveśayecchipyaṃ maṇḍapasyātha dakṣiṇe ।sāsanādikuśāsīnaṃ tatra saṃśodhayedguruḥ ।।āditattvāni saṃhṛtya paramārthe layaḥ kramāt ।punarutpādayecchiṣyaṃ sṛṣṭimārgeṇa deśikaḥ ।।nyāsaṃ śiṣye tataḥ kṛtvā taṃ pradakṣiṇamānayet ।paścimadvāramānīya kṣepayet kusumāñjalim ।।yasmin patanti puṣpāṇi tannāmādyaṃ vinirdiśet ।pārśveyāgabhuvaḥ khāte kuṇḍe sannabhimekhale ।।śivāgniṃ janayitveṣṭvā punaḥ śiṣyeṇa cārcayet ।dhyānenātmanibhaṃ śiṣyaṃ saṃhṛtya pralayaḥ kramāt ।।punarutpādya tatpāṇau dadyāddarbhāṃś ca mantritān ।pṛthivyādīni tattvāni juhuyāddhṛdayādibhiḥ ।।

kamalānanā iti ña

sandhādimekhale iti kha
ekaikasya śataṃ hutvā vyomamūlena homayet ।hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ kuryādastreṇāṣṭāhutīrhunet ।।prāyaścittaṃ viśuddhyarthaṃ tataḥ śeṣaṃ samāpayet ।kumbhaṃ samantritaṃ prārcya śiśuṃ pīṭhe abhiṣecayet ।।śiṣye tu samayaṃ datvā svarṇādyaiḥ svaguruṃ yajet ।dīkṣā pañcākṣarasyoktā viṣṇvāderevameva hi ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe pañcākṣarādipūjāmantrā nāma tryadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha caturadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

pañcapañcāśadviṣṇunāmāṇi

agnir uvāca
japan vai pañcapañcāśadviṣṇunāmāni yo naraḥ ।mantrajapyādiphalabhāk tīrtheṣvarcādi cākṣayam ।।puṣkare puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ gayāyāñca gadādharam ।rāghavañcitrakūṭe tu prabhāse daityasūdanam ।।jayaṃ jayantyāṃ tadvacca jayantaṃ hastināpure ।vārāhaṃ vardhamāne ca kāśmīre cakrapāṇinam ।।janārdanañca kubjāmre mathurāyāñca keśavam ।kubjāmrake hṛṣīkeśaṃ gaṅgādvāre jaṭādharam ।।śālagrāme mahāyogaṃ hariṃ gobardhanācale ।

piṇḍārake caturvāhuṃ śaṅkhoddhāre ca śaṅkhinam ।।vāmanañca kurukṣetre yamunāyāṃ trivikramam ।viśveśvaraṃ tathā śoṇe kapilaṃ pūrvasāgare ।।viṣṇuṃ mahodadhau vidyādgaṅgāsāgarasaṅgame ।vanamālañca kiṣkindhyāṃ devaṃ raivatakaṃ viduḥ ।।kāśītaṭe mahāyogaṃ virajāyāṃ ripuñjayam ।viśākhayūpe hy ajitannepāle lokabhāvanam ।।dvārakāyāṃ viddhi kṛṣṇaṃ mandare madhusūdanam ।lokākule ripuharaṃ śālagrāme hariṃ smaret ।।puruṣaṃ pūruṣavaṭe vimale ca jagatprabhuṃ ।anantaṃ saindhavāraṇye daṇḍake śārṅgadhāriṇam ।।utpalāvartake śaurīṃ narmadāyāṃ śriyaḥ patiṃ ।dāmodaraṃ raivatake nandāyāṃ jalaśāyinaṃ ।।gopīśvarañca sindhvavdhau māhendre cācyutaṃ viṭuḥ ।sahādrau devadeveśaṃ vaikuṇṭhaṃ māgadhe vane ।।sarvapāpaharaṃ vindhye auḍre tu puruṣottamam ।ātmānaṃ hṛdaye viddhi japatāṃ bhuktimuktidam ।।vaṭe vaṭe vaiśravaṇaṃ catvare catvare śivam ।parvate parvate rāmaṃ sarvatra madhusūdanaṃ ।।naraṃ bhūmau tathā vyomni vaśiṣṭhe garuḍadhvajam ।vāsudevañca sarvatra saṃsmaran bhuktimuktibhāk ।।nāmānyetāni viṣṇīś ca japtvā sarvamavāpnuyāt ।kṣetreṣveteṣu yat śrāddhaṃ dānaṃ japyañca tarpaṇam ।।

tatsarvaṃ koṭiguṇitaṃ mṛto brahmamayo bhavet ।
yaḥ paṭhet śṛṇuyādvāpi nirmalaḥ svargamāpnuyāt ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe pañcapañcāśadviṣṇunāmāni nāma caturadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nārasiṃhādimantrāḥ

agnir uvāca
stambho vidveṣaṇoccāṭa utsādo bhramamāraṇe ।vyādhiśceti smṛtaṃ kṣutraṃ tanmokṣo vakṣyate śṛṇu ।।
oṃ namo bhagavate unmattarudrāya bhrama bhrāmaya amukaṃ vitrāsaya udbhrāmaya raudreṇa rūpeṇa hūṃ phaṭh ṭha 
śmaśāne niśi japtena trilakṣaṃ madhunā hunet ।citāgnau dhūrtasamidubhirbhrāmyate satataṃ ripuḥ ।।hemagairikayā kṛṣṇā pratimā haimasūcibhiḥ ।japtvā vidhyecca tatkaṇṭhe hṛdi vā miyate ripuḥ ।।kharabālacitābhasma brahmadaṇḍī ca markaṭī ।gṛhe vā mūrdhni taccūrṇaṃ japtamutsādakṛta kṣipet ।।bhṛgvākāśau sadīptāgnirbhṛgurvahniś ca varma phaṭ ।
evaṃ sahasrāre hūṃ phaṭ ācakrāya svāhā hṛdayaṃ vicakrāya śivaḥ
śikhācakrāyātha kavacaṃ vicakrāyātha netrakam ।।

sañcakrāyāstramudiṣṭaṃ jyālācakrāya pūrvavat ।śārṅgaṃ sudarśanaṃ kṣudragrahahṛt sarvasādhanam ।।mūrdhākṣimukhahṛdguhyapāde hy asyākṣarānnyaset ।cakrābjāsanamagnyābhaṃ daṃṣṭraṇañca caturbhujam ।।śaṅkhacakragadāpadmaśalākāṅkuśapāṇinam ।cāpinaṃ piṅgakeśākṣamaravyāptatripiṣṭapaṃ ।।nābhistenāgninā viddhā naśyante vyādhayo grahāḥ ।pītañcakraṃ gadā raktāḥ svarāḥ śyāmamavāntaraṃ ।।nemiḥ śvetā vahiḥ kṛṣṇavarṇarekhā ca pārthivī ।madhyetaremare varṇānevaṃ cakradvayaṃ likhet ।।ādāvānīya kumbhodaṃ gocare sannidhāya ca ।dattvā sudarśanaṃ tatra yāmye cakre hunet kramāt ।।ājyāpāmārgasamidho hy akṣataṃ tilasarṣapau ।pāyasaṃ gavyamājyañca sahasrāṣṭakasaṃkhyayā ।।hutaśeṣaṃ kṣiptet kumbhe pratidravyaṃ vidhānavit ।prasthānena kṛtaṃ piṇḍaṃ kumbhe tasminniveśayet ।।viṣṇādi sarvaṃ tatraiva nyaset tatraiva dakṣiṇe ।
namo viṣṇujanebhyaḥ sarvaśāntikarebhyaḥ pratigṛhṇantu śāntaye namaḥ
dadyādanena mantreṇa hutaśeṣāmbhasā baliṃ ।।phalake kalpite pātre palāśaṃ kṣīraśākhinaḥ ।gavyapūrṇe niveśyaiva dikṣvevaṃ homayeddvijaiḥ ।।sadakṣiṇamidaṃ homadvayaṃ bhūtādināśanam ।

varṇadvayamiti kha
gavyāktapatralikhitair niṣparṇaiḥ kṣudramuddhṛtam ।।dūrvābhirāyuṣe padmaiḥ śriye putrā uḍugbaraiḥ ।gosiddhyai sarpiṣā goṣṭhe medhāyai sarvaśākhinā ।।
oṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavate nārasiṃhāya jvālāmāline dīptadaṃṣṭrāyāgninetrāya sarvarakṣoghnāya sarvabhūtavināśāya sarvajvaravināśāya daha paca rakṣa hūṃ phaṭ
mantroyaṃ nārasiṃhasya makalāghnivāraṇaḥ ।japyādinā haret kṣudragrahamārīviṣāmayān ।cūrṇamaṇḍūkavayasā jalāgnistambhakṛdbhavet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nārasiṃhādimantrā nāma pañcādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṣṭhādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

trailokyamohanamantrāḥ

agnir uvāca
vakṣye mantraṃ caturvargasiddhyai trailikyamohanam ।
oṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ oṃ namaḥ puruśottamaḥ puruṣottamapratirūpa lakṣmīnivāsa sakalajagatkṣobhaṇa sarvastrīhṛdayadāraṇa tribhuvanamadonmādakara suramanujasundarojanamanāṃsi tāpaya dopaya śoḍaya māraya stambhaya drāvaya ākarṣaya paramasubhaga sarvasaumāgyakara kāmaprada amukaṃ hana cakreṇa gadayā khaḍgeṇa sarva-[!!!]

vāṇairbhida pāśena haṭṭa aṅkuśena tāḍya turu kintiṣṭhasiyāvattāvat samīhitaṃ me siddhaṃ bhavati hūṃ phaṭ namaḥ oṃ puruṣottama tribhuvanamadonmādakara hūṃ phaṭ hṛdayāya namaḥ karṣaya mahābala hūṃ phaṭ astrāya tribhuvaneśvara 
sarvajanamanāṃsi hana dāraya mama vaśamānaya hūṃ phaṭ
netrāya trailokyamohana hṛṣīkeśāpratirūpa
sarvastrīhṛdayākarṣaṇa āgaccha namaḥ ।।

saṅgākṣiṇyāyakena nyāsaṃ mūlavadīritaṃ ।।iṣṭvā sañjapya pañcāśatsahasramabhiṣicya ca ।kuṇḍegnau devike vahnau kṛtvā śataṃ hunet ।।pṛthagdadhi ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ caruṃ sājyaṃ payaḥ śṛtaṃ ।dvādaśāhutimūlena sahasrañcākṣatāṃstilān ।।yavaṃ madhutrayaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ dadhi samicchataṃ ।hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ śiṣṭaṃ prāśayetsaghṛtaṃ caruṃ ।।sambhojya viprānācāryaṃ toṣayetsidhyate manuḥ ।snātvā yathāvadācamya vāgyato yāgamandiraṃ ।।gatvā padmāsanaṃ baddhvā śoṣayedvidhinā vapuḥ ।rakṣoghnavighnakṛddikṣu nyasedādau sudarśanam ।।pañcabījaṃ nābhimadhyasthaṃ dhūmraṃ caṇḍānilātmakam ।aśeṣaṃ kalmaṣaṃ dehāt viśleṣayadanusmaret ।।raṃvījaṃ hṛdayābjasthaṃ smṛtvā jvālābhirādahet ।urdhvādhastiryagābhistu mūrdhni saṃplāvayedvapuḥ ।।dhyātvāmṛtair vahiścāntaḥsuṣumnāmārgagāmibhiḥ ।evaṃ śuddhavapuḥ prāṇānāyamya manunā tridhā ।।

vinyasennyastahastāntaḥ śaktiṃ mastakavaktrayoḥ ।guhye gale dikṣu hṛdi kakṣau dehe ca sarvataḥ ।।āvāhya brahmarandhreṇa hṛtpadme sūryamaṇḍalāt ।tāreṇa samparātmānaṃ smarettaṃ sarvalakṣaṇaṃ ।।
trailokyamohanāya vidmahe smarāya dhīmahi tanno viṣṇuḥ pracodayāt ātmārcanāt kratudravyaṃ prokṣayecchuddhapātrakaṃ । kṛtvātmapūjāṃ vidhinā sthaṇḍile taṃ samarcayet ।। karmādikalpite pīṭhe padmasthaṃ garuḍopari । marvāṅgasundaraṃ prāptavayolāvaṇyayauvanaṃ ।। madāghūrṇitatāmrākṣamudāraṃ smaravihvaliṃ । divyamālyāmvaralepabhūṣitaṃ sasmitānanaṃ ।। viṣṇuṃ nānāvidhānekaparivāraparicchadam । lokānugrahaṇaṃ saumyaṃ sahasrādityatejasaṃ ।। pañcavāṇadharaṃ prāptakāmaikṣaṃ dvicaturbhujam । devastrībhirvṛtaṃ devīmukhāsaktekṣaṇaṃ japet ।। cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ dhanuḥ khaḍgaṃ gadāṃmuṣalamaṅkuśaṃ । pāśañca vibhrataṃ cārcedāvāhādivisargataḥ ।। śriyaṃ vāmorujaṅghāsthāṃ śliṣyantīṃ pāṇinā patiṃ । sābjacāmarakarāṃ pīnāṃ śrīvatsakaustubhānvitāṃ ।। mālinaṃ pītavastrañca cakrādyāḍhyaṃ hariṃ yajet । oṃ sudarśana mahācakrarāja duṣṭabhayaṅkara chida chinda vidāraya paramamantrān grasa bhakṣaya bhūtāni cāśapa hūṃ
phaṭ oṃ jalacarāya svāhā । khaḍgatīkṣṇa chinda khaḍgāya
namaḥ । śāraṅgāya saśarāya hūṃ phaṭ । bhūtagrāmāya vidmahe caturvidhāya dhīmahi tanno brahma pracodayāt । sambartaka śvasana pothaya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā । pāśa bandha ākarṣaya hūṃ phaṭ । aṅkuśena kaṭṭa hūṃ phaṭ kramādbhujeṣu mantraiḥ svair ebhirastrāṇi pūjayet ।।

oṃ pakṣirājāya hrūṃ phaṭ
tārkṣyaṃ yajet karṇikāyāmaṅgadevān yathāvidhi ।śāktirindrādiyantreṣu tārkṣyādyā dhṛtacāmarāḥ ।।śaktayo ante prayojyādau sureśādyāś ca daṇḍinā ।pīte lakṣmīsarasvatyau ratiprītijayāḥ sitāḥ ।।kīrtikāntyau site śyāme tuṣṭipuṣṭyau smarodite ।lokeśāntaṃ yajeddevaṃ viṣṇumiṣṭārthasiddhaye ।।dhyāyenmantraṃ japitvainaṃ juhuyāttvabhiśecayet ।
oṃ śrīṃ krīṃ hrīṃ hūṃ trailokyamohanāya viṣṇave namaḥ
etatpūjādinā sarvān kāmānāpnoti pūrvavat ।।toyaiḥ sammohanī puṣpair nityantena ca tarpayet ।brahmā saśakraśrīdaṇḍī vījaṃ trailokyamohanam ।।japtvā trilakṣaṃ hutvā ca lakṣaṃ bilvaiś ca sājyakaiḥ ।taṇḍulaiḥ phalagandhādyaiḥ dūrvābhistvāyurāpnuyāt ।।tayābhiṣekahomādikriyātuṣṭo hy abhīṣṭadaḥ ।

phalapuṣpādyair iti ṭa

oṃ namo bhagavate varāhāya bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥpataye bhūpatidvaṃ me dehi hṛdayāya svāha pañcāṅgaṃ nityamayutaṃ japtvāyūrājyamāpnuyāt ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe trailokyamohanamantro nāma ṣaṣṭhādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

trailokyamohanīlakṣmyādipūjā

agnir uvāca
vakṣaḥ savahniryāmākṣau daṇḍīḥ śrīḥ sarvasiddhidā ।mahāśriye mahāsiddhe mahāvidyutprabhe namaḥ ।।
śriye devi vijaye namaḥ । gauri mahābale bandha namaḥ । hūṃ mahākāye padmahaste hūṃ phaṭ śriyai namaḥ । śriyai phaṭ śriyai namaḥ । śriyai phaṭ śrīṃ namaḥ । śriye śrīda namaḥ svāhā svāhā śrīphaṭ ।।
asyāṅgāni navoktāni teṣvekañca samāśrayet ।trilakṣamekalakṣaṃ vā japtvākṣābjaiś ca bhūtidaḥ ।।śrīgehe viṣṇugehe vā śriyaṃ pūjya dhanaṃ labhet ।ājyāktaistaṇḍulair lakṣaṃ juhuyāt khādirānale ।।rājā vaśyo bhavedvṛddhiḥ śrīś ca syāduttarottaraṃ ।sarṣapāmbhobhiṣekeṇa naśyante sakalā grahāḥ ।।bilvalakṣahutā lakṣmīrvittavṛddhiś ca jāyate ।śakraveśma caturdvāraṃ hṛdaye cintayedatha ।।

balākāṃ vāmanāṃ śyāmāṃ śvetapaṅkajadhāriṇīm ।ūrdhvavāhudvayaṃ dhyāyetkrīḍantīṃ dvāri pūrvavat ।।urdhvīkṛtena hastena raktapaṅkajadhāriṇīṃ ।śvetāṅgīṃ dakṣiṇe dvāri cintayedvanamālinīm ।।haritāṃ dordvayenordhamudvahantīṃ sitāmbujam ।dhyāyedvibhīṣikāṃ nāma śrīdūtīṃ dvāri paścime ।।śāṅkarīmukktare dvāri tanmadhye aṣṭadalapaṅkajaṃ ।vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaścāniruddhakaḥ ।।dhyeyāste padmapatreṣu śaṅkhacakragadādharāḥ ।añjanakṣīrakāśmīrahemābhāste suvāsasaḥ ।।āgneyādiṣu patreṣu gugguluś ca kuruṇṭakaḥ ।damakaḥ salilaśceti hastinī rajataprabhāḥ ।।hemakumbhadharāś caite karṇikāyāṃ śriyaṃ smaret ।caturbhujāṃ suvarṇābhāṃ sapadmordhvabhujadvayāṃ ।।dakṣiṇābhayahastābhāṃ vāmahastavarapradāṃ ।śvetagandhāṃśukāmekaraumyamālāstradhāriṇīṃ ।।dhyātvā saparivārāntāmabhyarcya sakalaṃ labhet ।droṇābjapuṣpaśrīvṛkṣaparṇaṃ mūrdhni na dhārayet ।।lavaṇāmalakaṃ varjyaṃ nāgādityatithau kramāt ।pāyasāśī japet sūktaṃ śriyastenābhiṣecayet ।।āvāhādivisargāntāṃ mūrdhni dhyātvārcayet śriyam ।vilvājyābjapāyasena pṛthak yogaḥ śriye bhavet ।।viṣaṃ mahiṣakāntāgnirudrijyotirvakadvayam ।

oṃ hrīṃ mahāmahiṣamardini ṭha ṭha mūlamantraṃ bhahiṣahiṃsake namaḥ । mahiṣaśatruṃ bhrāmaya hūṃ phaṭ ṭha ṭha mahiṣaṃ heṣaya hūṃ mahiṣaṃ hana devi hūṃ mahiṣanisūdani phaṭ durgāhṛdayamityuktaṃ sāṅgaṃ sarvārthasādhakam ।। yajedyathoktaṃ tāṃ devīṃ pīṭhañcaivāṅgamadhyagam । oṃ hrīṃ durge rakṣaṇi svāhā ceti durgāyai namaḥ । āryāyai kanakaprabhāyai kṛttikāyai abhayapradāyai kanyakāyai surūpāyai ।।
patrasthāḥ pūjayedetā mūrtīrādyaiḥ svaraiḥ kramāt ।।cakrāya śaṅkhāya gadāyai khaḍgāya dhanuṣe vāṇāya ।aṣṭamyādyair imāṃ durgāṃ lokeśāntāṃ yajediti ।durgāyogaḥ samāyuḥśrīsvāmiraktājayādikṛt ।।samādhyeśānamantreṇa tilahomo vaśīkaraḥ ।jayaḥ padmaistu durvābhiḥ śāntiḥ kāmaḥ palāśajaiḥ ।।puṣṭiḥ syāt kākapakṣeṇa mṛtidveṣādikaṃ bhavet ।brahmakṣudrabhayāpattiṃ sarvameva manurharet ।।
oṃ durge durge rakṣaṇi svāhā
rakṣākarīyamuditā jayadurgāṅgasaṃyutā ।śyāmāṃ trilicanāṃ devīṃ dhyātvātmānaṃ caturbhujam ।।śaṅkhacakrābjaśūlāditriśūlāṃ raudrarūpiṇīṃ ।yuddhādau sañjayedetāṃ yajet khaḍgādike jaye ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe trailokyamohanīlakṣmyādipūjā nāma saptādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athāṣṭādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tvaritāpūjā

agnir uvāca
tvaritāṅgānsamākhyāsye bhuktimuktipradāyakān ।oṃ ādhāraśaktyai namaḥ । oṃ hrīṃ puru mahāsiṃhāyanamaḥ । oṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ khecachekṣaḥ ।
strīṃ oṃ hrūṃ kṣaiṃ hrūṃ phaṭ tvaritāyai namaḥ । khe ca hṛdayāya namaḥ ।cache śirase namaḥ ।chekṣaḥ śikhāyai namaḥ । kṣastrī kavacāya namaḥ । strīṃ hrūṃ netrāya namaḥ । hrūṃ khe astrāya phaṭ namaḥ । oṃ tvaritāvidyāṃ vidmahe tūrṇavidyāñca dhīmahi tanno devī pracodayāt । śrīpraṇitāyai
namaḥ । hrūṃ kārāyai namaḥ । oṃ kheca hṛdayāya namaḥ ।
khecaryai namaḥ । chedanyai namaḥ kṣepaṇyai namaḥ ।striyai hrūṃ kāryai namaḥ । kṣemaṅkaryai jayāyai kiṅkarāya rakṣa । oṃ tvaritājñayā sthiro bhava vaṣaṭ
totalā tvaritā tūrṇetyetyevaṃ vidyeyamīritā ।।śirobhrumastake kaṇṭhe hṛdi nābhau ca guhyake ।urvoś ca jānujaṅghorudvaye caraṇayoḥ kramāt ।।nyastāṅgo nyastamantrastu samastaṃ vyāpakaṃ nyaset ।pārvatī śavarī ceśā varadābhayahastikā ।।mayūrabalayā picchamauliḥ kisalayāṃśukā ।siṃhāsanasthā māyūravarhacchatrasamanvitā ।।trinetrā śyāmalā devī vanamālāvibhūṣaṇā ।

viprāhikaṇrābharaṇā catrakeyūrabhūṣaṇā ।।vaiśyanāgakaṭībandhā vṛṣalāhikṛtanūpurā ।evaṃ rūpātmikā bhūtvā tanmantraṃ niyutaṃ japet ।।īśaḥ kirātarūpo abhūt purā gaurī ca tādṛśī ।japeddhyāyet pūjayettāṃ sarvasiddhyaiviṣādihṛt ।।aṣṭasiṃhāsane pūjyā dale pūrvādike kramāt ।aṅgagāyatrī praṇītā hūṅkārādyā dalāgrake ।।phaṭkārī cāgrato devyāḥ śrīvījenārcayedimāḥ ।lokeśāyudhavarṇāstāḥ phaṭkārī tu dhanurdharā ।।jayā ca vijayā dvāsthe pūjye sauvarṇayaṣṭike ।kiṅkarā varvarī muṇḍī laguḍī ca tayorvahiḥ ।।iṣṭvaivaṃ siddhayeddravyaiḥ kuṇḍe yonyākṛtau hunet ।hemalābho arjunair dhānyair godhūmaiḥ puṣṭisampadaḥ ।।yavair dhānyaistilaiḥ sarvasiddhirītivināśanam ।akṣair unmattatā śatroḥ śālmalībhiś ca māraṇam ।।jambubhirdhanadhānyāptistuṣṭirnīlotpalair api ।raktātpalair mahāpuṣṭiḥ kundapuṣpair mahodayaḥ ।।mallikābhiḥ purakṣobhaḥ kumudair janavar labhaḥ ।aśokaiḥ putralābhaḥ syāt pāṭalābhiḥ śubhāṅganā ।।āmrair āyustilair lakṣmīrbilvaiḥ śrīś campakair dhanam ।iṣṭaṃ madhukapuṣpaiś ca bilvaiḥ sarvajṇatāṃ labhet ।।trilakṣajapyātsarvāptirhomāddhyānāttathejyayā ।maṇḍale abhyarcya gāyatryā āhutīḥ pañcaviṃśatim ।।

dadyācchatatrayaṃ mūlāt pallavair dīkṣito bhavet ।pañcagavyaṃ purā pītvā carukaṃ prāśayetsadā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe tvaritāpūjā nāmāṣṭādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ chapter 

ś atha navādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tvaritāmantrādiḥ

agnir uvāca
aparāṃ tvaritāvidyāṃ vakṣye ahaṃ bhuktimuktidāṃ ।pure vajrākule devīṃ rajobhirlikhite yajet ।।padmagarbhe digvidikṣu cāṣṭau vajrāṇi vīthikāṃ ।dvāraśobhopaśobhāñca likhecchrīghraṃ smarennaraḥ ।।aṣṭādaśabhujāṃ siṃhe vāmajaṅghā pratiṣṭhitā ।dakṣiṇā dviguṇā tasyāḥ pādapīṭhe samarpitā ।।nāgabhūṣāṃ vajrakuṇḍe khaḍgaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ karamāt ।śūlaṃ śaraṃ tathā śaktiṃ varadaṃ dakṣiṇaiḥ karaiḥ ।।dhanuḥ pāśaṃ śaraṃ ghaṇṭāṃ tarjanīṃśaṅkhamaṅkuśam ।abhayañca tathā varjaṃ vāmapārśve dhṛtāyudham ।।pūjanācchatrunāśaḥ syādrāṣṭraṃ jayati līlayā ।dīrghāyūrāṣṭrabhūtiḥ syāddivyādisiddhibhāk ।।

vajrārgale iti ña
taletisaptapātālāḥ kālāgnibhuvanāntakāḥ ।oṃ kārādisvarārabhya yāvadbrahmāṇḍavācakam ।।oṃ kārādbhrāmayettoyantotalā tvaritā tataḥ ।prastāvaṃ sampravakṣyāmi svaravargaṃ likhedbhuvi ।।tālurvargaḥ kavargaḥ syāttṛtīyo jihvatālukaḥ ।caturthastālujihvāgro jihvādantastu pañcamaḥ ।।ṣaṣṭho aṣṭapuṭasampanno miśravargastu saptamaḥ ।ūṣmāṇaḥ syācchvargastu uddharecca manuṃ tataḥ ।।ṣaṣṭhasvarasamārūḍhaṃ ūṣmaṇāntaṃ savindukam ।tāluvargadvitīyantu svaraikādaśayojitam ।।jihvātālusamāyogaḥ prathamaṃ kevalaṃ bhavet ।tadeva ca dvitīyantu adhastādviniyojayet ।।ekādaśasvarair yuktaṃ prathamaṃ tāluvargataḥ ।ūṣmāṇasya dvitīyantu adhastād dṛśya yojayet ।।ṣoḍaśasvarasaṃyuktamūṣmāṇasya dvitīyakam ।jihvādantasamāyoge prathamaṃ yojayedadhaḥ ।।miśravargād dvitīyantu adhastāt punareva tu ।caturthasvarasambhinnaṃ tāluvargādisaṃyutam ।।ūṣmaṇaś ca dvitīyantu adhastādviniyojayet ।svaraikādaśabhinnantu ūṣmaṇāntaṃ savindukam ।।pañcasvarasamārūḍhaṃ oṣṭhasampuṭayogataḥ ।dvitīyamakṣarañcānyajjihvāgre tāluyogataḥ ।।

ūṣmāṇasyetyayaṃ pāṭho na sādhuḥ
prathamaṃ pañcame yojyaṃ svarārdhenoddhṛtā ime ।oṃkārādyā namontāś ca japet svāhāgnikāryake ।।oṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ hraḥ hṛdayaṃ hāṃ hṛśceti śiraḥ ।
hrīṃ jvala jjalaśikhā syāt kavacaṃ hanudvayam । hrīṃ śrīṃ kṣūnnetratrayāya vidyānetraṃ prakīrtitam kṣauṃ haḥ khauṃ hūṃ phaḍastrāya guhyāṅgāni purā nyaset
tvaritāṅgāni vakṣyāmi vidyāṅgāni śṛṇuṣva me ।ādidvihṛdayaṃ proktaṃ tricatuḥśira iṣyate ।।pañcaṣaṣṭhaḥ śikhā proktā kavacaṃ saptamāṣṭamam ।tārakantu bhavennetraṃ navārdhākṣaralakṣaṇaṃ ।।totaleti samākhyātā vajratuṇḍe tato bhavet ।kha kha hūṃ daśavījā syādvajratuṇḍendradrūtikā ।।khecari jvālinījvāle khakheti jvālinīdaśa ।varce śaravibhīṣaṇi khakheti ca śavaryapi ।।che chedani karālini khakheti ca karālyapi ।vakṣaḥśravadravaplavanī kha kha dūtīplavaṃ khyapi ।।strībālakāre dhunani śāstrī vasanavegikā ।kṣe pakṣe kapile hasa hasa kapilā nāma dūtikā ।।hrūṃ tejovati raudrī ca mātaṅgaraudridūtikā ।puṭe puṭe kha kha khaḍge phaṭ brahmakadūtikā ।।vaitālini daśārṇāḥ syustyajānyahipalālavat ।hṛdādikanyāsādau syān madhye netre nyasetsudhīḥ ।।pādādarabhya mūrdāntaṃ śira ārabhya pādayoḥ ।

vakṣaḥśravadravaplavanīthatheti kha, cha ca
aṅghrijānūruguhye ca nābhihṛtkaṇṭhadeśataḥ ।।vajramaṇḍalabūrdhe ca aghordhe cādivījataḥ ।somarūpaṃ tato gāvaṃ dhārāmṛtasuvarṣiṇam ।।viśantaṃ brahmarandhreṇa sādhakastu vicintayet ।mūrdhāsyakaṇṭhahṛnnābhau guhyorujānupādayoḥ ।।ādivījaṃ nyasenmantrī tarjanyādi punaḥ punaḥ ।ūrdhaṃ somamadhaḥ padmaṃ śarīraṃ vījavigrahaṃ ।।yo jānāti na mṛtyuḥ syāttasya na vyādhayo jvarā ।yajejjapettāṃ vinyasya dhyāyeddevīṃ śatāṣṭakam ।।mudrā vakṣye praṇītādyāḥ praṇītāḥ pañcadhāsmṛtāḥ ।grathitau tu karau kṛtvā madhye aṅguṣṭhau nipātayet ।।tarjanīṃ mūrdhnisaṃlagnāṃ vinyasettāṃ śiropari ।praṇīteyaṃ samākhyātā hṛddeśe tāṃ samānayet ।।ūrdhantu kanyasāmadhye savījāntāṃ vidurdvijāḥ ।niyojya tarjanīmadhye anekalagnāṃ parasparām ।।jyeṣṭāgraṃ nikṣipenmadhye bhedanī sā prakīrtitā ।nābhideśe tu tāṃ baddhvā aṅguṣṭhāvutkṣipettataḥ ।।karālī tu mahāmudrā hṛdaye yojya mantriṇaḥ ।punastu pūrvavad baddhalagnāṃ jyeṣṭhāṃ samutkṣipet ।।vajratuṇḍā samākhyātā vajradeśe tu bandhayet ।ubhābhyāñcaiva hastābhyāṃ maṇibandhantu bandhayet ।।trīṇi trīṇi prasāryeti vajramudrā prakīrtitā ।

prasāryā ceti ṭa
daṇḍaḥ khaḍgañcakragadā mudrā cākārataḥ smṛtā ।।aṅguṣṭhenākramet trīṇi triśūlañcordhvato bhavet ।ekā tu madhyamordhvā tu śaktireva vidhīyate ।।śarañca varadañcāpaṃ pāśaṃ bhārañca ghaṇṭayā ।śaṅkhamaṅkuśamabhayaṃ padmamaṣṭa ca viṃśatiḥ ।।mohaṇī mokṣaṇī caiva jvālinī cāmṛtābhayā ।praṇītāḥ pañcamudrāstu pūjāhome ca yojayet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe tvaritāmantrādirnāma navādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha daśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tvaritāmūlamantrādiḥ

agnir uvāca
dīkṣādi vakṣye vinyasya siṃhavajrākule abjake ।
he huti vajradanta puru lulu garja iha siṃhāsanāya namaḥ
tiryagūrdhvagatā rekhāś catvāraś catvāraś caturo bhavet ।।navabhāgavibhāgena koṣṭhakān kārayedbudhaḥ ।grāhyā diśāgatāḥ koṣṭhā vidiśāsu vināśayet ।।vāhye vai koṣṭhakoṇeṣu vāhyarekhāṣṭakaṃ smṛtam ।vāhyakoṣṭhasya vāhye tu madhye yāvat samānayet ।।vajrasya madhyamaṃ śṛṅgaṃ vāhyarekhā dvidhārdhataḥ ।vāhyarekhā bhavedvakrā dvibhaṅgā kārayedbudhaḥ ।।

madhyakoṣṭhaṃ bhavetpadmaṃ pītakarṇikamujjvalam ।kṛṣṇena rajasā likhya kuliśāsiśitordhatā ।।vāhyataś caturasrantu vajrasampuṭalāñchitam ।dvāre pradāpayenmantrī caturo vajrasampuṭān ।।padmanāma bhavedvāmavīthī caiva samā bhavet ।garbhaṃ raktaṃ keśarāṇi maṇḍale dīkṣitāḥ striyaḥ ।।jayecca pararāṣṭrāṇi kṣipraṃ rājyamavāpnuyāt ।mūrtiṃ praṇavasandīptāṃ hūṃkāreṇa niyojayet ।।mūlavidyāṃ samuccārya marudvyomagatāṃ dvija ।prathamena punaś caiva karṇikāyāṃ prapūjayet ।।evaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ pūjya ekaikaṃ vījamāditaḥ ।dalamadhye tu vidyāṅgā āgneyyāṃ pañca nairṛtam ।।madhye netraṃ diśāstrañca guhyakāṅge tu rakṣaṇam ।hutayaḥ keśarasthāstu vāmadakṣiṇapārśvataḥ ।।pañca pañca prapūjyāstu svaiḥ svair mantraiḥ prapūjayet ।lokapālānnyasedaṣṭau vāhyato garbhamaṇḍale ।।varṇāntamagnimārūṭaṃ ṣaṣṭhasvaravibheditaṃ ।pañcadaśena cākrāntaṃ svaiḥ svair nāmabhi yojayet ।।śīghraṃ siṃhe karṇikāyāṃ yajed gandhādibhiḥ śriye ।

āgneyāvannairṛtamiti ña

jyeṣṭhasvaravibhūṣitamiti kha, cha ca

nāmabhiryojayedityayaṃ pāṭhaḥ samīcīno bhavitumarhati

nīleti ña

śriyamiti ña
aṣṭābhir veṣṭayet kummair mantrāṣṭaśatamantritaiḥ ।।mantramaṣṭasahasrantu japtvāṅgānāṃ daśāṃśakam ।tomaṃ kuryādagnikuṇḍe vahnimantreṇa cālayet ।।nikṣiped hṛdayenāgniṃ śaktiṃ madhye agnigāṃ smaret ।garbhādhānaṃ puṃsavanaṃ jātakarma ca homayet ।।hṛdayena śataṃ hy ekaṃ guhyekaṃ guhyāṅge janayecchikhim ।pūrṇāhutyā tu vidyāyāḥ śivāgnirjvalito bhavet ।।homayemmūlamantreṇa śatañcāṅgaṃ daśāṃśataḥ ।nivedayettato devyāstataḥ śiṣyaṃ praveśayet ।।astreṇa tāḍanaṃ kṛtvā guhyāṅgāni tato nyaset ।vidyāṅgaiś caiva sannaddhaṃ vidyāṅgeṣu niyojayet ।।puṣpaṃ kṣipāyayecchiṣyamānayedagnikuṇḍakam ।yavair dvānyaistilair ājyair mūlavidyāśataṃ hunet ।।sthāvaratvaṃ purā homaṃ sarīsṛpamataḥ paraṃ ।pakṣimṛgapaśutvañca mānuṣaṃ brāhmameva ca ।।viṣṇutvañcaiva rudratvamante pūrṇāhutirbhavet ।ekayā caiva hy āhtyā śiṣyaḥ syāddīkṣito bhavet ।।adhikāro bhavedevaṃ śṛṇu mokṣamataḥ param ।sumerustho yadā mantrī sadāśivapade sthitaḥ ।।pare ca homayet svastho akarmakarmaśatān daśa ।pūrṇāhutyā tu tadyogī dharmādharmair na lipyate ।।mokṣaṃ yāti paraṃsthānaṃ yadgatvā na nivartate ।yathā jale jalaṃ kṣiptaṃ jalaṃ dehī śiras tathā ।।

kumbhaiḥ kuryāccābhiṣekaṃ jayarājyādisarvabhāk ।kumārī brāhmaṇī pūjyā gurvāderdakṣiṇāṃ dadet ।।yajet sahasramekantu pūjāṃ kṛtvā dine dine ।tilājyapurahomena devī śrīḥ kāmadā bhavet ।।dadāti vipulān bhogān yadanyacca samīhate ।japtvā hy akṣaralakṣantu nidhānādhipatirbhavet ।।dviguṇena bhavedrājyaṃ triguṇena ca yakṣiṇī ।caturguṇena brahmatvaṃ tato viṣṇupadaṃ bhavet ।।ṣaḍguṇena mahāsiddhir lakṣeṇaikena pāpahā ।daśa japtvā dehaśuddhyai tīrthasnānaphalaṃ śatāt ।।paṭe vā pratimāyāṃ vā śīghrāṃ vai sthaṇḍile yajet ।śataṃ sahasramayutaṃ jape home prakīrtitam ।।evaṃ vidhānato japtvā lakṣamekantu homayet ।mahiṣājameṣamāṃsena narajena pureṇa vā ।।tilair yavais tathā lājair vrīhigodhūmakāmrakaiḥ ।śrīphalair ājyasaṃyuktair homayitvā vratañcaret ।।ardharātreṣu sannaddhaḥ khaḍgacāpaśarādimān ।ekavāsā vicitreṇa raktapītāsitena vā ।।nīlena vātha vastreṇa devīṃ tair eva cārcayet ।vrajeddakṣiṇadigbhāgaṃ dvāre dadyādbaliṃ budhaḥ ।।

tilājyaplavahomeneti kha, cha ca

plaveneti kha, cha ca
dūtīmantreṇa dvārādau ekavṛkṣe śmaśānake ।evañca sarvakāmāptirbhuṅkte sarvāṃ mahīṃ nṛpaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe tvaritāmūlamantro nāma daśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athaikādaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tvaritāvidyā

agnir uvāca
vidyāprastāvamākhyāsye dharmakāmādisiddhidam ।navakoṣṭhavibhāgena vidyābhedañca vindati ।।anulomavilomena samastavyastayogataḥ ।karṇāvikarṇayogena ata ūrdhvaṃ vibhāgaśaḥ ।।tritrikeṇa ca yogena devyā sannaddhavigrahaḥ ।jānāti siddhidānmantrān prastāvānnirgatān bahūn ।।śāstre śāstre smṛtā mantrāḥ prayogāstatra durlabhāḥ ।guruḥ syāt prathamo varṇaḥ pūrvedyurna ca varṇyate ।।prastāve tatra caikārṇā dvyarṇāstryarṇādayo abhavan ।tiryagūrdhvagatā rekhāś caturaś caturo bhajet ।।nava koṣṭhā bhavantyevaṃ madhyadeśe tathā imān ।pradakṣiṇena saṃsthāpya prastāvaṃ bhedayettataḥ ।।prastāvakramayogena prastāvaṃ yastu vindati ।karamuṣṭisthitāstasya sādhakasya hi siddhayaḥ ।।

trailokyaṃ pādamūle syānnavakhaṇḍāṃ bhuvaṃ labhet ।kapāle tu samālikhya śivatattvaṃ samantataḥ ।।śmaśānakarpaṭe vātha vāhyaṃ niṣkramya mantravit ।tasya madhye likhennāma karṇikopari saṃsthitam ।।tāpayetkhādirāṅgārair bhūrjamākramya pādayoḥ ।saptāhādānayet sarvaṃ trelokyaṃ sacarācaram ।।vajrasampuṭagarbhe tu dvādaśāre tu lekhayet ।madhye garbhagataṃ nāma sadāśivavidarbhitam ।।kuḍye phalakake vātha śilāpaṭṭe haridrayā ।mukhastambhaṃ gatistambhaṃ sainyastambhantu jāyate ।।viṣaraktena saṃlikhya śmaśāne karpare budhaḥ ।ṣaṭkoṇaṃ daṇḍamākrāntaṃ samantācchaktiyojitam ।।mārayedacirādeṣa śmaśāne nihataṃ ripuṃ ।chedaṃ karoti rāṣṭrasya cakramadhye nyasedripuṃ ।।cakradhārāṅgatāṃ śaktiṃ ripunāmnā ripuṃ haret ।tārkṣyeṇaiva tu vījena khaḍgamadhye tu lekhayet ।।vidarbharipunāmātha śmaśānāṅgāralekhitam ।saptāhātsādhayeddeśaṃ tāḍayet pretabhasmanā ।।bhedane chedane caiva māraṇeṣu śivo bhavet ।tārakaṃ netramuddiṣṭaṃ śāntipuṣṭau niyojayet ।।dahanādiprayogoyaṃ śākinīñcaiva karpayet ।madhyādivāruṇīṃ yāvadvakratuṇḍasamanvitaḥ ।।

kuṇḍa iti ka

vajratuṇdasamanvita iti ṭa
kuṣṭādyā vyādhayo ye tu nāśayettānna saṃśayaḥ ।madhyādiuttarāntantu karālībandhanājjapet ।।rakṣayedātmano vidyāṃ prativādī yadā śivaḥ ।vāruṇyādi tato nyasya jvarakāśavināśanam ।।saumyādi madhyamāntantu gurutvaṃ jāyate vaṭe ।pūrvādi madhyamāntantu laghutvaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt ।।bhūrje rocanayā likhya etadvajrākulaṃ puram ।kramasthair mantravījaistu rakṣāṃ deheṣu kārayet ।।veṣṭitā bhāvahemnā ca rakṣeyaṃ mṛtyunāśinī ।vighnapāpāridamanī saubhāgyāyuḥpradā dhṛtā ।।dyūte reṇe ca jayadā śakrasainye na saṃśayaḥ ।bandhyānāṃ putradā hy eṣā cintāmaṇirivāparā ।।sādhayet pararāṣṭrāṇi rājyañca pṛthivīṃ jayet ।phaṭ strīṃ kṣeṃ hūṃ lakṣajapyādyakṣādirvaśago bhavet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe tvaritāvidyā nāmaikādaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvādaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānāmantrāḥ

agnir uvāca
oṃ vināyakārcanaṃ vakṣye yajedādhāraśaktikam ।dharmādyaṣṭakakandañca nālaṃ padmañca karṇikām ।।

tārahemnā ceti kha
keśaraṃ trigunaṃ padmaṃ tīvrañca jvalinīṃ yajet ।nandāñca suyaśāñcogrāṃ tejovatīṃ vindhyavāsinīṃ ।।gaṇamūrtiṃ gaṇapattiṃ hṛdayaṃ syādgaṇaṃ jayaḥ ।ekadantotkaṭaśiraḥśikhāyācalakarṇine ।।gajavaktrāya kavacaṃ hūṃ phaḍantaṃ tathāṣṭakaṃ ।mahodaro daṇḍahastaḥ pūrvādau madhyato yajet ।।jayo gaṇādhipo gaṇanāyako atha gaṇeśvaraḥ ।vakratuṇḍa ekadantotkaṭalambodaro gaja ।।vaktro vikaṭānano atha hūṃ pūrvo vighnanāśanaḥ ।dhūmravarṇo mahendrādyo vāhye vighneśapūjanam ।।tripurāpūjanaṃ vakṣye asitāṅgo rurus tathā ।caṇḍaḥ krodhastathonmattaḥ kapālī bhīṣaṇaḥ kramāt ।।saṃhāro bhairavo brāhmīrmukhyā hrasvāstu bhairabāḥ ।brahmāṇīṣaṇmukhā dīrghā agnyādau vaṭukāḥ kramāt ।।samayaputro vaṭuko yoginīputrakas tathā ।siddhaputraś ca vaṭukaḥ kulaputraś caturthakaḥ ।।hetukaḥ kṣetrapālaś ca tripurānto dvitīyakaḥ ।agnivetālo agnijihvaḥ karālī kālalocanaḥ ।।ekapādaś ca bhīmākṣa aiṃ kṣeṃ pretastayāsanaṃ ।aiṃ hrīṃ dvauś ca tripurā padmāsanasamāsthitā ।।vibhratyabhayapustañca vāme varadamālikām ।

vivāsinīmiti kha

tripurāyajanamiti kha, cha, ja, ña, ṭa ca
mūlena hṛdayādi syājjālapūrṇañca kāmakam ।।gomadhye nāma saṃlikhya cāṣṭapatre ca madhyataḥ ।śmaśānādipaṭe śmaśānāṅgāreṇa vilekhayet ।।citāṅgārapiṣṭakena mūrtiṃ dhyātvā tu tasya ca ।kṣiptvodare nīlasūtrair veṣṭya coccāṭhanaṃ bhavet ।।
oṃ namo bhagavati jvālāmānini gṛdhragaṇaparivṛte svāhā yuddhegacchan japanmantraṃ pumān sākṣājjayī bhavet ।

oṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ klīṃ śriyai namaḥ
uttarādau ca ghṛṇinī sūryā pujyā caturdale ।।ādityā prabhāvatī ca hemādrimadhurāśrayaḥ ।
oṃ hrīṃ gauryai namaḥ
gaurīmantraḥ sarvakaraḥ homāddhyānājjapārcanāt ।।raktā caturbhujā pāśavaradā dakṣiṇe kare ।aṅkuśābhayayuktāntāṃ prārthya siddhātmanā pumān ।।jīvedvarṣaśataṃ dhīmānna caurāribhayaṃ bhavet ।kruddhaḥ prasādī bhavati yudhi mantrāmbupānataḥ ।।añjanaṃ tilakaṃ vaśye jihvāgre kavitā bhavet ।tajjapānmaithunaṃ vaśye tajjapādyonivīkṣaṇam ।।sparśādvaśī tilahomātsarvañcaiva tu sidhyati ।saptābhimantritañcānnaṃ bhuñjaṃstasya śriyaḥ sadā ।।ardhanārīśarūpo ayaṃ lakṣmyādivaiṣṇavādikaḥ ।anaṅgarūpā śaktiś ca dvitīyā madanāturā ।।pavanavegā bhuvanapālā vai savvasiddhidā ।

anaṅgamadanānaṅgamekhalāntāñcapecchriye ।।padmamadhyadaleṣu hrīṃ svarān kādīṃstitaḥ striyāḥ ।ṣaṭkoṇe vā ghaṭe vātha likhitvā syādvaśīkaraṃ ।।
oṃ hrīṃ chaṃ nityaklinne madadrave oṃ oṃ
mūlamantraḥ ṣaḍaṅgaoyaṃ raktavarṇe trikoṇake ।dravaṇī hlādakāriṇī kṣobhiṇī guruśaktikā ।।īśānādau ca madhye tāṃ nityāṃ pāśāṅkuśau tathā ।kapālakalpakataruṃ vīṇā raktā ca tadvatī ।।nityābhayā maṅgalā ca navavīrā ca maṅgalā ।durbhagā manonmanī pūjyā drāvā pūrvāditaḥ sthitā ।।
oṃ hrīṃ anaṅgāya namaḥ oṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ smarāya namaḥ
manmathāya ca mārāya kāmāyaivañca pañcadhā ।kāmāḥ pāśāṅkuśau cāpavāṇāḥ dhyeyāś ca vibhrataḥ ।।ratiś ca viratiḥ prītirviprītiś ca matirdhṛtiḥ ।vidhṛtiḥ puṣṭirebhiś ca kramāt kāmādikair yutāḥ ।
oṃ chaṃ nityaklinne madadrave oṃ oṃ । a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ e ai o au aṃ aḥ । ka kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma ya ra la va śa ṣa sa ha kṣa । oṃ chaṃ nityaklinne madadrave svāhā ādhāraśaktiṃ padmañca siṃhe devīṃ hṛdādiṣu ।।

oṃ hrīṃ gauri rudradayite yogeśvari hūṃ phaṭ svāhā

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānāmantrā nāma dvādaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha trayodaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tvaritājñānam

agnir uvāca

om hrīṃ hūṃ khe che kṣaḥ strīṃ hrūṃ kṣe hrīṃ phaṭ tvaritāyainamaḥ
tvaritāṃ pūjayennyasya dvibhujāñcāṣṭavāhukāṃ ।ādhāraśaktiṃ padmañca siṃhe devīṃ hṛdādikam ।।pūrvādau gāyatrīṃ yajenmaṇḍale vai praṇītayā ।huṃkārāṃ khecarīṃ caṇḍāṃ chedanīṃ kṣepaṇīṃstriyāḥ ।।huṃkārāṃ kṣemakārīñca phaṭkārīṃ madhyato yajet ।jayāñca vijayāṃ dvāri kiṅkarañca tadagrataḥ ।।lilaihīmaiś ca sarvāptyai nāmavyāhṛtibhis tathā ।anantāya namaḥ svāhā kulikāya namaḥ svadhā ।।svāhā vāsukirājāya śaṅkhapālāya vauṣaṭ ।takṣakāya vaṣannityaṃ mahāpadmāya vai namaḥ ।।svāhā karkoṭanāgāya phaṭ padmāya ca vai namaḥ ।likhennigrahacakrantu ekāśītipadair naraḥ ।।vaste paṭe tarau bhūrje śilāyāṃ yaṣṭikāsu ca ।madhye koṣṭhe sādhyanāma pūrvādau paṭṭikāsu ca ।।
oṃ hrīṃ kṣūṃ chanda chanda caturaḥ kaṇṭhakān kālarātrikāṃ
aiśādāvambupādau ca yamarājyañca vāhyataḥ ।kālīnāravamālī kālīnāmākṣamālinī ।।

māmodetattadomomā rakṣata svasva bhakṣavā ।yamapāṭaṭayāmaya maṭamo ṭaṭa moṭamā ।।vāmo bhūrivibhūmeyā ṭaṭa rīśva śvarī ṭaṭa ।yamarājādvāhyato vaṃ taṃ toyaṃ māraṇātmakaṃ ।।kajjalaṃ nimbaniryāsamajjāsṛgviṣasaṃyutam ।kākapakṣasya lekhanyā śmaśāne vā catuṣpathe ।।nidhāpayet kumbhādhastādvalmīke vātha nikṣipet ।vibhītadrumaśāsvādho yantraṃ sarvārimardanam ।।likheccānugrahañcakraṃ śuklapatre atha bhūrjake ।lākṣayā kuṅkumenātha sphaṭikācandanena vā ।।bhuvi bhittau pūrvadale nāma madhyamakoṣṭhake ।khaṇḍe tu vārimadhyasthaṃ oṃ haṃso vāpi paṭṭiśam ।।lakṣmīślokaṃ śivādau ca rākṣasādikramāllikhet ।śrīḥsāmamomā sā śrīḥ sānau yājñe jñeyā nausā ।।māyā līlā lālī yāmā yājñe jñeyā nausā māyā ।yatra jñeyā vahiḥ śīghrā dikṣuraṃ kalasaṃ vahiḥ ।।padmasthaṃ padmacakrañca bhṛtyujit svargagandhṛtiṃ ।śāntīnāṃ paramā sāntiḥ saubhāgyādipradāyakam ।।rudre rudrasamāḥ kāryāḥ koṣṭhakāstatra tā likhet ।omādyāhrūṃphaḍantā ca ādivarṇamathānutaḥ ।।vidyāvarṇakrameneva saṃjñāñca vaṣaḍantikāṃ ।

pūrvapade iti ña
adhasthāt pratyaṅgiraiṣā sarvakāmārthasādhikā ।।ekāśītipade sarvāmādivarṇakrameṇa tu ।ādimaṃ yāvadantaṃ syādvaṣaḍantañca nāma vai ।।eṣā pratyaṅgirā cānyā sarvakāryādisādhanī ।nigrahānugrahañcakrañcatuḥṣaṣṭipadair likhet ।।amṛtī sā ca vidyā ca krīṃ saḥ hūṃ nāmātha madhyataḥ ।phaṭkārādyāṃ patragatāṃ trihrīṃkāreṇa veṣṭayet ।।kumbhavavaddhāritā sarvaśatruhṛt sarvadāyikā ।viṣannaśyet karṇajapādakṣarādyaiś ca daṇḍakaiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe tvaritājñānaṃ nāma trayodaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha caturdaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

stambhanādimantrāḥ

agnir uvāca
stambhanaṃ mohanaṃ vaśyaṃ vidveṣoccāṭanaṃ vade ।viṣavyādhimarogañca māraṇaṃ śamanaṃ punaḥ ।।bhūrje kūrmaṃ samālikhya tāḍanena ṣaḍṅgulam ।mukhapādacaturṣkeṣu tato mantraṃ nyaseddvijaḥ ।।catuṣpādeṣu krīṃ kāraṃ hrīṃ kāraṃ mukhamadhyataḥ ।garbhe vidyāṃ tato likhya sādhakaṃ pṛṣṭhato likhet ।।

mālāmantraistu saṃveṣṭya iṣṭakopari sannyamet ।vidhāya kūrmapṛṣṭhena karālenābhisampaṭhenat ।।mahākūrmaṃ pūjayitvā pādaprokṣantu nikṣipet ।tāḍayedvāmapādena smṛtvā śatruñca saptadhā ।।tataḥ sañjāyate śatrostambhanaṃ mukharāgataḥ ।kṛtvā tu bhairavaṃ rūpaṃ mālāmantraṃ samālikhet ।।oṃ śatrusukhastambhanī kāmarūpā ālīḍhakarī
hrīṃ pheṃ phetkāriṇī mama śatrūṇāṃ devadattānāṃ mukhaṃ stambhaya mama sarvavidveṣiṇāṃ mukhastambhanaṃ kuru oṃ hūṃ pheṃ phetkāriṇi svāhā phaṭ hetuñca samālikhya tajjapāntaṃ mahābalaṃ । vāmenaiva nagaṃ śūlaṃ saṃlikheddakṣiṇe kare ।। likhenmantramaghorasya saṃgrāme stambhayedarīn । oṃ namo bhagavatyai bhagamālini visphura spanda nityaklinne drava hūṃ saḥ krīṃ kārākṣare svāhā ।।
etena rocanādyaistu tilakāmmohayejjagat ।।
oṃ pheṃ hūṃ phaṭ phetkāriṇi hrīṃ jvala trailokyaṃ mohaya guhyakālike svāhā
anena tilakaṃ kṛtvā rājādīnāṃ vaśīkaraṃ ।gardhabhasya rajo gṛhya kusumaṃ sūtakasya ca ।।nārīrajaḥ kṣipedrātrau śayyādau dveṣakṛdbhavet ।gokhurañca tathā śṛṅgamaśvasya ca khuraṃ tathā ।।śiraḥ sarpasya saṃkṣiptaṃ hṛheṣūccāṭanaṃ bhavet ।

karavīraśiphā pītā sasiddhārthā ca maraṇe ।।vyālachucchundarīraktaṃ karavīraṃ tadarthakṛt ।saraṭaṃ ṣaṭpadañcāpi tathā karkaṭavṛścikam ।।cūrṇīkṛtya kṣipettaile tadabhyaṅgaś ca kuṣṭhakṛt ।
oṃ navarahāya sarvaśatrūn mama sādhaya māraya oṃ soṃ maṃ vuṃ cuṃ oṃ śaṃ vāṃ keṃ oṃ svahā
