anenārkaśatair arcya śmaśāne tu nidhāpayet ।।bhūrje vā pratimāyāṃ vā māraṇāya riporgrahāḥ ।
oṃ kuñjarī brahmāṇī । oṃ mañjarī māheśvarī । oṃ vetālī kaumārī oṃ kālī vaiṣṇavī । oṃ vetālī intrāṇī urvaśī । navamātaro he mama śatruṃ gṛhṇata 
bhūrje nāma riporlikhya śmaśāne pūjite mriyet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe stambhanādimantrā nāma caturdaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcadaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānāmantrāḥ

agnir uvāca
ādau hūṃkārasaṃyuktā khecache padabhūṣitā ।vargātītavisargeṇa hrīṃ hūṃkṣepaphaḍantakā ।।sarvakarmakarī vidyā viṣasandhādimardanī ।

oṃ kṣecachetiprayogaś ca kāladaṣṭasya jīvane ।।oṃ hūṃ kekṣaḥ prayogoyaṃ viṣaśatrupramardanaḥ ।strīṃ hūṃ phaḍitiyogoyaṃ pāparogādikaṃ jayet ।।khecheti ca prayogo ayaṃ vighnaduṣṭādi vārayet ।hrūṃ strīṃ omitiyogo ayaṃ yoṣidādivaśīkaraḥ ।।khe strīṃ khe ca prayogo ayaṃ vaśāya vijayāya ca ।
aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ spheṃ kṣauṃ bhagavati ambike kubjike spheṃ oṃ bhaṃ taṃ vaśanamo aghorāya sukhe vrāṃ vrīṃ kili kili viccā sphrauṃ he sphraṃ śrīṃ hrīṃ aiṃ śrīmiti kubjikāvidyā sarvakarā smṛtā bhūyaḥ skandāya yānāha mantrānīśaś ca tān vade ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānāmantrā nāma pañcadaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣoḍaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sakalādimantroddhāraḥ

īśvara uvāca
sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ śūnyaṃ kalāḍhyaṃ svamalaṅkṛtam ।kṣapaṇaṃ kṣayamantasthaṃ kaṇṭhoṣṭhaṃ cāṣṭamaṃśivam ।।prāsādasya parākhyasya smṛtaṃ rūpaṃ guhāṣṭadhā ।

ripuduṣṭādi vārayediti ka, ṭa ca

prasādasyeti kha

smṛtirūpamiti kha
sadāśivasya śabdasya rūpasyākhilasiddhaye ।।amṛtaścāṃśubhāṃścenduśceśvaraścogra ūhakaḥ ।ekapādena ojākhya auṣadhaścāṃśumān vaśī ।।akārādeḥ kṣakāraś ca kakārādeḥ kramādime ।kāmadevaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca gaṇeśaḥ kālaśaṅkarau ।।ekanetro dvinetraś ca triśikho dīrghabāhukaḥ ।ekapādardhacandraś ca balapo yoginīpriyaḥ ।।śaktīśvaro mahāgranthistarpakaḥ sthāṇudanturau ।nidhīśo nandī padmaś ca tathānyaḥ śākinīpriyaḥ ।।sukhavimbo bhīṣanaś ca kṛtāntaḥ prāṇasaṃjñakaḥ ।tejasvī śakra udadhiḥ śrīkaṇṭhaḥ siṃha eva ca ।।śaśāṅko viśvarūpaś ca kṣaś ca syānnarasiṃhakaḥ ।sūryamātrāsamākrāntaṃ viśvarūpantu kārayet ।।aṃśumatsaṃyutaṃ kṛtvā śaśivījaṃ vināyutam ।īśānamojasākrāntaṃ prathamantu samuddharet ।।tṛtīyaṃ puruṣaṃ viddhi dakṣiṇaṃ pañcamaṃ tathā ।saptamaṃ vāmadevantu sadyojātantataḥparaṃ ।।rasayuktantu navamaṃ brahmapañcapañcakamīritam ।oṃkārādyāś caturthyantā namontāḥ sarvamantrakāḥ ।।sadyodevā dvitīyantu hṛdayañcāṅgasaṃyutam ।caturthantu śiro viddhi īśvarannāmanāmataḥ ।।ūhakantu śikhā jñeyā viśvarūpasamanvitā ।

triśikhī cordhvavāhuka iti kha, cha ca
tanmantramaṣṭamaṃ khyātaṃ netrantu daśamaṃ matam ।।astraṃ śaśī samākhyātaṃ śivasaṃjñaṃ śikhidhyajaḥ ।namaḥ svāhā tathā vauṣat hūṃ ca phatkakrameṇa tu ।।jātiphaṭkaṃ hṛdādīnāṃ prāsādaṃ mantramāvade ।īśānādrudrasaṃkhyātaṃ proddhareccāṃśurañjitam ।।auṣadhākrāntaśirasamūhakasyoparisthitaṃ ।ardhacandrordhanādaś ca vindudvitayamadhyagaṃ ।।tadante viśvarūpantu kuṭilantu tridhā tataḥ ।evaṃ prāsādamantraś ca sarvakarmakaro manuḥ ।।śikhāvījaṃ samuddhṛtya phaṭkārāntantu caiva phaṭ ।ardhacandrāsanaṃ jñeyaṃ kāmadevaṃ sasarpakam ।।mahāpāśupatāstrantu sarvaduṣṭapramardanam ।prāsādaḥ sakalaḥ prokto niṣkalaḥ procyate adhunā ।।auṣadhaṃ viśvarūpantu rudrākhyaṃ sūryamaṇḍalam ।candrārdhaṃ nādasaṃyogaṃ visaṃjñaṃ kuṭilantataḥ ।।niṣkalo bhuktimuktau syātpañcāṅgo ayaṃ sadāśivaḥ ।aṃśumān viśvarūpañca āvṛtaṃ śūnyarañjitam ।।brahmāṅgarahitaḥ śūnyastasya mūrtirasastaruḥ ।vighnanāśāya bhavati pūjito bālabāliśaiḥ ।।aṃśumān viśvarūpākhyamūhakasyopari sthitam ।kalāḍhyaṃ sakalasyaiva pūjāṅgādi ca sarvataḥ ।।narasiṃhaṃ kṛtāntasthaṃ tejasviprāṇamūrdhagam ।

mantramādarediti ña

candrārdhanādasaṃyuktamiti kha
aṃśumānūhakākrāntamadhordhaṃ svasalaṅghṛtam ।।candrārdhanādanādāntaṃ brahmaviṣṇuvibhūśita ।udadhiṃ narasiṃhañca sūryamātrāvibheditam ।।yadā kṛtaṃ tadā tasya brahmāṇyaṅgāni pūrvavat ।ojākhyamaṃśumadyuktaṃ prathamaṃ varṇamuddharet ।।aśumaccāṃśunākrāntaṃ dvitīyaṃ varṇanāyakam ।aṃśumānīśvarantadvat tṛtīyaṃ muktidāyakam ।।ūhakañcāṃśunākrāntaṃ varuṇaprānataijasam ।pañcamantu samākhyātaṃ kṛtāntantu tataḥ param ।।aṃśumānudakaprāṇaḥ saptamaṃ varṇamuddhṛtam ।padmamindusamākrāntaṃ nandīśamekapādadhṛk ।।prathamañcāntato yojyaṃ kṣapaṇaṃ daśavījakam ।asyārdhaṃ tṛtīyañcaiva pañcamaṃ saptamaṃ tathā ।।sadyojātantu navamaṃ dvitīyāddhṛdayādikam ।daśārṇapraṇavaṃ yattu phaḍantañcāstramuddharet ।।namaskārayutānyatra brahmāṅgāni tu nānyathā ।dvitīyādaṣṭau yāvadaṣṭau vidyeśvarā matāḥ ।।ananteśaś ca sūkṣmaś ca tṛtīyaś ca śivoktamaḥ ।ekamūrcyekarūpastu trimūrtiraparas tathā ।।śrīkaṇṭhaś ca śikhaṇḍī ca aṣṭauvidyeśvarāḥsmṛtāḥ ।śikhaṇḍino apyanantāntaṃ mantrāntaṃ mūrtirīritā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sakalādimantroddhāro nāma ṣoḍaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptadaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gaṇapūjā

iśvara uvāca
viśvarūpaṃ samuddhṛtya tejasyupari saṃsthitam ।narasiṃhaṃ tato adhastāt kṛtāntaṃ tadadho nyaset ।।praṇavaṃ tadadhaḥkṛtvā ūhakaṃ tadadhaḥ punaḥ ।aṃśumān viśvamūrtisthaṃ kaṇṭhoṣṭhapraṇavādikam ।।namo antaḥ syāccaturvarṇo viśvarūpañca kāraṇam ।sūryamātrāhataṃ brahmaṇyaṅgānīha tu pūrvavat ।।uddharet praṇavaṃ pūrvaṃ prasphuradvayamuccaret ।ghoraghorataraṃ paścāt tatra rūpamataḥ smaret ।।caṭaśabdaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā tataḥ pravaramuccaret ।daheti ca dvidhā kāryaṃ vameti ca dvidhā gatam ।।ghātayeti dvidhākṛtya hūṃphaḍantaṃ samuccaret ।aghorāstrantu netraṃ syād gāyatrī cocyate adhunā ।।tanmaheśāya vidmahe mahādevāya dhīmahi ।tatraḥ śivaḥ pracodayāt gāyatrī sarvasādhanī ।।yātrāyāṃ vijayādau ca yajet pūrvaṅgaṇaṃ śriye ।turyāṃśe tu purā kṣetre samantādarkabhājite ।।catuṣpadaṃ trikoṇe tu tridalaṃ kamalaṃ likhet ।

sarvata iti kha

dvidhākṛtamiti kha
tatpṛṣṭhe padikāvithībhāgi tridalamaśvayuk ।।vasudevasutaiḥ sābjaistidalaiḥ pādapaṭṭikā ।tadūrdhve vedikā deyā bhagamātrapramāṇataḥ ।।dvāraṃ padmamitaṃ koṣṭhādupadvāraṃ vivarṇitam ।dvāropadvāraracitaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vighnasūdanam ।।āraktaṃ kamalaṃ madhye vāhyapadmāni tadvahiḥ ।sitā tu vīthikā kāryā dvārāṇi tu yathecchayā ।।karṇikā pītavarṇā syāt keśarāṇi tathā punaḥ ।maṇḍalaṃ vighnamardākhyaṃ madhye gaṇapatiṃ yajet ।।nāmādyaṃ savarākaṃ syāddevācchakrasamanvitam ।śiro hataṃ tatpuruṣeṇa omādyañca namo antakam ।।gajākhyaṃ gajaśīrṣañca gāṅgeyaṃ gaṇanāyakam ।trirāvartaṅgaganagaṅgopatiṃ pūrvapaṅktigam ।।vicitrāṃśaṃ mahākāyaṃ lamboṣṭhaṃ lambakarṇakam ।lambodaraṃ mahābhāgaṃ vikṛtaṃ pārvatīpriyam ।।bhayāvahañca bhadrañca bhagaṇaṃ bhayasūdanam ।dvādaśaite daśapaṅktau devatrāsañca paścime ।।mahānādambhāsvarañca vighnarājaṃ gaṇādhipam ।udbhaṭasvānabhaś caṇḍau mahāśuṇḍañca bhīmakam ।।manmathaṃ madhusūdañca sundaraṃ bhāvapuṣṭakam ।saumye brahmeśvaraṃ brāhmaṃ manovṛttiñca saṃlayam ।।layaṃ dūtyapriyaṃ laulyaṃ vikarṇaṃ vatsalaṃ tathā ।kṛtāntaṃ kāladaḍaṇca yajet kumbhañca pūrvavat ।।

śrayutañca japenmantraṃ homayettu daśāṃśataḥ ।śeṣāṇāntu daśāhutyā japāddhomantu kārayet ।।pūrṇāṃ datvābhiṣekantu kuryātsarvantu sidhyati ।bhūgo aśvagajavastrādyair gurupūjāñcarennaraḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gaṇapūjā nāma saptadaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athāṣṭādaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vāgīśvarīpūjā

īśvara uvāca
vāgīśvarīpūjanañca pravadāmi samaṇḍalam ।ūhakaṃ kālasaṃyuktaṃ manuṃ varṇasamāyutam ।।niṣāda īśvaraṃ kāryaṃ manunā candrasūryavat ।akṣaranna hi deyaṃ syāt dhyāyet kundendusannibhāṃ ।।pañcāśadvarṇamālāntu muktāsragdāmabhūṣitām ।varadābhayākṣasūtrapustakāḍhyāṃ trilocanāṃ ।।lakṣaṃ japenmastakāntaṃ skandhāntaṃ varṇamālikāṃ ।akārādikṣakārāntāṃ viśantīṃ mānavat smaret ।।kuryād guruś ca dīkṣārthaṃ mantragrāhe tu maṇḍalam ।sūryāgramindubhaktantu bhāgābhyāṃ kamalaṃ hitaṃ ।।

candramasāyutamiti ña

kṛtamiti kha
vīthikā padikā karyā padmānyaṣṭau catuṣpade ।vīthikā padikā vāhye dvārāṇi dvipadāni tu ।।upadvārāṇita dvacca koṇabāndhaṃ dvipaṭṭikam ।sidāni nava padmāni karṇikā kanakaprabhā ।।keśarāṇi vicitrāṇi koṇānraktena pūrayet ।vyomarekhāntaraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dvārāṇīndrebhamānataḥ ।।madhye sarasvatīṃ padme vāgīśī pūrvapadmake ।hṛllekhā citravāgīśī gāyatrī viśvarūpayā ।।śāṅkarī matirdhṛtiś ca pūrvādyā hrīṃ svavījakāḥ ।dhyeyā sarasvatīvacca kapilājyena homakaḥ ।saṃskṛtaprākṛtakaviḥ kāvyaśāstrādividbhavet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vāgīśvarīpūjā nāmāṣṭādaśādhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athonaviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

maṇḍalāni īśvara uvāca
sarvato bhadrakānyaṣṭamaṇḍalāni vade guha ।śaktimāsādhayet prācīmiṣṭāyāṃ viṣuve sudhīḥ ।।citrāsvātyantareṇātha dṛṣṭasūtreṇa vā punaḥ ।pūrvāparāyataṃ sūtramāsphālya madhyato aṅkayet ।।

dviparṇakamiti kha
koṭidvayantu tanmadhyādaṅkayeddakṣiṇottaram ।madhye dvayaṃ prakartavya sphālayeddakṣinottaram ।।śatakṣetrārdhamānena koṇasampātamādiśet ।evaṃ sūtracatuṣkasya sphālanāccaturasrakam ।।jāyate tatra kartavyaṃ bhadrasvedakaraṃ śubham ।vasubhaktendu dvipade kṣetre vīthī ca bhāgikā ।।dvāraṃ dvipadikaṃ padmamānāddhai sakapolakam ।kīṇabandhavicitrantu dvipadaṃ tatra vartayet ।।śuklaṃ padmaṃ karṇikā tu pītā citrantu keśaram ।raktā vīthī tatra kalpyā dvāraṃ lokeśarūpakaṃ ।।raktakoṇaṃ vidhau nitye naimittikābjakaṃ śṛṇu ।asaṃsaktantu saṃsaktaṃ dvidhābjaṃ bhuktimuktikṛt ।।asaṃsaktaṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ saṃsaktaṃ tattridhā pṛthak ।bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaś ca nāmataḥ phalasiddhidāḥ ।।padmakṣetre tu sūtrāṇi digvidikṣu vinikṣipet ।vṛttāni pañcakalpāni padmakṣetrasamāni tu ।।prathame karṇikā tatra puṣkarair navabhiryutā ।keśarāṇi caturviṃśadvitīye atha tṛtīyake ।।dalasandhirgajakumbha nibhāntaryaddalāgrakam ।pañcame vyomarūpantu saṃsaktaṃ kamalaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।asaṃsakte dalāgre tu digbhāgair vistarādbhajet ।bhāgadvayaparityāgādvasvaṃśair vartayeddalam ।।sandhivistarasūtreṇa tanmūlādañjayeddalam ।

savyāsavyakrameṇaiva vṛddhametadbhavettathā ।।atha vā sandhimadhyāttu bhrāmayedardhacandravat ।sandhidvayāgrasūtraṃ vā bālapadmantathā bhavet ।।sandhisūtrārdhamānena pṛṣṭhataḥ parivartayet ।tīkṣṇāgrantu suvātena kamalaṃ bhuktimuktidam ।।bhuktivṛddhau ca vaśyādau bālaṃ padmaṃ samānakaṃ ।navanābhaṃ navahastaṃ bhāgair mantrātmakaiś ca tat ।।madhye abjaṃ paṭṭikāvījaṃ dvāreṇābjasya mānataḥ ।kaṇṭhopakaṇṭhamuktāni tadvāhye vīthikā matā ।।pañcabhāgānvitā sā tu samantāddaśabhāgikā ।digvidikṣvaṣṭa padmāni dvārapadmaṃ savīthikam ।।tadvāhye pañca padikā vīthikā yatra bhūṣitā ।padmavaddvārakaṇṭhantu padikañcauṣṭhakaṇṭhakaṃ ।।kapolaṃ padikaṃ kāryaṃ dikṣu dvāratrayaṃ spuṭam ।koṇabandhaṃ tripattantu dvipaṭṭaṃ vajravadbhavet ।।madhyantu kamalaṃ śuklaṃ pītaṃ raktañca nīlakam ।pītaśuklañca dhūmrañca raktaṃ pītañca muktidam ।।pūrvādau kamalānyaṣṭa śivaviṣṇvādikaṃ japet ।prāsādamadhyato abhyarcya śakrādīnabjakādiṣu ।।astrāṇi vāhyavīthyāntu viṣṇvādīnaśvameghabhāk ।pavitrārohaṇādau ca mahāmaṇḍalamālikhet ।।aṣṭahastaṃ purā kṣetraṃ rasapakṣair vivartayet ।

pañcabhāgamiteti kha, cha ca
dvipadaṃ kamalaṃ madhye vīthikā padikā tataḥ ।।digvidikṣu tato aṣṭau ca nīlābjāni vivartayet ।madhyapadmapramāṇena triṃśatpadmāni tāni tu ।।dalasandhivihīnāni nīlendīvarakāni ca ।tatpṛṣṭhe padikā vīthī svastikāni tadūrdhvataḥ ।।dvipadāni tathā cāṣṭau kṛtibhāgakṛtāni tu ।vartayet svastikāṃstatra vīthikā pūrvavadvahiḥ ।।dvārāṇi kamalaṃ yadvadupakaṇṭhyutāni tu ।raktaṃ koṇaṃ pītavīthī nīlaṃ padmañcamaṇḍale ।।svastikādi vicitrañca sarvakāmapradaṃ guha ।pañcābjaṃ pañcahastaṃ syāt samantāddaśabhājitam ।।dvipadaṃ kamalaṃ vīthī paṭṭikā dikṣu paṅkajam ।catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭhato vīthī padikā dvipadānyathā ।।kaṇṭhopakaṇṭhayuktāni dvārānyabjantu madhyataḥ ।pañcābjamaṇḍale hy asmin sitaṃ pītañca pūrvakam ।।vaidūryābhaṃ dakṣiṇābjaṃ kundābhaṃ vāruṇaṃ kajam ।uttarābjantu śaṅkhābhamanyat sarvaṃ vicitrakam ।।sarvakāmapradaṃ vakṣye daśahastantu maṇḍalam ।vikārabhaktanturyāśraṃ dvārantu dvipadaṃ bhavet ।।madhye padmaṃ pūrvavacca vighnadhvaṃsaṃ vadāmyatha ।caturhastaṃ puraṃ kṛtvā vṛtrañcaiva karadvayam ।।vīthīkā hastamātrantu svastikair vahubhirvṛtā ।

tadvadupakaṇṭhayutānīti kha, ña ca
hastamātrāṇi dvārāṇi vikṣu vṛttaṃ sapadmakam ।।padmāni pañca śuklāni madhye pūjyaś ca niṣkalaḥ ।hṛdayādīni pūrvādau vidikṣvastrāṇi vai yajet ।।prāgvacca pañca brahmāṇi buddhyādhāramato vade ।śatabhāge tithibhāge padmaṃ liṅgāṣṭakaṃ diśi ।।mekhalābhāgasaṃyuktaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ dvipadikaṃ bhavet ।ācāryo buddhimāśritya kalpayecca latādikam ।।catuḥṣaṭpañcamāṣṭādi khāchikhādyādi maṇḍalam ।khākṣīndusūryagaṃ sarvaṃ khākṣi caivenduvarṇanāt ।।catvāriṃśadadhikāni caturdaśaśatāni hi ।maṇḍalāni hareḥ śambhordevyāḥ sūryasya santi ca ।।daśasaptavibhakte tu latāliṅgodbhavaṃ śṛṇu ।dikṣu pañcatrayañcaikaṃ trayaṃ pañca ca lomayet ।।ūrdhvage dvipade liṅgamandiraṃ pārśvakoṣṭhayoḥ ।madhyena dbipadaṃ padmamatha caikañca paṅkajaṃ ।।liṅgasya pārśvayorbhadre padadvāramalopanāt ।tatpārśvaśobhāḥ ṣaḍlopya latāḥ śeṣās tathā hareḥ ।।ūrdhvaṃ dvipadikaṃ lopya harerbhadrāṣṭakaṃ smṛtam ।raśmimānasamāyuktavedalopācca śobhikam ।।pañcaviṃśatikaṃ padmaṃ tataḥ pīṭhamapīṭhakam ।dvayaṃ dvayaṃ rakṣayitvā upaśobhās tathāṣṭa ca ।।devyādikhyāpakaṃ bhadraṃ vṛhanmadhye paraṃ laghu ।

lopayediti ña । lopayediti ṭa
madhye navapadaṃ padmaṃ koṇe bhadracatuṣṭayam ।।trayodaśapadaṃ śeṣaṃ buddhyādhārantu maṇḍalaṃ ।śatapatraṃ ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ buddhyādhāraṃ harādiṣu ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe maṇḍalāni nāmonaviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha viṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aghīrāstrādiśāntikalpaḥ

īśvara uvāca
astrayāgaḥ purā kāryaḥ sarvakarmasu siddhidaḥ ।madhye pūjyaṃ śivādyastraṃ vajrādīn pūrvataḥ kramāt ।।pañcacakraṃ daśakaraṃ raṇādau pūjitaṃ jaye ।grahapūjā ravirmadhye pūrvādyāḥ somakādayaḥ ।।sarva ekādaśasthāstu grahāḥ syuḥ grahapūjanāt ।astraśāntiṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvotpātavināśinīṃ ।।graharogādiśamanīṃ mārīśatruvimardanīṃ ।vināyakopataptighnamaghorāstraṃ japennaraḥ ।।lakṣaṃ grahādināśaḥ syādutpāte tilahomanam ।divye lakṣaṃ tadardhena vyomajotpātanāśanaṃ ।।ghṛtena lakṣapātena utpāte bhumije hitam ।ghṛtagugguluhome ca sarvotpātādimardanam ।।

dūrvākṣatājyahomena vyādhayo atha ghṛtena ca ।sahasreṇa tu duḥkhasvapnā vinaśanti na saṃśayaḥ ।।ayutād grahadoṣaghno javāghṛtavimiśritāt ।vināyakārtiśamanamayutena ghṛtasya ca ।।bhūtavedālaśāntistu guggulorayutena ca ।mahāvṛkṣasya bhaṅgetu vyālakaṅke gṛhe sthite ।।āraṇyānāṃ praveśe dūrvājyākṣatahāvanāt ।ulkāpāte bhūmikampe tilājyenāhutācchivam ।।raktasrāve tu vṛkṣāṇāmayutād gugguloḥ śivaṃ ।akāle phalapuṣpāṇāṃ rāṣṭrabhaṅge ca māraṇe ।।dvipadāderyadā māri lakṣārdhācca tilājyataḥ ।hastimārīpraśāntyarthaṃ kariṇīdantavardhane ।।hastinyāṃ madadṛṣṭau ca ayutācchāntiriṣyate ।akāle garbhapāte tu jātaṃ yatra vinaśyati ।।vikṛtā yatra jāyante yātrākāle ayutaṃ hunet ।tilājyalakṣahomantu uttamāsiddhisādhane ।।madhyamāyāṃ tadardhena tatpādādadhamāsu ca ।yathā japas tathā homaḥ saṃgrāme vijayo bhavet ।aghorāstraṃ japennyasya dhyātvā pañcāsyamūrjitam ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe aghorāstrādiśāntikalpe nāma viṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

vyālakāke iti kha

chapter 

ś athaikaviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

pāśupataśāntiḥ

īśvara uvāca
vakṣye pāśupatāstreṇa śāntijāpādi pūrvataḥ ।pādataḥpūrvanāśo hi phaḍantaṃ cāpadādinut ।।
oṃ namo bhagavate mahāpāśupatāya atulabalavīryaparākramāya tripañcanayanāya nānārūpāya nānāpraharaṇodyatāya sarvāṅgaraktāya bhinnāñjanacayaprakhyāya śmaśānavetālapriyāya sarvavighnanikṛntaratāya sarvasiddhipradāya bhaktānukampine asaṃkhyavaktrabhujapādāya tasminsiddhāya vetālavitrāsine śākinīkṣobhajanakāya vyādhinigrahakāriṇe pāpabhañjanāya sūryasomāgninetrāya viṣṇukavacāya khaḍgavajrahastāya yamadaṇḍavaruṇapāśāya rudraśūlāya jvalajjihvāya sarvarogavidrāvaṇāya grahanigrahakāriṇe duṣṭanāgakṣayakāriṇe
oṃ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāya phaṭ । hūṃkārāstrāya phaṭ ।vajrahastāya phaṭ । daṇḍāya phaṭ ।
khaḍgāya phaṭ । pāśāya phaṭ । aṅkuśāya phaṭ । kuverāya phaṭ । triśūlāya phaṭ
mudgarāya phaṭ । padmāya phaṭ ।īśānāya phaṭ । kheṭakāstrāya phaṭ । muṇḍāstrāya phaṭ । picchikāstrāya phaṭ । kṣurikāstrāya phaṭ ।brahmāstrāya phaṭ । gaṇāstrāya phaṭ ।pilipicchāstrāya phaṭ । gandharvāstrāya phaṭ ।dakṣiṇāstrāya phaṭ । paścimāstrāya phaṭ ।
mantrāstrāya phaṭ । śākinyastrāya

phaṭ । yoginyastrāya phaṭ । daṇḍāstraya phaṭ । sahādaṇḍāstrāya phaṭ । nānāstrāya phaṭ । īśānāstrāya phaṭ । aghorāstrāya phaṭ । sadyojātāstrāya phaṭ । hṛdayāstrāya phaṭ । guruḍāstrāya phaṭ । rakṣasāstrāya phaṭ । dānavāstrāya phaṭ । kṣauṃnarasiṃhāstrāya phaṭ । tvaṣṭrastrāya phaṭ । naḥ phaṭ । paḥ phaṭ । maḥ phaṭ । pheḥ phaṭ । bhuvaḥ phaṭ । janaḥ phaṭ । sarvaloka phaṭ । sarvatattva phaṭ । sarvanāḍī phaṭ । sarvadeva phaṭ । śrīṃ phaṭ । struṃ phaṭ । lāṃ phaṭ । māyāstrāya phaṭ । kṣetrapālāstrāya phaṭ । hūṃkārāstrāya phaṭ । bhāskarāstrāya phaṭ । vighneśvarāstrāya phaṭ । hrauṃ hroṃ phaṭ । chādaya phaṭ । trāsaya phaṭ । vidrāvaya phaṭ । sarvaduritaṃ nāśaya phaṭ ।।
sakṛdāvartanādeva sarvavighnān vināśayet ।śatāvartena cotpātānraṇādau vijayo bhavet ।।ghṛtagugguluhomācca asādhyānapi sādhayet ।paṭhanātsarvaśāntiḥ syacchastrapāśupatasya ca ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe pāśupataśāntirnāmaikaviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

asādhyamapīti kha

chapter 

ś atha dvāviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ṣaḍaṅgānyaghorāstrāṇi

īśvara uvāca
oṃ hrūṃ haṃsa iti mantreṇa mṛtyurogādi śāsyati ।lakṣāhutibhirdūrvābhiḥ śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ prasādhayet ।।atha vā praṇavenaiva māyayā vā ṣaḍānana ।divyāntarīkṣabhaumānāṃ śāntirutpātavṛkṣake ।।
oṃ namo bhagavati ganṅe kāli mahākāli māṃsaśoṇitabhojane raktakṛṣṇamukhi vaśamānaya mānuṣān svāhā ।।
oṃ lakṣaṃ japtvā daśāṃśena hutvā syāt sarvakarmakṛt ।vaśaṃ nayati śakrādīnmānuṣeṣveṣu ka kathā ।।antardhānakarī vidyā mohanī jṛmbhanī tathā ।vaśannayati śatrūṇāṃ śatrubuddhipramohinī ।।kāmadhenuriyaṃ vidyā saptadhā parikīrtitā ।mantrarājaṃ pravakṣyāmi śatrucaurādimohanam ।।mahābhayeṣu sarveṣu smartavyaṃ harapūjitaṃ ।lakṣaṃ japtvā tilair homaḥ siddhyeduddharakaṃ śṛṇu ।।
oṃ hale śūle ehi brahmasatyena viṣṇusatyena rudrasatyena rakṣa māṃ vāceśvarāya svāhā ।।
durgāttārayate yasmāttena durgā śivā matā ।
oṃ caṇḍakapālini dantān kiṭi kṣiṭi guhye phaṭ hrīṃ
anena mantrarājena kṣālayitvā tu taṇḍulān ।।

triṃśadvārāni japtāni taccaureṣu pradāpayet ।dantaiścūrṇāni śuklāni patitāni hi śuddhaye ।।
oṃ jvalallocana kapilajaṭābhārabhāsvara vidrāvaṇa trailokyaḍāmara dara bhrama ākaṭṭa toṭaya moṭaya daha paca evaṃ siddhirudro jñāpayati yadi grahopagataḥ svargalokaṃ devalokaṃ vā ārāmavihārācalaṃ tathāpi tamāvartayiṣyāmi valiṃ gṛhṇa dadāmi te svaheti
kṣetrapālabaliṃ datvā graho nyāsādhradaṃ vrajet ।śatravo nāśamāyānti raṇe vairagaṇakṣayaḥ ।।haṃsabījantu vinyasya viṣantu trividhaṃ haret ।aguruñcandanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kuṅkumaṃ nāgakeśaram ।।nakhaṃ vai devadāruñca samaṃ kṛtvātha dūpakaḥ ।mākṣikena samāyukto dehavastrādidhūpanāt ।।vivāde mohane strīṇāṃ bhaṇḍane kalahe śubhaḥ ।kanyāyā varaṇe bhāgyemāyāmantreṇa mantritaḥ ।।hrīṃ rocanānāgapuṣpāṇi kuṅkumañca mahaḥśilā ।lalāṭe tilakaṃ kṛtvā yaṃ paśyetsa vaśī bhavet ।।śatāvaryāstu cūrṇantu dugdhapītañca putrakṛt ।nāgakeśaracūrṇantu ghṛtapakvantu putrakṛt ।।pālāśavījapānena lameta putrakantathā ।
oṃ uttiṣṭha cāmuṇḍe jambhaya mohaya amukaṃ vaśamānaya svāhā

nighnāntvati kha, cha ca
ṣaḍviṃśā siddhavidyā sā nadītīramṛdā striyam ।।kṛtvonmattarasenaiva nāmālikhyārkapatrake ।mūtrotsargantataḥ kṛtvā japettāmānayetstriyam ।।
oṃ kṣuṃsaḥ vaṣaṭ mahāmṛtyuñjayo mantro japyāddhomācca puṣṭikṛt ।

oṃ haṃsaḥ hrūṃ hūṃ sa hraḥ sauṃḥ
mṛtasañjīvanī vidyāṃ aṣṭārṇā jayakṛdraṇe ।।mantrā īśānamukhyāś ca dharmakāmādidāyakāḥ ।īśānaḥ sarvavidyānāmīśvaraḥsarvabhūtānāṃ ।।brahmaṇaścādhipatirbrahma śivo me astu sadāśivaḥ ।
oṃ tatpuruṣāya vidmahe mahādevāya dhīmahi tanno rudraḥ pracodayāt
oṃ aghorebhyo atha ghorebhyo dhoraharebhyastu sarvataḥ ।।
sarvebhyo namaste rudrarūpebhyaḥ । oṃ vāmadevāya namo jyeṣṭhāya namaḥ rudrāya namaḥ । kālāya namaḥ kalavikaraṇāya namo balavikaraṇāya namo balapramathanāya namaḥ । sarvabhūtadamanāya namo manonmānāya namaḥ oṃ sadyojātaṃ pravakṣyāmi sadyojātāya vai namaḥ । bhave bhave anādibhave bhajasva māṃ bhavodbhava ।। pañcabrahmāṅgaṣaṭkañca vakṣye ahaṃ bhuktimuktidaṃ । oṃ namaḥ paramātmane parāya kāmadāya parameśvarāya yogāya yogasambhavāya sarvakarāya kuru satya bhava bhavodbhava vāmadeva sarvakāryakara pāpapraśamana sadāśiva prasanna namo astu te svāhā ।।

pañcabrahmāṅgaphaṭkāramiti ña
hṛdayaṃ sarvārthadantu saptatyakṣarasaṃyutaṃ ।
oṃ śivaḥ śivāya namaḥ śivaḥ । oṃ hṛdaye jvālini svāhā śikhā । oṃ śivātmaka mahātejaḥ sarvajña prabhurāvartaya mahāghora kavaca piṅgala namaḥ । mahākavaca śivājñayā hṛdayaṃ bandha ghūrṇaya cūrṇaya sūkṣmavajradhara vajrapāśa dhanurvajrāśanivajraśarīra mama śarīramanupraviśya sarvaduṣṭān stambhaya hūṃ akṣarāṇāntu kavacaṃ śataṃ pañcākṣarādhikam ।। oṃ ojase netraṃ oṃ prasphura tanurūpa caṭa pracaṭa kaṭa vama ghātaya hūṃ phaṭ aghorāstram ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ṣaḍaṅgānyaghorastrāṇi nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha trayoviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rudraśāntiḥ

īśvara uvāca
śivaśāntiṃ pravakṣyāmi kalpāghoraprapūrvakam ।saptakoṭyadhipo ghoro brahmahatyādyaghārdanaḥ ।।uttamādhamasiddhīṇāmālayo akhilaroganut ।divyāntarīkṣabhaumānāmutpātānāṃ vimardanaḥ ।।viṣagrahapiśācānāṃ grasanaḥ sarvakāmakṛt ।prāyaścittamaghaughārtau daurbhāgyārtivināśanam ।।ekavīrantu vinyasya dhyeyaḥ pañcamukhaḥ sadā ।

brahmaharyādimardana iti kha
śāntike pauṣṭike śuklo rakto vaśye atha pītakaḥ ।।stambhane dhūmra uccāṭamāraṇe kṛṣṇavarṇakaḥ ।karṣaṇaḥ kapilo mohe dvātriṃśadvarṇamarcayet ।।triṃśallakṣaṃ japenmantraṃ homaṃ kuryāddaśāṃśataḥ ।guggulāmṛtayuktena siddho asiddho atha sarvakṛt ।।aghorānnāparo mantro vidyate bhuktimuktikṛt ।abrahmacārī brahmacārī asnātaḥ snātako bhavet ।।aghorāstramaghorantu dvāvimau mantrarājakau ।japahomārcanādyuddhe śatrusainyaṃ vimardayet ।।rudraśāntiṃ pravakṣyāmi śivāṃ sarvārthasādhanīṃ ।putrarthaṃ grahanāśārthaṃ viṣavyādhivinaṣṭaye ।।durbhikṣamārīśāntyarthe duḥsvapnaharaṇāya ca ।balādirājyaprāptyarthaṃ ripūṇāṃ nāśanāya ca ।।akālaphalite vṛkṣe sarvagrahavimardane ।pūjane tu namaskāraḥ svāhānto havane tathā ।।āpyāyane vaṣaṭkāraṃ puṣṭau vauṣanniyojayet ।cakāradvitayasthāne jātiyogantu kārayet ।।
oṃ rudrāya ca te oṃ vṛṣabhāya namaḥ avimuktāya asambhavāya puruṣāya ca pūjyāya īśānāya pauruṣāya pañca cottare viśvarūpāya karālāya vikṛtarūpāya avikṛtarūpāya vikṛtau cāpare kāle apsu māyā ca nairṛte ।

dakāradvitayasthāna iti ña । ukāradvitayasthāna iti ṭa

niyatāviti ña, ṭa ca

ekāpiṅgalāya śvetapiṅgalāya kṛṣṇapiṅgalāya namaḥ madhupiṅgalāya namaḥ madhupiṅgalāya niyatau anantāya ādrārya śuṣkāya payogaṇāya । karālāya vikarālāya dvau māyātattve । sahasraśīrṣāya sahasravaktrāya sahasrakaracaraṇāya sahasraliṅgāya । vidyātattve । sahasrākṣādvinyased dakṣiṇe hale । ekajaṭāya dvijaṭāya trijaṭāya svāhā । kārāya svadhākārāya vaṣaṭkārāya vaṣaṭkārāya ṣaḍrudrāya । īśatattve tu vahnipatre sthitā guha । bhūtapataye paśupataye umāpataye kālādhipataye । sadāśivādhyakṣyatattve ṣaṭ pūjyāḥ pūrvadale sthitāḥ । umāyai kurūpadhāriṇi oṃ kuru ruhiṇi rudrosi devānāṃ devadevaviśākha hana daha paca matha turu aru suru rudraśāntimanusmara kṛṣṇapiṅgala akālapiśācādhipativiśveśvarāya namaḥ । śivatattve karṇikāyāṃ pūjyau hy umāmaheśvarau । oṃ vyomavyāpine vyomarūpāya sarvavyāpine śivāya anantāya anāthāya anāśritāya śivāya । śivatattve nava padāni vyomavyāpyabhidhāsyahi । śāśvatāya yogapīṭhasaṃsthitāya nityaṃ yogine dhyānāhārāya namaḥ । oṃ namaḥśivāya sarvaprabhave śivāya īśānamūrdhāya tatpuruṣādipañcavaktrāya navapadaṃ pūrvadale sadākhye pūjayedguha । aghorahṛdayāya vamadevaguhyāya sadyojātamūrtaye । oṃ namo namaḥ । guhyātiguhyāya goptre anidhanāya sarvayogādhikṛtāya jyotīrūpāya agnipatre hīśatattve vidyātattve dve yāmyage parameśvarāya cetanācetana vyomana vyapina prathama tejastejaḥ māyātattve nairṛte kālatattve

sūru iti ña

atha vāruṇe । oṃ dhṛ dhṛ nānā vāṃ vāṃ anidhāna nidhanodbhava śiva sarvaparamātman mahādeva sadbhāveśvara mahāteja
yogādhipate muñca pramatha oṃ sarva oṃ bhava oṃ bhavodbhava ।sarvabhūtasukhaprada vāyupatre atha niyatau puruṣe cottarena ca ।
sarvasānnidhyakara brahmaviṣṇurudrapara anarcita astutastu ca sākṣina turu pataṅga piṅga jñāna śabda sūkṣma śiva sarvaprada oṃ namaḥśivāya oṃ namo namaḥ śivāya oṃ namo namaḥ
īśāne prākṛte tattve pūjayejjuhuyājjapet ।graharogādimāyārtiśamanī sarvasiddhikṛt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe rudraśāntirnāma trayoviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha caturviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

aṃśakādiḥ

īśvara uvāca
rudrākṣakaṭakaṃ dhāryaṃ viṣamaṃ susamaṃ dṛḍam ।ekatripañcavadanaṃ yathālābhantu dhārayet ।।dvicatuḥṣaṇmukhaṃ śastamavraṇaṃ tīvrakaṇṭhakaṃ ।dakṣavāhau śikhādau ca dhārayeccaturānanaṃ ।।abrahmacārī brahmacārī asnātaḥ snātako bhavet ।haimī vā mudrikā dhāryā śivamantreṇa cārcya tu ।।

kāryeti kha
śivaḥ śikhā tathā jyotiḥ savitraścetigocarāḥ ।gocarantu kulaṃ jñeyaṃ tena lakṣyastu dīkṣitaḥ ।।prājāpatyo mahīpālaḥ kapoto granthikaḥ śive ।kuṭilāś caiva vetālāḥ padmahaṃsāḥ śikhākule ।।dhṛtarāṣṭrā vakāḥ kākā gopālā jyotisaṃjñake ।kuṭikā sāṭharāś caiva guṭikā daṇḍino apare ।।sāvitrī gocare caivamekaikastu caturvidhaḥ ।siddhādyaṃśakamākhyāsye yena mantraḥsusiddhidaḥ ।।bhūmau tu mātṛkā lekhyāḥ kūṭaṣaṇḍāvavarjitāḥ ।mantrākṣarāṇi viśliṣya anusvāraṃ nayet pṛthak ।।sādhakasya tu yā saṃjñā tasyā viśleṣaṇaṃ caret ।mantrasyādau tathā cānte sādhakārṇāni yojayet ।।siddhaḥ sādhyaḥ suśiddho ariḥ saṃjñāto gaṇayet kramāt ।mantrasyādau tathā cānte siddhidaḥ syācchatāṃśataḥ ।।siddhādiścāntasiddhaś ca tatkṣaṇādeva sidhyati ।susiddhādiḥ susiddhantaḥsiddhavat parikalpayet ।।arimādau tathānte ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet ।siddhaḥ susiddhaś caikārthe ariḥ sādhyastathaiva ca ।।ādau siddhaḥ sthito mantre tadante tadvadeva hi ।madhye ripusahasrāṇi na doṣāya bhavanti hi ।।māyāprasādapraṇavenāṃśakaḥ khyātamantrake ।brahmāṃśako brahmavidyā viṣṇvaṅgo vaiṣṇavaḥsmṛtaḥ ।।

viṣṇvaṃśa iti ña
rudrāṃśako bhavedvīra indrāṃśaśceśvarapriyaḥ ।nāgāṃśo nāgastabdhākṣo yakṣāṃśo bhūṣaṇapriyaḥ ।।gandharvāṃśo atigītādi bhīmāṃśo rākṣasāṃśakaḥ ।dairyāṃśaḥ syād yuddhakāryo mānī vidyādharāṃśakaḥ ।।piśācāṃśo malākrānto mantraṃ dadyānnirīkṣya ca ।mantra ekāt phaḍantaḥ syāt vidyāpañcāśatāvadhi ।।bālā viṃśākṣarāntā ca rudrā dvāviṃśagāyudhā ।tata ūrdhvantu ye mantrā dṛddhā yāvacchatatrayaṃ ।।akārādihakārantāḥ kramāt pakṣau sitāsitau ।anusvāravisargeṇa vinā caiva svarā daśa ।।hrasvāḥ śuklā dīrghāḥ śyāmāṃstithayaḥpratipammukhāḥ ।udite śāntikādīni bhramite vaśyakādikam ।।bhrāmite sandhayo dveṣoccāṭane stambhane astakam ।ihāvāhe śāntikādyaṃ piṅgale karṣaṇādikam ।।māraṇoccāṭanādīni viṣuve pañcadhā pṛthak ।adharasya gṛhe pṛthvī ūrdhve tejo antarā dravaḥ ।।randhrapārśve vahirvāyuḥ sarvaṃ vyāpya maheśvaraḥ ।stambhanaṃ pārthive śāntirjale vaśyādi tejase ।vāyau syād bhramaṇaṃ śūnye puṇyaṃ kālaṃ samabhyaset ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe aṃśakādirnāma caturviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

karṣakādikamiti kha, cha ca

chapter 

ś atha pañcaviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gauryādipūjā

īśvara uvāca
saubhāgyāderumāpūjāṃ vakṣye ahaṃ bhuktimuktidāṃ ।mantradhyānaṃ maṇḍalañca mudrāṃ homādisādhanam ।।citrabhānuṃ śivaṃ kālaṃ mahāśaktisamanvitam ।iḍādyaṃ paratodvṛtya sadevaḥ savikāraṇam ।।dvitīyaṃ dvārakākrāntaṃ gaurīprītipadānvitaṃ ।caturthyantaṃ prakartavyaṃ gauyyā vai mūlavācakaṃ ।।
oṃ hrīṃ saḥ śauṃ gauryai namaḥ
tatrārṇatritayenaiva jātiyuktaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulam ।āsanaṃ praṇaveṇaiva mūrtiṃ vai hṛdayena tu ।।udakāñca tathā kālaṃ śivavījaṃ samuddharet ।prāṇaṃ dīrghasvarākrāntaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ jātisaṃyutam ।।āsanaṃ praṇavenātra mūrtinyāsaṃ hṛdācaret ।yāmalaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa ekavīraṃ vadāmy atha ।।vyāpakaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃyuktaṃ vahnimāyākṛśānubhiḥ ।śivaśaktimayaṃ vījaṃ vījaṃ hṛdayādivivarjitaṃ ।।gaurīṃ yajeddhemarūpyāṃ kāṣṭhajāṃ śailajādikāṃ ।pañcapiṇḍāṃ tathāvyaktāṃ koṇe madhye tu pañcamaṃ ।।lalitā subhagā gaurī kṣobhaṇī cāgnitaḥ kramāt ।

pañcamī iti ña
vāmā jyeṣṭhā kriyā jñānā vṛtte pūrvādito yajet ।।sapīṭhe vāmabhāge tu śivasyāvyaktarūpakam ।vyaktā dvinetrā tryakṣarā śuddhā vā śaṅkarānvitā ।।pīṭhapadmadvayaṃ tārā dvibhujā vā caturbhajā ।siṃhasthā vā vṛkasthā vā aṣṭāṣṭādaśasatkarā ।।sragakṣasūtrakalikā galakotpalapiṇḍikā ।śaraṃ dhanurvā savyena pāṇinānyatamaṃ vahat ।।vāmena pustatāmbūladaṇḍābhayakamaṇḍalum ।gaṇeśadarpaṇeṣvāsāndadyādekaikaśaḥ kramāt ।।vyaktāvyaktāthavā kāryā padmamudrā smṛtāsane ।tiṅgamudrā śivasyoktā mudā cāvāhanī dvayoḥ ।।śaktimudrā tu yonyākhyā caturasrantu maṇḍalaṃ ।caturasraṃ tripatrābjaṃ madhyakoṣṭhacatuṣṭaye ।।tryaśrordhe cārdhacandrastu dvipadaṃ dviguṇaṃ kramāt ।dviguṇaṃ dvārakaṇṭhantu dviguṇādupakaṇṭhataḥ ।।dvāratrayaṃ trayaṃ dikṣu atha vā bhadrake yajet ।sthaṇḍile vātha saṃsyāpya pañcagavyāmṛtādinā ।।raktapuṣpāṇi deyāni pūjayitvā hy udaṅmukhaḥ ।śataṃ hutvāmṛtājyañca pūrṇādaḥ sarvasiddhibhāk ।।balindatvā kumārīś ca tisro vā cāṣṭa bhojayet ।naivedyaṃ śivabhakteṣu dadyānna svayamācaret ।।

siṃhasthāvāhyasiṃhastheti kha, cha, ña, ṭa ca

striyo vāṣṭa ca bhojayediti kha, cha ca
kanyārthau labhate kanyāṃ aputraḥ putramāpnuyāt ।durbhagā caiva saubhāgyaṃ rājā rājyaṃ jayaṃ raṇe ।।aṣṭalakṣaiś ca vāksiddhirdevādyā vaśamāpnuyuḥ ।na nivedya na cāsnīyādvāmahastena cārcayet ।।aṣṭamyāñca caturdaśyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ ।mṛtyuñcayārcanaṃ vakṣye pūjayet kalasodare ।।hūyamānañca praṇavo mūrtirojasa īdṛśaṃ ।mūlañca vauṣaḍantena kumbhamudrāṃ pradarśayet ।।homayet kṣīradurvājyamamṛtāñca punarnavām ।pāyasañca purāḍāśamayutantu japenmanuṃ ।।caturmukhaṃ caturvāhuṃ dvābhyāñca kalasandadhat ।varadābhayakaṃ dvābhyāṃ snāyādvaikumbhamudrayā ।।ārogyaiś caryadīrghāyurauṣadhaṃ mantritaṃ śubham ।apamṛtyuharo dhyātaḥ pūjito adbhuta eva saḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gauryādipūjā nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

devālayamāhātmyam

īśvara uvāca
vrateśvarāṃś ca satyādīniṣṭvā vratasamarpaṇam ।ariṣṭaśamane śastamariṣṭaṃ sūtranāyakam ।।

hemaratramayaṃ bhūtyai mahāśaṅkhañca māraṇe ।āpyāyane śaṅkhasūtraṃ mauktikaṃ putravardhanam ।।sphāṭikaṃ bhūtidaṃ kauśaṃ muktidaṃ rudranetrajaṃ ।dhādhīphalapramāṇena rudrākṣaṃ cottamantataḥ ।।sameruṃ meruhīnaṃ vā sūtraṃ japyantu mānasam ।anāmāṅguṣṭhamākramya japaṃ bhāṣyantu kārayet ।।tarjanyaṅguṣṭhamākramya na meruṃ laṅghyejjape ।pramādāt patite sūtre japtavyantu śatadvayam ।।sarvavādyamayī ghaṇṭā tasyā vādanamarthakṛt ।gośakṛnmūtravalmīkamṛttikābhasmavāribhiḥ ।।vesmāyatanaliṅgādeḥ kāryamevaṃ viśodhanam ।skando namaḥ śivāyeti mantraḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ ।।gītaḥ pañcākṣaro vede loke gītaḥṣaḍakṣaraḥ ।omityante sthitaḥ śambhurmudrārthaṃ vaṭavījavat ।।kramānnamaḥ śivāyeti īśānādyāni vai viduḥ ।ṣaḍakṣarasya sūtrasya bhāṣyadvidyākadambakaṃ ।।yadoṃnamaḥ śivāyeti etāvat paramaṃ padam ।anena pūjayelliṅgaṃ liṅge yasmāt sthitaḥ śivaḥ ।।anugrahāya lokānāṃ dharmakāmārthamuktidaḥ ।yo na pūjayate liṅganna sa dharmādibhājanaṃ ।।liṅgārcanādbhuktimuktiryāvajjīvamato yajet ।varaṃ prāṇaparityāgo bhuñjītāpūjya naiva taṃ ।।

bhaktidamiti kha
rudrasya pūjanādrudro viṣṇuḥ syādviṣṇupūjanāt ।sūryaḥ syāt suryapūjātaḥ śaktyādiḥ śaktipūjanāt ।।sarvayajñatapodāne tīrthe vedeṣu yat phalaṃ ।tat phalaṃ koṭiguṇitaṃ sthāpya liṅgaṃ labhennaraḥ ।।trisandhyaṃ yorcayelliṅgaṃ kṛtvā vilvena pārthivam ।śataikādaśikaṃ yāvat kulamuddhṛtya nākabhāk ।।bhaktyā vittānusāreṇa kuryāt prasādasañcayam ।alpe mahati vā tulyaphalamāḍhyadaridrayoḥ ।।bhāgadvayañca dharmārthaṃ kalpayejjīvanāya ca ।dhanasya bhāgamekantu anityaṃ jīvitaṃ yataḥ ।।trisaptakulamuddhṛtya devāgārakṛdarthabhāk ।mṛtkāṣṭheṣṭakaśailādyaiḥ kramāt koṭiguṇaṃ phalam ।।aṣṭeṣṭakasurāgārakārī svargamavāpnuyāt ।pāṃśunā krīḍamānopi devāgārakṛdarthabhāk ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe devālayamāhatmyādirnāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptaviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chandaḥsāraḥ

agnir uvāca
chando vakṣye mūlajaistaiḥ piṅgaloktaṃ yathākramam ।sarvādimadhyāntagaṇau mlau dvau jau stau trikau gaṇāḥ ।।

dhanasyānnāthamekantviti kha
hrasvo gururvā pādānte pūrvo yogād visargataḥ ।anusvārādvyañjanāt sthāt jihvāmūlīyatas tathā ।।upādhmānīyato dīrgho gururglau nau gaṇāviha ।vasavoṣṭau ca catvāro vedādityādilopataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe chandaḥsāro nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athāṣṭāviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chandaḥsāraḥ

agnir uvāca
chandodhikāre gāyatrī devī caikākṣarī bhavet ।pañcadaśākṣarī sā syāt prājāpatyāṣṭavirṇikā ।।yajuṣāṃ ṣaḍarṇā gāyatrī sāmnāṃ syāddvādaśākṣarā ।ṛcāmaṣṭādaśārṇā syātsāmnāṃ vardheta ca dvayaṃ ।।ṛcāṃ turyañca vardheta prājāpatyācatuṣṭayaṃ ।vardhedekaikakaṃ śeṣe āturyādekramutsṛjet ।।uṣṇiganuṣṭub vṛhatī paṅktistriṣṭubjagatyapi ।tāni jñeyāni kramaśo gāyatryo brahma eva tāḥ ।।tisrastisraḥ samānyaḥ syurekaikā ārya eva ca ।ṛgyajuṣāṃ saṃjñāḥ syuś catuḥṣaṣṭipade likhet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe chandaḥsāro nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athonatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chandaḥsāraḥ

agnir uvāca
pāda āpadapūraṇe gāyatryo vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ ।jagatyā ādityāḥ pādo virājo diśa īritāḥ ।।viṣṇuto rudrāḥ pādaḥ syācchanda ekādipādakaṃ ।ādyaṃ catuṣpāccaturbhistripāt saptākṣaraiḥ kvacit ।।sā gāyatrī pade nīvṛt tatpratiṣṭhādi ṣaṭ tripāt ।bardhamānā ṣaḍaṣṭāṣṭā tripāt ṣaḍvasubhūdharaiḥ ।।gāyatrī tripadā nīvṛt nāgī navanavartubhiḥ ।vārāhī rasadvirasā chandaścātha tṛtīyakam ।।dvipād ddvādaśavasvantaiḥ tripāttu traiṣṭubhaiḥ smṛtam ।uṣṇik chando aṣṭavasukaiḥ pādair vede prakīrtitaḥ ।।kakubuṣṇigaṣṭasūryavasvarṇāṃ tribhireva saḥ ।punaruṣṇik sūryavasuvasvarṇaiś ca tripādbhavet ।।paroṣṇik paratastasmāccatuṣpādāt tribhirbhavet ।sāṣṭākṣarair anuṣṭup syāt catuṣpācca tripāt kvacit ।।aṣṭārkasūryavarṇaiḥ syāt madhye ante ca kvacidbhavet ।vṛhatījagatyastrayo gāyatryāḥ pūrvako yadi ।।tṛtīyaḥ pathyā bhavati dvitīyānyaṃ kusāriṇī ।skandhau grīvā krauṣṭuke syād yakṣe syadvo vṛhatyapi ।।

upariṣṭādvṛhatyante purastādvṛhatī punaḥ ।kvacinnavakāś catvāro digvidikṣvaṣṭavarṇikāḥ ।।mahāvṛhatī jāgataiḥ syāt tribhiḥ sato vṛhatyapi ।bhaṇḍilaḥ paṅkricchandaḥ syātsūryārkāṣṭāṣṭavarṇakaiḥ ।।pūrvau vedayujau sataḥ paṅktiś ca viparītakau ।prastārapaṅktiḥ purataḥ pavādāstārapaṅktikā ।।akṣarapaṅktiḥ pañcakāś catvāraścālpaśo dvayaṃ ।padapaṅktiḥ pañca bhaveccatuṣkaṃ ṣaṭkakatrayam ।।ṣaṭkapañcabhirgāyatraiḥ ṣaḍbhiś ca jagatī bhavet ।ekena triṣṭuvjyotiṣmatī tathaiva jagatīritā ।।purastājyotiḥ prathame madhye jyotiś ca madhyataḥ ।upariṣṭājyotirantyādekasmin pañcake tathā ।।bhavecchandaḥ śaṅkumatī ṣaṭke chandaḥkakudmatī ।tripādaśiśumadhyā syāt sā pipīlikamadhyamā ।।viparītā yavamadhyā trivṛdekena varjitā ।bhūmijaikenādhikena dvihīnā ca cirādbhavet ।।avarāṭsyāddvābhyāmadhikaṃ sandigdho daivatāditaḥ ।ādipādānniś cayaḥ syācchandasaṃ devatā kramāt ।।agniḥ sūryaḥ śaśī jīvo varuṇaś candra eva ca ।viśvedevāś ca ṣaḍjādyāḥ svarāḥ ṣaḍjo vṛṣaḥkramāt ।।gāndhāro madhyamaś caiva pañcamo dhaivatas tathā ।niṣādavarṇāḥ śvetaś ca sāraṅgaś ca pisaṅgakaḥ ।।

sapipīlikamadhyageti kha
kṛṣṇo nīlo lohitaś ca gaurī gāyatrimukhyake ।gaurīcanābhāḥ kṛtayo jyotiśchando hi śyāmalaṃ ।।agnirvaiśyaḥ kāśyapaś ca gautamāṅgirasau kramāt ।bhārgavaḥ kauśikaś caiva vāśiṣṭo gotramīritaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe chandaḥsāro nāmonatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha triṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chandojātinirūpaṇam

agnir uvāca
catuḥśatamutkṛtiḥ syādukṛteś caturastyajet ।abhisaṃvyā pratyakṛtistāni chandāṃśi vai pṛthak ।।kṛtiścātighṛtivṛtto atyaṣṭiścāṣṭirityataḥ ।atiśarkarī śakkarīti atijagatī jagatyapi ।।chando atra laukikaṃ syācca ārṣamātraiṣṭubhāt smṛtam ।triṣuppaṅktivṛhatī anuṣṭuvuṣṇigīritam ।।gāyatrī syāt supratiṣṭā pratiṣṭhā madhyayā saha ।atyuktātyukta ādiś ca ekaikākṣaravarjitam ।।caturbhāgo bhavet pādo gaṇacchandaḥ pradarśyate ।tāvantaḥ samudrā gaṇā hy ādimadhyāntasarvagāḥ ।।

kṛtiścānighṛtirvṛttīti ña, ṭa ca
caturṇaḥ pañca ca gaṇā āryālakṣanamucyate ।svarārdhañcāryārdhaṃ syādāryāyāṃ viṣamena jaḥ ।।ṣaṣṭho jo nalapūrvā syāddvitīyādipadaṃ nale ।saptame ante prathamā ca dvitīye pañcame nale ।।ārdhe padaṃ prathamādi ṣaṣṭha eko laghurbhavet ।triṣu gaṇeṣu pādaḥ syādāryā pañcārdhake smṛtā ।।vipulānyātha capalā gurumadhyagatau ca jau ।dvitīyacaturthau pūrve ca capalā mukhapūrvikā ।।dvitīye jaghanapūrvā capalāryā prakīrtitā ।ubhayormahācapalā gītavādyārdhatulyakā ।।antyenārdhenopagītirudgītiścotkramāt smṛtā ।ardhe rakṣagaṇā āryā gīṭacchando atha mātrayā ।।vaitālīyaṃ dvisvarā syādayuṣpāde same nalaḥ ।vasavo ante vanagāś ca gopucchandaśakaṃ bhavet ।।bhagaṇāntā pāṭalikā śeṣe pare ca pūrvavat ।sākaṃ ṣaḍvā miśrāyuk prācyavṛttiḥ pradarśyate ।।pañcamena pūrvasākaṃ tṛtīyena sahasrayuk ।udīcyavṛttirvācyāṃ syād yugapacca pravartakaṃ ।।ayukcāruhāsinī syādyugapaccāntikā bhavet ।।saptārcirvasavaś caiva mātrāsamakamīritam ।bhavennalavamau laś ca dvādaśo vā navāsikā ।।viśvokaḥ pañcamāṣṭau mo citrā lavamakaś calaḥ ।

pucchalamiti kha
parayuktenopacitrā pādākulakamityataḥ ।।gītāryā lopaścet saumyā laḥ pūrvaḥ jyotirīritā ।syācchikhā viparyāstārdhā tūlikā samudāhṛtā ।।ekonatriṃśadante gaḥ syājjñejanasamāvalā ।gu ity ekaguruṃ saṃkhyāvarṇāddaśaviparyayāt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe chandojātinirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athaikatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

viṣamakathanam

agnir uvāca
vṛttaṃ samañcārdhasamaṃ viṣamañca tridhā vade ।samantāvat kṛtvakṛtamardhasamañca kārayet ।।viṣamañcaiva vāsyūnamativṛttaṃ samānyapi ।glaucatuḥpramāṇī syādābhyāmanyadvitānakaṃ ।।pādasyādyantu vakraṃ syāt śanau na prathmāsmṛtau ।vālyamuś caturthādvarṇāt pathyā varṇaṃ yujoyataḥ ।।viparītapathyānyāsāccapalā vā yujasvanaḥ ।vipulāyugnasaptamaḥ sarvaṃ tasyaiva tasya ca ।।

naḥ pūrva iti kha

hy a tiyekanurumiti ña
tauntau vā vipulānekā cakrajātiḥ samīritā ।bhavet padacaturūddhvaṃ caturvṛddhyā padeṣu ca ।।gurudvayānta āpīḍaḥ pratyāpīḍo gaṇādikaḥ ।prathamasya viparyāse mañjarī lavaṇī kramāt ।।bhavedamṛtadhārākhyā uddhatādyucyate adhunā ।ekataḥ samajasānaḥsyurna sau jo go atha bhaunajau ।।nogo atha sajasā gogastṛtīyacaraṇasya ca ।saurabhe kecanabhagā lalitañca namau jasau ।।upasthitaṃ pracupitaṃ prathamādyaṃ samau jasau ।gogatho malajā rogaḥ samo nagarajayāḥ pade ।।vardhamānaṃ malau svau nasau atho bhojova iritā ।śuddhavirāḍārṣabhākhyaṃ vakṣye cārdhasamantataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe viṣamakathanaṃ nāmaikatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvātriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ardhasamanirūpaṇam

agnir uvāca
upacitrakaṃ sasamanāmathabhojabhagāmatha ।drūtamadhyā tatabhagāgathonanajayāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।vegavatī sasamagā bhabhabhagogatho smṛtā ।

sasamanāgathatobhayāgatha iti kha
rudravistārastosabhagāsamajāgogathā smṛtā ।।rajasāgogathodroṇaugogau vai ketumatyapi ।ākhyānikī tatajagāgathotatajagāgatha ।।viparītākhyānikī ttau jayāgātau jagogatha ।saumalau gathalabhabhāvau bhaveddhariṇavallabhā ।।lauvanaugāthanajajā yaḥ syādaparākramaṃ ।puṣpitā nanavayānajajāvogatho rajau ।।vījatho javajavāgo mūle panamatī śikhā ।aṣṭāviṃśatināgābhā triṃśannāgantato yuji ।khañjā tadviparītā syāt samavṛttaṃ pradarśyate ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ardhasamanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvātriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha trayastriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

samavṛttanirūpaṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
yatirviccheda ity uktastattanmadhyāntayau gaṇau ।yausaḥ kumāralālitā tau gau citrapadā smṛtā ।।vidyunmālā mamamāgaṇair bhūtagaṇair bhavet ।māṇavakā krīḍitakaṃ vanau halamukhī vasaḥ ।।syādbhujaṅgaśiśusūtānau mehanaṃ marutaṃ nanau ।bhavecchuddhavirāḍvṛttaṃ samau jagau ।।

paṇavomalayomaḥ syājjau gau mayūrasāriṇī ।sattāmabhasagā vṛttaṃ bhajatādyuparisthitā ।।rukmavatī bhasasagāvindrāvajrā tajau gajau ।jatau jagau gūpapūrvāvādyantādyupajātayaḥ ।।dodhakaṃ bhagabhāgau syāt śālinī matabhāgagau ।yatiḥ samudrā ṛṣayaḥ vātormī mabhatāgagau ।।catuḥsvarā syādbhramarī vilāsitā mabhaunalau ।samudrā atha ṛṣayo vanau laugau rathoddhatā ।।sāmatādhanabhāgogovṛttānanasamāś ca saḥ ।śyenī vajavanāgaḥ syādramyā naparagāgagaḥ ।।jagatī vaṃśasthā vṛttaṃ jatau jāvatha tau javau ।indravaṃśā toṭakaṃ saiś caturbhiḥ pratipādataḥ ।।bhaveddrutavilambitā nabhau bhavāvathau nalau ।syau śrīpuṭho vasuvedā jalogatijalau jamau ।।jasau vasarvavaścātha tataṃ nanamarāḥ smṛtaṃ ।kusumavicitrā nyau dyau nau nau rau syāccalāmbikā ।।bhujaṅgaprayātaṃ thaiḥ syāccaturbhiḥ sragvinībhavaiḥ ।pramitākṣarā gajau sau kāntotpīḍā matau samau ।।vaiśvadevī mamayāyāḥ pañcāṅgā navamālinī ।

malaghāga iti kha

caraṇātmikā iti kha । cañcalāmbikā iti ṭa

mamāviti kha

viśvadevīti kha
najau bhayau pratipādaṃ gaṇā yadi jagatyapi ।।praharṣaṇī mavajavā gopatirvahnidikṣu ca ।rucirā jabhasajagā cchinnā vedair grahaiḥ smṛtā ।।mattamayūraṃ matayā sagau vedarahe yatiḥ ।gaurīnalanasāgaḥ syādasambādhā natau nagau ।।goga indriyanavakau nanau vasanagāḥ svarāḥ ।svarāścāparājitā syānnanabhānanagāḥ svarāḥ ।।dviḥpraharaṇakalitā vasantatilakā nabhau ।jau gau siṃhonnatā sā syānmuneruddharṣaṇī ca sā ।।candrāvartā nanau somāvartartunavakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।maṇiguṇanikarā sau mālinau nau mayau yayaḥ ।।yatirvasusvarā bhau vau natalamitrasagrahāḥ ।ṛṣabhagajavilāsitaṃ jñeyā śikhariṇī jagau ।।rasabhālabhṛgurudrāḥ pṛthvījasajasā janau ।govasugrahavicchinnā piṅgaleneritā purā ।।vaṃśapatrapatitaṃ syād bhavanā bhau nagau sadik ।hariṇī nasamāraḥ so nagau rasacatuḥsvarāḥ ।।mandākrāntā nabhanataṃ tagaugachirasasvarāḥ ।kusumitalatā vellitā yayayāḥ śarāḥ ।।rathāḥ svarāḥ pratirathasasajāḥ satatāś ca gaḥ ।śārdūlavikrīḍitaṃ syādādityamunayo yatiḥ ।।

dviḥpraharaṇañcaliteti kha

lananāgātrasagrahā iti ña
kṛtiḥ suvadanā moro bhanayā bhanagāḥ surāḥ ।yatirmunirasāścātha iti vṛttaṃ kramāt smṛtam ।।snagdharā maratānomoyapau triḥsaptakā yatiḥ ।samudrakaṃ bharajānovanago daśabhāskarāḥ ।।aśvalalitaṃ najabhā jabhajā bhanamīśataḥ ।mattākrīḍā mamananā naunagnau goṣṭamātithiḥ ।।tanvī bhanatasābhobho layo vāṇasurārkakāḥ ।krauñcapadā bhamatatā nau nau vāṇaśarāṣṭataḥ ।।bhujaṅgavijṛmbhitaṃ mamatanā nanavāsanau ।goṣṭeśamunibhiśchedo hy upahārākhyamīdṛaśam ।।mananānatānaḥ so gagau graharaso rasāt ।nau saptarodaṇḍadaḥ syāccaṇḍavṛṣṭipraghātakaṃ ।।rephavṛddhyā ṇaṇavā syurvyālajīmūtamukhyakāḥ ।śeṣe vai pracitā jñeyā gāthāprastāra ucyate ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe samavṛttanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayastriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha catustriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

prastāranirūpaṇam

agnir uvāca
chando atra siddhaṃ gāthā syāt pāde sarva gurau tathā ।prastāra ādyagāthonaḥ paratulyo atha pūrvagaḥ ।।

grahavaso vasāditi ga

caṇḍavṛṣṭiprayānaka iti ṭa
naṣṭamadhye same aṅkenaḥ same ardha viṣame guruḥ ।pratilomaguṇaṃ nādyaṃ dviruddiṣṭaga ekanut ।।saṅkhyādvirardhe rūpe tu śūnyaṃ śūnye dvirīritaṃ ।tāvadardhatadguṇitaṃ dvidvyūnañca tadantataḥ ।।pare pūrṇaṃ pare pūrṇaṃ meruprastārato bhavet ।nagasaṃkhyā vṛttasaṃkhyā cādhvāṅgulamadhordhataḥ ।saṅkhyaiva dviguṇaikonā chandaḥsāro ayamīritaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe prastāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śikṣānirūpaṇam

agnir uvāca
vakṣye śikṣāntriṣaṣṭiḥ syurvarṇā vā caturādhikāḥ ।svarā viṃśatirekaś ca sparśānāṃ pañcaviṃśatiḥ ।।yādayaś ca smṛtā hy aṣṭau catvāraś ca samāḥ smṛtāḥ ।anusvāro visargaś ca paukhyau cāpi parānvitau ।।duṣpṛṣṭaśceti vijñeyā ḷkāraḥ pluta eva ca ।raṅgaś ca khe araṃ proktaṃ hakāraḥ pañcamair yutaḥ ।।antasthābhiḥ samāyukta aurasyaḥ kaṇṭhya eva saḥ ।ātmabuddhyā samasyarthaṃ manoyukte vivakṣayā ।।manaḥ kāyāgnimāhanti sa prerayati mārutam ।

vargamukhe araṃ proktamiti kha
mārutastūrasi caran mantraṃ janayati svaraṃ ।।prātaḥsavanayogastu chando gāyatramāśritam ।kaṇṭhe mādhyandinayutaṃ madhyamantreṣu bhānugam ।।tārantārtīyasavanaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ jāgatānugam ।sodīrṇo mūrdhnyabhihito vakramāpadya mārutaḥ ।।varṇān janayate teṣāṃ vibhāgaḥ pañcadhā smṛtaḥ ।svarataḥ kālataḥ sthānāt prayatnārthapradānataḥ ।।aṣṭau sthānāni varṇānāmuraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiras tathā ।jihvāmūlañca dantāś ca nāsikauṣṭhau ca tālu ca ।।svabhāvaś ca vivṛttiś ca śaṣasā repha eva ca ।jihvāmūlamupadhmā ca gatiraṣṭavidhoṣmaṇaḥ ।।padyo bhāvaprasandhānamukārādi parampadaṃ ।svarāntaṃ tādṛśaṃ vidyādyadanyadvyaktamūṣmaṇaḥ ।।ūtīrthādāgataṃ dagdhamapavarṇañca bhakṣitaṃ ।evamuccāraṇaṃ pāpamevamuccāraṇaṃ śubham ।।atīrthādāgataṃ dravyaṃ sāmnāyaṃ suvyavasthitaṃ ।susvareṇa suvaktreṇa prayuktaṃ brahmarājani ।।na karālo na lamvoṣṭho nāvyakto nānunāsikaḥ ।gadgado bahujihvaś ca na varṇān vaktum arhati ।।evaṃ varṇāḥ prayoktavyā nāvyaktā na ca pīḍintāḥ ।

mātramiti kha

bhāvantārtīyasavanamiti kha

kutīrthādāgatamiti ṭa । kṣatīrthadāgatamiti kha
samyagvarṇaprayogeṇa brahmaloke mahīyate ।।udāttaścānudāttaś ca svaritaś ca svarāstrayaḥ ।hrasvo dīrghaḥ pluta iti kālato niyamāvadhi ।।kaṇṭhyā vahāvicuyaśāstālavyā oṣṭhajā vupu ।syurmūrdhanyā ṛhurasāḥ dantyāḥ ḷ olasāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।jihvāmūle tu hvaḥ prokto dantyoṣṭho vaḥ smṛto budhaiḥ ।edaitau kaṇṭatālavyau o au kaṇṭhyauṣṭhajau smṛtau ।।ardhamātrā tu kaṇṭhasya ekāraikārayorbhavet ।ayogavāhā vijñeyā āśrayasthānabhāginaḥ ।।aco aspṛṣṭāpaṇastvīṣannomāḥ spṛṣtā halaḥsmṛtāḥ ।śeṣāḥ spṛṣṭā halaḥ proktā nibodhātra pradhānataḥ ।।amo anunāsikānakrau nādimau hasaṣaḥ smṛtāḥ ।īṣannādopaṇayaśaḥ śvāsinaś ca thakādayaḥ ।īṣacchāsaṃ svaraṃ vidyāddīrghametat pracakṣate ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śikṣānirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

khaṭavasā iti kha

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭtriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kāvyādilakṣaṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
kāvyasya nāṭakādeś ca alaṅkārān vadāmy atha ।dhvanirvarṇāḥ padaṃ vākyamityetadvāṅmayaṃ mataṃ ।।śāstretihāsavākyānāṃ trayaṃ yatra samāpyate ।śāstre śabdapradhānatvamitihāseṣu niṣṭhatā ।।abhidhāyāḥ pradhānatvāt kāvyaṃ tābhyāṃ vibhidyate ।naratvaṃ durlabhaṃ loke vidyā tatra ca durlabhā ।।kavitvaṃ durlabhaṃ tatra śaktistatra ca durlabhā ।vyutpātirdurlabhā tatra vivekastatra durlabhaḥ ।।sarvaṃ śāstramavidvadbhirmṛgyamāṇanna sidhyati ।ādivarṇā dvitīyāś ca mahāprāṇasturīyakaḥ ।।vargeṣu varṇavṛndaṃ syāt padaṃ suptiḍprabhedataḥ ।saṅkṣepādvākyamiṣṭārthavyavachinnā padābalī ।।kāvyaṃ sphuṭadalaṅkāraṃ guṇavaddoṣavarjitam ।yonirvedaś ca lokaś ca siddhamannādayonijaṃ ।।devādīnām saṃskṛtaṃ syāt prākṛtaṃ trividhaṃ nṛṇāṃ ।gadyaṃ padyañca miśrañca kāvyādi trividhaṃ smṛtam ।।apadaḥ padasantāno gadyantadapi gadyate ।cūrṇakotkalikāgandhivṛttabhedāt trirūpakam ।।alpālpavigrahaṃ nātimṛdusandarbhanirbharaṃ ।

cūrṇakaṃ nāmto dīrghasamāsāt kalikā bhavet ।।bhavenmadhyamasandarbhannātikutsitavigraham ।vṛttacchāyāharaṃ vṛttaṃ gandhinaitat kilotkaṭam ।।ākhyāyikā kathā khaṇḍakathā parikathā tathā ।kathāniketi manyante gadyakāvyañca pañcadhā ।।kartṛvaṃśapraśaṃsā syādyatra gadyena vistarāt ।kanyāharaṇasaṃgrāmavipralambhavipattayaḥ ।।bhavanti yatra dīptāś ca rītivṛttipravṛttayaḥ ।ucchāsaiś ca paricchedo yatra yā cūrṇakottarā ।।vaktraṃ vāparavaktraṃ vā yatra sākhyāyikā smṛtā ।ślokaiḥ svavaṃśaṃ saṃkṣepāt kaviryatra praśaṃsati ।।sukhyasyārthāvatārāya bhavedyatra kathāntaram ।paricchedo na yatra syādbhavedvālambhakaiḥ kvacit ।।sā kathā nāma tadgarbhe nibadhnīyāccatuṣpadīṃ ।bhavet khaṇḍakathā yāsau yāsau parikathā tayoḥ ।।amātyaṃ sārthakaṃ vāpi dvijaṃ vā nāyakaṃ viduḥ ।syāttayoḥ karuṇaṃ viddhi vipralambhaś caturvidhaḥ ।।samāpyate tayor nādyā sā kathāmanudhāvati ।kathākhyāyikayormiśrabhāvāt parikathā smṛtā ।।bhayānakaṃ sukhaparaṃ garbhe ca karuṇo rasaḥ ।adbhuto ante sukḷptārtho nodāttā sā kathānikā ।।padyaṃ catuṣpadī tacca vṛttaṃ jātirititridhā ।vṛttamakṣarasaṃkhyeyamukthaṃ tat kṛtiśeṣajam ।।

mātrābhirgaṇanā sā jātiriti kāśyapaḥ ।samamardhasamaṃ vṛttaṃ viṣamaṃ paiṅgalaṃ tridhā ।।sā vidyā naustitīṣūrṇāṃ gabhīraṃ kāvyasāgaraṃ ।mahākāvyaṃ kalāpaś ca paryābandho viśeṣakam ।।kulakaṃ muktakaṃ koṣa iti padyakuṭumbakam ।sargabandho mahākāvyamārabdhaṃ saṃskṛtena yat ।।tādātmyamajahattatra tatsamaṃ nāti duṣyati ।itihāsakathodbhūtamitaradvā sadāśrayaṃ ।।mantradūtaprayāṇājiniyataṃ nātivistaram ।śakkaryātijagatyātiśakkaryā triṣṭubhā tathā ।।puṣpitāgrādibhirvakrābhijanaiścārubhiḥ samaiḥ ।muktā tu bhinnavṛttāntā nātisaṃkṣiptasargakam ।।atiśarkvarikāṣṭibhyāmekasaṅkīrṇakaiḥ paraḥ ।mātrayāpyaparaḥ sargaḥ prāśastyeṣu ca paścimaḥ ।।kalpo atininditastasminviśeṣānādaraḥ satāṃ ।nagarārṇavaśailartu candrārkāśramapādapaiḥ ।।udyānasalilakrīḍāmadhupānaratotsavaiḥ ।dūtīvacanavinyāsair asatīcaritādbhūtaiḥ ।।tamasā marutāpyanyair vibhāvair atinirbharaiḥ ।

kaśyapa iti ja, ña, ṭa ca

tādarthamajahattatreti ja

anuṣṭubheti ja

vyakteti ña
sarvavṛttipravṛttañca sarvabhāvaprabhāvitam ।।sarvarītirasaiḥ puṣṭaṃ puṣṭaṅguṇavibhūṣaṇaiḥ ।ata eva mahākāvyaṃ tatkartā ca mahākaviḥ ।।vāgvaidagdhyapradhānepi rasa evātra jīvitam ।pṛthakprayatnanirvartyaṃ vāgvakrimni rasādvapuḥ ।।caturvargaphalaṃ viśvagvyākhyātaṃ nāyakākhyayā ।samānavṛttinirvyūṭaḥ kauśikīvṛttikomalaḥ ।।kalāpo atra pravāsaḥ prāganurāgāhvayo rasaḥ ।saviśeṣakañca prāptyādi saṃskṛtenetreṇa ca ।।ślokair anekaiḥ kulakaṃ syāt sandānitakāni tat ।muktakaṃ śloka ekaikaś camatkārakṣamaḥ satā ṃ ।।sūktibhiḥ kavisiṃhānāṃ sundarībhiḥ samanvitaḥ ।koṣo brahmāparicchinnaḥ sa vidagdhāya rocate ।।ābhāsopamaśaktiś ca sarge yadbhinnavṛttatā ।miśraṃ vapuriti khyātaṃ prakīrṇamiti ca dvidhā ।śravyañcaivābhineyañca prakīrṇaṃ sakaloktibhiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre kāvyādilakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

juṣṭamiti ja, ṭa ca

chapter 

ś atha saptatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nāṭakanirūpaṇam

agnir uvāca
nāṭakaṃ saprakaraṇaṃ ḍima īhāmṛgo api vā ।jñeyaḥ samavakāraś ca bhavet prahasanantathā ।।vyāyogabhāṇavīthyaṅkatroṭakānyatha nāṭikā ।saṭṭakaṃ śilpakaḥ karṇā eko durmallikā tathā ।।prasthānaṃ bhāṇikā bhāṇī goṣṭhī hallīśakāni ca ।kāvyaṃ śrīgaditaṃ nāṭyarāsakaṃ rāsakaṃ tathā ।।ullāpyakaṃ preṅkṣaṇañca saptaviṃśatireva tat ।sāmānyañca viśeṣaś ca lakṣaṇasya dvayī gatiḥ ।।sāmānyaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ śeṣaḥ kvāpi pravartate ।pūrvaraṅge nivṛtte dvau deśakālāvubhāvapi ।।rasabhāvavibhāvānubhāvā abhinayās tathā ।aṅkaḥ sthitiś ca sāmānyaṃ sarvatraivopasarpaṇāt ।।viśeṣo avasare vācyaḥ sāmānyaṃ pūrvamucyate ।trivargasādhanannāṭyamityāhuḥ karaṇañca yat ।।itikartavyatā tasya pūrvaraṅgo yathāvidhi ।nāndīmukhāni dvātriṃśadaṅgāni pūrvaraṅgake ।।devatānāṃ namaskāro gurūṇāmapi ca stutiḥ ।gobrāhmaṇanṛpādīnāmāśīrvādādi gīyate ।।nāndyante sūtradhāro asau rūpakeṣu nibadhyate ।gurupūrvakramaṃ vaṃśapraśaṃsā pauruṣaṃ kaveḥ ।।

sambandhārthau ca kāvyasya pañcaitāneṣa nirdiśet ।naṭī vidūṣako vāpi pāripārśvika eva vā ।।sahitāḥ sūtradhāreṇa saṃlāpaṃ yatra kurvate ।citrair vākyaiḥ svakāryotthaiḥ prastutākṣepibhirmithaḥ ।।āmukhaṃ tattu vijñeyaṃ budhaiḥ prastāvanāpi sā ।pravṛttakaṃ kathodghātaḥ prayogātiśayas tathā ।।āmukhasya trayo bhedā vījāṃśeṣūpajāyate ।kālaṃ pravṛttamāśritya sūtradhṛgyatra varṇayet ।।tadāśrayaś ca pātrasya praveśastat pravṛttakaṃ ।sūtradhārasya vākyaṃ vā yatra vākyārthameva vā ।।gṛhītvā praviśet pātraṃ kathodghātaḥ sa ucyate ।prayogeṣu prayogantu sūtradhṛgyatra varṇayet ।।tataś ca praviśet pātraṃ prayogātiśayo hi saḥ ।śarīraṃ nāṭakādīnāmitivṛttaṃ pracakṣate ।।siddhamutprekṣitañceti tasya bhedābubhau smṛtau ।siddhamāgamadṛṣṭañca sṛṣṭamutprekṣitaṃ kaveḥ ।।vījaṃ vinduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryameva ca ।arthaprakṛtayaḥ pañca pañca ceṣṭā api kramāt ।।prārambhaś ca prayatnaś ca prāptiḥ sadbhāva eva ca ।niyatā ca phalaprāptiḥ phalayogaś ca pañcamaḥ ।।mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho vimarṣaś ca tathaiva ca ।tathā nirvahaṇañceti kramāt pañcaiva sandhayaḥ ।।alpamātraṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ bahudhā yat prasarpati ।

phalāvasānaṃ yaccaiva vījaṃ tadabhidhīyate ।।yatra vījasamutpattirnānārtharasasambhavā ।kāvye śarīrānugataṃ tanmukhaṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।।iṣṭasyārthasya racanā vṛttāntasyānupakṣayaḥ ।rāgaprāptiḥ prayogasya guhyānāñcaiva gūhanam ।।āś caryavadabhikhyātaṃ prakāśānāṃ prakāśanam ।aṅgahīnaṃ naro yadvanna śreṣṭhaṃ kāvyameva ca ।।deśakālau vinā kiñcinnetivṛttaṃ pravartate ।atastayorupādānaniyamāt padamucyate ।।deśeṣu bhārataṃ varṣaṃ kāle kṛtayugatrayaṃ ।narte tābhyāṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaduḥkhodayaḥ kvacit ।sarge sargādivārtā ca prasajjantī na duṣyati ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre nāṭakanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athāṣṭatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śṛṅgārādirasanirūpaṇam

agnir uvāca
akṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma sanātanamajaṃ vibhuṃ ।vedānteṣu vadantyekaṃ caitanyaṃ jyotirīśvaram ।।ānandaḥ sahajastasya vyajyate sa kadācana ।vyaktiḥ sā tasya caitanyacamatkārarasāhvayā ।।

ādyastasya vikāro yaḥ so ahaṅkāra iti smṛtaḥ ।tato abhimānastatredaṃ samāptaṃ bhuvanatrayaṃ ।।abhimānādratiḥ sā ca paripoṣamupeyuṣī ।vyabhicāryādisāmānyāt śṛṅgāra iti gīyate ।।tadbhedāḥ kāmamitare hāsyādyā apyanekaśaḥ ।svasvasthādiviśeṣotthaparighoṣasvalakṣaṇāḥ ।।sattvādiguṇasantānājjāyante paramātmanaḥ ।rāgādbhavati śṛṅgāro raudrastaikṣṇāt prajāyate ।।vīro avaṣṭambhajaḥ saṅkocabhūrvībhatsa iṣyate ।śṛṅgārājjyāyate hāso raudrāttu karuṇo rasaḥ ।।vīrāccādbhutaniṣpattiḥ syādvībhatsādbhayānakaḥ ।śṛṅgārahāsyakaruṇā raudravīrabhayānakāḥ ।।vībhatsādbhutaśāntākhyāḥ svabhāvāccaturo rasāḥ ।lakṣmīriva vinā tyāgānna vāṇī bhāti nīrasā ।।apāre kāvyasaṃsāre kavireva prajāpatiḥ ।yathā vai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate ।।śṛṅgārī cet kaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasamayaṃ jagat ।sa cet kavirvītarāgo nīrasaṃ vyaktameva tat ।।na bhāvahīno asti raso na bhāvo rasavarjitaḥ ।bhāvayanti rasānebhirbhāvyante ca rasā iti ।।sthāyino aṣṭau ratimukhāḥ stambhādyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ ।mano anukūle anubhavaḥ sukhasya ratiriṣyate ।।harṣādibhiś ca manaso vikāśo hāsa ucyate ।

citrādidarśanāccetovaiklavyaṃ bruvate bhayam ।।jugupsā ca padārthānāṃ nindā daurbhāgyavāhināṃ ।vismayo atiśayenārthadarśanāccittavistṛtiḥ ।।aṣṭau stambhādayaḥ sattvādrajasastamasaḥ param ।stambhaśceṣṭāpratīghāto bhayarāgādyupāhitaḥ ।।śramarāgādyupetāntaḥkṣobhajanma vapurjalaṃ ।svedo harṣādibhirdehocchāso antaḥpulakodgamaḥ ।।harṣādijanmavāksaṅgaḥ svarabhedo bhayādibhiḥ ।manovaiklavyamicchanti śokamiṣṭakṣayādibhiḥ ।।krodhastaikṣṇaprabodhaś ca pratikūlānukāriṇi ।puruṣārthasamāptyārtho yaḥ sa utsāha ucyate ।।cittakṣobhabhavottambho vepathuḥ parikīrtitaḥ ।vaivarṇyañca viṣādādijanmā kāntiviparyayaḥ ।।duḥkhānandādijannetrajalamaśru ca viśrutam ।indrayāṇāmastamayaḥ pralayo laṅghanādibhiḥ ।।vairāgyādirmanaḥkhedo nirveda iti kathyate ।manaḥpīḍādijanmā ca sādo glāniḥ śarīragā ।।śaṅkāniṣṭāgamotprekṣā syādasūyā ca matsaraḥ ।madirādyupayogotthaṃ manaḥsaṃmohanaṃ madaḥ ।।kriyātiśayajanmāntaḥśarīrotthaklamaḥ śramaḥ ।śṛṅgārādikriyādveṣaścittasyālasyamucyate ।।

bhayarāgādyupasthita iti kha
dainyaṃ sattvādapabhraṃśaścintārthaparibhāvanaṃ ।itikartavyatopāyādraśanaṃ moha ucyate ।।smṛtiḥ syādanubhūtasya vastunaḥ prativimbanaṃ ।matirarthaparicchedastattvajñānopanāyitaḥ ।।vrīḍānurāgādibhavaḥ saṅkocaḥ kopi cetasaḥ ।bhaveccapalātāsthairyaṃ harṣaścittaprasannatā ।।āveśaś ca pratīkāraḥ śayo vaidhuryamātmanaḥ ।kartavye pratibhābhraṃśo jaḍatetyabhidhīyate ।।iṣṭaprāpterūpacitaḥ sampadābhyudayo dhṛtiḥ ।garvāḥ pareṣvavajñānamātmanyutkarṣabhāvanā ।।bhavedviṣādo daivādervighāto abhīṣṭavastuni ।autsukyamīpsitāprāptervāñchayā taralā sthitiḥ ।।cittendriyāṇāṃ staimityamapasmāro acalā sthitiḥ ।yuddhe bādhādibhīstrāso vīpsā cittacamatkṛtiḥ ।।krodhasyāpraśamo amarṣaḥ prabodhaścetanodayaḥ ।avahitthaṃ bhavedguptiriṅgitākāragocarā ।।roṣato guruvāgdaṇḍapāruṣyaṃ vidurugratāṃ ।ūho vitarkaḥsyādvyādhirmanovapuravagrahaḥ ।।anibaddhapralāpādirunmādo madanādibhiḥ ।tattvajñānādinā cetaḥkaṣāyo paramaḥ śamaḥ ।।kavibhiryojanīyā vai bhāvāḥ kāvyādike rasāḥ ।vibhāvyate hi ratyādiryatra yena vibhāvyate ।।vibhāvo nāma sadvedhālambanoddīpanātmakaḥ ।

ratyādibhāvavargo ayaṃ yamājīvyopajāyate ।।ālambanavibhāvo asau nāyakādibhavas tathā ।dhīrodātto dhīroddhataḥ syāddhīralalitas tathā ।।dhīrapraśānta ity evaṃ caturdhā nāyakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।anukūlo dakṣiṇaś ca śaṭho dhṛṣṭaḥ pravartitaḥ ।।pīṭhamardo viṭaś caiva vidūṣaka iti trayaḥ ।śṛṅgāre narmasacivā nāyakasyānunāyakāḥ ।।pīṭhamardaḥ sambalakaḥ śrīmāṃstadveśajo viṭaḥ ।vidūṣako vaihasikastvaṣṭanāyakanāyikāḥ ।।svakīyā parakīyā ca punarbhūriti kauśikāḥ ।sāmānyā na punarbhūrirityādyā bahubhedataḥ ।।uddipanavibhāvāste saṃskārair vividhaiḥ sthitaiḥ ।ālambanavibhāveṣu bhāvānudvīpayanti ye ।।catuḥṣaṣṭikalā dvedhā karmādyair gītikādibhiḥ ।kuhakaṃ smṛtirapyeṣāṃ prāyo hāsopahārakaḥ ।।ālambanavibhāvasya bhāvair udbuddhasaṃskṛtaiḥ ।manovāgbuddhivapuṣāṃ smṛtīchādveṣayatnataḥ ।।ārambha eva viduṣāmanubhāva iti smṛtaḥ ।sa cānubhūyate cātra bhavatyuta nirucyate ।।manovyāpārabhūyiṣṭho mana ārambha ucyate ।dvividhaḥ pauruṣastraiṇa īdṛśo api prasidhyati ।।śobhā vilāso mādhuryaṃ sthairyaṃ gāmbhīryameva ca ।lalitañca tathaudāryantejo aṣṭāviti pauruṣāḥ ।।

nīcanindottamaspardhā śauryaṃ dākṣādikāraṇaṃ ।manodharme bhavecchobhā śobhate bhavanaṃ yathā ।।bhāvo hāvaś ca helā ca śobhā kāntistathaiva ca ।dīptirmādhuryaśaurye ca prāgalbhyaṃ syādudāratā ।।sthairyaṃ gambhīratā strīṇāṃ vibhāvā dvādaśeritāḥ ।bhāvo vilāso hāvaḥsyādbhāvaḥ kiñcicca harṣajaḥ ।।vāco yuktirbhavedvāgārambho dvādaśa eva saḥ ।tatrābhāṣaṇamālāpaḥ pralāpo vacanaṃ vahu ।।vilāpo duḥkhavacanamanulāpo asakṛdvacaḥ ।saṃlāpa uktapratyuktamapalāpo anyathāvacaḥ ।।vārtāprayāṇaṃ sandeśo nirdeśaḥ pratipādanam ।tattvadeśo atideśo ayamapadeśo anyavarṇanam ।।upadeśaś ca śikṣāvāk vyājoktirvyapadeśakaḥ ।bodhāya eṣa vyāpāraḥsubuddhyārambha iṣyate ।tasya bhedāstrayaste ca rītivṛttipravṛttayaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre śṛṅgārādirasanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

muhuriti kha

chapter 

ś athonacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

rītinirūpaṇaṃ

agnirucāca
vāgvidyāsampratijñāne rītiḥ sāpi caturvidhā ।pāñcālī gauḍadeśīyā vaidarbhī lāṭajā tathā ।।upacārayutā mṛdvī pāñcālī hrasvavigrahā ।anavasthitasandarbhā gauḍīyā dīrghavigrahā ।।upacārair na bahubhirupacārair vivarjitā ।nātikomalasandarbhā vaidarbhī muktavigrahā ।।lāṭīyā sphuṭasandharbhā nātivisphuravigrahā ।parityaktāpi bhūyobhirupacārair udāhṛtā ।।kriyāsvaviṣamā vṛttirbhāratyārabhaṭī tathā ।kauśikī sātvatī ceti sā caturdhā pratiṣṭhitā ।।vākpradhānā naraprāyā strīyuktā prākṛtoktitā ।bharatena praṇītatvād bhāratī rītirucyate ।।catvāryaṅgāni bhāratyā vīthī prahasanantathā ।prastāvanā nāṭakādervīthyaṅgāś ca trayodaśa ।।udghātakaṃ tathaiva syāllapitaṃ syāddvitīyakam ।asatpralāpo vākśreṇī nālikā vipaṇantathā ।।vyāhārastimatañcaiva chalāvaskandite tathā ।

vāgveṇīti ka, ña, ṭa ca

vyāhārastrigatañcaiveti kha
gaṇḍo atha mṛdavaś caiva trayodaśamathācitam ।।tāpasādeḥ prahasanaṃ parihāsaparaṃ vacaḥ ।māyendrajālayuddhādibahulārabhaṭī smṛtā ।
maṅkṣiptakārapātau ca vastūtthāpanameva ca ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre rītinirūpaṇaṃ nāmonacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha catvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nṛtyādāvaṅgakarmanirūpaṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
ceṣṭāviśeṣamapyaṅgapratyaṅge karma cānayoḥ ।śarīrārambhamicchanti prāyaḥ pūrvo avalāśrayaḥ ।।līlā vilāso vichittirvibhramaṃ kilakiñcitaṃ ।moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ vivvoko lalitantathā ।।vikṛtaṃ krīḍitaṃ keliriti dvādaśadhaiva saḥ ।līleṣṭajanaceṣṭānukaraṇaṃ saṃvṛtakṣaye ।।viśeṣān darśayan kiñcidvilāsaḥ sadbhiriṣyate ।hasitakrānditādīnāṃ saṅkaraḥ kilakiñcitaṃ ।।vikāraḥ kopi vivvoko lalitaṃ saukumāryataḥ ।śiraḥ pāṇiruraḥ pārśvaṅkaṭiraṅghririti kramāt ।।aṅgāni bhrūlatādīni pratyaṅgānyabhijānate ।

saṅkṣiptakarapātau ceti ja
aṅgapratyaṅgayoḥ karma prayatnajanitaṃ vinā ।।na prayogaḥ kvacinmukhyantiraścīnañca tat kvacit ।ākampitaṃ kampitañca dhūtaṃ vidhūtameva ca ।।parivāhitamādhūtamavadhūtamathācitaṃ ।nikuñcitaṃ parāvṛttamutkṣiptañcāpyadhogatam ।।lalitañceti vijñeyaṃ trayodaśavidhaṃ śiraḥ ।bhrūkarma saptadhā jñeyaṃ pātanaṃ bhrūkuṭīmukhaṃ ।।dṛṣtistridhā ramasthāyisañcāripratibandhanā ।ṣaṭtriṃśadbhedavidhurā rasajā tatra cāṣṭadhā ।।navadhā tārakākarma bhramaṇañcalanādikaṃ ।ṣoḍhā ca nāsikā jñeyā niśvāso navadhā mataḥ ।।ṣoṭauṣṭhakarmakaṃ pāpaṃ saptadhā civukakriyā ।kaluṣādimukhaṃ ṣoḍhā grīvā navavidhā smṛtā ।।asaṃyutaḥ saṃyutaś ca bhūmnā hastaḥ pramucyate ।patākastripātākaś ca tathā vai kartarīmukhaḥ ।।ardhacandrotkarālaś ca śukatuṇḍastathaiva ca ।suṣṭiś ca śikharaś caiva kapitthaḥ kheṭakāmukhaḥ ।।sūcyāsyaḥ padmakoṣo hi śirāḥ samṛgaśīrṣakāḥ ।kāṃmūlakālapadmau ca caturabhramarau tathā ।।haṃsāsyahaṃsapakṣau ca sandaṃśamukulau tathā ।

ākalpitaṃ kalpitañceti kha

kāṅgūlakālapadmāviti ña

kāṃmūlakālapadmau kāṅgūlakālapadmau etatpāṭhadvayaṃ na samīcīnaṃ
urṇanābhastāmracūḍaś caturviṃśatirityamī ।।asaṃyutakarāḥ proktāḥ saṃyutāstu trayodaśa ।añjaliś ca kapotaś ca karkaṭaḥ svastikas tathā ।।kaṭako vardhamānaścāpyasaṅgo niṣadhas tathā ।dolaḥ puṣpapuṭaś caiva tathā makara eva ca ।।gajadanto vahistambho vardhamāno apare karāḥ ।uraḥ pañcavidhaṃ syāttu ābhugnanartanādikam ।।udaranduratikṣāmaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pūrṇamiti tridhā ।pārśvayoḥ pañcakarmāṇi jaṅghākarma ca pañcadhā ।anekadhā pādakarma nṛtyādau nāṭake smṛtam ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre
nṛtyādāvaṅgakarmanirūpaṇam nāma catvariṃśadadhikatriśatatamo
adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

abhinayādinirūpaṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
ābhimukhyannayannarthānvijñeyo abhinayo budhaiḥ ।caturdhā sambhavaḥ sattvavāgaṅgāharaṇāśrayaḥ ।।stambhādiḥ sāttviko vāgārambho vācika āṅgikaḥ ।śarīrārambha āhāryo buddhyārambhapravṛttayaḥ ।।rasādiviniyogo atha kathyate hy abhimānataḥ ।tamantareṇa sarve ṣāmapārthaiva svatantratā ।।sambhogo vipralambhaś ca śṛṅgāro dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।

pracchannaś ca prakāśaś ca tāvapi dvividhau punaḥ ।।vipralambhābhidhāno yaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ sa caturvidhaḥ ।pūrvānurāgānākhyaḥ pravāmakaruṇātmakaḥ ।।etebhyo anyataraṃ jāyamānamambhogalakṣaṇam ।vivartate caturdhaiva na ca prāgativartate ।।strīpuṃsayostadudayastasya nirvirtikā ratiḥ ।nikhilāḥ sāttvikāstatra vaivarṇyapralayau vinā ।।dharmārthakāmamokṣaiś ca śṛṅgāra upacīyate ।ālamvanaviśeṣaiś ca tadviśeṣair nirantaraḥ ।।śṛṅgāraṃ dvividhaṃ vidyādvāṅnepathyakriyātmakam ।hāsaś ca turvidho alakṣyadantaḥ smita itīritaḥ ।।kiñcillakṣitadantāgraṃ hasitaṃ phullalocanam ।vihasitaṃ sasvanaṃ syājjihmopahasitantu tat ।।saśabdaṃ pāpahasitamaśabdamatihāsitaṃ ।yaścāsau karuṇo nāma sa rasastrividho bhavet ।।dharmopaghātajaścittavilāsajanitas tathā ।śokaḥ śokādbhavet sthāyī kaḥ sthāyī pūrvajo mataḥ ।।aṅganepathyavākyaiś ca raudro api trividho rasaḥ ।tasya nirvartakaḥ krodhaḥ svedo romāñcavapathuḥ ।।dānavīro dharmavīro yuddhavīra iti trayam ।vīrastasya ca niṣpattiheturutsāha iṣyate ।।ārambheṣu bhavedyatra vīramevānuvartate ।

bhayānako nāma rasastasya nirvartakaṃ bhayaṃ ।।udvejanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś ca vībhatso dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।udvejanaḥ syāt plutyādyaiḥ kṣobhaṇo rudhirādibhiḥ ।।jagupsārambhikā tasya sāttvikāṃśo nivartate ।kāvyaśobhākarān dharmānalaṅkārān pracakṣyate ।।alaṅkariṣṇavaste ca śabdamarthamubhau tridhā ।ye vyutpattyādinā śabdamalaṅkartumiha kṣamāḥ ।।śabdālaṅkāramāhustān kāvyamīmāṃsakā vidaḥ ।chāyā mudrā tathoktiś ca yuktirgumphanayā saha ।।vākovākyamanuprāsaścitraṃ duṣkarameva ca ।jṇeyā navālaṅkṛtayaḥ śabdānāmityasaṅkarāt ।।tatrānyokteranukṛtiśchāyā sāpi catruvvidhā ।lokacchekārbhakoktīnāmekokteranukārataḥ ।।ābhāṇakoktirlokoktiḥ sarvasāmānya eva tāḥ ।yānudhāvati lokoktiśchāyāmicchanti tāṃ budhāḥ ।।chekā vidagdhā vaidagdhyaṃ kalāsu kuśalā matiḥ ।tāmullikhantī chekoktiśchāyā kavibhiriṣyate ।।avyutpannoktirakhilair arbhakoktyopalakṣyate ।tenārbhakoktiśchāyā tanmātroktimanukurvatī ।।viplutākṣaramaślīlaṃ vaco mattasya tādṛśī ।yā sā bhavati mattoktiśchāyoktāpyatiśobhate ।।abhiprāyaviśeṣeṇa kaviśaktiṃ vivṛṇvatī ।

mutpradāyinīti sā mudrā saiva śayyāpi no mate ।।uktiḥ sā kathyate yasyāmarthako apyupapattimān ।lokayātrārthavidhinā dhinoti hṛdayaṃ satāṃ ।।ubhau vidhiniṣedhau ca niyamāniyamāvapi ।vikalpaparisaṅkhye ca tadīyāḥ ṣaḍathoktayaḥ ।।ayuktayoriva mitho vācyavācakayordvayoḥ ।yojanāyai kalpyamānā yuktiruktā manīṣibhiḥ ।।padañcaiva padārthaś ca vākyaṃ vākyarthameva ca ।viṣayo astyāḥ prakaraṇaṃ prapañcaśceti ṣaḍvidhaḥ ।।gumphanā racanācaryā śabdārthakramagocarā ।śabdānukārādarthānupūrvārtheyaṃ kramāttridhā ।।uktipratyuktimadvākyaṃ vākovākyaṃ dvidhaiva tat ।ṛjuvakroktibhedena tatrādyaṃ sahajaṃ vacaḥ ।।sā pūrvapraśnikā praśnapūrviketi dvidhā bhavet ।vakroktistu bhaveḍbhaṅgyā kākustena kṛtā dvidhā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre abhinayādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvicatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śabdālaṅkārāḥ

agnirucāca
syādāvṛttiranuprāso varṇānāṃ padavākyayoḥ ।ekavarṇānekavarṇāvṛttervarṇaguṇo dvidhā ।।ekavarṇagatāvṛtterjāyante pañca vṛttayaḥ ।madhurā lalitā prauṭā bhadrā paruṣayā saha ।।madhurāyāś ca vargantādadho vargyā raṇau svanau ।hrasvasvareṇāntaritau saṃyuktatvaṃ nakārayoḥ ।।na kāryā vargyavarṇānāmāvṛttiḥ pañcamādhikā ।mahāprāṇoṣmasaṃyogapravimuktalaghūttarau ।।lalitā balabhūyiṣṭhā prauṭā yā paṇavargajā ।ūrdhvaṃ repheṇa yujyante naṭavargonapañcamāḥ ।।bhadrāyāṃ pariśiṣṭāḥ syuḥ paruṣā sābhidhīyate ।bhavanti yasyāmūṣmāṇaḥ saṃyuktāstattadakṣaraiḥ ।।akāravarjamāvṛttiḥ svarāṇāmatibhūyasī ।anusvāravisargau ca pāruṣyāya nirantarau ।।śaṣasā rephasaṃyuktāścākāraścāpi bhūyasā ।

raśau ghanāviti ña

mahāprāṇoṣmasaṃyogādaviyuktalaghūttarāviti ṭa

lalitā vanabhūyiṣṭheti kha । lalitā vatsabhūyiṣṭheti ṭa
antasthābhinnamābhyāñca haḥ pāruṣyāya saṃyutaḥ ।।anyathāpi gururvarṇaḥ saṃyukteparipanthini ।pāruṣyāyādimāṃstatra pūjitā na tu pañcamo ।।kṣepe śabdānukāre ca paruṣāpi prayujyate ।karṇāṭī kauntalī kauntī kauṅkaṇī vāmanāsikā ।।drāvaṇī mādhavī pañcavarṇāntasthoṣmabhiḥ kramāt ।anekavarṇāvṛttiryā bhinnārthapratipādikā ।।yamakaṃ sāvyapetañca vyapetañceti taddvidhā ।ānantaryādavyapetaṃ vyapetaṃ vyavadhānataḥ ।।dvaividhyenānayoḥ sthānapādabhedāccaturvidham ।ādipādādimadhyānteṣvekadvitriniyogataḥ ।।saptadhā saptapūrveṇa cet pādenottarottaraḥ ।ekadvitripadārambhastulyaḥ ṣoḍhā tadāparaṃ ।।tṛtīyaṃ trividhaṃ pādasyādimadhyāntagocaram ।pādāntayamakañcaiva kāñcīyamakameva ca ।।saṃsargayamakañcaiva vikrāntayamakantathā ।pādādiyamakañcaiva tathāmreḍitameva ca ।।caturvyavasitañcaiva mālāyamakameva ca ।daśadhā yamakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tadbhedā bahavo apare ।।svatantrasyānyatantrasya padasyāvartanā dvidhā ।

bālavāsiketi kha, ṭa ca । vanavāsiketi ña

pūrvapūrveṇeti ja, ña, ṭa ca

sambandhayamakaś caiveti kha
bhinnaprayojanapadasyāvṛttiṃ manujā viduḥ ।।dvayorāvṛttapadayoḥ samastā syātsamāsataḥ ।asamāsāttayorvyastā pāde tvekatra vigrahāt ।।vākyasyāvṛttirapyevaṃ yathāsambhavamiṣyate ।alaṅkārādyanuprāso laghumadhyevamarhaṇāt ।।yayā kayācidvṛtyā yat samānamanubhūyate ।tadrūpādipadāsattiḥ sānuprasā rasāvahā ।।goṣṭhyāṃ kutūhalādhyāyī vāgbandhaścitramucyate ।praśnaḥ prahelikā guptaṃ cyutadatte tathobhayam ।।samasyā sapta tadbhedā nānārthasyānuyogataḥ ।yatra pradīyate tulyavarṇavinyāsamuttaraṃ ।।sa praśnaḥ syādekapṛṣṭadvipṛṣṭottarabhedataḥ ।dvidhaikapṛṣṭo dvividhaḥ samasto vyasta eva ca ।।dvayorapyarthayorguhyamānaśabdā prahelikā ।sā dvidhārtho ca śābdī ca tatrārthī cārthabodhataḥ ।।śabdāvabodhataḥ śābdī prāhuḥ ṣoḍhā prahelikāṃ ।yasmin gupte api vākyāṅge bhāvyartho apāramārthikaḥ ।।tadaṅgavihitākāṅkṣastadguptaṃ gūḍhamapyadaḥ ।yatrārthāntaranirbhāso vākyāṅgacyavanādibhiḥ ।।tadaṅgavihitākāṅkṣastaccutaṃ syāccaturvidham ।

laghumapyevamarhaṇāditi ṭa । laghumadhyeva varhaṇāditi ja

laghumadhyevamarhaṇāt, laghumapyevamarhaṇāt, laghumadhyeva varhaṇāt etat pāṭhatrayaṃ na samyak pratibhāti
svaravyañjanavindūnāṃ visargasya ca vicyuteḥ ।।dattepi yatra vākyāṅge dvitīyorthaḥ pratīyate ।dattantadāhustadbhedāḥ svarādyaiḥ pūrvavanmatāḥ ।।apanītākṣarasthāne nyaste varṇāntare api ca ।bhāsate arthāntaraṃ yatra cyutadattaṃ taducyate ।।suśliṣṭapadyamekaṃ yannānāślokāṃśanirmitam ।sā mamasyā parasyātmaparayoḥ kṛtisaṅkarāt ।।duḥkhena kṛtamatyarthaṃ kavisāmarthyasūcakam ।duṣkaraṃ nīrasatvepi vidagdhānāṃ mahotsavaḥ ।।niyamācca vidarbhāca bandhācca bhavati tridhā ।kaveḥ pratijñā nirmāṇaramyasya niyamaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।sthānenāpi svareṇāpi vyañjanenāpi sa tridhā ।vikalpaḥ prātilomyānulomyādevābhidhīyate ।।pratilomyānulomyañca śabdenārthena jāyate ।anekadhāvṛttavarṇavinyāsaiḥ śilpakalpanā ।।tattatprasiddhavastūnāṃ bandha ity abhidhīyate ।gomūtrikārdhabhramaṇe sarvatobhadramambujam ।।cakrañcakrābjakaṃ daṇḍo murajāśceti cāṣṭadhā ।pratyardhaṃ pratipādaṃ syādekāntarasamākṣarā ।।dvidhā gomūtrikāṃ pūrvāmāhuraśvapadāṃ pare ।antyāṅgomūtrikāṃ dhenuṃ jālabandhaṃ vadanti hi ।।ardhābhyāmardhapādaiś ca kuryādvinyāsametayoḥ ।

jānubandhamiti ka, kha ca
nyastānāmiha varṇānāmadhodhaḥ kramabhāgināṃ ।।adhodhaḥsthitavarṇānāṃ yāvattūryapadannayet ।turyapādānnayedūrdha pādārdhaṃ prātilomyataḥ ।।tadeva sarvatobhadraṃ trividhaṃ sarasīruhaṃ ।catuṣpatraṃ tato vighnaṃ catuṣpatre ubhe api ।।atha prathamapādasya mūrdhanyastripadākṣaraṃ ।sarveṣāmeva pādānāmante tadupajāyate ।।prākpadasyāntimaṃ pratyak pādādau prātilomyataḥ ।antyapādāntimañcādyapādādāvakṣaradvayaṃ ।।catuśchade bhavedaṣṭacchade varṇatrayaṃ punaḥ ।syāt ṣoḍaśacchade tvekāntarañcedekamakṣaraṃ ।।karṇikāṃ tolayedūrdhvaṃ patrākārākṣarāvaliṃ ।praveśayet karṇikāyāñcatuṣpatrasaroruhe ।।karṇikāyāṃ likhedekaṃ dve dve dikṣu vidikṣu ca ।praveśanirgamau dikṣu kuryādaṣṭacchade ambuje ।।viśvagviṣamavarṇānāṃ tāvat patrābalījuṣāṃ ।madhye samākṣaranyāsaḥsaroje ṣoḍaśacchade ।।dvidhā cakraṃ caturaraṃ ṣaḍarantatra cādimaṃ ।pūrvārdhe sadṛśā varṇāḥ pādaprathamapañcamāḥ ।।ayujo aśvayujaś caiva turyāvapyaṣṭamāvapi ।tasyopapādaprākpratyagareṣu ca yathākramaṃ ।।syātpādārdhacatuṣkantu nābhau tasyādyamakṣaraṃ ।paścimārāvadhi nayennemau śeṣe padadvayī ।।

tṛtīyaṃ turyapādānte prathamau sadṛśāvubhau ।varṇau pādatrayasyāpi daśamaḥ sadṛśo yadi ।।prathame carame tasya ṣaḍtarṇāḥ pathime yadi ।bhavanti dvyantaraṃ tarhi vṛhacca kramudāhṛtaṃ ।।sammukhāradvaye pādamekaikaṃ kramaśo likhet ।nābhau tu varṇaṃ daśamaṃ nemau tūryapadannayet ।।ślokasyādyantadaśamāḥ samā ādyantimau yujoḥ ।ādau varṇaḥ samau turyapañcamāvādyataryayoḥ ।।dvitīyaprātilomyena tṛtīyaṃ jāyate yadi ।padaṃ vidadhyāt patrasya daṇḍaś cakrābjakaṃ kṛteḥ ।।dvitīyau prāgdale tulyau saptamau ca tathāparau ।sadṛśāvuttaradalau dvitīyābhyāmathārdhayoḥ ।।dvitīyaṣaṣṭhāḥ sadṛśāś caturthapañcamāvapi ।ādyantapādayostulyau parārdhasaptamāvapi ।।samau turyaṃ pañcamantu krameṇa viniyojayet ।turyau yojyau tu tadvacca dalāntāḥ kramapādayoḥ ।।ardhayorantimādyau tu muraje sadṛśāvabhau ।pādārdhapatito varṇaḥ prātilomyānulomataḥ ।।antimaṃ paribadhnīyādyāvatturyamihādimat ।pādātturyādyadevādyaṃ navamāt ṣoḍaśādapi ।।akṣarāt puṭake madhye madhye akṣaracatuṣṭayam ।kṛtvā kuryādyathaitasya murajākāratā bhavet ।।dvitīyaṃ cakraśārdūlavikrīḍitakasampadam ।

gomūtrikā sarvavṛttair anye bandhāstvanuṣṭubhā ।।nāmadheyaṃ yadi na cedamīṣu kavikāvyayoḥ ।mitradheyābhituṣyanti nāmitraḥ khidyate tathā ।।vāṇavāṇāsanavyomakhaḍgamudgaraśaktayaḥ ।dvicaturthatriśṛṅgāṭā dambholimuṣalāṅkuśāḥ ।।padaṃ rathasya nāgasya puṣkariṇyasiputrikā ।ete bandhās tathā cānye evaṃ jñeyāḥ svayaṃ budhaiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre śabdālaṅkāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha tricatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

arthālaṅkārāḥ

agnir uvāca
alaṅkaraṇamarthānāmarthālaṅkāra iṣyate ।taṃ vinā śabdasaundaryamapi nāsti manoharam ।।arthālaṅkārarahitā vidhaveva sarasvatī ।svarūpamatha sādṛśyamutprekṣātiśayāvapi ।।vibhāvanā virodhaś ca hetuś ca samamaṣṭadhā ।svabhāva eva bhāvānāṃ svarūpamabhidhīyate ।।nijamāgantukañceti dvividhaṃ tadudāhṛtam ।sāṃsiddhikaṃ niyaṃ naimittikamāgantukaṃ tathā ।।

vidhureveti kha, ṭa ca
sādṛśyaṃ dharmasāmānyamupamā rūpakaṃ tathā ।mahoktyarthāntaranyāsāviti syāttu caturvidham ।।upamā nāma sā yasyāmupamānopameyayoḥ ।sattā cāntarasāmānyayogitvepi vivakṣitaṃ ।।kiñcidādāya sārūpyaṃ lokayātrā pravartate ।samāsenāsamāsena sā dvidhā pratiyoginaḥ ।।vigrahādabhidhānasya sasamāsānyathottarā ।upamādyotakapadenopameyapadenaca ।।tābhyāñca vigrahāttredhā sasamāsāntimāt tridhā ।viśiṣyamāṇā upamā bhavantyaṣṭādaśa sphuṭāḥ ।।yatra sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ kathyate gamyate api vā ।te dharmavastuprādhānyāddharmavastūpame ubhe ।।tulyamevopamīyete yatrānyonyena dharmiṇau ।parasparopamā sā syāt prasiddheranyathā tayoḥ ।।viparītopamā sā syādvyāvṛtter niyamopamā ।anyatrāpyanuvṛttestu bhavedaniyamopamā ।।samuccayopamāto anyadharmavāhulyakīrtanāt ।vahordhammasya sāmyepi vailakṣṇyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ ।।yaducyate atiriktatvaṃ vyatirekopamā tu sā ।yatropamā syādvahubhiḥ sadṛśaiḥ sā bahūpamā ।।dharmāḥ pratyupamānañcedanye mālopamaiva sāap।upamānavikāreṇa tulanā vikriyopamā ।।trilokyāsambhavi kimapyāropya pratiyogini ।

kavinopamīyate yā prathate sādbhutopamā ।।pratiyoginamāropya tadabhedena kīrtanam ।upameyasya sā mohopamāsau bhrāntimadvacaḥ ।।ubhayordharmiṇostathyāniś cayāt saṃśayopamā ।upameyasya saṃśayya niś cayānniś cayopamā ।।vākyārthanaiva vākyārthopamā syādupamānataḥ ।ātmanopamānādupamā sādhāraṇyatiśāyinī ।।upameyaṃ yadnyasya tadnyasyopamā matā ।yadyuttarottaraṃ yāti tadāsau gaganopamā ।।praśaṃsā caiva nindā ca kalpitā sadṛśī tathā ।kiñcicca sadṛśī jñeyā upamā pañcadhā puraḥ ।।upamānena yattatvamupameyasya rūpyate ।guṇānāṃ samatāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpakaṃ nāma tadviduḥ ।।upamaiva tirobhūtabhedā rūpakameva vā ।sahoktiḥ sahabhāvena kathanaṃ tulyadharmiṇāṃ ।।bhavedarthāntaranyāsaḥ sādṛśyenottareṇa saḥ ।anyathopasthitā vṛttiścetanasyetarasya ca ।।anyathā manyate yatra tāmutprekṣāṃ pracakṣate ।lokasīmānvṛttasya vastudharmasya kīrtanam ।।bhavedatiśayo nāma sambhavāsambhavāddvidhā ।guṇajātikriyādīnāṃ yatra vaikalyardarśanaṃ ।।viśeṣadarśanāyaiva sā viśeṣoktirucyate ।

pavanopameti kha । gamanopameti ka, ṭa ca
prasiddhahetuvyāvṛtyā yat kiñcit kāraṇāntaram ।।yatra svābhāvikatvaṃ vā vibhāvyaṃ sā vibhāvanā ।saṅgatīkaraṇaṃ yuktyā yadasaṃgacchamānayoḥ ।।virodhapūrvakatvena tadvirodha iti smṛtaṃ ।sisādhayiṣitārthasya heturbhavati sādhakaḥ ।।kārako jñāpaka iti dvidhā so apyupajāyate ।pravartate kārakākhyaḥ prāk paścāt kāryajanmanaḥ ।।pūrvaśeṣa iti khyātastayoreva viśeṣayoḥ ।kāryakāraṇabhāvādvā svamāvādvā niyāmakāt ।।jñāpakākhyasya bhedo asti nadīpūrādidarśanāt ।avinābhāvaniyamo hy avinābhāvadarśanāt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre arthālaṅkāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha catuś catvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śabdārthālaṅkārāḥ

agnir uvāca
śabdārthayoralaṅkāro dvāvalaṅkurute samaṃ ।ekatra nihito hāraḥ stanaṃ grīvāmiva striyāḥ ।।praśastiḥ kāntiraucityaṃ saṃkṣepo yāvadarthatā ।abhivyaktiriti vyaktaṃ ṣaḍbhedāstasya jāgrati ।।praśastiḥ paravanmarmadravīkaraṇakarmaṇaḥ ।vāco yuktirdvidhā sā ca premoktistutibhedataḥ ।।

premoktistutiparyāyau priyoktiguṇakīrtane ।kāntiḥ sarvamanorucyavācyavāttakasaṅgatiḥ ।।yathā vastu tathā rītiryathā vṛttis tathā rasaḥ ।ūrjasvimṛdusandarbhādaucityamupajāyate ।।saṃkṣepo vācakair alpair vahorarthasya saṃgrahaḥ ।anyūnādhikatā śabdavastunoryāvadarthatā ।।prakaṭatvamabhivyaktiḥ śrutirākṣepa ity api ।tasyā bhedau śrutistatra śabdaṃ svārthasamarpaṇam ।।bhavennaimittikī pāribhāṣikī dvividhaiva sā ।saṅketaḥ paribhāṣeti tataḥ syāt pāribhāṣikī ।।mukhyaupacārikī ceti sā ca sā ca dvidhā dvidhā ।svābhidheyaskhaladvṛttiramukhyārthasya vācakaḥ ।।yayā śabdo nimittena kenacitsaupacārikī ।sā ca lākṣaṇikī gauṇī lakṣaṇāguṇayogataḥ ।।abhidheyāvinābhūtā pratītir lakṣaṇocyate ।abhidheyena sambandhātsāmīpyātsamavāyataḥ ।।vaiparītyātkriyāyogāllakṣaṇā pañcadhā matā ।gauṇīguṇānāmānantyādanantā tadvivakṣayā ।।anyadharmastato anyatra lokasīmānurodhinā ।samyagādhīyate yatra sa samādhiriha smṛtaḥ ।।śrūteralabhyamāno artho yasmādbhāti sacetanaḥ ।sa ākṣepo dhaniḥ syācca dhvaninā vyajyate yataḥ ।।śabdenārthena yatrārthaḥ kṛtvā svayamupārjanam ।

pratiṣedha iveṣṭasya yo viśeṣo abhidhitsayā ।।tamākṣepaṃ vruvantyatra stutaṃ stotramidaṃ punaḥ ।adhikārādapetasya vastuno anyasya yā stutiḥ ।।yatroktaṃ gamyate nārthastatsamānaviśeṣaṇaṃ ।sā samāsokitiruditā saṅkṣepārthatayā budhaiḥ ।।apahnutirapahnutya kiñcidanyārthasūcanam ।paryāyoktaṃ yadanyena prakārenābhidhīyate ।eṣāmekaṃtamasyeva samākhyā dhvanirityataḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre śabdarthālaṅkāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuś catvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kāvyaguṇavivekaḥ

agnir uvāca
alaṃkṛtamapi prītyai na kāvyaṃ nirguṇaṃ bhavet ।vapuṣyalalite strīṇāṃ hāro bhārāyate paraṃ ।।na ca vācyaṃ guṇo doṣo bhāva eva bhaviṣyati ।guṇāḥ śleṣādayo doṣā gūḍārthādyāḥ pṛthakkṛtāḥ ।।yaḥ kāvye mahatīṃ chāyāmanugṛhṇātyasau guṇaiḥ ।sambhavatyeṣa sāmānyo vaiśeṣika iti dvidhā ।।sarvasādhāraṇībhūtaḥ sāmanya iti manyate ।śabdamarthamubhau prāptaḥ sāmānyo bhavati tridhā ।।śabdamāśrayate kāvyaṃ śarīraṃ yaḥ sa tadguṇaḥ ।

śloṣo lālityāgāmbhīryasaukumāryamudāratā ।।satyeva yaugikī ceti guṇāḥ śabdasya saptadhā ।suśliṣṭasanniveśatvaṃ śabdānāṃ śleṣa ucyate ।।guṇādeśādinā pūrvaṃ padasambaddhamakṣaraṃ ।yatrasandhīyate naiva tallālityamudāhṛtaṃ ।।viśiṣṭalakṣaṇollekhalekhyamuttānaśabdakam ।gāmbhīryaṃ kathayantyāryāstadevānyeṣu śabdatāṃ ।।aniṣṭhurākṣaraprāyaśabdatā sukumāratā ।uttānapadataudaryayutaślāghyair viśeṣaṇaiḥ ।।ojaḥ samāsabhūyastvametatpadyādijīvitaṃ ।ābrahma stambhaparyantamojasaikena pauruṣaṃ ।।ucyamānasya śabdena yena kenāpi vastunaḥ ।utkarṣamāvahannartho guṇa ity abhidhīyate ।।mādhuryaṃ sambidhānañca komalatvamudāratā ।prauḍhiḥ sāmayikatvañca tadbhedāḥ ṣaṭcakāśati ।।krodherṣyākāragāmbhīryātmādhuryaṃ dhairyagāhitā ।sambidhānaṃ parikaraḥ syādapekṣitasiddhaye ।।yatkāṭhinyādinirmuktasanniveśaviśiṣṭatā ।tiraskṛtyaiva mṛdutā bhāti komalateti sā ।।lakṣyate sthūlalakṣatvapravṛtteryatra lakṣaṇam ।guṇasya tadudāratvamāśayasyātisauṣṭhavaṃ ।।abhipretaṃ prati yato nirvāhasyopapādikāḥ ।yuktayo hetugarbhiṇyaḥ prauḍhāprauḍhirudāhṛtā ।।

svatantrasyānyatantrasya vāhyāntaḥsamayogataḥ ।tatra vyutpattirarthasya yā sāmayikateti sā ।।śabdārthavupakurvāṇo nāmnobhayaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।tasya prasādaḥ saubhāgyaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ praśastatā ।।pāko rāga iti prājñaiḥ ṣaṭprapañcavipañcitāḥ ।suprasiddharthapadatā prasāda iti gīyate ।।utkarṣavān guṇaḥ kaścidyasminnukte pratīyate ।tatsaubhāgyamudāratvaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।yathāsaṅkhyamanuddeśaḥ sāmanyamatidiśyate ।samaye varṇanīyasya dāruṇasyāpi vastunaḥ ।।adāruṇena śabdena prāśastyamupavarṇanaṃ ।uccaiḥ pariṇatiḥ kāpi pāka ity abhidhīyate ।।mṛdvīkānārikelāmbupākabhedāccaturvidhaḥ ।ādāvante ca saurasyaṃ mṛdvīkāpāka eva saḥ ।।kāvyecchayā viśeṣo yaḥ sarāga iti gīyate ।abhyāsopahitaḥ kāntiṃ sahajāmapi vartate ।।hāridraś caiva kausumbho nīlī rāgaś ca sa tridhā ।vaiśeṣikaḥ parijñeyo yaḥ svalakṣaṇagocaraḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe kāvyaguṇaviveko nāma pañcacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭcatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kāvyadoṣavivekaḥ

agnir uvāca
udvegajanako doṣaḥ sabhyānāṃ sa ca saptadhā ।vaktṛvācakavācyānāmekadvitriniyogataḥ ।।tatra vaktā kavirnāma prathate sa ca bhedataḥ ।sandihāno avinītaḥ sannajño jñātā caturvidhaḥ ।।nimittaparibhāṣābhyāmarthasaṃsparśivācakam ।tadbhedo padavākye dve kathitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dvayoḥ ।।asādhutvāprayuktve dvāveva padanigrahau ।śabdaśāstraviruddhatvamasādhutvaṃ vidurbudhāḥ ।।vyutpannair anibadvatvamaprayuktatvamucyate ।chāndasatvamavispaṣṭatvañca kaṣṭatvameva ca ।।tadasāmayikatvañca grāmyatvañceti pañcadhā ।chāndasatvaṃ na bhāṣāyāmavispaṣṭamabodhataḥ ।।gūḍārthatā viparyastārthatā saṃśayitārthatā ।aviṣpaṣṭārthatā bhedāstatra gūḍhārthateti sā ।।yatrārtho duḥkhasavedyo viparyastārthatā punaḥ ।vivakṣitānyaśabdārthapratipātirmalīmasā ।।anyārthatvāsamarthatve etāmevopasarpataḥ ।

manīṣayeti ja
sandihyamānavācyatvamāhuḥ saṃśayitārthatāṃ ।।doṣatvamanubadhnāti sajjanodvejanādṛte ।asukhoccāryamāṇatvaṃ kaṣṭatvaṃ samayācyutiḥ ।।asāmayikatā neyāmetāñca munayo jaguḥ ।grāmyatā tu jaghanyārthapratipātiḥ khalīkṛtā ।।vaktavyagrāmyavācyasya vacanātsmaraṇādapi ।tadvācakapadenābhisāmyādbhavati sā tridhā ।।doṣaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ prātisviko arthasya sa tu dvidhā ।anekabhāgupālambhaḥ sādhāraṇa iti smṛtaḥ ।।kriyākārakayorbhraṃśo visandhiḥ punaruktā ।vyastasambandhatā ceti pañca sādhāraṇā matāḥ ।।akriyatvaṃ kriyābhraṃśo bhraṣṭakārakatā punaḥ ।kartryādikārakābhāvo visandhiḥsandhidūṣaṇam ।।vigato vā viruddho vā sandhiḥ sa bhavati dvidhā ।sandherviruddhatā kaṣṭapādādarthāntarāgamāt ।।punaruktatvamābhīkṣṇyādabhidhānaṃ dvidhaiva tat ।arthāvṛttiḥ padāvṛttirarthāvṛttirapi dvidhā ।।prayuktavaraśabdena tathā śabdāntareṇa ca ।nāvartate padāvṛttau vācyamāvartate padam ।।vyastasambandhatā suṣṭhusambandho vyavadhānataḥ ।sambandhāntaranirbhāṣāt sambandhāntarajanmanaḥ ।।

malā iti ka, ja ca

kaṣṭapādādarthāntarakramāditi ṭa

prayuktacaraśabdeneti ja, ña ca
abhāvepi tayorantarvyavadhānāstridhaiva sā ।antarā padavākyābhyāṃ pratibhedaṃ punardvidhā ।।vācyamarthārthyamānatvāttaddvidhā padavākyayoḥ ।vyutpāditapūrvavācyaṃ vyutpādyañceti bhidyate ।।iṣṭavyāghātakāritvaṃ hetoḥ syādasamarthatā ।asiddhatvaṃ viruddhatvamanaikāntikatā tathā ।।evaṃ satpratipakṣatvaṃ kālātītatvasaṅkaraḥ ।pakṣe sapakṣenāstitatvaṃ vipakṣe astitvameva tat ।।kāvyeṣu pariṣadyānāṃ na bhavedapyaruntudam ।ekādaśanirarthatvaṃ duṣkarādau na duṣyati ।।duḥkhīkaroti doṣajñāngūḍhārthatvaṃ na duṣkare ।na grāmyatodvegakārī prasiddher lokaśāstrayoḥ ।।kriyābhraṃśena lakṣmāsti kriyādhyāhārayogataḥ ।bhraṣṭakārakatākṣepabalādhyāhṛtakārake ।।pragṛhye gṛhyate naiva kṣataṃ vigatasandhinā ।kaṣṭapāṭhādvisandhitvaṃ durvacādau na durbhagam ।।anuprāse padāvṛttirvyastasambandhatā śubhā ।nārthasaṃgrahaṇe doṣo vyutkramādyair na lipyate ।।vibhaktisaṃjñāliṅgānāṃ yatrodvego na dhīmatāṃ ।saṃkhyāyāstatra bhinnatvamupamānopameyayoḥ ।।anekasya tathaikena bahūnāṃ bahubhiḥ śubhā ।kavīmāṃ samudācāraḥ samayo nāma gīyate ।।

ekādaśanirastatvamiti ña
