samānyaś ca viśiṣṭaś ca dharmavadbhavati dvidhā ।siddhasaiddhāntikānāñca kavīnāñcāvivādataḥ ।।yaḥ prasidhyati sāmānya ity asau samayo mataḥ ।sarvesiddhāntikā yena sañcaranti niratyayaṃ ।।kiyanta eva vā yena sāmānyastena sadvidhā ।chedasiddhantato anyaḥ syāt keṣāñcidbhrāntito yathā ।।tarkajñānaṃ muneḥ kasya kasyacit kṣaṇabhaṅgikā ।bhūtacaitanyatā kasya jñānasya suprakāśatā ।।prajñātasthūlatāśabdānekāntatvaṃ tathārhataḥ ।śaivavaiṣṇavaśākteyasaurasiddhāntināṃ matiḥ ।।jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ brahma sāṅkhyānāṃ sapradhānakaṃ ।asmin sarasvatīloke sañcarantaḥ parasparam ।।badhnanti vyatipaśyanto yadviśiṣṭaiḥ sa ucyate ।parigrahādapyasatāṃ satāmevāparigrahāt ।।bhidyamānasya tasyāyaṃ dvaividhyamupagīyate ।pratyakṣādipramāṇair yad bādhitaṃ tadasadviduḥ ।।kavibhistat pratigrāhyaṃ jñānasya dyotamānatā ।yadevārthakriyākāri tadeva paramārthasat ।।ajñānājjñānatastvekaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat ।viṣṇuḥ svargādihetuḥ sa śabdālaṅkārarūpavān ।aparā ca parā vidyā tāṃ jñātvā mucyate bhavāt ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe alaṅkāre kāvyadoṣaviveko nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha adhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ekākṣarābhidhānaṃ

agnir uvāca
ekākṣarābhidhanañca mātṛkāntaṃ vadāmi te ।a viṣṇuḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syādā pitāmahavākyayoḥ ।।sīmāyāmathāvyayaṃ ā bhavetsaṃkrodhapīḍayoḥ ।iḥ kāme ratilakṣmyorī uḥ śive rakṣakādya ūḥ ।।ṛ śabde cāditau ṛsyāt ḷ ḹ te vai ditau guhe ।e devī ai yoginī syādo brahmā au maheśvaraḥ ।।aṅkāmaḥ aḥ praśastaḥ syāt ko brahmādau ku kutsite ।khaṃ śūnyendriyaṃ khaṅgo gandharve ca vināyake ।।gaṅgīte go gāyane syad gho ghaṇṭā kiṅkiṇīmukhe ।tāḍane ṅaś ca viṣaye spṛhāyāñcaiva bhairave ।।co durjane nirmale chaśchede jirjayane tathā ।jaṃ gīte jhaḥ praśaste syādbale ño gāyane ca ṭaḥ ।।ṭhaś candramaṇḍale śūnye śive codbandhane mataḥ ।ḍaś ca rudre dhvanau trāse ḍhakvāyāṃ ḍho dhvanau mataḥ ।।ṇo niṣkarṣe niś caye ca taś caure kroḍapucchake ।bhakṣaṇe thaśchedane do dhāraṇe śobhane mataḥ ।।

brahmakādya ūriti kha

praśāntaḥsyāditi kha

dhane iti ña
dho dhātari cadhūstūre no vṛnde sugate tathā ।pa upavane vikhyātaḥ phaś ca jhañjhānile mataḥ ।।phuḥ phutkāre niṣphale ca viḥ pakṣī bhañca tārake ।mā śrīrmānañca mātā syādyāga yo yātṛvīraṇe ।।ro bahnau ca laḥ śakre ca lo vidhātari īritaḥ ।viśleṣaṇe vo varuṇe śayane śaś ca śaṃ sukhe ।।ṣaḥ śreṣṭhe saḥ parokṣe ca sālakṣmīḥ saṃ kacemataḥ ।dhāraṇe has tathā rudre kṣaḥ kṣattre cākṣare mataḥ ।।kṣo nṛsiṃhe harau tadvat kṣetrapālakayorapi ।mantra ekākṣaro devo bhuktimuktipradāyakaḥ ।।haihayaśirase namaḥ sarvavidyāprado manuḥ ।akārādyās tathā mantrā mātṛkāmantra uttamaḥ ।।ekapadme arcayedetānnava durgāś ca pūjayet ।bhagavatī kātyāyanī kauśikī cātha caṇḍikā ।।pracaṇḍā suranāyikā ugrā pārvatī durgayā ।
oṃ caṇḍikāyai vidmahe bhagavatyai dhīmahi tanno durgā pracodayāt
kramādi tu ṣaḍaṅgaṃ syādgaṇo gururguruḥ kramāt ।।ajitāparājitā cātha jayā ca vijayā tataḥ ।kātyāyanī bhadrakālī maṅgalā siddhirevatī ।।siddhādivaṭukāḥ pūjyā hetukaś ca kapālikaḥ ।ekapādo bhīmarūpo dikpālānmadhyato nava ।।hrīṃ durge durge rakṣaṇi svāhāmantrārthasiddhaye ।gaurī pūjyā ca dharmādyāḥ skandādyāḥ śaktayo yajet ।।

prajñā jñānā kriyā vācā vāgīśī jvālinī tathā ।kāminī kāmamālā ca indrādyāḥ śaktipūjanaṃ ।।oṃgaṃ svāhā mūlamantro ayaṃ gaṃ vā gaṇapataye namaḥ ।ṣaḍaṅgo raktaśuklaś ca dantākṣaparaśūtakaṭaḥ ।।samodako atha gandhādigandholkāyeti ca kramāt ।gajo mahāgaṇapatirmaholkaḥ pūjya eva ca ।।
kuṣmāṇḍāya ekadantatripurāntakāya śyāmadantavikaṭaharahāsāya

lambanāśānanāya padmadaṃṣṭrāya megholkāya dhūmolkāya

vakratuṇdāya vighneśvarāya vikaṭotkaṭāya gajendragamanāya

bhujagendrahārāya śaśāṅkadharāya gaṇādhipataye svāhā
etair manubhiḥ svāhāntaiḥ pūjya tilahomādinārthabhāk ।kādyair vā vījasaṃyuktaistair ādyaiś ca namo antakaiḥ ।।mantrāḥ pṛthak pṛthagvā syurdvirephadvirmukhākṣiṇaḥ ।kātyāyanaṃ akanda āha yattadvyākaraṇaṃ vade ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ekākṣarābhidhānaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ś athāṣṭacatvāriṃśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

vyākaraṇaṃ

skanda uvāca
vakṣye vyākaraṇaṃ sāraṃ siddhaśabdasvarūpakam ।kātyāyanavibodhāya bālānāṃ bodhanāya ca ।।pratyāhārādikāḥ saṃjñāḥ śāstrasaṃvyavahāragāḥ ।
a i u ṇa ṛ ḷ ka e ṅa ai au ca ha ya va ra ṭa ṇa na ña ma ṅa ṇa nama jha bha ña gha dha ṣa ja va ga ḍa da śa kha pha cha ṭha tha ca ṭa ta ka pa ya śa ṣa sa ra ha la iti pratyāhāraḥ
upadeśa iddhalantaṃ bhavedajanunāsikaḥ ।।ādivarṇo gṛhyamāṇo apyantyenetā sahaiva tu ।tayormadhyagatānāṃ syādgrāhakaḥ svasya tadyathā ।।

ś athonapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sandhisiddharūpaṃ

skanda uvāca
vakṣye sandhisiddharūpaṃ svarasandhimathāditaḥ ।daṇḍāgramaṃ sāgatā dadhīdaṃ nadīhate madhūdakaṃ ।।pitṛṣabhaḥ ḹkāraś ca tavedaṃ sakalodakaṃ ।ardharco ayaṃ tavalkāraḥ saiṣā saindrī tavaudanam ।।khaṭṭaugho abhavadityevaṃ vyasudhīrvasvalaṅkṛtaṃ ।pitrarthopavanaṃ dātrī nāyako lāvako nayaḥ ।।ta iha tayihetyādi te atra yo atra jale akajaṃ ।prakṛtirno aho ehi a avehi i indrakaṃ ।।u uttiṣṭha kavī etau vāyu etau vane ime ।amī ete yajñabhūte ehi deva imannaya ।।vakṣye sandhiṃ vyañjanāṇāṃ vāgyato ajekamātṛkaḥ ।ṣaḍete tadime vādivāṅnītiḥ ṣaṇmukhādikam ।।vāṅmanasaṃ vagbhāvādirvāk ślakṣṇaṃ taccharīrakaṃ ।tallu nāti taccarecca kruṅṅāste ca sugaṇiha ।।bhavāṃś caran bhavāṃśchātro bhavāṃṣṭīkābhavāṃṣṭhakaḥ ।bhavāṃstīrthaṃ bhavāṃstheyāt bhavāṃllekhā bhavāñjayaḥ ।।bhavāñchete bhavāñcaśete bhavāñśete bhavāṇḍīnaḥ ।svambhartā tvaṅkaroṣyādiḥ sandhirjñeyo visargajaḥ ।।

kaśchindyāt kaś caret kaṣṭaḥ kaṣṭhaḥ kasthaś ca kaś calet ।ka khanet ka karoti sma ka ,, paṭhet ka ,, vā ।।kaśśvaśuraḥ kaḥśvaśuraḥ kassāvaraḥ kaḥsāvaraḥ ।kaḥ phaleta kaḥ śayitā ko atra yodhaḥ ka uttamaḥ ।।devā ete bho iha sodarā yānti bhago vraja ।supūḥ sudūrātriratra vāyuryāti punarna hi ।।punareti sa yātīha eṣa yāti ka īśvaraḥ ।jyotīrūpaṃ tavacchatraṃ mlecchadhīśchidramacchidat ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyākaraṇe sandhisiddharūpaṃ nāmonapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ś atha pañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

subvibhaktasiddharūpaṃ

skanda uvāca
vibhaktisiddharūpañca kātyāyana vadāmi te ।dve vibhaktī suptiṅaś caya supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ ।।su aujasiti prathamā amauṭśaso dvitīyā ।ṭābhyāṃ bhisiti tṛtīyā ṅebhyāṃbhyasaś caturthyapi ।।ṅasibhyāṃbhyasaḥ pañcamī syātṅasomiti ṣaṣṭhyapi ।ṅi ossuviti saptamī syāt syuḥ prātipadikātparāḥ ।।dvividhaṃ prātipadikaṃ hy ajantañca halantakaṃ ।

pratyekaṃ trividhaṃ tat syāt pumāṃstrī ca napuṃsakaṃ ।।darśyante nāyakāsteṣāmanuktānāñca vīryataḥ ।vṛkṣaḥ sarvo atha pūrvaś ca prathamaś ca dvitīyakaḥ ।।tṛtīyaḥ khaṇḍapā vahniḥ sakhāpatiraharpatiḥ ।paṭurnīrgrāmanīndraś ca khalapūrmitrabhūḥ svabhūḥ ।।auśrīḥ sudhīḥ pitā bhrātā nā karta kroṣṭunaptṛnaptṛkau ।surā rā gaus tathā dyaurglauḥ svarāntāḥ puṃsi nāyakāḥ ।।suvāk tvak pṛṣat samrāṭ janmabhāk ca aveḍapi ।āpo marudbhavan dīvyan bhavāṃś ca maghavān pivan ।।bhagavānadhavānarvānvahnimat sarvitsupṛt ।susīmā kuṇḍī rājā ca śvā yuvā maghavā tathā ।।pūṣā sukarmā yajvā ca suvarmā ca sudharmaṇā ।aryamā vṛtrahā panthāḥ sukakudādipañca ca ।।praśān sutāṃś ca pañcādyāḥ sugīḥ surāḥ supūrapi ।candramāḥ suvacāḥ śreyān vidvāṃśceśanasā saha ।।pecivān gauravānaḍvān godhūṅmitradruhau śvaliṭ ।striyāṃ jāyā jarā bālā eḍkā saha vṛddhayā ।।kṣatriyā bahurājā ca bahudā mātha bālikā ।māyā kaumudagandhā ca sarvā pūrvā sahānyayā ।।dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca buddhiḥ strī śrīr nadī sudhaiḥ ।bhavantī caiva dīvyantī bhātī bhāntī ca yānyapi ।।śṛṇvatau tudatī kartrī tudantī kurvatī mahī ।rundhatī krīḍtī dantī pālayantī surāṇyapi ।।

garurī putravatī nīś ca vadhūrdevatayā bhuvā ।tisro dve kati varṣābhūḥ svasā mātā varā gauḥ ।।naurvāktvakprācyavākṣīti tiraścī samudīcyapi ।śaradvidyut saridyoṣit agnivit saspadā dṛśat ।।yaiṣā sā vedavitsaṃvit bahvī rājñī tvayā mayā ।somā pañcādayo rājī dhūḥ pūś caiva diśā girā ।।catasro viduṣī caiva keyaṃ dik dṛkca tādṛśī ।asau striyāṃ nāyakāś ca nāyakāś ca napuṃsake ।।kuṇḍaṃ sarvaṃ somapañca dadhi vāri khalapvatha ।madhu trapu kartṛ bhaktṛ ativaktṛ payaḥ puraḥ ।।prākpratyak ca tiryagudak jagad jāgrattathā sakṛt ।susampacca sudaṇḍīha ahaḥ kiñcedamityapi ।।ṣaṭsarpiḥ śreyaś catvāri ado anye hīdṛśāḥ pare ।etebhyaḥ prathamādayaś ca syuḥ prātipadikātparāḥ ।।dhātupratyayahīnaṃ yatsyāt prātipadikantu tat ।prātipadikāt svaliṅgārthavacane prathamā bhavet ।।sambodhane ca prathamā ukte karmaṇi kartari ।karma yat kriyate tatsyāt dvitīyā karmaṇi smṛtā ।।kriyate yena karaṇaṃ kartā yaś ca karoti saḥ ।anukte tiṅkṛttaddhitaistṛtīyā karaṇe bhavet ।।kārake kartari ca sā sampradāne caturthyapi ।yasmai ditsā dhārayate sampradānaṃ tadoritaṃ ।।

diveti ja
apādānaṃ yato apaiti ādatte ca bhayaṃ yataḥ ।apādāne pañcamī syāt svasvāmyādau ca ṣaṣṭhyapi ।।ādhāro yo adhikaraṇaṃ vibhaktistatra saptamī ।ekārthe caikavanacaṃ dvyarthe dvivacanaṃ bhavet ।।bahuṣu bahuvacanaṃ siddharūpāṇyatho vade ।vṛkṣaḥ sūryo ambuvāho arka herave hedvijātayaḥ ।।viprau gajānmahendreṇa yamābhyāmanalaiḥ kṛtaṃ ।rāmāya munivaryābhyāṃ kebhyo dharmāt harau ratiḥ ।।śarābhyāṃ pustakebhyaś ca arthasyeśvarayorgatiḥ ।bālānāṃ sajjane prītirhaṃsayoḥ kamaleṣu ca ।।evaṃ kāmamaheśādyāḥ śabdā jñeyāñca vṛkṣavat ।sarve viśve ca sarvasmai sarvasmātkataro mataḥ ।।sarveṣāṃ svañca viśvasmin śeṣaṃ rūpañca vṛkṣavat ।evañcobhayakatarakatamānyatarādayaḥ ।।pūrve pūrvāś ca pūrvasmai pūrvasmāt susamāgataḥ ।pūrve buddhiś ca pūrvasmin śeṣarūpantu sarvavat ।।evaṃ parāvarādyāś ca dakṣiṇottarakāntarāḥ ।aparaścādharo nemāḥ prathamāḥ prathame arkavat ।।evaṃ caramāyatayā alpārdhā nema ādayaḥ ।dvitīyasmai dvitīyāya dvitīyasmāt dvitīyakāt ।।dvitīyasmin dvitīye ca tṛtīyaś ca tathārkavat ।somapāḥ somapau jñeyau somapāḥ somapāṃ vraja ।।kīlālapau somapaś ca somapā somape dada ।

somapābhyāṃ somapābhyaḥ somapaḥ somapoḥ kulaṃ ।।evaṃ kīlālapādyāḥ syuḥ kaviragnis tathārayaḥ ।hekave kavimagnī tān harīn sātyakinā hṛtaṃ ।।ravibhyāṃ ravibhirdehi vahṇaye yaḥ samāgataḥ ।agneragnyos tathāgnīnāṃ kavau kavyoḥ kaviṣv atha ।।evaṃ susṛtirabhrāntiḥ sukīrtiḥ sudhṛtis tathā ।sakhā sakhāyau sakhāyaḥ hesakhe vraja satpatiṃ ।।sakhāyañca sakhāyau ca sakhīn sakhyā gato dada ।sakhye sakhyuś ca sakhyuś ca sakhyoḥ śeṣaḥ kaveriva ।।patyā patye ca patyuś ca patyuḥ patyos tathāgnivat ।dvau dvau dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dvitvādyarthe dvayordvayoḥ ।।trayastrīṃś ca tribhistribhyastrayāṇāñca triṣu kramāt ।kavivat katikatītiśeṣaṃ vahuvacanaṃ smṛtam ।।nīrniyau ca niyo henīḥ niyaṃ niyo niyo niyā ।nībhyāṃ nībhirniye nībhyaḥ niyānniyi niyos tathā ।।suśrīḥ sudhīḥ prabhṛtayo grāmaṇīḥ pūjayeddhariṃ ।grāmaṇyau grāmaṇyo grāmaṇyaṃ grāmaṇyā grāmaṇībhiḥ ।।grāmaṇyo grāmaṇyāmevaṃ senānīpramukhāḥ subhūḥ ।subhuvau ca svayambhuvaḥ svayambhuñca svayambhuvaḥ ।।svayambhuvā svayambhuvi evaṃ pratitebhuvādayaḥ ।khalapūḥ khalapvau śreṣṭhau khalapvañca khalapvi ca ।।evaṃ śarapūmukhāḥ syuḥ kroṣṭā kroṣṭāra īritāḥ ।kroṣṭūṃś ca kroṣṭunā kroṣṭrā kroṣṭūnāṃkroṣṭarīddṛśaṃ ।।

pitā pitarau pitaraḥ hepitaḥ pitarau śubhau ।pitṝn pituḥ pituḥ pitroḥ pitṝṇāṃ pitarīdṛśaṃ ।।evaṃ bhrātā ca jāmātṛmukhā nṝṇāṃ nṛṇāṃ tathā ।kartā kartārau kartṝṃś ca kartṝṇāṃ kartarīdṛśaṃ ।।pitṛvaccaivamudgātā svasā naptrādayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।surāḥ surāyau surāyaḥ surāyāñca surāyyapi ।।gauḥ gāvau gāṅgā gavā ca gorgavoś ca gavāṃ gavi ।evaṃ dyaurlauścāpi tathā svarāntāḥ puṃsi nāyakāḥ ।।suvāk suvācau suvācā suvāgbhyāñca suvākṣvapi ।evaṃ dikpramukhāḥ prāṅca prāñcau prāñcañca bho vraja ।।prāgbhyāṃ prāgbhiḥ prācāñca prāci ca prāṅsu prāṅkṣvapi ।evaṃ hy udaṅudīcī vā samyaṅ pratyaksamīcyapi ।।tiryaṅtiraś ca sadhryaṅ ca viśvadryaṅ pūrvavat smṛtāḥ ।adadryaṅadamuyaṅ syāt tathāmumuyaṅīritaḥ ।।adadryañco hy amudrīcaḥ adadryagbhyāñca pūrvavat ।tattvatṛṭ tattvatṛṣau ca tattvatṛṅbhyāṃ samāgataḥ ।।tattvatṛṣi tattvatṛṭsu evaṃ kāṣṭhataḍādayaḥ ।bhiṣak bhiṣagbhyāṃ bhiṣaji janmabhāgādayas tathā ।।marut marudbhyāṃ maruti evaṃ śutrujidādayaḥ ।bhavān bhavantau bhavatāṃ bhavaṃś caiva bhavatyapi ।।mahānmahāntau mahatāmevaṃ bhagavadādayaḥ ।evaṃ maghavānmaghavantau agniciccāgnicityapi ।।agnicitsvevamevānyat vedavittattvavittvapi ।

vedavidāmevamanyat yaḥ samastena sarvavit ।।rājā rājānau rājñaḥ rajñi rājani rājan ।yajvā yajvānastadvat karī daṇḍī ca danḍinā ।।panthāḥ panthānau ca pathaḥ pathibhyāṃ pathi cedṛśam ।manthā ṛbhukṣāḥ pathyādyāḥ pañca pañca ca pañcabhiḥ ।।pratān pratānau pratānbhyāṃ hepratāṃś ca suśarmaṇaḥ ।āpaḥ apaḥ adbhirapyevaṃ praśāṃś caiva praśāmyapi ।।kaḥ kena sarvavat keṣu ayaṃ ceme imānnayaḥ ।anena cābhyāmebhiś ca asmai cebhyaḥ svamasya ca ।।anayoreṣāmeṣu syāccatvāraś caturs tathā ।caturṇāñca caturṣv asti sugīḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sugiryapi ।।sudyauḥ sudivau sudyubhyāṃ diḍviṣau viṭsu yādṛśaḥ ।yādṛgbhyāñcaiva viḍbhyāñca ṣaṭ ṣaṭ ṣaṇāñcaṣaṭsvapi ।।suvacāḥ suvacasā ca suvacobhyāmathedṛśam ।he suvaco he uśanan uśanā vośanasyapi ।।puradaṃśā anehā hevidvan vidvāṃsa uttamāḥ ।viduṣe namo vidvadbhyāṃ vidvatsu ca vabhūvivān ।।evañca pecivān śreyān śreyāṃsau śreyasas tathā ।asau amū amī śreṣṭhā amuṃ amūnihāmunā ।।amībhiramusmai vāmusmādamusya vāmuyos tathā ।amīṣāmamusminnityevaṃ godhuk godhugbhirāgataḥ ।।godhukṣvityevamanyepi mitradruho mitraduhā ।mitradhrugbhyāṃ mitradhrugbharevaṃ cittadruhādayaḥ ।।

svaliṭ svaliḍbhyāṃ svalihi anaḍvānanaḍutsu ca ।ajantāś ca halantāś ca puṃsyatho atha striyāṃ vade ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyakaraṇe puṃliṅgaśabdasiddharūpaṃ nāma pañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athaikapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

strīliṅgaśabdasiddharūpam

skanda uvāca
ramā rame ramāḥ śubhā ramāṃ rame rasās tathā ।ramayā ca ramābhyāñca ramābhiḥ kṛtamavyayaṃ ।।ramāyai ca ramābhyāś ca ramāyā ramayoḥ śubhaṃ ।ramāṇāñca ramāyāñca ramāsvevaṃ kalādyaḥ ।।jarā jarasau jara iti jarasaś ca jarā jarāṃ ।jarasañca jarāsvevaṃ sarvā sarve ca sarvayā ।।sarvasyai dehi sarvasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ sarvasyos tathā ।śeṣaṃ ramāvadrūpaṃ syād dve dve tisraś ca tisṛṇāṃ ।।buddhīrbuddhyā buddhaye ca buddhyai buddheś ca hemate ।kavivatsyānmunīnāñca nadī nadyau nadīṃ nadīḥ ।।nadyā nadībhirnadyai ca nadyāñcaiva nadīṣu ca ।kumārī jṛmbhaṇītyevaṃ śrīḥ śriyau ca śriyaḥ śriyā ।।

śriyai śriye strīṃ striyañca strīś ca striyaḥ striyā striyai ।striyāḥ strīṇāṃ striyāñca grāmaṇyāṃ dhenvai ca dhenave ।।jambūrjambvau ca jambūś ca jambūnāñca phalampiva ।varṣābhvau ca punarbhvau ca mātṝrvāpi ca gauś ca nauḥ ।।vāgvācā vāgbhiś ca vākṣu śragbhyāṃ sraji strajos tathā ।vidvadbhyāñcaiva vidvatsu bhavatī syād bhavantyapi ।।dīvyantī bhātī bhāntī ca tudantī ca tudatyapi ।rudatī rundhatī devī gṛhnatī coryantyapi ।।dṛṣat dṛṣadbhyāṃ dṛṣadi viśesaviduṣī kṛtiḥ ।samit samidbhyāṃ samidhi sīmā sīmni ca sīmani ।।dāmanībhyāṃ kakudbhyāñca keyamābhyāṃ tathāsu ca ।gīrbhyāñcaiva girā gīrṣu subhūḥ supūḥ purā puri ।।dyaurdyubhyāṃ divi dyuṣu tādṛśyā tādṛśo diśaḥ ।yādṛśyāṃ yādṛśī tadvat suvacobhyāṃ suvacaḥsvapi ।asau cāmūmamū cāmūramūbhiramuyāmuyoḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyākaraṇe strīliṅgaśabdasiddharūpaṃ nāmaikapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvipañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

napuṃsakaśabdasiddharūpaṃ

skanda uvāca
napuṃsake kiṃ ke kāni kiṃ ke kāni tato jalaṃ ।sarvaṃ sarve ca pūrvādyāḥ somapaṃ somapāni ca ।।grāmaṇi grāmaṇinī ca grāmaṇi grāmaṇīnyapi ।vāri vāriṇī vārīṇi vāriṇāṃ vāriṇīdṛśaṃ ।।śucaye śucine dehi mṛdune mṛdave tathā ।trapu trapuṇi trapuṇāñca khalapūni khalapvi ca ।।kartrā ca kartṛṇe kartre atiryatiriṇāntathā ।abhinyabhininī caive suvacāṃsi suvacāṃsi suvākṣu ca ।।yadyattvime tat karmāṇi idañceme tvimāni ca ।īdṛktvado amunī amūni amunā syādamīṣu ca ।।ahamāvāṃ vayaṃ māṃ vai ābāmasmānmayā kṛtaṃ ।āvābhyāñca tathāsmābhirmahyamasmabhyameva ca ।।madāvābhyāṃ madasmacca putro ayaṃ mama cāvayoḥ ।asmākamapi cāsmāsu tvaṃ yuvāṃ yūyamījire ।।tvāṃ yuvāñca yuṣmāṃś ca tvayā yuṣmābhirīritaṃ ।tubhyaṃ yuvābhyāṃ yummabhyaṃ tvat yuvābhyāñca yuṣmat ।।tava yuvayoryuṣmākaṃ tvayi yuṣmāsu bhāratī ।upalakṣaṇamatraiva ajjhalantāś ca te smṛtāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyākaraṇe napuṃsakaśabdasiddharūpaṃ nāma dvipañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha tripañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kārakaṃ

sukanda uvāca
kārakaṃ sampravakṣyāmi vibhaktyarthasamanvitaṃ ।grāmo asti hemahārkeha naumi viṣṇuṃ śriyā saha ।।svatantraḥ kartā vidyāntaṃ kṛtinaḥ samupāsate ।hetukartālambhayate hitaṃ vai karmakartari ।।svayaṃ bhidyet prākṛtadhīḥ svayañca chidyate taruḥ ।kartābhihita uttamaḥ kartānabhihito adhamaḥ ।।kartānabhihito dharmaḥ śiṣye vyākhyāyate yathā ।kartā pañcavidhaḥ proktaḥ karma saptavidhaṃ śṛṇu ।।īpsitaṃ karma ca yathā śraddadhāti hariṃ yatiḥ ।anīpsitaṃ karma yathā ahiṃ laṅghayate bhṛśaṃ ।।naivepsitaṃ nānīpsitaṃ dugdhaṃ sambhakṣyanrajaḥ ।bhakṣyedpyakathitaṃ gopālo dogdhi gāṃ payaḥ ।।kartṛkarmātha gamayecchiṣyaṃ grāmaṃ gururyathā ।karma cābhihitaṃ pūjā kriyate vai śriye hareḥ ।।karmānabhihitaṃ stotraṃ hareḥ kuryāt sarvadaṃ ।karaṇaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ vāhyamabhyantaraṃ tathā ।।cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ gṛhṇīti vāhyaṃ dātreṇa tallunet ।sampradānaṃ tridhā proktaṃ prerakaṃ brāhmaṇāya gāṃ ।।

naro dadāpi nṛpataye dāsantadanumantṛkaṃ ।anirākartṛkaṃ bhartre dadyāt puṣpāṇi sajjanaḥ ।।apadānaṃ dvidhā proktaṃ calamaśvāttu dhāvataḥ ।patitaścācalaṃ grāmādāgacchati sa vaiṣṇavaḥ ।।caturdhā cādhikaraṇaṃ vyāpakandadhni ghṛtam ।tileṣu tailaṃ devārthamaupaśleṣikamucyate ।।gṛhe tiṣṭhet kapirvṛkṣe smṛtaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ yathā ।jale matsyo vane siṃhaḥ smṛtaṃ sāmīpyakaṃ yathā ।।gaṅgāyāṃ gho ṣo vasati aupacārikamīdṛśaṃ ।tṛtīyā vātha vā ṣaṣṭhī smṛtānabhihite tathā ।।viṣṇuḥ sampūjyate lokair gantavyantena tasya vā ।prathamābhihitakartṛkarmaṇoḥ praṇameddharim ।।hetau tṛtīyā cānnena vasedvṛkṣāya vai jalaṃ ।caturthī tādarthye abhihitā pañcamī paryupāṅmukhaiḥ ।।yoge vṛṣṭaḥ pari grāmāddevo ayaṃ balavat purā ।pūrvo grāmādṛte viṣṇorna muktiritaro hareḥ ।।pṛthagvinādyaistṛtīyā pañcamī ca tathā bhavet ।pṛthaggrāmādvihāreṇa vinā śrīś ca śriyā śriyaḥ ।।karmapravacanīyākhyair dvitīyā yogato bhavet ।anvarjunañca yoddhāro hy abhito grāmamīritaṃ ।।namaḥsvāhāsvadhāsvastivaṣaḍādyaiś caturthyapi ।namo devāya te svasti tumarthādbhāvācinaḥ ।।pākāya paktaye yāti tṛtīyā sahayogake ।

hetvarthe kutsite aṅge sā tṛtīyā ca viśeṣaṇe ।।pitāgātsaha putreṇa kāṇo akṣṇā gadayā hariḥ ।arthena nivasedbhṛtyaḥ kāle bhāve ca saptamau ।।viṣṇau nate bhavenmuktirvasante sa gato harim ।nṛṇāṃ svāmī nṛṣu svāmī nṛṇāmīśaḥsatāmpatiḥ ।।nṛṇāṃ sākṣī nṛṣu sākṣī goṣu nātho gavāmpatiḥ ।goṣu sūto gavāṃ sūto rājñāṃ dāyādako astviha ।।annasya hetorvasati ṣaṣṭhī smṛtyarthakarmaṇi ।mātuḥ smarati goptāraṃ nityaṃ syāt kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ।apāṃ bhettā tava kṛtirna niṣṭhādiṣu ṣaṣṭhyapi ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyākaraṇe kārakaṃ nāma tripañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha catuḥpañcaśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

samāsaḥ

skanda uvāca
ṣoḍhā samāsaṃ vakṣyāmi aṣṭāviṃśatidhā punaḥ ।nityānityavibhāgena luglopena ca dvidhā ।।kumbhakāraś ca nityaḥ syāddhemakārādikas tathā ।rājñaḥ pumān rājapumān nityo ayañca samāsakaḥ ।।

arthasyeti ja
kaṣṭaśrito luksamāsaḥ kaṇṭhekālādikastvaluk ।syādaṣṭadhā tatpuruṣaḥ prathamādyasupā saha ।।prathamātatpuruṣo ayaṃ pūrvaṃ kāyasya vigrahe ।pūrvakāyo aparakāyo hy adharottarakāyakaḥ ।।ardhaṃ kaṇāyā ardhakaṇā bhikṣātūryamathedṛśam ।āpannajīvikastadvat dvitīyā cādharāśritaḥ ।।varṣambhogyo varṣabhogyo dhānyārthaś ca tṛtīyayā ।caturthī syādviṣṇubalirvṛkabhītiś ca pañcamī ।।rājñaḥ pumān rājapumān ṣaṣṭhī vṛkṣaphalaṃ tathā ।saptamī cākṣaśauṇḍo ayamahito nañsamāsakaḥ ।।karmadhārayaḥ saptadhā nīlotpalamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ ।viśeṣaṇapūrvapado viśeṣyottaratas tathā ।।vaiyākaraṇakhamūciḥ śītoṣṇaṃ dvipadaṃ śubham ।upamānapūrvapadaḥ śaṅkhapāṇḍara ity api ।।upamānottarapadaḥ puruśavyāghra ity api ।sambhāvanāpūrvapado guṇavṛddhiritīdṛśam ।।guṇa iti vṛddhirvācyā suhṛdeva suvandhukaḥ ।avadhāraṇapūrvapado bahubrīhiś ca saptadhā ।।dvipadaś ca bahuvrīhirārūḍhbhavano naraḥ ।arcitāśeṣapūrvoyaṃ bahvaṅghriḥ parikīrtitaḥ ।।ete viprāścopadaśāḥ saṅkhyottarapadastvayam ।saṅkhyobhayapado yadvaddvitrā dvyekatrayo naraḥ ।।sahapūrvapado ayaṃ syāt samūloddhṛtakastaruḥ ।

vyatihāralakṣaṇārthaḥ keśākeśi nakhānakhi ।।diglakṣyā syāddakṣiṇapūrvā dvigurābhāṣito dvidhā ।ekavadbhāvi dviśṛṅgaṃ pañcamūlī tvekadhā ।।dvandvaḥ samāso dvividho hītaretarayogakaḥ ।rudraviṣṇū samāhāro bherīpaṭahamīdṛśam ।।dvidhākhyāto avyayībhāvo nāmapūrvapado yathā ।śākasya mātrā śākaprati yathāvyayapūrvakaḥ ।।upakumbhañcoparathyaṃ prādhānyena caturvidhaḥ ।uttarapadārthamukhyo dvandvaścobhayamukhyakaḥ ।pūrvārtheśo avyayībhāvo bahuvrīhiś ca vāhyagaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyākaraṇe samāso nāma catuḥpañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

taddhitaṃ

skanda uvāca
taddhitaṃ trividhaṃ vakṣye sāmānyavṛttirīdṛśī ।le vyaṃsalo vatsalaḥ syādilaci syāttuphenilaṃ ।।lomaśaḥ śe pāmano ne ilaci syāttu picchilaṃ ।aṇi prājña ārcakaḥ syāt dantāduraci danturaḥ ।।re syānmadhuraṃ suśiraṃ re syāt keśara īdṛśaḥ ।

hiraṇyaṃ ye mālavo ve valaci syādrajasvalaḥ ।।inau dhanī karī hastī dhanikaṃ ṭikanīritaṃ ।payasvī vini māyāvī ūrṇāyuryuci īritaṃ ।।vāgmo mini ālaci syādvācālaścāṭacīritaṃ ।phalino varhiṇaḥ kekī vṛndārakas tathā kani ।।āluci śītanna sahate śītāluḥ śvālurīdṛśaḥ ।himālurāluci syācca himaṃ na sahate tathā ।।rūpaṃ vātādulaci syād vātulaścānapatyake ।vāśiṣṭhaḥ kauravo vāsaḥ pāñcālaḥ sosya vāsakaḥ ।।tatra vāso māthuraḥ syādvettyadhīte ca cāndrakaḥ ।vyutkramaṃ vetti kramakaḥ naraś cakrāma kauśakaḥ ।।priyaṅgūnāṃ bhavaṃ kṣetraṃ praiyaṅgavīnakaṃ khañi ।maudgīnaṃ kaudravīṇañca vaidehaścānapatyake ।।iñi dākṣirdāśarathiḥ kaci nārāyaṇādikaṃ ।āśvāyanaḥ syācca phañi yaci gārgyaś ca vātsakaḥ ।।ḍhhaki syādvainateyādiścāṭakerastathairaki ।ḍhraki gaudherako rūpaṃ gaudhāraścārakīritaṃ ।।kṣatriyo ghe kulīnaḥ khe ṇye kairavyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।yati mūrdhanyamukhyādiḥ sugandhiriti rūpakaṃ ।।tārakādibhya itaci nabhastārakitādayaḥ ।anaṅi syācca kuṇḍodhnī puṣpadhanvasudhanvanī ।।cañcupi vittavañcuḥ syādvittamasya ca śabdake ।caṇapi syāt keśacaṇaḥ rūpe syāt paṭarūpakam ।।

īyasau ca paṭīyān syāt tarapyakṣatarādikam ।pacatitarāñca tarapi tamapyaṭatitamāmapi ।।mṛdvītamā kalpapi syādindrakalpo arkakalpakaḥ ।rājadeśīyo deśīye deśye deśyādirūpakam ।।paṭujātīyo jātīye jānumātrañca mātraci ।ūrudvayaso dvayasaci urudaghnañca daghnaci ।।tayaṭi syāt pañcatayaḥ dauvārikaṣṭhakīritaṃ ।sāmānyavṛttiruktātha avyayākhyaś ca taddhitaḥ ।।yasmādyatatasili ca yatra tatra tralīritaṃ ।asmin kāle hy adhunāsyādidānīñcaiva dānyapi ।।sarvasmin sarvadā dāsyāttasminkāle rhilīritaṃ ।tarhi ho amin kāla iha karhi kasmiṃś ca kālake ।।yathā thāli thami kathaṃ pūrvasyāndiśi sañcayet ।astāti caiva pūrvasyāḥ pūrvādigrāmaṇīyakāḥ ।।purastāt sañcared gacchet sadyastulye ahanīritaṃ ।uti pūrvābde ca parut pūrvatare parāryapi ।।aiṣamo asmin saṃbatsare rūpaṃ samasi ceritaṃ ।edyavau paredyavi syāt parasminnahanīritaṃ ।।adyāsminnahani dye syāt pūrvedyuś ca tathaidyusi ।dakṣiṇasyāndiśi vaset dakṣiṇāddakṣiṇādyubhau ।।uttarasyāndiśi vaseduttarāduttarādyubhau ।upari vasedupariṣṭād bhavedriṣṭāti ūrdhvakāt ।।uttareṇ ca pitroktaṃ āci ca syācca dakṣiṇā ।

āhau dakṣiṇāhi vaseddviprakāraṃ dvidhā ca dhā ।।dhyamuñi caikadhyaṃ kuru tvaṃ dvaidhandhamuñi cedṛśaṃ ।dvau prakārau dvidhā dhāci āsusurataraṃ yathā ।।nipātāstaddhitāḥ proktāḥ taddhito bhāvavācakaḥ ।paṭorbhāvaḥ paṭutvantve padutā taliceritaṃ ।।prathimā cemani pṛthoḥ saukhyaṃ sukhāt ṣyañīritam ।steyaṃ yāti ca stenasya ye sakhyuḥ sakhyamīritaṃ ।।kaperbhāvaś ca kāpeyaṃ sainyaṃ pathyaṃ yakīritaṃ ।āśvaṃ kaumārakaṃ cāṇi rūpaṃ cāṇi ca yauvanam ।ācāryakaṃ kaṇi proktamevamanyepi taddhitāḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyakaraṇe taddhitasiddharūpaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

uṇādisiddharūpam

kumāra uvāca
uṇādayo abhidhāsyante pratyayā dhātutaḥ pare ।uṇi kāruś ca śilpī syāt jāyurmāyuś ca pittakaṃ ।।gomāyurvāyurvedeṣu vahulaṃ syuruṇādayaḥ ।

pāṭho ayam paunaruktyadoṣeṇa duṣṭaḥ

khayaṃ suṣṭhutarā yatheti ja । amumuttarā yatheti ṭa

pāṭho ayaṃ, etatpāṭhasthalābhisiktapāṭhāntarañca na samyak pratibhāti
āyuḥ svāduś ca hetvādyāḥ kiṃśārurdhānyaśūkakaḥ ।।kṛkavākuḥ kukkuṭaḥ syād gururbhartā marus tathā ।śayuścājagaro jñeyaḥ sa harāyudhamucyate ।।svarurvaṃjñaṃ trapurusi samasāraṃ phalgurīritaṃ ।gṛdhnaś ca krani kiraci mandiraṃ timiraṃ tamaḥ ।।ilaci salilaṃ vāri kalyāṇaṃ bhaṇḍilaṃ smṛtaṃ ।budho vidvān kvasau syācca śiviraṃ guptasaṃsthitiḥ ।।oturviḍālaś ca tuni abhidhānādugādayaḥ ।karṇaḥ kāmī ca gṛhabhūrvāsturjaivātṛkaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।anaḍvān vahatervini syājjātau jīvārṇavauṣadhaṃ ।nau vahnirinani hariṇaḥ mṛgaḥ kāmī ca bhājanam ।।kambojo bhājanambhāṇḍaṃ saraṇḍaś ca catuṣpadaḥ ।tarureraṇḍaḥ saṅghāto varūḍaḥ sāma nirbharaṃ ।।sphāraṃ prabhūtaṃ syānnāntapratyaye cīravalkalaṃ ।kātaro bhīrurugrastu pracaṇḍo javasaṃ tṛṇaṃ ।।jagaccaiva tu bhūrloko kṛśānurjyotirarkakaḥ ।varvaraḥ kuṭilo dhūrtaś catvarañca catuṣpathaṃ ।।cīvaraṃ bhikṣuprāvṛttirādityo mitra īritaḥ ।putra sūnuḥ pitā tātaḥ pṛdākurvyāghravṛścike ।garto avaṭo atha bharato naṭo aparepyuṇādayaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyākaraṇe uṇādisiddharūpaṃ nāma ṣatpañcāśaṭadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

pāṭho ayaṃ na sādhu saṅgacchate

chapter 

ś atha saptapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

tiṅvibhaktisiddharūpaṃ

kumāra uvāca
tiṅvibhaktiṃ pravakṣyāmi tathādeśaṃ samāsataḥ ।tiṅstriṣvapi vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari ।।sakarmakārmakācca kartari dvipade smṛtāḥ ।sakarmakākarmaṇi ca tadādeśastatheritaḥ ।।vartamāne laḍākhyāto vidhyādyarthe liṅīritaḥ ।vidhyādau loḍāśiṣi ca bhūtānadyatane ca laṅ ।।bhūte luṅliṭ parokṣe atha bhāvinyadyatane ca luṭ ।liṅāśiṣi ca śeṣe arthe laḍbhaviṣyati ḷṅbhavet ।।liṅnimimitte kriyātipattau pare navātmanepadam ।pūrvaṃ nava parasmaipadantiptasantīti prathamaḥ pumāna ।।sipthastha madhyamanaro mipvasmascottamaḥ pumān ।ta ātāṃ antātmane mukhyaḥ thāsāthāṃ dhvañca madhyamaḥ ।।uttama i vahi mahi bhūvādyā dhātavaḥ smṛtāḥ ।bhuviredhiḥ pacirnandirdhvaṃsiḥ śraṃsiḥ padistvadiḥ ।।śīṅaḥ krīḍo juhotiś ca jahātiś ca dadhātyapi ।dīvyatiḥ svapitirnahiḥ sunotirvasireva ca ।।tudirmṛśatirmuñcatiḥ rudhirbhujistyajistaniḥ ।śavādike vikaraṇe maniś caiva karotyapi ।।

krīḍtirvṛṅo grahiścoriḥ pā nīrarciś ca nāyakāḥ ।bhuvi syāt tiṅ bhavati saḥ bhavatastau bhavanti te ।।bhavasi tvaṃ yuvāṃ bhavatho yūyaṃ bhavatha cāpyahaṃ ।bhavāmyāvāṃ bhavāvaś ca bhavāmo hy edhate kulaṃ ।।edhete dve tathaidhante edhase tvaṃ hi medhayā ।edhethe ca samedhadhve edhe hy edhāvahe dhiyā ।।edhāmahe harerbhaktyā pacatītyādi pūrvavat ।bhūyate anubhūyate asau bhāve karmaṇi vai yaki ।।vubhūṣati samītyevaṃ ṇici bhāvayatīśvaraṃ ।yaṅi vobhūyate vādyaṃ vobhotei syācca yaṅluki ।।putrīyati putrakāmyatyevaṃ paṭapaṭāyate ।ghaṭayaty atha sani ṇici bubhūṣayati rūpakaṃ ।।bhavedbhavetāñca liṅi bhaveyuś ca bhaveḥ pare ।bhavetañca bhavetaivaṃ bhaveyañca bhaveva ca bhavema ca ।।edheta edheyātāmedheran manasā śriyā ।edhethāś ca edheyāthāmedhedhvamedheya edhevahi edhemahi ।।astu tāvadbhavatām loṭi bhavantu bhavatādbhava ।bhavataṃ bhavata bhavāni bhavāva ca bhavāma ca ।।edhatāmedhetāmedhantāmedhai pacāvahai pacāmahai ।abhyanandadapacatāmacannapacas tathā ।।abhavatamabhavatāpacamapacāvāpacāma ca ।aidhatairdhetāmaidhadhvaṃ aidhe caidhāmahīritaṃ ।।abhūdabhūtāmabhūvanabhūścābhūvameva luṅ ।

aidhiṣṭaidhisātāṃ narāvaidhiṣṭhā eidhiṣīdṛśaṃ ।।liṭi babhūva babhūvatuḥ babhūvuś ca bavhūvitha ।babhūvathurvabhūva ca babhūviva babhūvima ।।pece pecāte pecire tvamedhāñcakṛṣe tathā ।edhāñcakrāthe pecidhve pece pecimahe tathā ।।luṭi bhavitā bhavitārau bhavitāro harādayaḥ ।bhavitāsi bhavitāstho bhavitāsmas tathā vayaṃ ।।paktā paktārau paktāraḥ paktāse tvaṃ śubhaudanaṃ ।paktādhve paktāhe cāhaṃ paktāsmahe hareś caruṃ ।।liṅāśiṣi sukhaṃ bhūyāt bhūyāstāṃ hariśaṅkarau ।bhūyāsuste ca bhūyāstvaṃ yuvāṃ bhūyāstamīśvarau ।।bhūyāsta yūyaṃ bhūyāsamahaṃ bhūyāsma sarvadā ।yakṣīṣṭa hy edhiṣīyāstāṃ yakṣīrannedhisīya ca ।।yakṣīvahyedhisīmahi liṅi cāyakṣyateti ḷṅ ।ayakṣyetāmayakṣyantāyakṣye ayakṣyethāṃ yuvāṃ ।।ayakṣyadhvamaidhiṣyāvahyaidhiṣyāmahyarervayam ।ḷṭi syādbhaviṣyatīti edhiṣyāmaha īdṛśam ।।evaṃ vibhāvayiṣyanti bobhaviṣyati rūpakaṃ ।ghaṭayet paṭayettadvat putrīyati ca kāmyati ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyākaraṇe tiṅsiddharūpaṃ nāma saptapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athāṣaṭapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kṛtsiddharūpam

kumāra uvāca
kṛtastriṣvapi vijñeyā bhāve karmaṇi kartari ।ajlyuṭ ktin ghaño bhāve yujakārata eva ca ।।aci dharmasya vinaya utkaraḥ prakaras tathā ।devo bhadraḥ śrīkaraś ca lpuṭi rūpantu śobhanam ।।ktini vṛddhistutimatī ghañi bhāvo atha yucyapi ।kāraṇā bhāvanetyādi akāre ca cikitsayā ।।tathā tavyo hy anīyaś ca kartavyaṃ karṇīyakam ।deyaṃ dhyeyañcaiva yati ṇyati kāryañca kṛtyakāḥ ।।kartari ktādayo jñeyā bhāve karmaṇi ca kvacit ।gato grāmaṃ gato grāma āśliṣṭaś ca gurustvayā ।।śatṛṅ śānacau bhavan edhamāno bhavantyapi ।vuṇ tṛcau sarvadhātubhyo bhāvako bhavitā pathā ।।kvibantaś ca svayambhūś ca bhūte liṭaḥ kvansu kāna ca ।babhūvivān pecivāṃś ca pecānaḥ śraddadhānakaḥ ।।aṇi syuḥ kumbhakārādyā bhūtepyuṇādayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।vāyuḥ pāyuś ca kāruḥ syādvahulaṃ chandasīritaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vyākaraṇe kṛtsiddharūpaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśadadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athonaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

svargapātālādivargāḥ

agnir uvāca
svargādināmaliṅgo yo haristaṃ pravadāmi te ।svaḥsvarganākatridivā dyodivau dvetripiṣṭapaṃ ।।devā vṛndārakā lekhā rudrādyā gaṇadevatāḥ ।vidyādharo apsaroyakṣarakṣogandharvakinnarāḥ ।।piśāco guhyakaḥ siddho bhūto amī devayonayaḥ ।devadviṣo asurā daityāḥ sugataḥ syāttathāgataḥ ।।brahmātmabhūḥ surajyeṣṭho viṣṇur nārāyaṇo hariḥ ।revatīśo halī rāmaḥ kāmaḥ pañcaśaraḥ smaraḥ ।।lakṣmīḥ padmālayā padmā sarvaḥ sarveśvaraḥ śivaḥ ।kapardo asya jaṭājūṭaḥ pināko ajagavandhanuḥ ।।pramathāḥ syuḥ pāriṣadā mṛḍānī caṇḍikāmbikā ।dvaimāturo gajāsyaś ca senānīragnibhūrguhaḥ ।।ākhāṇḍalaḥ sunāsīraḥ sūtrāmāṇo divaspatiḥ ।pulomajā śacīndrāṇī devī tasya tu vallabhā ।।syāt prāsādo vaijayanto jayantaḥ pākaśāsaniḥ ।airāvate abhramātaṅgairāvaṇābhramuvallabhāḥ ।।hrīdinī vajramastrī syāt kuliśambhiduraṃ paviḥ ।vyomayānaṃ vimāno astrī pīyūṣamamṛtaṃ sudhā ।।

syāt sudharmā devasabhā svargaṅgā suradīrghikā ।striyāṃ bahuṣvapsrasaḥ svarveśyā urvaśīmukhāḥ ।।hāhā hūhūś ca gandharvā agnirvahnirdhanañcayaḥ ।jātavedāḥ kṛṣṇavartmā āśrayāśaś ca pāvakaḥ ।।hiraṇyaretāḥ saptārciḥ śukraś caivāśuśukṣaṇiḥ ।śucirappittamaurvastu vāḍavo vaḍavānalaḥ ।।vahnerdvayorjvālakīlāvarcirhetiḥ śikhā striyāṃ ।triṣu sphuliṅgo agnikaṇo dharmarājaḥ paretarāṭ ।।kālo antako daṇḍadharaḥ śrāddhedevo atha rākṣasaḥ ।kauṇapāsrapakravyādā yātudhānaś ca nairṛtiḥ ।।precetā varuṇaḥ pāśī śvasanaḥ sparśano anilaḥ ।sadāgatirmātariśvā prāṇo marut samīraṇaḥ ।।javo raṃhastarasī tu laghukṣipramarandrutam ।satvaraṃ capalaṃ tūrṇamavilambitamāśu ca ।।satate anāratāśrāntasantatāviratāniśaṃ ।nityānavaratājasramapyathātiśayo bharaḥ ।।ativelabhṛśātyarthātimātrodgāṭanirbharam ।tīvraikāntanitāntāni gāḍhavāḍhadṛḍhāni ca ।।guhyakeśo yakṣarājo rājarājo dhanādhipaḥ ।syāt kinnaraḥ kiṃpuruṣasturaṅgavadano mayuḥ ।।nidhir nā sevadhirvyoma tvabhraṃ puṣkaramambaram ।dyodivau cāntarīkṣaṃ khaṃ kāṣṭhāśākakubho diśaḥ ।।abhyantarantvantarālañcakravāḍantu manḍalaṃ ।

taḍitvān vārido meghastanayitnurvalāhakaḥ ।।kādambanī meghamālā stanitaṃ garjitaṃ tathā ।śampāśatahradāhrādinyairāvatyaḥ kṣaṇaprabhāḥ ।।taḍitsaudāminī vidyuccañcalā capalāpi ca ।sphurjathurvajraniṣpeṣo vṛṣṭighātastvavagrahaḥ ।।dhārā sampāta āśāraḥ śīkaro ambukaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ।varṣopalastu karakā meghachanne ahni durdinaṃ ।।antardhā vyavadhā puṃsi tvantardhirapavāraṇaṃ ।apidhānatirodhānapidhānacchadanāni ca ।।abjo jaivātṛkaḥ somo glaurmṛgāṅkaḥ kalānidhiḥ ।vidhuḥ kumudavandhuś ca vimbo astrī maṇḍalaṃ triṣu ।।kalā tu ṣoḍśo bhāgo bhittaṃ śakalakhaṇḍake ।candrikā kaumudī jyotsnā prasādastu prasannatā ।।lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣmakaṃ cihnaṃ śobhā kāntirdyutiśchaviḥ ।suṣamā parmā śobhā tuṣārastuhinaṃ himaṃ ।।avasyāyastu nīhāraḥ prāleyaḥ śiśiro himaḥ ।nakṣatramṛkṣaṃ bhantārā tārakā pyuḍu vā striyāṃ ।।gururjīva āṅgirasa uśanā bhārgavaḥ kaviḥ ।vidhuntudastamo rāhur lagnaṃ rāśyudayaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।saptarṣayo marīcyatrimukhāścitraśikhaṇḍinaḥ ।haridaśvavraghmapūṣadyumaṇirmihiro raviḥ ।।pariveṣastu paridhirupasūryakabhaṇḍale ।kiraṇo asramayūkhāṃśugabhastighṛṇidhṛṣṇayaḥ ।।

bhānuḥ karo marīciḥ strīpuṃsayordīdhitiḥ striyāṃ ।syuḥ prabhā rugrucistviḍbhābhāśchavidyutidīptayaḥ ।।rociḥ śocirubhe klīve prakāśo dyota ātapaḥ ।koṣṇaṃ kavoṣṇaṃ mandoṣṇaṃ kaduṣṇaṃ triṣu tadvati ।।tirmaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ kharaṃ tadvaddiṣṭo anehā ca kālakaḥ ।ghasro dināhanī caiva sāyaṃsandhyā pitṛprasūḥ ।।pratyūṣo aharmukhaṃ kalyamuṣaḥpratyūṣasī api ।prāhṇāparāhṇamadhyāhṇāstrisandhyamatha śarvarī ।।yāmī tamī tamisrā ca jyotsnī candrakayānvitā ।āgāmivartamānāharyuktāyāṃ niśi pakṣiṇī ।।ardharātraniśīthau pradoṣo rajanīmukhaṃ ।sa parvasandhiḥ pratipatpañcadaśyorya dantaram ।।pakṣāntau pañcadaśyau dve paurṇamāsī tu pūrṇimā ।kalāhīne sānumatiḥ pūrṇe rākā niśākare ।।amāvāsyā tvamāvasyā darśaḥ sūryendusaṅgamaḥ ।sā dṛṣṭenduḥ sinīvālī sā naṣṭendukalā kuhūḥ ।।saṃvartaḥ pralayaḥ kalpaḥ kṣayaḥ kalpānta ity api ।kaluṣaṃ vṛjinaino aghamaṃhoduritaduṣkṛtam ।।syāddharmamastriyāṃ puṇyaśreyasī sukṛtaṃ vṛṣaḥ ।mutprītiḥ pramado harṣaḥ pramodāmodasammadāḥ ।।syādānandathurānandaḥ śarmaśātasukhāni ca ।śvaḥ śreyasaṃ śivaṃ bhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ maṅgalaṃ śubham ।।bhāvukaṃ bhavikaṃ bhavyaṃ kuśalaṃ kṣemamastriyāṃ ।

daivaṃ diṣṭaṃ māgadheyaṃ bhāgyaṃ strī niyatirvidhiḥ ।।kṣetrajña ātmā puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ prakṛtiḥ striyāṃ ।heturnā kāraṇaṃ vījaṃ nidānaṃ tvādikāraṇam ।।cittantu ceto hṛdayaṃ svāntaṃ hṛnmānasammanaḥ ।buddhirmanīṣā dhiṣaṇā dhīḥ prajñā śemuṣī matiḥ ।।prekṣopalibdhiścitsambitpratipajjñapticetanāḥ ।dhīrdhāraṇāvatī medhā saṅkalpaḥ karma mānasaṃ ।।saṅkhyā vicāraṇā carcā vicikitsā tu saṃśayaḥ ।adhyāhārastarka ūhaḥ samau nirṇayaniś cayau ।।mithyādṛṣṭirnāstikatā bhrāntirmithyāmatirbhramaḥ ।aṅgīkārābhyupagamapratiśravasamādhayaḥ ।।mokṣe dhīrjñānamanyatra vijñānaṃ śilpaśāstrayoḥ ।muktiḥ kaivalyanirvāṇaśreyoniḥśreyasāmṛtaṃ ।।mokṣo apavargo athājñānamavidyāhammatiḥ striyāṃ ।vimardotthe parimalo gandhe janamanohare ।।āmodaḥ so atinirhārī surabhirghrāṇatarpaṇaḥ ।śuklaśubhraśuciśvetaviśadaśvetapāṇḍarāḥ ।।avadātaḥ sito gauro valakṣo dhavalo arjunaḥ ।hariṇaḥ pāṇḍuraḥ pāṇḍurīṣatpāṇḍustu dhūsaraḥ ।।kṛṣṇe nīlāsitaśyāmakālaśyāmalamecakāḥ ।pīto gauro haridrābhaḥ pālāśo harito harit ।।rohito lohito raktaḥ śoṇaḥ kokanadacchaviḥ ।avyaktarāgastvaruṇaḥ śvetaraktastu pāṭalaḥ ।।

śyāvaḥ syātkapiśo dhūmradhūmalau kṛṣṇalohite ।kaḍāraḥ kapilaḥ piṅgapiśaṅgaukadrupiṅgalau ।।citraṃ kirmīrakalmāṣaśavalaitātha karvure ।vyāhara uktirlapitamapabhraṃśo apaśabdakaḥ ।।tiṅsuvantacayo kāvyaṃ kriyā vā kārakānvitā ।itihāsaḥ purāvṛttaṃ purāṇaṃ pañcalakṣaṇaṃ ।।ākhyāyikopalabdhārthā prabandhaḥ kalpanā kathā ।samāhāraḥ saṃgrahastu pravahlikā prahelikā ।।samasyā tu samāsārthā smṛtistu dharmasaṃhitā ।ākhyāhve cābhidhānañca vārtā vṛttānta īritaḥ ।।hūtirākāraṇāhvānamupanyāsastu vāṅmukhaṃ ।vivādo vyavahāraḥ syāt prativākyottare same ।।upoddhāta udāhāro hy artha mithyābhisaṃśanam ।abhiśāpo yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ praśnaḥ pṛcchānuyogakaḥ ।।āmreḍitaṃ dvistriruktaṃ kutsāninde ca garhaṇe ।syādābhāṣaṇamālāpaḥ pralāpo anarthakaṃ vacaḥ ।।anulāpo muhurbhāṣā volāpaḥ paridevanaṃ ।vipralāpo virodhoktiḥ saṃlāpo bhāṣaṇaṃ mithaḥ ।।supralāpaḥ suvacanamapalāpastu nihnavaḥ ।uṣatī vāgakalyāṇī saṅgataṃ hṛdayaṅgamaṃ ।।atyarthamadhuraṃ sāntvamabaddhaṃ syādanarthakaṃ āab।niṣṭhurāślīlaparuṣaṃ grāmyaṃ vai sunṛtaṃ priye ।ācd।satyaṃ tathyamṛtaṃ samyaṅnādanisvānanisvanāḥ āab।

āravārāvasaṃrāvavirāvā atha marmaraḥ ।।ā।svanite vastraparṇānāṃ bhūṣaṇānāntu śiñjitaṃ āab।vīṇāyā nikvaṇaḥ kvāṇaḥ tiraścāṃ vāśitaṃ rutaṃ ।ācd।kolāhalaḥ kalakalo gītaṃ gānamime same āab।strī pratiśrut pratidhvāne tantrīkaṇṭhānnisādakaḥ ।kākalī tu kale sūkṣme dhvanau tu madhurāsphuṭe āab।kalo mantrastu gambhīre tāro atyuccaistrayastriṣu ।।ācd।samanvitalayastvekatālo vīṇā tu vallakī āab।vipañcī sā tu tantrībhiḥ saptabhiḥ parivādinī ।tataṃ vīṇādikaṃ vādyamānaddhaṃ murajādikaṃ āab।vaṃśyādikantu śuṣiraṃ kāṇsyatālādikaṃ ghanaṃ ।ācd।caturvidhamidaṃ vādyaṃ vāditrātodyanāmakaṃ ।āab।mṛdaṅgā murajā bhedāstvaṅkyāliṅgyo ardhakāstrayaḥ ।ācd।syādyaśaḥpaṭaho ṭakkā bheryāmānakadundubhiḥ āab।ānakaḥ paṭaho bhedā jharjharīḍiṇḍimādayaḥ ।mardalaḥ paṇavastulyau kriyāmānantu tālakaḥ āab।layaḥ sāmyaṃ tāṇḍavantu nāṭyaṃ lāsyañca nartanaṃ ।ācd।tauryatrikaṃ nṛtyagītavādyaṃ nāṭyamidaṃ trayam āab।rājā bhaṭṭārako devaḥ sābhiṣekā ca devyapi ।śṛṅgāravīrakaruṇādbhutahāsyabhayānakāḥ āab।vībhatsaraudre ca rasāḥ śṛṅgāraḥ śucirujjvalaḥ ।ācd।utsāhavardhano vīraḥ kāruṇyaṃ karuṇā ghṛṇā āab।kṛpā dayā cānukampāpyanukrośo apyatho hasaḥ ।

hāso hāsyañca vībhatsaṃ vikṛtaṃ triṣvidaṃ dvayaṃ ।vismayo adbhutamāś caryaṃ citramapyatha bhairavaṃ ।।dāruṇaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ ghoraṃ bhīmaṃbhayānakaṃ ।bhayaṅkaraṃ pratibhayaṃ raudrantūgramamī triṣu ।।caturdaśa daratrāsau bhītirbhīḥ sādhvasambhayaṃ ।vikāro mānaso bhāvo anubhāvo bhāvabodhanaḥ ।।garvo abhimāno ahaṅkāro mānaścittasamunnatiḥ ।anādaraḥ paribhavaḥ paribhāvastiraskriyā ।।vrīḍā lajjā trapā hrīḥ syādabhidhyānaṃ dhane spṛhā ।kautūhalaṃ kautukañca kutukañca kutūhalaṃ ।।stroṇāṃ vilāsavivvokavibhramā lalitantathā ।helā līletyamī hāvāḥ kriyāḥ śṛṅgārabhāvajāḥ ।।dravakeliparīhāsāḥ krīḍā līlā ca kūrdanaṃ ।syādāchuritakaṃ hāsaḥ sotprāsaḥ samanāksmitaṃ ।।adhobhuvanapātālaṃ chidraṃ śvabhraṃ vapā śuṣiḥ ।gartāvaṭau bhuvi śvebhre tamiśrantimiraṃ tamaḥ ।।sarpaḥ pṛdākurbhujago dandaśūko vileśayaḥ ।viṣaṃ kṣveḍaś ca garalaṃ nirayo durgatiḥ striyāṃ ।।payaḥ kīlālamamṛtamudakaṃ bhuvanaṃ vanaṃ ।bhaṅgastaraṅga ūrmirvā kallolollolakau ca tau ।।pṛṣantivindupṛṣatāḥ kūlaṃ rodhaś ca tīrakaṃ ।toyotthitaṃ tat pulinaṃ jambālaṃ paṅkakardamau ।।jalocchāsāḥ parīvāhāḥ kūpakāstu vidārakāḥ ।

ātārastarapaṇyaṃ syāddroṇī kāṣṭhāmbuvāhinī ।।kaluṣaścāvilo acchastu prasanno atha gabhīrakaṃ ।agādhaṃ dāsakaivartau śambūkā jalaśuktayaḥ ।।saugandhikantu kahlāraṃ nīlamindīvaraṃ kajaṃ ।syādutpalaṃ kuvalayaṃ site kumudakairave ।।śālūkameṣāṃ kandaḥ syāt padmaṃ tāmarasaṅkajaṃ ।nīlotpalaṃ kuvalayaṃ raktaṃ kokanadaṃ smṛtam ।।karahāṭaḥ śiphā kandaṃ kiñjalkaḥ keśaro astriyāṃ ।khaniḥ striyāmākaraḥ syāt pādāḥ pratyantaparvatāḥ ।।upatyakādrerāsannā bhūmirūrdhvamadhityakā ।svargapātālavargādyā uktā nānārthakān śṛṇu ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe svargapātālādivargā nāmonaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

avyayavargāḥ

agnir uvāca
āṅīṣadarthe abhivyāptau sīmārthe dhātuyogaje ।ā pragṛhyaḥ smṛtau vākye apyāstu syāt kopapīḍyoḥ ।।pāpakutseṣadarthe ku dhigjugupsananindayoḥ ।cānvācayasamāhāretaretarasamuccaye ।।

svastyāśīḥ kṣemapuṇyādau prakarṣe laṅghane apyati ।svitpraśne ca vitarke ca tu syādbhede avadhāraṇe ।।sakṛtsahaikavāre syādārāddūrasamīpayoḥ ।pratīcyāṃ carame paścādutāpyarthavikalpayoḥ ।।punaḥsadārthayoḥ śaśvat sākṣāt pratyakṣatulyayoḥ ।khedānukampāsantoṣavismayāmantraṇe vata ।।hanta harṣe anukampāyāṃ vākyārambhaviṣādayoḥ ।prati pratinidhau vīpsālakṣaṇādau prayogataḥ ।।iti hetau prakaraṇe prakāśādisamāptiṣu ।prācyāṃ purastāt prathame purārthe agrata ity api ।।yāvattāvacca sākalye avadhau māne avadhāraṇe ।maṅgalānantarārambhapraśnakārtsneṣv athotha ca ।।vṛthā nirarthakāvidhyornānānekobhayārthayoḥ ।nu pṛcchāyāṃ vikalpe ca paścātsādṛśyayoranu ।।praśnāvadhāraṇānujñānunayāmantraṇe nanu ।garhāsamuccayapraśnaśaṅkāsambhāvanāsv api ।।upamāyāṃ vikalpe vā sāmitvardhe jugupsite ।amā saha samīpe ca kaṃ vāriṇi ca mūrdhani ।।ivetthamarthayorevaṃ nūnaṃ tarke arthaniś caye ।tūṣṇīmarthe sukhe joṣaṃ kimpṛcchāyāṃ jugupsane ।।nāma prākāśyasambhāvyakrodhopagamakutsane ।alaṃ bhūṣaṇaparyāptiśaktivāraṇavācakam ।।

hūṃ vitarke paripraśne samayāntikamadhyayoḥ ।punaraprathame bhede nirniś cayaniṣedhayoḥ ।।syātprabandhe cirātīte nikaṭāgāmike purā ।uraryurī corarī ca vistāre aṅgīkṛte trayam ।।svarge pare ca loke svarvārtāsambhāvayoḥ kila ।niṣedhavākyālaṅkāre jijñāsāvasare khalu ।।samīpobhayataḥśīghrasākalyābhimukhe abhitaḥ ।nāmaprakāśayoḥ prādurmitho anyonyaṃ rahasyapi ।।tiro antardhau tiryagarthe hā viṣādaśugartiṣu ।ahahetyadbhute khede hi hetāvavadhāraṇe ।।cirāya cirarātrāya cirasyādyāścirārthakāḥ ।muhuḥ punaḥ punaḥ śaśvadabhīkṣṇamasakṛt samāḥ ।।srāgjhaṭityañcasāhnāya sapadi drāṅmaṅkhu ca drute ।balavat suṣṭhu kimuta vikalpe kiṃ kimūta ca ।।tu hi ca sma ha vai pādapūraṇe pūjanepyati ।divāhnītyatha doṣā ca naktañca rajanāviti ।।tiryagarthe sāci tiro apyatha sambodhanārthakāḥ ।syuḥ pyāṭpāḍṅga he hai bhoḥ samayā nikaṣā hiruk ।।atarkite tu sahasā syāt puraḥ purato agrataḥ ।svāhā devahavirdāne śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ vaṣaṭ svadhā ।।kiñcidīṣanmanāgalpe pretyāmutra bhavāntare ।

jijñāsānunaya iti ña
yathā tathā caiva sāmye aho ho iti vismaye ।।maune tu tūṣṇīṃ tūṣṇīkaṃ sadyaḥ sapadi tatkṣaṇe ।diṣṭyā śamupayoṣañcetyānande athāntare antarā ।।antareṇa ca madhye syuḥ prasahya tu haṭārthakam ।yukte dve sāmprataṃ sthāne abhīkṣṇaṃ śasvadanārate ।।abhāve nahyano nāpi māsma mālañca vāraṇe ।pakṣāntare cedyadi ca tattve tv addhāñjasā dvayam ।।prākāśye prādurāviḥ syādomevaṃ paramaṃ mate ।samantatastu paritaḥ sarvato viśvagityapi ।।akāmānumatau kāmamasūyopagame astu ca ।nanu ca syādvirodhoktau kaccit kāmapravedane ।।niḥṣamaṃ duḥṣamaṃ garhye yathāsvantu yathāyathaṃ ।mṛṣā mithyā ca vitathe yathārthantu yathātathaṃ ।।syurevantu punarvaivetyavadhāraṇavācakāḥ ।prāgatītārthakaṃ nūnamavaśyaṃ niś caye dvayaṃ ।।saṃvadvarṣe avare tvarvāgāmevaṃ svayamātmanā ।alpe nīcair mahatyuccaiḥ prāyobhūmny adrute śanaiḥ ।।sanā nitye vahirvāhye smātīte astamadarśane ।asti sattve ruṣoktāvūmuṃ praśne anunaye tvayi ।।hūṃ tarke syāduṣā rātreravasāne namo natau ।punararthe aṅganindāyāṃ duṣṭhu suṣṭhu praśaṃsane ।।sāyaṃ sāye prage prātaḥ prabhāte nikaṣāntike ।parutparāryaisamo abde pūrve pūrvatare yati ।।

adyātrāhny atha pūrvehnītyādau pūrvottarā parāt ।tathādharānyānyataretarātpūrvedyurādayaḥ ।।ubhayadyuścobhayedyuḥ pare tvahni paredyapi ।hyo gate anāgate ahni śvaḥ paraśvaḥ śvaḥpare ahani ।।tadā tadānīṃ yugapadekadā sarvadā sadā ।etarhi sampratīdānīmadhunā sāmpratantathā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe avyayavargā nāma ṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athaikaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nānārthavargāḥ

agnir uvāca
ākāśe tridive nāko lokastu bhavane jane ।padye yaśasi ca ślokaḥśare khaḍge ca sāyakaḥ ।।ānakaḥ paṭaho bherī kalaṅko aṅkāpavādayoḥ ।mārute vedhasi vradhne puṃsi kaḥ kaṃ śiro ambunoḥ ।।syāt pulākastucchadhānye saṃkṣepe bhaktasikthake ।mahendraguggulūlūkavyālagrāhiṣu kauśikaḥ ।।śālāvṛkau kapiśvānau mānaṃ syānmitisādhanaṃ ।sargaḥ svabhāvanirmokṣaniś cayādhyāyasmṛṣṭiṣu ।।yogaḥ sannahanopāyadhyānasaṅgatiyuktiṣu ।

bhogaḥ sukhe stryādibhṛtāvabjau śaṅkaniśākarau ।।kāke bhagaṇḍau karaṭau duś carmā śipiviṣṭakaḥ ।riṣṭaṃ kṣemāśubhābhāveṣvariṣṭe tu śubhāśubhe ।।vyuṣṭiḥ phale samṛddhau ca dṛṣṭirjñāne akṣṇi darśane ।niṣṭhāniṣpattināśāntāḥ kāṣṭhotkarṣe sthitau diśi ।।bhūgovācastviḍā ilāḥ pragāḍhaṃ bhṛṣakṛcchrayoḥ ।bhṛśapratijñayorvāḍhaṃ śaktasthūlau dṛḍhau triṣu ।।vinyastasaṃhatau vyūḍhau kṛṣṇo vyāse arjune harau ।paṇo dūyatādiṣūtsṛṣṭe bhṛtau mūlye dhane api ca ।।maurvyāṃ dravyāśrite satvaśuklasandhyādike guṇaḥ ।śreṣṭhe adhipe grāmaṇīḥ syāt jugpsākaruṇe ghṛṇe ।।tṛṣṇā spṛhāpipāse dve vipaṇiḥ syādvaṇikpathe ।viṣābhimaraloheṣu tīkṣṇaṃ klīve khare triṣu ।।pramāṇaṃ hetumaryādāśāstreyattāpramātṛṣu ।karaṇaṃ kṣetragātrādāvīriṇaṃ śūnyamūṣaraṃ ।।yantā hastipake sūte vahnijvālā ca hetayaḥ ।srutaṃ śāstrāvadhṛtayoryugaparyāptayoḥ kṛtaṃ ।।khyāte hṛṣṭe pratīto abhijātastu kulaje budhe ।viviktau pūtavijanau mūrchitau mūḍsocchayau ।।artho abhidheyaraivastuprayojananivṛttiṣu ।nidānāgamayostīrthamṛṣijuṣṭajale gurau ।।prādhānye rājaliṅge ca vṛṣāṅge kakudo astriyāṃ ।strī sambijjñānasambhāṣākriyākārājināmasu ।।

dharme rahasyupaniṣat syādṛtau vatsare śarat ।padaṃ vyavasititrāṇasthānalakṣmāṅghrivastuṣu ।।triṣvaṣṭamadhurau svādū mṛdū cātīkṣṇakomalau ।satye sādhau vidyamāne praśaste abhyarhite ca sat ।।vidhirvidhāne daive api praṇidhiḥ prārthane care ।vadhūrjāyā snuṣā ca sudhālepo amṛtaṃ snuhī ।।spṛhā sampratyayaḥ śraddhā paṇḍitammanyagarvitau ।brahmabandhuradhikṣepe bhānū raṣmidivākarau ।।grāvāṇau śailapāṣānau mūrkhanīcau pṛthagjanau ।taruśailau śikhariṇau tanustvagdehayorapi ।।ātmā yatno dhṛtirvuddhiḥ svabhāvo brahmavarṣma ca ।utthānaṃ pauruṣe tantre vyutthānaṃ pratirodhane ।।niryātanaṃ vairaśuddhau dāne nyāsārpaṇe api ca ।vyasanaṃ vipadi bhraśe doṣe kāmajakopaje ।।mṛgayākṣo divāsvapnaḥ parivādaḥ striyo madaḥ ।tauryatrikaṃ vṛthāṭyā ca kāmajo daśako gaṇaḥ ।।paiśūnyaṃ sāhasaṃ droha īrṣyāsūyārthadūṣaṇam ।vāgdaṇḍaś caiva pāruṣyaṃ krodhajo api gaṇo aṣṭakaḥ ।।akarmaguhye kaupīnaṃ maithunaṃ saṅgatau ratau ।pradhānaṃ paramārthā dhīḥ prajñānaṃ buddhicihnayoḥ ।।krandane rodanāhvāne varṣma dehapramāṇayoḥ ।ārādhanaṃ sādhane syādavāptau toṣaṇe api ca ।।ratnaṃ svajātiśreṣṭhe api lakṣma cihnapradhānayoḥ ।

kalāpo bhūṣaṇe varhe tūṇīre saṃhate api ca ।।talpaṃ śayyāṭṭāreṣu ḍimbhau tu śiśuvāliśau ।stambhau sthūṇājaḍībhāvau sabhye saṃsadi vai sabhā ।।kiraṇapragrahau raśmī dharmāḥ puṇyayamādayaḥ ।lalāmaṃ pucchapuṇḍrāśvabhūṣāprādhānyaketuṣu ।।pratyayo adhīnaśapathajñānaviśvāsahetuṣu ।samayāḥ śapathācārakālasiddhāntasaṃvidaḥ ।।atyayo atikrame kṛcchre satyaṃ śapathatathyayoḥ ।vīryaṃ balaprabhāvau ca rūpyaṃ rūpe praśastake ।।durodaro dyūtakāre paṇe dyūte durodaraṃ ।mahāraṇye durgapathe kāntāraḥ punnapuṃsakaṃ ।।yamānilendracandrārkaviṣṇusiṃhādike hariḥ ।daro astriyāṃ bhaye śvabhre jaṭharaḥ kaṭhine api ca ।।udāro dātṛmahatoritarastvanyanīcayoḥ ।cūḍā kirīṭaṃ keśāś ca saṃyatā maulayastrayaḥ ।।baliḥ karopahārādau sainyasthair yādike balaṃ ।strīkaṭīvastrabandhe api nīvī paripaṇe api ca ।।śukrale mūṣike śreṣṭhe sukṛte vṛṣabhe vṛṣaḥ ।dyūtākṣe sāriphalake apyākarṣo athākṣamindriye ।।nā dyūtāṅge ca karṣe ca vyavahāre kalidrume ।ūṣṇīṣaḥ syāt kirīṭādau karṣūḥ kulyābhidhāyinī ।।pratyakṣe adhikṛte adhyakṣaḥ sūryavahnī vibhāvasū ।śṛṅgārādau viṣe vīrye guṇe rāge drave rasaḥ ।।

tejaḥpurīṣayorvarca āgaḥ pāpāparādhayoḥ ।chandaḥ padye abhilāse ca sādhīyān sādhuvāḍhayoḥ ।vyūho vṛnde apyahirvṛtre apyagnīndvarkāstamonudaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nānārthavargā namaikaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dviṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

bhūmivanauṣadhyādivargāḥ

agnir uvāca
vakṣye bhūpurādrivanauṣadhisiṃhādinargakān ।bhūranantā kakṣamā dhātrī kṣmāpyākuḥ syāddharitryapi ।।mṛnmṛttikā praśastā tu mṛtsā mṛtsnā ca mṛttikā ।jagattrapiṣṭapaṃ lokaṃ bhuvanaṃ jagatī samā ।।ayanaṃ vartma mārgādhvapanthānaḥ padavī sṛtiḥ ।saraṇiḥ paddhattiḥ padyā vartanyekapadīti ca ।।pūḥ strī purīnagaryau vā pāttanaṃ puṭabhedanam ।sthānīyaṃ nigamo anyattu yanmūlanagarātpuram ।।tacchākhānagaraṃ veśo veśyājanasamāśrayaḥ ।āpaṇastu niṣadyāyāṃ vipaṇiḥ paṇyavīthikā ।।rathyā pratolī viśikhā syāccayo vapramastriyāṃ ।prākāro varaṇaḥ śālaḥ prācīraṃ prāntato vṛtiḥ ।।

bhittiḥ strī kuhyameḍūkaṃ yadantarnastakīkasaṃ ।vāsaḥ kūṭo dvayoḥ śālā sabhā sañjavanantvidam ।।catuḥśālaṃ munīnāntu parṇaśāloṭajo astriyāṃ ।caityamāyatanantulye vājiśālā tu mandurā ।।harmyādi dhanināṃ vāsaḥprāsādo devabhūbhujāṃ ।strī dvārdvāraṃ pratīhāraḥ syādvitardistu vedikā ।।kapotapālikāyantu viṭaṅkaṃ puṃ napuṃsakaṃ ।kavāṭamavarantulye niḥśreṇistvadhirohiṇī ।।sammārjanī śodhanī syāt saṅkaro avakaras tathā ।adrigotrigirigrāvā gahanaṃ kānanaṃ vanaṃ ।।ārāmaḥ syādupavanaṃ kṛtrimaṃ vanameva yat ।syādetadeva pramadavanamantaḥpurocitaṃ ।।vīthyālirāvaliḥ paṅktiśreṇīlekhāstu rājayaḥ ।vānaspatyaḥ phalaiḥ puṣpāttairapuṣpādvanaspatiḥ ।।oṣadhyaḥ phalapākāntāḥ palāśī drudrumāgamāḥ ।sthāṇu vā nā dhruvaḥ śaṅkuḥ praphullotphullasaṃsphuṭāḥ ।।palāśaṃ chadanaṃ parṇamidhmamedhaḥ samit striyāṃ ।bodhidrumaś caladalo dadhitthagrāhimanmathāḥ ।।tasmin dadhiphalaḥ puṣpaphaladantaśaṭhāvapi ।uḍumbare hemadugdhaḥ kovidāre dvipatrakaḥ ।।saptaparṇo viśālatvak kṛtamālaṃ suvarṇakaḥ ।ārevatavyādhighātasampākacaturaṅgulāḥ ।।syājjambīre dantaśaṭho varuṇe tiktaśāvakaḥ ।

putrāge puruṣastuṅgaḥ keśaro devavallabhaḥ ।।pāribhadre nimbatarurmandāraḥ pārijātakaḥ ।vañjulaścitrakṛccātha dvau pītanakapītanau ।।āmrātake madhūke tu guḍapuṣpamadhudrumau ।pīlau guḍaphalaḥ sraṃsī nādeyī cāmbuvetasaḥ ।।śobhāñjane śigrutīkṣṇagandhakākṣīramocakāḥ ।rakto asau madhuśigruḥ syādariṣṭaḥ pheṇilaḥ samau ।।gālavaḥśāvaro lodhrastirīṭastilvamārjanau ।śeluḥ śleṣmātakaḥ śīta uddālo bahuvārakaḥ ।।vaikaṅkataḥ śruvāvṛkṣo granthilo vyāghrapādapi ।tindukaḥ sphūrjakaḥ kālo nādeyī bhūmijambukaḥ ।।kākatindau pīlukaḥ syāt pāṭalirmokṣamuṣkakau ।kramukaḥ paṭṭikākhyaḥ syātkumbhī kaiṭaryakaṭphale ।।vīravṛkṣo aruṣkaro agnimukhī bhallātakīṃ triṣu ।savarjakāsanajīvāś ca pītasāle atha mālake ।।sarjāśvakarṇau vīrendrau indradruḥ kakubho arjunaḥ ।iṅgudī tāpasatarurmocā śālmalireva ca ।।ciravilvo naktamālaḥ karajaś ca karañjake ।prakīryaḥ pūtikarajo markaṭyaṅgāravallarī ।।rohī rohitakaḥ plīhaśatrurdāḍimapuṣpakaḥ ।gāyatrī bālatanayaḥ khadiro dantadhāvanaḥ ।।arimedo viṭkhadire kadaraḥ khadire site ।pañcāṅgulo vardhamānaś cañcurgandharvahastakaḥ ।।

piṇḍītako maruvakaḥ pītadāru ca dāru ca ।devadāruḥ pūtikāṣṭhaṃ śyāmā tu mahilāhvayā ।।latā govandanī gundā priyaṅguḥ phalinī phalī ।maṇḍūkaparṇapatrorṇanaṭakaṭvaṅgaṭuṇṭukāḥ ।।śyonākaśukanāsarkṣadīrghavṛntakuṭannaṭāḥ ।pītadruḥ saralaścātha niculo ambuja ijjalaḥ ।।kākoḍumbarikā phalgurariṣṭaḥ picumardakaḥ ।sarvatobhadrako nimbe śirīṣastu kapītanaḥ ।।vakulo vañjulaḥ proktaḥ picchilāguruśiṃśapāḥ ।jayā jayantī tarkārī kaṇikā gaṇikārikā ।।āparṇamagnamanthaḥ syādvatsako girimallikā ।kālaskandhastamālaḥ syāt taṇḍulīyo alpamāriṣaḥ ।।sindhuvārastu nirguṇḍī saivāsphotā vanodbhavā ।gaṇikā yūthikāmbaṣṭhā saptalā navamālikā ।।atimuktaḥ puṇḍrakaḥ syātkumārī taraṇiḥ sahā ।tatra śoṇe kuruvakastatra pīte kuruṇṭakaḥ ।।nīlā jhiṇṭī dvayorvāṇā bhiṇṭī sairīyakas tathā ।tasminrakte kuruvakaḥ pīte sahacarī dvayoḥ ।।dhustūraḥ kitavo dhūrto rucako mātulaṅgake ।samīraṇo maruvakaḥ prasthapuṣpaḥ phaṇijjhakaḥ ।।kuṭherakastu parṇāse athāsphoto vasukārkake ।śivamallī pāśupato vṛndā vṛkṣādanī tathā ।।jīvantikā vṛkṣaruhā guḍūcī tantrikāmṛtā ।

somavallī madhurṇī mūrvā tu moraṭī tathā ।।madhulikā madhuśreṇī gokarṇī pīluparṇyapi ।pāṭhāmbaṣṭhā viddhakarṇī prācīnā vanatiktikā ।।kaṭuḥ kaṭumbharā cātha cakrāṅgī śakulādanī ।ātmaguptā prāvṛṣāyī kapikacchuś ca markaṭī ।।apāmārgaḥ śaikharikaḥ pratyakparṇī mayūrakaḥ ।phañjikā brāhmaṇī bhārgī dravanti śambarī vṛṣā ।।maṇḍūkaparṇī bhaṇḍīrī samaṅgā kālameṣikā ।rodanī kacchurānantā samudrāntā durālabhā ।।pṛśniparṇī pṛthakparṇī kalaśirdhāvanirguhā ।nidigdhikā spṛśī vyāghrī kṣudrā dusparśayā saha ।।avalgujaḥ somarājī suvalliḥ somavallikā ।kālameṣī kṛṣṇaphalā vakucī pūtiphaly api ।।kaṇoṣaṇopakulyā syācchreyasī gajapippalī ।cavyantu cavikā kākaciñcī guñje tu kṛṣṇalā ।।viśvā viṣā prativiṣā vanaśṛṅgāṭagokṣurau ।nārāyaṇī śatamūlī kāleyakaharidravaḥ ।।dārvī pacampacā dāru śuklā haimavatī vacā ।vacogragandhā ṣaḍgranthā golomī śataparvikā ।।āsphotā girikarṇī syāt siṃhāsyo vāsako vṛṣaḥ ।miśī madhurikācchatrā kokilākṣekṣurakṣurā ।।viḍaṅgo astrī kṛmighnaḥ syāt vajradrusnuksnuhī sudhā ।mṛdvīkā gostanī drākṣā valā vāṭyālakas tathā ।।

kālā masūravidalā tripuṭā trivṛtā trivṛt ।madhukaṃ klītakaṃ yaṣṭimadhukā madhuyaṣṭikā ।।vidārī kṣīraśuklekṣugandhā kroṣṭrī ca yā sitā ।gopī śyāmā śārivā syādanantotpalaśārivā ।।mocā rambhā ca kadalī bhaṇṭākī duṣpradharṣiṇī ।sthirā dhruvā sālaparṇī śṛṅgī tu vṛṣabho vṛṣaḥ ।।gāṅgerukī nāgabalā muṣalī tālamūlikā ।jyotsnī paṭolikā jālī ajaśṛṅgī viṣāṇikā ।।syāllāṅgalikyagniśikhā tāmbūlī nāgavallyapi ।hareṇū reṇukā kauntī hrīvero divyanāgaraṃ ।।kālānusāryavṛddhāśmapuṣpaśītaśivāni tu ।śaileyaṃ tālaparṇī tu daityā gandhakuṭī murā ।।granthiparṇaṃ śukaṃ varhi valā tu tripuṭā truṭiḥ ।śivā tāmalakī cātha hanurhaṭṭavilāsinī ।।kuṭaṃ naṭaṃ daśapuraṃ vāneyaṃ paripelavam ।tapasvanī jaṭāmāṃsī pṛkkā devī latā laśūḥ ।।karcurako drāviḍako gandhamūlī śaṭhī smṛtā ।syaddṛkṣagandhā chagalāntrā vegī vṛddhadārakaḥ ।।tuṇḍikerī raktaphalā vimbikā pīluparṇy api ।cāṅgerī cukrikāmbaṣṭā svarṇakṣīrī himāvatī ।।sahasravedhī cukro amlavetasaḥ śatavedhyapi ।jīvantī jīvanī jīvā bhūminimvaḥ kirātakaḥ ।।kūrcaśīrṣo madhukaraś candraḥ kapivṛkas tathā ।

dadrughnaḥ syādeḍagajo varṣābhūḥ śīthahāniṇī ।।kunandatī nikumbhastrā yamānī vārṣikā tathā ।laśunaṅgṛñcanāriṣṭamahākandarasonakāḥ ।।vārāhī vadarā gṛṣṭiḥ kākamācī tu vāyasī ।śatapuṣpā sitacchatrāticchatrā madhurā misiḥ ।।avākpuṣpī kāravī ca saraṇā tu prasāraṇī ।kaṭambharā bhadravalā karvūraś ca śaṭī hy atha ।।paṭolaḥ kulakastiktaḥ kāravellaḥ kaṭillakaḥ ।kuṣmāṇḍakastu karkārurirvāruḥ karkaṭī striyau ।।ikṣvākuḥ kaṭutumbī syādviśālā tvindravāruṇī ।arśeghnaḥ śūraṇaḥ kando mustakaḥ kuruvindakaḥ ।।vaṃśe tvaksārakarmāraveṇumaskaratejanāḥ ।chatrāticchatrapālaghnau mālātṛṇakabhūstṛṇe ।।tṛṇarājāhvayastālo ghoṇṭā kramukapugakau ।śārdūladvīpinau vyaghre haryakṣaḥ keśarī hariḥ ।।kolaḥ pautrī varāhaḥ syāt koka īhāmṛgo vṛkaḥ ।lūtorṇanābhau tu samau tantuvāyaś ca markaṭe ।।vṛścikaḥ śūkakīṭaḥ syātsāraṅgastokakau samau ।kṛkavākustāmracūḍaḥ pikaḥ kokila ity api ।।kake tu karaṭāriṣṭau vakaḥ kahva udāhṛtaḥ ।kokaś cakraś cakravāko kādambaḥ kalahaṃsakaḥ ।।pataṅgikā puttikā syātsaraghā madhumakṣikā ।

sakuladantī nirdaṃṣṭreti kha
dvirephapuṣpaliḍbhṛṅgaṣaṭpadabhramarāalayaḥ ।।kekī śikhyasya vākkekā śakuntiśakunidvijāḥ ।strī pakṣatiḥ pakṣamūlañcañcustoṭirubhe striyau ।।gatiruḍḍinasaṇḍīnau kulāyo nīḍamastriyāṃ ।peśī koṣo dvihīne aṇḍaṃ pṛthukaḥ śāvakaḥ śiśuḥ ।।potaḥ pāko arbhako ḍimbhaḥ sandohavyūhako gaṇaḥ ।stomaughanikaravrātā nikurambaṃ kadambakaṃ ।saṅghātasañcayau vṛndaṃ puñjarāśī tu kūṭakaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe bhūmivanauṣadhyādivargā nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha triṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nṛbrahmakṣatraviṭśūdravargāḥ

agnir uvāca
nṛbrahmakṣatraviṭśūdravargānvakṣye atha nāmataḥ ।naraḥ pañcajanā martya yadyoṣāvaṃlā vadhūḥ ।।kāntārthinī tu yā yāti saṅketaṃ sābhisārikā ।kulaṭā puṃś calyasatī nagnikā strī ca koṭavī ।।kātyāyanyardhavṛddhā yā sairindhrī paraveśmagā ।asikrī syādavṛddhā yā malinī tu rajasvalā ।।vārastrī gaṇikā veśyā bhrātṛjāyāstu yātaraḥ ।nanāndā tu svasā patyuḥ sapiṇḍāstu sanābhayaḥ ।।

samānodaryasodaryasagarbhasahajāssamāḥ ।sagotrabāndhavajñātibandhusvasvajanāḥ samāḥ ।।dampatī jampatī bhāryāpatī jāyāpatī ca tau ।garbhāśayo jarāyuḥ syādulvañca kalalo astriyāṃ ।।garbho bhruṇa imau tulyau klīvaṃ śaṇḍo napuṃsakam ।syāduttānaśayā ḍimbhā bālo māṇavakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।piciṇḍilo vṛhatkukṣiravabhraṭo natanāsike ।vikalāṅgastu pogaṇḍa ārogyaṃ syādanāmayam ।।syādeḍe vadhiraḥ kubje gaḍulaḥ kukare kuniḥ ।kṣayaḥ śoṣaś ca yakṣmā ca pratiśyāyustu pīnasaḥ ।।strī kṣutkṣutaṃ kṣayaṃ puṃsi kāsastu kṣavathuḥ pumān ।śothastu śvayathuḥ śophaḥ pādasphoṭo vipādikā ।।kilāsaṃ sidhnakacchāntu pāma pāmā vicarcikā ।koṭho maṇḍalakaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śvitre drur nāmakārśasī ।।anāhastu vibandhaḥ syādgrahaṇī rukpravāhikā ।vījavīryendrayaṃ śukraṃ palalaṃ kravyamāmiṣaṃ ।।vukkāgramāṃsaṃ hṛdayaṃ hanmedastu vapā vasā ।paścādgrīvā śirā manyā nāḍī tu dhamaniḥ śirā ।।tilakaṃ ktoma mastiṣkaṃ drūṣikā netrayormalam ।antraṃ purī tadgulmastu plīhā puṃsy atha vasnasā ।।snāyuḥ striyāṃ kālakhaṇḍayakṛtī tu same ime ।syāt karpūraḥ kapālo astrī kīkasaṅkulyamasthi ca ।।syāccharīrāsthni kaṅkālaḥ pṛṣṭhāsthni tu kaśerukā ।

śiro asthani karoṭiḥ strī pārśvāsthani tu parśukā ।।aṅgaṃ pratīko avayavaḥ śarīraṃ varṣma vigrahaḥ ।kaṭo nā śroṇiphalakaṃ kaṭiḥ śroṇiḥ kakudmatī ।।paścānnitambaḥ strīkaṭyāḥ klīve tu jaghanaṃ puraḥ ।kūpakau tu nitambasthau dvayahīne kakundare ।।striyāṃ sphicau kaṭiprothāvupastho vakṣyamāṇayoḥ ।bhagaṃ yonirdvayoḥ śiśno meḍhro mehanaśephasī ।।piciṇḍakukṣī jaṭharodaraṃ tundaṃ kucau stanau ।cūcukantu kucāgraṃ syānna nā kroḍaṃ bhujāntaram ।।skandho bhujaśiro aṃśo astrī sandhī tasyaiva jatruṇī ।punarbhavaḥ kararuho nakho astrī nakharo astriyāṃ ।।pradeśatālagokarṇāstarjanyādiyute tate ।aṅguṣṭhe sakaniṣṭhe syādvitastirdvādaśāṅgulaḥ ।।pāṇau ca peṭapratalaprahastā vistṛtāṅgulau ।baddhamuṣṭikaro ratniraratniḥ sa kaniṣṭhavān ।।kambugrīvā trirekhā sāvaṭurghāṭā kṛkāṭikā ।adhaḥ syāccivukañcauṣṭhādatha gaṇḍau galo hanuḥ ।।apāṅgau netrayorantau kaṭākṣo apāṅgadarśane ।cikuraḥ kuntalo bālaḥ pratikarma prasādhanam ।।ākālpaveśau nepathyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ khelayogajam ।cūḍāmaṇiḥ śiroratnaṃ taralo hāramadhyagaḥ ।।karṇikā tālapatraṃ syāllambanaṃ syāllalantikā ।mañjīro nūpuraṃ pāde kiṅkiṇī kṣudraghaṇṭikā ।।

dairghyamāyāma ārohaḥ pariṇāho viśālatā ।paṭaccaraṃ jīrṇavastraṃ saṃvyānañcottarīyakam ।।racanā syāt parispanda ābhogaḥ paripūrṇatā ।samudgakaḥ sampuṭakaḥ pratigrāhaḥ patadgrahaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nṛvargo nāma triṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha catuḥṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

brahmavargaḥ

agnir uvāca
vaṃśo anvavāyo gotraṃ syāt kulānyabhijanānvayau ।mantravyākhyākṛdācārya ādeṣṭā tvadhvare vratī ।।yaṣṭā ca yajamānaḥ syāt jñātvārambha upakramaḥ ।satīrthyāś caikaguravaḥ sabhyāḥ sāmājikās tathā ।।sabhāsadaḥ sabhāstārā ṛtvijo yājakāś ca te ।adhvaryūdgātṛhotāro yajuḥsāmargvidaḥ kramāt ।।caṣālo yūpakaṭakaḥ same sthaṇḍilacatvare ।āmikṣā sā śṛtoṣṇe yā kṣīre syāddadhiyogataḥ ।।pṛṣadājyaṃ sadadhyājye paramānnantu pāyasam ।upākṛtaḥ paśurasau yo abhimantrya kratau hataḥ ।।paramparākaṃ samanaṃ prokṣaṇañca badhārthakam ।

pūjā namasyāpicitiḥ saparyārcārhaṇāḥ samāḥ ।।varivasyā tu śuśrūṣā paricaryāpyupāsanam ।niyamo bratamastrī taccopavāsādi puṇyakam ।।mukhyaḥ syāt prathamaḥ kalpo anukalpastu tato adhamaḥ ।kalpe vidhikramau jñeyau vivekaḥ pṛthagātmatā ।।saṃskārapūrvaṃ grahaṇaṃ syādupākaraṇaṃ śruteḥ ।bhikṣuḥ parivrāṭ karmandī pārāśaryapi maskarī ।।ṛṣayaḥ satyavacasaḥsnātakaścāplutavratī ।ye nirjitendriyagrāmā yatino yatayaś ca te ।।śarīrasādhanāpekṣaṃ nityaṃ yat karma tadyamaḥ ।niyamastu sa yat karmānityamāgantusādhanam ।syād brahmabhūyaṃ brahmatvaṃ brahmasāyujyamityapi ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe brahmavargo nāma catuḥṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha pañcaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

kṣatraviṭśūdravargāḥ

agnir uvāca
mūrdhābhiśikto rājanyo bāhujaḥ kṣatriyo virāṭ ।rājā tu praṇatāśeṣasāmantaḥ syādadhīśvaraḥ ।।cakravartī sārvabhaumo nṛpo anyo maṇḍaleśvaraḥ ।mantrī dhīsacivo amātyo mahāmātrāḥ pradhānakāḥ ।।

draṣṭari vyavahārāṇāṃ prāḍvivākākṣadarśakau ।bhaurikaḥ kanakādhyakṣo athādhyakṣādhikṛtau samau ।।antaḥpure tvadhikṛtaḥ syādantarvaṃśiko janaḥ ।sauvidallāḥ kañcukinaḥ sthāpatyāḥ sauvidāś ca te ।।ṣaṇḍo varṣavarastulyāḥ sevakārthyanujīvinaḥ ।viṣayānantaro rājā śatrurmitramataḥ paraṃ ।।udāsīnaḥ parataraḥ pārṣṇigrāhastu pṛṣṭhataḥ ।caraḥ sparśaḥ syātpraṇidhiruttaraḥ kāla āyatiḥ ।।tatkālastu tadātvaṃ syādudarkaḥ phalamuttaraṃ ।adṛṣṭaṃ vahnitoyādi dṛṣṭaṃ svaparacakrajam ।।bhadrakumbhaḥ pūrṇakumbho bhṛṅgāraḥ kanakālukā ।prabhinno garjito māto vamathuḥ karaśīkaraḥ ।।striyāṃ śṛṇistvaṅkuśo astrī paristomaḥ kutho dvayoḥ ।karṇīrathaḥ pravahaṇaṃ dolā preṅkhādikā striyāṃ ।।ādhoraṇā hastipakā hastyārohā niṣādinaḥ ।bhaṭā yodhāś ca yoddhāraḥ kañcuko vāraṇo astriyāṃ ।।śīrṣaṇyañca śirastre atha tanutraṃ varma daṃśanaṃ ।āmuktaḥ pratimuktaś ca pinaddhaścāpinaddhavat ।।vyūhastu balavinyāsaś cakrañcānīkamastriyāṃ ।ekebhaikarathā tryaśvāḥ pattiḥ pañcapadātikāḥ ।।pattyaṅgaistriguṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ kramādākhyā yathottaraṃ ।senāmukhaṃ gulmagaṇau vāhinī pṛtanā camūḥ ।।anīkinī daśānīkinyo akṣohiṇyo gajādibhiḥ ।

dhanuḥ kodaṇḍa iṣvāsau koṭirasyāṭanī smṛtā ।।nastakastu dhanurmadhyaṃ maurvī jyā śiñjinī guṇaḥ ।pṛṣatkavāṇaviśikhā ajihmagakhagāśugāḥ ।।tūṇopāsaṅgatūṇīraniṣaṅgā iṣudhirdvayoḥ ।asirṛṣṭiś ca nistriṃśaḥ karavālaḥ kṛpālaḥkṛpāṇavat ।।saruḥ khaḍgasya suṣṭau syādīlī tu karapālikā ।dvayoḥ kuṭhāraḥ sudhitiḥ churikā cāsiputrikā ।।prāsastu kunto vijñeyaḥ sarvalā tomaro astriyāṃ ।vaitālikā bodhakarā māgadhā vandinastutau ।।saṃśaptakāstu samayātsaṅgrāmādanivartinaḥ ।patākā vaijayantī syātketanaṃ dhajamistriyāṃ ।।ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvamityahaṃpūrvikā striyāṃ ।ahamahamikā sāsyādyo ahaṅkāraḥ parasparam ।।śaktiḥ parākramaḥ prāṇaḥ śauryaṃ sthānasahobalaṃ ।mūrchā tu kaśmalaṃ moho apyavarmaddastu pīḍanaṃ ।।abhyavaskandanantvabhyāsādanaṃ vijayo jayaḥ ।nirvāsanaṃ saṃjñapanaṃ sāraṇaṃ pratighātanaṃ ।।syātpañcatā kāladharmo diṣṭāntaḥ pralayo atyayaḥ ।viśo bhūmispṛṣo vaiśyā vṛttirvartanajīvane ।।kṛṣyādivṛttayo jñeyāḥ kusīdaṃ vṛddhijīvikā ।uddharo arthaprayogaḥ syātkaṇiśaṃ sasyamañjarī ।।kiṃśāruḥ sasyaśūkaṃ syāt stambo gutsastṛṇādinaḥ ।dhāmyaṃ vrīhiḥ stambakariḥ kaḍaṅgaro vupaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।

māṣādayaḥ śamīdhānye śukadhānye yavādayaḥ ।tṛṇadhānyāni nīvārāḥ śūrpaṃ prasphoṭanaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।syūtaprasevau kaṇḍolapiṭau kaṭakiniñjakau ।samānau rasavatyāntu pākasthānamahānase ।।paurogavastadadhyakṣaḥ sūpakārāstu vallavāḥ ।ārālikā āndhasikāḥ sūdā audanikā guṇāḥ ।।klīve ambarīṣaṃ bhrāṣṭo nā karkaryālurgalantikā ।āliñjaraḥ syānmaṇikaṃ suṣavī kṛṣajīrake ।।āranālastu kulmāṣaṃ vāhlīkaṃ hiṅgu rāmaṭhaṃ ।niśā haridrā pītā strī khaṇḍe matsyaṇḍiphāṇite ।।kūrcikā kṣiravikṛtiḥ snigdhaṃ masṛṇacikkaṇaṃ ।pṛthukaḥ syāccipiṭako dhānā bhraṣṭayavāstriyaḥ ।।jemanaṃ lepa āhāro māheyī saurabhī ca gauḥ ।yugādīnāñca boḍhāro yugyaprasāṅgyaśāṭakāḥ ।।cirasūtā vaṣkayaṇī dhenuḥ syānnavasūtikā ।sandhinī vṛṣabhākrāntā vehadgarbhopaghātinī ।।paṇyājīvo hy āpaṇiko nyāsaścopanidhiḥ pumān ।vipaṇo vikrayaḥ saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye hy ādaśa triṣu ।।viṃśatyādyāḥ sadaikatve sarvāḥ saṃkhyeyasaṃkhyayoḥ ।saṃkhyārthe dvibahutve stastāsu cānavateḥ striyaḥ ।।paṅkteḥ śatasahasrādi kramāddaśaguṇottaraṃ ।mānantu lāṅguliprasthair guñjāḥ pañcādyamāṣakaḥ ।।te ṣoḍaśākṣaḥ karṣo astrī palaṃ karṣacatuṣṭayam ।

suvarṇavistau hemno akṣe kuruvistastu tatpale ।।tulā striyāṃ palaśataṃ bhāraḥ syādviṃśatistulāḥ ।kārṣāpaṇaḥ kārṣikaḥ syāt kārṣike tāmrike paṇaḥ ।।dravyaṃ vittaṃ svāpateyaṃ rikthamṛthakthaṃ dhanaṃ vasu ।rītiḥ striyāmārakūṭo na striyāmatha tāmrakam ।।śulvamaudumbaraṃ lauhe tīkṣṇaṃ kālāṃyasāyasī ।kṣāraḥ kāco atha capalo rasaḥ sūtaś ca pārade ।।garalaṃ māhiṣaṃ śṛṅgaṃ trapusīsakapiccaṭaṃ ।hiṇḍīro abdhikaphaḥ pheṇo madhūcchiṣṭantu sikthakam ।।raṅgavaṅge picusthūlo kūlaṭī tu manaḥśilā ।yavakṣāraś ca pākyaḥ syāt tvakkṣīrā vaṃśalocanāḥ ।।vṛṣalā jadhanyajāḥ śūdrāścāṇḍālāntyāś caśaṅkarāḥ ।kāruḥ śilpī saṃhataistair dvayoḥ śreṇiḥ sajātibhiḥ ।।raṅgājīvaścitrakarastvaṣṭā takṣā ca vardhakiḥ ।nāḍindhamaḥ svarṇakāro nāpitāntāvasāyinaḥ ।।jāvālaḥ syādajājīvo devājīvastu devalaḥ ।jāyājīvastu śailūṣā bhṛtako bhṛtibhuktathā ।।vivarṇaḥ pāmaro nīcaḥ prākṛtaś ca pṛthagjanaḥ ।vihīnopasado jālmo bhṛtye dāseraceṭakāḥ ।।paṭustu peśalo dakṣo mṛgayurlubdhakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।cāṇḍālastu divākīrtiḥ pustaṃ lepyādikarmaṇi ।।pañcālikā putrikā syādvarkarastaruṇaḥ paśuḥ ।mañjūṣā peṭakaḥ peḍā tulyasādhāraṇau samau ।

pratimā syāt pratikṛtirvargā brahmādayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe kṣatraviṭśīdravargā māma pañcaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

sāmānyanāmaliṅgāni

agnir uvāca
sāmānyāny atha vakṣyāmi nāmaliṅgāni tacchṛṇu ।sukṛtī puṇyavān dhnayo mahecchastu mahāśayaḥ ।।pravīṇanipuṇābhijñavijñaniṣṇātaśikṣitāḥ ।syurvadānyasthūlalakṣadānaśauṇḍā bahuprade ।।kṛtī kṛtajñaḥ kuśala āsaktodyukta utsukaḥ ।ibhya āḍhyaḥ parivṛḍho hy adhibhūrnāyako adhipaḥ ।।lakṣmīvān lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīlaḥ svatantraḥ svairyapāvṛtaḥ ।khalapūḥ syādvahukaro dīrghasūtraścirakriyaḥ ।।jālmo asamīkṣyakārī syāt kuṇṭho mandaḥ kriyāsu yaḥ ।karmaśūraḥ karmaṭhaḥ syādbhakṣako ghasmaro admaraḥ ।।lolupo gardhalo gṛdhrurvinītapraśritau tathā ।dhṛṣṭe dhṛṣṇurviyātaś ca nibhṛtaḥ pratibhānvite ।।pragalbho bhīruko bhīrurvandārurabhivādake ।bhūṣṇurbhaviṣṇurbhavitā jñātā vidurabindukau ।।mattaśauṇḍotkaṭakṣīvāś caṇḍastvatyantakopanaḥ ।

devānañcati devadryaṅviśvadryaṅviśvagañcati ।।yaḥ sahāñcati sa sadhryaṅ sa tiryaṅ yastiro añcati ।vācoyuktiḥ paṭurvāgmī vāvadūkaś ca vaktari ।।syājjalpakastu vācālo vācāṭo bahugarhyavāk ।apadhvasto dhikkṛtaḥ syādbaddhe kīlitasaṃyatau ।।varaṇaḥ śabdano nāndīvādī nānvīkaraḥ samāḥ ।vyasanārtoparakrau dvau baddhe kīlitasaṃyatau ।।vihistavyākulau tulyau nṛśaṃsakrūraghātukāḥ ।pāpo dhūrto vañcakaḥ syānmūrkhe vaidehavāliśau ।।kadarye kṛpaṇakṣudrau mārgaṇo yācakārthinau ।ahaṅkāravānahaṃyuḥ syācchubhaṃyustu śubhānvitaḥ ।।kāntaṃ manoramaṃ rucyaṃ hṛdyābhīṣṭe hy abhīpsite ।asāraṃ phalgu śūnyaṃ vai mukhyavaryavareṇyakāḥ ।।śreyān śreṣṭhaḥ puṣkalaḥ syātprāgryāgryagrīyamagrimaṃ ।vaḍroru vipulaṃ pīnapīvnī tu sthūlapīvare ।।stokālpakṣullakāḥ sūkṣmaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ dabhraṃkṛśantanu ।mātrākuṭīlavakaṇā bhūyiṣṭhaṃ puruhaṃ puru ।।akhaṇḍaṃ pūrṇasakalamupakaṇṭhāntikābhitaḥ ।samīpe sannidhābhyāsau nediṣṭaṃ susamīpakaṃ ।।sudūre tu daviṣṭhaṃ syādvṛttaṃ nistalavartule ।uccaprāṃśūnnatodagrā dhruvo nityaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।āviddhaṃ kuṭilaṃ bhugnaṃ vellitaṃ vakramityapi ।

pāṭho ayaṃ puraruktidoṣeṇa duṣṭaḥ
cañcalaṃ taralañcaiva kaṭhoraṃ jaṭharaṃ dṛḍhaṃ ।।pratyagro abhinavo navyo navīno nūtano navaḥ ।ekatāno ananyavṛttiruccaṇḍamavilambitaṃ ।।uccāvacaṃ naikabhedaṃ sambādhakalilaṃ tathā ।timitaṃ stimitaṃ klinnamabhiyogatvabhigrahaḥ ।।sphātirvṛddhau prathā khyātau samāhāraḥ samuccayaḥ ।apahārastvapacayo vihārastu parikramaḥ ।।pratyāhāra upādānaṃ nirhāro abhyavakarṣaṇaṃ ।vighno antarāyaḥ pratyūhaḥ syādāsyātvāsanā sthitiḥ ।।sannidhiḥ sannikarṣaḥ syātmaṃkramo durgasañcaraḥ ।upalambhastvanubhavaḥ pratyādeśo nirākṛtiḥ ।।parirambhaḥpariṣvaṅgaḥ saṃśleṣa upagūhanaṃ ।anumā pakṣahetvādyair ḍimbe bhramaraviplavau ।।asannikṛṣtārthajñānaṃ śabdāddhi śābdamīritaṃ ।sādṛśyadarśanāttulye buddhiḥ syādupamānakaṃ ।।kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā vinā nasyādarthāpattiḥ parārthadhīḥ ।pratiyoginyāgṛhīte bhuvi nāstītyabhāvakaḥ ।ityādināmaliṅgo hi harirukto nṛbuddhaye ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sāmānyanāmaliṅgāni nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha saptaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

nityanaimīttikaprākṛtapralayāḥ

agnir uvāca
caturvidhastu pralayo nityo yaḥ prāṇināṃ layaḥ ।sadā vināśo jātānāṃ brāhmo naimittiko layaḥ ।।caturyugasahasrānte prākṛtaḥ prākṛto layaḥ ।laya ātyantiko jñānādātmanaḥ paramātmani ।।naimittikasya kalpānte vakṣye rūpaṃ layasya te ।caturyugasahasrānte kṣīṇaprāye mahītale ।।anāvṛṣṭiratīvogrā jāyate śatavārṣikī ।tataḥ sattvakṣayaḥ syācca tato viṣṇurjagatpatiḥ ।।sthito jalāni pivati bhānoḥ saptasu raśmiṣu ।bhūpātālasamudrāditoyaṃ nayati saṃkṣayaṃ ।।tatastasyānubhāvena toyāhāropavṛṃhitāḥ ।ta eva raśmayaḥ sapta jāyante sapta bhāskarāḥ ।।dahanty aśeṣaṃ trailokyaṃ sapātālatalaṃ dvija ।kūrmapṛṣṭhasamā bhūḥ syāttataḥ kālāgnirudrakaḥ ।।śeṣāhiśvāsasampātāt pātālāni dahatyadhaḥ ।pātālebhyo bhuvaṃ viṣṇurbhuvaḥ svargaṃ dahatyataḥ ।।ambarīṣamivābhāti trailokyamakhilaṃ tathā ।tatastāparītāstu lokadvayanivāsinaḥ ।।

gācanti te maharlokaṃ maharlokājjanaṃ tataḥ ।rudrarūpī jagaddagdhvā mukhaniśvāsato hareḥ ।।uttiṣṭanti tato medhā nānārūpāḥ savidyutaḥ ।śataṃ varṣāṇi varṣantaḥ śamayantyagnimutthitam ।।saptarṣisthānamākramya sthite ambhasi śataṃ marut ।mukhaniśvāsato viṣṇornāśaṃ nayati tānghanān ।।vāyuṃ pītvā hariḥ śeṣe śete caikārṇave prabhuḥ ।brahmarūpadharaḥ siddhair jalagair munibhistutaḥ ।।ātmamāyāmayīṃ divyāṃ yoganidrāṃ samāsthitaḥ ।ātmānaṃ vasidevākhyaṃ cintayanmadhusūdanaḥ ।।kalpaṃ śete prabuddho atha brahmarūpī sṛjaty asau ।dviparārdhantato vyaktaṃ prakṛtau līyate dvija ।।sthānāt sthānaṃ daśaguṇamekasmādguṇyate sthale ।tato aṣṭādaśame bhāge parārdhamabhidhīyate ।।parārdhaṃ dviguṇaṃ yattu prākṛtaḥ pralayaḥ smṛtaḥ ।anāvṛṣṭyāgnisamparkāt kṛte saṃjvalane dvija ।।mahadādervikārasya viśeṣāntasya saṃkṣaye ।kṛṣṇecchākārite tasmin samprāpte pratisañcare ।।āpo grasanti vai pūrvaṃ bhūmirgandhādikaṃ guṇaṃ ।ātmagandhāttato bhūmiḥ pralayatvāya kalpate ।।rasātmikāś ca tiṣṭhanti hy āpastāsāṃ raso guṇaḥ ।pīyate jyotiṣā tāsu naṣṭāsvagniś ca dīpyate ।।jyotiṣo api guṇaṃ rūpaṃ vāyurgrasati bhāskaraṃ ।

naṣṭe jyotiṣi vāyuś cabalī dodhūyate mahān ।।vāyorapi guṇaṃ sparśamākāśaṃ grasate tataḥ ।vāyau naṣṭe tu cākāśannīravaṃ tiṣṭhati dvija ।।ākāśasyātha vai śabdaṃ bhūtādirgrasate ca khaṃ ।abhimānātmakaṃ khañca bhūtādiṃ grasate mahān ।।bhūmiryāti layañcāpsu āpo jyotiṣi tadbrajet ।vāyau vāyuś ca khe khañca ahaṅkāre layaṃ sa ca ।।mahāttatve mahāntañca prakṛtirgrasate dvija ।vyaktāvyaktā ca prakṛtirvyaktasyāvyaktake layaḥ ।।pumāne kākṣaraḥ śuddhaḥ so apyaṃśaḥ paramātmanaḥ ।prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś caitau līyete paramātmani ।।na santi yatra sarveśe nāmajātyādikalpanāḥ ।sattāmātrātmake jñeye jñānātmanyātmahaḥ pare ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe nityanaimittikaprākṛtapralayā nāma saptaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athāṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

ātyantikalayagarbhotpattinirūpaṇaṃ

agnir uvāca
ātyantikaṃ layaṃ vakṣye jñānādātyantiko layaḥ ।ādhyātmikādisantāpaṃ jñātvā svasya virāgataḥ ।।

ādhyātmikastu santāpaḥśārīro mānaso dvidhā ।śārīro bahubhirbhedaistāpo asau śrūyatāṃ dvija ।।tyaktvā jīvo bhogadehaṃ garbhamāproti karmabhiḥ ।ātivāhikasaṃjñastu deho bhavati vai dvija ।।kevalaṃ sa manuṣyāṇāṃ mṛtyukāla upasthite ।yāmyaiḥ puṃbhirmanuṣyāṇāṃ taccharīraṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।nīyate yāmyamārgeṇa prāṇināṃ mune ।tataḥ svaryāti narakaṃ sa bhramedghaṭayantravat ।।karmabhūmiriyaṃ brahman phalabhūmirasau smṛtā ।yamo yonīś ca narakaṃ nirūpayati karmaṇā ।।pūraṇīyāś ca tenaiva yamañcaivānupaśyatāṃ ।vāyubhūtāḥ prāṇinaś ca garbhante prāpnuvanti hi ।।yamadūtair manuṣyastu nīyate tañca paśyati ।dharmī ca pūjyate tena pāpiṣṭhastāḍyate gṛhe ।।śubhāśubhaṃ karma tasya citragupto nirūpayet ।bāndhavānāmaśauce tu dehe khalvātivāhike ।।tiṣṭhannayati dharmajña dattapiṇḍāśanantataḥ ।tanyaktvā pretadehantu prāpyānyaṃ pretalokataḥ ।।vaset kṣudhā tṛṣā yukta āmaśrāddhānnabhuṅnaraḥ ।ātivāhikedehāttu pretapiṇḍair vinā naraḥ ।।na hi mokṣamavāpnoti piṇḍāṃstatraiva so aśrute ।kṛte sapiṇḍīkaraṇe naraḥ saṃvatsarātparaṃ ।।

pretalaukike iti kha
pretadehaṃ samutamṛjya bhogadehaṃ prapadyate ।bhogadehāvubhau proktāvaśubhaśubhasaṃjñitau ।।bhuktvā tu bhogadehena karmabandhānnipātyate ।taṃ dehaṃ paratastasmādbhakṣayanti niśācarāḥ ।।pāpe tiṣṭhati cet svargaṃ tena bhuktaṃ tadā dvija ।tadā dvitīyaṃ gṛhṇāti bhogadehantu pāpināṃ ।।bhuktvā pāpantu vai paścādyena bhuktaṃ tripiṣṭapaṃ ।śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe svargabhraṣṭo abhijāyate ।।puṇye tiṣṭhati cetpāpantena bhuktaṃ tadā bhavet ।tasmin sambhakṣite dehe śubhaṃ gṛhṇāti vigraham ।।karmaṇyalpāvaśeṣe tu narakādapi mucyate ।muktastu narakādyāti tiryagyoniṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।।jīvaḥ praviṣṭo garbhantu kalale apyatra tiṣṭhati ।ghanībhūtaṃ dvitīye tu tṛtīye avayavāstataḥ ।।caturthe asthīni tvaṅmāṃsampañcame romasambhavaḥ ।ṣaṣṭhe ceto atha jīvasya duḥkhaṃ vindati saptame ।।jarāyuveṣṭite dehe mūrdhni baddhāñjalis tathā ।madhye klīvastu vāme strī dakṣiṇe puruṣasthitiḥ ।।tiṣṭhatyudarabhāge tu pṛṣṭhasyābhimukhas tathā ।yasyāṃ tiṣṭhatyasau yonau tāṃ sa vetti na saṃśayaḥ ।।sarvañca vetti vṛttāntamārabhya narajammanaḥ ।

gacchatīti ka
andhakārañca mahatīṃ pīḍāṃ vindati mānavaḥ ।।māturāhārapītantu saptame māsyupāśnute ।aṣṭame navame māsi bhṛśamudvijata tathā ।।vyavāye pīḍāmāpnoti māturvyāyāmake tathā ।vyādhiś ca vyādhitāyāṃ syānmuhūrtaṃ śatavarṣavat ।।santapyate karmabhistu kurute atha manorathān ।garbhādvinirgato brahman mokṣajñānaṃ kariṣyati ।।sūtivātair adhībhūto niḥsaredyoniyantrataḥ ।pīḍyamāno māsamātraṃ karasparśena duḥkhitaḥ ।।khaśabdāt kṣudraśrotāṃsi dehe śrotraṃ viviktatā ।śvāsocchāsau gatirvāyorvakrasaṃsparśanaṃ tathā ।।agnerūpaṃ darśanaṃ syādūṣmā paṅktiś ca pittakaṃ ।medhā varṇaṃ balaṃ chāyā tejaḥ śauryaṃ śarīrake ।।jalātsvedaś ca rasanandehe vai saṃprajāyate ।kledo vasā rasā takraṃ śukramūtrakaphādikaṃ ।।bhūmerdhrāṇaṃ keśanakhaṃ gauravaṃ sthirato asthitaḥ ।mātṛjāni mṛdūnyatra tvaṅmāṃsahṛdayāni ca ।।nābhirmajjā śakṛnmedaḥ kledānyāmāśayāni ca ।pitṛjāni śirāsnāyuśukrañcaivātmajāni tu ।।kāmakrodhau bhayaṃ harṣo dharmādharmātmatā tathā ।ākṛtiḥ svaravarṇau tu mehanādyaṃ tathā ca yat ।।

śvāsocchāsau sanirvāpau vāhyasaṃsparśanamiti ña

nābhirmeḍamiti kha, ña ca
??? ।।tāmasāni tathājñānaṃ pramādālasyatṛṭkṣudhāḥ ।mohamātsaryavaiguṇyaśokāyāsabhayāni ca ।।kāmakrodhau tathā śauryaṃ yajñepsā bahubhāṣitā ।ahaṅkāraḥ parāvajñā rājasāni mahāmune ।।dharmepsā mokṣakāmitvaṃ parā bhaktiś ca keśave ।dākṣiṇyaṃ vyavasāyitvaṃ sātvikāni vinirdiśet ।।capalaḥ krodhano bhīrurbahubhāṣo kalipriyaḥ ।svapne gaganagaś caiva bahuvāto naro bhavet ।।akālapalitaḥ krordho mahāprājño raṇapriyaḥ ।svapne ca dīptimatprekṣī bahupitto naro bhavet ।।sthiramitraḥ sthirotsāhaḥ sthirāṅgo draviṇānvitaḥ ।svapne jalasitālokī bahuśle ṣmā naro bhavet ।।rasastu prāṇināṃ dehe jīvanaṃ rudhiraṃ tathā ।lepanañca tathā māṃsamedhasnehakarantu tat ।।dhāraṇantv asthi majjā syātpūraṇaṃ vīryavardhanaṃ ।śukravīryakaraṃ hy ojaḥ prāṇakṛjjīvasaṃsthitiḥ ।।ojaḥ śukrāt sārataramāpītaṃ hṛdayopagaṃ ।ṣaḍaṅgaśakthinī bāhurmūrdhā jaṭharamīritaṃ ।।ṣaṭtvacā vāhyato yadvadanyā rudhiradhārikā ।vilāsadhāriṇī cānyā caturthī kuṇḍadhāriṇī ।।pañcamī vidradhisthānaṃ ṣaṣṭhī prāṇadharā matā ।kalāsaptamau māṃsadharā dvitīyā raktadhāriṇī ।।yakṛtplīhāśrayā cānyā medodharāsthidhāriṇī ।

majjāśleṣmapurīṣāṇāṃ dharā pakvāśayasthitā ।ṣaṣṭhī pittadharā śukradharā śukrāśayāparā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe ātyantikalayagarbhotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣṭyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athonasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

śarīrāvayavāḥ

agnir uvāca
śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ dhīḥ khuñca bhūtagaṃ ।śabdasparśarūparamagandhāḥ khādiṣu tadguṇāḥ ।।pāyūpasthau karau pādau vāgbhavet karmakhuntathā ।utsargānandakādānagativāgādi karma tat ।।pañcakarmendriyānyatra pañcabuddhīndriyāṇi ca ।indriyārthāś ca pañcaiva mahābhūtā mano adhipāḥ ।।ātmāvyaktaś caturviṃśatattvāni puruṣaḥ paraḥ ।saṃyuktaś ca viyuktaś ca yathā matsyodake ubhe ।।avyaktamāsritānīha rajaḥsattvatamāṃsi ca ।āntaraḥ puruṣo jīvaḥ sa paraṃ brahma kāraṇaṃ ।।sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yo vetti puruṣaṃ paraṃ ।saptāśayāḥ smṛtā dehe rudhirasyaika āśayaḥ ।।śleṣmaṇaścāmapittābhyāṃ pakvāśayastu pañcamaḥ ।

vāyumūtrāśayaḥ saptaḥ strīṇāṃ garbhāśayo aṣṭamaḥ ।।pittātpakvāśayo agneḥ syādyonirvikaśitā dyutau ।padmavadgarbhāśayaḥ syāttatra ghatte saraktakaṃ ।।śukraṃ svaśukrataścāṅgaṃ kuntalānyatra kālataḥ ।nyastaṃ śukramato yonau neti garbhāśayaṃ mune ।।ṛtāvapi ca yoniścedvātapittakaphāvṛtā ।bhavettadā vikāśitvaṃ naiva tasyāṃ prajāyate ।।bukkātpukkasakaplīhakṛtakoṣṭhāṅgahṛdvraṇāḥ ।taṇḍakaś ca mahābhāga nibaddhānyāśaye mataḥ ।।rasasya pacyamānasya sārādbhavati dehināṃ ।plīhā yakṛcca dharmajña raktapheṇācca pukkasaḥ ।।raktaṃ pittañca bhavati tathā taṇḍakasaṃjñakaḥ ।medoraktaprasārācca vukkāyāḥ sambhavaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।raktamāṃsaprasārācca bhavantyantrāṇi dehināṃ ।sārdhatrivyāmasaṃkhyāni tāni nṝṇāṃ vinirdiśet ।।trivyāmāni tathā strīṇāṃ prāhurvedavido janaḥ ।raktavāyusamāyogāt kāmeyasyodbhavaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।kaphaprasārādbhavati hṛdayaṃ padmasannibhaṃ ।adhomukhaṃ tacchūṣiraṃ yatra jīvo vyavasthitaḥ ।।caitanyānugatā bhāvaḥsarve tatra vyavasthitāḥ ।tasya vāme tathā plīhā dakṣiṇe ca tathā yakṛt ।।dakṣiṇe ca tathā kloma padmasyaivaṃ prakīrtitaṃ ।śrotāṃsi yāni dehe asmin kapharaktavahāni ca ।।

teṣāṃ bhūtānumānācca bhavatīndriyasambhavaḥ ।netrayormaṇḍalaṃ śuklaṃ kaphādbhavati paitṛkaṃ ।।kṛṣṇañca maṇḍalaṃ vātāttathā mavati mātṛkaṃ ।pittāttvaṅmaṇḍalaṃ jñeyaṃ mātāpitṛsamudbhavaṃ ।।māṃsāsṛkkaphajā jihvā medo asṛkkaphamāṃsajau ।vṛṣāṇau daśa prāṇasya jñeyānyāyatanāni tu ।।mūrdhā hṛnnābhikaṇṭhāś ca jihvā śukrañca śoṇitaṃ ।gudaṃ vastiś ca gulphañca kaṇḍurāḥ śoḍaśeritāḥ ।।dve kare dve ca caraṇe catasraḥ pṛṣṭhato gale ।dehe pādādiśīrṣānte jālāni caiva ṣoḍaśa ।।māṃsasnāyuśirāsthinyaḥ catvāraś ca pṛthak pṛthak ।maṇibandhanagulpheṣu nibaddhāni parasparaṃ ।।ṣaṭkūrcāni smṛtānīha hastayoḥ pādayoḥ pṛthak ।grīvāyāñca tathā meḍhre kathitāni manīṣibhiḥ ।।pṛṣṭhavaṃśasyopagatāś catasro māṃsarajjavaḥ ।navatyaś ca tathā peśyastāsāṃ bandhanakārikāḥ ।।sīraṇyaś ca tathā sapta pañca mūrdhānamāśritāḥ ।ekaikā meḍhrajihvāstā asthi ṣaṣṭiśatatrayaṃ ।।sūkṣmaiḥ saha catuḥṣaṣṭhirdaśanā viṃśatirnakhāḥ ।pāṇipādaśalākāś ca tāsāṃ sthānacatuṣṭayaṃ ।।ṣaṣṭyaṅgulīnāṃ dve pārṣṇyorgulpheṣu ca catuṣṭayaṃ ।catvāryaratnyorasthīni jaṅghayostadvadeva tu ।।dve dve jānukapoloruphalakāṃśasamudbhavaṃ ।

akṣasthānāṃśakaśroṇiphalake caivamādiśet ।।bhagāstokaṃ tathā pṛṣṭhe catvāriṃśacca pañca ca ।grīvāyāñca tathāsthīni jatrukañca tathā hamuḥ ।।tanmūlaṃ dvelalāṭākṣigaṇḍanāsāṅghyravasthitāḥ ।parśukāstālukaiḥ sārdhamarvudaiś ca dvisaptatiḥ ।।dveśaṅkhake kapālāni catvāryeva śiras tathā ।uraḥ saptadaśāsthīni sandhīnāṃ dve śate daśa ।।aṣṭaṣaṣṭistu śākhāsu ṣaṣṭiś caikavivarjitā ।antarā vai tryaśītiś ca snāyor navaśatāni ca ।।triṃśādhike dve śate tu antarādhau tu saptatiḥ ।ūrdhvagāḥ ṣaṭśatānyeva śākhāstu kathitāni tu ।।pañcapeśīśatānyeva catvāriṃśattathordhvagāḥ ।catuḥśatantu śākhāsu antarādhau ca ṣaṣṭikā ।।strīṇām caikādhikā vai syādviṃśatiś caturuttarā ।stanayordaśa yonau ca trayodaśa tathāśaye ।।garbhasya ca catasraḥ syuḥ śirāṇāñca śarīriṇāṃ ।triṃśacchatasahasrāṇi tathānyāni navaiva tu ।।ṣaṭpañcāśatsahasrāṇi rasandehe vahanti tāḥ ।kedāra iva kulyāś ca kledalepādikañca yat ।।dvāsaptatis tathā koṭyo vyomnāmiha mahāmune ।majjāyā medasaś caiva vasāyāś ca tathā dvija ।।mūtrasya caiva pittasya śleṣmaṇaḥ śakṛtas tathā ।

pañcapeśīśatānyatreti kha, ña ca
raktasya sarasasyātra kramaśo añjalayo matāḥ ।।ardhārdhābhyadhikāḥ sarvāḥ pūrvapūrvāñjalermatāḥ ।ardhāñjaliś ca śukrasya tadardhañca tataujasaḥ ।।rajasastu tathā strīṇāñcatasraḥ kathitā budhaiḥ ।śarīraṃ maladoṣādi piṇḍaṃ jñātvātmani tyajet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe śarīrāvayavā nāmo na saptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athasapratyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

narakanirūpaṇam

agnir uvāca
uktāni yamamārgāṇi vakṣye atha maraṇe nṛṇāṃ ।ūṣmā prakupitaḥ kāye tīvravāyusamīritaḥ ।।śarīramuparudhyātha kṛtsnāndoṣānruṇaddhi vai ।chinatti prāṇasthānāni punarmarmāṇi caiva hi ।।śaityāt prakupito vāyuśchidramanviṣyate tataḥ ।dve netre dvau tathā karṇau dvau tu nāsāpuṭau tathā ।।ūrdhvantu sapta cchidrāṇi aṣṭamaṃ vadanaṃ tathā ।etaiḥ prāṇo viniryāti prāyaśaḥ śubhakarmaṇāṃ ।।adhaḥ pāyurupasthañca anenāśubhakāriṇāṃ ।

piṇḍaṃ kṛtvā tuvnyasediti ña
mūrdhānaṃ yogino bhittvā jīvo yātyatha cecchayā ।।antakāle tu samprāpre prāṇe apānamupasthite ।tamasā saṃvṛte jñāne saṃvṛteṣu ca marmasu ।।sa jivo nābhyadhiṣṭānaścālyate mātariśvanā ।bādhyamāṇaścānayate aṣṭāṅgāḥ prāṇavṛttikāḥ ।।cyavantaṃ jāyamānaṃ vā praviśantañca yoniṣu ।prapaśyanti ca taṃ siddhā devā divyena cakṣupā ।।gṛhṇāti tatkṣaṇādyoge śarīrañcātivāhikam ।ākāśavāyutejāṃsi vigrahādūrdhvagāminaḥ ।।jalaṃ mahī ca pañcatvamāpannaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ ।ātivāhikadehantu yamadūtā nayanti taṃ ।।yāmyaṃ mārgaṃ mahāghoraṃ ṣaḍaśītisahasrakam ।annodakaṃ nīyamāno bāndhavair dattamaśnute ।।yamaṃ dṛṣṭvā yamoktena citraguptena ceritān ।prāpnoti narakānraudrāndharmī śubhapathair divam ।।bhujyante pāpibhirvakṣye narakāṃstāś ca yātanāḥ ।aṣṭāviṃśatirevādhaḥkṣiternarakakoṭayaḥ ।।saptamasya talasyānte ghore tamasi saṃsthitāḥ ।ghorākhyā prathamākoṭiḥ sughorā tadadhaḥsthitā ।।atighorā mahāghorā ghorarūpā ca pañcamī ।ṣaṣṭhī taralatārākhyā saptamī ca bhayānakā ।।bhayotkaṭā kālarātrī mahācaṇḍā ca caṇḍayā ।kolāhalā pracaṇḍākhyā padmā narakanāyikā ।।

padmāvatī bhīṣaṇā ca bhīmā caiva karālikā ।vikarālā mahāvajrā trikoṇā pañcakoṇikā ।।sadīrghā vartulā saptabhūmā caiva subhūmikā ।dīptamāyāṣṭāviṃśatayaḥ koṭayaḥ pāpiduḥkhadāḥ ।।aṣṭāviṃśatikoṭīnāṃ pañca pañca ca nāyakāḥ ।rauravādyāḥ śatañcaikaṃ catvāriṃśaccatuṣṭayaṃ ।।tāmiśramandhatāmiśraṃ mahārauravarauravau ।asipatraṃ vanañcaiva lohabhāraṃ tathaiva ca ।।narakaṃ kālasūtrañca mahānarakameva va ।sañjīvanaṃ mahāvīci tapanaṃ sampratāpanaṃ ।।saṅghātañca sakākolaṃ kudmalaṃ pūtimṛttikaṃ ।lohaśaṅkumṛjīṣañca pradhānaṃ śālmalīṃ nadīm ।।narakānviddhi koṭīśanāganvai ghoradarśanān ।pātyante pāpakarmāṇa ekaikasminbahuṣvapi ।।mārjārolūkagomāyugṛghrādivadanāś ca te ।tailadroṇyāṃ naraṃ kṣiptvā jvālayanti hutāśanaṃ ।।ambarīṣeṣu caivānyāṃstāmrapātreṣu cāparān ।ayaḥpātreṣu caivānyān bahuvahnikaṇeṣu ca ।।śūlāgrāropitāścānye chidyante narake apare ।tāḍyante ca kaśābhistu bhojyante cāpyayoguḍān ।।yamadūtair narāḥ pāṃśūnviṣṭhāraktakaphādikān ।taptaṃ madyaṃ pāyayanti pāṭayanti punarnarān ।।yantreṣu pīḍayanti sma bhakṣyante vāyasādibhiḥ ।

tailenoṣṇena sicyante chidyante naikaghā śiraḥ ।।hā tāteti krandamānāḥ svakannidanti karma te ।mahāpātakajānghorānnarakānprāpya garhitān ।।karmakṣayātprajāyante mahāpātakinastviha ।mṛgaśvaśūkaroṣṭrāṇāṃ brahmahā yonimṛcchati ।।kharapukkaśamlecchānāṃ madyapaḥ svarṇahāryapi ।kṛmikīṭapataṅgatvaṃ gurugastṛṇagulmatāṃ ।।brahmahā kṣayarogī syāt surāpaḥ śyāvadantakaḥ ।svarṇahārī tu kunakhī duś carmā gurutalpagaḥ ।।yo yena saṃspṛśatyeṣāṃ sa talliṅgo abhijāyate ।annahartā māyāvī syānmūko vāgapahārakaḥ ।।dhānyaṃ hṛtvātiriktāṅgaḥ piśunaḥ pūtināsikaḥ ।tailahṛttailapāyī syāt pūtivaktrastu sūcakaḥ ।।parasya yoṣitaṃ hṛtvā brahmasvamapahṛtya ca ।araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ ।।ratnahārī hīnajātirgandhān chuchundarī śubhān ।patraṃ śākaṃ śikhī hṛtvā mukharo dhānyahārakaḥ ।।ajaḥ paśuṃpayaḥ kāko yānamuṣṭraḥ phalaṃ kapiḥ ।madhu daṃśaḥ phalaṃ gṛdhro gṛhakāka upaskaraṃ ।।śivatrī vastraṃ sārasañca jhallī lavaṇahārakaḥ ।ukta ādhyātmikastāpaḥ śastrādyair ādhibhautikaḥ ।।grahāgnidevapīḍādyair ādhikaivika īritaḥ ।

yānaṃ vasta iti kha
trithā tāpaṃ hi saṃsāraṃ jñānayogādvināśayet ।
kṛcchrair vrataiś ca dānādyair viṣṇupūjādibhirnaraḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe narakanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athaikasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yamaniyamāḥ

agnir uvāca
saṃsāratāpamuktyarthaṃ vakṣyāmy aṣṭāṅgayogakaṃ ।brahmaprakāśakaṃ jñānaṃ yogastatraikacittatā ।।cittavṛttirnirodhaś ca jīvabrahmātmanoḥ paraḥ ।ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahau ।।yamāḥ pañca smṛtā niyamādbhuktimuktidāḥ ।śaucaṃ santoṣatapasī svādhyāyeśvarapūjane ।।bhūtāpīḍā hy ahiṃsā syādahiṃsā dharma uttamaḥ ।yathā gajapade anyāni padāni pathagāmināṃ ।।evaṃ sarvamahiṃsāyāṃ dharmārthamabhidhīyate ।udvegajananaṃ hiṃsā santāpakaraṇantathā ।।rukkṛtiḥ śonitakṛtiḥ paiśunyakaraṇantathā ।
