brahmaprakāśanaṃ jñānamiti ña

yathā nāgapade anyānīti ka

padagāmināmiti kha, ja ca
hitasyātiniṣedhaś ca marmodghāṭanameva ca ।।sukhāpahnutiḥ saṃrodho badho daśavithā ca sā ।yadbhūtahitamatyantaṃ vacaḥ satyasya lakṣaṇaṃ ।।satyaṃ brūyātpriyaṃ brūyānna brūyātsatyamapriyaṃ ।priyañca nānṛtaṃ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।maithunasya parityāgo brahmacaryantadaṣṭadhā ।smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ keliḥ prekṣyaṇaṃ guhyabhāṣaṇaṃ ।।saṅkalpo adhyavasāyaś ca kriyānirvṛttireva ca ।etanmaithunamaṣṭāṅgaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।brahmacaryaṃ kriyāmūlamanyathā viphalā kriyā ।vasiṣṭhaś candramāḥ śukro devācāryaḥ pitāmahaḥ ।।tapovṛddhā vayovṛddhāste api strībhirvimohitāḥ ।gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyāstrividhāḥ surāḥ ।।caturthī strī surā jñeyā yayedaṃ mohitaṃ jagat ।mādyati pramadāṃ dṛṣṭvā surāṃ pītvā tu mādyati ।।yasmāddṛṣṭamadā nārī tasmāttānnāvalokayet ।yadvā tadvāparadravyamapahṛtya balānnaraḥ ।।avaśyaṃ yāti tiryaktvaṃ jagdhvā caivāhutaṃ haviḥ ।kaupīnācchādanaṃ vāsaḥ kanthāṃ śītanivāriṇīṃ ।।pāduke cāpi gṛhṇīyāt kuryānnānyasya saṃgrahaṃ ।dehasthitinimittasya vastrādeḥ syātparigrahaḥ ।।śarīraṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnataḥ ।śaucantu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ vāhyamabhyantaraṃ tathā ।।

gṛjjalābhyāṃ smṛtaṃ vāhyaṃ bhāvaśuddherathāntaraṃ ।ubhayena śuciryastu sa śucirnetaraḥ śuciḥ ।।yathā kathañcitprāptyā ca santoṣastuṣṭirucyate ।manasaścendriyāṇāñca aikāgryaṃ tapa ucyate ।।tajjayaḥ sarvadharmebhyaḥ sa dharmaḥ para ucyate ।vācikaṃ mantrajapyādi mānasaṃ rāgavarjanaṃ ।।śārīraṃ devapūjādi sarvadantu tridhā tapaḥ ।praṇavādyāstato vedāḥ praṇave paryavasthitāḥ ।।vāṅmayaḥ praṇavaḥ sarvaṃ tasmātpraṇavamabhyaset ।akāraś ca tathokāro makāraścārdhamātrayā ।।tisro mātrāstrayo vedāḥ lokā bhūrādayo guṇāḥ ।jāgratsvapnaḥ suṣuptiś ca brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ ।।pradyumnaḥ śrīrvāsudevaḥ sarvamoṅgārakaḥ kramāt ।amātro naṣṭamātraś ca dvaitasyāpagamaḥ śivaḥ ।।oṅkāro vidito yena sa munirnetaro muniḥ ।caturthī mātrā gāndhārī prayuktā mūrdhnilakṣyate ।।tatturīyaṃ paraṃ brahma jyotirdīpo ghaṭe yathā ।tathā hṛtpadmanilayaṃ dhyāyennityaṃ japennaraḥ ।।praṇavo dhanuḥ śaro hy ātmā brahma tallakṣyamucyate ।apramattena veddhavyaṃ śaravattanmayo bhavet ।।etedekākṣaraṃ brahma etadekākṣaraṃ paraṃ ।detadekākṣaraṃ jñātvā yo yadicchati tasya tat ।।chando asya devī gāyatrī antaryāmī ṛṣiḥ smṛtaḥ ।

devatā paramātmāsya niyogo bhuktimuktaye ।।bhūragnyātmane hṛdayaṃ bhuvaḥ prājāpatyātmane ।śiraḥ svaḥsūryātmane ca śikhā kavacamucyate ।।oṃbhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥkavacaṃ satyātmane tato astrakaṃ ।vinyasya pūjayedviṣṇuṃ japedvai bhuktimuktaye ।।juhuyācca tilājyādi sarvaṃ sampadyate nare ।yastu dvādaśasāhasraṃ japamanvahamācaret ।।tasya dvādaśabhirmāsaiḥ paraṃ brahma prakāśate ।animādi koṭijapyāllakṣātsārasvatādikaṃ ।।vaidikastāntriko miśro viṣṇārvai trividho makhaḥ ।trayānāmīpsitenaikavidhinā harimarcayet ।।praṇamya daṇḍavadbhūmau namaskāreṇa yo arcayet ।sa yāṅgatimavāpnoti na tāṃ kratuśatair api ।।yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau ।tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yamaniyamā nāmaikasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvisaptyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

āsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhārāḥ

agnir uvāca
āsanaṃ kamalādyuktaṃ tadbaddhvā cintayetparaṃ ।śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiramāsanamātmanaḥ ।।nātyucchritaṃ nātinīcaṃ celājinakuśottaraṃ ।tatraikāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yātacittendriyakriyaḥ ।।upaviśyāsane yuñjyādyogamātmaviśuddhaye ।samakāyaśīragrīvaṃ dhārayannacalaṃ sthiraḥ ।।samprekṣya nāsikāgraṃ svandiśaścānavalokayan ।pārṣṇibhyāṃ vṛṣaṇau rakṣaṃs tathā prajananaṃ punaḥ ।।urubhyāmuparisthāpya vāhū tiryak prayatnataḥ ।dakṣiṇaṃ karapṛṣṭhañca nyaseddhāmatalopari ।।unnamya śanakair vakraṃ mukhaṃ viṣṭabhya cāgrataḥ ।prāṇaḥ svadehajo vāyustasyāyāmo nirodhanaṃ ।।nāsikāpuṭamaṅgulyā pīḍyaiva ca pareṇa ca ।ādaraṃ recayedvāyuṃ recanādrecakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।vāhyena vāyunā dehaṃ dṛtivat pūrayedyathā ।tathā purṇaś ca santiṣṭhet pūraṇāt pūrakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।na bhuñcati na gṛhṇāti vāyumantarvāhiḥsthitam ।sampūrṇakumbhavattiṣṭhedacalaḥ sa tu kumbhakaḥ ।।

kanyakaḥ sakṛdudghātaḥ sa vai dvādaśamātrikaḥ ।madhyamaś ca dvirudghātaś caturviṃśatimātrikaḥ ।।uttamaś ca trirudghātaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśattālamātrikaḥ ।svedakampābhidhātānām jananaścottamottamaḥ ।।ajitānnāruhedbhūmiṃ hikkāśvāsādayas tathā ।jite prāṇe khalpadojavinmūtrādi prajāyate ।।ārogyaṃ śīghragāmitvamutsāhaḥ svarasauṣṭhavam ।balavarṇaprasādaś ca sarvadoṣakṣayaḥ phalaṃ ।।japadhyānaṃ vināgarbhaḥ sa garbhastatsamanvitaḥ ।indriyāṇāṃ jayārthāya sa garbhaṃ dhārayetparaṃ ।।jñānavairāgyayuktābhyāṃ prāṇāyāmavaśena ca ।indriyāṃś ca vinirjitya sarvameva jitaṃ bhavet ।।indriyāṇyeva tatsarvaṃ yat svarganarakāvubhau ।nigṛhītavisṛṣṭāni svargāya narakāya ca ।।śarīraṃ rathamityāhurindriyāṇyasya vājinaḥ ।manaś ca sārathiḥ proktaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ kaśaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।jñānavairāgyaraśmibhyāṃ sāyayā vidhṛtaṃ manaḥ ।śanair niścalatām eti prāṇāyāmaikasaṃhitam ।।jalavinduṃ kuśāgreṇa māse māse pivettu yaḥ ।saṃvatsaraśataṃ sāgraṃ prāṇayāmaś ca tatsamaḥ ।।indriyāṇi prasaktāni praviśya viṣayodadhau ।

kanyasa iti ña

prāṇāyāmo aṅkuśa iti jha
āhṛtya yo nigṛhṇāti pratyāhāraḥ sa ucyate ।।uddharedātmanātmānaṃ majjamānaṃ yathāmbhasi ।
bhoganadyativegena jñānavṛkṣaṃ samāśrayet ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe āsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhārā nāma dvisaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha trisaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dhyānam

agnir uvāca
dhyai cintāyāṃ smṛto dhāturviṣṇucintā muhūrmuhuḥ ।anākṣiptena manasā dhyānamityabhidhīyate ।।ātmanaḥ samanaskasya muktāśeṣopadhasya ca ।brahmacintāsamā śaktirdhyānaṃ nāma taducyate ।।dhyeyālambanasaṃsthasya sadṛśapratyayasya ca ।pratyāntaranirmuktaḥ pratyayo dhyānamucyate ।।dhyeyāvasthitacittasya pradeśe yatra kutricit ।dhyānametatsamuddiṣṭaṃ pratyayasyaikabhāvanā ।।evaṃ dhyānasamāyuktaḥ khadehaṃ yaḥ parityajet ।kulaṃ svajanamitrāṇi samuddhṛtya harirbhavet ।।evaṃ muhūrtamardhaṃ vā dhyāyed yaḥ śraddhayā hariṃ ।sopi yāṃ gatimāpnoti na tāṃ sarvair mahāmakhaiḥ ।।

bhoganadyabhiveśeneti ña
dhyātā dhyānaṃ tathā dhyeyaṃ yacca dhyānaprayojanaṃ ।etaccatuṣṭayaṃ jñātvā yogaṃ yuñjīta tattvavit ।।yogābhyāsādbhavenmūktiraiśvaryañcāṣṭadhā mahat ।jñānavairāgyasampannaḥ śraddadhānaḥ kṣamānvitaḥ ।।viṣṇubhaktaḥ sadotsāhī dhyātetthaṃ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ ।mūrtāmūrtaṃ parambrahma harerdhyānaṃ hi cintanam ।।sakalo niṣkalo jñeyaḥ sarvajñaḥ paramo hariḥ ।aṇimādiguṇaiśvaryaṃ muktirdhyānaprayojanam ।।phalena yojako viṣṇurato dhyāyet pareśvaraṃ ।gacchaṃstiṣṭhan svapan jāgradunmiṣan nimiṣannapi ।।śucirvāpyaśucirvāpi dhyāyet śatatamīśvaram ।svadehāyatanasyānte manasi sthāpya keśavam ।।hṛtpadmapīṭhikāmadhye dhyānayogena pūjayet ।dhyānayajñaḥ paraḥ śuddhaḥ sarvadoṣavivarjitaḥ ।।teneṣṭvā muktimāpnoti vāhyaśuddhaiś ca nādhvaraiḥ ।hiṃsādoṣavimuktitvādviśuddhiścittasādhanaḥ ।।dhyānayajñaḥ parastasmādapavargaphalapradaḥ ।tasmādśuddhaṃ santyajya hy anityaṃ vāhyasādhanaṃ ।।yajñādyaṃ karma santyajya yogamatyarthamabhyaset ।vikāramuktamavyaktaṃ bhogyabhogasamanvitaṃ ।।cintayeddhṛdaye pūrvaṃ kramādādau guṇatrayaṃ ।tamaḥ pracchādya rajasā sattvena cchādayedrajaḥ ।।

dhyānamārgeṇeti kha, ja ca
dhyāyettrimaṇḍalaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ sitaṃ kramāt ।sattvopādhiguṇātītaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ ।।dhyeyametadaśuddhañca tyaktvā śuddhaṃ vicintayet ।aiśvaryaṃ paṅkajaṃ divyaṃ puruśopari saṃsthitaṃ ।।dvādaśāṅgulavistīrṇaṃ śuddhaṃ vikaśitaṃ sitaṃ ।nālamaṣṭāṅṇūlaṃ tasya nābhikandasamudbhavaṃ ।।padmapatrāṣṭakaṃ jñeyamaṇimādiguṇāṣṭakam ।karṇikākeśaraṃ nālaṃ jñānavairāgyamuttamam ।।viṣṇudharmaś ca tatkandamiti padmaṃ vicintayet ।taddharmajñānavairāgyaṃ śivaiśvaryamayaṃ paraṃ ।।jñātvā padmāsanaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhāntamāpnuyāt ।tatpadmakarṇikāmadhye śuddhadīpaśikhākṛtiṃ ।।aṅguṣṭhamātramamalaṃ dhyāyedoṅkāramīśvaraṃ ।kadambagolakākāraṃ tāraṃ rūpamiva sthitaṃ ।।dhyāyedvā raśmijālena dīpyamānaṃ samantataḥ ।pradhānaṃ puruṣātītaṃ sthitaṃ padmasthamīśvaraṃ ।।dhyāyejjapecca satatamoṅkāraṃ paramakṣaraṃ ।manaḥsthityarthamicchānti sthūladhyānamanukramāt ।।tadbhūtaṃ niś calībhūtaṃ labhet sūkṣme api saṃsthitaṃ ।nābhikande sthitaṃ nālaṃ daśāṅgulasamāyataṃ ।।nālenāṣṭadalaṃ padmaṃ dvādaśāṅgulavistṛtaṃ ।

sattvopādhisamāyuktaḥ sadā dhyeyaś ca keśava iti kha

labdhadīpaśikhākṛtimiti kha, ña ca
sakarṇike kesarāle sūryasomāgnimaṇḍalaṃ ।।agnimaṇḍalamadhyasthaḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।padmī caturbhujo viṣṇuratha vāṣṭabhujo hariḥ ।।śārṅgākṣavalayadharaḥ pāśāṅkuśadharaḥ paraḥ ।svarṇavarṇaḥ śvetavarṇaḥ saśrovatsaḥ sakaustubhaḥ ।।vanamālī svarṇahārī sphuranmakarakuṇḍalaḥ ।ratnojjvalakirīṭaś ca pītāmbaradharo mahān ।।sarvābharaṇabhūṣāḍhyo vitastarvā yathecchayā ।ahaṃ brahma jyotirātmā vāudevo bimukta oṃ ।।dhyānācchrānto japenmantraṃ japācchrāntaś ca cintayet ।japadhyānādiyuktasya viṣṇuḥ śīghraṃ prasīdati ।।japayajñasya vai yajñāḥ kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīṃ ।japinaṃ nopasarpanti vyādhayaścādhayo grahāḥ ।bhuktirmurktirmṛtyujayo japena prāpnuyāt phalaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dhyānaṃ nāma trisaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

prāpnuyāddharimiti kha । prāpyate phalamiti ña

chapter 

ś atha catuḥsaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

dhāraṇā

agnir uvāca
dhāraṇā manasodhyeye saṃsthitirdhyānavaddvidhā ।mūrtāmūrtaharidhyānamanodhāraṇato hariḥ ।।yadvāhyāvasthitaṃ lakṣayaṃ tasmānna calate manaḥ ।tāvat kālaṃ pradeśeṣu dhāraṇā manasi sthitiḥ ।।kālāvadhi paricchinnaṃ dehe saṃsthāpitaṃ manaḥ ।na pracyavati yallakṣyāddhāraṇā sābhidhīyate ।।dhāraṇā dvādaśāyāmā dhyānaṃ dvadaśadhāraṇāḥ ।dhyānaṃ dvādaśakaṃ yāvatsamādhirabhidhīyate ।।dhāraṇābhyāsayuktātmā yadi prāṇair vimucyate ।kulaikaviṃśamuttārya svaryāti paramaṃ padaṃ ।।yasmin yasmin bhavedaṅge yogināṃ vyādhisambhavaḥ ।tattadaṅgaṃ dhiyā vyāpya dhārayettattvadhāraṇaṃ ।।āgneyī vāruṇī caiva aiśānī cāmṛtātmikā ।sāgniḥ śikhā phaḍantā ca viṣṇoḥ kāryā dvijottama ।।nāḍībhirvikaṭaṃ divyaṃ śūlāgraṃ vedhayecchubham ।pādāṅguṣṭhāt kapālāntaṃ raśmimaṇḍalamāvṛtaṃ ।।

svayaṃ yāti paraṃ padamiti kha
tiryakcādhordhvabhāgebhyaḥ prayāntyo atīva tejasā ।cintayet sādhakendrastaṃ yāvatsarvaṃ mahāmune ।।bhasprībhūtaṃ śarīraṃ svantataś caivīpasaṃharet ।śītaśleṣmādayaḥ pāpaṃ vinaśyanti dvijātayaḥ ।।śiro dhīrañca kārañca kaṇṭhaṃ cādhomukhe smaret ।dhyāyedacchinnacintātmā bhuyo bhūtena cātmanā ।।sphuracchīkarasaṃsmarśaprabhūte himagāmibhiḥ ।dhārābhirakhilaṃ viśvamāpūrya bhuvi cintayet ।।brahmarandhrācca saṃkṣobhādyāvadādhāramaṇḍalag ।suṣumnāntargato bhūtvā saṃpūrṇendukṛtālayaṃ ।।saṃplāvya himasaṃsparśatoyenāmṛtamūrtinā ।kṣutpipāsākramaprāyasantāpaparipīḍitaḥ ।।dhārayedvāruṇīṃ mantro tuṣṭyarthaṃ cāpyatantritaḥ ।vāruṇīdhāraṇā proktā aiśānīdhāraṇāṃ śṛṇu ।।vyomni brahmamaye padme prāṇāpāṇe kṣayaṅgate ।prasādaṃ cintayed viṣṇoryāvaccintā kṣayaṃ gatā ।।mahābhāvañjapet sarvaṃ tato vyāpaka īśvaraḥ ।ardhenduṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ nirābhāsannirañjanaṃ ।।asatyaṃ satyamābhāti tāvatsarvaṃ carācaraṃ ।yāvat svasyandarūpantu na dṛṣṭaṃ guruvaktrataḥ ।।dṛṣṭhe tasmin pare tattve ābrahma sacarācaraṃ ।

pāṭho ayamādarśadoṣeṇa duṣṭaḥ

vīraśceti ña
pramātṛmānameyañca dhyānahṛtpadmakalpanaṃ ।।mātṛmodakavatsarvaṃ japahomārcanādikaṃ ।viṣṇumantreṇa vā kuryādamṛtāṃ dhāraṇāṃ vade ।।saṃpūrṇendunibhaṃ dhyāyet kamalaṃ tantrimuṣṭigam ।śiraḥsthaṃ cintayed yatnācchaśāṅkāyutavarcasaṃ ।।sampūrṇamaṇḍalaṃ vyomni śivakallolapūrṇitaṃ ।tathā hṛtkamale dhyāyettanmadhye svatanuṃ smaret ।sādhako vigatakleśo jāyate dhāraṇādihiḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe dhāraṇā nāma catuḥsaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

samādhiḥ

agnir uvāca
yadātmamātraṃ nirbhāsaṃ stimitodadhivat sthitaṃ ।caitanyarūpavaddhyānaṃ tat samādhirihocyate ।।dhyāyanmanaḥ sanniveśya yastiṣṭhedacalasthiraḥ ।nirvātānalavadyogī samādhisthaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।।na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na paśyati na vamyati ।na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na saṅkalpayate manaḥ ।।na cābhimanyate kiñcinna ca budhyati kāṣṭhavat ।evamīśvarasaṃlīnaḥ samādhisthaḥ sa gīyate ।।

yathā dīpo nivātasyo neṅgate sopamā smṛtā ।dhyāyato viṣṇumātmānaṃ samādhistasya yoginaḥ ।।upasargāḥ pravartante divyāḥ siddhiprasūcakāḥ ।pātitaḥ śrāvaṇo dhāturdaśanasvāṅgavedanāḥ ।।prārthayanti ca taṃ devā bhogair divyaiś ca yoginaṃ ।nṛpāś ca pṛthivīdānair dhanaiś ca sudhanādhipāḥ ।।vedādisarvaśāstrañca svayameva pravartate ।abhīṣṭachandoviṣayaṃ kāvyañcāsya pravartate ।।rasāyanāni divyāni divyāś cauṣadhayas tathā ।samastāni ca śilpāni kalāḥ sarvāś ca vindati ।।surendrakanyā ity ādyā guṇāś ca pratibhādayaḥ ।tṛṇavattāntyajed yastu tasya viṣṇuḥ prasīdati ।।aṇimādiguṇaiśvaryaḥ śiṣye jñānaṃ prakāśya ca ।bhuktvā bhogān yathecchātastanuntyaktvālayāttataḥ ।।tiṣṭhet svātmani vijñāna ānande brahmaṇīśvare।malino hi yathādarśa ātmajñānāya na kṣamaḥ ।।sarvāśrayannije dehe dehī vindati vedanāṃ ।yogayuktastu sarveṣāṃ yogānnāpnoti vedanāṃ ।।ākāśamekaṃ hi yathā ghaṭādiṣu pṛthag bhavet ।tathātmaiko hy anekeṣu jalādhāreṣvivāṃśumān ।।brahmakhānilatejāṃsi jalabhūkṣitidhātavaḥ ।ime lokā eṣa cātmā tasmācca sacarācaraṃ ।।

gṛddaṇdacakrasaṃyogāt kumbhakāro yathā ghaṭaṃ ।karoti tṛṇamṛtkāṣṭhair gṛhaṃ vā gṛhakārakaḥ ।।karaṇānyevamādāya tāsu tāsviha yoniṣu ।mṛjatyātmānamātmaivaṃ sambhūya karaṇāni ca ।।karmaṇā doṣamohābhyāmicchayaiva sa badhyate ।jñānādvimucyate jīvo dharmād yogī na rogabhāk ।।vartyādhārasnehayogād yathā dīpasya saṃsthitiḥ ।vikriyāpi ca dṛṣṭvaivamakāle prāṇasaṃkṣayaḥ ।।anantā raśmayastasya dīpavad yaḥ sthito hṛdi ।sitāsitāḥ kadrunīlāḥ kapilāḥ pītalohitāḥ ।।ūrdhvamekaḥ sthitasteṣāṃ yo bhittvā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ ।brahmalokamatikramya tena yāti parāṅgatiṃ ।।yadasyānyadraśmiśatamūrdhvameva vyavasthitaṃ ।tena devanikāyāni dhāmāni pratipadyate ।।ye naikarūpāścādhastādraśmayo asya mṛduprabhāḥ ।iha karmopabhogāya taiś ca sañcarate hi saḥ ।।buddhīndriyāṇi sarvāṇi manaḥ karmendriyāṇi ca ।ahaṅkāraś ca buddhiś ca pṛthivyādīni caiva hi ।।avyakta ātmā kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrastyāsya nigadyate ।īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtasya sannasan sadasacca saḥ ।।buddherutpattiravyaktā tato ahaṅkārasambhavaḥ ।tasmāt khādīni jāyante ekottaraguṇāni tu ।।

śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpañca raso gandhaś ca tadguṇāḥ ।yo yasminnāśritaś caiṣāṃ sa tasminneva līyate ।।sattvaṃ rajastamaś caiva guṇāstasyaiva kīrtitāḥ ।rajastamobhyāmāviṣṭaś cakravadbhrābhyate hi saḥ ।।anādirādimān yaś ca sa eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ ।liṅgendriyair upagrāhyāḥ sa vikāra udāhṛtaḥ ।।yato devāḥ purāṇāni vidyopaniṣadas tathā ।ślokāḥ sūtrāṇi bhāṣyāṇi yaccānyadmāṅbhayaṃ bhavet ।।pitṛyānopavīthyāś ca yadagastyasya cāntaraṃ ।tenāgnihotriṇo yānti prajākāmā divaṃ prati ।।ye ca dānaparāḥ samyagaṣṭābhiś ca guṇair yutāḥ ।aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi munayo gṛhamedhinaḥ ।।punarāvartane vījabhūtā dharmapravartakāḥ ।saptarṣināgvīthyāś ca devalokaṃ samāśritāḥ ।।tāvanta eva munayaḥ sarvārambhavivarjitāḥ ।tapasā brahmacaryeṇa saṅgatyāgena medhayā ।।yatra yatrāvatiṣṭhante yāvadāhūtasaṃplavaṃ ।vedānuvacanaṃ yajñā brahmacaryaṃ tapo damaḥ ।।śraddhopavāsaḥ satyatvamātmano jñānahetavaḥ ।sa tvāśramair nididhyāsyaḥ samastair evameva tu ।।draṣṭavyastvatha mantavyaḥ śrotavyaś ca dvijātibhiḥ ।ya evamenaṃ vindanti ye cāraṇyakamāśritāḥ ।।upāsate dvijāḥ satyaṃ śraddhayā parayā yutāḥ ।

kramātte sambhavantyarcirahaḥ śuklaṃ tathottaraṃ ।।ayanandevalokañca savitāraṃ savidyutaṃ ।tatastān puruṣo abhyetya mānaso brahmalaukikān ।।karoti punarāvṛttisteṣāmiha na vidyate ।yajñena tapasā dānair ye hi svargajito janāḥ ।।dhūmaṃ niśāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ dakṣiṇāyanameva ca ।pitṛlokaṃ candramasaṃ nabho vāyuṃ jalaṃ mahīṃ ।।kramātte sambhavantīha punareva vrajanti ca ।etadyo na vijānāti mārgadvitayamātmanaḥ ।।dandaśūkaḥ pataṅgo vā bhavedkīṭo athavā kṛmiḥ ।hṛdaye dīpavadbrahma dhyānājjivo mṛto bhavet ।।nyāyāgatadhanastattvajñānaniṣṭho atithipriyaḥ ।śrāddhakṛtsatyavādī ca gṛhastho api vimucyate ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe samādhirnāma pañcasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṭsaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

brahmajñānaṃ

agnir uvāca
brahmajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi saṃsārājñānamuktaye ।ayamātmā parṃ brahma ahamasmīti mucyate ।।deha ātmā na bhavati dṛsyatvācca ghaṭādivat ।prasapte maraṇe dehādātmānyo jñāyate dhruvaṃ ।।dehaḥ sa cedavyavaharedvikāryādisannibhaḥ ।cakṣurādīnīndriyāṇi nātmā vai karaṇaṃ tvataḥ ।।mano dhīrapi ātmā na dīpavat karaṇaṃ tvataḥ ।prāṇo apyātmā na bhavati suṣupte citprabhāvataḥ ।।jāgratsvapne ca caitanyaṃ saṅkīrṇatvānna budhyate ।vijñānarahitaḥ prāṇaḥ suṣupte jñāyate yataḥ ।।ato nātmendriyaṃ tasmādintriyādikamātmanaḥ ।ahaṅkāro api naivātmā dehavadvyabhicārataḥ ।।uktebhyo vyatirikto ayamātmā sarvahṛdi sthitaḥ ।sarvadraṣṭā ca bhoktā ca naktamujjvaladīpavat ।।samādhyārambhakāle ca evaṃ sañcintayenmuniḥ ।yato brahmaṇa ākāśaṃ khādvāyurvāyuto analaḥ ।।agnerāpo jalātpṛthvī tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīrakaṃ ।apañcīkṛtabhūtebhya āsan pañcīkṛtānyataḥ ।।

sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ dhyātvāsmāllayaṃ brahmaṇi cintayet ।pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni tatkāryañca virāṭsmṛtam ।।etat sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ hi ātmano jñānakalpitaṃ ।indriyair atha vijñānaṃ dhīrā jāgaritaṃ viduḥ ।।viśvastadabhimānī syāt trayametadakārakaṃ ।apañcīkṛtabhūtāni tatkāryaṃ liṅgamucyate ।।saṃyuktaṃ saptadaśabhirhiraṇyagarbhasaṃjñitaṃ ।śarīramātmanaḥ sūkṣmaṃ liṅgamityabhidhīyate ।।jāgratsaṃskārajaḥ svapnaḥ pratyayo viṣayātmakaḥ ।ātmā tadupamānī styāttaijaso hy aprapañcataḥ ।।sthūlasūkṣmaśarīrākhyadvayasyaikaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ ।ātmā jñānañca sābhāsaṃ tadadhyāhṛtamucyate ।।na sannāsanna sadasadetatsāvayavaṃ na tat ।nirgatāvayavaṃ neti nābhinnaṃ bhinnameva ca ।।bhinnābhinnaṃ hy anirvācyaṃ bandhasaṃsārakārakaṃ ।ekaṃ sa brahma vijñānāt prāptaṃ naiva ca karmabhiḥ ।।sarvātmanā hīndriyāṇāṃ saṃhāraḥ kāraṇātmanāṃ ।buddheḥ sthānaṃ suṣuptaṃ syāttaddvayasyābhimānavān ।।prājña ātmā trayañcaitat makāraḥ praṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ ।akāraś ca ukāro asau makāro hy ayameva ca ।।ahaṃ sākṣī ca cinmātro jāgratsvapnādikasya ca ।nājñānañcaiva tatkāryaṃ saṃsārādikabandhanaṃ ।।nityaśuddhabandhamuktasatyamānandamadvayaṃ ।

brahmāhamasmyahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvimukta oṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jñānaṃ samādhirbandhaghātakaḥ ।ciramānandakaṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakaṃ ।।ayamātmā parambrahma tad brahma tvamasīti ca ।guruṇā bodhito jīvo hy ahaṃ brahmāsmi vāhyataḥ ।।so asāvādityapuruṣaḥ so asāvahamakhaṇḍa oṃ ।mucyate asārasaṃsārādbrahmajño brahma tadbhavet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe brahmajñānaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha saptasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

brahmajñānaṃ

agnir uvāca
ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pṛthivyavanalojjhitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvāyvākāśavivarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirādikāryavivarjitam ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvirāḍātmavivarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjāgratsthānavivarjitam ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirviśvabhāvavivarjitam ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirākārākṣaravarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvākpāṇyaṅghrivivarjitam ।।

ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pāyūpasthavivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śrotratvakcakṣurujjhitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotīrasarūpavivarjitam ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sarvagandhavivarjitam ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjihvāghrāṇavivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sparśaśabdavivarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirmanobuddhivivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiścittāhaṅkāravarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prāṇāpānavivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirvyānodānavivarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ samānaparivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjarāmaraṇavarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śokamohavivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ kṣutpipāsāvivarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śabdodbhūtādivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirhiraṇyagarbhavarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ svapnāvasthāvivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotistaijasādivivarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirapakārādivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sabhājñānavivarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiradhyāhṛtavivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sattvādiguṇavarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sadasadbhāvavarjitaṃ ।

ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sarvāvayavavarjitaṃ ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirbhedābhedavivarjitaṃ ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ suṣuptisthānavarjitam ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prājñabhāvavivarjitam ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirmakārādivivarjitam ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirmānameyavivarjitam ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirmitimāhṛvivarjitam ।।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ sākṣitvādivivarjitam ।ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ kāryakāraṇavarjitam ।।dehendriyamanobuddhiprāṇāhaṅkāravarjitaṃ ।jāgrat sapnasuṣuptyādimuktaṃ brahma turīyakaṃ ।।nityaśuddhabuddhamuktaṃ satyamānandamadvayam ।brahmāhamasmyahaṃ brahma savijñānaṃ vimukta oṃ ।
ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ samādhirmokṣadaḥ paraḥ ।।

e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe samādhirnāma saptasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athāṣṭasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

brahmajñānaṃ

agnir uvāca
yajñaiś ca devānāpnoti vairājaṃ tapasā padaṃ ।brahmaṇaḥ karmasannyāsādvairāgyāt prakṛtau layaṃ ।।jñānāt prāpnoti kaivalyaṃ pañcaitā gatayaḥsmṛtāḥ ।prītitāpaviṣādādervinivṛttirviraktatā ।।sannyāsaḥ karmaṇāntyāgaḥ kṛtānāmakṛtaiḥ saha ।avyaktādau viśeṣānte vikāro asminnivartate ।।cetanācetanānyatvajñānena jñānamucyate ।paramātmā ca sarveṣāmādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ ।।viṣṇunāmnā ca deveṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate ।yajñeśvaro yajñapumān pravṛttair ijyate hy asau ।।nivṛttair jñānayogena jñānamūrtiḥ sa cekṣyate ।hrasvadīrghaplutādyantu vacastatpuruṣottamaḥ ।।tatprāptiheturjñānañca karma coktaṃ mahāmune ।āgamoktaṃ vivekācca dvidhā jñānaṃ tathocyate ।।śabdabrahmāgamamayaṃ paraṃ brahma vivekajam ।dve brahmaṇī veditavye brahmaśabdaparañca yat ।।vedādividyā hy aparamakṣaraṃ brahmasatparam ।tadetadbhagavadvācyamupacāre arcane anyataḥ ।।sambharteti tathā bhartā bhakāro arthadvayānvitaḥ ।netā gamayitā sraṣṭā gakāro ayaṃ mahamune ।।

aiśvaryasya samagrasya vīryasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ ।jñānavairāgyayoś caiva ṣaṇāṃ bhaga itīṅganā ।।vasanti viṣṇau bhutāni sa ca dhātustridhātmakaḥ ।evaṃ harau hi bhagavān śabdo anyatropacārataḥ ।।utpattiṃ pralayaś caiva bhūtānāmagatiṃ gatiṃ ।vetti vidyāmavidyāñca sa vācyo bhagavāniti ।।jñānaśaktiḥ paraiśvaryaṃ vīryaṃ tejāṃsyaśeṣataḥ ।bhagavacchabdavācyāni vinā heyair guṇādibhiḥ ।।khāṇḍikyajanakāyāha yogaṃ keśidhvajaḥ purā ।anātmanyātmabuddhiryā ātmasvamiti yā matiḥ ।।avidyābhavambhūtirvījametaddvidhā sthiram ।pañcabhūtātmake dehe dehī mohatamāśritaḥ ।।ahametaditītyuccaiḥ kurute kumatirmatiṃ ।itthañca putrapautreṣu taddehotpātiteṣu ca ।।karoti paṇḍitaḥ sāmyamanātmani kalevare ।sarvadehopakārāya kurute karma mānavaḥ ।।dehaścānyo yadā puṃsastadā bandhāya tatparaṃ ।nirvāṇamaya evāyamātmā jñānamayo amalaḥ ।।duḥkhajñānamayo adharmaḥ prakṛteḥ sa tu nātmanaḥ ।jalasya nāgninā saṅgaḥ sthālīsaṅgāttathāpi hi ।।śabdāste kādikā dharmāstat kṛtā vai mahāmune ।tathātmā prakṛtau saṅgādahaṃmānādibhūṣitaḥ ।।bhajate prākṛtāndharmān anyastebhyo hi so avyayaḥ ।

vandhāya viṣayāsaṅgaṃ mano nirviṣayaṃ dhiye ।।viṣayāttatsamākṛṣya brahmabhūtaṃ hariṃ smaret ।ātmabhāvaṃ nayatyenaṃ tadbrahmadhyāyinaṃ mune ।।vicārya svātmanaḥ śaktyā lauhamākarṣako yathā ।ātmaprayatnasāpekṣā viśiṣṭā yā manogatiḥ ।।tasyā brahmaṇi saṃyogo yoga ity abhidhīyate ।viniṣpandaḥ samādhisthaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati ।।yamaiḥ sanniyamaiḥ sthityā pratyāhṛtyā marujjayaiḥ ।prāṇāyāmena pavanaiḥ pratyāhāreṇa cendriyaiḥ ।।vaśīkṛtaistataḥ kuryāt sthitaṃ cetaḥ śubhāśraye ।āśrayaścetaso brahma mūrtañcāmūrtakaṃ dvidhā ।।sanandanādayo brahmabhāvabhāvanayā yutāḥ ।karmabhāvanayā cānye devādyāḥ sthāvarāntakāḥ ।।hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu ca jñānakarmātmikā dvidhā ।trividhā bhāvanā proktā viśvaṃ brahma upāsyate ।।pratyastamitabhedaṃ yat sattāmātramagocaraṃ ।vacasāmātmasaṃvedyaṃ tajjñānaṃ brahma saṃjñitam ।।tacca viṣṇoḥ paraṃ rūpamarūpasyājamakṣaraṃ ।aśakyaṃ prathamaṃ dhyātumato mūrtādi cintayet ।।sadbhāvabhāvamāpannastato asau paramātmanā ।bhavatyabhedī bhedaś ca tasyājñānakṛto bhavet ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe brahmajñānaṃ nāmāṣṭasaptatyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athonāśītyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

advaitabrahmavijñānaṃ

agnir uvāca
advaitabrahmavijñānaṃ vakṣye yadbhavato agadat ।śālagrāne tapaś cakre vāsudevārcanādikṛt ।।mṛgasaṅgāmmṛgo bhūtvā hy antakāle smaran mṛgaṃ ।jātismaro mṛgastyaktvā dehaṃ yogātsvato abhavat ।।advaitabrahmabhūtaś ca jaḍavallokamācarat ।kṣattāsau vīrarājasya viṣṭiyogamamanyata ।।uvāha śivikrāmasya kṣatturvacanacoditaḥ ।gṛhīto viṣṭinā jñānī uvāhātmakṣayāya taṃ ।।yayau jaḍagatiḥ paścāt ye tvanye tvaritaṃ yayuḥ ।śīghrān śīghragatīn dṛṣṭvā aśīghraṃ taṃ nṛpo'bravīt ।।
rājovāca
kiṃ śrānto asyalpamadhvānaṃ tvayoḍhā śivikā mama ।kimāyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvānasi nirīkṣyase ।।
brāhmaṇa uvāca
nāhaṃ pīvānna vaiṣoḍhā śivikā bhavato mayā ।na śrānto asmi na vāyāso voḍhavyo asi mahīpate ।।bhūmau pādayugantasthau jaṅghe pādadvaye sthite ।urū jaṅghādvayāvasthau tadādhāraṃ tathodaram ।।vakṣaḥsthalaṃ tathā vāhū skandhau codarasaṃsthitau ।skandhasthiteyaṃ śivikā mama bhāvo atra kiṃ kṛtaḥ ।।

śivikāyāṃ sthitañcedaṃ dehaṃ tvadupalakṣitaṃ ।tatra tvamahamapyatra procyate cedamanyathā ।।ahaṃ tvañca tathānye ca bhūtairuhyāma pārthiva ।guṇapravāhapatito guṇavargo hi yātyayaṃ ।।karmavaśyā guṇāś caite sattvādyāḥ pṛthivīpate ।avidyāsañcitaṃ karma taccāśeṣeṣu jantuṣu ।।ātmā śuddho akṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ ।pravṛddhyapacayau nāsya ekasyākhilajantuṣu ।।yadā nopacayastasya yadā nāpacayo nṛpa ।tadā pīvānasīti tvaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritaṃ ।।bhūjaṅghāpādakaṭyūrujaṭharādiṣu saṃsthitā ।śivikeyaṃ tathā skandhe tadā bhāvaḥsamastvayā ।।tadanyajantubhirbhūpa śivikotthānakarmaṇā ।śailadravyagṛhotthopi pṛthivīsambhavopi vā ।।yathā puṃsaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ prākṛtaiḥ karaṇair nṛpa ।soḍhavyaḥ sa mahābhāraḥ kataro nṛpate mayā ।।yaddravyā śivikā ceyaṃ taddravyo bhūtasaṃgrahaḥ ।bhavato me akhilasyāsya samatvenopavṛṃhitaḥ ।।tacchrutvovāca rājā taṃ gṛhītvāṅghrī kṣamāpya ca ।prasādaṃ kuru tyaktvemāṃ śivikāṃ brūhi śṛṇvate ।yo bhavān yannimittaṃ vā yadāgamanakāraṇam ।।
brāhmaṇa uvāca
śrūyatāṃ kohamityetadvaktuṃ naiva ca śakyate ।

pāṭho ayaṃ na samīcīnaḥ
upabhoganimittañca sarvatrāgamanakriyā ।।sukhaduḥkhopabhogau tu tau deśādyupapādakau ।
dharmādharmodbhavau bhoktuṃ janturdeśādimṛcchati ।।

rajovāca
yo asti sohamiti brahman kathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate ।ātmanyeṣu na doṣāya śabdohamiti yo dvija ।।
brāhmaṇa uvāca
śabdohamiti doṣāya nātmanyeṣa tathaiva tat ।anātmanyātmavijñānaṃ śabdo vā bhrāntilakṣaṇaḥ ।।yadā samastadeheṣu pumāneko vyavasthitaḥ ।tadā hi ko bhavān kohamityetadviphalaṃ vacaḥ ।।tvaṃ rājā śivikā ceyaṃ vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥsarāḥ ।ayañca bhavato loko na sadetannṛpocyate ।।vṛkṣāddāru tataśceyaṃ śivikā tvadadhiṣṭhitā ।kā vṛkṣasaṃjñā jātasya dārusaṃjñātha vā nṛpa ।।vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati cetanaḥ ।na ca dāruṇi sarvastvāṃ bravīti śivikāgataṃ ।।śivikādārusaṅghāto racanāsthitisaṃsthitaḥ ।anviṣyatāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha tadbhede śivikā tvayā ।।pumān strī gaurayaṃ vājī kuñcaro vihagastaruḥ ।deheṣu lokasaṃjñeyaṃ vijñeyā karmahetuṣu ।।jihvā bravītyahamiti dantauṣṭhau tālukaṃ nṛpa ।ete nāhaṃ yataḥ sarve vāṅnipādanahetavaḥ ।।kiṃ hetubhirvadatyeṣā vāgevāhamiti svayaṃ ।tathāpi vāṅnāhametaduktaṃ mithyā na yujyate ।।

piṇḍaḥ pṛthag yataḥ puṃsaḥ śiraḥpāyvādilakṣaṇaḥ ।tato ahamiti kutraitāṃ saṃjñāṃ rājan karomyahaṃ ।।yadanyo asti paraḥ kopi mattaḥ pārthivasattama ।tadeṣohamayaṃ cānyo vaktum evamapīṣyate ।।paramārthabhedo na nago na paśurnaca pādapaḥ ।śarīrāś ca vibhedāś ca ya ete karmayonayaḥ ।।yastu rājeti yalloke yacca rājabhaṭātmakam ।taccānyacca nṛpetthantu na sat samyaganāmayaṃ ।।tvaṃ rājā sarvalokasya pituḥ putro riporipuḥ।patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kastvāṃ bhūpa vadāmyahaṃ ।।tvaṃ kimetacchiraḥ kinnu śirastava tathodaraṃ ।kimu pādādikaṃ tvaṃ vai tavaitat kiṃ mahīpate ।।samastāvayebhyastvaṃ pṛthagbhūto vyavasthitaḥ ।kohamityatra nipuṇaṃ bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva ।tacchratvovāca rājā tamavadhūtaṃ dvijaṃ hariṃ ।।
rajovāca
śreyo arthamudyataḥ praṣṭuṃ kapilarṣimahaṃ dvija ।tasyāṃśaḥ kapilarṣestvaṃ mat kṛte jñānado bhuvi ।jñānavīcyudacheryasmādyacchreyastacca me vada ।।
brāhmaṇa uvāca
bhūyaḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthanna pṛcchasi ।śreyāṃsyaparamārthāni aśeṣāṇyeva bhūpate ।।devatārādhanaṃ kṛtvā dhanasampattimicchati ।putrānicchati rājyañca śreyastasyaiva kiṃ nṛpa ।।vivekinastu saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ ।

yajñādikā kriyā na syāt nāsti dravyopapattitā ।।paramārthātmanoryogaḥ paramārtha itīṣyate ।eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ ।।janmavṛddhyādirahita ātmā sarvagato avyayaḥ ।paraṃ jñānamayo asaṅgī guṇajātyādibhirvibhuḥ ।।nidādhaṛtusaṃvādaṃ vadāmi dvija taṃ śṛṇu ।ṛturbrahmasuto jñānī tacchiṣyo abhūt pulastyajaḥ ।।nidāghaḥ prāptavidyo asmānnagare vai pure sthitaḥ ।devikāyāstaṭe tañca tarkayāmāsa vai ṛtuḥ ।।divye varṣasahasre agānnidāghamavalokituṃ ।nidāgho vaiśvadevānte bhuktvānnaṃ śiṣyamabravīt ।bhuktante tṛptirutpannā tuṣṭidā sākṣayā yataḥ ।।
ṛtur uvāca
kṣudasti yasya bhute anne tuṣṭirbrāhmaṇa jāyate ।na me kṣudabhavattṛptiṃ kasmāttvaṃ paripṛcchasi ।।kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija ।pṛṣṭohaṃ yattvayā brūyāṃ tṛptirastye va me sadā ।।pumān sarvagato vyāpī ākāśavadayaṃ yataḥ ।ato ahaṃ pratyagātmāsmītyetadarthe bhavet kathaṃ ।।so ahaṃ gantā na cāgantā naikadeśaniketanaḥ ।tvaṃ cānyo na bhavennāpi nānyastvatto asmi vā pyahaṃ ।।

nidāghaṛtusaṃvādamadvaitabuddhaye śṛṇviti kha, ña ca

tataḥ kṣutsambhavābhāvāditi kha, ña ca

kutaḥ kutra kva gantāsītyetadapyarthavat kathamiti kha, ña ca

bhokteti ka
mṛṇmayaṃ hi gṛhaṃ yadvanmṛdāliptaṃ sthirībhavet ।pārthivo ayaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ।।ṛturasmi tavācāryaḥ prajñādānāya te dvija ।ihāgato ahaṃ yāsyāmi paramārthastavoditaḥ ।।ekamevamidaṃ viddhi na bhedaḥ sakalaṃ jagat ।vāsudevābhidheyasya svarūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।।ṛturvarṣasahasrānte punastannagaraṃ yayau ।nidāghaṃ nagaraprānte ekānte sthitamabravīt ।ekānte sthīyate kasmānnidāghaṃ ṛturabravīt ।।
nidāgha uvāca
bho vipra janasaṃvādo mahāneṣa nareśvara ।pravivīkṣya puraṃ ramyaṃ tenātra sthīyate mayā ।।
ṛtur uvāca
narādhipo atra katamaḥ katamaścetaro janaḥ ।kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvamabhijño dvijottama ।।yo ayaṃ gajendramunmattamadriśṛṅgasamutthitaṃ ।adhirūḍho narendro ayaṃ parivārastathetaraḥ ।।gajo yo ayamadho brahmannuparyeṣa sa bhūpatiḥ ।ṛturāha gajaḥ ko atra rājā cāha nidāghakaḥ ।।ṛturnidāgha ārūḍho dṛṣṭāntaṃ paśya vāhanaṃ ।uparyahaṃ yathā rājā tvamadhaḥ kuñjaro yathā ।।ṛtuḥ prāha nidāghantaṃ katamastvāmahaṃ vade ।ukto nidāghastannatvā prāha me tvaṃ gururdhruvam ।।

ārūḍho ayaṃ gajaṃ rājā paralokastathetara iti kha, ña ca

ka pustake sarvatra ṛbhuriti ṛtusthānīyaḥ pāṭhaḥ
nānyasmāddvaitasaṃskārasaṃskṛtaṃ mānasaṃ tathā ।ṛtuḥ prāha nidāghantaṃ brahmajñānāya cāgataḥ ।paramārthaṃ sārabhūtamadvaitaṃ darśitaṃ mayā ।।
brāhmaṇa uvāca
nidāgho apyupadeśena tenādvaitaparo abhavat ।sarvabhūtānyabhedena dadṛśe sa tadātmani ।।avāpa muktiṃ jñānātsa tathā tvaṃ muktimāpsyasi ।ekaḥ samastaṃ tvañcāhaṃ viṣṇuḥ sarvagato yataḥ ।।pītanīlādibhedena yathaikaṃ dṛśyate nabhaḥ ।bhrāntidṛṣṭibhirātmāpi tathaikaḥ sa pṛthak pṛthak ।।
agnir uvāca
muktiṃ hy avāpa bhavato jñānasāreṇa bhūpatiḥ ।saṃsārājñānavṛkṣārijñānaṃ brahmeti cintaya ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe advaitavrahmavijñānaṃ namonāśītyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś athāśītyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

gītāsāraḥ

agnir uvāca
gītāsāraṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvagītottamottamaṃ ।kṛṣṇo arjunāya yamāha purā vai bhuktimuktidaṃ ।।
śrībhagavānuvāca
gatāsuragatāsurvā na śocyo dehavānajaḥ ।ātmājaro amaro abhedyastasmācchokādikaṃ tyajet ।।

jñānāt sauvīrabhūpatiriti kha, ña ca

paṭhatāṃ bhuktimuktidamiti kha
dhyāyato viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgasteṣūpajāyate ।saṅgāt kāmastataḥ krodhaḥ krodhātsammoha eva ca ।।ammohāt smṛtivibhraṃśo buddhināśāt praṇaśyati ।duḥsaṅgahāniḥ satsaṅgānmokṣakābhī ca kāmanut ।।kāmatyāgādātmaniṣṭhaḥ sthiraprajñastadocyate ।yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī ।।yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ ।ātmanyeva ca santuṣṭastasya kāryaṃ na vidyate ।।naiva tasya kṛte nārtho nākṛte neha kaś canaḥ ।tattvavittu mahāvaho guṇakarmavibhāgayoḥ ।।guṇā guneṣu vartante iti matvā na sajjate ।sarvaṃ jñānaplavenaiva vṛjinaṃ santariṣyati ।।jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute arjuna ।brahmaṇyādhāya karmāṇi saṅgantyaktvā karoti yaḥ ।।lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā ।sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani ।।īkṣate yogayuktātmā sarvatra samadarśanaḥ ।śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭo abhijāyate ।।na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaściddurgatiṃ tāta gacchati ।devī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā ।।māmeva ye prapadyante māyāmetāntaranti te ।ārto jijñāsurarthārtho jñānī ca bharatarṣabha ।।caturvidhā bhajante māṃ jñānī caikatvamāsthitaḥ ।

akṣaraṃ brahma paramaṃ svabhāvo adhyātmamucyate ।।bhūtabhāvodbhavakaro visargaḥ karmasaṃjñitaḥ ।adhibhūtaṃ kṣarobhāvaḥ puruṣaścādhidaivataṃ ।।adhiyajñohamevātra dehe dehabhṛtāṃ vara ।antakāle smaranmāñca madbhāvaṃ yātyasaṃśayaḥ ।।yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaṃ smarannante tyajeddehantamāpnuyāt ।prāṇaṃ nyasya bhruvormadhye ante prāpnoti matparam ।।omityekākṣaraṃ brahmavadan dehaṃ tyajantathā ।brahmādistambhaparyantāḥ sarve mama vibhūtayaḥ ।।śrīmantaścorjitāḥ sarve mamāṃśāḥ prāṇinaḥsmṛtāḥ ।ahameko viśvarūpa iti jñātvā vimucyate ।।kṣetraṃ śarīraṃ yo vetti kṣetrajñaḥ sa prakortitaḥ ।kṣetrakṣetrajñayorjñānaṃ yattajjñānaṃ mataṃ mama ।।mahābhūtānyahaṅkāro buddhiravyaktameva ca ।indrayāṇi deśaikañca pañca cendriyagocarāḥ ।।icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṅghātaścetanā dhṛtiḥ ।etatkṣetraṃ samāsena savikāramudāhṛtaṃ ।।amānitvamadambhitvamahiṃsā kṣāntirārjavam ।ācāryopāsanaṃ śaucaṃ sthairyamātmavinigrahaḥ ।।indriyārtheṣu vairāgyamanahaṅkāra eva ca ।janmamṛtyujarāvyādhiduḥkhadoṣānudarśanaṃ ।।āsaktiranabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu ।

mamāṅgā iti kha
nityañca samacittattvamiṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu ।।mayi cānanyayogena bhaktiravyabhicāriṇī ।viviktadeśasevitvamaratirjanasaṃsadi ।।adhyātmajñānaniṣṭhatvantattvajñānānudarśanaṃ ।etajjñānamiti proktamajñānaṃ yadato anyathā ।।jñeyaṃ yattat pravakṣyāmi yaṃ jñātvāmṛtamaśnute ।anādi paramaṃ brahma sattvaṃ nāma taducyate ।।sarvataḥ pāṇipādāntaṃ sarvato akṣiśiromukham ।sarvataḥ śrutimalloke sarvamāvṛtya tiṣṭhati ।।sarvendriyaguṇābhāsaṃ sarvendriyavivarjitam ।asaktaṃ sarvabhṛccaiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca ।।vahirantaś ca bhūtānāmacarañcarameva ca ।sūkṣmatvāttadavijñeyaṃ dūrasthañcāntike api yat ।।avibhaktañca bhūteṣu vibhaktamiva ca sthitam ।bhūtabhartṛ ca vijñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca ।।jyotiṣāmapi tajjyotistamasaḥ paramucyate ।jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya dhiṣṭhitaṃ ।।dhyānenātmani paśyanti kecidātmānamātmanā ।anye sāṅkhyena yogena karmayogena cāpare ।।anye tvevamajānanto śrutvānyebhya upāsate ।tepi cāśu tarantyeva mṛtyuṃ śrutiparāyaṇāḥ ।।sattvātsañjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca ।pramādamohau tamaso bhavato jñānameva ca ।।

guṇā vartanta ity eva yo avatiṣṭhati neṅgate ।mānāvamānamitrāritulyastyāgī sa nirguṇaḥ ।।ūrdhvamūlamadhaḥśākhamaśvatthaṃ prāhuravyayaṃ ।chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yastaṃ veda sa vedavit ।।dvau bhūtasargau loke asmin daiva āsura eva ca ।ahiṃsādiḥ kṣamā caiva daivīsampattito nṛṇāṃ ।।na śaucaṃ nāpi vācāro hy āsurīsampadoddhavaḥ ।narakatvāt krodhalobhakāmastasmāttrayaṃ tyajet ।।yajñastapas tathā dānaṃ sattvādyaistrividhaṃ smṛtam ।āyuḥ sattvaṃ balārogyasukhāyānnantu sāttvikaṃ ।।duḥkhaśokāmayāyānnaṃ tīkṣṇarūkṣantu rājasaṃ ।amedhyocchiṣṭapūtyannaṃ tāmasaṃ nīrasādikaṃ ।।yaṣṭavyo vidhinā yajño niṣkāmāya sa sāttvikaḥ ।yajñaḥ phalāya dambhātmī rājasastāmasaḥ kratuḥ ।।śraddhāmantrādividhyuktaṃ tapaḥ śārīramucyate ।devādipūjāhiṃsādi vāṅmayaṃ tapa ucyate ।।anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ svādhyāyasajjapaḥ ।mānasaṃ cittasaṃśuddhersaunamātsavinigrahaḥ ।।sāttvikañca tapo akāmaṃ phalādyarthantu rājasaṃ ।tāmasaṃ parapīḍāyai sāttvikaṃ dānamucyate ।।deśādau caiva dātavyamupakārāya rājasaṃ ।ādeśādāvavajñātaṃ tāmasaṃ dānamīritaṃ ।।

oṃtatsaditi nirdeśo brahmaṇastrividhaḥ smṛtaḥ ।yajñadānādika karma buktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇāṃ ।।aniṣṭamiṣṭaṃ miśrañca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ ।bhavatyatyāgināṃ pretya na tu sannyāsināṃ kvacit ।।tāmasaḥ karmasaṃyogāt mohātkleśabhayādikāt ।rājasaḥ sāttviko akāmāt pañcaite karmahetavaḥ ।।adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇañca pṛthagvidham ।trividhāś ca pṛthak ceṣṭā daivañcaivātra pañcamaṃ ।।ekaṃ jñānaṃ sāttvikaṃ syāt pṛthag jñānantu rājasaṃ ।atattvārthantāmasaṃ syāt karmākāmāya sāttvikaṃ ।।kāmāya rājasaṃ karma mohāt karma tu tāmasaṃ ।sīdhyasiddhyoḥ samaḥ kartā sāttviko rājaso atyapi ।।śaṭho alasastāmasaḥ syāt kāryādidhīś ca sāttvikī ।kāryārthaṃ sā rājasī syādviparītā tu tāmasī ।।manodhṛtiḥ sāttvikī syāt prītikāmeti rājasī ।tāmasī tu praśokādau mukhaṃ sattvāttadantagaṃ ।।sukhaṃ tadrājasañcāgre ante duḥkhantu tāmasaṃ ।ataḥ pravṛttirbhūtānāṃ yena sarvamidantataṃ ।।svakarmaṇā tamabhyarcya viṣṇuṃ siddhiñca vindati ।karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvāvasthāsu sarvadā ।।

bhavatyayogināmiti kha
brahmādistambhaparyantaṃ jagadviṣṇuñca vetti yaḥ ।siddhimāpnoti bhagavadbhakto bhāgavato dhruvaṃ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe gītāsāro nāmāśītyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś athaikāśītyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

yamagītā

agnir uvāca
yamagītāṃ pravakṣyāmi uktā yā nāciketase ।paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ bhuktyai muktyai mokṣārthināṃ satāṃ ।।
yama uvāca
āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaparidhānagṛhādikam ।vāñchatyaho atimohena susthiraṃ svayamasthiraḥ ।।bhogeṣu śaktiḥ satataṃ tathaivātmāvalokanaṃ ।śreyaḥ paraṃ manuṣyānāṃ kapilodgītameva hi ।।sarvatra samadarśitvaṃ nirmasatvamasaṅgatā ।śreyaḥ param manuṣyānāṃ gītaṃ pañcaśikhena hi ।।āgarbhajanmabālyādivayo avasthādivedanaṃ ।śreyaḥ paraṃ manuṣyāṇām gaṅgāviṣṇupragītakaṃ ।।ādhyātmikādiduḥkhānāmādyantādipratikriyā ।śreyaḥ paraṃ manṣyāṇāṃ janakodgītameva ca ।।abhinnayorbhedakaraḥ pratyayo yaḥ parātmanaḥ ।tacchāntiparamaṃ śreyo brahmodgītamudāhṛtaṃ ।।

kartavyamiti yatkarma ṛgyajuḥsāmasaṃjñitaṃ ।kurute śreyase saṅgān jaigīṣavyeṇa gīyate ।।hāniḥ sarvavidhitsānāmātmanaḥ sukhahaitukī ।śreyaḥ paraṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ devalodgītamīritaṃ ।।kāmatyāgāttu vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ brahma paraṃ padaṃ ।kāmināṃ na hi vijñānaṃ sanakodgītameva tat ।।pravṛttañca nivṛttañca kāryaṃ karmaparo abravīt ।śreyasāṃ śreya etaddhi naiṣkarmyaṃ brahma taddhariḥ ।।pumāṃścādhigatajñāno bhedaṃ nāpnoti sattamaḥ ।brahmaṇā viṣṇusaṃjñena parameṇāvyayena ca ।।jñānaṃ vijñānamāstikyaṃ saubhāgyaṃ rūpamuttamam ।tapasā labhyate sarvaṃ manasā yadyadicchati ।।nāsti viṣṇusamandhyeyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparaṃ ।nāstyārogyasamaṃ dhanyaṃ nāsti gaṅgāsamā sarit ।।na so asti bāndhavaḥ kaścidviṣṇuṃ muktvā jagadguruṃ ।adhaścordhaṃ hariścāgre dehendriyamanomukhe ।।ityevaṃ saṃsmaran prāṇān yastyajetsa harirbhavet ।yattad brahma yataḥ sarvaṃ yatsarvaṃ tasya saṃsthitam ।।agrāhyakamanirdeśyaṃ supratiṣṭhañca yatparaṃ ।parāparasvarūpeṇa viṣṇuḥ sarvahṛdi sthitaḥ ।।yajñeśaṃ yajñapuruṣaṃ kecidicchanti tatparaṃ ।kecidviṣṇuṃ haraṃ kecit kecid brahmāṇamīśvaraṃ ।।indrādināmabhiḥ kecit sūryaṃ somañca kālakam ।

brahmādistambhaparyantaṃ jagadviṣṇuṃ vadanti ca ।।sa viṣṇuḥ paramaṃ brahma yato nāvartate punaḥ ।suvarṇādimahādānapuṇyatīrthāvagāhanaiḥ ।।dhyānair vrataiḥ pūjayā ca dharmaśrutyā tadāpnuyāt ।ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu ।।buddhintu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca ।indrayāṇi hayānāhurviṣayāṃśceṣugocarān ।।ātmendriyamanoyuktaṃ bhoktetyāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ ।yastvavijñānavān bhavatyayuktena manasā sadā ।।na satpadamavāpnoti saṃsārañcādhigacchati ।yastu vijñānavān bhavati yuktena manasā sadā ।।sa tatpadamavāpnoti yasmādbhūyo na jāyate ।vijñānasārathiryastu manaḥpragrahavānnaraḥ ।।so adhvānaṃ paramāpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam ।indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ ।।manasastu parā buddhiḥ buddherātmā mahān paraḥ ।mahataḥ paramavyaktamavyaktātpuruṣaḥ paraḥ ।।puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ ।eṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhātmā na prakāśate ।।dṛśyate tvagryayā budhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ ।yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñaḥ tadyacchejjñānamātmani ।।jñānamātmani mahati niyacchecchānta ātmani ।jñātvā brahmātmanoryogaṃ yamādyair brahma sadbhavet ।।

ahiṃsā satyamasteyaṃ brahmacaryāparigrahau ।yamāś ca niyamāḥ pañca śaucaṃ santoṣasattapaḥ ।।svādhyāyeśvarapūjā ca āsanaṃ padmakādikaṃ ।prāṇāyāmo vāyujayaḥ pratyāhāraḥ svanigrahaḥ ।।śubhe hy ekatra viṣaye cetaso yat pradhāraṇaṃ ।niś calatvāttu dhīmadbhirdhāraṇā dvija kathyate ।।paunaḥpunyena tatraiva viṣayeṣveva dhāraṇā ।dhyānaṃ smṛtaṃ samādhistu ahaṃ brahmātmasaṃsthitiḥ ।।ghaṭadhvaṃsādyathākāśamabhinnaṃ nabhasā bhavet ।mukto jīvo brahmaṇaivaṃ sadbrahma brahma vai bhavet ।।ātmānaṃ manyate brahma jīvo jñānena nānyathā ।jīvo hy ajñānatatkāryamuktaḥ syādajarāmaraḥ ।।
agnir uvāca
vaśiṣṭha yamagītoktā paṭhatāṃ bhuktimuktidā ।ātyantiko layaḥ prokto vedāntabrahmadhīmayaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe yamagītā nāmaikāśītyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha dvyaśītyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ

āgneyapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ

agnir uvāca
āgneyaṃ brahmarūpante purāṇaṃ kathataṃ mayā ।saprapañcaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ vidyādvayamayaṃ mahat ।।ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvākhyā vidyā viṣṇurjagajjaniḥ ।chandaḥ śikṣā vyākaraṇaṃ nighaṇṭujyotirākhyakāḥ ।।niruktadharmaśāstrādi mīmāṃsānyāyavistarāḥ ।āyurvedapurāṇākhyā dhanurgandharvavistarāḥ ।।vidyā saivārthaśāstrākhyā devāntānyā harirmahān ।ityeṣā cāparā vidyā parividyākṣaraṃ paraṃ ।।yasya bhāvo akhilaṃ viṣṇustasya no bādhate kaliḥ ।aniṣṭvā tu mahāyajñānakṛtvāpi pitṛsvadhāṃ ।।kṛṣṇamabhyarcayanbhaktyā nainaso bhājanaṃ bhavet ।sarvakāraṇamatyantaṃ viṣṇuṃ dhyāyanna sīdati ।।anyatantrādidoṣottho viṣayākṛṣṭamānasaḥ ।kṛtvāpi pāpaṃ govindaṃ dhyāyanpāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।taddhyānaṃ yatra govindaḥ sa kathā yatra keśavaḥ ।tat karma yattadarthīyaṃ kimanyair bahubhāṣitaiḥ ।।na tat pitā tu putrāya na śiṣyāya gururdvija ।paramārthaṃ paraṃ brūyādyadetatte mayoditaṃ ।।saṃsāre bhramatā labhyaṃ putradāradhanaṃ vasu ।

suhṛdaś ca tathaivānye nopadeśo dvijedṛśaḥ ।।kiṃ putradārair mitrair vā kiṃ mitrakṣetravāndhavaiḥ ।upadeśaḥ paro vandhurīdṛśo yo vimuktaye ।।dvividho bhūtamārgīyaṃ daiva āsura eva ca ।viṣṇubhaktiparo daivo viparītas tathāsuraḥ ।।etat pavitramārogyaṃ dhanyaṃ duḥsvapnanāśanaṃ ।sukhaprītikaraṃ nṝṇāṃ mokṣakṛdyattaveritaṃ ।।yeṣāṃ gṛheṣu likhitamāgneyaṃ hi purāṇakaṃ ।pustakaṃ sthāsyati sadā tatra neśurupadravāḥ ।।kiṃ tīrthair gopradānair vā kiṃ yajñaiḥ kimupoṣitaiḥ ।āgneyaṃ ye hi śṛṇvanti ahanyahani mānavāḥ ।।ye dadāti tilaprasthaṃ suvarṇasya ca māṣakaṃ ।śṛṇoti ślokamekañca āgneyasya tadāpnuyāt ।।adhyāyapaṭhanañcāsya gopradānād viśiṣyate ।ahorātrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ śrotumicchoḥ praṇaśyati ।।kapilānāṃ śate datte yad bhavejjyeṣṭhapuṣkare ।tadāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ hi paṭhitvā phalamāpnuyāt ।।pravṛttañca nivṛttañca dharmaṃ vidyādvayātmakaṃ ।āgneyasya purāṇasya śāstrasyāsya samaṃ na hi ।।paṭhannāgneyakaṃ nityaṃ śṛṇvan vāpi purāṇakaṃ ।bhakto vaśiṣṭha manujaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।nopasargā na cānarthā na caurāribhayaṃ gṛhe ।tasman syād yatra cāgneyapurāṇasya hi pustakaṃ ।।

na garbhahāriṇībhītirna ca bālagrahā gṛhe ।yatrāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ syānna piśācādikaṃ bhayaṃ ।।śṛṇvanvipro vedavit syāt kṣatriyaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ ।ṛddhiṃ prāpnoti vaiśyaś ca śūdraścārogyamṛcchati ।।yaḥ paṭhetśṛṇuyānnityaṃ samadṛgviṣṇumānasaḥ ।brahmāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ sattatra naśyantyupadravāḥ ।।divyāntarīkṣabhaumādyā duḥsvapnādyabhicārakāḥ ।yaccānyadduritaṃ kiñcittatsarvaṃ hanti keśavaḥ ।।paṭhataḥ śṛṇvataḥ puṃsaḥ pustakaṃ yajato mahat ।āgneyaṃ śrīpurāṇaṃ hi hemante yaḥ śṛṇoti vai ।।prapūjya gandhapuṣpādhyair agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet ।śiśire puṇḍarīkasya vasante cāśvamedhajam ।।grīṣme tu vājapeyasya rājasūyasya varṣati ।gosahasrasya śaradi phalaṃ tatpaṭhato hy ṛtau ।।āgneyaṃ hi purāṇaṃ yo bhaktyāgre paṭhete hareḥ ।so arcayecca vasiṣṭheha jñānayajñena keśavam ।।yasyāgneyapurāṇasya pustakaṃ tasya vai jayaḥ ।likhitaṃ pūjitaṃ gehe bhuktirmuktiḥ kare asti hi ।।iti kālāgnirūpeṇa gītaṃ me hariṇā purā ।āgneyaṃ hi purāṇaṃ vai brahmavidyādvayāspadam ।vidyādvayaṃ vasiṣṭhedaṃ bhaktebhyaḥ kathayiṣyasi ।।
vasiṣṭha uvāca
vyāsāgneyapurāṇaṃ te rūpaṃ vidyādvayātmakaṃ ।kathitaṃ brahmaṇo viṣṇoragninā kathitaṃ yathā ।।

sārdhaṃ devaiś ca munibhirmahyaṃ sarvāthadarśakaṃ ।purāṇamagninā gautamāgneyaṃ brahmasanmitaṃ ।।yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyāddhyāsa likhedvā lekhayedapi ।śrāvayetpāṭhayedvāpi pūjayeddhārayedapi ।।sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ prāprakāmo divaṃ vrajet ।lekhayitvā purāṇaṃ yo dadyādviprebhya uttamaṃ ।।sa brahmalokamāpnoti kulānāṃ śatamuddharet ।ekaṃ ślokaṃ paṭhedyastu pāpapaṅkādvimucyate ।।tasmādvyāsa sadā śrāvyaṃ śiṣyebhyaḥ sarvadarśanaṃ ।śukādyair munibhiḥ sardhaṃ śrotukāmaiḥ purāṇakaṃ ।।āgneyaṃ paṭhitaṃ dhyātaṃ śubhaṃ syād bhuktimuktidaṃ ।agnaye tu namastasmai yena gītaṃ purānakaṃ ।।
vyāsa uvāca
vasiṣṭhena purā gītaṃ sūtaitatte mayoditaṃ ।parāvidyāparāvidyāsvarūpaṃ paramaṃ padam ।।āgneyaṃ durlabhaṃ rūpaṃ prāpyate bhāgyasaṃyutaiḥ ।dhyāyanto brahma cāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ harimāgatāḥ ।।vidyārthinas tathā vidyāṃ rājyaṃ rājyārthino gatāḥ ।aputrāḥ putriṇaḥ santi nāśrayā āśrayaṃ gatāḥ ।।saubhāgyārthī ca saubhāgyaṃ mokṣaṃ mokṣārthino gatāḥ ।likhanto lekhayantaś ca niṣpāpaś ca śriyaṃ gatāḥ ।।śukapailamukhaiḥ sūta āgneyantu purāṇakaṃ ।rūpaṃ cintaya yātāsi bhuktiṃ muktiṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।।śrāvaya tvañca śiṣyebhyo bhaktebhyaś ca purāṇakam ।

sūta uvāca
vyāsa prasādādāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ śrutamādarāt ।।āgneyaṃ brahmarūpaṃ hi munayaḥ śaunakādayaḥ ।bhavanto naimiṣāraṇye yajanto harimīśvaraṃ ।।tiṣṭhantaḥ śraddhayā yuktāstasmādvaḥ samudīritam ।agninā proktamāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasammitaṃ ।।brahmavidyādvayopetaṃ bhuktidaṃ muktidaṃ mahat ।nāsmātparataraḥ sāro nāsmātparataraḥ suhṛt ।।nāsmātparataro grantho nāsmātparataro gatiḥ ।nāsmātparataraṃ śāstraṃ nāsmātparatarā śrutiḥ ।।nāsmātparataraṃ jñānaṃ nāsmātparatarā smṛtiḥ ।nāsmātparo hy āgamo asti nāsmādvidyā parāsti hi ।।nāsmātparaḥ syātsiddhanto nāsmātparamamaṅgalam ।nāsmātparo asti vedāntaḥ purāṇaṃ paramantvidaṃ ।।nāsmātparataraṃ bhūmau vidyate vastu durlabham ।āgneye hi purāṇe asmin sarvavidyāḥ pradarśitāḥ ।।sarve matsyāvatārādyā gītā rāmāyaṇantviha ।harivaṃśo bhāratañca nava sargāḥ pradarśitāḥ ।।āgamo vaiṣṇavo gītaḥ pūjādīkṣāpratiṣṭhayā ।pavitrārohaṇādīni pratimālakṣaṇādikaṃ ।।prāsādalakṣaṇādyañca mantrā vai bhuktimuktidāḥ ।śaivāgamastadarthaś ca śākteyaḥ saura eva ca ।।maṇḍalāni ca vāstuś ca mantāṇi vividhāni ca ।pratisargaścānugīto brahmāṇḍaparimaṇḍalaṃ ।।

gīto bhuvanakoṣaś ca dvīpavarṣādinimnagāḥ ।gayāgaṅgāprayāgādi tīrthamāhātmyamīritaṃ ।।jyotiś cakraṃ jyotiṣādi gīto yuddhajayārṇavaḥ ।manvantarādayo gītāḥ dharmā varṇādikasya ca ।।aśaucaṃ dravyaśuddhiś ca prāyaścittaṃ pradarśitaṃ ।rājadharmā dānadharmā vratāni vividhāni ca ।।vyavahārāḥ śāntayaś ca ṛgvedādividhānakaṃ ।sūryavaṃśaḥ somavaṃśo dhanurvedaś ca vaidyakaṃ ।।gāndharvavedo arthaśāstraṃ mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ ।purāṇasaṃkhyāmāhatmyaṃ chando vyakaraṇaṃ smṛtaṃ ।।alaṅkāro vighaṇḍuś ca śikṣākalpa ihoditaḥ smṛtaḥ ।naimittikaḥ prākṛtiko laya ātyantikaḥ ।।vedāntaṃ brahmavijñānaṃ yogo hy aṣṭāṅga īritaḥ ।stotraṃ purāṇamāhātmyaṃ vidyā hy aṣṭādaśa smṛtāḥ ।।ṛgvedādyāḥ parā hy atra parāvidyākṣaraṃ paraṃ ।saprapañcaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ brahmaṇo rūpamīritaṃ ।।idaṃ pañcadaśasohasraṃ śatakoṭipravistaraṃ ।devaloke daivataiś ca purāṇaṃ paṭhyate sadā ।।lokānāṃ hitakāmena saṃkṣipyodgītamagninā ।sarvaṃ brahmeti jānīdhvaṃ munayaḥ śaunakādayaḥ ।।śṛṇuyācchrāvayedvāpi yaḥ paṭhetpāṭhayedapi ।likhellekhāpayedvāpi yujayetkīrtayedapi ।।purāṇapāṭhakañcaiva pūjayet prayato nṛpaḥ ।

gobhūhiraṇyadānādyair vastrālaṅkāratarpaṇaiḥ ।।taṃ saṃpūjya labheccaiva purāṇaśravaṇāt phalaṃ ।purāṇānte ca vai kuryādavaśyaṃ dvijabhojanaṃ ।।nirmalaḥ prāptasarvārthaḥ sakulaḥ svargamāpnuyāt ।śarayantraṃ pustakāya sūtraṃ vai patrasañcayaṃ ।।paṭṭikābandhavastrādi dadyād yaḥ svargamāpnuyāt ।yo dadyādbrahmalokī syāt pustakaṃ yasya vai gṛhe ।।tasyotpātabhayaṃ nāsti bhuktimuktimavāpnuyāt ।yūyaṃ samarata cāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ rūpamaiśvaraṃ ।sūto gataḥ pujitastaiḥ śaunakādyā hariṃ yāyaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe āgneyapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītyadhikatriśatatamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

samāptamāgneyaṃ purāṇaṃ

athāgnipurāṇa pariśiṣṭam

agnipurāṇasya kakārādi-cihnita-daśasaṃkhyakādarśa-pustakānāṃ madhye navasu ādarśapustakeṣu yamagītādhyāyāt paraṃ purāṇa-māhātmyādhyāyena pustakaṃ sampūrṇaṃ । ga-cihnita-pustake tu yama-gītādhyāyāt paraṃ atiriktatrayastriṃśat saṃkhyakasṛṣṭiprakaraṇādyadhyāyā vartante । uktādhyāyānāṃ navasu ādarśapustakeṣu avidyamānatvāt pramāṇyaṃ sandigdhaṃ । prāmāṇyepi sthānaviśeṣe viluptākṣarapariśuddhaga-cihnitaikamātrādarśapustakamavalambya uktātiriktādhyāyātramudrāpaṇe samartho nābhūvaṃ । parantvetadvijñāpanāya gacihnitādarśapustakamātrasthitātirikta katipayādhyāyā yathāśakti pariśodhya pariśiṣṭarūpeṇa mudrāpitāḥ । gacihnitādarśapustakasya viluptākṣaratvādapariśuddhatvācca asya pariśiṣṭasya vahuṣu sthāneṣu asādhupāṭhā vartante iti

chapter 

ś prathamo adhyāyaḥ

sūta uvāca
brahmā bhūtva jagatsṛṣṭau narasiṃhaḥ pravartate ।tathā te kathayiṣyāmi bharadvāja nibodha me ।।nārāyaṇākhyo bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ ।utpannaḥ prohyate priyapriyāmaropacārataḥ ।।

pāṭho ayam ādarśākṣaravilopena śīdhayitumaśakyaḥ
nijena tasya mānena āyurvarṣaśataṃ smṛtaṃ ।kālaś ca viṣṇuryastena tasyāyuḥ parigaṇyate ।।anyeṣāñcaiva bhūtānāṃ carāṇāmacarāś ca ye ।bhūmimṛtsāgarādīnāmaśeṣāṇāñca sattama ।।aṣṭādaśa nimeṣāś ca kāṣṭhaikā parikīrtitā ।kāṣṭhāstriṃśat kalāstriṃśat kalā jñeyā muhūrtakaṃ ।।tāvat saṃkhyair ahorātraṃ muhūrtair mānuṣaṃ smṛtaṃ ।ahorātrāṇi tāvanti māsaḥ pakṣadvayātmakaḥ ।।taiḥ ṣaḍabhirayanaṃ māsair dve ayane dakṣiṇottare ।ayanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ rātrirdevānāmuttaraṃ dinaṃ ।।ayanadvayañca varṣañca martyānāṃ parikīrtitaṃ ।nṛṇāṃ māsaḥ pitṝṇāntu ahorātramudāhṛtaṃ ।।vasvādīnāmahorātraṃ mānuṣo vatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ ।divyair varṣasahasraistu kṛtatretādisaṃjñitaṃ ।।caturdarśadvādaśabhistadvibhāgaṃ nibodha me ।catvāri trīṇi dve caikaṃ kṛtādiṣu yathākramaṃ ।।divyābdānāṃ sahasrāṇi yugeṣvāhuḥ purāvidaḥ ।tatpramāṇaiḥ śataiḥ sandhyā pūrvā tatrābhidhīyate ।।sandhyāṃśakaś ca tattulyo yugasyānantaro hi saḥ ।sandhyāsandhyāṃśayormadhye yaḥ kālo vartate dvija ।।yugākhyaṃ sa tu vijñeyaḥ kṛtatre tādisaṃjñitaṃ ।kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparañca kaliśceti catuyugaṃ ।।procyate tat sahasrañca brahmaṇo divasaṃ dvija ।

brahmaṇo divase brahmanmanavaś ca caturdaśa ।।bhavanti pratimānañca teṣāṃ kālakṛtaṃ śubhaṃ ।saptarṣayaḥ surāḥ śakro manustatsūnavo nṛpāḥ ।।ekakāle hi sṛjyante saṃkriyante ca pūrvavat ।caturyugānāṃ saṅkhyātā sāhyekāntekasaptatī ।।manvantaraṃ manoḥ kālaḥ śakrādīnāmapi dvija ।aṣṭhau śatasahasrāṇi divyayā saṅkhyayā sūta ।।ekapañcāśattathānyāni sapta cānyāni vai mune ।viṃśatiś ca sahasrāṇi kāloyaṃ sādhikaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।brāhmamevamaharjñeyametadevānukīrtitaṃ ।etasmin vai sa manasā sṛṣṭvā devāṃs tathā pitṝn ।।gandharvān dānavān yakṣān rākṣasān guhyakāṃs tathā ।ṛṣīn vidyādharāṃś caiva manuṣyāṃś ca paśūṃs tathā ।।pakṣiṇaḥ sthāvarāṃś caiva pipīlikabhujaṅgamān ।cāturvarṇyaṃ tathā sṛṣṭaṃ niyujyādharakarmaṇi ।।punardinānte trailokyamapasaṃhṛtya sa prabhuḥ ।śete so anantaśayane tāvatīṃ rātrimavyayaḥ ।।tasyānte abhūnmahākalpaḥ pādma ity abhiviśrutaḥ ।tasminmatsyāvatāro abhūnmanthanārthaṃ mahodadheḥ ।।tadvadvarāhakalpaś ca tṛtīyaḥ parikalpitaḥ ।tatra viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ vārāhaṃ vapurāsthitaḥ ।।

pāṭho ayaṃ na sādhuḥ

sṛṣṭvā jagadvyoma dharāntu toyaṃ prajāstu sṛṣṭvā
sakalāstatheśaḥ ।naimittikākhye pralaye samastaṃ hṛtvāvaśete harirādidevaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sṛṣṭi-prakaraṇaṃ nāma prathamo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha dvitīyo adhyāyaḥ

sūta uvāca
atra suptasya devasya nābhau padmamajāyata ।tasmin padme mahābhāga vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ।।brahotpannaḥ sa tenoktaḥ prajāḥ sṛja mahāmate ।evamuktvā tirobhāvaṃ gato nārayaṇaḥ prabhuḥ ।।tathetyuktaṃ gataṃ devaṃ viṣṇuṃ brahmā vicintayan ।āste kiñcijjagaddhetu nādhyagacchata kiñcana ।।tāvattasya mahān krodho brahmaṇo abhūnmahātmanaḥ ।tato rudraḥ samutpannastasyāṅke roṣasammavaḥ ।।rudan sa kathitastena brahmaṇāvyaktajanmanā ।nāma me dehi cedyuktantasya rudretyasau dadau ।।so api tena sṛjamveti prokto lokamimaṃ punaḥ ।asakṛcchrāntasalile sasarja tapase dhṛtaḥ ।।

tasmin salilamagne tu punaranyaṃ prajāpatiṃ ।brahmā sasarja bhūteśo dakṣiṇāttiṣṭhato aparaṃ ।।dakṣaṃ vāme tatottiṣṭhet tasya patnīmajījanat ।sa tasyāṃ janayāmāsa manuṃ svāyambhuvaṃ prabhuṃ ।।tasmāt sambhāvitā sṛṣṭiḥ prajānāṃ brahmaṇā tathā ।ityevaṃ kathitā sṛṣṭirmayā te munisattama ।sṛjato jagadīśasya kimbhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi ।।
bharadvāja uvāca
saṃkṣepeṇaitadākhyātaṃ tvayā me lomaharṣaṇa ।vistareṇa punarvrūhi ādisṛṣṭiṃ mahāmate ।।
sūta uvāca
tathaitadaṇḍāvasāne niśāsūptotthitaḥ prabhuḥ ।sattvodriktastadā brahmā śūnyaṃ lokamavaikṣata ।।nārāyaṇaḥ pareṇārcyaḥ pūrveṣāmapi pūrvajaḥ ।brahmasvarūpo bhagavān anādiḥ sarvasambhavaḥ ।।imañce dehavantohā ślokaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prati ।brahmasvarūpinaṃ devaṃ jagataḥ prabhavāvyayaṃ ।।āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ ।ayanaṃ tasya tat pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।sṛṣṭiṃ cintayatastasya kalpādiṣu yathā purā ।avṛddhipūrvakantasya prādurbhūtamahomayaḥ ।।tamo moho mahāmohastāmikhādyajasaṃjñakaḥ ।avidyāḥ pañca pūrveṣāṃ prādurbhūtā mahātmanaḥ ।।

ādarśākṣaravilopāt pāṭho ayaṃ śodhayitumaśakyaḥ

pāṭho ayaṃ na sādhuḥ
pañcadhāvasthitaḥ sargo dhyāyataḥ pratibodhanāt ।mukhyasargaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sargavidbhirvicakṣaṇaiḥ ।।punaranyantathā tasya dhyāyataḥ sargamuttamaṃ ।tiryakśrotaḥ samutpannastiryakśrotaṃ ??? ??? smṛtaḥ ।।paśvādayaste vikhyātā utpathagrāhiṇastu te ।tamapyasādhakaṃ matvā tiryakaśrotaś caturmukhaḥ ।।ūrdhvaśrotastṛtīyastu pārthivordhvamavartata ।tatordhvacāriṇo devāḥ sahasargasamudbhavāḥ ।।yadā tuṣṭo na sargañca tadā tasthau prajāpatiḥ ।asādhakāṃstu tānmatvā mukhyasargasamudbhavān ।।tataḥ sa cintayan vipra ārvāk śrotastu sa smṛtaḥ ।arvākśrotastathotpannā manuṣyāḥ sādhakā matāḥ ।।te ca prakāśavahanāstamodrijā rajodhikāḥ ।tasmātte duḥkhavahanā bhūyo bhūyaś ca kāriṇaḥ ।।ityete kathitāḥ sargāḥ te tatra munisattama ।prathamo mahataḥ sargastanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyakaḥ ।।vaikārikastṛtīyastu samaha aintriyakaḥ smṛtaḥ ।mukhyasargaḥ caturthastu ??? ??? ??? sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।tiryak śrotastu yaḥ proktastiryagyoniḥ sa pañcamaḥ ।tatordhvaśrotaṣāṃ ṣaṣṭho devasargastu saptamaḥ ।।tatorvāk śrotasaḥ śreṣṭhasaptamaḥ saptamānuṣaḥ ।aṣṭamonugrahaḥ sargaḥ sa sāttvikastāmaso hi saḥ ।।navamo rudrasargastu navasargāḥ prajāpateḥ ।

pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu priyāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।prākṛtāvaikṛtāś caiva jagatomūlahetavaḥ ।sṛjato brahmaṇaḥ sṛṣṭirutpannā ye mayeritāḥ ।।tato vikārastu parāpaveśaḥ śaktyā praviśyātha sasarja sarvaṃ ।nārāyaṇaḥ sarvagaraikarūpaḥ brahmādirūpair jagadekanāthaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sṛṣṭi-prakaraṇaṃ nāma dvitiyo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha tṛtīyo adhyāyaḥ

sṛṣṭi-prakaraṇaṃ

bharadvāja uvāca
navadhā sṛṣṭirutpānā brahmano avyaktajanmanaḥ ।kathaṃ sā vavṛdhe sūta etatkathaya me adhunā ।।
sūta uvāca
prathamaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā rudrasyānu tapodhanāḥ ।sanakādayaś ca ye sṛṣṭā marīcyādaya eva ca ।।marīciratriś ca tathā aṅgirāḥ pulahaḥkatuḥ ।punastyaś ca mahātejāḥ pracetā bhṛgureva ca ।।nārado daśamaś caiva vasiṣṭhaś ca mahādyutiḥ ।sanakādayo nivṛttyākhye te ca charme niyojitāḥ ।।

pravṛttyākhye marīcyādyā mokṣaike nārado muniḥ ।yo asau prajāpatisthasya dakṣo nāmāṅgasambhavaḥ ।।tasya dauhitravaṃśena jagadetaccarācaraṃ ।devāś ca dānavāś caiva gandharvoragapakṣiṇaḥ ।।sarve dakṣasya kanyāsu jātāḥ paramadhārmikāḥ ।caturvidhāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca ।।vṛddhiṃ gatāni tānyeva manusargodbhavāni ca ।manusargasya kartāro marīcyādyā maharṣayaḥ ।vasiṣṭhādyā mahābhāgā brahmaṇo mānasodbhavāḥ ।।sargeṣu bhūtāni viyanmukhāni kālena cāsau sṛjate parātmā ।sa eva paścā ??? ??? rājyarūpī munisvarūpī ca sṛjatyanantaḥ ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sṛṣṭi-prakaraṇaṃ nāma tritīyo adhyāyaḥ

chapter 

ś atha caturtho adhyāyaḥ

sṛṣṭi-prakaraṇaṃ

bharadvāja uvāca
rudrasargantu me bruhi vistareṇa mahāmate ।anusargaṃ marīcyādyāḥ sasṛjuste kathaṃ punaḥ ।।

mitrāvaruṇaputratvaṃ vaśiṣṭhasya kathaṃ bhavet ।brahmaṇo manasaḥ pūrvamutpannasya mahāgate ।।
sūta uvāca
rudrasṛṣṭintu vakṣyāmi tatsargañcaiva sattaṃ ।pratisargaṃ munīnāntu vistarādgadataḥ śṛṇu ।।kalpādāvātmanastulyaṃ sutaṃ pradhyāyatastataḥ ।prādurāsīt prabhoraṅge kumāro nīlalohitaḥ ।।ardhanārīśvaravapuḥ pracaṇḍo ati śarīravān ।tejasā bhāsayan sarvā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā ।।taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejasā dīptaṃ pratyuvāca prajāpatiḥ ।vibhajyātmānamadya tvaṃ mama vākyānmahāmate ।।ityukto brahmaṇā tena rudrastatra pratāpavān ।strībhāvaṃ puruṣatvañca pṛthak pṛthagathākarot ।।vibheda puruṣatvañca daśadhā vaikathā tu saḥ ।teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me dvijasattama ।।ajaikapādahirvradhnaḥ kapālī rudra eva ca ।haraś ca vahurūpaś ca tryambakaścāparājitaḥ ।।vṛṣākapiś ca śambhuś ca kapardo raivatas tathā ।ekādaśaite kathitā rudrāstribhuvaneśvarāḥ ।।strītvañcaiva tathā rudro vibheda daśadhaikadhā ।tameva vahurūpeṇa patnītvena vyavasthitā ।।tapastaptvā jale ghoramuttānaḥ sa yadā purā ।tadā sa sṛṣṭavāndevo rudrastatra pratāpavān ।।tapobalena viprendra bhūtāni vividhāni ca ।

piśācān kaśmalāṃś caiva siṃhoṣṭramakarānanān ।।vetālapramukhānanyānanyāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ ।tena sṛṣṭāstu kailāse brahmabhūtāsthitanaha ।।vināyakānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ vriṃśatkoṭyardhameva ca ।nārakākhyavināśāya sṛṣṭavānskandameva ca ।।evamprakāro rudro asau mayā te kīrtitaḥ prabhuḥ ।anusargaṃ marīcyādeḥ kathayāmi nibodha me ।।devadyāḥ sthāvarāntāś ca prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayambhuvā ।yadāx syax tāḥ sarvāḥ nābhyavardhanta dhīmataḥ ।।tadā sa mānasān putrān sadṛśānātmano asṛjat ।marīcimatryaṅgirasaṃ pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratuṃ ।।pracetasaṃ vaśiṣṭhañca ??? ??? ??? ??? mahāmatiṃ ।nava brahmaṇa ity ete purāṇe niś cayaṃ gatāḥ ।।agninaś ca pitaraś caiva brahmaputro tu mānasau ।sṛṣṭikāle mahābhāga dharmaṃ svāyambhuvaṃ manuṃ ।।śatarūpāñca sṛṣṭvā tu kanyāṃ sa manave dadau ।tasmācca puruṣāddevī śatarūpā vyajāyata ।।priyavratottānapādau prasutīñcaiva kanyakāṃ ।dadau prasūtiṃ dakṣāya manuḥ khāyambhuvaḥ sūtāṃ ।।prasūtiś ca tadā dakṣāccatvāro viṃśatis tathā ।sasarja kanyakāstāsāṃ śṛṇu nāmāni me adhunā ।।śraddhā sūtirdhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā ।

pāṭho ayaṃ na sādhuḥ
buddhirlajjā vapuḥ śāntiḥ siddhiḥ kīrtistrayodaśa ।।patnyarthaṃ pratijagrāha dharmo dākṣāyaṇīḥ prabhuḥ ।śraddhādīnāntu patnīnāṃ jātāḥ kāmādayaḥ sutāḥ ।।dharmasya putrapautrādyair dharmavaṃśo vivardhitaḥ ।tāsu śiṣṭā yavīyasyastāsāṃ nāmāni kīrtaye ।।sambhūtiścānubhūyā ca smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā ।sannatiścātha satyā ca urjā khyātirdvijottama ।।svāhā ca daśamī jñeyā svadhā caikādaśī smṛtā ।etāś ca dattā dakṣeṇa ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanāṃ ।।marīcyādīnāñca ye putrāstānahaṃ kathayāmi te ।patrī marīceḥ sambhūtirjajñe sā kaśyapaṃ muniṃ ।।smṛtiścāṅgirasaḥ patnī prasūtā kanyakās tathā ।sinīvālī kuhaś caiva rākā cānumatis tathā ।।anasūyā tathaivātrerjajñe putrānakanmaṣān ।somaṃ durvāsasañcaiva dattātreyañca yoginaṃ ।।prītyāṃ pulastyabhāryāyāṃ dādānistatsuto abhavat ।tasya vai viśravāḥ putrastatputrā rāvaṇādikāḥ ।।??? ??? ??? rākṣasāḥ proktā laṅkāpuranivāsinaḥ ।yeṣāṃ badhāya lokeṣu viṣṇuḥ kṣīrodanīradhau ।।brahmādyaiḥ prārthito devair avatāramihākarot ।kardamaścāmbarīṣaś ca sahiṣṇuśce sutatrayam ।।kṣamā tu susuve bhāryā pulastyasya prajāpateḥ ।

kratostu satvatirbhāryā vālikhilvānasūyata ।।ṣaṣṭi tāni sahasrāni ṛṣīṇāmūrdhvaretasāṃ ।aṅguṣṭhaparvamānānāṃ jvaladbhāskaratejasāṃ ।।pracetaso atha satyāyāṃ satyasandhyāstrayaḥ sutāḥ ।jātāstatputrapautrāś ca śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।।urjāyāñca vasiṣṭhasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ ।rājā cordhvavāhuś ca saranaścānaghantime ।।surrūpāḥ śukra ity ete sarve saptarṣayo abhavan ।bhṛgoḥkhyātyāṃ samutpannā lakṣmīrviṣṇuparigrahā ।।tathā dhātāvidhātārrau khātyāṃ jātau sutau bhṛgoḥ ।āyatirniyatiś caiva meroḥ kanye suśobhane ।।dhātāvidhātroste bhārye tayorjātau sutābubhau ।prāṇaś caivamṛkaṇḍuś ca mārkaṇḍeyo mṛkaṇḍujaḥ ।।yena mṛtyurjito vipra purā nārāyaṇāya yā ।tato devaśivā jajñe prāṇasyāpi suto abhavat ।।dyutimāniti vikhyātaḥ sañjayastatsuto abhavat ।tato vaṃśo mahābhāga bhārgavo vistaraṃ gataḥ ।।yaścāsāvagnināmā ca brahmaṇastanayo agrajaḥ ।tasmāt svāhā sutāllebhe trīnudāraujaso dvijāḥ ।।pāvakaṃ pavamānañca śuciñcāpi jalāśinaṃ ।teṣāntu vaṃśajān vakṣye ṣaṭcatvāriṃśadīritān ।।

pāṭho ayaṃ ādarśadoṣeṇāpariśuddhaḥ
kathyante vahuśaś caite pitā pautratrayañca yat ।evamekonapañcāśadanvayāt parikīrtitāḥ ।।pitero brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā vyākhyātā ye mayā tava ।tebhyaḥ svadhā sute jajñe menā vai dharaṇīdharā ।।prajāḥ sṛjeti vyādiṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣaḥ svayambhuvā ।yathā sasarja bhūtāni tathā me śṛṇu sattama ।।bhūtāni manasā pūrvaṃ dakṣax ??? asṛjansune ।devānṛṣīn sagandharvānasurān pannagāṃstadā ।।padāsya sṛjamānasya na vyavardhanta vai prajāḥ ।tadā sañcintya sa muniḥ sṛṣṭihetoḥ prajāpatiḥ ।।maithunenaiva dharmeṇa sisṛkṣurvividhāḥ prajāḥ ।asiknī yadvṛhatkanyā vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ ।।ṣaṣṭi dakṣo asṛjat kanyā vairiṇyāmitiṃ naḥ śrutiḥ ।dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa ।।saptaviṃśati somāya catasro viṣṇunemine ।dve caiva buddhaputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tadā ।।dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe tadapatyāni me śṛṇu ।viśvedevāstu viśvāya sādhyāsādhyānasuyata ।।marutyāntu marutvanto vaso astu vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ ।bhānostu bhānavo devā muhūrtāyāṃ muhūrtajāḥ ।।nadyāyāñcaiva ghopākhyo nāgavīthyāñca jāmijāḥ ।pṛthivīviṣayaṃ pūrvamarundhatyāṃ vyajāyata ।।

saṅkalpāyāntu saṅkalpaḥ putro yajñe mahāmate ।ye tvanekavasuprāṇā devajyotiḥpurogamāḥ ।।vasavo aṣṭau samākhyātāsteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu ।āpo dhravaś ca somaś ca dharaś caivānilo analaḥ ।।pratyūṣaś ca prabhāṣaś ca vasavo aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ ।teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।।sādhyāś ca vahavaḥ proktāstatputrāś ca sahasraśaḥ ।aditirditirdanuś caiva ariṣṭā surasā tathā ।।surabhirvinatā caiva tāmrā krodhā khasā irā ।kadrurmuniś ca dharmajña tadapatyāni me śṛṇu ।।adityāṃ kaśyapājjātāḥ putrā dvādaśa śobhanāḥ ।tānahaṃ nāmato vakṣye śṛṇuṣva gadato mama ।।margo aṃśuraryamān caiva mitro atha varuṇas tathā ।savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃś ca mahāmate ।।tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaivendro dvādaśa viṣṇurucyate ।dityāḥ putradvayaṃ jajñe kaśyapāditi naḥ śrutaṃ ।।hiraṇyākṣo mahākāyo vārāheṇa tu yo hataḥ ।anye ca vahavo daityā ditiputrā mahābalāḥ ।।ariṣṭāyāntu gandharvāj jajñire ।surasāyāmathotpannā vidyādharagaṇā vahuḥ ।।gāstu vai janayāmāsa surabhyāṃ kaśyapo muniḥ ।vinatāyāntu putrau dvau prakhyātau garuḍāruṇau ।।

garuḍo devadevasya viṣṇoramitatejasaḥ ।vāhanatvaṃ gataḥ prītyā aruṇaḥ sūryāsārathiḥ ।।tāmrāyāḥ kaśyapājjātāḥ ṣaṭputrāstān nibodha me ।aśva uṣṭrā gardabhāś ca hastino gavayā mṛgāḥ ।।krodhāyāṃ jajñire tadvat paśavo duṣṭajātayaḥ ।irā vṛkṣalatāvallītṛṇajātyaśvaputrikāḥ ।।khasā tu yakṣarakṣāṃsi munerapsarasas tathā ।kadruputrā mahānāgā dandaśūkā viṣorvaṇāḥ ।।saptaviṃśati yāḥ proktāḥ somapatnyo atha suvratāḥ ।tāsāṃ putrā mahāsatvā budhādyā abhavandvija ।।ariṣṭanemipatnīnāmapatyānīha ṣoḍaśa ।vahuputrasya viduṣaḥ tāmrāyāṃ vidyudādayaḥ ।।pratyaṅgiraḥsutāḥ śreṣṭhā ṛṣayo ṛṣisatkṛtāḥ ।kṛśāśvasya tu devarṣerdevapraharaṇāḥ sutāḥ ।।ete yugasahasrānte jāyante punareva hi ।ete kaśyapadāyādāḥ kīrtitāḥ sthāṇujaṅgamāḥ ।।eteṣāṃ putrapautrādyair vṛddhā sṛṣṭiḥ prajāpateḥ ।sthirau sthitasya devasya nārasiṃhasya dhīmataḥ ।।etā vibhṛtayo vipra mayā te parikīrtitāḥ ।kathitā dakṣakanyānāṃ mayā te apatyasantatiḥ ।śraddhāvān yaḥ smaredetān yaśaḥsantānavān bhavet ।।sargānusargau kathitau mayā te samāsataḥ sṛṣṭivivṛddhihetoḥ ।

paṭhante ye viṣṇuparāḥ sadā narāḥ idaṃ dvijāste vimalā
bhavanti ca ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe sṛṣṭiprakaraṇaṃ nāma caturtho adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha pañcamo adhyāyaḥ

vāsiṣṭhasya mitrāvaruṇaputratvakathanaṃ

sūta uvāca
sṛṣṭiste kathitā viṣṇormayā te jagato dvija ।devadānavayakṣādyā yathotpannā mahātmanā ।।yamudiśya tvayā pṛṣṭhaḥ purāhamṛṣisannidhau ।mitrāvaruṇaputratvaṃ vasiṣṭhasya kathantviti ।।tadahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi puṇyākhyānaṃ purātanaṃ ।śṛṇuṣvaikāgramanasā bharadvāja mayeritaṃ ।।sarvadharmārthatatvajñaḥ sarvavedidāṃvaraḥ ।pārāgaḥ sarvavidyānāṃ dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ ।।tena dattāḥ śubhāḥ kanyāḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa ।tāsāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi nibodha ca mamādhunā ।।aditirditirdanuḥ kāṣṭhā muhūrtā siṃhikā mune ।srutā kroṣṭā ca surabhirvinatā surasā ।।kadruś ca surasā caiva yātudevī śunī smṛtā ।dakṣasyaitā duhitarastāḥ prādāt kaśyapāya saḥ ।।

tāsāṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca aditirnāmanāmataḥ ।aditiḥ susuve putrān dvādaśāgnisamaprabhān ।।teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuta dvijasattamāḥ ।yair idaṃ vāsavaṃ naktaṃ vartate kramaśaḥ sadā ।।bhargo aṃśuścāryamā caiva mitro atha varuṇas tathā ।savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃś ca mahāmata ।।tvaṣṭā pūṣā tataivendro viṣṇurdvādaśamaḥ smṛtaḥ ।ete vai dvādaśādityā varṣantipatanti ca ।।tasyāstu madhyamaḥ putro varuṇo nāmanāmataḥ ।lokapāla itikhyāto vāruṇyāṃ diśi śabdyate ।।paścimasya samudrasya pratīcyāṃ diśi rājate ।jātarūpamayaḥ śrīmānasto nāma śiloccayaḥ ।।sarvaratnamayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ dhātuprasravaṇānvitaiḥ ।saṃyuktobhāti śailo asau nānāratnamayaḥ śubhaḥ ।।mahodarīguhābhiś ca siṃhasārdūlanāditaḥ ।nānāviviktabhūmīṣu devagandharvasevitaḥ ।।yasmin gate dinakare tamasā pūryate jagat ।tasya śṛṅge mahādivyā jāmbunadamayī śubhā ।।ramyā maṇimayaistambhair vihitā viśvakarmaṇā ।purī sukhāvatī nāma samṛddhā bhogasādhanaiḥ ।।tasyāṃ varuṇa ādityo dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā ।pāti sarvānimān lokānniyukto brahmaṇā svayaṃ ।।

upāsyamānīgandharvaistathaivāpsarasāṅgaṇaiḥ ।divyagandhānudīptāṅgo divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ ।।kadācidvaruṇo yāto mitreṇa sahito vanaṃ ।kurukṣetre śabhe araṇye sadā brahmarṣisevite ।।nānāpuṣpaphalopete nānārtho samanvite ।āśramāyax dṛśyante munīnāmūrdharetasāṃ ।।tasmiṃstīrthe samāśritya vahupuṣpaphalodake ।cīrakṛṣṇājinadharau ceratustapa uttamaṃ ।।tatraikasmin vanoddeśe vimalo atha hradaḥ śubhaḥ ।bahugulmalatākīrṇo nānāpakṣiniṣevitaḥ ।।nānātaruvanacchanno nalinyā copaśobhitaḥ ।pauṇḍarīka itikhyāto mīnakacchapasevitaḥ ।।ceraturmitrāvaruṇau bhrātarau brahmacāriṇau ।tantu deśaṃ gatau deśāt vicarantau yadṛcchayā ।।tābhyāṃ tatra tadākṛṣṭā urvaśī tu varāpsarāḥ ।snāpayantī sahitānyābhiḥ sakhībhiḥ sā varānanā ।।gāyantī dihasantī ca manojñā madhurasvanā ।gaurī kamalagarbhābhā snigdhā kṛṣṇaśiroruhā ।।padmapatraviśālākṣī raktoṣṭhī mṛdubhāṣiṇī ।śaṅkhakundendusadṛśair dantair aviralaiḥ samaiḥ ।।subhruḥ sunāsā sunakhā suranāṭā manasvinī ।karasammitamadhyāṅgī pīnorujaghanasthalī ।।

tanvaṅgī madhurālāpā sumadhyā cāruhāsinī ।raktotpalakarāpādāmupadī vinayānvitā ।।pūrṇacandranibhā bālā mattākuñjaragāminī ।dṛṣṭvā tanvyāstu tadrūpaṃ tau devau viṣayaṃgatau ।।tasyā hāsyena lāsyena smitena lalitena ca ।mṛdunā vāmanācaiva śītalena sugandhinā ।।mattabhramaragītena puṃskokilarutena ca ।susvareṇa hi gītena urvaśyā madhureṇa ca ।īkṣitau ca kaṭākṣeṇa skandatustā vubhāvapi ।।vasiṣṭha mitrāvaruṇātmajo asi tatrocurāgatya hi viśvadevāḥ ।retastrabhāgaṃ kamaleca vantau vasiṣṭha sevantu pitāmahojaṃ ।।tattridhā patitaṃ retaḥ kamale atha sthale jale ।kamale atha vasiṣṭhastu jāto hi munisattama ।sthale tvagastyaḥ sambhūto jale matsyo mahādyutiḥ ।।sa tatra jāto mahimān vasiṣṭhaḥ ।kumbhetvagastyaḥ salile ca matsyaḥ ।।sthale tāvapi tapyete punarugratarantapaḥ ।

pāṭho ayaṃ na sādhuḥ

pāṭho ayaṃ na samīconaḥ

śloky ayaṃ ādarśadoṣeṇa śodhayitumaśakyaḥ
tapasā prāptakāmo asau paraṃ jyotiḥ sanātanaṃ ।।tapasyantau suraśreṣṭhau brahmāgatyedamabravīt ।mitrāvaruṇau devau putravantau mahādyutī ।।siddhirbhavatvatiśayā yuvayorvaiṣṇavī punaḥ ।khādhikāre tu sthīyetāmadhunā lokasākṣiṇau ।।ityuktvāntardadhe brahmā tau sthitrau svādhikārake ।evaṃ te kathitaṃ vipra vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ ।।mitrāvaruṇaputratvamagastyasya ca dhīmataḥ ।idaṃ puṃsīyamākhyānaṃ purāṇaṃ pāpanāśanaṃ ।।sāmātyaputro nṛpatiḥ śrutvā pāpāt pramucyate ।putrakāmāś caye kecit śṛṇvantīdaṃ śucivratāḥ ।।acirādeva putrāṃstu labhante nātra saṃśayaḥ ।yaś caitat paṭhate nityaṃ havyakavye dvijottama ।।devāś ca pitarastasya tṛptā yānti yathāsukhaṃ ।yaś caitat paṭhate nityaṃ prātarutthāya mānavaḥ ।।vindate sumahāputrān svargalokañca gacchati ।varaṃ mayeritaṃ purā vedaparair udīritaṃ ।।paṭhiṣyate yastu śṛṇoti sarvadā ।sa yātiśuddho adhikalokamañjasā ।।
e ity āgneye mahāpurāṇe vasiṣṭhasya mitrāvaruṇaputratvakathanaṃ nāma pañcamo adhyāyaḥ ।।

chapter 

ś atha ṣaṣṭho adhyāyaḥ

mārkaṇḍeyopākhyānaṃ

bharadvāja uvāca
mārkaṇḍeyena mininā kathaṃ mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ ।etadākhyāhi me sūta tvayaitat suciraṃ purā ।।
sūta uvāca
idantu mahādākhyānaṃ bharadvāja śṛṇaṣva me ।śṛṇvantu ṛṣayaḥ sarve purāvṛttaṃ vravīmyahaṃ ।।kurukṣetre mahāpuṇye vyāsapīṭhau varāśrame ।tatrāsīnaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyaṇaṃ muniṃ ।।kṛtasnānaṃ kṛtajapaṃ muniśiṣyaiḥ samāvṛtaṃ ।vedavedāṅgatattvajñaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradaṃ ।।praṇipatya yathānyāyaṃ śukaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।idameva samuddiśya tam papraccha kṛtāñjaliḥ ।।yaduddiśya vayaṃ pṛṣṭāstvayātra munisannidhau ।narasiṃhasya bhaktena puṇyatīrthanivāsinā ।।
śuka uvāca
mārkaṇḍeyena muninā kathaṃ mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ ।etadākhyāhi me tāta śrotumicchāmi te adhunā ।।
vyāsa uvāca
mārkaṇḍeyena muninā yathā mṛtyuḥ parājitaḥ ।tathā te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu vatsa samāhitaḥ ।।śṛṇvantu munayaśceme kathyamānaṃ mayādhunā ।

mahiṣyāś caiva śṛnvantu mahadākhyānamuttamaṃ ।।bhṛgoḥ khyātyāṃ mamutpanno mṛkaṇḍurnāma vai sutaḥ ।sumitrā nāma patrī ca mṛkaṇḍostu mahātmanaḥ ।।dharmajñā dharmaniratāṃ patiśuśrūṣaṇe ratā ।tasyāṃ tasya suto jāto mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmatiḥ ।।bhṛgoḥ pautro mahābhāgo vamotvaca mahāmatiḥ ।bubudhe vallabho vālaḥ pitā tatra kṛtakriyaḥ ।।tasmin vai jātamātre tu ādeśī kaścidabravīt ।varṣe dvādaśame putro mṛtvyārtaś ca bhaviṣyati ।।śrutvā tanmātāpitarau duḥkhitau tau babhūvatuḥ ।paribhūyamānahṛdayau taṃ nirīkṣya mahāmatiṃ ।।tathāpi tat pitā dhīmān yatnāt kālakriyāṃ tataḥ ।cakāra sarvāṃ medhāvī prahito asau gurorgṛhaṃ ।।vevamevādyastrāste guruśuśruṣanodyataḥ ।svīkṛtya vedaśāstrāṇi sa puṇyagṛhamāgataḥ ।।mātāpitrornamaskṛtya pādayorvinayānvitaḥ ।tasthau tatra gṛhe dhīmān mārkaṇḍeyo mahādyutiḥ ।।taṃ nirīkṣya mahātmānaṃ tatśraddhāñca vilakṣaṇāṃ ।duḥkhitau tau bhṛśaṃ tatra tanmātṛpitarau śuka ।।tau dṛṣṭvā duḥkhamāpannau mārkaṇḍeyo mahādyutiḥ ।

pāṭho ayaṃ na pariśuddhaḥ

pāṭho ayaṃ na sādhuḥ
uvāca vacanaṃ tatra kimarthaṃ duḥkhamīdṛśaṃ ।।yadetat kuruṣe mātastātena saha dhīmatā ।vaktum arhasi duḥkhasya kāraṇaṃ mama pṛcchataḥ ।।ityuktā putrakeṇātha mātā tasya mahātmanaḥ ।kathayāmāsa tatsarvaṃ ādeśī yad uvāca ha ।।tac chrutvāsau suniścāha mātaraṃ pitaraṃ punaḥ ।pitrā sārdhaṃ tvayā mātarmarkāryaṃ duḥkhamanvapi ।।apaneṣyāmi mṛtyuṃ x tapasā nātra saṃśayaḥ ।yathā cāhaṃ cirāyuḥsthāṃ kuryāṃ tathā mahattapaḥ ।।ityuktvāsau samāśvāsan pitarau na sadyasāt ।tyajanvīna vanaṃ nāma nānāṛṣisamākulaṃ ।।tatrāsau munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ svāsīnaṃ svapitāmahaṃ ।bhṛguṃ dadarśa dharmajñaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmatiḥ ।।bhṛgurāha mahābhāgaṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tadā śiśuṃ ।kimāgato asi putrastu pituste kuśalaṃ punaḥ ।।mātuś ca bāndhavānāñca kimāgamanakāraṇaṃ ।ityevamukto muninā mārkaṇḍeyo mahātmanā ।।uvāca sakalaṃ tasmai ādeśivacanantadā ।pautrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā punastaṃ bhṛgurabravīt ।evaṃ matimahāvuddhe kiṃ tvaṃ karma cikīrṣasi ।।
mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
bhūtāpahāriṇaṃ mṛtyuṃ jetumicchāmi sāmprataṃ ।

pāṭho ayamādarśadoṣaduṣṭaḥ
tavaopadeśāttu guro tatropāyaṃ vadasva naḥ ।।
gurur uvāca
nārāyaṇamanabhyarcya tapasā manasā suta ।ko jetuṃ śaknuyān mṛtyuṃ tatastaṃ tapasārcaya ।।tama ??? ntamajaṃ viṣṇuṃ acyutaṃ puruṣottamaṃ ।bhaktapriyaṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ bhaktyā taṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja ।।tameva śaraṇaṃ pūrvaṃ gatavānnārado muniḥ ।tapasā mahatā vatsa nārāyaṇamanāmayaṃ ।।tatprasādānmahābhāga nārado brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ ।jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ vijityāsau dīrghāyurvartate sukhaṃ ।।tamṛte puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ janārdanaṃ ।bhaktānāṃ vatsalaḥ kuryāt mṛtyusenānivāraṇaṃ ।।tasmāt tvaṃ lokakartāraṃ viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ śriyaḥpatiṃ ।govindaṃ gopatiṃ devaṃ satataṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja ।।nārasiṃhamajaṃ devaṃ yadi pūjayase sadā ।vatsa jetāsi mṛtyuṃ tvaṃ sasainyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
vyāsa uvāca
uktaḥ pitāmahenaivaṃ bhṛguṇātha tamabravīt ।mārkaṇḍeyo mahātejā vinayātsa pitāmahaṃ ।।ārādhyaḥ kathitastāta viṣṇureveti niś cayāt ।ārādhitaś ca bhagavān mama mṛtyuṃ harediti ।।kathamatra mayā kāmyamacyutārādhanaṃ guro ।yenāsau mama tuṣṭastu mṛtyuṃ sadyo apaneṣyati ।।bhṛgur uvācatuṅgā ca bhaginī bhadrā dve nadyau mantrasambhave ।
